column2: Chun, hnuoi hi a sie le a ruok ngawt a na, tui inthûktak chung chu ân thim mup a. Pathien Thlarau chun tui chunghai chu a awp zing a.
Chun, Pathienin, “Var hung um raw se,” a ta; chuongchun, var a hung um ta a.
Chun, Pathienin var chu a en a, ṭha a ti hle a: chuongchun, Pathien chun var le inthim chu a ṭhe ta a.
Pathienin var chu “Sûn” ân bûk a, inthim chu “Zân” ân bûk a. Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a; chu chu ni khatna.
Chun, Pathienin, “Tui le tui kâra chun boruok lientak um sienla, chu chun tui le tuihai chu ṭhe raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Pathienin boruok lientak chu a siem a, boruok lientak hnuoia tui umhai le boruok lientak chunga tui umhai chu a ṭhe ta a: chuong angtak chu a lo ni ta a.
Chun, Pathienin boruok lientak chu “Vân” ân bûk a. Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a; chu chu ni hnina.
Chun, Pathienin, “Vân hnuoia tui umhai chu hmun khatah luong khâwm sienla, khawmuol chu inlang raw se,” a ta: chuongchun, chuong angtak chun a hung ni ta a.
Pathienin khawmuol chu “Hnuoi” ân bûk a, tui um khâwmhai chu “Tuipuihai” ân bûk a: Pathienin chu chu a en a, ṭha a ti hle a.
Chun, Pathienin, “Hnuoi hin hlo dâm, thlai chi nei dâm, thei kûng hnuoi chunga mâni chi um dân ding anga ra, a ra sûnga a chi um dâm chu hung insuo raw se,” a ta: chuong angtak chun a hung um ta a.
Hnuoi chun hlo dâm, thlai mâni um dân ding anga chi nei dâm, thing mâni chi um dân ding anga ra, a ra sûnga a chi um dâm chu ân suo ta a: Pathienin a en a, ṭha a ti hle a.
Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a, chu chu ni thumna.
Chun, Pathienin, “Sûn le zân ṭhêna dingin vân boruok lientaka chun varhai um sienla, chuonghai chu inchikna dâm, hunbi dâm, ni dâm, kum dâm hrietna ding ni raw se;
hnuoi chung elvar dingin vân boruok lientaka chun varhai ni bawk raw hai se,” a ta: chuong angtak chun a hung ni ta a.
Chuongchun, Pathienin var ropuitak pahni khi a siem ta a; var ropui lem chu sûn rorêltu dingin, var ropui naw lem chu zân rorêltu dingin: arasihai khawm a siem bawk a.
Pathienin chuonghai chu vân boruok lientaka khin a sie ta a: hnuoi chung sukvar ding le,
sûn le zân chunga rorêl ding le var le inthim chu ṭhe dingin. Pathienin chu chu a en a, ṭha a ti hle a.
Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a, chu chu ni lina.
Chun, Pathienin, “Tuihai chun thilsiem chângthei hringna neihai tamtak insuo ṭeu hai sienla, vatehai khawm chu hnuoi chunga vân boruok lientaka hin vuong raw hai se,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Pathienin tuipuia thilhring lientak takhai chu a siem a, thilsiem hringna nei le chângthei tinrêng tuiin a insuo ṭeuhai chu anni chi um dân ding ang sengin a siem bawk a, vate thla nei tinrêng khawm anni chi um dân ding ang sengin a siem a: Pathienin chu chu a en a, ṭha a ti hle a.
Chun, Pathienin, “Chi tamtak inthlain hung pung unla, tuipuia tuihai suksip ro, vatehai khawm hnuoiah pung raw hai se,” tiin mal a sâwm a.
Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a; chu chu ni ngana.

Chun, Pathienin, “Hnuoi chun thilsiem hringna neihai, anni chi um dân ding ang sengin: ran, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwnhai le ramsahai, anni chi um dân ding ang sengin insuo raw se,” a ta: chuong angtak chu a hung ni ta a.

Chuongchun, Pathienin, ram sa anni chi um dân ding ang sengin, ran dâm anni chi um dân ding ang sengin, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwnhai po po, anni chi um dân ding ang sengin a siem a: Pathienin chu chu a en a, ṭha a ti hle a.

Chun, Pathienin, “Ei angpuiin, eini angtakin, mihriem siem ei ta, anni chu tuipuia nga chunga dâm, chunglêng vate chunga dâm, ran chunga dâm, hnuoi chung po poa le thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn po po chunga dâm, thu inneitir ei tiu,” a ta.

Chun, Pathienin anni chu mal a sâwm a, Pathien ma chun an kuomah, “Chi tamtak thlain hung pung unla, hnuoi hi hluo sip unla, in thu thuin inumtir ro; tuipuia nga chunga dâm, chunglêng vate chunga dâm, thilhring hnuoi chunga bawkinvâka lâwn po po chunga dâm thu nei bawk ro,” a ta.
Chun, Pathien bawkin,“Ngai ta u, hnuoi chung po poa um thlai chi nei tinrêng le thing tinrêng chi nei ra um hai chu ka pêk cheu a nih: in bu ding nîng an tih.

Chun, hnuoia sa tinrêng kuoma dâm, chunglêng vate tinrêng kuoma dâm, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn tinrêng kuoma dâm, hringna nei taphawt kuoma chun, an bu dingin hlohna tinrêng ka pêk a nih,” a ta: Chuong angtak chu a hung ni ta a.
Chun, Pathienin a thilsiem tinrêng chu a en a, ngai ta, ṭha a ti êm êm a. Chuongchun, zântieng a um a, zîngtieng a um bawk a, chu chu a ni rukna a nih.
Chuongchun, hnuoi le vân chu an chunga umhai po po le chun siem zo a ni ta a.
Hienghai hi hnuoi le vân siem an ni dân chanchin chu a nih.
Hnuoia hlo hrim hrim hi hnuoiah a la um naw a, hnuoia thlai hrim hrim khawm hi a mâwng bawk nawh.
amiruokchu, hnuoia inthawkin sûm a hung suok a, hnuoi chung po po chu a sukhnâwng a.
Chun,
Chun, Edena inthawkin huon sukhnâwng dingin vadung a luong suok a; chutaka inthawk chun ân ṭhe dar a, pali a hung ni ta a.
A pakhatna hming chu Pison a na; chu chu Havila ram po po luong huoltu chu a nih; chutaka chun rângkachak a um a;
chu rama rângkachak chu ṭhatak a nih; chutaka chun delium le onik lung khawm a um.
Vadung pahnina hming chu Gihon a nih; chu chu Kus
Vadung pathumna hming chu Hiddekel a nih; chu chu Assuria ram saktienga luong chu a nih. Vadung palina chu Euphrates a nih.
Chun,
a suol le a ṭha hrietna thing ra ruok hi chu i fâk ding a ni nawh; i fâk chun i fâk ni ngeiin i thi ngei ding a nih,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Chun,
Chun,
Chuongchun, mihriem chun ran po po dâm, chunglêng vate dâm, ramsa tinrêng dâm hming chu a sak seng a; nisienlakhawm, mihriem ta ding chun a ṭhangpuitu ding a kawppui âwm mi a um naw a.
Chuongchun,
chun,
Chun, mihriem chun, “Hi zet hi chu ka ru ang ru neia, ka tisa ang tisa nei ngei chu a nih; Pasala inthawka lâk suok a ni leiin, ‘Nuhmei’ ti ding nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, pasal le a nuhmei chu an pahni chun saruokin an um a, an inzak chuong naw a.
Nuhmei chun rûl kuoma chun, “Ti lo e, huona thing rahai hi kan fâk thei a;
huon lailung lai taka thing um, chu ra ruok chu Pathienin, ‘in fâk ding a ni naw a, tâwk khawm in tâwk ding a ni nawh, chuong naw chun thîng in tih,’ a ti a nih,” a ta.
in fâk nia inthawk chun in mit hung var a ta, a suol le a ṭha hrein Pathien ang in hung ni ding a nih ti Pathienin a hriet zing a ni chu,” a ta.

Chuongchun, nuhmei chun thing ra chu fâk dinga ṭha a nih ti le, mit latak a nih ti le, mi sukvar dingin thing ra inhnarumtak a nih ti a hriet chun a ra chu a lo a, a fâk ta a; a kâwla um a pasal kuoma khawm chun ṭhen khat a pêk a, ama khawm chun a fâk ta a.
Chuongchun, an pahni chun an mit a hung var a, saruok an nih ti an hung inhriet ta a; theichang hna an ṭhui mat a, puonbil an insiem fâwm ta a.
Chun,
Chun,
Ama chun, “Huonah i ri ka hriet a, saruok ka ni leiin ka ṭi a, chuongchun, kân bihmang a nih,” a ta.
Ama chun “Saruok i nih ti tuin am a hril che a? Thing ra fâk lo ding ka ti kha i fâk a ni maw?” a ti a.
Mihriem chun, “A mi umpui dinga nuhmei i mi pêk ngei khan thing ra chu a mi pêk a, ka fâk ta a nih,” a ta.
Lalpa Pathien chun rûl kuoma chun, “Hieng ang hi i thaw leiin ran po po le ramsa tinrêng laia chun ṭawngsephurin um bîk i ta, bawkkhupin lâwn tâng i ta, i dam sûngin pilvut fa bawk i tih;

Nuhmei kuoma chun, “Nau vawnna le nau neinaa i rinumna chu nasatakin sukpung ka ta, natak tuorin nau nei hlak i ta; nisienlakhawm, i nuom zâwng chu i pasal tieng nîng a ta, ama chun i chungah thu nei a tih,” a ta.

Chun, Adam kuoma chun, “I nuhmei thu i zâwm a, thing pakhat, ‘A ra i fâk ding a ni nawh,’ tia thu ka pêk che kha a ra i fâk leiin hnuoi hi nanga leiin ṭawngsephurin a um tah a nih; i dam sûngin inrimtaka sinthawin a ra chu fa tâng i tih;
hnuoia i kîr nâwk hmakhat chu, i hmaiah thlan luong rak khawpin bu fa tâng i tih; hnuoia inthawka lâk suok i ni si a, pilvut i ni a, pilvutah i kîr nâwk ding a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, mihriem chun a nuhmei chu mi hring po po nu a ni leiin a hmingah Evi ân bûk a.
Chun,
chuleiin,
Chuongchun, mihriem chu a hnawt dawk ta a; chun, hringna thing lampui chu vêng dingin Eden huon saktieng panga chun Cherubhai le mei kâwlhnâm inlet tuo zawk zawk chu a sie ta bawk a.
Chun, Adam chun a nuhmei Evi chu a pâwl a; chuongchun, ân rai a, Kaina a hung nei a, “
Chun, a sang Abel a hung nei nâwk a. Abel chu berâm vêngtu a ni a, Kaina ruok chu hnuoi inlettu a nih.
Chun, a nakie chun hieng ang hi a na, Kaina chun
Kaina le a thilinhlân ruok chu a lâwm ve naw a. Chuongchun, Kaina chu a lunginsen êm êm a, a hmêl a hung inthim khup el ta a.

Thil thaw ṭha ni la chu pawm i ni naw ding am a nih? I thaw ṭha naw ruok chun suol chun kawtkhâr bulah ân chân zing che a nih; a dit zâwng chu nangma thuhne che a ni a, nisienlakhawm, nangin i thuhne lem ding a nih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun,
Hnuoi, i kuta inthawka i sang thisen dawng dinga a bâu lo katua inthawkin ṭawngsephur i ni tah,
hnuoi în let pha khawm a ṭhatna chu pe phal ta naw ni che; hnuoia hin tlânhmang le invai hung ni tâng i tih,” a ta.
Chun, Kaina chun

Ngai ta, nangin vawisûn hin hnuoi chunga inthawkin i mi hnawthmang ta si a; i mithmua inthawk thuphmangin ka um ding a ni ta a; hnuoia hin tlânhmang le invai ka lo ni ta ding a ni si a, chuleiin, a mi hmu taphawtin mi that el an tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Kaina chu
Kaina chun a nuhmei a pâwl a, chuongchun, ân rai a, Enok a nei a; chun, khuo a siem a, a khaw hminga chun a naupa hming chawiin Enok a sak a.
Enok chun Irad a nei a; Irad chun Mehujael a nei a; Mehujael chun Methusael a nei a; Methusael chun Lamek a nei a.
Lamek chun nuhmei pahni a nei a, pakhat hming chu Ada a ni a, pakhat hming chu Zila a nih.
Ada chun Jabal a nei a, ama chu puon ina um ran vaituhai thlatu a nih.
A sang hming chu Jubal a na, ama chu ṭingṭang le theihle mûttuhai po po thlatu a nih.
Zila khawm chun Tubal-kaina, dâr le thîr hriemhrei tinrêng suttu, a nei a; chun Tubal-kaina farnu chu Naama a nih.
Lamek chun a nuhmeihai kuoma chun,
“Ada le Zilla hai, ka rawl hre unla;
Lamek nuhmeihai, ka thu hril hi ngai ro:
Sukhliema ka um leiin mi ka that a,
Vuok thitlinga ka um leiin tlangvâl ka that a nih:
Kaina phuba hman a let saria lâk a ni ding chun,
Lamek phuba lem chu a let sâwmsari le pasariin lâk ni ngei a tih,” a ta.

Chun, Adam chun a nuhmei chu a pâwl nâwk a; chuongchun, ama chun naupasal a nei nâwk a, a hmingah Seth a sak a: “Pathienin Abel aiah chi thla dang a mi ruotpêk tah; Kaina chun ama a that ta si a,” a ti a.
Chun, ama, Seth ngei khawm chun naupasal a nei ta a; a hmingah Enos a sak a; chuong lai chun mihai chun
anni chu nuhmei le pasalah a siem a nih, siema an um ni khan mal a sâwm a, an hming dingin “Mihriem,” ân bûk a.
Adam chun kum za le sâwmthum a niin, ama angtak, ama angpui ngei naupasal a nei a; a hmingah Seth a sak a;
chun, Seth a nei hnung chun Adam chu kum za riet a la dam a; naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Adam dam sûng po chu kum za kuo le sâwmthum a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Seth chun kum za le panga a niin naupasal Enos a nei a;
chun, Enos a nei hnung chun Seth chu kum za riet le pasari a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Seth dam sûng po chu kum za kuo le sâwmpahni a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Enos chun kum sâwmkuo a niin naupasal Kenan a nei a;
Kenan a nei hnung chun Enos chu kum za riet le sâwmpanga a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Enos dam sûng po chu kum za kuo le panga a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Kenan chu kum sâwmsari a niin naupasal Mahalalel a nei a;
Mahalalel a nei hnung chun Kenan chu kum za riet le sâwmli a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Kenan dam sûng po chu kum za kuo le sâwm a na; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Mahalalel chun kum sâwmruk le panga a niin naupasal Jared a nei a;
Jared a nei hnung chun Mahalalel chu kum za riet le sâwmthum a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Mahalalel dam sûng po chu kum za riet le sâwmkuo panga a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Jared chun kum za le sâwmruk le pahni a niin naupasal Enok a nei a;
Enok a nei hnung chun Jared chu kum za riet a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Jared dam sûng chu kum za kuo le sâwmruk le pahni a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Enok chun kum sâwmruk le panga a niin naupasal Methusela a nei a;
Methusela a nei hnung chun Enok chu kum za thum sûng Pathien leh an lêng hmunkhat hlak a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Enok dam sûng po chu kum za thum le sâwmruk le panga a nih;
Methusela chun kum za le sâwmriet le pasari a niin naupasal Lamek a nei a;
Lamek a nei hnung chun Methusela chu kum za sari le sâwmriet le pahni a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a;
chuongchun, Methusela dam sûng po chu kum za kuo le sâwmruk le pakuo a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Lamek chu kum za le sâwmriet le pahni a niin naupasal a nei a;
“Ama ngei hin
Chun, Noa a nei hnung chun Lamek chu kum za nga le sâwmkuo le panga a la dam a; naunuhmei le naupasalhai a la nei nâwk a;
chun, Lamek dam sûng po chu kum za sari le sâwmsari pasari a nih; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, Noa chu kum za nga mi a na; Noa chun naupasal Sem, Ham, le Japheth a nei a.
Chun, hieng hi a na, hnuoi chungah mihriem an hung pung a, naunuhmeihai an hung nei tâwl chun,
Pathien naupasalhai chun mihriem naunuhmeihai chu hmêl ṭhatakin an hmu a; chuongchun, an dit zâwng taphawthai chu nuhmeiah an nei tâwl hlak a.
Chun,
Chun,
Chuongchun, Lalpa chun hnuoia hin mihriem a lo siem ta lei chun ân sîr hle a, lungril natnain a hmang pha ta a.
Chuongchun,
Noa ruok chun
Hienghai hi Noa thlahai chu an nih: Noa chu mi feltak a na, a dam ruolpuihai lai chun sawisêlbo a nih: Noa chu Pathien leh an lêng hmunkhat hlak.
Noa chun naupasal pathum, Sem, Ham le Japheth a nei a.
Chun, hnuoi hi Pathien mithmuin a se zo ta a, hnuoi hi inpâwngnêknain a sip zo ta bawk a.
Chun, Pathienin hnuoi hi a en a; chun, ngai ta, a se zo tah: tisa po poin hnuoia hin an umdân an suksiet zo ta si a.
Chun, Pathienin Noa kuoma chun, “Tisa po po suktâwpna ding thu ka sukthlûk tah: anni leiin hnuoi hi inpâwngnêknain a sip zo ta si a: chuongchun, ngai ta, a hnuoi pumin ka sukbohmang ding a nih.
I ta dingin fâr thingin lawng siem rawh: lawnga chun pindanhai siem i ta, a puo tieng le a sûng tieng chu a chârnain châr suok vawng rawh.
Hi hi i siem dân ding chu a nih: lawng dung tieng chu tawng za thum ni sienla, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmnga, ân sâng tieng chu tawng sâwmthum ni raw se.

Lawnga chun tukver siem i ta, a chung tieng tawng khat chinah i zo ding a nih; chun, lawng kawtkhâr chu a pangah i hawng ding a nih; sâwng hnuoihnung le sâwng hnina le sâwng thumna neiin i siem ding a nih.
Chun, ngai ta, keima ngeiin, tisa po po hringna thuoka inthuok taphawt chu vân hnuoia inthawka sukbohmang dingin hnuoia hin tui ka suklêt ding a nih; hnuoia thil tinrêng um hi thi vawng an tih.
Amiruokchu, ka thuthlung chu i kuomah sukdet lem ka tih, lawnga chun i lût ding a nih, nang lût i ta, i naupasalhai leh, i nuhmei leh, i nauhai nuhmeihai khawm i kuomah an lût ve ding a nih.
Chun, tisa po poa thilhring tinrêng laia mi, chi tin pahni peiin i kuoma a hringa um ve dingin lawnga chun i ṭhuoi lût ding a nih, a pui le a chal an ni seng ding a nih.

Vatehai anni chi umdân ang sengin, ranhai anni chi umdân ang sengin, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâk chi tinrêng anni chi umdân ang sengin, chi tin pahni pei a hringa um dingin, i kuomah an hung ve ding a nih.
Chun, bu fâk hlak ang chi po po la la, i kuomah sie khâwm rawh; chuongchun, nangni le anni ta dingin bu nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chuong ang chun Noa chun a thaw a, Pathienin a kuoma thu a pêk po po ang ngei chun a thaw ta a.
Chun,
Sa thieng tinrêng laia mi, a chal le a pui seng, tuok sari pei le, sa thiengnaw laia mi, a chal le a pui seng tuok khat peiin ṭhuoi i tih.
Chunglêng vate laia mi khawm, a pui le a chal seng, tuok sari peiin, hnuoi chung po poa chi thla dinga hring dingin i ṭhuoi ding a nih.
Ni sari a la bâk a, chu hnunga chun hnuoi chunga hin ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli sûng ruo insûrtir ka ta; ka thilhring siem tinrêng hi hnuoi chunga inthawkin sukbohmang ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Noa chun
Chun, hnuoia tui a hung lêt lai chun Noa chu kum za ruk mi a nih.
Sa thieng laia mi le, sa thiengnaw laia mi le, vate laia mi le, hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn tinrêng laia mi khawm,
a pui le a chal a tuok peiin Pathienin Noa kuoma thu a pêk ang khan, Noa kuomah lawngah an lût ta a.
Chun, ni sari hnunga chun hnuoia hin tui chu a hung lêt ta a.
Noa chu kum za ruk a ni kum, a thla hnina ni sâwm le ni sari niah, chu ni ngei chun tui inthûk lientak hnâr po po chu a hung pût ta vawng a, vân tukverhai khawm a hung inhawng ta bawk a.
Chun, ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli sûng chu hnuoia hin ruopui nasatak a sûr ta a.
Chu ni ngei chun Noa le a naupasalhai Sem, Ham, Japheth le Noa nuhmei chu lawnga chun an lût ta a, a naupasalhai nuhmei pathum khawm an kuomah an lût ve a;

anni chu an lût a, ramsa tinrêng mâni chi um dân ang sengin, ran po po mâni chi um dân ang sengin, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn chi tinrêng mâni chi um dân ang sengin, vate tinrêng mâni chi um dân ang sengin, vate thla nei tinrêng chu an lût seng bawk a.
Chuongchun, tisa po po hringna thuok nei taphawt chu a tuok peiin Noa kuomah lawnga chun an lût ta a.
Chun, a lûthai chu Pathienin a kuoma thu a pêk angin, tisa nei laia mi tinrêng chu a pui le a chal a tuok peiin an lût a; chun,
Chun, tui chu hnuoia hin ni sâwmli sûng po a lêt a, tui chu a hung pung a, lawng chu a hung lên kâng a, hnuoi chunga chun a chîm lâng pei ta a.
Tui chu a hung um ta puou a, hnuoi chunga hin a hung pung rak el ta a, lawng chu tui chunga chun ân lâng pei a.
Chun, hnuoi chunga tui chu a hung insâng tiel tiel a, vân hnuoia tlâng insânghai po po chu a chîm zo ta a.
Tawng sâwmpanga zeta insângin tui chu a hung um ta puou el a, tlânghai chu a tlum hmang ta dai a.
Chuongchun, hnuoia taksa chângthei po po, vate dâm, ran dâm, sa dâm, thilhring hnuoi chunga bawkinvâka lâwn tinrêng dâm, mihriem po po leh an thi zo vawng ta a;
an hnâra hringna thlarau thuok umna po po, khawmuola um taphawthai chu an thi ta vawng a.

Chuongchun, hnuoi chunga thil hringna nei tinrêng, mihriem dâm, ran dâm, thilhring bawkinvâk chi dâm, chunglêng vate dâm, hnuoia inthawka sukbohmangin an um ta a: Noa le a kuoma lawnga umhai chau chu hlain an um ta a.
Chun, tui chu ni za le sâwmnga sûng po chu hnuoia hin a um ta puou el a.
Chun, Pathienin Noa le lawnga a kuoma thilhring tinrêng le ran um po po chu a hriet zing a; chun Pathienin hnuoi chunga hin thli ân hrângtir a, chuongchun, tui chu a hung kang ṭan ta a,
tui inthûktak hnarhai le vân tukverhai khawm chu a hung inkhâr ta a, vâna inthawka ruo hung sûr chu sukchâtin a um ta bawk a;
chuongchun, tui chu hnuoi chunga inthawk chun a kang ta deu deu a, ni za le sâwmnga chu a bo hnung chun tui chu a tlâwm ta deu a.
Chuongchun, lawng chu thla sarina, ni sâwm le ni sari nia chun Ararat tlânga chun a lo innghat ta a.
Chun, tui chu thla sâwmna chenin a tlâwm deu deu pei a; thla sâwmna ni khat nia chun, tlâng sîphai chu a hung inlang ta a.
Chun, ni sâwmli hnunga chun Noa chun lawng tukver a siem kha a hawng ta a:
chun, vaâk pakhat ân vuong suoktir a; chu chu a suok a, hnuoia inthawka tui chu a kang zo hmakhat chu a vuong vêl a vuong vêl a.
Chun, hnuoi chunga tui a tlâwm ta le tlâwm ta naw hrietna dingin vaṭhu ân vuong suoktir nâwk a;

nisienlakhawm, vaṭhu chun fûkna ding hrim hrim a hmu naw a, a kuomah lawngah a kîr nâwk ta a, tui chu hnuoi chung po poa chun a la um si a; chuongchun, a kut a hang pur dawk a, a man a, lawng sûngah a kuomah a lâk lût nâwk ta a.
Chun, ni sari dang a nghâk nâwk a, vaṭhu chu lawnga inthawk ân vuong suoktir nâwk a;
vaṭhu chu zântieng chun a kuomah a hung lût nâwk a; chun, ngai ta, oliv hna suktlawng hlim a hmûra chun a hung put a: chuongchun, Noa chun hnuoiah tui a tlâwm tah ti a hriet a.
Chun, ni sari dang a nghâk nâwk a, vaṭhu chu ân vuong suoktir nâwk a; a kuomah a hung kîr nâwk ta naw a.

Chun, a kum za ruk le a kum khatna, a thla khatna ni khat nia chun tui chu hnuoia inthawk chun a kang zo ta a: chuongchun, Noa chun lawng inkhumna chu a hâwk a, a en a; chun, ngai ta, hnuoi chung chu a lo inhil ta huou el a.
A thla hnina ni sâwmhni le ni sari nia chun hnuoi chu a hung ṭâwl zo ta a.
Chun, Pathienin Noa kuoma chun a hril a,
“Lawnga inthawkin suok ro, nang le i nuhmei, i naupasalhai le an nuhmeihai leh.

Tisa po po laia mi thil hringna nei tinrêng i umpuihai, vate dâm, ran dâm, thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn tinrêng dâm le khan i kuomah ṭhuoi suok rawh, hnuoia hin te neiin chi tamtak thlaha an hung pung theina dingin,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Noa chu a suok a, a naupasalhai le a nuhmei le a nauhai nuhmeihai khawm a kuomah an suok ve a;
sa tinrêng dâm, thilhring tinrêng dâm, vate tinrêng dâm, hnuoi chunga chângthei taphawthai chu anni chi umdân ang sengin lawnga inthawk chun an suok ta a.
Chun, Noa chun
Chun,
Hnuoi um sûng po bu tu le bu lâk, khaw dei le khaw lum, nipui le phalbi le, sûn le zân dâm hi bo naw nih,” a ta.
Chun, Pathienin Noa le a naupasalhai chu mal a sâwm a, an kuomah, “Chi tamtak inthlain hung pung unla, hnuoi hi hluo sip ro.
Nangni ṭîna le pawisakna hnuoia sa tinrêng le chunglêng vate tinrêngin nei an ta; chuonghai le hnuoia bawkinvâka lâwn po po le, tuipuia nga po pohai chu, in kuta pêk an ni vawng tah.
Thilhring chângthei tinrênghai chu in ta dingin fâk ding nîng an ta; thlai hring ka pêk ang cheu khan iengkim ka pêk vawng cheu.

Chun, in thisen, in hringna phuba chu la ngei ngei ka tih; sa tinrêng chunga chun lâng ka tih, mihriem kuoma inthawk khawmin, mi tin an unauhaia inthawk chun, mihriem hringna phuba chu la seng ka tih.
Tukhawm mihriem thisen insuotu chu mihriem vêkin ama thisen chu an insuo ve ding a nih: Pathienin ama angpuiin mihriem a siem si a.
Chun, nangni chu chi tamtak inthlain hung pung ro; hnuoia hin nau tamtak nei unla, a chunga hin hung pung ro,” a ta.
Chun, Pathienin Noa le a kuoma um a naupasalhai kuoma chun,
“Ngai ta u, keima ngeiin in kuoma le in hnunga in thlahai kuoma khawm ka thuthlung chu ka sukdet a nih;
in kuoma thilhring tinrêng um, in umpui vate dâm, ran dâm, ramsa tinrêng kuoma dâm khawm; lawnga inthawka hung suok po po, hnuoia sa tinrêng kuoma chen khawm.
In kuomah ka thuthlung chu ka sukdet a; tisa po po tuilêta sukbohmangin um ta naw ni hai a, hnuoi sukse dingin tui lêt nâwk ta naw bawk a tih,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Pathien bawkin, “Hi hi kei le nangni le in kuoma thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng umhai kâra, suon tâwp lova um peihai ta dingin, ka thuthlung inchikna chu a nih.
Sûmah ka sumrisâng kân zâmtir a, chu chu kei le hnuoi inkâra thuthlung inchikna ding nîng a tih.
Chun, hieng hi nîng a ta, hnuoi chunga sûm kân zâmtirin sumrisâng chu sûma chun inlang a ta,
kei le nangni le tisa po po laia thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng inkâra ka thuthlung hi hre zing ka tih. Chuongchun, tui chu tisa po po sukbohmang dingin hung lêt nâwk ta naw nih.

Chun, sumrisâng chu sûmah inzâm hlak a ta; chuongchun, Pathien le hnuoi chunga tisa um po po laia thilsiem hringna nei tinrêng inkârah kumkhaw thuthlung um chu ka hriet zing theina dingin en hlak ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Pathien bawkin, Noa kuoma chun, “Chu chu kei le hnuoi chunga tisa um po po inkâra thuthlung sukdetna inchikna a nih,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, Noa naupasal lawnga inthawka suokhai chu Sem, Ham, le Japheth an nih: Ham chu Kanaan pa a nih.
Chuonghai pathum chu Noa naupasalhai an na: chuonghaia inthawka suokhai chun hnuoi po po hi an dâp zo tah a nih.
Noa chu hnuoi inlettu hmasatak a ni a, Grêp huon a siem a,
uoin chu a dâwn a, ân rui a: chuongchun, a puon inah puon bovin a zâl a.
Chun, Ham, Kanaan pa chun a pa saruokna chu a hmu a, tuola a unauhai pahni chu a hril a.
Chuongchun, Sem le Japheth chun puon an lâk a, liengkoa inzâwnin hnungtâwlin an fe a, an pa saruokna chu an inkhum ta a; naw dang tieng an ngha a, an pa saruokna chu an hmu naw a.
Noa chu a uoin inrui chu a hung har a, a naupasal naupang takin a chunga a thawzie chu a hung hriet ta a.
Chuongchun,
“Kanaan chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se;
A unauhai siehlawhai siehlaw nîng a tih,” a ta.
Kanaan chu Sem siehlawin um raw se
Pathienin Japheth chu suklien sienla,
Sem puon inhaiah um raw se;
Kanaan chu a siehlawin um raw se,”
a ti bawk a.
Chun, Noa chu tuilêt hnung chun kum za thum sâwmnga a dam a.
Noa dam sûng po po chu kum za kuo le sâwmnga a na; chun a thi ta a.
Hieng hi Noa naupasal, Sem, Ham, le Japheth thlahai chu an nih; tuilêt hnunga naupasal an ineihai chu.
Japheth naupasalhai chu: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mesek le Tiras an nih.
Gomer naupasalhai chu: Askenaz, Riphath le Togarma an nih.
Javan naupasalhai chu: Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim le Dodanim an nih.
Chuonghaia inthawk chun a nih tuipui kama hnamhai chu anni ram ramah an indar ta chu: anni ṭawng ang pei le, anni hnam ang peiin, anni chihai laia seng chun.
Ham naupasalhai chu: Kush, Mizraim, Put le Kanaan an nih.
Kush naupasalhai chu Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka hai an nih. Raama naupasalhai chu Sheba le Dedan an nih.
Kush chun naupasal Nimrod a nei a: ama chu hnuoia mi hrât hmasatak a nih.
Ân lal phutna chu Sinar rama Babel, Erek, Akkad le Kalne khuo a nih.
Chu rama inthawk chun a suok a, Assuriaah a lût a, Ninevi, Rehoboth-Ir, Kala le,
Ninevi le Kala inkâra Resen khuohai a siem a (chu Resen chu khaw ropuitak a nih).
Chun, Mizraim chun Lud, Anam, Lahab, Naphtu,
Pathrus, Kaslu (Philistinhai suokna) le Kaphtor mihai a thla a.
Kanaan chun a nau lutîrah Zidon a nei a, Heth khawm a nei bawk a;
Jebus-hai, Amor-hai, Girgashai,
Hiv-hai, Arko-hai, Sin-hai,
Arvad-hai, Zemar-hai, Hamathai, a thla a; chu hnunga chun Kanaan hnamhai chu an hung indar lien pei ta a.
Chun, Kanaan hnamhai ramri chu Zidona inthawkin Gerar pan zâwngin Gaza chenin; Sodom, Gomorra, Adma le Zeboiim pan zâwngin, Lasa chenin a nih.
Chuonghai chu Ham thlahai chu an nih, anni hnamhai ang pei le anni ṭawng ang peiin, anni ram rama le anni chi lai chun.
Sem, Eber nau po pohai thlatu, Japheth u khawm chun nauhai a nei ve a.
Sem naupasalhai chu: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud le Aram an nih.
Aram nauhai chu: Uz, Hul, Gether le Mash an nih.
Arpaksad chun naupasal Sela a nei a; Sela chun naupasal Eber a nei a.
Eber chun naupasal pahni a nei a: pakhat hming chu Peleg a na, a dam lai chun hnuoi hi ṭhein a um ta si a, a sang hming chu Joktan a nih.
Joktan chun naupasal Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, Seba,
Ophir, Havila le Jobab a nei a: chuong po po chu Joktan naupasalhai an nih.
Chun, an umna chu Mesaa inthawkin khawsak tlâng Sephar pan zâwngin a nih.
Chuonghai chu Sem thlahai chu an ni a, anni hnamhai ang pei le anni ṭawnghai ang peiin, anni ram ramhaiah, anni chihai ang pei chun.
Chuonghai chu Noa thlahai hnamhai an ni a, an thlahai ang peiin, an chihai lai chun: tui lêt hnungin chuonghaia inthawk chun a nih, hnuoia hin chi tin an indar ta chu.
Chun, hnuoia mi po po chu ṭawng hmunkhat le thu hril dân hmunkhat an ni vawng a.
Chun, hieng hi a na, khawsak tienga an insawn pei lai chun Sinar ramah phaizâwl an hmu a; chutaka chun umhmun an khuor ta a.
“Thaw ro, ṭêklei siem ei ta, ṭhatakin râwng ei tiu,” an inti tâwl a. Chuongchun, lung aiah ṭêklei chu an siem a, lungchârna aiah lawngchârna an nei bawk a.
Chun, “Thaw ro, khawpui siem ei ta, in insâng a sîpin vân tawng dingin bâwl bawk ei tiu a, ei hming sukthang ei tiu; chuong naw chun hnuoi chung po poa hin sukdarin um râwi ei tih,” an in ti a.
Chun,
Chun,
Thaw ro, zu fêng ei tiu a, ṭawng an inhriettuo thei nawna dingin an ṭawng zu suktumpêk ei tiu,” a ta.
Chuongchun,
Chuleichun, a hming chu Babel an ti a;
Hienghai hi Sem thlahai chu an nih: Sem chu kum za mi a niin tui lêt hnung kum hni hnunga chun naupasal Arpaksad a nei a:
Chun, Arpaksad a nei hnung chun Sem chu kum za nga a la dam a, naunuhmei le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Arpaksad chun kum sâwmthum le panga a niin naupasal Selah a nei a:
Selah a nei hnung chun Arpaksad chu kum za li le pathum a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Selah chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Eber a nei a:
Eber a nei hnung chun Selah chu kum za li le pathum a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Eber chun kum sâwmthum le pali a niin naupasal Peleg a nei a:
Peleg a nei hnung chun Eber chu kum za li le sâwmthum a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Peleg chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Reu a nei a:
Reu a nei hnungin Peleg chu kum za hni le pakuo a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Reu chun kum sâwmthum le pahni a niin naupasal Serug a nei a:
Serug a nei hnungin Reu chu kum za hni le pasari a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Serug chun kum sâwmthum a niin naupasal Nahor a nei a:
Nahor a nei hnungin Serug chu kum za hni a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Nahor chun kum sâwmhni le pakuo a niin naupasal Tera a nei a:
Tera a nei hnungin Nahor chu kum za khat le sâwm le pakuo a la dam a, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai a nei nâwk a.
Chun, Tera chun kum sâwmsari a niin naupasal Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei a.
Chun, hienghai hi Tera thlahai chu an nih. Tera chun naupasal Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei a. Haran chun naupasal Lota a nei a.
Haran chu a piengna rama Kaldaihai khuo Urah, a pa Tera hmaa chun a thi a.
Chun, Abram le Nahor chun nuhmei an nei a; Abram nuhmei hming chu Sarai a ni a; Nahor nuhmei chu Haran naunu Milka a ni a, Milka chu Iska unaunu a nih.
Chun, Sarai chu a ching a, nau hrim a nei naw a.

Tera chun a naupa Abram le, a naupa naupasal (Haran naupa) Lota le, a mo, a naupa Abram nuhmei Sarai chu a ṭhuoi a; Kanaana fe dingin Kaldaihai khuo Ura inthawk chun an suok tlâng ta a; nisienlakhawm, Haran an hung tlung a, chutaka chun umhmun an khuor ta a.
Tera dam sûng chu kum za hni le panga a nih; chun, Tera chu Harana chun a thi ta a.
Chuongchun, Abram chu
Chun, Abramin a nuhmei Sarai le, a unaupa naupasal Lota le an sum themsuok po po le, Harana an mi neihai chu a ṭhuoi a; Kanaan rama fe dingin an suok a. Kanaan ram chu an tlung chun,
Abram chu chu rama Sekem hmun chen, More thingsaisuo hmun chen chun a fe pei a. Chuong lai chun Kanaan mihai chu chu rama chun an um a.
Chutaka inthawk chun Bethel saktienga tlânga chun ân tâwl a, chutaka chun puon in a zar a, a thlangtieng chun Bethel chu a um a, a sak tieng chun Ai khuo a um a; chutaka chun
Chun, Abram chu Negeb
Chun, chu rama chun ṭâm a hung tla a; chu rama chun ṭâm chu a nasa êm leiin Abram chu Aiguptaa um hri dingin a zu fe ta a.
Aigupta a lût ding lai chun a nuhmei Sarai kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, nuhmei hmêl ṭhatak i nih ti ka hriet;
chuleiin, Aigupta mihaiin an hmu pha che chun, ‘Hi hi a nuhmei a ni hi,’ tîng an ta, kei chu mi that an ta, nang ruok chu hlâng an ti che.
I zâra ṭhataka ka um theina ding le, nangma leia ka hring theina dingin, ‘A farnu ka nih,’ ti pei raw aw,” a ti a.
Chun, Abram chu Aigupta a lût chun Aigupta mihai chun nuhmei chu an hmu a, a hmêl chu ṭha an ti êm êm a.
Pharao milienhai khawmin an hmu a, Pharao kuomah a ṭhatzie an hril a; chuongchun, nuhmei chu Pharao inah an ṭhuoi lût ta a.
Chun, ama chun Sarai lei chun Abram chu ṭhatakin a sawngbâwl a; chuongchun, berâm dâm, bâwng dâm, sabengtung chal dâm, suokpa dâm, suoknu dâm, sabengtung pui dâm, sanghâwngsei dâm a nei pha ta a.
Nisienlakhawm,
Chuongchun, Pharao chun Abram chu a ko a, “Ka chunga i thilthaw hi iengtizie am a ni ta leh? I nuhmei a nih ti iengdinga i mi hril naw am a na?
Iengdinga ‘ka farnu a nih’ i ti? Chu lei chun an nâwm ka nuhmeia ka lo nei ta hiel hi: en rawh, taka hi i nuhmei, ṭhuoi la, fe hmang dai rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Abram chu Aiguptaa inthawk chun a suok a, ama le a nuhmei le, a nei po po, ama ruolin Lota leh, Negeb-a chun an hang fe ta a.
Chun, Abram chu ran dâm, tangka dâm, rângkachak dâmin a hausa êm êm a.
Chun, Negeba inthawk chun Bethel tlung rakin a fe pei a, Bethel le Ai khuo inkârah, a tîrtaka a puon in umnaa khan;
a tîra a maichâm siemna ngeia khan; chun, chutaka chun Abram chun
Chun, Lota, Abram le fe ve khawm khan berâm ruol dâm, bâwng ruol dâm, puon in dâm a nei ve a.
An um rêlna dingin ramin a dai ta naw a, an thil nei chu a nasa hle si a; chuongchun, an um hmunkhat thei ta dêr da el a.
Chuongchun, Abram ran puhai le Lota ran puhai inkâra chun insêlna a hung suok ta a: chuong lai chun Kanaan le Periz mihai chu chu rama chun an um a.
Chuongchun, Abramin Lota kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin, kei le nanga inkârah, ka ran puhai le i ran puhai inkâra khawm, insêlna um naw raw se; unau ei ni si a.

Ram chu a pumin a um duoi a ni naw am a nih? Lunginsiettakin, ka kuoma inthawk hin insuktum el rawh: nang vawitieng i fe chun kei changtieng fêng ka ta, annawleh, nang changtieng i fe chun kei vawitieng fêng ka tih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Lota chu a dâk suok a, Zoar pan zâwng chun, Jordan phaizâwl po po chu
Chuongchun, Lota chun Jordan phaizâwl po po chu a thlang ta a; chun, Lota chu saktieng chun ân tâwl ta a: chuongchun, an inṭhe ta a.
Abram chu Kanaana chun a um a, Lota chu phaizâwl khuohaia chun a um a, a puon in chu Sodom chenin a tâwl pei a.
Chun, Sodom mihai chu Pathien mithmuin nasataka ṭha naw le suolin an um a.
Chun, a kuoma inthawka Lota a tuma a um hnung chun,
Chun, i thlahai chu hnuoia pilvut ang elin la siem ka tih: chuongchun, mîn hnuoia pilvut hi an tiem sêng chun i thlahai khawm chu tiem sêng ni bawk an tih.
Tho la, ram hi a dung a khangin fang suok rawh; i kuomah ka pêk ding che a nih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Abram chun a puon in chu a tâwl a, Hebrona um Mamre thingsaisuo
Chun, Sinar lal Amraphel, Ellasar lal Ariok, Ellam lal Kedorlaomer le, Goiim lal Tidal dam lai chun hieng hi a na,
anni chun Sodom lal Bera chu an rûn a. Gomorra lal Birsa, Adma lal Sinab, Zeboiim lal Semeber le Bela lal chu an rûn bawk a. (Bela khuo chu Zoar khuo a ni tah).
Chuonghai po po chu Siddim ruoma chun an ṭhang ruol a (chu chu Tuipui Al a ni tah).
Kum sâwmpahni sûng chu Kedorlaomer hnuoiah an um a, a kum sâwm pathumnaa chun an hel ta a.
A kum sâwm palinaa chun Kedorlaomer le a kuoma lal umhai chu an hung a, Asteroth-karnaim khuoah Rephaimhai an that a, Ham khuoah Zuzimhai, Kiriathaim zâwlah Emimhai,
an umna Seir tlângah Elparan chenin Hormihai an that a, (Elparan chu thlalêr depa um a nih).
Chun, an kîr nâwk a, En-mispat an tlung a (chu chu Kades a ni tah). Amalekhai rama mi po le, Hazazontamara um, Amorhai khawm chu an that nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Sodom lal, Gomorra lal, Adma lal, Zeboiim lal le Bela lal chu an suok a (Bela khuo chu Zoar khuo a ni tah); chun, anni chu thaw dingin Siddim ruoma chun an ṭhang tlat a.
Elam lal Kedorlaomer, Goiim lal Tidal, Sinar lal Amraphel, le Ellasar lal Ariok chu thaw dingin, lal paliin lal panga an thaw a.
Chun, Siddim ruom chu lawng hnâi khurin a sip a; chun, Sodom le Gomorra lalhai chu an tlânse a, chutaka chun an tla a, a tla mahlahai chu tlânga chun an tlân hmang ta a.
Chuongchun, Sodom le Gomorra mihai sum po po, le an fâk ding po po an lâk a, an kîr ta a.
Lota, Abram unaupa naupa, Sodoma um chu, a sumhai leh an lâk bawk a, an fe ta a.
Chun, mi pakhat tlânsuok chu a hung a, Hebrai mi Abram chu a hril a; ama chu Amor mi Mamre thingsaisuohai
Abramin a nau chu salah an ṭhuoi ti a hriet phingleh a ina pieng, ama mi, inchûk thiemsa tah, za thum le sâwmpariet a ṭhuoi suok a, Dan chenin a hnawt ta a.
Chun, zâna chun anni chu thaw dingin ama le a suokhai chu an insem dar a, annirawi chu an that a, Hoba chenin an hnawt a (Hoba chu Damaska hmâra um a nih).
Chun, sum po po chu a hung lâkkîr nâwk vawng a, a naupa Lota le a sumhai chu a hung lâk nâwk vawng bawk a, a nuhmeihai khawm a hung ṭhuoi kîr a, mi danghai po po leh.
Chun, Kedorlaomer le a kuoma lal umhai chu thata a kîr nâwk chun, Sodom lal chu Save ruoma chun Abram tuok dingin a suok a (Save ruom chu lal ruom a ni tah).
Chun, Salem lal Melkizedek chun bei le uoin a hung lâk a; ama chu Pathien Chunghnungtak thiempu a nih.
Chun, ama chun Abram chu mal a sâwm a, “Abram chu hnuoi le vân neitu, Pathien Chunghnungtak malsâwmin um sien;
Chun, Sodom lal chun Abram kuomah, “Mihriemhai hi mi pe la, sumhai hi chu nangin nei rawh,” a ti a.
Abram chun Sodom lal kuoma chun, “Hnuoi le vân neitu
pat zai khat khawm, kekawkhrui hlek khawm, i nei hrim hrim chu la dêr naw ning, chuong naw chun, ‘Abram chu keia sukhausak annâwm,’ ti rawi i tih:
tlangvâlhai fâk hmang le ka mi fepuihai chanvo bak naw chu la naw ning; Aner, Eskol le Mamre chun an chanvo chu la raw hai se,” a ti a.
Chuong thil hnunga chun, “Abram, ṭi naw rawh; kei hi i phaw le i lâwmman nasatak el chu ka nih,” tiin
Abram ruok chun, “Aw
Abram bawk chun, “Ngai ta, chi hrim hrim i mîn thlatir si naw a; en ta, ka ina pieng siehlaw hi ka rohluotu ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a kuomah, “Hi ram hi hluo dinga pe ding che a, Kaldaihai khuo Ura inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu che
Ama chun, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, hluong ka tih ti iengtin am hrieng ka ta?” a ti a.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Bâwngla kum thum mi, kêlpui kum thum mi, berâmchal kum thum mi, le vaṭhu le pârva te mi hung lapêk rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, chuong po po chu a hung lâk a, a laitakah a khawi seng a, a her pakhat chu a her khingtieng zâwna chun a sie seng a, vatehai ruok chu a khawi ve naw a.
Chun, vate sa-sel fa mihai chu saruonghai chunga chun an zu fu hlak a, Abram chun a lo hâwl hmang pei a.
Nisa a tla dier dier laiin Abram chu a lo in dêr el a; chun, ngai ta, inthim nasatak thil râpthlâktak el hin ama a hung inkhum a.
Chun,
Nang ruok chu i thlatuhai kuomah thlamuongtakin fêng i ta, tar tak i ni hnungin phûm an ti che.
Chun, suon linaa chun hitaka hin hung kîr nâwk an tih, Amorhai suolnahai hi a la kim hri si nawh,” a ta.
Chun, nisa a hung tla a, khuo a hung inthim chun, ngai ta, rawtuina mei khu mup mup le chuong saherhai kâra chun meiser chawk vung vung inlawn inlawn a um a.
Ken-hai, Keniz-hai, Kadmon-hai,
Hit-hai, Periz-hai, Rephaim-hai,
Amor-hai, Kanaan-hai, Girgashai le, Jebus-hai ram le hin ka pêk bawk a,” tiin Abram kuoma chun thu a thlung ta a.
Chun, Sarai, Abram nuhmei chun, nau hrim hrim a neipêk dêr naw a, Sarai chun Aigupta mi suoknu pakhat a nei a, a hming chu Hagar a nih.
Chun, Sarai chun Abram kuomah, “Ngai ta khai,
Chun, Abram chu Kanaana kum sâwm a um hnung chun, Abram nuhmei Sarai chun a suoknu Aigupta mi Hagar chu a ṭhuoi a, a pasal Abram kuoma chun a nuhmeia um dingin a pêk a.
Ama chun Hagar chu a lo pâwl a: amanu chu ân rai ta a; chun ân rai ti ân hriet phingleh a pi chu a hung hmusit el ta a.
Chun, Sarai chun Abram kuomah, “Ka thil tuor hi nangin a maw phur rawh: ka suoknu chu i pawm dingin ka pêk che a; chun ân rai ti ân hriet phingleh a mi hmusit el ta a;

Abram ruok chun Sarai kuomah, “Ngai ta, i suoknu chu i kuta um annâwm, nanga remti ang ang chu a chungah thaw ta la,” a ti a. Chuongchun, Sarai chun a sukrimsi ta hle a, chuleiin, a tlânhmangsan ta a.
Chun,
Chun, a kuomah, “Hagar, Sarai suoknu, khawlaia inthawka hunga khawlaia fe ding am i na?” a ta. Ama chun, “Ka pi Sarai kuoma inthawkin ka tlânhmang a nih,” a ta.
Ama chu mihriem laia ram sabengtung ang nîng a ta, ama chun mi tin do a ta, mi tinin ama khawm do bawk an tih; a unau po po hnaiah um bawk a tih,” a ti nâwk bawk a.
Chun, Hagarin ama betu
Chuleichun, tuisunsuo chu “Beer-lahai-roi”
Chun, Hagar chun Abram chu naupasal a neipêk a; chun, Abram chun a naupa Hagarin a nei chu a hmingah Ismael a sak ta a.
Chun, Hagarin Abram ta dinga Ismael a nei pêk lai chun Abram chu kum sawmriet le kum ruk mi a nih.
Chun, Abram chu kum sawmkuo pakuo mi a niin
Chuongchun, nang le ei kârah thu thlung ka ta, nasatakin sukpung ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Abram chu a bawkkhup a; chun, Pathienin ama chu a biek a,
“Ngai ta, kei chun ka thuthlung chu i kuomah a nih ka thlung chu: chuongchun, chi tum tum, chi tamtak thlatu ni tâng i tih.
Nasatakin chi inthlatir ka ti che a, nangmaa chun chi ti khawp hiel dâm siem ka ta, nangmaa inthawkin lalhai hung suok bawk an tih.
Chun, Pathien bawkin Abraham kuoma chun, “Chun, nang chun chu, ka thuthlung hi i zâwm ding a nih; nang le i hnunga i thlahai an thla nâwksâwng pei chen khawmin in zâwm ding a nih.
Nangni laia ni riet mi chu in thla sâwng peihai chen khawmin, i thla ni kher lo, i ina pieng amani khawm, mikhuol kuoma tangka suma inchâwk amani khawm, pasal taphawt chu a ser i tan ding a nih.
I ina pieng le i tangka suma în châwk khawm a ser i tan ngei ding a nih: chuongchun, ka thuthlung chu kumkhaw thuthlung dingin in tisaa chun um tâng a tih.
Chun, pasal ser tan lo, a ser hmawr vun taksaa sertanna um naw chu, chu ngei chu a chipui laia sukbohmang nîng a ta: ama chun ka thuthlung chu a bawsiet a nih,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, Pathien bawkin Abraham kuomah, “I nuhmei Sarai chu a hmingah Sarai ti ta naw ti ni a, a hming chu Sara

Ama chu mal sâwm ka ta, chu bâka khawm amaa inthawk naupasal pêng ka ti che: anih, ama chu mal sâwm ka ta, chi tum tum thlatunu ni tâng a tih, hnam tum tum lalhai amaa inthawk chun la hung suok an tih,” a ti nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Abraham chu a bawkkhup a, ân nui a, a lungrilin, “Kum za mi hin nau a nei ding am a nih? Sara kum sawmkuo mi chun nau a nei ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Abraham bawk chun Pathien kuomah, “Ismael hi i hmaah um thei sienla aw!” a ti a.
Pathien chun, “Ni lo e, i nuhmei Sarain naupasal neipêk lem a ti che: a hmingah Isak

Ismael chungthu khawm hi ka ngaipêk che a nih: ngai ta, ama chu mal ka sâwm ta a, chi tamtak inthlatir ka ta, nasatakin sukpung bawk ka tih; ama chun lal sâwmpahni thlâng a ta, ama chu chi ropuitakah la siem ka tih.
Ka thuthlung ruok chu, Sarain kum nâwk hieng ang huna a neipêk ding che, Isak chungah sukdet lem ka tih,” a ti a.
A kuoma thu a hril zo chun Pathien chun Abraham chu a kai tung san ta a.

Chun, Abraham chun a naupa Ismael le a ina pieng po po le, a tangka suma a închâwk po pohai le Abraham sûnghai laia mi pasal taphawt chu a ṭhuoi a, Pathienin a kuoma a hril ta ang ngeiin, chu ni ngei chun an ser hmawr vun tisa chu a tanpêk tâwl a.
Abraham chu a ser hmawr vun tisa an tan lai chun kum sawmkuo pakuo mi a nih.
Chun, a naupa Ismael chu a ser hmawr vun an tan lai chun kum sâwmpathum mi a nih.
Chu ni ngei chun Abraham le a naupa Ismael chu sertan an lo ni tah.
A sûnghai laia pasal po po, a ina pienghai le ram dang mi tangka suma a în châwkhai khawm chu, ama ruol chun an ser tan a ni ta vawng a.
Abraham chu sûn nisa lum lai taka puon in kawtkhâr bula a ṭhung laiin,
A hang dâk a, a thlîr a, a kâwl ela mi pathum lo ngirhai chu a hmu a; a hmu phingleh puon in kawtkhâra inthawk anni chu tuok dingin a va tlân a, hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a,
“Pu, i mi lunginsiet thei chun lunginsiettakin in siehlaw hi mi fe khêl lul naw ro khai,
tui tlâwmte bêk hung la hai sienla, in kehai sâwp unla, thing hnuoia hin châwl hri ta u;
bei tlawmte bêk va lâng ka ta, in lungril sukhar ro khai, chu hnunga chun fe pei de ti niu, in siehlaw hi in mi hung sir ta si si hin chu,” a ta. Anni chun, “I hril ang chun va thaw rawh,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Abraham chu puon in sûnga Sara kuoma chun a va lût vak a, “Beiphit indi tak tekhâwng thum siem la, hmet la, beiphêkhaiah siem rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Abraham chu bâwngruol tieng a va tlân a, bâwngte ṭhatak hi a hung lâk a, siehlaw kuomah a pêk a; ama chun a lo siem vat vat a.
Chun, nenetui kîng dâm, nenetui dâm, a bâwngte sa siem dâm chu a lâk a, an hmaah a va pêk a; chun, an fâk lai chun an kâwlah thing hnuoia chun a ngîr zing a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “I nuhmei Sara khawlai am a um a?” an ti a. Ama chun, “Saw puon ina sawn,” a ti a.
Abraham le Sara chu upatak, tartak el an ni ta a; nuhmei dân pângngai chu Sara chun a nei ta naw a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Sara chun, “Kân nui nawh,” tiin ân pha a; a ṭi si a. Chun, ama chun, “Awi lo lo chu, în nui de kha,” a ti a.
Chun, mihai chu chutaka inthawk chu an tho a, Sodom tieng chu an en a; chun, Abraham chu anni inthla dingin anni lai chun a fe ve a.
Chuongchun,
tuhin zu fêng ka ta, an khêkri ka kuoma hung tlung ang hin an thaw ngei le an thaw ngei naw en ka ta; an thaw naw chun hre el ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, mihai chu chutaka inthawk chun an inher a, Sodom tieng an pan ta a; Abraham ruok chu
Chun, Abraham chun a va hnai a, “Mi felhai chu mi suolhai lai chun i sukbohmang ve ding am a nih?
Khaw sûnga chun mi fel sâwmnga bêk an um el rawi mawh, a sûnga mi fel sâwmnga umhai lei chun khuo chu hla lovin i sukbohmang el ding am a nih?

Nang êm chun, chuong ang êm chun, mi felhai chu mi suolhai anga an um vena dinga mi felhai chu mi suolhai laia sukhlum ve el chu i thaw awm êm si naw a; nang êm chun i thaw âwm êm si naw a: hnuoi chung po po Rorêltu chun feltakin a thaw naw ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chun,
Abraham chun, “Ngai ta, kei pilvut le meivâm el hin Lalpa chu ka biek pawp sa ta che chu:

mi fel chu pangain sâwmnga an tling naw a ni rawi mawh; Pangaa an tling naw leiin khaw pumpui chu i sukbohmang ding am a nih?” a ti a. Chun, ama chun, “Chutaka chun sâwmli le panga khawm ka hmu chun sukbohmang naw ning,” a ti a.
Ama chun ama chu a biek nâwk pei a, “Chutaka chun sâwmli bak i hmu el rawi mawh,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Sâwmli lei khawm chun sukbohmang naw ning,” a ta.

Chun, ama chun, “Aw, Lalpa chu lunginsen naw la, hril nâwk ka tih: chutaka chun sâwmthum chau i hmu el rawi mawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Chutaka chun sâwmthum khawm ka hmu chun sukbohmang naw el ka tih,” a ta.
Ama chun, “Ngai ta, Lalpa chu ka biek pawp sa ta che; chutaka chun sâwmhni bak khawm i hmu el rawi mawh,” a ta. Ama chun, “Sâwmhni lei khawm chun sukbohmang naw ning,” a ta.

Chun, ama chun, “Aw Lalpa, lunginsen naw la, vawikhat bak hang hril nâwk ka tih; chutaka chun sâwm bak khawm i hmu el rawi mawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chun,“Sâwm lei khawm chun sukbohmang naw ning,” a ti a.
Chun,

chun, “Puhai, lunginsiettakin in siehlaw ina hin lût phawt unla, riek unla, in kehai sâwp ro khai: chun, inhmatakin tho in ta, fe nâwk de ti niu,” a ti a. Anni chun, “Ni lo e, khawlaiah riek lem kan tih,” an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a thlêm a thlêm a; chuongchun, ama chu an zui a, a ina chun an lût a: chun, ama chun hme a siempêk a, chawl ṭhanglo bei a zeu a, an fâk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, an zâl hmain khuoa mi, Sodoma mi ngei, vêng tina mi po po, alien achînin in chu an inhuol khup el a;
chun, Lota chu an ko a, a kuomah, “Vawizâna i kuoma mi hung lûthai kha khawlai am an um a? Anni kan pâwl theina dingin kan kuomah hung ṭhuoi suok rawh,” an ti a.
Lota chu kawtkhâr bulah an kuoma chun a va suok a, kawt chu a khâr nâwk a.
Chun, “Ka unauhai, lunginsiettakin chuong ang êm êm chun suol da ta unla;

ngai ta u, pasal la pâwl ngailo naunuhmei pahni ka nei a: anni chu in kuomah hung ṭhuoi suok ka ta, ṭha in ti angin an chungah thaw de ti niu: hihai chunga ruok hin chu iengkhawm thaw lul naw ro khai; ka in sûng huolhimna hnuoia hung lût an ni si a,” a ta.

Anni chun, “Inkieng el rawh ie,” an ti a. Anni bawk chun, “Hi mipa hrep hi hitaka um ding hin a hung inpêm lût a, rorêltua um a tum vei a! Tuhin chu anni chunga thaw nêk hmanin i chungah kan thaw ṭha naw nâwk zuol ding a nih,” an ti a. Chun, mi (Lota) chu an hung baw huk a, kawtkhâr chu sukse dingin an hung hnai a.
Nisienlakhawm, mihai chun an kut an pur dawka Lota chu an kuomah in sûnga chun an kei lût a, kawt chu an khâr ta tlat a.
Chun, kawtkhâr bula mihai chu achîn alienin, an mit an sukdelpêk a; chuongchun, kawtkhâr chu an hmu zo ta naw a.
Chun, mihai chun Lota kuomah, “Hienghai naw hi hitaka hin sûnghai dang i nei am? I mâkpahai, i naupasalhai, i naunuhmeihai le khaw sûnga i nei taphawt chu hi hmuna inthawk ṭhuoi suok rawh.
Chuongchun, Lota chu a fe suok a, a naunuhmeihai neitu a mâkpahai kuoma chun a va hril a, “Tho unla, hi hmuna inthawk hin suok ro;
Vârṭien a hung ni chun vântirkohai chun, “Tho la, i nuhmei le i naunuhmei pahni umhai hi ṭhuoi rawh, chuong naw chun, hi khaw hremnaa hin bohmang ve rawi in tih,” tiin Lota chu an tur ta a.
Ama hlak chu a la muong hle si a; chuongchun,

Chun, khawhnâwma an ṭhuoi suok hnung chun, “I hringna dingin tlân suok rawh: i hnungtieng ngha naw la, phaizâwla hrim hrim hin châwl bawk naw rawh; tlânga sawn tlân rawh, chuong naw chun, bohmang rawi i tih,”
Nisienlakhawm, Lota chun a kuomah, “Chuongchu ni lo e, Pu,

ngai ta, i siehlaw hin i lunginsietna a hmu a, ka hringna hi humhimin i zângaina chu nasatakin i suklang a; nisienlakhawm, tlânga sawn chu tlân thei naw ningah: thil ṭha nawtak hin mi hung nangin thi hlau rawi ka tih.
En ta, saw khuo saw tlânna dingin a hnai tak a, khaw chite a ni sia. (Khaw chite ni lo am a nih?)chu taka chun mîn tlântir lem rawh, chuongchun, dam ka tih,” a ti a.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, chu thil kawnga khawm chun ka zâwm che a nih, khuo i hril chu sukbohmang naw el ka tih.
Inhmaw la, chutaka chun tlân rawh, chu chu i tlung hmakhat chu iengkhawm ka thaw thei âwm si naw a,” a ti a. Chuleiin, chu khaw hminga chun Zoar
Lotain Zoar a tlung chun hnuoi chunga chun nisa a hung suok ta a.
Chun,
chuongchun, chuong khuohai chu, phaizâwl po po, khuoa mi po pohai le, hnuoia thil mâwnghai le chun a sukbohmang ta vawng a.
Chun, Abraham chu zîngkâr inhmatakin
Chun, Pathienin phaizâwl khuohai chu a sukbohmang lai chun, Pathienin Abraham chu a hriet zing a, Lota umna khuohai a sukbohmang laiin Lota chu bohmangnaa inthawk a tir suok a.
Chun, Lota chu Zoara inthawk chun a hang fe a, tlânga chun a um a, a naunuhmeihai pahni chu a kuomah an um ve a; Zoarah a um ngam si naw a: chun, ama le a naunuhmeihai pahni chu pûkah an um ta a.
Chun, a upa lem chun a naupang lem kuoma chun, “Ei pa hi a upa ta a, khawvêl po po dân anga eini mi pâwl dingin hnuoi chunga hin pasal pakhat khawm an um ta si naw a:
thaw rawh, ei pa hi uoin indâwntir ei ti khai, chuongchun, ei pa suonmawng lova ei siem theina dingin a kuomah zâl ei tih,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, chu zân chun an pa chu uoin an indâwntir ta a; chun, a upa lem chu a lût a, a pa kâwla chun a va zâl a; ama chun amanu hung zâl lai chu a hriet naw a, a tho nâwk lai khawm chu a hriet bawk naw a.

Chun, a zînga chun a upa lem chun a naupang lem kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, zâni zân khan ka pa kâwlah ka zâl a; vawizân khawm hin uoin indâwntir nâwk ei ti khai; chun, nang lût la, ei pa suonmawng lova ei siem theina dingin a kâwlah va zâl ve rawh,” a ta.

Chuongchun, chu zân khawm chun an pa chu uoin an indâwntir nâwk a: chun, a naupang lem chu a tho a, a kuomah a va zâl ta a; ama chun amanu hung zâl lai chu a hriet naw a, a tho nâwk lai khawm chu a hriet bawk nawh.
Chuong ang chun Lota naunuhmeihai pahni chun an paa inthawk chun nau an lo vawn ta a.
A upa lem chun naupasal a nei a, a hmingah Moab
A naupang lem khawm chun naupasal a nei ve a, a hmingah Ben-ammi
Abraham chu Mamrea inthawk chun Sim
Chun, Abrahamin a nuhmei Sara chu, “Ka farnu a nih,” a ti a: chuongchun, Gerar lal Abimelek chun mi a tir a, Sara chu a vân ṭhuoitir a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chu Abimelek kuomah zânah a mangah a hung a, a kuomah, “Ngai ta, i nuhmei ṭhuoi lei hin mi thi el i ni tah; mi nuhmei a ni si a,” a ta.
Abimelek ruok chun a la pâwl hri naw a; chuongchun, “Lalpa, pawi tâwklo mi khawm i sukhlum ding am a nih?

Ama ngei khawmin ka kuomah, ‘Ka farnu a nih’ a ti ni lo am a nih? Chun amanu (Sara) ngei khawmin, ‘Ka ṭapa a nih,’ a ti bawk si a: lungril ṭhatak le kut inthiengtak nei pumin hi hi ka thaw a nih,” a ti a.

Chun, Pathienin a manga chun, “Anih, hi hi lungril ṭhatak putin i thaw a nih ti ka hriet a; chuongchun, kei khawmin ka chunga i thil thaw suol ding chu ka khap che a nih; chuleiin a nih ama i them ka phal naw chu.

Chuongchun, tuhin mi nuhmei kha pe kîr nâwk rawh; ama chu zâwlnei a ni si a, ṭawngṭaipêk a ti che a; chun, dam el i tih: i pêk kîr nâwk naw chun i thi ngei ding a nih ti hre rawh, nang le i nei po pohai leh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Abimelek chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, a siehlawhai po po a ko a, an na hrietah chuong thu po po chu a hril a: anni chun an ṭi ta êm êm a.

Chuongchun, Abimelek chun Abraham a ko a, a kuomah, “Kan chunga i thil thaw hi iengtizie am a ni a? Ieng kawng âm i chungah thil kan suksuola kei le ka khuoletuihai chunga hin thil suol nasatak i hung intlungtir hi? Thil thaw âwm naw tak ka chungah i thaw ta hi,” a ti a.
Abimelek bawk chun Abraham kuomah, “Iengam i ngaituoa hieng ang thil hi thaw i ni a?” a ti nâwk a.
Abraham chun, “Hi khuoa hin Pathien ṭina a um dêr naw a ni ka ring a, ka nuhmei lei hin mi sukhlum el in tih ti ka ring lei a nih.
Chu nâksapah ka farnu a ni hrim bawk a, ka pa naunu a ni a, ka nu naunu ruok chu a ni nawh; chun, ka nuhmei a hung ni tah a nih.

Pathienin ka pa ina inthawka a mîn vaitir lai khan a kuomah, ‘Hi hi i lunginsietna ka chunga înlangtir ding chu a nih: ei tlungna hmun taphawtah, ‘Ka ṭapa a nih,’ mi ti pei rawh ka ti hrim a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Abimelek chun berâmhai, bâwngchalhai le, suokpahai le suoknuhai a ṭhuoi a, Abraham kuoma chun a pêk a, a nuhmei Sara khawm chu a pêk kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Abimelek chun, “En ta, ka ram a um duoi annâwm, i nuomna taphawta hin um rawh,” a ta.

Chun, Sara kuoma chun, “En ta, i ṭapa kuoma hin tangka sâng khat ka pêk ta a, ngai ta, i kuoma um po pohaia inthawka mit inkhumna ding a ni hi: i chungthu hrim hrima hin i fel nâwk vawng tah a nih,” a ti a.
Abraham nuhmei Sara lei chun
Chuongchun, Sara chu ân rai a, Pathienin a kuoma a hril hun ruot taka chun Abraham chu a tar hnungin naupasal a neipêk ta a.
Abraham chun a naupasal nei, Sarain a neipêk chu a hmingah Isak
Abraham chu a naupa Isak a nei lai chun kum za mi a nih.
Chun, Sara chun, “Pathienin a mi suknui tah; mi tin a hre taphawt chun mîn nuipui an tih,” a ti a.
Ama bawk chun, “Sara hin nautehai a la pawm ding a nih ti tuin am Abraham kuomah hril ngaina hrieng an ta? a tar hnung hin naupasal ka neipêk ta hi,” a tis a.
Chun, naute chu a hung inṭhang a, nene nêk an inbântir ta a, Isak chu nene nêk an inbântir ni chun Abrahamin ruoi ropuitak a ṭhe a.
Chun, Aigupta mi, Hagar naupa, Abraham ta dinga a neipêk chun a nuisan lai Sara chun a hmu a.
Chu thu chu a naupa Ismael lei chun Abraham ta ding chun lungngaithlâk tak a nih.
Chun, suoknu naupaa khawm hin i thla a ni leiin chi ti khawp zet la siem ka tih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Abraham chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, bei le tuiûm a lâk a, Hagar kuomah a pêk a, a liengkoah ân chuonpêk a, naupang le chun ân fetir ta a; chuongchun, a fe a, Beer-seba thlalêra chun ân vâk ân vâk ta a.
Chun, tuiûma tui chu a hung bo ta a, chuongchun, naupang chu chîmbuk pakhat hnuoiah a sie el ta a.
Chun, “Naupang thi ding chu ka en ngam nawh,” a ti leiin a fe a, hla fe thal kâp phâk ding chena hin, a hma zâwna chun a va ṭhung ta chawt a. Chuonga a hma zâwna a ṭhung lai chun inringtakin

Chun, Pathienin naupang râwl chu a hriet a, chun Pathien vântirkoin vâna inthawkin Hagar chu a zuk ko a, a kuomah, “Hagar, iengin am a sukbuoi che leh? ṭi naw; a umnaa naupang râwl kha Pathienin a hriet a nih.
Tho la, naupang kha keitho la, i kutin chel rawh, ama chu chi ropuitakah ka siem ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Pathienin a mit a sukvarpêk a, tuisunsuo a hmu a: chuongchun, a va fe a, tuiûma chun tui chu a thun sip a, naupang chu ân dâwntir ta a.
Chun, Pathien chu naupang kuoma chun a um hlak a, a hung inṭhang lien pei a; thlalêrah a um hlak a, thal kâp thiem mi a hung ni ta a.
Paran thlalêra chun a um a; chun, a nuin Aigupta rama inthawk nuhmei a neipêk ta a.
Chuong lai chun Abimelek le a sipai pâwl hotu Phikol chun Abraham kuomah, “I thilthaw taphawtah Pathien i kuomah a um pei hlak a:

chuleiin, ka lo lunginsiet ta che ang khan kei le hi i khuolchâmna ram hi lunginsiet ve thunga, kei le ka naupa le ka naupa naupa khawm hlêm lo dingin Pathien hming sâlin tuhin ka kuomah inkhâm rawh,” a ti a.
Abraham chun, “Inkhâm ta naw ning am,” a ti a.
Chun, Abimelek siehlawhaiin tuisunsuo an lâkpêk lei chun Abimelek chu Abraham chun a lo kâwk a.
Abimelek chun, “Chu thil thawtu chu tu am a nih ka hriet dêr naw a; nang hlakin i mi hril si naw a, vawisûn chau naw chu ka la hriet dêr nawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Abraham chun berâmhai le bâwngchalhai a ṭhuoi a, Abimelek kuomah a pêk a: chun, an pahni chun thu an thlung ta a.
Abraham chun a berâm ruol laia mi berâmte a la pasari a sie tum a.
Abimelek chun Abraham kuomah, “Berâmte a la pasari a tuma i sie hi ieng tina am a na?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Hi tuisunsuo hi keiin ka cho a nih ti i mi hrietpuina dingin hi berâmte a la pasari hi ka kuta inthawkin i lâk ding a nih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Beer-sebaa chun thu an thlung ta a: chun, Abimelek chu a tho a, a sipai pâwl hotu Phikol leh Philistinhai rama chun an kîr nâwk ta a.
Abraham chun Beer-sebaa chun tamarisk thing a phun a, chutaka chun
Chuongchun, Abraham chu Philistin mihai rama chun sâwttak a um a.

Chun, Pathien chun, “I naupa, i naupasal nei sun, i lunginsiettak, Isak ngei kha ṭhuoi la, Moria rama chun fe la, chutaka chun tlâng pakhat hril ka ti che a, pumrawhmang inhlânah inhlân rawh,” a ti a.

Chun, Abraham chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, a sabengtung a siem a, a kuomah a siehlaw tlangvâl pahni a ṭhuoi a, a naupa Isak le chun; chun, pumrawhmanga inthawina ding chun thing a chêk a, a tho a, Pathienin a hrilna hmun tieng chun a fe ta a.
A ni thum nia chun Abraham chun a hang en a, a hmun chu hlatakah a hang hmu a.

Chuongchun, Abraham chun a siehlaw tlangvâlhai kuoma chun, “Hitaka hin sabengtung le hin lo um ro, kei le naupang hi sawtaka sawn fêng kan ta; chun Pathien va bieng kan ta, in kuomah hung kîr nâwk kan tih,” a ta.
Abraham chun pumrawhmang inhlânna thing chu a lâk a, a naupa Isak chu ân puttir a: ama chun mei le chemte a chawi a, chuongchun, an pahni chun an fe ta a.

Chun, Isakin a pa Abraham chu a biek a, “Pa,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Hitaka hi ka um, ka naupa,” a ti a. Chun, ama chun, “En ta, mei le thing chu a um a; anleh pumrawhmanga inhlân ding berâmte chu khawlai am a um a?” a ti a.
Abraham chun, “Ka naupa, Pathienin ama ta dinga pumrawhmang inthawina ding berâmte chu ngaituo fâwm el a tih,” a ti a: chuongchun, an pahni chun an fe pei ta a.
Chun, Abrahamin a kutin a ban a, a naupa sukhlumna dingin chemte chu a lâk a.
Nisienlakhawm,
Ama chun, “Naupang chunga khan i kut thlâk naw la, ama kha iengkhawm law naw rawh; i naupasal nei sun khawm mi pêk în ro naw leiin Pathien i ṭi ti tuhin ka hriet tah,” a ta.

Chun,Abraham chu a hang ngha a, a en a; a hnungtieng chun berâmchal a ki thinghnawka lo intâng tlat hi a hmu a: chuongchun, Abraham chun berâmchal chu a va man a, chu chu a naupa aiah pumrawhmang inhlânna ding chun a hmang ta a.
Chuongchun, Abrahamin chu hmun hminga chun “Lalpain ngaituong a tih”
Chun,

mal sâwm ngei ngei ka ti che a, vâna arasi zât le tuisuoriet panga phaiphin zâtin i thlahai chu la sukpung ngei ngei ka ta, i thlahai chun an dohai kul kawtkhâr chu neipêk an ta, ka thu i âwi ta leiin,
Chuongchun, Abraham chu a siehlaw tlangvâlhai kuoma chun, a kîr nâwk ta a, chun, an tho a, Beer-sebaa chun, an fe tâwl ta a: chun Abraham chu Beer-sebaah a um ta zing a.
Chuong thil hnunga chun, “Ngai ta, Milka khawm khan i sang Nahor chu nauhai a neipêk tah,” tiin Abraham chu hrilin a um a.
An nau lutîr chu Uz, a sang chu Buz a nih, Aram pa Kemuel leh;
Chesed, Hazo, Pildas, Jidlaph le Bethuel an nih.
Bethuel chun naunuhmei Rebeka a nei a; chuonghai pariet chu Milka chun Abraham sangpa Nahor chu a neipêk a.
A hmei, a hming Reuma khawmin Teba, Gaham, Tahas le Maaka a nei bawk a.
Sara dam sûng chu kum za le sâwmhni le pasari a nih: chu chu Sara dam sûng kum chu a nih.
Sara chu Kanaan rama Kiriath-arbaa chun a thi a (chu chu Hebron khuo a nih): chun Abraham chu Sara chunga ṭap ding le sûn dingin a hung a.
Chun, a mithi ruong hmaa chu a tho a, Heth thlahai kuoma chun,
Hit mihai chun Abraham chu an dawn a, a kuomah,

“Pu, lo ngai ta, nang chu keini lai hin lal ropuitak i ni a, kan thlânhaia hin i nuomna takah i mithi chu phûm el rawh, i mithi i phûmna dingin keini lai tukhawmin kan thlânhai pêk che inro naw ning ungah,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Abraham chu a tho a, chu rama mi, Hit mihai chu chibai a bûk a.
Chun, “Ka mithi chu ka phûm hmang in remti chun, mi lo ngai unla, Zohar naupa Ephron kuomah mi hnipêk unla,
a lo mawnga um amân a inei, Makpelaa pûk kha mi pe dingin. Inphûmna hmuna nei sawng dingin a man âwm tâwk intêlin nangni hrietah mi pe raw se,” a ti a.
Ephron chu Hit mihai lai chun a ṭhung ve zing a: chuongchun, Hit mi Ephron chun Hit mihai hrietah, a khaw kul kawtkhâra lût taphawt hriet ngeia chun Abraham chu a dawn a,
“Ni lo e, pu, mi lo ngai ta, lo chu ka pêk che a, a sûnga pûk um khawm chu ka pêk bawk che; ka chipuihai nauhai mithmua hin ka pêk che a nih, i mithi chu phûm el rawh,” tiin.
Chun, Abraham chu chu rama mihai hmaa chun a kûn a, chibai a bûk a.
Chun, chu rama mihai hrieta chun Ephron kuomah, “Rem i ti chun, lunginsiettakin mi lo ngai la, lo man chu pe el lem ka ti che: ka kuoma inthawkin la la, chuongchun, ka mithi chu phûm ka tih,” a ti a.
Ephron chun Abraham chu a dawn a, a kuomah,
“Pu, mi lo ngai ta, hnuoi tangka sekel za li man dâm chu nang le keia ta dingin hril khawp am nîng a ti? I mithi chu phûm el rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mamre zâwna
Hit mihai mithmua le a khaw kul kawtkhâra lût taphawthai mithmua chun nei sawng dingin Abraham kuomah pêkin a um ta a.
Chu hnunga chun Abraham chun a nuhmei Sara chu Kanaan rama Mamre (chu chu, Hebron) zâwna Makpelaa loa pûka chun a phûm ta a.
Chuongchun, lo le a sûnga um pûk chu inphûmna hmuna nei sawng dingin Abraham kuomah Hit mihai chun an pêk suok ta a.
Chun, Abraham chu a hung upa a, a hung tar ta hle a; chun,
Chun, Abraham chun a siehlaw, a in sûnga upa tak,
chuongchun,
ka ram tieng, ka laibunghai laia fein, ka naupa Isak hi nuhmei i neipêk lem ding a nih,” a ta.
Siehlaw chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei chun hi ram tieng hin a mi zui nuom kher da el rawi mawh, i naupa hi i hung suokna ram tieng chun ka ṭhuoi kîr ding am nîng a ti?” a ta.
Abraham chun a kuomah, “Ka naupa hi chutaka chun ṭhuoi kîr nâwk naw dingin fimkhur rawh.
Chun, nuhmei chun a zui nuom naw che chun, ka kuoma i înkhâmna kawnga hin inthieng el i tih; iengkhawm ni sien ka naupa hi chutaka chun i ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ding a ni nawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, siehlaw chun a kut chu a pu Abraham êlpui hnuoia chun a rawl a, chu thua chun a kuoma chun ân khâm ta a.
Chun, siehlaw chun a pu sanghâwngsei laia mi sanghâwngsei sâwm a ṭhuoi a, a pu thil ṭha tinrêng chawiin a suok ta a: chuongchun, a tho a, Mesopotamia rama Nahor-hai khuoa chun a fe ta a.
Chun, zântienga nuhmei ruol tui chawi dinga an suok hun lai tak chun, khawhnâwmah tuisunsuo kâwla chun a sanghâwngseihai chu ân dingṭhaṭhuontir a.
Chun, “Aw
En ta, tuikhur kâwlah ka ngîr a, khuoa mihai naunuhmei ruol khawm tui chawi dingin an hung hi:

chuongchun, hieng ang hin ni raw se, nunghâk tu kuoma khawm, ‘Lunginsiettakin ka dâwn dingin i tuibêl kha sukhnuoi raw khai,’ tîng ka ta; ‘Dâwn rawh, i sanghâwngseihai khawm dâwn ding pêng ka tih,’ titu taphawt chu, chu ngei chu i siehlaw Isak ta dinga i ruot chu ni raw se; chutaka chun ka pu chungah lunginsietna în entir ti hrieng ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, a hril zo hmain, ngai ta, Abraham sangpa Nahor nuhmei Milka naupa Bethuel naunu Rebeka chu a liengkoa tuibêl putin a hung suok a.
Chu nunghâk chu a hmêl a ṭha hle a, nunghâk inthieng a ni a, pasal hrim hrimin an la pâwl ngai dêr nawh. Tuikhura chun a zu fe a, a tuibêl a thâl sip a, a hung tung ta a.
Chun, siehlaw chu ân tuokpui dingin a tlân a, “Lunginsiettakin i tuibêla tui kha tlâwmte mîn dâwntir raw khai,” a ti a.
Ama chun, “Dâwn ta la, pu,” a ta; inhmâwtakin a tuibêl chu a kutah a dawm thlâk a, ân dâwntir ta a.
Ama ân dâwntir zo chun, “I sanghâwngseihai khawm an dâwn khawp hmakhat chun chawi pei ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, inhmâwtakin a tuibêl chu ran thlênga chun ân ruok a, tui chawi dingin tuisunsuo tieng chun a tlân nâwk a, a sanghâwngseihai po po ta ding chun a chawi ta pei a.
A vân zinnaa chun
sanghâwngseihai chun an dâwn khawp phingleh, siehlaw chun rângkachak hnâra inbûk duli bûk le, a kuta dingin bânbun pahni rângkachak tangka sâwm bûk a phawr a;
a kuomah, “Tu naunu am i ni a, lunginsiettakin mi hril ta. I pa inah kan riekna ding hmun um a ti?” a ti a.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Nahor ta dinga nei Milka naupa Bethuel naunu ka nih,” a ta.
Ama bawkin a kuomah “Bupâwl le ran bu kan hau ve ve a, riekna hmun khawm kan nei,” a ti nâwk a.
Chuongchun, siehlaw chun a lu a kûn a,
Chun, “Ka pu chunga a lunginsietna le a takna bo ngailo
Chun, nunghâk chu a tlân a, chuong thu chu a nu sûnghai a va hril a.
Rebeka chun ṭapa a nei a, a hming chu Laban a nih: chuongchun, Laban chu a suok a, tuikhur tieng mi kuoma chun a va tlân a.

Hnâra inbûk le a farnu kuta bânbunhai chu a hmu a, “Mi chun chuong ang khâng ang chun a mi tih,” tia a farnu Rebeka thu hril chu a hriet phingleh, mi kuoma chun a va fe a; chun, ngai ta, ama chu tuikhura sanghâwngseihai lai chun a lo ngîr zing a.
Chun, Laban chun, “Nang
Chun, chu mipa chu ina chun a lût a, chun Laban chun sanghâwngseihai thuomhnaw chu a sût a; sanghâwngseihai ta ding chun bupâwl le ran bu a pêk a, a ke le a ruolhai ke sâwpna dingin tui a pêk bawk a.
Chun, Abraham siehlaw hmaa chun fâk ding an hung pêk bawk a; nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “Ka hungna san thu ka hril hmakhat chun fa naw ning,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Hril ta la,” a ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Abraham siehlaw ka nih.
Ka pu nuhmei Sara chun a tar hnungin ka pu ta dingin naupasal a nei a; ama kuoma chun a nei po po a pêk vawng a.
Ka pu chun, ‘Ka umna rama Kanaan mihai nunghâk laia mi hi ka naupa nuhmeiah i neipêk ding a ni nawh:
ka pa in tieng, ka laibunghai laia fein, ka naupa ta dingin nuhmei i neipêk lem ding a nih,’ tiin ṭawng a mîn khâmtir a.
Keiin ka pu kuoma chun, ‘Nuhmei chun a mi zui nuom da el rawi mawh,’ ka ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun ka kuomah, ‘
ka laibunghai kuom ngei i tlung pha chun în khâmnaa inthawk hin inthieng i tih, nunghâk chu an pêk naw che chun, ka kuoma în khâmnaa inthawk hin inthieng i tih,’ a ti a.
Chuongchun, vawisûn hin tuikhur chu ka hung tlung a, ‘Aw
en ta, tuikhur kâwlah ka ngîr hi: chun, hieng ang hin ni raw se, nunghâk tui chawi dinga hung suok tu kuoma khawm, “Lunginsiettakin dâwn dingin i tuibêla tui kha tlâwmte mi pe ta,” ka ti a:
Chun, amân, “Dâwn rawh, i sanghâwngseihai ta ding khawm hin chawi ka tih,” titu taphawt chu, chu ngei chu ka pu naupa ta dinga

Chun, ka lungrila ka hril zo hma chun, ngai ta, Rebeka hi a tuibêl putin a hung suok a; chun, tuikhura chun a zu fe a, tui a zu chawi a; chun, a kuomah, ‘Lunginsiettakin tui mîn dâwntir ta khai,’ ka ti a.

Ama hin inhmawtakin a liengkoa inthawk chun a tuibêl chu a dawm thlâk a, ‘Dâwn rawh, i sanghâwngseihai khawm hi dâwn ding pêng ka tih,’ a ta: chuongchun, ka dâwn a, sanghâwngseihai khawm ân dâwntir bawk a.

Chun, keiin, ‘Tu naunu am i ni a?’ tiin kân dawn a. Ama chun, ‘Milka ineipêk Nahor naupa Bethuel naunu ka nih,’ a ti a; chun, hnâra inbûk chu a hnârah kân bûk a, bânbunhai chu a kutah kân buntir bawk a.
Chun, ka lu ka kûn a,
Chuongchun, tuhin, ka pu in lunginsiet a, a chungah thaw tak taka in thaw ding chun mi hril ro; in thaw naw ding khawmin mi hril bawk ro; chuongchun, ka thaw dân ding hre thei ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Laban le Bethuel chun an dawn a, “Hi thil hi
En ta, Rebeka chu i hmaa hi a um annâwm, ṭhuoi la fe el rawh,
Abraham siehlaw chun an thu chu a hriet phingleh hnuoi sikin
Chun, Abraham siehlaw chun tangkaruo incheinahai le, rângkachak incheinahai le silfênhai a lâk suok a, Rebeka kuoma chun a pêk a; a ṭapa le a nu kuoma khawm chun thil hlutak takhai a pêk bawk a.
Chun, ama le a ruolhai chun an fâkin an dâwn a, an riek ta a. Zîngkâra an tho chun, “Ka pu kuomah mîn fetir ta ro,” a ti a.
A ṭapa le a nu chun, “Tawinu hi ni sâwt nawte, ni sâwm bêk kan kuomah um hri raw se; chu hnunga chun fe de nih,” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Mi sukhnu naw ro khai,
Anni chun, “Tawinu chu ko kan ta, ama bau ngeiah bieng kan tih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Rebeka chu an ko a, a kuomah, “Hi mipa kuoma hin fe nuom i ti?” an ti a. Ama chun, “Nuom e,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an farnu Rebeka le, a dawntu le, Abraham siehlaw le a rawihai chu an infetir ta a.
Chun, Rebeka chu mal an sâwm a, a kuomah, “Kan farnu, nang chu sîng ruoka sâng tamtak nu hung ni la, i thlahai chun anni theidatuhai kul kawtkhâr chu neipêk raw hai se,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Rebeka chu a tho a, a suoknuhai leh sanghâwngseihai chunga chun an chuong a, mi chu an zui ta a; chuongchun, siehlaw chun Rebeka chu a ṭhuoi a, a fe ta a.
Chun, Isak chu Beer-lahai-roi tienga inthawk chun a hung a, Sim rama
Chun, Isak chu zântieng hin inngaituo dingin phûlah a va lêng suok a: chun, a hei ngha a, a en a; chun, ngai ta, sanghâwngseihai an hung a.
Chun, Rebeka chu a hang ngha a, Isak chu a hmu phingleh sanghâwngsei chunga inthawk chun a ṭum ta a.
Abraham siehlaw kuoma chun, “Phûla a mi tuok dinga hung saw tu am a na?” a ti a. Siehlaw chun, “Ka pu a ni saw,” a ta: chuongchun, ân khumna puon a lâk a, ân khum ta a.
Chun, siehlaw chun a thilthaw po po chu Isak a hril a.

Isak chun Rebeka chu a nu Sara puon ina chun a ṭhuoi lût a; chun, Rebeka chu a nei a, a nuhmei a hung ni ta a; chun, ama chu a hmangai hle a, chuongchun, Isak chu a nu thi thua khawm chun a hung thlamuong thei ta a.
Abraham chun nuhmei dang a nei a, a hming chu Ketura a nih.
Ama chun Zimran, Joksan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Suah a neipêk a.
Joksan chun naupasal Sheba le Dedan a nei a. Dedan naupasalhai chu Assurim, Letusim le Leummim an nih.
Midian naupasalhai chu Epha, Epher, Hanok, Abida le Eldaa an nih. Chuong po po chu Ketura nauhai an nih.
Abraham chun a nei po po Isak kuomah a pêk a.
A thaikêm naupasalhai kuoma ruok chun lâwmmanhai a pêk a; chun, ama la dam lai ngei chun a naupa Isak kuoma inthawk chun, saktieng, khawsak ramah, ân fe hmangtir tâwl ta a.
Abraham dam sûng chu kum za khat le sâwmsari le panga a nih.
Abraham chun a thlarau ân thla ta a, a lua kêlsam ṭo hiela tartakin, tarkûna damin a thi ta a, a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoiin a um ve ta a.
A naupasalhai Isak le Ismael chun Hit mi Zohar naupa Ephron loa, Mamre zâwna Makpelaa pûka chun an vui ta a;
chu lo chu Abrahamin Hit mihaia inthawka ân châwk kha a nih. Chutaka chun Abraham chu an phûm a, a nuhmei Sara le khan.
Abraham thi hnung chun Pathienin a naupa Isak chu mal a sâwm a; chu Isak chu Beer-lahai-roi kâwla chun a um a.
Hieng hi Abraham naupa Ismael, Sara suoknu Aigupta mi Hagarin Abraham a neipêk thlahai chu an nih.
Misma, Duma, Massa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphis le Kedema an nih.
Chuong chu Ismael naupasalhai an nih, an khuo ang pei le an riebûk ang peia an hming ziek a nih: an chi ang pei chun lal sâwm le pahni an nih.
Chun, Ismael dam sûng kum chu hi hi a nih, kum za le sâwmthum pasari hi: chun, a thlarau ân thla a, a thi ta a, a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoiin a um ve ta a.
Chun, a thlahai chu Havilaa inthawkin Assuria pan zâwngin Aigupta zâwn Sur chenin an um a, a unau po po epa chun a um a.
Chun, hieng hi Abraham naupa Isak thlahai chu an nih:
Abraham chun naupasal Isak a nei a, Isak chu Paddan-aram rama Suria mi Bethuel naunu, Suria mi Laban farnu Rebeka chu nuhmeia a nei lai chun kum sâwmli mi a nih.
Chun, a nuhmei chu a ching leiin, Isak chun
A nau vawnhai chu phîng sûnga chun an insuol a; ama chun, “Hieng ang hi a ni si chun iengdinga ka dam zing am a na?” tiin
Chun,
“I sula chun chi hni an um a,
I phîng sûnga inthawk ngei chun hnam hni inṭhêng an ta,
Hnam pakhat chu hnam pakhat nêk chun hrât lem a ta;
A upa lemin a naupang lem rawng chu bâwl a tih,” a ta.
Chun, a nau nei a hun chun, ngai ta, a sula chun inphîr an lo um a,
a hmasa lem chu sentakin, puon inhmul anga inhmul thuopin a hung suok a; chuongchun, a hmingah Esau an sak ta a.
Chu zoa chun a unaupa chu a hung suok a, a kutin Esau kekhawng chu a chel zing a; chuongchun, a hmingah Jakob
Chun, naupanghai chu an hung inṭhang lien a, Esau chu sapêl thiemtak, ramsuok mi tak a nih; Jakob ruok chu mi totak, puon in dâma um mi a nih.
Isak chun a sakhi sa a fâk hlak leiin Esau chu a ngaina hle a; Rebeka ruok chun Jakob chu a ngaina lem a.
Vawikhat chu Jakob chun iengkhat a lo suonghruoi a, Esau chu rama inthawkin a hung a, a châu hle a.
Esau chun Jakob kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin i iengkhat sen suong hruoi kha, kha ngei kha mîn fâktir raw khai, ka ṭâm êm el,” a ta (chuleiin, a hming chu Edom an ti a nih).
Jakob chun, “I nau lutîr nina mîn châwktir zet la tie,” a ta.
Chun, Esau chun, “Ni e, ka thi vâng vâng a ni si a, nau lutir nina el hi ka ta dingin ieng am ṭhahnem chuong a ta?” a ta.
Jakob chun, “Ka kuomah inkhâm zet raw le,” a ti a: chun, a kuoma chun ân khâm ta a, a nau lutîr nina chu Jakob kuoma chun a zawr ta a.
Chun, Jakob chun Esau chu bei le havai suong hruoi chu a pêk a; chuongchun, a fâkin a dâwn a, a tho a, a fe ta a. Chuong ang chun Esau chun a nau lutîr nina chu a ngainêp a nih.
Chun, chu rama chun Abraham dam laia ṭâm tla hmasa lem ti lo khawm kha, ṭâm a hung tla nâwk a. Chuongchun, Isak chu Philistin mihai lai Abimelek kuomah, Gerarah a zu fe a.
Chun,
Hi rama hin um hri phawt la, chuongchun, i kuomah um ka ta, mal ka sâwm ding che a nih: hieng ram po po hi i kuoma le i thlahai kuomah pein i pa Abraham kuoma kân khâmna kha ka sukdet ding a nih.
Vâna arasi zâtin i thlahai chu la sukpung ka ta, hieng ram po po hi i thlahai kuomah la pe bawk ka tih; chun, i thlaa chun khawvêla chi tin la thawveng an tih:
Abraham chun ka thu a awi a, ka hrilhai , ka thupêkhai, ka thuruothai, ka dânhai khawm a zâwm lei khan,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Isak chun Gerara chun umhmun a khuor ta a.

Chu khuoa mihai chun a nuhmei chanchin an indawn a; ama chun, “Ka farnu a nih,” a ta: a hmêl a ṭhat leiin, “Hi khuoa mihai hin Rebeka lei hin mi that rawi an tih,” tiin, “Ka nuhmei a nih,” a ti ngam naw a nih.
Chutaka chun sâwttak a um hnungin, Philistin mihai lal Abimelek chun tukvera inthawkin a hei thlîr a; chun, ngai ta, Isak chun a nuhmei Rebeka chu ân saipui lai a hei hmu a.
Chuongchun, Abimelekin Isak chu a ko a, “Ngai ta, i nuhmei a ni ngei hi, iengdinga ‘Ka farnu a nih,’ i ti am a na?” a ti a. Isak chun a kuomah, “Ama leiin thi rawi ka tih ka ti lei a nih,” a ta.

Abimelek chun, “Kan chunga i thilthaw hi iengtizie am a na? Mihai laia mi tukhawmin i nuhmei hi an lo zâlpui el thei i sawnnaw; chuongchun, kan chunga hin thiemnawna i hung intlungtir a ni ding a nih,” a ta.
Abimelek bawk chun, “Tukhawm ama hi amanih, a nuhmei hi amanih tâwk tâwk chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih,” tiin, mi po po chu thu a pêk a.
Chun, Isak chun chu rama chun bu a chîng a, chu kum chun a let za a hmu a.
chuongchun, mi chu a hung hausa ta hle a, nasataka mi neinung hung ni rau khawpin a hung lien ta duok duok a.
Berâm ruolhai, ran ruolhai a nei a, sûnghai tamtak a nei bawk a; chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun an thîk ta a.
A pa Abraham dam laia a siehlawhaiin tuisunsuo an cho po po khawm chu Philistin mihai chun an nel a, pilin an vur bit ta vawng el a.
Chun, Abimelekin Isak kuomah, “Keini nêkin i hrât lem si a, kan kuoma inthawk hin fe hmang dai rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Isak chu chutaka inthawk chun a suok a, Gerar ruomah a puon in a zar a, chutaka chun umhmun a khuor a.

Chun, Isak chun a pa Abraham dam laia an tuisunsuo chohai chu a cho nâwk a; Abraham thi hnung khan Philistin mihai chun an lo nel tâwl ta si a; chun, a pain a lo inbûk ta ang pei khan an hming chu ân bûk a.
Isak siehlawhai chun ruomah an cho a, chutaka chun tuisunsuo hnâr nei an hmu ta hlau a.
Gerar ranpuhai chun, “Tui hi kan ta a nih,” tiin Isak ranpuhai chu an insêlpui a: chuonga ama leh an insêl leiin tuisunsuo hminga chun Esek
Tuisunsuo dang an cho nâwk a, chu khawm chu lâkpêk tumin an insêlpui nâwk a; chuongchun, a hmingah Sitna
Chutaka inthawk chu ân tâwl a, tuisunsuo dang a cho nâwk a: chu ruok chu chu lâkpêk tumin an insêlpui ta naw a: chuongchun, “Tuhin chu
Chutaka inthawk chun Beersebaah a hang fe a.
Chu zân ngei chun
Chuongchun, chutaka chun maichâm a siem a,
Chun, Gerara inthawkin Abimelek chu ama thurâwntu
Isak chun an kuomah, “In mi theida a in kuoma inthawkin in mîn fe hmangtir si a, iengdinga ka kuoma hung am in ni a?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “

i pawi iengkhawm kan tâwk naw a, thil ṭha bak naw chu i chunga hrim iengkhawm kan thaw naw a, tlangtaka kan infetir el che ang khan, nang khawma kan sietna ding hrim i thaw nawna dingin: tuhin nang chu
Chuongchun, an ta dingin ruoi an ṭhe a, an fâkin an dâwn ta a.
Zîngtieng chun inhmatakin an tho a, ṭawng an inkhâm tuo a. Chun, Isakin anni chu ân fetir ta a, a kuoma inthawk chu lungmuongtakin an suok ta a.
Chu ni le le chun Isak siehlawhai chu an hung a, an tuisunsuo cho chanchin an hung hril a, a kuomah, “Tui kan hmu tah,” an ti a.
Chun, Esau chu kum sâwmli mi a niin Hit mi Beeri naunu Judith le Hit mi Elon naunu Basemath nuhmeiah a nei a;
chuonghai chu Isak le Rebeka lungril sukrimsitu an nih.
Isak chu a hung tar a, khaw hmu thei lo khawpa a mit a hung inthim chun, a naupa upa lem Esau chu a ko a, a kuomah, “Ka naupa,” a ti a: ama chun, “Hitaka hin ka um,” a ti a.
Chun, amân a kuomah, “Ngai ta, ka tar ta bêk a, ka thi ni ding ka hriet si naw a.
Chuleiin, tuhin, lunginsiettakin, i hriemhrei thal bâwm le i thal ngul kha chawi la, phûlah va suok la, sakhi mi va kâppêk rawh.
Chun, ka thi hmaa mal ka sâwm theina ding chein, ka du zâwng takin hme inhniktakah mi siempêk la, ka fâk dingin ka kuomah hung la rawh,” a ti a.
Rebeka chun a naupa Jakob kuomah, “Ngai ta,i pa chun i u Esau kuomah hieng hin a ti ka hriet a,
‘Sakhi mi hung kâppêk la, ka fâk a ka thi hmaa
Chuleiin, tuhin, ka naupa, thu ka pêk ang pei che chu zâwm rawh.
Ran ruol lai va fe la, chutaka inthawk chu kêlte ṭha deu deu pahni mi va lapêk rawh: chu chu a duzâwng takin i pa ta dingin hme inhniktakah lo siem ka tih;
chun, a thi hmaa mal a sâwm theina ding chein a fâk dingin i pa kuomah i va fepui ding a nih,” a ti a.
Jakob chun a nu Rebeka kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, ka u Esau chu mi inhmultak a ni a, kei ruok chu mi innâmtak ka ni si a.
Ka pa chun a mi lo them vêl el khawm a ni thei a, ama ngaiin hlêmtu ang hung ni ding ka ni a, malsâwm nêk hmanin ṭawngsie inphur ni lem el ka ta,” a ti a.
A nu chun a kuomah, “Ka naupa, i ṭawngse phur ding chu keia chungah um raw se: ka thu zâwm la mi va lapêk el rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a va fe a, a va lâk a, a nu kuomah a hungpui a; chun, a nu chun a pa du zâwngin hme inhniktakin a lo siem ta a.
Chun, Rebeka chun a naupa upa lem, Esau silfên ṭhatak, ina a kuoma um chu a lâk a, a naupa naupang lem Jakob chu ân hâktir a;
kêlte vun chun a kut nâmna lai le a rîng nâmna lai chu a tuom a:
chun, hme inhniktak le bei a siemhai chu a naupa Jakob kutah a pêk bawk a.
Chun, ama chu a pa kuomah a fe a, “Pa,” a ti a; ama chun, “Hitaka hi ka um, ka naupa a tu lem am i ni a?” a ta.
Jakob chun a pa kuomah, “I naupa upa lem Esau ka nih, i mi tir ang khan ka thaw zo tah, lunginsiettakin tho la, mal mi sâwm dingin ṭhung la, ka sakhi sa hi fa raw le,” a ta.
Isak chun a naupa kuomah, “Ka naupa, iengtizie am a na i hung inhma ngei de?” a ti a. Ama chun, “
Chun, Isak chun Jakob kuomah, “Ka naupa, lunginsiettakin hung hnai raw khai, lo them vêl ka ti che, ka naupa Esau i ni takzet am,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakob chun a pa Isak chu a va hnai a; ama chun a lo them vêl a, “A rawl chu Jakob rawl a ni si a, a kuthai ruok chu Esau kut a ni si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a kut chu Esau kut anga ân hmul leiin ama chu a hriet naw a; mal a sâwm ta a.
“Ka naupa Esau ngei i ni de maw?” a ta. Ama chun, “Nih e,” a ta.

Chun, ama chun, “Mi hung chawi hnai pêk rawh, chuongchun, mal ka sâwm theina ding chein ka naupa sakhi sa chu lo fâng ka tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, a hung chawi hnai pêk a, a fâk ta a; uoin khawm a lâkpêk a, a dâwn bawk a.
Chun, a pa Isak chun a kuomah, “Ka naupa, hung hnai la mi fâwp rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a va hnai a, a fâwp a: ama chun a silfên rim chu a hriet a, mal a sâwm ta a,
“En ta, ka naupa rim hi
Chuongchun, Pathienin vân daidaw,
Le hnuoi ṭhatna hmun,
Le bu le uoin tamtak pe raw se che.
Mi chi tum tumin i rawng bâwl hai sienla,
Hnam tum tumin chibai bûk raw hai se che.
I unauhai lai lalah um la,
I nu nauhaiin chibai bûk raw hai se che.
Ṭawngsie inphurtu che taphawt chu ṭawngsephurin um sienla,
Malsâwmtu che chu malsâwmin um raw se,” a ti a.
Chun, Isakin Jakob mal a sâwm zo a Jakob chu a pa kuoma inthawka a suok hman chauin, a u Esau chu a ramsuok a hung a.
Ama khawm chun hme inhniktakin a siem a, a pa kuoma chun a hung chawi ve a, a pa kuoma chun, “Pa, tho la, mal i mi sâwmna dingin i naupa sakhi sa hi fa raw le,” a ti a.
A pa Isak chun a kuomah, “Tu am i ni a?” a ti a. Ama chun, “I naupa, i naupa upa lem Esau ka nih,” a ti a.
