Chuongchun, Isak chu nasatakin ân thin a, “Sakhi kâp a, ka kuoma a sa hung la a, i hung tlung hmaa ka ifâk zo ta a, mal ka isâwm ta kha tu am a ni a? Anih, ama chu malsâwmin um tho tho tâng a tih,” a ti a.
Esau chun a pa thu hril a hrietin, nasatak le thlasetakin a ṭap ta a, a pa kuoma chun, “Aw pa, kei hi, kei khawm hi mal mi sâwm ve lul raw a ti a.
Ama chun, ‘I sangin a mi hung hlêm a, i malsâwmna chu a lâkpêk ta che a nih,’ a ti a.

Esau chun a hminga Jakob an ti hi an ti dik hle ni lo am a nih? hi vawi hni a mi lân tah a ni a: ka nau lutir nina a mi lâkpêk a; chun, ngai ta, tuhin ka malsâwmna chu a mi lâkpêk nâwk ta hi,” a ti a. Chun, ama bawkin, “Malsâwmna i mi la hlapêk naw am a nih?” a ti a.

Isak chun a dawn a, Esau kuomah, “Ngai ta, ama chu i lalah ka siem a, a unauhai po po khawm a siehlaw dingin ka pêk vawng a; bu le uoinin ka châwm ta bawk a; ka naupa, nanga ta dingin iengam thawpêk ka ti che a?” a ti a.
Esau chun a pa kuomah, “Pa, malsâwmna pakhat bak amani i nei? Aw pa, kei hi, kei khawm hi mal mi sâwm ve lul rawh,” a ti a.
Chun, Esau chu inringtakin a ṭap ta a. Chun, a pa Isak chun a dawn a, a kuomah,
“Ngai ta, i umna hmun ding chu hnuoi ṭhatnaa inthawka hlatakah nîng a ta,
Chungtienga inthawka vân daidaw hlatah a nih i um ding chu.
I kâwlhnâmin a nih i hring ding chu, i sang rawng khawm i bâwl ding a nih;
În tleng suok pha ruok chun,
A rîngkawl chu i rînga inthawk thinthla tâng i tih,” a ti a.
Chun, a pain mal a sâwmna lei chun Esau chun Jakob chu a theida ta a. Esau chun a lungrilin, “Ka pa sûn ni ding chu a hnai ta a, chu pha chun ka sang Jakob chu that el ka tih,” a ti a.
A naupa upa lem Esau thu hril chu Rebeka an hril a; chuongchun, mi a tir a, a naupa naupang lem Jakob chu a ko a, a kuomah, “Ngai ta, i u Esau chun i chungthuah nang sukhlum tum chein ân hnêm a nih.
Chuleichun, ka naupa, tuhin ka thu hi awi rawh: tho la, Harana ka ṭapa Laban inah tlânhmang rawh.
I u lungsen hi a bo hmakhat chu ni iengzât lai amanih a kuomah va um phawt rawh,

i u lungsenna hi a bo a, a chunga i thilthaw hi a theinghil pha chun mi tir ka ta, chutaka inthawk chu hung inṭhuoitir ka ti che, iengdingin am ni khatah in pahni hni chun chân el ka ti cheu a?” a ti a.

Chun, Rebeka chun Isak kuomah, “Hit naunuhai lei hin nun hi ka nghawk a nih. Jakob hin hi ram nunghâk, hieng Hit naunuhai laia mi hi nuhmeiin a nei ve nâwk lem chun, ka ta dingin hring hi ieng am ṭhahnem a ta?” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Isak chun Jakob chu a ko a, mal a sâwm a, thu a pêk bawk a, a kuomah, “Kanaan ram nunghâkhai laia mi hi nuhmeiin i nei ding a ni nawh.
Tho la, Paddan-aram rama i nu pa, Bethuel inah fe la, chutaka mi i nu ṭapa Laban naunuhmeihai laia mi chu nuhmeiin va nei rawh.
Pathien Iengkimthawthei chun mal sâwm chein, hnam tamtak um khâwm hung ni dingin chi tamtak inthlatir chein, sukpung raw se che.
Mikhuol i nina ram, Pathienin Abraham kuoma a pêk hi i hluo theina dingin Abraham malsâwmna chu indawngtir bawk raw se che, nang le i thlahai khawm,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Isakin Jakob chu ân fe hmangtir a: chun, Paddan-aram rama Jakob le Esau nu Rebeka ṭapa Aram mi Bethuel naupa Laban kuoma chun a fe ta a.
Chun, Esau chun Isakin Jakob mal a sâwm a, nuhmei nei dingin Paddan-aram ramah ân fe hmangtir ti le, mal a sâwm laiin, “Kanaan nunghâkhai laia mi hi nuhmeiah i nei ding a ni nawh,” tiin thu a pêk ti,
le Jakobin a nu le pa thu awiin Paddan-aram ramah a fe tah ti a hriet a.
Chuonga Esauin Kanaan nunghâkhai chun a pa Isak lung chu an buo naw hle ti a hriet chun,
Esau chu Ismael kuomah a va fe a, Abraham naupa Ismael naunu Mahalath, Nebaioth farnu chu, nuhmei dingin a nuhmei nei sahai bâka chun a va nei sa ta a.
Jakob chu Beer-sebaa inthawkin a suok a, Haran tieng a pan ta a.
Chun, hmun ieng amanih a hang tlung a, nisa a tla ta leiin chutaka chun a riek ta a. Chu hmuna lung pakhat chu a lâk a, lukhamah a hmang a, chu hmuna chun in dingin a zâl ta a.
Chun, mang a nei a, hnuoi chunga hin leilâk a lo indaw a, a tâwp chun vân a sun a; a chunga chun Pathien vântirkohai ṭum le kaiin a hmu a.
A tâwpa chun
i thlahai chu hnuoia pilvut zâtin la um an ta, thlangtieng dâm, saktieng dâm, hmârtieng dâm, simtieng dâm indar lien i ta, nangma le i thlahaia chun khawvêla hnam tin la thawveng an tih.
Ngai ta, i kuomah ka um a, i fena taphawtah vêng pei ka ti che a, hi rama hin ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka ti che: i kuoma ka hril hi ka thaw hmakhat chun thlathlam naw ning che,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakob chu a in a hung har a, “Hi hmuna hin
Chun, a ṭi a, “Hi hmun hi ṭi a va um ngei de! Hi hi hmun dang a ni naw a, Pathien in a lo ni hi tie, hi hi vân kawtkhâr a lo ni hi,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakob chu zîngtieng inhmatakin a tho a, lung a ilukham chu a lâk a, lungphun dingin a phun a, a sîpa chun sahriek a buok a.
Chu hmun hminga chun Bethel ân bûk a, a khaw hming hmasa chu Luz a nih.
Chun, Jakob chun thu a tiem ta a, “Pathien ka kuomah a um a, hi ka fena lampuia hin mi vêng a, fâk ding bei le sil ding silfên a mi pêk a,
chuonga ka pa in tienga thlamuongtaka ka hung kîr nâwk phawt chun,
hi lungphun ka phun khawm hi Pathien in nîng a tih: chun, ka kuoma i mi pêk ding po poa chun sâwma pakhat chu pe ngei ngei ka ti che,” tiin.
Chu hnunga chun Jakob chu a fe pei a, khawsak nauhai ram chu a hung tlung ta a.

A hang en chun phûla tuisunsuo um hi a hmu a, a kâwla chun berâm ruol thum hi an um zing a; chu tuisunsuoa inthawk chun berâm ruolhai chu tui an indâwntir hlak a nih: tuisunsuo kawta lung um chu a lien hle el a.
Chutaka chun berâm ruol po po chu an fe khâwm hlak a, tuisunsuo kawta lung chu an inhlum hmang a, berâmhai chu tui an indâwntir a, lung chu tuisunsuo kawta a umna pângngaia chun an sie nâwk hlak a.
Jakob chun an kuomah, “Ka unauhai, khawtienga mi am in ni a?” a ti a. Anni chun, “Harana mi kan nih,” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Nahor naupa Laban in hriet am?” a ti a. Anni chun, “Hre e,” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “A dam lai a ni?” a ti a. Anni chun, “A dam lai a ni ie, en ta, a naunu Rakil khawm berâm ṭhuoiin a hung saw,” an ti a.
Ama chun, “Ngai ta u, nisa khawm a lân sâng hle a, ran ṭhuoi khâwm khawm a la hun naw a: berâmhai hi tui indâwntir unla vân thla ro khai,” a ti a.
Anni chun, “Thei naw ning ungah, berâm ruol po po an fe khâwm a, tuisunsuo kawta lung hi an inhlum sawn hmakhat chu; chu hnunga chun berâmhai chu tui kan indâwn tir hlak a nih,” an ti a.
Anni a la biek lai chun Rakil chu a pa berâmhai ṭhuoiin a hung tlung a; ama chun a vêng hlak a ni a.
Chun, Jakob chun a nu ṭapa Laban naunu Rakil le, a nu ṭapa Laban berâm ruol chu a hmu chun a va hnai a, tuisunsuo kawta lung chu ân hlum hmang a, a nu ṭapa beramhai chu tui ân dâwntir a.
Chun, Jakobin Rakil chu a fâwp a, inringtakin a ṭap ta a.
Chun, Jakobin ama chu chu minu pa tupa a nizie le Rebeka naupa a nizie Rakil chu a hril a; chuongchun, Rakil chu a tlân a, a pa a va hril ta a.
Laban chu a farnu naupa Jakob chanchin a hriet chun, a tuok dingin a tlân a, a kuo a, a fâwp a, ama chu a inah a ṭhuoi ta a. Chun, Jakobin chuong thu po po chu Laban a hril ta a.
Laban chun a kuomah, “Ka tisa le ka ru ngei i ni chu tie,” a ti a. Chun, thla khat a kuomah a um ta a.
Chun, Labanin Jakob kuomah, “Ka tupa i ni leiin a thlâwnin ka rawng i bâwl ding am a ni? Iengam hlâwng i ta? mi hril raw khai,” a ta.
Laban chun naunuhmei pahni a nei a,a upa lem hming chu Leah a ni a, a naupang lem hming chu Rakil a nih.
Leah chu mitmeng inkhup deutak a ni a, Rakil ruok chu pieng ṭhatak, hmêl ṭhatak a nih.
Jakob chun Rakil chu a hmangai a; chuongchun, “I naunuhmei naupang lem Rakil hi nei dingin kum sari i rawng bâwlpêk ka ti che,” a ti a.
Laban chun, “Ama chu mi dang kuoma ka pêk nêk chun i kuoma ka pêk chu ṭha lem a tih, ka kuomah um zing el rawh,” a ta.
Jakob chun Rakil nei ding chun kum sari chu rawng a bâwl ta a, nisienlakhawm, Rakil chu a hmangai êm leiin ni sâwt nawte ang chauin a hriet a.
Chun, Jakobin Laban kuomah, “Ka pâwl theina dingin ka nuhmei chu mi pe raw le, ka hun a kim ta si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Laban chun chu khuoa mi po po chu a khâwm vawng a, ruoi a ṭhe a.
Chun, thimbut hin a naunu Leah chu a ṭhuoi a, Jakob kuomah a ṭhuoi lût a; ama chun a lo pâwl a.
(Laban chun a suoknu Zilpah chu a naunu Leah kuoma chun a suoknu dingin a pêk a).

Chun, zîngtieng a hung ni chun Leah a lo ni zing el a; chuongchun, Jakobin Laban kuomah, “Ka chunga i thilthaw hi iengtizie am a ni a? Rakil nei dingin i rawng ka bâwl ni lo am a nih? Iengdinga i mi hlêm am?” a ti a.
Laban chun, “Kan rama hin chuong anga nau a u hmaa a naupang lem infetir chu dân a ni naw ie.
A pakhata inneina chawlkâr chen chu tlingtla phawt la, chun, kum sari dang ka rawng i bâwl nâwk ding chun a dang khawm chu pêng kan ti che,” a ta.
Jakob chun chuong ang chun a thaw a, chu nu chawlkâr chu a tlingtla a, chuongchun, a naunu Rakil chu a nuhmei dingin a pêk ta a.
(Laban chun a suoknu Bilha chu a naunu Rakil suoknu dingin a pêk a).
Jakob chun Rakil khawm chu a pâwl a, Leah nêk chun Rakil chu a hmangai lem bawk a, Laban rawng chu kum sari dang a bâwl nâwk ta a.
Chun,
Chun, Leah chu ân rai a, naupasal a nei a, a hmingah Reuben a sak a: “
Chun, ân rai nâwk a, naupasal a nei nâwk a, “
Chun, ân rai nâwk a, naupasal a nei nâwk a, “Tu zêt hin chu naupasal pathum ka neipêk ta a, ka pasalin mi zâwm tâng a tih,” a ti a: chuleiin, a hmingah Levi sak a nih.
Chun, ân rai nâwk a, naupasal a nei nâwk a, “Tuta ṭum hin chu
Rakil chun Jakob chu nau hrim a neipêk nawh ti ân hriet chun, a unu chu a îtthîk ta a, Jakob kuoma chun, “Nauhai mi pe rawh, chuong naw chun ka thi el ding a nih,” a ti a.
Rakil chunga chun Jakob chu a lunginsen thut el a; chuongchun, “I rîla ra phalnawtu Pathiena i mi ngai am ka nih?” a ti a.
Amanu chun, “En ta, ka suoknu Bilha hi, ama hi pâwl rawh; chuongchun, kei khâwmin amaah nauhai ka nei ve theina dingin, ka khûp chunga hin nau a nei ding annâwm,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a suoknu Bilha chu a nuhmei dingin a pêk a, Jakob chun ama chu a lo pâwl a.
Bilha chu ân rai a, Jakob chu naupasal a neipêk ta a.
Rakil chun, “Pathienin a mi ngaituo a, ka rawl a hriet bawk a, naupasal a mi pêk a ni hi,” a ti a. Chuleiin, a hmingah Dan a sak a.
Chun, Rakil suoknu Bilha chu ân rai nâwk a, Jakob chu naupasal dang a neipêk nâwk a.
Chun, Rakil chun, “Pathien inbuonin ka unaunu chu ka buon a, ka hne tah,” a ti a, chuongchun, a hmingah Naphtali a sak a.
Leah chun nau dang a nei nâwk ta nawh ti ân hrietin a suoknu Zilpah chu a ṭhuoi a, a nuhmei dingin Jakob kuomah a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Leah suoknu Zilpah chun Jakob chu naupasal a neipêk a.
Chun, Leah chun, “A va hamṭhatthlâk ngei de,” a ti a; chuongchun, a hmingah Gad a sak a.
Leah suoknu Zilpah chun Jakob chu naupasal dang a neipêk nâwk a.
Leah chun, “Ka va hamṭha de! nuhmeihai chun hamṭha mi ti ngawt an tih,” a ta; chuongchun, a hmingah Aser a sak a.
Chun, bu lâk lai hin Reuben chun phûlah Zâwldiai a va hmu a, a nu Leah kuomah a hung chawi a. Chun, Rakil chun Leah kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin i naupa zâwldiai a ṭhen mi pe ta?” a ti a.

Ama ruok chun, “Ka pasal i mi lâkpêk hi thil duoi am a nih? Ka naupa zawldiai khawm i mi lâkpêk nâwk pei ding maw?” a ti a. Rakil chun, “Annawleh, i naupa zâwldiai aiah vawizân zâlpui a ti che,” a ti a.

Chun, zântieng chun Jakob chu phûla inthawk chun a hung a, Leah chu a tuok dingin a va suok a, “I mi pâwl ding a nih, ka naupa zawldiaiin ka haw tlat ta che a nih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, chu zân chun a zâlpui ta a.
Chun, Pathienin Leah ṭawngṭaina a ngai a; chuongchun, ân rai a, Jakob chu naupasal pangana a neipêk a.
Leah chun, “Ka suoknu chu ka pasal kuoma ka pêk leiin Pathienin ka hlaw a mi pêk tah a ni hi,” a ti a: chuongchun, a hmingah Issakar a sak a.
Chun, Leah chu ân rai nâwk a, Jakob chu naupasal parukna a neipêk a.
Chun, Leah chun, “Pathienin thuom ṭhatak a mîn neitir a; tuhin chu ka pasal chu naupasal paruk ka neipêk ta leiin ka kuomah um tâng a tih,” a ta; chuongchun, a hmingah Zebulun a sak a.
Chu hnunga chun naunuhmei a nei a, a hmingah Dina a sak a.
Chun, Pathienin Rakil chu a hriet zing a, Pathien chun a ṭawngṭaina a ngai a, a sul a hawngpêk ta a.
Chuongchun, ân rai a, naupasal a nei a: chun, “Pathienin ka hming sie ân khum tah,” a ti a:
chun, “Lalpa chun naupasal dang mi pe sa raw se,” tiin, a hmingah Josef a sak a.

Rakilin Josef a hung nei chun, Jakobin Laban kuomah, “Ka umna pângngai, ka ram tienga ka fe theina dingin mîn fetir ta raw khai, i rawng ka bâwl san ka nuhmeihai le ka nauhai hi mi pe la, mîn fetir rawh.
I rawng ka bâwlpêk zie che hlak chu i hriet si a,” a ti a.
Laban chun a kuomah, “I mi lunginsiet thei chun la um phawt ta la,
Chun, ama bawkin, “I hlaw ding chu mi hril la, chuongchun, pêng ka ti che,” a ti a.
Ama chun, “Iengtin am i rawng ka bâwl a, ka enkawlna hnuoiah i ran chu iengtin am an um ti i hriet annâwm.
Ka hung hma chun tlâwmte bak i nei a, tuhin chu tamtak an hung ni ta hi; ka nghatna tieng tieng
Chun, ama chun, “Ieng am pêng ka ti che a” a ti a. Jakob chun, “Iengkhawm i mi pêk ding a ni nawh; hi thil hi i mi thawpêk chun i ran ruol chu inthlain vêngpêk nâwk ka ti che.

Vawisûn hin i ran ruol chu va en suok vawng ka ta, berâm laia a dumin a rawl le, a dum pheu pheu le, a dum taphawt le, kêl laia a vârin a rawl le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu chu, chutaka inthawkin ṭhuoi tum ka ta; chun, tuta hnung chu chuong anga um chu ka hlaw ni sienla.

Chuongchun, nakie ka hlaw dinghai en dinga i hung pha chun ka felna hin mi dawnpêk el a tih: kêl lai chun a vârin a rawl naw le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu naw le, berâm laia a dum naw ka kuoma um i hmu taphawt chu ka inrûkah ruot el i tih,” a ti a.
Laban chun, “A ṭha ie! i hril ang tak chun ni raw se,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, chu ni tak chun kêlchal a vâra inzetan le, a vâra rawl pheu pheu po po le, kêlpui a vârin a rawl le, a vârin a rawl pheu pheu po po, a vâr ṭhang taphawt chu berâm laia a dum po po le chun a ṭhuoi tum a, a naupasalhai kutah a pêk a.
Chun, ama le Jakob inkâra ni thum lama chun ân umtir a; chun, Jakob chun Laban ran ruol dang po po chu ân thla nâwk ta a.
Chun, Jakobin hriengzau le almond thing le insething hring tuoihai a lâk a, a hâwng a khawk vâr ṭuk a, thing tuoihaia chun a vâr chu a suklang a.
A hmawl khawkna hâwnghai chu ran tui dâwn hlakna kuonga dâm le, tui luongnaahai chun ran ruol hma peia chun a sie a: chun, tui dâwn dinga an hung chun an inzâwl hlak a.
Ran ruolhai chu hmawlhai zâwna chun an inrai phut a, a ze intan dâm, a ze chip nuk dâm, ân ze pheu pheu dâmin te an hung nei hlak a.

Jakob chun berâmtehai chu a sie tum a; ran ruolhai chu Laban ran ruolhai lai a ze intan le a dum po po tieng chu ân nghattir a; ama ran ruolhai chu a sie tum hlak a, Laban ran ruol lai chu a sie naw a.
Ran hrât deuhai chu an hung inrai hlima, hmawl lai chun an inrai theina dingin, Jakob chun tui luongnaah, ran ruol mithmua chun hmawlhai chu a sie hlak a.
Amiruokchu, ran chu an ṭan a ṭha naw chun a sie ngai nawh: chuongchun, a te ṭanṭha naw deuhai chu Laban ta a hung ni pei a, a hrât deuhai chu Jakob ta a hung ni pei a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu nasatakin a hung pung a, ran ruol, ruol lientak dâm, suoknu le suokpa dâm, sanghâwngsei dâm, sabengtung dâm a hung nei ta a.
Jakob chun Laban naupahaiin, “Jakobin ei pa ta po po a lâkpêk vawng a, ei pa taa mi a nih hieng hausakna a nei po po hi,” an ti thuhai a lo hriet a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chun Laban hmêl chu a en a, hi hma ang khan a chungah a ṭha ta nawh ti a hmu a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Jakob chun mi a tir a, phûla a ran ruol umnaa chun Rakil le Leah chu ân kotir a;
an kuomah, “In pa hmêl ka enin hi hma ang khan ka chungah a ṭha ta nawh ti ka hmu a; nisienlakhawm, ka pa Pathien chu ka kuomah a um zing a nih.
Nangni khawmin in pa rawng hi ka theitâwpin ka bâwl ti in hriet a.
Nisienlakhawm, in pa chun a mi hlêm a, ka hlaw hi vawi sâwm lai a mi sukdanglampêk ta a; nisienlakhawm, Pathienin ka pawi a tawk a phal naw a nih.
A ze irawl nukhai chu i hlaw nîng a tih, a ti leh ran po po chun te, a ze irawl nukhai an nei hlak a; chun ‘A ze itanhai i hlaw nîng a tih,’ a ti leh ran po po chun te a ze itan ruok an nei hlak a.
Chuong ang chun Pathienin in pa ranhai chu a lâkpêk a, kei a mi pêk tah a ni hi.
Ranhai an inzâwl hun lai chun ka mangin ka hang dâk a, ran zâwltu a chalhai chu a ze intan dâm, a ze irawl dâm, a ze ṭielṭak dâm, an nih ti ka hmu a.
Chun, ka manga chun Pathien vântirkoin, ‘Jakob,’ a mi hung ti a. Kei chun, ‘Hitaka hi ka um,’ ka ti a.
Ama chun, ‘Hung dâk la en rawh, ran zâwltu a chalhai po po saw, a ze intan dâm, a ze irawl dâm, a ze ṭielṭak dâm an ni saw: I chunga Laban thilthaw po po hi ka hmu a nih.
Kei hi lungphuna sahriek i nâlna, a kuoma thu i tiemna, kha Bethel Pathien kha ka nih; tuhin tho la, hi rama inthawk hin suok la, i piengna rama chun fe nâwk ta rawh,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Rakil le Leah chun an dawn a, a kuomah, “Kan pa ina chun kan ta dingin chanvo le ro inkhâwm ding hrim a la um ta rawp am a nih?
Ama chun ram dang mi ang chauah a mi ngai tah ni lo am a nih? A mi zawr a, kan man khawm a fâk zo vawng ta si a.
Pathienin kan pa kuoma inthawka sum a lâkpêk po po chu keini le kan nauhai ta a ni hi; chuongchun, Pathienin i kuoma a hril taphawt chu thaw raw khai,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu a tho a, a naupasalhai le a nuhmeihai chu sanghâwngseihai chungah ân chuongtir a;
chun, Kanaan rama a pa Isak kuoma fe dingin a ran po po le, a sum inkhâwl po po, a ran hmuhai, Paddan-aram rama ân khâwlhai chu a fepui ta vawng a.
Laban chu a berâm hmul vaw dingin a fê dai a; chun, Rakil chun a pa milimhai chu ân rûkpêk a;
chun, Jakob chu Aram
Chuongchun, a nei po po le chun a tlân hmang ta a; chun, a tho a, Vadungpui
Jakob chu a tlân hmang ti, a ni thum niah, Laban an hril a.
Chuongchun, a unauhai a ṭhuoi a, ni sari lam a hnawt a, Gilead tlânga chun a hnawt phâk ta a.
Chun, Aram mi Laban kuoma chun zânah a mangah Pathien a hung a, a kuomah, “Jakob kuomah a sie a ṭha, a iengkhawm hril lo dingin fîmkhur rawh,” a ti a.
Laban chun Jakob chu a hnawt phâk a.Jakob chun a puon in chu tlânga chun a lo zar ta a; chun, Laban khawm chun a unauhai leh Gilead tlânga chun an zar ve ta a.
Chun, Laban chun Jakob kuomah, “I thilthaw hi iengtizie am a ni leh? ka hriet naw kâr i fe rûk dai a, kâwlhnâma salmanhai ang ela ka naunuhmeihai i ṭhuoi hmang hi?
Iengleia mi hlêm a, mi hril lova tlân hmang am i na? Khuong leh dâr leh ṭingṭang leh hla sakin kân thla ding che bah.
Iengleia ka naupahai le ka naunuhai fâwpa kan thla i phal naw am a na? I thilthaw hi invêtthlâk tak a nih.
Suksethei che ka nih i sawnnaw: nisienlakhawm, i pa Pathien chun zâni zân khan, ‘Jakob kuomah a sie a ṭha iengkhawm hril lo dingin fimkhur rawh,’ tiin a mi biek a nih.
Chun, i pa in ngai tain fe inhâwk êm êm la khawm, iengdinga ka pathienhai mîn rupêk am i ni a?” a ti a.
Jakob chun a dawn a, Laban kuomah, “Ka ṭi lei a nih, i naunuhmeihai hi mi lapêk rawi i tih, ti ka ṭia a nih.
Tukhawm i pathienhai i hmûna chu dam naw ni hai; ei unauhai mithmua hin i ta kan kuoma um chu en chieng la, la ta la,” a ta. Rakilin a lo inrûk ti Jakob chun a hriet si naw a.
Chun, Laban chu Jakob puon ina dâm, Leah puon ina dâm, suoknuhai pahni puon ina dâm chun a lût pei a; nisienlakhawm, a hmu naw a. Leah puon ina inthawk chu a suok a, Rakil puon ina chun a lût a.
Rakil chun milim chu a lâk a, sanghâwngsei thuomhnaw lai chun a lo sie a, a lo ṭhung de a. Laban chun a puon in sûng po po chu a dap vêl vawng a, nisienkhawm, a hmu naw a,

chun ama chun a pa kuomah, “I hmaah ka tho pei naw leiin, ka lalpa, lunginsen naw rawh; nuhmei umdân pângngai chu ka chunga a um lai tak a ni si a,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a zawng a zawng a, milimhai chu a hmu zo ta naw a.
Chun, Jakob chu a lunginsen ta a, Laban chu a hal a. Jakob chun Laban kuomah, “Iengam ka bawsiet a, iengam a na ka suolna i mi hung hnawt rak el a?
Ka thuomhnaw po po i dap suok vawng khawmin, i insûng thuomhnaw hrim iengam i hmu leh? Ka unauhai le i unauhai hmaa hin hung sie suok la, a tu lem am ei indik ngaituo raw hai se.
Tuhin kum sâwmhni zet i kuomah ka um ta a, i berâmpuihai le i kêlpuihai chun an têhai an nei suol hrim hrim ngai naw a, i berâm ruol laia a chalhai khawm ka fâk ngai bawk nawh.
Ramsa se khawm i kuoma hin ka la hung intlun ngai naw a, keiin ân hmang ai chu ka tuor lem hlak a, sûna inrûk amanih, zâna inrûk amani khawm ka ithung i phût hlak a.
Vawi tamtak chu sûna nisa lum le zâna khawdeiin a mi sukrinum êm êm hlak a, îmu khawm ka hmu ngai nawh.
Chuong kum sâwmhni sûng po chu i kuomah ka um a, i naunuhmeihai pahni hlaw dingin kum sâwmpali le, i ranhai hlaw dingin kum ruk i rawng ka bâwl a; ka hlaw hlak chu vawi sâwm lai i sukdanglam si a.

Ka pa Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isak Iṭi chu ka kuomah um naw sienla lem chu, tu khawm hin ruok ngawta mîn fetir ngei ding i ni hi. Pathienin ka rinum tuor le ka rimsikzie chu a hmu a, zâni zân chun a kâwk che a ni chu,” a ti a.

Chun, Laban chun a dawn a, a kuomah, “Naunuhmeihai hi keia nauhai an ni a, naupanghai hi keia naupanghai an ni a, ranhai hi keia ran an ni a, i hmu po po hi keia ta vawng an nih: vawisûn hin hieng ka naunuhmeihai chunga le an nauhai chunga hin iengam thaw thei ka ti leh?
Hung ta, kei le nang hin thu thlung ei tih, chu chu kei le nanga kâra hrietna ni raw se,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chun lung a lâk a, lungphun dingin a phun a.
Chun, Jakobin a unauhai kuomah, “Lung la khâwm ro,” a ti a; chun, lung an lâk a, an intieng khâwm a; chun, lung intieng khâwm kâwla chun bu an fâk a.
Laban chun chu lung intieng khâwm chu Jegar-sahadutha
Laban chun, “Hi lung intieng khâwm hi vawisûn hin kei le nanga kâra hrietpuitu a ni hi,” a ti a. Chuleiin, a hminga chun Galeed inbûk a ni ta a.
Mizpah
Ka naunuhmeihai hi i sukrimsi a, ka naunuhmeihai ni lo nuhmei dang i nei chun, tukhawm ei kuoma hin an um nawa chu, en ta, Pathien chu kei le nanga kâra hretu a nih,” a ti a.
Laban bawk chun Jakob kuomah, “Hi lung intieng khâwm hi en la, kei le nanga kâra hi lung ka phun khawm hi en ta.

Pawi intâwkpêk dingin, keiin hi lung intieng khâwm hi khêlin i kuom tieng hung naw ningah, ti le, nang khawmin hi lung intieng khâwm le hi lungphun hi khêlin ka kuom tieng hung naw ti nih, ti hi lung intieng khâwm hi hrietna ni sienla, hi lungphun khawm hi hrietna ni bawk raw se.
Abraham Pathien, Nahor Pathien, an pa Pathien chun ei kâra thu ngaituo raw se,” a ti nâwk a. Chun Jakob chun a pa Isak Iṭi chu sâlin ṭawng ân khâm ta a:
Chun, Jakobin tlânga chun inthawina ân hlân a, a unauhai chu bei fa dingin a ko a; chuongchun, bei an fâk a, tlânga chun an riek ta a.
Chun, zingkâr Laban chu a tho a, a tuhai le a naunuhmeihai chu a fâwp a, mal a sâwm a; chun, Laban chu a fe a, ama umna tieng a kir nâwk ta a.
Jakob chu a fe ta pei a; chun, Pathien vântirkohaiin an lo intuokpui a.
Jakobin anni a hmu chun, “Hieng hi Pathien pâwlhai an nih,” a ti a; chuongchun, chu hmun hminga chun Mahanaim
Chun, Jakob chun Seir rama Edom phûl tienga a u Esau kuoma chun a hmaah palaihai ân tlântir a.
“Ka lalpa Esau kuoma chun hieng ang hin in hril ding a nih, ‘I siehlaw Jakobin hieng ang hin a ti a nih: Laban kuoma chun mikhuol ka ni a, tu chen hin ka um ta zing a.
Bâwngchal dâm, sabengtung le berâm dâm, suoknu le suokpa dâm ka nei bawk a, i lunginsietna ka hmu theina dingin, ka lalpa hril dingin mi ka hung tir a nih,’ a tih,” tiin, thu a pêk a.
Chun, palaihai chu Jakob kuomah an hung kîr nâwk a, “I u Esau kuom kan va tlung a, mi za li hung ṭhuoiin a tuok ding chein a hung nghe nghe annaw,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu a ṭi êm êm a, a lunginzîng ta a; chun, a kuoma mi umhai dâm, berâm ruol le bâwng ruol dâm, sanghâwngseihai dâm chu pâwl hniin a siem a:
Esau chu pâwl khatah a hunga a that khawmin pâwl khat la um chu tlân hmang thei an tih ti a ngaituo a.
Chun, Jakob bawk chun, “Aw ka pu Abraham Pathien, ka pa Isak Pathien, aw
i siehlaw chunga lunginsietna po po în langtir le thutak po po în langtir laia a chîntak khawm hi hmu tlâk ka ni nawh; hi Jordan hi ka hmawl le bak ka kân a; tuhin chu pâwl hni zet ka lo ni ta hi.
Lunginsiettakin ka u kuta inthawk, Esau kuta inthawk ngei chu mi sanhim rawh, nunau puma a mi hung that ka ṭi si a.
Nangin, ‘Siem ṭha ngei ngei ka ti che a, i thlahai chu tuisuorieta phaiphin tiem sênglo khawp raua tam angin siem ka ti che,’ i ti si a,” a ti a.
Chun, chu zân chun chutaka chun a riek ta a; chun, a thil nei laia mi a u Esau ta dingin lâwmman dingin a sie tum a;
kêlpui za hni le kêlchal sâwmhni, berâmpui za hni le berâmchal sâwmhni,
sanghâwngsei sâwrlai sâwmthum an tehai leh, bâwngpui sâwmli le bâwngchal sâwm, sabengtungpui sâwmhni le sabengtungchal sâwm leh.
Chun, chuonghai chu pâwl tin a tum sengin a siehlawhai kutah ân kawltir a: chun, a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Ka hmaah fe kai unla, pâwl tin hi kâr inneitir pei ro,” a ti a.
A hmaṭhuoitu kuoma chun hieng hin thu a pêk a, “Ka u Esau chun ân tuokpui che a, ‘Tu mi am i ni a? Khâwlaia fe ding am? I hmaa umhai hi tu ta am?’ tia ân dawn pha che chun,
‘I siehlaw Jakob ta an nih, pu Esau, i ta dingin lâwmmana ân phur che a ni hi: ama khawm kan hnungah a um’ ti rawh,” tiin.
A dawttu le, a dawt nâwktu le ran ruol khaltuhai po po kuoma khawm, “Esau in hmu pha chun chuong ang tak chun in hril ding a nih.

‘Chun, ngai ta, i siehlaw Jakob chu kan hnunga sawn a um,’ ti bawk unla,” tiin thu a pêk seng a. “Lâwmman ka hmaa fe hin a lung sukdam ka ta, chu hnunga chun a hmêl hmûng ka tih; chuongchun, mi lo lâwm el a tih,” a ti a nih.
Chuongchun, lâwmman chu a hmaa chun a fe kai ta a, ama ruokchu chu zân chun a pâwl lai chun a riek ta a.
Chu zân chun a tho a, a nuhmeihai pahni le, a suoknuhai pahni le, a nau sâwm le pakhathai chu a ṭhuoi a, Jabbok vadung kaia chun a kai ta a.
Chuongchun, anni chu a ṭhuoi a, vadung chu ân kaitir a, a nei po po khawm ân kaitir bawk a.
Chun, Jakob chu ama khât bakin a um ta a; chun, mi pakhatin ama chu khawfingchat chenin a buon a buon a.
A hne nawh ti ân hrietin a êlpui ru suktuona lai hi a khîk pêk a; chuongchun, a buon lai chun Jakob êlpui ru insuktuokna chu a hung inpelsawl ta a.
Chun, mi chun, “Mîn thla rawh, khawfing khawm a chat ding a ni ta hi,” a ti a. Jakob chun, “Mal i mi sâwm naw chun inthla naw ning che,” a ti a.
Chun, mi chun a kuomah, “I hming iem a na?” a ti a. Ama chun, “Jakob,” a ti a.
Chun, mi chun, “I hming chu Jakob ti ta naw ni hai a, Israel ti lem tâng an ti che; Pathien le mihriem i buon a, i hne ta si a,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakobin ama chu ân dawn a, “Lunginsiettakin i hming mi hril rawh,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Iengleia ka hming indawn am i ni a?” a ti a. Chun, chutaka chun Jakob chu mal a sâwm ta a.
Chun, Jakobin chu hmun hminga chun Peniel
Chun, a êlpui inpelsawl leia inbâi puma Peniel a suoksan lai tak chun nisa a hung suok a, ama chu a hung khaw a.
Chuleiin, tu chen hin Israel mihai chun êlpui ru suktuoa ke tha um hi an fâk ngai nawh: Jakob êlpui ru suktuo chu a ke tha laitaka a khîk leiin.
Chun, Jakob chu a hang dâk a, a thlîr a, Esau, a mi za lihai le hung chu a hmu a. Chuongchun, a nauhai chu Leah kuoma dâm, Rakil kuoma dâm, suoknuhai pahni kuoma dâm a sem diet diet a.
Suoknuhai le an nauhai chu a hmatâwng takah, Leah le a nauhai chu a dawtah, Rakil le Josef chu a nuhnung takah a sie a.
Ama chu an hmaa chun a fe a, a unaupa kuom tieng pana a fe chun a kuom a tlung hmain, vawisari hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk hman a.
Chun, Esau chu ama lâwm dingin a tlân a, a kuo a, a ir a suktuo a, a fâwp a; chun, an ṭap ve ve ta a.
Esau chu a hang dâk a, nuhmeihai le naupanghai chu a hmu a, “I ṭhuoihai hi tuhai am an ni a?” a ti a. Ama chun, “Pathienin lunginsiettaka i siehlaw kuoma a pêk naupanghai an ni hi,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, suoknuhai chu an nauhai le chun an hung hnai a, an kûn a,
Leah khawm a nauhai le chun an hung hnai a, an kûn a; chu hnunga chun Rakil le Josef chu an hung hnai a, an kûn ve a.
Esau chun, “Ran ruol ka întuokpui zozaihai kha ieng i tina am a ni a?” a ti a. Jakob chun, “Ka lalpa, i lunginsietna ka hmu theina dingin ka ti a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, Esau chun, “Kei khawmin ka hau ie, ka sangpa, i nei po po chu i ta ni raw se,” a ti a.
Jakob chun, “Ni lo e, i mi lunginsiet thei chun lunginsiettakin ka lâwmman hi mi pawmpêk rawh: Pathien hmêl hmu angin i hmêl ka hmu a, ka chungah i lâwm si a.
Pathienin a mi lunginsiet a, ka nei ṭeu leiin lunginsiettakin ka thil hung pêk che hi chu pawm rawh,” a ta. Chuong ang chun a thlêm a, ama chun a pawm ta a.
Chun, Esau chun, “Hung rawh fêng ei tih, hma ṭhuoi pêk ka ti che,” a ti a.

Jakob chun a kuomah, “Naupanghai hi an la chîn a, berâm ruol le ran ruol ka kuoma umhai khawm hi te ṭhuoi an nih ti ka lalpain i hriet a; ni khat chau khawm khal hrât taluo inla, ran ruol po po hi thi vawng el an tih.

Ka lalpa, lunginsiettakin i siehlaw hmaa hin fe la, kei chu Seir tlângah ka lalpa kuom ka tlung hmakhat chu, ka hmaa ran fe hi an fe thei tâwk ang peiin le, naupanghai fe thei tâwk ang peiin, damtein hung sawm lem ka tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Esau chun, “Ka kuoma um mi ṭhenkhathai bêk hi mâksanpêk ka ti che aw,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Iengding kherin am ie? ka lalpa, i lunginsietna mîn hmutir el rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Esau chu chu ni ma chun Seir tlâng tieng panin a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Jakob chu Sukkoth-ah a fe a, ama ta dingin in a bâwl a, a ranhai ta dingin bûk a bâwl bawk a; chuleiin, chu hmun hming chu Sukkoth an ti ta a.
Chun, Jakob chu Paddan-aram rama inthawka hungin, Kanaan rama um Sekem khuo chu himtakin a tlung a, khawhnâwma chun a puon in a zar ta a.
A puon in zarna hmun chu Sekem pa Hamor nauhaia inthawkin tangka zain ân châwk a.
Chutaka chun maichâm a siem a, a hmingah El-elohe-Israel
Chun, Leah naunu Dina, Jakob a neipêk chu, chu ram nunghâkhai hmu dingin a va lêng suok a.
Chun, Hiv mi Hamor, chu ram lal naupa Sekem chun ama chu a lo hmu a; a man a, a zâlpui a, ân tlâwm ta a.
Chun, a lungril chu Jakob naunu Dina chunga chun a um tlat a, chu nunghâk chu a hmangai a, bau ṭhatakin a biek a.
Sekem chun a pa Hamor chu a biek a, “Chu nunghâk chu nuhmeiin mi neipêk rawh,” a ti a.
Jakob chun a naunu Dina chu Sekem chun a sukkhawhlo ti a lo hriet a, nisienlakhawm, a naupasalhai chu phûlah ran lai an um leiin an hung hmakhat chu a to zing a.
Sekem pa Hamor chu Jakob be dingin a kuomah a fe a.

Jakob naupasalhai chun an hriet phingleh phûla inthawk chun an hung a; chun, Jakob naunu zâlpuiin Israelhai laiah thil suol invêtthlâktak, thil thaw dêr lo ding chu a thaw ta leiin an lungngai a, an lunginsen ta êm êm a.
Hamor ruok chun anni a biek a, “Ka naupa Sekem lungril chu in naunu chungah a um tlat a: lunginsiettakin nuhmeiin inneitir ta unla.
Innei pawl ei tiu, in naunuhmei hai mîn neitir unla, kan naunuhmeihai khawm nei bawk ro.
Kan ramah keini lai um in ta, in nuomna hmun hmunah um bawk unla, hienglai hin um unla, sumdâwng unla, insukmuk ro,” a ti a.
Sekem khawm chun a nunghâk pa le ṭahai kuomah, “Mi lunginsiet ro, ka kuoma in hril taphawt pêng ka ti cheu.
Man le thilpêk chu iengzat khawm ngên unla, in ti ang peiin pêng ka ti cheu: iengkhawm ni sienla, nunghâk chu nuhmeiin mîn neitir phawt el ro,” a ti a.
Jakob nauhai chun an farnu Dina a sukkhawhlopêk lei chun Sekem le a pa Hamor chu zaihlêmin an dawn a,
an kuomah, “Hi thil, sertanlo mi kuoma kan farnu pêk hi thaw thei naw ning ungah; chu chu kan ta dingin hmingsietna ding a ni si a:
hieng anga in tiem ruok chun in thu ang chu remti thei kan tih: nangni laia pasal taphawt chu keini angin sertanin um unla.
Chuongchun, kan naunuhmeihai inneitir kan ti cheu a, keini khawma in naunuhmeihai nei bawk kan ta; chun, in kuomah um kan ta, chi khat ei hung ni ding annâwm.
Nisienlakhawm, sertan kawnga kan thu in zâwm naw ding chun, kan naunu chu ṭhuoi kan ta, fe el kan tih,” an ti a.
An thu chun Hamor le Hamor naupa Sekem chu an suklâwm ta a.
Chuongchun, tlangvâl chun Jakob naunu chu a dit hle si a, chu thil chu sâwt nghâk lovin a thaw nghâl ta a; ama chu a pa sûnghai laia inzâkai tak a nih.
Chun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem chun an khaw kul kawtkhâr chu an tlung a, an khuohai chu an biek a,

Sawtaka mihai saw mi remtakin an um a, chuleiin, hi rama hin umin, hieng lai hin sumdâwng raw hai se, ngai ta u, an ta dingin ram khawm hi a lien huntâwk bawk a; an naunuhmeihai saw nuhmeiahai nei inla, ei naunuhmeihai khawm anni inneitir bawk ei tiu.
“Nisienlakhawm, chi khat ei hung nina dinga ei kuoma um chu hieng anga ei tiem chau hin sawhai sawn an mi remtipui ding a ni a, sertan an ni angin eini laia pasal taphawt chu sertan hung ni ve inla.
An ran dâm, an sum dâm, an sa po po dâm eini ta a ni vawng naw ding am a nih? An thu hi remtipui el ei tiu, chuongchun, ei kuomah an um el ding a nih.” an ti a.
Chun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem thu chu a khaw kul kawtkhâra suok taphawt chun an zâwm a, a khaw kul kawtkhâra suok po po, pasal taphawt chun ser an intantir ta vawng a.
Chun, ni thum nia an nat laitak chun, Jakob naupasalhai laia mi pahni, Dina ṭahai Simon le Levi chun an kâwlhnâm chawi ve vein inrûkin khuo chu an thaw a, pasal po po chu an that zo vawng el ta a.
Chuongchun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem chu kâwlhnâm ngeiin an that a, Sekem ina inthawkin Dina chu an ṭhuoi a, an suok ta a.
Jakob naupasalhai chun an mi thathai chu an va nangchîng a, an farnu an sukkhawhlo pêk leiin khuo chu an rawk ta a.
An berâm ruolhai, an bâwngruolhai, an sabengtunghai, khuoa thil umhai le loa thil umhai an lâkpêk a;
an sum po po an lâk a, an nauhai le an nuhmeihai po po an man a, in sûnga um taphawt chu an fe hmangpui ta a.

Chun, Jakobin Simeon le Levi kuoma chun, “Nangnîn hi rama um Kanaan mihai le Periz mihai laia hin, theida in mîn phurtirin in mi suklungzîng hle a nih; kei tlâwmte ka ni leiin mi thaw dingin hung inpun khâwm an ta, mi that el an tih; chuongchun, sukbohmangin um ka tih, kei le ka sûnghai le hin,” a ti a.
Anni ruok chun, “Kan farnu hi nawchizawr thawin a thaw el ding a ni?” an ti a.
Chun, Pathienin Jakob kuoma chun, “Tho la, Bethelah hang fe la, chutaka chun um rawh: i u Esaua inthawka i tlân hmang laia i kuoma inlâr Pathien ta ding khan chutaka chun maichâm siem rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chun a sûnghai le a kuoma umhai po po kuoma chun, “Nangni laia mi dang pathien umhai chu sie hmang dai unla, insukthiengin in silfênhai inthleng ro:
tho ei ta, Bethelah fêng ei tiu: chuongchun, ka lunginzîng laia mi dawna, ka fenaa ka kuoma um pei Pathien ta ding khan maichâm siem ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mi dang pathien an kuta um po po le, an naa nabe an ibe po po chu Jakob an pêk a, chun Jakob chun Sekem khaw kâwla thingsaisuo hnuoia chun a thuphmang ta a.
Chun, an fe a, an vêla khuohai chun an lo ṭi nasa hle a, Jakob naupasalhai chu an hnawt ngam naw a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chun Kanaan rama Luz khuo (chu chu Bethel) chu a tlung a, ama le a kuoma umhai po po leh.
Chun, chutaka chun maichâm a siem a, a u kuoma inthawka a tlân hmang lai khan chutaka chun Pathien a kuoma ân lâr leiin a hmun chu, “El-Bethel,”
Chun, Rebeka dawntu Debora chu a thi a, Bethel thlanga thingsaisuo hnuoia chun an phûm a; thingsaisuo hminga chun “Ṭapna thingsaisuo”
Chun, Jakob chu Paddan-aram rama inthawka a hung nâwk chun Pathien a kuomah ân lâr nâwk a, mal a sâwm a,
Pathien chun a kuomah, “I hming hi Jakob a ni a, i hming hi Jakob ti nâwk ta naw ni hai chea, i hming chu Israel ni lem tâng a tih,” a ta; chuongchun, a hminga chun Israel ti a ni ta a.
Pathien bawk chun a kuomah, “Kei Pathien Iengkimthawthei
Abraham le Isak kuoma ram ka pêkhai hi i kuomah pêng ka ti che, i um naw hnunga i thlahai kuoma khawm ram hi pe pei ka tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Pathienin ama a biekna hmuna inthawk chun Jakob chu a fesan ta a.
Chun, a biekna hmuna chun Jakobin ban (lung ban) a phun a, a chunga chun thilinhlân dâwn mi a buok a, a chungah sahriek a buok bawk a.
Chun, Jakob chun Pathienin ama a biekna hmun hminga chun Bethel ân bûk a.
Chun, Bethela inthawk chun an fe a; Ephrath tlungna ding chu hla rei a la ni a, Rakil chun nauha ân vawi a, na deu el hin ân vawi ta a.
Chun, nataka ân vawi lai chun nau dawm mi chun, “Ṭi naw rawh, naupasal dang i nei ding a ni hi,” a ti a.
Chun, a thlarau a suok ding lai chun (a thi ta si a) a hminga chun Ben-oni
Chuongchun, Rakil chu a thi a, Ephrath lampuia chun an phûm a (Ephrath chu Bethlehem a nih).
Chun, a thlân chunga chun Jakobin lung a phun a. Chu chu tu chen a Rakil thlân Lungphun la um chu a nih.
Chun, Israel chu a fe pei a Eder. Insâng
Israel chu chu rama a um lai chun, Reubenin a pa thaikêm Bilha chu a va zâlpui a; chun, Israel chun chu chu a hriet a. Tuhin Jakob naupasalhai chu sâwmpahni an ni tah.
Leah naupasalhai chu Reuben (Jakob nau lutîr), Simeon, Levi, Juda, Issakar le Jebulun an nih.
Rakil naupasalhai chu Josef le Benjamin an nih.
Rakil suoknu Bilha naupasalhai chu Dan le Naphtali an nih.
Leah suoknu Zilpah naupasalhai chu Gad le Aser an nih. Chuong chu Jakob naupasal, Paddan-aram rama pienghai chu an nih.
Chun, Jakob chu Abraham le Isak khuolchâmna hmun Kiriatharba (Hebron an ti bawk) Mamrea a pa Isak kuom chu a tlung ta a.
Chun, Isak dam sûng chu kum za le sâwmriet a nih.
Chun, Isak chun a thlarau ân thla a, upatak, tarkûna damin a thi a, a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoiin a um ta a: chun, a naupasalhai Esau le Jakob chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, hieng hi Esau thlahai chu an nih (Esau chu Edom a nih).
Ismael naunu, Nebaioth farnu Basemath an nih.
Ada chun Esau chu Eliphaz a neipêk a; Basemath chun Reuel a nei a,
Oholibama chun Jeus, Jalam le Kora a nei a; chuong chu Esau naupasal Kanaan rama pienghai chu an nih.

Chun, Esau chun a nuhmeihai, a naupasalhai, a naunuhmeihai le, a ina mi po po, a ranhai, a sa po po le, Kanaan rama a lam suok a thilnei po po chu a sawm a, a sang kuoma inthawk chu ram dangah a fe ta dai a.
An thil neihai chu a nasa taluo a, an um hmunkhat thei naw a nih; an ranhai leiin an khuolchâmna ram chun a dai ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Esau chu Seir tlânga chun a um ta a; Esau chu Edom a nih.
Hieng hi Seir tlânga Edom mihai thlatu Esau thlahai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai hming chu an nih: Esau nuhmei Ada naupa Eliphaz, Esau nuhmei Basemath naupa Reuel.
Eliphaz naupasalhai chu Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam le Kenaz an nih.
(Timna chu Esau naupa Eliphaz thaikêm a nih, ama chun Eliphaz chu Amalek a neipêk a). Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Ada naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Reuel naupasalhai chu an nih: Nahath, Zera, Samma le Mizza hi. Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Basemath naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Zibeon tunu Ana naunu Oholibama, Esau nuhmei, naupasalhai an nih: ama chun Esau chu Jeus, Jalam le Kora a neipêk a.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai laia hotuhai chu an nih: Esau nau lutîr Eliphaz naupasalhaia hotuhai: Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
Kora, Gatam le Amalek hi: hieng hi Edom rama Eliphaz-a inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih; chuong chu Ada naupasalhai chu an nih.

Hieng hi Esau naupa Reuel naupasalhai chu an nih: hotu Nahath, Zera, Samma le Mizza hi: hieng hi Edom rama Reuela inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih, hieng hi Esau nuhmei Basemath naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Oholibama naupasalhai chu an nih: hotu Jeus, Jalam le Kora hi; hieng hi Ana naunu, Esau nuhmei Oholibama naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai chu an nih; hieng hi anni laia hotuhai chu an nih: Esau chu Edom a nih.
Dison, Ezer le Disan hi. Hieng hi Edom rama Seir naupasalhai, Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih.
Lotan nauhai chu Hori le Hemam an nih, chun, Lotan farnu chu Timna a nih.
Hieng hi Sobal nauhai chu an nih: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Sepho le Onam hi.
Hieng hi Zibeon nauhai chu an nih: Aia le Ana hi. Hi Ana hi a nih a pa Zibeon sabengtung lien chihai an thla laia thlalêra tuilumkhurhai hmu suoktu kha.
Hieng hi Ana nauhai chu an nih: Dison le Ana naunu Oholibama hai hi.
Hieng hi Dison
Hieng hi Ezer nauhai chu an nih: Bilhan, Zaavan le Akan hai hi.
Hieng hi Disan nauhai chu an nih: Uz le Aran hai hi.
Hieng hi Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih: hotu Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana,
Dison, Ezer le Disan hai hi: hieng hi Seir rama an chihai ang peia Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih.
Beor naupa Bela chun Edomah ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a nih.
Bela chu a thi a, Bozra mi Zera naupa Jobab chu a aiin ân lal a.
Jobab chu a thi a, Teman mihai rama mi Husam chun a aiin ân lal a.
Husam chu a thi a, Bedad naupa Hadad, Moab phûla Midian mihai thattu kha a aiin ro a rêl a, a khawpui hming chu Avith a nih.
Hadad chu a thi a, Masreka mi Samla chun a aiin ro a rêl a.
Samla chu a thi a, Vadungpui
Saula chu a thi a, Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chu a aiin ân lal a.
Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chu a thi a, Hadar chun a aiin ân lal a; a khawpui hming chu Pau a nih; a nuhmei hming chu Mezahab naunu Matred naunu Mehetabel a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an sûngkuo ang pei, an hmun ang pei le an hming ang peia Esau thla hotuhai hming chu a nih: Hotuhai Timna, Alva, Jetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hai hi: Hieng hi an ram neia an umna ang peia Edom (chu chu Edom mihai thlatu Esau) thla hotuhai chu an nih.
Jakob chu a pa khuolchâmna Kanaan rama chun a um ta a.

Hieng hi Jakob thlahai chu an nih: Josef chu kum sâwmpasari a niin a uhai, a pa nuhmeihai Bilha le Zilpah naupasalhai leh ran ruol an inthla a. Josef chun an suol thukhawchâng chu a pa kuomah ân tlun a.
Chun, Israel chun Josef chu a tar tieng nau a ni leiin a nauhai po po nêk chun a hmangai lem a; chuongchun, zakawfuol rawng tamtaka ṭiel a siempêk a.
An pa chun ama chu a uhai po po nêkin a hmangai lem ti a unauhaiin an hriet chun ama chu an theida ta hle a, ṭawngbau ṭha hrim a chungah an rawl thei ta naw a.
Chun, Josef chun mang a nei a, a uhai kuoma a hril chun ama chu an theida zuol ta a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin ka mang thu hi lo ngai ro:
ngai ta u, loa hin buphalhai ei lo intêl a, ngai ta u, ka buphal chu a hung tho a, a ngîr ta a; in buphalhai chun an hung inhuol a, ka buphal chu chibai an bûk tâwl a,” a ti a.

A uhai chun a kuomah, “Nang tehin kan chungah ro i rêl vei ding maw? Nang tehin kan chungah thu i nei vei ding maw?” an ti a. Chuongchun, a mang lei le a thuhril lei chun ama chu an theida nâwk zuol det a.
Chun, mang dang a nei nâwk a, a uhai chu a hril nâwk a, “Ngai ta u, mang ka nei nâwk a, nisa, thla le arasi sâwmpakhat khin chibai an mi lo bûk chu tie,” a ti a.
Chun, a pa chu a hril a, a uhai khawm; chun, a pa chun a kâwk a, a kuomah, “Mang i nei hi ieng mang am a ni lie? Kei le i nu le i uhai hin hnuoi sikin chibai kan bûk hlak ding che am a nih?” a ti a.
Chun, a uhai chu Sekema chun an pa ran ruol chu inthlain an fe a.
Israel chun Josef kuomah, “I uhaiin Sekemah a ni maw ran ruol chu an inthla? hung ta, an kuomah tir ka ti che,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Mi tir ta la,” a ta.

A pa chun a kuomah, “I uhai an dam am, ran ruol khawm an dam am va en la, an chanchin mi hung hril nâwk raw aw,” a ti a. Chuongchun, Hebron ruoma inthawk chun a tir suok a; ama chun Sekem chu a va tlung ta a.
Chun, mi tuin amanih phûla ân vâk ân vâk lai chun a hmu a; chuongchun, mi chun, “Iengam i zawng leh?” tiin ân dawn a.
Ama chun, “Ka uhai ka zawng a nih: lunginsiettakin ran ruol an inthlâna chu mi hril ta khai,” a ti a.
Mi chun, “Hitaka inthawkin an suok kha tie, ‘Dothanah fêng ei tiu,’ an ti chu ka hriet,” a ti a. Chun, Josef chun a uhai chu a hnawt a, Dothana chun a va hmu a.
Anni chun hlataka inthawkin an lo hmu a, an kâwl hnai a tlung hmain ama thatna ding thu an lo rawt ta a.
“En ta u, mang neipa a hung saw.
Thaw ro, that ei ta, khur pakhatah thlâk ei tiu khai; chun, ‘Sain a se tah,’ ei ti el ding annâwm: chuongchun, a manghai chu iengtin am a um hre el ei tih,” an inti tâwl a.
Reuben ruok chun chu chu a lo hrietin an kuta inthawk chun a sansuok a, “A that êm chu that nâwng ei tiu,” a ti a.

Reuben bawk chun a pa kuoma ṭhuoi nâwkna dinga an kuta inthawk chu a sansuok theina dingin, an kuoma chun, “Thisen chu insuo naw ro, thlalêra khura hin thlâk unla, kut chu a chunga hin thlâk naw ro,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chun a uhai kuom a va tlung chun, ama chu a zakawfuol rawng tamtaka ṭiel a ihâk chu an lo hlîppêk a;
an ṭhuoi a, khurah an thlâk ta a: khur chu a ruok tui um nawna a nih.
Chun, Juda chun a unauhai kuomah, “Ei sang ei that a, a thisen suok ei ip chun iengam ṭhathnemna um a ta?
Thaw ro, a chungah kut thlâk lovin Ismael mihai kuoma sawn zawr el lem ei tiu; ama hi ei sang, ei tisa ngei a ni si a,” a ti a. A unauhai chun a thu chu an zâwm ta a.
Reuben chu khura chun a hung kîra Josef chu khurah a lo um ta nawh ti a hmu chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a,
chun, a sanghai kuom tieng a kîr nâwk a, “Bawipu kha a um ta nawh, kei hi khaw tieng am fe tâng ka ti le aw?” a ta.
Chun, Josef zakawfuol chu an lâk a, kêlchal an thata a thia chun zakawfuol chu an inchie a.
Chun, zakawfuol chu an inphur a, an pa kuoma chun an hung chawi a, a kuomah, “Hi hi kan hmu ringawt a, i naupa zakawfuol a ni am a ni naw en ta,” an ti a.
Ama chun a lo hriet el a, “Ka naupa zakawfuol a ni hi, sahrângin a se a ni hi aw, Josef chu keinawi nengin a um ni ngei a tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakob chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, saiip puon a dierkei a, ni sâwttak a naupa chu a sûn a.

A naupasalhai po po le a naunuhmeihai po po chu ama thlamuon dingin an tho a; nisienlakhawm, ama chun thlamuon a nuom naw a, “Ni lo, lusûn pumin thlânah ka naupa kuomah ka fe ding a nih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a pa chu ama ngaiin a ṭap hlak a.
Chun, Midian mihai chun Josef chu Aiguptaah Pharao hnuoia hotu pakhat, vêngtu pâwl hotu Potiphar kuoma chun an zâwr a.
Chuong lai chun hieng hi a ni a, Juda chu a unauhai laia inthawk chu a fe thla a, Adullam mi pakhat a hming Hira chu a zu bêl a.
Juda chun chutaka chun Kanaan mi pakhat a hming Sua naunu a hmu a, ama chu a neia a pâwl ta a.
Chuongchun, ân rai a, naupasal a nei a; chun, Juda chun a hmingah Er a sak a.
Chun, naupasal a nei nâwk a, a hmingah Selah a sak a: chu chu a nei lai chun Juda chu Chezib-ah a um a.
Juda chun a nau lutîr Er chu nuhmei a neipêk a, a hming chu Tamar a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Juda nau lutîr Er chu
Chun, Juda chun Onan kuomah, “I u nuhmei chu pâwl la, pasalhai unau thaw ding chu thawpêk la, i u ta ding chun chi thlapêk rawh,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Onan chun chithla ding chu ama thla a ni naw ding a nih ti a hriet a; chuongchun, a u nuhmei a pâwl po leh a u ta dinga chi thlapêk lo dingin a chi chu hnuoiah a sukthlâk hlak a.
A thilthaw chu
Chun, a nakie chun Sua naunu, Juda nuhmei chu, a thi a; chun, a ngai a hung bo a, Timnaa berâm hmul vawtuhai kuom tieng chun ama le a ruolpa Adullam mi Hira chu an hang fe a.
Chun, Tamar chu, “I tarpupa chu a berâm hmul vaw dingin Timnaah a hang fe ding a nih,” tiin an hril a.

Ama chun a pasal sûnna silfênhai chu a hlîp a, inkhumna puonin ân khum a, ân tuom tlat a, Timna lampuia Enaim kul kawtkhâra chun a lo ṭhung a: Selah chu a puitling ta si a, a pa chun a nuhmei dingin ân neitir naw zo a ni tah ti a hriet si a.
Chun, Judain ama chu a hmuin nawchizawr amanih a sâwn a, a hmai chu ân khum tlat si a.

Chuongchun, lampui sîra nuhmei tieng chu a va pan a, “Hung ta, lunginsiettakin zâl hmunkhat ei tih,” a ta; a mo kha a nih ti a hriet si naw a. Ama chun, “I mi zâlpui chun iengam mi pêng i ta?” a ti a.
Ama chun, “Ran ruol laia kêlte inphur ka ti che,” a ti a. Chun, ama chun, “Chu chu i mi hung inphur hmaa lo hrên ding iemani bêk i mi pêk ding?” a ti a.

Ama chun, “Hrên ding ieng am pêng ka ti che a?” a ta. Amanu chun, “I hming namna le i hrui, i hmawl chawi le khan,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a pêk a, a zâlpui ta a; chun, amaa inthawk chun nau a vawn ta a.
Chun, a tho a, a inkhumna puon chu a hlîp a, a hmeithaina silfênhai chu ân bel nâwk ta a.
Chun, Judain a thil hrên chu nuhmei kuta inthawk la dingin a ruolpa Adullam mi kutah kêlte chu ân phur a, nisienlakhawm, ama chun a va hmu zo naw a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei umna laia mihai kuoma chun, “Lampui sira Enaima nawchizawr um kha khaw lai am a um ta leh?” tiin ân dawn a. Anni chun, “Nawchizawr hrim hitaka hin an um naw ie,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Juda kuoma chun a kîr nâwk a, “Ama chu ka hmu zo nawh, a hmuna mihai khawmin, ‘Nawchizawr hrim hitaka hin an um nawh,’ an lo ti bawk a,” a ta.
Juda chun, “Nei sawng el raw se, chuong naw chun muolpho rawi ei tih, en ta, hi kêlte hi kân phur a, ama i hmu zo si naw a,” a ti a.

Thla thum vêl amani hnunga chun Juda chu, “I monu Tamar chun tlangvâl a dit a, chunawa khawm, ngai ta, sâwn a pai nghe nghe annaw,” tia hril a ni a. Juda chun, “Ṭhuoi suok unla, raw hlumin um raw se,” a ti a.

Chun, an ṭhuoi suok chun Tamar chun, “Hi thil neitupaa inthawk hin a nih nau ka vawn chu,” tiin, a tarpupa kuoma chun mi a tir a; ama bawkin, “Lunginsiettakin hieng hming namna hai, hrui hai, hmawl hai hi tu ta am a nih en chieng ta khai,” a ti bawk a.
Juda chun chuong thil chu ama ta a nih ti a hriet a, “Ama chu keia nêkin a fel lem a nih, ama chu ka naupa Selah chu kân neitir ta si naw a,” a ti a. Chun, Juda chun ama chu a pâwl nâwk ta dêr naw a.
Chun, nauhain a se laiin, ngai ta, a sula chun inphîr an lo um a.
A nau pakhat chun a kut a hung pur dawk a; chuongchun, nau dawm mi chun, “Hi hi a suok hmasa lem a ni hi,” tiin a chel a, a kuta chun pat sen ân buntir a.
A kut chu a kei lût nâwk lai chun, ngai ta, a unau chu a hung suok ta a; chuongchun, nau dawmtu chun, “Iengdinga suokna ding insiem am i ni a?” a ti a, chuleiin, a hmingah Perez an sak a.
Chu hnunga chun a unau pat sen bun kha a hung suok ve a, a hmingah Zera an sak a.
A pu chun
Chuongchun, Josef chun a pu lunginsietna a hlaw a, ama rawngbâwltuah a um a; chun, ama chu a sûnghai chunga hotuah a siem a, a nei po po a kutah a sie ta vawng a.
A inah hotuin a siem a, a nei po po chunga hotua a siem chena inthawk chu Josef leiin
Chuongchun, a nei po po chu Josef kutah a sie tlat a, a kuoma thil um hrim hrim chu a hrietpui dêr naw a, ama bufâk bak naw chu. Josef chu mi pien ṭhatak a ni a, a hmêl khawm a ṭha hle a.
Chuong hnunga chun hieng hi a ni a, a pu nuhmei chun Josef chu dit enin a en a, “Mi zâlpui rawh,” a ti a.
Ama ruok chu a nuom naw a, a pu nuhmei kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, ka pu chun hi ina hin ka kuomah ieng ieng am a um a hriet si naw a, a nei po po chu ka kutah a sie vawng a;

hi ina hin keia nêka lien lem tukhawm an um naw a: a nuhmei i ni leiin nang bak naw chu ka ta dingin iengkhawm inro a nei bawk nawh: chuleiin, iengtin am hi suol lientak hi thawin Pathien chungah thil suksuol thei ka ti leh?” a ti a.
Ni tinin Josef chu thlêm hlak sien khawm, ama zâlpui ding le ama kuoma um ding thu chu Josef chun a pawm nuom naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, ni khat chu, a sin chu thaw dinga in sûnga a va lût lai, chu ina mi tukhawm hrim an um naw lai chun,
ama-nu chun, “Mi zâlpui rawh,” tiin a silfênah a lo man a; ama chun a silfên chu ama-nu kuta chun a tlânsan a, a suok ta dai a.
Chun, a silfên chu a kuta mâksanin a tlân suok tah ti a hriet phingleh,

ama-nu chun a ina umhai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “En ta u, a mi sukmuolpho dingin Hebrai mi pakhat ei kuomah a ṭhuoi lût ta hi; mi zâlpui tumin ka kuomah a hung lût a, chuongchun, râwl inringtakin ka khêk a;
chun, râwl insuoin inringtakin ka khêk ti a hriet phingleh, ka kâwlah a silfên hi a tlânsan a, a suok ta dai a ni kha,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef pu a hung hmakhat chu a silfên chu a kâwlah a lo sie zing a.
A kuomah chu thu bawk chu a lo hril a, “Hebrai siehlaw ei kuoma i hung ṭhuoi kha, mi sukmuolpho tumin ka kuomah a hung lût a:
chun râwl insuoa ka khêk phingleh, ka kâwlah a silfên hi mâksanin a tlân suok a nih,” a ti a.
Josef pu chun a nuhmeiin a kuoma, “I siehlaw hin hieng ang hin a mi thaw,” ti a hril chu a hriet chun, a lunginsen ta thut a.
Chuongchun, Josef pu chun ama chu a ṭhuoi a, intângna in, lal mi intâng khuopa an umnaa chun a khum a, chuongchun, chutaka intângna ina chun a um ta a.
Nisienlakhawm,
Chuongchun, intângna in vêngtu chun intângna ina intânghai po po chu Josef kutah ân kawltir ta vawng a; chuongchun, chutaka an thaw taphawt chu Josef chu a thawtu a ni pei hlak a.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Aigupta lal uoin petu le a bei siemtu chun an pu Aigupta lal chu an suklungninaw a.
Chuongchun, Pharao chu a siehlaw pahni, a uoin pe hotu tak le, a bei siem hotu tak chunga chun a lunginsen ta a.
Chuongchun vêngtu pâwl hotu inah, intângna in, Josef khuopa a umnaa chun, ân tângtir ta a.
Vêngtu pâwl hotu chun Josef chu anni ân enkawltir a: chuongchun, ama chun anni chu a nghâk a, an rawng a bâwl ta a: chun, ni iengzat lai amanih an intâng phawt a.
Chun, intângna ina khuopa um, Aigupta lal uoin petu le bei siemtu chun, an pahniin zân khatah mang umze tum ve ve an nei a.
A zînga zîngkâr chun Josef chu an kuomah a va lût a, anni chu lungngai hmêl deuin a va hmu a.
Chun, ama chun, “Iem a tia vawisûn chu lungngai hmêl in va put de?” tiin, Pharao siehlaw hotuhai, a pu ina ama kuoma intâng vehai chu ân dawn a.

Anni chun a kuomah, “Mang kan nei a, a mi hrilfie thei tukhawm an um si nawa a nih,” an ti a. Josef chun an kuomah, “Mang hrilfienahai chu Pathien ta a ni naw am a nih? Lunginsiettakin mi hang hril ta u,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, uoin pe hotu tak chun a mang chu Josef a hril a, a kuomah, “Ka manga chun ka hmaa hin grêp hrui a lo um a,
grêp hruia chun a kau pathum a um bawk a; chun, inder suok angin a lo um a, pârhai a lo hung suok a: a pâr bâwrhai chun grêp hminhai a hung insuo ta a.
Chun, Pharao no chu ka kuta hin a lo um a; chuongchun, grêp rahai chu ka lo a, Pharao noa chun ka sâwr a, no chu Pharao kutah ka lo pêk a,” a ta.
Josef chun a kuomah, “Hi hi a hrilfiena a nih: a kau pathum chu ni thum a nih.

Tuta inthawk ni thuma chun Pharaoin i lu dawm kâng a ta, i sinthaw chu inthawtir nâwk a ti che: chuongchun, a uoin petu i ni laia i pêk dân pângngai ang khan Pharao no chu a kutah i pêk nâwk ding a ni chu.
Amiruokchu, i chan ṭhat nâwk pha chun mi hung hre zing la, lunginsiettakin lunginsietna ka chungah hung inlangtir la, Pharao kuomah ka chanchin hung hril la, hi ina inthawk hin mi ṭhuoi suok rawh.
Hebrai mihai rama inthawka miin ân rûka an mîn rûk hmang ka ni a, hi rama khawm hin rip sûnga an mi khumna khawp iengkhawm ka suksuol nawh,” a ti a.
Bei siemtu chun hrilfiena chu a ṭha ti a hrietin Josef kuomah, “Kei khawm mang ka nei a, bei vâr leikhâwr pathumin ka lo sipsuon a;
chun, leikhâwr chunghnung taka chun Pharao bu, beisiemtuin a siem, chi tinrêng hi a lo um a; chuong chu vatehaiin ka leikhawr sîpsuona inthawk chun an lo fâk mur mur a,” a ti a.
Josef chun a dawn a, “Hi hi a hrilfiena a nih: leikhâwr pathum chu ni thum a nih;
tuta inthawka ni thuma chun Pharaoin i tisaa inthawkin i lu chu dawm kâng a ta, thing lêrah khai a ti che; chuongchun, vatehaiin i sa chu an fâk mur mur ding a ni chu,” tiin.
Chun, ni thum ni, Pharao pieng champhaphâk ni chun, Pharaoin ama siehlaw po pohai ta dingin ruoi a ṭhe a; chun, a siehlawhai laia mi uoin pe hotu tak le bei siem hotu tak lu chu a dawm kâng ta a.
Uoin pe hotu tak chu uoin pe hotuah ân ṭhangtir nâwk a; chuongchun, no chu Pharao kuta chun a pêk ta a;
bei siem hotu tak ruok chu a khai ta a, Josefin an kuoma a hrilfie ang tak khan.
Nisienlakhawm, uoin pe hotu tak chun Josef chu a hriet zing awzâwng ta naw a, a theinghil ta a.
Chun, kum hni zet hnungah Pharao chun mang a nei a: Nile vadung panga hin a lo ngir a.
Bâwngpui pasari naltak tak, thâutak tak tuia inthawka hung suok a, phairuong laia tla hi a hmu a.
Chun, bâwngpui dang pasari bertak tak, chêrtak tak hi tuia inthawk bawka an hnunga hung suok ve chu a hmu a, bâwngpui danghai kâwlah vadung panga chun an lo ngîr a.
Chun, bâwngpui bertak tak, chêrtak tak chun bâwngpui naltak tak, thâutak tak chu an fâk zo el ta a. Chun, Pharao chu a ṭhanghar ta a.
Chun, a hang in nâwk a, mang a nei nâwk chun, bu kûng khata hin vui sari lientak tak, ṭhatak tak an hung suok a.
Chu hnunga chun vui sari chitê te khawsak thliin a mût ṭâwl bir berhai chu an hung suok nâwk a.
Chun, vui chitê têhai chun vui sari lientak tak, ṭhatak takhai chu an lem zo el ta a. Chun, Pharao chu a ṭhang a, a mang a lo ni zing el ti a hriet a.

Chun, zîngtieng chun a lunginzîng ta hle el a; chuongchun, mi a tir a, Aigupta rama mitvaidawithiem po po le mivar po po chu a ko a; Pharao chun a mang chu a lo hril tâwl a: nisienlakhawm, Pharao hrilfie thei tukhawm an um naw a.
Chun, uoin pe hotu tak chun Pharao kuomah, “Vawisûn hin ka suksuolzie ka hriet suok tah:
Pharao a siehlawhai chungah a lunginsen a, vêngtu pâwl hotu ina chun kei le bei siem hotu tak chu a mîn tângtir a;
Chun, kei le ama chun zân khatah mang kan nei a, mang umze tum ve ve a nih kan nei chu.
Chutaka chun kan kuoma vêngtu pâwl hotu siehlaw, Hebrai mi, tlangvâl pakhat a um a: ama chu kan hril a, ama chun kan manghai chu a mi hril a, kan mang ang dungzui pei chun a mi hrilfiepêk ve ve a.
Chun, a mi hrilfie ang tak chun a hung um ta ngei a nih: kei chu ka sinthaw hi a mîn thawtir nâwk a, ama chu a khaihlum ta a,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Pharao chun Josef chu ân kotir nghâl ta a, inhmawtakin ripa inthawk chun an ṭhuoi suok ta a; chun, ama chu ânvaw fai a, a silfên chu a thleng a, Pharao kuomah a hung lût a.
Chun, Pharao chun Josef kuomah, “Mang ka nei a, a hrilfie thei tukhawm an um naw a, nangin mang hi a thu i hriet chun i hrilfie thei ti i chanchin mi hril ka lo hriet a,” a ti a.
Josef chun Pharao chu a dawn a, “Chu chu keimaa um a ni naw a, Pathienin Pharao chu thlamuongthlâktakin dawn lem a tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Pharaoin Josef kuomah, “Ngai ta, ka manga chun Nile vapanga hin ka lo ngîr a,
bâwngpui pasari naltak tak, thâutak tak hi tuia inthawk chun an hung suok a, phairuong lai hin an lo tla a:
chun, bâwngpui dang pasari bertak tak, chêrtak tak le inthirtak tak, chuong ang hrima sie Aigupta ram po poa khawm ka la hmu ngai naw hi, an hnungah an hung suok ve a;
chun, bâwngpui bertak tak, chêrtak takhai chun bâwngpui pasari thâutak tak hung suok hmasahai chu an fâk zo el ta a.
Amiruokchu, an fâk zo hnung khawm chun tu khawma an fâk ti an hriet chuong nawh, a phuta ang bawk khan an la ber zing a. Chun, ka ṭhang ta a.
Chun, ka manga chun bu kûng khata vui sari lientak tak, ṭhatak tak hung suok ka hmu bawk a;
chu hnunga chun vui sari vuoi sil sel, chite te, khawsak thli imût ṭâwl bir ber hi an hung suok nâwk a:
chun, vui chite tehai chun vui sari ṭhatak takhai chu an lem zo el ta a. Chun, mitvaidawithiemhai chu ka hril a, nisienlakhawm, a mi hrilfie thei tukhawm an um si naw a,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Josef chun Pharao kuomah, “Pharao mang hi thuhmun a nih: Pathienin a thilthaw ding Pharao ân hriettir a ni chu.
Bâwngpui pasari ṭhatak takhai chu kum sari an nih, bu vui sari ṭhatak takhai khawm chu kum sari an ni bawk a; mang chu thuhmun a nih.
An hnunga bâwngpui pasari bertak tak, chêrtak tak hung suokhai chu kum sari an nih; bu vui sari a si ruok khawsak thli imût ṭâwl bir berhai khawm chu: chuong chu ṭâm kum, kum sari ding a nih.
Chu chu a nih Pharao kuoma ka hril kha: Pathienin a thilthaw ding Pharao ân hriettir a ni hi.
Aigupta ram sûng po poa hin hausakna nasatak kum sari a hung tlung ding a nih;
chu hnunga chun ṭâm kum, kum sari hung um nâwk a tih, chuongchun, hausakna po po kha Aigupta rama hin theinghil vawng ni tâng a tih; ṭâm chun ram hi fa se zo a tih:
hausakna kha a zuitu ṭâm lei chun hi rama hin hre ta naw ni hai, a nasa hle ding a ni si a.
Chun, Pharao mang ân nei nawntirna che chu hi lei hi a nih, thil thaw ding chu Pathienin a sukdet a, Pathien bawkin ân tlungtir vak ding leiin.
Chuleiin, tuhin Pharao chun mi pakhat vartak, bengvârtak zawng suok sienla, Aigupta ram chunga hin hotuah inumtir raw se.
Pharaoin chu chu thaw sienla; chun, ram chunga hin hotuhai ruot sienla, hausak kum, kum sari sûng chun Aigupta ram bu hi hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat pei la khâwm raw hai se.
Anni chun chuong kum ṭhat kum hung tlung dinga bu po po chu Pharao thuneinain la khâwmin, fâk dingin khuoahai sung khâwmin vawng ṭha raw hai se.
Chuongchun, ṭâm leia ram hi a bohmang nawna dingin, bu chu ṭâm kum, kum sari, Aigupta rama hung tlung ding sûnga ding chun, hi ram ta ding hin inringlâwkna ding nîng a tih,” a ti a.
Chu thu chu Pharao le a siehlawhai po po chun ṭha an ti zâwng tak a ni a.
Pharao bawk chun Josef kuomah, “Pathienin chuong po po chu ân hriettir che leiin, nang anga bengvâr le var hrim hi an um nawh:
nang hi ka sûnghai chunga hotuah um i ta, ka khuoletui po po i thu thuin um a tih: lalṭhungphaa ṭhung thua chau hin nanga nêkin inlal ka tih,” a ta.
Pharao bawk chun Josef kuomah, “En ta, Aigupta ram sûng po poa hin hotuah ka siem che,” a ti a.
Chun, a tawlailîr nei pahninaa chun ân chuongtir a, a hmaa chun, “Dingṭhaṭhuon
Chun, Pharaoin Josef kuomah, “Kei Pharao ka nih, nanga thu naw chun Aigupta ram sûng po poa hin tukhawmin an kut amanih, an ke amanih inlet naw ni hai,” a ta.
Chun, Pharaoin Josef hmingah Zaphenath-paneah ân bûk a: On khaw thiempu Potiphera naunu Asenath chu nuhmeiah ân neitir bawk a. Chun, Josef chu a suok a, Aigupta ram chu a fang ta a.
Josef chu Aigupta lal Pharao hmaa a ngîr laiin kum sâwmthum mi a nih. Chun, Josef chu Pharao kuoma inthawk chu a suok a, Aigupta ram po po chu a fang suok ta a.
Chun, kum ṭhat kum, kum sari sûng chun hnuoi chun hlâwktakin bu an suo hlak a.
Aigupta rama kum ṭhat kum, kum sari hung tlunga bu po po chu a lâk khâwm a, bu chu khuohaia chun a sung khâwm ta a; khaw tinah a vêl lova bu seng chu a sung khâwm pei a.
Chuongchun, Josef chun bu chu tamtak, tuisuorieta phaiphin zâtin a sung khâwm rei rui el a, ân khi khawm chu a ma ta hiel a, inkhi sêng ruol a ni ta si naw a.
Ṭâm hung tlung hma chun Josef chun naupasal pahni a nei a, chuhai chu On khaw thiempu Potiphera naunu Asenath chun a neipêk a nih.
Josef chun a nau lutîr hminga chun Manasse
Chun, a nau pahnina hminga chun Ephraim
Kum ṭhat kum, kum sari, Aigupta rama hung tlung chu a hung bo ta a.
Aigupta rama mi po po chu an ṭâm phingleh Pharao kuomah fâk ding hniin an khêk a. Pharao chun Aigupta mi po po kuoma chun, “Josef kuomah fe unla, a hril taphawt cheu chu thaw ro,” a ti a.
Ṭâm chu ram po poa a hung tla phing chun Josef chun an sung khâwmna in po po chu a hawng a, Aigupta mihai kuoma chun a zawr a: Aigupta rama chun ṭâm chu a tla nasa hle a.
Chun, hnuoi chung po poa ṭâm chu a tlâk nasat hle leiin ram tina mihai chu bu inchaw dingin Aiguptaa Josef kuoma chun an hung a.
Ama bawk chun, “Ngai ta u, Aigupta ramah bu a um ti ka lo hriet tah: thi lova ei hring suok theina dingin chutaka chun zu fe unla, chutaka inthawk chun zûn chaw ro khai,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Josef uhai sâwm chu Aiguptaah bu inchaw dingin an zu fe a.
Josef sang Benjamin ruok chu a uhai lai Jakob chun ân fetir ve naw a, “Tuok suol zu tuok hlau rawi a tih,” a ti a nih.
Chuongchun, Israel naupasalhai chu mi fehai lai chun bu inchaw dingin an fe ve ta a, Kanaan rama khawm ṭâm a tla ve si a.
Chun, Josef chu Aigupta ram chunga chun hotu a ni a, ama chu chu rama mi po po kuoma a zawrtu a nih: chuongchun, Josef unauhai chu an hung a, hnuoi sikin ama chibai an bûk tâwl a.

Josef chun a uhai chu a lo hmu a, anni chu a lo hriet tâwl hle a; nisienlakhawm, mi dang anga hriet naw tehlêm thawin inrawmtakin anni a biek a, “Khawlaia inthawka hung am in ni a?” a ti a. Anni chun, “Bu inchaw dinga Kanaan rama inthawka hung kan nih,” an ti a.
Josef chun a uhai rawi chu a lo hriet a, anni ruok chun ama chu an hriet si naw a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Ni lo e, Pu, i siehlawhai hi bu inchaw dinga hung kan nih.
Mi pakhat nau vawng kan ni a, mi indiktak kan nih, i siehlawhai hi enthlatuhai kan ni naw tawp el,” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka awi nawh, ram ruokzie en dinga hung in ni hi maw,” a ti a.
Anni chun, “Keini i siehlawhai hi unau sâwmpahni, Kanaan rama um, mi pakhat nau kan nih: chun, ngai ta, kan mi tlum tak tuhin kan pa kuomah a um a, pakhat ruok chu a um ta naw a nih,” an ti a.
Josef chun an kuomah, “ ‘Enthlatuhai in ni hi,’ ka ti kha in ni ngei hi.
Hieng ang hin infiein um in tih: in mi tlumtak chu hitaka hin a hung naw chun Pharao hringna sâlin hitaka inthawk hin suok naw ti niu ti ka hril cheu.

Nangniah thutak a um le a um naw infiena dingin nangni laia mi pakhat tir unla, in sangpa chu hung ṭhuoi raw se; nangni ruok chu khuopin lo um phawt in tih: chuong naw chun Pharao hringna sâlin, ‘Enthlatuhai in nih,’ ka ti ngei ding cheu a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, an rêng chun ni thum ân tângtir tâwl a.
A ni thum ni chun Josef chun an kuomah, “Hieng ang hin thaw unla hring in tih, Pathien ka ṭi si a:
mi indik in ni chun, in unau laia mi pakhat in intângna ina hin khuopin um sienla, a dang po chu fe unla, in sûnghai ṭâm ta ding chun bu phur ro:
chun, in mi tlumtak chu ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro; chuongchun, in thu chu fieng a ta, in thi naw ding a nih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, chuong ang chun an thaw ta a.
Chun, Reuben chun, “Naupang chungah thil suksuol naw ro ka ti naw cheu am a nih? in ngai naw a, chuleiin, ngai ta u, a thisen phuba chu an lâk a ni hi,” tiin anni chu a dawn a.
An kâra ṭawng inlettu a um leiin Josef chun an thu hril chu a hriet ti an hriet naw a.
Chun, ama chu ân her hmang a, a ṭap ta a: chun, an kuomah a kîr nâwk a, anni a biek a, anni laia Simeon chu a tumin a ṭhuoi a; an mithmua chun a khuop ta a.
Chun, Josef chun an bâwmhai chu bua suksip ding le an tangkahai an ipa sie nâwk seng ding le, lampuia dinga fâk ding pe dingin thu a pêk a: chuong ang chun an thaw pêk tah
Chun, an bu chu an sabengtunghai chu an inphurtir a, chutaka inthawk chu an suok ta a.
Anni laia mi pakhatin riebûka chun a sabengtung bu pe dinga a ip a hang hawng chun, a tangka chu a hmu ta el a, a ip bau bula chun a lo um a.

Chuongchun, a unauhai kuoma chun, “Ka tangka kha an lo sie nâwk a ni hi tie, en ta u, ka ipa hi a lo um zing el,” a ta: chun an lung a kak rak a, “Pathienin hieng anga a mi thaw hi iengtizie am a ni aw?” tiin, inthin pumin an inen tâwl a.
Kanaan rama an pa kuom chu an hung tlung a, an chunga thil hung tlung po po chu an hril a.
“Chu an ram hotu chun inrawmtakin a mi biek a, ram enthlatuah a mi ruot a.
Chun, keini chun a kuomah, ‘Mi indiktak kan nih, enthlatuhai kan ni naw tawp el,
unau sâwm le pahni kan nih; kan pa naupasalhai kan ni vawng a, pakhat chu a um ta naw a, kan mi tlumtak chu tuhin Kanaan ramah kan pa kuomah a um a nih,’ kan ti a.

Chun, ram hotu chun kan kuomah, ‘Hieng ang hin mi indiktak in nih ti hre thei ka tih, in unau pakhat ka kuomah mâksan unla, in sûnghai ṭâm ta ding chun bu phur unla, fe ta ro: chun in mi tlumtak chu ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro:
chuongchun, enthlatuhai in ni naw a, mi indiktak in ni lem ti hrieng ka tih; chun, in unaupa hi pe nâwk ka ti cheu a, hi rama hin sumdâwng tâng in tih,’ a mi ti a nih,” an ti a.
Chun, an iphai chu an bun ruok chun, ngai ta, an tangka fûn seng chu an ip senga chun a lo um a; chun, anni le an pa chun an tangka fûn chu an hmu chun an ṭi hle a.

Chun, an pa Jakob chun an kuomah, “Nangni hin ka nauhai in mîn sûntir a ni hi: Josef a um ta naw a, Simeon a um ta naw a, Benjamin chen khawm ṭhuoi hmang in tum nâwk pei a: chuong thil po po chun a mi baw buoi a ni ta hi,” a ti a.
Chun, Reuben chun a pa kuomah, “I kuomah ka hung ṭhuoi nâwk naw leh ka naupasalhai hi that el de ti ni: ama chu ka kutah mîn kawltir la, i kuomah hung ṭhuoi nâwk el ka tih,” tiin a hril a.

Ama chun, “Ka naupa hi nangni leh fe thla ve naw tawp a ti, a u a thi ta a, ama bak hi a ni ta si a: in fena lampuia dâm tuoksuol zu tuok sienla, ka lu inṭuok hi lungngaitakin thlânah in inliemtir ding a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, chu rama chun ṭâm chu a tla nasa hle a.
Aiguptaah bu an phur kha an fâk zo chun, an pa chun an kuomah, “Fe nâwk unla, bu tlâwmte bêk ei ta dingin zûn chaw nâwk ro khai,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Juda chun a kuomah, “Ama chun, ‘In sangpa in kuoma a hung ṭhang ve naw chun, ka hmêl hmu naw ti niu,’ tiin a mi tiem tlat a nih.
Kan sangpa hi keini leh i tir chun bu chu inchaw pêk kan ti che:
i tir naw ruok chun zu fe naw ning ungah; ama chun kan kuomah, ‘In sangpa in kuoma a hung ṭhang ve naw chun ka hmêl hmu naw ti niu,’ a ti tlat si a,” tiin a hril a.
Israel chun, “Iengdinga sang dang in la nei thu dâm hril khera ka ta dinga thil ṭha nawtak thaw am in ni leh?” a ti a.

Anni chun “In pa chu a la dam am? unau dang in la nei am?” tiin kan chanchin le ei laibunghai chanchin a mîn dawn tlat si a; chuong a thu mîn dawn ang pei chun kan hril a nih: “In sangpa chu hung ṭhuoi thla ro, tîng a tih ti tuin am hre kher kher a ti leh?” an ti a.
Juda chun a pa Israel kuomah, “Bawipu chu ka kuomah infetir rawh, chuongchun, tho kan ta, fe el kan tih, keini le nangni le ei nau le tehai hi thi loa ei um theina dingin.
A chungthua hin keiin a bul tum pei ka tih: keia inthawk ngeiin ama chu phût rawh. I kuomah ka hung ṭhuoi nâwk a, i hmaa hin kân ngîrtir nâwk naw chun, a maw chu kumkhuoin phur de ningah;
muong naw inla chu tuhin a vawihnina khawm kan hung tlung nâwk ta ding bah,” a ti a.

Chun, an pa Israel chun an kuomah, “Chuong ang a ni si chun hieng ang hin thaw ro, in bâwmhaia khan hi rama thil ṭha ṭhenkhat thinghnai damdawi, khuoizu, riminhnik, murra, theihâwngngar le almond thei dâm tlâwmte sengin ama ta ding chun lâwmman dingin chawi thla ro.
Tangka khawm a lêt hniin chawi unla, in ip bau bula tangka a pêkkîr hai cheu khawm kha chawi kîr nâwk ro; a thaw pal a ni rawi mawh.
In sangpa khawm chu ṭhuoi unla, tho unla, ama kuoma chun fe nâwk ro,
in sangpa pakhat le Benjamin hi ân suo pêkna ding cheuin, Pathien Iengkimthawthei chun ama chu inlunginsiettir raw se cheu. Ka nauhai chu chân a ni leh ka chân ding ni el a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, anni chun lâwmman chu an chawi a, tangka khawm chu a lethniin an chawi bawk a. Benjamin khawm an ṭhuoi a: chun, an tho a, Aiguptaa chun an zu fe a, Josef hmaa chun an ngîr nâwk ta a.
Josef chun Benjamin an kuoma um chu a hmu phingleh, a in enkawltu kuoma chun, “Sawhai saw in sûngah ṭhuoi lût la, ran that la, buotsai rawh, anni sawn sûnah ka kuomah bu an fâk ding a nih,” a ta.
Enkawltu chun Josef thupêk ang chun a thaw a; anni chu Josef ina chun a ṭhuoi lût a.

Chun, Josef ina ṭhuoi lûta an um leiin an ṭi a, “Fe hmasak ṭuma ei ipa tangka a mi pêk kîrhai lei khan a ni hi a mi ṭhuoi lût: ei chunga remchâng zawnga mi thawin, eini le ei sabengtunghai le hin suoka um dinga mi man a tum a ni hi,” an ti a.
Chun, Josef in enkawltu kuoma chun an va fe a, kawtkhâr bula chun an biek a,
“Aw pu, kan hung hmasak ṭum khan bu inchaw ding ngawta hung thla kan ni a;
chun, riebûk kan tlung chun kan iphai chu kan hang hawng a; kan tangka seng chu kan ip bau bulah a lo um ta seng a, kan tangka chu a bûk ngai chiein a lo um a; chuongchun, kan hung chawi nâwk a nih.
Chun, bu inchâwkna dingin tangka dang kan hung chawi a, kan tangka chu kan ipah tuin am a sie ti kan hriet si nawh,” an ta.

Ama chun, “Lungmuongtakin um unla, ṭi naw ro, in Pathien, in pa Pathien chun in iphaia chun ro a pêk cheu a ni chu: in tangka kha ka hmu si a,” a ti a. Chun, Simeon chu an kuomah a hung ṭhuoi suokpêk ta a.
A in enkawltu chun anni chu Josef in sûngah a ṭhuoi lût a, tui a pêk a, an ke an sâwp a; an sabengtunghai chu bu a pêk bawk a.
Anni chun an lâwmman hung chawi chu Josef sûnbu faa a hung inlawi phaa dingin an lo siem lâwk diem a; chutaka chun bu an fâk ding a nih ti an hriet leiin.
Josef chu a inah a hung phingleh, an lawmman hung chawi chu in sûngah a kuomah an chawi lût a, hnuoi sikin chibai an bûk tâwl a.
Ama chun an chanchin ân dawn a, “In pa a chanchin in hril tarpa kha a dam lai am a nih, damin a la um de maw?” a ti a.
Anni chun, “Kan pa i siehlaw chu a dam lai a nih, damin a la um,” an ti a. Chun, an lu an kûn a, chibai an bûk nâwk a.
Chun, ama chu a hang dâk a, a sang Benjamin, a nu naupa chu a hmu a, “Kha kha in mi tlumtak, a chanchin in mi hril kha a ni?” a ti a. Ama bawkin, “Ka naupa, Pathienin lunginsiet raw se che,” a ti a.
Chun, Josefin a sang a hmu chun lungriemin a thlâk a, chuongchun, ṭapna hmun inhmawtakin a zawng ta vat a, pindan sûngah a lût a, chutaka chun a ṭap suok ta a.
Chun, a hmai a phi a, a va suok nâwk a, ân sûm hrâm hrâm a, “Bufâk siem ro le,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, ama ta dingin atumin, annirawi ta dingin a tumin, Aigupta mihai a fâkpuihai ta dingin a tumin an siem ta a. (Aigupta mihai chun Hebrai mihai chu buthlêng an awtpui thei si nawh; chuong anga thaw chu Aigupta mihai ta ding chun a thieng naw a nih).
Chuongchun, a upa tak chu a nau lutîr nina angin, a naupang tak chu a nau mitlum nina angin Josef hmaa chun an ṭhung pei a: chuongchun, mak an ti tâwl seng a.

Chun, Josef chun a kuoma chanvohai chu an kuomah ân hlân sâwngtir pei a. Benjamin chanvo lem chu an chanvo po po nêkin a lêtngain a tam lem a. Chun, uoin dâm an dâwn a, ama rawi chun an hlim ta hle a.
Chun, ama chun a in enkawltu kuoma chun, “Khahai ip kha an phur thei tâwkin buin suksip la, an tangka seng chu an ip bau bulah sie seng rawh.
Chun, ka no, tangkaruo no kha, an naupang tak ip bau bulah sie rawh, a bu man tangka le khan,” tiin thu a pêk a. Ama chun Josef hril ang chun a thaw ta a.
Khuo a hung var phingleh anni chu an sabengtunghai le chun an infetir ta a.

Khuoa inthawka an fe suok chu an la tlung hlat hmain, Josef chun a in enkawltu kuoma chun, “Tho la, mihai kha va hnawt rawh; chun, i hnawt phâk phingleh an kuomah, ‘Iengtiziea thil ṭha thil ṭha nawa thung am in ni lie? Iengdinga ka tangkaruo no kha in inrûk am?
Kha kha ka pu uoin dâwnna le ṭhumvâwrna ngei a ni naw am a nih? hieng ang in thaw hi in thaw suol a nih,’ ti rawh,” a ti a.
Chun, a hnawt phâk a, chuong thu chu an kuomah a hril a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Pu, iengtizie am a na hieng ang thu i hril hi? I siehlawhai hin chuong ang thil kan thaw naw dingzie chu.
Ngai ta, kan ip bau bula tangka kan hmuhai khawm kha Kanaan rama inthawkin i kuomah kan hung chawi nâwk kha: iengtin am i pu ina tangka amanih, rângkachak amanih inru thei kan ti leh?
I siehlawhai laia hin tukhawm i hmuna taphawt chu thi raw se, keini khawm ei pu suokah um el kan tih,” an ti a.
Ama chun, “Aw le, in thu ang pei chu ni raw se chu: amiruokchu, tukhawm ka hmuna taphawt chu ka suokah um raw se, nangni ruok chu fe thei in tih,” a ta.
Chu phingle chun inhmawtakin mâni ip chu hnuoiah an lâk thlâk seng a, mâni ip chu an hawng seng bawk a.
Chun, ama chun an upa takah a phut a, an naupang tak chenin a zawng a: chuongchun, no chu Benjamin ipa chun a hmu ta a.
Chu phingle chun an silfênhai chu an keithlêr a, mâni sabengtung chu an inphurtir nâwk seng a, khuoa chun an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Juda le a unauhai chun Josef in chu an va tlung a, ama chu chutaka chun a lo la um zing a; chun, a hmaa chun an bawkkhup tâwl ta a.
Chun, Josef chun an kuomah, “Ieng thil am an ta leh in thaw hi? Keia ang mi hin ai an sân thiem ngei ti in hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.

Juda chun, “Pu, i kuomah ieng am hril tâng kan ti leh? Ieng am hril kan ti a? Iengtin am in hrilveng tâng kan ti leh? Pathienin i siehlawhai suolna chu a hmu suok tah a ni hi: ngai ta, pu, i suokhai kan ni a ni ta hi, keini le a kuta no an hmuna khawm hi,” a ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Chuong ang chun ka thaw naw dingzie chu: a kuta no an hmuna bak hi ka suokah um a tih: nangni ruok chu in pa kuomah lungmuongtakin fe ta ro,” a ti a.

Chu phingleh Juda chun Josef chu a va hnai a, “Aw pu, lunginsiettakin i siehlaw hi i hrietah thu bau khat mîn hriltir rawh, i lunginsen chu i siehlaw chunga hin inchawktir naw la, nang chu Pharao ang el i ni si a.
Pu, nangin, ‘Pa amanih, unau amanih in nei am?’ tiin i siehlawhai hi i mîn dawn a.
Chun, pu, keinîn i kuoma hin, ‘Pa, tarsie le, a tar tieng nau, naupangtak kan nei, chu u chu a thi a, a pa chun ama chu a hmangai ngawt el,’ kan ti a.
Chun, nangin i siehlawhai kuoma hin, ‘Ama chu ka mita ka hmu theina dingin ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi thla ro,’ i ti a.
Chun, pu, keinîn i kuomah, ‘Bawipu chun a pa mâksan thei naw nih, a mâksan chun a pa chu a thi el ding a ni si a,’ kan ti a.
Chun, nangin i siehlawhai kuoma hin, ‘In mi tlumtak chu nangni le a hung thla ve naw chun ka hmêl hmu ta naw ti niu,’ i ti a.
I siehlaw kan pa kuom kan hang tlung chun, pu, i thu chu kan hril a.
Chun, kan pa chun, ‘Fe nâwk phawt unla, bu tlâwmte bêk ei ta dingin zûn chaw nâwk ro,’ a ti a.

Chun, keinîn, ‘Zu fe thei ta naw ning ungah: kan mi tlumtak hi kan kuoma a hung ve ding chun zu fe nâwk el kan tih, kan mitlum tak hi kan kuoma a hung ve naw ding chun, ama hmêl chu kan hmu thei naw ding a nih,’ kan ti a.
Chun, i siehlaw ka pa chun kan kuomah, ‘Ka nuhmei chun naupasal pahni a mi neipêk ti in hriet;
Chun, pakhat chu ka kuoma inthawkin a fe suok a; keinawi nengin a um ni ngei a tih ka ti a; chutaka inthawk chu ama chu ka hmu ta naw vang vang a.
Ama khawm hi ka kuoma inthawk in ṭhuoi hmang a, tuoksuol a zu tuok chun, ka lu inṭuok hi lungngaitakin thlânah in mîn liemtir ding a nih,’ a ti a.
Chuongchun, Bawipu hi kan laia ṭhang lova, i siehlaw ka pa kuom ka hang tlung chun, a hringna chu Bawipu hringna le hin ân zawm tlat leiin hieng ang hi nîng a tih:
Bawipu hi a ṭhang ve nawh ti a hriet phingleh thi el a tih: chuongchun, i siehlawhai hin i siehlaw kan pa lu inṭuok rak chu lungngaitakin thlânah kan inliemtir ding a ni hi.
I siehlaw hin, ‘I kuoma ka hung ṭhuoi nâwk naw chun a maw chu kumkhuoin i chungah phur ka tih,’ tiin ka pa kuoma chun Bawipu chungthua hin a bul tumtuah kân siem ta si a.
Chuleiin, lunginsiettakin, i siehlaw hi Bawipu aiah, pu, i suokah mîn umtir la, Bawipu hi a uhai kuomah hang infetir rawh.
Bawipu ṭhang lovin ka pa kuomah iengtin am hang fe thei ka ti leh? ka pa chunga sietna tlung ding chu hmu ngam naw ning,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chu a kâwla ngîr po pohai hmaa chun ân sûm zo ta naw a, “Mi po po ka kuoma inthawk hin infe suoktir vawng ro,” tiin a khêk a.
Chuongchun, Josef a unauhai kuoma ân hriettir sûng po a kâwlah tukhawm an ngîr nawh. Chun, a ṭap ta rak rak a, chuongchun, Aigupta mihai chun an hriet a. Pharao sûnghai khawmin an hriet bawk a.
Chun, Josef chun a unauhai kuomah, “Josef kha ka nih, ka pa chu a la dam maw?” a ti a. Nisienlakhawm, a unauhai chun an dawn thei naw a, a hmaa chun lungzîngtaka an um leiin.
Josef bawkin a unauhai kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin mi hung hnai ta u,” a ti a. Chuongchun, an va hnai a. Ama chun, “In unaupa Josef, Aiguptaa lûtpui dinga in izawr kha ka nih.
Tuhin hitaka fe dinga in mi zawr leiin lungngai naw ro, nangni le nangni intheida bawk naw ro: mihai hringna sanhim dingin Pathienin in hmaah a mi tir hmasa a ni hi.
Hi kum hni sûng hi hi rama hin ṭâm a hung tla ta a: kum nga a la bâk a, chu sûng po chu hnuoi inlet um naw ni a, bu sîk khawm um naw bawk a tih.
Chuongchun, hnuoia hin chithlahai hlapêk ding cheu le, sanhimna ropuitaka in ta dinga mi tamtak sanhim ding cheuin, Pathienin in hmaah a mi lo tir hmasa a nih.
Chuongchun, hitaka mîn kaitirtu hi nangni in ni naw a, Pathien a ni lem, ama chun Pharao paa le a sûnghai po po hotuah le Aigupta ram po po rorêltuah a mi siem ta a.
Gosen ramah um i ta, ka kâwl hnaiah i um ding a nih, nang le i nauhai le i tuhai leh, i berâm ruolhai le i bâwng ruolhai leh, i nei po pohai leh;
chutaka chun keiin châwm ka ti che a, ṭâm ding kum nga a la um si a; chuong naw chun nang le i sûnghai le, i nei po po rimsi rawi in tih,’ ti ro.
Tuhin nangni mit ngei le, ka sangpa Benjamin mit ngeiin, keia bau ngeiin a hril ti in hmu hi.
Aigupta rama ka ropuina po po thu le, in thil hmu po po thu hi ka pa hril in ta, ka pa chu inhmâwtakin hitaka hin in hung ṭhuoi thlâk ding a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, a ir le a sang Benjamin ir chu suktuoin a ṭap bawk a.
Chun, a unauhai po po chu a fâwp a, a ṭap khum seng a; chu hnunga chun, a unauhai chun thukhawchâng an hrilpui ta a.
Chun, “Josef unauhai an hung,” ti thuthang Pharao ina an lo hriet chun Pharao le a siehlawhai a suklâwm hle a.
Pharao chun Josef kuomah, “I unauhai kuomah, ‘Hieng hin thaw ro, in sahai bu inphurtir unla, Kanaan ramah fe ro:
chun, in pa le in sûnghai chu hung ṭhuoi unla, ka kuoma hin hung ro; chuongchun, Aigupta ram ṭhatna lai tak pêng ka ti cheu a, chu rama thil ṭha takhai chu in fâk ding a nih,’ ti rawh.
Chun, hieng ang hin hril bawk la: in nauhai ta ding le in nuhmeihai ta dingin Aigupta rama inthawk hin tawlailîrhai lain fe unla, in pa ṭhuoiin hung ro.
In thuomhnaw khawm ngaituo nuom naw ro, Aigupta ram po poa thil ṭha taphawt hi in ta a ni si a, tiin,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Israel nauhai chun chuong ang chun an thaw a: chun, Josef chun Pharao thupêk ang chun tawlailîrhai a pêk a, lampuia dingin fâk ding a pêk bawk a.
An rênga kuomah silfên inthlengna ding a pêk seng a; Benjamin kuoma lem chu tangka za thum le silfên inthlengna panga a pêk a.
Chun, an pa kuoma chun sabengtung sâwm Aigupta rama thil ṭha phur le, sabengtungpui sâwm, bu le bei le, lampuia a pa ta dinga mamaw danghai phur ân phur a.
Chun, a unauhai chu a tir suok a, an fe ta a: chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Lampuia inhal lo dingin fimkhur ro,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Aiguptaa inthawk chu an fe tung a, Kanaan rama, an pa Jakob kuom chu an hang tlung a.
