A kuomah, “Josef kha a la dam a, Aigupta ram po po rorêltu a nih,” tiin an hril a. Chun, a lung chu a mit sul a, an thu hril chu a awi si naw a.
Chun, a kuomah Josef thu hril po po chu an hril a; a chuongna ding tawlailîrhai Josefin a inphur chu a hmu chun an pa Jakob lungril chu a har ta huoi a:
chun, Israel chun, “A hun tah ie, ka naupa Josef chu damin a la um a ni tak tak hi: ka thi hmain ama zu hmûng ka tih,” a ti ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel chu a nei po po leh a suok a, Beer-seba chu a tlung a, a pa Isak Pathien kuomah inthâwinahai ân hlân a.
Chun, Pathienin zâna a manghaia chun Israel chu a biek a, “Jakob, Jakob,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Hitaka hi ka um,” a ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Kei Pathien, i pa Pathien chu ka nih: Aiguptaa zu fe chu ṭi naw rawh: chutaka chun chi ropuitakah ka siem ding che a nih.
Aiguptaa chun nang leh fe vêng ka ta; chun, zu ṭhuoi kai nâwk ngei ngei ka ti che: chun, Josef chun i thi pha i mit a siempêk ding che a nih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu Beersebaa inthawk chun a suok a, Israel naupahai chun an pa Jakob le an nauhai le an nuhmeihai chu chuongna dinga Pharao tawlailîr inphurhaia khan an inchuongtir a.
Jakob chun a naupasalhai, a tupahai, a naunuhmeihai, a tunuhai, a thlahai po po chu, Aiguptaa chun a lûtpui tâwl ta a.
Chun, Reuben naupasalhai chu: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi.
Simeon naupasalhai chu Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Johar le Kanaan nuhmei le an naupasal Saula.
Levi naupasalhai chu Gerson, Kohath le Merari.
Juda naupasalhai chu Er, Onan, Selah, Perez le Zera. (Er le Onan chu Kanaan ramah an thi tah). Perez naupasalhai chu Hezron le Hamul.
Issakar naupasalhai chu Tola, Puva, Job le Simron.
Zebulun naupasalhai chu Sered, Elon le Jahleel.
Hienghai po hi Leah naupahai, a naunu Dina leh Paddan-aram rama Jakob a neipêkhai chu an nih: a naupasalhai le a naunuhmeihai po po chu sâwmthum pathum an nih.
Gad naupasalhai chu: Ziphion, Haggi, Suni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi le Areli.
Aser naupasalhai chu: Imna, Isva, Isvi, Beria le an farnu Sera. Chun, Beria naupasalhai chu: Heber le Malkiel.
Hienghai hi Labanin a naunu Leah a ipêk Zilpah naupasalhai chu an nih, hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, mi sâwmparuk an nih.
Jakob nuhmei Rakil naupasalhai chu: Josef le Benjamin.
Josef chun Aiguptaah naupasal Manasse le Ephraim chu a nei a, chuhai chu On khaw thiempu Potiphera naunu Asenathin ama a neipêk a nih.
Chun, Benjamin naupasalhai chu: Bela, Beker, Asbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim le Arda.
Hienghai hi Rakil naupasalhai Jakob a neipêkhai chu an nih; hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, an rêng chun sâwmpali an nih.
Chun, Dan naupa chu Husim.
Naphtali naupasalhai chu: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer le Sillem.
Hienghai hi Labanin a naunu Rakil kuoma a pêk Bilha naupasalhai chu an nih; hienghai hi Jakob a neipêk a, an rêng chun pasari an nih.
Jakob naupasalhai nuhmeihai tiem lovin Jakob le Aiguptaa lût ve, a ṭhalbea suok po pohai chu, an rêng chun sâwmruk paruk an nih;
Gosen ram tieng lo khikhmu dingin Juda chu Josef kuomah Jakobin a lo in fe hmasatir a: chuongchun, Gosen rama chun an lût ta a.
Chun, Josef chun a tawlailîr chu a siemrêl a, Gosenah a pa Israel tuok dingin a hang fe a: chun, a kuomah ân hriettir a, a ir a suktuo a, sâwt fe a ir suktuoin a ṭap a.
Israel chun Josef kuomah, “Damin i la um a, i hmêl ka hmu nâwk ta lei hin tuhin chu nuom leh thi ta de ning,” a ti a.
Josef chun a unauhai le a pa sûnghai kuomah, “Hang fêng ka ta, Pharao hril ka ta, a kuomah, ‘Ka unauhai le ka pa sûnghai, Kanaan rama umhai kha, ka kuom an hung tlung tah;
anni chu ran vaituhai an ni leiin berâm vêngtuhai an ni a, an berâm ruolhai le an bâwng ruolhai le an nei po po an hung sawm vawng a nih,’ tiin, hang hril ka tih.
Chun, Pharao chun a ko cheu a, ‘Ieng sin am in thaw hlak ?’ a ti pha cheu chun,

nangnîn, ‘I siehlawhai hi kan thlatuhai chenah naupang chite kan ni laia inthawk tu chen hin ran vaituhai kan nih,’ ti ro: chuongchun, Gosen ramah um thei in tih. Berâm vêngtu hrim hrim chu Aigupta mihai tirdak zâwngtak a ni si a,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chun Pharao chu a hang hril a, “Ka pa le ka unauhai, an berâm ruol dâm, an ran ruol dâm, an nei po po leh Kanaan rama inthawkin an hung tlung thla ta a: tuhin Gosen ramah an um,” a ta.
Chun, a unauhai laia mi panga a ṭhuoi a, Pharao chu ân hrietttir a.
Pharao chun a unauhai kuoma chun, “Ieng sin am in thaw a?” a ti a. Anni chun Pharao kuomah, “I siehlawhai hi kan thlatuhai chenah berâm vêngtuhai kan nih,” an ti a.

Anni bawk chun Pharao kuomah, “Hi rama um phawt ding hin kan hung a nih: kan ramah i siehlawhai berâm ruolhai fâk ding a um ta si nawh, ṭâm hi Kanaan ramah a tla nasa hle si a; chuleiin, lunginsiettakin i siehlawhai hi Gosen ramah mîn umtir rawh,” an ti a.
Chun, Pharao chun Josef a biek a, “I pa le i unauhai hi i kuomah an hung ta a.

Aigupta ram chu a um duoi annâwm: i pa le i unauhai chu ram ṭhatna lailiah umhmun inkhuortir ta la, Gosen ramah umhmun khuor raw se; chun, anni laia mi thilthawtheitak hriet i nei lem chun ka ran chungah hotuah siem rawh,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chun a pa Jakob chu a ṭhuoi lût a, Pharao hmaa chun ân ngîrtir a: chuongchun, Jakob chun Pharao chu mal a sâwm ta a.
Chun, Pharaoin Jakob kuomah, “Kum iengzat am i ni ta a?” a ti a.

Jakob chun Pharao kuomah, “Ka khuol inzin kum chen chu kum za le sâwmthum a ni a, ka dam sûng kumhai hi a tlâwmin a rimsikthlâk a nih, a mi thlatuhai an khuol inzin laia an dam sûng kum khawm a zât ve bawk nawh,” a ti a.
Chun, Jakobin Pharao chu mal a sâwm nâwk a, Pharao kuoma inthawk chu a suok ta a.
Chun, Josef chun a pa le a unauhai chu umhmun ân khuortir a, Pharao thupêk angin, Aigupta rama ram ṭhatak laia Rameses rama chun ro dingin ram a pêk a.
Chun, Josef chun a pa le a unauhai le a pa sûnghai po po chu, an sûngkuo ang peiin fâk ding a pêk a, a châwm ta a.
Chun, chu ram po poa chun fâk ding hrim a um ta naw a, ṭâm a tla nasa hle si a; chuongchun, ṭâm lei chun Aigupta le Kanaan ram chu a chau ta a.
Josef chun an bu inchâwkna manah Aigupta ram le Kanaan rama tangka um po po chu ân khâwm pêk zo vawng ta a; chun, Josef chun chu tangka chu Pharao inah a hung chawi a.

Chun, Aigupta ram le Kanaan rama tangka po po an hmang zo hnung chun Aigupta mi po po chu Josef kuoma chun an hung a, “Fâk ding mi pe raw khai, i hmaa hin kan thi el ding am a nih? tangka hlak a um ta si naw a,” an ti a.
Chun, Josef chun, “In ranhai hung pe el ro, in ranhai manah fâk ding pêng ka ti cheu,” a ta.

Chuongchun, an ranhai chu Josef kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; Josef chun chuong sakawrhai, berâm ruolhai, bâwng ruolhai le sabengtunghai mana chun fâk ding a pêk pei a: chu kum chun an ran po po manah fâk ding a pêk a, a châwm tâwl ta a.

Chu kum chu ân vawi a, kum a hung thar chun an hung nâwk a, a kuomah, “Pu, kan tangka po po kan hmang zo tâkzie le, kan ran ruolhai i ta a ni tâkzie hi, pu, i kuoma hin ip naw ning ungah: pu, i mithmua hin kan ramhai le kan tisa bak naw chu iengkhawm a um ta dêr naw a;

i hmaa hin keini le kan ram hi kan bohmang el ding am a nih? Keini hi kan ram pumin fâk dingin mîn chaw rawh; chuongchun, keini le kan ram hi Pharao siehlawhai ni el kan tih: chun, thi loa dama kan um theina ding le, ram hi mâk a ni nawna dingin bu chi mi pe bawk la,” an ti a.

Chuongchun, Josef chun Pharao ta dingin Aigupta ram po po chu ân châwkpêk ta a; ṭâm chu an chunga a tlung nasa bêk leiin Aigupta mihai chun an lo chu an zawr si a. Chuongchun, ram chu Pharao ta a ni ta vawng a.
Mihriemhai chu Aigupta ramri khingtieng tâwpa inthawka khingtieng tâwp chenin khuoahai chun ân tâwltir tâwl ta a.
Thiempuhai ram bak ân châwk naw a; thiempuhai chun Pharaoa inthawk chanvo an nei a, Pharaoin an chanvo a pêk chu an fâk hlak a nih: chuleiin, an ram chu an zawr ve naw a.
Chu hnunga chun Josef chun mihai kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, vawisûn hin nangni hi in ram pumin Pharao ta dingin kân châwk ta cheu a, hi, hitaka hi in ta ding bu chi a um hi, hnuoiah chîng ro.
Chun, bu lâk pha chun Pharao ta dingin hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat pei pêng in ta, a hmun li chu nangni ta nîng a tih, in chîng nâwk ding, in fâk ding le in nau le tehai fâk dingin,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun, “Nangin kan hringna hi i sanhim ta a: pu, mi lunginsiet la, Pharao siehlaw ni el kan tih,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Josef chun Pharaoin hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a hmu pei ding thu hi, Aigupta ram ta dingin tu chen hin dânah a siem tah a: thiempuhai ram bak chu a nih Pharao ta ni lo chu.
Chuongchun, Israelhai chun Aigupta rama Gosen rama chun umhmun an khuor ta a; chutaka chun an insukmuk a, chi tamtak an thla a, nasatakin an pung ta a.
Chun, Jakob chu Aigupta rama chun kum sâwmpasari a um a; chuongchun, Jakob dam sûng kum chu kum za le sâwmli pasari a nih.

Chun, Israel thi hun ding chu a hung hnai ta a; chuongchun, a naupa Josef chu a ko a, a kuomah, “I mi lunginsiet thei chun, lunginsiettakin i kut kha ka êlpui hnuoiah rawl la, ka chungah thuzâwmtak le indiktaka thaw dingin intiem rawh. Aiguptaa hin mi phûm lul naw rawh.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka kuomah inkhâm raw le,” a ti a; chuongchun, a kuomah ân khâm ta a. Chun, Israel chu khum lu sikin a kûn ta a.
Chun, chuong hnunga chun, Josef kuomah, “Ngai ta, i pa a dam nawh ie,” an ti a: chuongchun, a naupasalhai pahni, Manasse le Ephraim chu a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Jakob chu “Ngai ta, i naupa Josef chu i kuomah a hung ie,” tia an hril chun, Israel chu ân sukhar a, khuma chun a ṭhung ta a.
‘Chi tamtak inthlatir ka ti che a, sukpung bawk ka ti che a, chi tum tum um khâwmah siem ka ti che; chun, hi ram hi i hnunga i thlahai kuoma chun kumkhaw ro dingin pêng ka tih,’ a mi ti a.
Chun, i naupasalhai pahni, Aiguptaa i kuoma ka hung hmaa i neihai hi, ka ta an nih: Ephraim le Manasse hi, Reuben le Simeon ang bawkin ka ta nîng an tih.
Anni hnunga nau i neihai chu i ta nîng an ta, an ro chana chun an uhai hming chu inṭâwmpui el an tih.
Israelin Josef naupahai a hmu chun, “Hieng hi tuhai am an ni a?” a ti a.
Josef chun a pa kuomah, “Hieng hi ka naupasalhai, Pathienin hitaka a mi pêkhai chu an nih,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Lunginsiettakin ka kuoma hin hung ṭhuoi rawh, anni chu mal lo sâwm ka tih,” a ti a.
Israel chu a upat leiin a mit ân thim taa, a hmu fie thei naw a nih. Chun, a hung ṭhuoi hnai a; chun, ama chun a lo fâwp a, a lo pawm a.
Israel chun Josef kuomah, “I hmêl hmu hi ka beisei ta naw a, nisienlakhawm, ngai ta, Pathienin i thlahai hmêl chen khawm a mîn hmutir tah a ni hi,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chun anni chu a pa mal kâra inthawk chun a kei suok a, ama chu hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a.
Josef chun an pahni chun a kei a, Ephraim chu a kut changtiengin Israel kut vawitieng pangah, Manasse chu a kut vawitiengin Israel kut changtieng pangah a hung ṭhuoi hnai a.
Nisienlakhawm, Israel chun a ban inkal ṭâl a, a kut changtieng chun a ban a, a naupang lem Ephraim lusîpah, a kut vawitieng chu Manasse lusîpah ân nghat a, Manasse chu nau lutîr a ni si a.
Chun, Josef chu mal a sâwm a, “A mi thlatu Abraham le Isak a hmaa an umna hlak Pathien, vawisûn chena ka dam sûng po poa mi châwmtu Pathien,

suol po poa inthawka a mîn tlantu vântirko chun naupanghai hi malsâwm raw se; chun ka hming le a mi thlatu Abraham le Isak hming chu anni hmingah put raw se: chun, hnuoia hin mipui nasatak hung ni dingin hung pung raw hai se,” a ti a.
Josef chu a pain a kut changtieng Ephraim lusîpa ân nghat a hmu chun a lungni ta naw a; chuongchun, a pa kut Ephraim lusîpa chu Manasse lusîpa tâwl dingin a dawm kâng a.
Chun, Josefin a pa kuomah, “Pa, hieng ang ding hi a ni nawh, hi hi a nih nau lutîr chu, i kut changtieng hi a lusîpah innghat lem rawh,” a ti a.

Nisienlakhawm, a pa chun a nuom naw a, “Ka hriet deh, ka naupa, ka hriet, ama khawm hnama hril khawpin um a ta, ama khawm ropui bawk a tih; amiruokchu, a sang hi ama nêkin ropui lem a ta, a thlahai khawm hi chi tum tum tamtak la hung nîng an tih,” a ta.
Chun, Israel bawk chun Josef kuomah, “Ngai ta, ka thi ding a ni ta a: nisienlakhawm, Pathien chu in kuomah um a ta, in thlatuhai rama chun ṭhuoi nâwk a ti cheu.
Chu naw khawm chu i unauhai chanvo nêk chun chan khatin
Chun, Jakobin a naupasalhai chu a ko a, a hril a; “Ni nuhnunghaia in chunga thil la tlung ding chu ka hril theina ding cheuin hung inkhâwm ro.
Nangni Jakob naupasalhai, hung inkhâwm unla, ngai ro:
In pa Israel thu hi ngai ro.
Reuben, nang hi ka nau lutîr,
Ka thilthawtheina, ka hrâtna ra hmasatak,
Insângtakna le thuneitakna neitu i nih.
Nisienlakhawm, tui anga det lo i ni a,
Chunghnungtakna chu nei naw ti nih,
I pa khumpui i kai leiin:
Chun, chu chu i sukpawrche a, ka zâlnaah i kai kha.
Simeon le Levi hi unau an nih:
An kâwlhnâmhai chu thisen insuona hriemhrei an nih.
Aw ka thlarau, nang chu an inrâwnnaa chun inrawl ve naw rawh:
An lunginsenin mi an that a,
An kâwmawnain bâwngchal tha an sat a.
An lunginsenṭeuna chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se, a ṭium si a.
An lung puom hlena chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se, a nunrâwng si a.
Jakobrawihai lai chun anni chu thedar ka ta,
Israelrawihai lai chun anni chu sukdar ka tih.
Juda, nang chu i unauhaiin inpâk an ti che,
I kut chu i râlhai rîngah innghat a ta,
I pa naupasalhai chu i hmaah kûn an tih.
Ka naupa, i sase chu i hang fesan ta a,
A kûn a, sakeibakneichal angin a bawk a,
Sakeibakneipui ang bawk siin, tuin am suktho ngam an ta?
Lal hmawl chu Judaa inthawk hin bo naw ni a,
Rorêltu hmawl chu a ke kâra inthawkin bo naw bawk a tih;
A neitu takpa
Hnam tinin ama thu awi an tih.
A sakawrte chu Grêp hruiah a thlung a,
A sabengtungte chu grêp hrui ṭha miah a thlung bawk a.
A silfên chu uoinah a sâwp a,
A puon chu grêp thisenah.
A mithai chu uoin suksenin um a ta,
A hahai chu nenetui sukvârin.
Zebulun hin tuisuoriet pangah umhmun khuor a ta,
Lawngchâwlna vapang nîng a tih:
A ramri chu Zidonah nîng a tih.
Issakar hi sabengtung hrâttak,
Berâm huong kâra bawk a nih:
Châwlna chu ṭhain a hriet a,
Ram chu inhawiin a hriet bawk a.
Chuongchun, iengkhat put dingin a liengko chu a sukhnuoi a,
Kuli sinthawin siehlawah a hung um ta a.
Dan hin a mihai chu,ro rêlpêk a tih.
Israel hnam pakhat ni vein.
Dan hi lamliena rûl,
Lampuia rûlriel,
A chunga chuong a thala tla dêr khawpa
Sakawr kea chuk hlaktu hi nîng a tih.
Aw
Gad hi râlin thâwng an ta,
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kekhawng tieng thaw lem a tih.
Aser hi a fâk ṭhâng a ta,
Lal tensietna suklang mi nîng a tih.
Naphtali hi sazukpui insuo a ni a,
Thu ṭhatakhai a hril hlak.
Josef hi kâu ra nuomtak a ni a,
Tuikhur kâwla kâu ra nuomtak chu.
A kâu nâwksâwnhai chun lung bang ân zâm khum a.
Thal kâphai chun ama chu nasatakin an sukrinum a,
An kâp a, an suknawmna a:
Nisienlakhawm, ama thalngul chu ngartakin a um zing a,
A kut thahai chu sukhrâtin a um a,
Jakob Mihrât kut chun,
(Chutaka inthawk chun berâm vêngtu,
Israel lungpui chu a hung um a.)
I pa Pathien nangma ṭhangpuitu dinga,
Iengkimthawthei,
Chungtienga vân malsâwmnahai,
Hnuoitienga bawk zing tui inthûktak malsâwmnahai,
Nene le sul malsâwmnaa
Nang malsâwmtu ding ngei sukhrâtin a um a.
I pa malsâwmpêkna hi,
A mi thlatuhai malsâwmpêkna nêk hmanin,
Chatuon tlâng tâwpkhâwk chenin a nasa ta lem a nih:
Chuonghai chu Josef lua hin um a ta,
A unauhaia inthawka suktuma umpa lusîpa chun um a tih.
Benjamin hi satene hnukinrawl a nih,
Zîngkâr chun a sase chu fâng a ta,
Zântieng chun a râllâk chu sem a tih,” tiin.
Chuong po po chu Israel hnam sâwm le hnam hni chu an nih; chun, hieng hi anni malsâwma an kuoma an pa thu hril chu a nih: an malsâwmna dawng ding ang peiin mal a sâwm seng a.
Chun, anni chu thuro a sie a, an kuomah, “Ka chipuihai kuomah ṭhuoiin ka um ve ding a ni tah. Hit mi Ephron loa pûka khan ka thlatuhai lai mi phûm ve ro,
chutaka chun Isak le a nuhmei Rebeka chu an phûm a: chutaka bawk chun Leah ka phûm a,
lo le a sûnga pûk um chu Heth thlahaia inthawka inchâwk a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, Josef chun a pa hmai a sik a, a ṭa a, a fâwp a fâwp a.
Chun, Josefin a siehlaw damdawi thiemhai chu a pa ruong chu hmawntheilova siem dingin thu a pêk a: chuongchun, damdawi thiemhai chun Israel ruong chu hmawntheilovin an siem a.
A ruong siemna dingin ni sâwmli an aw a, hmawntheilova siemna chun ni chuong zât chu a aw hlak hrim a nih; chun, ni sâwmsari sûng zet Aigupta mihai chun ama sûnin an ṭap a.
Chun, ama an sûn zo hnung chun Josefin Pharao sûnghai chu a biek a, “In mi lunginsiet thei chun, lunginsiettakin Pharao hrieta chun,

‘Ka pain, ngai ta, ka thi ding a ni ta a, Kanaan rama ka thlân ka chosaah, chutaka ngei chun mi hung phûm rawh,’ tiin a mîn khâmtir a. Chuleiin, tuhin lunginsiettakin, ka pa hi mi hang inphûmtir la, chu zo chun hung nâwk el ka tih,'tia mi lo hrilpêk dingin ka ngên cheu a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, Pharao chun, “Ân khâmtir ang che chun i pa chu hang phûm raw chu,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Josef chu a pa phûm dingin a hang fe ta a. Pharao siehlaw po po, a sûnghai laia upahai leh, Aigupta ram upahai po po le,
Josef sûnghai po po leh, a unauhai leh, a pa sunghai chu ama leh an fe ve a. An nauhai rawi le, an berâm ruolhai le, an bâwng ruolhai bak chu Gosen rama chun an mâksan a.
Anni ruol chun tawlailîrhai le, sakawr chung chuong mihai an hang fe ve a; pâwl ruol lientak an nih.
Chun, Jordan râla Atad hrizâwl chu an tlung a, chutaka chun nasatakin an ṭa a, ni sari a pa sûnna a siem a.
Chu rama mi Kanaan mihai chun Atad hrizâwla an mithi sûn chu an hmu chun, “Hi Aigupta mihai mithi sûnna nasatak a ni hi,” an ti a; chuleiin, chu hmun hminga chun Abel-mizraim
Chun, a naupasalhai chun a thupêk ang peiin an thawpêk a,
Josef chu a pa phûm zo chun ama le a unauhai le, a pa phûm dinga ama ruola hang fehai po po le chun Aiguptaah an kîr nâwk ta a.
Josef unauhai chun an pa thi chu an ngaituoin, “Josef hin mi theidâng a ta, a chunga thil ei suksuol po po phuba kha ei chunga hin la hung la kim nek el a ti aw,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Josef kuoma hril dingin thu an incha a, “I pa chun a thi hma khan,

‘Hieng ang hin Josef kuomah, Lunginsiettakin i unauhai bawsietna le an suolna chu ngaidam rawh, i chungah thil chu an suksuol dea chu, tiin hril ro,’ tiin thu a mi pêk a: tuhin, lunginsiettakin i pa Pathien siehlawhai bawsietnahai chu ngaidam rawh,” an ti a. Chuonga a kuoma an hang hril chun Josef chu a ṭap ta a.
A unauhai khawm chu an va fe a, a hmaa chun an bawkkhup tâwl a, “Ngai ta, i siehlawhai kan ni hi,” an ti a.
Josef chun an kuomah, “Ṭi naw ro, Pathien aiaw am ka nih?
Nangni chun ka chungah thil suol thaw in lungril a; nisienlakhawm, Pathien chun, vawisûna an um ang ngei hin, mi tamtak dama sanhimna dingin thil ṭhaa inchangtir a lo lungril lem a ni si a.
Chuleiin, ṭi naw ro, nangni le in nau-le-tehai chu châwm pei ka tih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a thlamuon a, bau ṭhatakin a biek tâwl a.
Chun, Josef chu ama le a pa sûnghai leh Aigupta rama chun a um a: Josef chu kum za le sâwm a dam a.
Josef chun Ephraim nau a tuhai khûp thum chen a hmu a, Manasse naupa Makir nauhai khawm Josef mal chungah an pieng a.

Chun, Josefin a unauhai kuomah, “Ka thi ding a ni ta a, nisienlakhawm, Pathienin hung kan ngei ngei a ti cheu a, hi rama inthawk hi hung ṭhuoi suok cheuin, Abraham, Isak le Jakob hai kuoma inkhâma pêk a tiem ramah ṭhuoi a ti cheu,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Josef chu kum za le sâwm mi a niin a thi a; a ruong chu hmawntheilovin an siem a, Aiguptaah kuongin an sie ta a.
Reuben, Simeon, Levi le Juda,
Issakar, Zebulun le Benjamin,
Dan le Naphtali, Gad le Aser hi.
Chun, Josef le a unauhai po le, chu ṭhang khat sûnga mi po chu an thi ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Israel mipuihai chu an hung sûngruol a, tamtaka hung inbelsain an hung pung a, nasataka thilthawtheiin an hung um a; ram chu anni hluo sipin a um ta a.
Tuhin Aiguptaa chun Josef hre ngailo lal thar a hung inlal ta a.
A mihai kuoma chun, “En ta u, Israel mipuihai hi eini nêkin an tam hlein thil an thaw thei lem bêk a;
Chuleiin, phurrik takhaia anni sukrinum dingin, an chungah sinthawhotuhai an siempêk ta ngei a. Chun, Pithom le Rameses, siekhâwmna khawpuihai chu, Pharao ta dingin an bâwl ta a.
Nisienlakhawm anni chu an sukrimsi po leh an pung zuol deu deuin, an indar lien deu deu lem ta a. Chun, Aigupta mihai chun Israel mihai chu an ṭithâwng hle el ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chu inrimtakin sin an inthawtir a;
an sinthaw po po, lo sin kawng tinrênga le lung rawtnawinaa le ṭêklei siemnaa sin intaktakhai chu rimsitaka inthawtirin an nunhai an sukrinumpêk ta a.
ama chun, “Hebrai nuhmeihai kuoma naudawmtu sin in va thaw a, nau piengna hmun ngeia in va hmu pha; naupasal an ni chun that unla, naunuhmei a ni ruok chun a hringin hla ro,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, naudawmtuhai chun Pathien an ṭi a, Aigupta lalin anni thu a pêk angin an thaw naw a, nautê pasalhai chu an sanhim lem ta a.
Chun, Aigupta lal chun naudawmtuhai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Iengdinga hi thil hi in thaw a, naupasalhai chu a hringa hla am in na?”a ti a.
Naudawmtuhai chun Pharao kuomah, “Hebrai nuhmeihai chu Aigupta nuhmeihai ang an ni naw a, anni chu an hrisêl a, naudawmtuhai an kuom an tlung hma hin nau chu an lo nei ta hlak a nih,” an ti a.
Pathienin naudawmtuhai chu ṭhatakin a ngaisak a; Hebrai mihai chu an hung pung a, thilthawtheitak an hung ni ta a.
Naudawmtuhai chun Pathien an ṭi leiin Pathienin sûngkuoahai a siem ta a.
Chun, Pharao chun, “Naupasal hung pieng taphawt chu vadungah pei unla, naunuhmei taphawt chu a hringin hla ro,” tiin a mihai chu thu a pêk tlat a.
Chun Levi sûnghai laia mi pakhat chu a fe a, Levi naunu nuhmeiin a nei ta a.
Chun, ama chu a thuphmang zing thei naw phingleh phairuong lawng a lâk a, fâr hnai le lawng hnaiin a zût a; chu sûnga chun naupang chu a sie a, vadung sîra phairuonghai lai chun a sie ta a.
Ama chu iengtin am a um pei ti hre dingin a farnu chu hla fea hin a ngir a.
A hang hawng chun nautê chu a hmu a: chun, ngai ta, nautê chu a ṭap ta a. Ama chu a lunginsiet a, “Hi hi Hebrai nauhai laia pakhat chu a ni ngei el,” a ti a.
Chun a farnu chun Pharao naunu kuomah, “Fêng ka ta, Hebrai nuhmei naudawntu, hi nautê dawnpêktu ding che hi ka va kopêk ding che am a nih?” a ti a.
Pharao naunu chun a kuomah, “Va fe rawh,” a ti a. Chun nuhmeite chu a fe a, naute nu ngei chu a va ko ta a.
Chun, Pharao naunu chun a kuomah, “Hi naute hi la la; ka ta dingin dawn rawh; chun, i hlaw tâwk pêng ka ti che,” a ti a.

Chun, nuhmei chun naute chu a lâk a, a dawn ta a. Naute chu a hung inṭhang lien a, Pharao naunu kuomah a hung ṭhuoi a, a naupa a hung ni ta a. Chun, “Tuia inthawka ka lâk suok a ni a” tiin a hmingah Mosie a sak a.
A ni hninaa a va fe suok nâwk chun, ngai ta, Hebrai mi pahni an lo insuol a; ama chun a thil suksuoltu lem kuoma chun, “Iengdinga i unau i vuok am a na?” a ti a.
Midian mihai thiempu chun naunuhmei pasari a nei a; anni chu an hung a, tui an chawi a, an pa berâm ruol chu tui pe dingin tuibêlhai chu an thâl sip a.
Chun, berâmpuhai chu an hung a, anni chu an hnawt hmang ta a; nisienlakhawm, Mosie chu a ngîr a, anni a ṭhangpui a, an berâm ruol chu tui ân dâwntir ta a.
An pa Reuel kuomah an hung chun, “Iengtizie am a na vawisûn chu in va hung inhma de?” a lo ti a.
Anni chun, “Aigupta mi pakhatin berâmpuhai kuta inthawk a mi sansuok tâwl a nih, chu bak khawm chu ni lovin tui a mi chawipêk a, kan berâm ruol tui ân dâwntir bawk a,” an ti a.
Ama chun a naunuhai kuomah, “Anleh ama chu khâwlai am a um a? chu mipa chu iengdinga in hung mâksan am? Bei fa dingin ama chu hung ko ro,” a ta.
Chun, Mosie chu chu mipa kuoma um ding chun ân sukthlûk ta a; ama chun a naunu Zippora chu Mosie a pêk a.
Zippora chun naupasal a nei a. Mosie chun, “Hrietlo rama inzin ka ni tah,” a ti a, a hmingah Gersom a sak ta a.
Chuong ni tamtak sûng chun Aigupta lal chu a thi ta a. Israel mihai chu an intângna lei chun an thuok a dawng hle a, Pathien an ko a, an intângna leia ama an kona chun Pathien kuom a tlung ta a.
Chun, Israel mihai chu Pathien chun a hmu a, anni chu a hriet zing bawk a.
Mosie chun, “Tuhin va hnai ka ta, hi thilhmu ropuitak hin chîmbuk hi iengtiziea kâng hmang lo el am a nih va en ka tih,” a ta.
Chun

chuleiin, Aigupta mihai kuta inthawka anni sansuok ding le, chu rama inthawka, Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai hmun, ram lien le ram ṭha, khuoizu le nenetui luong rama ṭhuoi lût dinga hung thla ka nih.
Chuongchun, tuhin, ngai ta, Israel mihai khêkri chu ka kuom a hung tlung a, chu nâksapah nêksâwr an nina, Aigupta mihaiin an nêksawrna chu ka hmu zing bawk a.
Chuleiin, hung ta, Israel mihai chu Aiguptaa inthawka i hung ṭhuoi suok theina dingin Pharao kuomah tir ka ti che,” a ti a.
Mosie ruok chun Pathien kuomah, “Tu am ka ni a, Pharao kuoma ka fe a, Israel mihai Aiguptaa inthawk ka hung ṭhuoi suok el ding chu?” a ti a.

Ama chun, “I kuomah um ngei ngei ka tih, chun, ka tir che a nih ti inchikna chu hi hi nîng a tih: Aiguptaa inthawka Israel mihai i hung ṭhuoi suok pha, hi tlâng chunga hin Pathien rawng la bâwl in tih, ti hi,” a ti a.

Mosie chun Pathien kuomah, “Ngai ta, Israel mihai kuom ka va tlunga an kuomah, ‘In thlatuhai Pathien chun in kuomah a mi hung tir a nih,’ ka ti pha, ‘A hming ieng am a na?’ tîng an ta, an kuomah ieng am hril ka ti leh?” a ti a.
Pathien chun Mosie kuomah, “UMA kha KA NIH” a ti a. Chun, ama bawkin, “Israel mihai kuoma chun, UMA khan in kuomah a mi tir a nih, tîng i tih,” a ta.

Chu naw khawm chu Pathienin Mosie kuomah “Israel mihai kuoma chun, ‘In thlatuhai Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isak Pathien le Jakob Pathien Jehova chun in kuomah a mi hung tir a nih,’ tîng i tih: hi hi kumkhuoa ka hming a nih, hi hi ṭhang po po mi hriet dân ding chu a nih.

Fe la, Israel upahai chu ko khâwm la, an kuomah, ‘In thlatuhai Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isak Pathien le Jakob Pathien Jehova chu ka kuomah a hung inlâr a, Ka hung sir ta ngei cheu a, Aiguptaa in chunga thil thawa um tahai chu ka hmu tah.

Chun, in kuomah Aiguptaa rimsiknaa inthawkin Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai ram khuoizu le nênetuia luong rama chun ṭhuoi lût ka ti cheu ti ka tiem ta cheu kha,’ a tih, ti rawh.
Chun i râwl chu ngai an ta, nang le Israel upahai chu Aigupta lal kuomah fêng in ta, a kuomah, Hebrai mihai Pathien,
Nisienlakhawm, kut thilthawtheia thawlui naw chun Aigupta lal chun infetir naw tawp a ti cheu ti ka hriet.
Chun, keiin ka kut inlet ka ta, ka thilmakhai po po chu anni lai ngeia thawin, Aigupta chu hung suksieng ka tih: chu hnunga ruok chun infetir a ti cheu.
Chun, hi Israel mihai hi Aigupta mihai mithmuah ditsakna inhmutir ka ta; chuongchun, in fe pha chun, ruok ngawtin fe naw tawp in tih:

Nuhmei tinin a tuolbâwm le an ina mikhuol kuoma chun, tangka le rângkachak incheinahai le puonsil haw seng a ta, chun in naupasalhai le in naunuhmeihai incheitir nân hmang in ta, chuong ang chun Aigupta mihai chu suksieng in tih,” a ti a.
Mosie chun a dawn a, “Nisienlakhawm, ngai ta, kei chu mi ring naw ni hai, ka râwl khawm ngai naw bawk an tih, ‘I kuomah
Chun,
Chun hi inchiknahai pahni khawm hi an la ring naw a, i râwl khawm an la ngai naw rawp chun, vadung
Mosie chun
Chuongchun, tuhin fe la, kei i bauah um ka ta, i thuhril ding chu inchûktir ka ti che,” a ti a.
Ama ruok chun, “Aw
Mosie chunga chun
Ama kuoma chun thu hril i ta, thuhai chu ama bauah sieng i ta: i bau le ama baua chun um ka ta, ieng am in thaw ding chu inchûktir ka ti cheu.
Ama chu i ta dingin mipuihai kuoma thuhriltu nîng a tih; ama chu i ta dingin bau nîng a ta, nang chu a ta dingin Pathien ang nîng i tih.
Hi hmawl hi i kutin chawi pei i ta, chu chun inchiknahai chu thâwng i tih,” a ti a.

Mosie chu a tarpupa Jethro kuomah a kîr nâwk ta a, a kuomah, “Ka hni che hi, mîn fetir la, ka unauhai Aiguptaa umhai kuoma chun mîn kîrtir nâwk la, damin am an um va hmûng ka tih,” a ti a. Jethro chun Mosie kuomah, “Thlamuongtakin fe rawh,” a ti a.
Mosie chun a naupasalhai le a nuhmei a ṭhuoi a, sabengtung chungah anni ân chuongtir a, Aigupta ramah a kîr nâwk ta a. Mosie chun Pathien hmawl chu a kutin a chawi pei a.
Chun, nangin Pharao kuoma chun, ‘Hieng hin

chuleiin, i kuomah, “Ka naupa hi ka rawng a bâwl theina dingin infetir rawh,” ka ti a nih; infetir chu i phal naw chun, ngai rawh, i naupa i nau lutîr ngei chu sukhlum ka tih, ti ka hril che hi a tih,’ tiin i hril ding a nih,” a ti a.
Lam kâra an riekna hmuna chun
Zippora chun meitâwklung ngei a lâk a, a naupa serhmawr vun chu a ât thlâk a, Mosie ke chu ân tâwktir a; chun, chu nu chun, “Ka ta dingin moneitu, thisen insuohmang, i ni ngei el hi,” a ti a.
Chuongchun,
Mosie chun
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu an fe ta a, Israel upahai po po chu an ko khâwm a.
Aron chun
Mipui chun an ring ta a:
Chun, chu hnunga chun Mosie le Aron chu an va fe a, Pharao kuomah, “Hieng ang hin
Anni chun, “Hebraihai Pathien chun a mîn tuokpui ta a, kan ngên che,
Aigupta lal chun an kuomah, “Mosie le Aron hin iengtiziea mipuihai hi an sinthawhaia inthawkin inṭhuoihmang am a na? In sin chu va thaw ṭawk ṭawk unla a ni el,” a ti a.
Pharao bawk chun, “Ngai ta, tuhin hi rama mihai hi an tam ta hle a; an sinhaia inthawk in inchawltir el a!” a ti a.
Chu ni ma chun mipuihai sinthaw hotuhai le an hotuhai chu Pharao chun thu a pêk a,
“Kha hma ang khan mipuihai chu ṭêklei siem dingin bupâwl pe ngai ta naw unla, fe hai sienla, an bupâwl ding chu annîn inkhâwm lem raw hai se.

Chun, kha hmaa ṭêklei an siem zât tho kha siem dingin phût unla, ieng kawng khawmin suktlâwm naw ro: an tha a bo si a; chuleiin annâwm, ‘Mîn fetir la, kan Pathien kuomah mîn thâwitir rawh,’ tia an khêk hi.
Chuong mihai chunga chun sin rik lem chu innghat ni raw se; inrimtaka an thaw theina dingin; chun, thu teplo mei mei chu ngaisak naw bawk raw hai se,” a ti a.
Chun, mipuihai sinthaw hotuhai le an hotuhai chu an fe suok a, mipuihai kuoma chun, “Pharao chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Bupâwl chu pe naw ning cheu ah.
Chuongchun, mipuihai chu Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun bupâwl aiah bu kûng la khâwm ding chun an indar ta sup sup a.
Sinthaw hotuhai chu, “Bupâwl umsa laia in sinthawhai, in ni tin sinthawhai ang kha tlingtla ro,” tia nawr sênin ṭul namên lovin an ṭûl a.
Chun, Israel laia sinthaw hotua ruothai chu Pharao kuomah an hung a, an khêk a, “I siehlawhai hi iengdinga hienga i mi thaw am a na?

I siehlawhai hi bupâwl pêk kan ni naw a, kan kuomah, ‘Ṭêklei siem ro,’ an ti si a! Chun, ngai ta, i siehlawhai hi vuokin kan um a; nisienlakhawm, ân diknawna chu nangma mihai ngeiah a ni lem,” an ti a.
Pharao ruok chun, “In tha a bo,
Tuhin fe unla, sin va thaw el ro; bupâwl chu pêk ni hliek naw ti niu a, ṭêklei ruok chu siem ding zât pângngai chu in pêk suok ngei ding a nih,” a ti a.

Israel laia sinthaw hotua ruothai chun, “Ieng kawng khawmin, in ni tin sinthawa ṭêklei siem ding zât chu in suktlâwm ding a ni nawh,” ti hril an ni chun ngîrhmun ṭha nawtaka um an nih ti an inhriet ta a.
Pharao ina inthawka an hung suok chun, anni lo nghâk zingtu Mosie le Aron chu an va hmu a,
an kuomah, “
Pharao kuoma i hminga thu hril dinga ka hung chinah, hi mihai chungah tlatsiet a thaw a, nangin i sansuok dêr si naw a,” a ti a.
Abraham kuoma dâm, Isak kuoma dâm, Jakob kuoma dâm Pathien Iengkimthawthei
Khuolchâm anga an umna ram, Kanaan ram chu anni pe dingin an kuomah thuthlung ka siem bawk a.
Chu naw khawm chu, Aigupta mihaiin suoka an inumtir Israel mihai inrûm ri chu ka hriet a; ka thuthlung chu ka hriet zing a.
Chuleiin, Israel mihai kuomah hril la, ‘
Ka mihai ni dingin lâng ka ti cheu a, in ta dingin Pathien ni bawk ka tih; chun, Aigupta mihai rikphurna hnuoia inthawka la suoktu cheu, in Pathien
Abraham, Isak le Jakob kuoma pe dinga ka bân ka pharna hlak rama chun ṭhuoi lût ka ti cheu a; chu ram chu ro dingin pêng ka ti cheu:
Chuong thu chu Mosien mipuihai kuomah a hril a; an lungril inrimna lei le an suok intângnaa an rimsik êm lei khan, Mosie thuhril chu an ngaisak nawh.
Chun
“Va fe la, Aigupta ram lal Pharao chun Israel mihai chu a rama inthawkin insuoktir raw se va ti rawh,” tiin.
Mosie chun
Nisienlakhawm,
Simeon naupasalhai chu: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Johar le Saul, Kanaan nuhmei le an naupasal le chun: hieng hi Simeon sûngkuohai chu an nih.
An sûngkuo ang peia Gerson naupasalhai chu Libni le Simei.
Kohath naupasalhai chu Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel. Kohath dam sûng kumhai chu kum zakhat le sâwmthum pathum a nih.
Merari naupasalhai chu Mahli le Musi. Hieng hi an inthla dân suina ang peia Levi mi sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Amram hin a pa farnu Jokebed chu nuhmeiin a nei a; ama chun Aron le Mosie a neipêk a. Amram dam sûng kumhai chu kum za khat le sâwmthum pasari a nih.
Izhar naupasalhai chu: Kora, Nepheg le Zikri.
Uzziel naupasalhai chu: Misael le Elzaphan le Sithri.
Aron chun Amminadab naunu, Nason farnu, Eliseba chu nuhmeiin a nei a; ama chun Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar a neipêk a.
Kora naupasalhai chu Assir, Elkana le, Abiasaph; hieng hi Kora sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Aron naupa Eleazar chun Putiel naunuhmei pakhat chu nuhmeiin a nei a, ama chun Phinehas a neipêk a. An sûngkuohai ang peiin, hieng hi Levi mihai pahnam
Hieng hi an nih Mosie le Aron kuoma
Hi Aron le hi Mosie hi an nih Aigupta lal Pharao kuoma Israel mihai Aiguptaa inthawka ṭhuoi suok dinga hriltuhai chu.
Aigupta rama
Mosie chun
Chun,
Thu ka pêk po po che kha nangin hril i ta: chun, i unaupa Aron chun, a rama inthawka Israel mihai chu infe suoktir dingin Pharao kuomah hril vêng a tih.
Pharao chun in thu chu ngai naw ni a, chuongchun, Aigupta chunga chun ka kut thlâk ka ta, ka mipuihai, ka mi Israel mihai chu, rorêlna nasatakhai hmangin Aigupta rama inthawkin ṭhuoi suok ka tih.
Aigupta chunga chun ka bân ka phar a, Israel mihai chu anni laia inthawk ngeia ka ṭhuoi suok pha chun, Aigupta mihai chun
Chun, Mosie le Aron chun
Pharao kuoma thu an hril lai hin Mosie chu kum sawmriet mi a ni a, Aron chu kum sawmriet pathum mi a nih.
“Pharao chun, ‘Thilmak chu hang inentir ta u le,’ a ti pha cheu chun, Aron kuomah, ‘I hmawl la la, Pharao hmaah pei thla rawh,’ tîng i ta; chun, rûlin inchang a tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu Pharao kuoma chun an va lût a,
Chun, Pharao khawmin mi varhai le dawithiemhai a ko khâwm a, Aigupta aisânthiemhai khawm chun dawi hmangin chuong ang tak chun an thaw ve ta a.
Mi tin chun an hmawl chu an pei thlâk a, rûlah ân chang seng a, nisienlakhawm, Aron hmawl chun an hmawlhai chu a lem ta a.
Pharao lungril chu sukngarin a um a,
Chun,
Pharao kuomah zîngkâr va fe la, tui tienga a fe laiin ama intuokpui dingin vadung
Chun, a kuomah, ‘
Hieng hin
Chun, vadunga nga umhai chu thîng an ta, vadung chu a thûkin thûng a tih; chun, Aigupta mihai chun vadunga tui chu dâwn dingin tirdak an tih,’ ti rawh,” a ti a.
Chun,
Mosie le Aron chun
Vadunga nga umhai chu an thi ta a; chun, vadung chu a thûkin a thu ta a, Aigupta mihai chun vadunga tui chu an dâwn thei ta naw a: Aigupta ram sûng po poah thisen chu a um si a.
Chun, Aiguptaa aisânthiemhai khawm chun dawi hmangin chuong ang tak chun an thaw ve a. Pharao lungril chu sukngarin a um zing a,
Pharao chu a kîr a, a inah a fe ta a, a lungrilah hi thu hi a ngaituo bawk nawh.
Aigupta mihai po po chun vadung vêla chun tui dâwn ding hmu tumin an cho ta a; vadung tui chu an dâwn thei ta si naw a.
Lalpain Nile vadung a vuoka inthawkin ni sari a liem ta a.
Chun,
Anni infetir i phal naw chun, ngai rawh, i ram sûng po po uṭawkhaiin ka hung hrem ding a nih.

Vadung chu uṭawkhaiin sip an ta, chuong chu hung suok an ta, i in sûnga dâm, i khum pindan sûnga dâm, i khum chunga dâm, i siehlawhai in sûnga dâm, i mihai chunga dâm, i thuk sûnga dâm, i bei siemna thuk sûnga dâm hung lût an tih.
Chuong uṭawkhai chu nanga chunga le i mihai chunga le, i siehlawhai chungah hung ṭuong seng an tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ti a.
Chun,
Chun, Aron chun Aiguptaa tuihai chunga chun a bân a phar a, uṭawkhai chu an hung suok a, Aigupta ram chu an dâp ta vawng a.

Mosie chun Pharao kuomah, “Nangma le i ina uṭawkhai chu sukbohmanga vadunga bak chun um zing dingin i mihai le i siehlawhai le nanga ta dingin iengtik am ka ngên pêk ding cheu lunginsiettakin mi hril rawh,” a ti a.
Ama chun, “Zînga leh,” a ti a. Ama chun, “I thu ang peiin ni raw se:
Uṭawkhai chu i mihai le i siehlawhai le i in le nangmaa inthawkin fe hmang an ta, vadunga bak um tâng an tih,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pharao chun chuong chu a bo tah ti a hriet chun, a lungril a sukngar a;

Chuong ang tak chun an thaw a, Aron chun a kuta hmawl chu ân let a, hnuoia pilvut chu a vuok a, sa le mihriem chunga chun hrikhai an hung um ta a; Aigupta ram po poa chun pilvut chu hrikin a hung inchang vawng ta a.
Aisânthiemhai chun an dâwi hmangin hrikhai suksuok dingin an thaw ve a, nisienlakhawm, an thei naw a. Chuongchun, sa le mihriem chunga chun hrikhai chu an um ta a.
Aisânthiemhai chun Pharao kuomah, “Hi hi Pathien kutpâr a nih,” an ti a. Pharao lungril ruok chu sukngarin a um a,
Chun,
Chuong ni lova, ka mihai în fetir naw chun nang le i siehlawhai le i mihai chunga le, i in sûnga le, Aigupta mihai inhai le an umna leihnuoi po poa chun tho ruolpui hung tir ka tih.
Chu ni chun ka mihai umna Gosen ram chu suktum ka ta, tho ruol hrim um der naw ni hai, hnuoi chunga hin kei
Chuong ang chun i mihai le ka mihai inkârah thlierhranna
Chun,
Chun, Pharao chun Mosie le Aron chu a ko a, “Fe unla, hi ram sûnga hin in Pathien kuoma chun inthâwi ro,” a ti a.
Mosie chun, “Chuong anga thaw chu rem thei naw nih. Kan Pathien
Thu a mi pêk angin, thlalêrah ni thum lama hlaah fêng kan ta,
Pharao chun, “
Mosie chun, “I kuoma inthawkin fe suok ka ta, Pharao le a siehlawhai le a mihaia inthawka, thohai hi zînga inthawka an fe hmangna dingin
Mosie chu Pharao kuoma inthawk chun a suok a,
Hi ṭum khawm hin Pharao chun a lungril a sukngar a, mipui chu ân fetir chuong nâwk naw a.
Chun,
Anni chu infetir i phal naw a, i khuokhir zing chun,
ngai rawh, loa i ran ruol umhai, sakawrhai, sabengtunghai, sanghâwngseihai, bâwng ruolhai le, berâm ruolhai chungah
Chun,
A zînga chun chu thil chu
Pharao chun mi a tir a, Israel mihai ran ruol chu pakhat khawm an thi dêr nawh ti a hriet a. Nisienlakhawm, Pharao lungril chu a ngar a, mihai chu ân fetir chuong nawh.
Chun, Aigupta ram chung po poah pilvut indi takah inchang a ta, Aigupta ram sûng po povah mihriem le ran chungah khuoihli invûngin inchang a tih,” a ti a.
Chun, thuka vut chu an lâk a, Pharao hmaa chun an ngir a; Mosie chun vân tieng chun a vawr ta a, chuongchun, mihriem le ran chunga chun khuoihli invûngah ân chang ta a.
Chun, khuoihlihai lei chun aisânthiemhai chu Mosie hmaa chun an ngîr thei ta naw a; chu khuoihli chu Aigupta mihai po po le aisânthiemhai chunga khawm a um seng si a.
Chun,
Hnuoi chung po poah keima ang tukhawm an um nawh ti i hriet theina dingin, tuta ṭum hin chu, i mihai le i siehlawhai le nangma chunga ngei ka hri po po ka hung tir ding a ni si a.
Tuhin ka kut inlet ka ta, i mihai le nang ngei chu hripuiin hrem ka ti cheu a, hnuoia inthawka sât thlâk ni tâng i tih:
Ka mihai chunga hin nang le nang inchawimawiin, anni chu i lân fetir naw rawp ding a ni maw?
Ngai rawh, zîngah tu pha ngei hin riel nasa râpthlâk insûrtir ka ta; chuong ang hrim hrim chu Aiguptaah, hi ram um hlima inthawk tu chen hin a la um ngai dêr nawh.

Chuleiin, tuhin mi tir la, i ran ruol le loa i thil nei po po chu inhulah hung la lût vak raw hai se; mi tin le ran loa um taphawthai, ina hung lâk lût nawhai chungah riel chu a hung sûr ding a ni si a, an thi vawng ding a nih, a tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ti a.
Pharao siehlawhai laia
Chun,
Chun, Mosie chun a hmawl chu vân tieng ân let a; chuongchun,
Chuongchun, riel, ṭêktla le riel inpawl, râpthlâktak el, Aigupta ram po poah, hnam a hung ni chena inthawka la hmu ngai dêr lo chu a hung tlung ta a.
Aigupta ram po poa, loa thil um taphawt chu mihriem le ran khawm a dêng hlum ta vawng a; riel chun loa thlaihna tinrêng chu a dêng hlumin, rama thinghai khawm chu a dêng thliek bawk a.
Israel mihai chêngna Gosen rama bak chun riel chu a tla ve naw a.
Chun, Pharao chun mi a tir a, Aron le Mosie chu ân kotir a, an kuomah, “Tuta ṭum chu ka lo suol takzet a nih, ka mihai le kei chu kan khawhlo a,
Hun ta raw se, riel le vâninrûm ri nasatakhai hi a bona dingin
Mosie chun a kuomah, “Khawpui hi ka suoksan phingleh,
Nisienlakhawm, nang le i siehlawhai chun,
Buṭei chu a vui lai a ni a, ziza khawm chu a pâr lai a ni a, buṭei le ziza chu an se vawng a.
Bupui le mîm ruok chu dêng siet an ni ve naw a, an puitling inhnu leiin.
Mosie chu Pharao kuoma inthawka khawpui puoah a suok chun,
Pharao chun ruo le riel le vâninrûmhai chu a ma tah ti a hmu chun, a la suksuol ta rawp a, ama le a siehlawhai khawm chun an lungril chu an la sukngar ta rawp a.
Pharao lungril chu sukngarin a um a, Mosie baua
anni lai ngeia inchikna ka thawhai le, Aigupta mihai chu ieng angin am an chungah thil ka thawa ti i naupa le i tupa hrieta ngei khawm i hril theina dingin le;
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu Pharao kuomah an va lût a, a kuomah, “Hebraihai Pathien
Ka mihai în fetir phal naw chun, ngai rawh, i ram sûngah, zinga leh khâuhai hung ṭhuoi ka ta;

hnuoi chung po po chu a dâpin hung dâp an ta, hnuoi chu mi hmu theilo khawp hielin um a tih. Riel isuksietnaa i la chang a mahla la umhai chu fa vawng an ta, i ta dinga loa thing mâwng tinrênghai khawm chu fa vawng bawk an tih.

I inhai le i siehlaw po po inhai le Aigupta mi po po inhai chu sip vawng an ta, i pahai le i thlatuhai khawmin, hi hnuoi chunga an uma inthawk vawisûn ni chen hin chuong ang chu an la hmu ngai nawh,’ a tih,” an ti a. Chun Mosie chu ân her a, Pharao kuoma inthawk chun a fe suok ta a.
Chun, Pharao siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Hi mipa hi ei ta dingin ieng chen am châng a ni ding a ni leh? An Pathien
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu Pharao kuomah an hung ṭhuoi nâwk a, ama chun an kuomah, “Fe unla, in Pathien
Mosie chun, “
Pharao chun, “
Chuong chu ni thei naw nih, mi puitling bak va fe unla,
Chun,
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aigupta ram chunga chun a hmawl chu ân let ta a; chun,

Khâuhai chu Aigupta ram po po chunga chun an hung a, Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun an um khup el ta a; a râpthlâk bêk a, anni hma hin anni ang hrim hin khau an la um ngai naw a, anni hnunga khawm um ngai ta bawk nawng an tih.

A ram pumpui chu an dâp khup el si a, ram chu ân thim khup el bawk a; rama hna hring tinrêng le, thing rahai, riel ihlahai chu an fâk ta ngei a; Aigupta ram pumpuia chun loa thlaihna, thing le thil a hring hrim a um ta dêr naw a.
Chun Pharao chun Mosie le Aron chu inhmawtakin a ko a, “Nang le in Pathien
Tuhin ka ngên che hi, ka suol hi vawikhat bak mi ngaidam nâwk phawt la, hi thina hi keimaa inthawka a lâkhmang theina dingin
Pharao kuoma inthawk chu a fe suok a,
Nisienlakhawm,
Chun, Mosie chun vân tieng a bân a phar a; chuongchun, ni thum sûng chu Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun inthim sa mup el chu a um ta a;
chu ni thum sûng chun tukhawm an hmuna inthawkin an suok naw a, inhmu khawm an inhmutuo thei bawk nawh; Israel mihai umnahaia ruok chun var an nei seng a.
Chun, Pharao chun Mosie a ko a, “Fe unla,
Mosie ruok chun, “Kan Pathien
Kan ran ruolhai khawm keini leh an fe ve ding a nih, ran tê pakhat khawm mâksan an ni ding a ni naw a; kan Pathien
Nisienlakhawm, Pharao lungril chu
Pharao chun a kuomah, “Ka kuoma inthawkin fe hmang la, ka hmêl hrim hrim hung hmu nâwk ta lo dingin fîmkhur rawh, ka hmêl i hmu nâwk ni ni chun i thi ngei ding a ni si a,” a ti a.
Mosie chun, “I ti ṭha ngawt el ie, i hmêl hmu nâwk hrim hrim ta naw ning,” a ti a.
Mipuihai hrieta chun hril la, pasal tin le nuhmei tinin, rângkachak le tangkaruo incheinahai an tuolbâwmhaia inthawkin haw seng raw hai se,” a ti a.
Mosie chun, “Hieng ang hin
Aigupta rama naulutîr po po, Pharao nau utîr a lalṭhungphaa ṭhunga inthawka, bu râwtnawinaa sinthaw suoknu naulutîr tak chen le, ran ruol tê hmasatakhai le chun thi fai vawng an tih.
Chun, Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun ṭapna nasatak um a tih: chuong ang hrim hrim chu a la um ngai dêr naw a, um khawm um nâwk ta ngai naw ni.

Nisienlakhawm, Israelhai ruok chu anni amanih, an ranhai amanih, uiin ân bau ri tak ngiel khawm hriet ni naw nih. Chu pha chun, Lalpain Aigupta mi le Israel mihai chu a thlier ngei a nih ti hre tâng in tih.

Chun, hieng i siehlawhai po po hi ka kuomah hung an ta, ka hmaa bawkkhupin, Nanga zuitu dinghai po po le chun suok ta rawh,’ mi tîng an tih; chun, chu hnunga chun suok tâng ka tih, tiin,” a ti a. Pharao kuoma inthawk chun lunginsentakin a suok ta a.
Chun
Mosie le Aron chun Pharao hmaa chun thilmakhai po po chu an thaw ta a; nisienlakhawm,
Aigupta rama chun
“Hi thla hi in ta dingin thla inṭanna nîng a ta, in ta dingin kum khata thla hmasatak ning a tih.
Israel mi inkhâwmhai po po lai chun hril unla, ‘hi thla ni sâwm ni tak hin, mi tinin an pahnamhai ang peiin berâmte pakhat, sûng khat ta dingin berâmte pakhat la seng raw hai se:
chun, sûng khat chu berâmte pakhat fâ sêng lo khawpa tlâwm an ni chun an tuolbâwm hnaitak leh inkawpin berâmte pakhat, a fa ding mi tamzie ang peiin insem an tih.
In berâmte chu a chal kum khat mi, demkailo a ni ding a nih, kêl ruol laia inthawkin, annawleh, berâm ruol laia inthawkin la tum in tih,
chu thla ni sâwmpali chen chun kawl in tih: Israel mi pungkhâwmhai po po chun zântieng chun that in tih.
Chun, a thisen chu lâng an ta, an fâkna ding in kawtkhâr bieng ve ve le kawtkhâr lu khang pheiah nâl an tih.
Chu zân chun a sa chu meia rawin, chawl ṭhanglo bei leh fâng an ta; hlohna kha leh fâng an tih.
A selin amanih, tuia suongin amanih fa naw unla, em hmin lem ro; a lu le a kehai le a sûnghai le chun.
Zîngkâr chena dingin a iengkhawm in hla ding a ni nawh; zîngkâr chena um zing taphawt chu meiin raw hmang in tih.
Chun, hieng ang hin fâng in tih: in dier kei sa zingin, in kekawk bun sa zingin le, in kuta in hmawl chawi sa zingin, inhmâwtakin in fâk ding a nih.

Chu zân chun Aigupta ram fe thleng ka ta, ran le mihriem khawm, Aigupta rama nau lutîr po po chu ka sukhlum ding a ni si a; chun, Aigupta mihai pathienhai chunga khawm rorêlnahai intlungtir bawk ka tih,

Chun, thisen chu in ta dingin in umna inhai inchikna nîng a ta; thisen chu ka hmu pha chun, nangni chu fekân ka ti cheu a, Aigupta ram ka hung hrem lai khawm chun, nangni sukbohmang ding cheuin in chungah hri hrim hrim um naw nih.
Hi ni hi in ta dingin hrietzingna nîng a ta,

Ni sari sûng chu chawl ṭhanglo bei in fâk ding a na, ni khat nia inthawk khawmin in inhaia inthawkin chawl sie hmang vawng in ta; ni khat nia inthawka ni sari ni chen chun mi tukhawmin chawl ṭhang bei a fâk chun, chu mi chu Israel mihaia inthawka tuithlâr a ni ding a ni si a.

Ni khat ni chun in ta dingin inkhâwmpui inthieng um a ta, ni sari ni khawmin inkhâwmpui inthieng um bawk a tih; chuong nihaia chun sin iengkhawm in thaw ding a ni nawh, mi tinin fâk rawngbâwl ruok chu thaw thei in tih.
Chawl ṭhanglo bei ruoiṭhe chu inser in ta, chu ni la la chun in mihai chu Aigupta rama inthawkin ka ṭhuoi suok a ni si a; chuleiin, kumkhaw dâna neiin, hi ni hi in thlahai chenin inser in tih.
Thla hmasatakah, chu thla ni sâwmpali ni zântiengah chawl ṭhanglo bei in fâk ding a nih, chu thla ma ni sâwmhni pakhat ni zântieng chenin.

Ni sari sûng chu chawl hrim hrim in inhaiah hmu a ni ding a ni nawh: mi tukhawm chawl ṭhang bei fatu chu, mikhuol khawm, a rama pieng khawm, chu mi chu Israel mipuihai laia inthawka tuithlâr nîng a tih.
Chawl ṭhang hrim hrim chu iengkhawm in fâk ding a ni nawh; in umna taphawthaia chun chawl ṭhanglo bei in fâk ding a nih,’ tiin hril rawh,” tiin.
Chun Mosie chun Israel upahai po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Fe suok unla, in sûngkaw tamzie ang peiin berâmte la unla, fekân ruoi dingin that ro.

Hussop bâwr la unla, thlênga thisena chun inchie unla, chu thlênga thisen chun kawtkhâr bieng pahnihai le kawtkhâr lu chung khangphei chu nâl ro: chun, zîngkâr a ni hmakhat chu tukhawm a in kawtkhâra chun suok hlek naw raw se.
Aigupta mihai chu hrem dingin
Hi thil hi dâna neiin nangni le in thlahai chenin kumkhuoin inser in tih.
Chun, a thutiem anga,
Chun, in nauhaiin, ‘Hi rawngbâwlna hi a umzie ieng am a na?’ an ti pha cheu chun,
‘Aigupta mihai a sukhlum a, ei inhai a sanhim laia, Aigupta rama Israel mihai inhai fekântu,
Chun, Israel mihai chu an fe a,
Zânril lai takah
Zâna chun Pharao le a siehlawhai le Aigupta mi po pohai chu an tho a, Aiguptaa chun ṭap nasatak el chu a um ta a: in tin el chu mithi um nawna hrim a um si naw a.
Azân azânin Mosie le Aron chu a ko a, “Tho unla, Israel mihai le chun ka mihaia inthawkin fe hmang dai ro; chuongchun, fe unla, in ti ta angin
In ti ta angin in bâwng ruolhai le in berâm ruolhai chu ṭhuoi unla, fe vak ro khai; chun, kei khawm mal mi sâwmpêk bawk unla,” a ti a.
Aigupta mihai chun Israel mihai chu inhmâwtaka suok dingin an nawr sek sek a, “Ei thi zo vawng ding an ta hi,” an ti leiin.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chu an bei hmetna thlênghai chu puona tuoma an liengkohaia putin an beihai chu chawl phul hmain an châwi ta a.
Israel mihai chun Mosie thu ang pei chun an thaw a; Aigupta mihai chu silfên le, rângkachak le tangkaraw incheinahai an hni tâwl a;
chuongchun,
Israel mihai, naupangnawi tiem loa puitling ruok khawm nuoi ruk lai chu Ramesesa inthawkin Sukkoth chen kein an fe ta a.
Mi chilak tamtak khawm anni leh an hang fe ve a; bâwng ruol le berâm ruol le ran ruol tamtak leh.

Aiguptaa inthawka beihlawm an hung chawihai chu chawl ṭhanglo beiphêkhaiah an zeu a, chawl ṭhanglo a ni hrim a; Aiguptaa inthawk a nama nam suok el an ni leiin le an muong thei ta naw leiin fâk ding iengkhawm an inbuotsai si naw a.
Kum za li le sawmthum tâwpah, chu ni la la chun
Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suok dinga
amiruokchu, siehlaw tukhawm tangka suma inchâwk tah, ama chu sertanpêk tah a ni bawk chun fa vêng a tih.
Khuolchâm amanih, inhlawfa siehlaw tukhawmin chu chu fa thei naw nih.
Israel mipuihai chun hi hi an zâwm tlat ding a nih.
Hnam dang mi nang le fe ve a um a,
Hieng ang hin Israel mihai po po chun an thaw a;
Chu ni ngei chun
Chun
Mosie chun mipui kuoma chun, “Suoka in umna Aiguptaa inthawk in hung suok ni kha hre zing ro:
Abib thla, hi ni hin in fe suok a ni hi.
Ni sari sûng chawl ṭhanglo bei fâng in ta, a ni sari ni chun
Ni sari sûng chu chawl ṭhanglo bei fâk ding a ni a; chun, in kuoma hrim hrim chawl ṭhang bei hmu a ni ding a ni naw a, in ram sûng po po le nangni kuoma khawm chawl hrim hrim hmu a ni ding a ni nawh.
Chu ni chun i naupa kuomah, ‘Aiguptaa inthawka ka hung suok laia
Chun,
Chuleiin, kum tinin hi hi a hun peiah dân angin i hmang ding a nih.”
Chun i thlatuhai le nanga kuoma a tiem ta anga Kanaan mihai ramah
sul hung kêu hmasatak taphawt chu

Mipui po po chun vâninrûmhai, ṭêktlahai, tawtawrâwt ri le, tlâng khu suok chu an hmu chun mipui chu an inthin a, hlatakah an ngîr a.
Anni chun Mosie kuomah, “Nangin kan kuomah thu hril la, ngai kan tih; Pathien ruok chun kan kuomah thu hril naw raw se. Chuong naw chun thîng kan tih,” an ti a.

Keima le biek ding pathien danghai in insiem ding a ni naw a, in ta dingin tangkaraw pathienhai, rângkachak pathienhai in siem ding a ni bawk nawh.
Lung maichâm i mi siempêk chun, lung cherhai hmangin i bâwl ding a ni nawh; a chungah hriemhrei în let chun i sukpawrche a nih.
I saruokna chu hmu a ni nawna dingin, kailâwnhaiin ka maichâma chun i hang kai ding a ni bawk nawh.
“Hienghai hi an kuoma i pêk ding dânhai chu an nih:
Ama khâta hung lût a ni chun, ama khâtin suok nâwk el a ta; nuhmei nei tah a ni chun a nuhmei khawm ama leh suok vêng a tih.
A hotupa chun nuhmei a pêk a, a nuhmei chun naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai a neipêk chun,nuhmei le a nauhai chu a hotupa ta nîng an ta; ama khâtin suok el a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, siehlaw chun, Ka hotupa, ka nuhmei le ka nauhai ka hmangai a, zalêna um dingin suok da el ka tih, a ti chun:
a hotupa chun Pathien
“Miin a naunuhmei siehlawnu ni dinga a zawr chun, siehlawpahai suok angin chu minu chu suok thei naw nih.
A hotupa a suklungawi naw a, ama chun nei dinga a huol naw chun,
A naupa nuhmei dinga a huol a ni chun, ama chu naunuhmeihai ang bawkin a thaw ding a nih.
Nuhmei dang ân neitir chun, a bu, a silfên le inneinaa a chan chu a suktlâwmpêk chuong ding a ni nawh.
Hi thil pathum hi chu minu chunga a thaw naw chun, bat nei lovin, tangka pe bawk lovin fe suok el a tih.
Miin a vênghai tum hrimnaa hlêma sukhlum tuma a thaw ruok chun, ama chu sukhlum dingin ka maichâma inthawkin ṭhuoi hmang i tih.
“Tukhawm a nu manih, a pa manih vawtu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
“Tukhawm mihriem inru chu, a zawr khawmin, amain a umpui a ni khawmin, ama chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
“Tukhawm a pa manih, a nu manih ṭawngsieinphurtu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Mi insuol hai sienla, mi pakhatin mi dang lunga dêngin amanih, a kuttumin amanih chum sienla, ama chu thi lovin, tho kâng pei lovin zâl el sienla;
a hung tho nâwk a, hmawl ṭhuna a lâwn thei chun, a vawtu chu insuo phawt ding a nih; a hun sukhmang ai chu thung a ta, a dam var chenin enkawl a tih.
“Miin a siehlawpa amanih, a siehlawnu amanih hmawlin vaw sien, thi dêr sienla, ama chu hrem ngei ding a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, ni khat amanih, ni hni amanih a la dam chun, ama chu hrem ding a ni nawh; siehlaw chu a tangka a ni leiin.

“Mi an insuol a, nuhmei nau vawn a sukna a, a nau chu a tla chun, sietnain hung zui kher naw sien khawm, chu nuhmeinu pasalin a chunga a phût zât ang ang chu inchawitir ngei ding a nih: chun, rorêltuhaiin ṭha an ti ang chu a pêk ding a nih.
mit aiah mit, ha aiah ha, kut aiah kut, ke aiah ke,
raw aiah raw, sukhliem aiah sukhliem, vuok aiah vuok pe ve thung i tih.
“Miin a siehlawpa mit amanih, a siehlawnu mit amanih a vuok a, a suksiet chun, a mit lei chun ama chu iengkhawm ngai lovin insuoktir el a tih.
A siehlawpa ha amanih, a siehlawnu ha amanih a vuok thlawng chun, a ha lei chun iengkhawm ngai lovin insuoktir el a tih.
“Bâwngchalin pasal amanih, nuhmei a sik a, a thi chun, chu bâwngchal chu lunga dêng hlum ngei ding a na, a sa chu fâk a ni ding a ni nawh; bâwngchal neitu ruok chu fihlîm a tih.

Nisienlakhawm, bâwngchal chu a hma khawmin mi sik hmangtak lo ni tahin, a neitu khawm chu inhriettir lo ni ta bawk sienla, ama chun a inah a thlung naw a, pasal amanih, nuhmei a sikhlum a ni chun, a neitu chu sukhlum nîng a ta, bâwgchal khawm chu dêng hlum ni bawk a tih.
Ama chu intlanna phût a ni chun, a hringna ta dinga intlanna a kuoma phût ang taphawt chu pêng a tih.
Pasalte amanih, nuhmeite amanih, a sikhlum a ni khawmin hi dân bawk hi a chungah hmang nîng a tih.
Bâwngchalin siehlawpa amanih, siehlawnu a sik chun, a neitu chun an hotupa kuoma chun shekel tangka sâwmthum pêng a ta, chun, bâwngchal chu dêng hlum nîng a tih.
“Miin khur hawngin amanih, miin khur choin nel nâwk naw sienla, chutaka chun sabengtung amanih, bâwngchal tla ta sienla,
a khur neitu chun thung a ta; a ran neitu kuoma chun tangka pêng a ta, ran thi chu ama ta ni tâng a tih.
“Mi pakhat bâwngchalin mi dang bâwngchal suknain lo thi ta sienla, bâwngchal la dam chu zawr an ta, a man chu insem an tih; chun, a thi khawm chu insem bawk an tih.

Bâwngchal chu a hma khawma mi sik hmang a ni ti hriet sa a ni ruok chun, a neituin a inah a thlung naw a ni chun, bâwngchal aia chun bâwngchal ma a pêk ngei ding a nih; chun, ran thi chu ama ta ni tâng a tih.
“Mîn bâwngchal amanih, berâm inru sienla, lo zawrin amanih lo that sienla; bâwngchal pakhat aia chun bâwngchal panga pêng a ta, berâm pakhat aia chun berâm pali a pêk ding a nih.
Inru chu ina a lût lai hmuin, vuokin lo thi ta sienla, ama chunga chun thisen phuba um naw nih.
Ama chunga chun nisa a suok ta chun, ama ta dingin thisen phuba chu um a tih. Inru chun a thung ngei ding a nih. Iengkhawm a nei naw chun ama chu iengkhat inrûk mana zawr ding a nih.
A thil inrûk chu, bâwngchal amanih, sabengtung amanih, berâm amanih a hringa a kuta hmu a ni chun, a lêthni peiin thung a tih.
“Mîn lo amanih, grêp huon infâktirin, annawleh, a ran chu insuoin mi dang loah intlattir sienla; a lo laia a ṭha tak le, a grêp huon laia a ṭha takin thung a tih.
“Mei a suok a, ṭhûl a kâng mat pei a, bu hlum amanih, buvui ngîr lai amanih, lo amanih a kâng hmang chun, mei insuotu chun a thung ngei ding a nih.
Inru chu man a ni naw chun, a in neitu chun a vênghai thuomhnaw chunga chun kutkem a lo hmang le hmang naw fie dingin Pathien

Thil inhmang thubuoi tinah, bâwngchal khawm, sabengtung khawm, berâm khawm, silfên khawm, thil inhmang ieng ienga khawm, mi pakhatin, ‘Hi hi a nih,’ a ti phawt chun, a khingtuokhai ve ve chu Pathien hmaah hung an ta, Pathienin ân thiemnaw chun a vêngpa kuoma chun a lêt hniin thung a tih.
“Miin a vênghai kuomah sabengtung amanih, bâwngchal amanih, berâm amanih ran hrim hrim enkawl dingin sie sienla, lo thiin amanih, suknatin amanih, khal hmangin lo umin, mi tukhawmin hmu naw hai sien,
a vênghai thuomhnawhai chungah kutkem a hmang le hmang naw,
Nisienlakhawm, amaa inthawka inrûk hmang a ni chun, a ran neitu chu a thung ding a nih.
Ramsa ikeinâwi vawng amanih a lo ni chun, hrietfiena dingin hung lâng a ta, keinâwia um ta hnung chu thung ta naw nih.
“Mîn a vênghai ran iengkhawm haw sienla, lo thi amanih, inhliem lo ni sienla, a neitu ṭhanglo a ni chun, a thung ngei ding a nih.
A neitu a ṭhang ruok chun, thung chuong naw ni a; man neia haw a ni chun haw a ni dân dân chun fêng a tih.
“A pa chun ama chu a pêk nuom dêr naw chun, nunghâk man ang hu tangka a pêk tho ding a nih.
Hmeithai amanih, fahra chu i sukrimsi ding a ni nawh.
Ieng kawnga khawm i sukrimsi a, kei an mi hung ko phawt chun, an mi kona lo hre ngei ngei ka ta;
ka lunginsenna chu hung lum a ta, kâwlhnâmin that ka ti che a; i nuhmei chu hmeithai nîng a ta; i nauhai chu fahra nîng an tih.
“I vênghai silfên tiemkama i lâk chun nisa tlâk hmain i pêk nâwk ngei ding a nih;
chu chu a puonsil neisun a ni a, a taksa inkhumna dinga a puon chu a nih; khâwlai am zâl tâng a ta? Chun, kei a mi hung ko pha lo hrieng ka tih, mi lunginsiettheitak ka ni si a.
Chuong ang bawk chun i bâwngchalhai, i berâmhai i thaw ding a nih; ni sari chu a pui leh um an ta, ni riet ni chun ka kuomah i pêk ding a nih.
Thil suol thaw dingin mipui chu i zui ding a ni naw a; indikna keikâwi dinga mi tamna tieng tienga ṭhangin thubuoiah hrietpuitu i ni ding a ni bawk nawh;
Nangma theidatu che khawm ni sien, a sabengtung chu a phurrikin a delde lai i hmu chun, mâksan el lovin insuo dingin i ṭhangpui ngei ding a nih.
“I mi, rethei tak takhai thubuoi chu, indiknaw takin i rêlpêk ding a ni nawh.

kum sarinaa ruok chun inchâwltirin inumtir ṭawk ṭawk i tih, i mi pasiehaiin an fâk theina dingin le, an mâksanhai chu ramsahaiin an fâk theina dingin. Chuong ang bawkin, i grêp huonhai le i oliv huonhai chu thâwng i tih.
I kuoma ka hril ta po po hi pawisa la, pathien danghai hming hrim chu lam naw la, i baua inthawkin hriet khawm ni bawk naw raw se.

Chawl ṭhanglo bei ruoi i nei ding a na, ni sari sûng chawl ṭhanglo bei fâng i ta, thu ka pêk ang chea, Abib thlaa hun ka ruotpêk che huna khan (chu thla chun Aiguptaa inthawkin i hung suok a ni si a) chun, tukhawm ka hmaah kut ruokin an hung inlang ding an nawh.
Loa i chîng i sininrimna ra hmasahai sîk hunah Busîk ruoi le, kum tâwpah loa inthawka i sinthaw rahai po po i lâk khâwm vawng pha Pâwltlâk ruoi i nei bawk ding a nih.
Kum khatah ṭum thum pasal po po
“Ngai ta, i lampuia enkawl ding che le, hmun ka buotsaia chun ṭhuoi ding chein i hmaah vântirko ka tir a nih.
Ama chu pawisa unla, a râwl chu ngai unla, suklungsen naw ro; ka hming chu amaa chun a um a, in bawsietnahai chu a ngaidam naw ding cheu a ni si a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama râwl chu i ngai tak tak a, ka hril po po hi i thaw chun, i hmêlmahai ta dingin hmêlma nîng ka ta, i khingpuihai ta dingin an khingpui nîng ka tih.
Ka vântirko chu i hmaah fêng a ta, Amor mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Kanaan mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai rama chun ṭhuoi lût a ti che; chun, anni chu sukbohmang ka tih.
An pathienhai kuoma chun i kûn ding a ni naw a, an rawng khawm i bâwl ding a ni naw a, an sin i thaw ding a ni bawk nawh; anni chu peithla letdêr i ta, an milimhai chu suknâwi vawng i tih.
“I ram sûngah ching le mâni nau ṭhe tukhawm um naw ni hai a, i dam sûng nihai chu sukkim ka tih.
Ka ṭitumna chu i hmaah tir ka ta, mi an kuoma i hungna dinghai chu sukbohmang ka ta, i hmêlmahai chu hnung innghat ding chein siem ka tih.
I hmaah khuoi tûrnei tir ka ta, chuongchun, Hiv mihai, Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai chu i hmaa inthawkin hnawt suok an tih.
I hmaa inthawkin kum khat sûngin hnawt suok vawng naw ning, chuong naw chun ram chu râusan nîng a ta, ram sahai i chungah hung ṭuong rawi an tih.
I hung pung a, ram chu i hluo thei zet hmakhat chu anni chu tlawmte têin i hmaa inthawkin hnawt suok hret hret ka tih.

Tuipui Sena inthawka Philistin tuipui chen le, thlalêra inthawka Euphrates vadung chenin i ramri chu khang ka ta; a ram hluotuhai chu i kutah ka pêk ding che a ni si a; chun, nangin i hmaa inthawkin hnawt suok i tih.
“An pathienhai leh amanih, anni leh amani khawm thuthlung hrim i siem ding a ni nawh.
I ram sûngah an um ding a ni naw a, chuong naw chun ka chungah insuksuoltir rawi an ti che; an pathienhai rawng i bâwl chun, i ta dingin châng a ni ngei ngei ding a ni si a, tiin” a ta..
Mosie chu a hung a,
Mosie chun
Chun, Israel mi tlangvâlhai chu a tir a,
Chun, thuthlungna lekhabu chu a lâk a, mipui hrieta chun a tiem ta a; anni chun, “
Chun, Mosie le Aron, Nadab, Abihu le, Israel upa sâwmsari chu an hang fe a;
Israel mipui hotuhai chungah chun Pathienin a kut ân nghat naw a; Pathien chu an hmu ngei a, an fâkin an dâwn a.
Mosie le a rawngbâwltu Josua chu an tho a, Mosie chu Pathien tlânga chun a hang fe ta a.

Upahai kuoma chun, “Hitaka hin keini mi lo nghâk ro, in kuoma kan hung nâwk hmakhat chu: chun, ngai ta u, Aron le Hur hi in kuomah an um a, tukhawmin thubuoi a nei chun an kuomah lo fe raw se,” a ti a.
Israel mihai mita
Mosie chu sûm zîng hnuoia chun a lût a, tlânga chun a hang fe ta a. Mosie chu ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli tlânga chun a hang um ta a.
“Israel mihai kuoma chun hril la, ka ta dingin thilpêk dâwl raw hai se; mi tin an lungrila inhâwktaka petuhaia inthawk chun ka ta dinga thilpêk chu in lâk ding a nih.
Hieng hi annia inthawka thilpêk in lâk dinghai chu a nih; rângkachak, tangkaruo le dârsen leh,
sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le patzaiinhmi thlûr, kêl hmul,
berâmchal vun suksen, seal vunhai le shittim thing leh;
meivar dingin hriek, riminhnik, râwmi ding le innâlna hriek dingin riminhnik,
Onik lung le lunghai thiempu zakawsîng le a âwma bel ding leh nîng a tih.
Chun, hmun inthieng mi siempêk raw hai se, anni laia ka um zing theina dingin.
Biekbûk riruong le a thuomhnawhai riruong kân entir che po po ang tak hin in bâwl ding a nih.
Rângkachak inthiengin inluon khum i ta; a sûng le puo inluon khum i tih; a chunga chun a vêlin rângkachakin a tlâng kâwm i tih.
Rângkachak kuol pali sut i ta, a kehai palia chun inbûk i tih; kuol hni chu a sîr khatah um an ta, kuol hni dang chu a sîr khingtiengah um an tih.
Shittim thing zâwnfunghai siem i ta, rângkachak inluon khum i tih.
“Thuthlung bâwm sîra a kuol sûnghaia chun Thuthlung bâwm zâwnfunghai chu rawl lût ve ve rawh.
Zâwnfunghai chu Thuthlung bâwma a kuolhai sûnga chun um zing an tih, lâk suok an ni hrim hrim ding a ni nawh.
Thuthlung bâwm sûnga chun thuthlung ka pêk ding che chu sieng i tih.
Chun rângkachak inthiengin zângaina ṭhungpha siem i ta, a seitieng tawng hni le a chenve, a lientieng tawng khat le a chenvein.
Rângkachak cherub pahni a suta sutin, zângaina ṭhungpha hmawr ve veah sieng i tih.
Cherub pakhat chu a hmawr khingkhatah, cherub pakhat dang chu a hmawr khingtiengah siem i ta; a hmawr pahni tâwpa cherubhai chu zângaina ṭhungpha leh hlûm khatin siem i tih.
Cherubhai chun chungtieng an thla zar an ta, an thlahai chun zângaina ṭhungpha chu zar hlieng an ta, an hmaihai chu innghattuok ve vein, cherubhai chun zângaina ṭhungpha tieng chu nghâng an tih.
Chun, Thuthlung bâwm chunga chun zângaina ṭhungpha chu sieng i ta; chun, Thuthlung bâwm sûnga chun thuthlung ka pêk ding che chu sieng i tih.
“Shittim thingin dawkân siem i ta; a seitieng tawng hni, a lientieng tawng khat, ân sângtieng chu tawng khat le a chenve nîng a tih.
Rângkachak inthiengin inluon khum i ta, a vêlin rângkachakin a tlâng kâwm i tih.
A vêlin kutphabawkin a rei siem i ta, chu rei chu a vêlin rângkachakin inluon i tih.
Chu ta ding chun rângkachak kuol pali siem i ta, chu kuolhai chu a kil palia a ke palia chun inbûk i ta;
Dawkân zâwnna zâwnfunghai rawlna dingin a kuolhai chu a rei hnaiah an um ding a nih.
Dawkân zâwnna ding chun shittim thing zâwnfunghai siem i ta; rângkachakin inluon khum i tih.
A thlênghai, haihawhai, notung seihai, noinkûmhai, dâwn mi thilinhlân bun suokna dingin siem i tih: chuong chu rângkachak inthiengin i siem ding a nih.
Chun, ka hmaah dawkân chunga chun entirna bei sie rawp i tih.
Chu khâwnvar siena ngul chun kâu paruk nei a ta, sîr khata chun sathâukhâwnvar siena kâu thum, a sîr khingtiengah sathâukhâwnvar siena kâu thum bawk;

kau khata chun almond zîk anga siem khei pathum, amûm le a hmawr pâr um, a kâu danga chun almond zîk anga siem khei pathum, a mûm le a hmawr pârhai um a tih; sathâukhâwnvar siena kâu hung suok, a kâu parukhai chu chuong ang seng chu an nih.
Chun, sathâukhâwnvar siena ngula almond zîkhai anga siem no pali, a mûmhai le a hmawr pârhai leh um a tih.
A hmawr pârhai le an kâuhai chu zawm khat an ni ding a ni a, a pumpui chun rângkachak inthieng sutzawm vawng a ni ding a nih.
Chun, chutaka chun khâwnvar pasari siem i ta, an umna hmazâwn hmun ruok elvar dinga inṭhut nîng an tih.
A chaichehai le a vâmdawhai khawm chu rângkachak inthienga siem an ni ding a nih.
Rângkachak inthieng talent khat bûka siem ding a nih, hieng a bûrlebêl po pohai le hin.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sawmhni pariet, puonzâr tin lientieng chu tawng li nîng a tih; puonzâr po po chu intie seng an ni ding a nih.
Puonzâr panga chu ṭhui zawm vawng ding a na, a dang panga khawm chu ṭhui zawm vawng ding a nih.
Puonzâr pakhat a thuo laia kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valbahai dumpâwlin siem i ta, chuong ang bawkin a zawm hninaa puonzâr puo tak tlânga chun siem bawk i tih.
Puonzâr pakhata chun valba sâwmnga siem i ta, chun, a zawm hninaa puonzâr tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk siem i tih; valbahai chu an inzawm seng ding a nih.
Rângkachakin puonchepna sâwmnga siem i ta, puonchepnahai chun puonzârhai chu chepdêng i ta; biekbûk chu pakhat hung nîng a tih.
Biekbûk chunga inkhumna dingin kêl hmul puonzârhai siem i ta, puonzâr chu sâwm le pakhat siem i tih.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sâwmthum, puonzâr tin lientieng chu tawng li nîng a tih: puonzârhai sawm le pakhat chu intie seng an ni ding a nih.
Puonzâr pangahai chu anni le anni ṭhui zawm i ta, puonzâr parukhai chu anni le anni ṭhui zawm bawk i ta, puon in tuoltienga chun puonzâr parukna chu thlep i tih.
A thuo hmasaa puonzâr kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga siem i ta, chun, a thuo hninaa puonzâr kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk siem i tih.
“Chun, dârsenin puonchepna sâwmnga siem i ta, puonchepnahai chu valbahai sûnga chun thun i ta, puonzârhai chu pakhat an ni theina dingin chelmat a tih.
Puon in puonzârhaia chung inkhum tâwk bâk, puonzâr chenve la chuong kaithla chu biekbûk châwrtieng chun inzar a tih.
Sîr khingah tawng khat, sîr dangah tawng khat bawk puon in inkhumna puonzârhai lienziea la chuong chu, biekbûk hitieng sîr le sawtieng sîr zuk inkhum dingin inzar ve vêng a tih.
Chun, chu bûk chung inkhumna ding chun berâmchal vun suksenhai siem i ta, chu chunga chun a chung inkhumna seal vunhai siem bawk i tih.
Thingphêk seizie chu tawng sâwm nîng a ta, thingphêk tin lientieng chu tawng khat le a chenve nîng a tih.
Thingphêk tina chun a rek pahni, a dang le sukzawmna ding um seng a ta, biekbûk thingphêkhai po po chu chuong ang seng chun i siem ding a nih.
Chun, biekbûk ding thingphêkhai chu simsawngah thingphêk sâwmhni siem i tih.

Thingphêk sâwmhni hnuoia chun tangkaraw kerkuokhai sâwmli siem i ta, thingphêk pakhat hnuoia a rêkhai pahni inṭhutna dingin kerkuok pahni, thingphêk dang hnuoia a rek pahnia dingin kerkuok pahni bawk siem i tih.
“Chun, biekbûk sîr khingtieng, hmartieng panga chun thingphêk sawmhni,
le tangkaraw kerkuok sâwmli, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni, thingphêk dang hnuoiah kerkuok pahni pei bawk siem i tih.
Biekbûk chawrtieng pang, thlangtieng panga chun thingphêk paruk siem i tih.
A chawrtieng panga biekbûk kihaia dingin thingphêk pahni bawk siem i tih.
A hnuoitieng chun suktuok nîng an ta, chuong ang bawk chun a chungtieng khawm a sîpa chun kuol pakhata chelkhâwm nîng an tih; a kiha thingphêkhai pahni chu chuong anga chu siem ding a nih.
Chun, thingphêk pariet le tangkaraw kerkuok, kerkuok sâwm le paruk, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni, thingphêk dang hnuoiah kerkuok pahni pei ning a tih.
Chun, shittim thing bangruhai siem i tih: biekbûk sîr khat tienga thingphêkhaia dingin panga,
biekbûk sîr khingtienga thingphêkhaia dingin panga; chun biekbûk hnungtienga thlangtieng panga thingphêkhaia dingin panga bawk.
A bangru lailung thingphêkhai a lai taka mi chu a tâwpa inthawka a tâwp khingtieng chena rawl thleng zar a ni ding a nih.
Chun, thingphêkhai chu rângkachakin inluon khum i ta, bangruhai thunna ding chun rângkachak kuolhai siem bawk i tih; chun, bangruhai khawm chu rângkachakin inluon khum i tih.
Chun, biekbûk chu tlânga a riruong inhmutir i ni ang dan peiin în ngîr ding a nih.
chun rângkachaka inluon khum, tangkaraw kerkuokhaia inṭhut, shittim ban palia rângkachak kuoikimhaia chun i khai ding a nih.
Puonzâr chu puonchepnahaiin khai i ta, puonzâr sûngtienga chun Thuthlung bâwm chu hung lâng i ta, chuongchun, puonzâr chun Hmun Inthieng le Hmun Inthiengtak chu ṭhepêk a ti che.
Hmun Inthieng taka chun Zângaina ṭhungpha chu Thuthlung bâwm chunga chun sieng i tih.
Puonzâr puoa chun dawkân chu sieng i ta, khâwnvar siena chu dawkân zâwn Biekbûk simtieng pangah; chun, dawkân chu hmartieng pangah i sie ding a nih.
Puon in kawtkhâr ding chun puonzâr, puonzai inhmi kawp le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr, puon ṭhuimawi thiemtaka ṭhui chu i siem ding a nih.
Puonzâr khaina ding chun shittim ban panga siem la, rângkachakin inluonkhum rawh; an kuoikimhai chu rângkachak a ni ding a na, dârsen kerkuok panga i sutpêk bawk ding a nih.
A kil pali chunga chun kihai siem i ta, chu kihai chu ama le chun zawm khat an ni ding a nih; dârsenin inluon khum bawk i tih.
A vut dawna dingin bêlhai siem i ta, meikhelnahai, châwtawlhai, thîrkuoihai le vutluohai siem i ta; a hmangruohai po po chu dârsena siem a ni ding a nih.
Chu ding chun dârsena inphan thuk siem bawk i ta; chun, a lên kil palia chun dârsen kuol pali siem i tih.
A lên chu maichâm chenve zu tlung dingin maichâm rei hnuoi zar zarah sieng i tih.
Maichâm zâwnna ding chun zâwnfunghai shittim thingin siem i ta, dârsen inluon khum i tih.
Zâwnfunghai chu dârsen kuolhai sûnga chun rawl ding a nih, hang zâwn zâwngin zâwnfunghai chu maichâm sîr hnia chun um an tih.
Thingphêkhaiin maichâm chu a kawrawngin i siem ding a nih, tlânga inhmutir i ni ang tak khan siem a ni ding a nih.
A ban chu sâwmhni le a kerkuok sâwmhni dârsena siem nîng a ta, ban kuoikimhai le a tuommawinahai chu tangkaruo a ni ding a nih.
Chuong ang bawk chun hmartieng pang tluonsuok chun puonzârhai tawng za khat le ban sâwmhni, kerkuok sâwmhni dârsena siem um an ta; ban kuoikimhai le tuommawinahai chu tangkaruo a ni ding a nih.
Thlangtieng pangah a tuolzâwl tluonsuokin puonzârhai tawng sâwmnga, ban sâwm le kerkuok sâwm bawk leh um a tih.
Saktieng pangah tuoltieng tuolzâwl lienzie chu tawng sâwmnga nîng a tih.
Kawt sîr khata puonzârhai chu tawng sâwm le panga nîng a ta, ban pathum le a kerkuok pathum leh.
Chun, a sîr khingtienga ding chun puonzârhai chu tawng sâwmpanga nîng a ta, a banhai pathum le a kerkuokhai pathum leh.
A tuolzâwl kawta ding chun puonzâr tawng sâwmhni, sahmul dumpâwl le a êm le seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawpa siem ṭhuimawi thiemtaka ṭhui a ni ding a nih, a ban pali le a kerkuok pali leh.
A tuolzâwl sîr vêl po poa a banhai po po chu tangkaruoin tuommawi ding a na, a kuoikimhai tangkaruo, a kerkuokhai dârsen an ni ding a nih.
A tuolzâwl huol sûng chu a dungtieng tawng za khat, a khangtieng tawng sâwmnga, ân sângtieng tawng nga, a puonzai inhmi kawp inkhai tawng nga le an kerkuokhai chu dârsen an ni ding a nih.
Chutaka Biekbûk rawngbâwlna po poa hmangruohai po po le a kilnahai po po le a tuolzâwl inhuonnaa a kilna po po chu dârsen vawng a ni ding a nih.
Intuokna puon in Thuthlung bâwm hmaa puonzâr puoa chun Aron le a naupasalhaiin

“I unaupa Aron hi Israel mihai laia inthawkin ama le a naupasalhai hi, thiempu sina ka hmaa rawng an bâwl theina dingin Aron le Aron naupasalhai, Nadab le Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar hi i kuomah hung ṭhuoi rawh.
I unaupa Aron ta dingin mawina ding le ropuina dingin silfên inthieng i siempêk ding a nih.
Mi, lungrila varna nei, varna thlaraua ka suksiphai po chu, Aron silfênhai siem dingin hril rawh, ama chu thiempu sina ka kuoma rawng a bâwl theina dinga inhlânthieng a ni theina dingin.

“Hieng hi silfên an siem dinghai chu a nih: âwmbel, zakawsîng, zakawfuol le zakawchung ṭhuimawi, lukâwm le kâwngkhi hi; chun, i unaupa Aron le a naupasalhai chu thiempu sina ka kuoma rawng an bâwl theina dingin silfên inthienghai siempêk an tih.
Chun, rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawp hmang an tih.
An khai detna dingin a dârbel pahni, a hmawr hnia ṭhui mat a ni ding a nih.
Chun, zakawsîng chunga a khitna ṭhuimawi chu siem dân thuhmun bawka siem, zawm khat a ni ding a na; rângkachak le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawp ṭhataka siem a ni ding a nih.
Chun, onik lung pahni lâng i ta, chuhaia chun Israel naupasalhai hming chu ker i tih;
an piengzie indawt ang peiin hming paruk chu lung pakhatah, hming paruk dang chu lung danga chun ker i tih.
Lungkertuin hming namna a ker angin, lung pahnia chun Israel naupasalhai hming indawt ang peiin ker i ta, rângkachak kerkuokhaia thun dingin siem i tih.

Israel naupasalhai ta dinga hrietzingna lunghai dingin, chu lung pahni chu thiempu zakawsîng dâr belhaia chun sieng i ta; chuongchun, Aron chun hrietzingna dingin a liengko pahni chunga chun an hminghai chu
“Rângkachak kerkuokhai siem i ta, rângkachak inthieng khaidiet pahni hruol anga inherthlawp leh;
chun, khaidiet herthlawphai chu kerkuokhaia chun thun i tih.
Kil li nei a thuo a ni ding a na, a sei tieng khâp khat, a lien tieng khâp khat bawk a ni ding a nih.
A sûnga chun lung phûm chihai tlar liin phûm i ta, a tlar hmasatak chu sardion, topaz le karbankle lung,
a tlar hnina chu emeral, sapphir le endonuk (lunghlu),
a tlar thumna chu jasinth, agate le amethust,
a palina chu birul, onik le jasper lung nîng a ta, a phûmna chu rângkachaka tuom khum seng ni bawk an tih.
Lunghai chu sawmpahni, Israel naupasalhai hming indawt ang peiin nîng an ta, hmingnamna kerhai angin Israel hnam sâwmpahni hming chu ker ning a tih.
Âwmbel chunga chun rângkachak inthieng khaidiet, hruol anga inherthlawp siem i tih;
chun, âwmbel chunga chun rângkachak kuol pahni siem i ta; chu kuolhai pahni chu âwmbel hmawr pahnia chun inbûk i tih.
Rângkachak khaidiet pahni chu âwmbel hmawra kuol pahnia chun inbûk i tih.
Khaidiet pahni hmawrhai chu kerkuok pahnia chun thun i ta, zakawsîng dârbelhai hmatieng panga chun khai i tih.
Rângkachak kuol pahni siem i ta, zakawsîng deptieng pang sûng, a tlâng sîr chunga âwmbel pahni hmawrhaia chun inbûk i tih.

Rângkachak kuol pahni bawk siem i ta, zakawsîng hmatieng panga dârbel pahni hnuoitieng pang, a thuo sûnghnung lem hnuoitienga ân tuokna, zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng inbûkna chung taka khan inbûk i tih.
Chun, âwmbel chu zakawsînga kawp thlapna dingin le, zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng chunga chun a um theina dingin âwmbela a kuolhai le zakawsînga a kuolhaia chun hrui dumpâwlin khit mat an tih.
Chun, Aron chun
Rorêlna âwmbela chun Urim le Thummim inbûk i ta,
A hmawr a lai zâwnah a lu âwng a um ding a na, a lu âwng chu a vêl tuok chun ân ek nawna dingin, indona phâw zakuo angin puon a khâwnga khâwnga tuom ding a nih.
A hmawr tlânghaia chun theibufai dumpâwl, a êm le seninlârin, a hmawr tlâng vêl po poa chun i siem ding a nih; an inkârah rângkachak telnênghai leh,
zakawfuol hmawr tlâng vêl tuoka chun rângkachak telnêng, theibufai, rângkachak telnêng le theibufai ti anga inkârthlâkin a um ding a nih.
Aronin rawng a bâwl pha chun chuong ang chun inthuom a ta, a ri chu
Chu chu hrui dumpâwlin lukâwm chungtienga chun khitdêng i ta, lukâwm hmatieng panga chun a um ding a nih.
Aron bâwk chunga chun a um ding a na. Aron chun Israel mihaiin thilpêk inthienga an pêk thil inthienghaia suolna um phawt chu phur a tih:
“Aron naupasalhai ta dinga mawina le ropuina dingin zakawchunghai, kâwngkhihai le lukâwmhai siempêk i tih.
I unaupa Aron le a naupasalhai chu inhâktir i ta, anni chu ka hmaa thiempu sina rawng an bâwl theina dingin hriek nâl i ta, namdet i ta, inhlân thieng i tih.
Chun, an taksa saruokna inkhum dingin kekawrhnuohai siempêk i ta, kâwnga inthawka êlpui chen tlung an tih;

chuong chu Aron le a naupasalhai chun an bun ding a nih, intuokna puon ina an hung lût phain amanih, Hmun Inthienga rawng bâwl dinga maichâm an hung hnai phain amanih, suolna phura an thi nawna dingin. Ama le ama hnunga a thlahai chena khawm hi hi dân nîng a tih.
bei, chawl ṭhanglo le beiphêk chawl ṭhanglo hriek pawl le, beiinphân chawl ṭhanglo hriek nâl leh, chuongchu bupui beiphit inditakin i siem ding a nih.
Chun, leikhâwr pakhatah sieng i ta, leikhâwr chu bâwngchal le berâmchal pahni le chun hung la lût i tih.
Aron le a naupasalhai chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun hung ṭhuoi i ta, tuiin însiltir i tih.
Chun, silfênhai chu lâng i ta, Aron chu zakawchung, zakawfuol, zakawsîng le âwmbel chu inhâktir i ta;
zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng chun khit i ta, a lu chunga chun lukâwm sieng i ta, lukâwm chunga chun lukhum inthieng chu sieng i tih.
Chun, innâlna hriek lâng i ta, a lu chungah buok i ta, ama chu nâl i tih.
A naupasalhai chu hung ṭhuoi i ta, zakawchunghai inhâktir i ta,
an kâwng chu kâwngkhiin hrên i ta, lukhim inkhimtir i ta, thiempu nina chu kumkhaw dânah nei an tih: chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chu în hlânthieng ding a nih.
Intuokna puon in tuola chun bâwngchal ṭhuoi i ta, Aron le a naupasalhai chun bâwngchal lu chunga chun an kut innghat an tih.
Intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun
Bâwngchal thisen chu lâng i ta, i kutpârin maichâm kîhaia chun nâl i ta; chun, a thisen dang po chu maichâm bula chun bur i tih.
Chun, a sûng thâu po chu lâng i ta, a thin chunga duorda le, a kalhai pahni le anni tuomtu thâu leh maichâm chunga chun rawng i tih.
Bâwngchal sa le, a vun le, a êk ruok chu bûk puoa chun meiin rawng i tih; suol ta dinga thil inhlân a nih.
Berâmchal pakhat chu la bawk i ta, Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kuthai innghat an tih.
Berâmchal chu that i ta, a thisen chu lâng i ta, maichâm chu a vêlin thêng i tih.
Berâmchal chu ât nawi i ta, a sûnghai le a kehai chu sâwp i ta, a sa âtsa le, a lu leh chun sieng i ta;
“Chun, berâm chal dang pakhat chu lâng i ta, Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kuthai innghat an tih.

Chun, berâmchal chu that i ta, a thisen chu lâng i ta, Aron nakâwr changtieng hmawra le a naupasalhai nakâwr changtieng hmawra le, an changtieng kutpui chunga le, an changtieng kepuihaiah nâl i ta; chun, thisen la um po chun maichâm chu a vêl chun thêng i tih.

Maichâm chunga thisen chu innâlna hriek leh lâng i ta, Aron le a silfênhai le, a naupasalhai le an silfênhai chunga chun thêng i ta, ama chu inhlânthieng nîng a tih; a silfênhai le a naupasalhai le a naupasalhai silfênhai leh.
Berâmchal thâu khawm chu a ngûm le a sûngbawtu thâuhai leh, a thin chunga a duorda leh, a kal pahni le a tuomtu thâuhai leh, a dâr changtieng leh la bawk i tih (inhlânna berâmchal a ni leiin).
Chun, bei tliem khat, beiphêk hriek pawl tlang khat le, bei inphân pakhat leh;
Aron le a naupasalhai kuthaia chun a rêng chun sie vawng i ta,
Chun, chuong chu an kuthaia inthawkin lâng i ta,
Aron inhlânna berâmchal ir chu lâng i ta,
Thên thilinhlân ir le dawmkâng thilinhlân dâr, inhlânna berâmchal ir le dâr dawmkânga thên tah, thiempu chan khawm chu inhlân i tih, Aron le a naupasalhai chan a ni leiin.
Aron le a naupasalhai chan dinga Israel thilinhlân an pêk zing ding an bat nîng a tih; chu chu an inremna thilinhlânhaia inthawka thiempu chan dinga Israel mihai inhlân ding chu nîng a tih;
“Aron silfên inthienghai chu ama hnunga a naupasalhai ta dingin nîng a tih, anniah inhlânthieng le hrieknâl an nina dingin.
Hmun Inthienga rawng bâwl dinga a hung pha, ama aia thiempu sin thawtu a naupa chun silfênhai chu ni sari sûng hâk a tih.
“Inhlânna berâmchal chu lâng i ta, Hmun Inthienga chun a sa chu suong i tih.
Aron le a naupasalhai chu berâm sa le leikhâwra bei chu intuokna puon ina kawt bula chun fâng an tih.
