Chuong thil intlanna siemnahai chu anni inhlânna le hlânthiengna dingin fâng an tih, amiruokchu, thil inthieng an ni leiin mi dang chun a fâk ve ding a ni nawh.
Inhlânna sa le bei a iengkhawm chu zîngkâr chena a um zing chun, a mahla chu meiin râwng i tih, thil inthieng a ni leiin fâk a ni ding a ni nawh.
Chuong ang chun Aron le a naupasalhai chungah, thu ka pêk che po po ang tak khan i thaw ding a na; ni sari sûng anni chu i hlânthieng ding a nih,

ni tinin suol ta dinga thil inhlân bâwngchal chu inhlân i tih. Maichâm ta ding khawm chun suol ta dinga thilinhlân inhlân i ta, chu ta dinga intlanna i siem lai chun, inhlân thiengna dingin, maichâm chu hriek nâl bawk i tih.
Maichâm ta dingin ni sari sûng chu intlanna siem i ta, chun, inhlân i tih; chun, maichâm chu inthiengtak hung nîng a ta, maichâm tâwk taphawt chu inthieng ni tâng an tih.
“Hi hi maichâm chunga i thilinhlân ding chu a nih; berâmte pahni kum khat mi ve ve ni tinin în hlân zie ding a nih.
Berâmte pakhat chu zîngtieng inhlân i ta, berâmte dang chu zântieng inhlân i tih.
Berâmte pakhat le chun beiphit indi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat hriek sâwrsa hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat chawkpawl, le dâwnmi thilinhlân dingin uoiin hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat inhlân i tih.
Berâmte pakhat chu zântieng inhlân i ta,
Chu chu i thlahai chena dingin
Chutaka chun Israel mihai chu intuokpui ka ta, intuokna puon in chu ka ropuinain sukthieng nîng a tih.
Intuokna puon in le maichâm chu sukthieng ka ta, Aron le a naupasalhai khawm chu thiempu sina ka rawng bâwl dingin sukthieng ka tih.
Israel mihai lai chun um zing ka ta, an Pathien nîng ka tih.
Chun, anni laia ka um zing theina dinga Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu
“Riminhnik rawna dingin maichâm siem i ta, shittim thingin siem i tih.
A seitieng tawng khat, a lientieng tawng khat, killi nei nîng a tih. Ân sângtieng chu tawng hni nîng a ta, chutaka a kihai chu ama le zawmkhat an ni ding a nih.
A chung le a sîrhai, a vêlin, a kihai leh rângkachak inluonkhum i ta; chun, a vêlin rângkachak rei siem bawk i tih.
A kalhai pahni chung a rei hnuoia chun rângkachak kuol pahni siem la, a sîr hniah i siem ding a nih: chu chu a zâwnnaa zâwnfunghai rawlna ding nîng a tih.
Thuthlung bâwm chunga zângaina ṭhungpha kân tuokpuina ding che hma zâwnah, Thuthlung bâwm kâwla puonzâr hmaa chun sieng i tih.
Chun, Aronin chu chunga chun thil riminhnik chu râwng a ta, zîng tinin khâwnvarhai chu a chei pha râw hlak a tih.
Aron chun zântienga khâwnvarhai ân sit pha chun raw bawk a tih; in thlahai chenin
Chu chunga chun riminhniklo thil, pumrawhmang thilinhlân khawm, fâkmi thilinhlân khawm în hlân ding a ni naw a, dâwnmi thilinhlân hrim a chunga chun i bur ding a ni bawk nawh.
Aron chun a kihai chunga chun kum khata vawi khat intlanna siem a ta; in thlahai chenin intlanna suol ta dinga thilinhlân thisen chun kum khatah vawikhat maichâm ta dinga intlanna siempêk a tih,
“Israel mihai nizât i tiem pha chun, tiem an ninaa an nizât ang peiin, mi tinin ama ta dingin intlanna sum pêk ding a nih, anni i tiem pha anni laia hri a um nawna dingin.
Intiemnaa tiema um taphawt chun pêng a tih: Hmun Inthieng sum dingin shekel chenve (shekel khat chu gerah sâwmhni a nih),
Mi tin intiemnaa ṭhang phâk, kum sâwmhnia upa le a chungtienghai chun
In hringna ta dinga intlanna siem dinga
Israel mihai kuoma inthawkin intlanna sum chu lâng i ta, intuokna puon in rawngbâwlna dingin hmang i tih; in hringna ta dinga intlanna siem dinga
Aron le a naupasalhai chun chutaka chun an kuthai an kehai sâwp an tih.
Intuokna puon ina an lût ding phain amanih,
An kuthai, an kehai sâwp an tih; chuongchun, thi naw ni hai; chun, anni ta dingin kumkhuoa dân nîng a tih, ama le a chithla le an thlahai chen khawmin,” tiin.
“Riminhnik pui deu deuhai la la, murra tui inthieng shekel za nga bûk, thingzungthak riminhnik chu zâtve, chu chu shekel za hni sâwmnga, mafu riminhnik shekel za hni sâwmnga,
thingzungthak chi dang shekel za nga bûk; hieng hi Hmun Inthienga shekel bûk hmang dân ang peiin nîng a ta; chun, oliv hriek hin khat leh;
hienghai hi chawkpawlin innâlna hriek inthieng, rim inhniktak, riminhnik siemtu siem dân angtakin siem i ta, chu chu innâlna hriek inthieng nîng a tih.
Chu hriek chun intuokna puon in le Thuthlung bâwm,
dawkân le a hmangruo po po, khâwnvar siena le a hmangruo dang po po le riminhnik rawna maichâm le,
pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm le a hmangruo po po le, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna le chun nâl i tih.
Chun, inthiengtak an ni theina dingin inhlân i ta, chu chu tâwk taphawt chu inthieng an tih.
Chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chu thiempu sina ka hmaa rawng an bâwl theina dingin nâl i ta, inhlân bawk i tih.
Israel mihai kuoma chun hril la, ‘Hi hi in thlahai chenin ka kuoma innâlna hriek inthieng nîng a tih.
Mi narân taksa chunga hrim hrim buok a ni ding a ni naw a, hi chawkpawl angtak hin, ama ang hi in siem ding a ni nawh: inthieng a ni a, in ta ding khawmin inthieng a ni ding a nih.
Tukhawm ama angtaka lo chawkpawl amanih, mi narân chunga lo nâl amanih, an um chun, ama chu a mihai laia inthawka tuithlâr nîng a tih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun,
Riminhnik siemtu siem dân angtakin, riminhnik râwmi, riminhniktakin, chia saw, inthieng le faitakin siem i tih.
A hlek chite vaw thla hlak i ta, kân tuokpuina ding che intuokna puon ina Thuthlung bâwm hmaa chun sieng i ta, i ta dinga inthiengtak a ni ding a nih.
Hieng chawkpawl dân anga riminhnik i siem chu nanga ta dingin i siem ding a ni naw a: i ngaia chun
Mi tukhawm mâni hmang dinga chuong anga rim nei siemtu chu a mihai laia inthawka tuithlâr nîng a tih,” tiin.
“En ta, Juda hnama mi Hur naupa Uri naupasal a hming Bezalel chu ka ko ta a,
ama chu Pathien Thlarauin ka suksip ta a, varna le hrietthiemna le kutthiem sin tinrêng thawtheina leh,
kutthiem sinhai riruong dingin, rângkachak, tangkaruo le dârsena sinthaw dingin.
Lung inbûk ding ât thiem dingin, thing kermawi thiem ding le kutthiem mak kawng tinrênga sinthaw dingin ka suksip a nih.

Chun, ngai ta, ama inthlawppui dingin Dan hnama mi Ahisamak naupa Oholiab chu ka ruot bawk a; theina nei mihai po kuoma chun themthiemna ka sie ta a, thu ka pêk ta chehai po po kha an siem theina dingin;
intuokna puon in, Thuthlung bâwm le, chu chunga zângaina ṭhungpha le, puon in thuomhnawhai po le,
dâwkân, a hmangruohai leh, sathâukhâwnvâr siena, a hmangruohai le, riminhnik rawna maichâm le,
pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm a hmangruohai po po leh, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna leh;
silfên ṭhataka siemhai le, thiempu Aron silfên inthienghai le, a naupasalhai silfênhai thiempu sina rawngbâwlnaa an hmanghai le;
innâlna hriek le, Hmun Inthienga dinga riminhnik râwmihai leh siem dingin. Thu ka pêk che ang taphawt chun thâwng an tih,” tiin.
“Israel mihai kuoma chun hril la, ‘Ka châwlnihai chu titakzetin in inser ding a nih:

Châwlni chu in inser ding a nih, in ta dinga inthieng a ni si a; mi tin a bâwsetu taphawt chu sukhlum a ni ngei ding a nih: mi tukhawm chu nia sin iengkhawm thaw taphawt chu, chu mi chu a mihai laia inthawka tuithlâr nîng a tih.
Ni ruk sûng chu sin thaw ding a na, ni sari ni ruok chu châwl ṭawk ṭawk ni,
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chun kumkhaw thuthlung dingin châwlni chu inser an tih, an thlahai chenin châwlni chu an inser ding a nih.
Kumkhuoin Israel mipuihai le keia inkâra inchikna ni zing a tih:
Chun, Sinai tlâng chunga ama le inbiekna chu a suktâwp chun Thuthlung phêk hni, lung phêk pahni Pathien kut ngeia ziekhai chu Mosie kuomah a pêk ta a.
Aron chun an kuomah, “Rângkachak kutsebihai in nuhmeihai le in naupasalhai le in naunuhmeihai nakâwra an bêhai chu hlîp thla unla, ka kuomah hung la ro,” a ti a.
Chun, mipui po po chun an nakâwrhaia rângkachak nabêhai chu an hlîp a, Aron kuoma chun an hung lâk a.

An kuta inthawk chun a lâk a, kerna hriemhrei hmangin a sungna ding a siem a, bâwngte limah a sung ta a. Anni chun, “Aw Israel, hi hi Aigupta rama inthawka hung ṭhuoi suoktu che i pathien chu a ni hi,” an ti a.
Aronin chu chu a hmu chun, bâwngte hmaa chun maichâm a siem a, “Zînga chu

an kuoma thu ka pêka inthawk chun an pêt hmang nghâl el ta a; bâwngte lim sung an insiemfâwm a, an biek a, a kuomah an inthâwi a, ‘Aw Israel, Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu che i pathien a ni hi,’ an ti a,” tiin.
chuleiin, tuhin mi mâksan rawh, an chunga ka lunginsenna chu a hung lum a, anni ka sukbohmang theina dingin; nang ruok chu hnam ropuitakah la siem ka ti che,” a ti a.
Mosie ruok chun

Iengdingin am Aigupta mihai chun, ‘Hnuoi chunga anni sukbohmang vawng ding le tlânghaia chun anni sukhlum dingin thiltum ṭhanawtakin anni a ṭhuoi suok a,’ ti el an ti leh? I lunginsenna ṭiumtaka inthawk chun inher la, i mihai chunga hi thil ṭhanaw hi lakîr rawh.

I siehlawhai Abraham, Isak le Israel kuoma nangma le nangma inkhâma, ‘I thlahai chu vâna arasihai angin sukpung ka ta; hi ram po po ka hril ta hi in thlahai kuomah pêng ka ta, kumkhuoin hluong an tih,’ tia i hril kha hre zing rawh,” a ta.
Chun,

Chun, Mosie chu ân her a, thuthlung lung phêk pahni chu a kuta chawiin, tlânga inthawk chun a fe thla ta a: chu lung phêkhai chu an pang khing hni hnia ziek an nih; a pang khing khat le a pang khingtieng khawm chun ziek ve ve an nih.
Chu lungphêkhai chu Pathien sinthaw, le Pathien iziek, lungphêkhai chunga ker an nih.
Josua chun mipui khêkri chu a hrietin Mosie kuomah, “Riebûka sawn indona ri a um,” a ti a.
Mosie chun, “Hnena khêkri chu a ni naw a, hnea umhai khêkri khawm a ni bawk naw a, hlasak ri a ni lem chu ka hriet chu,” a ti a.
Chun, riebûk kâwl a hung tlunga bâwngte lim le lâm chu a hmu phingleh Mosie lunginsenna chu a hung lum a, a kuthaia inthawk lungphêkhai chu a dehâwn a, tlâng bula chun a sukkawi ta a.
Bâwngte lim an siem chu a lâk a, meiah a raw a, a râwt nâwi a, tuiah a phul a, Israelhai chu ân dâwntir ta a.
Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “Hi mipui hin i kuomah ieng am an thawa hienga an chunga suol nasatak în tlungtir hi?” a ti a.
Aron chun, “Ka lalpa lunginsenna chu lum naw raw se: hi mipui hi thil suol âwnsa hrim an nih ti nangin i hriet annâwm.
Chun, an kuomah, ‘Tukhawm rângkachak nei chun hlîp raw se,’ ka ti a, chuongchun, an mi hung pêk a, chun, meiah ka rawtui a, hi bâwngte lim hi a hung suok a ni hi,” a ti a.
Mosie chun mipui chu zalêntaka um a hmu chun (Aronin a lo khuokhir naw leiin hmêlmahai mithmuah muolphotakin a lo inumtir ta si a),
Mosie chu riebûk kawtkhâra chun a ngîr a, “
Chun, an kuomah, “Israel Pathien
Levi naupasalhai chun Mosie thu ang chun an thaw a; chuongchun, mipui chu chu ni chun mi sâng thum lai an tlu ta a.
Mosie chun, “Vawisûn hin in chunga malsâwmna a pêk theina ding cheuin, mi tin chu mâni naupa amanih, mâni unaupa amanih chenin
A zînga chun Mosie chun mipui kuoma chun, “Thil suol nasatak in thaw ta chu a ni a, chuleiin,
Chun, Mosie chu
Tuhin fe la, hmun ka hrilna chea khan mipui chu ṭhuoi la, ngai ta, ka vântirko i hmaah fêng a tih. Amiruokchu, ka hung sir nia chun an suol man chu anni chungah intlungtir ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Aron isiem bâwngte an siem lei chun
In hmaah ka vântirko tir ka ta, Kanaan mihai, Amor mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai chu hnawt suok ka tih.
Mipuiin hi thuthang ṭhanaw hi an hriet chun an sûn a, tukhawmin an incheina chu an inbel ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chun Horeb tlânga inthawk chu an incheinahai chu an hlîp ta vawng a.
Mosie chun puon in chu a sawm pei a, riebûk puotieng, riebûka inthawka hla deua hin a zar hlak a; chu chu “Intuokna puon in” tiin ân bûk a. Mi tin
Mosie chu puon ina a fe lai chun mipui po po chu an tho a, mi tin chu mâni puon in kawtkhâra chun an ngîr a, Mosie chu puon ina a lût chenin an enzui pei a.
Mosie puon ina a lût phingleh sûm ngîr a hung thla a, puon in kawtkhâra chun a ngîr a; chun,
Mipui chun sûm ngîr kawtkhâra ngîr an hmu pha chun, mipui po po chu an tho a, mâni puon in kawtkhâr chita chun mi tinin chibai an bûk hlak a.
Mosie chun

Chuleiin, tuhin ka ngên che, i mithmuah lunginsietna ka chang a ni chun, nang ka hriet che a, nanga mithmua lunginsietna chu a tâwp chena ka hmu theina dingin i lamhai chu mîn entir rawh: chun, hi hnam hi i mihai an ni hi ngaituo rawh,” a ti a.
Mosie chun a kuomah, “Ka kuomah i fe ve pei naw ding chun hitaka inthawk keini mi ṭhuoi tung ta naw rawh.

Kei le i mihai hin i lunginsietna kan hmu tah ti iengtin am inhriet a ta? Hnuoi chunga um mi dang po poa inthawk kei le i mihai ṭhea kan umna chu keini le i fe ve zingnaa chun a ni naw ding am a nih?” a ti a.
Mosie chun, “Ka ngên che, i ropuina chu mîn hmutir rawh,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Ka hmêl chu hmu thei naw ti nih, tukhawm ka hmêl hmu chu an hring ding a ni si naw a,” a ti a.
ka ropuinain a fe khêl lai che chun lungpui kak kârah sieng ka ti che a, ka kutin i hmai hlieng ka ti che;
chun, ka kut chu la hmang ka ta, ka hnungtieng chu hmûng i ta, ka hmai ruok chu hmu a ni ding a ni naw,” a ti a.
Zîngkâr inzo hieu la, zîngkâr chun Sinai tlângah hung la, tlâng sîpa ka kuoma chun nang ngei hung rawh.

Tukhawm nang leh an hung ding a ni naw a, tlâng chung po poa chun tukhawm hmu an ni bawk ding a ni naw a; chun, tlâng hmaa chun berâm ruolhai amanih, bâwng ruolhai amani khawm tla bawk naw raw hai se,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun a hmasahai ang tak chun lung phêk pahni chu a sak ta a; chun, zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a,

sâng tamtak chunga hmangainaa sip, khawhlona le bawsietna le suolna ngaidam hlak, thiemnawa ngaihai ruok chu iengti khawma inthla el ngailo, pahai rîtlona nauhai, nauhai nauhai nâwk le suon thumna le suon lina chen chunga thung hlaktu a nih,” tiin a puong ta a.
Mosie chu inhmâwtakin hnuoi tieng a lu a kûn a, chibai a bûk ta a.

“Tuhin nanga mithmuah lunginsietna ka hmu ta chun, Aw Lalpa, ka ngên che, Lalpa chu keini lai fe ve raw se; mi kâwmaw ni de hai sien khawm, kan khawhlona le suolna chu mi ngaidam la, i rochan dingin nangin mi la rawh,” a ti a.
“Vawisûn thu ka pêk che hi zâwm rawh. Ngai rawh, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai le Jebus mihai chu i hmaa inthawkin ka hnawt suok ding a nih.
I chungah fimkhur rawh, chuong naw chun i fêna tieng ram hluotuhai leh thuthlung siem rawi i ta, nangni laia châng ni rawi a tih.
Amiruokchu, an maichâmhai chu kei chim in ta, an milimhai chu vaw nawi vawng in ta, an pathiennu Asera lim khawm chu phûr thlûng in tih:
A ram hluotuhai le chun thuthlung siem hlau rawi i tih: an pathienhai hnawta an inzawr a, an pathienhai kuoma inthâwina an nei phain, mi pakhatin fiel a ti che a, an inthâwina chu fa rawi i tih.
An naunuhmeihai chu i naupasalhai inneitir i ta, an naunuhmeihai chun an pathienhai hnawta an inzawr phain, i naupasalhai chu an pathienhai leh inuiretir rawi an tih.
Sabengtungte hmasa tak chu berâmtein intlan i tih; în tlan naw chun a rîng her bawng i tih. I naupasal nau lutîr po po chu intlan i tih. Tukhawm ka hmaah kut ruokin a hung inlang ding a ni nawh.
Hnamhai chu i hmaah hnawt suok ka ta, i ramrihai chu ka suklien ding a ni si a; kum khat sunga ṭum thum,
“Ka inthâwina thisen chu chawl ṭhang bei leh în hlân ding a ni nawh. Fekân ruoiṭhe inthâwina chu zîngkâr chena dingin hla ding a ni bawk nawh.
Chun,
Chutaka chun Mosie chu
Aron le Israel mihai po poin Mosie chu an en a, a hmai vun a lo var pup el ti an hmu chun a kâwl hnaia fe chu an ṭi ta a.
Mosie ruok chun anni chu a ko a, Aron le mipui ṭhuoituhai po po chu a kuomah an hung kîr a, Mosie chun a lo biek tâwl a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun Israel mihai po po chu an hung hnai a, Sinai tlânga
Mosie chun anni a biek zo chun, hmai inkhumnain a hmai ân khum a.
Amiruokchu, Mosie chu
chun, Israel mihai chun Mosie hmai, Mosie hmai vun var chu an hmu ta a.
Mosie chun Israel mipui po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Hieng hi
In umna hmun po poa chun châwlni chun mei khawm in sêm dêr ding a ni nawh,” a ti a.
‘Nangni lai
sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le pâtzai inhmi kawp le kêl hmul,
berâmchal vun suksenhai, seal vunhai le shittim thing;
chun, meivar dingin hriek le innâlna hriek ding le, riminhnik râwmi dingin thil riminhnikhai leh;
zakawsîng le âwmbela phûm onik lunghai le lung danghai leh.
“Chun, nangni laia themthiem taphawt hung hai sienla,
Biekbûk, a puon in le ân khumna, a puonchepnahai le, a thingphêkhai, a bangruhai, a banhai le a kerkuokhai,
Thuthlung bâwm le a zâwnfunghai, zângaina ṭhungpha le inkhumna puonzâr,
dâwkân le a zâwnfunghai le a thuomhnawhai po po le entirna bei chu:
elvartu ding khâwnvar siena, a hmangruohai le a khâwnvarhai le a meivar ta dinga hriek leh;
riminhnik rawna maichâm a zâwnfunghai leh, innâlna hriek le riminhnik rawmi le kawtkhâr puonzâr biekbûk kawtkhâra mi ding;
le pumrawhmang thil inhlânna maichâm, a dârsen thuk leh, a zâwnfung le a hmangruo po po leh, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna leh;
a tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzâr, le chutaka a banhai, le a kerkuokhai leh, a tuolzâwl inhuonna kawta puonzâr leh;
biekbûka a kilna, a tuolzâwla a kilna le a hruihai leh;
Hmun Inthienga rawngbâwlna dinga thiemtaka khâwng silfênhai, thiempu sina rawngbâwl dinga Aron silfên inthienghai le a naupasalhai silfênhai le chun,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, Israel mi pungkhâwm po po chu Mosie kuoma inthawk an ṭin dar a.
Mi tin lungril phûrna nei le mi tin lungrila inhâwkna nei taphawt chu an hung a; intuokna puon in sina ding le, chutaka rawngbâwlna po poa ding le, silfên inthieng dinga hmang ding
Lungrila pêk nuomna nei po po, pasal le nuhmei khawm, an hung a; puon kilnahai,
Chun, mi tin sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le patzai inhmi dâm, kêl hmul dâm, berâmchal vun suksenhai le seal vun neitu chun a hung chawi a.
Mi tin dârsen le tangkaruoa thilpêk inhlân theitu chun
Nuhmei themthiemhai po chu an kutin pat an kher a; sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le, patzai inhmi an kherhai chu an hung chawi a.
Nuhmei themthiem phûrtakhai po po chun kêl hmul chu an kher a.
Ṭhuoituhai chun onik lung le lung dang zakawsîng le âwmbela phûm ding chu an hung chawi a;
meivar dingin le, innâlna hriek le riminhnik râwmihai hmang dingin riminhnikhai leh.
Israel mihai pasal tin le nuhmei tin an lungrila pêk nuomna neihai chun
ama chu varnaa le hrietthiemnaa le, kutthiem sin tinrêng thawtheina le hrietnaa chun Pathien Thlarauin suksip a nih;
kutthiem sinhai riruong dingin, rângkachak, tangkaruo le dârsena sinthaw dingin,
inbûk ding lung ât thiem dingin, thing kermawi thiem ding le kutthiem sin kawng tinrênga sin thaw dingin.
Dan hnama mi Ahisamak naupa Oholiab le ama chu mihai inchûktir theina a pêk ve ve a.

Anni chu kutthiem sin tinrêng thiemtuhai, riruongtuhai, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le patzai inhmi ṭhuimawi thiemhai le, puon khâwngtu sin kutthiemna le riruongna sin tinrêng thaw thiemnain a suksip tah a nih.
“Bezalel le Oholiab le mi themthiem tukhawm, Hmun Inthieng bâwlnaa sin po pohai thaw dân hre dinga an lungrila
Mosie chun Bezalel, Oholiab le mi themthiem

Anni chun Israel mihaiin Hmun Inthieng bâwlnaa hmang dinga nuomthua thilpêk an hung chawihai po po chu Mosie kuoma inthawkin an lâk a. Zîng tinin ama kuoma chun mâni nuomthua thilpêk chu an la hung chawi zing a.
Chun, mi themthiem Hmun Inthienga sinthawtuhai po po chu, mi tin chu an sinthawna senga inthawkin, an hung a,
Mosie kuoma chun, “

Chuongchun, Mosie chun, “Pasal khawmin, nuhmei khawmin Hmun Inthienga dinga thilpêk dang hrim pe ta naw raw hai se,” tiin thu a pêk a, chu thu chu riebûk po poa puong a ni ta a. Chuongchun, mipui chu an hung pêk khap an ni ta a:
Hmangruo an nei chu sin po poa hmang ding chun a huntâwk ta a, a tam taluo rau ta leiin.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sâwmhni pariet, puonzâr tin lientieng chu tawng li a ni a, puonzâr po po chu ân tie vawng a nih.
Chun, puonzâr panga chu a ṭhui zawm a, puonzâr panga dang chu a ṭhuizawm bawk a.
Puonzâr pakhat a thuo laia kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valbahai dumpâwlin a siem a, chuong ang bawk chun a thuo hninaa puonzâr puo tak tlânga chun a siem bawk a.
Puonzâr pakhata chun valba sâwmnga a siem a, a thuo hninaa puonzâr pakhat tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk a siem a; valbahai chu an inzawm seng bawk a.
Chun, rângkachak puonchepna sâwmnga a siem a, chuong puonchepnahai chun puonzârhai chu an cheptuo a: chuongchun, biekbûk chu pakhat a hung ni ta a.
Biekbûka puon in inkhumna ding chun kêl hmul puonzârhai a siem a, puonzâr chu sâwm le pakhat a siem a.
Puonzâr tin seitieng chu tawng sâwmthum, puonzâr tin lientieng chu tawng li a nih; puonzâr sâwm le pakhat chu an intie seng a.
Puonzâr panga chu a ṭhui zawm a, puonzâr paruk chu a ṭhui zawm bawk a.
Puonzâr hmasa a kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga a siem a, a thuo hninaa puonzâr kâwlhnung tak tlânga chun valba sâwmnga bawk a siem a.
Puon in chu pindan pakhat a ni theina dinga chep khâwmna dingin dârsen puonchepna sâwmnga a siem a.
Chu puon in inkhumna ding chu berâmchal vun suksenin le chu chung nâwka chun seal vunhaiin inkhumna a siem a.
Chun, biekbûk bang intunghai chu shittim thingin a siem a.
Thingphêk tin seitieng chu tawng sâwm, thingphêk tin lientieng chu tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
Thingphêk tin chun rek pahni, a dang le thun zawmna ding a nei seng a; biekbûk thingphêk po po chu chuong ang seng chun a siem vawng a.
Biekbûka thingphêkhai chu chuong ang chun a siem a, simsawngah thingphêk sâwmhni,

chun, thingphêk sâwmhni hnuoia chun tangkaruo kerkuok sâwmli, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah a rek pahni inṭhutna dingin kerkuok pahni pei; chun, thingphêk dang hnuoia khawm a rek pahni in ṭhutna ding kerkuok pahni pei bawk a siem a.
Chun, biekbûk sîr hnina, a hmartieng panga chun, thingphêk sâwmhni le,
an inṭhutna ding tangkaruo kerkuok sâwmli a siem a; thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni, thingphêk dang hnuoiah kerkuok pahni bawk.
Biekbûk châwrtieng thlangtieng panga chun thingphêk paruk a siem a.
Biekbûk châwrtieng kihaia dingin thingphêk pahni a siem a.
Chun, a hnuoitieng chun suktuok an ni a, a chungtieng ruok chun a sîpah, kuol pakhata chel khâwm an ni a, a kihai pahnia mi chu chuong ang ve ve chun a thaw a.
Chuongchun, thingphêk pariet an inṭhutna tangkaruo seng leh; kerkuok sâwmparuk, thingphêk pakhat hnuoiah kerkuok pahni peiin a um a.
Chun, shittim thing bangruhai a siem a, biekbûk sîr khata thingphêkhai dingin bangru panga,
biekbûk sîr khingtienga thingphêkhai dingin bangru panga bawk, biekbûk châwrtieng thlangtieng panga thingphêkhai dingin bangru panga.
A bangru lailung tak chu a thingphêkhai sûngah a tâwp taka inthawka khingtieng tâwp tak chena rawl thlengin a siem a.
Thingphêkhai chu rângkachakin ân luon khum a; chun, a bangruhai rawlna dingin rângkachak kuolhai a siem a, bangruhai chu rângkachakin ân luon khum bawk a.
Chun, puonzâr sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le a seninlâr le, patzai inhmi kawpin, cherubhai lim kutthiemtaka siemhaia cheiin a siem a.
Chu khaina ding chun shittim thing ban pali a siem a, rângkachakin ân luon khum a; an kuoikimhai chu rângkachak a ni a, an inṭhutna dingin tangkaraw kerkuok pali a sut bawk a.
Puon in kawtkhâra ding chun puonzâr, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, a seninlâr le puonzai inhmi kawp, a ṭhuia ṭhuimawia chei chu a siem a;
a ban panga le a kuoikimhai leh. An lubâwkhai le an tuom mawinahai chu rângkachak ân luon khum a, an inṭhutna panga ruok chu dârsen an nih.
Bezalel chun shittim thingin Thuthlung bâwm a siem a; a seitieng tawng hni le a chenve, a lientieng tawng khat le a chenve, ân sângtieng khawm tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
A sûng le a puo chu rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a, a vêlin rângkachakin a tlâng a kâwm a.
Rângkachak kuol pali a kehai palia dingin; sîr khatah kuol hni, a sîr dangah kuol hni bawk a siem a,
shittim thing zâwnfunghai a siem a, rângkachakin ân luon khum a.
Thuthlung bâwm chu zâwnna dingin, thuthlung bâwm sîrhaia kuolhaia chun zâwnfunghai chu a rawl a.
Rângkachak inthiengin Zângaina ṭhungpha a siem a; chu seitieng chu tawng hni le a chenve, a lientieng chu tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
Rângkachakin cherub pahni, a suta sut zawmin, zângaina ṭhungpha tâwp ve vea chun a siem a;
cherûb pakhat hmawr khing khatah cherub pakhat hmawr khing dangah; a hmawr ve veah cherubhai chu zângaina ṭhungpha le zawmkhatin a siem a.
Cherubhai chun an thlahai chu chungtieng an zâr a, an thlahai chun zângaina ṭhungpha chu a zâr hlie a, an hmai le an hmai chu innghattuokin, zângaina ṭhungpha tieng chun cherubhai hmai chu a ngha a.
Shittim thingin dawkân a siem a, a seitieng tawng hni, a lientieng tawng khat, ân sângtieng chu tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
Rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a, a vêlin rângkachakin a tlâng a kâwm a.
A vêlin a rei kutphabawkin a siem a, chu rei tlâng chu rângkachakin ân luon a.
Chu chu ta ding chun rângkachak kuol pali a siem a, chu kuolhai chu a ki palia a kehai palia chun ân bûk a.
Dawkân zâwnna ding zâwnfunghai rawlna dingin a kuolhai chu a rei hnaiah an um a.
Dawkân zâwnna ding chun shittim thing zâwnfunghai a siem a, rângkachakin ân luon khum a.
Chu dawkân chunga hmang ding chun bûrlebêlhai-thlenghai, riminhnik thlêngtêhai, no inkûmhai, notung seihai, dâwnmi thilinhlânhai bun suokna dingin rângkachak inthiengin a siem a.

Chun, rângkachak inthiengin sathâukhâwnvar siena a siem a. Sathâukhâwnvar siena a ṭhut le a ngul chu a suta suta siem a nih; chu chu le a kheihai, a mûmhai le a hmawr pârhai chu zawm khat vawng a nih.
A sîrhaia chun kau paruk a ṭo suok a, a sîr khata chun sathâukhâwnvar siena kau thum, sîr khing dangah sathâukhâwnvar siena kâu thum bawk;

kâu khata chun almond zîk pâr anga siem, a khei pathum, a mûm le a hmawr pârhai; kâu danga khawm almond zîk pâr anga siem khei pathum, a mûm le a hmawr pârhai leh Khâwnvar sienaa kâu paruk suokhai chu chuong ang seng chu a nih.
Khâwnvar siena ngulpuia chun almond zîkhai anga siem, khei pali, a mûmhai le a pârhai leh an um a.
A sîra kâu paruk ṭo suokhaia tuok khat pei hnuoia chun a mûm pakhat a um pei a,
an mûmhai le an kauhai chu ama le chun zawmkhat vawng an ni a, a pumpui chun rângkachak inthieng hlawm khata sut vawng an nih.
A khâwnvarhai pasari le a chaichehai, a vâmdawhai chu rângkachak inthiengin a siem a.
Khâwnvar siena le a hmangruo po po chu rângkachak inthieng talent khatin a siem a.
A chung le a sîrhai, a vêlin, a kihai leh rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a; a vêlin rângkachak rei a siem bawk a.
A zâwnna ding a zâwnfunghai rawlna dingin a sîr khing hnia a rei hnuoia chun rângkachak kuol pahni a siem a.
Shittim thing zâwnfunghai a siem a, rângkachakin ân luon khum a.
Chun, riminhnik siemtu siem dânin riminhnik râwmi le innâlna hriek inthieng a siem a.
A kil palia chun kihai a siem a, a kihai chu ama le zawmkhat an nih; dârsenin ân luon khum a.
Chun, maichâma bûrlebêlhai: bêlhai, meikhelnahai, châwtawlhai, thîrkuoihai le vutluohai, a bûrlebêlhai po po chu dârsenin a siem a.
Maichâm ding chun a chung khang hnuoiah dârsen inphan thuk maichâm chenve hang tlungin a siem bawk a.
Dârsen inphan thuk kil lia chun a zâwnfunghai rawlna dingin kuol pali ân bûk a.
Shittim thing zâwnfunghai a siem a, dârsenin ân luon khum a.
A zâwnna dingin maichâm sîrhaia a kuolhaia chun zâwnfunghai chu a rawl a; maichâm chu thingphêkin a kawrawngin a siem a.
A ban sâwmhni le an kerkuok sâwmhni dârsena siem leh; a banhaia kuoikimhai le a tuommawinahai ruok chu tangkaruo an nih.
Hmârtieng panga chun tawng za khat, ban sâwmhni, an kerkuokhai sâwmhni dârsena siem an nih; banhaia kuoikimhai le an tuommawinahai chu tangkaruo an nih.
Thlangtieng panga chun puonzâr tawng sâwmnga, banhai sâwmkhat, an kerkuokhai sâwmkhat a nih; banhaia kuoikimhai le a tuom mawinahai chu tangkaruo a nih.
A tuol tienga saktieng panga chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.
A kawt sîr khata a puonzârhai chu tawng sâwmpanga, ban pathum le a kerkuok pathum bawk leh.

A sîr khingtienga khawm chuong ang bawk chu a nih; a tuolzâwl inhuonna kawtkhâr hitieng pang le sawtieng pangah puonzârhai chu tawng sâwmpanga ve ve an nih; banhai pathum ve ve, kerkuokhai pathum ve ve leh.
Tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzârhai chu a vêlin puonzai inhmi kawp a ni vawng a.

A banhai inṭhutna kerkuokhai chu dârsen an nih, a kuoikimhai le a tuommawinahai ruok chu tangkaruo an nih; a hmawrbâwkhai tuomna chu tangkaruo an ni a, tuolzâwl inhuonna banhai po po chu tangkaruoa tuommawi vawng an nih.

A tuolzâwl kawtkhâr puonzâr chu dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le puonzaiinhmi kawp kutthiem taka ṭhuimawi a nih, a seitieng chu tawng sâwmhni, ân sângzie chu tawng nga, tuolzâwl puonzârhai le inep tâwk chie a nih.
Banhai chu pali, a kerkuokhai dârsena siem pali bawk a nih, a kuoikimhai chu tangkaruo, an hmawrbâwkhai inkhumna le an tuommawinahai chu tangkaruo an nih.
Biekbûk le tuolzâwl po poa hmang a kilna chu dârsen a nih.
Thiempu Aron naupa Ithamar kuta, Levi mihai rawngbâwlnaa hmang dinga Mosie thupêk ang peia an tiem angin, biekbûk, thuthlung biekbûka thil hmanghai belkhâwm chu hi hi a nih:
Juda hnama mi Hur naupa Uri naupasal Bezalel chun
Ama ṭhangpuitu ding chun Dan hnama mi Ahisamak naupa Oholiab, lung ker thiem le kutthiemtak, dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le puonzai inhmi kawpa ṭhuimawi thiem mi chu a um bawk a.
Hmun Inthieng sinthawnaa hmang rângkachak thilpêk, rângkachak hmang tahai po po chu Hmun Inthieng tangka bûk dân angin talent sâwmhni pakuo le shekel za sari le sâwmthum a nih.

Chu chu Intiemnaa tiemna laia ṭhang phâk, pasal kum sâwmhni le a chungtieng mi nuoi ruk sâng thum za nga sâwmnga, mi lukipa beka khat (chu chu Hmun Inthieng tangka bûk dân anga shekel chenve) pei ang a nih.
Tangkaruo talent za khat chu Hmun Inthienga kerkuokhai le puonzâr khaina kerkuokhai siemnaa hmang a nih; kerkuok za khatah talent za khat, kerkuok pakhatah talent khat pei.
Chun, shekel sâng khat za sari sâwmsari panga chu banhaia kuoikimhai siemnain a hmang a, an hmawrbâwkhai ân luon khum a, tuommawinahai a siem vawng bawk a.
Dârsen thilinhlânhai chu talent sâwmsari le shekel sâng hni za li a nih.
Chu chun biekbûk kawtkhâra kerkuokhai, dâr maichâm le dâr thuk le, maichâm hmangruo dang po po le,
tuolzâwl inhuonna, a vêl po poa kerkuokhai, le tuolzâwl inhuonna kawtkhâra kerkuokhai, biekbûk kilna po po, le tuolzâwl inhuonna a vêla kilna hmang po po chu a siem a.
Rângkachak chu phêk inphântakhaiin an sut a, a zaiin an ât a, kutthiemtak sinthaw, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawpa zep dingin.
Zakawsînga chun a liengko belhai a hmawrhai pahnia ama le ṭhui matin an siem a.
Zakaw chunga a khitna, kâwngchûn chu hmangruo thuhmun le khâwng dân thuhmuna thiemtaka khâwng, rângkachak, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, le seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawpa,
Onik lunghai chu an ât a, Israel naupasalhai hming ang peiin, hmingnamna ker anga rângkachak kerkuokhaia chun an phûm a.
killi inchen seng a ni a: âwmbel chu thlep thuoa siem a ni a, thlep thuo chun a seizie khâp khat, a lienzie khâp khat bawk a nih.
Chutaka chun lunghai chu tlar liin an inbûk a, sardion, topaz le karbankle lung chu tlar khatna a nih.
A tlar hnina chu emeral, sapphir le diamond lung;
a tlar thumna chu jasinth, agate le amethust lung,
a tlar lina chu birul, onik le jasper lunghai a ni a; rângkachak kerkuokhaia phûm an nih.
Lunghai chu sâwm le pahni, Israel naupasalhai hming ang peia an hming leh, hnam sâwmpahnia dingin lung tin chu a hming pei leh, hmingnamna anga siem a nih.
Âwmbel chunga chun rângkachak kerkuok pahni le rângkachak inthieng khaidiet, hruol anga inherthlawp an siem a.
Rângkachak kerkuok pahni le rângkachak kuol pahni bawk an siem a, a kuol pahni chu âwmbel tâwp ve vea chun an inbûk a.
Rângkachak khaidiethai pahni chu âwmbel hmawra kuol pahnia chun an inbûk a.
Khaidiet hmawr khingtieng pahni chu kerkuok pahnia chun an inbûk a, zakawsîng liengko bel hmatieng panga chun an khai a.
Rângkachak kuol pahni an siem a, âwmbel hmawr khing tieng sîr tâwp, sûngtieng pang zakawsîng deptienga chun an inbûk a.
Rângkachak kuol pahni an siem a, hmatiengah zakawsîng liengko bel hnuoitieng pang zakawsîng khitna thiemtaka khâwng chunga ân tuoknaa khan an inbûk a.
Zakawfuola a âwng chu indona phaw zakuo anga, ân ek nawna dinga a vêl tuoka tuom a nih.
Zakawfuol hmawr tlânga chun dumpâwl, a êm, seninlâr le patzai inhmi kawpin theibufai an siem a.
Rângkachak inthiengin telnênghai an siem bawk a, telnênghai chu theibufai inkâr, zakawfuol hmawr tlânga a vêl suoka theibufai inkâra chun an khai a:
Mosie thu a pêk angin, rawngbâwlna ding zakawfuol hmawr tlâng vêl suoka chun, telnêng theibufai, telnêng le theibufai ti peia khaiin.
puonzai inhmi lukâwm, puonzai inhmi lukhum, puonzai inhmi kawpin puonzai inhmi kekawr hnuoihai,
puonzai inhmi kawp ṭhatak le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr ṭhuimawia chei kâwngchûn,
Chuong ang chun intuokna puon in sin po po chu zo a ni ta a, chun Israel mihai chun
Biekbûk chu Mosie kuomah an hung lâk a, a puon in le a hmangruo po po, a kuoikimhai, a thingphêkhai, a bangruhai, a banhai le ân ṭhutnahai;
ân khumna berâmchal le kêl vun suksenhai, a chung inkhumna seal vunhai, a puonzâr khaihai:
Thuthlung bâwm le a zâwnfunghai, zângaina ṭhungpha leh;
Rângkachak inthienga siem sathâukhâwnvar siena le khâwnvarhai, a khâwnvarhai siena pei leh a hmangruo po po, meivar dinga hriek;
rângkachak maichâm, innâlna hriek, riminhnik râwmi le puon in kawtkhâr puonzâr ding;
dâr maichâm le dâr inphan thuk, zâwnfunghai le a bûrlebêl po pohai, dâr maihûn le ân ṭhutna;
tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzâr khaihai, a banhai, a kerkuokhai, tuolzâwl inhuonna kawtkhâra puonzâr, a hruihai, a kilnahai, biekbûk le intuokna puon ina dinga rawngbâwlna hmangruo po po;
Hmun Inthienga rawngbâwlna dinga silfên khâwng ṭhatakhai, thiempu Aron silfênhai le, thiempu sina rawngbâwlna dinga a naupasalhai silfênhai le chun an hung lâk a.
Mosie chun an sinthawhai po po chu a en a,
“Thla khatna ni khat niah intuokna puon in biekbûk chu în tung ngîr ding a nih.
Chun, a sûnga chun Thuthlung bâwm chu sieng i ta, Thuthlung bâwm chu puonzârin zâr hlieng i tih.
Dawkân chu hung la lût i ta, a chunga thil umhai chu indawt peiin sieng i tih: khâwnvar siena chu hung la lût i ta, chutaka chun khâwnvarhai chu inṭhut i tih.
Riminhnik râwna rângkachak maichâm chu Thuthlung bâwm hmaa chun inṭhut i ta, biekbûk kawtkhâr puonzâr chu zâr i tih.
Pumrawhmang inhlânna maichâm chu intuokna puon in biekbûk kawtkhâr hmaa chun inṭhut i tih.
Maihûn chu intuokna puon in le maichâm inkâra chun inṭhut i ta, a sûngah tui sieng i tih.
Tuolzâwl inhuonna chu a vêlin inngîr i ta, tuolzâwl inhuonna puonzârhai chu khai i tih.
Chun, innâlna hriek lâng i ta, biekbûk le a sûnga um po po chu nâl i ta, inhlân i ta, chutaka hmangruo po po le chun; chuongchun, hung inthieng tâng an tih.
Chun, pumrawhmang inhlânna maichâm chu nâl i ta, a hmagruo po po khawm nâl bawk i ta; chun, maichâm chu inhlân i ta, maichâm chu inthiengtak hung ni tâng a tih.
Maihûn le ân ṭhutna khawm nâl i ta, inhlân i tih.
Chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun hung ṭhuoi i ta tuiin insiltir i tih.
Aron chunga chun silfên inthienghai chu bel i ta, ama chu hriek nâl i ta, inhlân i tih, thiempu sina ka rawng a bâwl theina dingin.
A naupasalhai chu hung ṭhuoi i ta, anni chu zakawchunghai inhâktir i ta,
an pa i nâl ang bawk khan hriek nâl i tih, thiempu sina ka rawng an bâwl theina dingin. Hriek nâl an nina chu an ta dingin an thlahai chena thiempu an ni zingna ding nîng a tih,” tiin.
Chun, kum hninaa thla hmasa tak, chu thla ni khatnaa chun biekbûk chu inngîr a lo ni ta a.
Mosie chun biekbûk chu ân ngîr a, a kerkuokhai chu a sie a, chutaka chun a thingphêkhai chu ân ngîr a, a bangruhai chu a thun lût a, a banhai chu ân ngîr ta a.
A puon in chu biekbûk chunga chun a keiphar a, a chunga chun inkhumnain ân khum a,
Chun, thuthlung chu a lâk a, Thuthlung bâwm sûnga chun a sie ta a; Thuthlung bâwma chun a zâwnfunghai a rawl a; Thuthlung bâwm chunga chun zângaina ṭhungpha chu a sie a;
chun, Thuthlung bâwm chu biekbûk sûnga chun a hung lâk lût a; pindanna puonzârhai chu a khai a, Thuthlung bâwm chu a zarhlie a,
Puonzâr puo biekbûk hmartieng pangah intuokna puon ina chun dawkân a sie a,
Biekbûk simtieng pangah dawkân zawna chun sathâu khâwnvar siena chu a sie a,
Puonzâr hmaah, intuokna puon ina chun rângkachak maichâm chu a sie a,
chu chunga chun riminhnik rawmi chu a raw a,
Chun, biekbûk kawtkhâr puonzârhai chu a zâr a.
Intuokna puon in biekbûk kawtkhâra chun pumrawhmang thil inhlânna maichâm chu ân tung a, a chunga chun pumrawmhmang thilinhlânhai le fâkmi thilinhlânhai ân hlân a,
Chutaka chun Mosie le Aron le a naupasalhai chun an kuthai le an kehai an sâwp hlak a;
intuokna puon ina an lût pha le maichâm hnaia an hung pha an sâwp hlak;
Tuolzâwl inhuonna chu biekbûk le maichâm huol vêl vawngin ân ngîr a, tuolzâwl inhuonna kawtkhâr puonzârhai khawm a khai a. Chuongchun, Mosie chun sin chu a zo ta a.
Biekbûk chu
An inzin sûng po po chun, sûm chu biekbûk chunga inthawka lâk kânga a um phingleh Israel mihai chun hmatieng an pan pei a;
sûm chu lâk kânga a um naw ruok chun, lâk kânga a um ni hma po chun an fe suok ngai naw a.
An inzin sûng po chun, Israel sûnghai po po mithmuah,
Lalpa chun Mosie a ko a, intuokna puon ina inthawkin a biek a,
“Israel mihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Nangni laia tukhawmin thilinhlân
“A thilinhlân chu bâwng ruol laia mi, pumrawhmang thilinhlân a ni chun a chal, demkailo ân hlân ding a nih: ama chu
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta; chuongchun, a ta dingin intlanna siemna dingin pawmpêk ning a tih.
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu inhlip a ta, chan nawi a tih.
Chun, thiempu Aron naupasalhai chun maichâma chun mei sieng an ta; mei chunga chun thing sep khâwm an tih.
Aron naupasal thiempuhai chun sa tlin dâm, a lu dâm, a thâu dâm chu maichâma chun mei chunga thinga chun sie fel diem an ta;
a sûnghai le a kehai ruok chu tuiin sâwp an ta; thiempu chun
“A thilinhlân chu pumrawhmang thilinhlân dinga ran ruol laia mi, berâm amanih, kêl amanih a ni chun, a chal demkailo ân hlân ding a nih.
Maichâm sîr hmârtieng pangah
Chun, chan nawi a ta, a lu leh a thâu leh; thiempu chun maichâm chunga mei chunga thinga chun sie fel diem a ta;
a sûnghai le a kehai ruok chu tuiin sâwp a ta, a pumin thiempu chun inhlân a ta, maichâma chun a raw ding a nih;
Thiempu chun maichâma chun hung chawi a ta, a lu chu her bawng a ta, maichâma chun râwng a ta, a thisen chu maichâm panga chun infar kangtir a tih.
A awng chu a hmul le chun pei a ta, maichâm kâwl, saktieng panga vut siena hmuna chun pei a tih.
A thla le a thla inkârah thlêr a ta, a puma thlêr suok ruok chu ni lovin; chun, thiempu chun maichâmah, mei chunga thinga chun a raw ding a nih; chu chu
“Tukhawmin Fâkmi thilinhlân,
chun, Aron naupasal thiempuhai kuomah fepui a ta; chutaka beiphit indîtak vei khat, hriek le beraw po po le chun la suok a ta; chun, thiempu chun hrietzingna dingin maichâma chun râwng a ta; chu chu
Fâkmi thilinhlân la lâk mahlahai chu Aron le a naupasalhai ta ding nîng a tih; chu chu
“Fâkmi thilinhlân, a urnaa ur thilinhlân în hlân chun beiphit indîtak, hrieka hmet chawl ṭhanglo amanih, hrieka nâl chawl ṭhanglo beiphêk inphân amanih a ni ding a nih.
I thilinhlân chu thlênga ur, fâkmi thilinhlân a ni chun, chawl ṭhanglo hrieka hmet beiphit indîtak a ni ding a nih.
Khawi i ta, hriek chu bur khum i ta; chu chu fâkmi thilinhlân a nih.
I thilinhlân chu bêldara zêu, fâkmi thilinhlân a ni chun beiphit indîtak le hrieka siem a ni ding a nih.
Chuong thila siem fâkmi thilinhlân chu
Chun, thiempu chun fâkmi thilinhlâna inthawkin hrietzingna chanpuol chu la suok a ta, maichâma chun rawng a tih. Chu chu
Fâkmi thilinhlâna lâk mahlahai chu Aron le a naupasalhai chanpuol ding nîng a tih; chu chu
“Fâkmi thilinhlân hrim hrim
Rahmasa thilinhlân ding chu
I fâkmi thilinhlân po po chu machi saw vawng i ta, i fâkmi thilinhlâna chun i Pathien thuthlung machi chu i theinghil ding a ni nawh; i thilinhlân po poa chun machi în hlân sa ding a nih.
“Rahmasatak fâkmi thilinhlân
Chun, hriek nâl i ta, a chungah beraw i sie ding a nih; chu chu fâkmi thilinhlân a nih.
Thiempu chun, bu sukphita hrietzingna chanpuol le hriek a ṭhen le beraw po po le chun a râw ding a nih; chu chu
A thilinhlân lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula chun that a ta; chun, Aron naupasal thiempuhai chun maichâm chu thisen chun an the huol ding a nih.
Inremna thilinhlân, inthâwinaa mi chu,
a kal pahni le a tuomtu thâu a diemnêma mi le a thin tuomtu duorda, a kalhai pum chun phawr a ta, ân hlân ding a nih.
Chun, Aron naupasalhai chun maichâmah meia thing um chunga pumrawhmang thilinhlân chunga chun râwng an ta; chu chu
“Inremna thilinhlân inthâwinaa
A thilinhlâna berâmte ân hlân chun
a thilinhlân lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta, intuokna puon in tuola chun that a ta; Aron naupasalhai chun maichâm chu thisen chun an the huol ding a nih.
Chuongchun, inremna thilinhlân, inthâwinaa mi,
a kal pahni le a diemnêma mi le a thin tuomtu duorda, a kalhai puma phawrin ân hlân ding a nih.
Thiempu chun chu chu
“A thilinhlân chu kêl a ni chun
a lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta, intuokna puon in tuola chun a that ding a nih; chun, Aron naupasalhai chun maichâm chu thisen chun an the huol ding a nih.
Chuongchun, chutaka a thilinhlâna mi chu,
a kal pahnihai le a tuomtu thâu a diemnêma mi le a thin tuomtu duorda, a kalhai pum chun phawr a ta, ân hlân ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun chuonghai chu, riminhnik dingin, mei hmanga thilinhlânin maichâma chun a raw ding a nih. A thâu po po chu
Thâu amanih, thisen amanih in fâk naw ding a nih ti hi, in thlahai chena khawm in umna taphawta chun kumkhaw thuruot ngîrzing nîng a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Israel mihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘
a suksuoltu chu hriek nâla um thiempu a ni a, mipuihai chungah thiemnaw inchangna ân tlungtir chun, a thil suksuol tah suol inthâwina ding chun,
Bâwng chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah
Hriek nâla um thiempu chun bâwng thisen ieng zât amani chu lâng a ta, intuokna puon ina chun hung chawi a ta;
thiempu chun thisena chun a kutpâr inchieng a ta, hmun inthieng puonzâr hmaa chun,
Chun, thiempu chun a ṭhen chu
Chun, suol inthâwina bâwngchal thâu po po chu la vawng a ta, a sûng thâu le a rîlbâwtu po po leh,
a kal pahnihai le a tuomtu duorda a diemnêma mi le a kalhai pumin a thin tuomtu duorda le chun,
inremna thilinhlânna bâwngchala mi angin phawr vawng a ta, thiempu chun pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâma chun a râw ding a nih.
Chun, bâwngchal vun le, a sa po po, a lu, a kêhai, a sûnghai le a êk leh;
bâwngchal pumpui el chu, riebûk puotieng hmun faiah vut bunthlâkna hmuna chun hung lâng a ta, thing chungah meiin a râw ding a nih; vuthai bunthlâkna hmun ngeia chun râw a ni ding a nih.
an thil suksuol chu hriet suok a ni chun, mipuiin suol inthâwina dingin bâwng tuoi inhlân an ta; intuokna puon in tuola chun an hung kei ding a nih.
Chun, pungkhâwmhai laia upahai chun
Chun, hriek nâla um thiempu chun intuokna puon ina chun bâwng thisen aṭhen chu hung chawi a ta;
thiempu chun thisena chun a kutpâr inchieng a ta, puonzâr bulah
Chun, thisen aṭhen chu intuokna puon inah
A thâu po po chu la vawng a ta, maichâma chun a râw ding a nih.
Chuong ang chun bâwng chu thâwng a ta; suol inthâwina bâwng a thaw ang charin hi khawm hi a thaw ding a nih; chun, thiempu chun intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam ni tâng an tih.
Chun, bâwng chu khawhnâwm tieng fepui a ta, bâwng hmasa a râw ang khan a râw ding a nih; chu chu mipuihai ta dinga suol inthâwina a nih.
“Rorêltuin thil a suksuol a,
a thilsuol thaw chu inhriettir a ni chun a thilinhlânah kêlchal, demkailo hung kei a ta;
kêl lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta,

Chun, thiempu chun suol inthâwina thisen chu a kutpârin tlâwmte lâng a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm kihaia chun nâl a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm bula chun a thisen la um po chu a bunthlâk ding a nih.
A thâu po po chu intlanna thilinhlân inthâwina thâu a râw angin maichâma chun a râw ding a nih; chun, a suol chungchâng thua chun thiempu chun intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam nîng a tih.
“Vântlâng laia mi tukhawmin
thil a suksuol chu inhriettir a ni chun a thilinhlânah kêl, a pui demkailo, a thil suksuol tah suol inthâwina dingin a hung kei ding a nih.
Suol inthâwina ding lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna hmuna chun suol inthâwina chu a that ding a nih.
Thiempu chun thisen chu a kutpârin tlâwmte lâng a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlân maichâm kihaia chun nâl a tih; a thisen la um po chu maichâm bula chun a bunthlâk ding a nih.
Chun, a thâu po po chu intlanna thilinhlân thâu an lâk angin la vawng a ta; chun, thiempu chun
“Suol inthâwina dinga a thilinhlâna berâmte a hung chawi chun, a la demkailo a hung chawi ding a nih.
Suol inthâwina lu chunga chun a kut innghat a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlân an thatna hmuna chun suol inthâwina dingin a that ding a nih.
Thiempu chun suol inthâwina thisen chu a kutpârin tlâwmte lâng a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm kiahai chun nâl a ta, a thisen la um po chu maichâm bula chun bunthlâng a tih.
A thâu po po chu, berâmte thâu intlanna thilinhlân inthâwinaa mi lâk angin la vawng a ta; chun, thiempu chun
“Tukhawm a thil hmua manih, a thil hrieta manih hretu a ni a, inkhâmtirtu râwl a hriet khawma hril nuom lotu chun, a hril nuom nawna suola a rîtlona maw chu phur a tih.
Tukhawma thil thiengnaw hrim hrim, ramsa thiengnaw ruong amanih, invâka invâk chi ran inthiengnaw ruong amanih hre lo khawmin lo themin hung pawrche ta sienla, thiemnaw chang a tih.
Mihriem inthiengnawna ieng ang khawm, a thiengnawna hre lova a them pal khawmin, a hriet suok pha chun thiemnaw chang a tih.

Tukhawma thil ṭha naw amanih, thil ṭha amanih thaw dinga, ieng dâwn loa ṭawng ân khâm zung zung chun, a hriet suok huna chun, ân khâm zung zungna ṭawngbau a ieng ienga khawm chun thiemnaw chang a tih.
Hieng thil pakhata khawm hin thiemnaw a chang pha chun a suolna chu inpuong a ta;
a thil suol thaw ta leia bawsiet inthâwina dingin, ran ruol laia mi berâmte amanih, kêl amanih suol inthâwinaa hmang dingin
“A neiin berâmte chu a tlin naw ruok chun,
Thiempu kuoma chun hung chawi a ta; ama chun suol inthâwina ding chu inhlân hmasâng a ta, phel lovin a lu chu a rîngah her bawng a ta;
suol inthâwina thisen chu maichâm panga chun tlâwmte thêng a ta; thisen la um po chu maichâm bula chun infar kangtir ding a nih; chu chu suol inthâwina a nih.
A pakhat nâwk chu dân angin pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin inhlân a ta, thiempu chun a thil suksuol ta chungchânga chun intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam nîng a tih.

Amiruokchu, a neiin vaṭhu pahni amanih, pârva te pahni amani khawm a tlin naw chun, a suol mana dingin a thilinhlânah suol inthâwina beiphit indîtak epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat hung chawi a ta; hriek a nâl ding a ni naw a, a chungah berâw khawm a sie ding a ni nawh, suol inthâwina a ni leiin.
Thiempu kuoma chun hung chawi a ta, thiempu chun hrietzingna puola dingin a vei khat lâng a ta, maichâm chungah

Chun, chuong thilhai a ieng ieng khawm a lo suksuol ta chungchângah intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam nîng a tih; a la um po chu fâkmi thilinhlân ang bawkin thiempu chanpuol ding nîng a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Tukhawmin thil a suksuol a,

Thil inthieng chunga a lo sukdik nawna chu thung a ta, a hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat bel a ta, thiempu chu a pêk ding a nih; chun, thiempu chun bawsiet inthâwina berâmchal chun intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam nîng a tih.
“Nangni laia tukhawmin

Berâm ruol laia mi berâmchal demkailo amanih,a tlukpui amanih, bawsiet inthâwina ding chun thiempu kuomah a hung kei ding a nih; chun, thiempu chun, hre lova a thaw pal chungchânga chun intlanna siempêk a ta, ngaidam nîng a tih.
Chu chu bawsiet inthâwina a nih,
“Tukhawma thil suksuolin,
annawleh, thil inhmang hmuin, chu thua chun khêl hrilin ṭawng inkhâm ta sienla, hieng thil po po a ieng ieng khawm hi a suksuol a,
a thil suksuol leia thiemnaw a chang chun, a înrûk dâm, hlêma a thil lâk dâm, a kuoma sum inkawltira um dâm, thil inhmang a hmu dâm,

khêla ṭawng a înkhâmna thil ieng khawm chu a thung nâwk ding a nih; a kim charin thung nâwk vawng a ta, a hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat chu a chuongin bel a tih; bâwsiet inthâwina ân hlân ni chun a neitu chu a pêk nâwk ding a nih.
A bawsiet inthâwina dingin, berâm ruol laia mi, i ngaia bawsiet inthâwina dinga âwmtâwk, berâmchal demkailo
chun, thiempu chun

“Aron le a naupasalhai chu thu pe rawh. Hi hi pumrawhmang thilinhlân dân ding chu a nih. Pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu maichâm a chunga a râwnaa chun zânkhawvârin a zingkâr chen um a ta; chun, maichâm mei chu a hring zing ding a nih.

Thiempu chun a puonzai inhmi silfên inbel a ta, a taksa inkhumna dingin a puonzai inhmi kekawr chu bun a ta; chun, maichâma pumrawhmang thilinhlân kâng vâmhai chu lâng a ta, maichâm sîra chun a sie ding a nih.
Chun, a silfên chu hlîp a ta, silfên dang inbel a ta, a vâmhai chu khawhnâwm tieng hmun faiah a fepui ding a nih.

Maichâm chunga mei chu sukhring zing nîng a ta, a thi ding a ni nawh; chun, thiempu chun tûk tinin thing chu tîng a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu sie fel a ta, chutaka chun inremna thilinhlân thâuhai chu a raw ding a nih.
Maichâma chun mei chu hring zing a ta, a thi ding a ni nawh.
“Chun, hi hi fâkmi thilinhlân dân chu a nih: Aron naupasalhai chun maichâm bulah
Ama chun fâkmi thilinhlâna mi beiphit inditak vei khat le, chu fâkmi thilinhlân chunga hriek le berâw po po la suok a ta,
Chun, lâk mahla chu Aron le a naupasalhai chun an fâk ding a nih; chu chu hmun inthienga chun chawl ṭhang lovin fâng an ta; intuokna puon in tuolah an fâk ding a nih.
Chawl ṭhanga em ding a ni nawh. Mei hmanga ka thilinhlân an chanvo dinga ka thilpêk a nih; chu chu suol inthâwina le bawsiet inthâwina ang bawkin thil inthiengtak a nih.
Aron thla pasal po pohai chun an fâk ding a nih. Chu chu
Chun,
“Hriek nâla an um nia Aron le a naupasalhaiin
A zêuna thlêngdârah hriek pawla siem ding a nih. Ân chie pawl pha chun hung la lût i ta, a hlek te tein fâkmi thilinhlân chu
A naupasalhai laia mi a hnung thuoltu dinga hriek nâla um thiempu chun, kumkhaw dân dinga pêk a ni angin
Thiempuin fâkmi thilinhlân ân hlân taphawt chu râwhmang vawng ding a na: fâk dêr lo ding a nih,” tiin.
“Aron le a naupasalhai kuoma chun hril la: Hi hi suol inthâwina dân ding chu a nih. Pumrawhmang thilinhlân thatna hmuna chun suol inthâwina khawm chu
Suol inthâwina inhlântu thiempu chun fâng a ta; intuokna puon in tuolah, hmun inthiengah a fâk ding a nih.
Thil iengkhawm chu sa tâwk taphawt chu thil inthieng sie hran nîng a ta; chun, a thisen chu ieng puona khawm the kai a ni chun, a kaina taphawt chu hmun inthienga chun i sâwp ding a nih.
A suongna pil bêl chu sukkawi ding a na; dâr bêla suong a ni ruok chun nâwt faia intlêu fai ding a nih.
Thiempu sûngkuoa pasal taphawt chun chu chu an fâk ding a nih. Chu chu ân thieng tak a nih.
Suol inthâwina, a thisen, hmun inthienga intlanna siemna dinga intuokna puon ina hung lâk ruok chu fâk ding a ni naw a; râw el ding a nih.
“Hi hi bawsietna inthâwina dân ding chu a nih: Thil inthieng tak a nih.
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân an thatna hmuna chun bawsiet inthâwina khawm chu an that ding a nih; chun, a thisen chun maichâm chu an the vêl ding a nih.
A thâu po po chu inhlân an ta; a mei thâu tak dâm, a sûng thâu dâm,
a kalhai pahni le a tuomtu thâu, a diemnêma mi le a thin tuomtu duorda, a kalhai pum chun phawr a ta;
thiempu chun
Thiempu sungkuoa pasal taphawt chun chu chu fâng an ta; hmun inthienga fâk ding a nih; chu chu thil inthieng tak a nih.
Bawsiet inthâwina chu suol inthâwina ang bawk a na, dân angkhat a nih; chutaka intlanna siemtu thiempu chun, chu chu a nei ding a nih.
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlânpêktu thiempu ngei chun pumrawhmang thilinhlâna an înhlân vun chu a chang vawng ding a nih.
Chun, a urnaa ur fâkmi thilinhlân taphawthai, a zêunaa zêu le thlênga zêu po pohai chu ân hlântu thiempu chanpuol ding a nih.
Fâkmi thilinhlân po po chu hrieka hmet khawm, a ṭâwl khawm a dang ang bawkin Aron naupasalhaiin an insem tlâng ding a nih.
“Hi hi miin

Lâwmthu hrilna dinga ân hlân chun, lâwmthu hril inthâwinaa chun hrieka hmet chawl ṭhanglo bei le, hrieka nâl chawl ṭhanglo beiphêk inphânhai le, hrieka hmet beiphit inditak inchie zawp ân hlân sa ding a nih.
Lâwmthu hrilna dinga inremna thilinhlâna inthâwina ding chun chawl ṭhang bei ân hlân sa ding a nih.
Chutaka mi chu thilinhlân tina mi
Lâwmthu hrilna dinga inremna thilinhlân inthâwina sa chu, chu thilinhlân ân hlân ni ngei chun fâk zo ding a nih; zîngkâr chen iengkhawm a khêk ding a ni nawh.
Amiruokchu, a thilinhlân inthâwina chu thutiem amanih, mâni nuomthua thilinhlân amanih a ni chun, ân thâwina ân hlân ni ngei chun fâk ding a nih; fâk mahla chu a zîng tûka fâk ding a nih;
amiruokchu, inthâwina sa a ni thum ni chena la um ta rawp chu râw el ding a nih.

A inremna thilinhlân inthâwina sa chu ni thum ni chena an fâk chun pawmpêk ni naw ni a, ân hlântu khawm chu inhlâna ngai ni naw bawk a tih; thil tirdakum nîng a ta, tukhawm a fa taphawt chun an khawhlona maw chu phur an tih.
“Sa, thil inthiengnaw hrim hrim le intâwk chu fâk ding a ni naw a, râw el ding a nih. Sa chu ân thienghai po chun fa thei an ta,
inthienglo puma
Tukhawma thil inthiengnaw hrim hrim, mi inthiengnaw amanih, ran inthiengnaw amanih, thil tirdakum pawrche hrim hrim a tâwk a, inremna thilinhlân inthâwina sa,
“Israel mihai chu hril la: Sebâwng amanih, berâm amanih, kêl amani thâu chu in fâk ding a ni nawh.
Mânia thi thâu le sa ise thâu chu thil dang ienga khawm hmang thei nîng a ta, fâk ruok chu in fâk dêr ding a ni nawh.
Tukhawm
In umna taphawta chun thisen hrim hrim, vate amanih, ramsa amanih thisen chu in fâk ding a ni nawh.
Tukhawm ni sienla, thisen fa hrim hrim chu, a chipuihai laia inthawkin tuithlârin a um ding a nih,” tiin.
“Israel mipuihai kuoma chun hril la:
ama kuthai ngeiin mei hmanga thil inhlânhai chu
Thiempu chun a thâu chu maichâmah rawng a ta; a âwm ruok chu Aron le a naupasalhai chanpuol ding a nih.
A mal changtieng chu, i inremna thilinhlânhai inthâwinaa inthawka i thilinhlân dingin thiempu kuoma chun i pêk ding a nih;
Aron naupasalhai laia mi, inremna thilinhlânhaia thisen le thâu inhlântu chun, a mal changtieng chu ama chanpuol dingin a nei ding a nih.

A âwm an ithên le a mal an inhlân hlak chu, Israel mihai an inremna thilinhlân inthâwinahaia inthawkin ka lâkpêk a, Israel mihai kumkhaw thaw dân dingah thiempu Aron le a naupasalhai ka pêk tah a nih.
Hi hi a nih, Aron le a naupasalhai chanpuol dinga,
anni chu hriek nâla an um niin, Israel mipuihaiin hi thil hi pe dingin
Hi hi, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm, fâkmi thilinhlân dâm, suol thâwina thilinhlân dâm, bawsiet inthâwina thilinhlân dâm, inhlân inthiengna thilinhlân dâm, inremna thilinhlânhai dâm dinga,
Sinai thlalêrah, an thilinhlânhai chu, Israel mipuihai chun
“Aron chu a naupasalhai leh ṭhuoi la, silfênhai, hriek nâlmi dâm, suol inthâwina ding bâwngchal dâm, berâmchal pahni, chawl ṭhanglo bei bâwm khat le chun chawi bawk la;
chun, mi po po chu intuokna puon in tuollai chun inumkhâwmtir rawh,” tiin.
Mosie chun
Mosie chun a hung khâwmhai kuoma chun, “Hi hi a nih,
Mosie chun Aron le a naupasalhai chu a hung ṭhuoi a, ân siltir a.
Chuongchun, zakuo chung ân hâktir a, kâwng khitna chun a khit a, zakawfuol khawm chu ân hâktir a, zakawsîng ân hâktir bawk a, zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng chun a khitde a.
Chun, âwmbel chu a bel a; âwmbela chun Urim le Thummim a sie a.
Lukâwmm khawm ân kâwmtir a; lukâwm hmatieng chun rângkachak phêk suktuma um inchikna inthieng chu a bel a,
Chun, Mosie chun hriek nâlmi chu a lâk a, biekbûk le a sûnga thil umhai po po chu a nâl a, a sukthieng tâwl a.
Chu hriek chun maichâm chu vawi sari a the a; maichâm le a hmangruo po pohai, maihûn le a ṭhuthai dâm, sukthiengna dingin hriek a nâl a.
A sukthiengna dingin hriek nâlmi chu Aron lu chunga chun a bur a, a nâl ta a.
Chun, Mosie chun Aron naupasalhai chu a hung ṭhuoi a, zakuo ân hâktir a, kâwng khitna chun anni chu a khit a, lukhum ân khumtir a,
Chun, suol inthâwina ding bâwngchal chu a hung kei a, Aron le a naupasalhai chun, suol inthâwina ding bâwngchal lu chunga chun an kut an innghat a.

Mosie chun a that a; thisen chu a lâk a, intlanna siemna dingin, maichâm kihaia chun a kutpârin a vêlin a nâl a, maichâm chu ân hlân thieng a, maichâm bula chun thisen chu a bunthlâk a, a sukthieng ta a.
A rîlbâwtu po po dâm, a thin tuomtu duorda dâm, a kal pahni le a thâu dâm chu a lâk a, maichâma chun Mosie chun a râw ta a.
Bâwngchal chu a vun leh a sa leh, a êk leh riebûk puoah a raw a,
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân berâmchal chu a hung inhlân a, Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kut an innghat a.
Mosie chun a that a, maichâm chu thisen chun a the huol a.
Berâmchal chu a chan a, a lu le a sa tlinhai le a thâuhai chu a raw a.
A sûng le a kehai chu a sâwp a; berâmchal chu maichâmah a pum chun a râw vawng ta a; chu chu riminhnik dinga pumrawhmang thilinhlân,
Chun, berâmchal dang, hlânthiengna berâmchal chu a hang inhlân nâwk a; Aron le a naupasalhai chun berâmchal lu chunga chun an kut an innghat a.
Mosie chun a that a, a thisen chu a lâk a, Aron nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, a kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, a ke changtieng kepuia dâm chun a nâl a.

Chun,Mosie chun Aron naupasalhai chu a ṭhuoi a, thisen chu an nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, an kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, an ke changtieng kepuia dâm chun a nâl a; chun, maichâm chu thisen chun a the huol a.
A thâu dâm, a mei thâu tak dâm, a rîlbâwtu po po dâm chu, a thin tuomtu duorda le a kal pahni le a thâu dâm leh, a mal changtieng a lâk a.
A rêng chun Aron le a naupasalhai kuta chun a sie a;
Chun, Mosie chun an kuta inthawk chun a lâk a, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chungah maichâma chun a raw a; chu chu riminhnik dinga suktumna thilinhlân,
Chun, Mosie chun a ir chu a lâk a,

Mosie chun hriek nâlmia inthawk le, maichâma thisena mi chu a lâk a, chu chun Aron le a silfênhai a the a, a naupasalhai le an silfênhai khawm; Aron le a silfênhai chu a hlân thieng a, a naupasalhai le an silfênhai khawm.

Mosie chun Aron le a naupasalhai kuoma chun, “Intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah sa kha suong unla, ‘Aron le a naupasalhai chun fa rawhai se,’ tia thu pêka ka um angin inhlân thiengna leikhâwra bei le chun chutaka chun fa ro.
Chun, sa le bei a la chuong chu meiah in râw ding a nih.
In inhlân thieng nihai a kim hmakhat chun, ni sari sûng chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra inthawk chun suok naw tawp ro, hi inhlân thiengna hin ni sari sûng a aw ding a ni si a.
Tuta thaw ang hin intlanna siempêk ding cheuin
Intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula chun ni sari, sûn le zân um zing in ta, in thi nawna dingin
Chuongchun,
A ni riet ni chun Mosie chun Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel upahai chu a ko a;
Aron kuoma chun, “Suol inthâwina dingin bâwngte a chal, le pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin berâmchal demkailo ve ve kei la,
Chun, Israel mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin bâwngte le berâmte kum khat mi ve ve demkailo ṭhieu,
le bâwngchal le berâmchal
Chun, Mosiein thu a pêk ang chun intuokna puon in tuola chun an hung kei a; chun, mi po po chun an va hnai a,
Mosie chun, “Hi hi a nih, in thaw dinga

Chun, Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “Maichâm kha hung hnai la, i suol inthâwina dâm, i pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm inhlân la; nangma ta ding le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem rawh; chun, mipuihai thilinhlân chu inhlân la, intlanna siempêk rawh,
Chun, Aron chun maichâm chu a va hnai a, ama puola suol inthâwina bâwgte chu a that a.
Aron naupasalhai chun thisen chu a kuoma chun an inhlân a, thisena chun a kutpâr chu ân chie a, maichâm kihaia chun a nâl a; thisen chu maichâm bula chun a bunthlâk a;
suol inthâwina thâu dâm, a kal dâm, a thin tuomtu duorda dâm chu maichâm chunga chun a raw a,
A sa le a vun chu riebûk puoah a raw a.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu a that a, Aron naupasalhai chun thisen chu ama an pêk a, ama chun maichâm chu a the huol a.
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân sa tlin chu a tum tumin a lu leh an pêk a, ama chun maichâma chun a lo raw a.
A sûnghai le a kehai chu a sâwp a, maichâm chunga chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân leh a raw a.
Chun, mipuihai thilinhlân chu ân hlân a; mipuihai ta dinga suol inthâwina kêl chu a kei a, a that a, a hmaa mi ang bawk khan suol inthâwina ding chun ân hlân a.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu ân hlân a, a dân ang peiin ân hlân a nih.
Chun, fâkmi thilinhlân chu ân hlân a, chutaka mi chu a vei khatin a lâk a, zingkâr pumrawhmang thilinhlân ti naw khawm chu maichâma chun a râw bawk a.
Bâwngchal thâu le berâmchal thâu dam, a mei thâu tak dâm, a rîlbâwtu dâm, a kal dâm, a thin tuomtu duorda dâm chu an pêk bawk a.
A thâu chu a ir chunga chun an sie a; ama chun a thâu chu maichâma chun a lo raw a.
A ir le a mal changtieng ruok chu Aron chun
Chun, Aron chun mipui tieng a bân a phar a, mal a sâwm tâwl a; suol inthâwina le pumrawhmang thilinhlân le inremna thilinhlân ân hlân zo chun a hung ṭum a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu intuokna puon ina chun an va lût a; an hung suok nâwk a, mipuihai chu mal an sâwm a; chun,
Aron naupasalhai Nadab le Abihu chun an mei lâkna chu an lâk ve ve a, chutaka chun meiling chu an sie a, riminhnik chu an phul a,
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “Hi hi a nih
Chun, Mosie chun Aron pami Uzziel naupa Misael le Elzaphan chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Hung hnai unla, in unauhai hi hmun inthienga inthawk hin riebûk puoah zâwn dawk ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an hung hnai a, zakuo hâk pumin riebûk puoa chun, Mosie hril angin an zâwn dawk a.

Mosie chun Aron kuoma le a naupasalhai Eleazar le Ithamar kuoma chun, “A sûnnain in sam inthla naw unla, in puonhai keithlêr bawk naw ro, chuong naw chun thi rawi in ta, mi po po chungah lunginsen rawi a tih; in unauhai Israel sûngkuo pumpuiin
Chun, intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun in suok ding a ni nawh, chuong naw chun thîng in tih;
“Nang amanih, i naupasalhai amani khawmin, intuokna puon in sûnga in fe laiin uoin le zu hrim hrim dâwn naw ro, chuong naw chun thîng in tih; hi hi in thlahai chena kumkhaw dân ding nîng a tih.
Chu chu ân thieng le ân thieng naw le, a thieng le a thieng naw in thlier theina ding le,

A ir thêna thên le a mal dawmkânga inhlân ruok chu hmun faiah in fâk ding a nih; nang le i naupasalhai le i naunuhmeihai leh; Israel mipuihai inremna thilinhlân inthâwinaa i chanpuol le i naupasalhai chanpuola ruot a ni si a.
Mosie chun suol inthâwina kêl chu nguntakin a zawng a; chun, ngai ta, an lo râw zo dêr tah a na; chuongchun, Aron naupasal la dam Eleazar le Ithamar chunga chun a lunginsen a,
“Iengdinga suol inthâwina chu hmun inthienga in fâk naw am a na? Hi hi thil inthieng tak, mipui rîtlona in phur theina dinga a pêk cheu,
Ngai ta u, a thisen chu hmun inthienga chun in lâk lût lêm; thu ka pêk ang khan hmun inthienga chun in fâk ngei ding a nih in sawnnaw,” tiin.
Chun, Aron chun Mosie kuomah, “Ngai ta, vawisûn hin
Mosiein chu chu a hriet chun a lungawi ta a.
Sa laia a tin inkâk a, a irsuok sawi chi taphawt chu fa thei in tih.
Amiruokchu, irsuok sawi chi le tin inkâk laia miah hienghai hi chu in fâk ding a ni nawh: sanghâwngsei, irsuok chu a sawi a, a ke tin ân kâk naw leiin in ta dingin a thieng naw a nih.
Râwl mazupui, irsuok a sawi dea chu, a tin ân kâk naw leiin in ta dingin thieng naw a nih.
Mazupui, irsuok a sawia chu a tin ân kâk naw leiin in ta dingin a thieng naw a nih.
Vawk, a tin chu ân kâk a, irsuok a sawi naw leiin in ta dingin a thiengnaw a nih.
An sa in fâk ding a ni naw a, an ruong khawm in tâwk ding a ni nawh, in ta dingin an inthieng naw a nih.
“Tuia chêng po po lai hienghai hi fa thei in tih: Tuipuia manih, vadunga manih, tuia chêng pângpar le phuhlip nei taphawt chu fa thei in tih.
Tuia chênghai po po le, tuia thilhring um po po laiah, tuipuia mi amanih, vadunga mi amanih pângpar le phuhlip nei naw taphawt chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum an nih.
In ta dingin thil tirdakum nîng an ta, an sa in fâk ding a ni naw a, an ruonghai khawm chu thil tirdakumah in nei ding a nih.
Tuia mi pângpar le phuhlip nei naw taphawt chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum an nih.
“Vatehai laia mi chu hienghai hi thil tirdakuma in nei ding chu an nih: fâk lo ding an na, thil tirdakum an nih, mupui dâm, musie dâm, muârla dâm,
mute dâm, muvânlai chi hrim hrim dâm;
vaâk tieng chi hrim hrim dâm,
ostrik dâm, vabak dâm, tuipui pelêu dâm, mu chi hrim hrim dâm,
simbu dâm, kaikuongrâl dâm, chingpirinu dâm,
tuivatâwk dâm, tuivalawng dâm, mulukawl dâm,
tuivaârngo dâm, awinu chi hrim hrim, vakhawhri dâm le bâk dâm khawm.
“Thla nei ke palia lâwn chi hrim hrim chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum nîng an ta.
Amiruokchu, thla nei, ke palia lâwn chi khawm hnuoi chunga inchâwmna dinga an kepâr chung tienga êlpui nei po po fa thei in ta;
chuonghai laia chun, khâuṭhikṭhi chi hrim hrim dâm, ṭhângkhâu chi hrim hrim dâm, khuongbai chi hrim hrim dâm fa thei in tih.
Amiruokchu, thla nei, ke pali nei, a lâwna lâwn chi po po chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum ni vawng an tih.
“Chun, hieng lei hin inthiengnaw hung kai thei in tih; mi tukhawm saruong tâwk taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng an ta;
tukhawm hieng ruonghai latuhai chun an puonhai an sâwp ding a na, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng an tih.
Ran a tin inkâk a, inkâk suok lo, irsuok khawm sawi lo chi taphawt chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum nîng an tih.
Chun, sapheimanli chi po poah kebawra lâwn taphawt chu in ta dingin thil tirdakum an na: an ruong tâwk taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng an tih.
An ruong latuhai taphawt chun an puonhai an sâwp ding a na, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng an tih; in ta dingin thil tirdakum a nih.
“Chun, hnuoia bawkinvâk chi laia in ta dinga thil tirdakum chu hieng hi nîng an tih: bui dâm, mazu dâm, tangkâwng chi hrim hrim dâm,
sawkkhe dâm, khawmuol awle dâm, chawlru dâm, tangmâm dâm, laikîng dâm.
Hieng hi bawkinvâk chi po po laia in ta dinga thil tirdakumhai chu an nih.

An thia thil iengkhawm an del chu inthiengnaw ni pei an tih; thil hmang lai phawt, thing hmangruo dâm, puon dâm, savun dâm, saiip dâm khawm ni sienla, tuia inchie ding a na, zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng a tih; chu zo chun inthieng a tih.
Pil bêl iengkhawm sûngah a tla lût chun, a sûnga um po po chu inthiengnaw a ni a, in sukkawi ding a nih.
Chu bêla fâk mi po po khawm, chutaka tuiin a khieng ta hrim hrim chu thil inthiengnaw nîng a tih; chuong ang bêl hrim hrima dâwnmi dâwn thei chi po po inthiengnaw an nih.

Thil iengkhawm an ruong a ieng lai khawma a del taphawt chu thil tirdakum ni pei a ta, bei urna thuk amanih, a zêuna bêl amani khawm ni sienla vuok kawi pei ding a nih; a pawrche ta a, in ta dingin thil inthiengnaw a ni ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, tuikhur amanih, tuibêl amanih, tui intling khâwm amani chu pawrche naw ni a, an ruongin a itâwk taphawt ruok chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chun, thlaichi chîngmi hrim hrim chu an ruong chun a ieng lai khawm lo del ta sien khawm sukpawrche naw nih.
Amiruokchu, thlai chi tuia inchie hnung an ruong a ieng lai khawmin del sienla, in ta dingin thil inthiengnaw a nih.
“Ran in fâk thei chi hrim hrim khawm lo thi ta sienla, a ruong tâwktu taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
A sa fa taphawt chun an puon sâwp an ta, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng an tih; a ruong latu khawm chun a puonhai a sâwp ding a na, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
“Thilhring hnuoia bawkinvâk chi po po chu thil tirdakum an na, in fâk ding a ni nawh.
Phînga intawl chi le ke palia invâk chi amanih, ke tamtak nei chi amanih, hnuoia bawkinvâk chi hrim hrim chu in fâk ding a ni nawh, thil tirdakum an ni si a.
Bawkinvâk chi hrim hrimin in insukpawrche ding a ni nawh; thieng naw in ni nawna dingin anni chun in insukpawrche ding a ni bawk nawh.
In Pathien ni dinga Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoitu cheu
a thieng le thiengnaw thlierna ding le, thilhring fâk thei mi le fâk theilo mi thlierna dingin,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
‘Nuhmeiin nau a vawn a, naupasal a nei chun ni sari chu inthiengnaw nîng a ta; nuhmei dân pângngaia ân thiengnaw ang chun inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
A ni riet ni chun a naupa ser hmawr vun chu tan ding a nih.
Thisen lei chun inthienin ni sâwmthum pathum um a ta; a inthien ni a kim hmakhat chun thil inthieng hrim hrim a them ding a ni naw a, hmun inthienga khawm a hung lût ding a ni nawh.
Naunuhmei a nei ruok chun nuhmei dân pângngai huna ân thiengnaw angin châwlkâr hni chu inthiengnaw nîng a tih; chun, thisen leia inthienin ni sâwmruk paruk a la um ta rawp ding a nih.

“Chun, naupasal amanih, naunuhmei amani leia a inthienna ni a kim pha chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin berâmte kum khat mi le suol inthâwina dingin pârvate amanih, vaṭhu amanih intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah thiempu kuomah a hung chawi ding a nih;
ama chun

Chun, a neiin berâmte a tlin naw chun, vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârvate tuok khat amanih a chawi ding a nih: pakhat chu pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin, pakhat chu suol inthâwina dingin; chun, thiempu chun intlanna siempêk a ta, chuongchun, inthieng ni tâng a tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” tiin.
“Mi a taksa vun ân vûng amanih, ân khir amanih, a puor amania, a vuna chun inphâr hri ni âwma ân lang chun thiempu Aron kuoma manih, a naupasal thiempuhai pakhat phawt phawt kuoma ṭhuoi ding a nih.

Thiempu chun taksa vuna hri chu lo en a ta; a hri umna lai hmul chu a hung vâr a, a hri chu taksa vun nêka inthûka ân lang chun inphârna hri a ni a; thiempu chun ama chu en a ta, mi inthiengnaw a ni chu a puong ding a nih.
A taksa vuna puorhai chu a hung vâr a, vun nêka inthûk lema ân lang naw a, a hmul chu a vâr naw chun, hri invawitu chu thiempu chun ni sari khum a tih;
thiempu chun ni sari ni chun ama chu en a ta, a hri chu a pângngai zinga a hmu a, a hri chu vuna chun a lo indar lien chuong naw chun, ni sari ma khum nâwk a tih.

Chun, thiempu chun ni sari ni chun en nâwk a ta; hri chu a lo duk a, vuna chun a lo indar lien naw chun, thiempu chun ân thieng a nih ti puong a tih; inkhir el a ni a, a puonhai sâwp a ta, inthieng hung ni tâng a tih.
Amiruokchu, a inthienna dinga thiempu ân entir hnunga a khir chu vuna chun a lo indar lien chun, thiempu chu ân entir nâwk ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun lo en a ta, a khir chu vuna chun a lo indar lien chun, thiempu chun inthieng naw a nih ti puong a tih; inphâr a nih.
“Inphârna hri mîn a kawl chun thiempu kuoma ṭhuoi ding a nih.
Thiempu chun lo en a ta, vuna chun a vâra a hung invûng suok a, a hmul chu a hung sukvâr a, ân vûngnaa chun taksa châr a hung inlang chun,
a taksa vuna inphârna hri det lo um zing tah a nih; thiempu chun inthiengnaw a nih ti puong a ta, khum hran chuong naw nih, inthiengnaw a ni leiin.
A phârna chu a vuna chun ân dar lien a, a hri invawitu chu a lua inthawka a ke chena thiempu hriet thei tâwka inphârnain a bâwm chun,
thiempu chun en a ta, inphârna chun a tisa po po chu a bâwm suok ta chun, hri invawitu chu ân thieng a nih ti a puong ding a nih; a vâr zo ta a, ân thieng tah a nih.
Amiruokchu, taksa châr a hung inlang chun ân thieng naw a nih.
Thiempu chun taksa châr chu en a ta, ân thieng nawh ti a puong ding a nih; taksa châr chu ân thieng naw a ni a, inphârna a nih.
Amiruokchu, taksa châr chu a hung danglam nâwk a, a hung vâr nâwk chun thiempu kuomah fêng a ta;
thiempu chun lo en a ta; a hri chu a hung vâr chun, thiempu chun hri invawitu chu ân thieng a nih ti a puong ding a nih, ân thieng tah a nih.
“Tisa vun chu a hung khuoihli a, a hung dam a,
khuoihli umna hmuna chun a hung vâr pâwng amanih, vâr sen deua a hung puor amani khawmin, thiempu inentir ding a nih.
Thiempu chun lo en a ta, vun nêka inthûka ân lang a, a hmul chu a hung vâr chun, thiempu chun inthiengnaw a nih ti a puong ding a nih; inphârna hri a na, khuoihlia inthawk chun a hung inṭan a nih.
Amiruokchu, thiempu chun a lo en a, hmul vâr a um naw a, vun nêkin ân thûk naw a, a duk deu chau a ni chun, thiempu chun ni sari khum hran a ta;
vuna chun a hung indar lien chun, thiempu chun ân thieng nawh ti a puong ding a nih; hri a nih.
Amiruokchu, a puor vâr chu a umna ngaiah a um a, a lo indar lien naw chun khuoihli pânser el a na; thiempu chun ân thieng a nih ti a puong ding a nih.
“Chun, taksa vun chu a kâng a, a kâng inlâwngna lai chu a vâr sen deu amanih, a vâr amania a hung puor chun,

thiempu chun lo en a ta; a puorna lai taka hmul chu a vâr a, vun nêka inthûka ân lang chun, inphârna a na, kângnaa chun a hung inṭan a nih; chuongchun, thiempu chun ân thieng nawh ti a puong ding a nih, inphâr hri a nih.
Amiruokchu, thiempu chun a lo en a, a lo puor a, hmul vâr a um naw chun, vun nêka inthûk lova, a hmuk deu chau a ni chun, thiempu chun ni sari sûng khum hran a ta;
chun, thiempu chun ni sari ni chun ama chu en a ta, vuna chun a lo indar lien chun, thiempu chun inthiengnaw a nih ti a puong ding a nih; inphâr hri a nih.
A puor chu a umna pângngaia chun a um zing a, vuna chun a lo indar lien naw a, a hmuk deu chau a ni chun, mei kâng ser el a na, thiempu chun ân thieng ti a puong ding a nih, mei kâng ser el a nih.
“Nuhmei khawm, pasal khawm, a lua manih, a khâkhmula manih hri a kai chun,

thiempu chun hri chu lo en a ta; chun, vun nêka inthûk lema ân lang a, hmul eng zai inhmitak a um chun thiempu chun inthiengnaw a nih ti a puong ding a nih, inbuotna hri a na, lua manih, khâkhmula mania inphâr hri a nih.
Thiempu chun inbuotna hri chu a en a, vun nêka inthûk lema ân lang naw a, a hmuk dum a um naw chun, thiempu chun inbuotna hri invawitu chu ni sari khum hran a ta;
ni sari niin thiempu chun hri chu en a ta; inbuotna hri chu ân dar lien naw a, hmul eng khawm a um bawk naw a, inbuotna hri chu vun nêka inthûk nawa ân lang chun,
vaw ding a na, ân buotna lai ruok chu a vaw ding a ni nawh; thiempu chun ama chu ni sari dang khum hran nâwk a tih;

chun, thiempu chun ni sari ni chun inbuotna chu en nâwk a ta, inbuotna chu a lo indar lien naw a, vun nêka inthûka ân lang naw chun, thiempu chun ân thieng ti a puong ding a nih; chun, a puonhai sâwp a ta, hung inthieng tâng a tih.
Amiruokchu, chu inbuotna chu an thien fai hnunga vuna chun a hung indar lien chun,
thiempu chun ama chu lo en a ta; chun, inbuotna chu vuna chun a lo indar lien chun, thiempu ta ding chun hmul eng chu zawng kher ngai naw ni a, ân thieng naw a nih.
Amiruokchu, inbuotna chu a ngai zingin a hmu a, hmul dum a mâwng chun, inbuotna chu a dam a na, ân thieng a nih; thiempu chun ân thieng ti a puong ding a nih.
“Nuhmei amanih, pasal amanih an taksa vuna chun a puor vârṭak a um chun,
thiempu chun en a ta, an taksa vuna puor chu a vâr mâwk deu chau a ni chun, a puor mei mei a na, vuna hung inṭan a na, ân thieng a nih.
“Mi a sam a tla kawl chun lukawl a na; nisienlakhawm, ân thieng a nih.
Chun, mi a bâwk le a barêp samhai a tla chun bâwk kawl a na; nisienlakhawm, ân thieng a nih.
Amiruokchu, chu lukawlnaa manih, bâwkkawlnaa manih chun hri sen dâng deu a um chun, a lukawlnaa manih, bâwkkawlnaa mania hung inṭan inphârna a nih.
Chuongchun, thiempu chun lo en a ta, a lukawla manih, a bâwkkawla mani hri chu a sen dâng hlar a, taksa vuna inphârna anga ân lang chun,
mi inphâr a na, ân thiengnaw a nih; thiempu chun ama chu inthiengnaw a nih ti a puong ngei ding a nih; ân phârna chu a luah a nih.
“Inphâr hri invawi chu a puonhai keithlêr nîng a ta, a sam a tlâiin put a ta, a hmûr chungtieng tuom a ta, ‘Inthiengnaw, inthiengnaw,’ tiin a khêk ding a nih.
Inphârnain a bâwm sûng po chu inthiengnaw nîng a ta, ân thiengnaw a na, a um hran ding a nih; a umna ding chu riebûk puotieng nîng a tih.
“Silfên khawm, sahmul silfên amanih, puonzai inhmi silfên amani khawm;
a phiera phier amanih, a khâwnga khâwng amani khawm; puonzai inhmi amanih, sahmul amani khawm, savun amanih, iengkhawm savuna siem amanih inphârna hri a um a,

chu hri chu silfêna manih, savuna manih, a khâwnga khâwng amanih, a phiera phier amanih, iengkhawm savuna siem amania a hring deuin amanih, a sen deuin amani khawm a hung inlang suok chun, inphâr hri a na, thiempu inentir ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun hri chu en a ta, hri kaina chu ni sari sie hran a ta;

ni sari ni chun hri chu en a ta, hri chu silfên a khâwnga khâwng amanih, a phiera phier amanih, ieng ding khawma an ihmang savuna manih ân dar lien chun, hri chu inphârna hri nghettak chi a ni a, ân thieng naw a nih.

Silfên chu a khâwnga khâwng amanih, a phiera phier amanih, sahmul amanih, patzai inhmi amanih, savuna siem chi tinrêng amanih, inphâr hri umna taphawt chu râw ding a na, inphâr dettak chi a ni si a, râw ngei ding a nih.
“Chun, thiempu chun a lo en a, silfên khâwnga manih, phiera manih, savuna siem chi hrim hrima a lo indar lien naw chun,
thiempu chun hri umna chu sâwp thu pêng a ta, ni sari dang sie hran nâwk a tih.

Chun, hri umna sâwp hnung chun thiempu chun en nâwk a ta; hri umdân chu a danglam naw chun, hri lo indar lien naw sien khawm, ân thieng chuong naw a nih; inphârna umna chu a hnung khawm ni sien, a hma tieng khawm ni sien i râw ding a nih.
“Chun, thiempuin a lo en a, sâwp hnunga hri kaina chu a lo da deu chun, chu hmun chu, silfêna mi khawm, savuna mi khawm, khâwnga mi khawm, phîera mi khawm chu kei thlâng a ta;
chu, silfêna manih, khâwnga manih, phiera manih, savun thil ienga khawm ân langa an dar lien chun, hri umna chu i râw ding a nih.
Silfên chu khâwng amanih, phier amanih, savun thil iengkhawm, i sâwp hnunga hri chun ân kiengsan chun, sâwp nâwk ding a na; chuongchun, inthieng hung nîng a tih.
“Hi hi silfên, sahmul amanih, puonzai inhmi amanih, khâwng amanih, phier amanih, savuna siem thil hrim hrimhaia inphârna hri uma, ân thieng le ân thiengnaw puongna dân ding chu a nih,” tiin.
“Hi hi inphâr ân thien nia a thaw dân ding chu ning a tih: Thiempu kuoma ṭhuoi ding a na;
thiempu chu riebûk puotieng fe suok a ta, en a tih. Inphâr chu a phârna chu a dam ta chun,
thiempu chun, ân thienna ding chun, vate hring inthieng pahni le sidar thing le patzai sen le husop hung chawipêk ding thu pêng a ta;
thiempu chun vate pakhat pil bêlah vadung tui luong chunga that dingin thu pêng a tih.
Vate hring ruok chu, sidar thing dâm, patzai sen dâm, husop dâm le chun chawi a ta, vadung tui chunga vate thata um thisena chun phûm vawng a ta;
inphârnaa inthawka inthien ding chu, thisen chun vawi sari thêng a ta, ân thieng tah tiin puong a ta; chun, vate hring chu ramah insuong a tih.

Chun, ân thien ding chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, invaw fai vawng a ta, ân sil ding a nih; chuongchun, inthieng hung nîng a ta; chu zo chun riebûkah fêng a ta, amiruokchu, a puon in puoa chun ni sari a um ding a nih.

Chun, a ni sari ni chun a lu sam po po le a khâkhmul le, a mitkho hmul dâm vâw kawl a ta, a hmul po po chu vâw fai vawng a ta; chun, a puonhai sâwp a ta, ân sil ding a nih; chuongchun, inthieng hung ni tâng a tih.

“Chun, ni riet ni chun berâmte a chal pahni demkailo le berâmte a la pakhat, demkailo kum khat mi le, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga beiphit inditak epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum hrieka hmet le hriek limlai khat a chawi ding a nih.
Chun, ân thientu thiempu chun ân thien ding le chuong thilhai chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah
Thiempu chun berâmte pakhat chu hriek limlai khat le chun lâng a ta, bawsiet inthâwina dingin inhlân a tih;

Chun, suol inthâwina le pumrawhmang thilinhlân an thatna hlak hmun, hmun inthienga chun berâmte chal chu a that ding a nih; suol inthâwina ang bawkin bawsiet inthâwina khawm chu thiempu chanpuol a ni a; thil inthiengtak a nih.
Thiempu chun bawsiet inthâwina thisen chu lâng a ta, inthien ding nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, a kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, a ke changtieng kepuia dâm thiempu chun nâl a tih.
Chun, hriek limlai khat chu thiempu chun lâng a ta, ama vawitieng kutphaa chun sung a ta;
a kut vawitienga hrieka chun a changtieng kutpâr phûm a ta, hriek chu
Chun, a kuta hriek la um ṭhenkhat chun inthien ding chu a nakâwr changtieng hmawr dâm, a kut changtieng kutpui dâm, a ke changtieng kepui dâma bawsiet inthâwina thisen chunga chun nâl a tih.
Chun, thiempu chun a kuta hriek la um po chun, inthien ding lu chu nâl a tih. Chun, thiempu chun
Chun, thiempu chun suol inthâwina chu inhlân a ta, ân thiengnawna leia inthien ding chu intlanna siempêk a tih. Chu zo chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu that a ta;
chun, thiempu chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân le fâkmi thilinhlân chu maichâma chun inhlân a ta, thiempu chun intlanna siempêk a tih; chuongchun, inthieng hung ni tâng a tih.

“Chun, mi pasie a ni a, chuong ang chu a tlin naw chun, berâmte a chal pakhat bawsiet inthâwina ding, intlanna siempêkna ding thên ding le, fâkmi thilinhlân dingin beiphit inditak epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat, hrieka chawkpawl, hriek limlai khat leh chawi a ta;
chun, vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârvate tuok khat amanih, a nei thei lem lem chu pakhat chu suol inthâwina ding, a dang chu pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin.
Ni riet ni chun ân thienna dingin thiempu kuomah intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah
Chuongchun, thiempu chun bawsiet inthâwina berâmte le hriek limlai khat chu lâng a ta, thêna thilinhlân dingin
