Bawsiet inthâwina berâmte chu that a ta; thiempu chun bawsiet inthâwina thisen chu lâng a ta, inthien ding nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, a kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, a ke changtieng kepuia dâm nâl a tih.
Thiempu chun hriek iemani tâwk ama kutpha vawitienga chun bun a ta;
a kut vawitienga hriek ṭhenkhat chu a kut changtiengin
Chun, thiempu chun a kuta hriek chun inthien ding nakâwr changtieng hmawra dâm, a kut changtieng kutpuia dâm, a ke changtieng kepuia dâma bawsiet inthâwina thisen chung taka chun nâl a ta;
chun, thiempu kuta hriek la um po chun
Chun, vaṭhu amanih, pârvate amanih, a nei thei lem lem pakhat chu inhlân a ta; a nei thei lem lem taphawt,
suol inthâwina dingin pakhat, pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân leh; chun, thiempu chun inthien ding chu
Hi hi inphârna hri invawi, inthienna dân ang tlin nawhai ta dinga dân a nih,” tiin.
“Hluo dinga ka pêk cheu Kanaan ram in hluo pha, in hluo ding rama in khawlaia khawm inphârna hri ka sie chun,
chu in neitu chun, ‘Hi ina hin hri ṭhenkhat um âwmin ka hriet,’ tiin thiempu a hung hril ding a nih.

Chun, thiempu chu hri en dinga a lût hma chun, in sûnga thil umhai po po chu inthieng lova a um nawna dingin, in chu sukruok dingin thiempu chun thu pêng a ta; chu zo chun thiempu chu in en ding chun lût a tih.
Chun, hri chu en a ta; hri chun a hring tieng amanih, a sen tieng deu amanih banga chun a lo kai a, bang chu a phaia ân lang ta chun,
thiempu chu ina inthawk chun kawtkhârah suok a ta, in chu ni sari khâr a tih.
Chun, ni sari ni chun, thiempu chun va en nâwk a ta; hri chu banga chun a lo indar lien chun,
hri umna lung chu lâk suok a, khawhnâwmah hmun pawrchea pei dingin thiempu chun thu pêng a ta;
chun, in sûng tieng chu inziet vêltir a ta, chun lung chârna an ziet khawk chu khawhnâwmah hmun pawrchea bawk chun bun thlâng a ta;
chun, lung dang lâng an ta, chuong lunghai hmuna chun sieng an tih; chun, lung chârna dang lâng a ta, in chu châr a tih.
Chun, lung a lâk suok a, in chu a phâwk a, a ziet hnunga hri chu ina a hung suok nâwk chun,
thiempu chu va fêng a ta, en nâwk a tih; hri chu ina chun a lo indar lien chun, chu ina inphârna hri chu a det chi a na, ân thiengnaw a nih.
In chu ṭhiek a ta, a lunghai, a thinghai le a chârnahai po po khawm; chun, khawhnâwmah hmun pawrcheah thak hmang a tih.
Tukhawm chu in chu khâr a ni sûng hrim hrima lût chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw ni bawk a tih.
Tukhawm chu ina zâl taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a tih. Tukhawm chu ina bu fa taphawt khawmin a puonhai a sâwp ding a nih.
“Chun, thiempu chu a lût a, a hang en vêl a, in chu phâwk ṭhat a ni hnunga hri chu a lo indar lien naw chun, in chu ân thieng a nih ti thiempu chun a puong ding a nih, hri chu ân kieng ta leiin.
In inthienna ding chun vate pahni le sidar thing le patzai sen le husop a chawi ding a nih.
Vate chu pil bêlah vadung tui chungah that a ta,
sidar thing le husop le patzai sen chu vate hring le chun lâng a ta, vate thata um tah thisena le vadung tuia chun phûm a ta; in chu vawi sari thêng a tih.
Chuong ang chun, vate thisen dâm, vadung tui dâm, vate hring dâm, sidar thing dâm, patzai sen dâm chun in chu inthien a tih.
Vate hring ruok kha chu khuoa inthawkin ramhnuoiah invuong suoktir a tih; chuongchun, in inthienna chu siem a ta, in chu hung inthieng tâng a tih.
“Hi hi inphârna chi tinrêng le inbuotna hri ta dinga dân chu a nih;
puona inphârna hri um le ina mi dâm,
ân vûng dâm, a puor suok dâm, a hmun hmuna inlang dâm,
ân thieng le ân thiengnaw inhrietna dingin. Hi hi inphârna chungchânga dân chu a nih,” tiin.
“Israel mipuihai chu hril unla, an kuomah, ‘Pasal tukhawm a taksaah thilpût a nei chun, a thilpût lei chun ân thiengnaw a nih.
Chu thil a pût sûng po chu ân thiengnaw a na, a tisaa chun a pût zing amanih, a pût chu suktâwp a ni ta khawmin inthiengnaw a ni ta tho tho a nih.
Chu thilpût neitu zâlna khum taphawt chu inthiengnaw nîng a ta, a ṭhungna taphawt khawm chu inthiengnaw ni bawk a tih.
Tukhawm a khum chu va tâwk taphawt chun an puonhai sâwp an ta, an insil ding a nih; chuongchun, zântieng chen chun inthiengnaw nîng an tih.
Chu thilpût neitu inṭhungnaa ṭhung taphawt khawm chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil bawk a ta, zântieng chen chun inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chun, tukhawm chu thilpût neitu tisa tâwk taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng a tih.
Chu thilpût neitu chun, mi inthieng chil a sâkkhum chun, ama chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil bawk a ta, zântieng chen chun inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chun, chuongna ienga khawm thilpût neitu chu a chuong chun, chu thil chu inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Tukhawm ân nghatna hmun tâwk taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih; chun, chuong thilhai dawm sawntu chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta; zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chun, tukhawm thilpût neituin a kut intleu lova a them taphawt chun, a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta; zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chu thilpût neitu chun pil bêl amanih a tâwk chu sukkawi el ding a nih; thing bûrlebêlhai po po ruok chu intleu fai ding a nih.
“Chun, thilpût neitu chu a thilpût chu sukthieng a ni chun, ân thienna dingin ni sari inbituk a ta, a puonhai sâwp a tih; chun, vadung tuiah insil a ta, hung inthieng a tih.
A ni riet ni chun vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, parvate tuok khat amanih chawiin
Chun, thiempu chun suol inthâwina dingin pakhat, pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin pakhat chu ân hlân ding a nih; chuongchun, thiempu chun a thilpût thua chun
“Tukhawm inpâwlna chi amaa inthawka a suok chun, a pumin ân sil vawng ding a ni a; zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng a tih.
Silfên dâm, savuna siem thil iengkhawm inpâwlna chî umna taphawt chu, sâwp faia intleu fai vawng ding a na, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Chun, nuhmei a zâlpui a, chî ân suo chun, an pahni chun an insil ve ve ding a nih: zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng an tih.
“Nuhmei khawma a nei pângngaia thipût a nei chun ni sari sûng chu inthiengnaw nîng a tih; chun, tukhawm ama tâwk taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Ân thiengnaw sûnga a zâlna taphawt khawm chu inthiengnaw nîng a ta, a ṭhungna taphawt khawm inthiengnaw ni bawk a tih.
Tukhawm a khum lo tâwk taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta; zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Tukhawm a ṭhungna tâwk taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta; zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng a tih.
Khuma thil um amanih, a ṭhungnaa thil um amani tâwk taphawt chu zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.

“Nuhmei ân thieng naw hun pângngai ni lova ni tamtak a thi a pûtin amanih, ân thiengnaw pângngai nêka sâwt thi a nei chun, ân thiengnaw pângngai hun sûng ang bawk khan, a thipût sûng po chu, inthiengnaw a ni ding a nih.
A thipût sûng poa a zâlna khum taphawt chu ân thiengnaw hun dân pângngai ang kha nîng a ta, a ṭhungna taphawt khawm ân thiengnaw ang khan inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Tukhawm chuong thil tâwk taphawt chu inthiengnaw nîng a ta, a puonhai sâwp a ta, ân sil ding a nih; zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a tih.
Amiruokchu, a thipût chu ân thieng ta chun, ni sari sûng inbituk a ta, chu hnunga chun hung inthieng tâng a tih.
A ni riet ni chun vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârvate tuok khat amani chawi a ta; intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah thiempu a hung pêk ding a nih.
Thiempu chun suol inthâwina dingin pakhat, pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin pakhat ân hlân ding a nih; chuongchun,
“Hieng ang hin Israel mipuihai chu an inthiengnawnaa inthawk chu i sukthieng ding a nih, anni laia ka biekbûk um chu an sukpawrche châng khawma, an pawrchena leia an thi nawna dingin,” tiin.
“Hi hi thilpûthai le pawrchena khawpa inpâwlna chi suokhai ta dinga dân chu a nih;
chun, nuhmei a hul naw leia damnaw le, mi tukhawm pasal khawm, nuhmei khawm thilpût neitu ta ding le, nuhmei inthiengnaw laia lo zâlpuitu ta dinga dân chu a nih,” tiin.
Aron naupasalhai pahniin
Hieng ang hin Aron chu hmun inthienga chun a fe ding a nih; suol inthâwina dingin bâwng tuoi, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin berâmchal leh.

Puonzai inhmi zakaw chung chu hâk a ta, a tisa inkhumna dingin puonzai inhmi kekawr chu bun a ta, puonzai inhmi kâwngkhiin inhrêng a ta, puonzai inhmi lukhum a khum ding a nih; hieng hi silfên inthieng a nih. Insil zet zet a ta; chun, ân bel ding a nih.
Israel mipui pungkhâwmhaia inthawkin, suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal pahni le pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin berâmchal pakhat chawi a tih.
“Chun, Aron chun ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu inhlân a ta, ama le a sûnghai ta dingin intlanna siem a tih.
Kêl pahni chu kei a ta, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah
Chun, Aron chun kêl pahni chungchânga chun ṭhumvâwr a ta, pakhat chu
Aron chun
Azazel chanpuola tlu kêl ruok chu intlanna siemna dingin, Azazel ta dinga thlalêra insuo dingin
“Aron chun ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu lâng a ta, ama le a sûnghai ta dingin intlanna siem a ta; ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu that a tih.
Chun, meilâkna meilinga sip, maichâma inthawkin
Riminhnik khû chun, thuthlungna bâwm chunga, zângaina ṭhungpha chu bâwm dingin,
Bâwngchal thisen iengzât amani chu lâng a ta, a kutpârin zângaina ṭhungpha hmatieng pang chu thêng a ta; chun, a kutpârin zângaina ṭhungpha hmabul vêl chu, thisen chun vawi sari a the ding a nih.

“Mipui puola suol inthâwina kêl chu that a ta, a thisen chu puonzâr sûngtienga chun hung lûtpui a ta; a thisen chu bâwngchal thisen a thaw ang bawk khan thâwng a ta, zângaina ṭhungpha le, zângaina ṭhungpha hmabul vêl chu thêng a tih.

Chuongchun, Israel mipui inthiengnawna lei dâm, an bawsietnahai lei dâm, an suolnahai lei dâmin hmun inthieng puola dingin intlanna siem a ta; chuong ang chun, an inthiengnawna laia chêng intuokna puon in puola ding khawmin siem a tih.

Hmun inthienga intlanna siem dinga a lût lai chun, ama le a sûnghai le Israel mipuihai puola intlanna a siem zoa a hung suok nâwk hmakhat chun, tukhawm intuokna puon in sûnga chun an um ding a ni nawh.
Chun, a kutpârin vawi sari thêng a ta, inthien a tih; chuongchun, Israel mipuihai inthiengnawnaa inthawk chun sukthieng a tih.
“Hmun inthieng le intuokna puon in le maichâm puola intlanna a siem zo chun kêl hring lai chu inhlân a ta;

Aron chun kêl hring lai lu chunga chun,a kut a khing pahniin innghat a ta, a chunga chun Israel mipuihai rîtlonahai po po, an bawsietnahai po po, a suolna po po chenin insam a ta, chuonghai chu kêl lu chunga chun innghat a ta, mi pakhat a iruotsa khan thlalêr tieng ṭhuoi hmang dai a tih.
Kêl chun an rîtlona po po chu chêng nawna rama chun phur a ta, kêl chu thlalêra chun ân suo ding a nih.
“Chun, Aron chu intuokna puon ina chun lût a ta, hmun inthieng a lût laia puonzai inhmi silfên a hâk chu hlîp a ta, chutaka chun mâksan a ta;
hmun inthienga chun insil a ta, a silfên inbel a ta, suok a ta, ama puola pumrawhmang thilinhlân le mipui puola pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu inhlân a ta, ama le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem a tih.
Chun, suol inthâwina thâu chu maichâma chun râwng a tih.
Chun, Azazel kuoma kêl insuotu taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, chu zo chun a umna hmun tieng chun a kir nâwk ding a nih.
A rawtu chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, chu zo chun riebûk tieng hung thei a tih.
“Chun, hi hi in kumkhaw dân ding nîng a tih; thla sarina, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun insukrinum in ta, sin hrim hrim in thaw ding a ni nawh, a ram mi khawmin, nangni laia um ram dang mi khawmin.
Hi ni hin, nangni sukthiengna ding cheuin in ta dingin intlanna siem a ni ding a ni si a; chuongchun,
In ta dingin châwl ṭawk ṭawkna ni a na, in insukrinum ding a nih; hi hi in kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu, a pa aia thiempu ni dinga hriek nâl le, suktuma um chun intlanna siem a ta, puonzai inhmi silfên inthieng chu inbel a ta;
hmun inthieng puol dingin intlanna siem a ta, intuokna puon in le maichâm puola ding chun intlanna siem bawk a ta; chun, thiempuhai le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem bawk a tih.
An suolna po po leia kum tin vawi khat Israel mipuihai ta dinga intlanna siem hi in kumkhaw dân ding a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun,
“Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel mipui po po chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Hi hi
Israel sûngkuo laia mi hrim hrim, bâwngchal amanih, berâmte amanih, kêl amani khawm ni sien, riebûka manih, riebûk puoa manih that a,
Chu chu Israel thlahaiin hmun uolaua inthâwina an ithathai an hung chawi theina dingin,
Chun, thiempu chun intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula maichâm chu thisen chun thêng a ta, a thâu chu
Lepchie taka umin, khawhrihai chu zuiin an kuomah an inthâwi ta hrim hrim ding a ni nawh,’ Hi hi an thlahai chena an kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
Chun, an kuomah hril la, Israel sûngkuo laia mi hrim amanih, ram dang mi anni laia khawsahaiin amanih, pumrawhmang thilinhlân amanih, inthâwina amanih ân hlân a,
“Tisa hringna chu thisena chun a um si a; in hringna intlanna siemna dinga maichâm chunga ka pêk cheu a nih; hringna dinga intlanna siemna chu thisen ngei chu a ni si a.
Chuleiin, Israel mipuihai kuomah, ‘Tukhawma thisen in fâk ding a ni naw a, ram dang mi nangni laia khawsahai khawmin thisen chu an fâk ding a ni bawk nawh,’ ka ti a nih.
Chun, Israel mipuihai laia mi amanih, ram dang mi anni laia khawsain amanih, ramsuoka sa amanih, vate amanih fâk thei a hung phur chun, a thisen chu suksuok a ta, pilvut a vur khum ding a nih.

“Tisa po po hringna chu thisen chu a ni si a; chuleiin, Israel mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Ieng sa thisen khawm in fâk ding a ni nawh, tisa po po hringna chu a thisen chu a ni si a; tukhawm a fa taphawt chu tuithlârin a um ding a nih.

Chun, mânia thi amanih, sa se amanih fa taphawt chu, chu rama mi hrim amanih, ram dang mi amani khawm ni sienla, a puonhai sâwp a ta, ân sil ding a nih; chun, zântieng chenin inthiengnaw nîng a ta, chu hnunga chun inthieng hung nîng a tih.
Ân sâwp naw a, ân sil naw ruok chun, ama rîtlona maw chu phur a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Israel mipuihai be la, an kuomah, ‘Kei hi
In umna tah Aigupta ram mihai thaw ang kha thaw naw unla, ka ṭhuoi lûtna ding cheu Kanaan ram mihai thaw ang khawma thaw naw unla, an dân khawm zâwm bawk naw ro.
Ka rorêlhai chu pawmin, ka dânhai chu hrawin in zâwm ding a nih; kei hi
“Tukhawma in sûng bulhai hrim hrim chu an saruokna hlîm dingin in pan ding a ni nawh; kei hi
I pa nuhmei saruokna i hlîm ding a ni nawh, i pa saruokna a nih.
I naupasal naunu amanih, i naunuhmei naunu amani saruokna chu i hlîm ding a ni nawh. An saruokna chu nanga saruokna a ni si a.
I pa nuhmei naunu, i pa nei ngei saruokna chu i hlîm ding a ni nawh, i farnu a ni leiin.
I nu zuorpuinu saruokna chu i hlîm ding a ni nawh, i nu sûng bul a nih.
I nuhmei zuorpuinu saruokna i hlîm ding a ni nawh, a saruokna chu hlîm dingin i nuhmei dam sûng chun i nei kawp ding a ni nawh.
Ama le insukpawrche dingin i tuolbâwm nuhmei chu i zâlpui ding a ni nawh.
“Hieng thil a ienga khawm hin insukpawrche naw ro; hieng thil po poa in hmaa ka hnawt suok tah hnamhai chu an lo pawrche ta a,
ram khawm chu a lo pawrche tah a nih; chuleiin, a rîtlona chu ka hrem a, ram chun a sûnga umhai chu a luok dawk ta vawng a.
Nangni chun chu ka dânhai, ka rorêl dânhai in zâwm ding a nih; hieng thil tirdakumhai a ieng el khawm hi in thaw ding a ni nawh, a ram mi khawmin, ram dang mi in rama khawsa khawmin;
(hieng thil tirdakum po po hi in hmaa hi rama lo umhai khan an lo thaw ta a, ram khawm chu a lo pawrche tah a nih);
in hmaa hnam a luok dawk ang bawka in sukpawrche leia ram chun a luok dawk ve nawna ding cheuin.
Tukhawm hieng thil tirdakumhai a ieng ieng khawm thawtu taphawt chu an chipuihai laia inthawka tuithlârin um an tih.
Chuleiin, hieng an thil chîng tirdakumhai hi in chîng ve nawna dingin, thupêk hi in zâwm ding a nih; chuong thilhai chun insukpawrche ngai dêr naw ro: Kei hi
“Israel thla, mipuihai po po chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘In inthieng ding a nih, kei
In inhlân ni tak amanih, a zîng tûka mania fâk ding a na; ni thum chena um a la um chun râw ding a nih.
Ni thum nia fâk a ni chun thil tirdakum a na, pawm ni naw nih,
chun, a fatu taphawt chun
In grêp huona lo ṭhelhai in zawng nâwk ding a ni naw a, in grêp huona a ra ṭilhai in rût khâwm ding a ni bawk nawh; mi rimsihai le ram dang mihai in hlapêk ding a nih; Kei hi
I chipuihai lai mihai hêkin în vâk vêl ruoi ding a ni naw a, i tuolbâwm thisen thuah a ni naw zâwngin i ṭhang ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi
I lungrilin i unau i theida ding a ni nawh, i tuolbâwm chu i kâwk ngei ding a nih, a suolnaa în thiengna dingin.
“Tukhawm suoknu, pasal huoltu nei, lân tlan lo, lân suoktir lo le zâl hmunkhat taphawt chu hrem nîng a ta, sukhlum chu ni êm naw ni a, ama chu insuo lo a la ni leiin.
Intuokna kawtkhâr bulah
Chun, a thil suksuol taa bawsiet inthâwina dingin thiempu chun berâmchalin

“Ram chu in va hluo a, fâk dinga theikûng chi tinrêng in phun pha chun, a ra chu in ta dinga thiengnawah in ngai ding a nih; in ta dingin kum thum sûng chu inthieng nawa ngai ding a na, fâk dêr lo ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, a kum li kum chun a ra po po chu suktum ding a ni a,
A kum nga kum ruok chun, in ta dinga a pung pei theina dingin a ra chu in fâk ding a nih: Kei
Mithi leiin in taksa in ât ding a ni naw a, in inṭiel ding a ni bawk nawh; Kei hi
“Lua kêlsam ṭohai hmaa chun i ngîr pei ding a na, tar hmêl chu în za ding a na, i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a nih; Kei hi
“Ram dang mi in rama khawsa ve an um chun in sukse ding a ni nawh.
Ram dang mi nangni laia khawsahai chu in ta dingin a ram mi ang hrim an ni ding a nih; nangma i înhmangai angin i hmangai ding a nih; nangni khawm Aigupta rama khan ram dang mi in ni kha: Kei hi
“Rorêl thua dâm, seizie inkhinaa dâm, bûknaa dâm, tamzie inkhinaa dâm indik nawtakin in thaw ding a ni nawh.
Khâina indiktak, bûkna indiktak, epha indiktak, hin indiktak in nei ngei ding a nih: Kei hi
Chun, ka thupêkhai po po le ka rorêlhai po po chu zâwmin in thaw ding a nih: Kei hi

“Israel mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Tukhawm Israel thlahai laia mi amanih, Israel rama khawsa, ram dang mi amanih, mâni rîla rahai a tukhawm Molek kuoma pe taphawt chu sukhlum ngei ding a na, hi rama mihai hin lungin an dêng ding a nih.

Kei khawmin ka hmun inthieng sukpawrche ding le, ka hming inthieng sukpawrche dinga a rîla ra Molek a pêk leiin, chu mi chunga chun ka hmai sukthim ka ta, a chipuihai laia inthawk chu sukbohmang ka tih.
Hi rama mihai hin, chuong ang mi mâni rîla ra Molek petu chu an theinghil tehlêm a, an sukhlum naw chun, ama le a sûnghai chunga chun
ka hmai sukthim ka ta, Molek kuoma uire dinga a mi uiretsantuhai po leh an chipuihai laia inthawk sukbohmang ka tih.
Ka thupêkhai chu in pawmin in zâwm ding a nih. Kei hi
Mîn ran a zâlpui chun sukhlum ngei ding a nih; ran khawm chu in sukhlum ding a nih.
“Chuleiin, ka thupêkhai po po, ka rorêlhai po po pawmin in zâwm ding a nih; chuongchun, umna dinga ka ṭhuoina cheu ram chun luok dawk naw ni cheu.
In hmaa ka hnawt suok tah hnamhai dân dâm in hrâw ding a ni nawh; hieng thilhai po po hi an thaw hlak leiin ka tirdak tâwl an nih.
Amiruokchu, nangni kuoma chun, an ram, nênetui le khuoizua luong ram chu hluong in ta, in hluo dingin ka pêk cheu a nih, ka lo ti ta a. Kei hi

Chuleiin, sa thieng le thieng naw, vate thieng le thiengnaw in thlier hran ding a nih; sa amanih, vate amanih, hnuoia bawkinvâk chi hrim hrim amani chu in ta dingin inthieng lova ka ithlier hran tahai chun, in hringnahai in suktirdakum ding a ni nawh.
A sûng bul, a nu, a pa, a naupa, a naunu, a unaupa dâm le,
a farnu, nunghâk inthieng, pasal la neilo a ni leiin, chuonghai thinaa ruok chun insukpawrche thei a tih.
A chipuihai laia lusa a ni leiin ân sukpawrche ding a ni naw a, ân sukhmingse ding a ni nawh.
An Pathien ta dingin mi inthieng nîng an ta, an Pathien hming an suksiet ding a ni bawk nawh;
Nawchizawr amanih, hming se tah amanih, a pasal imâk hnung amanih an nei ding a ni nawh; thiempu chu a Pathien ta dingin mi inthieng a ni si a.
Ama chu în hlân thieng ding a na, i Pathien ta dinga fâkmi thilinhlân chu ân hlân hlak si a. I ta dinga mi inthieng a ni ding a nih. Kei
Thiempu naunuhmei tukhawm nawchizawra ân sukpawrche chun, a pa a sukpawrche a na, ama chu raw ding a nih.
“A unauhai laia thiempu inlal tak, a lu hriek nâlmia nâl tah, silfên bel dinga suktuma um ta chun, a sam chu a thlâiin a put ding a ni naw a, a puonhai a keithlêr ding a ni naw a,
mithi ruong umnaa chun a lût ding a ni naw a, a pa amanih, a nu amani leiin ân sukpawrche ding a ni nawh;
hmun inthienga inthawk chun a suok ding a ni bawk naw a, a Pathien hmun inthieng chu a sukpawrche ding a ni bawk naw; a Pathien hriek nâlmia suktumin a um ta si a: Kei hi
Nuhmei ding chun nunghâk hnakhat a nei ding a nih.
Hmeithai amanih, mâk hnung amanih, nuhmei hming se tah amanih, nawchizawr amani chu a nei ding a ni naw a, ama chipui ngei nunghâk inthieng nuhmeiah a nei ding a nih;
chuongchun, a chipui lai a thlahai chu a sukpawrche naw ding a nih; kei hi
“Aron kuomah hril la, ‘I thlahai laia an suonlepârhai lai chena demkai taphawt chun, a Pathien fâk ding thilinhlân inhlân dingin hung hnai naw raw se.
Tukhawm demkâi taphawt chun an hung hnai ding a ni dêr nawh; mitdel, kebai, hmai hmêlhem, kut le ke sei taluo dâm,
kea hliemna nei, kut hliem dâm,
zângkûn, mi tawnginsam, mithmu fie naw, pang inthak nei, pang inhlip, tilmu kawi dâm;
thiempu Aron thlahai laia mi tukhawm demkaina nei chu,
A Pathien fâkmi thilinhlâna mi, ân thieng tak le thil inthienghaia mi chu fa thei a ta;
amiruokchu, demkaina nei a ni leiin, puonzâr bula manih, maichâm hnaia mani chu hung thei naw ni, ka hmun inthienghai sukpawrche rawi a tih; kei
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel mipuihai po po kuoma chun a hril ta a.
“Aron le a naupasalhai kuomah hril la, Israel mipuihaiin thil inthieng ka kuoma an inhlân laiin insiekieng raw hai se, ka hming sukse rawi an tih. Kei hi
An kuomah, ‘In suonhai chena in thlahai po po lai tukhawm inthiengnaw puma Israel mipuihaiin
Aron thla tukhawm inphârna amanih, thipût amani chun ân thieng hmakhat chun, thil inthienghai laia mi chu a tâwk taphawt le,
tukhawm ama sukpawrche thei, bawkinvâk chi hrim hrim amanih, pawrchena kai thei tâwk taphawt chu,
chuong ang tâwktu chu zântieng chen chun inthieng naw nîng a ta; chun, ân sil naw chun thil inthienghai laia mi chu a fâk ding a ni nawh.
Nisa a tlâk hnung ruok chun inthieng tâng a ta, chu hnung chun thil inthienghai laia mi khawm chu fa thei tâng a tih; a fâk ding a ni leiin.
Insukpawrche dingin mânia thi amanih, sa se amanih a fâk ding a ni nawh. Kei hi
Chuleiin, ka thupêk chu an pawm ding a nih, chuong naw chun suol maw chu phurin, anni insukpawrchein thi pal rawi an tih: Kei hi
“Ram dang mîn thil inthieng chu a fâk ding a ni nawh; thiempu kuoma khawsa amanih, inhlawfa amani chun thil inthieng chu a fâk ding a ni nawh.
Thiempuin ama suma ân châwk ruok chun fa thei a tih; chun, a ina pienghai chun a fâk ding chu fa thei an tih.

Amiruokchu, thiempu naunu chu nau bovin hmeithaiin amanih, mâkin amanih a hung um a, a pa in tieng a kir nâwk chun, a nunghâk lai ang bawk khan a pa fâk ding chu fa vêng a tih; nisienlakhawm, ram dang mi chun an fâk ding a ni nawh.
Mîn hre lova thil inthieng chu a fâk chun, a hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat chu sie sâng a ta, thil inthieng chu thiempu a pêk ding a nih.
Israel mipuihai thil inthieng,
chuong ang chun, an thil inthienghai fapêkin rîtlona le bawsietna maw an inphurtir ding a ni nawh; Kei hi
“Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel mipui po po be la, an kuomah, ‘Israel sûngkuo laia mi amanih, Israelhai laia um ram dang mi amanih, tukhawma thilinhlân thutiemna khawm, nuomthua thilinhlân khawm,
pawm tlâk dingin bâwng amanih, berâm amanih, kêl amanih demkailo a chal in inhlân ding a nih.
Demkai hrim hrim chu in inhlân ding a ni nawh; pawmpêk tlâk cheu a ni âwm si naw a.
Tukhawmin thutiem sukpuitling dingin amanih, mâni nuomthua thilinhlâna dingin amanih,
A mitdel dâm, a ru tliek dâm, a silawng dâm, inpânna nei dâm, pang inthakna nei dâm, pang inhlip dâm chu
Mâni nuomthua thilinhlâna ding chun, bâwngchal khawm, berâmte khawm, kut le ke sei taluo amanih, tawi taluo amani khawm inhlân thei in tih; thutiemnaa ding ruok chun pawm ni naw nih.
A tilmu sukduk amanih, sukpêr amanih, sukkawi amanih, lâk amani chu

Ram dang mihai kuoma inthawka lain chuong ang laia mi hrim hrim chu in Pathien fâk ding thilinhlânah in inhlân ding a ni nawh, chuonga chun sietna le demkaina a um lei chun, pawmpêk thei cheu ni naw ni,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Bâwngchal amanih, berâm amanih, kêl amanih a hung piengin, a pui kuomah ni sari a um ding a nih; ni riet nia inthawka hnung tieng chun
Bâwngpui amanih, berâmpui amanih, a tê leh ni khat sûng in that ding a ni nawh.
Lâwmthu hrilna inthâwia
Chu ni chun fâk zo ding a na, a zînga chena dingin iengkhawm in khêk ding a ni nawh: Kei hi
“Chuleiin, ka thupêkhai hi in pawmin in zâwm ding a nih: Kei hi
Chun, ka hming inthieng hi in suksiet ding a ni naw a, Israel mipuihai laia chun chawimawiin ka um ding a nih;
Kei hi nangni sukthiengtu in Pathien ni dinga Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu ka nih: Kei hi
“Israel mipuihai chu be la, an kuomah, ‘
Ni ruk sûng sin thaw ding a na, ni sari ni ruok chu ursûntaka inser châwlna, inkhâwmpui inthieng a nih; ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni naw a, in chêngna taphawta chun
Thla khatna ni sâwmpali ni, zântieng chu
Chu thla ma, ni sâwmpanga ni chu,
A ni khat ni chun inkhâwmpui inthieng nei in ta, sin hrim hrim in thaw ding a ni nawh.
Ni sari sûng mei hmanga thilinhlân
“Israel mipuihai chu hril la an kuomah, ‘Ram ka pêk cheu chu in va tlung a, chutaka chun bu dâm in sîk pha chun, in ra hmasaa mi buphal pakhat chu thiempu kuomah in hung chawi ding a nih.
Chun, pawmpêk thei cheu a nina dingin, ama chun buphal chu
Buphal in thên ni chun berâmte a chal demkailo kum khat mi, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin
Chutaka fâkmi thilinhlân chu beiphit inditak epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni hrieka hmet

In Pathien ta dinga thilinhlân chu in inhlân hmakhat, chu ni tlung hmakhat chun, bei amanih, bu zêu amanih, a vui tharlâm amani khawm in fâk ding a ni nawh; hi hi in chêngna taphawtah in thlahai chena kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
“Châwlni zîng, a thêna thên thilinhlân buphal in hung chawi ni a inthawkin tiem in ta, châwlni vawi sari tiem tling in ta;
châwlni vawi sarina zîng chen chun ni sâwmnga tiem in ta;
In umna hmunhaia inthawkin epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hnia siem, bei tlang thên ding pahni, beiphit indi mi, chawl ṭhanga ur,

Bei inhlân ruol chun berâmte pasari, demkailo kum khat mi ṭhieu le, bâwng tuoi pakhat le berâmchal pahni khawm in inhlân ding a nih; chuonghai chu, an fâkmi thilinhlân le an dâwnmi thilinhlânhai le chun,
Chun, suol inthâwina dingin kêl chal pakhat le, inremna thilinhlân inthâwina dingin berâmte a chal pahni kum khat mi in inhlân ding a nih.
Thiempu chun siem hmasak tak bei chu berâmte pahni le chun,
Chu ni chun thu puong in ta; inkhâwmpui inthieng nei in ta; sin hrim in thaw ding a ni naw a; hi hi in chêngna taphawtah in thlahai chena dingin kumkhaw dân nîng a tih.
“Israel mipuihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Thla sarina, chu thla ni khat ni chu in ta dingin ursûntaka insera châwlna, tawtawrâwt mûta hrietzingna, inkhâwmpui inthieng nîng a tih.
Sin hrim hrim in thaw ding a ni naw a;
“Thla sarina ni sâwm ni ruok hi chu intlanna ni a na; in ta dingin inkhâwmpui inthieng nîng a ta, insukrinum in ta:
Chu ni chun ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh:
Tukhawm chu nia insukrinum lo chu a chipuihaia inthawkin tuithlârin um a tih.
Tukhawm chu nia sin iengkhawm thaw taphawt chu, chu mi chu a chipuihaia inthawkin sukbohmang ka tih.
Ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh; hi hi in chêngna taphawtah in thlahai chena kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
In ta dinga châwlni ursûntaka inser châwlna nîng a ta, in insukrinum ding a nih; chu thla ni kuo ni zântieng, chu zântienga inthawka zântieng nâwk chenin châwlniah in hmang ding a nih,” tiin.
“Israel mipuihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Thla sarina ni sâwmpanga ni le ni sari sûng chu
A ni khatna chu inkhâwmpui inthieng nîng a ta, sin hrim hrim in thaw ding a ni nawh.
Ni sari sûng chun, mei hmanga thilinhlân
Hienghai hi an nih
Thla sarina ni sâwmpanga nia, in lo ra suok in lâk khawm huna chun,
A ni khat ni chun thing kûng mawi tak tak rahai, intûm kâuhai, thing inbuktak zârhai, vadunga phahrâm kâuhai chawi in ta,
Hi hi
Bâwkteah ni sari sûng um in ta, Israel ram mi po po chu bâwkteah in um ding a nih;
chuongchun, in thlahai chun, Israel thlahai chu Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok lai khan bâwkteah kân umtir ti hre thei an tih: Kei hi
Chuongchun, Mosie chun
“Israel mipuihai chu oliv hriek inthiengtak, sit dinga sâwr, khâwnvar sukchawk zingna dinga i kuoma hung la dingin thu pe rawh.
Intuokna puon ina thuinhriettirna puonzâr puotienga chun, zântienga inthawka zîngkâr chena dingin,
A tlar hnia chun beraw hlîr hlak i sie ve ve ding a nih, chu chu bei le chun hrietzingna,
Châwlni taphawtah
Chun, Aron le a naupasalhai chanpuol nîng a ta, hmun inthiengah an fâk ding a nih; kumkhaw dâna
Israel nuhmei naupa, a pa chu Aigupta mi, pakhat chu Israel mipuihai lai a va fe a; chu Israel nuhmei naupa le Israel mi pakhat riebûka chun an insuol a;
Israel nuhmei naupa chun ṭawngsie inphurin Pathien hming a hrilsiet a; chuongchun, ama chu Mosie kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a. A nu hming chu Selomith a na. Dan chi Dibri naunu a nih.
Chun,
“Ṭawngsiea inkhâmtu chu riebûk puoah ṭhuoi unla, a hretuhai po po chun a luah an kut innghat hai sienla, mi po po chun lungin dêng raw hai se.
Chun, Israel mipuihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Tukhawm a Pathien ṭawngsie inphur taphawt chun a suol maw chu phur a tih.
Chun,
Tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Ran thattu taphawt chun a thung ding a nih, hringna aiah hringna.
mi a sukhmêlhem angin ama chunga khawm thaw ve ding a nih.
Ran sukhlumtu chun a thung ding a nih; mi sukhlumtu chu sukhlum ve ding a nih.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel mipuihai chu a biek a; ṭawngsiea inkhâmtu chu riebûk puoah an ṭhuoi suok a, lungin an dêng a. Israel mipuihai chun
Sinai tlângah
I loa chun kum ruk sûng chu thil chîng i ta, grêp huon chu kum ruk sûng chu sât der i ta, a ra suokhai sîk i ta;
a kum sari kum ruok chu ram châwl dêrna,
I lohmaa amaa mâwng chu i sîk ding a ni naw a, i enkawl naw grêp chu i lo ding a ni bawk nawh; ram châwl dêrna kum a ni ding a nih.
Ram châwl kum chun in fâkfâwm ding insuopêk a ti cheu a; i ta ding dâm, i siehlawpa le i siehlawnu ta ding dâm, i inhlawfa ta ding dâm, i kuoma khawsa ram dang mi ta ding dâm,
i bâwng ruol ta ding dâm, i rama ranhai ta ding dâm, chutaka a hung ra suok po po chu fâkfâwm ding nîng a tih.
“Chun, châwl kum kum sari tiem i ta, kum sari hmun sari nîng a ta, châwl kum kum sari sûng chu kum sâwmli pakuo nîng a ta.
Chu hnung thla sarina ni sâwm ni chun tawtawrâwt inringtak chu inmût vêltir i ta; intlanna nia chun in ram po poah tawtawrâwt in inmût vêltir ding a nih.

Chu kum sâwmngana chu inser thieng i ta, ram sûnga um po pohai kuomah zalênna thu in puong ding a nih; in ta dingin jubili nîng a ta; mi tinin mâni ta ngai nei nâwk in ta; mi tin chu mâni insûng khur sengah in um nâwk ding a nih.
Chu kum sâwmngana chu in ta dingin jubili nîng a ta; iengkhawm chîng naw ti niu a, amaa mâwng khawm sîk bawk naw ti niu a, grêp enkawl naw ra chu in lo ding a ni bawk nawh.
Jubili a ni si a; in ta dingin kum inthieng a ni ding a nih; in lova thil ra suok chu in fâk ding a nih.
Hi jubili kum hin mi tinin mâni ta ngei in chang nâwk seng ding a nih.
I tuolbâwm kuomah ieng amanih i zawr a, i tuolbâwma inthawkin ieng amanih în châwk khawma i hlêm ding a ni nawh;
jubili hnunga kum zât ang peiin i tuolbâwm thil chu inchâwng i ta, bu le bâl tam kum izirin i kuomah a zawr ding a nih.
A kum tam dân zir peiin a man chu sukpung i ta, a kum tlâwm dân zir peiin a man chu i suktlâwm ding a nih; lohma suok pung kum zirin i kuoma chun zawr a ni ding a nih.
In inhlêm ding a ni naw a, in Pathien chu in ṭi ding a nih: kei hi
“Chuleiin, ka thuruothai chu in zâwmin, ka rorêlhai chu in pawmin in ṭi ding a nih; chuongchun, chu rama chun thlamuongtakin in khawsa ding a nih.
Ram chun ra insuong a ta, tlaitakin chên in ta, thlamuongtakin in va khawsa ding a nih.
‘Iengkhawm kan chîng naw a, thlai ra iengkhawm kan sîk naw bawk ding chun, kum sarina kum chun ieng am fâng kan ta?’ in ti a ni thei a;
a kum ruk kum chun ka malsâwmna in chungah intlungtir ka ta, kum thum sûnga ding chun ra insuong a tih.
Chun, a kum riet kum chun chîng in ta, thil ra suok in kawl, a hluihai chu fâng in ta, kum kuo kum chun, a hung thar nâwk chen chun, a hlui in kawlhai chu in fâk ding a nih.
“Kumkhuoa dingin ram chu zawr sawng ding a ni nawh, ram chu ka ta a ni si a; ka kuoma khawsa mikhuol le khuolchâm el in ni si a.
Chun, ram in hluo po poa chun, ram intlan in phal ding a nih.
“I unau chu hung pasein, a ram ṭhenkhat lo zawr sienla, a laibung bul takin a unauin a lo zawr chu a hung intlan ding a nih.
Chun, mîn intlanpêktu ding a nei naw a, ama a hung khawsa thei a, intlanna ding khawp a hung nei chun,
a lo zawr china kum chu sut sienla, a zawrnapa kuoma chun a intêl chuong chu pe kîr raw se; chuongchun, a ram chu ama ma chun hluo nâwk a tih.
A ta dinga ân tlan kîr nâwk thei naw chun, a zawr ta chu jubili kum chenin ân chawtu kuta chun um raw se; chun, jubili kum chun suok nâwk a ta, ama chun a ram chu hluo nâwk a tih.
“Kul nei khuoah mîn in a zawr chun, a zawra inthawka kum khat pumhlûm sûng intlan nâwk thei a tih; kum khat pumhlûm sûng chun intlan nâwk theina nei a tih.
Kum khat sûnga ân tlan nâwk thei naw chun, kul nei sûnga khuoa in chu, ân chawtu nei sawng dinga siem nîng a ta, a thlahai chena an ta ni tâng a ta, jubilia khawm suok chuong naw nih.
Kul nei naw khuoa inhai ruok chu, thingtlâng ram anga ngai nîng a ta, intlan nîng a ta, jubili chun insuo nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, Levi mihai khuo, an chanpuola khuoa inhai chu Levi mihai chun ieng lai khawma intlan thei an tih.
Chun, Levi mihai laia mîn ân tlan naw chun zawr tah in le, a chanpuol khuo chu jubilia chun suok a tih; Levi mihai khuoa inhai chu Israel mipuihai laia an chanpuol a ni si a.
An khaw kâwl vêla lohai ruok chu zawr thei ni naw nih, an kumkhaw chanpuol a ni si a.
A pung hnawtin i sum în pûktir ding a ni naw a, a pung hnawtin i fâk ding lai hai khawm inpûktir naw rawh.
Kei hi
inhlawfa ang le i kuoma khawsa ve angin i umpui ding a nih; Jubili kum chen i rawng bâwl a ta;
chu zo chun i kuoma inthawkin suok a ta, ama le a nauhai leh; chun, anni sûngkuo pângngaia chun lût nâwk an ta, an pi le puhai in le lo an hluo nâwk ding a nih.
Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok, ka siehlawhai an ni si a, suok zawra zawr ding an ni nawh.
Rilotakin a chungah i um ding a ni naw a, i Pathien chu i ṭi ding a ni lem.
Suoknu le suokpaa i nei ding chu: in vêla hnam laia mi, suoknu le suokpa ding chun în châwk ding a nih.
Chun, nangni laia khawsa ram dang mihai le, in rama pieng an sûnghai laia mi khawm inchaw thei bawk in tih; anni chu in thilnei hung nîng an tih.
Chun, nangni hnunga in nauhai ro hluo sâwng thilah siem in ta; chuonghai chu in kumkhaw suok dingin siem thei in ta; amiruokchu, in unau Israel mihai laia ruok chun rilotakin in um ding a ni nawh.

“Ram dang mi amanih, i kuoma khawsa tu amanih a hung hausa a, a kuoma i unaupa a hung pasie a, i kuoma ram dang mi kuoma manih, i kuoma khawsa kuoma manih, ram dang mi thlahai kuoma manih a tlu lût chun,
a tlûk lût hnung khawma intlan thei nîng a ta, a unauhai laia mîn intlan thei a tih.
A pamiin amanih, a pami naupân amanih intlan thei a tih; a chihai laia a laibung hnaiin amani khawm intlan thei a tih; chun, ama khawm a hung hausa chun ama le ama chu intlan thei a tih.
A tlûk lûtnapa leh a tlûk lûta inthawka jubili kum nâwk ding sût hmunkhat hai sienla, a tlûk lût man chu a kum zir nîng a ta; chun, inhlawfa a ruoi sûtpêk ang peia sûtpêk nîng a tih.
Kum tamtak a la bâk chun, a la bâk zât hu chu sûtin, ama inchâwkna mana inthawkin let kîr nîng a ta.
Jubili kum tlungna ding kum tlâwmte chau um a ni chun, sût hmunkhat hai sienla, a sinthaw ding la bâk kum izirin, ân tlanna dingin tangka chu a pêk kîr ding a nih.
Kum khat bi peia ruoi inhlawfa angin a bêl ding a na; i mithmua chun rilotakin a thaw ding a ni nawh.
Chuong ang zâwnga intlan a ni naw khawma, jubili kum chun suok a ta, ama le a nauhai leh.
Israel mipuihai chu keima siehlawhai an ni si a, Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok, ka siehlawhai an nih: Kei hi
ruotuihai chu a huntakah intlâktir ka ta, hnuoi chun a ra insuong a ta, rama thinghai chun ra insuong an tih.
In hrizâwla bu chun grêp lo hun man phâk a ta, in grêp lo hun chun thil chîng hun man phâk a ta; in bei chu tlaitakin chên in ta, in rama hin thlamuongtakin khawsâng in tih.
Hi ram hi râlmuongtakin inumtir ka ta, zâl ṭawk ṭawk in ta, tukhawma sukṭi naw nihai cheu a, ramsa suolhai chu hi rama inthawk hin hnawt hmang ka ta, kawlhnâmin in ram fe thleng naw bawk a tih.
In hmêlmahai chu hnawt in ta, in hmaah kawlhnâma thatin um an tih.
Mi pangain za hnawt in ta, mi zain sîng hnawt in ta; in hmêlmahai chu in hmaah kawlhnâma thatin um an tih.
Ditsak ka ti cheu a, in kuomah ka thuthlung sukdet ka tih.
Sâwttak in ikawl a hlui chu fâng in ta, a thar siena dingin a hluihai chu la suok in tih.
Nangni lai ka biekbûk chu inumtir ka ta, ka hringna chun hnungnghat naw ni cheu.
Kei hi
“Amiruokchu, ka thu in pawm naw a, hieng ka thupêkhai po po hi in zâwm naw a;
ka thuruothai in dit naw a, in hringnain ka rorêlhai chu a theida a, ka thupêkhai po po zâwm lova ka thuthlung in bawsiet chun,
In chunga chun ka hmai sukthim ka ta, in hmêlmahai hmaa chun tlâwm in tih; nangni theidatuhai cheuin in chungah ro rêl an ta, tu hnawt lovin tlân in tih.
Chuong sa khawma ka thu in la pawm naw rawp chun, in suolhai leiin a let sariin la hrem ka ti cheu a;
in hrâtna sawngtawlawi chu suksieng ka ta, in vânhai chu thîr angin siem ka ta, in hnuoi chu dârsen angin;
chun, in tha chu sêng thlâwn mei mei nîng a tih, in ram chun ra insuo naw ni a, rama thinghai khawm chun ra an insuo naw ding a ni si a.
“Kei a mi kal zâwnga in um a, ka thu in pawm naw chun, in suolhai zirin a let sariin in chungah hremna intlungtir ka tih.
Nangni lai ramsahai inhungtir ka ta, chuonghai chun in nauhai lâkpêk an ti cheu a, sukkiem tiel tiel an ti cheu a, in lampuihai chu ṭhing ṭhuop a tih.
“Chuong sa khawma ka thununna chu in pawm naw a, a mi kal zâwnga in la um ta rawp chun,
kei khawm nangni kal zâwngin um ka ta, keima ngeiin in suolhai leiin a let sariin hrem ka ti cheu.
In chungah kâwlhnâm inlêngtir ka ta; chu chun thuthlung phuba chu lâng a ta, mâni khaw sûng sengah intawm khâwm in tih; chun, nangni lai hri inlêngtir ka ta, hmêlmahai kutah pêk nîng in tih.
In ifâk tak bei ka sukchatpêk pha cheu chun, nuhmei sâwmin urna pakhatah ur an ta, in bei chu bûk chie peiin pe nâwk an ti cheu; fâk chu fâng in ta, khawp chu khawp naw ti niu.
“Chuong sa khawma ka thu in pawm naw a, a mi kalzâwnga in la um ta rawp chun,
lunginsentakin nangni kal zâwngin um ka ta; in suol leiin a let sariin hrem bawk ka ti cheu.
In naupasalhai sa fâng in ta, in naunuhmeihai sa khawm fa bawk in tih.
In bâwlhmunhai sukchim ka ta, in milimhai sukthlûng ka ta, in ruonghai chu in milimhai chungah pei ka ta; chun, ka hringna khawmin a theida ding cheu a nih.
In khuohai chu sukrêm ka ta, in hmun inthienghai chu sukrêm bawk ka tih; in rim inhnikhai khawm chu inhnam naw bawk ka tih.
In ram chu sukrêm ka ta; in hmêlma chutaka umhai chun mak tîng an tih.
Hnam danghai laia chun sukdar ka ti cheu a, a hnawt ding cheuin kâwlhnâm chu phawi ka ta, chuongchun, in ramhai chu sukrêm nîng a ta, in khuohai chu ṭâwp a tih.
“Ram chu sukrêma a um sûng po le, in hmêlmahai rama in um sûng chun, ram chun châwlnihai chu hlimtakin hmang a tih; chuongchun, ram chu châwl a ta, a châwlnihai chu hlimtakin hmang a tih.
Sukrêma a um sûng po chun châwl a ta, in um laia châwlnia châwl ngai lo kha.

Chun, nangni laia mi la umsunhai chu, an hmêlmahai ramah an lungrilah thlabârna inumtir ka ta; hnaṭâwng inlêng riin anni hnawt a ta, kâwlhnâma inthawka tlânsie angin tlânsieng an ta, tu ihnawt dêr lovin tlûng an tih.
Tu ihnawt lovin kâwlhnâma hnawt ang elin inpalthlu rem rum an ta; in hmêlmahai lo dang dingin hrâtna hrim hrim nei naw ti niu.
Hnam danghai lai chun bohmang in ta, in hmêlmahai ram chun fa zo a ti cheu.
Chun, nangni laia mi la umsunhai chu in hmêlmahai ramah an rîtlona leiin rêm tiel tiel an ta; an pi le puhai chun an rîtlona an rêm pha angin, anni khawmin rêm pha bawk an tih.
“An suol, ka chunga an suolna lei le, an rîtlona le an pi le puhai rîtlona leh, a mi kal zâwnga an um leia
Jakob kuoma ka thuthlung chu hre zing ka ta, Isak le Abraham kuoma ka thuthlung khawm hre zing ka ta; ram khawm chu hre zing bawk ka tih.

Ram khawm chu inkiengsan an ta, anni um lova a rêm sûng chun a châwlnihai chu hlimtakin hmang a tih; ka rorêlnahai an dit naw lei le, ka thuruothai an hringna chun a theida hlak leia an rîtlona chun insiem ṭhâng an tih.
amiruokchu, an Pathien ka ni theina dinga, hnam tinhai mithmua Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok, an thlatuhai le thuthlung chu, anni lei hin hre zing lem ka tih: Kei hi
Hienghai hi, Sinai tlânga Mosie hmanga ama le Israel mipuihai inkâra
“Israel mipuihai hril la, an kuomah, ‘Mîn ieng amanih pawimaw bîk chungchânga thu a tiem chun, a mihriem phûtâwk i ruot chu
Pasal a ni chun i ruot dân ding chu, kum sâwmhnia inthawka kum sâwmruk mi chu, hmun inthieng shekel ang, tangka shekel sâwmnga hu nîng a tih.
Nuhmei a ni chun i ruot dân ding chu, shekel sâwmthum nîng a tih.
Kum ngaa inthawka kum sâwmhni mi a ni chun, i ruot dân ding chu, pasal chu shekel sâwmhni, nuhmei chu shekel sâwm nîng a tih.
Thla khata inthawka kum nga mi a ni chun, i ruot dân ding chu pasal chu tangka shekel nga, nuhmei chu tangka shekel thum nîng a tih.
Kum sâwmruka inthawka chung tieng a ni chun, i ruot dân ding chu, pasal chu shekel sâwmpanga, nuhmei chu shekel sâwm nîng a tih.
Amiruokchu, i ruot nêka a lo pase chun, thiempu kuoma ṭhuoi ding nîng a tih, thiempu chun lo ruot a tih; thutiemtu thei ang tâwk tâwk thiempu chun lo ruot a tih.
“Thilinhlân
A sukdanglam ding a ni naw a, a ṭhain a sie, a siein a ṭha thleng ding a ni nawh; ran ran vêka a thleng lui chun, an pahniin a thlengna le chun thil inthieng an ni ding a nih.
Chun, ran inthieng naw,
chun, thiempu chun a ṭhat le ṭhatnaw zirin a man tâwk lo ruot a ta; nang thiempuin i ruot tâwk ang chu ni pei a tih.
Amiruokchu, ân tlan nâwk nuom chun, a man ruot zât hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a bel ding a nih.
“Mîn a in chu
Ân hlântu chun a in chu ân tlan nâwk ding chun, a man dinga ruot zât hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a bel ding a nih; chuongchun, a ta ni nâwk a tih.
“Mîn a rama lo a ṭhen
A lo chu jubili kuma inthawka inhlân a ni chun, i ruot ang chu ni zing a ta;
jubili kum hnunga inhlân a ni ruok chun, thiempu chun a man chu jubili tlung nâwkna ding kum izir peiin ruotpêk a ta, chun i ruot dâna inthawkin a kiem ding siem nîng a tih.
Ân hlântu chun ân tlan nâwk tak tak ding chun, a man ruot zât hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat bel nâwk a ta, a ta ni nâwk el a tih.
Lo chu ân tlan nuom naw amanih, mi dang kuoma zawr amanih a ni chun, intlan nâwk thei ni ta naw nih;
jubili kuma a suok nâwk pha chun, lo chu
A rochan hluo sâwnga mi ni lo, ram a închâwk
jubili kum chena dingin thiempu chun a man ruotpêk a ta, ama chun chu ni chun ruot zât chu,
Chun, jubili kum chun ân châwknapa, a ram neitu pângngai chun nei nâwk a tih.
Chun, man sut dân po po chu hmun inthieng shekel ang huin a ni ding a nih; shekel khat chu gera sâwmhni nîng a tih.
Ran inthieng naw a ni chun, i ruot dân angin ân tlan ding a na, hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a bel ding a nih; intlan a ni naw chun, a man i ruot dân angin zawr ding a nih.
Mi, nangni laia inthawka sukbohmang dinga siehran taphawt chu intlan ding a ni naw a, sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
“Ram sûnga mi, sâwmapakhat po po, thlai amanih, thei rahai khawm,
Miin a sâwma pakhat a ieng khawm intlan a nuom chun, hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a bel ding a nih.
Ran ruol le berâm ruol laia sâwmapakhat, hmawl hnuoia lût a sâwmna pei chu
A siet le a ṭhat a fie ding a ni naw a, a thleng ding a ni bawk nawh; a thleng lui chun, a thlengna leh a pahni chun thil inthieng nîng a ta, intlan nâwk thei ni naw nih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Hienghai hi Sinai tlânga Israel mipuihai ta dinga
Kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng Israelhai laia mi râl kâpa fe thei chin chu Aron le nangin a pâwl pâwlin in tiem vawng ding a nih.
I kuomah hnam tin laia mi pakhat, sûngkaw puipa an um pei ding a nih.
Simeon hnama mi Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel.
Juda hnama mi Amminadab naupa Nason.
Issakar hnama mi, Zuar naupa Nethanel.
Zebulun hnama mi Helon naupa Eliab.
Josef thla, Ephraim hnama mi Ammihud naupa Elisama. Manasse hnama mi Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel.
Benjamin hnama mi Gideon naupa Abidan.
Dan hnama mi Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer.
Aser hnama mi Okran naupa Pagiel.
Gad hnama mi Deuel naupa Eliasaph.
Naphtali hnama mi Enan naupa Ahira.
Hienghai hi mipuihai laia thlang, an pahnama ṭhuoitu, Israel sûngkuo puipahai chu an nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie le Aron chun chuong an hming lama umhai chu an ṭhuoi a,
mipui po po chu thla hnina, ni khat ni chun an ko khâwm vawng a, a chi chiin a sûngkuo kuoin, an hming indawt dân ang peiin kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng po po chu an thlatuhai hming an târlang a.
Israel naupa upatak Reuben thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming indawt dân ang peiin, pasal kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Reuben thla po po chu sîng li sâng ruk le za nga an nih.
Simeon thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam ang peiin pasal kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Simeon thla po po chu sîng nga sâng kuo le za thum an nih.
Gad thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Gad thla po pohai chu sîng li sâng nga za ruk le sâwmnga an nih.
Juda thla suonhai chu a chi chiin; an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Juda thla po pohai chu sîng sari sâng li le za ruk an nih.
Issakar thla suonhai chu, an chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Issakar thla po pohai chu sîng nga sâng li le za li an nih.
Zebulun thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Zebulun thla po pohai chu sîng nga sâng sari le za li an nih.
Josef thla laia mi Ephraim thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Ephraim thla po pohai chu sîng li le za nga an nih.
Manasse thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Manasse thla po pohai chu sîng thum sâng hni le za hni an nih.
Benjamin thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dan ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin ,
Benjamin thla po pohai chu sîng thum sâng nga le za li an nih.
Dan thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Dan thla po pohai chu sîng ruk sâng hni le za sari an nih.
Aser thla suonhai chu a chi chiin an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Aser thla po pohai chu sîng li sâng khat le za nga an nih.
Naphtali thla suonhai chu a chi chiin, an pahnam hnamin, an hming tam dân ang peiin kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng, râl kâp thei chin,
Naphtali thla po pohai chu sîng nga sâng thum le za li an nih.
Chuonghai chu an nih Mosie le Aronin Israel puipa sâwmpahni, sûngkaw puipahai le an tiemhai chu.
Chuongchun, râl kâp thei chin po po, Israel thla a pahnam hnama kum sâwmhni le a chungtieng po Israel rama mi chu an tiem a;
an tiemhai po po nuoi ruk sâng thum za nga le sâwmnga an nih.
“Levi chihai chu i tiem ve ding a ni naw a, Israel mihai lai i tiem sa ding a ni bawk nawh;

Chun, biekbûk chu a suok ding po leh Levi mihai chun ṭhiek hlak an ta, chun, biekbûk chu keizar ding a ni po leh, Levi mihai chun keizar hlak an tih, hnam dang a hung inrawl ve taphawt chu sukhlum ding nîng a tih.
Chun, Israel mihai chun mâni hmun sengah, a pâwl pâwlin an tam dân izir peiin an puon inhai chu zar an tih.

Levi mihai ruok chun Israel mi pungkhâwmhai chunga lunginsenna a um nawna dingin inhriettirna biekbûk vêla chun an zar ding a nih. Levi mihai chun inhriettirna biekbûk chu an enkawl ding a nih,” tiin a lo hril ta si a.
Chuong ang chun Israel mihai chun an thaw a;
“Israel mihai chun an sûngkuoa inchikna târ sengin an pâwl thaw dân angin an puon in an zar ding a nih; intuokna puon in ang sengin a vêlin an zar ding a nih.
Nisa hung suokna khawsak tieng panga an pâwl tam dân izir ang peia puon in zar dinghai chu Juda pâwlhai nîng an ta; chun, Juda thla puipa ding chu Amminadab naupa Nason nîng a tih.
A pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng sari sâng li le za ruk an nih.
Issakar mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Zuar naupa Nethanel nîng a tih, a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng nga sâng li le za li an nih.
Chun, Zebulun chihai, Zebulun thlahai ṭhuoitu ding chu Helon naupa Eliab nîng a ta;
a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng nga sâng sari le za li an nih.
“An pâwl tam dân izir peiin a simtieng pangah Reuben rawihai chu um an ta; an ṭhuoitu ding chu Sedeur naupa Elizur nîng a tih.
A pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng li sâng ruk le za nga an nih.
Chun, a dawta zar ding chu Simeon chihai nîng an ta; an ṭhuoitu ding chu Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel nîng a tih.
A pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng nga sâng kuo le za thum an nih.
Chun, Gad chihai, Gad mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Reuel naupa Eliasaph nîng a ta;
a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng li sâng nga za ruk le sâwmnga an nih.
Reuben mihai tamzie chu nuoi khat sîng nga sâng khat za li sâwmnga an nih. Anni hi an dawta suok ding an nih.
“Chuongchun, intuokna puon in chu suok a ta, Levi mihai chu a laiah um an ta; an umna izir peiin a pâwl pâwlin an fe seng ding a nih.
A pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng li le za nga an nih.
A dawta chun Manasse chi nîng an ta.
Manasse ṭhuoitu ding chu Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel nîng a tih; a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng thum sâng hni le za hni an nih.
A dawt nâwka chun Benjamin chihai: Benjamin mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Gideoni naupa Abidan nîng a tih;
a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng thum sâng nga le za li an nih.
Chun, Ephraim mihai tamzie chu nuoi khat sâng riet le za khat an nih. Chun, a dawttu dawt nâwktuah an suok ding a nih.
“An pâwl tam dân izir peiin Dan mihai chu a hmârtieng pangah um an ta; Dan mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer nîng a ta;
a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng ruk sâng hni le za sari an nih.
Chun, a dawta puon in zar ding chu Aser chihai nîng an tih: Aser mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Okran naupa Pagiel nîng a tih;
Chun, a dawt nâwkah Naphtali chihai; Naphtali mihai ṭhuoitu ding chu Enan naupa Ahira nîng a ta;
a pâwlhai tamzie chu sîng nga sâng thum le za li an nih.
Dan mihai tamzie chu nuoi khat sîng nga sâng sari le za ruk an nih. Chun, anni hin a pâwl pâwla suokin hnung an dâl pei ding a nih,” tiin.
Hieng hi Israel mihai sûngkuo tina mi an tiemhai chu, an tam tieng nuoi ruk sâng thum za nga le sâwmnga an nih.
Levi mihai ruok chu Israel mihai laia tiem an ni ve nawh,
Hienghai hi Sinai tlânga
“Levi chihai chu thiempu Aron kuomah ṭhuoi la, a rawng an bâwl theina dingin a kuomah inumtir rawh.
Anni chun biekbûka rawngbâwlna sin chu thawin intuokna puon in bulah ama le pungkhâwmhai puolin rawng bâwl an tih.
Thuomhnaw po po chu kawl an ta, Israel mihai puola biekbûk rawngbâwlna sin chu thâwng an tih.
Levi mihai chu Aron le a naupasalhai kuomah inhlân i ta; Israel mihai puola ama kuoma inhlân an nih.
Aron le a naupasalhai chu ruot i ta, an thiempu nina chu chang zing an tih; hnam dang hung inrawlhai chu sukhlum nîng an tih,” tiin.
“Ngai ta, Levi mihai hi Israel thlahai laia inthawka Israel thlahai nau lutir sul hung keu hmasatak aiah keima ngeiin ka lâk an na, Levi mihai chu ka ta nîng an tih;
nau lutîr po po chu ka ta an ni si a, Aigupta rama nau lutîr po po sukhlum ni khan Israelhai laia nau lutîr po po a mihriem a ranin ka puola dingin ka hau a nih; ka ta nîng an ta; kei hi
Chuongchun, Mosie chun thaw dinga thupêk a ni ang chun
Chun, Gerson naupahai hming chu an sûngkuo kuoin Libni le Simei an nih.
Chun, Kohath naupahai chu an sûngkuo kuo chun Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel an nih.
Merari naupahai chu an sûngkuo kuoin Mahli le Musi an nih. Hieng hi an pahnam ang peia Levi mihai sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Gerson chu Libni sûngkuo le Simei sûngkuo thlatu a na, hienghai hi Gerson sûngkuo an nih.
Pasal po po thla khat chin chungtieng an tiemhai chu sâng sari le za nga zet an tling a.
Gerson mihai sûngkuohai chun an puon inhai chu biekbûk thlangtieng panga chun an zar ding a nih.
Gerson mihai pahnam ṭhuoitu chu Lael naupa Eliasaph nîng a tih.
Gerson nauhaiin intuokna puon ina an enkawl ding chu biekbûk le puon in nîng a ta, a chung dâm, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr puon zâr dâm,
a tuolzâwl puon zar dâm, biekbûk bula a tuolzâwl kawtkhâr puon zar dâm, maichâm vêla mi dâm le chutaka rawngbâwlna po pohai le chun.
Chun Kohath chu Amram mihai, Izhar mihai, Hebron mihai, Uzziel mihai sûngkuohai thlatu a na; hienghai hi Kohath sûngkuohai an nih.
Pasal po po thla khat chin chungtieng an tiem dân ang chun sâng riet le za ruk an nih, hmun inthieng enkawltu dinghai chu.
Kohath naupasalhai sûngkuohai chun, biekbûk simtieng pangah an puon in an zar ding a nih.
Kohath mihai sûngkuo ṭhuoitu ding chu Uzziel naupa Elizaphan nîng a tih.
An enkawl ding chu bâwm dâm, dâwkân dâm, sathâu khâwnvar siena dâm, maichâm dâm, chutaka rawngbâwlna hai nîng a tih.
Chun, thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar chu Levi mihai ṭhuoituhai ṭhuoitu nîng a ta, hmun inthieng enkawltuhai chu inrawi a tih.
Merari chu Mahli le Musi mihai sûngkuo thlatu a nih. Hienghai hi Merari thlahai an nih.
Pasal po po thla khat chin chungtieng an tiemna ang chun sâng ruk le za hni an nih.
Merari sûngkuo pahnam ṭhuoitu ding chu Abihail naupa Zuriel a nih; biekbûk hmartieng pangah an puon in an zar ding a nih.
Merari naupasalhai enkawl dinga ruot chu biekbûk thingphêk remkhâwm dâm, a bangruhai dâm, a banhai dâm, ân nghatna kerkuokhai dâm, hmangruo po pohai le chutaka rawngbâwlnaa chu an nih;
a tuolzâwl inhuonna banhai dâm, an nghatna kerkuokhai dâm, a kildenahai le a hruihai leh.

Biekbûk saktieng pang intuokna puon in bul, nisa suokna tieng panga puon in zartu ding chu Mosie le Aron le a naupasalhai nîng an tih, hmun inthienga chun Israel mihai puolin a ṭûl taphawt chu thâwng an tih; hnam dang hung inrawl taphawt chu sukhlum ding nîng an tih.
Levi chu (
Chuongchun, Mosie chun
An hming indawt ang peia thla khat chin chungtieng naulutîr pasal po po an tiemhai chu sîng hni sâng hni za hni sâwmsari le pathum an nih.
Chun, Levi mihai nêka an tamna Israel mihai naulutir za hni sâwmsari le pathum intlanna dingin,
a lukipin shekel nga seng i lâk ding a nih; hmun inthieng shekel angin i lâk ding a na, (shekel chu gera sawmhni a nih);
a chuong hai, intlanna sum chu Aron le a naupasalhai i pêk ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Levi mihai intlanhai bâk intlanhaia inthawka intlanna sum chu;
Israel mihai nau lutîra inthawk chun hmun inthieng shekel angin sâng khat za thum sâwmruk le panga a lâk a.
Chun,
“Levi nauhai laia Kohath mihai a sûngkuo kuoin, a pahnam hnamin, kum sâwmthum chin chungtieng,
kum sâwmnga chenin intuokna puon ina rawngbâwlna sin thaw tlâk ding po po zât chu tiem vawng ro.
Intuokna puon in hmun inthiengtaka Kohath naupasalhai sinthaw ding chu hieng hi a nih:
umhmun an sawn ding po leh Aron chu a naupasalhai leh lût an ta, hmun inthieng puon zar chu hlîp thlâng an ta, chu chun thuthlungna bâwm chu inkhum an ta,
seal vunin inkhum an ta, chu chunga chun puon dumpâwlin inkhum an ta, a zâwnna hmawl chu inbûk an tih.

Chun, inentirna bei dâwkân chunga chun thlênghai, riminhnik siena thlêngtêhai, thlêngkûmhai le dâwnmi thilinhlânna notung lienhai an sie ding a nih; chun, chatlak loa sie bei chu chutaka chun a um ding a nih;
chu chu puon senlârin inkhum an ta, inkhumna seal vunin inkhum an ta, a zâwnfung an inbûk ding a nih.
Êntu khâwnvar siena le chutaka dinga an hmang ding a khâwnvarhai, a chaichehai, a vut sienahai, hriek bûr po pohai puon dumpâwlin inkhum an tih;
chu chu le a hmangruohai po po chu inkhumna seal
Chun, rangkachak maichâm chu puon dumpâwlin inkhum nâwk an ta, inkhumna seal vunin inkhum nâwk an ta, a zâwnfung chu inbûk an tih.
Hmun inthienga an hmangruo, rawngbâwlna bûrlebêlhai po po chu la vawng an ta, puon dumpâwlin fûn an ta, inkhumna seal vunin inkhum an ta, zâwnnaa chun an sie ding a nih.
Maichâma meivâm chu luok fai an ta, a chungah puon senduk phâng an ta,
a chunga chun an rawngbâwl vêlna bûrlebêlhai po po, mei lâkna dâm, sa thurna thîrkuoi dâm, vutluo dâm, chawtawl dâm, maichâm bûrlebêlhai po po chu sieng an ta; chun, an inbûk ding a nih.

Aron le a naupasalhai chun hmun inthieng le hmun inthieng bûrlebêlhai po po an inkhum zo a, umhmun sawn ding hun taphawta chun Kohath naupasalhai chu a zâwn dingin hung inthawk hlak an ta, nisienlakhawm, thil inthienghai chu an them ding a ni nawh, an them chun chu thîng an tih. Hieng hi intuokna puon ina Kohath naupasalhai chanpuol ding a nih.

Thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar thaw ding chu, insit ding hriek dâm, riminhnik dâm, chatlak lova fâkmi thilinhlân dâm, hriek nâlmi dâm, biekbûk le chutaka thil um po pohai enkai dâm, hmun inthieng le a thuomhnawhai ngaituo vêl chu a nih,” tiin.
“Kohath mihai pahnam chu Levi mihaia inthawkin sukbohmang ni naw sien;

amiruokchu, thil inthieng takhai an hung hnai pha thi pha lova, an hring lem theina dingin hieng hin thaw ro: Aron le a naupasalhai chu lût hai sienla, an thaw ding le an chanpuol ding seng ruotpêk raw hai seh,
amiruokchu, thil inthieng en dingin sâwt nawte khawm lût naw raw hai se, an lût chun thîng an tih,” tiin.
Chun,
“Gerson naupasalhai khawm an pahnam hnamin, a sûngkuo kuoin tiem vawng rawh;
kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga mi chenin rawngbâwlna sin intuokna puon ina thaw ding po po zât chu tiem vawng rawh.
Gerson sûngkuo sinthaw ding chu rawngbâwl tieng le rikphur tieng a nih,
biekbûk puonzâr dâm, intuokna puon in ân khumna leh, a chung inkhumna seal vun dâm, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr puonzâr dâm,
biekbûk le maichâm vêla tuollai puonzârhai dâm, kawtkhâr puonzâr dâm, a hruihai dâm le chutaka rawngbâwlna dinga hmangruo po po dâm phur an ta. Chuong thila thaw ṭûl po po chu an thaw ding a nih.
Gerson naupasalhai sinthaw dinga rawngbâwlna tieng le rikphur tienga an chanpuol po po chu Aron le a naupasalhai thu thu nîng a tih, an phur ding po ruotpêk i tih.
Chuong chu intuokna puon ina Gerson naupasalhai sûngkuohai sinthaw ding chu a na, an thaw ding chu thiempu Aron naupa Ithamar ruot ding a nih.
“Merari naupasalhai chu a sûngkuo kuoin, a pahnam hnamin i tiem ding a nih.
Kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga chenin rawngbâwlnaa ṭhang thei, intuokna puon ina sinthawtu ding zât chu i tiem vawng ding a nih.
Intuokna puon ina an sinthaw, an chanpuol ding chu hi hi a nih: biekbûk thingphêkhai, a bangruhai, a banhai dâm, ân nghatna kerkuok dâm,
a kawt inhuonna banhai, ân nghatna kerkuok dâm, kildenahai dâm, a hruihai dâm, a hmangruo po po le, a hmangruo dang po po phur dâm, a hming lam pei sengin an chanpuol ding i ruot pêk ding a nih.
Chuong chu thiempu Aron naupa Ithamar rawia intuokna puon ina Merari naupasalhai sûngkuohai thaw ding a nek nek chena an rawngbâwl dân ding chu a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie le Aron le a pungkhâwmhai laia ṭhuoituhai chun,
Kohath naupasalhai chu a sûngkuo kuoin, a pahnam hnamin intuokna puon ina sinthawtu ding zât chu kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga mi chenin an tiem a.
Chuong a pahnam hnama an tiemhai chu sâng hni za sari le sâwmnga an nih.
Chuong chu an nih intuokna puon ina rawngbâwl hlak Kohath mihai thla an itiem, Mosie hmanga
Gerson naupasalhai, intuokna puon ina sinthaw dinga rawngbâwl thei zât ding chu, a sûngkuo kuoin,
a pahnam hnamin kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga mi chena tiem an na;
chuong a pahnam hnama, a sûngkuo kuoa an tiemhai chu sâng hni za ruk le sâwmthum an nih.
Chuong chu an nih Gerson naupasalhai sûngkuohai, intuokna puon ina rawngbâwl po po,
Merari naupasalhai, intuokna puon ina sin thaw dinga rawngbâwl ding zât chu, a sûngkuo kuoin, a pahnam hnamin,
kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga mi chena tiem an na;
chuong a sûngkuo kuoa an tiemhai chu sâng thum le za hni an nih.
Chuong chu an nih Merari naupasalhai sûngkuohai Mosie hmanga
Levi mihai, rawngbâwl ding le intuokna puon ina mi phur phurtu ding zât,
a pahnam hnamin, a sûngkuo kuoin kum sâwmthum chen chungtieng kum sâwmnga mi chenin Mosie le Aron le Israel ṭhuoituhai chun an tiem a;
chuong an tiemhai chu sâng riet za nga le sâwmriet an nih.
Mosie hmanga
“Israel mihai chu riebûka inthawkin inphâr po po le thipût po po le mithi leia pawrche taphawt chu sie suok vawng dingin thu pe rawh
a nuhmei a pasalin i sie suokin riebûk puoah i sie ding a nih; a lai taka ka umna hlak an riebûk chu an sukpawrche nawna dingin,” tiin
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chun chuong ang chun an thaw a, riebûk puoah an sie dawk a;
“Israel mipuihai kuomah hril la, ‘Pasalin amanih, nuhmeiin amanih Lalpa ringna bawsein mihriem thaw hlak suol ieng el khawm a thaw chun, chu mi chu thiemnaw chang a nih;
a suksuolnaa chun thupha a chawi ding a nih; chun, a suksuol man chu kimtaka thung ding a na, a hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat a suksuolnapa chu a pêk belsa ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mi chun suol man intêltu ding laibung a nei naw chun, a suksuol man chu
Chun, Israel mipuihai thil inthieng a thêna thên thilinhlân po po, thiempu kuoma inhlân taphawt chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a ta.
Mi tin thil inthieng chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a tih, miin thiempu a pêk taphawt chu thiempu chanpuol nîng a tih,’ tiin,” a ta.
“Israel mipuihai kuomah hril la, an kuomah, ‘Nuhmeiin khaw dang nghain a pasal suolsan sienla,
mîn zâlpui sienla, a pasalin hre si naw sienla: chuong anga a um zing a, insukpawrche zing pum siin, lân puong si lovin, hretu khawm um si lo, man ni naw sienla;
chun, thîkna lungril putin a nuhmei insukpawrchea um chu thîk sienla amanih, thîkna lungril putin a nuhmei insukpawrche si lo chu thîk sienla,
chuong ang a ni chun a pasal chun a ta dinga thilinhlân buṭei
Thiempu hung ṭhuoi a ta,
thiempu chun pil bêlin tui inthieng lâng a ta, biekbûk ṭuong pilvut lâng a ta, tuia chun phul a tih.
Thiempu chun nuhmei chu

Chun, thiempu chun nuhmei chu ṭawng inkhâmtir a ta, nuhmei kuoma chun, I pasal ni lo mi dang tukhawma an zâlpui naw che a, pawrchena tieng i la fe pet naw chun ṭawngsie intlungtirtu, hi tui khaa inthawk hin fihlîm i tih.
Amiruokchu, khaw dang nghaa i lo pawrche a, i pasal ni lo mi tuin amanih a zâlpui che chun fihlîm naw ti nih, a ti ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun nuhmei chu vau a ta, ṭawng inkhâmtir a ta, nuhmei kuomah thiempu chun,
Ṭawngsie intlungtirtu hi tui hi i rilah lût a ta, i phing sukvûng a ta, i êlpui inkâr sukzûr a tih, tîng a ta; chun, nuhmei chun, Amen, Amen a lo ti ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun chuong ṭawngsie thuhai chu lekhabuah ziek a ta, khâkna tui chun inchieng a tih:
chun, nuhmei chu ṭawngsie intlungtirtu khâkna tui chu indâwntir bawk a tih: chuongchun, ṭawngsie intlungtirtu tui chu a phîng sûngah lût a ta, nasatakin hung nâng a tih.
Chun, thiempu chun thîkna thilinhlân chu nuhmei kuta inthawk lâng a ta,
thiempu chun fâkmi thilinhlân hrietzingna ding chu vei khat lâng a ta, maichâma chun râwng a ta, chu zo chun tui chu nuhmei chu ân dâwntir ding a nih.

Tui a hang indâwntir chun a lo pawrche a, a pasal chunga thil a lo suksuol chun ṭawngsie intlungtirtu tui chu a phîng sûngah lût a ta, nasatakin hung nâng a ta, a phîng chu hung invûng a ta, a êlpui chu hung chêr a ta, chuongchun, nuhmei chu a chipuihai lai ṭawngsephur hung nîng a tih.
Amiruokchu, nuhmei chu a lo pawrche naw a, ân thieng chun fihlîm a ta, nau vawn thei pei hung nîng a tih.
Hi hi, nuhmei, khaw dang nghaa, a pasal ni lo, mi dang le lo insukpawrche amanih,
pasalin thîkna lungril a hung put a, a nuhmei a thîk amanih a rêl dân chu a nih; chuongchun,
Chuongchun, pasal chu rîtlonaa chun fihlîm a ta, nuhmei chun a suolna maw chu phur a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Israel mipuihai kuomah hril la, an kuomah, ‘Pasal amanih, nuhmei amani khawma ieng amanih thutiem bîk,
Ân suktum sûng po chun grêp hruia mi a laimu khawm, a hâwng khawm a fâk ding a ni nawh.
Insuktumna thu ân tiem sûng po chun a lu khawm vâw dêr lo ding a nih.
A pa hai, a nu hai, a unaupa hai, a farnu hai amanih thi thua khawm ân sukpawrche ding a ni nawh. Pathien ta dinga ân suktumna chun a khuop leiin.
“Ân suktum sûng po chun
A kâwlah mi hung thi ta thutin, ân suktumna lu chu lo sukpawrche ta ang sienla, a inthien ni, a ni sari ni chun a lu chu a vaw ding a nih.
Chun, ni riet ni chun intuokna puon in kawtkhârah thiempu kuomah vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârvate tuok khat amanih a hung chawi ding a nih.

Thiempu chun pakhat chu suol thâwina dingin inhlân a ta, pakhat chu pumrawhmang thilinhlânah, mithi leia a suksuolnaa chun inremna siempêk a tih; chun, chu ni vêk chun a lu chu a sukthieng ding a nih.
Thiemnaw thâwina dingin berâmte a chal kum khat mi hung chawiin ân suktumna nihai chu
Chun,

inremna thilinhlân dingin berâmchal demkailo pakhat, chawl ṭhanglo bei le beiphit inditak hrieka hmeta siem beihlawm le hrieka chûl beiphêk inphân bâwm khat, an fâkmi thilinhlân ding le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai leh an inhlân ding a nih.
Thiempu chun chuong chu
Berâmchal chu bâwma chawl ṭhanglo bei le chun inremna inthâwina thilinhlân dingin
Nazarit mi chun intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun ân suktumna lu chu vâwng a ta, insuktumna sam chu lâng a ta, inremna inthâwi thilinhlân hnuoia meia chun a raw ding a nih.

Chun, thiempu chun berâmchal dâr suong hmin le bâwma chawl ṭhanglo bei pakhat le chawl ṭhanglo beiphêk inphân pakhat lâng a ta. Nazarit mi chun ân suktumna lu chu a vâw zo chun inchawitir a tih; chun, thiempu chun thêna thilinhlân dingin
Hi hi thiempu chanpuol inthieng chu nîng a ta, a thêna thên ir le a mal leh; chu zoa chun Nazarit chun uoin chu dâwn thei tâng a tih.
Hi hi a nih Nazarit thutiem dân le
“Aron le a naupasalhai kuomah, ‘Hieng ang hin Israel mipuihai chu mal in sâwm ding a nih, an kuomah,
lunginsiet pei raw se cheu;
lungmuongna pe raw se cheu, ti ro,’
tiin hril rawh.
Chuongchun, Israel mipuihai chunga chun ka hming chu inchuongtir nîng a ta, chun, keiin anni chu malsâwm ka tih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun biek- bûk chu ân ngir zo a, hriek a nâl a, a sukthieng a, a thuomhnaw po po le a maichâm le a bûrlebêlhai po po hriek a nâl a, a sukthieng ni chun,
Israel ṭhuoituhai, an pahnam ṭhuoituhai chun thilinhlân an inhlân a, chuonghai chu an hnam ṭhuoituhai, an tiemhai chunga kha um an nih.
An thilinhlânhai chu tawlailîr chung nei paruk le, bâwngchal sâwmpahni, ṭhuoitu pahniin tawlailîr pakhat pei, pakhatin bâwngchal pakhat pei
“Biekbûk sina dingin a ṭangkai ding a na, lo la raw khai, Levi mihai an sin thaw izir ang peiin pe seng i ta,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun tawlailîrhai le bâwngchalhai chu a lâk a, Levi mihai a pêk a.
Tawlailîr pahni le bâwngchal pali chu Gerson naupasalhai chu an sin izir peiin a pêk a.
Tawlailîr pali le bâwngchal pariet chu thiempu Aron naupa Ithamar rawihai Merari naupasalhai chu an sin izir peiin a pêk a.
Kohath naupasalhai ruok chu a pêk ve nawh; hmun inthieng sin chu an chanpuol a na, a zâwna zâwn ding a ni leiin.
Thiempuhai chun hriek nâl ni chun maichâm inhlânna dinga an thilinhlânhai chu maichâm bula chun an inhlân a.
Chun,
Ni khat nia thilinhlân inhlântu chu Juda chi Amminadab naupa Nason a na;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rangkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga, hieng hi Amminadab naupa Nason thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni hni ni chun Issakarhai ṭhuoitu Zuar naupa Nethanel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlâna ding chun tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrâwhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga ân hlân a. Hieng hi Zuar naupa Nethanel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni thum ni chun Zebulun mihai ṭhuoitu Helon naupa Eliab chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;

inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Helon naupa Eliab thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni li ni chun Reuben mihai ṭhuoi- tu Sedeur naupa Elizur chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;

suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat; inremna inthâwi thilinhlân dingin bâwngchal pahni;
berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Sedeur naupa Elizur thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni nga ni chun Simeon thla Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina ding kêlchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, ni ruk ni chun Gad mihai ṭhuoitu Deuel naupa Eliasaph chun ân hlân a,

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;

suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga an nih. Hieng hi Deuel naupa Eliasaph thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni sari ni chun Ephraim mihai ṭhuoitu Ammihud naupa Eliasam chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa, beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat,
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Ammihud naupa Eliasam thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni riet ni chun Manasse mihai ṭhuoitu Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, beramtê a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni kuo ni chun Benjamin mihai ṭhuoitu Gideoni naupa Abidan chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Gideoni naupa Abidan thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, ni sawm ni chun Dan mihai ṭhuoitu Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat,
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer thilinhlânhai chu a nih.
Ni sâwmpakhat ni chun, Aser mihai ṭhuoitu Okran naupa Pagiel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Okran naupa Pagiel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni sâwmpahni ni chun, Naphtali mihai ṭhuoitu Enan naupa Ahira chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlânhai chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel zâ le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, berâmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kelchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Enan naupa Ahira thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, maichâm hriek nâl nia Israel ṭhuoituhai thilinhlânhai chu tangkaruo thlêng sâwmpahni, tangkaruo châwtawl sâwmpahni, rângkachak haihaw sâwmpahni;
tangkaruo thlêng chu shekel zâ le sâwmthum tluka rik seng an nih; châwtawl chu sâwmsari seng a rik a nih; tangkaruo bûrlebêlhai po po chu hmun inthienga shekel sâng hni le za li tluka rik a nih.
Riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw sâwmpahni chu hmun inthienga shekel sâwm tluka rik seng an nih; rângkachak haihawhai po po chu shekel za le sâwmhni tluka rik a nih;
pumrawhmang thilinhlân dinga bâwngchal po po chu sâwmpahni an nih; berâmchal sâwmpahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi sâwmpahni, an fâkmi thilinhlânhai leh; chun, suol thâwina dingin kêlchal sâwmpahni;

inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal sâwmhni pali, berâmchal sâwmruk, kêlchal sâwmruk le berâmte a chal kum khat mi chu sâwmruk a nih. Hi hi hriek nâl hnunga maichâm inhlânna thilinhlânhai a nih.

Chuongchun, intuokna puon ina ama be dinga Mosie a lût chun thuthlung bâwm chunga zângaina ṭhungpha chungtienga cherub pahnihai inkâra inthawk chun ama hung bein râwl a hriet a; râwl chun a biek ta a.
“Aron hril la, a kuomah, ‘Khâwnvarhai chu i sitin khâwnvar pasari chun sathâu khâwnvar siena hmatieng a ên ding a nih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Aron chun chuong ang chun a thaw a;
Hi khâwnvar siena siem dân chu rangkachak, a suta sut a nih, a ngul bul le a pâr chena sut a nih;
“Levi mihai chu Israel mi danghai laia inthawkin suktum la, sukthieng rawh.
Anni chu sukthieng dingin hieng ang hin i thaw ding a nih; an chungah intlêng faina tui infar la, an taksa po po chu invâwtir la; an puonhai insâwptir la, insukthiengtir rawh.
Bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, a fâkmi thilinhlân, hrieka pawl beiphit inditak leh inlâktir la; suol thâwina dingin bâwngchal tuoi dang pakhat i kei bawk ding a nih.
Levi mihai chu intuokna puon in bula chun ṭhuoi la, Israel mipui po po chu inpungkhâwmtir vawng rawh;
chun, Levi mihai chu
chuongchun, Aron chun Levi mihai chu
Levi mihai chun bâwngchal luahai chun an kut innghat an ta; chun, Levi mihai ta dinga inremna siemna dingin, pakhat chu suol thâwina dingin, pakhat chu pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin
Levi mihai chu Aron le a naupasalhai hmaa chun inumtir i ta;
Chuong ang chun Israel mihai laia inthawkin Levi mihai chu suktum i ta, chuongchun, Levi mihai chu ka ta nîng an tih.
Chu zoa chun Levi mihai chu intuokna puon ina rawngbâwl dingin lût an ta; nangin anni chu sukthieng i ta, a thêna thên thilinhlânah în hlân ding a nih.
Israel mihai laia ka chanpuol dinga ruot an ni si a; sul hung kêu ta po po Israel mihai naulutir po po aiah ka chanpuola ka nei tah a nih.
Israel mihai laia naulutir po po chu ka ta an ni hrim a, mihriem ni leh, ran ni leh; Aigupta rama naulutir po po ka sukhlum lai khan ka chanpuolah ka ruot tah a nih.

Chuongchun, Israel mihai aia intuokna puon ina rawngbâwl ding le, Israel mihaiin hmun inthieng an hung hnai khawma Israel mihai laia hri ân lêng nawna dinga inremna siem dingin Israel mihai laia inthawkin Levi mihai hi Aron le a naupasalhai ka pêk a nih,” tiin.
Chuong ang chun Mosie hai, Aron hai, Israel mi pungkhâwmhai po po chun Levi mihai chunga chun an thaw a; Levi mihai chungchâng thua
Chuongchun, Levi mihai chu suola inthawk chun an insukthieng a, an puonhai an sâwp a; chun, Aron chun
Chun, chu zoa chun Levi mihai chu Aron le a naupasalhai hnuoia an rawngbâwl sin thaw ding chun intuokna puon in sûnga chun an lût a; Levi mihai chungchâng thua
“Levi mihai chanpuol chu hieng hi a nih, kum sâwmhni panga chen chungtieng chun intuokna puon ina rawngbâwlna sin thâwng an ta;
kum sâwmnga mihai chun chu rawngbâwl sin chu châwlsan an ta, rawngbâwl ta naw ni hai.
Amiruokchu, intuokna puon in enkawl thua chun an unauhai ṭhangpui pei an ta, rawng ruok chu bâwl ta naw ni hai. Hieng ang hin Levi mihai chu an sin ding i rêlpêk ding a nih,” tiin.
“Israel mihai chun Fekân ruoiṭhe chu a hunbi peiah nei raw se.
A hunbiah, hi thla ni sâwmpali zântieng in nei ding a nih; chutaka thaw dinga ruot ang po po le, a dân ang po po chu in nei ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel mihai chu Fekân ruoiṭhe chu nei dingin a hril a.
Chuongchun, Sinai thlalêra chun thla khatna ni sâwmpali ni zântieng fekân ruoiṭhe chu an nei ta a;
Chun, tuhai amanih mithi ruong leia thieng naw an lo um a. Chu ni chun fekân ruoiṭhenaa chun an ṭhang ve thei naw a. Chuongchun, chu ni chun Mosie le Aron hmaa chun an fe a.
Chuonghai chun a kuomah, “Mithi ruong leiin kan inthieng naw a ni ta a, iengleiin am Israel mihai laia a hunbia
Mosie chun an kuomah, “Lo to ta u, in chungchâng thuah
“Israel mihai kuomah, ‘Nangni laia mi khawm, in thlahai laia mi khawm, mithi ruong leia thieng naw amanih, lo thanghmang amanih an um hlau chun
Thla hnina ni sâwmpali ni zântieng an nei ding a nih. Chawl ṭhanglo bei hlohna kha leh an fâk ding a nih.
Chuong ang chun a um zing a; sûm chun a tuom zing a, zâna chun mei angin ân lâng a.
Sûmin puon in chu ân kiengsan po leh, Israel mihai chun fe zai an rêl hlak a; chun, sûm a ngirna hmuna phawt chun Israel mihai chun umhmun an khuor hlak.
Biekbûk chunga sûm chu sâwttak a um chun Israel mihai chun
A châng chun sûm chu biekbûk chunga chun sâwt nawtê chau a um hlak a; chuongchun,
