A châng chun sûm chu zântienga inthawkin zîngtieng chen a um a; chun, zîngkâra sûm chu ân vawr sâng chun an fe hlak a; ni khat chau amanih, zân khat chau amanih uma sûm chu ân vawr sâng chun an fe el hlak a.

Biekbûk chungah sûm chu ni hni amanih, thla khat amanih, kum khat amani khawm a um chun, chutaka a um zing chun Israel mihai chun umhmun an khuor zing a, an fe ngai naw a; ân vawr sâng ruok chun an fe hlak.
“Tangkaruo tawtawrâwt pahni siem la, a suta sutin siem rawh; mipuihai ko khâwmna ding le insuoktirna dingin i hmang ding a nih.
Chun, pakhat chau an mût chun Israel ṭhuoituh, an pahnama lûhai pei chau i kuomah hung khâwm an tih.
Râlkhêl mûta in mût chun saktieng panga umhai chu an suok ding a nih.
Chun, râlkhêl mûta a vawihninaa in mût chun simtieng panga umhai chu an suok ding a nih; an suokna dingin râlkhêl mûtin an mût ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mipuihai hung khâwmna ding ruok chun mût phawt in ta, râlkhêl mût ruok chun mût lovin.
Aron naupasal thiempuhai chun tawtawrâwt chu an mût ding a nih. Chu chu in ta dingin in thlahai chenah in kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
In rama hmêlma hnuoisietu cheu do dinga in fe ding phâ râlkhêl mûtin tawtawrâwthai chu in mût ding a nih; chuongchun,

In hlimna nia dâm, in Fekân ruoiṭhe hunbi neia dâm, in thla thara dâm le, in pumrawhmang thilinhlâna le in inremna thilinhlân inthâwinahaia chun tawtawrâwt chu in mût ding a nih; chuongchun, in Pathien hmaa in ta dinga hrietzingna a ni ding a nih; kei hi
Chun, kum hnina, thla hnina, chu thla ni sâwmhni ni chun sûm chu inhriettirna biekbûk chunga inthawk chun a lo invawr sâng ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chu an fe dân bi ang chun Sinai thlalêra inthawk chun an suoka, Chun, Paran thlalêra chun sûm chu a ngîr ta a.
Mosie hmanga
Juda pâwlhai an pâwl tam dân izir peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Amminadab naupa Nason a nih.
Issakar rawi hotu chu Zuar naupa Nethanel a nih.
Zebulun rawi hotu chu Helon naupa Eliab a nih.
Chun, biekbûk chu an ṭhiek a, Gerson naupasalhai le Merari naupasal, biekbûk zâwntuhai chu an suok a.
Reuben rawi chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Sedeur naupa Elizur a nih.
Simeon rawi hotu chu Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel a nih.
Gad rawi hotu chu Deuel naupa Eliasaph a nih.
Chun, Kohath rawi chun thil inthieng chu an zâwn a, an suok a; chun, an va tlung chun biekbûk chu indin zo hieu a lo ni ta a.
Ephraimhai chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a; an hotu chu Ammihud naupa Elisama a nih;
Manassehai hotu chu Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel a nih;
Benjaminhai hotu chu Gideoni naupa Abidan a nih.
Chun, a nuhnungtaka chun Dan hai chu an pâwl tam dân ang peiin an suok a, an hotu chu Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer a nih.
Aserhai hotu chu Okran naupa Pagiel a nih.
Naphtalihai hotu chu Enan naupa Ahira a nih.
Chuong ang chu a nih Israel mipuihai an pâwl tam dân ang peia an fe dân chu; chuong ang tak chun an suok ta a.
Chun, Mosie tarpupa Midian mi Reuel naupa Hobab kuomah Mosie chun, “Pêng ka ti cheu,
Ama chun a kuomah, “Hung da el ka tih, keini ramah ka laibunghai kuomah fe lem ka tih,” a ta.
Mosie chun, “Mi fesan lul naw raw khai, thlalêra umhmun kan khuorna ding chu i hriet lem si a, kan ta dingin mit i hung ni ding a nih.
Keini leh i fe ve chun,
Chuongchun,
An bûka inthawka an suok chun
Chun, ân nghat po leh, “Aw
Mipuihai chun
Chuongchun, mipuihai chun Mosie an ko a; Mosie chu
Chu hmun hminga chun Tabera an ta,
Nuom nuoma Aigupta rama nga dâm ei fâk hlak kha ei hriet zing a, fanghmahai, vaifanghmahai, purûn sel fâk mihai, purûn bâlhai le purûn vâr hai dâm,
amiruokchu, tuhin ei thlin a ṭâwl zo an ta hi, iengkhawm beisei ding hrim hrim a um nawh: manna chau naw hi chu,” an ta.
(manna chu koriendar mu ang, ân lang dâna chun lunghlu ang hi a nih.
Mihai chun an rût khâwm a, rawtnawinaah an rawtnawi a, suma dâm an suk a, bêlah an suong a, bei dâmin an siem a, hang fâk chun hrieka zêu bei ang a nih.
Riebûka chun zâna dâidâw a tlâkin manna chu a tla sa ve a).
Chun, mipuihai chu a sûng sûngin an puon in kawtkhâr senga chun an ṭap ti Mosie chun a lo hriet a; chun,

Hieng mipuihai po po hi ka nauhai bêk am an nih? An pi le an puhai ṭawng inkhâma pêk i tiem rama ṭhuoi lût dingin, ‘Nau pawmtuin nênê ne lai a pawm angin i ângsûngah pawm rawh,’ i mi ti ding ela ka ṭhuoi suok tâwl am an nih?
Hieng mipui po po pêk ding hi khâwlaia sa am nei ka ta? ‘Kan fâk dingin sâ mi pe rawh,’ tia ṭapin an mi thaw si a.
Hieng mipui po po hi mâni ngawt chun ka phur zo nawh, ka ta dingin a rik taluo a nih.
Chun, nangin mipui kuomah, ‘Zînga ding hin insukthieng vawng unla, chuongchun, sa chu fa ngei in tih. Sa fâk ding tuin am mi pêng a ta? Aigupta rama inhawi ei ti vei leh, tiin
Ni khat amanih, ni hni amanih, ni nga amanih, ni sâwm amanih, ni sâwmhni amanih el khawm ni lovin,
thla khat pumhlûm, nghawk khawp rak le in hnâr kuoa suok rak khawpin fâng in tih; nangni laia um
Mosie chun, “Ka umpui kea fe thei ṭhieu khawm mipui nuoi ruk an nih, ‘thla khat pumhlûm fâk ding sâ pêng ka tih,’ ti el chu.
Berâm ruol le ran ruol khawm thatpêk ta ang inla, an khawp ding am a nih? Mediterranean tuipuia nga po po khawm manpêk inla, an khawp ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu a suok a,
Chuongchun,

Amiruokchu, bûka chun mi pahni an um a, pakhat hming chu Eldad a na, mi dang hming chu Medad a nih; thlarau chu an chungah a um a, tiemhai laia ṭhang chu an na, puon ina ruok chun an va fe ve naw a; bûka chun thu an hril a.
Chuongchun, tlangvâl pakhat a va tlân a, Mosie a va hril a, “Eldad le Medad chun bûkah thu an hril an hril el,” a va ta.
Chun, Nun naupa Josua, a tleirâwl tira inthawka Mosie rawngbâwltu chun a dawn a, “Pu Mosie, khap el rawh,” a ta.
Mosie chun a kuomah, “Keia leia ngaimaw am i nih?
Chuongchun, Mosie chu bûka chun a lût nâwk a, ama le Israel mi upahai le chun.
Chun,
Chun, chu sa chu an fâk lai, an la fâk zo hmain, mipuihai chungah
Chun, Kibroth-hattaavaa in- thawk chun mipuihai chu Hezerothah an fe a, Hezerotha chun an um ta a.
Miriam le Aron chun Mosiein Kus mi nuhmeia a nei leiin an hrilsiet a; Kus mi chu a nei ngei si a.
Anni chun, “Mosie kuoma chau hin am a nih
Mosie chu hnuoi chunga mihriem po poa zainêm tak a na.
Chun, Mosie le Aron le Miriam kuomah
Puon in kawtkhârah a lo ngîr a, Aron le Miriam chu a ko a, an pahni chun an hung suok a.
Ama chun, “Ka thu hi ngai ro, nangni lai hin zâwlnei in um chun ama chu kei
Chuongchun,
Puon in chunga sûm chu ân kieng ta a; chun, ngai ta, Miriam chu vûr ang ela vârin a hung inphâr ta a; Aron chun Miriam chu a hei en a, inphâr a lo ni ta zing el ti a hmu a.
Chuongchun, Aron chun Mosie kuomah, “Aw pu, kan chungah suol innghat lul naw raw khai, invêttakin kan lo thaw a, kan lo suol tah a nih.
Mi a nu sula inthawka a hung suok tîra thi sa deuthaw angin Miriam chu um lul naw raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun, “Aw Pathien, sukdam nâwk ta khai,” tiin
Chun,
Chuongchun, Miriam chu riebûk puoah ni sari an khum hmang a. Miriam chu an ṭhuoi lût hma khat chun mipuihai chu an intâwl sawn naw a.
Chu zoa chun mipuihai chu Hazerotha inthawk chu an suok a, Paran thlalêrah umhmun an khuor a.
Chun,
“Israel mihai ka pêk Kanaan ram va enthla dingin mihai tir rawh; an pahnam tina mi, an ṭhuoituhai laia mi pakhat pei i tir ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Paran thlalêra inthawk chun
Hieng hi an hming a nih. Reuben hnama mi Zakkur naupa Sammua.
Simeon hnama mi Hori naupa Saphat.
Juda hnam laia mi Jephunne naupa Kaleb.
Issakar hnama mi Josef naupa Igal.
Ephraim hnama mi Nun naupa Hosea.
Benjamin hnama mi Raphu naupa Palti.
Zebulun hnama mi Sodi naupa Gaddiel.
Josef hnam, (Manasse hnam an ti) laia mi Susi naupa Gaddi.
Dan hnama mi Gemali naupa Ammiel.
Aser hnama mi Mikael naupa Sethur.
Naphtali hnama mi Vophsi naupa Nahbi.
Gad hnama mi Maki naupa Geuel.
Hieng hi ram enthla dinga Mosiein a tirhai hming chu a nih. Nun naupa Hosea chu Mosie chun Josua tiin a thleng a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Kanaan ram enthla dingin anni rawi chu a tir a, an kuomah, “Simtieng fe phawt unla, tlângram tieng chun fe pei unla.
ram chu ieng ang am a nih ti dâm, chuonga chêng mipuihai chu an hrât le hrât naw dâm, an tlâwm le an tam dâm,

an umna ram chu a ṭha le ṭha naw dâm, an umna khuohai dâm chu ieng ang am a na, puon in el amanih, annawleh kul neiin am a ni ti dâm, chun, ram chu a chênghnâwng le hnâwng naw, a ram upa le upa naw dâm khawm va enthla unla.
Chun, huoitakin um unla, chu rama theirahai chu hung phur ro,” a ta. Grêp ra hmasa ra hun lai tak a nih.
Chuongchun, an hang suok ta a, ram chu Zin thlalêra inthawka Hamath lûtna Rehob chenin an enthlâk vawng a.

Simtienga chun an hang fe phawt a, Hebron an va tlung a, chutaka chun Anak thlahai, Ahiman mihai, Sesai mihai, Talmai mihai an um a, (Hebron chu Aigupta rama Zoan inngîr hma kum saria inngîr tah a nih).
Chun, Eskol ruom an va tlung a, chutaka grêp ra bâwr khat a kâu pumin an sât bawng a, hmawlin mi pahniin an zâwn a; theibufaihai le theichanghai an hâwn bawk a.
Chu hmun chu Eskol ruom an ta; Israel mihaiin chutaka grêp bâwr chu an sat thlâk leiin.
An ram va enthlâk chu ni sâwmli an thang a, an hung kîr nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, Paran thlalêra Kades a chun Mosie le Aron le Israel mipui po po kuom chu an hung tlung a, chu ram theihai chu an inentir a.
Amiruokchu, a rama mi umhai chu mi hrâttak tak el an na, khuohai khawm kul nei, ropuitak tak an nih; chun, Anak thlahai khawm kan hmu bawk a.
Amiruokchu, Kaleb chun, Mosie hmaa mipui chu a sukto ṭhuop a, “Hang inthawk vak ei tiu khai, hang la el ei tiu, hne ngei ngei ei tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai kuoma chun an ram hang enthlâk chu, “Ram enthla dinga kan hei fang chu, a sûnga umhai fa zo hmang a na, chun, a umhai kan hmuhai khawm chu mi âwmkhautak tak el an na;
chutaka chun Anak thlahai, mi lienhai, âwmkhautak tak el kan hmu a, keini chu khâu ang chauin kan inhmu el a nih; anni khawma khâu ang chauin an mi hmu hrim a,” tiin a ṭha naw tiengin an hril a.
Chuongchun, a pungkhâwmhai po po chu râwl insuo meuin an ṭap a; chu zân chun mipuihai chu an ṭap an ṭap el a.

Israel mi po po chu Mosie le Aron chunga chun an chier a; a pungkhâwmhai po po chun an kuomah, “Aigupta rama khan lo thi law law kha ni ta lem inla aw! Annawleh, thlalêrah hin lo thi ta lem el inla aw!

Ieng dinga kâwlhnâma thi el dinga Pathienin hi rama hi mi ṭhuoi am a ni aw? Ei nuhmei ei nau le tehai hlak chu man el ding an ni âwm si a. Aigupta rama kîr nâwk el hi eini ta dingin a ṭha lem a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.
Chuongchun, an inbiek tâwl a, “Hotu siem ei tiu khai, Aigupta ramah kîr nâwk el ei tiu,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Mosie le Aron chu Israel mipui pungkhâwm po pohai hmaa chun an bawkkhup a.
Chun, Nun naupa Josua le Jephunne naupa Kaleb, ram enthlatuhai laia ṭhang vehai chun an puonhai an keithlêr a;
Israel mipui pungkhâwm po pohai kuoma chun, “Enthla dingin kan va fang suok ram chu ram ṭhatak a nih.
Ei chunga hin
Nisienlakhawm, a pungkhâwmhai po po chun lunga dêng an rawt a. Chuongchun,
nangmaa hin an nêka ropui le thilthawthei lem hnam inngir ka tih,” a ta.
Mosie ruok chun

hi rama mihai hi hril an ta; hieng mipuihai lai hin i um ti an hriet ta a; hmaisan meuin an hmu ta si che a; i sûm chu an chungah a um hlak a; chun, sûnah sûmngîr, zânah meiin an hma i ṭhuoi hlak si a.
Hieng mipuihai hi ṭum khata i sukhlum vawng chun i hming inthang zie hretu hnamhai chun,
Hieng anga i lo hril ta lei khan i thilthawtheina chu sukbutling hrâm dingin ka hung ngên che a nih.
I zainêmna a nasat ang ngei le, Aigupta rama inthawka tu chena i ngaidam ang hin mipuihai rîtlona hi ngaidam ta khai,” a ta.
Chun,
amiruokchu, ka hring zing ang le Lalpa ropuinain hnuoi pumpui a la suksip vawng ding ang bawkin thu ka tiem,
an thlatuhai kuoma inkhâma ram ka tiem chu hmu naw tawp an ta, anni laia mi ngainêptu hrim hrim khawma hmu bawk naw ni hai.
Ka siehlaw Kaleb ruok hi chu, lungril danglam puta titakzeta a mi zui leiin, a va fena rama chun ṭhuoi ka ta, a thlahai chun hluong an tih.
Tuhin, Amalek mihai le Kanaan mihai chu ruoma chun an um a, zinga khin kir nâwk unla, Tuipui Sen lampui tieng thlalêrah lût ro,” a ta.
“Hieng mi rilo pungkhâwmhai, ka chunga chier hlakhai hi ieng chen am dâwng ka ti aw? Israel mipuihai chierna, ka chunga an chiernahai chu ka hriet deh.
An kuomah, ‘ka hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, ka na hriet ngeia in hril angtakin in chungah thâwng ka ta; in ruonghai chu thlalêra hin um a ta;
bân phar meua, Inumtir ka ti cheu, ka tina rama chun Jephunne naupa Kaleb le Nun naupa Josua chau naw chu lût naw tawp in tih.
Amiruokchu, man el ding nîng an ta, in iti in nau le tehai ruok hi chu ṭhuoi lût ka tih, in dit naw ram chu hluong an tih.
Nangni ruok chu in ruonghai chu hi thlalêra hin um a tih.
Ram in va enthlâk ni zât; ni sâwmli chu, ni khat aiah kum khat pei, kum sâwmli sûng zet in bawsietna chu tuor phâng in ta, chuongchun, ka lungni nawzie hi hre tâng in tih.
Kei
Chun, ram enthla dinga Mosiein a tir, hung kîr nâwk a ram chanchin a ṭha naw tienga hung hril a, a chunga pungkhâwmhai inchiertirtu,
ram a ṭha naw tienga hung hriltuhai chu
Ram enthla dinga fe Nun naupa Josua le Jephunne naupa Kaleb ruok chu an thi ve naw a.
Mosiein chuong thuhai chu Israel mihai po po chu a hril a; chuongchun, mipuihai chu an lungngai ta hle el a.
Chuongchun, zîngkâr an tho a, tlâng sîpa chun an hang fe a, “Ngai ta, hi kan hung a nih,
Chun, Mosiein, “Tluongtlungna ni naw ni ti hriet zing sain iengdinga
Nangni lai
In hmaa khin Amalek mihai le Kanaan mihai an um a na, kâwlhnâma sâthlum ni el in tih.
Nisienlakhawm, tlâng sîpa chun fe an tum ṭâl a; amiruokchu,
Chuongchun, chu tlânga um Amalek mihai le Kanaan mihai chu an hung thla a, an thaw a, Horma chenin an hnawt a, an vuokthlûk rum el a.
“Israel mihai hril la, an kuomah, ‘In umna dinga ram ka pêk cheu in tlung phaleh,
Dâwnmi thilinhlânah uoin hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat pumrawhmang thilinhlân amanih, inthâwina amaniha berâmte hming kimin in buotsai ding a nih.
Chun, berâmchala chun beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni, hriek hin hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khata hmet in buotsai ding a nih.
Dâwnmi thilinhlân chun
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân ama- nih, thutiem hlen dinga inthâwina amanih,
bâwngchal inhlân ruol chun beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, hriek hin chenvea hmet in inhlân ding a nih.
Chun, dâwnmi thilinhlânah uoin hin chenve,
“Chuong ang chun bâwngchal dâm, berâmte a chal dâm, kêlte dâm, an hming kima thaw ding a nih.
An tam dân izir peiin buotsai in ta, an tam dân ang pei chun in inhlân ding a nih.
Chu rama pieng po po chun hieng ang pei hin
In thlahai chena mipuihai le hnam dang in kuoma umhai ta ding khawma dân angkhat chau a um ding a nih;
In ta ding le in kuoma hnam dang umhai ta dingin dân hmunkhat le thaw dân hmunkhat chau um a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
“Israel mihai hril la, an kuomah, ‘Hieng hi nîng a ta, ka ṭhuoina ding cheu ram in va tlung a,
chu rama bei in fâk pha chun
In bei hmet hmasa tak laia hlawm khat chu thên thilinhlânah in inhlân ding a nih, hrizâwla mi thên thilinhlâna in thên angin in thên ding a nih.
In thlahai chenin in bei hmet hmasa tak chu
pungkhâwmhaiin hre lova thawpal a ni chun, pungkhâwmhai po po chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân
Chun, thiempu chun Israel mipui pungkhâwm po po ta ding chun inremna siem a ta, ngaidam nîng an tih, thawpal a ni lei le, an thilinhlân
Israel mipui pungkhâwmhai po po chu ngaidam nîng an ta, anni laia hnam dang umhai khawm; mipui po po chun an thawpal a ni leiin.
Hre lova
Hre lova suksuoltu ta dingin Israel mi chu rama pienghai ta dingin le hnam dang mi anni laia umhai ta ding khawma dân angkhat in nei ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, ân dittâwk leia thaw a ni ruok chun, chu rama pieng amanih, hnam dang amanih khawm ni sienla,
Israel mihai thlalêra an um lai chun mi pakhat châwlnia thing inkhâwm hi an hmu a.
A thing inkhâwm hmutuhai chun Mosie le Aron le pungkhâwmhai kuoma chun an ṭhuoi a.
Ieng anga thaw ding am a ni ti la puonglo a ni leiin intângna inah an khum a.
Chuongchun,
chu rei chu in en hlak a,
ka thupêkhai po po chu in hriet zing a, in zâwm a, in Pathien ta dinga in inthieng theina dingin a nih.
In Pathien ni dinga Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoisuoktu cheu
Levi naupa Kohath, chu naupa Izhar, chu naupa Kora chun Eliab naupasalhai Dathan le Abiram le Peleth naupa On, Reuben thlahai leh mihai an ṭhuoi a.
Israel mi, mi inlâr deu deu mipui laia hotu, rorêltu thlanghai laia mi za hni le sâwmngahai leh Mosie hmaah an va fe a.
Mosie le Aron chu sawisêlin an pungkhâwm a, an kuomah, “In insukngêng êm el, mipuihai chu an inthieng seng si a;
Chu chu Mosiein a hang hriet chun a bawkkhup a.
Hieng ang hin thaw ro, Kora le a pâwl po po hai;
zingah meilâkna dâm chawi unla, chutaka chun mei sie unla,
Chun, Mosiein Kora kuomah, “Nangni Levi nauhai, ngai ta u,
Levi naupasal in unauhai po po le ama hnai dinga ân umtir cheu hi thil chînah in ngai a ni maw? Thiempu nina khawm in la zawng sa rawp a ni maw?
Chuleiin, nang le i pâwlhai po po chu
Chun, Mosie chun Eliab nâupa Dathan le Abiram ân kotir a, anni chun, “Hung naw ning ungah!
Nênetui luongna ramah i mi ṭhuoi lût naw a, lo le grêp huon ro ding i mi pêk bawk nawh; mi hlêm i tum a, hung naw ning ungah,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu a lung a sen hle el ta a;
Chun, Mosie chun Kora kuoma chun, “Zîngah nang le i mi pungkhâwmhai nang leh, anni leh, Aron leh
riminhnik phul hai sienla,
Chuongchun, mi tin chun an mei lâkna chu an chawi a, mei an sie a, riminhnik an phul a; Mosie le Aron leh intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun an va ngîr a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, anni chu an bawkkhup a, “Aw Pathien, tisa po pohai thlarau Pathien, mi pakhat suol leiin mipui po po chungah i lunginsen ding am a nih?” an ti a.
Chun,
“Mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Kora hai, Dathan hai, Abiram hai bûka inthawk hin inkiengsan vawng ro,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu a tho a, Dathan le Abiram kuoma chun a va fe a; Israel upahai chun an zui a.
Chun, pungkhâwmhai kuoma chun, “Hieng mi suolhai puon ina inthawk dâm hin suok ro khai; an iengkhawm hi tâwk naw ro, chuong naw chun chu an suolna po poa hin ṭhang ve rawi in tih,” tiin a hril a.

Chuongchun, Kora hai, Dathan hai, Abiram hai bûka inthawkhai chun an suok ta dur dur el a; chun, Dathan le Abiram chu an puon ina inthawk chun an hung suok a, an puonin kawtkhâra chun an nuhmeihai, an naupasalhai, an naunuhmeihai le chun an ngîr a.
Chun, Mosiein, “Keia lungril puoksuoka thaw a ni naw a, hieng thil thaw ding hin
Hieng mihai po po hi mi dang thi dân ang bawkin an thi a, mi po po hrem ang bawka hrem an ni chun Pathienin a mi tir naw nîng a ta.
Chuong thu po po chu a hril zo chun, an hnuoi leihnuoi chu a hung kak ta phut el a,
chuongchun, leihnuoi chun a bâu chu a ka a, an sûngkuoin, Kora mihai po po, an thuomhnaw po po leh a lem zo vawng tâwl ta a.
Chuongchun, anni le an ta po po chu a hringin Seola chun an tlum ta vawng a, leihnuoi chun a bâu ân chîp nel a, pungkhâwm laia inthawk chu an bohmang ta a.
Chuongchun, an vêla Israel mi po pohai chu an khêk ria chun an tlân dar a, “Hnuoiin mi lem ve hlau rawi a tih,” an ti a.
Chun,
Chun,
“Thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar chu meia inthawka mei lâknahai chu la suok dingin hril la, sukdar neng raw se, thil inthieng a ni si a,
mei lâknahai chu hieng thilsuol thawtuhaiin thi pha hiela an inhlân a ni si a. Chuleiin, maichâm inkhumna phêk dinga sut ni raw se.
Chuongchun, thiempu Eleazar chun a kânghai dârsen mei lâknahai chu a lâk a, maichâm inkhumnahai sut a ni ta a;
Mosie hmanga a kuoma
Nisienlakhawm, a zînga chun, “
Chun, Mosie le Aron chunga mipui an pungkhâwm lai chun intuokna puon in tieng an ngha a; sûmin a hung inkhum le
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu intuokna puon in tuola chun an va fe a.
Chun,
“Hieng mipuihaia inthawk hin insiekieng ro, ka hung sukbohmang thut theina dingin,” tiin. Chun, anni chu an bawkkhup a.
Mosie chun Aron kuomah, “I mei lâkna chawi la, maichâma inthawkin mei sie la, riminhnik phul la, mipuihai lai chun fepui vat la, an ta dingin inremna siem rawh.
Aron chun Mosie hril ang chun a chawi a, pungkhâwmhai laia chun a tlân lût ta a, hri chu mipui lai ân lêng ṭan tah ti a hmu a, riminhnik chu a phul a, mipui ta ding chun inremna chu a siem a.
Mithi le mi hring inkâra chun a ngîr a, hri chu ân kieng ta a.
Chuongchun, Kora chungchâng thua thihai tiem lovin hria thi po po chu sîng khat sâng li le za sari an nih.
Chun, Aron chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra Mosie kuoma chun a kîr nâwk a, chuongchun, hri chu ân kieng ta a.
“Israel mihai hril la, an sûngkuo tin puolah hmawl pakhat pei, an sûngkuo izir peia an ṭhuoituhai po po zât hmawl sâwm le pahni la la, chun, an hmawla chun an hming seng ziek rawh.
Levi hmawla chun Aron hming ziek la, an sûngkuo tina dingin hmawl pakhat pei a ni ding a nih.
Chun, ei inbiekna, intuokna puon in, thu inhriettirna hmaa chun i sie ding a nih.
Chun, ka mi thlang ding hmawl chu hung inder a ta, chuongchun, Israel mihai chierna, i chunga an chierna hi ka sukre ding a nih,” tiin.

Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel mihai chu a biek a, an ṭhuoituhai po po chun an sûngkuo tin puolah ṭhuoitu tinin hmawl pakhat pei, hmawl sâwm pahni an pêk a; Aron hmawl khawm chu an hmawlhai lai chun a ṭhang ve a.
Mosie chun thu inhriettirna puon ina chun
A zînga chun Mosie chu thu inhriettirna puon ina chun a va fe a; ngai ta, Levi sûngkuo puola Aron hmawl lo inder chu a hmu a,a kumûm a, a pâr a, almondin a ra a.
Mosie chun
Chun,
Chuong ang chun Mosie chun a thaw a,
Chun, Israel mihai chun Mosie kuomah, “Ngai ta, kan bohmang a ni annâwm, kan se zo tah, kan se zo vawng tah annâwm.
Chun, Levi chi, i pa chi, i unauhaiin an zawm ve che a, i rawng an bâwl theina dingin i kâwl hnaiah inumtir la, amiruokchu, nang le i naupasalhai chu thuinhriettirna puon in bulah in um ding a nih.
Anni chun inkawppui an ti che a, puon in rawngbâwlna po poah intuokna puon in sin chu chang an ta, hnam dang chun an hung hnai ding cheu a ni nawh.
Nang chun hmun inthieng sin le maichâm sin chu chang i ta; Israel mihai chunga lunginsenna a um nawna dingin.
Chun, ngai ta, kei hin i unau Levi mihai chu Israel mihai laia inthawkin ka thlang suok a, intuokna puon in rawngbâwl dinga

Nang le i naupasalhai hin maichâm le puonzâr sûngtieng in thiempu sin chu thâwng in tih. Chun, nangin rawngbâwl i tih, thiempu sin hi in rawngbâwl sin dingin ka pêk cheu a nih; hnam dang hung inrawl ve phawt chu sukhlum nîng an tih,” a ta.
Chun,

Meia raw mahla thil inthienghai chu i ta nîng a ta; an thilinhlân tinrêng an beiphit thilinhlân dâm, an suol thâwina thilinhlân dâm, an thiemnaw thâwina thilinhlân ka kuoma an hung inhlân ding chenin nang le i naupasalhai puol nîng a tih.
Hmun inthieng takah fâng in ta, pasal po poin fâng in tih; in ta dingin inthieng nîng a tih.

Hieng hi i chanpuol nîng a tih: beiphit thilinhlâna an thilpêk, Israel mihai a thêna thên thilinhlân chenin, nang le i naupasalhai le i naunuhmeihai leh kumkhuoa in chanpuolah ka pêk cheu a nih, i ina mi inthieng po po chun fa thei an tih.
Hriek ṭha tak dâm, grêp ṭha tak dâm, bu ṭha tak dâm, ra hmasa tak
An loa ra hmin hmasa tak
Thla khat a ni chun intlan dinghai chu intlanna man i ruot angin hmun inthienga shekel hmang dân angin, shekel ngaa intlan ding a nih, (shekel chu gera sâwmhni a nih).
Amiruokchu, bâwng pieng thla hmasa tak dâm, berâm pieng thla hmasa tak dâm, kêl pieng thla hmasa takhai chu în tlan ding a ni naw a, an inthieng a nih, an thisen chu maichâmah thêng i ta,
An sa chu i ta nîng a ta, a thêna thên thilinhlân ir le a mal changtieng i ta a ni ang hin.
“Levi mihai chu rawngbâwl sin, puon in rawngbâwl sina an sinthaw manah Israel rama sâwmapakhat po po hi ka pêk a nih.
Tuta chen chu Israel mipuihai chun intuokna puon in an hung hnai ding a ni nawh; suol maw phurin thi rawi an tih.
Levi mihai ruok hin chu intuokna puon in rawngbâwl sin chu thâwng an ta, anni dân nîng a tih; chun, Israel mihai laiah rochan nei naw ni hai.
Israel mihaiin sâwmapakhat
Chun,
“Chuong thua naw khawm chun Levi mihai chu hril la, an kuomah, ‘In rochan dinga Israel mihai sâwmapakhat ka pêk cheu, annia inthawka in dawng pha chun, chu sâwmapakhata sâwma pakhat chu
Chuongchun, in thên thilinhlân chu hrizâwla bu le i uoin sâwrnaa uoin anga ngai nîng a tih.
Chuong ang chun Israel mihai laia inthawka sâwmapakhat in dawng po poa mi chu
In thil dawng po poa mi chu a ṭha tak, ân thieng tak pei
Chuleiin, an kuomah, Chutaka a ṭha tak in thên pha chun Levi mihai hrizâwla hung le uoin hung tlung anga ngai nîng a tih.
Khâwlâi hmuna khawm fa thei in tih; nangni le in sûnghai khawma, intuokna puon ina in rawngbâwl man a ni si a.
A ṭha tak in thên chu a suol maw phur naw ti niu a, Israel mihai thil inthieng chu sukpawrche naw ti niu a, in thi naw ding a nih,’ ti rawh,” a ta.
“Hi hi
Thiempu Eleazar pêng i ta, ama chun riebûk puoah ṭhuoi suok a ta, a hmaa chun that a ni ding a nih.
Thiempu Eleazar chun a kutpârin a thisen chu lâng a ta, intuokna puon in hma tienga chun vawi sari thêng a tih.
Chun, mi tuin amanih bâwngla chu a mithmuah râwng a ta, a vun dâm, a sa dâm, a thisen dâm, a êk dâm leh râwng a tih.
Thiempu chun sidar thing le husop le patzai lâng a ta, bâwgla an râwnaa chun a peilût ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu chun a silfênhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, chu zoa chun riebûka chun fêng a ta, zântieng chenin thiempu chu thienglo nîng a tih.
A rawtu khawm chun a silfênhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, zântieng chenin thienglo nîng a tih.

Insukpawrchenaw mi pakhatin bâwngla vâm chu la khâwm a ta, riebûk puo hmun faiah sieng a ta; chuonghai chu, suol thaihmangna dinga, Israel mipuihai inthieng nawna sukfaina tui siemna dingin sie ṭhat nîng an tih.
Chun, bâwngla vâm la khâwmtu chun a silfênhai sâwp a ta, zântieng chenin thienglo nîng a tih. Hi hi Israel mihai le hnam dang an kuoma umhai ta dinga kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
“Tu ruong khawm themtu chu ni sari thienglo nîng a tih.
Ama chu ni thum ni le ni sari ni chun inthien a ta, thieng ni tâng a tih, amiruokchu, ni thum ni le ni sari nia ân thien naw chun ni sari ni khawm chun thieng la ni naw ni.
Tukhawma tu ruong khawm a thema ân thien naw chun
“Mi puon inah a thi chun hi hi a dân ding a nih: puon in lût taphawt le puon in sûnga um taphawt chu ni sari thienglo nîng a tih.
Chun, bûrlebêl inhawng a sînnaa sîn lo chu thienglo a nih.
Tukhawmin khawhnâwma kâwlhnâma that amanih, mithi ruong amanih, mihriem ru amanih, thlân amanih a tâwk chun ni sari thienglo a nih.
An thiengnawhai puola suol thâwina vâm chu lâng a ta,

bêlah tuikhur tui leh sung a tih. Chun, mi thiengin husop lâng a ta, tuia chun inchieng a ta, puon in dâm, bûrlebêl po pohai, chutaka mi um po pohai, ru amanih, that ruong amanih, mithi ruong amanih, thlân amanih tâwktuhai chu thêng a ta;
chun, mi thiengin ni thum ni le ni sari niin mi thieng naw chu thêng a ta, ni sari ni chun sukthieng a ta; a silfênhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, zântieng chun hung inthieng tâng a tih.
Mi thienglo, inthien lo ruok chun
Hi hi an ta dinga kumkhaw dân ding a nih; inthienna tuia thea um taphawt chun an silfênhai sâwp an ta, chun, inthienna tui tawk taphawt chu zântieng chenin thienglo nîng a tih.
Mi thienglovin a tâwk taphawt chu thienglo ni ve pei a ta; chun, chu tâwktu taphawt chu zântieng chenin thienglo nîng a tih,” tiin.
Chun, Israel mipui pungkhâwmhai po po chu thla khatnaa chun Zin thlalêrah an lût a; chun, mipuihai chun Kadesa chun umhmun an khuor a; chutaka chun Miriam chu a thi a, chutaka chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, mipui chun, “
Iengdinga

Iengdinga hi ram ṭha nawtaka mi ṭhuoi lût dingin Aigupta rama inthawka mîn suoktir am i na? Thlai chi dâm, theichanghai, grêphruihai, theibufaihai umna ram ni lo hi; tui dâwn ding hrim hrim hlak um lo” tiin Mosie chu an suosal ta a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu mipuihai laia inthawk chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun an va fe a; an bawkkhup a;
chun,
Chuongchun,
Mosie chun
Mosie le Aron chun pungkhâwmhai chu lungpui bula chun an inumkhâwmtir a, an kuomah, “Mi hel hmanghai, ngai ta u, hi lungpuia inthawk hin tui kan lâk suokpêk ding cheu am a nih?” an ta.
Mosie chun a bân a phar a, lungpui chu a hmawl chun vawi hni a hang vuok a; chuongchun, tui a hung suok ta zur zur el a, pungkhâwmhai le an ranhai chun an dâwn ta a.
Chun,
Hi hi Meriba
Mosie chun Kadesa inthawk chun Edom lal kuomah mi a tir a, “I unaupa Israel chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Kan chunga tuorna hung tlung po po hi i hriet a;
kan pi le puhai Aigupta ramah an fe thla a, sâwttak el Aigupta rama kan um dâm, Aigupta mihaiin kan pi le puhai le keini ngei khawm ṭha nawtaka an mi thawzie dâm kha.
Chuongchun,

Lunginsiettakin i ram hi fe thleng kan tih; lo amanih, grêp huon amanih fe naw ning unga a, tuisunsuo tuihai dâwn bawk naw ning ung; lal lamlienah fe pei kan ta, i ram kan khêl hmakhat chun changtieng amanih, vawitieng amanih khawm pêt naw ning ungah,’ tiin,” a ta.
Edom ruok chun a kuomah, “In mi pal thleng ding a ni nawh, in mi pal vai chun a thaw ding chein kâwlhnâm leh hung inthawk ka tih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Israel mipuihai chun a kuomah, “Lamlienah hang fêng kan ta, chun, keini le kan ranin i tui kan dâwn chun a man chu pêng kan ti che; thil dang iengkhawm thaw lovin a fein fethleng ringawt kan tih,” an ta.
Ama chun, “Fethleng lo ding,” a ta. Chun, Edom chu mipui tamtak leh mi hrâttakhai leh anni thaw ding chun a hung suok ta a,
an fe chu a phal ta naw a, chuongchun, Israel mihai chun an kîrsan nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, Kadesa inthawk chun an suok a, Israel mipui pungkhâwmhai po po chun Hor tlâng an va tlung a.
Chun,
Meriba tuia dâm khan ka thu kalin in hel lei khan Israel mipuihai ka pêk rama chun a lût naw ding a nih.
Aron chu a silfênhai hlîppêk la, a naupa Eleazar chu inhâktir rawh: Aron chu a chipuihai kuoma ṭhuoi nîng a ta, chutaka chun thîng a tih,” tiin.
Mosie chun
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aron chu a silfênhai a hlîppek a, Eleazar ân hâktir a, chun, Aron chu tlâng sîpa chun a thi ta a; chun, Mosie le Eleazar chu tlânga inthawk chun an hung thla a.
Chun, mipui po poin Aron a thi ti an hriet chun Israel mihai po po chun ni sâwmthum an sûn a.
Chun, Israel mihai chun
Chuongchun,
Chun, Hor tlânga inthawk chun Tuipui Sen tieng Edom ram fe huolin an fe a: a lampui lei chun mipuihai lung chu a hnuol hle a.
Mipuihai thi el dingin iengdinga Aiguptaa inthawka i mi ṭhuoi suok am a na? Bei um lo, tui hlak um bawk lo; hi bei tirdakum khawm hi kan hringna hin a hnâm tah a nih, an ta.
Chuongchun,
Chun, mihai chu Mosie kuomah an fe a, “
Chun,
Chuongchun, Mosiein dâr rûl a siem a, banah a khai a, rûl chuk taphawtin dâr rûl chu an enin an dam pei a.
Chun, Israel mipuihai chu an fe pei ta a; Oboth-ah umhmun an khuor a.
Oboth-a inthawk chun an fe nâwk a; nisa suokna tieng pangah Moab thlalêr bul Ije—abarimah umhmun an khuor a.
Chutaka inthawk chun an fe nâwk a, Zered ruomah umhmun an khuor a.
Chutaka inthawk chun an fe nâwk a. Amor mihai ramria inthawka hung filawr thlalêra Arnon khingtieng pangah umhmun an khuor a; Arnon chu Moab ramri, Moab le Amor mihai inkâra um a nih.
Chuleiin, “
“Suphah-a Vaheb khuo,
Amon ruomhai,
Ar khaw bul chena inzam,
Moab ramri depa
Ruom pangpêrhai chu,” tia hril a nih.
Chutaka inthawk chun Beerah
Chun, hi hla hi Israelhai chun an sak a,
“Aw tuikhur, hung inchik suok rawh,
Zaiin awi ro,
Lalhaiin an cho tuikhur chu.
An lal hmawl le an hembâwka,
Mipuihai mi lienhai icho chu.”
Chun, thlalêra inthawk chun Mattanaah an fe a.
Mattanaa inthawk chun Nahalielah an fe a; Nahaliela inthawk chun Bamothah,
Bamoth-a inthawk chun Moab ram phairuom, pisga tlâng ṭhut an tlung a, chu tlâng sîpa inthawk chun Jeshimon thlalêr
“I rama hin mîn fe thlengtir raw khai; loa manih, grêp huona manih, pêt naw ning ung a, tuisunsuo tuihai khawm dâwn naw ning ung a, i ram kan khêl hmakhat chun lal lamlienah fe pei kan tih,” tiin.

Nisienlakhawm, Sihon chun Israel mihai chu a ram fe thleng chu a phal naw a; Sihon chun a mihai po po chu a khâwm vawng a. Israel mihai chu thaw dingin thlalêra chun an vân thawk suok ta lem a, Jahaz an va tlung a; chuongchun, Israel mihai chu an va thaw ta a.
Chun, Israel mihai chun kâwlhnâm leh an lo thaw a, a ram chu Arnona inthawka Jabbok chenin, Ammon mihai ramri Jazer chenin an neipêk a; Ammon thlahai ram chu a khir hle a nih.
Israel mihai chun chuong khuo po po chu an lâk a, chuongchun, Israel mihai chu Amor mihai khuohai po poa chun an um a, Hesbon le a khawper po poa dâm chun.
Hesbon chu Amor mihai lal Sihon khuo a na, ama chu chu hmaa Moab lalhai thaw a, a kuta inthawka ram po po Arnon chena lâkpêktu a nih.
Chuleiin, hla phuoktuhai chun,
“Hesbonah hung unla,
Sihon khawpui chu inngîr le sukdet ni sienla,
Hesbona inthawkin mei a suok a,
Sihon khawpuia inthawk chun meichawk,
Moaba Ar a kâng zo a.
Arnon hmun insâng lalhai chu,
I chung a rik de, Moab!
I bohmang a ni tah, aw Kemos chibai bûktuhai,
A naupasalhai chu tlânse ding le,
A naunuhmeihai chu sala um dingin a pêk a,
Amor mihai lal Sihon kuomah.
Kan hang kâp a, Hesbon a bohmang a,
Dibon chenin.
Nopha chenin ka sukrêm a,
Medeba tlung rakin,” an tih.
Chuong ang chun a nih Amor mihai rama Israelhai chu an um chu.
Chun, Mosie chun Jazer va enthla dingin mi a tir a, chutaka khuohai chu an lâk a. Amor mi umhai chu an hnawt suok a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, ama khawm, a naupasalhai khawm, hla hrim hrim nei lovin a mihai leh an that a; a ram chu an hluopêk ta a.
Chun, Zippor naupa Balak chun Israel mihaiin Amor mihai an thaw dân po po chu a hriet a.
Chun, Moab mihai chun mihai chu an ṭi hle el a, an tam hle si a; Israel mipuihai lei chun Moab mihai chu an lunginzîng ta a.

Ama chun Amaw rama Euphrates vadung panga Pethora Beor naupa Balaam kuomah mi a tir a, “Ngai ta, hnam pakhat Aiguptaa inthawka hung suok an um a, leihnuoi a dâpin an hung dâp a, keia mi dep tâwtah an um a;

lunginsiettakin hung la, hieng mihai hi ṭawngsie mi vân phur pêk ta khai; keia ta ding chun an hrât taluo a nih, kan that theiin, kan hne theiin, kan rama inthawk hi kan hnawt suok thei khiet rawi mawh; mal i sâwm taphawthai chu malsâwmin an um a; ṭawngsie în phur taphawthai chu ṭawngsephurin an um ti ka hriet si a,” tiin a vân ko tir a.
Chuongchun, Moab upahai le Midian upahai chu aisân man ding chawiin an suok ta a; Balaam kuom chu an va tlung a, Balak thu incha chu an hril a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Vawizân chu hitaka hin riek unla,
Balaam kuoma chun Pathien a hung a, “I kuoma mihai hi tuhai am an na? ” a ta.
Balaam chun Pathien kuomah, “Zippor naupa Moab lal Balak chun ka kuomah mi a hung tir a,
‘Ngai ta, Aigupta rama inthawka hung hnam chun leihnuoi an hung dâp a; hung la ṭawngsie mi vân phurpêk rawh, ka do theiin ka hnawt suok thei khiet rawi mawh,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Balaam chu zîngkâr a tho a, Balak mi lienhai kuoma chun, “In rama chun fe nâwk ta ro khai,
Chuongchun, Moab mi lienhai chu an tho a, Balak kuoma chun an fe a, “Balaam chun keini a mi hung zui nuom nawh,” an ta.
Balak chun mi lien tam nâwk zuol, anni nêka ropui lem a tir nâwk a.
Balaam kuom chu an va tlung a, a kuomah, “Zippor naupa Balak chun hieng hin a ti a nih, ‘Ka kuoma i hung hi iengkhawmin hluo naw raw se.
Mi ropuitakah siem ka ti che a, ka kuoma i hril taphawt chu thaw pei ka tih; chuleiin, hung hrâm la, hieng mihai hi ṭawngsie mi vân phurpêk hrâm ta khai,’ a ti a,” an ta.
Balaam ruok chun Balak mihai chu a dawn a, an kuomah, “Balak chun a in tangka le rângkachaka sip hi mi pe ding ni sienkhawm, ieng iengkhawm
Chuleiin,
Chun, zâna chun Pathien chu Balaam kuoma chun a hung a, a kuomah, “Hieng mihai hi nanga koa hung an ni chun tho la, anni zui rawh, amiruokchu, i kuoma ka hril chau che hi i thaw ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Balaam chu zîngkâr a tho a, sabengtung a siemrêl a, Moab mi lienhai chu a zui ta a.
Chun, a fe lei chun Pathien lung chu a hung chawk ta a, chun,
Sabengtung chun
Chun,
Chun, sabengtung chun
Chun,
Chun, sabengtung chun
Chuongchun,
Balaam chun sabengtung kuoma chun, “I mi suknawmna leiin a nih; kâwlhnâm lem chu chawi lang chu sukhlum hiel tâng ka ti che,” a ta.
Sabengtung chun Balaam kuoma chun, “Tu chena i chuong rawpna i sabengtung ka ni an naw am a nih? Hieng ang hin ka thaw hlak luo che am a nih?” a ta. Ama chun, “Thaw ngai lo e,” a ta.
Chun,
Chun,
chun, sabengtung chun a mi hmu a, ka hmaa chun vawi thum a pêt a ni kha, pêt naw sienla chu ama chu sukhlum si lovin, nang sukhlum hiel naw ning che,” a ta.
Balaam chun
Chun,
Balakin Balaam a hung ti a hriet chun Arnon tienga an ramri chenin a va tuok a.
Balak chun Balaam kuomah, “Ṭhahnemngaitakin ko ding chein mi ka hung tir a ni naw am a nih? Ieng dinga ka kuomah hung nuom lo am i na? Mi ropui takah ka siem thei che a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Balaam chun Balak kuomah, “Ngai ta, hi ka hung ta a, nuom nuom hril theina ka nei am a nih? Pathienin ka bâua thu a sie chau ka hril ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Balaam chu Balak kuoma chun a fe ta a; Kiriath-buzoth an va tlung ta a.
Chun, Balak chu bâwng le berâmin ân thâwi a, a sa chu Balaam le a kuoma mi lien umhai chu a thawn a.
Chun, a zinga chun Balak chun Balaam chu a ṭhuoi a; Baal hmun insâng
Chun, Balaam chun Balak kuoma chun, “Hitaka hin maichâm pasari mi siempêk la, bâwngchal pasari le berâmchal pasari mi buotsaipêk raw khai,” a ta.
Balak chun Balaam hril ang chun a thaw a; chun, Balak le Balaam chun maichâm tina chun bâwngchal pakhat le berâmchal pakhat an inhlân a.
Balaam chun Balak kuomah, “I pumrawhmang thilinhlân bula hin lo ngîr zing la, kei chu hang fe tum ka ta,
Pathien chun Balaam chu a lo intuokpui a; Balaam chun a kuomah, “Maichâm pasari chu ka siem ta a; maichâm tina chun bâwngchal pakhat le berâmchal pakhat kân hlân seng a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a kuoma chun a kîr nâwk ta a; chun, ngai ta, Balak chu a pumrawhmang thilinhlân bula chun Moab mi lienhai po po leh a lo ngîr zing a.
Chun thu chu a hril ta a,
“Aram rama inthawkin Balak chun a mi ṭhuoi a,
Saktieng tlânga Moab lal chun;
‘La hung la, Jakob rawihai ṭawngsie mîn phurpêk rawh,
Hung la Israelhai hi mi hung vaukhâwngpêk ta!’ a ta.
Iengtin am Pathien ṭawngsie inphur naw chu inphur thei ka ta?
Iengtin am Pathien vaukhâwng lo chu vaukhâwng ka ta?
Lungpui chunga inthawk dâmin anni chu ka hmu si a,
Tlânga inthawk dâmin anni chu ka hmu a;
Ngai ta, hnam a tuma um det sa a nih,
Hnam danghai le angkhata inngai ngai lo.
Jakobrawi pilvut zât hiel chu tuin am tiem thei a ta?
Israelhai hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat chu tuin am tiem thei a ta?
Mi fel thi angin thi ve thei lang,
Ka tâwpna chu a tâwpna ang ni sien,” a ta.
Chun, Balak chun Balaam kuomah, “I mi thaw dân hi iengtizie am a na? Ka hmêlmahai ṭawngsie inphur dingin ka ṭhuoi che a, mal i sâwm lem ta hlau el hi!” a ta.
Ama chun a dawn a, “

Chun, Balak chun a kuomah, “Hmun dangah fe nâwk ei tih khai; chutaka inthawk chu hmu thei tâwl i ta; a hmatâwng pâwl takhai chu hmûng i ta, an rêng ruok chun hmu vawng kher naw ti ni a; chutaka inthawk chun ṭawngsie mîn phurpêk rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Zophimhai umna Pisga sîpa chun a hang ṭhuoi a, maichâm pasari a siem a, maichâm tina chun bâwngchal pakhat le berâmchal pakhat ân hlân a.
Chun, Balak kuoma chun, “Saw laia
Chun,
Chun, a kuoma chun a va fe a, ngai ta, a pumrawhmang thilinhlân bula chun a lo ngir zing a, Moab milienhai khawm a kuoma chun an um ve a. Balak chun a kuomah, “
“Tho la, Balak, ngai ta;
Zippor naupa, ka thu ngai rawh:
Inkîr hmang mihriem naupa a ni bawk naw a,
A hril ta chu a thaw naw ding am a nih?
A lo hril ta chu a sukpuitling naw ding am a nih?
Ngai ta, mal sâwm dingin thu ka hmu a,
Mal a sâwm ta a, ka sukdanglam thei nawh.
Israel mihai lai chun kâwmâwna a hmu bawk nawh.
Anni lai chun Lal chawimawina ri chu a um a.
Aigupta rama inthawkin Pathien chun a ṭhuoi suok tâwl a.
Ramsiel tha ang el an put a.
Jakob chungah dawi invêtna a um naw a.
Israelhai chunga sietna ding hrillâwkna a um bawk nawh.
Jakob le Israelhai chanchin an hril zâtin, “Pathien thilthaw chu a va mak de!” tîng an tih.
Sakeibaknei angin an inchâwm tho a:
An sase an fâk hma chun zâl naw ni hai a.
An sase thisen chu an dâwn hma chun,” a ta.
Chun, Balak chun Balaam kuomah, “Ṭawngsie inphur naw la, mal khawm sâwm naw rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Balaam chun a dawn a, Balak kuomah, “
Chun, Balak chun Balaam kuomah, “Hung ta, hmun dangah ṭhuoi phawt ka ti che. Chutaka inthawk chun ṭawngsie i mîn phûrpêk Pathien chun a phal khiet rawi mawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Balak chun Balaam chu thlalêr zuk suk en Peor sîpah a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Balaam chun Balak kuomah, “Hitaka hin maichâm pasari mi siempêk la, bâwngchal pasari le berâmchal pasari mi buotsaipêk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Balak chun Balaam hril ang chun a thaw a, maichâm tina chun bâwngchal pakhat le berâmchal pakhat ân hlân a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai mal sâwmpêk chu
Chun, Balaam chu vântieng a tang a, Israel mihai chu a hnam hnama um chu a hmu a, chun, Pathien thlarau a chungah a hung tlung a.
Chun, thu chu a hril ta a,
“Beor naupa Balaam,
Mit vara,
Pathien thuhai hrea,
Iengkimthawthei inlârna hmu a,
Tlu bawkhupa mit hung var ta chun:
Aw Jakob rawi chu in puon inhai a va ṭha de;
Aw Israelhai, in Biekbûk chu:
Vadung panga huon angin,
Vadung panga sidar thinghai ang an nih.
A bâlṭina inthawkin tui luong suok a ta,
A chi chu tui tamtakahai chun um a ta,
A lal chu Agag nêkin ropui lem a ta,
A ram chu chawimawiin um a tih.
Aiguptaa inthawkin Pathien chun a ṭhuoi suok a,
Ram siel tha ang el an put a,
An hmêlma hnam danghai chu fa zo an ta,
An ruhai chu suknâwi vawng an ta,
An thalin kâp thleng an tih.
Sakeibakneihai ang elin, tuin am chawktho a ta?
Malsâwmtu taphawt cheu chu malsâwmin um sienla,
Ṭawngsie inphurtu taphawt cheu chu ṭawngsephurin um raw hai se,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Balaam chunga chun Balak lung chu a hung chawk ta a, a kuthai a ben a. Balak chun Balaam kuomah, “Ka hmêlmahai ṭawngsie inphur dingin ka ko che a, hi, vawi thum rau mal i sâwm ta a.
Chuleiin, i umna tieng fe hmang dai rawh; ropuitaka chawisâng che ka lungril a na, nisienlakhawm, ngai ta,
Chun, Balaam chun Balak kuomah, “I mitirhai kuoma khawm ka hril hrim naw am a nih?
‘Balak hin a in chu tangka le rângkachaka sipin mi pe ding ni sien khawm, a ṭha tieng amanih, a se tieng amanih, keia lungril puoksuok chun
Ngai ta! tuhin ka mihai kuomah ka fe ding a nih; hung la, hieng mihai hin hi hnunga i mihai chunga an thaw dân ding hril ka ti cheu,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun thu chu a hril ta a,
“Beor naupa Balaam,
Mit vara,
Pathien thuhai hre a,
A chunghnungtak hrietna hre a,
Iengkimthawthei inlârna hmu a,
Tlu bawkkhupa mit hung var ta chun:
‘Ama chu ka hmu a, tuta a um ang ni lo hi,
Ka thlîr a, hnaitea mi ang ni lovin;
Jakoba inthawk chun arasi hung suok a ta,
Israela inthawk chun lalhmawl hung suok a ta,
Moab ram tluonin sun thleng a ta,
Buoina nauhai po po suktlâwm a tih.
A hmêlma hlak Edom le,
Seir dâm chu chang a tih;
Israelhai chan a ṭhat sûng po chu.
Jakoba inthawkin tu amanih inlal a ta,
Khuoa a la um sunhai chu sukbohmang a tih,’ a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Amalek tieng chu a ngha a, thu a hril a,
“Amalek chu hnam bultak a ni nâk a chu,
A tâwpna chu bohmangna a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Ken tieng a ngha a, thu a hril a,
“In umna hmun chu a det a,
I bu chu lungpuia sep a na.
Nisienlakhawm, Ken chu sukrêm la nîng a tih,
Assurhaiin sala an ṭhuoihmang pha cheu,” a ta.
Chun, thu chu a hril nâwk a,
“Pathienin hienga a thaw chun tu am hring thei a ta?
Kittim rama inthawkin lawnghai hung tlung a ta,
Assur le Eber sukrinum a ta.
Anni khawm chu bohmang vawng an tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Balaam chu a tho a, a khuo tieng a fe ta a; Balak khawm chu a fe ve ta a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai chu Sittima an um lai chun, Moab naunuhmeihai an pâwl ta a;
an pathienhai kuoma an inthâwinahaia chun an fiel tâwl a; Chuongchun, an fâk a, an pathienhai chu chibai an bûk ve ta a.
Israelhai chun Baal-peor an pawm ve ta a, chuongchun, Israelhai chunga chun
Chuongchun, Mosie kuomah, “Mipuihai ṭhuoituhai po po chu ṭhuoi la,
Chun, Mosie chun Israel rorêltuhai kuoma chun, “Baal-peor pawmtuhai po po chu sukhlum vawng ro,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, Israel laia mi pakhatin intuokna puon in kawtkhâra a ṭap lai takin Mosie mithmua le Israel mi pungkhâwmhai mithmuah Midian nuhmei pakhat a unauhai kuomah a hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, thiempu Aron naupa Eleazar naupa Phinehas chun a lo hmu a, pungkhâwmhai laia chun a tho a, fei a lâk a;
Chun, Israel mi chu puon in sûnga chun a hnawt lût a. Israel mi leh an pahni chun a sun thleng a, nuhmei chu a phîngah.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chunga hremna chu a re ta a. Chu hremnaa thihai chu sîng hni le sâng li an nih.

“Thiempu Aron nau Eleazar naupa Phinehas hin ka thîkna anga anni laia a thîkna chun ka lunginsen chu Israel mihai laia inthawk chun a sukkieng a; chuongchun, ka thîkna chun Israel mihai chu sukbohmang naw ning.
Chuleiin, ka remna thuthlung chu a chungah thlung ka ta,
ama le a hnunga a thlahai ta dingin kumkhaw thiempu nina thuthlung nîng a tih; a Pathien ta dingin a thîk a, Israel mihai ta dinga inremna a siem leiin, ti rawh,” tiin.
Israel mi an that, Midian nuhmei le an ithat hming chu Zimri, Simeon mihai laia an pahnam ṭhuoitu Salu naupa a nih.
Chun, Midian nuhmei an ithat hming chu Kozbi, Zura naunu a nih; ama chu Midian mihai pahnam laia an hotu a nih.
Anni khawma Peor chungchâng thua le Peor chungchâng thu a hrem nia an farnu, Midian mihai milien naunu an that,
Kozbi chungchâng thua var vervêka an hlêm chêu ang khan an la hlêm ta rawp si chêu leiin,” tiin.
Hremna chu a rê hnung chun
“Israel mi pungkhâwm po pohai chu, kum sâwmhni chen chungtieng, a chi chiin, Israel rama râl kâp thei chin chu tiem vawng ro,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie le thiempu Eleazar chun Jeriko zâwn, Jordan pang, Moab phaiah anni chu an biek a,
“Mipuihai chu kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng tiem ro,” tiin,
Hezron pahnama mi Hezron; Karmi pahnama mi Karmi.
Hienghai hi Reuben pahnama mi chu an nih, tiem ta po chu sîng li sâng thum za sari le sâwmthum an nih.
Pallu thla Eliab;
Eliab thlahai chu; Namuel, Dathan, le Abiram an nih. Hieng Dathan le Abiram hai hi an nih
Chu pâwl chu an thi lai chun hnuoiin a bâu a ka a, Kora hai le chun a lem ta a; Kora rawihai meiin mi za hni le sâwmnga a kâng hlum ṭum khan; chuonghai chu, inchikna a hung ni ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Kora naupasalhai chu an thi nawh.
Hienghai hi Simeon thlahai chu an nih, sîng hni sâng hni le za hni an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Gad naupasalhai: Zephon thlahai Zephon rawi; Haggi thlahai Haggi rawi; Suni thlahai Suni rawi;
Ozni thlahai Ozni rawi; Eri thlahai Eri rawi;
Arod thlahai Arod rawi; Areli thlahai Areli rawi an nih.
Hienghai hi Gad naupasalhai thlahai nizât chu a nih, sîng li le za nga an nih.
Juda naupasalhai Era le Onan an nih. Era le Onan chu Kanaan ramah an thi a.
Chun, Juda thlahai pahnam fe dân chun hieng ang hi a nih; Sela thlahai Sela rawi; Perez thlahai Perez rawi; Zera thlahai Zera rawi an nih.
Perez thlahai chu: Hezron thlahai Hezron rawi; Hamul thlahai Hamul rawi an nih.
Hienghai hi Juda naupasalhai thlahai ni zât chu a nih, sîng sari sâng ruk le za nga an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Issakar thlahai: Tola thlahai Tola râwi; Puva thlahai Puvarawi;
Jasub thlahai Jasubrawi; Simron thlahai Simron râwi an nih.
Hienghai hi an tiem dân anga Issakar naupasalhai thlahai ni zât chu a nih, sîng ruk sâng li le za thum an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Zebulun thlahai: Sered thlahai Sered râwi; Elon thlahai Elon râwi; Jaleel thlahai Jaleel râwi an nih.
Hienghi Zebulun thlahai ni zât chu a nih, sîng ruk le za nga an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Josef thlahai: Manasse le Ephraim;
Manasse thlahai; Makir thlahai chu Makir râwi, Makir chun Gilead a thla a. Gilead thlahai chu Gilead râwi an nih.
Chun, hienghi Gilead thlahai an nih: Iezer thlahai chu Iezer râwi; Helek thlahai chu Helek râwi;
Asriel thlahai chu Asriel râwi; Sekem thlahai chu Sekem râwi; .
Semida thlahai chu Semida râwi; Hepher thlahai chu Hepher râwi an nih.
Chun, Hepher naupa Zelophehad chun naupasal nei lovin naunuhmei a nei a; Zelophehad naunuhmeihai hming chu Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka le Tirza an nih.
Hienghi Manasse thlahai an nih, an ni zât chu sîng nga sâng hni le za sari an nih.
Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân ang peia Ephraim thlahai an nih: Suthela thlahai chu Suthela rawi; Beker thlahai chu Beker rawi; Tahan thlahai chu Tahan rawi an nih.
Chun, hienghi Suthela thlahai chu an nih. Eran thlahai chu Eranrâwi an nih.
Hienghi Ephraim thlahai pahnam ni zât an nih; sîng thum sâng hni le za nga an nih. Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân ang peia Josef thlahai an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Benjamin thlahai: Bela thlahai chu Bela rawi; Asbel thlahai chu Asbel rawi; Ahiram thlahai chu Ahiram rawi an nih.
Sesupham thlahai chu Sesupham râwi; Hupham thlahai chu Hupham râwi an nih.
Bela thlahai chu Ard le Naaman an nih. Ard thlahai chu Ard râwi; Naaman thlahai chu Naaman râwi an nih.
Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân peia Benjamin thlahai an nih; an ni zât chu sîng li sâng nga le za ruk an nih.
Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân ang peia Dan thlahai an nih; Suham thlahai chu Suham rawi an nih. Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân ang peia Dan thlahai chu an nih.
Suhamrawi thlahai po po ni zât chu sîng ruk sâng li le za li an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Aser thlahai chu: Imna thlahai chu Imna rawi; Isvi thlahai chu Isvi rawi; Beria thlahai chu Beria rawi an nih.
Beria thlahai chu: Heber thlahai chu Heber rawi; Malkiel thlahai chu Malkiel rawi an nih.
Aser nau nuhmei hming chu Sera a na.
Hienghi Aser naupasalhai thlahai ni zât chu a nih, sîng nga sâng thum le za li an nih.
An pahnam indawt dân ang peia Naphtali thlahai chu: Jazeel thlahai chu Jazeel rawi; Guni thlahai chu Guni rawi;
Jazer thlahai chu Jazer rawi; Sillem thlahai chu Sillem rawi an nih.
Hienghi an pahnam indawt dân ang peia Naphtali thlahai an nih; an tiem po hai chu sîng li sâng nga le za li an nih.
Hieng hi Israel mihai an tiem po hai chu an na, nuoi ruk sâng khat za sari le sâwmthum an nih.
Chun,
“Hienghai hi an hming tam dân ang hu peiin ram hi sempêk ding a nih.
A tam deuhai chu ram pe lien deu i ta, a tlâwm deuhai chu pe chîn deu i tih; an tam dân ang peiin ram chu pêk seng ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, aisânin ram chu sem ding a nih; an puhai hnam hming indawt dân ang peiin ram chu chang an tih.
Chun, aisân ang pei chun a tam le tlâwmhai kuoma khawm ram chu sem nîng a tih,” tiin.
Hienghi Levi thlahai an nih: Libna thlahai, Hebron thlahai, Mahli thlahai, Musi thlahai, Kora thlahai an nih. Kohath chun Amram a thla a.
Amram nuhmei hming chu Jokebed, Levi naunu, Aigupta rama Levi kuoma pieng a nih. Chun, ama chun Amram le chun Aron le Mosie le an farnu Miriam chu a nei a.
Aron chun Nadab hai, Abihu hai, Eleazar hai, Ithamar hai a nei a.
Nadab le Abihu chu
Tiem po po pasal thla khat chin chungtieng chu sîng hni le sâng thum an nih. Israel mihai laia ram sem chang ve ding an ni naw leiin Israel mihai laia tiem an ni nawh.
Hieng hi a nih Jeriko zâwn, Jordan vapang, Moab phaia Israel mihai tiemtu Mosie le Eleazarin an tiemhai chu.
Intuokna puon in kawtkhârah Mosie le thiempu Eleazar le mi lienhai le pungkhâwm po pohai hmaa chun an va ngîr a,
“Thlalêra khan kan pa a thi a,
Naupasal nei naw lei elin iengdingin am kan pa hming chu a thlahai laia chun bo el a ta? Kan pa unauhai lai chanvo mi pe ve ro,” an ta.
Mosie chun an thu chu
“Zelophehad naunuhai chu an indik a nih; an pa chanvo chu i pêk ding a nih.
Chun, Israel mihai kuomah chun, ‘Mi naupasal nei lova a thi chun a ro chu a naunuhmei in pêk ding a nih.
Nau nuhmei a nei naw chun a ro chu a unaupahai in pêk ding a nih.
Unaupahai khawm a nei naw chun a ro chu a pa unaupahai in pêk ding a nih.
Chun, a pain unaupahai a nei naw chun a ro chu a laibung inhnaipui tak pêng in ta, ama chun inkhâwm a tih, chun,
Chun, i hang hmu zo chun i unaupa Aron chu a chipuihai kuomah ṭhuoi a ni ang bawkin nang khawm ṭhuoi ni tâng i tih.
Zin thlalêra pungkhâwmhai an chier laia an mithmuah tuia khan mi chawimawi dinga ka thupêk che kala i hel lei khan,” a ta. (Chuong chu Zin thlalêra Kadesa Meriba tuiahai chun a nih).
Chun, Mosiein
thiempu Eleazar le pungkhâwmhai hmaa chun inngîrtir la, an mithmua chun thuneina pe rawh.
Chun, Israel mi pungkhâwmhai po poin a thu an âwi theina dingin a chungah i thuneina a ṭhen inhlân rawh.
Chuongchun, ama chu thiempu Eleazar hmaa chun ngîr a ta, ama chun
Mosie chun
chun, a chungah kut ân nghat a, Mosie hmanga
“Israel mihai chu thu pe la, an kuomah, ‘Ka bu ka ta dinga riminhnik meia thilinhlân, ka kuoma thilinhlân chu a hun tak peiah in inhlân ding a nih,’ ti la.
Berâmte pakhat chu zîngkâr inhlân in ta, pakhat chu zântieng inhlân in tih;
beiphit thilinhlâna dingin beiphit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat chawkpawl leh.
Chun, Berâmte pakhat inhlânnaa dâwnmi thilinhlân chu, hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat a ni ding a nih;
Chun, berâmte pakhat chu zântieng în hlân ding a nih; Zântienga beiphit thilinhlân ang le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân ang bawk chu

“Chun, châwlniin berâmte, a chal kum khat mi, demkailo pahni le beiphit thilinhlâna dingin beiphit indi mi epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni hrieka chawkpawl le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân leh în hlân ding a nih;
hi hi châwlni poa pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân bâka pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân ding chu a nih.
In thla thar taphawtah

chun, bâwngchal tina chun beiphit thilinhlân dingin beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum; chun, berâm pakhatah beiphit thilinhlânah beiphit indi mi, hrieka chawkpawl hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni;
chun, berâmte tinah beiphit thilinhlâna dingin beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat; hi hi pumrawhmang thilinhlân riminhnik

Chun, an dâwnmi thilinhlân chu bâwngchal pakhatah uoin hin chenve nîng a tih; berâmchal pakhatah hin hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat, berâmte pakhatah hin hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat; hi hi kum tluona thla tina pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu a nih.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân hrim le chutaka dâwnmi thil inhlân hrim bâkah
Ni khat ni chun inkhâwmpui inthieng um a ta, ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni naw a;
meia thilinhlân pumrawhmang thilinhlân ruok chu
beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl, an beiphit thilinhlân leh; bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni;
berâmte pasaria chun hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng a ni ding a nih;
chun, in ta dinga inremna siemna dingin suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat.
Hienghi zîngkâra pumrawhmang thilinhlân, pumrawhmang thilinhlân hrim bâkah in inhlân ding a nih.

Chuong ang bawkin, ni tin, ni sari sûng,Lalpa ta dinga riminhnik, fâk ding (bei) meia thilinhlân chu Lalpa kuomah in inhlân zie ding a nih. Hi hi ni tina pumrawhmang le dâwnmi thilinhlân inhlân hrim bâka inhlân ding chu a nih.
A ni sari ni chun inkhawmpui inthieng nei in ta, ieng sin khawm in thaw ding a ni nawh.
an beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl, bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni,
berâmte pasaria chun hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng;
in ta dinga inremna siemna dingin kêlchal pakhat leh.
(Demkailo an ni ngei ding a nih). Pumrawhmang thilinhlân le dâwn ding thilinhlân zing le chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlân bâkah inhlân ding a nih.
an beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl, bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni,
berâmte pasariah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng;
in ta dinga inremna siemna dingin suol thâwina kêlchal pakhat leh,
thla thar pumrawhmang thilinhlân le chutaka beiphit thilinhlân dâm, dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm, an thaw dân pângngai
an beiphit thilinhlân, beiphit indi mi hrieka chawkpawl, bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni,
berâmte pasariah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat seng:
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; inremna dinga suol thâwina dâm, pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le an dâwnmi thilinhlânhai bâkah.
chun,
an beiphit thilinhlân hrieka chawkpawl, bâwngchal sâwmpathum, bâwngchal pakhatah epha hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun thum, berâmchal pahni, berâmchal pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun hni;
berâmte sâwmpali, berâmte pakhatah hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân hrim, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân dâm, dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
“A ni hni niin bâwngchal tuoi sâwmpahni, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali in inhlân ding a nih;
an beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dân ang takin, an tam dân ang peiin bâwngchal, berâmchal, le berâmte hai chu in inhlân ding a nih.
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân dâm, dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
“A ni thum ni chun bâwngchal sâwmpakhat, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali;
an beiphit thilhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, an dân ang takin, an tam dân ang peiin bâwngchal,le berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing le chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân bâkah.
“A ni li ni chun bâwngchal sâwm, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali;
an beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dân ang takin, an tam ang peiin bâwngchal, berâmchal,le berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
“A ni nga ni chun bâwngchal pakuo, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali;
an beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dan ang takin an tam ang peiin bâwngchal, berâmchal, berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina ding kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân dâm, chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
“A ni ruk ni chun bâwngchal pariet, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali;
an beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dân ang takin, an tam ang peiin bâwngchal, berâmchal, berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân dâm, chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
“Chun, ni sari ni chun bâwngchal pasari, berâmchal pahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi demkailo sâwmpali;
an beiphit thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dân ang takin, an tam ang peiin, bâwngchal, berâmchal, berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
an beiphit thilinhlân le an dâwnmi thilinhlânhai chu, a dân ang takin, an tam ang peiin, bângchal, berâmchal, berâmtehai ruol chun in inhlân ding a nih;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat leh; pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân zing dâm, chutaka beiphit thilinhlân le chutaka dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm bâkah.
In thutiem dâm, nuomthua thilinhlân dâm, in pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm, in beiphit thilinhlân dâm, in dâwnmi thilinhlân dâm, in inremna thilinhlân dâm bâka chun hieng hi in hunbi ruoiṭhe nei niin
Mosie chun Israel mihai ṭhuoituhai chu a biek a, “Hi hi a nih
Nuhmei khawmin a nunghâk laia a pa ina a um laiin
ân tiemkamna le thutiema ân khuokhirna chu a pain a hriet a, a pain a tosan el chun ân tiemkamna po po chu puitling a ta; chun, thutiem tinrêng ân khuokhirnahai chu um zing a tih.
Amiruokchu, a pain a hriet huna a phal naw chun ân tiemkamnahai, le ân khuokhirna thutiemhai a ieng ieng khawm chu puitling naw ni a, a pain a phal naw a ni leiin
Thutiemin amanih, thu dâwn lova intiemnain amanih a del zing laia pasal a nei a,
a pasalin a hriet a, a hriet huna a to zing chun ân tiemkamna chu um zing a ta, a thutiem ân khuokhirnahai khawm chu um zing a tih.
Amiruokchu, a pasal chun a hriet huna a phal naw chun a chunga thutiem um le thu dâwn lova ân tiemna chu sukbo a tih; chun,
Amiruokchu, hmeithai amanih, mâksiet tuok amanih hai thutiem chu ân tiemna po po chun del zing a tih.
Chun, a pasal inah thu ân tiemkam amanih, inkhâma a lungril khuokhir dinga thu ân tiem a, a pasalin a hriet khawma a to zing a,
a phalnaw naw chun ân tiemkamna po po chu um zing a ta, ân khuokhirna tinrêng khawm chu um zing a tih.
Amiruokchu, a pasalin a hriet nia iengkhawm ni lova a siem a, a sukbo el chun, ân tiemna thua a bâu thu suok taphawt hai, ama ân tiemkamnahai amanih, umta naw ni a; a pasal chun a hlîp ta leiin
Thutiem po po le hringna sukrinum dinga khuokhirna inkhâmna po po chu a pasalin a sukhmangin a sukbo thei.
Chuleiin, a pasalin a hriet huna inthawkin a to ṭawk el chun a thu intiem ta po po le ân khitna po po chu a suknghet a nih; a hriet nia inthawka a tosan el leiin a suknghet a nih.
Amiruokchu, a hriet hun ni lova a hnunga iengkhawm ni lova a siem a, a sukbo chun a rîtlona maw chu a phur ding a nih,” tiin.
“Midian mihai chungah Israel mihai phuba la rawh; chu zoa chun i chihai kuomah ṭhuoi ni tâng i tih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun mipuihai chu a biek a, “Midian mihai chunga
Israel hnam po pohai laia hnam tina mi sâng khat pei indonaah in fe ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Israel mi sâng tamtak laia inthawkin, hnam tina inthawkin sâng khat seng indonaa fe dingin sipai sîng khat le sâng hni an pêk suok a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun chi tina inthawka sâng khat seng le thiempu Eleazar naupa Phinehas hmun inthienga bûrlebêlhai, thupêk vêlna dinga tawtawrâwthai chawiin indonaa chun ân fetir a.
Chun,
An mi thathai laia chun Midian mihai lalhai khawm an ṭhang ve a; Midian mihai lal panga Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur le Reba hai, Beor naupa Balaam khawm kâwlhnâmin an that a.
Israel mihai chun Midian mi nuhmei le naupanghai chu salah an ṭhuoi a, chun, an ran po pohai, an berâm ruol po pohai, an thuomhnawhai po po chu râllâk sum dingin an lâk a.
An umna khuo po pohai, an riebûkhai po po an râw vawng a.
Mihriem le ran, sal le râllâk sum po po an fepui vawng a.
Chun, salhai, manhai, râllâk sumhai chu Mosie le Eleazar le Israel mi pungkhâwmhai kuoma Jeriko zâwn Jordan vapang Moab phai an riebûka chun an hung intlun a.
Mosie le thiempu Eleazar le pungkhâwmhai po po chun riebûk puoah an lo va tuok a.
Chun, Mosie chu sipai hotuhai, indonaa inthawka hunghai chunga chun a lunginsen a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun an kuomah, “Nuhmei chu damin in la hla vawng maw?
Nuhmei naupang mi la pâwl naw po po chu in ta dingin hla ro.
Chun, khawhnâwmah ni sari riek unla, tukhawm mi that le mithi tâwk taphawt chu ni thum ni le ni sari niin inthien ro, nangni le in salhai khawm.
Chun, thuomhnaw hrim hrim le savuna thil siem hrim hrim dâm, kêl hmula thil siem po po dâm, thinga siemhai po po chungthua chu inthien ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, thiempu Eleazar chun indonaa fe indo mihai kuoma chun, “Hi hi
iengkhawm ni sienla, rângkachak dâm, tangkaruo dâm, dâr dâm, thîr dâm, rângva dâm, suon dâm;

iengkhawm meia rawa se theilo chu meiah rawl thleng in ta, chuongchun, hung inthieng tâng a tih; iengkhawm ni sienla, inthienna tuia sukthieng ding a nih; chun, meia raw tuor theilo po chu tuiah in rawl thleng ding a nih.
“Nang le thiempu Eleazar leh, pungkhâwmhai pahnam ṭhuoituhai leh râllâk suma an lâk mihriemhai le ranhai chu tiem vawng unla,
Indonaa fe râl kâp mihaia inthawk chun
Chuonga a chenve an changa inthawk chun la unla,
Chun, a chenve Israel mihai chanpuol chu sâwmnga peiah pakhat suktum la, mihriema inthawk dâm, bâwnga inthawk dâm, sabengtunga inthawk dâm, berâm ruola inthawk dâm, ran ruola inthawk dâmin; chuongchu
Chuongchun,
Sipaihaiin an lâk râllâk sum tiem lovin an lâk chu berâm nuoi ruk sîng sari le sâng nga,
bâwng sîng sari le sâng hni;
sabengtung sîng ruk le sâng khat,
mihriem chu nuhmei pasal la pâwl ngailo sîng thum le sâng hni an nih.
Chun, a zâtve indonaa fehai chanvo chu, berâm nuoi thum sîng thum sâng sari le za nga a na;
chun,
Bâwng chu sîng thum le sâng ruk a na, chutaka
Sabengtung chu sîng thum le za nga a na, chutaka
Mihriem chu sîng khat le sâng ruk an na, chutaka
Mosiein râlkâp mihaia inthawka a sem Israel mihai chanvo chu
mipui chanvo a zâtve chu berâm nuoi thum sîng thum sâng sari le za nga,
bâwng sîng thum le sâng ruk,
sabengtung sîng thum le za nga,
mihriem sîng khat le sâng ruk an na.
Israel chanvo a zâtvea inthawk chun Mosie chun mihriem le ran sâwmnga peiah pakhat a lâk a,
Chun, sipaihai chunga hotu, sâng chunga hotuhai, za chunga hotuhai chun Mosie an va hnai a.
Mosie kuomah, “I siehlawhai hin kan kuta um indo mihai chu kan tiem a, tukhawm a kim naw kan um naw a,
kan hringna ta dinga
Chun, Mosie le thiempu chun rângkachaka siem an thuom pohai chu an lâk a.
Sâng chunga hotu le za chunga hotuhai rângkachak
(Râlkâp mihai chun an râllâk sumhai chu mâni ta seng dinga la an na).
Chun, Mosie le thiempu Eleazar chun sâng chunga hotu le za chunga hotuhai rângkachak chu an lâk a, Israel thlahai hriet zingna dingin intuokna puon inah
Reuben le Gad thlahai chun ram an hau hle a; chun, Jazer ram le Gilead ram an hmu chun, a hmun chu ran ta dinga hmun ṭhatak niin an hriet a;
chuongchun, Gad thlahai le Reuben thlahai chun Mosie le thiempu Eleazar le pungkhâwmhai ṭhuoituhai chu an va biek a,
“Astaroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimra, Hesbon, Eleale, Sebam, Nebo le Beon dâm
Israel pungkhâwmhai hmaa
rem i ti zâwng a ni chun hi ram hi kan hluo dingin mi pe la, Jordan râl mi ṭhuoi kai da el raw khai,” an ta.
Chun, Mosie chun Gad mihai le Reuben mihai kuoma chun, “In unauhai chu indonaah fêng an ta, nangni chu hitaka hin in lo um el ding maw?
Iengdinga
Kades-barneaa inthawka ram va enthla dinga ka ti khan hieng ang bawk hin in puhai chun an ta,
Eskol ruom an hung tlung khan ram chu an hung hmu a,
Chuongchun, chu ni chun
‘Aigupta rama inthawka hung suok, kum sâwmhni chin chungtieng mi hrim hrim chu Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai kuoma inkhâma pêk ka tiem ram chu tukhawma hmu naw ni hai; an mi zui tak tak naw leiin;
Keniz mi Jephunne naupa Kaleb le Nun naupa Josua hai chau naw chun, anni chun
Chun, Israelhai chunga chun
Chun, ngai ta u, Israelhai chunga
Anni chun an va hnai a, a kuomah, “Hitaka hin kan ran ta dingin berâm huonhai le kan nau le tehai ta dingin khuohai siem kan ta.
Keini ruok chu an hmun ding ei tlung hmakhata Israel mihai hmaa fe pei dingin inrâlthuom diem kan ta; hi rama mihai lei hin kan nau le têhai chu kul nei khuoahai chun um an ta.
Israel mi po poin an hmun hluo ding an hluo hmakhat chu kan in tieng fe naw ning ungah.
Kan hluo ding chu hi tieng râl Jordan sak tieng a ni leiin Jordan râl khingtieng le a khêl tieng chu hluopui naw ning ungah,” an ta.
Chun, Mosiein an kuomah, “Chuong anga in thaw a, indonaa
nakie leh in tieng la fêng in ta,
Amiruokchu, chuong anga in thaw naw chun, ngai ta u,
In nau le têhai ta dingin khuohai siem unla, in berâmhai ta dingin huonhai siem un la, in hril ang chun thaw ro khai,” a ta.
Chun, Gad thlahai le Reuben thlahai chun Mosie kuomah, “I siehlawhai hin kan pu thupêk ang chun thâwng kan tih.
Kan nuhmei, kan nau le têhai, kan berâm ruolhai, kan ran ruolhai po po chu Gilead ram khuohaia hin lo um an ta;
amiruokchu, i siehlaw, indo dinga inrâlthuomhai po po chu kan pu hril ang chun
Chuongchun, Mosie chun an chungchâng thua chun thiempu Eleazar hai, Nun naupa Josua hai, Israel pahnam ṭhuoituhai chu thu a pêk a.
Chun, Mosie chun an kuomah, “Gad thlahai le Reuben thlahai indo dinga inrâlthuomhai po po hin
amiruokchu, inrâlthuoma an kaipui naw cheu chun Kanaan ramah nangni lai ṭhang ve el an tih,” a ta.
Chun, Gad mihai le Reuben mihai chun, “I siehlawhai kuoma
inralthuoma

Chun, Mosie chun Gad mihai le Reuben mihai le Josef nau Manasse hnam zâtve hai chu Amor lal Sihon ram dâm, Basan lal Og ram, chuong ramhai chu a khuo um po pohai leh a vêla rama khuohai le chun a pêk a.
Chun, Gad thlahai chun Dibon dâm, Ataroth dâm, Aroer dâm,
Atrothsophan dâm, Jazer dâm, Jogbeha dâm,
Beth-nimrah dâm, Betharan dâm an indin a, khawpui kul neihai, berâm huon dâm leh.
Chun, Reuben thlahai chun Hesbon dâm, Eleale dâm, Kiriathaim dâm,
Nebo dâm, Baal-meon dâm, (an hminghai hi sukdanglam a ni tah), Sibma dâm an indin a; an khuo siemhai chu hming dang an inbûk a.
Chun, Manasse naupa Makir thlahai chu Gilead rama chun an fe a, an lâk a. Amor mihai chutaka umhai chu an lâkpêk a.
Chun, Mosie chun Gilead ram chu Manasse naupa Makir chu a pêk a, chutaka chun a um a.
Chun, Manasse naupa Jair chun chutaka khuohai chu a va lâk a, Havot-Jair ân bûk a.
Chun, Noba chun Kenath a va lâk a, a khawperhai leh, ama hming chawiin Noba ân bûk a.
Mosie le Aron inrawina hnuoia Israel mihai Aigupta rama inthawka a pâwl pâwla an suok a, an fe pei dân chu hieng ang hin a nih.
Thla khatna, ni sâwmpanga ni, Fekân ruoiṭhe zo tûk chun, Ramesesa inthawkin Aigupta mihai mithmuah Israel mihai chu huoisen takin an fe suok a.
Chu hun chu Aigupta mihai naulutir po po
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chu Ramesesa inthawk chun an suok a, Sukkothah umhmun an khuor a.
Sukkotha inthawkin an suok a, thlalêr tawntira Ethama chun umhmun an khuor a.
Ethama inthawk chun an suok a, Baal-Jephan bula Pi-hahiroth tieng an intawl kîr nawk a. Migdol bula chun umhmun an khuor a.
Pi-hahiroth bula inthawk chu an suok a, tuipui an fe thleng a, thlalêrah an lût a, chun, Etham thlalêrah ni thum lam an fe a, Maraah umhmun an khuor a.
Maraa inthawk chun an suok a, Elim an tlung a; Elima chun tuihnâr sâwmpahni le intûm kûng sâwmsari a um a; chutaka chun umhmun an khuor a.
Elima inthawk chun an suok a, Tuipui Senah umhmun an khuor a.
Tuipui Sena inthawk chun an suok a, Sin thlalêra chun umhmun an khuor a.
Sin thlalêra inthawk chun an suok a, Dophkaah umhmun an khuor a.
Chun, Dophkaa inthawk chun an suok a, Alusa chun umhmun an khuor a.
Alusa inthawk chun an suok a, Rephidimah umhmun an khuor a, chutaka chun mipuihai dâwn ding tui a um naw a.
Rephidima inthawk chun an suok a, Sinai thlalêrah umhmun an khuor a.
Sinai thlahêra inthawk chun an suok a, Kibroth-hattavaah umhmun an khuor a.
Kibroth-hattavaa inthawk chun an suok a, Hazerothah umhmun an khuor a.
Hazerotha inthawk chun an suok a, Rithmaa chun umhmun an khuor a.
Rithmaa inthawk chun an suok a, Rimmon-pereza chun umhmun an khuor a.
Rimmon-pereza inthawk chun an suok a, Libnaah umhmun an khuor a.
Libnaa inthawk chun an suok a, Rissaah umhmun an khuor a.
Rissaa inthawk chun an suok a, Kehelathaah umhmun an khuor a.
Kehelathaa inthawk chun an suok a, Sepher tlângah umhmun an khuor a.
Chun, Sepher tlânga inthawk chun an suok a, Haradaah umhmun an khuor a.
Haradaa inthawk chun an suok a, Makhelothah umhmun an khuor a.
Makhelotha inthawk chun an suok a, Tahatha chun umhmun an khuor a.
Tahatha inthawk chun an suok a, Teraa chun umhmun an khuor a.
Teraa inthawk chun an suok a, Mithkaah umhmun an khuor a.
Mithkaa inthawk chun an suok a, Hasmonaa chun umhmun an khuor a.
Hasmonaa inthawk chun an suok a, Moserothah umhmun an khuor a.
Moserotha inthawk chun an suok a, Bene-jaakanah umhmun an khuor a.
Bene-jaakana inthawkin an suok a, Hor-hagidgadah umhmun an khuor a.
Hor-hagidgada inthawk chun an suok a, Jotbathaah umhmun an khuor a.
Jotbathaa inthawk chun an suok a, Abronaah umhmun an khuor a.
Abronaa inthawk chun an suok a, Ezion-geberah umhmun an khuor a.
Ezion-gebera inthawk chun an suok a, Zin thlalêrah umhmun an khuor a, chu chu Kades an ti bawk.
Kadesa inthawk chun an suok a, Edom ram dep Hor tlângah umhmun an khuor a.
Chuongchun, Aron chu Hor tlânga a thi chun kum zâ sâwmhni pathum a nih.
Kanaan mi Kanaan ram simtienga um Arad lal chun Israel mihai hung chu a lo hriet a.
Hor tlânga inthawk chun an suok a, Zalmonaah umhmun an khuor a.
Zalmonaa inthawk chun an suok a, Punonah umhmun an khuor a.
Punona inthawk chun an suok a, Obothah umhmun an khuor a.
Obotha inthawk chun an suok a, Moab ram sûnga Ije-abarimah umhmun an khuor a.
Ijima inthawk chun an suok a, Dibon-gadah umhmun an khuor a.
Dibon-gada inthawk chun an suok a, Almon-diblathaimah umhmun an khuor a.
Almon-diblathaima inthawk chun an suok a. Nebo bula Abarim tlângahai chun umhmun an khuor a.
Abarim tlânghaia inthawk chun an suok a, Jeriko zâwn Jordan vapang, Moab phaiah umhmun an khuor a.
Jordan vapang, Bethjesimotha inthawk a Abel-sittim chenin Moab phaiah umhmun an khuor a.
Chun, Jeriko zâwn Jordan vapang Moab phaia chun
“Israel mihai chu hril la, an kuomah ‘Jordan vadung in kai a,
chun, ram chu hluong in ta, chutaka chun um in tih; in hluo dingin ram chu ka pêk ta cheu a nih.

A hnam tam dân ang peiin aisânin ram chu hluong in ta, a hnam tam deuhai chu ram lien deu pêng in ta, a hnam tam naw deuhai chu ram chîn deu pêng in tih; aisâna a tlûkna taphawt chu an chanpuol nîng a ta; an pi le puhai chi fe dân ang peiin in hluo ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, chu rama umhai chu in hnawt suok naw chun in inumtirhai chu in mit ta dinga suntu le in pang ta dinga hling ang nîng an tih.
In umna rama chun suklungzîng an ti cheu. Chun, an chunga thaw ka lungril ang chu in chungah thâwng ka tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Chun,

“Israel mihai chu thu pe la, an kuomah, ‘Kanaan ram in tlung pha chun, (Kanaan rama ramri izir ang peia in hluo ding ram chu) simtienga in hluo ding chin chu Zin thlalêra inthawka Edom ram hrûl peiah nîng a tih;
chun, in ramri chu Akrabim hang fena simtieng pangah kâwi a ta, Zinah fe thleng a ta, chun, a hung suokna chu Kades-barnea simtiengah nîng a tih, chun, Hazar-addarah fêng a ta, Azmonah fe pei a tih.
Chun, ramri chu Azmona inthawk chun Aigupta vadung chenin kâwi a ta, a tâwpna chu Medirranean tuipui nîng a tih.
Thlangtieng panga chun Mediterranean tuipui chu a ramri dingin chang i ta, hi hi thlangtienga in ramri nîng a tih.
Chun, hi hmârtienga in ramri nîng a tih; Mediterranean tuipuia inthawka Hor tlâng huomin siem i ta.
Hor tlânga inthawka Hamath lûtna chenin siem i tih; ramri suokna chu Zedadah nîng a tih;
chun, ramri chu Ziphronah fe pei a ta, chun, a suokna chu Hazarenanah nîng a tih; hi hi hmartienga in ramri chu nîng a tih.
Saktienga in ramri chu Hazarenana inthawkin Sepham chenin siem in ta;
chu ramri chu Sephama inthawk Ribla chenin Ain saktieng pangah fe thlâng a tih; chuongchun, ramri chu fe thla pei a ta, Kinnereth tuipui saktieng pang zuk sun a ta;
chun, ramri chu Jordanah fe thlâng a ta, chun, a suokna chu Tuipui Thi-ah nîng a tih; hi hi a vêla ramri fe dân ang hin in ram nîng a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Reuben thlahaiin an pahnam izir pei le Gad thlahaiin an pahnamhai izir pei le, Manasse hnam zâtve khawmin an ram hluo ding chu an chang ta si a.
Hnam hni le hnam zâtvehai chun an ram hluo ding chu nisa suokna tieng Jeriko zâwn Jordan râl saktiengah an chang ta a,” tiin.
“Hluo dinga ram ṭhenawi puituhai hming chu hieng hi a nih: thiempu Eleazar le Nun naupa Josua hai.
Ram ṭhetu ding chun hnam tin laia ṭhuoitu pakhat seng i thlang ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuong mihai hming chu hieng hi a nih: Juda hnama Jephunne naupa Kaleb;
Simeon thlahai hnama Ammihud naupa Semuel;
Benjamin hnama mi Kislon naupa Elidad;
Dan thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Jogli naupa Bukki;
Josef thlahai laia Manasse thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Ephod naupa Hanniel:
Ephraim thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Siphtan naupa Kemuel.
Zebulun thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Parnak naupa Elizaphan.
Issakar thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Azan naupa Paltiel.
Aser thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Selomi naupa Ahihud.
Naphtali thlahai hnama ṭhuoitu Ammihud naupa Pedahel.
Hienghi Kanaan rama Israel mihai ram hluo ding sem dinga
“Israel mihai chu thu pe la, an ramahai chun Levi mihai umna ding khuohai siempêk raw hai se; chun, ran tlatna dingin khaw kâwl vêlhai chu Levi mihai chu i pêk ding a nih.
Khuohai chu an umna ding nîng a ta, a vêlhai chu an bâwng le an ran, an thil vai po pohai ta dingin nîng a tih.
Levi mihai kuoma ran tlatna hmun i pêk ding chu khaw kula inthawka tawng sâng khata hla a ni ding a nih.

Kul puotienga inthawkin inkhîng i ta, saktieng pangah tawng sâng hni, simtieng pangah tawng sâng hni; thlangtieng pangah tawng sâng hni, hmârtieng pangah tawng sâng hni, a lai takah khuo um a tih. Hi hi an khuo ta dinga ran tlatna hmun nîng a tih.
Levi mihai i pêk ding khuo po pohai chu khuo sâwmli pariet, a kâwl- vêla ran tlatna hmunhai leh nîng a tih.

Israel mihai ihluo khuo i pêk dân ding chu a hnam lien deua inthawk chun pe lien deu i ta; a hnam tlâwm deua inthawk chun pe chîn i ta, pahnam tinin an hluo ram tam dân i zirin a khuo chu Levi mihai a pêk ding a nih,” tiin.
‘Jordan vadung in kai a, Kanaan ram in lût pha chun,
himna khuo ding in ruot ding a nih, tuolthat paltu tlânna dingin.
Chuong khuohai chu phubalatua inthawka himna khuohai nîng an ta; pungkhâwmhai hmaa rorêlpêk dinga a ngir hmaa tuolthattu chu a thi nawna dingin.
Chuongchun, in ta dinga himna khuo in ruothai chu khuo paruk nîng a ta.
Jordan râlah khaw thum ruot in ta, Kanaan ramah khaw thum ruot in ta; himna khuohai nîng an tih.
Israel mihai le hnam dang le an kuoma chênghai ta dingin hi khuo paruk hi himna khuohai nîng an tih, chutaka chun tukhawm mi that palhai chu an tlân ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, thîr hriemhrei hmanga mi a thaw a, a thi chun, tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Chun, thina khawpa lunga mi a suk a, a thi chun tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Chun, thi khawpa thinga mi a vuok a, a thi chun tuolthat a nih, tuolthattu chu sukhlum ngei ding a nih.
Thisen phubalatu chun tuolthattu chu that nghâl el a tih. A hmu pha pha a sukhlum el ding a nih.
Chun, mi a theida leia nam rak amanih, inchân rûka dênga a thiin amanih,
intaina leia a chum hlum amani chun a sukhlumtu chu sukhlum ve ngei nîng a tih; tuolthat a nih, thisen phubalatu chun a hmu pha pha a sukhlum el ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, intai lei khawm ni chuong lova, nam thut amanih, chun, inchân ni kher lova dêng amanih,
an um ti khawm hre lova, a hmêlma khawm ni lova, a pawitâwk khawm ni chuong lova, lungin amanih a dêng a, mi a lo thi dâm a ni chun,
pungkhâwmhaiin hieng rorêlna dân ang hin a sukhlumtu thisen phubalatu ro chu a rêlpêk ding a nih;

pungkhâwmhai chun tuolthattu chu thisen phubalatua inthawk chun hum an ta, pungkhâwmhai chun a tlânna, himna khuoa chun inumtir nâwk an ta, hriek inthienga nâl, thiempu lal a thi hmakhat chun chutaka chun a um ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, ienglai khawmin tuolthattu chu a tlânna, himna khaw ramri puotieng a fe a,
thisen phubalatuin a himna khaw puoa a hmu a, thisen phubalatuin a that chun thisena chun thiemnaw chang naw ni;
thiempu lal a thi hmakhat chun chu himna khuoa chun a um zing ding a ni leiin; thiempu a thi hnunga ruok chun tuolthattu chu a umna rama chun a kîr nâwk ding a nih.
Hieng thil hi in thlahai chena in umna taphawta in rorêl dân ding chu nîng a tih.
Chun, tuolthattu chu in intlan ding a ni nawh, thina khawpa thiemnaw chang a na, sukhlum ngei ding a ni lem.
Chun, thiempu thi hma chun a himna khuoa tlân, a rama um nâwk ding intlanna chu in lâk ding a ni nawh.

Chuongchun, in umna ram chu, sukpawrche ding a ni nawh, thisen chun ram chu in sukpawrche si a, thisen suokna ram pawrche sâwpna ding chun thisen insuotu thisen ngawt naw chu hmang thei a ni si naw a.
In umna ram, ka umna hi in sukpawrche ding a ni nawh, kei
Chun, Josef sûnghai laia mi Manasse naupa Makir naupa Gilead thlahai pahnam ṭhuoituhai laia mihai chun an hung hnai a, Mosie le hotu Israel mihai ṭhuoituhai hmaa chun thu an hril a,

chun, anni chun Israel thlahai laia mi hnam dang tu nauhai khawm pasala an nei chun, kan pi le puhai ram an hluo chu lâkpêk a, an va ṭhangnahai rama bel ding nîng a ta, chuong ang chun kan ram chanpuola inthawk ṭhe suok hung nîng a ta.
Zelophehad naunuhmeihai chungchâng thua
Chuongchun, Israel mihai ram chu pahnam dang dang kuomah sawn sawn ni naw nih. Israel mihai chun an pi le puhai hnam ram chu an chang zing ding a nih.
Chuongchun, ram chu hnam dang dang kuoma sawn sawn a ni naw ding a nih. Israel thlahai chun anni ram seng chu an chang ding a ni si a,” tiin.
Chun,
Zelophehad naunuhmei Mahla hai, Tirza hai, Hogla hai,
Milka hai, Noa hai chun an pa unaupa naupasalhai an nei tâwl a, Josef naupa Manasse naupasalhai an nei a, an ram chu an pahnama chun a um zing ta a.
Hieng hi
Hieng thu hi Jordan saktieng, Paran le Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth le Dizahab inkara Suph va dep Araba, Mosiein Israelmihai po po kuoma a hril chu a nih.
Horeb tlânga inthawkin Kadesbarnea chu Seir tlâng tieng lampuia fein ni sâwmpakhat lam a na.
Kum sâwmlina, thla sâwmpakhatna, chu thla ni khat ni chun,
Chu chu Hesbona um Amor mihai lal Sihon le Edrei le Astaroth-a um Basan lal Og a that hnungin a nih.
Jordan saktieng Moab ramah hi dân hi Mosiein a puong ṭan ta a,

insawn ta unla, fe suok unla, Amor mihai tlâng rama le a kâwl vêl po po Arabaa dâm, tlâng rama dâm, phai rama dâm, Sim rama dâm, Kanaan mihai umna tuipui kamhaia le Lebanona dâm, vadungpui Euphrates vadung chenin fe ro.
