Ngai ta u, ram chu ka pêk dai ta cheu, in pu Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai le an hnunga an thla nâwk peihai kuoma inkhâma
Iengtin am keima khât chauin in buoina dâm, in phurrik dâm, in inngâwknahai chu phur zo ka ta?
In hnam chita inthawkin mi var, chinchâng hre mi, mi ngaisângumhai thlang suok unla, in ṭhuoituah siem ka tih,’ tiin ka hril cheu a.
Chun, nangnîn, ‘I thil hril chu kan ta dingin a ṭha hle el,’ tiin in mi dawn a.

Chuongchun, in hnam hotuhai chu ka pawm a, in hnam laia mi, mi var, chinchâng hre mihai in chungah ṭhuoituah ka siem a, sâng chunga hotu dâm, za chunga hotu dâm, sâwmnga chunga hotu dâm, sâwm chunga hotu dâm, ṭhuoituhai khawm.

Rorêlnaah thlierbîk in nei ding a ni nawh; mi chîn le mi lien inang zingin in ngaipêk ding a nih; tukhawm in ṭi ding a ni nawh; rorêlna chu Pathien ta a ni si a; in ta dinga thu khir taluo chu ka kuomah hung intlun hlak in ta, chu chu lo ngaituo hlak ka tih,’ tiin thu ka pêk a.
Chun, chuong lai chun thil in thaw dân ding po poah thu ka pêk cheu a.
“Chun,
Chun, in kuomah, ‘
Ngai ta u,
Chu thu chun a mi suklâwm hle el a, chuongchun, nangni laia mi sâwmpahni, hnam khatah pakhat pei ka thlang a:
chuongchun, an suok ta a, tlânga chun an hang lâwn a, Eskol ruom an hang tlung a, an hang enthlâk vawng a.
Chu rama thei dâm chu an lo a, an mi hung phurpêk a, chanchin an mi hung intlun a, ‘
Nisienlakhawm, in hang fe nuom naw a,
in puon inhaia chun in chier a, ‘

Iengdingin am chu chun hang fêng ei ta? Ei unauhai chun, Mihriem chu eini nêkin an lien a, an insâng lem bawk a; khuohai chu a lien tâwl hle a, vân tawngin kulhai a nei a; chun, Anakim thlahai khawm chu kan hang hmu bawk a, tiin kan lungril an sukzawp a,’ in ti a.
Kei chun in kuomah, ‘Zâmse naw unla, anni chu ṭi bawk naw ro.
Chuonghai po ka hril sa khawmin
in puon in in zarna ding hmun zawngpêk ding cheu le in lampui khîkhmu ding cheua zânah meia, sûnah sûma hmaṭhuoitu chu.
“Chun,
‘Hi suon rilotaka mi hin chu pakhat bêk khawmin in pi le puhai pêk dinga intkhâmna ram ṭhatak chu hmu naw tawp an tih.
Jephunne naupa Kaleb chau naw chun; ama chun chu hmûng a tih, a va sir tah ram chu ama le a nauhai pêng ka tih, ama chun
“Nangni leiin ka chunga khawm
I rawngbâwltu Nun naupa Josua hi chu lût a tih, ama hi infui rawh; Israel mihai chu ân hluotir ding a nih.
In nau le tehai, râllâkin la el an ta, in tihai hi, tuta a sie a ṭha la hre lo in nauhai hi lût an tih, anni chu pêng ka ta, hluong an tih.
Nangni ruok chu insawn unla, Tuipui Sen tiengah thlalêrah fe ro,’ tiin.
“Chun, nangnîn, ‘
Chun,
Chu chu ka hril cheu a, in pawm naw a,
Chun, chu tlânga um Amor mihai chun an lo thaw cheu a, khuoi mi hnawt ang elin an lo hnawt cheu a; Seir tlânga inthawka Horma chenin an that cheu a.
Chun, in hung kîr nâwk a,
Chuleichun, Kades-a chun sâwttak in um a ni kha.
Chun,
‘Hi tlâng hi in vêl sâwt tâwk ta a, hmartieng panin insawn ta ro.
Mipuihai chu Seir tlânga um Esau thla in unauhai ramah in fe thleng ding a nih. Anni chun lo ṭîng an ti cheu; chuleiin, fimkhur hle ro.
Anni chu thaw naw ro. An ram chu a khâwlai khawm kephaa sir khawp chau khawm ka pêk naw ding cheu a nih; Seir tlâng chu ama chanpuol dingin Esau ka pêk tah a nih.
An buhai chu in fâk dingin sumin inchâwng in ta; an tuihai chu in dâwn dingin sumin in inchâwk bawk ding a nih.
Chuongchun, Elath le Eziongebera inthawkin Araba lampuia fein, Seir tlânga um Esau thla ei unauhai ram ei fe thleng a. Chun, ei insawn a, Moab thlalêr tieng ei fe a.
chuonghai khawm chu Anak mihai ang bawka Repha mihai ti an na; nisienlakhawm, Moab mihai chun Em mihai an ti hlak a nih.
Kha hma khan chu Seir tlânga hin Hor mihai khawm an um bawk hlak a; nisienlakhawm, Esau thlahai hin an hluopêk a, an that a, an hmuna chun an um ta a; Israelhaiin
Chuongchun, Tho unla, Zered vadung chu kân ro khai,’ a ta. Chuong- chun, Zered vadung chu ei kân ta a.
Kades-barneaa inthawka ei suok le Zered vadung ei kân a,
Mipuihai laia inthawka an bohmang dêr hmakhat chun anni chu sukbohmang dingin
“Chuong anga mipuihai laia inthawka râlkâp mi po po an bohmang vawng a, an hung thi zo hnung chun,
‘Vawisûn hin Moab ram Ar chu i fe thleng ding a na;
chun, Ammon thlahai ep i va tlung hnai pha khawm sukbuoi naw la, thaw bawk naw rawh; Ammon mihai ram chu i puolah ka pêk naw ding che a nih; Lota thlahai puolah ka pêk tah a nih.
(Chu khawm chu Repha mihai rama ngai a ni bawk; chutaka chun kha hma khan Repha mihai chu an um hlak a; nisienlakhawm, Ammon mihai chun Zamzum mihai an ti hlak a nih.
Anak mihai anga mi lien le tam le mi insângtak tak an nih; nisienlakhawm,
Seir tlânga um Esau thlahai chu Hor mihai a sukbohmang laia a thaw ang khan; chuongchun, an hluo ve ta thung a, an hmuna chun tu chen hin an um ta a;
chun, Gaza chena khaw chînhaia um Av mihai chu Kaphtora inthawka hung suok Kaphtor mihai vêk chun an sukbohmang a, an hmuna chun an um ta a.)
Vawisûn hin vânkhuphnuoia hnam tin chunga chun nangma ṭina le ṭitumna in um ṭantir ka ta, i chanchin lo hrieng an ta, inthin an ta, nangma leiin lungngaitakin um an tih,’ tiin.
‘I rama hin mîn fe thlengtir raw khai; lamliena pei fêng ka ta, changtieng amanih, vawitieng amani khawm pêt naw ningah.
Ka fâk dingin bu sumin mîn chawktir i ta; ka dâwn dingin tui khawm sumin mîn chawktir i ta; mîn fe thlengtir ringawt el rawh;
Jordan ka kân a,
Nisienlakhawm, Hesbon lal Sihon chun a rama chun a mîn fe thlengtir phal naw a;
Chun,
Chuongchun, Sihon le a mihai po po chu Jahaz-ah a mi thaw dingin an hung inthawk a.
Chun,
Chu ṭum chun a khuohai po po chu ei lâk a, chuong khuoa pasal po po, nuhmei le an nauhai leh ei sukbohmang vawng a, hla hrim hrim ei nei nawh.
Ei lâk khuoa râllâka ei lâk thil le ranhai chau ei chan dingin ei lâk a nih.
Arnon ruom sîra Aroera inthawk le ruoma khaw uma inthawka Gilead chenin ei ta dingin insâng taluo khuo hrim a um dêr naw a,
Ammon thlahai ram chau in hnai naw a nih, Jabbok vadung râl khingtieng pang po po le tlâng rama khuohai le
Chun,
Chuongchun,
Chu ṭum chun a khuo po po, khuo sâwmruk, Basana Og ram Argob ram po po chu ei lâk vawng a; ei lâkpêk naw khuo pakhat bêk khawm a um nawh.
Hieng khuo po po hi kul insângtak tak, kawtkhâr le kalna nei vawng an nih, kul nei lo khuo tamtak tiem lo khawma.
Hesbon lal Sihon chunga ei thaw ang khan ei sukbohmang vawng a, khuo po po chu ei sukbohmang vawng a, pasal, nuhmei le an naupanghai chenin ei sukbohmang vawng a.
Amiruokchu, ran po po le, khuoa râllâka ei lâk thilhai chu ei chanpuol dingin ei lâk a.
Chu ṭum chun Jordan râla um Amor mihai lal pahni kuta inthawk chun Arnon ruoma inthawka Hermon tlâng chenin ei lâk a;
(chu Hermon chu Zidon mihai chun Sirion an ti a, Amor mihai chun Senir an ti thung a.)
Phai ram khuo po po le Gilead ram po po le Basan ram po po leh, Basan rama Og ram khuo, Saleka le Edrei chenin ei lâk a.

(Basan lal Og chau a nih, Repha mihai laia la um sun chu; a khum chu thîr a na, Ammon thlahai khuo Rabaa chun a la um zing a ni naw am a nih? Mihriem tawnga inkhiin a dungtieng tawng kuo, a khangtieng tawng li a nih.)
Gilead ram la um po le Og ram Basan po po chu Manasse hnam zâtvehai ka pêk a; Argob ram po po le Basan ram po po chu. (Hi hi Repha mihai ram an ti bawk hlak a.
Manasse naupa Jair chun Argob ram po po Gesur mihai le Maakat mihai ram chenin a lâk a; chuongchun, Basan chu, ama hming chawiin Havot-Jair a ta, tu chen hin an la ti zing.)
Chun, Gilead ram chu Makir ka pêk a.
Chun, Reuben mihai le Gad mihai chu Gileada inthawka Arnon ruom, ruom laitak chenin an ram chin dingin ka pêk a, Ammon thlahai ramri, Jabbok vadung chenin;
chun, Araba le Jordan khawm ramri dingin Kinneretha inthawkin Pisga saktieng pangpêr hnuoia Tuipui Thi, Araba Tuipui chenin.
“Chun, chuong lai chun ‘
Amiruokchu, in nuhmeihai, in nauhai le in ranhai (ran in hau ti ka hriet a) chu khuo ka pêk cheu a khan um raw hai seh;
nangni anga in unauhai chu
Chun, chuong lai bawk chun Josua chu, ‘
Anni chu ṭi naw unla; a thawpuitu cheu chu
“Chu lai huna chun

‘Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, i siehlaw kuoma hin i ropuizie le i kut hrâttak chu în langtir phawt chu a ni ta a; vâna manih, hnuoia hin amanih, i thilthaw ang le i thilthaw ropuitak ang hi thaw thei pathien tu am an um a?
Nisienlakhawm, nangni leiin
Pisga tlâng sîpah hang chuong la, thlangtienga dâm, hmârtienga dâm, simtienga dâm i mit hang inlên la, hang thlîr rawh; Jordan hi i kân naw ding a ni si a.
Amiruokchu, Josua hi thu pe la, infui ṭha la, sukhrât rawh, hieng mipuihai hi a ṭhuoikai ding a na, i hang hmu ding ram chu ân hluotir ding a nih,’ a mi ti a.
Chuongchun, Beth-peor ruoma khan ei um tah a ni kha.
“Khai le, Israel mihai,
Baal-peor leia
Ngai ta u, in va hluo ding rama khawm in zâwm pei dingin

Chuongchun, pawm unla zâwm ro; chu tak chu, hieng dân po po hi hre a, ‘Hi hnam ropuitak hi mi vartak le thil hre mi tak an ni phawt el,’ titu hnamhai mithmua chun in varna le thil hre mi in nina nîng a tih.
Ei ko taphawta
Hieng ang lâwma fel, dânhai le rorêlhai, tuta in hmaa ka zam po po ang dân nei hi hnam ropui dang tu am an um ve a?
“Horeb tlânga
Chuongchun, in hung hnai a, tlâng bula chun in hung ngîr a, vânlaizâwl tawngin tlâng chu inthim dâm, sûm dâm, inthim sâmup dâm inumtirin a kâng ta a.
Chun,
A thuthlung zâwm dinga thu a pêk cheu, thupêk sâwm chu in kuomah a puong a, lungphêk pahniah a ziek a.
Chun, chuong lai chun hluo dinga in va kaina rama in zâwm dingin dânhai le rorêlhai inchûktir dingin
“Chuleiin, fîmkhur hle ro; Horeb tlânga meia inthawka
milim dâm insiem fâwmin, insukse hlau rawi in tih, a chal ang amanih, a pui ang amanih,
hnuoia ran ang amanih, boruoka vuong hlak vate thla nei ang amanih,
hnuoia invâka invâk mi ang amanih, hnuoi hnuoia tuia nga laia mi ang amani hai chu.
Annawleh, vân tieng in hang ngha a, nisa dâm, thla dâm, arasi dâm, vân mi hai po po dâm in hang hmu a,
Chuong chau khawm chu ni lovin, nangni leiin
Kei chu hi rama hin thi ding ka na, Jordan vadung chu ka kai naw ding a nih; nangni ruok chu kai in ta, chu ram ṭhatak chu hluong in tih.
Fimkhur hle ro, chuong naw chun,
Jordan kâna in va hluo ding rama inthawk chun bohmang vak el in tih, ti in chungchâng thua a mi hrietpuitu dingin tuhin hnuoi le vân ka fiel a nih, chêng sâwt naw ti niu a, bohmang vawng el in tih.
Chutaka chun pathien, thing le lunga mihriem isiem, hmu thei lo, fa thei lo, rim khawm hre thei hlei lohai chu bieng in ta.
Nisienla khawm, chutaka khawm chun
Rinuma in uma, in chunga chuong thilhai po po chu a hung tlung pha chun a tâwp a tâwpa chun
“In pieng hma, kha hma tieng kha hang ngaituo unla, leihnuoia Pathienin mihriem a siema inthawk vânkhuphnuoia hieng anga thil ropui hi a um hlakin, hriet khawm a ni hrim hlak am chu?
Nangnîn meia inthawka Pathien râwl in hriet a, in la dam zing ang hin, mihaiin pathien râwl an hriet hlak am a ni?
Hnam dang laia inthawka fiena dâm, inchikna dâm, thilmak dâm, indona dâm, kut hrâttak dâm, bân phar dâm, thil râpthlâkhaia
Ân chûktir theina ding cheuin vâna inthawkin a râwl a hung inhriettir cheu a, hnuoi chunga hin a meipui chu ân hmutir cheu a, meia inthawkin a thu chu in lo hriet a.
In pi le puhai chu a hmangai leiin an hnungah an thlahai chu a thlang cheu a, ama ṭhangin a thilthawtheina ropuitakin Aigupta rama inthawk chun a ṭhuoi suok cheu a;
hnam dang nangni nêka ropui le thilthawthei lem hnawt suokpêk cheua an ram chu hluo dinga ân lûttir theina ding cheuin; tuta in ni ang tak hin.
Chuleiin, tuhin in lungrilah vawng unla, chungtieng vâna le hnuoitieng leihnuoia hin
Kumkhuoa dinga
tuolthattu a tuolbâwmhai, kha hma khawma theida chuong lo that paltu tlânna dingin; chuong khuo, a ienga khawm a tlân chun him a tih.
Chuonghai chu Reubenhai puola thlalêra tlâng zâwla Bezer dâm, Gad mihai puola Gileada Ramoth dâm, Manasse mihai puola Basana Golan dâm an nih.
Hi hi Mosiein Israel thlahai dân a pêk chu a nih;
Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia Mosieinn Israel thlahai kuoma inhriettirna dâm, dân dâm, rorêl dâm a hril chu a nih;
Jordan râla Mosie le Israel thlahaiin Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia an that, Hesbona um Ammon mihai lal Sihon rama Beth-peor zâwn ruoma khan:
A ram le Basan lal Og ram, nisa suokna tienga Amor mihai lal pahni ram chu an hluo a,
Arnon ruom sîra Ariera inthawka Sion tlâng (Hermon an ti bawk) chen le
Jordan râl saktieng pang Araba po po, Pisga pangpêr hnuoia Araba tuipui chenin.
Chun, Mosiein Israelhai po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Aw Israel mihai, in inchûka in pawm dinga dânhai, thuruothai, in na hrieta vawisûna ka hril hi lo ngai ro.
(chuonglai chun
“Keima naw chu Pathien dang hrim hrim i nei ding a ni nawh.
“Milim siem fâwm, chungtieng vâna mi amanih, hnuoitieng leihnuoia mi amanih, hnuoi hnuoitienga tuia mi amanih, a ieng angpui khawm i ta dingin i siem ding a ni nawh.
Chuong chu chibai i bûk ding a ni naw a, an rawng i bâwl ding a ni bawk nawh. Kei
mi hmangaia ka thupêkhai pawmtu sâng tamtakhai chunga ruok chu lunginsietna inlangtir hlak ka ni hi.
Ni ruk sûng chun sin thâwng i ta, i sin po po chu i thaw ding a nih.
Nang khawm Aigupta rama khan suok i ni ta a,
“În rûk ding a ni nawh.
“Chun, tlâng chu a kâng laia, inthima inthawka râwl chu in hang hriet chun, in mi hung hnai a, in hnam lusahai po po le in upahai le chun;
‘Ngai ta,
Chuleiin, ieng dingin am thîng kan ta? Hi mei nasatak hin a mi kâng hmang el naw ding am a nih?
Meia inthawka Pathien hring râwl kan hriet anga hre vea dam si, taksa puthai po po lai tu am an um a?
Nangin va hnai la,
Chun, in mi biek laia in thu hril chu
Chuong ang lungril chu put hlak hai sien chu aw, mi ṭîng an ta, ka thupêkhai chu zâwm rawp an ta, anni le an nauhai khawm kumkhawtluongin an tluongtlung hle ding bah!
Fe la, an kuomah, In puon inahai va fe phawt ro, ti rawh.
Nang ruok chu ka kâwlah ngîr la, hluo dinga ram ka pêka an pawm dinga i închûktir ding thupêk po po dâm, thuruothai dâm, rorêlhai dâm chu hril ka ti che,’ a ti a.
Chuleiin,
In va hluo ding rama in um a, in ta dinga ṭhatna ding le in chêng sâwt theina dingin
“Chun, hluo dinga in va kaina rama in zâwm dinga
nangni le in naupasalhai, in tupahaiin
Chuleiin, aw Israel mihai, in tluongtlunga,
in nauhai ṭhahnemngaitakin inchûktir in ta, in ina in ṭhung lai dâm, lampuia in fe lai dâm, in zâl lai dâm, in tho huna khawm in hril hlak ding a nih.
In in kawtkhâr biengahai, in kawtkhârahai in ziek ding a nih.
“Chun,
in suksip ni dêr lo, thil ṭha tinrênga sip in dâm, in cho ni dêr lo, tuikhur chosa dâm, in chîng ni dêr lo, grêp huon le Oliv thinghai dâm umnaah a ṭhuoi lût cheu a, in fâk a in tlai hle pha chun,
fîmkhur hle el ro; chuong naw chun, Aigupta rama inthawka suoka inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu
Pathien dang in vêla mihai pathien chu in biek ding a ni nawh.
Nangni laia um
in hmêlmahai po po in hmaa hnawt suok dinga
“Chun, in unauhaiin ‘
‘Aigupta rama Pharao suok ei na,
chun,
eini ruok chu mi pêk dinga ei pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâmna, chu ram chu a mi pêk theina dingin chutaka inthawk chu a mi ṭhuoi suok a.
Chuongchun, hieng dânhai po po hi zâwm ding le ei ṭhat zingna dinga
A thu mi pêk anga
In nauhai tuta mi zuituhai hi, pathien danghai rawngbâwl dingin ṭhuoikawiin um an ta; chun,
“Hnam dang nêka in tam leiin
Chuleiin,
ama theidatuhai sukbohmang dinga anni chung ngeia thung hlak a nih; ama theidatuhai chu riel sâwt naw ni a; anni chunga ngei thung a tih.
Chuleiin, thupêk dâm, thuruot dâm, rorêl dâm, zâwm dinga vawisûna thu ka pêk cheu hi in zâwm ding a nih.
“Hieng rorêlhai hi in ngai a, in zâwm a, in thaw leiin

hmangai a ti cheu a, malsâwm a ti cheu a, sukpung a ti cheu a, pêk dinga in pi le puhai kuoma ân khâmna rama chun in rîla ra le in hnuoi ra khawm malsâwm bawk a tih, in bu dâm, in uoin dâm, in hriek dâm, in bâwngtehai le in berâmtehai khawm.
Hnam po po laia chun malsâwm ni bîk in ta, nangni lai a nuhmei a pasalin a ching hrim hrim um naw ni hai, in ran laia khawm.
Chun,
“In lungrilah ‘Hieng hnamhai hi ei ni nêkin an tam si a, iengtin am hnawt suok thei ei ta?’ in ti a ni chun anni chu ṭi naw ro.
fiena nasatakin in mit ngeia in hmuhai, inchikna dâm, thilmak dâm, kut hrâttak dâm, bân phar dâma
Anni chu in ṭi ding a ni nawh;
An bohmang hma khat chu
An lalhai chu in kutah pêng a ta, an hming chu vânkhuphnuoia inthawk hin in thaihmang dai ding a nih; in sukbohmang dêr chenin in hmaa ngîr thei tukhawm um hrim hrim naw ni hai.

An Pathien lim siem fâwmhai chu in raw ding a nih, chutaka tangkaruo amanih, rângkachak amanih chu in inhnar ding a ni naw a; in ta dingin in lâk ding a ni bawk nawh, chuong naw chun inâwk el rawi in tih;
In in sûngah thil tirdakum la lûtin chu thil ang chun ṭawngsephurah in insiem ding a ni nawh; tirdakum namên lova tirdakin in theida hle ding a nih, ṭawngsephur thil a ni si a.
“Dama in um a, in hung pung pei a, pêk ding cheua in pi le puhai kuoma
Chun, a thupêkhai chu in zâwm ding le ding naw, in lungril hrietna dinga fiena ding le inngaitlâwmtir ding cheua thlalêra kum sâwmli a ṭhuoina cheu lampuihai po po kha hre zing ro.
Hieng kum sâwmli sûng hin in silfên chu in sil chulin in hâk chul naw a, in kehai khawm ân vûng naw a.
Miin a nau a thunun hlak angin
Chuleiin, a lampui hraw ding le ama chu ṭi dingin
bu dâm, buṭei dâm, grêp dâm, theichang dâm, theibufai dâm, umna ram, hriek nei oliv le khuoizu umna ram,
iengkhawm in tlâksam nawna ding, tlasam lova bei in fâkna ding ram, a lunghai chu thîr, a tlânghai chu dârsen cho suok theina ram, ram ṭhataka chun a ṭhuoi lût ding cheu a ni si a.
In fâka in tlai hle pha chun, ram ṭhatak a pêk cheu lei chun
“A thupêkhai, a thuruothai, a rorêlhai, vawisûna ka pêk cheu hi zâwm lovin
chuong naw chun, in fâk a, in tlai a, in ṭhatak dâm in bâwl a, in hluo pha le,
in ran ruolhai, in berâm ruolhai a hung pung a, in tangka dâm, in rângkachak dâm a hung pung a, in thil neihai po po chu a hung pung pha chun,
in lungril hung chapo a ta, suok in nina Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu
Ama chun thlalêr lientak le rapthlâktak, rûl chukna chi le ainuvêt umna, tui um nawna, ram ṭâwlah a ṭhuoi thleng cheu a; meitâwklung lungpuia inthawk chun tui a suksuokpêk cheu a,
in pi le puhai hriet ngailo manna chun a châwm cheu a, tuta hnunga in hung ṭhat theina dingin a sukhnuoi cheu a, a fie theina ding cheuin.
Chun, ‘hieng ei sum le paihai hi eini hrâtna le ei kutsuok a nih,’ ti lungril rawi in tih, fîmkhur bawk ro.
Tuta a nghet anga in pi le puhai kuoma inkhâmna thu a thlung chu a suknghetna dingin
In hmaa hnam danghai a sukbohmang angin nangni khawm bohmang in tih,
“Aw Israel mihai, ngai ta u, in nêka ropui le thilthawthei lem hnam, khawpui vân tawnga kul nei le ropuitakhai chu va hluo dingin tuhin Jordan chu in kai ding a ni ta a,
mi lientak tak le insângtak tak in hriet ta sahai Anak thlahai, ‘Anak thlahai chu tuin am ngam ei ta?’ in ti hlakhai ram chu.
Chuleiin,
In fel leiin amanih, in lungril indik leiin amanih an ram chu in hluo ding a ni naw a, hieng hnamhai suol lei le
Chuleiin, hi ram ṭhatak hi in fel leia hluo dingin
“Thlalêra
Lungphêk, in kuoma
Ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli hnunga chun lungphêk pahni, thuthlungna lungphêk chu a mi pêk a.
“Chun,

anni sukbohmang ding le vânkhuphnuoia inthawka an hming thaihmang dingin ka law law hang lâwng ka ta; chun, nangmaa inthawkin anni nêka hnam thilthawthei le ropui lem siem ka tih’, tiin a mi biek bawk a.
Chuongchun, tlânga inthawk chu ka hung thla a, tlâng chu a kâng ta a; thuthlungna lungphêk pahni chu ka kut khinghniin ka chawi a.
Chun, ka hei en a,
Chun, lungphêk pahni chu ka dawm a, ka kut khinghnia inthawk chun ka pei a, in mithmua chun ka sukkawi a.
Chun, kha hmaa ka thaw ang khan ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli
Nangni sukbohmang dinga
Chun,
In suolna leia in siem bâwngte lim chu ka lâk a, ka raw a, ka suknâwi a, pilvut angin ka râwtnawi dar a; a phit chu tlânga inthawka vadung hung luonga chun ka phul a.
“Taberaa dâm, Massaa dâm, Kibroth-hattaavaa dâm khawm
Chun,
Ka hriet tîr cheua inthawk tah
Chun,
I siehlaw Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai chu hre zing la, hieng mihai hi an kâwmaw zie dâm, an rîtlozie dâm, an suolziehai dâm ngaimaw naw rawh;
chuong naw chun, i mi ṭhuoi suokna rama mihai chun,
I thilthawtheina ropuitak le i bân phara i ṭhuoi suok, i mihai le i rochanhai an ni tlat si a,’ ka ti a.
“Chuong lai chun
Chun, kha hmaa lungphêk i sukkawi tahaia thu chuong kha lungphêkahai chun ziek ka ta; bâwma chun sieng i tih,’ a ta.
Chuongchun, Sittim thingin bâwm chu ka siem a, a hmaa mi ang lungphêk pahni chu ka sut bawk a, lungphêk pahni chu chawiin tlânga chun ka hang fe a.
Chun, lungphêkhaia chun a hmasaa ziek ang, in pungkhâwm nia tlânga meia inthawka
Chun, tlânga inthawk chun ka hung thla a, lungphêk chu ka bâwm siema chun ka sie a;
(Chun, Israel mihai chu Beeroth Bene-Jaakana inthawkin Mosera-ah an fe a; chutaka chun Aron chu a thi a, an phûm a, chun, a naupa Eleazarin a aiawin thiempu sin a thaw a.
Chutaka inthawk chun Gudgodaah an fe a, chun, Gudgodaa inthawk chun vadunghai ram Jotbathaah an fe a.
Chuong lai chun tu chena
Chuleiin, Levi chun a unauhai lai chun chanvo khawm, rochan khawm a nei naw a;
Chun, a hma ang bawk khan tlânga chun ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli ka um a; chun, chu ṭum khawm chun
Chun,
“Khai le, Israel mihai, nangnia inthawka
Ngai ta u, vân dâm, vânhai vân le, hnuoi le a sûnga um po po hi
Nisienlakhawm, in pi le puhai hmangai chu a lâwm zâwng a na, hnam dang po po nêkin nangni, an hnunga an thlahai hi a lo thlang ta cheu a nih, tuta in ni ang hin.
Chuleiin, in lungril ser chu tan unla, kâwmaw ta naw ro.
Pa nei nawhai le hmeithaihai chu feltakin ro a rêlpêk hlak a; ram dang mihai chu, fâk ding le silfênhai pein a hmangai hlak.
Ama chu in inpâk ding chu a na, hieng in mita in hmu tah thil ropuitak le râpthlâktakhai thawpêk hlak cheu in Pathien a nih.
Tuhin lo hre unla,
Aigupta sipaihai le an sakawrhai le an tawlailîr chunga a thilthawhai kha, an hnawt lai cheua Tuipui Sen tuia ân chîmpiltirzie dâm; tu chena
hi hmun in tlung hmakhata thla- lêra in chunga a thilthaw dân dâm,

Reuben naupa Eliab naupa Dathan le Abiram hai chunga a thaw dân dâm; hnuoiin a bâu a ka a, Israel mi po po lai anni le an sûnghai le an puon inhai le an ran ṭhuoi po po a lem vawng dân dâm hre lo in thlahai kuoma hril ka ni naw a,
in mit ngeia
“Chuleiin, in hung hrât a, in va pan ram chu in hluo theina dingin tuta thu ka pêk cheu, thupêk po po hi in zâwm ding a nih;
In va hluo ding ram chu in hung suokna Aigupta ram, thlai huona chi in tu a, in kea tui in buokna hlak ang a ni naw a;
in va hluo ding ram chu tlânghai le ruomhai le vân ruotui dawng ram a ni lem a.
“Chun,
In ranhai ta dingin in rama hlohna khawm inumtir bawk ka ta, nangni khawma fâng in ta, tlai in tih.
Fîmkhur ro khai, chuong naw chun, in lungril chu hlêmin um a ta, pêthmang in ta, pathien dang rawng dâm bâwl in ta, be el rawi in tih;
“Chuleiin, hieng ka thuhai hi in lungril le, in lungvarah khum in ta, inchikna dingin in bânah zem in ta, in mit le mit inkârah chalhrênna dingin a um bawk ding a nih.
Chuong chu in nauhai inchûktir in ta, in ina in ṭhung lai dâmin, lampuia in fe lai dâmin, in zâl lai dâmin, in tho pha khawm in hril hlak ding a nih.
Chun, in kawtkhâr bienghaiah, in kawtkhâra dâm in ziek ding a nih.
In kephaa in sirna taphawt chu in ta nîng a tih, thlalêra inthawk le Lebanon tlânga inthawka vadung, Euphrates vadunga inthawk chun thlangtieng tuipui chenin in ram nîng a tih.
Tukhawm in hmaah ngîr thei naw ni hai a;
Ngai ta u, vawisûn hin in hmaah malsâwmna le ṭawngsie ka sie a;
“Chun, in va hluo ding rama
Chu tlânghai chu nisa tlâkna khêl Araba tieng lampuia um, Kanaan mihai ram, Gilgal zâwn, More thingsaisuo sîr, Jordan râla um an nih.
Chun, tuta in hmaa ka sie, thuruot le rorêl po po hi zâwm dingin in fîmkhur ding a nih.
In va hluo ding ram hnamhaiin tlâng lienhai, tlâng chînhai, thing hring tin hnuoi dâma an pathienhai rawng an bâwlna hmun po pohai chu in suksiet vawng ding a nih.
An maichâmhai sukchim in ta, an lungphunhai suknâwi vawng in ta, an Asera dâm chu in raw ding a nih; an pathien lim siem fâwmhai chu phûrpêk in ta, chutaka an hming chu in thaihmang ding a nih.
Chuong ang chun

Chutaka chun in pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai, in inthâwinahai, in sâwmapakhat dâm, in thên thilinhlânhai dâm, in thutiem dâm, in nuomthua thilinhlânhai dâm, in ran ruol le in berâm ruol laia pieng hmasa takhai in hung lâk ding a nih.
Chutaka chu,
“Mi tinin mâni ṭha ti zâwng ang ela tuta ei thaw ang hin in thaw ding a ni nawh;
Jordan vadung in kai a,
“Hmun in hmuna taphawtah in pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai inhlân el lo dingin fîmkhur ro khai.
In hnamhai laia
Amiruokchu,

In ina chun sâwmapakhat, in bu dâm, in uoin dâm, in hriek dâm le in ran ruol le berâm ruol laia pieng hmasa takhai, in thutiema mi dâm, in nuomthua thilinhlânhai dâm, in thên thilinhlânhai chu fa thei naw ti niu a.
In rama in um sûng po chu Levi mihai chu ngaitha lo dingin fîmkhur ro.
Sangai hai, sakhi hai in fâk ang elin fâng in ta, ân thienghai le ân thiengnawhai khawma angkhat zingin fâng an tih.
Thisen ruok chu fa lo dingin fîmkhur ro, thisen chu hringna a na, hringna pumin sa chu in fâk ding a ni nawh.
In fâk dêr ding a ni nawh, tui angin hnuoiah in bunthlâk el ding a nih.
Chuongchun,
In thil inthienghai le in thutiema mi chau chawi unla,
Chun,
Hieng thu ka pêk po po cheu hi nguntakin ngaituo ro; chuongchun,

sukbohmanga an umna anga khan in inâwk ve nawna dingin fîmkhur ro, ‘Hieng hnamhai hin iengtin am an pathienhai rawng an bâwl a, an thaw angin eini khawm thaw vêng ei tiu,’ tiin, an pathien chungchâng thuhai dâm chu dâwp vêl naw ro.
Chuong ang chun
“Thaw dinga thu ka pêk taphawt cheu chu in thaw ding a na, in belsa ding a ni naw a, in suktlâwm ding a ni bawk nawh.
“Nangni lai zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amanih an hung um a, inchikna amanih, thilmak amanih an inentir cheu a,
inchikna amanih, thilmak amanih an inentir cheu chu a hung tlung a, in hriet ngai naw, ‘Pathien dang zui ei tiu khai, an rawng bâwl ei tiu,’ in kuoma an ti chun,
chu zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amanih thuhai chu in pawm ding a ni nawh;
Chun, chu zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amani chu sukhlum ding a nih. Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoisuoka, suoka inthawka intlantu cheu

“I unaupa, in pa naupa amanih, in nu naupa amanih, i naupa amanih, i naunu amanih, i nuhmei pawmlai amanih, i ruol ṭhatak khawmin a rûkin, “Pathien dang rawng bâwl ei tiu khai’ tia nang amanih, in thlatuhai la hriet naw,
hnam dang in kâwl vêl hnaia mi amanih, in hlat deua mi amanih, kâwlkawdawnga inthawka kâwlkawdawng khingtieng chena mi pathienhai be dinga an thlêm cheu chun;
in remtipui ding a ni naw a, in pawm ding a ni bawk nawh; in lunginsiet ding a ni naw a, hla khawm in hla ding a ni naw a, in thup ding a ni nawh;
in sukhlum ngei ngei lem ding a na; a sukhlum dingin kut thlâk hmasâng i ta, chu hnunga chun mipui po poin,
Lungin in dêng hlum ding a nih; Aigupta rama inthawka suoka inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu
Chuongchun, Israel mi po po chun hrieng an ta, ṭîng an ta, nangni lai chuonga rîtlo hrim hrim chu chîng ta naw ni hai.
nangni laia mi dukdaklo ṭhenkhat hung suokin, chu khawpuia mihai chu in hriet ngai lo pathien danghai be dingin an ṭhuoi hmang ti thu hril in hriet chun,
ṭhahnemngaitakin indawn vêl unla, zawng suok ro; chun, ngai ta u, thudik a lo ni a, chuong anga thil tirdakum nangni laia thaw a ni hriet chieng a ni chun,
kâwlhnâmin chu khuoa umhai chu in sukhlum ngei ngei ding a nih; a sûnga um po pohai, ran ruolhai leh kâwlhnâmin in sukbohmang vawng ding a nih.
Râllâk sum po po chu khawlaiah la khâwm in ta; chun, khuo le râllâk sum po po chu
Râllâk sum chu a ieng ieng khawm in tâwk ding a ni nawh,
“Thil tirdakum hrim hrim in fâk ding a ni nawh.
Hieng sahai hi a nih in fâk thei ding chu; bâwngchal dâm, berâm dâm, kêl dâm,
sakhi dâm, sangai dâm, rienu dâm, sasen dâm, sakêl dâm, ram bâwng dâm, ram berâm dâm hi.
Chun, sa tinrêng tin inkâk, ir suok sawi, chu laia mi taphawt chu fa thei in tih.

Amiruokchu, hieng irsuok khawm sawi a, an tin khawm nei bawk hieng chi hi in fâk ding a ni nawh; Sanghâwngsei dâm, mazupui dâm, râwl zupui dâm hi, ir suok chu an sawia chu, an tin ân kâk naw leiin in ta dingin tirdakum an nih.
Chun, vawk hi a tin chu ân kâk dea chu irsuok a sawi naw leiin in ta dingin tirdak a um a nih, a sa in fâk ding a ni naw a, a ruong khawm in them ding a ni nawh.
“Tuia chêng po po lai hieng hi fa thei in tih, pângpar le phuhlip nei taphawt chu fa thei in tih.
Pângpar le phuhlip nei naw taphawt chu fa thei naw ti niu, in ta dingin a pawrche a nih.
Vate thieng po po chu fa thei in tih.
Hienghai ruok hi chu in fâk ding a ni nawh; mupui dâm, musie dâm, mu-arla dâm,
Mute dâm, muvânlai dâm, mute chi tinrêng dâm,
Vaâk chi hrim hrim,
Ostrik dâm, vabak dâm, tuipui pelêu dâm, muchi taphawt el hai chu,
chingpirinu dâm, simbu dâm,
mulukawl dâm, kaikuongrâl dâm,
tuivaârngo dâm, awinu chi hrim hrim dâm, vakhawhri le bâk dâm.
Thla nei kea lâwn chi po po dâm, in ta dingin thil tirdakum a na, fâk ding a ni nawh.
Thla nei ân thieng po po hai chu fa thei in tih.
“Mania thi chu iengkhawm in fâk ding a ni naw a, in umpui ram dang mihai fâk dingin pe thei in tih; hnam dang mihai kuomah a zawrin zawr thei bawk in tih; nangni chu
pawisaah inchangtir in ta, pawisa chu chawi el in tih.
Chun, pawisa chu in lungrila in dittak, bâwngchal amanih, berâmchal amanih, uoin amanih, zupui amanih, in lungrila in châk zâwng taphawta dingin hmang in ta; chutaka chun
Levi mihai in umnaa um vehai chu ngaitha hlek naw ro, nangni lai chanvo khawm, rochan khawm an nei ve si naw a.
“Kum thum ân vawi kum poah, chu kuma in lo thilsuok po poa sâwmapakhat chu la khâwm vawng in ta, in umnaah in sie ding a nih,
chun, in umnaa um Levi mihai khawm chu nangni laia chanvo, rochan khawm nei ve nawhai le ram dang mihai le pa nei nawhai le hmeithaihai chun fâng an ta, lo khawsa ve thei el an tih; chuongchun,
“Chun, kum sari ân vawi kum poah ngaidamna in siem ding a na.
Ngaidam dân chu hieng ang hi nîng a tih; leiba neitu taphawtin an tuolbâwmhai an lo inpûktir ta chu a ngaidam ding a nih; a tuolbâwm khawm, a unau khawm a ṭhîn lui ding a ni nawh,
Hnam dang mi chu ṭhîn lui thei in ta; nisienlakhawm, in ta iengkhawm in unauhai lo hmang ta chu in ngaidam ding a nih.
Mi rimsi hrim hrim um dêr naw ti niu, (
hieng thupêk, tuta ka thupêk po po cheu hi pawm dinga
An kuoma chun in tiktlai ngei ding a nih, an tlâksamnaa an mamaw phuhrûkna tâwk in inpûktir ding a nih.

‘Ngaidam kum, kum sarina chu a hung tlung ding a ni tah,’ tiin in unauhai chu hmu nuom lovin, iengkhawm pe nuom lovin in lungrila indik nawtaka ngaituona um lo dingin fîmkhur ro; chuong naw chun, ama chun in chungchâng thuah
In pêk ngei ngei ding a nih, chun, in pêk pha khawm in lungril ân hmûr dêr ding a ni nawh, chuong ang thil lei chun a nih

Chu rama chun mi rimsihai um naw lai a um âwm si naw a; chuleiin, ‘In rama in unauhai chunga dâm, tlasamhai chunga dâm, in mirimsihai chunga dâm, in tiktlai ngei ngei ding a nih,’ tiin thu ka pêk cheu a nih.
Chun, in insuoktir pha chun kutbenthekin in insuoktir ding a ni nawh;
in berâm ruol laia mi dâm, in hrizâwla mi dâm, in uoiin sâwrna khura mi dâm chu inrolotakin in pêk ding a nih;
Aigupta rama khan suok in ni ta a,
Nangni le in sûngkuo an ngainat lei le in inpâwlthiem leia in kuomah,

‘Suoksan naw ning cheu,’ an ti tlat chun, thîr zum lâng in ta, kawtkhâr sana chun an na ver in tih, chuongchun, kumkhawtluongin in suok ni tâng an tih, in suoknu khawm chu chuong ang bawk chun in thaw ding a nih.
Insuoktir chu thil harsaah in ngai ding a ni nawh, inhlawfa ruoina zâtve chauin kum ruk sûng in rawng an bâwlpêk ta si cheu a; chun,
Nisienlakhawm, ran chu hmêlhemna nei, a ke inbai amanih, a mit indel amanih, hmêlhemna ieng ang khawm nei a ni chun
In khaw sûnghaia in fâk el ding a nih; sangaihai, sakhihai in fâk ang bawkin mi inthienghai le mi inthieng nawhai khawmin fa thei in tih.
A thisen ruok chu in fâk dêr ding a ni nawh, tui angin hnuoiah in bunthlâk el ding a nih.

Chawl ṭhang bei leh in fâk ding a ni naw a; in dam sûng poa Aigupta rama inthawka in suok ni chu in hriet zing theina dingin ni sari sûng chawl ṭhanglo rinumna bei leh in fâk ding a nih, Aigupta rama inthawk khan inhmâwtaka suok in ni kha.
In ram sûngah ni sari sûng chu chawl hrim hrim a um ding a ni naw a, chun, ni khat ni zântienga in inthâwina sa chu zânkhawvârin a zîng tûk chenin a iengkhawm a um ding a ni nawh.
Chun, em hmin in ta,
Ni ruk sûng chu chawl ṭhanglo bei in fâk ding a nih. Chun, ni sari ni chu
“Châwlkâr sari tiem in ta; in bu sîk ṭan nia inthawkin châwlkâr sari chu tiem in tih.
Chun, Aigupta rama khan suok in nih ti in hriet zing ding a nih; chun, hieng dânhai hi fîmkhurtakin in zâwm ding a nih.
“In hrizâwla mi le in uoin sâwrna khura mi in sîk khâwm zo pha ni sari sûng chu bâwkte ruoiṭhe in nei ding a nih.

In ruoiṭhenaa chun nangni leh, in naupasalhai, in naunuhmeihai leh, in suokpahai, in suoknuhai leh, in umnaa Levi mihai leh, ram dang mihai, pa neilo le hmeithaihai dâm leh hlimtakin in um ding a nih.
Kum tin nangni laia pasal po po chu vawi thum
Chun, tukhawm
Pathien dang rawng va bâwl a, ka thupêk ni lo, nisa amanih, thla amanih, vâna mi hrim hrim bie an um a, an hril che a,
nangin i lo hriet a, ṭhahnemngaitaka în dawn a; a lo indik ngeia, thu chu a chieng faka, chuong anga thil tirdakum Israel mihai laia thaw a lo ni chun,
chu thil suol thawtu, pasal amanih, nuhmei amani ngei chu ṭhuoi suok in ta, lungin in dêng hlum ding a nih.
“Inthat thua dâm, sum le pai thua dâm, invuok thua dâm, in umnaa inkhingna thu hrim hrima dâm in ta dinga rêl intak taluo a hung um chun,
chu huna thiempu Levi mi le rorêltuhai kuoma chun fêng in ta, anni râwn in ta; chun, anni chun thu sukthlûk dân ding an lo khîkhmu ding cheu a nih.
An thu tlûkna an lo khîkhmu cheu chun changtienga manih, vawitienga manih in pêtsan ding a ni nawh.
Chuongchun, mi po poin hrieng an ta, ṭîng an ta, thawlui nâwk ta naw ni hai.
Amiruokchu, sakawr a hau ding a ni nawh, sakawr a hau theina dingin Aigupta mihai le chun inthuruol ding a ni bawk nawh.
Chuong naw chun a lungril invâkhmang rawi a tih. Nuhmei khawm a hau ding a ni naw a, tangka le rângkachak khawm a hau bawk ding a ni nawh.
Chun, a ram lalṭhungphaa a ṭhung pha chun, Levi thla thiempuhai hmaah dân bu chu a ta dingin inziek sâwngtir a ta,
kawl a ta, a dam sûng chun a tiem rawp hlak ding a nih, hieng dân le hieng thuruothai po po hi pawma, zâwma thaw dinga
a lungril a unauhai chungah ân sie sâng nawna dingin le changtieng amanih, vawitieng amanih thupêk chu a pêtsan nawna ding le Israelhai lai chun ama le a thlahai a rama hin an dam sâwt phâna dingin.
An unauhai laia chun rochan an nei ding a ni naw a, an rochan chu an kuoma a hril angin
Inthâwina inhlântu mipuihaia inthawka thiempu chanpuol ding chu hieng hi nîng a tih: bâwngchal khawm, berâm khawm a dâr le bekbawr khing hni le a phîngpui chu thiempu an pêk ding a nih.
In bu le bâlhai, in uoinhai le in hriek sâwrhai a hmasa takhai le in berâm hmul vâw hmasa tak dâm chu in pêk ding a nih.
“Chun, Levi mi tukhawm a umna Israel ram in umna khâwlai hmun khawm suoksana, a lungrila inhâwktaka
chutaka
An thiempu man bâkah mi dang chanpuol ang fâk ding chu chang ve tho an tih.
dâwi invêt thiem dâm, khawhri zâwl ruoi dâm, thiemrâu dâm, mithi biek chîng mihai dâm chu nangni lai an um ding a ni nawh.
Hieng thil thaw mi taphawthai chu
Chuong in va hluo ding rama hnamhai chun aisân le aien dâm an chîng hlak a, an pawm bawk a, nangni ta ding chun
Chun,
An unauhai laia inthawkin nangma ang zâwlnei siempêk ka ta; a bauah ka thuhai sieng ka ta, a kuoma thu ka pêk taphawt chu an kuomah hril a tih.
Chun, ka hminga ka thu a hril pawm naw taphawt chu ngaituong ka tih.
Ka hminga hril dinga ka pêk naw hril luitu zâwlnei amanih, pathien danghai hminga thuhriltu zâwlnei amanih, chu zâwlnei chu sukhlum ding a nih,’
Chun, in lungrilah, ‘Iengtin am thu chu
zâwlneiin
Tuolthat taphawt an tlânlûtna dingin,
Tuolthathai chutaka tlânlûta him theihai chu hienghai hi an nih; mîn a tuolbâwm kha hmaa theidâna khawm nei chuong lova that paltu hai,

mi a tuolbâwm leh thing phûr dinga rama fea thing phûr dinga hrei a hang inlet a, hreipui tlawngin a tuolbâwm chu dênghlum el ta ang sien, chu mi chu chuong khuohai laia pakhata chun tlânlût a ta, him a tih;

chuong naw chun, thisen phuba latu chun a lungsen nasat zuol laiin tuolthattu chu hnawt a ta, lampui kâr a hla vieu chun a tlung hmain hnawtphâk a ta, thina khawp a ni naw sa khawmin thi hlau rawi a tih, a hmain intheidâna nei a ni si naw a.
Chuleiin, ‘Khuo pathum in ta dingin in ruot ding a nih,’ tiin thu ka pêk cheu a nih.
“Chun,
Amiruokchu, miin a tuolbâwm chu a theida a, ân chân a, a thaw a, thi khawp raka a vuok a, chu khuo laia pakhata chun a tlân chun,
an khuo upahaiin mi tir sienla, chutaka inthawk chun va ṭhuoi hai sienla, sukhlum dingin thisen phuba latu kutah inhlân raw se.
In lunginsiet ding a ni naw a, in ta dinga ṭha dingin Israel rama inthawka pawitâwklo thisen insuona chu in sukbo ding a nih.
an inkhingnaah an pahni chun
Rorêltuhai chun nguntakin dap an ta; thuhretu chu hretu tehlêm a ni a, a unau chu khêla intum a nih ti hriet suok a ni chun,
Mi danghai chun hrieng an ta, ṭîng an ta, tuta hnung chuong ang thil ṭha naw hrim hrim chu nangni lai an thaw ta naw ding a nih.
“In hmêlmahai do dinga in suoka sakawrhai le tawlailîrhai dâm, mipuihai dâm, nangni nêka tam in hmuin, anni chu in ṭi ding a ni nawh; Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu
Chun, in indo ding hnai chun thiempu chun mipuihai chu va pan sienla, be sienla,
an kuomah, ‘Aw Israel mihai, hre ro khai, tuhin chu in hmêlmahai in do ding a ni ta a, zâm naw unla, ṭi naw unla, inthin bawk naw ro, anni chu ṭi dêr naw ro;
Chun, hotuhai chun mipuihai kuomah, ‘In thar bâwla lân hlân lo in um am? A inah kîr nâwk el raw se, indonaa chun thi hlau a ta, mi dangin inhlân rawi an tih.
Grêp huon siema a ra la sawr lo in um am? A in tieng kîr nâwk el raw se; indonaah thi hlau a ta, mi dangin sawr râwi an tih.
Nuhmei huola la neilo in um am? A in tieng kîr nâwk el raw se, indonaah thi hlau a ta, mi dangin nei râwi an tih,’ ti raw hai se.
Chun, hotuhaiin mihai kuoma thu an hril zo chun mipuihai hmaṭhuoitu ding sipai hotuhai an ruot ding a nih.
“Thaw dinga khuo in va hnai pha chun inremna thu hang hril phawt unla.
An lo inrempui cheu a, an lo inpêk el chun chutaka mi umhai po po chu sinthawa in ruoi ding nîng an ta, in rawng bâwl an tih.
An lo inrempui nuom naw cheu a, an lo do cheu ruok chun inhuol in ta;
“Hi laia hnamhai khuohai ni lo, in umnaa inthawka khaw hlahai po po chu chuong ang chun in thaw pei ding a nih.
Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai, Jebus mihai dâm chu

“Lâk tuma in thaw khuo chu sâwttak in inhuol khawmin chuong laia thinghai chu hreipuiin in phûr ding a ni nawh. A rahai chu fa thei in ta, in phûr ding a ni nawh. Loa thinghai chu mihriem am an ni, in inhuol ding chu?
A ra fâk naw mi a nih ti in hriet thing ruok chu suksein phûr in ta, a dotuhai cheu khuo chu a siet hmakhat chu kulin in inhuon khum ding a nih.
in upahai le in rorêltuhai chu hung an ta, an sukhlumna khuoa inthawk chun inkhîng an ta;
chun, a ruong umnaa inthawka khaw hnai tak, chu khaw upahai chun bâwng ruol laia bâwngla, la sawr lo, rîngkawl la bât lo kei an tih;
chu khaw upahai chun bâwngla, chu tui luongna, hnuoi lân letna ngailo le iengkhawm la chîng ngai nawna ruomah kei thlâng an ta, ruoma chun bâwngla rîng chu tan an tih.
Levi naupa thiempuhaiin hung pan an ta, anni chu
Ruong hnai tak khaw upahai po po chun ruoma an that bâwngla rîng an tan chunga chun an kut sâwp an ta, hieng hin an ti ding a nih;
‘Kan kutin thisen hi ân suo naw a, kan mitin a suok lai a hmu bawk nawh.
Chuong ang chun
“In hmêlmahai rûn dinga in fe suok a,
sal laia nuhmei hmêl ṭhatak, in mi dit zâwngtak, nuhmei dinga in mi dit zâwngtak in hmu chun,
in inah ṭhuoi in ta, an lu vâwng an ta, an tin tan an tih.
An sal zakuo chu hlîp an ta, in inah um an ta, thla khat zet an nu le pa sûn an ta, chu hnunga chun inpâwlpui tâng in tih, an pasal nîng in ta, in nuhmei ni tâng an tih.
Chun, in lung a awi naw chun an nuomna naah an fe in phal ding a nih, sum le paiah in zawr dêr ding a ni nawh, sal cheiin in chei ding khawm a ni bawk nawh, in sukhmingse ta si a.
a ro nei chu a naupasalhai ân khâwmtir pha chun a idittak naupa chu a naupasal upa a itheidanu naupa nêka kha upa lema siem el ding a ni naw a,
a nu le pa chun kei an ta, an khaw upahai kuomah an khaw kul kawtkhâr bulah ṭhuoi an tih.
An khaw upahai kuoma chun, ‘Hi kan naupa hi kâwmâwtak le helhmangtak a na, kan thu khawm a awi nuom naw a, insukthâm nuom mi le inrui hmang mi a na,’ an ti ding a nih.
Chuongchun, khuoa mi po po chun lungin an dênghlum ding a nih; chuong ang chun nangni laia inthawk chun thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih; chun, Israel mi po po chun hrieng an ta, ṭîng an tih.

Chun, in unauhai chu in kâwl hnaia um an ni naw a, a neitu chu in hriet naw amanih a ni chun, in in tieng ṭhuoi el in ta, in kuomah um zing a ta, in unauin a hung zawng pha pha in lo pêk nâwk ding a nih.

An sabengtung khawm chuong ang bawk chun in thaw ding a nih, chuong ang bawk chun an silfênhai khawm in thaw ding a nih, chuong ang tak chun in unau thil inhmang in hmu taphawt chu in thaw ding a na, in tobopui el ding a ni nawh.
“In unauhai sabengtung amanih, an bâwngchal amanih, lampuia tlu in hmuin in tosan el ding a ni naw a, in keithopui ngei ding a nih.
“Nuhmei chun pasal thuomhnaw an inbel ding a ni naw a, pasalin nuhmei silfên an inbel ding a ni bawk nawh; tukhawm chuong anga thaw chu
A pui chu insuo ngei ngei ding a nih, a te ruok chu la thei in ta, chuongchun, in ta dingin ṭhâng a ta, dam sâwt in tih.
“In thar in bâwl chun, chutaka chun mi dâm an tla a, in in chu thisen insuona in a hung ni nawna dingin in inchung chu in inhuon ding a nih.
Sahmul le pat khâwng pawl in inbel ding a ni bawk nawh.
“Miin nuhmei a nei a, a pâwl zet a, a theida nâwk si a,
‘Hi nuhmei hi ka nei a, ka pâwl a, nunghâk inthieng a nina ka hmu naw a,’ tia muolphotaka a siem a, a hming a suksiet chun,
nunghâk nu le pa chun kul kawtkhârah chu khaw upahai kuomah nunghâk inthieng a nina chu an hung suklang ding a nih.
Nunghâk pa chun upahai kuomah, ‘Hi mi hi ka naunu kân neitir a, amiruokchu, a hnâm nâwk si a; ngai ta,
I naunu hi nunghâk inthieng a nina ka hmu nawh, tiin muolphotakin a siem a, nisienlakhawm, hieng hi ka naunu chu nunghâk inthieng a nina chu annâwm,’ tîng a ta.
Chuongchun, chu khaw upahai hmaa chun puon chu phâng an ta. Chu khaw upahai chun a pasal chu ṭhuoi an ta, hrem an tih.
Israel nunghâk inthieng a sukhmingsiet leiin tangka shekel za inchawitir an ta, nunghâk pa chu an pêk ding a nih; ama chu a nuhmei nîng a ta, a dam sûngin ṭhe thei naw nih.
Amiruokchu, chu thu chu a lo indik a, nunghâk chu nunghâk inthieng a nina ân lang naw chun,
“Nunghâk inthieng, mi nuhmei huol, miin khuoah a hmu a, a zâlpui chun,
“Amiruokchu, miin ramhnuoiah nunghâk, mi ihuol a hmu a, a manlui a, a zâlpui chun a zâlpuitu pasal chau chu sukhlum ding a na,
a nunghâk chu iengkhawm law ding a ni nawh, nunghâk chunga chun thina khawp suol a um nawh; hieng ang hi chu mi a tuolbâwm thaw a, that ang a na;
ramah a va tâwk fûk a, mi ihuol nunghâk chu a khêk a, santu an um si naw a.
a zâlpuitu pasal chun nunghâk pa chu tangka shekel sâwmnga a pêk ding a nih; chun, ama chu a nuhmei nîng a ta, a sukhmingsiet ta leiin; a dam sûngin ṭhe thei naw nih.
Miin a pa nuhmei zâlpuiin a pa a sukmuolpho ding a ni nawh.
“Mi, a tilmu kawi le a zamaw intan chu
Nisienlakhawm,
An thlahai chu suon thumnaa inthawkin
“In hmêlmahai thawa in va riekna hmuna chun thil ṭha naw tinrênga inthawkin in insiekieng ding a nih.
Nangni lai tukhawm zâna a khâta thil suok leia lo pawrche tah an um chun, riebûka inthawk chun suok a ta, riebûka chun a lût nâwk ding a ni nawh.
Amiruokchu, zântieng a hung ni chun insil a ta, chun, nisa a tlâk pha chun riebûka chun a lût nawk ding a nih.
Riebûk puotieng chun hmun ruot in ta, chutaka chun in fe hlak ding a nih.
In hmangruohai lai chun suodûr nei in ta; chu chun in vân hnawmna ding cho khur in ta, in zun le êk chu in vur hlak ding a nih;
“Siehlaw, in kuoma an pu hung tlânsuoksan chu in pêk lêt nâwk ding a ni nawh.
“Israel naunuhmeihai lai nawchizawr an um ding a ni naw a, Israel naupasalhai lai pasal inzawr an um ding a ni bawk nawh.
Nawchizawr man amanih, pasal inzawr
“A pung hnawtin in unauhai in inpûktir ding a ni nawh; tangka tienga pung amanih, fâk ding tienga pung amanih, iengkhawm a pung hnawta inpûktir taphawt chu.
Ram dang mi chu a pung hnawtin inpûktir thei in tih; nisienlakhawm, in unauhai chu a pung hnawtin in inpûktir ding a ni nawh; chuongchun, in va hluo ding rama in kutsuok po poah
Thutiem kawnga in insûm chun suol ni naw nih.
In baua suok ta chu in thaw ngei ding a nih; nuomthua thilinhlân in baua in tiem
“In tuolbâwmhai grêp huona in fein in dittâwkin in fâk thei a; amiruokchu, in paikâwngah in khum ding a ni nawh.
a ina inthawka a suok hnunga mi dang a va nei a,
a pasal nuhnung lem chun a theida a, inmâkna lekha a ziekpêk a, a pêk a, a ina inthawka ân suoktirin amanih, a pasal nuhnung lem nuhmeia neitu chu a thi amanih a ni chun,
a pasal hmasa ama infetirtu khan, sukpawrche tah a ni leiin nei nâwk thei ta naw ni;

“Chun, nuhmei nei hlim chu sipaiah a fe ding a ni naw a, ieng sin thaw ding khawma phût ding a ni nawh; a in tieng kum khat sûng chu a nuom ang angin um a ta, a nuhmei le chun hlimtakin an um ding a nih.
Aigupta rama inthawka in hung suokna lampuia
“Iengkhawm in tuolbâwm in inpûktirin a thil siekham chu la dingin a inah in lût ding a ni nawh.
Tuolah ngîr in ta, a pûktu chun a thil siekham chu tuola chun a hung lâkpêk ding cheu a nih.
Mi rimsi a ni chun a thil siekham chu i riekpui ding a ni naw a,
a silfêna chun a zâl a, ân pâk theina ding cheuin a thil siekham chu nisa tlâkah in pêk kîr nâwk ngei ding a nih; chuongchun,
A thaw ni chun a hlaw chu in pêk ding a nih, nisain a tlâk nel ding a ni nawh; mi rimsi a na, chutaka chun a lungril a sie hlak a nih; chuong naw chun, in chungchâng thuah
“Nauhai leiin pahai chu sukhlum ding a ni naw a, pahai leiin nauhai khawm sukhlum ding a ni bawk nawh; mi tin mâni suol lei chaua sukhlum ding a nih.
Nangni khawm Aiguptaa khan suok in ni ta a,
“In oliv thing chu in vuokin a kâuhai chu in vuok nawn ding a ni nawh; ram dang mihai, pa nei lohai, hmeithaihai ta ding a nih.
In grêp huona mi in lo pha chun a hnung in zawng ding a ni nawh; ram dang mihai, pa nei lohai, hmeithaihai ta ding a nih.
“Mi an inkhing a, rorêlnaah an fe a, rorêltuhaiin an lo rêlpêk a, mi fel chu thiem an inchangtir a, mi suol chu thiemnaw an inchangtir a ni chun,
mi suol chu vuok âwm a ni chun rorêltu chun inzâltir a ta, a hmaah ân vuoktir ding a nih, a suol dân izirin vuok zât ding bi chu thliek nîng a tih.
Vawi sâwmli chena vuok thei nîng a ta, chu nêka tam lem chu ni lovin; hi nêka tam lem vuok chun in unau chu muolpho taluo rawi a tih.
Chuongchun, an khuo upahai chun ama chu ko an ta, bieng an ta, chun ama chun, ‘Ka nei nuom naw a nih,’ tia a ṭhang tlat chun, a unaupa nuhmei chun upahai hmaa chun hang pan a ta,
a kekawk hlîppêk a ta, a hmaiah chil sâk a ta, ‘A unaupa sûngkuo indin nuom nawtu chunga chun hieng anga thaw hi ni pei raw se,’ tîng a ta, a dawn ding a nih.
Chuongchun, ‘Kekawk hlippêk sûngkuo’ tiin Israelhai laia chun a hming inputtir ding nîng a tih.
“Mi insuol hai sienla, pakhat lem nuhmei chun ân suolpuia inthawka a pasal sansuok dingin a zamawah keipêk sienla,
a kut chu in tanpêk ding a nih, in lunginsiet hlawl ding a ni nawh.
In ina khawm inkhina chi dang dang a lien le a chîn in kawl ding a ni nawh.
Pathien khawm ṭi lovin in châu lai le in ngûi laia lampuia a lo tuok cheu a, nangni laia hnung tienga a hnufuolhai po po a lo thaw dân kha.
Chu huna thiempu kuoma chun fêng in ta, a kuomah, ‘Mi pêk dinga kan pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâmna ramah kan hung tah ti vawisûn hin
Thiempu chun in kuta inthawk chun bâwm chu lâng a ta,
Chun, ngai ta, aw

“Kum thum kuma sâwmapakhat pêk kuma in thil rasuok po po sâwmapakhat in pêk zo chun, Levi mihai dâm, ram dang mihai dâm, pa neinawhai, hmeithaihaiin in umnaa chun an fâk a, an lo khawsak thei vena dingin in pêk ding a nih.
Chun,
“Vawisûn hin
Vawisûn hin
chun, vawisûn hin a tiem ta cheu ang khan, a thupêkhai po po chu in zâwm a, ama chanpuol bîk ni ding le
a lo hril ta anga
Chun, Mosie le Israel upahai chun mipuihai chu thu a pêk a, “Thupêk po po vawisûna ka pêk cheu hi pawm ro.
Jordan vadung in kai zo chun tlângah lunghai chu phun in ta, lung chârnain in chârkhum ding a nih.
Lalpa in Pathien maichâm chu lung sut lovin in siem ding a nih; chutaka chun
chutaka chun fâng in ta,
Lung chunga dâm chun hi dân thu po pohai hi chiengtakin in ziek ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuleiin,
Chu ni ma chun Mosiein mipuihai chu thu a pêk a,

“Jordan vadung râl in kai hnung chun mipuihai mal sâwm dingin Gerizim tlângah hienghai hi an ngîr ding a nih: Simeon hnam le Levi hnamhai, Juda hnam le Issakar hnamhai, Josef hnam le Benjamin hnamhai.
Ṭawngsiea dingin hienghai hi Ebal tlângah an ngîr ding a nih; Reuben hnam dâm, Gad hnam dâm, Aser hnam dâm, Zebulun hnam dâm, Dan hnam dâm, Naphtali hnam dâm hi.
Chun, Levi mihai chun hang hril ṭan an ta, Israel mihai po po kuoma chun râwl inringtakin:
“‘A tuolbâwm ramri sawntu chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,’ tîng an ta, mipui po po chun, ‘Amen’ an lo ti ding a nih.
“ ‘A tuolbâwm arûka thattu chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,’ tîng an ta, mipui po po chun, ‘Amen’ an lo ti ding a nih.
“‘Pawitâwklo thatna dinga thamna latu chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,’ tîng an ta, mipui po po chun, ‘Amen’ an lo ti ding a nih.
In tieng le ram tienga khawm chun malsâwmin um in tih.
In rîla rahai, in hnuoi rahai, in ran ruol pung, in bâwngpui le berâm ruol pung dâm chu malsâwmin um a tih.
In bâwm le in bei hmetna thlênghai malsâwmin um an tih,
in invâk suok chu malsâwmin um in ta, in hung kîr khawm chu malsâwmin um in tih.
In hmêlma nangni thawtuhai cheu chu
“In kuomah ṭawng a lo inkhâm ta angin
Chuongchun, khawvêl hnam tinin
Chun, nangni pêk dinga in pi le puhai kuoma
a thuhai hi a ieng khawm hi changtienga manih, vawitieng amanih pathien danghai zui le rawngbâwl dinga in pêtsan naw phawt chun.
“Amiruokchu,
In tienga le ram tienga khawm chun ṭawngsie phur in tih.
In bâwm le in bei hmetna thlêng chu ṭawngsephurin um a tih.
In rila ra dâm, in hnuoi ra dâm, in bâwngpui le in berâm ruol punghai chu ṭawngsephurin um an tih.
In invâk suok chu ṭawngsephurin um in ta, in hung nâwk khawm chu ṭawngsephurin um in tih.
“Hluo dinga in lûtna rama inthawka a sukbohmang vawng hmakhat cheu chun
In chung tienga in vân chu dârsen nîng a ta, in hnuoi chu thîr nîng a tih.
In ram hluo chu pilvut le pilvut khuah
In ruong chu chunglêng vate po po le ramsa po pohai bu nîng a ta, a hnawthmangtu um dêr naw ni hai.
“Sukdam ruollo, Aigupta khuoihli dâm, pânsie dâm, invûngna dâm, uithak dâmin
Invêtna dâm, mit indelna dâm, ṭitna dâmin

mitdelin thimthama a dap a dap angin sûn vara khawm dap dap in ta, in khawsak thua chun tluongtlung ta naw ti niu; chun, nêksâwr ding le râllâk ding ringawt ni zawmzat in ta; sansuok ding cheu tukhawm um naw ni hai.
Nuhmei huol in ta, mi dangin zâlpui an tih; in bâwl in ta, hluo ruok chu hluo naw ti niu; grêp huon siem in ta, a ra chu sawr naw ti niu.

In mithmuah in bâwngchalhai chu that nîng an ta, a sa chu fa naw ti niu; in sabengtunghai chu la luipêk an ti cheu a, pe nâwk naw ni hai cheu; in berâmhai khawm chu in hmêlmahai pêk nîng an tih; santu ding cheu tukhawm nei naw ti niu.
In naunuhmeihai, in naupasalhai chu hnam danghai pêk nîng an ta, sûnnithlâkin anni chu ngaiin thlîr zing hlak in tih, in thlîrnân in mithai chu châu a tih; iengkhawm thaw thei in nei âwm si nawh.
In hnuoi râhai le in sin inrim râhai chu in hriet ngai naw hnamin fa zo an tih, nêksâwr ding le suknawmnat ni zawmzat in tih,
chuongchun, chuong thil chu in hmu chun invêt phâng in tih.
“Nangni le in lal leh, in pi le pu chena in hriet ngai naw hnam kuomah
Chuongchun,
Loah bu chi tamtak fe suokpui in ta, tlâwmte bak sîk in tih, khâuin an fâk zo vawng ding a nih.
Grêp huon siem in ta, enkawl in ta, nisienlakhawm, a uoin chu dâwn naw ti niu a, grêp chu lo bawk naw ti niu, a ngêin a fâk zo ding a nih.
In ram po poa chun oliv thing chîng in ta, nisienlakhawm, a hriek chu nâl naw ti niu, in oliv rahai chu hrût zo a tih.
Naupasalhai, naunuhmeihai nei in ta, nisienlakhawm, in ta ni zing naw ni hai, sala ṭhuoiin an la um ding a nih.
In thei kûng po po le in hnuoi râ chu khâu chan nîng a tih.
Ram dang mi nangni laia umhai chun insâng khal tiel tiel an ti cheu a, nangni ruok chu inhnuoi tiel tiel in tih.
Inpûktir an ti cheu a, nangni ruok chun inpûktir ve naw ti niu. Anni chu lu nîng an ta, nangni ruok chu mei nîng in tih.
Hieng ṭawngsie po po hi in chungah la hung um a ta, hnawt an ti cheu a, nangchîng an ti cheu a, an sukbohmang vawng cheu chenin; a thupêk cheu le a dân a pêk cheu zâwm dinga
in chunga le in thlahai chunga kumkhuoa inchikna ding le makti dingin la um a tih.
“Thil iengkima in hung burip khawma
nangni thaw dinga
upahai khawm pawisa lo le ṭhalaihai khawm ditsak chuong lo hnam nunrâwngtak el chu.

“Chun, in ran ruol punghai, in hnuoi rahai dâm, sukram in ni hmakhat chu fâng an ta, bu dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm, in bâwng punghai dâm, in berâm ruol têhai chu hlapêk naw ni hai cheu; in siet letdêr chenin.
Nangni laia mi nun ṭha mi tlangtakhai khawmin an unaupahai dâm, an nuhmei dittakhai dâm, an la umpui an nauhai takngiel khawm hmu nuom naw ni hai a,
iengkhawm an nei ta naw leiin an nauhai sa an fâk ding chu an tuhai khawm pe naw ni hai, an inhuolna cheu le an dang chêpna, in hmêlmahaiin in kul kawtkhâra an dang chêpna cheu leiin.
Nangni laia nuhmei um inno le innêmhai an innêm le an um inno leia hnuoi khawm sir ngai lohai chun an pasal dittakhai dâm, an naunuhmeihai dâm, an naupasalhai dâm, huphur an ta,

an pawm lai nautesen le an nau la pieng dinghai khawm chu inhnar an ta, iengkim an tlâksam ta leiin arûkin fâng an tih; an inhuolna cheu le an dang chêpna cheu, in hmêlmahaiin kul kawtkhâra an dang chêpna cheu leiin.
In ṭi hle hlak Aigupta ram hrihai dâm kha in chungah inlêngtir nâwk a ta, hri chun chel tlat a ti cheu a.
Hi dân lekhabua chuonglo, natna le hri tinrêng khawm in bohmang hmakhat chun
Vâna arasi zât hiel ni hlak kha tlâwmte bak hung ni tâng in ta,
A thaw ṭha ding cheu le a sukpung ding cheua
“Chun,
in hringna chu ṭi dawr dawrin um zing zing a tih; sûn le zânah ṭi zing zingin um in ta, in hringna chun ngaimuong taka um ni nei naw nih.
Zîngtieng chun, ‘Zântieng ni ta sien aw,’ tîng in ta, zântieng chun, ‘Zîngtieng ni ta sien aw,’ tîng in tih; thil ṭium in lungrilin a ṭi ding le in mita in thil hmu ding lei chun.
‘Hmu nâwk ta naw ti niu,’ in kuoma ka ti lampuia chun lawngin Aigupta ramah
Horeb tlânga an kuoma thu a thlung bâkah
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel mi po po chu a ko a, an kuomah a hril a, “Aigupta rama Pharao chunga dâm, a mihai po po chunga dâm, a ram po po chunga dâm, in mithmu ngeia
a fiena nasatak dâm, inchikna dâm, thilmak dâm in mit ngeia in hmu kha.
Thlalêrah kum sâwmli ka ṭhuoi ta cheu a, in silfênhai chu in sil chul naw a, in kekawkhai khawm in bun chul bawk naw a.
Kei hi
Chun, hi hmun in hung tlung hin Hesbon lal Sihon le Basan lal Og chu a mi do dingin an hung inthawk a, anni chu ei lo hne ta a.
An ram chu ei lâk a, Reuben mihai, Gad mihai, Manasse hnam zâtve hai hluo dingin ei pêk a.
Chuongchun, in thil thaw po poa in tluongtlung pei theina dingin hi thuthlung thuhai hi pawm unla, zâwm ro.
“Tuhin in rêngin in hnam ṭhuoituhai, in upahai, in hotuhai, Israel mi po po,
in nauhai leh, in nuhmeihai leh, in umnaa ram dang mi in umpuihai dâm, in thing phûrtu le in tuichâwitu chenin,
in pu Abraham, Isak, le Jakob hai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâm ta ang le, in kuoma a lo hril ta anga a mihai a ta dinga a sukdet theina ding cheu le, in Pathien a ni theina dingin
vawisûna
(Aigupta rama ei um dân dâm, hnam danghai nêrthlenga ei fe dân dâm, in hriet a;
anni laia an thil tirdakumhai le an milim, thing le lung dâm, tangkaruo le rângkachak dâm khawm kha in hmu bawk a).

Hi inkhâmna thu ngaithlatu po poin, ‘Lulultakin ei lampui hraw chu hraw zing inla khawm him tho ei tih,'tia lungrila ngaidân siem a, inthlamuontu um hlau rawi an tih. (Chu chun ram hnâwng le ram ṭâwt chungah sietna intlun a tih).
Hi dân bua chuong ṭawngsie thuthlung ang po po hin Israel hnam po po laia inthawkin suktuma umin thil ṭha naw tiengah
“Chun, ruolthar la hung um dinghai, in hnunga in nauhai la hung um dinghai le, ram dang mi hlataka inthawka hung dinghai chun, chu rama hri le
a ram pumpui chu kât le chia kângzêu, iengkhawm chîng nawna, iengkhawm inder nawna, hlobet takngiel khawm inder nawna ramah inchang a tih. Sodom le Gomorra, Adma le Zeboiim hai
Hnam tinin, ‘Ieng leia hi ram hi hieng anga
Chuongchun, mîn, ‘Aigupta rama inthawk a ṭhuoi suok laia a thuthlung,
pathien dang, an hriet naw pathienhai, amân a ruotpêk nilohai rawng chu an bâwl a, an biek lei a nih.
Chuleiin, hi lekhabua chuong ṭawngsie po po intlungtirin hi ram chunga hin
Lalpa lunginsenna nasatak le ṭiumtak lei chun anni chu an rama inthawkin a phâwi dawk a, ram dangah a thelût tâwl a nih, tuta an um dân ang hin,’ la tîng an tih.
Chun,
Chun, hung ngha nâwk in ta,
hi dân bua chuong, a thupêk dâm, a dânhai dâm, zâwm dinga
“Hi thupêk tuta ka pêk cheu hi in ta dingin ân tak naw a, a hlat naw bawk cheu a nih.
‘kan hrieta kan zâwm theina dingin tu am râlah mi fepêk a ta, mi hung lapêk ding?’ ti dingin tuisuoriet râla mi khawm a ni chuong nawh.
“Tuhin in hmaah hringna le ṭhatna, thina le thil ṭha naw ka sie a.
Amiruokchu, in lungrilin khaw dang a ngha a, in ngai naw a, ṭhuoihmanga in um a, pathien danghai in biek a, a rawng dâm in bâwl chun,
bohmang ngei ngei in tih, ti tuhin ka hril cheu a nih, Jordan vadung kaia hluo dinga in va lûtna ding rama chun dam sâwt naw ti niu.

In hmaah hringna le thina, malsâwmna le ṭawngsie ka sie ti tuhin in chungchâng thua hretu dingin hnuoi le vân ka sâl a nih; chuongchun, hringna chu thlang ro, in hring theina dingin, nangni le in thlahai leh;
Chun, Mosiein Israel mi po pohai kuomah hieng thu hi a va hril a.
An kuomah a hril a, “Tuhin chu kum za le sâwmhni ka lo ni ta a; ka suok invâk thei ta naw a; chun,
Chun, Mosie chun Josua chu a ko a, Israel mi po pohai mithmuah a kuomah, “Hrâttak le huoitakin um rawh, hieng mihai kuoma hin an pi le puhai
Chun, Mosie chun chu dân chu a ziek a,
Chuongchun, Mosie chun, “Kum sari kum, ngaidam kum taphawta bâwkte ruoiṭhea,
hmun a la ruot dinga Israel mi po po
Mipuihai, nuhmei, pasal, in nau le tehai, in umpui ram dang mihai, anni chun an ngai a, an inchûk a,
le an nauhai la hrelohai khawma an hriet a, Jordan vadung kaia in va hluo ding rama in um sûng po poa
Chun,

Chu pha chun an chungah ka lung chawk a ta, nghatsan ka ta, inbîksan ka tih, bohmang an ta, thil ṭha naw le lunginzîngna tamtak an chungah tlung a tih; chuongchun, chu ni chun, ‘Ei Pathien eini lai a um naw leiin hieng thil ṭha naw ei chungah a hung tlung a ni naw am a nih?’ tîng an tih,
pathien dang tieng nghaa thil ṭha naw an thawhai po po lei chun an kuoma inthawkin kân thup ngei ngei ding a nih.
Chuleiin, hla hi in ta dingin ziek la, Israel mihai chu inchûktir rawh; Israel mihai chungchâng thuah hi hla hi a mi hrepuitu a ni theina dingin invawntir rawh.

An pi le puhai kuoma inkhâma ka tiem, nênetui le khuoizua luong rama chun ka ṭhuoi a, fa le dâwna an um a, an tlaia an hung thâu pha meu chun pathien danghai kuom tieng nghâng an ta, an rawnghai bâwl an ta, mi hmusit an ta, ka thuthlunghai bâwsieng an tih.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun chu hla chu, chu ni la la chun a ziek a, Israel mihai chu ân chûktir a,
Mosiein hieng dân thuhai hi lekhabua a ziek zo a, zo hieu a hung ni chun,
thuthlung bâwm zâwntu Levi mihai chu Mosie chun thu a pêk a,
Hel in chîngzie dâm, in kâwmawzie dâm ka hriet a nih; ngai ta u, tuta ka la dampui lai cheu hmana
An na hrietah hieng thu hi ka hril a, an chungchâng thua hretu dingin vân le hnuoi ka sâl theina dingin in hnam ṭhuoituhai po po, in hotuhai mi ko khâwmpêk ro.

Ka thi hnung chun nasatakin insuksieng in ta, ka thupêk cheu lampuia inthawk hin pêthmang in tih ti ka hriet zing a nih; chun, a tâwpa lem chu thil ṭha nawin tlâkbuok a ti cheu a; in kut thilthawa suklungsen dinga
Chuongchun, Mosie chun Israel mi pungkhâwmhai po po hrieta chun hi hla hi a tâwp chenin a hril vawng a:
“Na lo sit ro, vânhai ka hril ding a nih;
Ka ṭawngbau suok leihnuoi hin lo ngai raw se,
Dâidâw angin ka thu chu far a tih;
Hlobet innotak chunga ruo ang le,
Hlohna chunga ruomuolkhawi angin.
Ropuina chu ei Pathien pe ro.
A lampui po po chu ân dik a nih.
Pathien ringum, rîtlona nei lo,
Fel le ṭha a nih.
Suon bengtlanaw le kâwmaw an nih.
Aw mi invêt le var nawhai,
Chuong ang chun maw
Ama chu ân dintu che i pa,
Siemtu che le inngîr dettu che ni lo am a nih?
Kha hma nihai kha hre zing la,
Suon tamtak kumhai chu ngaituo ro:
I pa indawn la, khîkhmûng a che;
I upahai khawm, hril an ti che.
Mihriem nauhai a ṭhe lai khan,
Hnamhai ramri chu a khang a,
Israel mihai zât ang peiin.
Jakob rawi chu a rochan an nih.
“Thlalêr ram ruok inrûm vung vunga chun;
A vêla umnghain a enkawl a,
A mitnaulêng angin a kawl a.
Mupuiin a bua a te a chawktho a,
A te chungah thla a zâp a,
A thlahai a zâr a, a lâk a,
A thlaa a dawm hlak angin,
Ram dang pathien ni lovin.
Hnuoi hmun insângahai chun ân chuongtir a,
Loa thil rasuok chu a fâk hlak a;
Lungpuia inthawka khuoizu ân dâwntir hlak a,
Lung changa inthawka hriek leh.
Bâwng nênetui inkhal, berâm nênetui,
Berâmte thâuhai leh,
Basan ram berâmchal le kêlhai,
Bu inhniktak chihai leh;
Grêp tui uoin i dâwn a.
“Jakobin khawptakin a fâk a, Jesurun chu a hung hausa a, a hung hel ta a.
A hung thâu a, a hung inchawm a, a hung nâm ta a;
A siemtu Pathien a nghatsan a,
A sandamna Lungpui chu a ngainêp a.
Ram dang pathienhai bein a thîkthu an chawktho a,
Thil tirdakumin a lungsenna an chawktho a.
An hriet ngai naw pathienhai kuomah,
Vaihnurama um chau pathien tharhai,
In thlatuhai iṭi ngai lohai kuoma chun.
A siemtu che Pathien i theinghil bawk.
A naunu le naupasalhai isuklungsenna leiin.
‘Inbîk hmangsan ka ta,
Iengtin am an um hrim hrim,’ a ta.
Suon rilo an nih,
Ringum lo nauhai.
An milimhaiin an mi suklungsen a;
Chia hril khawp lohai leh inthîktir ka ta,
Hnam invêthai hmangin suklungsen ka tih.
Ka lunginsen a chawk a,
Seol mawng chenin a kâng a,
Leihnuoi, a rasuok pumin a kâng zo,
Tlâng innghatna dâm a kâng a.
“An chungah sietna intieng khâwm ka ta,
An chungah thal inthlâng ka tih.
Phîngṭamin inrâwp an ta, meipui le sietna namên lovin kâng hmang an tih;
An chungah ramsa hahai tir ka ta.
Pilvuta invâk mihai tûr leh.
Puotiengah kâwlhnâmin thîng an ta,
Sûngtienga chun thlabârin,
Nunghâk, tlangvâl, nêne ne lai,
Lua kêlsam ṭohai chenin.
Mihriem laia anni hrietzingna chu sukbohmang dai ka tih,’ lo ti hiel tâng ka tih.
An hmêlmahai chu ngaisuolin,
‘Kan kut chu dawm sângin a um tah,
Hieng po po hi
Varna bo hnam an na,
Annia chun hrietthiemna a um nawh.
An tâwpna ding an ngaituo thiem ding bah.
Iengtin am pakhatin sâng hnawt a ta,
Pahniin sîng intlânsiettir an ta,
An Lungpuiin anni a zawr a,
An lungpui chu ei Lungpui ang a ni naw a,
Ei hmêlmahai ngei ngaidân khawma.
An grêphrui chu Sodom grêphrui,
Gomorra rama mi a nih;
An grêphai chu tûr grêp a nih.
A bâwrhai chu a khâ.
An uoinhai chu drakon tûr le,
Rûlriel tûr hrâttak a nih.
Ka robâwma châr khum chie a ni naw am a nih?
An kalbi ân tleu pha chun,
An sietna ni chu a hung hnai an ta a,
An chunga thil tlung dinghai chu hung tlung vak a tih.
A siehlawhai khawm thawpêk a tih;
An thilthawtheina inhmang a,
Khuokhir le khir naw tukhawm um dêr lova a hmu pha chun.
Hieng ang hin tîng a tih,
‘Khâwlai am an pathien,
An inhumhimna lungpui chu,
An inthawina thâu fatu,
An dâwn ding thilinhlân uoin dâwntuhai chu tuhâm an na?
Hung thoin hung ṭhangpui hai sienla cheu,
Nangni humtu ni raw hai se chu!
“Kei, keima ngei ka ni hre unla,
Pathien dang an um nawh;
Ka sukhlum hlak a, ka sukhring bawk hlak;
Ka sukhliem hlak a, ka sukdam bawk hlak;
Ka kuta inthawka mi lapêk thei hrim hrim an um nawh.
Vân tieng ka kut ka phar a,
Ka hringna sâlin ka hril a,
Ka kâwlhnâm tle ka tâtngei a,
Ka kutin rorêlna ka kawl chun,
Ka hmêlmahai chungah phuba lâng ka ta;
A mi theidatuhai chu thung ka tih.
Ka thalhai chu thisenin sukrui ka ta,
Ka kâwlhnâm chun thisen lem a tih;
Thathai le salhai thisen le
Hmêlma hotuhai
A siehlawhai thisen phuba chu a lâk ding a nih;
Ama dotuhai chungah phuba a lâk ding a nih,
A ram le a mihai ta dingin inremna famkim siem a tih,”
Mipuihai na hrietah chuong hla thu po po chu Mosiein a hril vawng a, ama le Nun naupa Hosea
Chun, Mosiein chuong thu po po chu Israel mi po po kuoma a hril zo chun, an kuomah,
In ta dingin thil teplo mei mei a ni naw a, in hringna a ni si a; chun, hieng thil thaw hin, hluo ding Jordan in va kân rama chun in dam sâwt ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chu ni vêk chun
“Moab rama Jeriko zâwna Abarim tlângdung Nebo tlânga chun hang fe la, Israel mihai hluo dinga ka pêk Kanaan ram chu hang thlîr rawh.
Chuongchun, i unaupa Aron Hor tlângah a thi a, a chihai kuoma ṭhuoi a ni ta ang bawk khan i hang lâwnna tlânga chun thîng i ta; i chihai kuoma ṭhuoi nîng i tih;
Zin thlalêra Kades-a Meriba tuia Israel mihai laia ka chunga in suol lei le Israel mihai laia in mi chawimawi naw lei khan.
Ram chu hang hmûng i ta, nisienlakhawm, Israel mihai ka pêk rama chun lût naw ti nih,” tiin.
“Sinaia inthawkin
Seira inthawkin an kuomah a tho a,
Paran tlânga inthawkin a var a suok a;
Mi inthieng sângsâwm laia inthawkin a hung;
A kut changtieng chun an ta dingin dân chawk thei a um a.
A mi inthienghai po po chu a kutah an um a;
I ke bulah an ṭhung a,
I thu chu pawm peiin,
Jakob mipuihai ta dingin ro hluo ding,
Ama chu Jeshurunah
Mipui ṭhuoituhai an pungkhâwm a,
Israel chi inzawmkhâwmhai chu.
Reuben chu dam zing sienla, thi lovin,
A mihai chu tlâwm hle hai sien khawm,” ti hi.
Chun, hi hi Juda mal a sâwmna a nih;
A mihai kuomah ṭhuoi lût rawh;
I kutin a ta dingin dopêk la,
A hmêlmahai thawpuitu ni rawh,” ti hi.
Chun, Levi chungthua chun,
“I Thummim le i Urim chu i mi inthieng kuomah pe la,
Massaah i fie a,
Meriba tuia i thaw pêkpa,
‘Ka nu le ka pa ka hriet nawh,’ titu,
A unauhai hre lo a,
Ama nauhai ngei khawm hre bawk lotu kuoma chun,
I thu chu an pawm a,
I thuthlung chu an zâwm si a.
Jakob mihai chu i rorêlhai chu inchûktir an ta,
Israelhai chu, i dân,
I hmaah riminhnik sieng an ta,
I maichâmah pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân an tih.
Mal sâwm rawh,
A kutsuokhai chu lo pawm la,
A thawtuhai kâwng chu vaw la;
A theidatuhai kâwng leh, an châng nâwk ta nawna dingin,” a ta.
Chun, Benjamin chungthua chun,
Sûnnithlâkin awp a ta,
Paw hlak a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Josef chungthua chun,
“A ram chu
Vân thil hlu dâidâw le,
Tui inthûktak hnuoi tienga tuihai ichâwm;
Nisa lum huntâwkhai,
Thlahaiin thil hlu ân suoktirin,
Kha hma tlânghaia thil ditumtakhaiin,
Chatuon tlânga thil hluhai dâmin.
Leilung le a chung thil hluhaiin,
Chîmbuka inlâr ditsaknain,
Malsâwmna chu Josef lu chungah hung um raw se,
A unauhai chunga hotua
A ropuina chu a bâwngchal pieng hmasa ropuina ang a na,
A ki chu ramsiel ki ang a nih.
Chuhai chun, hnam tin sik a tih, kâwlkawdawng chenin,
Chuonghai chu Ephraim sâng sâwmhai an na,
Manasse sâng tamtak chu an nih,” a ta.
Chun, Zebulunhai chungthua chun,
“Lâwm rawh, Zebulun, în vâksuoknaa dâm,
Chun, Issakar, i puon ina dâm,
Chutaka chun felna inthâwina dâm inhlân an tih;
Tuipuihai hausakna an tlân ding a ni si a;
Ṭieua ro inphûmhai leh,” a ta.
Gad chungthua chun,
“Gad mihai suklientu chu inpâkin um raw se,
Gad chu sakeibaknei angin a um a,
Bân a ham thlêr a, anih, lusîp chen khawmin.
A ram ṭha lai tak chu a ta dingin a thlang a,
Rorêltu chanvoa chun inṭhungtirin a um si a.
Ṭhuoituhai kuomah a fe a,
Israelhai kuoma a rorêlna chu,” a ta.
Dan chungthua chun,
“Dan chu sakeibakneite a nih,
Basana inthawka hung inchâwm suok chu,” a ta.
Naphtali chungthua chun,
“Aw Naphtali, ditsaknaa lungâwi,
Sim le thlang,
Aser mihai chungthua chun,
“Aser chu nau le tea malsâwmin um sienla,
A unauhai lai chun tlatlum sienla,
Hriekah a ke inchie raw se.
I kalnahai chu thîr le dârsen nîng a ta,
I dam sûng poin i hrâtna khawm um zing a tih,” a ta.
“Aw Jeshurun,i Pathien ang tukhawm an um dêr nawh,
A ṭhangpui ding chea vânhaia inthawka hung a,
A ropuinaa vân boruokhaia inthawka hung chu.
Hnuoi tienga chun chatuon bân a um,
Hmêlmahai chu a vaikiengpêk hlak che a,
‘Sukbohmang rawh,’ a ti a.
Jakob tuisunsuo chu a pumbil a,
Bu le uoin rama chun,
Anih, a vânhaiin dâidâw an infartir a,
I hamṭha de, aw Israel,
Nang ang hrim tu am an um a,
Nangma ṭhangpuitu phaw,
I ropuina kâwlhnâm a nih,
I hmêlmahai i kuomah intuklût an ta,
An hmun insânghai chu chîl i tih,” a ta.
Chun, Mosie chu Moab phaia inthawkin Jeriko zâwna Nebo tlâng, Pisga tlâng sîpa chun a hang lâwn a.
Naphtali le Ephraim ram po po, Manasse le Juda ram po po, a thlangtieng tuisuoriet chen;
Sim ram le tûm khawpui, Jeriko phai ruom, Zoar chenin.
Chun,
Chuongchun,
Mosie chu a thi chun kum za le sâwmhni mi a nih; a mit ân thim naw a, a tha khawm a ṭhum chuong nawh.
inchiknahai po po le, thilmak po pohai, Pharao le a siehlawhai po po kuoma le Aigupta ram po poa inentira,
kut hrâttak le ṭiumtak tak dâma Israel mi po pohai mithmua Mosiein a thaw ang thaw ve hlak chu.
“Ka siehlaw Mosie chu a thi ta a; tho la, nang le hieng mipui po pohai le hin Jordan hi kân unla, anni Israel mihai ngei ka ipêk rama chun fe ro.
Mosie kuoma ka hril ta ang khan, in kephaa in isir taphawt chu ka pêk vawng cheu a nih.
Thlalêra inthawk le hi Lebanon tlânga inthawka Euphrates vadung, vadung lientak chen, Hit mihai ram po po, nisa tlâkna tieng Mediterranean tuipui chen in ramri nîng a ta.
I dam sûng po po chun tukhawm i hmaah ngîr thei naw ni hai a, Mosie kuoma ka um ang khan i kuoma khawm ka um ve ding a nih; inhlâwsamtir naw ning che a, mâk khawm mâksan naw tawp ka ti che.
Hrâttak le huoitakin um rawh, inkhâma an thlatuhai pêk ka lo tiem ta ram kha anni hi în hluotir ding a ni si a.

Ka siehlaw Mosiein dân po po zâwm dinga a pêk che kha zâwm tlat dingin hrâttak le huoitakin um phawt el rawh. I fena taphawta i tluongtlung peina dingin i changtieng amanih, i vawitieng amaniah khawm pêtsan dêr naw rawh.

Hi dân bu hin i bâu chu suoksan hlek naw sienla, chu thu ziekhai po po chu i zâwm tlat theina dingin sûn le zânin i ngaituo ding a nih, chuongchun, i lampuihai chu suktluong pei i ta; i hung tluongtlung pei ding a nih. Thu ka pêk che a ni naw am a nih?
Hrâttak le huoitakin um rawh; ṭi naw la, zâm bawk naw rawh,
Chuongchun, Josua chun mipui hotuhai chu thu a pêk a,
“Riebûk chu va fang unla, mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Fâk dinghai buotsai ro khai, ni thum sûngin
Chun, Reuben mihai le, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai kuoma chun Josua chun,

In nuhmeihai, in nau le tehai le in ran ruolhai hi chu Jordan râla Mosiein ram a lo pêka cheu chun um an ta; nangni mi hrât huoihai po chu inrâlthuomin lo kai hmasâng in ta, in unauhai lo ṭhangpui in ta;
Anni chun Josua chu an dawn a, “Thaw dinga i thu mi pêkhai po po chu thaw pei kan tih.
Kawng iengkima Mosie thu kan zâwm pei hlak ang khan, i thu khawm zâwm pei kan tih.
Tukhawm i thupêk chunga hela, thu i pêk taphawt zâwm nuom lo chu sukhlum ding nîng an tih, hrâttak le huoitakin um phawt el rawh,” tiin.
“Ngai ta, vawizân hin ram enthla dingin Israel mi ṭhenkhat an hung a,” tiin Jeriko khuo lal chu an hril a.
Jeriko khuo lal chun, “I ina hung tlung mikhuolhai kha hung ṭhuoi suok rawh, ram pumpui enthla dinga hung an ni si a,” tia hril dingin Rahab kuomah mi a tir a.
Nuhmei chun mi pahnihai chu a ṭhuoi a, a thuphmang ta a; “Anih, mihai chu ka kuoma chu an hung ngei a, amiruokchu, khâwtaka inthawka hung am an ni ruok chu ka hriet nawh;
khaw inthim, kul kawtkhâr khâr hun ding lai vêl khan anni chu an suok nâwk ta a, khâwtieng am an fe tah ti khawm ka hriet nawh; hnawt vat unla, hnawt phâk in ti ie,” a ta.
Diktak chun in chungah a ṭhuoi a, in chunga a ziza kûng intieng khâwm lai chun a thuphmang a nih.
Chun, mihai chun Jordan vadung tieng chun kai chen chun an va hnawt ta a; chun, a hnawttuhai chu an suok phing le chun dai kawtkhâr chu an khâr ta a.
An zâl hma chun in chunga chun an kuomah a hang fe a,
chu mihai kuoma chun, “Hi ram hi
Chu chu kan lo hriet phingleh kan lungrilhai chu ântui zo a, nangni lei hin, mi tukhawm lungril mumal put hrim hrim hi an um naw a,

Chuleiin, tuhin ka ngên cheu a nih, hi in chungah ka lunginsietzie cheu ka lo suklang ta a, nangni khawma ka pa sûnghai chungah in lunginsietna chu hung inlangtir ve ding le inchikna fietak mi siempêk dingin
ka nu le ka pa le ka unaupahai le ka unaunuhai le an neihai po po leh, thinaa inthawkin kan hringna chu sansuok ngei dingin,” a ta.
Mihai chun amanu kuoma chun, “Kan thilthaw hi i hril suok naw ding chun in thi ai thîng kan tih.
Chuongchun, tukvera chun hruihruolin a thlâk thla ta a; a in chu khawpui kul tlânga um a ni si a, kul chunga chun a um a nih.

Chun, an kuoma chun, “Tlâng tieng panin fe ro khai, chuong naw chun, a hnawttuhai cheu khan hmu hlau rawi an ti cheu; chutaka chun ni thum vân bihmang unla, a hung hnawttuhai cheu kha an kîr nâwk hmakhat chun: chu zoa chun fe chau ro,” a ta.
Mihai chun a kuomah, “I ṭawng mîn khâmtir ringawt el hin chu thiemnaw mîn changtir el thei naw nih.

Ngai rawh, hi rama kan hung lût phaleh, hi pat sen hi i mi thlâkna tukvera hin lo khitde la; chun, in sûngah i kuomah i nu hai, i pa hai, i unaupahai, i pa sûnghai po po chu ṭhuoi lût vawng bawk raw aw.

Tukhawm i kawtkhâra inthawka khawlaia suok taphawt chu an thisen maw chu annîn phur an ta, keini chu thiemnaw changin um naw nîng ungah; amiruokchu, tukhawm in sûnga i kuoma um taphawt chu mîn an chungah kut an thlâk chun an thisen maw chu keinîn phur kan tih.
Amiruokchu, kan thilthaw hi i hril suok chun ṭawng i mîn khâmtirnaa hin thiemnaw changin um naw nîng ungah,” an ta.
Chun, amanu chun, “In thu ang pei chu ni raw se chu,” a ti a. Chuongchun, anni chu ân fetir a, an fe a; chun, tukvera chun pat sen chu a khitde a.

Chuongchun, an fe ta a, tlâng chu an va tlung a, anni hnawttuhai chu an kîr nâwk hmakhat chu, chutaka chun ni thum an um a, anni hnawttuhai chun lampui intluonin an zawng a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu zo naw a.
Chuongchun, mi pahnihai chu an kîr nâwk a, tlânga inthawk chu an fe thla a, Jordan vadung an kai a, Nun naupa Josua kuom chu an va tlung a, an chunga thil hung tlung po po chu an hril ta a.
Chun, Josua kuoma chun, “
Josua chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, Shittima inthawk chun an insawn a, Jordan an va tlung a, ama le Israel mihai po po le chun; an kai hmain chutaka chun an riek a.
Ni thum chinah hotuhai chun riebûk chu an va fang pei a.

Amiruokchu, nangni le chu inkâr chu inkhia tawng sâng hni amanih a ni ding a nih; hnai hlek naw ro, chuongchun, in fena ding lampui chu hre thei in ta, kha hma khan hi lampui hi in la hraw ngai si naw a,” tiin, mipuihai chu thu a pêk a.
Chun, Josua chun mipuihai kuomah, “Insukthieng ro, zinga hin
Chun, Josua chun thiempuhai kuoma chun, “Thuthlung bâwm hi zâwn unla, mipuihai hmaah fe ro,” a ta, a hril a. Chuongchun, thuthlung bâwm chu an zâwn a, mipui hma chu an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun,
Chun, thuthlung bâwm zâwntu thiempuhai chu thu pêng i ta, ‘Jordan vadung pang chu in tlung pha chun, Jordana chun ngir zing ro,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun Josua chun Israelhai kuoma chun, “Hung unla,

Josua chun, “Hitaka hin Pathien hring chu nangni lai a um a, in hmaa hin Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai,Hiv mihai, Periz mihai, Girgas mihai, Amor mihai, Jebus mihai hi a hnawt suok ngei ngei ding a nih ti hre ngei in tih.
Ngai ta u, khawvêl pumpui Lalpa thuthlung bâwm chun in hmaah Jordan vadung chu a kân a nih.
Chuongchun, Israel hnamhai laia mi hi sâwmpahni hnam tin aiah mi pakhat pei thlang suok unla,
chun,
Mipuihai chu Jordan vadung kai dinga an puon inhaia inthawka an suok chun, thuthlung bâwm zâwntu thiempuhai chu mipui hmaa chun an fe a, bâwm zâwntuhai chu Jordan an va tlung a,
bâwm zâwntu thiempuhai ke chun vapang tui a hang sir phingleh (bu sîk sûng po hin chu Jordan vadung hi a kuong po po a liem zing hlak a),

saktienga inthawka tui hung luong thla lai chu a ngîr ta a, hla reiah, Zarethan ram bula Adam khuoa chun a lo inhlawm ngîr ûr el ta a; chun, Araba tuipui, Tuipui thi chu, chu tienga luong lûthai khawm chu suktan vawng an ni ta a; chuongchun, mipuihai chu Jeriko khuo zawn taka chun an kai ta a.
Chun,
Chun, a hnam pumpui chun Jordan an kai fai vawng hnungin
“Mipuihai laia mi hi mi sâwmpahni, hnam tina mi pakhat pei thlang suok la, an kuomah,
‘Jordan vadung lailung, thiempuhai ngîrna laitaka mi lung sâwmpahni la unla, put phei unla, riebûk, vawizâna in riekna dingah sie ro,’ tiin thu pe rawh,” tiin a hril a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun Israel thlahai laia mi sâwmpahni, hnam tina mi pakhat pei a thlang suokhai chu a ko a;
chun, Josua chun an kuomah, “
Nakie in nauhaiin, ‘Hieng lunghai hi ieng inentirna am a na?’ tia an la hung indawn pha chun,
nangnîn an kuomah, ‘
Chun, Israel thlahai chun Josua thupêk ang chun an thaw a,
Chun, thuthlungna bâwm zâwntu thiempuhai ngîrna lai tak, Jordan vadung lailunga chun Josua chun lung sâwmpahni a phun a, chuong chu tu chen hin a la um zing a nih.
Mosiein Josua kuoma thu a lo pêk ta po po anga,
Mipui po po chu an kai vawng hnung chun
Mosiein an kuoma a lo hril ta angin Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai chu inrâlthuom sain Israel mipuihai hmain an lo kai a;
râlthuoma inthuom sa diem mi sîng li lai indo dingin Jeriko phaiahai chun
Chu ni chun
“Thiempuhai thuthlung bâwm zâwntuhai kha Jordan vadunga inthawka hung suok ding thu pe rawh,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Josua chun thiempuhai chu “Jordan vadunga inthawk khan hung suok ta ro khai,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Thiempuhai
Mipuihai chu thla khatna ni sâwm niin Jordan vadunga inthawk chu an suok a, Jeriko sak tieng panga Gilgala chun umhmun an khuor ta a.
Chuong lung sâwmpahni, Jordan vadunga inthawka an put dawkhai kha Josua chun Gilgala chun a phun ta a.
Chun, Israelhai kuoma chun thu a hril a, “Nakie phaleh in thlahaiin an pahai kuomah, ‘Hieng lunghai hi ieng inentirna am a na?’ tia an la hung indawn pha chun,
‘Israelhai chun Jordan vadung hi hnuoi hulah an kai a nih,’ tiin in thlahai chu in lân hriettir ding a nih.
Leihnuoia hnam tinrêngin
Chun, Jordan vadung thlang tienga um Amorhai lalhai po po le, Mediterranean tuipui panga um Kanaan ram lal po pohai chun, an kai hmakhat chun
Chuong lai chun,
Chuongchun, Josua chun meitâwklung chemtehai a siem a, Israel mihai chu Gibeath-haaraloth
Josua chun an ser a tanna san chu hi hi a nih: Aiguptaa inthawka suokhai po po, pasal, râl kâp mi po pohai kha Aiguptaa inthawka an suok hnung khan lam kârlakah thlalêra khan an thi zo tah a nih.
A hung suokhai po po kha chu ser tan sa vawng an na, amiruokchu, Aiguptaa inthawka an suok a, thlalêra lam kârlaka pienghai po po kha chu ser tan an ni ve nawh.
Chuongchun, an nauhai anni aia a sukpuitlinghai chu Josua chun an ser a tanpêk a, lam kâra khan an ser tan a ni naw leiin, sertanlo an ni si a,
Fêkân Ruoiṭhe zo tûk ni ngei chun chu rama bu chawl ṭhanglo bei le bu zêupuok an fâk a.

Chun, Josua chu Jeriko khaw bula a la um lai chun a dâk a, a hang en a; a hma zâwn ela chun mi pakhat a kâwlhnâm phawisa chawia lo ngîr zing hi a hmu a. Josua chun a hang pan a, a kuoma chun, “Keini tienga ṭhang am i ni, kan hmêlmahai tieng?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Ni lo e,
Chun
Jeriko khuo chu Israel mihai lei chun an khâr tlat a, tukhawm an suok naw a, tukhawm an lût bawk nawh.
Chun,
Râl kâp mi po po hin khawpui hi vêlin vawikhat chu hang vêl suok phawt in ta; chuong ang ruok chun ni ruk in thaw ding a nih.

Chun, berâmchal ki an mût rik ruoi ruoi a, tawtawrâwt ri in hriet pha chun, mipui po po chu inringtakin khêk dur dur raw se; chuongchun, khawpui kul chu chim rup a ta, mipui chu mâni hma zâwn sengah chun hang fêng an tih,” a ta.
Chun, Nun naupa Josua chun thiempuhai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Thuthlung bâwm hi zâwn unla, thiempu pasariin
Chun, ama chun mipuihai kuoma chun, “Fe pei unla, khawpui chu vêl suok ro, chun, inrâlthuomhai kha
Josuain mipuihai kuoma thu a hril zo chun
Chun, inrâlthuomhai chu tawtawrâwt mûttu thiempuhai hmaa chun an fe a, chun a hnungdâlhai chun bâwm chu an sawm a, thiempuhai chun fe malamin tawtawrâwt chu an mût pei a.

Chun, Josua chun mipuihai chu, “Khêk dêr naw unla, in râwl khawm hriet ni naw raw se, khêk dinga thu ka pêk ni cheu a tlung hmakhat chu in bâua inthawkin thu hrim hrim suok bawk naw sien, chu pha ruok chun chu khêk ro,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun,
Chun, Josua chu zingkâr inhmatakin a tho a, thiempuhai chun
Chun,
