Chun, a ni hni ni chun khawpui chu vawi khat an hang vêl suok nâwk a, riebûka chun an kîr nâwk a; chuong ang ruok chun ni ruk an thaw a.
A ni sari ni chun zîngkâr vârṭienin an tho a, thaw dân pângngaiin vawi sari an vêl suok a, chu ni chau chun khawpui chu vawi sari an vêl suok a nih.
A vawi sarinaa thiempuhaiin tawtawrâwt an hang mût chun Josua chun mipuihai kuoma chun, “Khêk ro khai,

Nangni ruokchu suksiet dinga thil pumpêka inthawk chun insiekieng hlau ro, chuong naw chun, suksiet dinga thil pumpêk laia mi ieng khawm lo lain, Israelhai riebûk hi suksiet dingah siem in ta, lunginzîngna intlun hlau rawi in tih.
Khawpui sûnga mi po po nuhmei pasal, a chîn a lien, bâwngchal dâm, sabengtung dâm leh kâwlhnâmin an sât hlum vawng ta a.
Chun, Josua chun mi pahni ram va enthlatuhai kuoma chun, “Nâwchizawr ina chun va lût unla, a kuoma ṭawng in lo inkhâm ta ang khan chu nuhmei chu a nei po po leh va ṭhuoi suok ro,” a ta.

Chuongchun, enthlatu tlangvâlhai chu an va lût a, Rahab le a pa le a nu leh, a unaupahai leh, a nei po pohai le chun an va ṭhuoi suok a, a laibung unauhai po po khawm an va ṭhuoi suok a, Israelhai riebûk puotienga chun an inumtir a.
Chun, khawpui chu a sûnga thil um po po leh meiin an raw vawng a, tangkaruo dâm, rângkachak dâm, dâr le thîr bûr le bêlhai chau chu
Chuongchun,
Amiruokchu, Israelhai chun thil inserhai chu an lo bawsiet a. Juda hnama mi Zera naupa Zabdi, chu naupa Karmi, chu naupa Akan chun thil ser ṭhenkhat chu a lo lâk a; chuongchun, Israelhai chunga chun

Chun, Josua chun Jeriko khuoa inthawk chun Bethel saktieng, Beth-Aven dep Ai khuoa chun mihai a tir a, an kuomah, “Hang fe unla, ram hang enthla ta u,” tiin a hril a. Mihai chu an hang fe a, Ai khuo chu an hang enthlâk ta a.

Chun, Josua kuoma chun an kir nâwk a, a kuomah, “Mi po po chu hang fe kher da el raw hai se, mi sâng hni amanih, sâng thum amanih hang fe hai sienla, Ai khuo chu thaw raw se; mi po po hang suksâwl kher ding a ni naw ie, tlâwmte chau an ni si a,” an ta.

Ai mihai chun mi sâwmthum le paruk lai an lo that a, dai kawtkhâr bula inthawk Sebarim chen rauin an hung hnawt a, an liem thlâknaa chun an that tâwl a, chun, mihai lungril chu ân tui zo ta a, tui ang el a lo ni ta a.

Josua chun, “E khai, iengdinga, Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, keini mipuihai hi sukbohmanga um dinga Amor mihai kuta pêk dinga Jordan vadung hi mi ṭhuoi kai am i na? Jordan vadung râla khan lungawitaka um ṭawk ṭawk ta lem ding kha aw.
Aw Lalpa, hienga hmêlmahai hnawta Israelhai an tlânse el hi ieng tin am ka thaw ding a ni ta leh?

Kanaan mihai le hieng laia chênghai po po hin hrieng an ta, mi hung inhuol an ta, hnuoi chunga inthawk hin kan hming an sukbo dai ding a ni hi; i hming ropuitak ta ding hin ieng am i thaw ding a ni ta leh?” a ta.

Israelhai hin thil an suksuol a nih; ka thuthlung pawm dinga ka pêk kha an bawsiet a ni hi; thil pumpêk laia ṭhenkhat an lâk bawk a nih; an inrûk a, an ip bawk a, an thuomhnaw lai ngei an thuphmang a nih.
Tho la, mipuihai hi inhlân thieng phawt el rawh; chun, an kuomah, ‘Zînga dingin inhlânthieng ro khai,
Chun, Josua chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, Israelhai chu a chi chiin a hung inlang tir a; Juda chihai chu man an lo ni ta a.
Juda hnamhai chu a hung inlangtir nâwk a; Zer hnamhai chu a lo man a, Zerhai sûnghai chu a khât khâtin a hung inlangtir nâwk a; Zabdi chu man a lo ni ta a.
Zabdi sûnghai chu a khât khâtin a hung inlangtir nâwk a; chuongchun, Juda chia mi Zera naupa, Zabdi, chu naupa Karmi,
chu naupa Akan chu man a lo ni ta a. Josua chun Akan kuoma chun, “Ka naupa,

râllâk laia mi Babulon ram puon ṭhatak le, tangka shekel za hni le, rângkachak tlang shekel sâwmnga bûk ka hmu a, kân hnar êm a, ka lâk el a nih; chun, ngai ta, ka puon in sûngah hnuoiah thuphmang a na, tangka chu chu hnuoia chun a um,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun mihai a tir a, puon in sûnga chun an va tlân a; chun, puon ina chun thuphmang a lo ni a, hnuoia chun tangka khawm chu a um ngei ti an hmu a.
Chuongchun, puon in sûnga inthawk chun an lâk a, Josua le Israel mihai po po kuoma chun an hung chawi a;

Chun, Josua le Israelhai po po chun, Zera naupa Akan chu tangka dâm, puon dâm, rângkachak tlang dâm, a naupahai dâm, a naunuhai dâm, a bâwngchalhai dâm, a sabengtunghai dâm, a berâmhai le a puon in dâm le a neihai po po le chun an ṭhuoi a, Akor

Jeriko le an lal chunga i thaw ang khan Ai khuo le a lal chunga khawm thâwng i ta, râllâk le ranhai chau chu nangni chan dingin lâng in tih. Khawpui inchânru ding a hnung tiengah sie bawk rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Josua le râl kâp mi po po chu Ai khuo tienga hang fe ding chun an inthawk ta a; Josua chun mi hrât huoisen sîng thum a thlang suok a, zânah ân fetir a.
Anni chu thu a pêk a, “Ngai ta u, khawpui hnungtienga chun khawpui chu thaw dingin inchânru unla, khawpuia inthawka hlatakah fe naw unla, inzosa zingin um phawt el ro.

Chuongchun, mi hung hnawt dingin hung suok an ta, khuoa inthawka hla rei chen kan zâwr suok chenin; anni chun, ‘Inhma ang bawk khan ei hmaah an tlansie nâwk tah,’ an ti ding a nih. Chuongchun, an hmaah tlânsieng kan tih.
Chun, inchânrûknaa inthawk chun hung suok in ta, khawpui chu la el in tih;
Khawpui chu in lâk phingleh, khawpui chu raw el ro,
Chun, Josua chun ân fetir ta a, inchânrûkna hmuna chun an fe a. Ai khuo thlangtienga Bethel le Ai khuo inkâra chun an um a, Josua ruok chu, chu zân chun mipuihai lai a riek a.
Chun, Josua chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, mipuihai chu a kei khâwm a; chun, ama le Israel upahai chu mipuihai hmaa chun Ai khuo tieng an hang fe a.
A kuoma râl kâp mi umhai po po chu an hang fe a, khawpui bul chen chu an hang fe a, Ai khuo hmârtieng panga chun an riek a; Ai khuo le an inkâra chun ruom a um a.
Chun, mi sâng nga lai a ṭhuoi a, khawpui thlangtieng pang Bethel le Ai khuo inkâra chun ân chânrûktir a.
Chuongchun, mipui khawpui hmârtieng panga sipaihai ṭhanghmun le, khawpui thlangtieng panga inchânrutuhai ṭhanghmun chu an hang ruot fel a; Josua chu chu zân chun ruom laitaka chun a riek a.

Chun, Ai khuo lal chun chu chu a hmu phingleh, inhmâwtakin chu tûk chun, chu khuoa mihai, ama le a rawihai po po chu an tho a, a hmun ruot Araba zâwnah Israelhai chu thaw dingin an hung suok ta a; nisienlakhawm, khuo hnungtieng chun ama thaw dingin an inchânrûk ti a hriet naw a.
Chun, khawpuia mi umhai po po chu anni hnawt dingin an ko khâwm a, chuongchun, Josua chu an hnawt a, khawpuia inthawk chun hla rei chu zâwr suokin an um ta a.
Ai khuo le Bethel khuoa chun Israelhai hnawt lo chu pakhat bek khawm an um ta naw a; khawpui chu khâr lovin an mâksan el ta a, Israelhai chu an hnawt ta a.
Chun,
Chun, ân chânrutuhai kha an umna hmuna inthawk chun an hung suok vat a; a kut chu a hang phar phingleh an tlân a, khawpuia chun an lût a, an lâk ta a; khuo chu an raw ta a.

Chuongchun, Ai mihai chun an hnungtieng an hei thlîr chun, khawpui khu vântienga tung ngut ngut el chu an hmu ta a, khawtieng tienga khawm tlân theina hrim hrim an nei ta naw a; chuongchun, thlalêra tlânhai khan anni hnawttuhai chu an hung lenghat ve ta thung a.
Chun, Josua le Israelhai po po chun inchânrutuhaiin khawpui an lâk, khawpui khu chu ân tung ngut ngut an hei hmu chun an hung kîr a, Ai mihai chu an that ta a.

Chun, mi danghai chu a thaw dingin khaw sûnga inthawk chun an hung suok a; chuongchun, Israelhai chun ruongchaiche an thlâk ta a; a ṭhen khingtieng an um a, a ṭhen khingtieng an um bawk a; chuongchun, an that a, pakhat khawm hla le insuo hrim hrim an nei naw a.
Ai khuo lal ruok chu a hringin an man a, Josua kuomah an ṭhuoi a.

Israel mihai chun Ai khuoa mi phûla umhai po po chu thlalêr rama anni an va hnawtna hmunah an that zo a, an rênga kâwlhnâma an that rêm dêr hnung chun, Israel mihai po po chu Ai khuo tieng chun an kîr nâwk a, kâwlhnâmin an that ta a.
Chu nia thihai po po chu nuhmei le pasal mi sîng khat le sâng hni an nih, Ai khuoa mihai po po chu.
Josua chun a fei inletna kut chu Ai mihai po po a sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chun a kei thlâk naw a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun Ai khuo chu a raw a, kumkhuoa dingin hnuoi pâwngah a siem a, tu chen hin râusan a lo ni tah a nih.

Chun, Ai khuo lal chu zântieng chenin thinglêrah a khai a; nisa tlâka chun Josuain thu a pêk a; chuongchun, a ruong chu thinglêra inthawk chun an lâk thlâk a, khawpui dâi kawtkhâr lûtnaah an pei a, a chungah lung an dêng vûm thûr a, chu chu tu chen hin a la um.
Chun, chutaka chun Israel mihai hma ngeia Mosiein dân a ziek kha lungahai chun a zieksâwng a,
Chun, chu hnunga chun dân thu po po, malsâwmna thu le ṭawngsephurna thu chu a tiem a, dân lekhabua chuong ang po po el kha.
Mosie thupêk ang po po chu Israel pungkhâwm po pohai le nuhmeihai le naupang chite tehai le anni laia hnam dang chêng vehai hrieta chun Josua chun tiem ṭhel hrim hrim a nei nawh.

Chun, Jordan vadung râla lalhai po po tlânga mi le phaia mi dâm, Mediterranean tuipui kam tluona chêng Lebanon tlâng chena um Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai, Jebus mihai chun an lo hriet chun,
Josua le Israelhai chu inthuruola thawhrawn tumin an pungkhâwm ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Gibeon khuoa umhai chun Josuain Jeriko khuo le Ai khuo a thaw dân an lo hriet chun,
var vervêkin an châng ve ta thung a, palai angin an insiem a, ip hluitak tak an sabengtunghai an inphurtir a, uoin peng hluitak tak, a ṭiek tahai leh,
kekawk hluitak tak, inphâwk ṭêt ṭût hi an bun a, puon hluitak tak an sil a, an fâk dinga an hung chawi beihai chu ṭâwl ṭekṭuk le ap bur el dâm hi a na.
Chun, Josua kuomah Gilgala an riebûka chun an va fe a, a kuoma le Israelhai kuoma chun, “Ram hlataka inthawka hung kan na; chuongchun, kan kuoma hin thu thlung ro khai,” an va ti a.
Anni chun Josua kuoma chun, “I siehlawhai kan ni hi,” an ta. Josua chun an kuomah, “Tuhai am in ni leh? Khâwtienga inthawka hung am in ni leh?” a ti a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “

Chun, kan upahai le kan rama chênghai po po chun kan kuomah, ‘Lampuia dingin fâk dinghai chawiin anni va be ro khai; chun, an kuomah, in siehlawhai kan ni hi, kan kuomah thu thlung ro khai ti unla,’ tiin an hril a.
Hieng kan fâk dinga kan beihai hi in kuoma hung dinga kan hung suok niin kan ina inthawka a luma kan hung chawi an na, nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu en hman ta u, a ṭâwl ṭuk tah a, a ap bur ta hi.
Hieng uoin peng kan thunnahai khawm hi a thar an na, en hman ta u, an inek vawng ta hi. Hieng kan puonhai le kan kekawkhai khawm hi kan hungna a hla khawp a, an hlui vawng ta hi,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Josua chun anni le chun inremna a siem a, anni chu hlâ dingin an inkârah thuthlung a siem ta a, chun, a pungkhâwmhai laia mi lienhai khawm chun an kuomah ṭawng an inkhâm ta a.
Chun, an kuoma thu an thlung china inthawka ni thuma chun an khaw kâwlhnai, anni laia lo um ve zing hlakhai an nih ti an hriet suok ta a.
Chun, Israelhai chu an fe pei a, ni thum ni chun an khawpuihai chu an va tlung a. An khawpuihai chu Gibeon dâm, Kephira dâm, Beeroth dâm, Kiriath-Jearim dâm an nih.
Nisienlakhawm, mi lienhai po po chun pungkhâwmhai po po kuoma chun, “
Hieng ang hin an chungah thâwng ei ta, hla el ei tiu, chuong naw chun an kuoma ṭawng kan lo inkhâm ta leiin ei chunga hin lunginsenna hung tlung el a tih,” an ti a.
Josua chun anni chu ân kotir a, an kuomah, “Iengdinga, ‘Ram hlataka inthawka hung kan nih,’ tia in mi hlêm el am? Keini laia chêng ve in lo ni zing el si a.
Tuhin, ngai ta, i kuta um kan na, i ngaia ṭha le indika i hriet ang ang chun kan chunga hin thaw pei el rawh,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, an chunga chun chuong ang chun a thaw ta a, Israel mihaia inthawk chun a sansuok a, anni chu an that ta naw a.

Chun, Jerusalem lal, Adonizedek chun Josuain Ai khuo a lâk a, a suksiet dêr a, Jeriko le an lal a suksiet angin, Ai khuo le an lal khawm a suksiet dêr a, Gibeona mihai chun Israelhai le chun inremna an siem a, anni lai an chêng ve tah ti a lo hriet chun, a ṭi ta hle el a.
Gibeon chu khaw lientak, lal khawpui ang a ni si a, Ai khuo nêk chun a ropui lem a, mihriem po pohai khawm chu mi hrâttak an ni si a.
Chuongchun, Jerusalem khaw lal Adoni-zedek chun Hebron lal Hosham, Jarmuth lal Piram, Lakis lal Japhia le Eglon lal Debir hai chu,
“Hung unla, mi hung ṭhangpui ro khai, Gibeon hi va thawng ei tiu, Josua le Israel mihai leh inremna an siem ta si a,” tiin ân cha khâwm a.
Chuongchun, Amor mihai lalhai panga, Jerusalem lal, Hebron lal, Jarmuth lal, Lakis lal, le Eglon lal chu an pung khâwm a, an sipaihai po po leh an hang fe a, Gibeon epa chun an um a, an indopui ta a.

Chun, Gibeon mihai chun an riebûk Gilgalah, Josua kuomah mi an tir a, “I siehlawhai hi ngaitha naw raw khai; inhmawtakin kan kuomah hung vat la, mi hung sandam la, mi hung ṭhangpui rawh: tlâng rama chênghai Amor lalhai keini mi thaw dingin an inhâwrkhâwm a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Josua le a kuoma râl kâp mi po po le, mi hrât huoisenhai po po chu, Gilgala inthawk chun an hang fe a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, zânkhuoa Gilgala inthawka hang fein Josua chun thâwk lekhatin anni chu a thaw ta thut a.
Chun, Israel mihai hmaa an tlânsie a, Beth-horona inthawka liem thlâkna hmuna an um lai chun
Chuongchun,
“Nisa, Gibeon chungah ngîr zing rawh.
Nang khawm, thlapa, Aijalon ruoma hin um zing rawh”, a ta
Chun, Josua le Israel mihai po po chu Gilgala an riebûka chun an kîr nâwk vawng ta a.
Chuong lal pangahai chu an tlân hmang a, Makeda pûkah an inbi a.
Chun, “Lal pangahai chu hmu an ni tah, Makeda pûka inbi an nih,” ti Josua chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun, “Pûk kawtkhâra chun lung lientak tak inhlum unla, a vêngtuhai khawm inumtir ro.
Nangni ruok chu um naw unla, in hmêlmahai chu hnawt pei unla, a hnung dâlhai kha that unla, an khuoa hrim hrim inlûttir naw ro,
Chun, Josua le Israel mihaiin anni chu nasataka beiin an that a, an that zo deuthaw a, an that mahla tlâwmte chu an khaw kulhaiah an tlânlût hman a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun, “Pûk kawtkhâr kha hang hawng unla, lal pangahai kha pûka inthawkin ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro,” a ti a.
Chuong ang chun an thaw a, chu lal panga Jerusalem lal, Hebron lal, Jarmuth lal, Lakis lal le Eglon lal hai chu pûka inthawk chun a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
Chu zoa chun, Josua chun a thaw a, a sukhlum tâwl a, thing panga lêrah a khai a, chuongchun, zântieng chen chun thing lêra chun an inkhai a.
Nisa tlâka chun Josua chun thu a pêk a, thing lêra inthawk chun an lâk thlâk a, an inbîkna pûka khan an peilût a, pûk kawtkhâr chu lung lientak takin an sîn a, tu chen khawm hin a la um zing.

Josua chun chu ni chun Makeda chu a lâk a, a lal khawm kâwlhnâmin a thaw a, chu khuoa um po pohai le chun a sukhlum fai rêt a, pakhat khawm hla hrim hrim a nei nawh. Jeriko lal chunga a thaw ang bawk khan Makeda lal chunga khawm a thaw a.
Chun, Josua chu Israelhai po po leh Makeda khuoa inthawk chun Libna tieng an fe a, Libna chu an do a,

chuongchun, chu khuo chu an lal pumin Israelhai kutah a pêk nâwk bawk a; chun, chu khuo chu thawin a sûnga um po pohai chu kâwlhnâmin an sukhlum vawng a, a sûngah mi pakhat khawm hla hrim hrim an nei nawh; Jeriko khaw lal chunga an thaw ang bawk khan chu khaw lal chunga khawm chun an thaw a.
Chun, Josua chu Israelhai po po leh Libnaa inthawk chun Lakis tieng chun an fe a, ṭhanghmun an khuor a, an do ta a,
chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Gezer lal Horam chu Lakis ṭhangpui dingin a hung a, chun, Josua chun ama le a rawihai leh pakhat khawm hlâ hlek lovin a lo that rip a.
Chun, Josua chu Israelhai po po leh Lakis a inthawk chun Eglon tieng chun an fe a, ṭhanghmun an khuor a, an do ta a.
Chu ni ma chun an lâk a, chu ni ma chun chu khuo chu thawin a sûnga um po pohai kâwlhnâmin an sukhlum fai rêt a, Lakis chunga an thaw ang bawk khan.
Chun, Josua chu Israelhai po po leh Eglona inthawkin Hebron tieng an hang fe a, an do ta a,

chuongchun, an lâk ta a; chu khuo le a lal le a khawpui po po leh, a sûnga um po pohai chu kâwlhnâmin an thaw a, an sukhlum vawng a, Eglon chunga an thaw ang bawk khan pakhat khawm hlâ hrim hrim an nei naw a; a suksiet letdêr a, a mi umhai po po an sukhlum fai rêt a.
Chun, Josua le Israelhai po po chu Debir tieng chun an lêt nâwk a, an do a;

chuongchun, chu khuo le a lal le a khawpuihai po po chu an lâk a, chun, kâwlhnâmin an thaw a, a sûnga mi um po pohai chu an sukhlum fai rêt a, pakhat khawm hlâ hrim hrim an nei nawh; Hebron chunga thaw ang khan Debir le a lal chunga khawm an thaw a, Libna khuo le a lal chunga an thaw ang bawk khan.

Chuongchun, Josua chun a ram pumin, tlâng ram dâm, Sim ram dâm, phai ram dâm, ṭên pangpêr ram dâm chu sukse vawngin, an lal po pohai chu a sukhlum vawng a; pakhat bêk khawm hlâ hrim hrim a nei dêr nawh:
Chun, Josua chun Kades-Barneaa inthawkin Gaza chenin, Gosen ram po po leh Gibeon chenin a lâkpêk vawng a,
chuong lalhai po po le an ramhai chu
Chun, Josua le Israel mihai po po chu Gilgala an riebûkah an kir nâwk ta a.
Hazar lal Jabinin chu chu a lo hriet chun Madon lal Jobab hai, Simron lal hai, Aksaph lal hai,
hmartienga tlâng ram lalhai dâm, Kinneroth simtienga Araba lal hai, phai ram lal hai dâm, thlangtieng panga Dor tlâng sâng lal hai,
saktieng le thlangtienga um Kanaan mihai dâm, tlângrama um Amor mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Jebus mihai, Mizpa ram Hermon tlâng hnuoia umhai Hiv mihai kuoma dâm mi a tir a.
An sipai ruolhai leh mi tamtak, an tam tieng chu tuipui kama phaiphin zât zet, sakawr le tawlailîr tamtak leh an inthawk ta a.
Chuong lalhai po po chu an intuok khâwm a, Israelhai chu thaw tumin Merom tuiahai chun an riek khâwm a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Josua le râlkâp mihai po po chu Merom tuiahai chun an vân thawk ta phut el a, an baw ta a.
Chun,
Chuong lai chun Josua chu a hnungkîr a, Hazor chu a lâk a, an lal chu kâwlhnâmin a that a, kha hma khan chu Hazor chu chuong lai vêl ram po poa khawpui tak a nih.
Chu khuoa mi umhai po po chu kâwlhnâmin an that vawng a, an sukchimit dêr a, ân thuokthei taphawt chu pakhat khawm an hla nawh, chuongchun, Hazor chu meiin a raw ta a.
Chun, chuong lalhai khawpuihai po po le an lalhai po po chu Josua chun a lâk vawng a, kâwlhnâma thawin a that a, a sukchimit vawng a;
Amiruokchu, muolvûma khawpui lo umhai kha chu Hazor tilo chu Israelhai chun pakhat khawm an raw naw a, chu khuo ruok chu Josuain a raw a nih.

Chuong khawpuia an râllâkhai po po le ranhai chu Israelhai chun anni chanpuolah an nei a, mihriem ruok chu an sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chu kâwlhnâmin an that a, ân thuokthei taphawt chu hla an nei nawh.
Chuongchun, Josua chun chuong ram po po, tlâng ram dâm, sim ram po po dâm, Gosen ram po po dâm, phai ram dâm, Araba dâm, Israelhai tlâng ram dâm, an phai ramhai leh a lâk vawng a.
Seir tlâng hang khawtu Halak tlânga inthawka Hermon tlâng hnuoia Lebanon ruoma Baal-gad chenin; an lalhai po po chu a man a, a that a, a sukhlum vawng a.
Josua chun chuong lalhai po po chu sâwttak a do a nih.
Gibeon khuoa um Hiv mihai ti chau naw chu Israel mihai le inremna siem khuo hrim an um dêr naw a, doa an lâk vawng an nih.

Chuong lai chun Josua chu a fe a, tlâng rama inthawk dâmin, Hebrona inthawk dâmin, Debira inthawk dâmin, Anaba inthawk dâmin, Juda tlâng rama inthawk dâmin, Israel tlâng ram po poa inthawk dâmin, Anakim mihai chu a sukchimit vawng a, Josua chun an khawpuihai pumin a sukbohmang vawng a,
Israel thlahai rama chun Anakim mihai chu pakhat khawm um an um ta dêr naw a, Gazaa dâm, Gatha dâm, Asdoda dâm ruok chun chu a um an la um a.
Chuongchun,

Hienghai hi an nih chuong ram lal, Israelhaiin an sukbohmang a, an ram Jordan vadung râl, nisa suokna tieng ram, Arnon ruoma inthawka Hermon tlâng chen dâm, saktieng panga Araba po po le an ineipêk ram lalhai chu.

Amorhai lal Sihon, Hesbona um chun Arnon ruom sîra um Aroera inthawkin ro a rêl a na; chun, ruom laitaka khawpuihai, Ammon thlahai ramri Jabbok vadung chenin Gilead ram zâtve chunga chun a rêl bawk a.
Saktieng chun Arabaa Galili dîl chenin a ni a; chun, saktienga ma, Bethjesimoth fena lampui tienga Araba tuipui, Tuipui Thi chenin a nih, chun, simtienga chu Pisga pangpêr ṭên chenin a nih;
chun, Astaroth le Edrei khuoa um Rephaim hnam la um sunhai laia chun Basan lal Og chu ân lal a.

Chun, hieng ram lalhai hi an nih Josua le Israel nauhaiin Jordan vadung râl thlangtieng panga an thathai chu; Lebanon ruom Baalgada inthawka Seir tlâng hang khawtu Halak tlâng chenin, chun, Josua chun Israel hnamhai chu an inṭhe ang peiin chu ram chu an rochan dingin a pêk tâwl a,
tlâng rama dâm, phai rama dâm, Arabaa dâm, tlâng pangpêr rama dâm, thlalêr rama dâm, Sim rama dâm, chuong chu Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai le Jebus mihai ram kha a nih.
Jeriko lal pakhat; Bethel depa Ai khuo lal pakhat;
Jerusalem lal pakhat; Hebron lal pakhat;
Jarmuth lal pakhat; Lakis lal pakhat;
Eglon lal pakhat; Gezer lal pakhat;
Debir lal pakhat; Geder lal pakhat;
Horma lal pakhat; Arad lal pakhat;
Libna lal pakhat; Adullam lal pakhat;
Makeda lal pakhat; Bethel lal pakhat;
Tappua lal pakhat; Hepher lal pakhat;
Aphek lal pakhat; Lasaron lal pakhat;
Madon lal pakhat; Hazor lal pakhat;
Simron-meron lal pakhat; Aksaph lal pakhat;
Taanak lal pakhat; Megiddo lal pakhat;
Kedes lal pakhat; Karmel tlânga Jokneam lal pakhat;
Dor tlâng sang Dor lal pakhat; Galilia
Tirza lal pakhat; lal po po chu sâwmthum le pakhat an nih.
Josua chu a hung upa a, a hung tar ta hle el a; chun,
Hieng ramhai hi a nih lâk lo chu: Philistin mihai ram po pohai le, Gesur mihai ram po pohai,

(Aigupta ram bula um Sihora inthawka hmartieng panga Ekron ramri chenin, chu chu Kanaan mihai rama ngai a nih; Philistin mi panga, Gaza mihai, Asod mihai, Askelon mihai, Git mihai, Ekron mihai lalhai ram) le,
simtienga Avim ram khawm; Kanaan mihai ram po po le Sidon mihai rama Meara, Amor mihai ramri Aphek khuo chenin,
chun, Gebal mihai ram le nisa suokna tienga Lebanon ram po po, Hermon tlâng hnuoi Baal-gada inthawka Hamath khuo lûtna chenin;
Chuleiin, tuhin hi hnam kuohai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai rochanah sempêk rawh,” a ti a.
Arnon ruom sîra um Aroera inthawk le, ruom laitaka khawpui le, Medeba phai ram po po, Dibon chenin;
chun, mihai lal Sihon, Hesbona lala inṭhung khawpui po po Ammon mihai ramri chenin;
chun, Gilead ram le Gesur mihai le Maakat mihai ramri chin le Hermon tlâng po po le Basan ram po po, Salka chenin;
Astaroth le Edrei khuoa lala inṭhung Basan lal Og ram po po leh (ama chu Rephaim hnama la um sun chu a nih); chuonghai chu Mosie khan a lo thaw a, a lo hnawt suok tah a nih.
Gesur mihai le Maakat mihai ruok chu Israel mihai chun an hnawt suok nawh. Gesur mihai le Maakat mihai chu tu chen hin Israel mihai lai an la um ta zing lem a nih.
Reuben thlahai chu an sûngkuo izir ang peiin Mosie chun ram a lo pêk ta a.
An ramri chu Arnon ruom sîra um Aroer khuoa inthawka ruom laitaka khawpui le Medeba phai ram po po;
Hesbon le chu phai rama khawpui po po, Dibon le Bamoth-baal dâm, Beth-baal-meon dâm,
Jahaz dâm, Kedemoth dâm, Mephaath dâm,
Kiriathaim dâm, Sibma dâm, ruom tlânga Zereth-sahar dâm,
Beth-peor dâm, Pisga ṭên pang dâm, Beth-jesimoth dâm,

Chuong chu, phai ram khawpui po po dâm, Hesbona rorêla um Amor mihai lal Sihon ram po po dâm a nih; ama chu Mosiein, Midian mihai hotuhai Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur le Reba hai le chun a lo sukbohmang ta a; anni chu Sihon mihai ram sûnga lo chêng hrim an nih.
Beor naupa Balaam aisânthiem khawm Israel mihaiin mi dang an thathai laia chun kâwlhnâmin an that sa ve a.
Chun, Reuben mihai ram chin chu Jordan le a kam po po chu a nih. Hieng ram le khawpuihai le khuohai hi a nih Reuben thlahai ta dinga an sûngkuo izir peia rochana an ruot chu.
Mosie chun Gad chi, Gad mihai kuoma chun an sûngkuo izir ang peiin ram a pêk a.
An ramri chu Jazer le Gilead ram khawpui po po le Ammon mihai ram zâtve, Rabba saka um Aroer chenin,
Hesbona inthawka Ramathmizpa le Betonim chenin, Mahanaima inthawka Debir ramri chenin;
chun, ruoma chun Beth-haram dâm, Beth-nimra dâm, Sukkoth dâm, Zaphon dâm, Hesbon lal Sihon ram dang dâm, Jordan le a panghrûl vêl le, Jordan râl saktieng panga Kinnereth dil tâwp chenin a nih.
Hienghai hi a nih Gad mihai ta dinga an sûngkuo izir ang peia an rochana ruot chu, a khawpuihai le khuohai chu.
Mosie chun Manasse hnam zâtvehai chu rochan a pêk a, Manasse chi zâtve ta dingin an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a nih a pêk chu.
An ramri chu Mahanaima inthawkin Basan ram po po, Basan ram lal Og ram po po le Basan rama Jair khawpui po pohai leh, chu chu khaw sâwmruk a nih;
Gilead ram zâtve le Basan ram lal Og rama Astaroth dâm, Edrei khuohai leh; chuong chu Manasse nau Makir thla, Makir thla zâtvehai ta dingin, an sûngkuo izir ang peia a ruot a nih.
Hieng Moab phai Jeriko zâwn, Jordan râl saktieng panghai hi a nih Mosiein an rochan dinga a lo sem chu.
Hienghai hi a nih Israel nauhaiin Kanaan ram an lâk, thiempu Eleazar hai, Nun naupa Josua hai, Israel nauhai hnam sûngkaw puipahaiin an rochan dinga an lo semhai chu.
Josef thlahai chu hnam hni an na, Manasse le Ephraim chu; Levi chihai chu chu rama chun chanpuol an pêk ve nawh, an umna ding khawpuihai le a khawkâwl vêl ran ruol tlatna hmun ding ti chau naw chu.
Amiruokchu, ka unau kei le fe vehai khan mipuihai lungril an suktuipêk a, kei ruok chun chu
Ngai ta,
Chuong sa khawm chun tu chen hin Mosiein a mi tir lai ang el khan ka la hrât zing a, inhmaa indona ding le suok invâkna dinga thahrui ka nei ang khan tu khawm hin ka la nei zing i sawnnaw.
Chuongchun, hi tlâng
Chuongchun, Josua chun ama chu mal a sâwm a; Jephunne naupa Kaleb chu a rochan dingin Hebron chu a pêk ta a.
Chuleiin, Hebron chu tu chen hin Keniz mi, Jephunne naupa Kaleb rochan a hung ni tah a nih,
Hebron khuo hming chu a hma chun Kiriath-arba a na, Arba chu Anakim mihai laia mi lientak a nih. Chuongchun, ram chu râlmuongin a um hri taphawt a.
Juda thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu Edom ramri chin simtieng pang, Zin thlalêr tlung rakin, sim tâwp chenin a va nih.
Simtieng panga an ramri chu Tuipui thi tâwp chen, sim sawng likilkawia inthawkin a nih;
chun Akrabim fena simtieng panin a fe pei a, Zin a va tlung a, chun, Kades-barnea simtieng khan a fe a, Hezron a va tlung a, chun Adara khan a tungin a fe a, Karka a kuolkhum a,
Chun, Azmonah a fe pei a, Aigupta vadungah a suok a; chun, Mediterranean tuipuiah ramri chu a tâwp a. Chu chu simtieng panga in ramri ding chu nîng a tih.
Chun, saktieng pang ramri chu Tuipui Thi, Jordan suo tak chu a nih. Hmartieng pang ramri chu likilkawi, Jordan suoa inthawkin a nih;
chun, ramri chu Beth-hoglaah a tungin a fe a, Beth-araba hmârah a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu Reuben naupa Bohan lunga chun a fe pei a;
chun, ramri chu Akor ruoma inthawkin Debira chun a fe pei a, chun, vadung simtienga um Adummima hang fena depa Gilgal tieng panin hmârtieng a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu En-rogelah a suok a nih;

chun, ramri chu Hinnom naupa ruoma Jebus mihai ram sîr simtieng (chu chu Jerusalem a nih) chenin a fe pei a, chun, ramri chu Hinom thlangtieng panga ruom bula um tlâng sîpah a fe a, chu chu Rephaim hmârtieng pang ruom tâwp tak a nih,
chun, ramri chu tlâng sîpa inthawkin Nephtoa vadung tuihai chenin an infetir a; Ephron tlângah khawpuiahai chun a fe pei a; chun, ramri chu Baala-ah (chu chu Kiriath-Jearim a nih) an infetir a;

chun, ramri chu Baala-ah inthawk chun thlangtieng panga Seir tlâng chenin ân kuol thla nâwk a; hmârtieng panga Jearim (chu chu Kesalon a nih) tlâng hrûlah a fe pei a; Beth-Semesah a suok a, Timnaah a fe pei a;

chun, ramri chu hmârtieng panga Ekron hrûla chun a fe suok a, chun, ramri chu Sikkeronah an infetir a; chun, Baala tlângah a fe pei a, Jabneelah a fe thla a, chuongchun, ramri chu Mediterranean tuipuiah a va tâwp a.
Chun, thlangtieng pang ramri chu Mediterranean Tuipui le a kam po chu a nih. Chu chu a nih Juda mihai an sungkuo izir ang peia ruot ramri chu.
Jephunne naupa Kaleb chu
Chutaka inthawk chun Debira mihai a hang rûn a; a hma chun Debir hming chu Kiriath-sepher a nih.
Kaleb chun, “Tukhawm Kiriathsepher hang thaw a, hang la thei taphawt chu ka naunu Aksa hi nuhmeiah inneitir ka tih,” a ti a.
Kaleb unau Kenaz naupa Othniel chun a hang lâk a; chuongchun, a nau- nu Aksa chu nuhmeiah ân neitir ta a.
Aksa chu Othniel kuom a va tlung chun, ram hni dingin a thlêm a, a sabengtunga inthawk chu a ṭum a; Kaleb chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i dit a?” a lo ti a.
Ama chun, “Mal mi sâwm rawh, simtieng rama i mîn umtir ta si hin chu tui hnâr neihai khawm mi pe sa rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, tui hnâr nei sakhnunghai le tui hnâr nei thlanghnunghai chu a pêk ta a.
Juda thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an rochan chu hieng hi a nih:
Sim tâwpa Edom ramri va deptu, Juda thlahai hnam khawpui hmawrtawnghai chu Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedes, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem, Bealoth,
Hazor-Hadatta, Kerioth-hezron, (chu chu Hazor a nih),
Amam, Sema, Molada,
Hazar-gada, Hesmon, Bethpelet,
Hazar-sual, Beerseba, Biziothia,
Baala, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Kesil, Horma,
Ziklag, Madmanna, Sansanna,
Lebaoth, Silhim, Ain le Rimmon hai hi a nih; khawpui po po chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmhni pakuo a nih.
Chun, phai ram tienga chun Estaol, Zora, Asna,
Zanoa, En-gannim, Tappua, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Soko, Azeka,
Saaraim, Adithaim, Gedera le Gederothaim, khawpuihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmpali a nih.
Zenan, Hadasa, Migdal-gad,
Dilean, Mizpe, Joktheel,
Lakis, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahmam, Kitlis,
Gederoth, Beth-dagon, Naama le Makeda khawpuihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh sâwmparuk a nih.
Libna, Ether, Asan,
Iphta, Asna, Nezib,
Keila, Akzib le Maresa, khawpuihai chu a sîrvêl khuohai leh pakuo a nih.
Ekron le a sîrvêl khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu:
Ekrona inthawka Mediterranean Tuipui chen hielin Asdod hrûla umhai po po a khaw chînhai leh.
Asdod le a sîrvêla khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu: Gaza le a sîrvêl khuohai le a khaw chînhai chu; Aigupta vadung le Mediterranean Tuipui le a kam chenin.
Chun, tlâng ram tieng chun Samir, Jattir, Soko,
Danna, Kiriath-sanna (chu chu Debir a nih);
Anab, Estemo, Anim,
Gosen, Holon, Gilo, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh sâwmpakhat a nih.
Arab, Duma, Esan,
Janim, Beth-tappua, Apheka,
Humta, Kiriath-arba (chu chu Hebron a nih) le Zior; khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh pakuo a nih.
Maon, Karmel, Ziph, Jutta,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa,
Kain, Gibea le Timna, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh sâwm a nih.
Halhul, Beth-zur, Gedor;
Maarath, Beth-anoth, Eltekon, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh paruk a nih.
Kiriath-baal (chu chu Kiriath-Jearim) a nih; Rabba dâm, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh khaw hni a nih.
Thlalêr tienga chun Betharaba, Middin le Sekaka,
Nibsan, Machi khawpui le, En-gedi, khawpuihai chu a khaw chînhai leh paruk a nih.
Chun, Josef thlahai chanpuol chu, Jeriko zâwn, Jordana inthawkin thlalêr kâwl, saktieng panga Jeriko tuiahai chun a suok a; Jerikoa inthawk chun tlâng ramah Bethel chenin a hang fe pei a;
chun, Bethela inthawk chun Luzah a suok a, Arka mihai ramriah Ataroth chenin a fe pei a,
chun, thlangtieng panga chun Japhleti mihai ramri Beth-horon thlanghnung lem ramri, Gezer chenin a fe thla a, chu chu tuisuorietah a suok a.
Chuongchun, Josef nauhai Manasse le Ephraim chihai chun chanpuolah an nei a.
Chun, an sûngkuo izir ang peia Ephraim thlahai ramri chu hieng ang hi a nih: saktieng panga an chanpuol ramri chu Ataroth-adar a nih, Bethhoron sakhnung lem chenin,
chun, ramri chu Mikmethath hmârah thlangtieng pangah a suok a; chun, ramri chu saktieng pangah Taanath-silo chenin a kîr a, Janoa saktieng a fe pei a;
chun, Janoaa inthawk chun Atarotha dâm, Naara dâm, a fe thla pei a, Jeriko a tlung a, Jordanah a suok a,
Tappuaa inthawkin ramri chu thlangtieng pangah Kana vadungte chenin a fe a; chu chu Mediterranean Tuipuiah a suok a, chuong chu a nih, Ephraim thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu,
Manasse thlahai chanpuol laia Ephraim thlahai ta dinga khawpui ruot hranpêkhai leh, a khawpuihai po po le a khuo chînhai le chun.

Chun, chanpuol chu Manasse hnam, an sûngkuo izir ang peiin, Abiezer nauhai, Helek nauhai, Asriel nauhai, Sekem nauhai, Hepher nauhai le Semida nauhai ta ding dâmin pêk a nih; chuonghai chu an sûngkuo izir ang peia Josef naupa Manasse naupasalhai chu an nih.

Manasse naupa Makir, chu naupa Gilead, chu naupa Hepher, chu naupa Zelophehad ruok chun naupasal nei lovin naunuhmei ruok a nei a; chuong a naunuhmeihai hming chu: Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka le Tirza an nih.
Chuongchun, Jordan râla Gilead le Basan ram tiem lovin Manasse chanpuolah hmun sâwm a tlu a;
Manasse naunuhmeihai chun a naupasalhai laia chun chanpuol an nei ve lei a nih. Gilead ram chu Manasse naupasal danghai chun an chang a.
Chun, Manasse ramri chu Sekem saktienga um Asera inthawka Mikmethath chenin a nih; ramri chu simtieng panga chun En-tappua mihai umna chenin a fe a.
Tappua ram chu Manasse ta a na, Manasse ramri depa Tappua ruok kha chu Ephraim thlahai ta a nih.

Chun, ramri chu Kana vadungteah, vadungte simtieng panga chun a fe thla a, chuong khawpuihai chu Manasse khawpuihai laia, Ephraim ta a nih. Manasse ramri chu vadungte hmârtieng panga chun a nih; chun, tuisuorietah a fe thla a.
Simtieng pang chu Ephraim ta a na, hmârtieng pang chu Manasse ta a na, Mediterranean Tuipui chu a ramri a nih, hmârtienga chun Aser chenin a va ni a, saktienga chun Issakar chenin a hang nih.

Issakar le Aser rama chun Manasse chun Beth-sean le a sîrvêl khuohai, Ibleam le a sîrvêl khuohai, Dora umhai le a sîrvêl khuohai, En-dora umhai le a sîrvêl khuohai, Taanaka umhai le a sîrvêl khuohai, Megiddoa umhai le a sîrvêl khuohai, zo khawsâng pathumhai chu a nei a.
Nisienlakhawm, Manasse thlahai chun chuong khawpuia umhai chu an hnawt suok thei naw a, Kanaan mihai chu chuong rama chun an um tlat el a.
Josef thlahai chun Josua kuomah, “Iengtiziea rohluo ding chanpuol pakhat le chan khat chau i mi pêk bîk am a na,
Josua chun an kuomah, “Chuonga tam in ni chun, Periz mihai le Rephaim mihai ram rampuihai khi, fe unla, in umna dingin hang vât ta unla, Ephraim tlâng ram in ta dinga a chîn taluo chun,” a ti a.
Josef nauhai chun, “Tlâng ram hi kan ta dingin a hun naw a nih, phai rama Kanaan mi chênghai po po, Beth-sean le a khawpuia umhai le Jezreel ruoma umhai hin thîr tawlailîr an nei seng si a,” an ti a.
Josua chun Josef sûnghai, Ephraim le Manasse thlahai kuoma chun, “In tam hle a, hrât khawm in hrât a; chuongchun, chan khat chau chu nei da ti niu ie,

tlâng ram khi in ta ni el raw se, rampui khawm ni sienla, vât in ta, a ram chin po po chu in ta a ni el ding annâwm; Kanaan mihai chun thîr tawlailîrhai neiin, hrât hle hai sien khawm, in la hnawt suok ding annâwm,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Israel mipui pungkhâwmhai po po chu Silo khuoah an inkhâwm ta a, chutaka chun inbiekna puonin an zar a; ram chu an thu hnuoiah a hung um ta a.
Israel thlahai lai chun an chanpuol la pêk ve lo hnam sari an la um a.

Hnam hran hran laia mi pathum seng inthlang suok unla, anni chu lo tir ka ta, anni chu inthawk an ta, ram chu va fang an ta, an chanpuol ding huntâwk ang sengin va ziek an ta, chun, ka kuomah hung kîr nâwk an tih.
Hmun sariah ṭhe phawt an ta, Judahai chu simtieng an chanpuolah um an ta; chun, Josef sûnghai chu hmârtiengah an chanpuolah um an tih.
Ram chu hmun sariah va ṭhe unla, ziek chu mi hung pe ro; chuongchun, hitaka hin
Levi mihai hin chu chu nangni lai chanvo an nei ve naw a,

Chuongchun, chuong mihai chu an inthawk suok ta a, chun, ram chanchin va ziek suok dinghai chu Josua chun, “Ram chu va fang unla, hung ziek suok unla, ka kuomah hung intlun nâwk unla, hitaka Silo khuoa hin
Chun, mihai chu an fe a, ram chu an va fang a, hmun sariah an ṭhe a, lekhabuah a khuoin an ziek suok a, riebûk Siloa chun Josua kuomah an fe nâwk a.
Josua chun Siloa chun
Ṭhumvâwr chu Benjamin thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peiin an chungah a tla ta a; chun, an ramri chin chu Juda thlahai le Josef thlahai inkâr kha a nih.

Hmârtieng panga an ramri chin chu Jordana inthawkin a na; chun, ramri chu Jeriko sîrah hmârtieng pangah a hang fe pei a, thlangtieng panga chun tlâng ramah a hang fe pei a, ramri tâwpna chu Beth-aven thlalêrah a nih.

Chun, ramri chu chutaka inthawk chun Luz tieng, Luz (chu chu Bethel a nih) sîrah, simtieng pangah a fe pei a, chun, ramri chu Beth-horon thlanghnung lem simtieng panga tlâng hrûlah Astaroth-adarah a fe thla a.

Chun, ramri chu a fe pei a, Beth-horon simtieng panga tlâng bula inthawk chun thlangtienga chun simtieng pangah ân kuol phei a; chu chu Kiriath-baal (chu chu Kiriath-Jearim a nih) Juda thlahai khawpuiah a tâwp a, chu chu thlangtieng pangah ramri chu a nih.
Chun, simtieng panga ram chu Kiriath-Jearim tâwpa inthawkin a nih, chun, ramri chu thlangtienga chun a suok a, Nephtoa vadung tuiahai chun a fe pei a;
chun, ramri chu Rephaim hmârtieng ruomah Hinnom naupa ruom bula tlâng hmawra chun a fe thla a; chuongchun, Jebushai sîrah, simtieng panga Hinnom ruomah a fe thla a; chun, En-rogelah a fe thla a;
chun, hmârtieng zâwngin Ensemesah a fe a, Adummim hang fena dep Gelilotha khan a fe a, chun, Reuben naupa Bohan lungah a fe thla a;
chun, Araba sîr hmârtieng pangah a fe pei a, Arabaa chun a fe thla a;
chun, ramri chu Beth-hogla sîr, hmârtieng pangah a fe pei a; chun, ramri tâwpna chu Jordan sim tâwp, Tuipui Al hmâr likilkawia khan a nih, chu chu simtieng ramri a nih.
Chun, Jordan chu saktieng rama ramri tâwp a nih. Chu chu a nih Benjamin hnam an sûngkuo ang peia an chanpuol ramin a huom sûng chu.
Chuongchun, Benjamin thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peia an khawpuihai chu Jeriko, Beth-hogla, Emek-keziz,
Beth-araba, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avim, Para, Ophra,
Kephar-amoni, Ophni, Geba, khawpui sâwmpahni a khaw chînhai leh;
Gibeon, Rama, Beeroth,
Mizpe, Kephira, Moza,
Rekem, Irpeel, Tarala,
Zela, Eleph, Jebus, (chu chu Jerusalem a nih), Gibeah le Kiriath an nih; khawpui sâwmpali a khaw chînhai leh. Hieng hi a nih Benjamin nauhai an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu.
Chun, ṭhumvâwr pahnina chu Simeon chungah, Simeon thlahai chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu ta a; an chanpuol chu Juda thlahai chanpuol lai khan a ṭhang ve a nih.
An chanpuola tluhai chu, Beerseba, Seba, Molada,
Hazar-sual, Bala, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Horma,
Ziklag, Beth-markaboth, Hazarsusa,
Beth-lebaoth le Saruhen, khawpui sâwmpathum a khaw chînhai leh.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether le Asan; khawpui pali a khaw chînhai leh;
Simeon nauhai chanpuol chu Juda nauhai chanpuol laia mi a nih; Juda nauhai chanpuol chu anni ta dingin a lien taluo si a; chuleiin, Simeon thlahai chanpuol chu an chan lai khan a ṭhang ve a nih.
Chun, ṭhumvâwr pathumna chu Zebulun thlahai chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tla ta a; an chanpuol ramri chu Sarid chenin a nih;
Sarida inthawkin saktieng pangah nisa suokna tieng pangah Kisloth-tabor ramri chenin a hang kâwi a; Daberathah a suok a, Japhiaa chun a fe pei a;
chun, chutaka inthawk chun saktieng pangah Gitta-hepher le Ethkazinah a fe pei a; Nea tieng panin Rimmonah a suok a;
chun, ramri chu hmârtienga chun Hannathon-ah ân kuol phei a, Iphtahel ruomah a suok a,
chun, Kattath, Nahalal, Simron, Idala le Bethlehem; khawpui sâwmpahni a khaw chînhai leh.
Chuong chu a nih Zebulun thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu; chuong khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Ṭhumvâwr palina chu Issakar chungah, Issakar thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tla ta a;
an ramri chin chu Jezreel, Kesulloth le Sunem,
Hapharaim Sion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kision, Ebez;
Remeth, En-gannim, En-hadda le Beth-pazez chenin a nih;
ramri chu Tabor, Sahazuma le Beth-semes a va tlung a nih; chuongchun, an ramri suokna chu Jordanah a nih; khawpui sâwmparuk, a khaw chînhai leh.
Chuong chu a nih Issakar nauhai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu, khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Ṭhumvâwr pangana chu Aser thlahai hnam chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tla ta a.
An ramri chin chu Helkath, Hali, Beten, Aksaph,
Allammelek, Amad le Misal an nih; thlangtieng panga chun Karmel le Sihor-libnath a zu tlung a;
chun, nisa suokna tieng panga chun Beth-dagonah an kuol a, chun, Zebulun le hmârtieng pangah Iphtahel ruomah Bethemek le Neiel a va tlung a, chun, hmârtieng panga chun fe peiin Kabul,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kana le Sidon ropui tlung zakin a fe pei a;
chun, ramri chu Ramaa le Tura khawpui kul neia chun ân kuol phei a; chun, ramri chu Hosaah ân kuol phei pei a, chuongchun, Akzib ram Medirerranean Tuipuiah a tâwp a.
Umma, Aphek le Rehob, khaw sâwmhni pahni le a khaw chînhai leh,
Chuong chu a nih Aser nauhai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, chuong khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Ṭhumvâwr parukna chu Naphtali thlahai chungah an sûngkuo izir ang pei bawkin Naphtali thlahai chung ngeiah a tla ta a.
An ramri chin chu Helepha inthawk dâm, Zanannima thingsaisuoa inthawk dâm, Adami-nekeb le Jabneela inthawka Lakkum chenin a nih; chun, a suokna chu Jordanah a nih;

chun, ramri chu thlangtieng panga chun Aznoth-taborah a fe thla a; chutaka inthawkin Hukkokah a fe a; chun, simtienga chun Zebulun a va tlung a, thlangtienga chun Aser a tlung a, chun, nisa suokna tienga chun Juda rama Jordan a hang tlung a.
Chun, khawpui kul nei mihai chu Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Kinnereth,
Adama, Rama, Hazor,
Kedes, Edrei, En-hazor,
Iron, Migdal-el, Horem, Bethanath le Beth-semes an nih; khawpui sâwmpakuo a khaw chînhai leh,
Chuong chu a nih Naphtali thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Ṭhumvâwr pasarina chu Dan thlahai hnam chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu ta a.
An chanpuol ramri chu Zora, Estaol, Ir-semes,
Saalabin, Aijalon, Ithla,
Elon, Timna, Ekron,
Elteke, Gibbethon, Baalat,
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gathrimmon,
Me-jarkon, Rakkon, Joppa dep ramhai le khan an nih.
Chuong chu a nih Dan thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, chuong khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai le chun.
Chuongchun, an chanpuol ding anga ramri siem ang peiin ram chu an lo sem zo ta a; chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun Nun naupa Josua chu anni lai chanpuol an siempêk ve a;
Chuonghai chu a nih thiempu Eleazar hai, Nun naupa Josua hai le Israel thlahai hnam sûngkuo upahaiin Siloa
“Israel thlahai kuoma hin thu hril la, ‘Inhumhimna khuohai siem ro khai, Mosie hmanga in kuoma ka hril ta kha,
tukhawm inringlâwk lova mî lo that paltu chu chutaka chun a tlân lût theina dingin; chuongchun, thisen phuba latua inthawka in ta dinga inhumhimna a ni ding a nih.

Chuong khawpuihai laia a ienga mani chun tlân a ta, khawpui kul kawtkhâr lûtnaa chun va ngîr a ta, chu khaw upahai na hrietah a chanchin chu intlun a tih; anni chun khaw sûngah an kuomah ṭhuoi lût an ta, anni laia a chêng ve theina dingin umna ding ruotpêk an tih.
Chun, thisen phuba latu chun ama chu a hung hnawt chun a thattu chu a kutah an lo pêk ding a ni nawh, a tuolbâwm chu inringlâwk lova a that a na, a hmain theidana a nei si naw a.

Mipui hmaa rorêl pêka um dinga a ngîr hmakhat le chuong lai huna thiempu lala um chu a thi hmakhat chun chu khuoa chun a um zing ding a na, chu hnunga chun mi thattu chu ama khaw sûng ngei, a tlânsuokna khuo, ama insûnga ngei chun a lût nâwk ding a nih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Naphtali tlâng rama Galilia Kades, Ephraim tlâng rama Sekem le Juda tlâng rama Kiriath-arba (chu chu Hebron a nih) chu an ruot ta a.
Saktienga Jordan vadung râla chun Jeriko saktieng Reuben hnam rama thlalêr phaizâwla Bezer, Gad hnam Gilead rama Ramoth le Manasse hnam rama Basan rama Golan chu an ruot ta a.
Chun, Levi chia mi sûngkuo tin lû tak peihai chu thiempu Eleazar kuoma le Nun naupa Josua kuoma le Israel hnama sûngkuo tin lusahai kuoma chun an va fe a,
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun

Ṭhumvâwr chu Kohath sûngkuohai chungah a tla a, chuongchun, thiempu Aron thla Levi chihai chun Juda hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Simeon hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Benjamin hnam chanpuola mi dâm khawpui sâwmpathum ṭhumvâwrin an chang ve a.
Kohath sûngkuo danghai chun Ephraim hnam thlahai chanpuola mi dâm, Dan hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola mi dâm khawpui sâwm ṭhumvâwrin an chang ve ta a.
Gerson thlahai chun Issakar hnam thlahai chanpuola mi dâm, Basan rama Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola mi dâm khawpui sâwmpathum ṭhumvâwrin an chang ve ta a.
Merari thlahai chun an sûngkuo izir ang peiin Reuben hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Gad hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Zebulun hnam chanpuola mi dâm khawpui sâwmpahni an chang ve a.
Israel thlahai chun
Juda thlahai hnam chanpuola mi dâm, Simeon thlahai hnam chanpuola mi dâm, chu an pêk a, hieng khawpui an hming hitaka hrilhai hi;
Chuonghai chu Levi chihai laia mi, Kohath sungkuo laia pakhat, Aron nauhai chunga ṭhum vâwr tla hmasatak a nih.
Chun, Juda tlâng rama Kiriatharba (chu chu Hebron) le a khaw kâwlvêlhai chu an pêk a. Arba chu Anak pa a nih.
Chun, thiempu Aron thlahai chu Hebron, mi thattuhai inhumhimna khawpui le, a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Libna le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Jattir le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Estemoa le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Holon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Debir le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh,
Ain le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Jutta le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Bethsemes le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh; chuong hnam hnihai chanpuola inthawka khawpui pakuohai chu an pêk a.
Chun, Benjamin hnam chanpuola mi chu Gibeon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Geba le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Anathoth le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Almon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pali an pêk bawk a.
Aron thla thiempuhai khawpui po po chu sâwmpathum a nih, a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh.
Levi chi Kohath thlahai sûngkuo, Kohath thla danghai khawma an chanpuol khawpuihai chu Ephraim hnam chanpuola mi kha a nih an nei chu.
Mi thattuhai inhumhimna khawpui Ephraim tlâng rama Sekem chu a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, Gezer le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Kibzaim le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Beth-horon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh khawpui pali an pêk a.
Dan chanpuola mi Elteke le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Gibbethon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Aijalon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Gath-rimmon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pali;
Manasse hnam zâtvehai chanpuola mi Ta-anak le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Gath-rimmon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pahni.
Kohath thla danghai hnam khawpui po po chu khaw sâwm a nih, a khaw kâwlvêla a ran tlatna hmunhai leh.

Levi chia mi Gerson hnamhai chu Manasse hnam zâtvehai chanpuola mi, mi thattuhai inhumhimna khawpui, Basan rama Golan chu a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, Be-estera le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pahni an pêk a.
Issakar hnam chanpuola mi Kison le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Daberath le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Jarmuth le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, En-gannim le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh; khawpui pali;
Aser hnam chanpuola mi Misal le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Abdon le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Helkath le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Rehob le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pali;
Naphtali hnam chanpuola mi, mi thattuhai inhumhimna khawpui Galili rama Kadesh chu a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, Hamoth-dor le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Kartan le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pathum;
Gersonhai chu an sûngkuo izir ang peiin an chanpuol khawpui po po chu khawpui sâwmpathum a nih, a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh.
Levi chi, Merari sûngkuo ta dinga an pêk po chu Zebulun hnam chanpuola inthawkin Jokneam le a kâwlvêla ran tlatna hmunhai, Karta le a khaw kâwlvêla ran tlatna hmunhai leh;
Dimna le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Nahalal le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pali;
Reuben hnam chanpuola mi Bezer le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Jahaz le a khaw kâwlvêlhai,
Kedemoth le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, Mephaath le a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, khawpui pali,
Gad hnam chanpuola mi, mi thattuhai inhumhimna khawpui, Gilead rama Ramoth, a khaw kâwlvêlhai Mahanaim a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh,
Hesbon a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh, Jazer le a khaw kâwlvêlhai, a rêngin khawpui pali.
Chuong po po chu Levi chia chanpuol la chang ve lo Merari sûngkuo chan dinga khawpui an pêk po chu an nih; a rêngin khawpui sâwmpahni a nih.
Israel thlahai chanpuola mi Levi chihai khawpui po po chu khawpui sâwmli le pariet a nih, a khaw kâwlvêlhai leh.
Chuong khawpuihai chun khaw kâwlvêl a nei seng a, chuong khawpui po po chu chuong ang vawng chu an nih.
Chuongchun,
Chun,
Chuongchun, Josua chun, Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtve hai chu a ko a,
hi chen hin, vawisûn ni chen hin in unauhai chu in thlathlam naw a,
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Josua chun anni chu mal a sâwm a, ân fetir ta a; chuongchun, an puon inhai tieng chun an fe ta a.

Tun Manasse hnam zâtvehai kha Mosie chun Basan ramah chanpuol a pêk a; a zâtve danghai ruok kha chu Josua chun thlang tienga Jordan râla an unauhai lai chanpuol a pêk lem a. Josua chun an in tienga ân fetir ding lai khan mal a sâwm a,

an kuomah, “In puon inhai tieng chun hausatakin fe ta unla, ran tamtak leh, tangka dâm, rângkachak le dâm, dâr le dâm, thîr le dâm, silfên tamtakhai le dâm, in hmêlmahaia inthawka in râllâkhai kha in unauhai leh insem seng ro,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai chu an kîr nâwk ta a. Kanaan ram Silo khuoa Israel thlahai kuoma inthawk chun Gilead ram,
Chun, Kanaan ram Jordan biel an va tlung chun Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai chun Jordan vadung panga chun maichâm lientak el langsârtak hi an siem a.

Chun, Israel thla mi danghai chun, “Ngai ta u, Reuben mihai le, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai khan Kanaan ram bultak Jordan biel, Israel thlahai ram tieng pangah maichâm an siem a,” tia mî hril an hriet a.
Chun, chu chu Israel thlahai chun an lo hrietin Israel mipui po po chu anni hang do ding chun Silo khuoa chun an inkhâwm ta a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun Gilead rama Reuben mihai le, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai kuoma chun Thiempu Eleazar naupa Phinehas an tir a;
ama le chun mi lien sâwm, Israelhai hnam laia sûngkuo lusa tak pakhat pei leh. Chuonghai chu Israel hnamhai laia an sûngkuo lusa takhai pei an nih.
Chun, Reuben mihaihai le Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai kuoma chun Gilead ramah an hang fe ta a,
vawisûn hin
Amiruokchu, in ram hluo hi ân thieng naw a ni chun,
Chuongchun, Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai chun Israelhai hnam puipa chu an dawn a,
Nakie pha chun in thlahaiin kan thlahai kuomah, ‘
Nangni Reuben mihai le Gad mihai,
Chuleiin, ‘Hung ta u, maichâm siem ei tiu, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna ding le inthâwina ding ruok chu ni lovin,
Chu nawa khawm, nakie pha kan kuoma manih, kan thlahai kuoma manih chuong anga an la hung ti pha leh keinin, ‘En ta unla, kan thlatuhaiin
Chun, thiempu Phinehas le a kuoma um mipuihai mi lien, Israel hnama lusahai chun Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse mihai thuhril an hriet chun anni a suklâwm ta hle a.
Chun, thiempu Eleazar naupa Phinehas chun Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse mihai kuoma chun, “

Chuongchun, thiempu Eleazar naupa Phinehas le mi lienhai chu Reuben mihai le Gad mihai kuoma inthawk chun Gilead rama inthawk chu Kanaan ram tienga Israelhai kuom tienga chun an kîr nâwk a, thu chu an vân tlun nâwk ta a.
Chun, Reuben mihai le Gad mihai chun chu maichâm chu Ed
Kum ieng zât lai amanih ân vawi a, Israelhai chu an kâwlvêla hmêlma po pohaia inthawk muongna
Josua chun Israel mipuihai po po, an upahai le an lusahai le, an rorêltuhai le an hotuhai chu ân kotir a, an kuomah, “Kei chu ka upain ka lo tar ta a,
Ngai ta u, hieng hnam a la umhai hi, hieng hnam ka sukbo tahai po po ramhai le hin, Jordana inthawka nisa tlâkna tieng Mediterranean tuipui tlung rakin in chihai rochanah ka ruotpêk cheu a nih.
Chun,
Chuleiin, Mosie dân lekhabua ziek po pohai hi changtienga manih, vawitienga manih in pêtsan nawna dingin huoitakin pawm unla, thaw bawk ro;
hieng hnam nangni laia la umhai le hin inchekpawl lovin an pathienhai hming khawm lam hlek lova, an hming sâla ṭawng khawm inkhâm lova an rawng khawm bâwl lova, kûna chibai inbûk nawna dingin,
vawisûn chena in la thaw zing ang hin,
Chuongchun,
Chuong naw chun, in nghatsan hlau a, hieng hnam la umhai, nangni laia la chêng zinghai hi in inkawppui a, anni le nuhmei pasal in innei a, anni chu in pâwl a, anni khawma an pâwl vai cheu chun,
Chun, ngai ta u, tuhin leihnuoi po po dân angin, ka fe ve ding a ni tah a nih,
Amiruokchu,
Chun, Josua chun Israel hnamhai po po chu Sekema chun a ko khâwm a. Israelhai upahai, an lusahai, an rorêltuhai, an hotuhai chu ân kotir a; Pathien hmaah an hung inlang tâwl a.

Chun, in thlatuhai chu Aigupta rama inthawkin ka ṭhuoi suok a; chun, tuipui in va tlung a, chuongchun, Aigupta mihai chun in thlatuhai chu tawlailîr le sakawr chung chuong mihai leh Tuipui Sen chenin an hnawt a.
Chun, Moab lal Zippor naupa Balak a hung inthawk a, Israel mihai chu a lo do a, chun, Beor naupa Balaam kha ṭawngsie inphurtir ding cheuin ân kotir a,
Chuleiin,
Chun,
Chun, mipuihai chun, “
ama
Chuongchun,
Josua ruok chun mipuihai kuoma chun, “
Chun, mipuihai chun Josua kuomah, “Ni lo e,
Chun, Josua chun mipuihai kuomah, “A rawng bâwl tumin
Chun, ama ma chun, “Chuong chu a ni chun, tûn nangni laia hnam dang pathien umhai chu sie hmang dai unla, in lungrilhai chu
Chun, mipuihai chun, Josua kuomah, “
Chuongchun, Josua chun chu ni chun mipuihai kuomah thu a thlung a, Sekem khuoa chun dân le rorêlna a ruotpêk a.
Chuongchun, Josua chun chuong thu chu Pathien dân buah a ziek a, chun, lung lientak a lâk a,
Chun, Josua chun mipuihai po po kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, hi lung hi ei thuhretu ni raw se,
Chuongchun, Josua chun mipuihai chu anni chanpuol ram senga khan ân fetir ta a.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Nun naupa Josua,
Chun, Josua dam sûng le, upahai Josua hnunga la damhai,
Chun, Aron naupa Eleazar chu a thi a, a naupa Phinehas puol dinga an pêk Ephraim tlâng rama Gibea khuoa chun an phûm ta a.
Juda chun a unau Simeon kuomah, “Kanaan mihai hang thaw dingin ka ram bituma hin hung ve la, kei khawm i ram bitumah hung vêng ka tih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, Simeon chun a fepui ta a.
Juda chu a hang fe a; chuongchun, Kanaan mihai le Periz mihai chu an kutah
Bezeka chun Adoni-bezek an hang hmu a; an thaw a, Kanaan mihai le Periz mihai chu an that ṭeu a.
Adoni-bezek ruok chu a tlân a; nisienlakhawm, an hnawt a, an man a, a kutpuihai le a kepuihai an tanpêk a.

Adoni-bezek chun, “Lal sâwmsari kutpui le kepui tan bawnga umhai chun ka dawkân hnuoia bumal an rût hlak a, ka thaw ang chiein Pathien chun a mi hung thung ve an ta hi,” a ti a. Chun, Jerusalemah an ṭhuoi a, chutaka chun a thi ta a.
Chun, Juda mihai chun Jerusalem chu an hang do a, an lâk a, kâwlhnâmin an that a, khawpui chu an raw ta a.
Chun, Juda chun Kanaan mihai Hebrona umhai chu a va thaw a (a hma chun Hebron hming chu Kiriatharba a nih), chuongchun, Sesai, Ahiman le Talmai chu an that a.
Chutaka inthawk chun Debira umhai chu an va thaw a (a hma chun Debir chu Kiriath-sepher a nih).
Kaleb chun, “Tukhawm Kiriathsepher chu thaw a, la taphawt chu ka naunu Aksa hi nuhmeiah inneitir ka tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Kaleb sangpa Kenaz naupa Othniel chun a lâk a, chuongchun, a naunu Aksa chu nuhmeiah ân neitir ta a.
Aksa chun Othniel kuom a va tlung chun a pa kuomah ram hni dingin ama chu a thlêm a; chun, a sabengtung chunga inthawk chun a ṭum a, Kaleb chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i dita le?” a lo ti a.
Juda chu a unau Simeon le chun an inthawk a, Zephatha um Kanaan mihai chu an that a, an sukchimit dêr a. Chu khawpui hming chu Horma
Juda chun Gaza le a ram chin, Askelon le a ram chin, Ekron le a ram chin khawm a lâk a.
Josef sûngkuohai khawm chu Bethel thaw dingin an hang suok ve a, an kuomah
Chun, Josef sungkuohai chun Bethel enthlatu ding mi an tira (a hma chun chu khaw hming chu Luz a nih).

Enthlatuhai chun khaw sûnga inthawka mi pakhat hung suok hi an hmu a, a kuomah, “Kan hni che hi, khawpui sûng lûtna mi kâwkhmu raw khai; chuongchun, keini khawma ṭhatakin kan thaw ding che a nih, ” an ti a.
Chun, khawpui sûng lûtna chu a kâwkhmu a, chuongchun, kâwlhnâmin chu khuo chu an thaw a, chu mipa le a sûnghai po ruok chu an hla a.
Chu mipa chu Hit mihai rama chun a lût a, khuo a siem a, chu khuo chu a hmingah Luz ân bûk a; tu chen hin chu hming chu a la put zing a nih.

Manasse chun Beth-sean le a khaw chinhaia umhai, Taanak le a khaw chinhaia umhai, Dor le a khaw chinhaia umhai, Ibleam le a khaw chinhaia umhai, Megiddo le a khaw chinhaia umhai chu a hnawt suok naw a; chu rama chun Kanaan mihai chu an um zing ta lem a.
Zebulun chun Kitron khuoa umhai le Nahalal khuoa umhai chu a hnawt suok naw a; Kanaan mihai chu anni lai an um ve a, sinthawa ruoi dingin an um ta lem a nih.
Aser chun Akkoa umhai, Sidona umhai, Ahlaba umhai, Akziba umhai, Helbaa umhai, Aphika umhai, Rehoba umhai, a hnawt suok naw a;
Aser mihai chu chu rama um Kanaan mihai laia chun an um ve ta lem a, anni chun an hnawt suok naw leiin.

Naphtali chun Beth-semesa umhai le Beth-anatha umhai a hnawt suok naw a; chu rama um Kanaan mihai lai chun an um ve ta lem a; amiruokchu, Beth-semesa umhai le Beth-anatha umhai chu an sinthawa ruoi dingin an um tah a nih.
Amor mihai chun Dan mihai chu tlâng ramah an hnawt kai a, ruoma an fe thlâk chu an phalpêk si naw a.
Amor mihai ruok chu Har-heres tlânga dâm, Aijalona dâm, Saalbima dâm an um ta zing a, nisienlakhawm, Josef sûnghai kut chu an chungah a hrât a, an sinthawtua hmang dingin an hung um ta a.
Chun, Amor mihai ramri chu Akrabim hang fena le Selaa inthawka a tunga fe pei a nih.
Chun,
Chuleiin, tuhin, ka hril cheu hi, Anni chu hnawt suokpêk ta naw ning cheu a, in nâkphêkhaia chun hling ang hung ni tâng an ta; an pathienhai chu in ta dingin châng nîng an tih,” a ti a.
Chu hmun hminga chun Bokim
Josuain mipui ân ṭîntir hnung chun Israel thlahai chu mi tin mâni chanpuol seng ram chu hluo dingin an fe ta a.
Josua dam sûng le Josua damkhêltu upahai,
Chun, Nun naupa Josua
Chu ṭhanga mihai po po khawm chu an thlatuhai kuomah an fe zo tâwl ta a, chun chuong mihai hnunga chun
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
Chuongchun,
Chun,

Nisienlakhawm, rorêltu chu a thi phingleh an hnungtawl nâwkin, pathien danghai rawng bâwla chibai bûk dinga zui thuah an thlatuhai nêkin an thaw ṭha naw nâwkzuol a, an thil thaw hlakhai le an lûlulna khawm an bân chuong naw a.
chuleiin, kei khawma tuta chin chu Josua thi hmaa hnawt suok bâk hnamhai hi hnawt suokpêk ta naw ning ah:
an thlatuhai ihraw ang khan
Chuongchun,
Hieng hnamhai hi an nih
chuong Israel thlahai suon, kha hmaa iengkhawm la hre ngai dêr lohai chun an hung hrietna ding le râl thaw dân inchûktira um dinga inumtir an nih.
Chuong hnamhai chu: Philistinhai lal pangahai,le Kanaan mi po po, Zidon mihai,le Hiv mihai, Baal-hermon tlânga inthawka Hamath khuo lûtna chena Lebanon tlânga Hiv mihai an nih.
Chuonghai chu
an naunuhmeihai chu nuhmeiin an nei a, chun an naunuhmeihai chu anni naupasalhai an inneitir thung a, an pathienhai rawng chu an bâwl ta a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
Chun, ram chu kum sâwmli râlmuongin a um a. Chun Kenaz naupa Othniel chu a thi ta a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
Ama chun Ammon mihai le Amalek mihai ân pun a, chuongchun, Israelhai chu a va thaw a; tûm khawpui chu a nei ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chu Moab lal Eglon hnuoia chun kum sâwmpariet an um a.
Nisienlakhawm, Israel thlahai chun
Ehud chun kâwlhnâm ngeituo tawng chena seiin a sut a; chu chu a êlpui changtieng puon hnuoiah a taivawn a.
Moab lal Eglon chu siechawi chu a hang pêk a. Eglon chu mi thâutak a nih.
Siechawi chu a hang pêk zo chun siechawi chawituhai chu ân fetir nâwk ta a.

Ama ruok chu Gilgal kâwla lung sutna hmuna inthawkin a kîr nâwk a, “I aw lalpa, thurûk hril ding che ka nei,” a ti a. Lal chun, “To ṭhiep ro khai,” a ti a; chuongchun, a bula ngîrhai po chun an suoksan ta vawng a.
Ehud chun a vawitiengin a êlpui changtienga kâwlhnâm chu a phawi a, a phîngah a chiu ta pawp el a;
a ha khawm chu a lût tlum hiel a, chun, a kâwlhnâm chu a thâuin a chîpnel ta tlat a, a phînga kâwlhnâm chu a phawi si naw a, a hnungtieng chen a tlang hiel a.
Chuongchun, Ehud chu tuolpûk
Chun, chuonga a suok hnung chun a siehlawhai chu an hung a, sâwng chung kawtkhârhai chu lo inkal tlatin an hmu a, “A thlan sukdeina pindanah a va châwl dam hri a ni ngei âwm hi,” an ti a.
Hrilhai rak chenin an nghâk el ta a; nisienlakhawm, pindan kawtkhârhai chu a hawng ta dêr da el a; chuongchun, chabi an lâk a, an hawng a, an lalpa chu ṭuonga chun thisaa lo zâl dêrin an hmu ta el a.
Ehud hlak kha khânga an nghâk sûng khan a lo tlân hmang ta a, lung sutna hmun kha a khêl a, Seiraah a tlân ta a.
Chun, ama chun, “Mi zui ro khai,
Chu ṭum chun Moab mi sîng khat lai, mi âwmkhau ṭhieu le mi hrât ṭhieu an that a, pakhat khawm a tlân suok an um nawh.
Chuongchun, chu ni chun Moab mihai chu Israelhai hmaa chun an tlâwm ta a. Chun, ram chu kum sawmriet sûng râlmuongin a um a.
Chun, ama hnunga chun Anath naupa Samgar a hung inlang ve a, ama chun Philistin mi, mi za ruk sebâwng sunna hmawlin a sun hlum a; ama bawk chun Israelhai chu a sansuok a nih.
Ehud thi hnung chun Israel thlahai chun
Chun, zâwlneinu Debora, Lapidoth nuhmei chun chuong lai chun Israelhai ro a rêl a.
Barak chun a kuomah, “Mi fepui ve la, chuongchun, fêng ka tih, i mi fepui naw ding ruok chun fe naw ningah,” a ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Fepui ngei ka ti che, amiruokchu, i fenaa chun hmingṭhat i hlaw naw ding a ni chu;
Barak chun Zebulunhai le Naphtalihai chu Kedesa chun ân cha khâwm a, mi sîng khat ama leh an hang fe a; chun Debora khawm ama leh a hang fe ve a.
Chun, Ken mi Heber chu Ken mi Mosie tarpupa Hobab thlahai laia inthawkin a tumin a lo um a, Kedes kâwla Zaananim rama thingsaisuo hmun kâwlah a puon in a va zar a.
Chun, Abinoam naupa Barak chu Tabor tlângah a hang fe ti Sisera chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, Sisera chun a tawlailîrhai po po, thîr tawlailîr za kuo le a rawihai Jentailhai ram Harosetha inthawk Kison vadung chena umhai chu a ko khâwm ta a.
Chun, Deborain Barak kuomah, “Khai le, vawisûn hi
Chun,
Barak chun tawlailîrhai le sipaihai chu Jentailhai ram Haroseth chenin a hnawt a; chuongchun, Sisera sipaihai po po chu kâwlhnâmin an that vawng a, pakhat khawm dam an um nawh.

Chun, Jael chu Sisera tuok dingin a hung suok a, a kuomah, “Ka lalpa, hung lût rawh, ka kuomah hung lût la, ṭi naw rawh,” a ti a. Chuongchun, puon in sûngah chu minu kuoma chun a lût ta a, ama chun puonin a lo inkhum a.
Sisera chun, “Ka hni che hi, tui tlâwmte dâwn ding mi hung pe ta, ka dang a châr êm el,” a ti a. Amanu chun nênetui bâwm a hang hawng a, ân dâwntir a, ama chu ân khum nâwk ta a.
Sisera chun, “Puon in kawtkhâra khan ngîr la, chun, ‘Hitaka hin mi an um am?’ tia an hung indawn che chun, ‘An um nawh,’ lo ti pei rawh,” a ti a.

Nisienkhawm, Heber nuhmei Jael chun puon in kilna zum a lâk a, hembâwk chu a kutin a chawi a, to ṭawkin a pan phei a, a chau leia imu inhniktaka a zâl laiin kilna zum chun a bek takah a hem a, a hem tlang a, hnuoiah ân bûr ta ngur el a; chuongchun, a thi ta a.

Chun, Barakin Sisera a hung hnawt chun Jael chu ama lo tuokin a va suok a, a kuomah, “La hung ta khai, i mi zawng chu lo inentir ka ti che,” a ti a. Chu nu puon ina chun a va lût a, Sisera a bekah puon in kilna zum inbûr ngura thisaa zâl chu a hmu a.
Chun, Israel thlahai kut chu Jabin chunga chun a hung hrât ta deu deu a. Kanaan lal Jabin chu an suksiet dêr el ta a.
Chuongchun, Debora le Abinoam naupa Barak chun chu ni chun hla an sak a:
“Hotuhai chun Israel lai hin hma an ṭhuoi a,
Mipuihai chu inhâwktakin an hung inpe ta hi;
Aw, nangni lalhai, lo ngai ta u,
Aw, nangni rorêltuhai, na lo sit ta u,
Keima ngeiin
Edom phaia inthawka i hung suok khan,
Hnuoi chu ân thin dur dur a, vânhai khawm a hung far a;
Anih, sûmhai chun ruo an insûrtir a.
Sinai tlâng chen khawm saw
Anath naupa Samgar nihaia le,
Jael nihaia chun, tlâng lamhai chu a ṭhing ṭhup a;
Inzin invâkhai chu lam inthlep kuolhaiah an fe hlak a.
Israel ram khuohai chu hluo lovin a ram zo a, a ram zo a,
Kei Debora ka châng a,
Israel ram nu ka châng hmakhat khan chu.
Pathien tharhai an chel a,
Daikawtkhâr bulhaia khan indona a hung um a,
Israel rama mi sîng li zet laia khan
Phaw le fei kha um hrim a um am a nih?
Ka lungril chu Israelhai hotuhai,rorêltuhai,
Mipuihai laia inhâwktaka inpetuhai lai chun a um a;
Nangni sabengtung vâr chunga chuonghai,
Nangni puondâp
Nangni lampuia inlawnhai,chuong thu chu puong ro.
Tuichawina hmunhaia thil rimawi rihai, hlasakmihai ri chun,
Israel mihai hnena ngei chu,
Chun,
Har la, har la, Debora,
Har la, har la, hla sak rawh;
Tho la, Barak, i manhai chu salah ṭhuoi rawh,
Aw nang Abinoam naupa.
Mi
Amalek zungzâmhai chu
Ephraima inthawkin an hung thla a,
Benjamin, i mihai laia miin an hung zui che,
Makira inthawkin ram rorêltuhai an hung thla a,
Zebuluna inthawk chun hotu lien hmawl chawihai an hung thla a,
Issakar mi lienhai chu Debora kuomah an ṭhang a,
Issakar chu Barak ta dingin a ringum a,
Ruom tieng chun a kaiza vêngtu ama leh an tlân thla a,
Reuben mihai laia ruok chun inṭhena
Fe ve thu an sukthlûk thei naw a.
Iengdinga berâm huon kârhaia i ṭhung zing am,
Berâm ruol kona theihle ngai el dingin?
Reuben mihai laia ruok chun inṭhena a um a,
Fe ve thu an sukthlûk thei nawh.
Gilead mihai chu Jordan râlah an um zing a,
Dan mihai chu iengdinga lawnghaia an um zing am?
Aser mihai chu tuisuoriet pangah an ṭhung ṭawk ṭawk a,
An likilkawihaia chun an um zing a.
Zebulun mihai le Naphtali mihai hi
Phûl hmun insânghaia thi huom zing zing mi an nih.
Lalhai chu an hung a, an do a,
Chuongchun, Kanaan lalhai chun
Megiddo tui kâwl Ta-anaka chun an do a;
Râllâk sum hrim an lâk nawh.
Vâna inthawkin arasihaiin an hung do a,
An hmuna inthawkin Sisera chu an hung do a.
Kison vadung chun anni a hnâwl hmang vawng a,
Tienlai vadung, Kison vadung chun.
Aw ka thlarau, hrâttakin fe pei rawh!
Chun, sakawrhai chun an ke an tet tlut tlut a,
An ke tinhaia hnuoia inchâwm inchâwmin.
Chutaka umhai chu nasatakin ṭawngsie inphur ro.
Ken mi Heber nuhmei hi hamṭha nîng a tih.
Ama chun tui a hung hni a,nênetui a lo pêk a;
Miṭha noin nênetui inkhal a pêk a.
Kilna a chawi a,
A changtiengin sinthaw mi hembâwk;
Hembâwk chun Sisera chu a hem a,a luah a hem tlang a,
A bek takah a hem a,a hem bûr ta ngur a.
A ke bula chun a awp rawk a,a tlu a, a bawk ta dêr a,
A ke bulah a awp rawk a, a tlu ta a;
A awp rawkna hmuna chun a thi ta dêr a.
Sisera nu chu tukverah a hung dâk a,
Zâwngdaikal âwnga chun a ko a;
‘Iengtiziea tawlailîr chu hung tlung intak am a ni a?
Iengdinga tawlailîr kehai chu muong vieu am a ni a?’ a ti a.
A nuhmei vartakhaiin an lo dawn a,
Anih, ama le ama ân dawn fâwm nâwk a,
‘Râllâk thilhai chu an hmuin an insem ni lo am a nih?
Mi tinin nunghâk pakhat pahni amani seng.
Sisera chan ding chu râllâk puon ze tum tum,
Hnêtu rînga bât ding puon a khing hnia ṭiel mawi, ze tum tumhai chu?’ tiin.
Chuong ang chun aw
Nangma hmangaituhai ruok chu hrâttaka fe nisa ang hi ni raw hai se,” tiin. Chun, ram chu kum sâwmli sûng râlmuongin a um a.
Israel thlahai chun
Chun, Israelhaiin thil an hang chîng hin Midianhai, Amalekhai le khawsak nauhai chu an hang fe a, an hang do a,

An ranruolhai le an puon inhai leh an hung inthawk a, khâu ang elin tamtakin an hung inthawk hlak si a; anni le an sanghâwngseihai chu tiem sêng khawm an ni nawh; an hunga ram chu an suksiet hlak a nih.
Chuongchun, Israelhai chu Midianhai lei chun nasataka sukhnuoi an lo ni ta a; chun, Israel thlahai chun
Chun Midianhai leia Israelhaiin
Aigupta kuta inthawk le nangni suknawmnatuhai cheu kuta inthawk khan ka sansuok cheu a, in hmaa inthawkin anni chu ka hnawt suok pei a, an ram chu ka pêk cheu a;
chun keiin, Kei hi
Chun,
Gideon chun a kuomah, “Aw pu,
Ama chun a kuomah, “Aw
Gideon chun a kuomah, “I mit tlung ka lo ni chun, nangma ngeiin i mi biek a nih ti inchikna ieng amanih mîn entir ta la.

I hmaa inhlân ding thilpêk ka va lâk a, i kuoma ka hung nâwk hmakhat chun, ka hni che hi, hitaka inthawk hin lo fe hmang dêr naw rawh,” a ti a. Ama chun “I hung nâwk hmakhat chun lo um zing ka tih,” a ti a.
Gideon chu a lût ta a, kêlte le beiphit epha khat chawl ṭhanglo a buotsai ta a; a sa chu leikhâwrah a sie a, a tui chu bêlah a sie a, thingsaisuo hnuoiah a kuoma chun a hung chawi a, a hung inhlân a.
Chun, Pathien vântirko chun a kuomah, “Sa le chawl ṭhanglo bei kha la la, hi lung chunga hin sie la, a tui kha bun suok rawh,” a ti a. Chuong ang chun a hang thaw a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Gideon chun
Chuongchun, Gideon chun chutaka chun
Chu zân ma chun
chun, hi kul chunga hin kawngzâwng neitakin
Chuongchun, Gideon chun a siehlawhai laia mi sâwm a ṭhuoi a,
Khawpuia mihai chu zîngkâr inhmataka an hang tho chun, Baal maichâm sukchima lo um le, a bula Asera phûr thlûka lo um le, maichâm siem chunga bâwngchal pahnina inhlâna lo um chu an hmu a.
“Hi hi tu thaw am nîng a ti leh aw?” tiin an inbiek tâwl a. Chun, an hang indawn a, an hang indap vêl hnung chun, “Joas naupa Gideon thaw a lo ni zing annâwm ie,” an ti ta a.
Chun, khawpuia mihai chun Joas kuoma chun, “I naupa chu hung ṭhuoi suok rawh, a thi ngei ding a nih; Baal maichâm a sukchim lei le a bula Asera a phûr leiin,” an ti a.

Joas ruok chun ama hung khingtuhai po po kuomah, “Baal chu in ṭan ding a ni maw? Ama chu in hum ding am a nih? Tukhawm ama ṭan taphawt chu zingkâr la la hin sukhlum ding a nih; pathien a ni chun a maichâm an sukchim leiin ama le ama inṭan ta sienla,” a ti a.
Chuleiin, chu ni chun Gideon chu Jerubbaal ti a ni ta a, chu chu, “Baal chun ama khing raw se” tina a nih, Baal maichâm a sukchim lei chun.
Chun, Midianhai po po le, Amalekhai le khawsak nauhai chu an pung khâwm ta a, Jordan vadung an kai a, Jezreel ruomah an inkul a.
Nisienlakhawm,

Chun, Manassehai po po kuomah mihai ân tlântir a, anni khawm chun, ama chu an pan khâwm ta a: chun Aserhai, Zebulunhai le Naphtalihai kuoma khawm mihai ân tlântir a, anni khawm chun an hung thlawp ve ta a.
Chun, Gideonin Pathien kuomah, “I hril anga keia kuta Israelhai hi i sansuok ding chun,

ngai ta, hrizâwlah berâm hmul sieng ka ta, berâm hmula chau chun dâidaw a lo tla a, hnuoi po po chu a lo hul vawng chun, i hril angin keia kutin Israelhai hi i sansuok ding a nih ti hrieng ka tih,” a ti a.
Chuong ang chu a hung ni ngei a, a zînga zingkâr inhmataka a tho a, berâm hmul chu a hmetsâwr chun, berâm hmula mi chu dâidaw berbu khat zet a sâwr suok el ta a.

Chun, Gideonin Pathien kuomah, “Ka chunga hin lunginsen naw la, vawi khat chau hang hril nâwk ka tih, vawi khat chau berâm hmulin mi sukfiepêk nâwk rawh, tuta ṭum chu berâm hmul chau chu lo hul sienla, hnuoi chung po poa chun dâidaw lo um ve thung raw se,” a ti a.
Chun, chuong angin chu zân chun Pathienin a hung thaw a; berâm hmul chau chu a lo hul a, hnuoi chung po poa chun dâidaw chu a lo um ta thung a.

Chuongchun, Jerubbaal (chu chu Gideon chu a nih) le a kuoma mipui um po po chu inhmatakin an tho a, Harod vadung bula chun an inkul a; chun, Midianhai kul chu an umna hmartieng pang More tlâng bul ruoma chun a nih.
Chun,

Chuleiin, ngai ta, mipui na hrietah, ‘Tukhawm a ṭi le inthin taphawt chu kîr nâwk sienla, Gilead tlânga inthawk hin fe nâwk el raw hai se,’ tiin hril rawh,” a ti a. Chuongchun, mipui chu sîng hni le sâng hni an kîr a, sîng khat an la um a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, mipui chu vadunga chun a ṭhuoi thlâk a; chun,
Chun, an kutphaa mi a lieka liekhai chu mi za thum an ni a, mi danghai po chu kûna dingṭhaṭhuona tui a dîta dît vawng an nih.
Chuongchun,

Chuongchun, mipui chun fâk ding le an tawtawrâwthai chu an chawi a, chun, Israel mi a danghai po chu an puon in tieng ân fetir ta vawng a, mi za thumhai ruok chu ân umtir a; chun, Midianhai kul chu an hnuoi ruoma chun a nih.
Chu zâna chun
Amiruokchu, zu fe chu i ṭi chun chu, i siehlaw Pura le hin kula chun zu fe phawt unla:

chuongchun, an thuhril chu hrieng i ta; chu hnunga chun chu i kut chu sukhrâtin um a ta, kula chun fe ngam tâng i tih,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a siehlaw Pura le chun kula râl vênghai umna tawntir taka chun an zu fe ta a.
Chun, Midianhai le Amalekhai le khawsak nauhai po po ruoma chun khâu ang elin tamtak an lo um hmur el a; an sanghâwngseihai chu tiem sêng ruollo, an tam tieng chu tuipui kama phaiphin zât zet an nih.

Chun, Gideon a zu tlung chun mi pakhat hin a ruolpa kuomah a mang a lo hril a, “Ngai ta, mang ka lo nei a, buṭei bei tlang hi Midianhai kula hin a hung inhlum a, puon ina hin a lo inhlum lût a, a hung sukchim a, a suklet tawp a, puon in chu ân hmât vawng el ta a,” a ti a.
Chun, a ruolpa chun a dawn a, “Chu chu Israel mi Joas naupa Gideon kâwlhnâm a ni el chu; Pathienin Midianhai po po le sipaihai po po chu a kutah a pêk a ni el chu teh,” a ti a.
Chun, Gideon chun mang le a umzie an inhrilfie a hriet chun, Pathien a biek ta a; chuongchun, Israelhai kul tieng chun a kîr nâwk a, “Tho ta u khai,
Chu mi za thum hai chu pâwl thumin a siem a, an rêng chun tawtawrâwt le pil bêl ruok, a sûnga meiser sie sa a pêk seng a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Mi en unla, ka thaw angin thaw ve pei ro aw; kul tawntir ka tlung phingleh ka thaw ang peiin thaw ve ro.
Kei le ka kuoma umhai po po hin tawtawrâwt kan hang mût phingleh kul vêla um po pohai khawmin tawtawrâwt chu mût seng bawk in ta, ‘

Chuongchun, Gideon le a kuoma um mi za hai chu zân vêng lailung râlvêng an inthleng hlim lai takin kul tawntir chu an zu tlung a; chun, tawtawrâwt chu an hang mût a, an pil bêl chawihai chu an sukhâwp vawng a.
Chun, a pâwl thum chun tawtawrâwt chu an mût a, bêlhai chu an sukhâwp a, an vawitieng chun meiser an chawi a, an changtiengin tawtawrâwt mût ding chu an chawi a; chun, “
Chun, Israelhai chu Naphtali, Aser le Manasse hnam po poa inthawk an pung khâwm a, Midianhai chu an hnawt ta a.

Chun, Gideon chun Ephraim tlâng ram po poa chun, “Midianhai hi hung thaw ro, Beth-bara chenin vadunghai chu lo lâk khal unla, Jordan vadung leh,” tiin mihai ân tlân vêltir a. Chuongchun, Ephraim mihai po po chu an pung khâwm a, Beth-bara chenin vadunghai chu Jordan vadung leh an lo lâk khal vawng a.

Chun, Midian lal pahni Oreb le Zeeb an man a, Oreb chu Oreb lungpuiah an that a, chun Zeeb chu Zeeb grêp sâwrna khurah an that a, Midianhai chu an hnawt ta a, chuongchun, Oreb le Zeeb lu chu Jordan vadung râlah, Gideon kuomah an hung lâk a.
Chun, Ephraim mihai chun a kuomah, “Iengtiziea hienga i mi thaw a, Midianhai do dinga i fe laiin i mi ko ve naw am a ni a?” an ti a. An hal nasa hle el a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni nêkin tuhin ieng am ka thaw bîk leh? Abiezer mihai grêp lo nêk chun Ephraim mihai grêp hmu ṭhel zawng hi a nasa lem ni lo am a nih?

Pathien chun Midian lalhai, Oreb le Zeeb chu in kutah a hung pêk ta cheu a, nangni nêkin kei hin ieng am ka thaw thei chuong leh?” a ti a. Chuongchun, chu thu a hang hril chun a chunga an lunginsen chu a re ta a.
Chun, Gideon le a kuoma mi za thum umhai chun Jordan vadung chu an zu tlung a, an kai a, châu sa sain an hnawt pei a.
Chun, Sukkoth khuoa mihai kuoma chun, “Hieng ka hnungzuihai hi, ka hni cheu hi, beiphêkhai pe ta u khai, an châu ta êm el a, Midianhai lal Zeba le Zalmunna ka hnawt a nih,” a ti a.
Sukkoth khuoa mi lienhai chun, “Zeba le Zalmunna chu i kuta umsa ang hrieua chuonga i sipaihai bei kan hang pêk el ding chu?” an ti a.
Gideon chun, “Aw le,
Chutaka inthawk chun Penuelah a hang fe a, an kuomah chuong ang bawk chun a hril nâwk a, chun Penuel khuoa mihai chun Sukkoth khuoa mihai dawn dân bawkin an lo dawn ve a.
Chun, Penuel khuoa mihai kuoma chun, “Inremna thu phura ka hung kîr nâwk pha chun, hi kul hi chu hung sukchim ngei ka tih,” tiin a hril bawk a.
Tuhin Zeba le Zalmunna chu an sipaihai, khawsak nauhai sipaihai thi mahlahai po po, sîng khat le sâng nga lai leh Karkorah an um a, kâwlhnâm chawi mi ṭhieu nuoi khat le sîng hni an thi si a.
Chun, Gideon chu Noba le Jogbeha saktienga puon ina
Chun, Zeba le Zalmunna chu an tlânse ta a; chuongchun, a hnawt a, Midian lal pahni Zeba le Zalmunna chu a man a, sipaihai po po chu a chawkbuoi
Chun, Joas naupa Gideon chu indonaa inthawkin Heres lam tunga chun a hung kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Sukkoth khuoa tlangvâl pakhat a man a, thu ân dawn a; ama chun Sukkoth khuoa mi lienhai le upahai hming chu a ziekpêk vawng a, sâwmsari pasari an nih.

Chun, Sukkoth khuoa mihai kuoma chun a hang fe a, “Zeba le Zalmunna hi en ta u, hienghai hi annâwm, ‘Zeba le Zalmunna chu i kuta umsa ang hrieua, chuonga i mi châuhai bei kan hang pêk el ding chu,’ tia in mi tielnahai kha,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, chu khuoa upahai chu a man a, thlalêr hling le hlohlingneihai chun Sukkoth mihai chu ân chûktir a.
Chun, Penuel khaw kul chu a sukchim a, khuoa mihai khawm chu a that a.
Chun, Zeba le Zalmunna kuoma chun, “Tabor tlânga in mi thathai kha mi ieng ang am an ni a?” a ti a. Anni chun, “Nanga ang ang hi an nih, lal nau hawina an nei seng el,” an ti a.
Ama chun, “Ka unau, ka nu naupahai ngei an nih in sawnnaw,
Chun, a naupa upa tak Jether kuoma chun, “Khai le nangin that rawh,” a ti a. Nisienlakhawm, tlangvâl chun a kâwlhnâm chu a phawi naw a, tleirâwl chau a la ni leiin a ṭi a nih.

Chun, Zeba le Zalmunna chun, “Nang kha hung inthawk la mi hung thaw ta la, patling le patling inthaw ding a nih annâwm,” an ti a. Chun, Gideon chu a tho a, Zeba le Zalmunna chu a that ta a; chun, an sanghâwngseihai rînga rîngawrhai chu a lâk a.

Chuongchun, Israel mihai chun Gideon kuomah, “Nangin kan chungah ro rêl ta raw khai, nang le i naupasalhai le i naupasalhai nauhai chen khawmin; nangin Midianhai kuta inthawk hin i mi sansuok ta si a,” an ti a.
Gideon chun an kuomah, “Kei chun chu in chunga hin ro rêl naw ning ah, ka naupa hlakin in chungah ro rêl naw bawk a tih;
Gideon ma chun an kuomah, “Thil pakhat ruok chu hni cheu ka nuom a, mi tinin in râllâk nabe kha mi pe seng ta unla,” a ti a (Ismael mihai an ni leiin rângkachak nabe an nei a nih).
Anni chun, “Pe mawl kan ti che,” an ti a. Chuongchun, puon an pha a, mi tinin an râllâk nabe chu an the suok ta seng a.

Chun, chuong rângkachak nabe a hni khâwm chu a rikzie chu rângkachak shekel sâng khat le za sari a nih, rîngawrhai, nabehai, Midian lalhai puon senduk tiemsa lovin an sanghâwngseihai khaidiet hli khawm ṭhang lovin.

Chun, Gideonin chuonghai chun thiempu zakawsîng a siem a, a umna Ophra khuoa chun a sie a; chutaka chun chu chu bein Israelhai po po chu an lo uire zo ta a, Gideon le a sûnghai ta ding khawma châng a lo ni ta a.
Chuongchun, Midianhai chu Israel thlahai hmaa chun suktlâwmin an lo um ta a, an châng thei ta naw a. Gideon dam sûng chu ram chu kum sâwmli râlmuongin a um a.
Chun, Joas naupa Jerubbaal chu a fe a, ama inah a um ta a.
Gideon chun ama nei ṭhieu naupasal sâwmsari a nei a, nuhmei tamtak nei a ni leiin.
Sekema a thâikêmin naupasal a neipêk bawk a, a hmingah Abimelek a sak a.
Joas naupa Gideon chu tar kûna damin a thi a, Abiezrithai ta Ophra a pa Joas thlâna chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, Gideon a thi phing chun Israel mipui chu an hnungtawl nâwk nghâl ta a. Baalhai kuoma chun, an hung uire ta a, Baal-berith chu an pathienah an hung siem a.
Chun, Israel mipui chun an vêla hmêlmahai po poa inthawka sansuoktu
Jerubbaal (Gideon) chu Israelhai chunga theitâwpa ṭhat insuo hlaktu sûnghai chunga khawm chun ṭhat an inchu ve ta nâw bawk a.
Chun, Jerubbaal naupa Abimelek chu Sekema a nu ṭahai kuomah a fe a, anni le a nu pa pahnamhai po po chu a biek a,

“Sekema mihai po po na hrietah thu hril unla, ‘Jerubbaal naupasal mi sâwmsarihaiin in chunga ro an rêl am ṭha lem in tih, mi pakhatin in chunga ro a rêl?’ ti ro khai; chun kei khawm in ru le in taksa ka nih ti hi hre zing bawk unla,” a ti a.
Chun, a nu ṭahai chun Sekema mihai po po na hrieta chun chuong thu po po chu an hril a; chuongchun, Abimelek zui nuomna lungril an lo put ta a, “Ama chu ei unaupa a nih annâwm,” an ti leiin.
Chun, Baal-berith ina inthawkin tangka sâwmsari an pêk a, chu chun Abimelek chun mi hotak tak le mi rura tak takhai a ruoi a, anni chun ama chu an zui ta a.
Chun, Ophra khuoa a pa ina chun a va fe a, Jerubbaal nauhai, a unauhai sâwmsari chu lung pakhat chungah a that tâwl a; Jerubbaal naupa a naupang tak Jotham ruok chu a lo inbi hlau leiin a that naw a.
Chun, Sekema mi po po le Bethmiloa mi po po chu an pung khâwm a, Sekema lungphun bul thingsaisuo kâwla chun, Abimelek chu lalah an siem ta a.

Chun, chu chu Jotham an hril chun Gerizim tlâng sîpah a hang ngîr a, râwl inringtakin a khêk a, an kuomah, “Nangni Sekema mihai, ka thuhril hi ngai ta u, chuongchun, Pathien khawma in thu a lo ngai ve ding a nih.
Vawikhat chu thinghai hi an lal ding hriek nâl dingin an va fe suok tâwl a, Oliv thing kuoma chun, ‘Nang kan lal dingin um ta la,’ an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, oliv thing chun an kuomah, ‘Pathien le mihriem chawimawi phâna dinga an mi hmangna tak ka hriek hi suoksanin thinghai chungah khingtieng khingtieng ka kûr vêl el ding maw chu?’ a ti a.
Chun, thinghai chun theichang kûng kuomah, ‘La hung ta, nang kan lalah ṭhung rawh ie,’ an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, theichang kûng chun an kuomah, ‘Ka thlumna le ka ra ṭhatak hi suoksanin thinghai chungah khingtieng khingtieng ka kûr el ding maw chu?’ a ti a.
Chun, thinghai chun grêphrui kuomah, ‘La hung ta, nang kan lalah ṭhung rawh ie,’ an ti a.
