Grêphrui ruok chun an kuomah, ‘Pathien le mihriem suklâwm hlaktu ka uoin hi suoksanin thinghai chungah khingtieng khingtieng kan zâm el ding maw chu?’ a ti a.
A tâwpa chun thinghai po po chun hling kuomah, ‘La hung ta, nang kan lalah ṭhung rawh ie,’ an ti a.
Tuhin Abimelek in lal dinga in lo siem ta hi thaw takzet le feltaka thaw in ni a, Jerubbaal le a sûnghai chu ṭhataka in thaw a, a phu ang peia a chunga lo thaw in ni a,
(ka pa hin râl a lo dopêk cheu a, a lo thi pha hiel a. Midianhai kuta inthawk chun a lo sansuok ta cheu a;

vawisûn hin ka pa sûnghai chunga chun in lo hel a, a naupasalhai sâwmsari zet lung pakhat chungah in lo sukhlum a, in unaupa a ni leiin a suoknu naupa Abimelek hi Sekem khuo mihai lalah in hung siem ta si a;)
vawisûn hin Jerubbaal le a sûnghai chunga thaw takzet le feltaka thaw in ni chun chu, Abimelek chunga hin lâwm ro; chun, ama khawm in chungah lâwm raw se;

chuong ang chu a ni naw ruok chun, Abimeleka inthawk hin mei hung chawk suok sienla, Sekema mihai le Beth-miloa mihai chu kâng zo vawng sienla, Sekem le Beth-milo mihaia inthawk mei hung chawk suok sienla, Abimelek chu kâng zo vawng bawk raw se,” a ti a.
Chun, Jotham chu a tlân hmang a, Beerah a tlân a, a unaupa Abimelek chu a ṭi leiin chutaka chun a um ta zing a.
Chun, Abimelek chu Israelhai chunga chun kum thum ân lal a.
Chun, Pathienin Abimelek le Sekema mihai kâra chun lungril suol ân umtir a, Sekema mihai chun Abimelek chunga chun vervêktakin an thaw ta a.

Chu chu Jerubbaal naupasalhai sâwmsari chunga nunsetaka an thaw leia an chunga phuba lâkna a hung tlung theina ding le, anni thattu an unaupa Abimelek chunga le a unauhai that dinga a kut lo sukhrâttu Sekem mihai chunga an thisen a um theina dingin a nih.
Chun, Sekem mihai chun tlâng sîphaiah ama inchânrutuhai an sie a, chu lampuia fe taphawt chu an lo suom hlak a, chu thu chu Abimelek chu an hril a.
Chun, Ebed naupa Gaal, a unauhai leh an hung inthawk a, Sekemah an lût a, Sekem mihai chun an lo ringzo hle a.
Chuongchun, lo tieng an fe a, an grêphai chu an lo a, an chîl a, ruoi an ṭhe a, an pathien inah an lût a, an fâkin an dâwn a, Abimelek chu an deusaw a.

Ebed naupa Gaal chun, “Abimelek chu tu am a na? Sekem khawm tu am a ni a, keinin a rawng kan hei bâwl el ding chu? Jerubbaal nau a ni naw am a nih? Zebul hi a khâwnbâwl a ni naw am a nih? Sekem pa Hamor mihai rawng chu bâwl el nâwm ei ni, iengdingin am ama rawng chu bâwl ei ti leh?
Hienghai rawi hi ka thuin hang um hai sien chu aw; Abimelek hi ka hang suktlâwm dêr el ding bah,” a ti a. Chun, Abimelek kuoma chun, “Sipaihai sukpung la, hung inthawk raw khai,” a ti a.
Chun, chu khuo rorêltu Zebul chun Ebed naupa Gaal thuhril a hriet chun a lo lunginsen ta thut a,
chuongchun, var vervêkin Aruma-a Abimelek kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, Ebed naupa Gaal le a unauhai Sekemah an hung a, i chunga helpui tumin khuoa mihai an infuipawr a.
Chuleiin, tuhin azân azânin i rawihai leh hung inthawk unla, phûlah lo inchân ro,

chun, zingkâr nisa suok hlimin tho la, khuo chu hung thaw el rawh; chun, ngai ta, ama le a rawihai chun an hung thaw ding pha che, remchâng i ti ang peiin an chungah lo thaw el rawh,” tia hril dingin mihai ân tlântir a.
Chuongchun, Abimelek le a rawihai po po chu azân azân chun an tho a, pâwl lia insiemin Sekem chu an inhuol ta a.
Chun, Ebed naupa Gaal chu a va suok a, khawpui lûtna kawtkhâra chun a va ngîr a; chun, Abimelek le a rawihai chu an inchân rûknaa inthawk chun an hung suok a.
Gaalin mipuihai a hang hmu chun Zebul kuomah, “En ta, tlâng sîpa inthawkin mipui an hung suok ie,” a ti a. Zebul chun, “Tlâng hlim saw mihriem angin i hmu ning a tie,” tiin a dawn a.
Gaal chun, “En hrim ta lân am ie, ram lai taka saw mipui an hung suok ie, pâwl khat lem chu Meonenim

Chu phingleh Zebul chun a kuomah, “Tu am ie, Abimelek a rawng ei ibâwl ding chu? tia i hrilna bau kha khaw lai am a um ta leh? Hienghai hi i mi hmusithai ngei kha ni lo am an nih? Va suok la, va thaw mawl raw khai,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Gaal chun Sekem mihai hma chu a va ṭhuoi a, Abimelek chu a va thaw ta a.
Abimelek chun ama chu a lo hnawt a, a tlânse ta a; khawpui lûtna kawtkhâr chenin mi tamtak hliemin an tlu phung el a.
Chun, Abimelek chu Aruma khuoah a um ta a, chuongchun, Zebul chun Gaal le a unauhai chu Sekema um thei lo dingin a hnawt suok ta vawng a.
A zinga chun mipui chu phûla hin an va fe suok a, Abimelek chu an va hril a.
Chun, a mihai a ṭhuoi a, pâwl thumah a siem a, phûla chun an inchân a; chun, a hei thlîr a, khawpuia inthawka mihai hung suok chu a hei hmu a, chun a tho a, anni chu a lo thaw a, a that tâwl a,
Abimelek le a pâwlhai chun an lo baw a, hmatieng an nawr peia khawpui lûtna kawtkhârah an va ngîr a, chun, pâwl hnihai chun phûla umhai po po chu an baw a, an that tâwl ta a.
Sekem kula um po pohai chun chu thu chu an lo hrietin Elberith kulbînga chun an lût ta vawng a.
Chun, Sekem kula chun mi po po an um khâwm vawng ti Abimelek chu an hril a.

Chun, mi po po chun thing kâu an sât thlâk ve ta seng a, Abimelek chu an zui a, kulbîng vêla chun an sie pei a, chun kulbînga chun anni chu an raw khum ta a: chuongchun, Sekem kula mihai po po chu an thi a, pasal le nuhmei sâng khat lai an nih.
Chun, Abimelek chu Thebez khuoah a fe a, Thebez chu ân huol a, a lâk a.
Amiruokchu, khawpui sûnga chun kulpui a um a, chutaka chun pasal le nuhmei po po le khawpui sûnga mi po po chu an tlân lût a, an inkhâr khum tlat a, kul chunga chun an um khâwm a.
Abimelek chu kul tieng chun a hang fe a, a hang thaw a, raw tumin kul kawtkhâr bula chun a fe a.
Chun, nuhmei tuin amanih bu râwtnawina lung chungtieng hi Abimelek lua chun a zuk thlâk a, a luru chu a kawi ta a.
Chun, Israelhaiin Abimelek chu a thi ti an hriet phingleh, mi tin chu mâni in tieng an fe ta seng a.
Abimelek chun a unauhai sâwmsari a that a, a pa chunga a thaw dân kawnga a rîtlona kha Pathienin hieng ang hin ama a hung thung ve ta a nih:
chun, Sekema mihai rîtlona po po khawm kha Pathienin a hung thung ve ta thung a: chun, Jerubbaal naupa Jotham ṭawngsie kha an chungah a hung tla ta a nih.
Abimelek hnunga chun Israelhai chu sansuok dingin Issakar mi Dod nau Pua naupa Tola a hung suok a, Ephraim tlâng ram Samir khuoah a um a.
Kum sâwmhni le kum thum Israelhai ro a rêl a, chun a thi a, Samir khuoah an phûm a.
Chu hnunga chun Gilead mi Jair a hung suok a, kum sâwmhni le kum hni Israelhai ro a rêl a.
Ama chun naupasal sâwmthum, sabengtungte sâwmthum chunga chuong hlak mi a nei a, chun, Gilead rama chun khaw sâwmthum an nei a, chuong chu tu chen hin Havvoth-jair an tih.
Chun, Jair chu a thi a, Kamon khuoah an phûm a.
Israel mipui chun
Chuongchun,
Chu kum chun Israel thlahai chu an suklungzîngin an nêksâwr êm êm el a, Jordan râl Gilead rama Amor mihai rama Israel mi umhai po po chu kum sâwm le kum riet sûng rau an nêksâwr a.
Chun, Ammon mihai chu Juda mihai, Benjamin hnamhai le, Ephraim pahnamhai do dingin Jordan râl an kai a; chuongchun, Israelhai chu namên lovin an lunginzîng ta a.
Zidon mihai, Amalek mihai, Maon mihai khawma an nêksâwr cheu a; chun, in mi ko a, an kuta inthawkin ka sansuok cheu a.
Chuong sa khawma nangnîn in mi nghatsan a, pathien danghai rawng chu in bâwl ta lem a; chuleiin, sansuok ta naw ning cheu ah.
In ithlang pathienhai chu ko ta unla, anni chun in lunginzîng pha chun sansuok el raw hai se cheu chu,” a ti a.
Chun, Israel mihai chun
Chuongchun, anni laia hnam dang pathienhai chu an sie hmang vawng a,
Chun, Ammon mihai chu an pungkhâwm a, Gileadah an vân kul a, Israel mihai chu an inkhâwm ve a, Mizpaah an inkul a.
Chun, mipuihai, Gilead rama mi lienhai chu an inbiek a, “Ammon mihai thaw phuttu ding hi tu am a um a? Gilead ram po poa hotuah um a tih,” tiin.
Tuhin Gilead mi Jepthah chu mi hrât huoisen a nih, ama chu nawchizawr naupa a nih. A pa chu Gilead a nih.

Gilead nuhmei chun ama chu naupasalhai a neipêk bawk a; chun, a nuhmei naupasalhai chun an hung puitlingin Jepthah chu an hnawt suok a, a kuomah, “Nang chun chu ei pa insûng ro hluo thei naw ti nih, nuhmei dang le nau i ni leiin,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Jepthah chu a unauhai laia inthawk chun a tlân hmang a, Tob ramah a um ta a; chun, Jepthah kuoma chun mi hotak takhai an um a, ama chu an zui hlak a.
A nakie deu chun Ammon mihai chun Israelhai chu an do ta a.
Ammon mihaiin Israelhai an hang do chun, Gilead mi upahai chu Tob rama Jepthah ṭhuoi dingin an fe suok ta a.
Chun, Jepthah kuoma chun, “Ammon mihai kan do theina dingin kan hotu takah hung um ta la,” an ti a.
Jepthah chun Gilead mi upahai kuoma chun, “In mi theida a, ka pa ina inthawk khan in mi hnawt suok a ni naw am a nih? In lunginzîng phinga iengdinga ka kuoma hung am in ni leh?” a lo ti a.

Gilead mi upahai chun Jepthah kuomah, “Chu lei tak chun a nih annâwm, tuhin nanga tieng kan hung ngha nâwk chu, Ammon mihai va do dinga keini le i fe theina dingin; chun, Gilead rama umhai po po chungah kan hotuah um i tih,” an ti a.
Chun, Jepthah chun Gilead mi upahai kuoma chun, “Ammon mihai do dinga in mi ṭhuoi nâwk a,
Gilead mi upahai chun Jepthah kuomah, “
Chuongchun, Jepthah chu Gilead mi upahai kuoma chun a fe ve ta a, chun, mihai chun hotu le a lusa tak dingin an lo siem ta a; chun Jepthah chun Mizpaah
Chun, Jepthah chun Ammon mihai lal kuoma chun, “Ka chungah ieng am i tia hienga ka ram do dinga ka kâwla hung el i ni lie?” tiin palaihai a tir a.

Ammon mihai lal chun, “Israelhai Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok lai khan ka ram an lâk leiin a nih, Arnona inthawka Jabbok le Jordan chenin; chuleiin, chu ramhai chu sêl lovin mi hung pe nâwk el rawh,” tiin, Jepthah palaihai chu a lo dawn a.
Jepthah chun Ammon mihai lal kuoma chun palaihai a tir nâwk a,
a kuomah, “Jepthah chun hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Israelhaiin Moab ram an lâkpêk naw a, Ammon mihai ram khawm an lâkpêk bawk nawh;
Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suokna Tuipui Sen chena thlalêr kha an fe thleng a, Kades kha an tlung khan
Chun, Israelhaiin Amorhai lal Sihon, Hesbon lal kuomah palaihai an tir a, Israelhai chun a kuomah, kan hmun tienga fe dingin i ram fe thleng kan tih, kan hni che a nih, an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Sihon chun Israelhai chu a ram fe thleng ding chun a ring zo naw a, Sihon chun a mihai po po chu ân khâwm a, Jahaz khuoah ân kul a, Israelhai chu a do ta a.
Chun,
Tuhin chuong anga
I pathien Kemos-in i puola a lo ruotpêk che chu i nei el ding a ni naw am a nih? Chun,
Israelhai Hesbona le a khaw chînhaia dâm, Aroer le a khaw chînhaia dâm, Arnon ramri dep khawpuihai po poa chun kum za thum zet an um lai khan iengdinga la lova lo la um zing am i ni leh?
Chuleiin, i chunga hin thil iengkhawm ka suksuol nawh, nangma lem hin mi hung thaw i tum lei hin ka chungah thil i suksuol a nih;
Nisienlakhawm, Ammon mihai lal chun Jepthah thu incha chu a lo ngai nuom naw a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Jepthah chu Ammon mihai do ding chun a fe ta a; chun,
Aroera inthawka Minnith chenin a thaw pei a, khuo sâwmhni zet; chun, Abel-keramim chenin a that a that a. Chuongchun, Ammon mihai chu Israel mihai hmaa chun an lo tlâwm ta a.
Chun, Jeptha chu a umna khuo Mizpa chu a tlung ta a; chun, ngai ta, a naunu chun khuongtehai leh lâmin ama a lo tuok a, a nau nei sun a na, ama naw chu naunuhmei le naupasal dang hrim a nei nawh.
Chun a pa kuoma chun, “Hieng ang hin thâwng ka tih, thla hni sûng chu keia khâtin um hran ka ta, tlânga hai hang rawl ka ta, ka nunghâkna hi hang sûn ka tih, kei le ka ruolhai le hin,” a ti a.
Ama chun, “Fe ta la,” a ti a. Chuongchun, thla hni thang dingin a tir a, a suok ta a, ama le a ruolhai le chun; chun, tlângahai chun a nunghâkna chu a hang sûn a.
Thla hni hnunga chun a pa kuomah a hung kîr nâwk a, ama chun ṭawng a lo inkhâm ta ang khan, a chungah a thaw a, pasal tukhawma an pâwl nawh.
Chuongchun, Israel naunuhai chun Gilead mi Jeptha naunu chu kum tin ni li sûn dânah an hung nei ta a.

Ephraim mihai chu an pung khâwm ta rak el a, Jordan vadung chu Zaphonah an fe kai a, Jeptha kuoma chun, “Iengdinga Ammon mihai do dinga i hung khan i mi hung fiel ve naw am a na? I in chu nang leh kan raw ding a nih,” an ti a.
Jeptha chun an kuomah, “Ammon mihai hi kei le ka mihaiin theipatâwp suoin kan thaw a na, kan incha lai cheu khan an kuta inthawkin in mi sansuok si nawh.
Nangni hlaka in mi sansuok nuom nawh ti ka hriet phingleh thi dâwn hlek lovin ka ṭhang a, Ammon mihai chu do dingin ka vân thawk a, chuongchun,

Chuongchun, Jeptha chun Gileada mi po po chu a ko khâwm a, Ephraim mihai chu a do ta a; chun Gilead mihai chun Ephraim mihai chu an that an that a, “Nangni Ephraim hnam tlân hmang Gileadhai, Ephraimhai lai le Manasse mihai laia ṭhang ve mei meihai,” an ti hlak leiin.

Ama chun, “Ni lo e,” a ti chun a kuomah, “Shibboleth hang ti ta,” an lo ti a, chun, ama chun, “Sibboleth,” a ti lem ta hlak a, a lam fie ve thiem si naw a, chuongchun, an man a, Jordan vadung kaihaia chun an lo that pei a; chuongchun, chu ṭum chun Ephraim mihai chu sîng li le sâng hni an that a.
Jeptha chun Israelhai chungah kum ruk ro a rêl a. Chun, Gilead mi Jeptha chu a thi a, Gilead rama khawpui pakhatah an phûm ta a.
Ama hnunga chun Bethlehema mi Ibzan chun Israelhai chungah ro a rêl a.

Ama chun naupasal sâwmthum a nei a, naunuhmei sâwmthum chu ama chipui ni lohai ân neitir a; chun, a naupasalhai ta ding chun ama chipui nilo mihaia inthawkin naunuhmei sâwmthum a ṭhuoipêk bawk a. Chun, Israelhai chungah kum sari ro a rêl.
Ibzan chu a thi a, Bethlehemah an phûm a.
Ama hnunga chun Zebulun mi Elonin Israelhai chungah ro a rêl a; Israelhai chungah kum sâwm ro a rêl.
Chun, Zebulun mi Elon chu a thi a, Zebulun rama Aijalonah an phûm a.
Ama hnunga chun Pirathon mi Hillel naupa Abdonin Israelhai chungah ro a rêl a.
Ama chun naupasal sâwmli le tupa sâwmthum, sabengtungte sâwmsari chunga chuong hlak mi a nei a; ama chun Israelhai chungah kum riet ro a rêl.
Chun, Pirathon mi, Hillel naupa Abdon chu a thi a, Ephraim ram Amalek mihai tlâng rama Pirathon khuoah an phûm ta a.
Israel thlahai chun
Chun, Zora khuoa Dan hnam mi pakhat a um a; a hming chu Manoa a nih, a nuhmei chu a ching a, nau hrim a nei naw a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, fîmkhur raw khai, uoin le zu hrim dâwn naw la, fâk thienglo hrim khawm fa dêr naw rawh;

amiruokchu, ka kuomah, ‘Ngai ta, inrai i ta, naupasal nei i tih, chuongchun, uoin le zu hrim dâwn naw la, fâk thieng lo thil hrim khawm fa dêr naw rawh, naupang chu sula a um laia inthawka a thi chenin Pathien ta dinga Nazarit mi a ni ding a ni si a,’ a ti a,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Manoain
Pathienin Manoa thuhril chu a lo ngai a, chun, nuhmei chu phûla a ṭhung laiin Pathien vântirko chu a kuomah a hung nâwk a, a pasal Manoa ruok chu a kuoma chun a um ve naw a.
Chun nuhmei chu inhmâwtakin a tlân ta a, a pasal chu a va hril a, a kuomah, “Ngai ta, ni khat nia ka kuoma hung bawk kha, ka kuomah a hung inlâr nâwk tah,” a ti a.
Manoa chu a tho a, a nuhmei chu a zui a, ama kuom chu a va tlung a, a kuomah, “Nang hi i ni maw nuhmei kuoma thuhriltu chu?” a ti a. Ama chun, “Ka nih,” a ti a.
Chun, Manoa chun, “I thu ang pei chun hung tlung raw se, naupang umdân ding chu iengtin am nîng a ta, ieng am nîng a ta a thaw ding chu?” a ti a.

Grep hruia inthawk hrim hrim chu a fâk ding a ni naw a; uoin le zu hrim khawm a dâwn ding a ni nawh, fâk thienglo thil hrim khawm a fâk ding a ni nawh; thu ka ipêk ta po po kha vawngṭha raw se,” a ti a.
Manoa bawk chun
Chun, Manoa chun kêlte chu fâk ding thilinhlân leh a lâk a, lungpui chungah
Maichâma inthawka meichawk chu vântieng ân tung lai chun
Amiruokchu,
A nuhmei ruok chun a kuomah, “
Chun, Zora le Estaol inkâra Mahane-dana chun
Samson chu Timna khuoah a zu fe a, Timnaa chun Philistin mihai naunuhmeihai laia mi nuhmei pakhat hi a zu hmu a.

A nu le pa ruok chun a kuomah, “I unauhai naunuhmeihai laia manih, ei chihai po po laia hin amanih nuhmei an um dêr naw nîng a ti maw, Philistin mi, sertanlohai laia nuhmei ding i zu zawng el chu?” an ti a. Samson ruok chun a pa kuomah, “Mi neipêk el rawh, ka dit êm i sawnnâwm ie,” a ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, a nu le pa chun, chu chu
Chuongchun, Samson chu a nu le pa le chun Timnaa chun an zu fe a, Timnaa grêp huon hi an zu tlung a; chun, ngai ta, sakeibaknei vânglai hin a lo inrûm khum a.
Chun, a zu fe a, nuhmei chu a zûn biekpui a, Samson chun a dit hle el a.
Chun, a nakie deu chun zu nei tumin a zu fe nâwk a, sakeibaknei ruong kha en tumin a va pêt a; chun, sakeibaknei taksaa khuoi lo um mur mur le a zu khawm lo um chu a hmu a.

Chu chu a lâk a, a fe nâwk ta a, fe malam chun a fâk pei a; chun, a nu le pa kuom chu a hang tlung a, anni khawm a pêk ve a; anni khawm chun an fâk a, amiruokchu, khuoizu chu sakeibaknei taksaa inthawka a lâk a nih ti iengkhawm a hril naw a.
Chun, a pa chu nuhmei kuoma chun a zu fe a; chun, chutaka chun Samson chun ruoi a ṭhe a, chu chu tlângvâlhai thaw dân hrim a ni a.

Chun, Samsonin an kuomah, “Tuhin thukhir indawn ka ti cheu le; ruoiṭhe ni, ni sari sûnga in mi hrilfie theia in hriet suok thei chun puon zai inhmi sil sâwmthum le inthlengna puon sâwmthum pêng ka ti cheu;

amiruokchu, in mi hrilfie thei naw chun, puon zai inhmi sil sâwmthum le inthlengna puon sâwmthum in mi pêk ding a nih,” a ti a. Anni chun a kuomah, “I thukhir chu hang hril ta la, lo ngai kan tih,” an ti a.
Chun ama chun an kuomah,
“Fatua inthawka fâk ding hung suok a,
Hrâttaka inthawka thlumtak hung suok,
ti hi,” a ti a.
Chun, ni thum sûng chun chu thukhir chu an hrilfie thei ta naw a.
A ni sari

Chuongchun, Samson nuhmei chu a hmaa chun a ṭap a, “Mi hmangai lovin i mi theida a lo ni lem hi tie: ka chihai chu thukhir în dawn a, kei hlak i mi hrilfie ve si naw a,” a ti a. Ama chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, ka nu le ka pa khawm ka hril naw a, nang ka hril ding che maw?” a ti a.
Chun, a ruoiṭhe, ni sari sûng po chu a hmaah a ṭap a ṭap el a, chun a ni sari ni chun a ngên tlut tlut el leiin a hril ta khawng khawng a; chun, ama chun thukhir chu a chihai chu a hril ve ta a.
Chun, a ni sari ni, nisa tlâk hmain chu khuoa mihai chun a kuomah, “Khuoizu nêka thlum lem ieng am a ni a le? Sakeibaknei nêka hrât lem ieng am a ni a le?” an ti a. Ama chun an kuomah,
“Ka bâwngla hin hnuoi inlet naw unla chu,
Ka thukhir hi in hriet suok dêr naw ding bah,” a ti a.
Chun,

Chu hnung sâwt rak loa chun, bu sîk hun lai hin, Samson chun kêlte chawiin a nuhmei chu a va kan a, “Pindan sûnga sawn ka nuhmei kuomah ka va lût ding a nih,” a ti a. Nisienlakhawm, a pa chun a lût a lo phal ta naw a.

A pa chun, “Ama hi i theida hle rawi am a nih ka ti a, chuleiin, i ruolpa ka lo pêk tah a nih; a sang hi ama nêkin a hmêl a ṭha lem a ni naw am a nih? A aiah ka ngên che hi, ama hi nei lem el raw khai,” a ti a.
Samson chun an kuomah, “Tuta ṭum chu Philistin mihai pawi tâwk lang khawm dem kai naw ning ah,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Samson chun sihal za thum a va man a, meiser a lâk a, an mei le mei chu a sui mat a, an mei inkâr senga chun meiserhai a sie a,
Chun, meiserhai chu a raw zo chun Philistin mihai bu ngîr lai chun ân tlânluttir tâwl ta a, buphal le bu la ngîrhai chu, oliv hmunhai chenin a kâng ta vawng a.

Chun, Philistin mihai chun, “Hi hi tu ithaw am an leh?” an ti a. Anni ma chun, “Timnaa mi mâkpa Samson thaw a ni el hi tie, a nuhmei a lâkpêk a, a ruolpa kha ân neitir leiin,” an ti a. Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hung a, chu minu le a pa chu an raw hlum ta a.
Chun, Samson chun an kuomah, “Hieng anga in thaw a ni si chun in chungah phuba ka lâk hmakhat chu to naw ning,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, nasatakin a thaw a, a that a that a, chun a fe thla a, Etam lungpui kawi kârah a um ta a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hang fe a, Juda rama chun an hang inkul a, Lehi hmuna chun an inzar a.
Juda rama mihai chun, “Iengtiziea mi do dinga hung el am in ni a?” an lo ti a. Anni chun, “Samson kha khuop a, kan chunga a thaw ang bawka a chunga thaw ve dingin kan hung a nih,” an ti a.

Chun, Juda rama mi, mi sâng thum Etam lungpui kawi kâra chun an zu fe a, Samson kuoma chun, “Philistin mihai hi kan chunga rorêltuhai an nih ti i hriet naw am a nih? Iengtiziea kan chunga hieng thil hung thaw el am i ni a?” an ti a. Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka chunga an thaw ang bawkin an chungah ka thaw ve a ni kha,” a ti a.

Anni chun a kuomah, “Nang hi khuop chea, Philistin mihai kuta pe ding chein kan hung thla a nih,” an ti a. Chun Samsonin an kuomah, “Nangni chun chu mi sukhlum lo dingin ka kuomah ṭawng inkhâm ro,” a ti a.

Anni chun a kuomah, “Sukhlum lo e a, amiruokchu, khuop tlat kan ti che a, an kutah kan pêk el ding che a nih; that chu that dêr naw ning ung che,” tiin an hril a. Chuongchun, hruihruol thar pahniin an khuop a, lungpuia inthawk chun an ṭhuoi tung ta a.
Lehi hmun a hung tlung chun, Philistin mihai chun an lo tuok a, an lo khêk dur dur a; chun,
Chun, sabengtung khâkru a tharlâm deu hi a hmu a, a hei ban a, a lâk a, chu chun mi sâng khat a vuok hlum a.
Chun, Samson chun,
“Sabengtung khâkruin pâwng thûr pâwng thûr e,
Sabengtung khâkruin mi sâng khat ka vuok hlum ie,”
a ti a.
Thu a hril zo chun a khâkru chawi chu a pei ta a; chun, chu hmun chu Ramath-lehi
chun, a dang a hung châr ta êm êm el a,

Chuongchun, Pathien chun Lehi hmuna khur um chu a hung sukkak phuk a; chun, tui a hung inchik suok ta a; chu chu a hang dâwn chun a lungril a hung hrât nâwk ta a, a hung har ta huoi a, chuongchun, chu hminga chun En-hakkore
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai hun laia chun Israelhai chungah kum sâwmhni ro a rêl a nih.
Samson chu Gazaah a fe a, chutaka chun nawchizawr hi a hmu a, a kuomah a lût ta a.

Chun, “Samson chu hitaka hin a hung ie,” tiin Gaza mihai chu an hril a. Chuongchun, an inhuol ta a, khawpui kul kawtkhâra chun zânkhawvâr an inchân a, zânkhawvâr chun an to ṭhiep a, “Khuo hung var phawt phawt sien, chuongchun, ei that ding annâwm,” an ti a.

Nisienlakhawm, Samson chu zânril chenin a zâl a, zânril lai chun a tho a, khawpui kul kawtkhârhai le a ban pahni chu a chel a, a kilnahai chen a phawidawk vawng a, a liengkoin a put a, Hebron zâwn tlâng sîp chenin a hang put kai a.
A nakie deu chun Sorek ruoma mi nuhmei pakhat a dit zâwng ta a, a hming chu Delila a nih.

Chun, Philistin mihai mi lienhai chu a kuoma chun an hang fe a, a kuomah, “Ama chu kan hne a, khuopa kan sawisak theina dingin a hrâtna san hi hriet tumin zâwr raw khai, chuongchun, kan rêng hin tangka sâng khat le za khat pe seng kan ti che,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Delila chun Samson kuoma chun, “I hrât hlena san hi mi hril raw khai, iengtin am sawisak dinga khuop thei ning i ti a?” a ti a.
Samson chun a kuomah, “Thalhrui thar la ṭâwl lo pasariin mi khuop sienla, chuongchun, hrât naw ning a, mi dang ang el bawk nîng ka tih,” a ti a.
Chun, Philistin mi mi lienhai chun thalhrui thar pasari la ṭâwl hlek lohai chu an pêk a, chuonghai chun a khuop ta a, Pindan sûng rilah inchânrutuhai an sie a.

Chun, a kuomah, “Samson, Philistin mihaiin an hung thaw ding che a nih ie,” a ti a. Chun, thalhruihai chu meiin ziza hrui pawn a kâng tan ang el hin a suktan ta a. Chuongchun, a hrâtna san chu hriet a ni naw a.
Chun, Delila chun Samson kuomah, “Ngai ta, i mi hlêm a, khêl i mi hril a nih, ieng anga khuop thei am i ni ding a na mi hril ta raw khai,” a ti a.
“Hruihruol thar la hmang hlek lovin mi khuop hai sienla, chuongchun, hrât ta naw ning a, mi dang ang el bawk nîng ka tih,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, Delila chun hruihruol thar a lâk a, a khuop ta a; chun, a kuomah, “Samson, Philistin mihaiin an hung thaw ding che a nih ie,” a ti a. Pindan sûng rila chun ân chânrutuhai kha an um a. Chun, a kut khuopna chu patzai suktan ang elin a hang suktan ta a.

Chun, Delila chun Samson kuomah, “I mi la hlêmin, khêl i mi la hril ta rawp a ni hi, ieng anga khuop thei ding am i ni a, mi hril raw khai,” a ti a. Ama chun, “ka sam phier sari hi puonah khâwng sa la, kilnain kildet la; chuongchun, hrât ta naw ning a, mi dang ang bawk ni el ka tih,” tiin a dawn a.

Chuongchun, a sam phier sari chu puonah a khâwngsa a, kilnain a kilde tlat a, a kuomah, “Samson, Philistin mihaiin an hung thaw ding che a ni ie,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a in chu a hung har a, puonkawl kildena chu a kawl le a pat pumin a keidawk ta vawng el a.

Chun, a kuomah, “I lungril hi i mi pêk hlek si naw a, iengtiziea, ‘Ka hmangai che,’ ti thei am i ni leh? Hi ṭum thum rau i mi hlêmna i suklang ta a, i hrât vieuna san hi i mi la hril dêr da el a” a ti a.
Chuonga ni tin ela a mawr rak a, a ngên tlut tlut leiin, thina khawp rauin a lungvar a hung lunginzîng ta a.

Chuongchun, a lungril po po chu a hril ta vawng a, a kuomah, “Ka lua hin bakmêt chem hrim ruoi a la ni ngai naw a, ka nu sula ka um laia inthawka Pathien ta dinga Nazarit mia hung um ka ni a, tuhin hung invaw ta lang chu ka hrâtna chu bo vawng el a tih; chuongchun, hung hrât nâwng ka ta, mi dang ang bawk hung ni el ka tih,” a ti a.

A lungril po po chu a hril vawng an tah ti Delila chun a hriet phingleh Philistin mihai mi lienhai chu, “La hung nâwk phawt ta u, a lungril po po chu a mi hril vawng a ni tah,” tiin ân cha tâwl ta a. Chuongchun, Philistin mihai mi lienhai chu a kuoma chun an hang fe a, tangka chu an chawi a.
Chun, a mal chungah a in innghiltir a, chun pasal a ko a, a sam phier sari chu ân âttantir ta vawng a, a sawisa ṭan ta a; chuongchun, a hrâtna chu a hung bo vawng el ta a.
Chun, “Samson, Philistin mihaiin an hung thaw ding che a ni ie,” a hang ti a: chun, a in chu a hang har a, “Ni dang ang bawk khan suok nâwk el ka ta, intleng suok nâwk el naw ning am,” a ti a,
Chun, Philistin mihai chun an man a, a mit an kheldawkpêk a, Gaza khuoah an fe thlâkpui a, dâr kawlhai an inbuntir a, lung inah bu a râwt nawi hlak a.
Nisienlakhawm, a lu vâw kha a lua sam chu a hung sei nâwk ta a.
Chun, Philistin mihai mi lienhai chu an pathien Dagon kuoma inthâwina ropuitak inhlân ding le insukhlim dingin an pung khâwm tâwl a, “Ei pathienin ei hmêlmapa Samson a mi pêk tah annâwm,” an ti a.
Chun, mipuihai chun an hang hmu chun an pathien chu an inpâk a, “Ei pathienin ei hmêlmapa le ei ram suksetu, mi tamtak mi thattupa chu ei kutah a mi pêk tah annâwm,” an ti a.

Chuonga an lungril a hlim lai tak chun, “Samson kha ennuom dingin hung ko ta u,” an ti a. Chuongchun, Samson chu lung ina inthawk chun an va ko suok a, chuongchun an hmaa chun a thaw ta a, ban le ban inkâra hin an inngîrtir a,
Chun, Samson chu ama keitu naupang kuoma chun, “Hi in dotu ban hi mi hang inthemtir ta, hang innghai ka ti ie,” a ti a.
Chu in chu nuhmei le pasalin an sip mup el a; Philistin mihai mi lienhai po po chu chutaka chun an um vawng a, chun Samson ennuoma thlîrtuhai chu in chunga chun pasal le nuhmei sâng thum lai an um a.
Chun, Samson chun
Chun, Samson chun chu in dotuhai tak, sût pahni chu a hei them a, a kut changtiengin pakhat chu a ringsan a, a kut vawitiengin pakhat.

Chun, Samson chun, “Philistin mihai hi hang thichil ka ti a,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a theitâwpin a kûn rak a; chun, mi lienhai le mipui a sûnga umhai po po chu in chun a del ta a. Chuongchun, a dam laia a sukhlumhai nêk chun a thichilhai chu an tam lem a.

Chun, a unauhai le a pa sûnghai po po chu an hung suok a, an lâk a, an hang zâwn a, Zora le Estaol inkâra a pa Manoa phûmna hmunah an phûm ta a. Chuongchun, kum sâwmhni Israelhai chungah ro a rêl a nih.
Ephraim tlâng rama chun mi pakhat a um a, a hming chu Mika a nih.

Ama chun a nu kuomah, “Tangka sâng khat le za khat an inrûkpêk che a, nang khawma ṭawngsie inphura, ka na hriet ngeia i hril kha, en ta, kha tangka kha ka kuomah a um a, keia lâk a ni kha,” a ti a. A nu chun, “Ka naupa chu
Chun, tangka sâng khat le za khat chu a nu a pêk nâwk a; chun, a nu chun, “Hi tangka hi keima kut ngeiin, ka naupa puola milim siemna ding le milim sungna dingin
Chun, tangka chu a nu a hang pêk chun a nu chun tangka za hni chu a lâk a, tangkaraw suttu kuomah a pêk a, ama chun milimin a lo siem a, milimin a lo sung ta a, chu chu Mika ina chun a um a.
Chun, Mika chun pathienhaiah a nei a, zakawsîng le milimhai a siem a, a naupa pakhat chu a thiempu dingin a suktum ta a.
Chun, Bethlehem-judaa mi Juda hnam, Levi chi tlangvâl pakhat a um a, chutaka chun a va um ve vak a.
Ama chu Bethlehem-juda khawpuia inthawka suok a, umna zawnga invâk a ni a, chuonga ân vâknaa chun Ephraim tlâng rama Mika in chu a va tlung ta a.
Mika chun a kuomah, “khâwtaka inthawka hung am i ni a?” a lo ti a. Ama chun a kuomah, “Bethlehemjudaa inthawkin, Levi chi ka ni a, umna ding zawnga invâk ka nih,” a ti a.
Mika chun a kuomah, “Ka kuoma hin um el ta la, ka pa ding le thiempu dingin um la, kum tinin tangkaruo tlang sâwm pêng ka ti che a, silfên sil khat le i fâk dinghai khawm,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Levi chi chu a lût ta a, Levi chi chun ama kuoma um chu a remti ta a, chuongchun, chu tlangvâl chu a naupa pakhatah a um ta a.
Chun, Mika chun Levi chi chu a suktum ta a, chuongchun, tlangvâl chu a thiempuah a hung um a, Mika ina chun a um ta a.
Chuongchun, Mika chun, “Tu zet hin chu Levi chi ka thiempu dingin ka nei ta si a,
Chuong lai chun Israel ramah lal an um naw a; chun Dan chihai chun ram hluo ding an zawng a: chuong lai chen khawm chun Israel chihai laia khan ram hluo ding an la chang si naw a.

Chuongchun, Dan mihai chun an hnam pumpui laia mi, pasal ṭha panga, Zora le Estoal khuoa inthawkin ram va enthlithlai ding le va hre chieng dingin an tir a, an kuoma chun, “Va fe unla, ram chu va hre chieng ta u,” an ti a. Chuongchun, Ephraim tlâng rama Mika in chu an va tlung a, chutaka chun an riek ta a.

Mika in kâwla an um lai chun Levi chi tlangvâl râwl chu an hriet a, chu tieng chu an va pan a, a kuomah, “Tuin am hitaka hin a ṭhuoi che a? Hi hmuna hin ieng am i thaw a? Taka hin ieng thawa um che?” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Mika hin hieng ang hin a mi lo siem ta a, a mi ruoi a, a thiempuah ka um a nih,” a ti a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Kan fena dinga hin kan tluongtlung ding le ding naw Pathien mi râwnpêk raw khai,” an ti a.
Chun, thiempu chun an kuomah, “Thlamuongtakin fe ro khai, in fena ding chu
Chun, Zora le Estaol khuoa unauhai kuoma an kîr nâwk chun, an unauhai chun an kuomah, “Ieng am hril ding in nei a?” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Zora le Estaola inthawk chun Dan hnamhai chu indona thuom inbelin mi za ruk an suok a.
Chutaka inthawk chun Ephraim tlâng ram tieng chu an pan a, Mika in chu an va tlung a.

Chun, Lais ram enthlithlai dinga suokhai mi panga chun an dawn a, an unauhai kuomah, “Hieng inhaia hin zakawsîng dâm, milim siem fâwm dâm, milim sung fâwm dâm, a um ti in hriet am? Chuleiin, tuhin ieng am in thaw ding ngaituo ro,” an ti a.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chu an pêt a, Levi chi tlangvâl umna Mika in ngei chu an va tlung a, a chungchâng thu an indawn a.
Chun, Dan mihai za ruk indona thuom inbelhai chu kul kawtkhâr bulah an ngîr a.

Chun, mi panga ram enthlithlaituhai chu an hang fe a, an hang lût a, milim siem fâwm dâm, milim dâm, milim sung fâwm dâm chu an lâk a, chun, thiempu chu mi za ruk indona thuom inbelhai lai kul kawtkhâr bula chun a ngîr ve a.
Chun, chuong mihai chu Mika inah an hang lût a, milim siem fâwm dâm, zakawsîng dâm, milim dâm, milim sung fâwm dâm an hang lâk chun, thiempu chun an kuomah, “Ieng am in thaw a ni leh?” a ti a.

Anni chun, “To rawh, i kutin i bau kha hup la, kan kuomah hung ve la, kan paa le thiempuah hung um rawh; i ta dingin sûng khat chau thiempua um am a ṭha lema Israelhai laia chi khat le hnam khat ta dinga thiempua um?” an ti a.
Chun, thiempu lungril chu a lâwm hle el ta a, chuongchun, zakawsîng dâm, milim dâm, milim siem fâwm dâm chu a lâk a, mipui laia chun a ṭhang ve ta a.
Chuongchun, an fe suok ta a, an nau le tehai le an ranhai, thuomhnawhai chu an sawm pei a.
Mika ina inthawka hla rei an hang fe hnung chun, Mika tuolbâwmhai chu an inpunkhâwm a, Dan mihai chu an va hnawt phâk ta a.
Chun, Dan mihai chu an hei ko a. Anni chu an hung ngha kîr a, Mika kuoma chun, “Ieng am a ni ta leh mi khâng zozai kha i hung pui?” an ti a.
Ama chun, “Ka pathien siemhai le thiempu chu in fepui a, in fe ta dai el a, ieng am nei ka nei ta leh? Iengti tia, ‘Ieng am i ni ta leh?’ mi ti el am in ni a?” a ti a.
Dan mihai chun a kuomah, “Keini lai hin ṭawng mei mei naw ta khai, chuong naw chun chu mi lunginrawm kut tuor rawi i tih; nang le i sûnghai hringna chân el rawi in tih,” an ti a.
Chun, Dan mihai chu an fe ta a, Mika chun ama ta dingin an hrât taluozie chu a hmuin a inah a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, Mika thil siem le a thiempu nei chu fepuiin Lais khuo, râlmuonga um ṭawk ṭawkhai kuom chu an hang tlung a, kâwlhnâmin an hang that a, khuo chu an raw ta a.

Zidona inthawka a hang hlat êm leiin a hang sansuoktu ding hlak tukhawm an um si naw a; tuhai le hlak khawm inhmangna hrim an nei naw bawk a; Beth-rehob bul ruoma um a nih. Chun, khuo chu an siem nâwk a, chutaka chun an um ta a.
A khaw hminga chun Israel nau an thlatu Dan hming inchawiin Dan an inbûk a, a phut chun chu khuo chu Lais an ti hlak a nih.
Chun, Dan mihai chun milim siem fâwm chu anni ta dingin an inngîr ta a; chun, Mosie
Chuongchun, Silo khuoa Pathien in a um sûng po chun an inngîr ta a.
Chuong laia Israel rama lal um naw lai chun Levi chi, mi pakhat hi Ephraim tlâng ram tâwp tieng chun a um a; Juda rama Bethlehema mi thaikêmin a nei a.
A thaikêm chun a uiretsan

Chun, a pasal chu a tho a, a siehlaw le sabengtung pahni ṭhuoiin va thlêma lungâwitaka ṭhuoi kîr nâwk tumin a va hnawt a. Ama chun a pa ina chun a lo ṭhuoi lût a. Nunghâk pa chun ama a lo hmuin a lo lâwm hle el a.
Chun, a tarpupa, nunghâk pa chun a kuoma um dingin a lo thlo a, a kuoma chun ni thum a um a, an fâkin an dâwn tlâng a, chutaka chun a riek a.

A ni li ni chun zingkâr inhmatakin an tho a, ama chu fe dingin an singsa a; nisienlakhawm, nunghâk pa chun a mâkpa kuoma chun, “Bei tlâwmte bêk fain i lungril insukhar phawt ta la, chu hnunga chun i la fe ding an nawm,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a ṭhung a, an pahni chun an fâkin an dâwn tlâng a; chun, nunghâk pa chun mi kuoma chun, “Lungawitakin riek hrâm raw khai, i lungril chu hlimtakin um raw se,” a ti a.
Mi chu fe tuma a hang tho chun, a tarpupa chun a thlêm a, chuongchun, a riek nâwk ta a.

A ni nga ni zîngkâr chun fe tumin inhmatakin a tho a, chun nunghâk pa chun, “I lungril sukhar hri phawt la tie, zântieng nisa innêm hun chen bêk chu um hri raw khai,” a ti a. Chun, an pahniin bu an fâk nâwk ta a.

Chun, mi chu a thaikêm le a siehlaw leh suok tuma an hang tho chun, a tarpupa, nunghâk pa chun a kuomah, “En ta, hi khuo khawm ân hnu ta a, vawizân chu riek nâwk hrâm el raw khai. En ta, khuo khawm ân thim hnai el ta hi, hitaka hin riek nâwk la, i lungril khawm hlimtakin um raw se; chun, zingah zîngkâr tho i ta, fe de ti nih,” a ti a.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chun chu zân chun riek a nuom ta naw a, a tho a, a suok ta a, Jebus khaw zâwn a va tlung a (chu chu Jerusalem khuo a nih), sabengtung pahni inthuom sa a ṭhuoi a, a thaikêm khawm chu a ṭhang ve a.
Jebus khaw kâwl an tlung chun khuo an hnu hle ta a; chun, siehlaw chun a pu kuomah, “Hung rawh, hi Jebus mihai khawpuia hin lût ei tiu a, riek el ei tiu khai,” a ti a.
A pu chun a kuomah, “Israel thlahai ni si lo hnam khuoa chun lût lo e a, Gibea khuo tieng pan pei lem ei tiu,” a ti a.
Chun, a siehlaw kuomah, “Hung rawh, hieng khuo laia pakhat hi pan ei tih. Gibea khuoa manih Rama khuoa manih ei riek ding annawm,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a fe nâwk ta pei a, Benjamin mihai Gibea khaw kâwl an tlung chun nisa a tla ta a.
Chun, Gibea khuoa riek ding chun an lût ta a; a lût a, chu khawpui khawlaidunga chun a ṭhung a, tukhawm ama intlungtir an um si naw a.
Chun, ngai ta, tar pakhat hi zântieng chun a lo fe a hung a, ama chu Ephraim tlâng rama mi a nih. Gibeaa chun a va um vak a nih, chutaka mihai ruok chu Benjamin mihai an nih.
Chun, a hang ngha a, khawlaia mikhuolpa chu a hang hmu chun, tarpa chun, “Khâwlaia fe ding am i ni a? Khâwtaka inthawka hung am i ni a?” a ti a.
Ama chun, a kuomah, “Juda ram Bethlehema inthawk Ephraim tlâng ram tâwp tienga fe tum ka nih; chutaka um chu ka ni a, Juda ram Bethlehemah ka va fe a, tuhin

Ka sabengtung ta ding lem chun bupâwl le ran bu khawm kan nei a; chun, kei le i suoknu le i siehlawhai kuoma um ve tlangvâl ta ding khawm hin bei le uoin a um bawk a, iengkhawm tlâksam chu kan nei dêr nawh,” a ti a.
Chun, tarpa chun, “Thlamuongtakin um raw khai, i mamaw po po chu keiin tum vawng ka tih, khawlaia chun chu riek lul naw rawh,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, a inah a ṭhuoi lût a, sabengtunghai chu bu a pêk a; chun, an kehai dâm an sâwp a, an fâkin an dâwn ta a.

Chuong anga hlim le lâwmtaka an um lai chun, ngai ta, chu khuoa mi Belial naupasal ṭhenkhathai chun in chu an hung inhuol ta a, kawtkhâr chu an hung suk dawt dawt a, in neitupa, tarpa kuoma chun, “I ina hung tlungpa kha hung ṭhuoi suok rawh, lo pâwl kan tih,” an ti a.
Chun, in neitupa chu a va suok a, an kuoma chun, “Ni lo e, ka unauhai, chuong ang êma suol chu thaw lul naw ro khai, ama hi ka mikhuol a ni hi, hieng anga thil invêtthlâktak hi chu thaw lo e a.

En ta u, hitaka hin ka naunu nunghâk le a thaikêm an um a, anni chu hung ṭhuoi suok ka ta, anni chu intlâwm unla, ṭha in ti ang phawtin an chungah thaw de ti niu, ama chunga ruok hin chu chuong ang thil invêtthlâk chu thaw naw ro,” a ti a.

Amiruokchu, chuonghai chun a thu an pawm nuom naw a; chuongchun, mi chun a thaikêm chu a man a, an kuoma chun a va ṭhuoi suok ta a; chun, anni chun an lo pâwl a, khawvar hmakhat chun zânkhawvârin an lo sawisa hrep a; khuo a hung var phingle chun an insuo ta a.
Khuo a hung var phingle chun nuhmei chu a fe a, a hotupa tlunginpa kawtkhâr bula chun a tlu dêr a, khawvar hnung chenin a um ta zing a.
Chun, a hotupa chu zîngkâr chun a hung tho a, kawtkhârhai chu a hei hawng a, fe tumin a va suok chun, a thaikêm chu a kuthai kaiṭên chunga inbânga lo tlu dêr el chu a hmu a.
Ama chun, “Tho rawh, fêng ei tih,” a hang ti a; nisienlakhawm, a dawn ta dêr naw a. Chuongchun, sabengtung chunga chun a siekai a; a tho a, a in tieng chun a fe ta a.
Chun, a in a va tlung chun chemtê a lâk a, a thaikêm chu a ru pumin hmun sâwm le hmun hniah a channawi a, Israel ram po poah a thawn dar a.

A lo hmu taphawt chun, “Israel thlahai Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok chinah hieng ang thil hrim hrim hi a la um ngai naw a, hmu khawm a ni ngai dêr nawh; ngaituo unla, inrâwn unla, hril ta u,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai po po chu an inthawk tâwl ta a, thukhat chelin, Dan khuoa inthawka Beer-seba chenin, Gilead rama mihai leh, Mizpaah
Chun, mi po po hotuhai, Israel chihai po po chen khawm chun Pathien mihai inkhâwmnaa chun an va ṭhang ve a, sipai kâwlhnâm chawi mi, nuoi li an nih.
(Benjamin mihai chun Israel thlahai chu Mizpaa chun an hang fe ti an lo hriet a.) Chun, Israel thlahai chun, “Iengti ziea hieng anga rîtlona hi hung um am a ni a? mi hril ta u,” an ti a.
Chun, Levi chi, nuhmei an that pasal chun, “Benjamin chihai umna khuo Gibeaah ka thaikêm leh riek tumin kan lût a.
Chun, Gibea mihai chun an mi hung thaw ta a, zânah in an hung inhuol a, mi that an tum a, ka thaikêmnu chu an sawisa hrep a, a hung thi ta a.
Chuongchun, ka thaikêm ruong chu ka lâk a, ka channâwi a, Israelhai ram hluo po poah ka thawn dar a nih. Israel rama hin thil tirdakumtak le invêtthlâktak an lo thaw ta si a.
Nangni Israel thlahai, in rêng hin ngai ta u, in ngaidân le in remti dân chu hril ro khai,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, mipui po po chu thukhat chelin an tho ṭhuop a, “Tukhawm mâni puon in tieng fe nâwm ei nih, tukhawm mâni ina khawm lût naw bawk ei tiu.
Gibea mihai ei thaw dân ding chu hieng ang hi a nih:

ṭhumvâwr ei ta, Israelhai chunga thil indik naw tak an thaw ang peia an thaw a, Gibea hmuna Benjamin mihai ei hang thawnaa mipuihai fâk ding lo inhlântu dingin Israel hnam po po laia mi za khatah sâwm pei, sâng khatah za pei, sîng khatah sâng pei thlang suok ei tih,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai po po chu chu khawpui thaw ding chun, mi pakhat anga insuikhawmin, an pungkhâwm ta a.
Chun, Israel hnamhai chun Benjamin mihai po po kuoma chun, “Nangni laia hieng anga rîtlona hung um el ta hi iengtizie am a ni a?

Gibeaa Belial nauhai chu hung ṭhuoi ro, chuongchun, Israel rama suol hi a re theina dingin lo sukhlum kan tih,” tiin mi an tir a. Nisienlakhawm, Benjamin chihai chun an unau Israel thlahai thuhril chu an lo pawm nuom naw a.
Benjamin mihai chu Israel thlahai chu do dingin khawpuia inthawk dâmin an hung suok tâwl a, Gibeaa chun an lût tâwl a.
Chun, chu nia Benjamin mihai khawpuia inthawka kâwlhnâm chawia suokhai chu, Gibeaa mi za sari thlang ṭhieu tiemsa lovin, mi sîng hni le sâng ruk an nih.
Chuong po po lai chun vawikawlawng thlang ṭhieu za sari an um a, an rêng chun vailungdênga samzai ruol khawm ṭhel hlek lo mi an nih.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu Benja-min mihai tiem lovin, kâwlhnâm chawi mi ṭhieu nuoi li an nih, chuonghai po po chu indo mi vawng an nih.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu an tho a, Bethelah an hang fe a, Pathien an hang râwn a, “Benjamin mihai chu tu am a na hang thaw hmasa ding?” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chu zîngkâr an tho a, Gibea chu an hang inhuol a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu Benjamin mihai thaw ding chun an inthawk a, anni thawna dingin Israel mihai chun Gibeaah ṭhanghmun an hang siem a.
Benjamin mihai chu Gibea khuoa inthawk chun an hung suok a, chu ni chun Israel mihai lai chun mi sîng hni le sâng hni an hung that ta a.
Chun, mipui, Israel thlahai chu an hang infui tuo nâwk a, an thaw phut nia an thawna hmuna bawk chun thaw dingin ṭhang an hang siem nâwk a.
(Chun, Israel thlahai chu an hang fe a, Pathien hmaah zântieng chenin an hang ṭap a, “Kan unau Benjamin mihai hi do dingin kan hang inthawk nâwk ding am a nih?” tiin
Chun a ni hni niin Israel thlahai chun Benjamin thlahai chu an hang hnai a.

Benjamin mihai khawm chu a ni hni ni chun thaw dingin Gibeaa inthawk chu an suok ve a, Israel thlahai lai chun sîng khat le sâng riet an hung that nâwk a, chuonghai po po chu kâwlhnâm chawi mi an nih.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai po po le mipuihai po po chu an hang fe a, Bethela chun an hang fe a; an ṭap a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
chun, chuong lai chun Aron naupa Eleazar naupa Phinehas chun a rawng a bâwl hlak a nih.) “Kan unau Benjamin mihai chu kan hang thaw nâwk ding am, kan tâwpsan el ta ding?” tiin.
Chun, Israelhai chun Gibea khuo vêla chun inchântu an insie rûk a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu Benjamin mihai chu do dingin a ni thum ni chun an hang inthawk nâwk a, ni dang ang bawk khan Gibea khuo thaw ding chun ṭhang an hang siem nâwk a.

Benjamin thlahai chu mihai chu do dingin an va suok a, khuo chu an suoksan a, chuongchun, ni dang ang bawk khan mihai chu thawin an that ṭan nâwk a, phûl faiah Bethel khuo hang fena le Gibea khuo lampuihaia chun Israelhai chu sâwmthum an that a.
Benjamin thlahai chun, “A hma ang bawk khan, ei hmaah an tlâwm nâwk ta le,” an ti a. Israel thlahai ruok chun, “Tlân ei tiu khai, khawpuia inthawk hi lamlienah intâwldawktir ei tiu,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai po po chun an ṭhanghmun chu an suoksan a, Baal-tamar hmunah ṭhanghmun an siem a; chun, lo inchânrutu Israelhai kha an ṭhanghmun Maare-geba
Chun, Israel mihai laia thlang ṭhieu sîng khatin Gibea khuo chu an thaw a, an inthaw chu a nasa hle el a, nisienlakhawm, anni chun an chan a se ngei ding a nih ti an hriet nawh.

Chuongchun, Benjamin mihai chun an tlâwm an tah ti an inhriet ta a, Israel thlahai chun Gibea khuo thaw dinga arûka inchântuhai an sie kha an ringzo leiin Benjamin mihai an hang hnungintawl san a nih.
Chun, arûka inchântuhai chun Gibea khuo chu an baw ta thut a, arûka inchântuhai chu an inzar dar a, khuoa mihai po po chu kâwlhnâmin an thaw ta rak el a.
Israel thlahai le arûka inchântuhai kha an intiemna chu khawpui sûnga mei sukkhûk lui lui phaleh

Israel thlahai chun indona chu thaw ṭan ve ding ti a nih. Benjamin mihai chun an hang thaw ṭan a, Israel mihai chu sâwmthum lai an that a, “Ei inthaw phut ni ang bawk khan an tlâwm nâwk ta ngei el le,” an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, khawpui sûnga chun meikhu chu a hung intung ta lui phingleh, Benjamin mihai chu an hei nghaleh a, khawpui chu a puma vân tienga khu tung ta lui lui el chu an hei hmu a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chu an hung inher nâwk ta a, Benjamin mihai chu an lunginzîng ta hle a, an chan a se ding a nih ti an hriet ta leiin.
Chuleiin, Israelhai hmaa chun thlalêr tieng ân tlânse ta a; nisienlakhawm, an hnawtzui ta ngat ngat a, khawpuia inthawka hung suokhai chun chutaka chun an sukhlum a.
Benjamin mihai chu an inhuol ta tlat a, an hnawt a, nisa suokna tieng Gibea dep an châwlna hmunah an hnawt phâk a.
Benjamin mihai chu mi sîng khat le sâng riet an thi a, an rêng el chun mi hrât huoisen ṭhieu an nih.
Chun, an intâwl a, thlalêr tieng Rimmon lungpuiah an tlânsie a; mi sâng nga chu lamlienhaia chun an that a, Gidom chenin an hnawtzui ngat ngat a, mi sâng hni an that a.
Chuongchun, chu nia Benjamin mi thihai po chu kâwlhnâm chawi mi ṭhieu sîng hni le sâng nga an nih, an rêng chun mi hrât huoisen an nih.
Mi za ruk ruok chu thlalêr tieng Rimmon lungpuiah an tlânsie a, chu Rimmon lungpuia chun thla li an um a.

Chun, Israelhai chu Benjamin mihai chunga chun an inthawk nâwk a, khawpui sûnga mi taphawt chu ranhai an hmu taphawt khawm kâwlhnâmin an sât hlum pei a; chu nawa khawm khuo an hmu taphawt chu an raw pei a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun Mizpaa chun, “Eini laia mi tukhawm ei naunuhmeihai hi Benjamin mihai nuhmeiah inneitir dêr nâwng ei tiu,” tiin ṭawng an inkhâm a.
Chun, mipui chu Bethelah an fe a, Pathien hmaa chun zântieng chenin an ṭhung a, an râwlhai insuoin an ṭap rak rak a.
Anni chun, “Aw
Chun, a zînga chun mipui chu inhmatakin an tho a, chutaka chun maichâm an siem a, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le inremna thilinhlânhai an inhlân a.
Chun, Israel thlahai chun, “Israel pahnam po po laia
Chun, Israel thlahai chun an unau Benjamin mihai chu an lainat hle el ta a, “Vawisûn ni hin Israel thlahai laia hnam khat chu sâtthlâk an lo ni ta si a.
A la um sunhai ta ding chun an nuhmei ding iengtin am ei thaw ding nîng a ta le? Ei naunuhmeihai hi nuhmeia inneitir dêr lo dingin
Chun, anni chun, “Israel pahnam laia mi a tu hnam tak am a na Mizpaa
Mipui chu an hang intiem chun Jabes-gilead rama umhai chu pakhat bêk khawm an lo um ve nawh ti an hmu ta a.
Chun, inkhâwmhai chun mi huoisen ṭha ṭhieu sîng khat le sâng hni an tir a, thu an pêk a: “Fe unla, Jabes-gilead rama umhai chu nuhmei le naupanghai khawm va sât hlum vawng ro.
In thaw dân ding chu hieng ang hi a nih, pasal tin le nuhmei tin, pasal zâlpui taphawt chu in sukhlum vawng ding a nih,” tiin.
Chun, Jabes-gilead rama umhai lai chun nunghâk za li, pasal la pâwl ngai hleklo an hmu a, chuonghai chu Kanaan rama an inkulna Siloa chun an hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, inkhâwmhai po po chun mi an tir a, Rimmon lungpuia um Benjamin mihai an va biek a, an kuomah inremna thu an puong a.
Chu phingle chun Benjamin mihai chu an kîr ta a; chun, Jabesgilead rama nuhmeihai an ihlahai chu an pêk a, chuong sa khawm chun an lân dai ta naw a.
Chun, Israel hnamhai laiah
Chuongchun, inkhâwmhai upahai chun, “A la damhai nuhmei ding hi iengtin am ei thaw ding chu? Benjamin mihai laia an nuhmeihai chu sukbohmang an lo ni ta si a,” an ti a.
Anni chun, “Israel hnam hi sukhmanga a um nawna dingin Benjamin mi la um sunhai hin an ta dinga rohluotu an nei ngei ding a nih.
Ei naunuhmeihai hlak nuhmeiah ei inneitir thei si naw a, Israel thlahai chun, ‘Tukhawm Benjamin mi nuhmei ding pe taphawt chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,’ tiin ṭawng ei lo inkhâm ta si a.
Nisienlakhawm, ngai ta u, Bethel hmar tieng, Bethela inthawka Sekem fena lamlien saktieng panga Lebanon sim tienga um Siloah kum tin
Chuongchun, anni chun Benjamin mihai kuoma chun, “Fe unla, grêp huonah vân bi unla,

lo thlîr zing unla, Siloa nunghâkhai rawi lâmnaa lâm dinga an hung suok pha, grêp huona inthawk chun hung suok unla, Silo nunghâkhai chu mâni nuhmei ding seng man unla, Benjamin mihai ramah fe vawng el ro.

Chun, an pahai amanih an ṭahai amanih, sawisêl dinga kan kuoma an hung leh, an kuomah, ‘Mi lunginsiet ro khai, indonaa khan an nuhmei ding kan lo manpêk seng ta si naw a; nangni hlaka in lo pêk naw bawk si a, lo pe ni unla thiemnaw in hlaw ding a ni bawk si a,’ lo tîng kan tih,” tiin thu an pêk ta a.

Chun, Benjamin mihai chun chuong ang chun an thaw a, a lâmhai laia mi chu anni zât seng nuhmeiah an man a, an fe hmangpui ta a; chun, an ram tieng chun an fe a, khawpuihai chu an chei nâwk a, chutaka chun an um ta a.
Chu phingleh chutaka inthawk chun Israel thlahai chu mâni chi chi le mâni hnam hnamin an inhlawm hran nâwk a, chutaka inthawk chun mâni ram sengah an fe nâwk ta a.
Rorêltuhaiin ro an rêl laiin chu rama chun ṭâm a hung tla a, chun, Juda ram Bethlehema mi pakhat Moab rama um dingin, ama le a nuhmei le a naupasalhai pahni chu an fe a.
Nisienlakhawm, Elimelek, Naomi pasal chu, a thi a, amanu le a naupasalhai pahni chau chu an um ta a.
Chun, Mahlon le Kilion chu an thi ve ve a; chuongchun, Naomi chu a naupasalhai pahni le a pasal chun an thi san ta a.
Chun, Moab rama inthawkin,
Chuongchun, a umnaa inthawk chun a mohai pahni le chun a suok a, Juda rama kîr nâwk dingin an fe ta a.
Pasal dang ina khawsakna in tuok ve ve theina dingin
Anni chun, “Ni lo e, i chihai kuoma i kîrnaa chun hung zui kan ti che,” an ti a.
Naomi chun, “Ka naunuhai, kîr nâwk lem ro, iengdingin am mi zui in ti a? In pasal ding naupasalhai ka la vawn zing am a nih?
Kîr nâwk unla, ka naunuhai, fe el lem ro, pasal hang nei dingin ka upa taluo ta si a. Beiseina ka la nei tiin, vawizân hin pasal nei elin naupasalhai nei ding hrim lang khawm,
an puitling chenin in nghâk el ding am a nih? Chu chu lei chun pasal nei lovin in um el ding am a nih? Ni lo e, ka naunuhai, ka chunga

Nisienlakhawm, Ruth chun, “Nang kîrsan ding che le zui lo ding chein mîn fui naw rawh; i fena phawtah fêng ka ta, i riekna phawtah riek ka ta, i chihai chu ka chihai nîng an ta, i Pathien chu ka Pathien nîng a ta;
i thinaa chun thîng ka ta, chutaka chun phûmin um ve el ka tih. Nang le kei hi thina chau naw thil dangin a mi ṭhe ding chun
Naomi chun ama zui a tum tlat a nih ti a hrietin a tosan ta a.
Chuongchun, an pahni chun Bethlehem chenin an fe ta a. Bethlehem an tlung chun anni lei chun a khaw phêkin an inhnîng ta sup sup el a; chun, nuhmeihai chun, “Hi hi Naomi kha a ni maw?” an ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Naomi mi ti naw ro, Marah mi ti lem ro, Iengkimthawthei chun lungsietthlâktakin a mi thaw ta si a.
Buriptakin ka suok a,
Naomi chun a pasal laibung, Elimelek pahnama mi neinungtak laibung a nei a, a hming chu Boaz a nih.
Chuongchun, a fe ta a, busîktuhai lâk ṭhel chu a va zawng a: Elimelek pahnam, Boaz lo kherah a va fe fûk hlau el a.
Chun, Boaz chun a siehlaw, busîktuhai chunga hotu kuoma chun, “Hi hi tu nunghâk am a ni leh?” a ti a.
Busîktuhai chunga hotu chun, “Moab nunghâk, Moab rama inthawka Naomi le hung kîr a nih.

‘Mi lunginsiet la, in bu lâk ṭhel zawng ka tih, busîktuhaiin an buphalhai an inkhâwm zona hnung peiah zawng ka tih,’ a ti a; chuongchun, a hung a, ṭuah sâwt nawte a châwl ti naw chu, zîngkâra inthawkin a la zawng ta zing a nih,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, Boaz chun Ruth kuomah, “Ka naunu, lo ngai ta, lo danga chu buhnung zawngin fe naw la, hitaka inthawk hi fe sawn naw rawh, ka siehlaw nunghâkhai kuoma hin um zing rawh.
An busîk hi en zing la, an hnung hi zui pei rawh, tlangvâlhai chu iengkhawm law lo ding chein thu ka pêk diem tah; chun, i dang a châr po leh tuibêla tlangvâlhai tui chawisa va dâwn hlak la,” a ti a.
Chun, ama chu a kûn a, hnuoi sikin a bawkkhup a, a kuomah, “Hnam dang ka ni si a, hienga i mi lo hriet nuoma i mi lo lunginsiet hi iengtizie am a ni leh?” a ti a.
Boaz chun a dawn a, “I pasal thia inthawka i tarpinu chunga i thilthawhai po po mîn an mi hril vawng a; chun i pa le nu le i piengna ram mâksana mi i la hriet ngailohai kuoma i hung dânhai chen hin.
Chun, amain, “Pu, nangin i mi thlamuon a, i siehlaw nunghâkhai laia mi ni naw lang khawm, ngilneitaka i mi biek hi ka ta dingin lunginsiettu ropuitak i nih,” a ti a.

Chun, bu fâk hunah Boaz chun a kuomah, “Taka hin hung la, beihai hi hung fa ve la, i bei tlanghai chu uoin thûrah inchie ve rawh,” a ti a. Chuongchun, busîktuhai kâwla chun a ṭhung a; chun, buzeu chu an pêk a, a fâk a, a khawp hnung khawm chun fâk sênglo a la nei ta rawp a.
Chun, buhnung zawng dinga ân thawk nâwk chun, Boaz chun a tlangvâlhai kuomah, “Buphal laia mi khawm rût sienla, hal naw ro.
Chun, a têla mi khawm keidawkpêk unla, mâksan pei unla, rût raw se, hal naw ro,” tiin a hril a.
Chuongchun, loa buhnung chu zântieng chenin a zawng khâwm a, a zawngsa chu a vuok a, buṭei epha khat zet a nih.
Chun, a phur a, khuo tieng a fe ta a; chun, a bu zawng khâwm chu a tarpinu chu ân entir a, a khawp hnunga a fâk sênglo khawm chu a phawr a, a pêk a.
A tarpinu chun a kuomah, “Vawisûn khan khâw tienga buhnung am i zawng a? Khâwlai am sin i thaw a? A lo hre nuomtu che chu malsâwmin um raw se,” a ti a.
Ama chun tu kuom am sin a va thaw ti a tarpinu chu a hril a, “Vawisûna sin ka va thawnapa hming chu Boaz a nih,” tiin. Chun, Naomiin a monu kuoma chun, “
Chun, Moab mi Ruth chun, “A ni ngei chu tie, ka kuoma khawm, ‘Ka bu hi an sîk zo vawng hmakhat chun, ka siehlawhai lai hin ṭhang ve zing rawh,’ a mi ti nghe nghe an naw,” a ti a.
Chun, Naomi chun a monu Ruth kuomah, “Ka naunu, lo danga an hmu dêr nawna ding chein, a siehlaw nunghâkhai lai ruok chun fe la ṭhang a tih,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, buṭei le bupui
Chun, a tarpinu Naomi chun a kuomah, “Ka naunu, i ta dinga khawsakna ṭha ka zawngpêk naw ding che am a nih?
Boaz, a siehlaw nunghâkhai laia sin i va thawnapa kha ei laibung bul a ni naw am a nih? Ngai ta, vawizân hin buṭei hrizâwlah a zâp fai ding a nih.
Insil la, sahriek innâl la, i incheina puon ṭha takhai sil la, hrizâwla chun zu fe rawh: amiruokchu, ama chu fâk le dâwn ân zo hmakhat chu a kuomah inhriettir dêr naw rawh.
Chun, a zâl phaleh a zâlna chu inchik la, lût la, a ke hlîm la zâl rawh; chun, amain i thaw ding chu lo hril a ti che,” a ti a.
Ruth chun a dawn a, “I hril taphawt chu thâwng ka tih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, hrizâwla chun a zu fe a, a tarpinuin a hril ang tak chun a thaw a.
Chun, Boaz chu bu a fâka a dâwn zo chun a lungril a hung hlim ta hle a, bu hlûm bula zâl dingin a fe ta a. Ruth chu to ṭawkin a va fe a, a ke chu a hlîma a zâl ve ta a.
Zânrilah chupa chu inlâurakin a ṭhanghar a, a hei inlet a; a ke thluona nuhmei lo zâl ve zing chu a hmu a.
Chun, ama chun, “Tu am i ni a?” a ti a. Ama chun, “I siehlawnu Ruth ka nih, i siehlawnu hi i puon mi hung kêuzawm rawh; ka laibung bul i ni si a,” a ti a.
Ama chun, ka naunu
Tuhin, “ka naunu, ṭi naw rawh; i hni taphawt thawpêk pei ka ti che; ka khaw mi chanpui po poin nuhmei feltak i nih ti an hriet seng si a.
Chun, tuhin, laibung bul chu ka ni ngei el; amiruokchu, keia nêka hnai lem a um a.
Vawizân chu um phawt el la, zingkâr ama chun i ta dinga laibung chan chu a thaw nuom chun ṭhang a ta, thaw raw se; amiruokchu, laibung chan chu a thawpêk nuom naw che chun,
Chuongchun, zingkâr chenin a ke thluona chun a zâl ta a, chun tukhawm lân hmu chieng thei hmain a tho a; chun, ama chun, “Hrizâwla chun nuhmei chu a hung ti tukhawmin hre naw raw se,” a ti a.
Chun, “I puon bât kha hung la la dâw rawh,” a ti a. Chuongchun, a daw a, buṭei chu tekhâwng ruk ân khi suok a, a sung a, ân phurtir a, chun, khuoa chun a fe ta a.
A tarpinu kuom a hang tlung chun, “Ka naunu, ieng am i chang a?” a lo ti a. Ama chun, chu mipain thil a thawpêk po po chu a hril vawng a.
“Hi buṭei tekhâwng ruk hi a mi pêk a, ‘I tarpinu kuoma chun kut ruokin fe dêr naw ti nih,’ a mi ti a nih,” tiin.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka naunu, ieng angin am thil a hung um ding ti i hriet hma chun nghâk el rawh, vawisûn nia hi thil hi a thaw zo hmakhat chun ama chu a to el âwm si naw a,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, Boaz chu kul kawtkhâra chun a hang fe a, chutaka chun a ṭhung a. An laibung bul Boazin a hril kha a hung chun, “Ruola, taka hin la hung la, hung ṭhung ta,” a ti a. Ama chu a va fe a, ân ṭhung a.
Chun, chu khuoa mi upa sâwm a ṭhuoi a, an kuomah, “Hitaka hin ṭhung ta u khai,” a ti a; chuongchun, an ṭhung ta a.
Chun, an laibung bul kuoma chun, “Moab rama inthawka hung kîr nâwk Naomi chun ei unaupa Elimelek ram kha a zawr a.

Chuleiin, hi thu hi hril cheha i kuomah, ‘Hitaka ṭhunghai mithmua le ka mihai upahai mithmua hin inchaw rawh. În tlan nuom chun intlan la, în tlan naw ding chun mi hril rawh, ka hriet theina dingin, nang naw chu a hang intlan ding âwm tu dang khawm an um si naw a; chun, nanga dawta chun kei ka nih,’ tia inhriettir che ṭûlin ka hriet a,” a ti a. Ama chun, “Intlan ka tih,” a ti a.
Boaz chun, “Naomi kuta inthawka ram chu în châwk ni chun mithi nuhmei Moab mi Ruth în châwk sa ding a nih, amaa inthawka mithi hming chu dei loa a ro hluo ding an um theina dingin,” a ti a.

An laibung bul chun, “Keia ta ding chun kân tlan thei nawh, keima rohluona ding tieng sukbuoi rawi ka tih, intlan theitu ka nina ai chu nangin chang el rawh, kei chun chu kân tlan thei naw a ni hi,” a ti a.

Tienlaia Israelhai laia thil ieng- kim an sukdetna dinga an intlan dân le an inthleng dân chu hieng hi a nih: Pakhatin kekawk a hlîp a, mi dang chu a pêk a, chu chu Israelhai laia thil sukdet dân a nih.
Boaz chun upahai le mipui po po kuoma chun, “Vawisûn hin nangni hi, Elimelek thil nei po po le Kilion le Mahlon thil nei po po Naomi kuta inthawkin kân châwk tah ti hretuhai in nih.

Chu chau chu ni lovin, mithi chu a hming a um zingna dinga rohluotu siempêk dingin le, mithi chu a unauhaia le a umna kul kawtkhâra a hming a bo nawna dingin, Moab nuhmei Ruth, Mahlon nuhmei chu ka nuhmei dingin kân châwk a, vawisûn hin chu hrepuituhai chu nangni hi in nih,” a ti a.
Chuleiin, Boaz chun Ruth chu a ṭhuoi a, a nuhmei a hung ni ta a; ama chu a pâwl a,
Chuongchun, nuhmeihai chun Naomi kuomah, “

Ama chu i ta dingin hringna tungding nâwktu le i tar tieng châwmtu hung ni raw se; i monu, a hmangaitu che hi, naupasal pasari nêkin i ta dingin a tam lem a, ama chun naupa a neipêk ta che hi,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Naomi chun naute chu a lâk a, a ângsûngah a pawm a; chun, ama dawntu chu a hung ni ta a.
Chun, a tuolbâwm nuhmeihai chun, nau hming chu an hung sak a, “Naomiin naupasal a nei tah,” tiin a hmingah Obed an sak a; ama chu, David pa Jesai a pa a hung nih.
Chuongchun, Perez thlahai chu hienghai hi an nih: Perez chu Hezron pa a na,
Hezron chu Ram pa a na, Ram chu Amminadab pa a na,
Amminadab chu Nason pa a na, Nason chu Salmon pa a na,
Salmon chu Boaz pa a na, Boaz chu Obed pa a na,
Obed chu Jesai pa a na, Jesai chu David pa a nih.

Ephraim tlâng rama Ramathaim-zophim khuoa chun mi pakhat a um a, a hming chu Elkana a nih; ama chu Jeroham naupa a na, ama chu Elihu naupa a na, ama chu Tohu naupa a na, ama chu Ephraim mi Zuph naupa a nih.
Nuhmei pahni a nei a, pakhat hming chu Hanna a na, a dang hming chu Peninna a nih; chun, Peninna chun nauhai a nei a, Hanna ruok chun nau a nei ve naw a.
Chun, ama chu an khuoa inthawkin Silo khuoah sipaihai
Chun, Elkana inthâwi ni a hung tlung chun a nuhmei Peninna le a naupasalhai le a naunuhai po po chu chanvo a siempêk a.
Hanna ta ding ruok chun chan hni a siempêk a, Hanna chu a hmangai êm êm si a; nisienlakhawm,
Chuong anga kum tin a lo thaw hlak leiin,

Chun, a pasal Elkana chun a kuomah, “Hanna, ieng dinga i ṭap am? Ieng dinga bu i fâk naw am a na? Ieng dinga i lungril i suknat am? Naupasal sâwm nêk khawmin i ta dingin ka ṭha lem a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Silo khuoa bu an fâk a an dâwn zo chun Hanna chu a tho a. Thiempu Eli chu
Hanna chun a lungrilin a hril a, a hmûr chu a châng a, a râwl chu hriet a ni naw a; chuleiin, Eli chun zu ân rui niin a ring a.
Chuongchun, Eli chun a kuomah, “Ieng chen am inrui zinga i um ding a na? I uoin chu sie hmang raw khai,” a ta.
Ama chun, “I siehlawnu hi i mittlung ni raw se,” a ta. Chuongchun, nuhmei chu a fe ta a, bu dâm a fâk a, lungngai hmêl a put ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Hanna chun nau a vawn a; a hun a hung tlung chun naupasal a nei a, “
Chun, Elkana le a sûnghai po po chu
Hanna ruok chu a hang fe ve naw a; a pasal kuoma chun, “Kei chu naute hin nêne nêk a bân hmakhat chu hang fe ve naw ning ah; chu pha ruok chun
A pasal Elkana chun a kuomah, “Ṭha âwma i ti ang phawt chun thaw el rawh; a nêne nêk în bântir chenin um rawh, amiruokchu,
Chun, nêne nêk ân bântir phing chun beiphit epha khat le uoin saidawiûm khat chawiin sebâwng pathum leh a hang ṭhuoi a, Silo khuoa
Chun, bâwngchal chu an that a, naupang chu Eli kuoma chun an ṭhuoi a.
Chun, ama chun, “Aw ka lalpa, i hringna sâlin ka hril a, kei chu aw lalpa, hi hmuna i kâwla ngîr a,
Hi naupang hni hin ka ṭawngṭai a na, chun,
Chuleiin, kei khawma
Hanna chu a ṭawngṭai a,
Ka ki chu
Ka hmêlmahai chungah ka bau suklienin a um a,
I sandamnaa chun ka lâwm êm êm leiin.
Nangma ang hrim an um si nawh;
Ei Pathien ang lungpui hrim a um bawk nawh;
Chuong ang taka chapo chun thu hril ta naw unla,
In baua inthawkin ṭawng chapo hrim hrim suok naw raw se;
Ama chun thilthawhai chu a bûk fie hlak.
Mi hrât thalngulhai a sukthliek a,
A kathai kâwng chu hrâtnaa khitin a um a,
Khawp hlakhai chu fâk ding zawngin an inhlawfa ta a,
Phîngṭâm hlakhai chu an phîng a ṭâm ta naw a;
Anih, ching chun pasari a nei ta a,
Nau tamtak neinu chu a châu tah,
Thlânah ân fe thlâktir hlak a, a ṭhuoi suok bawk hlak.
A suktlâwm hlak a, a chawisâng bawk hlak.
Pilvuta inthawkin pasie chu a keitho hlak a,
Pasie chu êkdûra inthawkin a chawikâng hlak,
Mi lienhai kuomah ân umtir theina ding le,
Ropuina lalṭhungpha an chang theina dingin,
Leihnuoi innghatsan chu
Khawvêl chu a chungah ân nghat ta si a.
A mi inthieng ke chu vêng a ta,
Mi suolhai ruok chu inthim hnuoiah sukdei ṭhapin um an tih;
Hrâtna chun tukhawma an ngam âwm si naw a.
Vâna inthawka vâninrûmin do a ta;
A lal chu hrâtna pêng a ta,
A hrieknâl ki chu chawimawi a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Elkana chu Rama khuoa a ina chun a fe nâwk ta a. Chun, naupang chun thiempu Eli hmaa chun
Eli naupasalhai chu Belial nauhai an na,
Chun, mipuihai laia thiempuhai thaw dân chu, mîn inthâwina an hung inhlân hin, sa suong laitak hin thiempu siehlaw hi sa thurna thîrkut zum thum nei mi chawiin a hung hlak a;

chun, bêl bau lien amanih, bêl dâwt nei amanih, bêl khaina nei amanih, bêl amani sûng chu a zuk sun a; chun, chu sa thurna inzumin a hung thur suok po po chu thiempu chun a lâk hlak a nih. Chuong ang chun Israel mihai chutaka hung po pohai chu Silo khuoa chun an lo thawpêk hlak a.
Anih, a thâu chu an raw hma chun thiempu siehlaw chu a hung a, ân thâwitu kuoma chun, “Thiempu ta dinga emhmin ding sa mi pe rawh, i sa suong chu a du naw a, a sel a dit a nih,” a ti hlak a.

Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “A thâu chu raw phawt el sienla; chun, chu zova chun i hringnain a dit zât zât i lâk ding annâwm,” a lo ti chun, “Ni lo, i mi pêk naw chun la lui hrim hrim ka tih,” a ti hlak a.
Chuongchun, tlangvâlhai suolna chu
Samuel chu naupang ni sien khawm, puonzai inhmi zakawsîng hâkin
Chu naw khawm chu a nuin zakawfuol chîn a ṭhuipêk a, kum tina an inthâwina inhlân dinga a pasal kuoma a fe ve hin a chawipêk hlak a.
Chun, Eli chun Elkana le a nuhmei chu mal a sâwmpêk a, “
Chun,
Eli chu a hung tar ta hle el a; Israel mihai po po chunga a nauhai thilthaw po po le inbiekna puon in kawtkhâr bula rawngbâwltu nuhmeihai an lo zâlpui hlak thu dâm a lo hriet a.
Chuongchun, an kuomah, “Iengdinga hieng ang thil hi in thaw am a na? Mi po pohaia inthawk hin in thilthaw ṭha nawhai chu ka lo hriet a nih.
Ni lo, ka naupasalhai, in chanchin ka lo hriet hi a ṭha naw tieng ruok a nih;
Mi pakhat mi dang chunga a suol chu Pathienin rorêlpêk a ta, amiruokchu mi,
Chun, naupang Samuel chu ân ṭhanglien deu deu a, Pathien le mihriemhai dit zâwngin a um ta a.
Chun, Eli kuoma chun Pathien mi pakhat a hung a, a kuomah, “

Ieng leiin am ka umnaa inhlân dinga ka ruot ka kuoma inthâwina le ka puola thil inhlân chu in sirde a, keia nêka i nauhai i chawimawi lem a, nangni insukthâuna dinga ka mi Israelhai inthâwina a ṭha ṭha in hmang am a na?’ tiin.
Chuleiin,
Ngai ta, i bân dâm, i pa sûnghai bân dâm ka tan ni ding chu a hung tlung ding a ni tah; i inah tarkûna dam hrim hrim um naw ni hai.
Pathienin Israelhai chu hausakna a pêk pha chun, hi ka umna ina hin tuorna la hmûng i ta; i ina chun kumkhawtluongin tarkûna dam um naw ni hai.
Chun, i mi, ka maichâma inthawka ka sukbohmang naw ding hai chu i mit sukkhamtu le I lungril suknatu nîng an ta; i ina hung pienghai taphawt chu an vânglai takin thi pei an tih.
Chun, hi hi, i naupasalhai pahni Hophni le Phinehas chunga thil hung tlung ding chu i ta dingin inchikna nîng a tih; ni khat sûngin an pahniin thi ve vêng an tih.
Chun, thiempu ringumtak ka ta dingin indin ṭha nâwk ka ta, ama chun chu ka lungril le ka lung tuokzâwngin thâwng a tih. Chun, sûngkuo dettakah inngîr ka ta, kumkhuoin ka hriek nâl hmaa chun um a tih.
Chun, i ina la um po pohai chu tangka le bei hni dingin fêng an ta, ama chibai bûk an tih, bei tlâwmte bêk ka hmu theina dingin thiempu sin mîn thawtir raw khai, tîng an tih,’ a ti a nih,” a ta.
Chun, naupang Samuel chun Eli hmaa chun
Chun, hieng hi a hung na, Eli chu ama hmuna a zâl laiin (a mit ân thim ta deu a, khuo a hmu ṭha thei mang ta naw a),
Pathien khâwnvar khawm a la thi hmain, Pathien bâwm umna
Chun, Eli kuoma chun a va tlân a, a kuomah, “Hitaka hi ka um, i mi ko a,” a ta. Ama chun, “Ka ko naw che ie, va zâl nâwk ta rawh,” a ta.
Chun,
Chuong lai chun Samuel chun
Chun,
Chuleiin, Eli chun Samuel kuoma chun, “Fe la, va zâl nâwk phawt la, a ko nâwk che chun, ‘
Chun,
Chun,
Chu ni chun a sûngkuo chungchâng thu ka hril po po chu a bula inthawka a tâwp chenin Eli chunga hin ka thaw ding a nih.
A nauhaiin Pathien an hrilsietna suol chu hre zing pumin a khap naw leiin a sûngkuo chu kumkhuoa dingin ka ngaituo ding a nih ti ka hril ta si a.
Chuleiin, Eli sûngkuo kuoma chun Eli sûnghai bawsietna chu inthâwinain amanih, thilinhlânin amanih iengtika khawm sukkieng thei ni naw nih, tiin ṭawng kân khâm tah a nih,” a ta.
Samuel chu zingkâr chenin a zâl a; chun,
Chun, Eli chun Samuel chu a ko a, “Samuel, ka naupa,” a ta. Ama chun, “Hitaka hin ka um,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ieng thil am
Chun, Samuel chu a hung a, iengkim el chu a hril fai vawng a, a kuoma chun iengkhawm ip a nei naw a. Chun, ama chun, “
Chun, Samuel chu a hung inṭhanglien deu deu a, a kuomah
Chuongchun, Dana inthawka Beerseba tlung rakin Israel mi po pohai chun Samuel chu
Chun,

Chun, Samuel thu chu Israel mi po po lai chun ân thang suok ta a. Chun, Israel mihai chu Philistin mihai do dingin an fe suok a, Ebenezer kâwlah ṭhanghmun an khuor a; Philistin mihai ruok chun Aphekah ṭhanghmun an khuor a.

Chun, Philistin mihai chu Israel mihai lo dang dingin an lo inzar dar a; chun, an hang inthaw chun Philistin mihai hmaa chun Israel mihai chu an tlâwm ta a; indona hmuna chun sipai sâng li lai amanih an that a.
Chun, mipuihai chu an riekhmuna an fe chun Israel upahai chun, “Ieng leia vawisûn hin Philistin mihai hmaa
Chuongchun,
Chun, Philistin mihaiin an khêkri an hriet chun, “Hebraihai riekhmuna khêkri inri ta dur dur el chu iengtizie am a ni ta leh?” an ta. Chun, an riekhmuna chun
Chun, Philistin mihai chun an ṭi ta a, “Riekhmuna chun Pathien a hung a ni ta chu teh,” an ti a. “Ei chung a rik ie, kha hma khan chuong ang chu a um ngai si naw a.
Ei chung a rik ie! chuong pathienhai kut hrâttaka inthawk chun tuin am mi sandam a ta? Chuong pathienhai chu an nih, Aigupta mihai thlalêra hri tinrênga sukhlumtu chu.
Aw, nangni Philistin mihai, in siehlawa an um ang khan Hebraihai siehlawah in um nawna dingin hrâttakin um unla, insukpasal ro khai, insukpasal unla thaw pei ro,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun an hang thaw a, Israel mihai chu an tlâwm a, an puonin tieng seng an tlân ta vawng a; an that nasa êm êm el a, Israelhai laia sipai sîng thum an thi a nih.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu an lâkpêk a; Eli naupahai pahni, Hophni le Phinehas chu an that bawk a.
Sipai laia Benjamin thla, mi pakhat a tlân a, a puonhai tlêr nung le a lua pilvut kai rakin chu ni ngei chun, Silo chu a va tlung a.

Chun, a va tlung chun, Eli chun lampui sîra a ṭhungnaa ṭhung pumin a lo thlîr zing a, Pathien bâwm lei khan a lungrilin ân thin ân thin a. Chun, ama chun khuo a hang tlung a, chanchin chu a hang hril chun a khuoin an khêk ta veng vung el a.
Eli chun an khêkri chu a lo hrietin, “Chu inri mur mur chu iengtizie am a na?” a ta. Chun, mi chu inhmawtakin a va fe a. Eli chu a va hril a.
Eli chu kum sâwmkuo le kum riet mi a na, a mit ân thim ta a, khuo a hmu thei ta naw a.
Chun, mi chun Eli kuoma chun, “Sipai laia inthawka hung ka ni hi, vawisûn hin sipai laia inthawka hung tlân ka nih,” a ta. Ama chun, “ka naupa, ieng angin am thil a um a?” a ta.

Chanchin hung intluntu chun a dawn a, “Israel mihai chu Philistin mihai hmaa chun an tlânsie a; chun, mipui lai chun inthatna nasatak a um bawk a; i naupahai pahni Hophni le Phinehas khawm an thi a; Pathien bâwm khawm an lâkpêk tah,” a ta.

Chun, Pathien bâwm thu a hang hril phingle chun kawtkhâr bula ṭhungnaa inthawk chun a thalin a tlu a, a ring a tliek a, a thi ta a, ama hi a tar êm leiin ân dâwl zo ta naw a nih. Israel chunga kum sâwmli rorêl tah a nih.

Chun, a monu Phinehas nuhmei chun nau a vawn a, a nei a hnai ta hle a, Pathien bâwm an lâkpêk ti thu a hang hriet a, a tarpupa le a pasal an thi ti a hang hriet chun, a kûn a, nau chu a nei ta a, a nauha chun ama a hung nang nghâl ta si a.
Chun, a thi vâng vâng laia a kâwla ngîr nuhmeihai chun a kuomah, “Ṭi naw rawh, naupasal i nei ta hi,” an ta. Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a dawn dêr naw a, a ngaisak bawk naw a.
Chun, “Ropuina chun Israelhai chu a suoksan tah,” tiin, naupang hminga chun Ikabod a sak a. Pathien bâwm chu an lâkpêk ta a, a tarpupa le a pasal khawm an thi ta si a.
“Ropuina chun Israel chu a suoksan ta a, Pathien bâwm chu an lâkpêk ta si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun Pathien bâwm chu an lâk a, Ebenezera inthawk chun Asdod khuoah an fepui ta a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun Pathien bâwm chu an lâk a, Dagon biekna inah an lâklût a, Dagon kâwla chun an sie a.
Chun, Asdod khuoa mihai chun a zînga zîngkâr an hang tho chun, ngai ta,
Chun, a zîngnâwk zîngkâr an hang tho chun, ngai ta,
Chu chu lei chun Dagon thiempu amanih, Dagon biekna ina hung hlakhai hrim hrim khawmin Asdod khuoa Dagon kawtkhâr bul chu tu chen khawm hin an la sir ngam naw a nih.

Chuongchun, Asdod khuoa mihaiin chuong ang chu a nih ti an lo hrietin, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm hi ei kuoma hin um zing da raw se ie, ei chunga le ei pathien Dagon chunga a kutthlâk a na êm el,” an ta.

Chuongchun, Philistin lal po pohai chu an kuomah an ko khâwm a, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm hi iengtin am ei thaw ding a na?” an ta. Anni chun, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm chu Gath khuoah va fepui ro,” tiin an dawn a; chuongchun, Israelhai Pathien bâwm chu an va fepui ta a.
Chun, chuonga an fetlungpui chun,

Chuongchun, Pathien bâwm chu Ekronah an infetir a. Pathien bâwm chun Ekron a va tlung chun, Ekron khuoa mihai chu, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm chu eini le ei mihai sukhlum dingin ei kuomah an hung lâk tah,” tiin an khêk ta rak el a.

Chuongchun, Philistin lalhai po po chu an ko khâwm a, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm hi infe hmangtir unla keini le kan mihai a mi sukhlum nawna dingin a umna hmun pângngaiah fe nâwk raw se,” an ta. Khaw pumpuia chun thina khawp buoina nasatak a um a; Pathien kut chun chu khuo chu a del hle si a.
A thi mahlahai khawm chu pânsiein an na tâwl a; chuongchun, chu khaw khêkri chun vân khi a hang tlung hiel a nih.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun, “

Anni chun, “Israelhai Pathien bâwm hi infetir ding in ni khawma a ruok chun infetir dêr naw ro, a kuomah bâwsiet inthâwina inhlân ngei ro, chuongchun, sukdamin um in ta, nangnia inthawka a kut lâk sawn a ni nawna san khawm hre tâng in tih,” an ta.

Chun, anni chun, “A kuoma kan bawsietna inthâwina inhlân ding chu ieng am nîng a ta?” an ta. Anni chun, “Philistin lalhai zâtin rângkachak pânsie lim panga le rângkachak chaichene lim panga, in rênga chunga hri inlêng le in lalhai chunga inlêng chu thuhmun a ni si a.

Chuleiin, in pânsie limhai le in ram suksetu chaichene lim chu siem unla; chun, Israelhai Pathien chu chawimawi ro; chuongchun, a kut chu in chunga dâm, in pathien chunga dâm, in ram chunga dâm sukzâng nuom rawi naw nîm.
Chuleiin, tuhin tawlailîr thar buotsai unla, bâwngpui pahni a nêne sâwr lai, rîngkawl lân bâttir ngailo chu bel unla; chun, an têhai chu in tieng hung ṭhuoipêk ro.
Chun,

Chuongchun, ama ramri tieng lampui hrawin Beth-semesa chun a fe am en ta u; a fe chun ei chunga thil ṭha nawtak hi ama thaw nîng a ta, a fe naw chun a mi hremtu chu ama kut a lo ni nawh ti hrieng ei ta, ei chunga hung um ve hrim hrim nîng a tih,” an ti a.
Chun, mihai chun chuong ang chun an thaw a, bâwngpui a nêne sâwr lai pahni an ṭhuoi a, tawlailîra chun an bel a, an têhai chu in tieng an khum a;
Chun,

Chun, bâwngpuihai chun Beth-semes tieng panin lam chu an hraw ta ngat ngat a; chuongchun, inbu malam peiin lam tluongpui chu an hraw a, changtieng amanih, vawitieng amanih khawm an pêt dêr naw a; Philistin lalhai chun Beth-semes ramri chenin an zui a.
Chun, Beth-semes khuoa mihai chun ruoma hin an bu an lo sîk a, an hang ngha a, bâwm chu an hang hmu a, an lâwm ta êm êm a.
Tawlailîr chu Beth-semes khuoa mi Josua loa chun a hung lût a, lungpui lientak umna laia chun a ngîr ta zing a; chun, tawlailîr thing chu an chêk a,
Chun, Levi chihai chun
Philistin mihaiin rângkachak pânsie lim
chun, rângkachak chaichene lim chu khuo po po kul nei khuo le thingtlâng tieng khuo khawm tiem vawng a, lal pangahai ta Philistin mihai khaw zât a nih.
Chuongchun, Kiriath-jearim khuoa mihai kuoma chun, “Philistin mihai chun
Chun, Kiriath-jearima bâwm a um sûng chu sâwttak a na, kum sâwmhni zet a nih; chun, Israel sûnghai po po chun
Chun Israel mihai chun Baalhai le Astarothhai chu an sie hmang a,
Chun, Samuel chun, “Israel mihai po po chu Mizpaah ko khâwm vawng unla,

Chun, Philistin mihai chun Israel mihai Mizpaah an um khâwm ti an hriet chun Israel mihai do dingin Philistin lalhai chu an hang inthawk a. Chu chu Israel mihaiin an lo hriet chun Philistin mihai chu an lo ṭi a.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai chun Samuel kuoma chun, “Philistin mihai kuta mi sandam dinga
Chun, Samuel chun berâmte nêne ne lai a lâk a, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin
Chun, Samuelin pumrawhmang thilinhlân ân hlân lai tak chun Philistin mihai chun Israel mihai chu thaw dingin an hung hnai a, nisienlakhawm, chu ni chun
Chun, Israel mihai chu Mizpaa inthawk chun an suok a, Philistin mihai chu an hnawt a, Beth-kar hnuoi an tlung chenin an that pei a.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun lung a lâk a, Mizpa le Sen inkâra chun a phun a, “Hi chen hi
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chu an tlâwm ta a, Israelhai rama chun an fe nâwk ta naw a. Chun,

Chun, Philistin mihaiin Israelhai khuo an lâkhai chu Ekrona inthawka Gath chenin Israel mihai an pêk kîr nâwk a, a ram chu Israel mihaiin Philistin mihai kuta inthawkin an sansuok a. Chun, Israel mihai le Amor mihai chu inremin an um a.
Samuel chun a dam sûngin Israel mihai ro a rêl a.
Kum tinin Bethel le Gilgal le Mizpa hi a kan vêl hlak a, chuong hmunahai chun Israel mihai ro a rêl hlak a.
Chun, a in umna a ni leiin Rama khuoa chun a fe nâwk hlak a; chutaka chun Israel mihai ro a rêl a, chutaka chun
A naulutir hming chu Joel a na, chun, a dawttu hming chu Abija a nih; anni chu Beer-sebaa rorêltu an na.
Nisienlakhawm, a nauhai chun a umdân chu an lâk ve naw a, sum le pai tieng an hnawt a, thamnahai an lâk a, indik nawtakin ro an rêl a.
Chuongchun, Israel mi upahai po po chu an inkhâwm a, Rama khuoa Samuel kuomah an fe a,
Nisienlakhawm, a kuoma, “Ro mi rêlpêktu ding lal mi pe rawh,” an ti chun Samuel chu a suklâwm naw hle a. Chuongchun, Samuel chu
Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok nia tuta chena an thil thaw dân po po, an mi nghatsan a, pathien danghai rawng dâm an mi bâwlsan hlak ang bawk hin i chungah an thaw a ni hi.
Chuleiin, an thu ngai rawh, amiruokchu, ursûntaka tiemkamin an chunga rorêltu lal châng dân ding chu khîkhmu chie rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chun
chun, a sipai sâng hotua dâm, sâwmnga hotua dâm ruot a tih; ṭhenkhat chu a hnuoi inlettua dâm, a busîktua dâm, a indo thuomhnaw siemtua dâm, tawlailîr hmangruo siemtua dâm hmang a ta.
In naunuhmeihai chu riminhnik siemtua dâm, bu suongtua dâm, bei siemtua dâm hmang a tih.
In thlai chi le in grêp huonhaia mi chu sâwma pakhat lâkpêk a ti cheu a, a siehlawhai le a hotuhai pêng a tih.
In siehlawpahai, in siehlawnuhai, in tlangvâl ṭha ṭhahai le in sabengtunghai lâkpêk a ti cheu a, a sinthaw dingin ruoi a tih.
In berâm ruol laia mi chu sâwma pakhat lâkpêk a ti cheu a; chun, ama siehlawhai nîng in tih.
Chun, chu nia chun in la thlang ding in lal lei chun la khêk suok in ta, nisienlakhawm, chu nia chun
Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chun Samuel rawl chu an ngai nuom naw a, “Ni lo e, lal kan nei ding a nih,
chuongchun, hnam dang po pohai ang hung nîng kan ta, chun, kan lal chun ro mi rêlpêk a ta, kan hmahai chu ṭhuoiin râlhai mi dopui a tih,” an ta.
Chun, Samuel chun mipui thuhrilhai po po chu a hriet a,
Benjamin rama Benjamin thlaa mi mi pakhat mi hrât huoisen a um a, a hming chu Kis a nih; ama chu Abiel naupa a na, ama chu Zeror naupa a na, ama chu Bekorath naupa a na, ama chu Aphia naupa a nih.
Chun, ama chun naupa a nei a, a hming chu Saula a nih; tlangvâl pieng ṭhatak a na, Israel mihai laia chun ama nêka pieng ṭha hrim hrim an um naw a, a liengko nêka insâng mi dang hrim hrim an um nawh.
Chun, Saula pa Kis sabengtunghai chu ân hmang tâwl a. Chuongchun, Kis chun a naupa Saula kuoma chun, “Tho la, siehlaw pakhat ṭhuoi la, sabengtunghai va zawng raw khai,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Ephraim tlâng ram dâm chu a fang a, chun Salisa ram dâm khawm chu a fang a, nisienlakhawm, a hmu naw a; chun, Saalim ram an fang nâwk a, chutaka khawm chun an um naw a; chun, Benjamin mihai ram an fang nâwk a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu chuong ta naw a.
Zuph ram an tlung chun, Saula chun a kuoma um ve, a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Hung rawh, kîr nâwk el tâng ei tih, chuong naw chun, ka pa khan sabengtunghai ngaituo ṭhulin eini mi ngaituo lem a tih,” a ta.
Siehlaw chun Saula chu a dawn nâwk a, “Ngai ta, tangka Shekel hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat ka la chawi a, chu chu ei fena ding a mi hril manah Pathien mi chu pe el ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun a siehlaw kuoma chun, “A ṭha hlau chu, fe ta nâwm ei nîm”, a ta. Chuongchun, Pathien mi umna khuoa chun an fe ta a.
Anni chun an dawn a, “Um e, in hmaa khan a hung a nih, inhmaw ro khai, vawisûn hin khuoah a hung a nih, vawisûn hin bâwlhmunahai mihai an inthâwi a nih,

khuo in hang lût hlimin bâwlhmuna bu fa dinga a fe hmain hang hmu nghâl el in tih; inthâwina malsâwmtu ding a ni leiin a tlung hmakhat chu mipui chun bu an fâk naw ding a nih, chu hnunga chun an mi fielhai chun an fâk hlak a nih. Chuleiin, hang fe vak unla, hang hmu nghâl el in tih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, khuoa chun an hang fe ta a. Khuo an hang lût chun, Samuel bâwlhmuna fe ding chun ân tuokpui a.

“Zîngah hieng ang hun lai hin Benjamin rama inthawkin i kuomah mi pakhat ka hung tir ding a na, ka mi Israel chunga hotu ni dingin hriek nâl i ta, ama chun Philistin mihai kuta inthawkin ka mihai sandam a tih; an khêkri chun ka kuom a hung tlung ta leiin ka mihai chu ka ngaisak tah a nih,” tiin.
Chun, Samuelin Saula a hmu chun,
Chuongchun, Saula chun kul kawtkhâra chun Samuel chu a va hnai a, “Hmutheitu in chu khâwlai am a na, mi hril ta,” a ta.

Samuel chun Saula chu a dawn a, “Keima hi hmutheitu chu ka nih, ka hmaa hin bâwlhmun tieng panin fe la, vawisûn hin ka kuomah bu i fâk ve ding a nih; chun, zîngah zîngkâr infetir ka ti che a, i lungrila um po po khawm hril ka ti che.
I sabengtung ni thum inhmang tahai chu lungkham naw rawh, an hmu tah. Israelhai laia ropuina po po chu tu ta ding am a na? I ta ding le i pa ina mi po pohai ta ding a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Samuel chun Saula le a siehlaw chu a ṭhuoi a, mikhuol pindana chun a ṭhuoi lût a, an mi fiel sâwmthumhai lai chun hmun ropuitaka chun ân ṭhungtir a.
Chun, Samuel chun bu suongtu kuoma chun, “I kuoma sietum ding ka ti, chanvo ka pêk che kha hung la raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, bâwlhmuna inthawka khuoa an fe thla chun in chungah Saula chu zâlna an siempêk a; a zâl ta a.

Chun, zîngkâr chun a tho a, nisa suok ding lai vêlin Samuel chun in chunga um Saula chu a ko a, “Tho la, infetir tâng ka ti che,” a ta. Chuongchun, Saula chu a tho a, ama le Samuel chu an fe suok ta a.
Khaw hmawrtâwng chu an zuk tlung chun, Samuel chun Saula kuomah, “Siehlaw hi ei hma tieng infetir la, (ama chu a fe ta a) nang ruok chu ngîr hri la, Pathien thu hang hril hri phawt ka ti che,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun hriek bâwm chu a hung lâk suok a, a lua chun a bur a, a fâwp a, “
