Vawisûn hin i mi fesan hnungin, Zelzaah Benjamin ramria Rakil thlân kâwlah mi pahni intuokpui i ta; chun, anni chun i kuomah, Sabengtung i zawnghai kha an hmu ta ie; chun, ngai ta, i pa chun sabengtung chu a ngaituo ta naw a, nangma mawl a ngaituo a, ‘Ka naupa chu iengtin am ka thaw ding a ni ta leh aw, a ti a ti el a,’ tîng an ta.

Chun, chutaka inthawk chun fe pei la, Tabor thingsaisuo chu va tlung i ta, chutaka chun mi pathum, Bethela Pathien kuoma hang fe dinghaiin lo intuokpui an ti che a; pakhat chun kêlte pathum pawm a ta, pakhat chun beiphêk pathum chawi a ta, chun, pakhat chun uoin peng chawi bawk a tih.
Chun, chibai bûk an ti che a, beiphêk chu phêk hni pêng an ti che a; chu chu lâng i ta.

Chu hnunga chun Philistin sipaihai umna Pathien tlâng chu va tlung i ta, chun, chutaka khuo i va tlung chun zâwlneihai perkhuong dâm, khuongtê dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm chawihai hma ṭhuoia bâwlhmuna inthawka hung thla intuokpui i ta; chun, thu hril duol duol an ta;
chun,
Chun, hieng inchiknahai hi i chunga a hung um pha chun thil hung umin a zir ang peiin i thaw ding a nih; Pathien chu i kuomah a um pei si a.

Chun, ka fe hma hin Gilgala chun lo zu fe la, chun, ngai ta, kei khawm pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le inremna inthâwinahai inhlân dingin i kuomah hung thlâng ka ta; i kuoma ka hung a, i thaw ding ka hung hril hma che chun ni sari i lo um ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chu ṭhe dinga a hnungnghat phingleh Pathien chun lungril danglam dai a pêk ta a; chun, chuong inchiknahai po po chu chu ni chun a hung tlung ta vawng a.
Chuongchun, tlâng chu an hang tlung chun, ngai ta, zâwlneihai chun an intuokpui a; chun

Chun, kha hmaa ama lo hre hlakhaiin zâwlneihai thu hril duol duolnaah a ṭhang ve ti an hriet chun mihai chu an inbiek a, “Kis naupa chunga thil hung um hi ieng am a ni ta leh? Saula khawm chu zâwlneihai lai a ṭhang ve am a ni el tah?” an ta.
Chun, an thu hril duol duolnaa a ṭhang zo chun bâwlhmun chu a tlung ta a.
Chun, Saula pami chun a kuoma le a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Khâwlai am in feh a?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Sabengtung kan zawng a nih, chun, kan hmu zo naw phingleh Samuel kuomah kan fe a nih,” a ta.
Saula pami chun, “Samuel chun i kuomah ieng am a na a hril mi hril raw khai,” a ta.
Saula chun a pami kuoma chun, “Sabengtunghai chu an hmu tah ti a mi hril ngei kha tie,” a ta. Amiruokchu, ram chungchâng thu Samuelin a hril chu a hril naw a.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun mipuihai chu Mizpaa chun
Israel thlahai kuoma chun, “

Nisienlakhawm, vawisûn hin in lunginzîngna po po le in rinumna po poa sanhimtu cheu in Pathien ngei chu in dit naw a, a kuomah, A ni nawh, lal mi siempêk rawh’ in ti a. Chuleiin, tuhin a hnama hnam le a chia chiin
Chuongchun, Samuel chun Israel chi po po chu a hung inlangtir a, chun, Benjamin chi chu thlang a lo ni ta a.

Chun, Benjamin chihai chu a sûngkuoin a hung inlangtir a, Matri mi sûngkuo chu thlang an lo ni ta a; chun, Kis naupa Saula chu thlang a lo ni ta a, nisienlakhawm, ama chu an hang zawng a, an hmu naw a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, an tlân a, an va ṭhuoi suok a; chun, mipui lai a hang ngîr chun mi lai chun ân sâng tak el a, mi dang hrim hrim a liengko nêka insâng khawm an um naw a.
Chun, Samuel chun mi po po kuomah, “
Saula khawm chu Gibea khuoa a in tieng a fe ta a; mi huoisenhai, an lungril Pathienin a tâwkhai, chu a kuomah an fe ve a.

Amiruokchu, Belial nauhai tuhaiin amani ruok chun, “Hi mipa hin iengtin am mi sandam thei hlak a ta?” an ta. Chuongchun, ama chu an ngainêp a, thilpêk hrim hrim an pêk nuom naw a. Nisienlakhawm, ama chu a to zing a.

Chuongchun, Ammon mi Nahas chu a hung inthawk a, Jabes-Gilead thaw tumin a hang ep a; chun, Jabes mihai po po chun Nahas kuoma chun, “Kan kuomah thu thlung la, chuongchun, i rawng bâwl kan tih,” an ta.

Ammon mi Nahas chun an kuomah, “Hieng ang hin a nih in kuoma thu ka thlung ding chu; in mit changtieng po po kheldawk vawng ding nîng a ta, chu chu Israel mi po pohai ta dinga hmingsietna nîng a tih,” a ta.

Chun, Jabes khuoa upahai chun a kuomah, “Israel ram po poa mi kan hang tir theina dingin ni sari mi la ngai phawt rawh; chutaka a mi sandam ding tukhawm an um naw chun i kuomah hung suok el kan tih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, an mi tirhai chun Saula umna Gibea chu an hung tlung a, mipuihai na hrieta chun chuong thu chu an hril a, chun, mipuihai chun an râwl an insuo a, an ṭap a.
Chun, loa inthawkin Saula chu sebâwng hung khalin a hung a; Saula chun, “Ieng am an ti a na mipuihai chu an ṭap a?” a ta. Chun, Jabes khuoa mihai thuhril chu an hril a.

Chuongchun, bâwng tuok khat a that a, a sa chu a chan nawi vawng a, Israel ram po poa chun ân semtir a; “Tukhawm Saula le Samuel hung zui nuom naw taphawt chu an sebâwng chu hieng anga thaw ve hi nîng a tih,” tiin. Chuongchun, mipuihai chun
Bezek hmuna chun a tiem a; Israel mihai chu nuoi thum an nih, Juda mihai chu sing thum an na.

Chun, an mi hung tirhai kuoma chun, “Jabes-Gilead mihai kuoma chun, ‘Zîngah nisa lum vânglai tak hmain sansuok nîng in tih,’ va ti ro,” an ta. Chun, an mi tirhai chu an va fe a, Jabes mihai chu an va hril a: chuongchun, an lâwm ta êm êm a.
Chuongchun, Jabes mihai chun, “Zînga hin in kuomah hung suok kan ta, in nuom nuomin kan chunga hin thaw el ro,” an ta.

Chun, a zînga chun Saula chun mipuihai chu pâwl thumin a siem a; zîng vêng hun lai takin an riekhmuna chun an lût a. Ammon mihai chu sûn nisa sat vânglai tak chenin an that a; an that mahlahai chu an indar vawng a, pahnia um hmunkhat hrim hrim khawm an um dêr naw a.
Chun, mipuihai chun Samuel kuomah, “Tuhai am an na ‘Saula hin ei chungah ro a rêl el ding am a nih?’ tituhai kha? Chuong mihai chu hung ṭhuoi la lo sukhlum kan tih,” an ta.
Chun, Samuel chun mipuihai kuoma chun, “Hung ro, Gilgala chun fêng ei tiu khai, chutaka chun ram hi indin thar nâwk ei tiu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui po po chu Gilgala chun an fe ta a, Saula chu Gilgala chun
Chun, Samuel chun Israel mi po pohai kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, ka kuoma in thuhrilhai po poa chun in râwl ka ngai a, lal ding chu ka siempêk ta cheu a.

Tuhin, ngai ta u, lal chun a lo keihruoi ta cheu a, kei chu ka hung tarin ka lu khawm ân ṭuok ta a; chun, ngai ta u, ka naupasalhai chu nangni lai an um a, ka tleirâwla inthawkin tuchen hin ka keihruoi cheu a.
Hitaka hin ka um a,
Anni chun, “I mi hlêm ngai naw a, i mi suknawmna ngai bawk naw a, tu kuta inthawk khawma lâk âwm lo chu i lâk ngai bawk nawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ka kuta hin âwm naw ieng khawm in hmu nawh ti vawisûn hin
Chuongchun, ngîr ṭhap unla,
Chuleiin, in lal thlang le hni chu en ta u,
amiruokchu,
Chuongchun, ngir ṭhap unla,
Vawisûn hin bu an sîk a ni naw am a nih? Vân inrûmtir ding le ruo insûrtir dingin
Chuongchun, Samuel chun
Chun, mipui po po chun Samuel kuoma chun, “Kan thi nawna dingin
Chun, Samuel chun, mipuihai kuoma chun, “Ṭi naw ro, hi thil ṭha nawtak hi thaw chu in thaw ngei a, amiruokchu,
iengkhawma ṭhahnem lo ding le sansuok thei lo ding cheu zuiin pêtsan naw ro, teplo mei mei an ni si a.
A hming ropuitak lei hin
Chu chau khawm chu a ni naw a, in ta dinga ṭawngṭai ma a,
Amiruokchu, suoltaka thil in la thaw rawp chun bohmang in tih, nangni le in lal khawm,” a ta.
Ro a rêl ṭan chun Saula chu kum sâwmthuma upa a na; Israelhai chungah kum hni ro a rêl a.

Chun, Saula chun Israelhai laia mi sâng thum a thlang a, sâng hni chu Mikmasa le Bethel tlângah Saula kuomah an um a; sâng khat chu Benjamin rama Gibeaa Jonathan kuomah an um a; a dang po chu anni puon inah ân fetir vawng a.

Chun, Jonathan chun Gebaa Philistin râl vêngtu sipaihai a thaw a, chu chu Philistin mihai chun an lo hriet a. Chuongchun, Saula chun, “Hebrai mihai khan lo hre seng raw hai seh,” tiin an ram po poah tawtawrâwt ân mûttir a.

Chun, Israelhai po po chun Saula chun Philistin râl vêngtu sipaihai a thaw ti le Israelhai khawmin Philistin mihai theida an phur a nih ti an lo hriet ta a. Chuongchun, a mipuihai chu Gilgala chun Saula kuomah an pungkhâwm ta ṭeu el a.

Chun, Philistin mihai chu Israelhai do ding chun an pungkhâwm ta ṭeu el a, tawlailîr sîng thum, sakawr chung chuong mi sâng ruk, sipai chu tuipui kama phaiphin zât zet an nih; chun, an hang fe a, Beth-aven saktieng panga Mikmasa chun ṭhanghmun an khuor a.
Chun, Israel mihai chun hnawchêpin an um ti an inhriet chun, (mihai chu an lunginzîng ta hle el a) mihai chu pûka hai, chîmbuka hai, lungpui phêna hai, kula hai, khur sûnga hai an inbi a.
Hebrai mi ṭhenkhat chu Jordan râla Gad le Gilead rama dâm an tlân a; Saula ruok chu Gilgala chun a la um zing a, mipuihai chun inthin dawr dawr pumin an zui a.
Chun, Saula chun, “Pumrawhmang thilinhlân ding le inremna thilinhlân dinghai chu hitakah ka kuomah hung la ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu ân hlân a.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu ân hlân zo chaua, ngai ta, Samuel chu a hung tlung ta a; chun, Saula chun chibai bûk dingin ama tuok dingin a fe a.

Chun, Samuel chun, “Ieng am a ni leh i lo thaw chu?” a ta. Saula chun, “Mipuihai chun an mi fe hmangsan ta a; nang hlak chu ni ruot nia chun i hung tlung ta naw a; Philistin mihai hlak chu Mikmasa chun an pungkhâwm huk tah ti ka hriet si a.
Chuleiin, ‘Philistin mihai chun Gilgala hin an mi hung thaw ding a ni ṭep si a,
Chun, Samuel chun Saula kuoma chun, “I thil thaw dân hi ân vêtthlâk ngawt el:
Chun, Samuel chu a tho a, Gilgala inthawk chun Benjamin rama Gibea khuoa chun a hang fe a. Chun, Saula chun a kuoma mi umhai chu a tiem a, za ruk lai an na.
Chun, Saula le a naupa Jonathan le an kuoma mi umhai chu Benjamin rama Geba khuoa chun an um a; nisienlakhawm, Philistin mihai chun Mikmasa chun ṭhanghmun an khuor a.
Chun, râlrûk pâwlhai chu Philistin mihai ṭhanghmuna inthawkin pâwl thumin an hung suok a; pâwl khat hai chun Shual rama Ophra tieng pan lampui an hraw a,
chun, pâwl khat chun Beth-horon tieng pan lampui an hraw a; chun, pâwl khat chun thlalêr dep Zeboim ruom tieng ngha ramri lampui chu an hraw a.
Israel ram pumpuia chun thirsu hrim hrim an um naw a; Philistin mihai chun, “Hebrai mihai hi kâwlhnâmhai amanih, feihai amani hi siem hlau rawi an tih,” an ti a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Israel mihai po po chu bâwngtuthlaw dâm, hmawl hmawra inbûk thîr dâm chu intâtngeitir dingin Philistin mihai kuomah an zu fe hlak a;
chuong an hnuoi inletna thîr ngei le bâwng tuthlaw tâtna man chu sekel hmun thuma ṭhea hmun hni a na, an hreipui le hmawl hmawra thîr inbûk tât man chu sekel hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat a nih.
Chuongchun, an indo ni chun Saula le Jonathan kuoma mi umhai chun kâwlhnâm amanih, fei amanih nei hrim hrim an um dêr naw a; Saula le a naupa Jonathan ruok chun an nei a.
Chun, Philistin râl vêngtu sipaihai chu Mikmas kâwna chun an suok ta a.

Ni khat chu Saula naupa Jonathan chun a râlthuom chawitu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Hung ta, khingtieng râl Philistin mi râl vêngtu sipaihai umnaa sawn va fêng ei tih,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, a pa chu a hril naw a.
Saula chu Gibea ram hmawr tieng daia Migrona theibufai kûng hnuoiah a um a; a kuoma mi umhai chu za ruk amani lai an na.
Chun, Silo khuoa thiempu Eli naupa Phinehas naupa Ikabod naupa Ahitub naupa Ahija chu thiempu zakawsîng hâkin a um ve a. Chun, Jonathan chu a fe ti mipuihai chun an hriet naw a.
Jonathanin Philistin mi râl vêngtu sipaihai umnaa fe a tumna kâwn le kâwn inkâra chun a khingtieng khingtieng chun lungpui indaw a um a, pakhat hming chu Bozez a na, a pakhat hming chu Sene a nih.
Lungpui indaw pakhat chu Mikmas hmârtieng panga um a na, a dang pakhat chu Geba zâwn simtieng panga um a nih.
Chun, Jonathan chun, a râlthuom chawitu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Hung rawh, sertan lo sipaihai umnaa sawn va fêng ei tih;
Chun, a râlthuom chawitu chun a kuomah, “I lungrila um angtak chun thaw rawh, ngai ta, i lungril angtak chu ka lungril a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Jonathan chun “Hung ta, an kuoma sawn va kai ei ta, vân suklang ei tih.
Chun, ei kuomah, ‘In kuoma kan hung hmakhat chun la um ro,’ an mi ti chun, ei hmuna chun ngîr zing ei ta,an kuomah hang fe nâwng ei ta,
‘Kan kuom tieng hin hung ro,’ an ti ruok chun hang fêng ei ta,
Chun, an pahni chun Philistin mi râl vêngtu sipaihai hmuna chun an vân suklang a, chun, Philistin mihai chun, “En ta u, Hebrai mihai an inbîkna khursûnga inthawkin an hung suok tah,”an ta.

Chun, râl vêngtu sipaihai umnaa mihai chun Jonathan le a râlthuom chawitu chu, “Hung unla, thil ieng amanih lo inentir kan ti cheu,” tiin an lo ko a. Chun, Jonathan chun a râlthuom chawitu kuoma chun, “Mi hung zui raw khai,
Chuongchun, Jonathan chu a kut le a ke hmangin a hang lâwn a, a râlthuom chawitu chun a zui a; chun, anni chu Jonathan hmaa chun an tlu ta zawt zawt a, a râlthuom chawitu chun a hung that ve pei a.
Chuongchun, Jonathan le a râlthuom chawituin an that hmasa tak ṭum chun ṭin chenve hmun ding ang vêla hin mi sâwmhni amani lai an that a nih.
Chun, riekhmuna mihai, phûla mi dâm, mipuihai po po chu an inthin a; chun, râl vêngtu sipaihai le râlrûkhai khawm chu an inthin ve a, chun, simkhawleihnuoi ân hning a, nasataka inthinna a um a.
Chun, Benjamin ram Gibeaa Saula râl vêngtuhai chun an hang thlîr vêl a, ngai ta, mipuihai chu an ṭe dar hum hum a, khingtieng khingtiengah an invâk nuoi nuoi el a.

Chuongchun, Saula chun a kuoma mipui umhai kuoma chun, “Tuhin intiem unla, tuhai hai am an na a kim naw?” a ta. Chun, an hang intiem chun ngai ta, Jonathan le a râlthuom chawitu chu an lo um ve ta naw a.
Chun, Saula chun Ahija kuoma chun, “Pathien bâwm chu hang la raw khai,” a ti a. Chuong lai chun Pathien bâwm chu Israel mihai laia um a na.
Chun, hieng hi a hung na, Saulân thiempu a biek zing lai dâm chun Philistin mihai riekhmun tienga buoi mur mur chu a zuol ta deu deu a; Saula chun thiempu kuoma chun, “I kut la kîr rawh,”
Chuongchun, Saula le mipuihai po po chu an fe khâwm a, indonaa chun an fe ta a; chun, anni le anni kâwlhnâma lo inthaw rak a, lo buoi nuk nuk chu an hmu a.
Chuongchun, chuong lai ram vêla mi riekhmuna hang fe ve, kha hma tienga Philistin mihai kuoma ṭhang Hebrai mihai khawm chu Saula le Jonathan kuoma um Israel mihai kuoma chun an hung ṭhang ve ta a.
Chuong ang bawkin Ephraim tlâng rama Israel mi inbihmang po pohai khawm khan Philistin mihai an tlânhmang ti an lo hriet a, anni khawm chun indonaa chun ṭhangin an hnawt zui ve ta ngat ngat a.
Chuongchun,

Chun, chu ni chun Israel mihai chu an lunginzîng a; nisienlakhawm, Saula chun, “Ka hmêlmahai chunga phuba ka lâk a, khuo a hung inhnu hmaa tukhawma bu a fâk chun ṭawngsephurin um raw se,” tiin mipui chu a vau a. Chuongchun, tukhawma bu chu intem khawm an intem dêr naw a.
Chun, mipui po pohai chun ramhnuoi an va tlung a, hnuoia chun khuoizu dâm a lo um a.
Chun, mipuiin ramhnuoi an va tlung chun khuoizu dâm a lo luong a, nisienlakhawm, tukhawma an liek nawh, mipuihai chun inkhâmna chu an ṭi a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, Jonathan chu a pa chun mipuihai chu inkhâma a vau lai a hriet ve naw a; chuongchun a hmawl chawi hmawr chu khuoithlâra chun a sunphûm a, a liek a, chuongchun, a mit meng chu a hung fie ta a.
Chuongchun, mipui laia mi pakhat chun a lo dawn a, “I pa chun mipuihai hi, ‘Vawisûna bu fa taphawt chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,’ tiin a mi vau tlat a, mipuihai khawm an chau hle hrim a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Jonathan chun, “Ka pa hin mihai a suklunginzing el a ni hi maw, en ta unla, khuoizu tlâwmte ka hang intem lei chauin ka mit meng a fie tâkzie hi.
Mipui hin an râllâk thil an hmu taphawt vawisûn hin an nuom nuomin fa thei hai sienla lem chu a va nasa nâwkzuol âwm de! chu lei tak chun Philistin mihai chu ei that nasa thei naw pha a ni hi,” a ta.
Chuongchun, chu ni chun Mikmasa inthawkin Aijalon chenin Philistin mihai chu an do a; chun, mipuihai chu an châu hle el ta a.
Chuongchun, mipuihai chun an râllâk thilhai chu a bawin an baw a, berâmhai, bâwngchalhai, kêltehai an man a, hnuoia chun an sukhlum a, mipuihai chun a thisen pumin an fâk el ta a.
Chun, Saula chun, “Mipuihai lai chun invâk dar vawng unla, an kuomah, ‘Mi tinin a sebâwng le berâm ka kuomah hung la sienla, hitaka hin hung that sienla, fa raw se, a thisen puma faa
Chun, Saula chun

Chun, Saula chun, “Zânah Philistin mihai chu zu thaw inla, zîng khawvar chenin rawk ei tiu khai, tukhawm hla hrim hrim nâwng ei tiu,” a ta. Chun, anni chun, “Ṭha i ti ang angin thaw rawh,” an ta. Thiempu ruok chun, “Hi lai hin Pathien hnai phawt ei tiu khai,” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun Pathien a râwn a, “Philistin mihai chu ka zu thaw ding am a nih? Israelhai kutah i pêk ding am a nih?” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, chu ni chun a dawn naw a.
Chun, Saula chun, “Nangni mipui hotuhai po po kha hung hnai ta u khai, vawisûn hin a ieng tak am ei thaw suol a na ti hriet tum ei tiu khai.
Israelhai sandam hlaktu

Chuongchun, Israelhai po po kuoma chun, “Nangni hi a tumin um khâwm unla; chun, kei le ka naupa Jonathan hi a tumin um kan tih,” a ta. Chun, mipuihai chun Saula kuomah, “Ṭha i ti ang angin thaw rawh,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Saula chun
Chun, Saula chun, “Kei le ka naupa Jonathan hriet ṭhena dingin ṭhum vâwr ro,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Jonathan chunga chun a tlu ta a. Chun, Saula chun Jonathan kuoma chun, “Iengam a na i thaw mi hril raw khai?” a ta. Chun, Jonathan chun a hril a, “Ka hmawl chawi hmawrin khuoizu tlâwmte chu kân tem ngei el a, ngai ta, ka thi ngei ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun, “Pathien chun a thaw thawin thaw el sienla, chu nêka nasa khawma, i thi ngei ding a nih, Jonathan,” a ta.
Chun, mipuihai chun Saula kuoma chun, “Israelhai laia hi sandamna ropuitak thawtu Jonathan hi a thi el ding maw? Teu lo e,
Chuongchun, Saulan Philistin mihai a hnawt chu a kîrsan ta a; chun, Philistin mihai khawm chu anni umna hmunah an fe ta a.
Saula chu Israelhai chunga rorêltua a hang ṭhang chun kil tina a hmêlma, Moab mihai, Ammon mihai, Edom mihai, Zoba lalhai dâm, Philistin mihai chu a do a; ân herna tienga taphawt chu a hne pei el a.
Huoitakin a thaw a, Amalek mihai chu a hne a, Israel mihai chu anni rawk hlaktuhai kuta inthawkin a sansuok a nih.
Saula naupasalhai chu Jonathan hai, Isvi hai, Malkisua hai an na, chun a naunuhmei pahnihai hming chu hieng hi a nih: a upa lem hming chu Merab a na, a naupang lem hming chu Mikal a nih.
Saula nuhmei hming chu Ahinoam, Ahimaaz naunu a nih. A sipai hotuhai hming chu Abner, Saula pami Nera naupa a nih.
Kis chu Saula pa a na, chun, Abner pa Nera chu Abiel naupa a nih.
Chuongchun, Saula dam sûng po po chun Philistin mihai le hin nasatakin an indo hlak a; chun, Saula chun mi hrât amanih, mi huoi amanih a hmu taphawt chu a lâk pei hlak a nih.

Amalek mihai do dingin fe la, an thil nei po po hla hrim hrim nei dêr lovin sukbohmang vawng rawh; nuhmei le pasal, naute khawm, nêne ne laihai dâm, bâwngchal le berâm dâm, sanghâwngsei le sabengtung dâm leh sukhlum vawng rawh,’ a ti a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Saula chun mipuihai chu a ko khâwm a. Telaim khuoa chun a tiem a, sipai nuoi hni le Juda mi sîng khat an nih.
Chun, Saula chun Amalek mihai khuo chu a zu tlung a, ruoma chun a lo lambun a.

Chun, Saula chun Ken mihai kuoma chun, “Hung suok unla, Amalek mihai laia inthawk hin insie fihlîm ro, chuong naw chun sukhlum sa rawi ka ti cheu, nangni chun chu Israel thlahai po po Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok khan in lo lunginsiet si a,” a ta. Chuongchun, Ken mihai chu Amalek mihai laia inthawk chun an suok ta a.
Chun, Saula chun Amalek mihai chu Havilaa inthawka Aigupta ram dep Sur chenin a thaw a.
Chun, Amalek mihai lal Agag chu a hringin a man a, mipuihai po po chu kâwlhnâmin a sât hlum vawng a.

Amiruokchu, Saula le mipuihai chun Agag chu an hla a, berâm ṭha ṭhahai, bâwngchal ṭha ṭhahai, a thau thau dâm, berâmte le a ṭha po po leh, chuonghai chu an sukhlum nuom naw a; a ṭha naw le an dit naw po chu an sukhlum vawng a.
Chun,
“Saula hi lala ka ruot hi kân sîr ngawt el a nih; a mi zui lai chu a mi hnung innghatin ka thupêk angin a thaw si naw a,” a ta. Chun, Samuel chu a lunginsen a, zânkhawvârin

Chun, Samuel chu Saula tuok dingin zîngkâr chun a tho a, chun, “Saula chu Karmelah a fe a, ngai ta, chutaka chun hriet zingna lung a phun a; chun, a kir nâwk a, a fe pei a, Gilgala chun a zu fe tah,” tiin Samuel chu an hril a.
Chun, Samuel chun, “Chuong berâm inbe ka naa hung lût le, bâwngchal inbu ka hang hriet si chu iengtizie am a na?” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun, “Amalek mihai ta an hung lâkpêk a nih,

Chun, Samuel chun, “Nanga ngaia chun mi chîntak ni la khawm, Israelhai hotu dinga siem i ni a ni naw am a nih? Chun,

Chun, Saula chun Samuel kuomah, “E,

Helna hi aisan thiemna suolhai leh ân ang a, kawmâwna hi milim biek le rîtlona suol tluk a nih.

Chuongchun, ka suol chu ngaidam la,

Chuongchun, Samuel chu fe dinga a hang inher chun a puon hmawr chu a chel a, a tlêr ta a.

Chun, Israelhai Thahrui chu inkhêl naw ni a, inkîr bawk naw nih; mihriem anga inkîr nâwk el mi a ni naw a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama chun, “Ka lo suol a ni ta a, nisienlakhawm, ka mihai upa le, Israelhai hmaa hin mi chawimawi dingin ka ngên che a nih; chun,

Chun, Samuel chun, “Amalek mihai lal Agag chu ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro,” a ti a. Chuongchun, Agag chu a kuoma chun inthin pumin a va fe a. Chun, Agag chun, “Thina kha chu ka pumpel ta chu ni âwmtak a na,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chun, “I kâwlhnâmin nuhmeihai nau boa a siem angin i nu khawm nuhmei laia nau bo mi nîng a tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, Samuel chun Agag chu Gilgal khuoa chun
Chun, Samuel chu Rama khuoah a fe a; chun, Saula chu a umna khuo Gibeaa chun a hang fe ta a.
Chuongchun, Samuel chun a thi ni chenin Saula chu a sir nâwk ta naw a; amiruokchu, Samuel chu Saula leiin a lungngai a nih; chun,
Chun, Samuel chun, “Iengtin am fe thei ka ti leh? Saula chun a lo hriet chun mi sukhlum el a tih,” a ta. Chun,
Ama chun, “Thu ṭhaa hung ni e,
Chun, an hung chun, Eliab chu a lo en a, “
Chun, Jesai chun Abinadab a hei ko a, Samuel hmaa chun ân fetir a. Ama chun, “Hi khawm hi
Chun, Jesai chun, Samma a vân fetir nâwk a. Ama chun, “Hi khawm hi
Chuongchun, Jesai chun a naupasal pasari hai chu Samuel hmaa chun ân fetir a. Chun, Samuel chun Jesai kuomah, “

Chun, Samuel chun Jesai kuomah, “Hitaka hin i nauhai an um kim vawng am?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “A naupang tak a la um a, ngai ta, berâm a vêng a nih,” a ta. Chun, Samuel chun Jesai kuomah, “Vân kotir raw khai, a hung tlung hmakhat chun ei awt naw ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a vân kotir a, a hung ṭhuoi a. Ama chu sâr veng vawng, mit meng mawitak, en dâwltak el hi a na. Chun,
Chuongchun, Samuel chun hriek bâwm ki chu a lâk a, a unauhai lai chun ama chu hriek a nâl a, chun,
Chun, Saula siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Pathien tir khawhriin a sukbuoi che a nih.
Tûn kan lalpa hin i siehlaw i hmaa umhai hi ṭingṭang kei thiemtak zawng ding thu mi pe raw khai, chuongchun, Pathien tir khawhriin a man pha che khawm, kei a ta, ṭha el hlak i tih,” an ta.
Chun, Saula chun a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Chuong ang kei thiemtak chu mi zawngpêk unla, ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro le,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, tlangvâl pakhat chun a dawn a, a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Bethlehem mi Jesai naupa pakhat chu ka hmu ta a, ama chu kei thiemtak, mi huoitak, indo mi, thuhril thiemtak, hmêl ṭhatak a nih; a kuomah
Chuongchun, Saula chun Jesai kuoma chun mi a tir a, “I naupa David berâm vênga um chu ka kuomah inhungtir rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Jesai chun sabengtung, bei le uoin peng khat phur le, kêlte a lâk a, a naupa David chu Saula pêk dingin ân chawitir a.
Chun, David chun Saula kuom chu a va tlung a, a hmaa chun a va ngîr a, ama chun a lo ngaina êm êm el a; a râlthuom chawituah a ṭhang ta a.
Chun, Saula chun Jesai kuomah, “David hi ka kuomah um raw se, ka mit a tlung hle el,” tia hril dingin mi a tir a.

Chun, hieng hi a hung na, Pathien tir khawhriin Saula chu a man po leh, David chun ṭingṭang a lâk a, a kei hlak a; chuongchun, Saula chu a hung har a, a ṭha nâwk hlak a; chun, khawhri chun a suoksan hlak a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun indo dingin an sipaihai an kei khâwm ṭeu el a. Judai ram sûng Soko khuoah an pungkhâwm a; Ephes-dammim hmunah Soko khuo le Azeka khuo inkâra chun ṭhanghmun an khuor a.
Chun, Saula le Israel mihai chu an pungkhâwm a, Ela ruomah ṭhanghmun an khuor a, Philistin mihai chu lo dang dingin an inzar dar a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu tlâng pangah an um a, chun, Israel mihai chu khingtieng tlâng panga chun an um a, an inkâra chun ruom a um a.
Chun, Philistin mihai ṭhanghmuna inthawk chun an mi hrât, Goliath, Gath khuoa mi, tawng ruk le khâp khata insâng hi a hung suok a.
Dâr lukhum hi a khum a, âwmphaw a hâk a, a âwmphaw rikzie chu dâr shekel sâng nga a nih.
A ngala chun dâr ngalphaw a bun a, a ruongzânga chun dâr feite a pai a.
A fei ngul chu puonkawl ang hi a na, a fei lu chu thîr shekel za ruka rik a nih; chun, a phaw chawitu chu a hmaa chun a fe a.

Chun, a ngîr a, Israelhai sipaihai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Iengdinga indo dinga in hung inzar dar am a na? Kei Philistin mi, nangni Saula siehlawhai in nih a ni naw am a nih? Mi inthlang unla, ka kuomah hung thla raw se.
A mi thaw thei a, a mi sukhlum chun in siehlawah um kan ta, amiruokchu, keiin ka ngam a, ka sukhlum chun kan siehlawah um in ta, kan rawngbâwl in tih,” a ta.
Chun, Philistin mi chun, “Vawisûn hin chu Israelhai sipaihai chu ka cho a nih, mi pakhat hung thaw unla, lo inthâwng kan tih,” a ta.
Chun, Saula le Israelhai po poin chu Philistin mi thuhril an hriet chun an ṭi a, an thlaphâng ta hle a.
Chun, David chu Jesai naupa a na, ama chu Bethlehem-Judaa Ephrath mi kha a na, naupasal pariet a nei a; ama chu Saula inlal lai chun tartak a ni ta a, tarsiea ngai a ni tah.
Chun, Jesai naupasal upahai pathum chun indonaa chun Saula an zui a. A naupasal pathum indonaa fehai hming chu a upa tak Eliab hai, a dawttu Abinadab hai, a pathumna chu Samma hai an nih.
Chun, David chu a naupang tak a na, chun, a upahai pathum chun Saula an zui a.
David chu Saula kuoma inthawk- in a pa berâm enkawl dingin Bethlehema chun a va fe a va fe hlak a.
Chun, Philistin mi chun zîngkâr le zântieng po hin a va hnai hlak a, ni sâwmli sûng zet chu a vân târlang hlak a.
Chun, Jesai chun a naupa David kuoma chun, “Bu zeu epha khat le hi bei tlang sâwm hi chawi la, i unauhai kuomah riekhmunah va fepui vak raw khai;
chun, nêne tui kîng tlang sâwm hi an pâwla sâng hotu chawipêk la, chun, i unauhai iengtin am an um hung indawn la, an chanchin hrietna hung phur rawh.
Saula le anni le Israel mi po po chu Philistin mihai doin Ela ruoma chun tûn an um a nih,” a ta.

Chun, David chu zîngkâr a tho a, berâmhai chu vêngtu pakhat ân kawltir a, Jesaiin thu a pêk ang chun a chawi a, a fe ta a; chun, indona hmuna suok mêk sipaihai chu inthaw dinga an lo khêk dur dur lai takin ama chu tawlailîr umna hmun chu a va tlung a.
Chun, Israel mihai le Philistin mihai chu indo ding chun an lo inzar a, sipai le sipai chu an lo inep a.
Chun, David chun a thuomhnaw chu thuomhnaw enkawltu kuoma chun a sie a, indona hmun tieng chun a va tlân a; a uhai chu chibai a va bûk a.

Chun, anni a biek lai chun, ngai ta, an mi hrât Gath khuoa Philistin mi a hming Goliath chu Philistin mihai sipai pâwl laia chu a hung suok a, a thuhril ngai bawk kha a hung hril a, chu chu David chun a lo hriet zing a.
Israel mihai po po chun ama chu an hei hmu chun an tlânsie a, an ṭi êm êm el a.

Chun, Israel mihai chun, “Kha mihriem a hung suokpa kha in hmu am? Israel mihai cho dinga hung suok a ni ngei el; tukhawm ama sukhlum taphawt chu lalin ama chu sum tiengin sukhausâng a ta; chun, a naunu pêng a ta, chun, a pa sûngkuohai chu Israelhai lai hin zalênin inumtir a tih,” an ta.

Chun, David chun a kâwla ngîrhai kuoma chun, “Hi Philistin mi hi sukhlum a, Israelhai hmingsietna sukbotu chu iengti anga thaw ding am nîng a ta? Hi sertan lo Philistin mi hi tu am a na Pathien hring sipaihai a hei cho vei chu?” a ta.
Chun, mipuihai chun hieng ang hin an dawn a, “A sukhlumtu taphawt chu kan hril anga kha thaw ding a nih,” an ta.

Chun, a u, a upa tak Eliab chun mihai kuoma a thu hril lai chu a lo hriet a: chuongchun, Eliab chu David chunga chun a lunginsen ta thut a, “Iengdinga i hung thla ve am a na? Thlalêra berâm tlâwmte um kha tu am în vêngtir leh? I chapozie le i lungril ṭhat nawzie ka hriet a nih: indo dâm en dingin i hung vei rawk a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun, “Ieng am ka thaw ta leh? A san a um a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun mi dang kuom tieng a nghatsan a, a hril ngai bawk a hril a; chun, mipuihai chun a hmaa an dawn ang bawk khan an dawn a.
Chun, David thuhril chu an hrietin Saula kuomah an hrilsâwng a; chun, ama chun a ko a.
Chun, David chun Saula kuomah, “Ama lei chun tu lungril khawm ṭi naw raw se; i siehlaw hin chu Philistin mi chu va thâwng ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Saulân David kuomah, “Nang chu, hi Philistin mi hi thaw dingin fe thei êm naw ti nih ie, tleirâwl el i la ni si a, ama chu a tleirâwl tîra inthawka indo mi a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Saula kuomah, “I siehlaw hin ka pa berâm ka vêng hlak a, sakeibaknei amanih, savawm amanih a hunga berâm ruol laia berâmte dâm a lâk hin,
ka hnawt a, ka thaw a, a baua inthawk chu ka sansuok hlak a nih; chun, mi thaw dinga a hung inthawk dâm hin a bakhmulah ka man a, ka thaw a, ka sukhlum hlak a nih.
I siehlaw hin sakeibaknei le savawm khawm ka sukhlum ve ve ta hlak a; chu sertan lo Philistin mi chu anni ang bawk chun um ve el a ti maw le, Pathien hring sipaihai a cho vei a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun, “Sakeibaknei kutbâwra inthawk le, savawm kutbâwra inthawka mi sansuoktu
Chun, Saula chun David chu ama thuomin a thuom a, dâr lukhum ân khumtir a, âwmphaw ân hâktir a,

Chun, David chun thuom chunga chun a kâwlhnâm a pai a, fe a hang tum a, chuong ang chun a la thaw sin ngai si naw a. Chun, David chun Saula kuomah, “Ka fepui thei dêr âwm naw a, hieng ang hin ka la thaw sin ngai nawa a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, David chu ân hlîp ta a.
Chun, a hmawl chu a chawi a, vadungtêa lung inmûm ṭhelṭhawl panga a thlang a, a berâm vêngna mansaa chun a pai a; chun, a vailungdêng chu a chawi a, Philistin mi chu a va hnai ta a.
Chun, Philistin mi chu a hung a, David chu a hung pan hnai a; chun, phaw chawitu chu a hmaa chun a fe a.
Chun, Philistin mi chu a hang ngha vêl a, David chu a hmu chun a hmusit hle el a; sâr hlerhlawr, mit meng mawitak, tleirâwl el a ni si a.
Chun, Philistin mi chun David kuoma chun, “Ui am ka nia hmawl le dâm i mi hung pan chu le?” a ta. Chuongchun, Philistin mi chun a pathienhai sâlin David chu ṭawngsie ân phur ta a.
Philistin mi chun David kuomah, “Hung ta, i sahai kha ramsahai le chunglêng vatehai lo infâktir ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun Philistin mi kuoma chun, “Nang chu kawlhnâm dâm, fei dâm, phaw dâm chawiin i hung inthawk a, kei chu sipaihai
Vawisûn hin
chun, hitaka pungkhâwmhai po po hin
Chun, Philistin mi chu a hung inthawka David chu thaw dinga a hung hnai chun David chu sipaihai tieng chun Philistin mi chu thaw dingin a tlân ta vat a.

Chun, David chun a mansa chu a hang pur a, lung a keidawk a, a vailungdêng chun a hei dêng a, Philistin mi chu a bâwk taka chun a hei dêng a, a bâwka chun lung chu a lût a, a tlu bawkkhup ta dêr el a.
Chuongchun, David chun Philistin mi chu vailungdêng le lungin a ngam a, Philistin mi chu a dêng a, a that ta a; David chun kâwlhnâm a chawi dêr naw a.

Chuongchun, David chu a tlân a, Philistin mi kâwla chun a va ngîr a, a kâwlhnâm chu a lâk a, a bâwma inthawk chu a phawi a, chu chun a that a, a lu a tan ta a. Chun, Philistin mihai chun an mi hrât chu a thi ti an hriet chun an tlânse ta a.

Chun, Israel mihai le Juda mihai chu an tho a, an khêk a, Philistin mihai chu Gath chen le Ekron kul kawtkhâr chen rakin an hnawt ta a. Chun, Philistin mihai laia hliemhai chu Saaraim lampui intluonin Gath le Ekron chen chun an tlu phung el a nih.
Chun, Israel mihai chun Philistin mihai an hnawt chu an kîrsan a, an riekhmun chu an suom ta a.
Chun, David chun Philistin mi lu chu a lâk a, Jerusalemah a fepui a, a râlthuom ruok chu a puon inah a sie a.

Chun, Saulan Philistin mihai thaw dinga David a fe lai a hmu khan sipai hotu Abner kuoma chun, “Abner, hi tleirâwl hi tu nau am a na?” a ta. Chun, Abner chun, “I hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, aw lalpa, ka hriet dêr naw a,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Hi naupang hi tu nau am a na, indawn suok raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, David chu Philistin mi a that a hung chu Abner chun a ṭhuoi a, Philistin mi lu chu chawi pumin Saula kuomah a fepui a.
Chun, Saula chun, “Tu naupa am i nih a, tlangvâl?” a ta. David chun a dawn a, “Bethlehem mi i siehlaw Jesai naupa ka nih,” tiin, a dawn a.
Chun, Saula kuoma thu a hril zo chun Jonathan hringna le David hringna chu a lo inzawm ta chie el a, chuongchun, Jonathan chun ama hringna a hmangai ang chiein a hmangai ta a.
Chun, Saula chun chu ni chun ân umtir ta nghâl a, a pa ina chun ân fetir phal ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Jonathan le David chun thu an thlung a, ama hringna ang chiea a hmangai leiin.
Chun, Jonathan chun a puon sil lai a hlîp a, David chu a pêk a, a thuom le a kâwlhnâm le a thalngul le a kâwng khitna chenin a pêk a.

Chun, Saula chun a tirna taphawta chun David chu a fe hlak a, feltakin a châng pei a; chun, Saula chun râl kâp mihai hotu dingin a siem a, chu chu mi po po ngaia le Saula siehlawhai ngaia khawm a ṭha êm êm a.
Chun, an hung inlawi a, Philistin mi thata David a hung kîr chun Israel khaw tinah, nuhmeihai hla sak le lâm pumin khuongtê le thil inri theihai leh, hlimtakin lal Saula tuok dingin an hung suok a.
“Saulain a sânga sâng a that a,
Davidin a sînga sîng a that a,”
an ti a.

Chuongchun, Saula chu a lunginsen ta vieu el a, chuong thu chun ama a suklâwm naw hle el a, “David chu a sînga sîng thatah an ngai a, kei ruok chu a sânga sâng chau thatah an mi ngai a: ram ti chau lo chu ieng am a nei ding dang a um ta leh?” a ta.
Chuongchun, chu nia inthawk chun Saula chun David chu a hmusiet ta a.

Chun, a zînga chun Pathien tir khawhri Saula chunga chun a hung tlung ta rak el a, in sûnga chun thu chu a hril ta nuk nuk el a, chun, David chun ni danga a thaw dân ang bawkin ṭingṭang a kei a: Saula chun a fei chu a chawi zing a.
Chun, Saula chun fei chu a hang inlet a, “Banga sawn David khâw de tlat ka tih,” a ta. David chun vawi hni ân kiensan a.
Chun, a kuoma
Chuleiin, Saula chun a kuoma inthawkin ân sawntir a, sâng chunga sipai hotuah a siem a, chun, mipuihai lai chun a lûtin a suok hlak.
Chun, David chu a thilthaw taphawtah feltakin a châng hlak a,
Chun, Saula chun feltakin a châng hlak ti a hmuin a ṭi hle el a.
Nisienlakhawm, Israelhai le Judahai po po chun David chu an ngaina êm êm a, anni laia lûta suok hlak a ni si a.
Chun, Saula chun David kuomah, “Ngai ta, ka naunuhmei upa lem Merab hi nuhmeiah inneitir ka ti che, huoitakin mi ṭan phawt el la.
Chun, David chun Saula kuomah, “Tu am ka na, ka hringna le Israelhai lai ka pa sûnghai chu ieng am an na, lal mâkpa ka hang nina san ding chu?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Saula naunu Merab chu David inneitir a hung hun chun Meholath mi Adriel nuhmei dingin a pêk ta el a.
Chun, Saula naunu Mikal chun David chu a hmangai a, Saula chu an hril a, chu chun a suklâwm a.

Chun, Saula chun, “A âwkna châng a hung ni theina dingin le Philistin mihaiin a chunga kut an thlâk theina dingin ama hi pêng ka tih,” a ta. Chuleiin, Saula chun David kuoma a vawi hninaah chun, “Vawisûn hin ka mâkpa ning i tih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Saula chun a siehlawhai chu thu a pêk a, “Inrûk takin David be unla, ‘Ngai ta, lal chu i chungah a lâwm hle el a, a siehlawhai po po khawma an hmangai che a nih; chuongchun, lal mâkpaa hin um el rawh,’ ti ro,” a ta.

Chun, Saula siehlawhai chun chuong thuhai chu David na hrieta chun an hril a. David chun, “Mi pasie le tukhawm ingaisâng naw keia ta ding hin lal mâkpa hang ni chu thil namênah in ngai am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Saula siehlawhai chun, “David chun chuong ang chun a ti a nih,” tiin an hril a.

Chun, Saula chun, “David kuoma chun hieng ang hin ti ro khai, ‘Lal chun lal hmêlma phubalâkna dingin Philistin mihai servun za ti naw chu man ieng dang khawm a dit nawh,’ tiin,” a ta. Saula chun David chu Philistin mihai kuta inthitir a lungril tlat a.
Chun, a siehlawhaiin chuong thu chu David an hang hril chun, lal mâkpa a hang ni ding chu David chu a lâwm hle el a. Chun, ni tiemhai chu a la tling naw a.

David le a mihai chu an tho a, Philistin mi za hni an va that a: David chun an ser vun chu a hung phur a, chuongchun, lal mâkpa a ni theina dingin lal chu kimtakin an pêk a. Chuongchun, Saula chun a naunu Mikal chu nuhmeiah ân neitir ta a.
Chun, Saula chun David kuoma chun Pathien a um a nih ti a hriet chieng ta a: chun, Saula naunu Mikal chun ama chu a hmangai a.
Chuongchun, Saula chun David chu a ṭi zuol ta sau a, Saula chu David hmêlma a ni kumkhuo el ta a.

Chuongchun, Philistin mi lienhai chu an vân thawk hlak a; chun, an hung inthawk dawk po leh David chu Saula siehlawhai po po nêka fel lemin a châng hlak a, chuongchun, a hming chu an chawisâng hle el ta a.
Chuongchun, Saula chun a naupa Jonathan le a siehlawhai po po chu David chu that dingin a hril a.

Nisienlakhawm, Saula naupa Jonathan chun David chu a ngaina hle el a. Chuongchun, Jonathan chun David chu, “Ka pa Saula chun that a tum che a, chuleiin, zîngah zîngkâr chun fîmkhur la, hmun inthupah inbi zing raw khai;
chun, fe suok ka ta, i umna phûlah ka pa kâwlah va ngîr ka ta, i chungchâng thuah ka pa bieng ka ta, ieng amanih ka hriet chun hril ka ti che,” a ta.

Chun, Jonathan chun a pa Saula hmaa chun David chu ân pâk a, a kuomah, “Lal chun a siehlaw chungah, David chunga hin thil suol thaw lul naw raw se, i chungah iengkhawm a suksuol si naw a, a thilthawhai chu i ta dinga ṭhatak a ni si a;
thi dâwn lovin Philistin mi kha a thaw a, chun
Chuongchun, Saula chun Jona-than rawl chu a ngai a, Saula chun, “Ṭawng inkhâmin,
Chun, Jonathan chun David chu a ko a, Jonathan chun chuong thil po po chu a hril a. Chun, Jonathan chun David chu Saula kuoma chun a ṭhuoi a, inhma ang bawk khan a kuoma chun a um nâwk ta a.
Chun, indona a hung um nâwk a, chuongchun, David chu ân thawk suok a, Philistin mihai chu a va thaw a, a va that ṭeu a, a hmaa chun an tlânse a.
Chun, Saula chu a ina fei chawia a ṭhung laiin

Chun, Saula chun a fei chun David chu banga khâwde tlat a tum a; nisienlakhawm, Saula kuoma inthawk chun a fe hmang vat a, fei chu banga chun a khâw bûr ta chut el a; chun, David chu a tlân suok a, chu zân chun a him ta a.
Chuongchun, Mikal chun David chu tukverah a thlâk thla a, chuong-chun, a tlân hmang a, a him ta a.
Chun, Mikal chun milim chu a lâk a, khuma chun ân zâltir a; chun, a lu tieng chun kêl hmul lukham a sieh a, puonin ân khum a.
Chun, David ṭhuoi dinga Saulan mi a hung tir chu, “A dam nawh,” a lo ta.
Chun, Saula chun David va en dingin mi a tir a, “A khum pumin hung zâwn suok unla, lo that el ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, a mi tirhai chu an va lût chun, ngai ta, khuma chun milim chu a lu tienga kêl hmul lukham khamin a lo um a.
Saula chun Mikal kuoma chun, “Ieng dinga hienga i mi hlêm a, a himna dinga ka hmêlma chu în suoktir am a na?” a ta.
Tûn David chu a tlân hmang a, a him ta a, Rama khuoa Samuel kuomah a va tlung a, a chunga Saula thilthawhai po po chu a hril a. Chun, ama le Samuel chu an fe a, Naiothah an um a.
Chun, Saula chu, “Ngai ta, David chu Rama khuoa Naiothah a um” ti an hril a.

Chuongchun, David chu va ṭhuoi dingin Saula chun mitirhai a tir a, chun, zâwlnei ruolin thu an hril duol duol lai le Samuel an chunga hotua um an va hmu chun, Saula mitirhai chunga chun Pathien thlarau a hung tlung a, anni khawm chun thu an hril ve ta duol duol a.
Chu chu Saula an hang hril chun, mi dang a tir nâwk a, anni khawm chun thu an va hril ve ta duol duol el a.

Chuongchun, ama khawm chu Rama khuoa chun a fe ve ta a; chun, Seku hmuna tuisunsuo lientak hmun chu a va tlung a, “Samuel le David hi khâwlai am an um a?” tiin ân dawn a. Chun, tuin amani hin, “Ngai ta, Rama khuoa Naiothah an um,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Rama khuoa Naiotha chun a fe a, chun, Pathien thlarau chu a chunga chun a hung tlung ve ta a, a fe pei a, Rama khuoa Naioth a tlung hmakhat chun thu a hril malam pei a.
Chun, David chu Rama khuoa Naiotha inthawk chu a tlân a, Jonathan kuoma chun a fe a, “Ieng am ka thaw leh? Ieng am ka bawsiet a? i pa chunga hin ieng am ka suksuol a hienga mi that tum a na?” a ta.

Chun, ama chun, “That lo e a, thi naw tawp i tih, ngai ta, ka pa hin mîn hriettir lovin, iengkhawm, lien sien chîn sien, a thaw ngai naw a, iengdingin am hieng thu hi ka kuomah ip hlak a ta? ip naw tawp a tih,” a ta.
Chun, David chun, “I pa chun i mi lunginsiet dân hi a hriet chieng hle el si a. ‘Jonathan chun hi hi chu hre kher da raw se, chuong naw chun, a lungngai âwm êm el,’ a ti nîng a tih. Amiruokchu,
Chuongchun, Jonathan chun David kuomah, “I hringnain a dit ang taphawt chun thawpêk pei ka ti che,” a ta.
I pa chun ka um naw hi hung hre suok a ni hlau chun, ‘David chun a khuo Bethlehema va fe vak dingin a mi hni a mi hni a, an sûngkaw ta dinga an kum tin inthâwi hun a na,’ lo ti la.
‘A ṭha chu,’ a ti chun, i siehlaw chu a lung muong a ta, amiruokchu, a lung a sen chun thil ṭha naw thaw a tum a nih ti hre el rawh.
Chuleiin, i siehlaw hi ṭhatakin thaw la, i siehlaw chu
Chun, Jonathan chun, “That lo e a, i chunga thil ṭha naw thaw ka pain a tum ka hriet phawt chun ka hril naw ding che am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun Jonathan kuomah, “I pa hin inrawmtakin dawn ta ang sienla che, tuin am mi hril a ta?” a ta.
Chun, Jonathan chun David kuomah, “Hung ta, va fêng ei tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, phûla chun an va fe rêl ta a.
Chun, Jonathan chun David kuomah, “
Chun, ka pain i chungah thil ṭhanaw thaw nuom ta sienla, ka hril naw che a, lungmuongtaka i fe theina dinga kân thla naw che chun,
Chun, ka thi nawna dingin ka dam sûng chaua
Jonathan chun, “David hmêlmahaia inthawkin
Chun, Jonathan chun ama a hmangaina sâlin David kuoma chun ṭawng ân khâm nâwk a, ama hringna a hmangai ang chiein a hmangai si a.
Chuongchun, Jonathan chun a kuomah, “Zinga hin thla thar a ni ding a na, i ṭhungna hmun a ruok ding leiin i um naw chu inlang ngei ding a na.
Ni thum i um hnung chun fe thla vat la, kha hmaa thil a hung um laia în bîkna hmuna khan hung la, Ezel lung bula chun um zing rawh.
Chun, inthemthiem ni âwmtakin a sîrah thal pathum hung kâp ka ta.
Chun, ngai ta, ‘Fe la, thalhai kha va zawng hmu rawh,’ tiin naupang tir ka ta. Naupang kuoma chun, ‘En ta, thalhai chu i hnungtienga kha a um ie, la la, hung rawh,’ ka ti chun,
Amiruokchu, naupang kuoma chun, ‘En ta, thalhai chu i khêltienga saw a um,’ ka ti chun, fe hmang el rawh;
Chun, nang le keiin thil ei hril tahai chungchâng thua chun ngai ta, nang le ei inkâra chun
Chuongchun, David chu phûla chun ân bihmang a, chun, thla a hung thar chun lal chu thlaithlêng awtin a ṭhung a.
Lal chu ni danga a ṭhungna pângngai bang kâwla a ṭhungnaa chun a ṭhung a; chun, Jonathan chu a ngîr a; chun, Abner chu Saula kâwla chun a ṭhung a; David hmun ruok kha chu a ruok a.
Amiruokchu, Saula chun chu ni chun iengkhawm a hril naw a, “A chungah thil ieng am a nih a um a, ân thieng naw amanih ning a ta, a thieng naw ni ngei a tih,” a ti lungril a.

Chun, thla thar a ni hni ni chun David hmun chu a la ruok ta rawp a; chuongchun, Saula chun a naupa Jonathan kuomah, “Iengdinga Jesai naupa hi zâni le vawisûn hin thlaithlêng awt dinga hung naw am a na?” a ta.
Jonathan chun Saula chu a dawn a, “David chun Bethlehema fe dingin a mi hni a mi hni a.

‘Mîn fetir hrâm rawh khai, kan sûngkuo chun khuoa chun inthâwina an nei ding a na, ka unaupa chun um ve dingin a mîn cha tlat a; chuongchun, i mi lunginsiet thei chun mîn fetir la, ka unauhai va sir ka tih,’ a ta. Chu lei chun lal dawkâna chun a hung naw a nih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Jonathan chungah Saula lung chu a sen ta thut el a, “Nang nuhmei lepchie le kâwmaw naupa, Jesai naupa chu i muolphona dingin le i nu saruokna sukmuolphona dingin i thlang ti ka hriet naw am a nih?
Jesai naupa hi, hi hnuoia a um sûng phawt chun sukdet ni naw ti ni a, i ram khawm. Chuleiin, inkotir nghâl la, ka kuomah hung inṭhuoitir rawh, a thi ngei ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Jonathan chun a pa Saula chu a dawn a, a kuomah, “Iengdingin am sukhlum ding nîng a ta? Ieng am a thaw hrim leh?” a ta.
Saula chun khaw tumin a fei chu a hang inlet a; chu chu lei chun Jonathan chun a pain David chu that a lo tum ngei a ni ti a hriet ta a.
Chun, Jonathan chu dawkâna inthawk chun lunginsentakin a tho a, chu thla ni hni ni chun thlaithlêng a awt ve ta naw a, a pa chun David a sukmuolpho êm lei chun a lungngaipui a nih.
Chun, zîngkâr chun Jonathan chu naupangte chu ṭhuoiin David le an hmun ruot phûl tieng chun a fe ta a.
Chun, a naupang kuoma chun, “Tlân la, ka thal kâphai hi va zawng raw khai,” a ta. Chun, naupang chu a tlân lai chun a khêl tieng chun thal chu a kâp a.
Chun, naupang chun Jonathan thal kâp tlâkna hmun a va tlung chun Jonathan chun naupang chu a ko a, “Thal chu i khêl tienga saw a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Jonathan chun naupangte chu a ko a, “Hung tlân vak rawh, inhmaw rawh, muong naw rawh,” a ta. Chun, Jonathan naupang chun thal chu a rût khâwm a, a pu kuom tienga chun a fe ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, naupang chun iengkhawm a hriet naw a, Jonathan le David chau chun thil umzie chu an hriet a.
Chun, Jonathan chun a hriemhreihai chu naupang chu a pêk a, a kuomah, “Fe la, khuoah lo hang fepui rawh,” a ta.

Chun, naupang chu a fe phingle chun David chu a umna hmun simtieng panga inthawk chun a hung tho a, hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai vawi thum a bûk a, chun, an infâwp a, an ṭap rêl a. David ruok chu a zuol bîk a.
Chun, Jonathan chun David kuomah, “Lungmuongtakin fe raw khai, ‘

David chun, thiempu Ahimelek kuoma chun, “Lalin thil thaw dingin thu a mi pêk a, ka kuomah, ‘Ka thil inthawtir tum che le ka thupêk hrim hrim che hi tukhawma hre naw raw se,’ a ti tlat a; chun, tlangvâlhai lo umna ding hmunhai chu ka ruot a.
Chuongchun, ieng ieng am i kutah a um a? Bei tlang nga mi pe la, annawleh, i nei ang taphawt khawm chu,” a ta.
Chun, thiempu chun David chu a dawn a, “Bei narân chu ka nei naw a, bei inthieng ruok chu ka nei a; tlangvâlhai chu nuhmeia inthawka an insiekieng phawt chun,” a ta.

Chun, David chun thiempu chu a dawn a, a kuomah, “Tuta ni thum sûng hin chu nuhmeia inthawk hrim hrim chu kan insiekieng vawng a nih, ka hung suok ding lai khawm khan tlangvâlhai bûrlebêl chu ân thieng a nih, invâk satlie el kan ni nâka chu; vawisûn lem chu chu an bûrlebêlhai chu a vân thieng nâwkzuol awm de e!” a ta.
Chun, chu ni chun Saula siehlaw laia mi pakhat
Chun, David chun Ahimelek kuoma chun, “Fei amanih, kâwlhnâm amanih i kawl naw maw? Lal hmaa chun inhmaw a ṭûl leiin ka kâwlhnâm le ka hriemhrei a ieng khawm ka hung chawi hman naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, David chu a tho a, chu ni chun Saula ṭi chun a tlân hmang a, Gath lal Akis kuomah a fe ta a.
‘Saulain a sânga sâng a that a,
Davidin a sînga sîng a that a,’
tia lâm pumin a chungchâng thu hlain an sak dur dur a ni naw am a ni kha?” an ta.
Chuongchun, Akis chun a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “En ta u, invêt a ni in hriet zing si a, iengdinga ka kuoma in hung ṭhuoi am a na?
Invêt ka tlâksam leiin am a nih hi mi hi ân vêtzie suklang dinga ka hmaa in hung ṭhuoi chu? Ama hi ka inah a hung lût el ding maw?” a ta.
Chun, mi lunginzing taphawthai, leibat nei taphawthai, lungninawna nei taphawthai chu a kuomah an fe khâwm a; chuongchun, an hotuah a um ta a, chun a kuoma chun mi za li lai an um ta a.

Chun, David chu chutaka inthawk chun Moab rama Mizpeah a fe a, Moab lal kuoma chun, “Pathien thil mi thawpêk ding ka hriet hmakhat chu ka nu le ka pa hung hai sien, i kuomah lo um raw hai se, ka hni che a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Moab lal hmaa chun anni chu a hung ṭhuoi a, kulbînga a um sûng po chun a kuoma chun an um ta a.

Chun, Saula chun David le a kuoma umhai chu an hmu tah ti a lo hriet a, Saula chu Gibeaah Rama khuoa tamarisk thing hnuoiah a fei chawiin a ṭhung a; chun, a vêla chun a siehlawhai po po chu an ngîr a.

Chun, Saula chun a kâwl vêla ngîr a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Nangni Benjamin thlahai lo ngai unla, Jesai naupa chun lohai, grêp huonhai pe seng cheuin, a sipai sâng hotuahai, a sipai za hotuahai a siem vawng ding cheu am a nih?

in rêngin in mi enbing a, ka naupain Jesai naupa kuoma thu a ithlung ka kuoma suklang hrim hrim in um naw a, a mi lungngaipui hrim hrim khawm in um naw a, ka naupain ka siehlaw hi mi do ding le vawisûn ni chen khawma min chân dinga ân fui thu ka kuoma suklang hrim iengdinga in um naw?” a ta.
Chuongchun, Saula siehlawhai kâwla ngîr Edom mi Doeg chun a dawn a, “Jesai naupa chu Nob khuoa Ahitub naupa Ahimelek kuoma a hung ka hmu a.
Chuongchun, lal chun Ahitub naupa Ahimelek thiempu le, a pa sûngkuo Nob khuoa thiempu um po po chu ân kotir a; anni chu an rêngin lal kuoma chun an hung a.
Chun, Saula chun, “Nang Ahitub naupa, lo ngai rawh,” a ta. Ama chun, “Ka lalpa, hitaka hin ka um,” a ta.
Chun, Saulain a kuomah, “Bei le kâwlhnâm dâm lo pe a,
Chuongchun, Ahimelek chun lal chu a dawn a, “Lal mâkpa, i mi rawntak hlak, in sûngkuo laia mi inzaum David ang hrim hrima mi ringum hi i siehlaw po pohai lai hin tu am a um a?

Vawisûn hi Pathien ka biek râwnpêk ṭan ni am a nih? A ni nawh. Lal hin a siehlaw amanih, ka pa sûngkuo hrim hrim hi min tum lul naw raw se, i siehlaw hin hieng thu po po a iengkhawm hi ka hriet naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Ahimelek, i thi ngei ngei ding a nih, nang le i pa sûngkuohai po po leh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kâwla ngîr sipai kuoma chun, “Nghakîr unla,

Chun, lal chun Doeg kuoma chun, “Nang nghakîr la, thiempuhai kha thaw rawh,” a ta. Edom mi Doeg chu a nghakîr a, thiempuhai chu a thaw a, chu ni chun puonzai inhmi sil thiempu zakawsîng hâk, mi sâwmriet le panga a that a.
Chun, Nob, thiempu khuo chu kâwlhnâmin a thaw a, a nuhmei a pasalin naupang le nênê ne lai chenin, bâwnghai, sabengtunghai, berâmhai leh kâwlhnâmin a sât hlum a.
Chun, Ahitub naupa Ahimelek naupasalhai laia pakhat a hming Abiathar chu a tlân suok a, David kuomah a tlân a.
Chun, Abiathar chun Saulain
David chun Abiathar kuoma chun, “Edom mi Doeg chutaka a um ni ngei khan Saula hril ngei ngei a tih ti ka hriet sa hrim a nih; I pa sûngkuohai po po chu keia leia thi an nih.
Nang chu ka kuomah um la ṭi naw rawh; kei mi that tum chun nang khawm that tum ngei an ti che; ka kuoma i um ruok chun chu him i tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun
Chun, David mihai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Judai rama um zing khawm hin ei ṭi a na, Keila khuoa zu fe a, Philistin sipaihai zu do chu ṭi a va um nâwkzuol âwm de!” an ta.
Chuongchun, David chun

Chuongchun, David le a mihai chu Keila khuoa chun an zu fe ta a, Philistin mihai chu an zu thaw a, an ranhai chu an lâkpêk a, an that ṭeu a. Chuong ang chun David chun Keila khuoa mihai chu a humhim ta a.
Chun, Ahimelek naupa Abiathar Keila khuoa David kuoma a tlân lai khan thiempu zakawsîng chawia fe thla a na.
Chun, Keila khuoa chun David chu a fe ti Saula an hril a, Saula chun, “Pathienin ka kutah a mi pêk a ni ta chu, kul kawtkhâr le a kalna nei khuoa chun lûtin ân khum ta si a,” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun mi po po chu indo dingin, Keila khuoa chun zu fe a, David le a mihai zûn huol dingin a ko khâwm a.
David chun Saula chun a chunga thil ṭha naw a ngaituo ti chu a lo hriet a, thiempu Abiathar kuoma chun, “Thiempu zakawsîng kha hung la ta khai,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun, “Aw
Keila khuoa mihai hin a kuta chun an mi pêk el ding am a nih? I siehlawin ka lo hriet ang chun Saula chu a hung thla ding am a nih? Aw
Chuongchun, David chun, “Keila khuoa mihai chun kei le ka mihai hi Saula kutah an mi pêk el ding am a nih?” a ta. Chun,

Chuongchun, David le a mihai za ruk lai chu an tho a, Keila khuoa inthawk chu an suok a, fena remchâng natieng poa chun an fe ta a. Chun, David chu Keila khuoa inthawkin a tlân suok tah ti Saula an hril a; chuongchun, inthawk suok chu a ṭhul ta a.
Chun, David chu thlalêrah, kulbîng nghettakahai a um a, Ziph thlalêr tlâng ramah a um ta zing a. Chun, Saula chun ama chu ni tin hin a zawng a, nisienlakhawm, Pathienin a kutah a pêk nawh.
Chun, David chun ama sukhlum tumin Saula chu a hung inthawk ti a hriet a; chuongchun, David chu Ziph thlalêr Horeshah a um a.
Chun, Saula naupa Jonathan chu a tho a, Horeshah David kuoma chun a fe a. Pathienah a kut chu a sukhrâtpêk a.

Chun, a kuomah, “Ṭi dêr naw rawh, ka pa Saula kut chun zawng suok naw ni che; Israelhai lalah um i ta, kei nanga dawt nîng ka tih, chu khawm chu ka pa Saula hin a hriet zing a nih,” a ta. Chun, an pahni chun
Chuleiin, aw lalpa, i hringnain hung thlâk a duthusâm ang ngei chun hung thla ta la, chun, keini lo thaw ve ding chu lal kuta ama lo inhlân chu nîng a ta,” an ta.
Chun, Saula chun, “
Fe unla, va sukchieng nâwkzuol unla, a hnung le hma va sui unla, chutaka a hmutu khawm va sukfel nâwkzuol zet zet ro: var vervêktakin thil a thaw hlak a nih ti mîn an mi hril a nih.

Chuleiin, ân bîkhmangna hmun po pohai hre vawng bak unla, chun, ka kuomah hung nâwk ngei ngei unla: chun, nangni leh ka fe ve ding a nih: chun, hi ramah a um phawt chun Juda mi sâng tamtak laia inthawk chun zawng suok ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, an tho a, Saula fe hmain Zipha chun an fe ta a, nisienlakhawm, David le a mihai chu Jeshimon simtieng Arabaah Maon thlalêra chun an um a.

Chun, Saula le a mihai chu ama zawng dingin an fe a. Chun, David chu an hril a, chuongchun, Maon thlalêra um lungpui pan ding chun a suok a. Saulân chu chu a hriet chun Maon thlalêra chun David chu a hnawt ta a.

Saula chu tlâng khingtieng pangah a fe a, David le a mihai chu tlâng khingtieng panga chun an fe a, chun, David chu Saula ṭi chun inhmâwtakin a tlân a; Saula le a mihai chun David le a mihai chu man tumin an inhuol vêl si a.
Nisienlakhawm, Saula kuoma chun, “Inhmaw la, hung rawh, Philistin mihai chun ei ram an hung thaw a nih,” tiin thangko a hung tlung a.
Chuongchun, Saula chun David a hnawt lai chu a kîrsan a, Philistin mihai do ding chun a fe ta a: chuleiin, chu hmun chu Selahama-hlekoth
Chun, David chu chutaka inthawk chu a fe a. En-gedi kulbîngahai chun a hang um ta a.
Chun, Saula chu Philistin mihai a va hnawt a hung chun, “Ngai ta, David chu En-gedi thlalêrah a um,” tiin an hril a.
Chuongchun, Saula chun Israel mi po pohai laia thlang ṭhieu mi sâng thum a ṭhuoi a, sakêlhai umna lungpui laia chun David le a mihai zawng dingin a fe ta a.
Chun, David mihai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta,
Chun, Saula puon hmawr a va ât thlâk chun David lungril chu a sukna hle a.
Chuongchun, a mihai kuoma chun, “
Chuongchun, David chun chuong thuhai chun a mihai chu a khap a, Saula thaw dinga an suok chu a phal ta naw a. Chun, Saula chu pûka inthawk chun a suok a, a fe ta a.
A hnung ela chun David khawm chu a tho a, pûka inthawk chun a suok a, “Lalpa, ka lalpa,” tiin Saula chu a ko zui a. Chun, Saula chu a nghakîr chun, David chun a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a.
Chun, David chun Saula kuomah, “Ngai ta, ‘David hin i sietna ding a zawng a nih,’ tiha mihaiin i kuoma an hril chu iengdinga i awi hlak am a na?
Ngai ta, vawisûn hin

Chu chau khawm chu ni loin, pa, en ta, hi i puon hmawr khawm ka chawi zing hi: i puon hmawr ka ât thlâk thei sia, ka sukhlum nawna chea hin ka kuta hin thil ṭha naw le bawsietna a um nawh ti le, ka hringna lâk tumin mi zawng la khawm, i chunga hin ka suol naw a nih ti hi hre zing ngei ngei raw khai.
Tienlai mihai thuvarin, ‘Mi suola inthawkin suol a hung suok hlak a,’ a tih a, nisienlakhawm, i chungah kut thlâk naw ning,
Israel lal hi tu zawnga hung suok am a na? Tu am a na i hnawt? Ui pûl thi, uihrik el.
Chuleiin,
Chun, Davidin Saula kuoma hieng thu hi a hril zo chun Saula chun, “Hi hi i râwl a ni maw, ka naupa David?” a ta. Chun, Saula chu râwl insuo meuin a ṭap ta a.
David kuoma chun, “Keia nêk chun i fel lem êm êm a nih, nang chun chu ka chungah thil ṭha i thaw a, kei ruok chun chu thil ṭha naw ka thaw a nih.
Chun, vawisûn hin ka chunga thil ṭha i thawzie i suklang tah a nih;
Mîn a hmêlma hmu ang sienla, tlangtakin ân suo nuom ding am a nih? Chuleiin, vawisûna ka chunga i thilthawa hin
Ngai ta, lal i la ni ngei ding a na, Israel ram chu i kutah sukdetin a um ding a ni ti ka hriet tah.
Chuleiin, keia hnunga ka thlahai la hung um dinghai chu sukbohmang naw ding le, ka pa sûngkuo laia inthawka ka hming sukbo lo dingin
Chuongchun, David chun Saula kuoma chun ṭawng ân khâm ta a. Chun, Saula chu a fe ta a, David le a mihai ruok chu kulbînga chun an hang fe ta a.
Chun, Samuel chu a thi ta a; chun, Israel mihai po po chu an inko khâwm a, an sûn a; Rama khuoa a ina chun an phûm ta a. Chun, David chu a tho a, Paran thlalêrah a zu fe a.
Chun, Maon khuoa chun mi pakhat a um a, a khawsakna chu Karmel tlângah a nih, mi ropuitak a na, berâm sâng thum le kêl sâng khat a nei a, Karmel tlânga chun a berâm hmul a vaw a.
Chu mipa hming chu Nabal a nih; a nuhmei hming chu Abigail a nih, chu nuhmei chu bengvârtak, hmêlṭhatak a na; a pasal ruok chu mi biek intaktak le mi rilotak a nih; Kaleb thla a nih.
Chun, David chun thlalêra inthawk chun Nabal chun a berâm hmul a vaw ti a lo hriet a.
Chuongchun, Davidin tlangvâl sâwm a tir a, tlangvâlhai kuoma chun, Davidin, “Karmel tlânga chun hang fe unla, Nabal kuoma chun hang fe unla, keia hmingin chibai hang bûk ro;
chun, mi neinungtakpa kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril ro, ‘I chunga dâm, i sûngkuohai chunga dâm, i nei po po chunga dâm, lungmuongna um raw se.
I berâm hmul vâwtuhai an um ti ka hriet a; I berâm vêngtuhai chu ka kuoma hin an um hlak a, an pawi iengkhawm kan tâwk naw a, Karmel tlânga an um sûng hrim hrim hin iengkhawm an chân nawh.

I tlangvâlhai indawn la hril el an ti che; chuleiin, tlangvâlhai hi lo lunginsiet rawh, a remchâng ni takin kan hung tlung a ni hi; i nei ang ang chu i siehlawhai le i naupa David hi lo pe ta, a ti a,’ va ti ro,” a ta.
Chun, David tlangvâlhai chu an va tlung chun, David hming chun chuong thu po po chu Nabal kuoma chun an hril a, chun, to zingin an nghâk a.
Chun, Nabal chun David siehlawhai chu a dawn a, “David chu tu am a ni leh? Jesai naupa chu tu am a ni leh? Tulai hin siehlaw tamtak puhai tlân hmangsan an tam el a.
Ka bei dâm, ka tui dâm, le ka berâm hmul vâwtuhai ta dinga ka that sa hi tuhai am an ni khawm hriet hlei lo mihai chu ka pêk hlak ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, David tlangvâlhai chu an lêt nâwk a, an kîr nâwk a; chuong thu po po chu an hung hril a.

Chun, David chun a mihai kuoma chun, “In kâwlhnâm pai seng ro,” a ta. Chun, an kâwlhnâm chu an pai seng a, David khawm chun a kâwlhnâm chu a pai a; mi za li laiin David chu an hang zui a; chun, mi za hni chu thuomhnaw nghâkin an um a.
Chun, tlangvâl pakhat chun Nabal nuhmei Abigail kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, David chun thlalêra inthawkin kan pu hi chibai bûk dingin mihai a hungtir a, ama chun a lo hal a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chu kan chungah an ṭha hle el a, kan pawi iengkhawm an tâwk naw a, phûla kan uma kan um hmunkhat sûng po po khan iengkhawm kan inhmang naw a;
berâm vênga an kuoma kan um sûng po po chun sûn le zân kan ta dinga kul an ni ringawt el a.

Chuleiin, ieng am a na i thaw ding, nguntakin ngaituo ta khai, kan pu sûngkuo le ama chunga hin thil ṭha naw thaw tumna a um a nih; ama hlak hi Belial naupa a ni ringawt el a, tu ibiek thei khawm a ni si naw a,” a ta.

Chun, Abigail chun inhmâwtakin, bei tlang za hni le uoin peng hni leh, berâm panga suong el dinga inzo sa hieu leh, beiphit bûk nga leh, grêp ra em ṭâwl bâwr za leh, theichang hlawm za hni leh a lâkkhâwm a, sabengtung ân phurtir a.
Chun, a siehlaw tlangvâlhai kuoma chun, “Ka hmaah lo fe pei unla, ngai ta u, hung zui ka ti cheu,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, a pasal Nabal chu a hril naw a.
Chuongchun, a sabengtung chunga chun a chuong a, tlâng kârkawta a ṭum laiin ngai ta, David le a mihai chun an hung pan a; chuongchun, an intuok ta a.
David chun, “A iengkhawm, ân hmang nawna dingin hi mipa nei hi thlalêrah a thlâwn ela vêngpêk ka lo ni hi tie; thil ṭha chu thil ṭha nawin a mi thung el ta si a.
Zingah zîng khawvar chena a ta po po laia pasal naupang pakhat chau hringna khawm ka hla a ni chun Pathienin David
Chun, Abigail chun David a hmu chun a sabengtunga inthawk chun a ṭum vat a, David hmaa chun a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a.
Chun, a ke bula chun a bawkkhup a, “Keimân, pu, keima ngeiin khawhlona chu phur el ka tih, chun, i siehlawnu hin i na hrietah thu hril sienla, i siehlawnu thuhril chu ngai dingin ka hni che a nih.

Ka hni che, ka lalpa hin Belial mi Nabal chu ienga khawm ngai naw raw khai, a hming ang chie el hi a ni hrim a nih, Nabal an ti namân, ân vêt a ni hi, kei i siehlawnu hin ka pu tlangvâl hungtirhai kha chu ka lo hmu naw a nih.
Chuleiin, tuhin pu Lalpa hringna le i hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, ka lo hmu naw takzet a nih,
Chun, hi ka pu ta dinga i siehlawin lâwmman ka hung chawi hi ka pu hung zuitu tlangvâlhai hi pêk ni raw se.
Ka hni che a nih, i siehlawnu suolna hi ngaidam rawh,
Nangma hnawt ding che le i hringna sukbo dingin mihai hung inthawk hai sien khawm,
Chun,
a san um lova thisen insuo ngai naw le, phuba i lâk bawk naw hi i ta ding chun lungngaina le lungril natna ni naw ni a; chun,
Chun, David chun Abigail kuoma chun, “Vawisûna mi tuok dinga hung tirtu che
chun, i remhrietna chu malsâwmin um sienla, chun, nang thisen insuo thiemnawnaa inthawka mi humtu le keima kuta phuba la lova mi siemtu chu malsâwmin um bawk rawh.
Nangin mi lo tuok vak naw la chu,
Chuongchun, David chun a thil hung chawipêkhai chu a lâk a; chun, a kuoma chun, “Lungmuongtakin, in tieng hang fe ta la, chun, i thu chu ka awi a, i hni chu ka pawmpêk che a nih aw,” a ta.

Chun, Abigail chu Nabal kuoma chun a hang fe a; chun, ngai ta, a ina chun lal ruoiṭhe ang elin ruoi a lo ṭhe a, ân rui hle leiin Nabal chu a hlim huom el a; chuleiin, a zîng khawvar hmakhat chun iengkhawm, a hril naw a.
Chun, zîngtienga Nabal uoin inrui chu a hung har chun a nuhmei chun chuong thu chu a hang hril a, a lungril chu a mit ta sul a, lung ang elin a hung um ta a.
Chun, ni sâwm hnunga chun
Chun, Davidin Nabal chu a thi ti a hang hriet chun, “Ka hming sietna dingin Nabal thilthawa mi hrilpuia, a siehlaw chu thil ṭha naw chu thaw lo dinga mi khaptu
Chun, David siehlawhai chun Karmel tlânga Abigail kuom an va tlung chun, “David chun a nuhmei dinga ṭhuoi ding chein a mi tir a nih,” tiin an biek a.
Chun, a tho a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a; “Ngai ta u, in siehlawnu hi ka lalpa siehlawhai ke sâwp dinga siehlaw ka nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Abigail chu a tho vak a, sabengtung chungah a chuong a, a hnungzui nunghâk pangahai le chun David mi tirhai chu an zui ta a, a nuhmeiah a um ta a.
David chun Jezreela mi Ahi- noam a lo nei ta bawk a; chuongchun, a nuhmeia chun an um ve ve ta a.
Saula chun a naunu Mikal David nuhmei kha Gallim khuoa Lais naupa Palti a lo inneitir tah a nih.
Chuongchun, Saula chu a tho a, Ziph thlalêra chun Israel mihai laia thlang ṭhieu mi sâng thum ṭhuoiin Ziph thlalêra chun David zawng dingin a zu fe ta a.
Chun, Saula chun Jeshimon dep, lam palailaka chun Hakila tlânga chun ṭhanghmun a khuor a. David ruok chu thlalêra chun a um zing a; chun, Saula chu ama zawng dingin thlalêra chun a hung ti a hriet a.
Chuleiin, David chun enthlittuhai a tir a, Saula chu a hung tak tak a nih ti a hriet chieng ta a.

Chuongchun, David chu a tho a, Saula ṭhanghmun khuornaa chun a fe a, chun David chun Saula le a sipai hotu Abner, Nera naupa zâlna chu a hmu a; Saula chu tawlailîr huol sûnga chun a zâl a, a vêlin mihai chun umhmun an rem a.
Chuongchun, David chun Hit mi Ahimelek le Joab unau Zeruia naupa Abisai kuomah, “Saula ṭhanghmuna chun kei leh tu am fêng a ta?” a ta. Abisai chun, “Keima hi i kuoma chun zu fe vêng ka tih,” a ta.

Chuongchun, David le Abisai chu mipuihai umnaah zâna chun an zu fe a; chun, ngai ta, Saula chu tawlailîr huol sûnga chun a lo zâl a, a lu tieng chun a fei chu hnuoia hin a sunbûr a; chun, Abner le mihai chu a vêla chun an zâl a.

Chuongchun, Abisai chun David kuomah, “Vawisûn hin i hmêlma chu Pathienin i kutah a pêk a ni hi, chuleiin, fei hin vawi khatin hnuoia hin hang sunde tlat el ka ti aw? Sun nawn nâwk naw tawp ka tih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, David chun Abisai kuomah, “Sukbohmang naw rawh,
Chun, David ma chun, “
Chuongchun, David chun Saula lu bula fei le tuiûm chu a lâk a, an fe nâwk ta a, tukhawmin an hmu naw a, tukhawm a hrie le har an um bawk naw a;
Chuongchun, David chu râl khingtieng chun a fe a, hla fea hin tlâng sîpah a ngîr a, an inkâr chu hlatak a nih.
Chun, David chun mipuihai le Nera naupa Abner chu, “Abner, i mi hung dawn naw ding am a nih,” tiin a ko a. Chuongchun, Abner chun a dawn a, “Lal hung ko veitu chu tu am i ni leh?” a ta.

Chun, David chun Abner kuoma chun, “Mi huoisen i ni naw am a nih? Israel mihai lai hin nang ang tu am an um a? Iengtiziea lal i pu chu i vêng naw am a na? Lal i pu chu sukbohmang dingin tu amanih a hung kha tie.
I thilthaw dân hi a ṭha naw a nih.
Chun, Saula chun David râwl chu a hei hriet a, “Chu i râwl a ni maw ka naupa David,?” a hei ti a. David chun, “Aw lalpa, ka pu, ka râwl a ni chu,” a ta.
Chun, “Ieng leiin am ka lalpa hin a siehlaw hi a hnawt a na? Ieng thil am ka thaw a? Ka kuta hin thil suol ieng am a um a?
Chuleiin, lalpa, ka pu chun a siehlaw thu hi ngai dingin ka hni che. Kei mi do dinga i lungril chawkthotu chu
Chuleiin, ka thisen chu

Chuongchun, Saula chun, “Thil ka lo thaw suol dêr el a nih, ka naupa David, hung kîr nâwk rawh, i mithmuah ka hringna hi vawisûn hin a hlut êm leiin iengkhawm law ta naw hrim hrim ka ti che, ngai ta, thil invêtthlâktak ka lo thaw ta a, ka lo thaw suol dêr el a ni ta hi,” a ta.
Chun, David chun a dawn a, “Aw lalpa, fei hi hei en ta, tlangvâl pakhat hung sienla hung la raw se.
Chun,
Ngai ta, vawisûna i hringna ka ngaihlutpêk che ang bawk hin
Chuongchun, Saula chun David kuomah, “Ka naupa David, malsâwmin um raw khai, thilthawtheitakin um i ta, hne

Chun, David chun a lungrilin “Iengtika mani chu Saula kuta hin ka la bohmang ngei ding chu a ni hi; Philistin mihai rama tlânhmang nêka ṭha hi a um naw ding a ni hi; chuongchun, Saula’n Israel ram sûng po poa a mi zawng hi beidawng tâng a ta, chuongchun, a kuta inthawka suok nîng ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chu a tho a, a kuoma mi za ruk umhai le chun Maok naupa Gath lal Akis kuomah an fe ta a.
Chun, David chu ama le a mihai leh, mi tin an sûngkuoin, David khawm a nuhmei pahnihai Jezreel mi Ahinoam le Nabal nuhmei Karmela mi Abigail leh, Gath khuoah Akis kuomah an um ta a.
Chun, David chu Gath khuoah a tlân ti Saula chu an hril a, chuongchun, a zawng nâwk ta naw a.
Chun, David chun Akis kuomah, “Mi lunginsiet la, i rama khuo pakhata hin umna hmun mi pe hai sienla, chutaka chun um ka tih; i siehlaw hi iengdingin am lal khuoah um zing a ta?” a ti a.
Chuongchun, Akis chun chu ni chun Ziklag khuo chu a pêk ta a: chuleiin, Ziklag khuo chu tu chen hin Judai ram lalhai ta a ni ta zing a.
Chun, Philistin rama David a um sûng chu kum khat pumhlûm le thla li a nih.
Chun, David le a mihai chu an hang fe a, Gesur mihai dâm, Girzi mihai dâm, Amalek mihai dâm an rûn a; chuong hnamhai chu tienlaia inthawkin Sur ram tieng pang Aigupta ram chena um an nih.

Chun, David chun ram chu a thaw a, a nuhmei a pasalin hla hrim hrim a nei naw a, berâmhai dâm, sebâwnghai dâm, sabengtunghai dâm, sanghâwngseihai dâm, an silfên dâm a lâkpêk a; chun a kîr nâwk a, Akis kuomah a fe a.
Akis chun, “Vawisûn hin khaw tieng am i rûn a?” a ta. David chun, “Juda Sim ram dâm, Jerahmeel Sim ram dâm, Ken mihai Sim ram dâm,” a ta.
Chun, David chun, “Philistin rama a um sûng hrim hrimin, ‘David chun hieng ang hin a thaw rawp hlak a nih,’ ti rawi an tih,” tiin a nuhmei a pasalin Gath khuoa ṭhuoi ding hrim hrim a hla naw a nih.
Chun, Akis chun David thuhril chu awiin, “Ama le ama hi Israel mihai ân theidatir ta hle el a, chuleiin, kumkhuoin ka siehlawah um a tih, ” a ta.

Chun, chuong lai chun Philistin mihai chun an sipaihai chu Israel mihai thawa do dingin an ko khâwm rak el a. Chun, Akis chun David kuomah, “Nang le i mihai chu sipaihai lai, ka kuomah in fe ve ngei ding a nih ti hre rawh,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Akis kuomah, “Aw le, i siehlaw thilthawthei dân chu hre el i tih,” a ta. Chun, Akis chun David kuomah, “A ṭha chu! a mi vêngtuah siem kumkhuong ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an pungkhâwm a, Sunema chun ṭhanghmun an va khuor a; chun, Saula chun Israel mi po po a ko khâwm a, Gilboaah ṭhanghmun an khuor ve a.
Chun, Saula chun Philistin mi sipaihai a hmu chun a ṭi a, a lungril ân thin hlawp hlawp el a.

Chuongchun, Saula chun a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Khawhri aisânthiem zâwl nuhmei a kuoma ka fea ka râwn dingin mi zawngpêk ro,” a ta. Chun, a siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Endor khuoah khawhri aisânthiem zâwl nuhmei a um annaw,” an ta.

Chun, Saula chu ân sukdanglam a, a puon danglam a sil a, ama le mi dang pahni leh an fe a, zânah nuhmei kuoma chun an va tlung a; chun, khawhri aisânnu kuoma chun, “Ai mi sânpêk la, i kuoma hming ka lam taphawthai chu mi ko suokpêk rawh,” a ta.
Nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Saula thilthaw chu i hriet a, a rama khawhri aisânthiem le dawithiemhai chu a sukbo zo ta a, iengdingin am ka thina dingin ka hringna châng i kam ding a ni leh?” a ta.
Chun, Saula chun
Chuongchun, nuhmei chun, “Tu am hang ko suokpêk ka ti che a?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Samuel mi hung ko suokpêk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun Samuel a hang hmu chun râwl inringtakin a khêk a; chun, nuhmei chun Saula kuomah, “Iengdinga i mi hlêm am a na, Saula i ni zing si a?” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ṭi naw rawh, ieng am a ni ta leh i hmu?” a ta. Chun, nuhmei chun Saula kuomah, “Hnuoia inthawka pathien hung suok ka hmu,” a ta.
Chun, a kuomah, “Ieng ang am a na?” a ta. Ama chun, “Tarsie hi a hung suok a, zakawfuol a hâk,” a ta. Chun, Saula chun Samuel a nih ti a hriet a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a.

Chun, Samuel chun Saula kuomah, “Iengdinga hienga i mi ko suok buoi am a na?” a ta. Saula chun a dawn a, “Ka lunginzîng êm êm ela a nih, Philistin mihai chun an mi do a, Pathien hlak chun a mi nghatsan a, zâwlneiin amanih, mangin amani khawm a mi dawn ta hrim hrim naw a; chuleiin, ka thaw ding mi hril dingin ka ko el che a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Samuel chun, “Chuonga
Chu naw khawm chu
Chuongchun, Samuel thuhril lei chun Saula chu a ṭi ta êm êm el a, hnuoiah a tlu dêr el ta a, tha le zung hrim hrim a nei ta naw a, sûnnithlâk le zânkhawvâra bu fa lo a ni si a.
Chun, nuhmei chu Saula kuoma chun a fe a, a lungngai êm êm ti a hriet a, a kuomah , “Ngai ta, i siehlawnu hin i hril chu ka awi a, thi le thi tiin ka kuoma i thuhrilhai chu ka pawm a nih.
Chuleiin, nang khawmin i siehlawnu thu chu awi ve rawh, bu tlâwmte bêk hung pêng ka ti che a, chuongchun, i fe phaa thahrui i nei theina dingin fa rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a nuom naw a, “Fa naw ningah,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, a siehlawhai chun nuhmei le chun an tir ṭâl a, an thu chu a awi ta a. Chuongchun, hnuoia inthawk chu a tho a, khuma chun a ṭhung a.
Chun, nuhmei chun sebâwngte châwm thau a ina chun a nei a, a va that vak a, chun, beiphit a lâk a, a hmet a, chawl ṭhanglo bei a siem a.
Saula le a siehlawhai hmaa chun a va sie a, chun, an lo fâk ta a. Chuongchun, an tho a, chu zân chun an fe ta a.
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun an sipaihai po po chu Apheka chun an ko khâwm vawng a; chun, Israel mihai chun Jezreela tui- khur kâwlah ṭhanghmun an khuor a.
Chun, Philistinhai lalhai chu sâng têl têl dâmin, za têl têl dâmin an fe zut zut el a.

Chun, David le a mihai le Akis le chun hnung an dâl a. Chuongchun, Philistin lalhai chun, “Hieng Hebrai mihai hi ieng thaw am an ni leh?” an ta. Akis chun Philistin lalhai kuoma chun, “Hi David, Israelhai lal Saula siehlaw, hi chen rau ka kuoma um ta a, ka kuoma a hung tlûklûta inthawka tu chen khawma a suolna ka hmu nawna chu a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Philistin lalhai chu a chungah an lunginsen a, a kuomah, “Ama chu i hmun ruotpêka khan kîr nâwk dingin infetir la, indonaah kan kuoma chun fe ve naw raw se; chuong naw chun indonaah ei hmêlmahai tieng ṭhang el rawi a tih; hieng mihai luhai laia ding hin hi mipa hi a lalpa leh an inrem nâwk el âwm de aw?
Chuongchun, Akis chun David chu a ko a, a kuomah, “
Chuleiin, Philistin lalhai i suklungninaw nawna dingin kîr nâwk la, lungâwitakin fe el rawh,” a ta.

David chun Akis kuomah, “Anleh ieng thil am ka lo thaw leh? i kuoma ka um sûng po vawisûn chen hin, ka pu, laltak hmêlma chu do lova ka hang kîr nâwk elna dingin i siehlaw chunga hin ieng am hriet i nei leh?” a ta.
Akis chun a dawn a, David kuomah, “Ka mithmua chun Pathien vântirko ang elin i ṭha a, nisienlakhawm, Philistin lalhai hin, ‘Indonaah kan kuomah hung ve naw nih,’ an ti tlat el a.
Chuleiin, i kuoma fe ve, i pu siehlawhai le hin zîngkâr tho unla, chun, zîngkâr in tho a, khuo a var phing le chun fe el ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David le a mihai chu Philistin rama kîr dinga zîngkâra suok dingin zîngkâr an tho ta a. Chun, Philistin mihai chu Jezreelah an hang fe ta a.
Chun, a ni thum nia David le a mihaiin Ziklag an tlung chun Amalek mihaiin Simtieng le Ziklag khuo chu an lo rûn zing ta a. Ziklag khuo chu an lo sawisa a, an lo raw a;
nuhmeihai le chu khuoa um taphawthai chu a chîn a lienin salah an man a, tukhawm that lovin an ṭhuoi a, an fepui ta a.
Chun, David le a mihaiin khuo an va tlung chun, ngai ta, a lo kâng fai vawng ta a; chun, an nuhmeihai, an naupasalhai, an naunuhmeihai chu salin an lo man ta a.
Chuongchun, David le a kuoma umhai chun an râwl an insuo a, ṭap hlei thei lo lêkin an ṭap a.
Chun, David chu a lunginzîng hle el a, mi tin an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai leiin mi po po an lungril a na êm êm a, ama chu lunga dêng thu an hril leiin; nisienlakhawm, David chu a Pathien
Chun, David chun, “Chuonghai chu hnawt lang, la hnawt phâk ka ti?” tiin
Chuongchun, David chu a fe ta a, ama le a kuoma mi za rukhai le chun; chun, Besor vadung chu an va tlung a, chutaka chun an mi mâksanhai chu an um a.
David ruok chun a hnawt pei a, ama le mi za lihai le chun, mi za hni chu an chau ta leiin Besor vadung chu an kai thei ta naw a, an lo um tah a nih.
Chun, phûla hin Aigupta mi an va hmu a, David kuoma chun an ṭhuoi a, bei an pêk a, a lo fâk a; chun, tui dâwn ding an pêk a;
chun, theichang hlawm tlang khat le grêp ra emṭâwl bâwr hni an pêk a; chun, chuong chu a hang fâk chun a hung har nâwk ta a; ni thum le zân thum bu fa lo le tui dâwn lo a ni si a.

Chun, David chun a kuomah, “Tu mi am i na? Khâwlaia inthawka hung am i ni a?” a ta. Ama chun, “Aigupta ram tlangvâl, Amalek mi siehlaw ka na; chun, ni thum a ni ta a, ka dam naw leiin ka pu chun a mi mâksan el a nih.

David chun a kuomah, “Chuonghai rawi umnaa chun mi zu ṭhuoi thei i ti?” a ta. Ama chun, “Mi that lo ding le, ka pu kuta mi pe nâwk lo dingin Pathien hming sâlin ṭawng inkhâm la, chuongchun, chuonghai umnaa chun zu ṭhuoi ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, a zuk ṭhuoi thlâk chun, ngai ta, Philistin ram le Judai rama râllâk tamtak an lâk leiin ruoi an ṭhe a, an fâkin an dâwn a, an lo um dar nei nuoi a.
Chuongchun, David chun nisa tlâka inthawkin a zînga zântieng chenin a thaw ta a, tlangvâl za li, sanghâwngsei chunga chuonga tlânsehai ti chau naw chu tukhawm dama suok hrim hrim an um nawh.
Chun, David chun Amalek mihaiin an lâk po po chu a lâk nâwk vawng a; chun, David chun a nuhmei pahnihai chu a sansuok bawk a.
Chuongchun, a chîn a lienin an naupasalhai, an naunuhmeihai, an râllâk le an thil lâk hrim hrim iengkhawm chân an nei naw a, David chun a lâkpêk nâwk vawng a nih.
Chun, David chun berâm ruol le ran ruolhai po po chu a lâk a, ran danghai hmaa chun an khal a, “Hieng hi David râllâk a ni hi,” an ta.

Chun, mi za hni an châu leia David zui thei lova Besor vadunga an inumtirhai kuom chu David chun a va tlung a; chun, anni chu David tuok ding le a kuoma um vehai chu tuok dingin an fe suok a; chun, David chun mipuihai kuom a va tlung chun chibai a bûk tâwl a.

Chuongchun, David kuoma fe vehai laia mi suolhai le Belial mihai po po chun an dawn a, “Ei kuoma an fe ve naw leiin râllâk thil ei va lâkpêk nâwk hrim hrim chu pe ve nâwng ei ta, an ṭhuoi a, an fe theina dingin an nuhmeihai le an nauhai seng ruok chu an ṭhuoi phal ei tih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, David chun, “Unauhai,
Tuin am hi thua hin in thu hi pawm a ta? Indonaa zu fehai chan ang bawk chu thuomhnaw vênga lo umhai chun an chang ve ding annâwm; inang vawnga chang ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, chu nia inthawk tu chen hin Israelhai ta dinga thupêk le dâna nei dingin a siem ta a.
Chun, Davidin Ziklag khuo a tlung chun, râllâk ṭhenkhat chu, “Hi hi
Bethela um dâm, Sim Ramotha um dâm, Jattira um dâm:
Aroera um dâm, Sipmotha um dâm, Estemoa um dâm:
Rakala um dâm, Jerahmeel khuohaia umhai dâm, Ken khuohaia umhai dâm:
Hormaa umhai dâm, Borasana umhai dâm, Athaka umhai dâm,
Hebrona umhai dâm, David le a mihai chêttlatna hmun po poa um Juda upa, a ruolhai kuoma chun a thawn a.
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun Israel mihai chu an do a, chun, Israel mihai chu Philistin mihai hmaa chun an tlânse a: Gilboa tlânga chun thatin an um ta zul el a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun Saula le a naupasalhai chu an hnawt zui ta ngat ngat a; chun, Philistin mihai chun Saula naupasalhai, Jonathan le Abinadab le Malkisua chu an that a.
Chun, Saula chu an thaw nasa ta êm êm el a, thal kâp mihai chun an hnawt phâk ta a: thal kâp mihai lei chun a lunginzîng ta êm êm el a.
Chun, a râlthuom chawitu chun Saula a thi ti a hriet chun, ama khawm chun a kâwlhnâm chu a bawlût ve a, an thi rêl ta a.

Chun, ruom râl khingtienga Israel mi umhai le Jordan râla umhaiin Israel mihai an tlânsie ti le Saula le a naupasalhai an thi ti an hriet chun, khuohai chu an suoksan a, an tlânhmang ta a; chun, Philistin mihai chun an va hluo ta a.
Chun, a zînga chun Philistin mihaiin an râl thathai thuom hlîppêk dinga an va fe chun Saula le a naupasal pathumhai Gilboa tlânga an lo thi chu an va hmu a.
Chun, Jabes-gileada umhaiin Philistin mihaiin Saula an thaw dân chungchâng thu chu an lo hriet chun,
Chun, an ruhai chu an lâk a, Jabesa tamarisk thing hnuoiah an phûm a; chun, ni sari bu an nghei a.
Chun, Saula a thi hnungin, David chu Amalek mihai rûnnaa inthawkin a hung a, David chu Ziklag khuoa ni hni a um hnung chun,

a ni thum ni chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat an ṭhanghmuna inthawk Saula kuoma mi chu a puonhai tlêr nengnungin le a lua pilvut kai nung hin a hung a; chun, David kuomah a hung tlung chun hnuoia bawkkhupin chibai a bûk a.
David chun a kuomah, “Khaw laia inthawka hung am i ni a?” a ta; ama chun, “Israel mihai ṭhanghmuna inthawkin ka hung tlân suok a nih,” a ta.

Chun, David chun a kuomah, “Ieng angin am thil a um a, mi hril ta khai?” a ta. Ama chun a dawn a, “Indonaa inthawk chun mihai chu an tlânsie a, mi tamtak chu an tlu a, an thi tâwl a, chun, Saula le a naupa Jonathan khawm an thi ve a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun a hriltu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Iengtin am Saula le a naupa Jonathan chu an thi ti i hriet a?” a ta.
Chun, a hnungtieng a hung ngha chun a mi hei hmu a, a mi hei ko a. Chun, kei chun, ‘Hitaka hin ka um ie,’ tiin ka dawn a.
Chuongchun, ka kuomah, ‘Tu am i ni a?’ tiin a mîn dawn a. Chun, kei chun, ‘Amalek mi ka nih,’ tiin ka dawn a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, ‘Ka kâwla hin ngîr la, mi hung that el ta, ka la dam ting a, lunginzîngnain a mi tlâkkhum ta si a,’ a ta.

Chuongchun, a kâwla chun ka ngîr a, chuonga tlu dêr ta hnung chu a dam zo ta âwm hrim hrima ka hriet naw leiin ka that ta el a, a lua lallukhum le bânbun chu ka lâk a, ka pu kuomah hitaka hin ka hung lâk a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun ama silfênhai chu a chel a, a keithlêr ta a, chuong ang bawk chun a kuoma mi um po pohai chun an thaw ve a;
chuongchun, Saula le a naupa Jonathan le
Chun, David chun a hriltu tlangvâl kuoma chun, “Khâwtieng mi am i ni a?” a ta. Ama chun, “Hmêlmak mi, Amalek mi naupa ka nih,” a ti a, a dawn a.
Chun, David chun a kuomah, “
Chuongchun, David chun tlangvâlhai laia mi pakhat chu a ko a, “Va hnai la, va that rawh,” a ta. Chun, a va sât a, a thi ta a.
Chun, David chun a kuomah, “
Chuongchun, David chun Saula le a naupa Jonathan chungah hi ṭaphla hi ân zâwt a,
Aw Israel, i ropuina chu i bâwlhmunahai that a na,
Mi thilthawtheihai an tlu ta hi!
Gath-a chun hril naw unla,
Askelon kawtthlêrahai chun puong bawk naw ro;
Chuong naw chun Philistin naunuhai lâwm an ta,
Sertan lo naunuhai hlimin khêk pal rawi an tih.
Nangni Gilboa tlânghai,
In chungah dâidâw le ruo khawm tla naw raw se; thil inhlân ding khawm insuo bawk naw ro.
Chutaka chun mi thilthawthei phaw chu tirdakumtakin an pei si a;
Saula phaw, hrieknâl lo mi phaw ang elin.
Thathai thisena inthawk le, mi thilthawthei thâua inthawk chun,
Jonathan thal chu a lêt naw a;
Saula kâwlhnâm chu a thlâwnin a lêt bawk nawh.
Saula le Jonathan umdân chu dit a umin a mâwi a,
An thi khawma an inṭhe nawh;
Mupuihai nêkin an ṭuonrang lem a,
