Sakeibakneihai nêkin an hrât lem.
Nangni Israel naunuhai,
Saula chu ṭa ro,
Puon sen mawihaia inthuom cheu a,
In puonahai rângkachaka cheimawinahai belpêktu cheu chu.
Indo lai taka mi thilthawtheihai an tlûk el chu!
I bâwlhmunahai Jonathan chu an that tah.
Ka unaupa Jonathan, i chungthua hin ka lunginzîng a nih;
Ka chungah i ṭha êm êm hlak a,
I mi hmangaina chu a mak a,
Nuhmei hmangaina chu a khûm dai a nih.
Mi thilthawtheihai chu an tlu a,
Indona thuomhnawhai khawm a bohmang zo tah!
Chun, chu hnunga chun David chun, “Juda ram khâwlai amaniah ka hang fe ding?” tiin
Chun, David chun a kuoma mi um po pohai chu a ṭhuoi a, mi tin an sûngkuohai seng leh, Hebron khuoa chun an um a.
Chuongchun, Jabes-gilead mihai kuoma chun David chun mi a tir a, an kuomah, “In lalpa Saula chu hi lunginsietna hi suklangin ama chu in lo phûm ta leiin
Chuongchun, in kuthai chu hung hrât sienla, huoitakin um ro, in lalpa Saula chu a thi ta si a; chun, Juda chihai chun an chunga lal dingin hriek an mi nâl ta bawk a,” a ta.
Chun, Nera naupa Abner, Saula sipai hotu chun Saula naupa Isboseth chu Mahanaimah a ṭhuoi a,
Gilead chunga dâm, Asur mihai chunga dâm, Jezreel chunga dâm, Ephraim chunga dâm, Israel chung po poah lalah a siem ta a.
(Saula naupa Isboseth chu Israel chunga ro a rêl ṭan lai chun kum sâwmli mi a na, kum hni ro a rêl a). Nisienlakhawm, Juda mihai chun David chu an pawm lem a.
Davidin Hebrona Juda chihai chunga ro a rêlna chu kum sari le thla ruk a ni ta a.
Chun, Nera naupa Abner le Saula naupa Isboseth siehlawhai chu Mahanaima inthawk an suok a, Gibeonah an fe a.
Chun, Zeruia naupa Joab le David siehlawhai chu an fe suok a, Gibeon dîla chun an intuok a; chuongchun, pâwl khat chu dîl râl khingtieng chun an ṭhung a, pâwl khat dang chu dîl râl khingtieng chun.
Chun, Abner chun Joab kuomah, “Tlangvâlhai chu hung inthawkhai sienla, ei hmaa hin hang inthaw ta hai sienla,” a ta. Chun, Joab chun, “Hung inthawk e â,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an inthawk a, an ni zât chin ruot chie chu an kai a, Benjamin chi Saula naupa Isboseth tienga ṭhang chu sâwm le pahni; chun, David siehlawhai chu sâwm le pahni bawk.
An khingpuihai chu an lu sengah an inman a, mâni bitumhai chu an nâkah kâwlhnâmin an insun seng a; chuongchun, an tlu ta vawng el a; chuleiin, chu hmun chu Helkath-Hazurim
Chuongchun, chu nia an inbei chu a nasa ta hle a, chun, Abner le Israel mihai chu David siehlawhai hmaa chun an tlâwm ta a.
Chun, chutaka chun Zeruia naupasalhai pathum Joab le Abisai le Asahel hai chu an um a, Asahel chu sazukpui ang ela ngal hrât a nih.
Chuongchun, Asahel chun Abner chu a hnawt a, Abner a hnawt chu changtieng le vawitieng khawm pêt hlek lovin a hnawt a.
Chuongchun, Abner chu a hang nghale a, “Nang i ni maw Asahel?” a hei ti a. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Kei ka nih ie,” a ta.

Chun, Abner chun, a kuomah, “I changtieng amanih, i vawitieng amani khan pêt la, tlangvâl pakhat kha man la, a râlthuom kha lâkpêk rawh,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, Asahel chun ama a hnawt chu a pêtsan nuom chuong naw a.
Chun, Abner chun Asahel kuomah, “Mi pêtsan rawh, iengdingin am sunthlûng ka ti che a? I unaupa Joab hmêl ka hmu ngam ding am a nih?” a ti nâwk a.

Nisienlakhawm, a pêt nuom chuong naw a, chuleiin, Abner chun a feiṭhut tiengin a phîngah a sun a, a fei chu a hnungtieng a tlang a, chutaka chun a tlu ta tawp a, chu hmuna chun a thi ta a; chun, Asahel a tlûka a thina hmun hung tlung taphawthai chu chutaka chun an ngîr chawt pei a.
Nisienlakhawm, Joab le Abisai chun Abner chu an hnawt pei a, chun, Gibeon thlalêr lampuia Gia dep Amma tlâng an tlung chun nisa a tla ta a.
Chun, Benjamin mihai chu Abner kuoma chun an pungkhâwm a, pâwl khatah an insiem a, tlâng sîpa chun an va ngîr ta a.

Chuongchun, Abner chun Joab chu a ko a, “Kumkhuoin kâwlhnâm hi ei inlet zing el ding am a ni? A tâwpna chu lunginzîngna ding chau a nih ti i hriet naw am a ni? Mipuihai chu ieng chen am an unauhai hnawt kîrsan dinga hril lovin i um ding a na?” a ta.
Chun, Joab chun, “Pathien hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, iengkhawm lo hril naw la chu mipuihai chu zîngkâr khan an fe hmang ta ding a na, an unauhai chu an hnawt naw ding bah,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chun tawtawrâwt chu a hei mût a, mipuihai chu an ngîr ta ṭhuop a, Israel mihai chu an hnawt ta naw a, an do nâwk ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Abner le a mihai chu chu zân chun zânkhawvârin an fe a, chun, Jordan an kai a, Bithron an fe thleng rak a, Mahanaim an tlung ta a.
Chun, Joab chu Abner a hnawt chu a kîr ta a; chun, mipuihai po po a hei ko khâwm chun David rawihai sâwmpakuo le Asahel an lo kim ta naw a.
David rawihai ruok chun Benjamin mihai le Abner mihai chu za thum le sâwmruk an sukhlum a.
Chuongchun, Asahel ruong chu an lâk a, Bethlehema a pa thlânah an phûm a. Chun, Joab le a mihai chu zânkhawvârin an fe a, Hebron an tlung chun khuo a var a.
Saula sûnghai le David sûnghai chu sâwttak an indo a, David chu a hung hrât tiel tiel a, Saula sûnghai ruok chu an hung hrât naw tiel tiel ta a.
Chun, David chun Hebron khuoa chun naupasalhai a nei a, a naupa hmasa tak chu Amnon, Jezreel mi Ahinoam le an inkâra mi a nih;
a dawttu chu Kileab, Karmela mi Nabal nuhmei Abigail le an kâra mi a nih; chun, a pathumna chu Absalom, Gesur lal Talmai naunu Maaka naupa a na.
Chun, a palina chu Adonija, Haggith naupa a nih, a pangana chu Sephatia, Abital naupa a nih;
chun, a parukna chu Ithream, David nuhmei Egla le an kâra mi a nih. Hieng hai hi David nau Hebrona pienghai chu an nih.
Chun, Saula sûnghai le David sûnghai chu an indo lai chun, Abner chu Saula sûnghai laia chun ân sukhrât ta deu deu a.
Saula chun hmei a nei a, a hming chu Rizpa, Aia naunu a nih. Chun, Isboseth chun Abner kuomah, “Iengdinga ka pa hmeinu kuomah i fe am?” a ta.

Chuongchun, Isboseth thuhril chun Abner chu a suklungsen ta êm êm el a, “Judahai ui lu el am ka nih? Vawisûn chen hin i pa Saula sûnghai le a unauhai le a ruolhai chungah zainêmna ka suklang a, David kutah kân hlân naw che a, nisienlakhawm, nangin hi nuhmei chunga hin suolah i mîn tum el a.
Chuongchun, a ṭi êm leiin Abner chu a dawn khawm a dawn ngam ta naw a.

Chun, Abner chun ama aiawin David kuoma chun, “Hi ram hi tu ta am a ni a?” tiin mitirhai a tir a; chun, “Ka kuomah thu thlung rawh, chuongchun, ngai ta, Israel mi po po i kuom tienga ṭhang dingin ka kut chu nangma tieng ṭhang a tih,” tiin a hril nâwk a.

Chun, ama chun, “Aw le, i kuoma chun thu thlung ka tih, amiruokchu, nangma kuomah thil pakhat ka phût ding a nih, chu chu hi hi a nih; mi hmu dinga i hung phaleh Saula naunu Mikal kha i hung ṭhuoi phawt naw chun ka hmêl hmu thei naw ti nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isboseth chun mi a tir a, a pasal Lais naupa Paltiel kuom ngeia inthawk chun an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, a pasal chu a kuoma chun a fe a, ṭap malam peiin a fe a, Bahurim chenin a zui a. Chuongchun, Abner chun a kuomah, “Fe rawh, kîr nâwk el rawh,” a ti a, chun, a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, Abner chun Israel mihai upahai chu a biek a, “Kha hma khan David chu in chunga lala um dingin in dit hlak a;
tuhin siem ta ro khai
Chun, Abner chun Benjamin mihai na hrieta chun a hril bawk a; chun, Abner chu Israel mihai le Benjamin sûng po pohaiin ṭha an ti ang taphawt Hebrona David na hrieta hril dingin a fe bawk a.
Chuongchun, Abner chu Hebrona David kuoma chun mi sâwmhni leh an fe a. Chun, David chun Abner le a kuoma mi sâwmhnihai ta ding chun ruoi a ṭhe a.

Abner chun David kuoma chun, “Tho ka ta, i kuoma thu an thlung theina ding le, i duthusâm angtaka ro i rêl theina dingin Israel mi po pohai ka lalpa kuoma hin hung kei khâwm dingin fêng ka tih,” a ta. Chun, David chun Abner chu ân fetir a, chuongchun, lungmuongtak chun a fe ta a.

Chun, ngai ta, David mihai le Joab mihai rammu chu an hung a, râllâk tamtak an hung lâk a, nisienlakhawm, Abner chu Hebrona David kuoma chun a lo um ta naw a; a lo infetir ta si a, ama khawm chu lungmuongtakin a lo fe tah a nih.
Joab le a kuoma mipui po po an hung tlung chun, “Nera naupa Abner chu lal kuomah a hung a, ama chun a lo infetir nâwk ta a, lungmuongtakin a fe nâwk tah,” tiin Joab chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, Joab chu lal kuoma chun a fe a, “I thil lo thaw hi iengtizie am a ni leh? Ngai ta, Abner chu i kuomah a hung a, iengdinga în fetir a, a fe dai el am a ni ta leh?
Nera naupa Abner chu i hriet a, i suok i lût le i thilthaw iengkim hriet tuma hung a na,” a ta.
Chun, David kuoma inthawka Joab a hung suok chun Abner hnawt ding chun mi a tir a, Sira tuisunsuoa inthawkin an hung ṭhuoikîr a, nisienlakhawm, David chun a hriet nawh.
Chun, Abner chun Hebron a hung tlung chun Joab chun kul kawtkhârah biekrûk dingin a ṭhuoi hran a, a unau Asahel thisen suok thungna dingin a phîngah a sun hlum ta a.
Chun, a nakiea Davidin a hung hriet chun, “Nera naupa Abner thisen insuo thua hin kei le ka ram chu

Joab lu chungah tla sienla, a pa sûnghai po po chunga leh; Joab sûnghaia inthawka thil pût amanih, phâr amanih, hmawl ringsana um mi amanih, kâwlhnâma thi amanih, ṭâm amanih hung um lovin um naw raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an unaupa Asahel chu Gibeona indonaa a that leiin Joab le a unau Abisai chun Abner chu an that ta a.
Chun, David chun Joab le a kuoma mipui po pohai kuoma chun, “In puonhai chu keithlêr unla, saiip puon sil unla, Abner chu sûn ro,” a ta. Chun, lal David chun hlâng chu a zui a.
Chun, Abner chu Hebrona chun an phûm a, lal chu râwl insuo meuin a ṭap a; mipui po po khawm chu an ṭap a.
Chun, lal chun Abner chu a ṭa a,
“Abner chu invêt thiin a thi el ding a ni maw?
I kuthai chu khuop a ni naw a, i ke hai chu kawl inbun a ni bawk nawh,
Mi rilo nauhai hmaa mi a tlûk anga i tlûk el ta chu?” a ta.
Chun, mi po po chun ama an ṭa nâwk a.

Chuongchun, sûn a la ni laiin David chu bu infâktir dingin mi po po chu an hung a; nisienlakhawm, David chun, “Nisa tlâk hmaa bu amanih thil dang amani khawm a fâka ka fâk vai chun Pathien chun a law law mi law raw se, chu nêka nasa khawmin,” tiin ṭawng ân khâm a.
Chu chu mi po poin an hriet chun an lâwm êm êm a, lal thilthaw taphawthai chun mipuihai po po chu a suklâwm pei a.
Chuongchun, mipui po po le Israel mi po pohai chun Nera naupa Abner thata um chu lal thu a ni nawh ti an hriet ta a.
Chun, lal chun a siehlawhai kuoma chun, “Vawisûn hin Israel mi lien, mi ropuitak a thi ti in hriet naw am a nih?
Lal dinga hrieknâl ni lang khawm, vawisûn hin ka hrât naw a nih; chun, hieng Zeruia nauhai hi ka ta dingin tuor hla an um taluo a nih;
Saula naupa Isboseth chun Hebronah Abner chu a thi ti a lo hriet chun a kuthai a hung hrât ta naw a, chun, Israel mi po pohai chu an ṭi ta a.

Chun, Saula naupa Isboseth chun sipai pâwl hotu pahni a nei a; pakhat hming chu Baanah a na, a dang hming chu Rekab a nih, Benjamin thla Beeroth mi Rimmon naupasalhai an nih; (Beeroth chu Benjamin rama ngai a ni si a;
Beeroth khuoa mihai chu Gittaim-ah an tlân a, tu chen hin chutaka chun an um ta a).
Chun, Beeroth mi Rimmon naupahai Rekab le Baana chu an fe a; Isboseth ina chun, nisa inding laitakin, a sûn châwl lai takin an fe a.
Bu la ni âwmtakin insûng ril tieng chun an lût a, a phîngah an va sun a; chun, Rekab le a unaupa Baana chu an tlânhmang ta a.
Chun, inah an va lût a, a zâlna pindana khuma zâl chu an sun a, an that a, a lu an tan a, a lu chu an lâk a, Araba lampui tieng fe thlengin zânkhawvârin an fe a.
Chun, Isboseth lu chu Hebrona chun David kuomah an hung lâk a, lal kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, hi nanga that tumtu, i hmêlma Saula naupa Isboseth lu,
Chun, David chun Beeroth mi Rimmon naupa Rekab le a unaupa chu a dawn a, an kuomah, “
Mi fel ama insûng luma, a khumlaizâwl ngeia mi, mi suolin an that a thisen man chu nangnia inthawk hin ka phût nâwk zuolin, hnuoia inthawk hin ka va sukbohmang âwm ngei cheu de aw,” a ta.

Chuongchun, David chun a tlangvâlhai chu thu a pêk a, anni chun an that a, an kut le an kehai an tanpêk a, Hebrona dîl panga chun an khai a, Is-boseth lu ruok chu an lâk a, Hebrona Abner thlâna chun an phûm ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel upahai po po chu Hebrona chun lal kuomah an va fe a; chun, lal David chun Hebrona chun
Nisienlakhawm, David chun Zion kul chu a lâk a, chu chu David khuo chu a nih.

Chun, David chun chu ni chun, “Jebus mihai that tumtu taphawt chu tuikawr zuiin hang fe hai sienla, David theidatu mitdel le kebai chu that raw hai se,” a ta. Chuongchun, “Mitdel le kebai chu ina chun lût naw nihai,” an ti hlak a.
Chun, David chu kula chun a um a, David khuo tiin ân bûk ta a. Chun, David chun Milloa inthawkin a vêlin kul a siem a, a sûngtieng leh.
Chuongchun, David chu a hung ropui ta deu deu a,
Chun, Tura lal Hiram chun David kuomah mi a tir a, sidar thinghai a thawn a, themthiemhai le lung suttuhai a tir bawk a, David ta ding chun in an bâwlpêk a.
Chun, David chun
Chun, David chun Hebron a suoksan hnungin Jerusalema chun thaikêm le nuhmei a nei belsa a; chuongchun, David chun naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai a la nei sa ta rawp a.
Chun, Jerusalema a neihai hming chu hieng hi an nih; Sammua, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elisua, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elisama, Eliada, le Eliphelet hai hi an nih.

Philistin mihai chun David chu Israelhaiin lala um dingin hriek an nâl ti an hrietin Philistin mihai po po chu David zawng ding chun an hang fe ta a; David chun chu chu a lo hrietin a kulbînga chun a fe a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hung a, Rephaim ruoma chun an inzar a.
Chun, David chun, “Philistin mihai thaw dingin kan hang fe ding am a nih? ka kuta hin anni chu pêng i ti?” tiin
Chuongchun, David chu Baal-perazima chun a fe a, chutaka chun David chun anni chu a hne a, “
Chutaka chun Philistin mihai chun an milimhai an mâksan a, David le a mihai chun an lâk a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chu an hang fe nâwk a, Rephaim ruoma chun an inzar nâwk a.
Chun, Davidin
Chun, thingtheihmi kûng lêra fe ri ṭhup ṭhup ang i hriet pha chun châng rawh, Philistin sipaihai thaw dingin i hmaah
Chuongchun,
David chun Israel mihai laia thlang ṭhieu mi sîng thum ân khâwm nâwk a.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu tawlailîr tharah an sie a, tlânga um Abinadab ina inthawk chun an lâk suok a, Abinadab naupasalhai Uzza le Ahio chun tawlailîr thar chu an khal a.
Chun, tlânga Abinadab ina inthawk chun, Pathien bâwm pum chun an lâk suok a; Ahio chu Pathien bâwm hma tieng chun a fe a.
Chun, David le Israel mi po pohai chun
Chun, Nakon hrizâwl an tlung chun Uzza chun Pathien bâwm chu a hei ban a, a chel a; sebâwng chu a pêm a pêm leiin.
Chun,
Chun,
Chu ni chun David chun
Chuongchun, David chun David khuoa chun
Chun, lal David chu, “Pathien bâwm leiin Obed-edom sûngkuo le a in le lo po po
Chun,
Chun, David chu a theitâwpin
Chuongchun, David le Israel mi po pohai chun khêk dur dur pum le tawtawrâwt mût ruoi ruoi pumin
Chun,
Chuongchun,
Chun, Davidin pumrawhmang thilinhlân le inremna thil inhlânhai ân hlân zo chun, sipaihai

Chun, mipui po po, Israel mi pumpuihai chu a nuhmei a pasalin mi tin el chu bei hlawm khat le sa tlin khat le grêp ra emṭâwl bâwr khat a sem seng a. Chuongchun, mi po po chu mâni in tieng an fe ta seng a.
David chun Mikal kuoma chun, “I pa le a sûnghai po po aiah mi thlang a,
Hieng nêk hmanin inzapui la um ka tih, kei le kei khawm lân sit pei bawk ka ta; amiruokchu, chuong siehlaw nunghâkhai i hrilhai chawimawi chun um ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Saula naunu Mikal chun a thi chenin nau a nei ta naw a.
Chun, lal chu a inah a um a,
lal chun zâwlnei Nathan kuomah, “Hi, kei chu sidar thing inah ka um a, Pathien bâwm ruok chu puon in elah a um a,” a ti a.
Chun, Nathan chun lal kuomah, “I lungrila a um ang tak chun va thaw rawh,
Chun, chu zân vêk chun Nathan kuomah
“Fe la, ka siehlaw David chu va hril rawh, ‘
Israel mipuihai Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suoka inthawkin tuchen hin inah ka um ngai naw a, puon ina le biekbûkah ka um pei lem hlak a.
Israel mipui lai po poah, ka fena taphawtahai khawm, ka mi Israelhai châwm dinga thu ka ipêk rorêltuhai kuomah, Iengdinga sidar thinga in i mi bâwlpêk naw am a na,’ tiin ka hril hlak am a nih?
Chuleiin, ka siehlaw David kuomah, Sipaihai
chun, i fena taphawtah i kuomah ka um pei a, i hmaa chun i hmêlmahai ka sukbo pei a, hnuoia mi ropuitakhai hming ang hming ropuitak siempêk ka ti che.
Chun, ka mi Israelhai ta dingin hmun ruot ka ta, anni ngei puol hmuna an um a, an insawn ta nawna dingin anni chu phun ka ta, kha hma ang khan mi rilohaiin sukrimsi ta naw ni hai a;
ka mi Israelhai chunga rorêltuhai ka ruot lai ang kha ni bawk ta naw nih; chun, i hmêlmahai po poa inthawk hin inchâwltir ka ti che. Chun, chu naw hrima khawm,
I nihai a kina, i puhai kuoma i zâl pha chun, i hnunga i thla, i rîla ra ding chu tungding ka ta, a ram chu sukdet ka tih.
Ama chun ka hming dingin in bâwl a ta; chun, a ram lalṭhungpha chu kumkhuoa dingin suknghet ka tih.
nisienlakhawm, i hmaa ka sawnhmang Saula kuoma inthawka ka lâk hmang ang khan ka zangaina chun ama chu mâksan naw nih.
Chun, i sûngkuo le i ram chu chatuona suknghet tlat nîng a ta, i lalṭhungpha chu chatuona suknghet nîng a tih,’ a tih,” tiin
Chuong thu po po ang le, chu inlârna ang chie chun Nathanin David kuoma chun a hril a.
David hin i kuomah ieng am hril nâwk chuong tâng a ta? I siehlaw hi i hriet vawng si, Aw Lalpa
I siehlaw hriet dingin i thu lei le nangma lungril ang peiin hieng thil ropuitak hi i thaw ta a.
Chuleichun, Aw

Aigupta rama inthawk le hnam tin le an pathienhaia inthawka i ta dinga în tlansuok, i mihai hmaa i ta dinga thil ropuitak le i ram ta dinga thil ṭiumtak thaw ding le ama hming ropuitak siem dinga Pathienin ama mihai ni dinga a hung intlansuok i mi Israelhai ang hrim hrim hi khawvêla hin hnam dang tu am an um a?
Chuongchun, i mi Israelhai chu chatuona i mihai an ni theina dingin i ta dingin i suknghet ta a; chun,
Chuongchun, Aw
Aw Sipaihai
Aw
chuleiin, i siehlaw sûnghai chu i hmaa chatuona an um zing theina dingin malsâwm la, aw

Chun, Moab mihai a thaw nâwk a, a hnuoiah ân zâltir a, inkhina hruiin ân khi a; tlar hni chu sukhlum dingin ân khi a, tlar khat chu a tluona hring dingin ân khi a. Chuongchun, Moab mihai chu David siehlawhai an hung ni ta a, thilpêkhai dâm an hung pêk hlak a.

Chuongchun, David chun a sakawr chung chuong mi sâng khat le za sari le sipai sîng hni a manpêk a; chun, David chun tawlailîr kei mi sakawrhai po po chu an thahrui a satpêk a, tawlailîr za hnûktu ding ruok chu a hla a.
Chun, Damaskaa Suria mihai Zoba lal Hadadezer san dinga fehai chu David chun Suria mihai laia mi chu sîng hni le sâng hni a that a.
Chuongchun, David chun Suria rama Damaskaa chun sipaihai a sie a; chuongchun, Suria mihai chu David siehlawhai an hung ni ta a, thilpêkhai an hung pêk hlak a. Chun,
Chun, David chun Hadadezer rawihai rângkachak phawhai chu a lâkpêk a, Jerusalem tieng a phur a.
Chun, Hadadezer khuo Betaa inthawk dâm, Berothaia inthawk dâmin dâr tamtak a lâk a.
Chun, Hamath lal Toi chun Hadadezer sipaihai po po David chun a hne ti a lo hriet a.

Hadadezer chu a thaw a, a hne leiin chibai bûk dingin le lâwmpui dingin Toi chun a naupa Joram chu David kuomah a tir a, Hadadezer chun Toi hi a lo do hlak hrim a na. Chun, Joram chun tangkaraw bêlhai dâm, rângkachak bêlhai dâm, dâr bêlhai dâm a hung chawi a;
Suria mihai ta dâm, Moab mihai ta dâm, Ammon mihai ta dâm, Philistin mihai ta dâm, Amalek mihai ta dâm, Zoba lal Rehob naupa Hadadezera inthawka a râllâkhai dâm an nih.
Chun, Edoma chun râl vêng sipai a sie a, Edom ram hmun tinah sipai a sie nghuon el a; chuongchun, Edom mihai po po chu David siehlawhai an hung ni ta a; chuongchun,
Chuongchun, David chun Israel mi po pohai chungah ro a rêl a; chun, David chun a mihai po po chunga chun feltakin ro a rêl a.
Chun, Zeruia naupa Joab chu sipai hotu tak a na; chun, Ahilud naupa Jehosaphat chu chanchin ziektu a nih;
chun, Ahitub naupa Zadok le Abiathar naupa Ahimelek chu thiempu an nih; chun, Seraia chu ziektu a nih;
chun, Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu Kereth mi le Peleth mihai hotu a nih; chun, David naupasalhai chu thiempu an nih.
Chun, Saula sûnghai siehlaw pakhat a hming Ziba a um a, David kuoma fe dingin an ko a; chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ziba i ni maw?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Ni e, kei i siehlawpa hi,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ama chu khaw lai am a um a?” a ta. Chun, Ziba chun lal kuomah, “Lo-debarah, Ammiel naupa Makir inah a um,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal David chun mi a tir a, Lo-debara inthawk, Ammiel naupa Makir ina mi chu an va ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Saula nau Jonathan naupa Mephiboseth chu David kuoma chun a hung a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a. Chun, David chun, “Mephiboseth,” a ta. Ama chun, “En ta, i siehlaw hi,” a ti a, a dawn a.

Chun, David chun a kuomah, “Ṭi naw rawh, i pa Jonathan zârah lunginsiet ngei ngei ka ti che a, i pu Saula ram po po inneitir nâwk ka ti che a; chun, ka dawkânah buthlêng awt ve rawp ta hlak i tih,” a ta.
Chun, chibai a bûk a, “Kei, ui thitlaw ang el, i siehlaw hi ieng am a nia i ngaisak a ni leh?” a ta.

Chun, a ta dingin hnuoi inletpêk i ta, nang le i naupasalhai le i siehlawhai leh; chun, i pu naupa chun fâk dinghai a nei theina dingin i thawsuokhai chu hung lâng i ta, i pu naupa Mephiboseth ruok hin chu ka dawkânah buthlêng awt rawp a tih,” a ta. Ziba chun naupasal sâwmpanga le siehlaw sâwmhni a nei a.

Chuongchun, Ziba chun lal kuomah, “Lal ka puin a siehlaw kuoma thu a pêk ang po po hin i siehlaw hin thâwng a tih,” a ta. Lal chun, “Mephiboseth chun chu ka dawkânah lal naupa ang bawkin buthlêng awt vêng a tih,” a ta.
Mephiboseth chun naupasal naupang hi a nei a, a hming chu Mika a nih. Chun, Ziba ina um po pohai chu Mephiboseth siehlawhai an na.
Chuongchun, Mephiboseth chu Jerusalema chun a um ta a, lal dawkâna chun buthlêng a awt ve rawp ta si a; a ke chu khinghnia inbai a nih.

David chun, “A pa chun a mi lo lunginsiet angin kei khawma Nahas naupa Hanun chu lunginsiet vêng ka tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, David chun a pa chungchâng thua thlamuon dingin ama mihai a tir a. Chun, David mihai chun Ammon mihai ram chu an va tlung a.

Nisienlakhawm, Ammon mi lusahairawi chun an lal Hanun kuoma chun, “David hin i pa ân za leiin i kuoma hin thlamuontu a hung tir niin i ring am a ni? David hin khawpui a hne theina dingin a siehlawhai khawpuia hin enthlatu le enfietu dingin a hung tir a ni lem naw am a nih?” an ta.

Chun, David chu an hang hril chun, a tuok dingin mi a tir a, anni chu an inzak hle el si a. Chun, lal chun, “In khâkhmulhai a mâwng sei hma po chu Jerikoah um hri unla, chu hnunga chun hung de ti niu,” a ta.
Chun, Ammon mihai chu an hung suok a, khaw lûtna kawtkhâr tienga chun ṭhanghmun an siem a; chun, Zoba mihai le Rehoba mihai Suria mihai le Toba le Maaka mihai ruok chu a tumin phûlah an um a.
Chuongchun, an hma tieng le an hnungtieng an hung thaw ding a ni ti Joabin a hriet chun Israel mihai laia a ṭha ṭha a thlangsuok a, Suria mihai chu do dingin ṭhanghmun a lo khaw a.
Chun, mi dang po po chu a unaupa Abisai kutah a sie vawng a, Ammon mihai chu thaw dingin ṭhanghmun a khaw bawk a.
“Suria mihai hi ka hne naw ding chun nangin mi ṭhangpui i ta, chun, nangin Ammon mihai hi i hne naw ding chun hung ṭhangpui ka ti che.
Huoitakin um unla, ei mihai le ei Pathien khuohai sanin insuk pasal ei tiu; chun,
Chuongchun, Joab le a kuoma mihai chun Suria mihai chu do dingin indona hmun tieng chu an va hnai a; chun, a hmaa chun an tlânsie a.

Chun, Ammon mihai chun Suria mihai an tlânsie ti an hriet chun anni khawm chu Abisai hmaa chun an tlânse ve ta a; khuoa chun an lût a. Chun, Joab chun Ammon mihai chu a kîrsan a, Jerusalemah a fe ta a.
Chun, Suria mihaiin Israelhai hmaa chun an chan a hung chau tah ti an hriet chun an inpun khâwm a.
Chun, Hadadezer chun mi a tir a, Vadung khêla Suria mihai chu a ṭhuoi suok a, Hadadezer sipai hotu Sobak chun hma a ṭhuoi a; Helamah an hung a.

Chun, chu chu David an hril a; chun, ama chun Israel mi po po a ko khâwm a, Jordan vadung an kai a, Helama chun an fe a. Chun, Suria mihai chun David chu do dingin ṭhanghmun an lo siem a, an lo do ta ngei a.

Chun, Suria mihai chu Israelhai hmaa chun an tlânse ta a; chun, David chun Suria mi tawlailîr za sari chunga chuong le sakawr chung chuong mi sîng li a that a; chun, an sipai hotu Sobak khawm a that a, chutaka chun a thi ta a.

Chuongchun, Hadadezer hnuoia lal siehlawa umhai po po chun Israelhai hmaah an chan a chau tah ti an lo hriet chun, Israelhai leh inremna an siem a, an siehlawhaiah an um ta a. Chuongchun, Suria mihai chun Ammon mihai chu an ṭhangpui ngam nâwk ta naw a.
Chun, David chun mi a tir a, chu nuhmei chanchin chu ân dawn feltir a. Chun, mi pakhatin, “Eliam naunu, Bathseba, Hit mi Uria nuhmei a ni naw am a nih?” a ti a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei chu a hung inrai ta a, chun, “Nau ka vawn a ni tah,” tiin David koumah mi an tir a.
Chun, David chun Joab kuomah, “Hit mi Uria chu ka kuomah inhungtir rawh,” tiin ân cha a. Chun, Joab chun Uria chu David kuomah ân fetir a.
Chun, Uriain a kuom a hang tlung chun, Joab le mihai chu ieng am an chang a, indonahai ieng am an chang ti ân dawn a.
Chun, David chun Uria kuomah, “I in tieng fe la, i kehai zu sâwp rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, Uria chu lal ina inthawk chun a suok a, chun, lal chun fâk dinghai leh a hnawtzui a.
Nisienlakhawm, Uria chu a lalpa siehlawhai lai lal in kawtkhâr bula chun a zâl ve ta el a, a in tieng chun a fe ta naw a.
Chun, David chu, “Uria chu a in tieng a fe nawh,” ti an hril phingleh David chun Uria kuoma chun, “Inzin hung i nih a ni naw am a nih? Iengdinga i in tieng i fe naw am?” a ta.
Chun, David chun Uria kuomah, “Vawisûn chu hitaka hin um la, zîngah fe de ti nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, Uria chu Jerusalema chun chu ni le a zînga khawm chun a um ta a.
Chun, a zîngah zîngkâr chun David chun Joab chu lekha a thawn a, Uria chu ân chawitir a.
Chun, lekhaa chun, “Uria chu râl zuolna laitaka inhmatâwngtir unla, an thata a thi hlauna dingin thlathlam ro,” tiin a ziek a.
Chun, Joab chun khuo chu ân huol vêl lai chun mi huoi huoi umna nia a hrieta chun Uria chu ân ṭhangtir a.
Chun, khuoa mihai chu an hung suok a, Joab chu an hung do a, mi ṭhenkhat David mihai laia mi ngei khawm chu an thi a; chun, Hit mi Uria khawm chu a thi a.
Chuongchun, Joab chun mi a tir a, indona chungchâng thu tieng po po chu David chu a hril a;
chun, a mi tir kuoma chun, “Lal kuoma indona chanchin po po i hril zo hnungin,
a lung a sen thuta, ‘Iengdinga thaw dinga khaw bul ela in fe am a na? Kula inthawkin kâp el an ti cheu ti in hriet naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, a mi tir chu a fe a, a va tlung a, Joabin a tirna san po po chu David chu a hril ta a.
Chun, a mi tir chun David kuoma chun, “Mihai chun an mi hung nawr a, phûlah an mi hung thaw a; keini chun an khaw lûtna kawtkhâr tlung rakin kan nawr ve thung a.
Chun, kâptuhai chun kula inthawk chun i siehlawhai chu an kâp a, chuongchun, lal siehlaw ṭhenkhathai chu an thi a; chun, i siehlaw Hit mi Uria khawm kha a thi annaw,” a ta.

David chun a mi tir kuoma chun, “Joab kuoma chun hieng ang hin va hril rawh, ‘Hieng hin i lungril chu suklâwm naw chuong naw raw se, kâwlhnâm chun tu tu khawm a thlierbîk si naw a, nasa nâwkzuolin khuo chu thaw unla, sukse ro,’ tiin infui rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Uria nuhmei chun a pasal Uria a thi ti a hriet chun a pasal chu a sûn a.
Chun, a sûn hunbi a bo hnung chun David chun ama in tieng ân ṭhuoitir a, a nuhmeiah a nei ta a, naupasal a neipêk a. Nisienlakhawm, David thilthaw chun
Chun,
Mi hausa chun berâm ruol tamtak le ran ruol tamtak a nei a;

mi pasie ruok khan chu berâmte alâ chiterek pakhat ân châwk, a ivai pakhat bak naw chu iengkhawm a nei naw a, a kuoma a nauhai le khawsa an na, a thlêng awtpui le a no inṭâwmpui, a ângsûnga um, a naunuhmei ang chiea a ngai a nih.

Chun, mi hausa kuoma chun inzin pakhat hi a va tlung a; chun, a kuoma mikhuol hung tlung chu ama berâm le ran chu that phal lovin, mi pasie berâm chu a lâkpêk a, a kuoma hung inzinpa chu a thatpêk a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chu chu mi chunga chun a lunginsen ta hle el a; Nathan kuoma chun, “
chun, hieng ang thil a thaw lei le lunginsietna a nei naw leiin a berâmte chu a lêt liin a thung ding nîng a tih,” a ta.

chun, i pu in ro chu kân hluotir che a, i pu nuhmeihai chu i ângsûngah ka sie a, Israel le Juda sûngkuohai ka pêk bawk che a, chun, chuong chu tlâwm taluo a ni chun, thil dang khawm ka pêk belsa ding che annâwm.
Iengtiziea
Chuleiin, tu hin kâwlhnâm chun i insûng chu inkiensan naw tawp a tih, nang chun mi ngainêpin Hit mi Uria nuhmei chu i nuhmei dingin i lâkpêk ta si a.
Nang chun chu inrûkin i thaw a, kei ruok chun chu Israel mihai po po mithmuah sûn khawvarah ka thaw ding a nih,’ a tih,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Nathan kuomah, “
David chun naupang ta ding chun Pathien kuomah a ngên rak a; chun, David chun bu dâm a nghei a, a lût a, zân khawvârin hnuoiah a zâl ta a.
Chun, a sûnghai laia upahai chu an tho a, hnuoia inthawka keitho ding chun a kâwlah an ngîr a; nisienlakhawm, a tho nuom naw a, an kuoma khawm bu khawm a fâk bawk nawh.

Chun, hieng hi a hung na, ni sari ni chun naupang chu a thi ta a. Chun, David siehlawhai chun naupang chu a thi tah ti hril chu an ṭi a, “Ngai ta u, naupang a dam lai khan a kuomah thu ei hril a, ei râwl a ngai si naw a, naupang chu a thi tah ti iengtin am hril ngam tâng ei ti leh, ieng amanih inlaw el rawi a tih,” an ta.

Nisienlakhawm, David chun chuonga siehlawhai chu an inbiekrûk a hmu chun David chun naupang chu a thi a nih ti a hriet ta a; chun, David chun a siehlawhai kuomah, “Naupang chu a thi tah a ni maw?” a ta. Chun, anni chun, “A thi tah,” an ta.
Chuongchun, David chu hnuoia inthawk chu a tho a, ân sâwp a, sahriek ân nâl a, a puonhai ân thleng a; chun,

Chun, a siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “I thil thawzie hi iengtizie am a ni a? Naupang chu a dam lai khan bu dâm i nghei a, i ṭap a; nisienlakhawm, naupang chu a thi ta a, i tho a, bu dâm i fâk ta lem a,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Naupang kha a la dam lai khan bu dâm ka ngheiin ka ṭap luo a, ‘Naupang chu a dam theina dingin

Nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu a thi ta si a, iengdingin am bu nghei tâng ka ta? Ka ko kîr nâwk thei ding am a nih? A kuomah keima hi la fêng ka ta, nisienlakhawm, ama chu ka kuomah hung kîr nâwk ta naw ni,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun a nuhmei Bathseba chu a thlamuon a, a kuomah a lût a, a zâlpui a, chun, naupasal a nei a, a hminga chun Solomon a sak a. Chun, ama chu
chun, zâwlnei Nathan chu thu ân chawitir a; chun, ama chun
Chun, Joab chun Ammon mihai khawpui Rabba a rûn a, khawpui chu a lâk a.
Chun, Joab chun David kuomah mi a tir a, “Rabba chu ka rûn a; anih, tuihai khawpui chu ka lâk tah annaw.
Chuongchun, mi la umhai po po chu ko khâwm la, khawpui chu do tumin ep la, la rawh, keiin khawpui chu ka lâk chun chu ka hming put el rawi a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun mi po pohai chu a ko khâwm a, Rabbaa chun an fe a, an va rûn a, an lâk ta a.

Chun, an lal lallukhum khum lai chu a lâkpêk a, a rikzie chu rângkachak talent bûk a na, lunghluhai khawm a ṭhang a; chun, David chu an inkhumtir a. Chun, khawpuia inthawk chun râllâk sum tamtak a lâk a.

Chun, mipuihai chu a kei suok a, thingâtnahai dâm, hnuoi inletna thîrzumhai dâm, thîr hreipuihai dâm hmangin sin an inthawtir a; hnuoi rawchang dâm an insiemtir a. Ammon mihai khawpuihai po po chu chuong ang chun a thaw a. Chun, David le mi po po chu Jerusalema chun an fe nâwk ta a.
Chun, David naupa Absalom chun farnu hmêl ṭhatak a nei a, a hming chu Tamar a nih. Chun, David naupa Amnon chun ama chu a hmangai a.
Chuongchun, Amnon chu a farnu Tamar lei chun a buoi ta hle el a, a damnaw ta a; ama hlak chu nunghâk inthieng a ni si a; a chunga thil ieng amani hang thaw chu Amnon ta ding chun khirtak a nih.
Amiruokchu, Amnon chun ruol a nei a, a hming chu Jonadab a na, David unaupa Simea naupa a nih; Jonadab chu mi var vervêktak a nih.

Chun, a kuomah, “Aw, nang lal naupa hi a ni têla iengtiziea chêr tiel tiel am i ni a? I mi hril nuom naw ding am a nih?” a ta. Chun, Amnonin a kuomah, “Ka unaupa Absalom farnu Tamar hi ka hmangai tlat el a nih,” a ta.

Chun, Jonadab chun a kuomah, “I khumah zâl zing la, damnaw tehlêm thaw la, chun, i pain a hung en pha che a kuomah, ‘Ka hni che a nih, ka farnu Tamar kha ka kuomah hung sienla, bei fâk ding mi hung pe sienla; chun, ka hmu theiah, ka mithmu ngeiah fâk ding mi buotsaipêk raw se; a kuta inthawk ngeiin lo fâng ka tih,’ lo ti raw khai,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Amnon chu a zâl a, a damnaw tehlêm ta a; chun, lalin a va en chun Amnon chun lal kuomah, “Ka hni che a nih, ka farnu Tamar kha hung sienla, ka mithmu ngeia hin beiphêk pahni mi siempêk sienla, ama kuta inthawk ngei chun lo fâng ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun Tamar kuoma chun, “I ṭapa Amnon in tieng fe la, fâk ding va siempêk raw khai,” tiin a inah mi a tir a.
Chuongchun, Tamar chu a ṭapa Amnon in tieng chun a fe a; ama chu a lo zâl zing a. Chun, beihlawm chu a lâk a, a hmet a, a mithmuah beiphêk chu a siem a, beiphêkhai chu a em ta a.
Chun, a emna chu a lâk a, a hmaa chun a bun a; nisienlakhawm, a fâk nuom naw a. Chun, Amnon chun, “Mi po pohai hin mi suoksan vawng raw hai se,” a ta. Chuongchun, ama chu an suoksan ta vawng a.

Chun, Amnon chun Tamar kuoma chun, “I kuta inthawk ngeia ka fâk theina dingin fâk ding chu pindana hin hung la ta raw le,” a ta. Chun, Tamar chun a beiphêk siemhai chu a lâk a, a ṭapa Amnon kuomah pindana chun a lâk lût a.
Infâktir dinga a kâwl hnaia a va fe chun a lo man a, a kuomah, “Ka farnu, hung ta zâl ei tih,” a ta.
Ama chun a dawn a, “Ni lo ve, ka ṭapa, mi thawlui naw rawh, Israelhai lai hin hieng ang thil hi thaw ding a ni naw ie, hi thil suol invêtthlâktak hi thaw naw raw khai.
Chun, keiin ka muolphona chu khâwlai am fepui ka ta? Chun, nang khawm Israelhai lai hin mi invêta ngai i ni el ding i sawnnaw. Chuleiin, lal be lem raw khai, i mi nei chu sêl chuong naw nih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a râwl chu a ngai naw a, ama nêkin a hrât lem si a, a thawlui a, a zâlpui ta a.

Chuongchun, Amnon chun theida namênlovin a theida nâwk ta thung a, a theidana chu ama a hmangai laia a hmangaina nêka nasa lemin a nih a theida chu. Chuongchun, Amnon chun a kuomah, “Tho la, fe hmang dai rawh,” a ta.

Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Chuong ang ding chu a ni nawh, hienga indiknawtaka i mi tirhmang hi ka chunga i thil thaw ta nêk hman khan a ṭha naw lem a nih,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a ngai chuong naw a.
Chuongchun, a rawngbâwltu a siehlaw chu a ko a, “Hi nuhmei hi ka kuoma inthawkin insuoktir la, kawt kal tlat rawh,” a ti a.
Zakawfuol ze tum tuma ṭiel a hâk a, chuong ang zakawfuol chu lal nunghâk inthienghai chun an hâk hlak a. Chuongchun, a siehlaw chun a ṭhuoi suok a, kawt a kal ta tlat a.
Chun, Tamar chun a lua chun vut a phul a, zakawfuol ze tum tuma ṭiel a hâk chu a keithlêr a, a lusîpah a kut a sui a, inringtaka ṭap malam peiin a fe ta a.

Chun, a ṭapa Absalom chun a kuomah, “I ṭapa Amnon chu i kuomah a hung lût a ni maw? nisienlakhawm, to el rawh, ka farnu, ama chu i ṭapa a ni annâwm, engto nuom naw rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, Tamar chu a ṭapa Absalom ina chun ngûitakin ân khum ta tlat el a.
Nisienlakhawm, lal Davidin chuong thil po po a hung hriet chun a lunginsen hle el ta a.
Chun, Absalom chun Amnon kuoma chun a sie a ṭha, iengkhawm a hril nuom naw a; Absalom chun a farnu Tamar chu a lo suollui lei chun Amnon chu a theida hle a nih.
Chun, kum hni pumhlûm a bo hnung chun Ephraim kâwla Baal-hazora chun Absalom chun berâm hmul ân vâwtir a; Absalom chun lal naupahai po po chu a fiel a.
Chun, Absalom chu lal kuoma chun a fe a, “Ngai ta, i siehlaw chun berâm hmul ân vâwtir a, lal le a siehlawhai chu a siehlaw kuoma hin fe ve hai sienla,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun Absalom kuomah, “Ni lo e, ka naupa, kan rêng chun fe naw ning ung, sukkhaw taluo rawi kan ti che,” a ta. Ama chun a fiel a fiel a, amiruokchu, a fe nuom chuong naw a, mal ruok chu a sâwm a.
Chuongchun, Absalom chun, “Annawleh, ka hni che hi, ka unaupa Amnon bêk kan kuomah hung raw se,” a ta. Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Iengdingin am fe bîk a ta?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Absalom chun Amnon le lal naupahai chu an rênga a kuoma fe ve dingin a ngênpêk ṭâl a.

Chun, Absalom chun a siehlawhai chu, “Ngai ta, Amnon chu uoin dâwna a hlim laiin in kuomah, ‘Amnon kha that ro,’ ka ti cheu chun that unla, ṭi naw ro, thu ka pêk ta cheu annâwm; insukhuoi unla, insukpasal ṭha unla,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Absalom siehlawhai chun Amnon chunga Absalom thupêk ang chun an thaw a. Chuongchun, lal naupahai po po chu an tho a, an sabengtung lien chi chungah an chuong seng a, an tlân hmang ta a.
Chun, lampui kâra an la um laiin, “Absalomin lal naupahai po po a that ta vawng el a, pakhat khawm hla a nei nawh,” tiin David kuoma chun chanchin a hung tlung a.
Chuongchun, lal chu a tho a, a silfênhai a keithlêr a, hnuoiah a zâl ta a; chun, a siehlawhai po po chu an silfênhai keithlêrin a kâwla chun an ngîr a.

Chun, David unaupa Simea naupa Jonadab chun a dawn a, “Ka pu hin lal naupasal tlangvâlhai po po chu an that vawng ti ring naw raw se, Amnon chau a thi a nih; a farnu Tamar a thawlui chena khan Absalom chun hieng anga thaw hi a tum hrim a nih.
Chuleiin, ka pu lal chun lal naupahai po po an thi amanih ti ringin, lung inhângpui naw raw se, Amnon chau a thi a nih,” a ta.
Absalom ruok chu a tlânhmang ta a. Chun, a râl vêngtu tlangvâl chun a mit a hang inlên a, a hang en a; chun, ngai ta, a hnungtienga tlâng panga lampuia chun mi tamtak an hung a.
Chun, Jonadab chun lal kuomah, “Ngai ta, lal naupahai chu an hung ie, i siehlawin a hril ang chie kha a ni ngei el,” a ta.
Chun, a hril zo phingle chun, ngai ta, lal naupahai chu an hung tlung a, an râwl insuo meuin an ṭap a; chun, lal khawm chu a siehlawhai le chun an ṭap ta rak rak el a.
Chuongchun, Absalom chu a tlânhmang a, Gesur rama chun a fe a, chutaka chun kum thum a va um a.
Lal David chun Absalom kuoma fe chu ân hâwk êm êm a. Amnon chungchâng thua chun a thlamuong ta a, ama chu a thi ta si a.
Zeruia naupa Joab chun lal lungril chu Absalom chungah ân nghat ti a hriet a.

Chuongchun, Joab chun Tekoa khuoah mi a tir a, chutaka nuhmei var pakhat chu a vân ṭhuoitir a, a kuomah, “Lusûn angin insiem la, lusûnna puon sil la, sahriek khawm innâl lovin, nuhmei sâwttak mithi sûn ta angin um rawh;
chun, lal kuomah fe la, a kuomah hieng ang hin thu va hril raw aw,” a ta. Chuongchun, Joab chun thu chu a hril ta a.
Chun, Tekoa khuoa nuhmei chun lal kuoma thu hril ding chun hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a, a bawkkhup a, “Aw lalpa, mi ṭhangpui rawh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ieng am a ni leh?” a ta. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Hmeithai ka ni a, ka pasal chu a thi ta a.
Chun, i suoknu hin naupasal pahni ka nei a, an pahni chun loah an insuol a, tukhawm a ṭheltu ding an um si naw a, a pakhat chun pakhat dang chu a vuok a, a sukhlum ta a.

Chun, ngai ta, an sûngkuo po po chun i suoknu hi an do hrawn a, ‘A unaupa thattu chu, a unaupa a that leia kan that ve theina dingin mi pe raw khai, chuongchun, rohluotu ding khawm sukbohmang nghâl kan tih,’ an ta; chuongchun, ka meiling la um sun chu sukhlum an ta, ka pasal chu hnuoi chunga hming le thla hrim hrim nei lovin a um el ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun nuhmei kuoma chun, “I inah fe ta la, i chungchâng thua chun thu pe el ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Tekoa khuoa nuhmei chun lal kuoma chun, “Aw lalpa, ka pu, bawsietna maw chu keia chunga le ka pa sûnghai chungah tla el raw se; chun, lal le lalṭhungpha chun maw chu phur naw raw se,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Tukhawm i chunga ieng amanih hril taphawt chu ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi la, tâwk nâwk ta naw tawp an ti che,” a ta.
Ama chun, “Thisen insuotuhai chunga phuba latuhaiin sukbohmang ta lo dingin lal chun
Chuongchun, nuhmei chun, “Ka hni che hi, i suoknu hin lalpa ka pu kuoma hin thu bau khat chau hang hril nâwk raw se,” a ta.

Ama chun, “Hril ta la,” a ta. Chun, nuhmei chun, “Annawleh, ieng leia Pathien mihai dodâla hienga thaw i tum am a ni a? Hieng thua inthawk hin lal chu thiemnaw chang angin ân lang a nih, lal chun a mi tlân hmang chu a ṭhuoikîr nâwk si naw lei hin.

Ei thi ngei ngei ding a na; chun, tuisik hnuoia inbaw tahnung rût nâwk thei ta lo ang hi ei na. Pathienin hringna hi a lâk hmang a ni naw a, a tlân hmang chu amaa inthawka mi hran a ni nawna dingin rem a ruot a ni lem a nih.
Chuongchun, lalpa, ka pu kuoma hi thu hril dinga ka hung khawm hi mi ka ṭi lei a na, chun, i suoknu chun lal kuoma hin hril phawt ka ta, lal chun a suoknu hnina chu ân hlawtlingtir rawi mawh.
Lal chun kei le ka naupa hi Pathien ro hluo lo dinga mi sukbohmang tumtu kuta inthawkin i suoknu hi sansuok dingin lo ngaisak i tih ka ti a.
Chuongchun, i suoknu ta ding hin, lalpa, ka pu thu chu lungmuongumtak ni sienla, ka hni che a nih, a sie a ṭha lo thlier dingin lalpa ka pu chu Pathien vântirko ang el a ni si a; chun,
Chun, lal chun a dawn a, nuhmei kuoma chun, “Ka îndawn taphawt che chu ka kuomah iengkhawm ip naw raw aw,” a ta. Chun, nuhmei chun, “Lalpa ka pu chun hril raw se chu,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun, “Hieng thua hrim hin Joab hin ṭhangna a nei am?” a ta. Chun, nuhmei chun a dawn a, “Lalpa ka pu, i thlarau hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, lalpa ka pu hin a hril taphawt chu tukhawma vawitienga manih, changtienga manih an fe khêl thei âwm naw a, i siehlaw Joab chun a mi tir a, hieng thuhai po po hi i suoknu hi a hril vawng a nih;
thil umdân sukdanglam dingin i siehlaw Joab chun hieng thil hi a thaw a nih; chun, ka pu chu khawvêla thil um po pohai hre theiin Pathien vântirko ang elin a var a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun Joab kuomah, “Ngai ta, tuhin hi thil hi ka thaw ve ta a, chuleiin, tuhin fe la, tlangvâl Absalom chu va ṭhuoi nâwk raw le,” a ta.

Chun, Joab chu hmaia hnuoi sikin a bawkkhup a, chibai a bûk a, lal chun mal a sâwm a; chun, Joab chun, “Aw lalpa, ka pu chun a siehlaw hnina chu ân hlawtlingtir leiin vawisûn hin i siehlaw hin i mit ka tlung a nih ti ka lo hriet ta a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chu a tho a, Gesura chun a fe a, Absalom chu Jerusalema chun a hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, lal chun, “Ama in tieng fe sienla, ka hmêl chu hung hmu naw raw se,” a ta. Chuongchun, Absalom chu ama in tieng chun a fe a, lal hmêl chu a hmu ta naw a.
Tuhin Israelhai po po lai Absalom ang hrima hmêl ṭhata inpâk hlaw tukhawm an um naw a, a ke lêra inthawka a lusîp chenin sawisêlna hrim hrim a um naw a.
A lu a vâw chun (kum khat peiah a vâw hlak a, a sam chu a rik êm leiin a vâw hlak a nih) a sam chu a bûk hlak a, lal bûk dâna shekel za hni a tling hlak a nih.
Chun, Absalom chun naupasal pathum le naunuhmei pakhat a nei a, a hming chu Tamar a na, hmêl ṭhatak a nih.
Chuongchun, Absalom chu kum hni pumhlûm Jerusalemah a um a, nisienlakhawm, lal hmêl hrim hrim chu a hmu naw a.
Chuongchun, Absalom chun lal kuoma tir dingin Joab chu ân cha a; nisienlakhawm, a fe nuom naw a; chun, ân châ nawn nâwk a, nisienlakhawm, a fe nuom chuong naw a.
Chuongchun, a siehlawhai kuomah, “I aw, Joab lo chu ka lo kâwl a na, buṭei a nei a, va rawpêk vawng ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, Absalom siehlawhai chun lo chu an va raw ta a.
Chuongchun, Joab chu a tho a, Absalom kuomah a ina chun a fe a, a kuomah, “Iengdinga i siehlawhaiin ka lo an raw am?” a ta.

Absalom chun Joab chu a dawn a, “Ngai ta, ‘Iengdinga Gesura inthawka hung am ka ni a? Chutaka chun um zing lang ka ta dingin a ṭha lem ding bah,’ tia lal kuoma tir dingin kân cha che a, chuleiin, lal hmêl chu mîn hmutir raw khai, chun, bawsietna nei ka lo ni chun mi sukhlum el raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chu lal kuoma chun a fe a, a hril a; chun, Absalom chu a ko a, lal kuomah a fe a; chun, lal hmaa chun hmaia hnuoi sikin a bawkkhup a; chun, lalin Absalom chu a fâwp ta a.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Absalom chun tawlailîr le sakawrhai le mi sâwmnga a hmaa tlân dingin a buotsai a.

Chun, Absalom chu zîngkâr hin a tho a, kul kawtkhâr lampuia chun a lo ngîr hlak a; chun, lal kuoma thupawi hung hril ding taphawt chu Absalom chun a lo ko hlak a, “Khâwlai khuo am in ni a?” a lo ti pei hlak a. Chun, “I siehlaw hi Israel hnam laia hnam pakhat ka nih,” an ti pei hlak a.
Chun, Absalom chun, “I aw, i thu chu a ṭhain ân dik a, nisienlakhawm, ngaituotu dingin lalin tukhawm a ruot nawh,” a lo ti hlak a.

Chun, Absalom ma chun, “Mi tin thupawi hril ding nei amanih, hni ding nei amani taphawt chu ka kuoma an hung theina dingin; kei hi hi ram rorêltua hin mi siem sien ka va ti de aw! chuongchun, feltakin ka rêlpêk hlak ding bah,” dâm a lo ti bawk hlak a.
Hieng ang khawm hin a thaw a, tukhawm ama chibai bûk dinga hang hnai taphawthai chu a lo ban a, a chel a, a lo fâwp hlak a.
Chuongchun, Israel mi lal kuoma thuhril dinga hung taphawthai chu Absalom chun chuong ang chun a lo thaw pei hlak a. Chuongchun, Absalom chun Israel mihai lungril chu a hîppêk a.
Chun, kum li a hung invawi hnung chun, Absalom chun lal kuoma chun, “Ka hni che a nih, Hebron khuoah
I siehlaw hin Suria rama Gesura ka um lai khan, ‘
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Lungmuongtakin fe raw khai,” a ta. Chuongchun, a tho a, Hebrona chun a fe ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Absalom chun, “Tawtawrâwt ri in hriet phingleh, ‘Absalom chu Hebronah lal a nih,’ ti ro,” tiin Israel hnam po pohai lai mi a tir rûk ta hlau a.
Chun, Absalom kuoma chun, a mi fielhai, mi za hni Jerusalema inthawkin an fe ve a, lungril ṭhatak putin an fe a, iengkhawm an hriet ve nawh.

Chun, Absalom chun inthâwinahai chu ân hlân laiin, Gilon mi Ahithophel, David rorêlpui chu, a khuo Gilo a inthawkin ân cha a, an thu phierrûuk chu a nasa hle el a. Absalom tieng chun mipui chu an pung tul tul el si a.
Chun, David kuoma chun, “Israel mihai lungril chu Absalom tieng a thle hle el,” tiin mitir a hung a.

Chun, David chun Jerusalema a mihai po po kuoma chun, “Tho unla, tlân suok ei tiu, tukhawm Absaloma inthawk hin ei suok thei âwm si naw a, suok vak ro khai, chuong naw chun mi hung hnawt phâk vak el a tih; ei chunga hin thil ṭha nawtak hung intlun a ta, kâwlhnâmin khuo hi hung thaw rawi a tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal mihai chun lal kuomah, “Ngai ta, i siehlawhai hi lal kan lalin a ruot ang peia thaw dingin kan inzo zing a nih,” an ta.
Chun, lal chu a suok a, a sûnghai po po chun an zui a. Chun, lal chun in nghâk dingin nuhmei sâwm thaikêm ruol chu a sie a.
Chun, lal chu a suok a, mipui po pohai chun an zui a, chun, in tâwpna taka chun an châwl hri a.
Chun, a mi po pohai chun an fe khêl a, chun, Kerith mi po pohai, Peleth mi po pohai le Git mi za ruk Gath-a inthawka ama hung zuituhai chun lal chu an pêl pei a.
Chuongchun, lal chun Git mi Ittai kuoma chun, “Iengtiziea nang hi i hung ve am? Kîr nâwk la, lal kuomah um rawh, nang chu mikhuol ram danga mi i ni bawk si a, nangma hmun tieng kîr nâwk raw khai.

Zâni ela hung i na, vawisûn hin a suk a tunga mi zui dingin ka ti ve ding che am a nih? Ka fe theina naah ka fe ding a na, nang chu kîr nâwk la, i unauhai po po hi ṭhuoi kîr rawh, lunginsietna le thutak i kuomah um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Ittai chun lal chu a dawn a, “
Chun, David chun, Ittai kuoma chun, “Fe unla, fe pei ro le,” a ta. Chuongchun, Git mi Itai chu a mihai po po le an nauhai po po le chun an fe a.
Chun, inringtakin a ram phêkin an ṭap ta a, mipui chu an fe vawng a; thlalêr lampui tieng chu panin lal khawm chun Kidron vadung chu a kân a; chun, mipui po po chun an kân bawk a.
Chun, Zadok hai, Pathien thuthlungna bâwm zâwnin Levi mihai po po leh a kuomah an fe ve a; Pathien bâwm chu an innghat a, mipuiin khuo chu an suoksan kim vawng chenin Abiathar chu a hang fe a.
Chun, lal chun Zadok kuomah, “Pathien bâwm kha khawpui sûngah zâwn kîr nâwk ro,
amiruokchu, ‘Nangmaah lâwmna hrim ka nei nawh,’ a ti chun, ngai ta, hieng el hi ka na, ṭha a ti ang angin ka chunga hin thaw el raw se,” a ta.
Lal chun thiempu Zadok kuoma chun, “Hmu theitu i ni naw am a nih? I naupasalhai pahni i naupa Ahimaaz le Abiathar naupa Jonathan leh lungmuongtakin khawpuiah fe nâwk ro.
Ngai ta, kei chu chanchin in mi hung inhriettir hmakhat chu thlalêra vadung kaiahai hin lo um ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Zadok le Abiathar chun Pathien bâwm chu Jerusalema chun an fepui nâwk a; chun, chutaka chun an um ta a.

Chuongchun, David chu Oliv tlâng hang fenaa chun a hang fe a, fe malam chun a ṭap malam pei a, a lu a khum a, ke ruokin a fe a; chun, a kuoma mi po pohai chun an lu an khum seng a, ṭap pum peiin an hang fe a.
Chun, tuin amanih David chu, “Ahithophel chu Absalom tienga ṭhangin thu phiertuhai lai a ṭhang ve,” tiin a hril a. Chun, David chun, “Aw
Chun, David chu Pathien biekna tlâng sîp a hang lâwn kai chun, ngai ta, Ark mi Husai chu a zakaw keithlêr hâka, a lua pilvut kâi hluomin ama tuok dingin a hung a.
Chun, David chun a kuomah, “Ka kuoma i fe ve chun keia ta dinga phurrik i ni el ding a na.

Amiruokchu, khawpui tieng chun i kîr a, Absalom kuomah, ‘Aw lalpa, i siehlawah um ka tih, kha hma tienga i pa siehlawa ka um ang khan tuhin i siehlawah um thung tâng ka tih,’ i va ti chun Ahithophel remruot mi hluopêktu ni lem i tih.
Chutaka chun thiempu Zadok le Abiathar khawm an um ve a ni naw am a nih? Chuongchun, hieng hi hung nîng a ta, lal ina thu suok i hriet taphawt chu thiempu Zadok le Abiathar hril hlak i ta.
Ngai ta, an naupasalhai pahni Zadok naupa Ahimaaz le Abiathar naupa Jonathan khawm an kuomah an um kha; chun, i thil hriet taphawt chu mi hril dingin anni chu i hung tir hlak ding annâwm,” a ta.
Chuongchun, David ruolpa Husai chu khawpuia chun a lût a; chun, Absalom chu Jerusalema chun a lût ta a.

Chun, lal chun Ziba kuoma chun, “Hieng hi iengtizie am a ni a?” a ta. Ziba chun, “Sabengtunghai hi lal sûnghai chuongna ding nîng a ta, bei le nipui theihai hi tlangvâlhai fâk ding nîng a ta; uoin hi chu thlalêra châu taphawthai dâwn ding nîng a tih,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun “Anleh, i pu naupa chu khâwlai am?” a ta. Ziba chun lal kuomah, “Ngai ta, Jerusalemah a um, ‘Vawisûn hin Israelhai chun ka pa ram an mi pêk nâwk ding a nih,’ a ti nghe nghe annâw,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun Ziba kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, Mephiboseth thil nei po po chu i ta vawng a ni tah,” a ta. Chun, Ziba chun, “Chibai ka bûk takzet che a nih, aw lalpa ka pu, i mit tlunga um pei tum ka tih,” a ta.
David chu lungin a dêng a, lal David siehlawhai po po khawm chu; chun, mipui po po le sipai huoisenhai po po chu a changtieng le a vawitieng an um a.
Chun, Simei chun ṭawngsie ân phur sûng chun hieng hin a hril a, “Fe hmang dai rawh, fe hmang dai rawh, nang thisen insuo hmang le Belial mihriempa,
a rorêl âi i rêl tah Saula sûnghai thisen chu
Nisienlakhawm, lal chun, “Nangni Zeruia naupasalhai, nangni mi lo hrietpêk ding ieng am a um a?

Chun, David chun Abisai le a siehlawhai po po kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, ka naupa ka rîla ra ngei chun mi that a tum a na, hi Benjamin mi hin a va tum nasa nâwk zuol âwm de! Iengkhawm law naw unla, ṭawngsie chu inphur el raw se;

Chuongchun, David le a mihai chu lampuia chun an fe pei ta a; chun, Simei chu an râla tlâng panga chun a fe ve pei a, a fe malam chun ṭawngsie chu ân phur pei a, lunghai dâmin a dêng a, pilvut dâmin a the a.
Chun, lal le a kuoma mi um po pohai chun Aiphim an tlung a, chutaka chun an châwldam ta a.
Chun, Absalom le mipui po po, Israel mihai chu Jerusalemah an fe a, chun, a kuomah Ahithophel khawm a ṭhang a.
Ark mi Husai, David ruolpa chun Absalom kuom a tlung chun, Husai chun Absalom kuomah, “Pathienin laltak humhim raw se, Pathienin laltak humhim raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Absalom chun Husai kuomah, “Hieng ang hi a ni maw i ruol i lunginsiet dân chu? Iengdinga i ruolpa kuoma i fe naw am?” a ta.
Chun, Husai chun Absalom kuomah, “Fe naw ning ah,
Chun, tu rawng am ka bâwl ding a na? Naupa hmaah rawng ka bâwl ding a ni naw am a nih? I pa hmaa rawng ka bâwl ang khan i hmaah bâwl ka tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Absalom chun Ahithophel kuoma chun, “Iengtin am ka thaw ding a na, i ngaidân hril ta?” a ta.

Chun, Ahithophel chun Absalom kuomah, “I pa thaikêm in nghâka siea umhai kuoma chun va lût rawh; chun, Israel mi po poin i pain a thîm che ti hrieng an ta, chuongchun, nanga tienga ṭhang po pohai kut chu a hung hrât ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuong laia rem a ruot, Ahithophel remruothai chu, Pathien thu ngai anga ngai a ni hlak a, chuong ang bawk chun, Ahithophelin David le Absalom rem a ruotpuihai po po chu ngai a ni hlak.
Chu naw khawm chu Absalom kuomah Ahithophel chun, “Tuhin mi sîng khat le sâng hni thlang suok ka ta, chun, vawizân hin David chu hnawt dingin inthawk ka tih;
Chuongchun, chu thu chun Absalom le Israel upahai po po chu a suklâwm ta hle a.
Chun, Absalom chun, “Tu hin Ark mi Husai chu ko ve phawt unla, a hril ve dân lo ngai phawt ei tih,” a ta.

chun, Husaiin Absalom kuom a hung tlung chun, Absalom chun, “Ahithophel chun hieng ang hin a hril a, a hril ang hin kan thaw ding am a nih? Thaw naw ding ni ta ang inla, nangin hang hril ve ta khai,” a ta.
Chun, Husai chun Absalom kuomah, “Tuta ṭuma Ahithophel remruot hi a ṭha naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Husai chun, “I pa le a mihai chu i hriet a, sipai huoitak, mi kâwlhrâwngtak, phûla savawm a tê manpêk ang el an na; chun, i pa hi indo mi a na, mipui lai chun riek khawm riek kher naw ni.

Ngai ta, tu khawm hin khaw lai khursûnga manih, khawlai hmuna manih ân bi zing a ni ding a na; chun, an inthaw tîra mi ṭhenkhat an tlu nuol chun a hre taphawtin, ‘Absalom zuituhai chu an that ṭeu el ie,’ ti el an ta.

Chuongchun, mi huoisentak, sakeibaknei lungril ang put mi meu khawm lo ṭîng a ta, Israel mi po po hlak chun i pa chu sipai huoitak a ni le a kuoma mi umhai chu mi huoisentak tak an ni ti an hriet vawng si a.
Chuongchun, khâwlai hmuna khawm ei tuok fûkna taphawtah hnuoia dâidâw tla ang elin bâwng ei ta, chun, ama le a kuoma mi umhai po po chu pakhat khawm hla nâwng ei tih.
Chu nawa khawm khuoa a lût chun, Israel mi po po, hruihruol chawiin chu khuoa chun va fêng ei ta, lung chiterek khawm um lo khawp rauin vadungah hnûkthla vawng ei tih,” a ti nghâl bawk a.
Chuongchun, Absalom le Israel mi po pohai chun, “Ark mi Husai remruot chu Ahithophel remruot nêk chun a ṭha lem,” an ti ta a.

Chuongchun, Husai chun thiempu Zadok le Abiathar kuomah, “Chuong ang khâng ang chun Ahithophel chun Absalom le Israel upahai chu rem a ruotpêk a; chun, keiin chuong ang khâng ang chun rem ka ruot bawk a.

Chuleiin, ‘Vawizân chu thlalêra vadung kaiahai riek ta lovin kân ngei ngei rawh, chuong naw chun lal le a kuoma um po pohai chu sukbohmang vawng rawi an tih,’ tiin David chu inhriltir vak ro khai,” a ta.
Jonathan le Ahimaaz chu En-rogelah an um a, suoknu pakhat hin anni chu a va hril hlak a na, chun, anni chun lal David chu an va hril nâwk sâwng hlak a; khawpuia an lût chu tukhawma hmu lo ding a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, naupangin a lo hmu a, Absalom chu a hril a; chuongchun, an pahni chun an tlân hmang ta vat a, Bahurima mi pakhat, a tuola tuisunsuo nei mi pakhat kâwlah an va fe a, tuisunsuoa chun an lût ta a.
Chun, nuhmeiin tuisunsuo sînnain a sîn a, a chunga chun bu a em a, tu hriet thei khawm a ni nawh.

Chun, Absalom siehlawhai chu chu ina nuhmei kuoma chun an va fe a, “Ahimaaz le Jonathan kha khaw lai am?” an ta. Chun, nuhmei chun an kuomah, “Vadung kai tâng an tih,” a lo ti a. Chun, an va zawng a, an hmu naw a, Jerusalemah an kîr nâwk ta a.

Chun, an fe liem hnung chun tuisunsuoa inthawk chun an hung suok a, lal David chu an va hril a, David kuoma chun, “Suok unla, vadung chu kai vak ro, hieng ang hin Ahithophel chun a phier cheu a nih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, David le a kuoma mi um po pohai chu an suok a, Jordan vadung an kai a, khuo a hung var chun pakhat khawm Jordan vadung kai lo an um nawh.

Chun, Ahithophel chun a remruot ang chu an pawm nawh ti a hrietin a sabengtung chu a siem a, a suok a, a khuo tieng a fe ta a, a sûnghai khawsak dân ding a ruotpêk diem a, ân âwkhlum ta a; chuongchun, a thi a, a pa thlânah an phûm ta a.
Chun, David chun Mahanaim a va tlung a. Chun, Absalom chun a kuoma Israel mi po pohai leh Jordan vadung an kai a.
Chun, Absalom chun, Joab aiah Amasa chu sipaihai hotuah a sie a. Amasa chu mi pakhat a hming Ithra, Ismael mi
Chun, Absalom le Israel mihai chun Gilead rama chun ṭhanghmun an va khuor a.
Chun, Davidin Mahanaim a tlung chun Ammon mi Rabba khuoa mi Nahas naupa Sobi hai, Lodebar khuoa mi Ammiel naupa Makir hai, Rogelim khuoa Gilead mi Barzillai hai chun,
khumhai dâm, maihûnhai dâm, pil bêlhai dâm, bu dâm, buṭei dâm, beiphit dâm, bu zêu dâm, dailuo dâm, bê dâm,

khuoizu dâm, bâwng nêne kîng dâm, berâm le bâwng nêne kîng thûm dâm, David le a kuoma mi umhai fâk dingin an hung chawi a, “Mipuihai chu thlalêra chun an phîngṭamin an chauin an dang châr êm êm ta a nih,” ti a ni si a.
Chun, David chun a kuoma mi umhai chu a tiem a, sipai sâng chunga hotu dâm, za chunga hotu dâm a siem a.

Chun, David chun mihai chu a tirsuok a, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu Joab chun ân rawi a, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu Joab unaupa Zeruia naupa, Abisaiin ân rawi a, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu Git mi Ittai chun ân rawi a. Chun, lal chun mipuihai kuomah, “Keima ngei khawm in kuomah fe ve ngei ngei ka tih,” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chun, “Fe ve lo e, keini rawi hi chu tlân hmang ta ang ni inla khawm, pawi ti naw ni hai a; chun, a chenve lai rau khawm hi va thi inla khawm an ûksak bar âwm naw a, nang chu keinirawi sîng tlukin i hlu si a, chuleiin, khawpuia inthawka mi ṭhangpui dinga inzosa zinga i lo um chu a ṭha lem a nih,” an ta.

Chun, lal chun an kuomah, “Ṭha in ti ang pei chun thâwng ka tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, lal chu kul kawtkhâr bula chun a ngîr a; chun, mipui po po chu za têl têl le sâng têl têl chun an suok ta zut zut el a.

Chun, lal chun Joab le Abisai le Ittai chu, “Keima leiin tlangvâl Absalom chu indawitakin va thaw ro khai,” tiin thu a pêk a. Mipui po poin Absalom chungchâng thuah lalin sipai hotuhai po po thu a pêk lai chu an hriet a.
Chuongchun, mipuihai chu Israel mihai chu do dingin indona hmun tieng chun an fe ta a; chun, an indona chu Ephraim rampui hnuoiah a nih.
Chun, chutaka chun David mihai hmaa chun Israel mihai chu an tlâwm ta a; chun, chutaka chun chu ni chun mi sîng hni zet an that a.
An indona chun chuong lai ram po po chu a huop vawng el si a, chu ni chun kâwlhnâm nêk hmanin rampui chun a lem tam lem a nih.

Chun, Absalom chun David mihai chu a vân tuokpui ta thut a. Chun, Absalom chu a sabengtung lien chi chungah a chuong a; chun, sabengtung chu thingsaisuo kau inbuktak hnuoiah a lût a, a lu chu thingsaisuoa chun ân tâng ta a, hnuoi tâwk lo, vân tâwk lo chun ân khai ta zing el a; chun, sabengtung hlak chu a fe pei ta a.
Chun, mi tuin amani a hmu a, Joab a hril a, “Ngai ta, thingsaisuoah Absalom inkhai zingin ka hmu,” a ta.
Chun, Joab chun a hriltu kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, chu chu i hmu si a, iengdinga i sukhluma hnuoia i sukthlâk nghâl naw? chuong chun thaw la chu tangka sâwm le kâwngkhi ka pêk ding che bah,” a ta.

Chun, mi chun Joab kuomah, “Tangka sâng khawm hmu ding ni lang lal naupa chungah ka kut thlâk naw hrim hrim ka tih; kan na hriet ngeiah lalin nang le Abisai le Ittai kuomah, ‘Tlangvâl Absalom chu tukhawma tâwk naw raw se,’ tiin thu a pêk si cheu a.
Ringumlotakin lo that ta ringawt inla, (lal kuoma chun iengkhawm thup thei a ni âwm si naw a) nang chu în sukfihlîm nâwk el âwm si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chun, “Hieng hin chu i kuomah ka um zing thei naw tawp el a,” a ta, fei pathum a chawi a, thingsaisuo laia Absalom dama lo la umzing lungkhura chun a sun a.
Chun, Joab râlthuom chawitu tlangvâl sâwm chun an hung inhuol a, Absalom chu an sun a, an that ta a.
Chun, Joab chun tawtawrâwt a hei mût a, Israel hnawttu mipuihai chu an hung kîr ta a, Joab chun mipuihai chu a lo dang tlat el ta a.
Chun, Absalom ruong chu an lâk a, rampui hnuoia khursûng inthûktaka chun an peilût a, a chunga chun nasatakin lung an dêng khâwm a, chun, Israel mihai po po chu mâni puon in sengah an tlân ta a.

Absalom chun a dam laiin lal ruoma chun lung intieng a lo intieng diem ta a, “Ka hming a dei nawna dingin, naupasal khawm ka nei si naw a,” a ta. Chu lung intieng hminga chun ama hming ân puttir a, tu chen hin Absalom hriet zingna ti a nih.
Chuongchun, Zadok naupa Ahimaaz chun, “Va tlân ka ta,
Chun, Joab chun a kuomah, “Vawisûn chu chanchin chu va hril naw rawh, ni dangah chanchin chu la hril lem rawh, lal naupa chu a thi ta leiin, vawisûn chu chanchin iengkhawm va hril naw rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chun Kus mi kuoma chun, “Fe la, i thil hmu chu lal va hril raw le,” a ta. Chun, Kus mi chun kûnin Joab chu chibai a bûk a, a tlân ta a.

Chuongchun, Zadok naupa Ahimaaz chun Joab kuomah, “Iengkhawm ni sienla, Kus mi kha va hnawtzui ka tih,” a ti nâwk a. Chun, Joab chun, “Ka naupa, chanchin hril man chu i hmu âwm si naw a, iengdingin am tlân i ta?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “Iengkhawm ni sien tlân ka tih,” a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Tlân el raw le,” a ta. Chuongchun, Ahimaaz chu phaizâwl tieng lampuiah a tlân a, Kus mi chu a lekhêl a.

Chuongchun, David chu daikawtkhâr pahni inkâra chun a lo ṭhung a; chun râl vêngtu chu kul kawtkhâr tuolpuo lem chung tieng chun a hang lâwn a, a hang ngha vêl a, mi pakhat a khât baka hung tlân a hmu a.
Chun, râl vêngtu chu a khêk a, lal chu a hril a. Chun, lal chun “Mi pakhat bak a ni chun chanchin hung hril ding ni ngei a tih,” a ta.

Chun, a hung vat vat a, a hung hnai ta deu deu a. Chun, râl vêngtu chun mi dang hung tlân a hmu nâwk a; chun, râl vêngtu chun kawtkhâr vêngtu chu a ko a, “En ta, mi dang ama khât bakin a hung tlân nâwk,” a ta. Chun, lal chun, “Ama khawm chun chanchin a hung intlun ve ding a ni chu,” a ta.

Chun, râl vêngtu chun, “A hmasa lem tlân dân chu Zadok naupa Ahimaaz tlân dân ni âwmtakin ka hriet,” a ta. Chun, lal chun, “Ama chu mi ṭhatak a na, chanchin ṭhatak a hung intlun ding nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Ahimaaz chun a ko a, lal kuomah, “A ṭha vawng ie,” a ta. Chun, a hmaia hnuoi sikin lal hmaa chun chibai bûkin a kûn a, “Lalpa, ka lalpa thaw tuma kut thlâk tumtuhai lo dangtu

Chun, lal chun, “Tlangvâl Absalom kha a la dam de maw?” a ta. Chun, Ahimaaz chun a dawn a, “Joabin lal siehlaw, kei i siehlaw ngei hi a mi tirsuok laiin an buoi mur mur ka hmu a; nisienlakhawm, ieng ang char a ni chu ka hriet nawh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Ka sîra hin la hung ngîr hri ta,” a ta. Chun, a sîra chun a hung ngîr a.
Chun, ngai ta, Kus mi chu a hung tlung a; chun, Kus mi chun, “Lalpa, ka lalpa ta dingin chanchin ka hung intlun a nih, i chunga helhai po po phuba chu

Chun, lal chun Kus mi kuoma chun, “Tlangvâl Absalom chu a la dam de maw?” a ta. Chun, Kus mi chun a dawn a, “Lalpa ka lalpa hmêlmahai le i sietna zawngtuhai po po chu chu tlangvâl ang chun um vawng raw hai se,” a ta.

Chuongchun, lal chu a lunginzîng ta hle el a, kul kawtkhâr chunga pindana chun a hang fe a, a ṭap a; chun, a hang fe malam chun, “Aw, ka naupa Absalom, ka naupa, ka naupa Absalom, i aia chun kei hi hang thi lem lang aw, Aw Absalom, ka naupa, ka naupa!” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab chu an hril a, “Ngai ta, lal chun Absalom chu a ṭa a, a sûn ie,” an ta.
Chuongchun, chu nia an hnena chu mi po po ta dinga sûnna a lo ni ta lem a; “Lal chu a naupa lei chun a lungngai nasa khawp el a,” an ti chu mipui chun chu ni chun an lo hriet ta si a.
Chun, mipuihai chu indonaa mi an tlânsie a, an inzak a, arûka an fe hmang angin chu ni chun a rûkin khawpuia chun an lût a.
Chun, lal chun a hmai a hup a, “Aw ka naupa Absalom, Aw Absalom, ka naupa, ka naupa,” tiin lal chu a ṭap a ṭap a.
Chun, Joab chu inah lal kuoma chun a lût a, “I hringna dâm, i naupahai le i naunuhai hringna dâm, i nuhmeihai le i thaikêmhai sanhimtuhai chu vawisûn hin inzaktakin i siem ta hi;

nangma hmangaituhai che i theida a, nangma theidatuhai che chu i hmangai tlata hin. Hotuhai le sipaihai chu i ta dinga iengkhawm ni lo angin vawisûn hin i suklang ta a; Absalom chu dam sienla, keini po po hi vawisûn hin thi ta vawng ni inlang, chu chu i lâwm zâwngtak ni âwmin vawisûn hin ka hriet a nih.
Chuleiin tho la, suok el rawh, i mihai suklungawi zâwngtakin thu hril rawh, i suok naw chun
Chuongchun, lal chu a tho a, kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a; “Ngai ta u, lal chu kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a,” tiin mipui po po chu an hril a; chun, mipui po po chu lal hmaa chun an va fe ta a.

Israelhai ruok chu anni puon in sengah an fe ta a. “Lal chun ei hmêlmahai kuta inthawkin a mi sansuok a, Philistin mihai kuta inthawkin a mi sandam ta a; chun, tuhin hi rama inthawk hin Absalom chu a tlân hmangsan a.
Chun, Absalom ei lal dinga hriek ei nâl chu indonaah a thi tah si a, iengdinga lal chu baukhat bêka a ko kîr zâi in rêl naw am a ni leh?” tiin Israel mi po pohai chu an insêl ta mur mur el a.

Chuongchun, lal David chun thiempu Zadok le Abiathar kuoma chun, “Juda upahai kuoma chun, ‘Iengdinga lal chu a in tienga ṭhuoi kîr ding thuah a nuhnungtaka ṭhang am in ni a? Israel mihaiin lal ṭhuoi kîr ding thu an hril chu lal kuom a tlung ta si a.
Ka unauhai in na, ka ru le ka tisa in ni si a, iengdinga a nuhnungtaka ṭhang am in ni leh aw?’ tiin hril ro.

Chun, Amasa kuomah, ‘Ka ru le ka tisa i ni naw am a nih? Joab aia ka hmaa sipaihai hotua ka siem nawtâk che leh Pathienin a law law mi law el raw se, chu nêka nasa khawmin,’ a ti a, va ti ro,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chuongchun, Judahai po po lungril chu mi pakhat lungril ang elin a sukthle ta duol a; chuongchun, lal kuomah, “I mihai po po le khan hung kîr nâwk ro,” ti dingin mi an tir ta a.
Chuongchun, lal chu a kîrnâwk a, Jordan a va tlung a. Chun, Judahai chu lal lo tuok a, lal chu Jordan lo ṭhuoikai dingin Gilgala chun an fe a.
Chun, a kuoma chun Benjamin mi sâng le, Saula sûnghai siehlaw, Ziba, a naupasalhai sâwm le panga le, a siehlaw sâwmhnihai leh an ṭhang ve a; chun, lal mithmua chun Jordan chu an kai a.
Chun, lal sûnghai ṭhuoikaina ding le ṭha a ti ang anga hmang dingin lawng an fepui a. Chun, Jordan vadung a hei kai chun Gera naupa Simei chu lal hmaa chun a bawkkhup a.

Chun, lal kuoma chun, “Ka lalpa chun khawhlona neiah mi ruot naw hrâm sienla, lalpa ka puin Jerusalem a suoksan nia i siehlaw hin indik nawtaka a lo thaw tahai kha hre zing bawk naw la, lal chun lungrilah vawn zing naw raw se.
I siehlaw hin thil ka lo suksuol ti kân hriet a; chuleiin, ngai ta, Josef sûng po pohai laia ka pu lal chu tuok dingin vawisûn hin a hung thla hmasa tak ka hung ni nghe nghe annaw,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Zeruia naupa Abisai chun a dawn a, “

Chun, David chun, “Nangni Zeruia naupasalhai, nangni hin in mi lo hriet pêk ding ieng am a um a? Vawisûn hin a mi dotuhai in ni naw am a nih? Vawisûn hin Israel mihai laia mi hrim hrim sukhlum ding am a nih? Vawisûn hi Israel mihai chunga lal ka ni hi ka hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, lal chun Simei kuoma chun, “Thi naw tawp i tih,” a ta. Chun, lal chun a kuomah ṭawng ân khâm ta a.
Chun, lal tuok dinga Jerusalema a fe chun lal chun a kuomah, “Mephiboseth, iengdinga ka kuoma i fe ve naw am?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Aw, lalpa ka pu, ka siehlawin a mi hlêm a nih; i siehlaw hin, ‘Lal kuoma ka fena dingin sabengtung chei ka tih,’ ka ti a, i siehlaw hi ka ke ân bâi si a.
Chun, lalpa ka pu kuoma hin i siehlaw hi a hêk a, nisienlakhawm, lalpa ka pu chu Pathien vântirko ang a na, chuleiin ṭha i ti ang angin thaw el rawh.

Ka pa sûnghai po po chu lalpa ka pu hmaa chun sukhlum vawng âwm an na, nisienlakhawm, i siehlaw hi i buthlêng awtpuituhai lai ân ṭhangtir a. Chuleichun, lal kuoma hin thil dang phût ngam âwm khawm am ka ni ta?” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “I chungchâng thu hi iengdinga i hril nâwk hlak am? Nang le Ziba chun ram chu insem ro ka ti a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Mephiboseth chun lal kuomah, “E, amâin nei vawng el raw se, lalpa ka pu chu inah râlmuongin a hung tlung ta si a,” a ta.
Barzillai chu upatak a na, kum sâwmriet mi zet a nih; Mahanaima lal um sûng khan fâk ding dâm a lo tumpêk a, mi neinungtak a nih.
Chun, lal chun Barzillai kuoma chun, “Ka kuoma fe ve la, ka kuomah Jerusalemah châwm ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Barzillai chun lal kuomah, “Ieng chen tak am la damin lal kuoma Jerusalema chun hang fe vêng ka ta?

Tuhin kum sâwmriet mi ka na, a sie le ṭha khawm thlier thei am ka la nih? I siehlaw hin ka thil fâk le dâwn hi ân hnik naw khawm ka hriet hran thei ta am a nih? Nuhmei le pasal hla sak ri khawm ka hriet hran thei ta am a nih? Chuleiin, i siehlaw hi iengdingin am ka pu ta ding hin phurrik ni el ka ta?
I siehlaw hin lal kuoma Jordan râl kai ve chau hi ka tum a nih; iengdingin am lal chun chuong ang chun ṭhat man chu mi thung ve kher a ta?

Lunginsiettakin i siehlaw hi mîn fetir nâwk el la, ka nu le pa thlân umna keini khuo ngeiah thi de ning. Amiruokchu, en ta, i siehlaw Kimham hi, lalpa ka pu kuomah fe ve sienla, a chungah ṭha i ti ang angin thaw rawh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a dawn a, “Kimham chu ka kuomah fe vêng a tih, ṭha i ti ang peiin a chungah thâwng ka tih; chun, thil iengkhawm i mi hni taphawt chu thawpêk pei ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, mipui po pohai chu Jordan râl an kai a; chun, lal khawm chu a kai ve a; chun, lal chun Barzillai chu a fâwp a, mal a sâwm a; chun, ama hmun tieng a fe nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, lal chu Gilgala chun a kai a. Kimham chu a kuoma chun a kai ve a; chun, Juda mi po pohai chun lal chu an ṭhuoi kai a; Israel mi khawm a zâtve an ṭhang.

Chun, Israel mi po po chu lal kuomah an hung a, lal kuoma chun, “Iengdinga kan unau Juda mihai hin an chang bîk che a, lal le a sûnghai le David mihai po po khawm Jordan râla an ṭhuoi sa vawng el?” an ta.

Chun, Juda mi po pohai chun Israel mihai chu an dawn a, “Lal chu keini tieng hnai a ni lei a nih, iengdinga hi thua hin in lunginsen el am? Lal nei ringa um am kan nih? Thilpêk ieng amani khawm a mi nei am a nih?” an ta.

Chun, Israel mihai chun Juda mihai chu an dawn a, “Lala hin chan sâwm kan nei a, Davida hin nangni nêkin chan kan nei lem a nih. Iengdinga in mi ngainêp el am a na? Lal ṭhuoikîr thu hi a rawt hmasatu kan ni naw am a nih?” an ta. Chuongchun, Juda mihai thu chu Israel mihai thu nêk chun ân rum ta lem a.
Chuongchun, Israel mi po poin David an zui chu an mâksan a, Bikri naupa Seba chu an zui ta a; Juda mihai ruok chun Jordana inthawka Jerusalem chenin an lal chu an inkawppui ta tlat a.
Chun, lal chun Amasa kuomah, “Ni thum sûngin Juda mihai mi ko khâwmpêk la, chun, nang khawm hung ṭhang ve bawk la,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Amasa chu Juda mihai ko khâwm dingin a fe ta a; amiruokchu, a hun ruotpêk nêkin a va thang sâwt ta a.

Chuongchun, David chun Abisai kuomah, “Bikri naupa Seba hin Absalom nêk hmanin ei pawi a tâwk ding a nih ie, i pu mihai hi ṭhuoi la, hnawt ro khai; chuong naw chun khaw kul neia dam lût hman a ta, ei hmu phâk nawa hin insuo hlau rawi ei tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab rawihai, Kereth mihai le, Peleth mihai le an mi hrâthai po po chun ama an zui suok ta a; Jerusalema inthawk chun Bikri naupa Seba chu hnawt dingin an suok ta a.

Gibeona lungpui umna an va tlung chun Amasa chun anni chu a lo tuok a. Chun, Joab chu indona thuomhnawin ân chei a; chun, a chunga chun kâwlhnâm a bâwm pumin, kâwngkhia chun a pai a; chun, a fe malam chun a kâwlhnâm chu damtein a phawi a.
Chun, Joab chun Amasa kuoma chun, “Unaupa, i ṭha pei de maw?” a ta. Chun, Joab chun Amasa chu fâwp tumin a khâkhmul chu a kut changtiengin a chel a.

Nisienlakhawm, Amasa chun Joabin kâwlhnâm a chawi chu a ngaisak naw a; chuongchun, a phînga chun a sun a, a rîlhai chu a sukthlâk nuoi el a, a sun nawn nâwk ta naw a; chuongchun, a thi ta a. Chuongchun, Joab le a unaupa Abisai chun Bikri naupa Seba chu an hnawt ta a.
Chun, a kâwlah Joab rawihai laia tlangvâl pakhat chu a ngir a, “Joab le David tienga ṭhang taphawt chun Joab hi zui pei raw se,” a ti a.

Chun, Amasa chu lamlien laitakah a thisenin a lo inchie nuoi el a. Chun, ama chun mi po po ngîr zinga a hmu chun Amasa ruong chu lamliena inthawk chun phûl tienga sawnin puonin ân khum a, a kâwla hung taphawt chu an ngîr peia a hmu leiin.
Chun, lamliena inthawka sie hmang a ni hnung chun Bikri naupa Seba chu hnawt dingin mi po po chun Joab chu an zui ta a.
Chun, Abel chen le, Beth-maaka chenin Israel hnam po pohai le Ber mihai po po khawm chu a sir vawng a; chun, an pungkhâwm a, ama an zui ve a.
Chun, Beth-maakaa Abel khuoa chun an inhuol a; chun, a khaw hrûla chun hnuoi an dêng pâwng a, kul hrûla chun a ngîr a, chun, Joab kuoma mi um po pohai chun kul chu sukchim dingin an suk tlut tlut a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei var pakhat khuoa inthawk chun a hung khêk a, “Khai khai, Joab kuomah, ‘Hung hnâi raw khai, i kuomah thu lo hril ka ti khai,’ a tih, hang ti ro khai,” a ti a.

Chun, a kuoma chun a va fe hnai a, chun, nuhmei chun, “Joab i ni maw?” a ti a. “Nih e,” tiin a dawn a. Chuongchun, a kuomah, “I suoknu thuhril hi ngai ta,” a ti a. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Ka lo ngai ie,” a ti a.
Chuongchun, “Tienlai chun, ‘Abel khuoa hin inrâwn phawt an ta,’ an ti hlak a, chuong ang chun thu an suktâwp hlak.
Kei hi Israelhai laia inrem nuom le ringum pâwl ka na, nang chun Israel khuo, a khaw bulpui hi suksiet i tum a ni hi,
Chun, Joab chun a dawn a, “Chuong ang chu a ni naw tawp el, sukhmang amanih, suksiet amanih ka tum naw hrim hrim . Chuong ang tieng thu chu a ni nawh;

Ephraim tlâng rama Bikri naupa Seba chun lal David ngei chu dodâlin a kut ân let a; ama chu mi pe el unla, khuo chu suoksan el kan tih,” a ti a. Chun, nuhmei chun Joab kuomah, “Ngai ta, a lu chu kulah hung pei liempêk kan ti che,” a ti a.

Chuongchun, nuhmei chu a varna hmang chun mipui po pohai lai chun a fe a. Chun, Bikri naupa Seba lu chu an tan a, Joab kuom tieng chun an thedawk a. Chun, tawtawrâwt a mût a, mâni puon in tieng seng, khuoa inthawk chun an indar ta a. Chun, Joab chu Jerusalemah lal kuoma chun a fe nâwk ta a.
Joab chu Israelhai po po sipai hotu a na, chun, Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu Kereth mi le Peleth mihai hotu a nih;
chun, Adoniram chu sinthawa ruoiluihai hotu a nih; chun, Ahilud naupa, Jehosaphat chu chanchin ziektu a na;
Seva chu lekha ziektu a na, chun, Zadok le Abiathar chu thiempu an nih;
chun, Jair mi Ira khawm chu David thiempu a nih.
Chun, David damlai chun a kum bi sirin kum thum ṭâm a tla a; chun, David chun

Chun, lal chun Gibeon mihai chu a ko a, an kuomah, (Gibeon mihai chu Israel thlahai an ni naw a, Amor mi la um sunhai kha an ni lem a; Israel thlahai chun an chunga chun ṭawng an lo inkhâm ta a; Saula chun Juda thlahai le Israel thlahai ta dinga ṭhahnem a ngai leiin that a tum el hlak a nih).
David chun Gibeon mihai kuoma chun, “Iengam thawpêk ka ti cheu a?

Chun, Gibeon mihai chun a kuomah, “Saula le a sûnghai le kan chungthua hin tangka le rângkachak tieng thu a ni naw a, Israel mihai lai hin mi sukhlum theina kan nei bawk nawh,” an ta. Chun, ama chun, “In hril ang taphawt chu thawpêk ka ti cheu,” a ta.
Chun, lal kuoma chun, “A mi sukbohmangtu le Israel ram sûng hrim hrima khawm um loa, sukbohmang dinga a mi phiertu chu,
a naupasalhai pasari mi pe la,
chun, Gibeon mihai kuta chun ân hlân a, chun, anni chun

Chun, Aia naunu Rizpa chun saiip puon a lâk a, bu sîk ṭantira inthawka vâna inthawka tuiin a hung burkhum chena a umna dingin, lungpui chungah ân zar khum a; an chunga sûna chunglêng vatehai fûk le ramsahai um khawm a phal naw a.
Chun, Aia naunu Saula thaikêm Rizpa thilthaw chu David chu an hril a.
Chutaka Saula ru le a naupa Jonathan ruhai chu a lâk a; chuongchun, an khaihai ru khawm chu an lâk khâwm a.

Chun, Saula ru le a naupa Jonathan ruhai chu Benjamin rama Zela khuoa a pa Kis thlânah an phûm a, chun, lal thupêk ang pei chun an thaw a. Chun, chu hnunga chun chu ram chunga chun Pathien a lungâwi ta a.
Philistin mihai chun Israel mihai chu an do nâwk a; chun, David chu a mihai le chun an fe thla a; Philistin mihai chu an zu do a, chun, David chu a hung chau ta hle el a.
Chun, Isbi-benod, mi lien naupasalhai laia mi, a fei rikzie chu dâr Shekel za thum, kâwlhnâm thar pai chun David chu that a tum a.

Nisienlakhawm, Zeruia naupa Abisai chun a san a, Philistin mi chu a thaw a, a that ta a. Chun, David mihai chun, “Israelhai khâwnvar hi i sukmit nawna dingin indo dingin kan kuomah suok ve ta dêr naw ti nih,” tiin a chungah ṭawng an inkhâm a.
Chu hnunga chun Philistin mihai leh Gob khuoah indona a um nâwk a; chutaka chun Husath mi Sibbekai chun mi lien naupasalhai laia mi Saph a that a.
Chun, Philistin mihai leh Gob khuoah an indo nâwk a; chun, Bethlehem mi Jaare-oregim naupa Elhananin Git mi Goliath a that a, a fei ngul chu puon khâwngtu puonkawl ang a nih.

Chun, Gath khuoah indona a um nâwk a, chutaka chun mi insângtak el a kut khingtieng khingtienga kutpâr paruk, a ke khingtieng khingtienga kepâr paruk, a rênga sâwmhni le pali nei hi a um a; ama khawm chu mi liena inthawka pieng a nih.
Chun, Israel mihai chu a va cho a, David unau Simei naupa Jonathan chun a lo that a.
Chun, chuong palihai chu Gath khuoa mi liena inthawka pieng an na, chuonghai chu David le a mihai kutah an thi a.
Chun, David chun a hmêlmahai po po kuta inthawk le Saula kuta inthawk
chuongchun, ama chun:
Ka lungpui, Pathien ama chu ring ka ta,
Ka phaw le ka sandamna ki, ka kulbîng insâng le kân humhimna a nih;
Ka sandamtu, nangin inpâwngnêknaa inthawkin i mi sandam hlak.
Inpâktlâk
Chuongchun, a mi dotuhaia inthawka sandamin um ka tih.
Thina hung insawk chun a mîn huol vêl a,
Pathien ngaisak nawna tuilien chun a mi suklau a.
Seol hruihruolhai chun a mi khuop vêl a,
Thina chânghai chun a mi âwk bawk a.
Ka lunginzîngin
Anih, ka Pathien chu ka ko hlak.
Chun, ama chun a biekina inthawk chun ka râwl chu a hriet a,
Chun, ka khêkri chu a naa chun a lût ta a.
Chu phingle chun hnuoi hi ân hnîng a, ân thin ta a,
A lunginsen leiin vân innghatna chenin ân hnîngin ân thin ta a.
A hnâra inthawk chun meikhu ân tung ta ngut ngut a,
A baua suok mei chun a kâng ta dur dur a;
Chu chun meihawl khawm chu a sukchawk ta dur dur a.
Ama chun vânhai khawm a sukkûn a, a ṭum ta a,
A ke hnuoiahai chun inthim sâmup hi a hung um a.
Cherub chungah a chuong a, a vuong ta a,
Anih, thli thlaahai chun an hmu a.
Inthim chu ama inhuol vêlna bûktêah a siem a,
Tuihai, vâna sûm sâmuphai chu fâwkkhâwmin,
A hmaa varna lei chun,
Meilinghai chu a chawk a.
Achunghnungtak chun a râwl ân suo a.
Chun, thalhai chu a kâp suok a, anni chu a sukdar a,
Kâwl dâm ân leptir a, a sukbuoi ta a.
Chu phingleh
A hnâra inthuok suokin a mût rak lei chun,
Leihnuoi innghatnahai chu suklangin a um ta a.
Ama chun chung tienga inthawkin a hung ban a, a mi chel a,
Tui tamtaka inthawk chun a mi hnûk dawk a.
A mi dotu hrâttaka inthawk chun a mi sanhim a,
A mi theidatuhaia inthawk leh, keia ta ding chun an hrât taluo si a.
Anni chun ka vângsiet ni chun an mi hung thaw a,
Nisienlakhawm,
Ama chun hmun inthâwltakah a mi ṭhuoi suok a,
Ka chunga a lâwm leiin a mi lo sanhim tah a nih.
Ka kuthai ân thieng ang ngeiin a mi thung a nih.
Ka Pathien kuoma inthawk chun suoltakin ka fe hmang ngai si naw a.
A rorêlna po po ka hmaah a um hlak a,
A thuruothai hlak chu ka nghatsan ngai si naw a.
A hmaa chun sawisêlbo ka lo ni a,
Ka rîtlonaa inthawkin kân siekieng hlak.
Chuleiin,
A mithmua kân thiengzie ang peiin.
Mi lunginsiet theihai kuoma chun lunginsiet theitakin insuklang i ta,
Mi ṭha famkimhai kuoma chun ṭha famkimin insuklang i tih.
Mi inthieng kuoma chun inthiengin insuklang i ta,
Chun, mi kâwmaw kuoma chun kâwmaw angin insuklang i tih.
Rinum tuor mihai chu sandam i ta,
Mi chapohai ruok chu i suktlâwm theina dingin an chungah i mit a fu zing a.
Aw
Nangma ṭhangpuiin râl ka hne a,
Ka Pathien ṭhangpui bawkin kul kân châwmhlên a nih.
Pathien chu a lampui a ṭha famkim a,
Ama ringtuhai po po ta dingin ama chu phaw a nih.
Ei Pathien naw chu tu am lungpui an um a?
Pathien chu ka kulpui nghettak a na,
Mi ṭha famkim chu a lampuiah a ṭhuoi hlak.
Ka hmun insângahai a mîn umtir hlak.
Ka kuthai hi râl kâp dingin ân chûktir hlak a,
Chuongchun, ka bânhai hin dâr thalngul a kuoi zo hiel a.
Nangin i sandamna phaw chu i mi pêk bawk a;
I înngaitlâwmna chun i mi siem lien tah.
Ka hnuoia ka kalchawina chu i suklien a,
Chuongchun, ka kehai hi ân tleu naw a.
Ka hmêlmahai chu ka hnawt phâk a,ka sukbohmang a,
Sukbohmang dêra an um hmakhat chun ka kîr nawh.
An tho nâwk thei nawna dingin ka sukbohmang dêr a, ka sât fik a;
Anih, ka ke hnuoiah an tlu ta a.
Nangin inthawnaa ding chun ka taiah hrâtnain i mi hrên si a,
A mi hung thawtuhai chu ka hnuoiah i tukdawl ta a.
A mi theidatuhai chu ka sukbohmang theina dingin,
Nangin a mi dotuhai chu mi hnunginnghatin în umtir ta bawk a.
An ngha vêl a, nisienlakhawm, sandamtu ding tukhawm an um naw a;
Chu phingle chun hnuoia pilvut ang elin ka vuok phit a,
Khawlai chirhak ang elin ka sukhmât a, ka sukdar ta a.
Nangin ka mihai innêkbuoinaa inthawk khawmin i mi sanhim ta a,
Hnam tin luah i mi siem a.
Ka hriet ngai naw hnam chun ka rawng an bâwl a.
Hnam danghai chu ka kuomah an inpêk a,
Ka chanchin an hriet phingleh ka thu an zâwm a.
Hnam danghai chu an lungril a beidawng zo a,
An kulbînghaia inthawk dâm chun inthin pumin hung suok an tih.
A mi sandamna lungpui, Pathien chu chawimawiin um raw se.
Phuba mi lapêktu le,
Hnam tin ka hnuoia tukdawltu Pathien ngei chu.
A mi dotuhaia inthawka a mi la suoktu,
