Anih, nangin a mi thawtuhai chungtieng chun i mi dawm kâng a;
Mi nunsiea inthawk chun i mi sanhim hlak.
I hming inpâkin hla sak bawk ka tih.
Ama chun sandamna ropuitak a lal a pêk hlak a;
A hrieknâl chungah, David le a thlahai chung ngeia chun,
Kumkhuoin a zainêmzie inlangtir a tih,” a ti a.
Hieng hi David thuhril nuhnung tak a nih,
Jesai naupa David chun a hril a;
“Insângtaka dawm sânga,
Jakob Pathien hrieknâl,
Israelhai hla mawitak phuoktu chun a hril a;
A thu chu ka leiah a um a.
Israelhai Pathien chun a hril a,
Israelhai lungpui chun:
‘Mi chunga feltaka rorêl hlaka,
Pathien ṭi puma rorêl hlak chu,
Nisa a hung suok a, sûm um dêr lo,
Zîng khawvar ang hi nîng a ta;
Raw sûr zoa khuo hung inthienga,
Hnuoia hlohna inder no hlap ang hi nîng a tih.
Chatuon thuthlung ka kuomah a thlung a;
Iengkim fel le suknghet tlatin;
Ka sandamna kim le duthusâm kim,
Ân der suoktir naw ding maw?
Mi rilohai chu an rênga a hnâwla hnâwlhmang mi, hling ang nîng an ta,
Kuta lâk mi an ni si nawh.
A tâwktu ding chun thîr le fei ngul ruoi lem ding a na,
Chuongchun, an hmuna rawhmang vawng nîng an tih,’ tiin a mi biek a,” tiin.
Hieng hi David sipai huoisenhai hming chu a nih; Takemon mi Joseb-bassebeth chu sipai hotuhai laia hotu tak a na, ama chu ṭum khata mi za riet thattu Aznit mi Adino an ti bawk kha a nih.
Ama chu a tho a, Philistin mihai chu kut kham rak khawpin, a kâwlhnâm khawm inlet theilo rak khawpin a that a, chu ni chun
Chun, chu dawttu chu Hara mi, Agee naupa Samma a na. Dailuo umna hmunah Philistin mihai chu lâk tumin an inkhâwm a, chun, mipuihai chun Philistin mihai chu an tlânsiet san a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu chu hmuna chun a ngîr a, a vêng tlat a, Philistin mihai chu a that a, chun,
Chun, sipai huoi sâwmthum laia pathumhai chu an zu fe a; bu sîk lai takin David kuomah Adullam pûkah an fe a; chun, Philistin sipaihai chun Rephaim kâwnah ṭhanghmun an khuor a.
Chun, David chun tui a châk êm êm el a, “Bethlehema tuisunsuo tui, kul kawtkhâr kâwla mi kha dâwn dinga mi pe um ta ve hai sienla aw,” a ta.

Chuongchun, sipai huoisen pathumhai chun, Philistin sipaihai chu an nêr thleng a, kul kawtkhâr kâwla mi, Bethlehema tuisunsuo chu an va thâl a; an chawi a, David kuomah an fepui a, nisienlakhawm, a lo dâwn nuom naw a,
“Aw
Sâwmthumhai laia chun chawimawi tlâk tak a ni naw am a nih? Chuleiin, an hotuah an siem a, nisienlakhawm, a chunghnung tak pathum laia tiemsa a kai nawh.
Chun, Kabzeel mi huoi naupa Jehoiada naupa Benaia thil nasatak thawtu chun Moab mi Ariel naupasal pahnihai chu a that a; chun, a zu fe a, vûr tlâk hun laiin khursûngah sakeibaknei a zu that bawk a.
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chun chuong ang thil chu a thaw leiin sipai huoisen pathumhai laia chun hmingṭhat a hlaw a.
Mi sâwmthumhai nêk chun chawimawi tlâk a ni hrim a, nisienlakhawm, achunghnung tak pathumhai laia tiemsa a kai nawh. Chun, David chun ama vêngtu hotuah a sie a.
Joab unaupa Asahel chu sâwmthumhai laia pakhat chu a na; Bethlehem khuoa mi Dodo naupa Elhanan,
Harod mi Samma, Harod mi Elika,
Palti mi Helez, Teko a mi Ikkes naupa Ira,
Anathoth mi Abiezer, Husath mi Mebunnai,
Aho mi Zalmon, Netophath mi Maharai,
Netophath mi Baana naupa Heleb, Benjamin thla Gibea khuoa mi Ribai naupa Ittai,
Pirathon mi Benaia, Gaas vadungtea mi Hiddai;
Arbath mi Abi-albon, Barhum mi Azmaveth;
Saalbon mi Eliaba, Jasen naupahai laia Jonathan;
Harar mi Samma, Arar mi Sarar naupa Ahiam;
Maakath mi Ahasbai naupa Eliphelet, Gilon mi Ahithophel naupa Eliam;
Karmel mi Hezro, Arba mi Paarai;
Zoba khuoa mi Nathan naupa Igal, Gad mi Bani;
Zeruia naupa Joab râlthuom chawitu Ammon mi Zelek, Beeroth mi Naharai;
Ithra mi Ira, Ithra mi Gareb;
Hit mi Uria, an rêng chun sawmthum le pasari an nih.
Chun,
Chun, lal chun a kuoma um sipai hotu Joab kuoma chun, “Israel hnam po po lai hin Dana inthawka Beer-Seba chenin invâk vêl la mi ieng zât am an ni ka hriet theina dingin tiem vawng ro,” a ta.
Chun, Joab chun lal kuomah, “
Nisienlakhawm, lal thu chun Joab le a sipai hotuhai chu a hne ta a. Chuongchun, Joab le a sipai hotuhai chu Israelhai tiem ding chun lal kuoma inthawk chu an suok ta a.
Chun, Jordan râl an va kai a, chun, Gad ruom laitak changtieng panga khaw um Aroera chun Jazer chenin umhmun an khuor a;
chun, Tahtim-hodsi le Gilead ram an tlung a; chun, Dan-jaan an tlung a, Zidon panin an fe pei a,
chun, Tura kul dâm an va tlung a; chun, Hiv mihai le Kanaan mihai khuohai po po an tlung a, chun, Judai simtieng Beer-sebaah an fe a.
Chuongchun, ram po po chu an fang suok hnung chun, thla kuo le ni sâwmhni zoah Jerusalemah an fe nâwk ta a.
Chun, Joab chun mihriem zât chin chu lal a pêk a; chun, Israel rama chun kâwlhnâm chawi mi, mi huoisen nuoi riet an um a; chun, Juda mi chu nuoi nga an um a.
Chun, mihriem an hang tiem zo chun David lungril chu a na ta hle el a. David chun
Chun, zîngkâra David a hang tho chun David zâwlnei, zâwlnei Gad kuomah
“Fe la, David kuomah, ‘

Chuongchun, Gad chu David kuomah a fe a, a kuomah, “I rama hin kum sari ṭâm hung tlâk am, i hmêlma hmaa an hnawt sûng che a, thla thum lo tlân hmang hri am, i rama ni thum hri hung inlêng? a mi tirtu ieng angin am ka dawn ding a na, inngaituo la, mi hril raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Gad kuomah, “Ka lunginzîng hle el a,
Chuongchun,
Chun, vântirkoin sukse dinga Jerusalem tienga a kut a hang inlet chun
Chun, Davidin mi sukhlumtu vântirko a hmu chun
Chun, chu ni chun Gad chu David kuomah a fe a, a kuomah, “Hang fe la, Jebus mi Arauna hrizâwlah
Chun, David chu
Chun, Arauna chu a hei ngha a, ama tieng pana lal le a rawihai hung chu a hmu a, chuongchun, Arauna chu a suok a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin lal hmaa chun a bawkkhup a.
Chun, Arauna chun, “Iengdinga ka pu lal chu a siehlaw kuoma hi hung am a ni a?” a ta. Chun, David chun, “Mipuihai laia inthawka hri hi ân kieng theina dingin

Chun, Arauna chun David kuomah, “Lalpa ka pu chun âwm a ti chu la sienla, inhlân raw se, en ta, pumrawhmanga inhlân dingin bâwngchalhai chu an um a; chun, thing dingin hrizâwl hmangruohai le sebâwng thuomhnawhai chu a um bawk a.
Aw, lalpa, hieng po po hi Arauna chun lal a pêk vawng a nih,” a ta. Chun, Arauna chun lal kuomah, “
Chun, David chun chutaka chun

Chuongchun, a siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Ka lalpa lal ta ding hin nunghâk tleirawl zawng ei tiu khai, lal bula hin um zing sienla, enkawl raw se; chun, i ângsûnga hin hung zâl sienla, ka lalpa hi a lum thei ding a nih,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Israel ram sûng po poa chun nunghâk hmêlṭha an zawng ta a; Sunam mi Abisag chu an va hmu a, lal kuoma chun an hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Nunghâk chu a hmêl a ṭha hle el a, lal chu a enkawl a, a rawng a bâwlpêk hlak a; nisienlakhawm, lal chun a pâwl naw a.
Chun, Haggith naupa Adonija chu ama le ama inchawisângin, “Kei hi lal ka la ni ngei âwm hi maw, ” a ta, tawlailîr le sakawr chung chuong mihai, mi sâwmnga a hmaa tlân dinghai leh a buotsai a.
A pa hlak chun ieng lai khawma, “Iengdinga hienga i thaw am a ni leh?” tiin a suklungawi naw ngai si naw a; chun, ama hi hmêl ṭhatak a na, Absalom hnuoia mi a nih.
Ama chun Zeruia naupa Joab le thiempu Abiathar chu a râwn a, anni chu Adonija tieng chun an ṭhang a, an ṭhangpui hlak a.
Thiempu Zadok hai, Jehoiada naupa Benaia hai, zâwlnei Nathan hai, Simei hai, Rei hai le David mi huoisenhai ruok chu Adonija tieng an ṭhang ve naw a.
Chun, Adonija chun berâmhai, bâwngchalhai, ran châwm thâuhai Zoheleth lungah a that a; chu chu En-rogel bula um a nih; chun, lal naupahai, a unauhai po po le, Juda rama lal upahai po po chu a fiel a.
Zâwlnei Nathan hai, Benaia hai, mi huoisenhai le a unaupa Solomon ruok chu a fiel ve naw a.
Chuongchun, nangma himna ding le i naupa Solomon himna ding lo hril ka ti che.
Ngai ta, lal i va biek lai tak chun kei khawma hung zui lût vêng ka ti che a, i thuhril chu ka hung sukdetpui ding che a nih,” tiin a hril a.
Chun, Bathseba chu lal pindana chun a va lût ta a, lal chu a upa ta hle el a, Sunam mi Abisag chun lal rawng chu a lo bâwl a.
Bathseba chun kûnin lal chu chibai a bûk a. Chun, lal chun, “Ieng am i dit a?” a lo ti a.
Ama chun, “Ka lalpa,
Nisienlakhawm, ngai ta, tuhin Adonija chun ro a rêl ta hi, lalpa nang ka pu hlaka i hriet si naw a;
bâwngchalhai, ran châwm thâuhai, berâmhai a that ṭeu a, lal naupahai po po le thiempu Abiathar le sipai pâwl hotu Joab a ko a; nisienlakhawm, i siehlaw Solomon ruok hi chu a ko ve naw a nih.
Chuongchun, ka pu lalpa hnunga hin lalṭhungphaah tu am a ṭhung ding a na ti i hril theina dingin Israelhai po po mit hi nang ka pu chunga hin a fu ṭhuop el a ni hi.
Chuong naw chun chu hieng hi hung nîng a ta, ka pu lal hi a puhai kuoma a in ve pha chun, kei le ka naupa Solomon hi thil suksuoltuah an mi ruot el ding a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, chuonga lal kuoma thu a la hril zing lai chun zâwlnei, Nathan chu a va lût ve a;
“En ta, zâwlnei Nathan a hung ie,” tiin lal chu an hril a. Chun, lal kuom a va tlung chun, lal hmaa chun a hmaia hnuoi sikin a bawkkhup a.
Chun, Nathan chun, “Aw lalpa ka pu, ‘Keia hnungah Adonija hi inlal a ta, ka lalṭhungphaah ṭhung a tih,’ i ti am a nih?
Nisienlakhawm, kei i siehlaw ngei le, thiempu Zadok le Jehoiada naupa Benaia le i siehlaw Solomon hi chu an mi fiel ve naw a.
Hi thil hi ka pu lalpa thilthaw a ni si chun, ka pu lalpa hnunga hin i lalṭhungphaa ṭhung ding chu a tu tak am a ni i siehlawhai hi i lân hriettir naw hrim nîng a ti maw?” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal David chun a dawn a, “Bathseba mi hung kopêk ro,” a ti a. Chun, lal kuoma chun a va fe a, lal hmaa chun a va ngîr a.
i kuoma Israelhai
Chun, lal David chun, “Thiempu Zadok hai, zâwlnei Nathan hai, Jehoiada naupa Benaia hai mi hung kopêk ro,” a ta. Chun, anni chu lal hmaa chun an va fe ta a.
Chun, lal chun an kuomah, “In lalpa siehlawhai hi ṭhuoi unla, chun, ka naupa Solomon hi keima sabengtung lien chia ngei inchuongtir unla, Gihonah ṭhuoi thla ro,
Chuongchun, ama chu hung zui in ta, ka lalṭhungphaa hin a hung ṭhung ding a nih, ama hi ka aia lal ding a ni si a; chun, ama hi Israel ram le Juda ram lal dinga ka ruot a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Jehoiada naupa Benaia chun lal chu a dawn a, “Amen,

Chuongchun, thiempu Zadok hai, zâwlnei Nathan hai, Jehoiada naupa Benaia hai, Kereth mihai, Peleth mihai chu an zu fe a, Solomon chu David sabengtung chunga chun an inchuongtir a, Gihon hmuna chun an ṭhuoi a.

Chun, thiempu Zadok chun Puon ina inthawkin hriek siena ki chu a lâk a, Solomon chu a nâl ta a. Chun, tawtawrâwt an mût a, chuongchun, mi po po chun, “Pathienin lal Solomon hi humhim raw se,” an ti a.
Chun, mipuihai po po chun ama chu an zui a, mipuihai chun theihle dâm an mût a, an lâwm nasa khawp a, an rihâu chun hnuoi chu a nghawr kak hiel a.

Chun, Adonija le mi fielhai a kuoma umhai po po chun an ruoiṭhe zo chun an hei hriet a. Chun, Joab chun tawtawrâwt mût rîk a hei hriet chun, “Khawpui sûnga ri nasatak um ta dur dur el chu iengtizie am a ni ta leh?” a ta.
Chuonga a ti lai tak chun ngai ta, thiempu Abiathar naupa Jonathan a hung a, Adonija chun, “La hung ta khai, nang chu chu mi fel i na, chanchin ṭha intlun ngei i tih,” a lo ti a.
Chun, Jonathan chun a dawn a, Adonija kuoma chun, “Tlun lo e, ei pu lal David chun Solomon lalah a siem tah annâwm ie,
ama ruol chun thiempu Zadok hai, zâwlnei Nathan hai, Jehoiada naupa Benaia hai, Kereth mihai, Peleth mihai lalin a tir a, lal sakawr chungah an inchuongtir ta a:

chun, thiempu Zadok le zâwlnei Nathanin Gihon hmunah lal dingin hriek an nâl ta a, chutaka inthawk chun hlimtakin an hung a, chu ri chun khawpui sûng chu a khâwk rum rum el a nih. Chu chu a nih in ri hriet chu.
Chun, Solomon chu hi ram lalṭhungphaa chun a ṭhung ta bawk a.

Chun, lal siehlawhai chun, ‘I Pathienin i hming nêkin Solomon hming chu sukṭha sienla, i lalṭhungpha nêkin Solomon a lalṭhungpha chu sukropui lem raw se,’ tia ei lal David chu lâwmpui dingin an fe huoi huoi bawk a; chun, lal chu khum sikin a lo kûn pei bawk a.
Chun, lal khawm chun hieng ang hin a ti a, ‘
Chun, Adonija mi fielhai po po chun an ṭi ta a, an tho a, mâni lampui sengah an fe ta vawng a.
Chun, Adonija chun Solomon chu a ṭi ta a, a tho a, maichâm ki a va chel ta a.
Chun, “Ngai ta, Adonija chun lal Solomon a ṭi a, ‘Lal Solomon hin a siehlaw kâwlhnâma sukhlum lo dingin ka kuomah ṭawng inkhâm phawt raw se,’ tiin maichâm ki a chel ie,” tiin Solomon chu an hril a.
Solomon chun, “Mi ringumtak a ni ti a suklang phawt chun a sam zâi khat khawm hnuoiah tla naw nih, amiruokchu, rîtlona a nei ti hriet a ni ruok chun thîng a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal Solomon chun mi a tir a, maichâma inthawk chun an va ṭhuoi ta a. Chun, a va fe a, Solomon chu chibai a bûk a, Solomon chun a kuomah, “I inah fe ta raw khai,” a lo ti a.
David thi hun chu a hung hnai ta a, a naupa Solomon chu thu a pêk a,
“Leihnuoi po po dân angin ka fe ve ding a ni ta a, chuongchun, hrâttakin um la, patlingtakin um rawh,
i thilthaw taphawta le i nghatna tieng poa i tluongtlung theina dingin Mosie Dân ziek anga,
Chuongchun, i rem hriet dân angin thaw la, a lua kêlsam ṭo hi thlânah lungmuongtakin inliemtir naw rawh.
Chuongchun, thiemchang chun chu insuo naw rawh, mi var i ni si a, a chunga ieng anga thaw ding am a na ti hre el i tih; a lua kêlsam ṭo chu thisen leh thlânah în liemtir ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, David chu a puhai kuoma chun a in innghil ve ta a, David khawpuia chun an phûm a.
Chun, Haggith naupa Adonija chu Bathseba Solomon nu kuomah a fe a, ama chun, “Ṭha tieng thua hung am i nih?” a lo ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ṭha tieng thuah nih e,” a ta. Chun, “I kuomah ieng am a nih hril ding ka nei a,” a ti nâwk a. Ama chun, “Hril ta la,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ram hi ka ta a ni tah ti le, Israelhai po po khawm hin keima hi lal dingin an mi thlîr zing a nih ti i hriet a, amiruokchu, ram chu ka unaupa ta dingin a hung inlet ta lem a;
Tuhin thil pakhat hni ding che ka nei a, mi remti nawpêk naw hrâm rawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Hril ta la,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka hni che a nih, lal Solomon kuoma chun hril la, (i thu chu a sêl âwm si naw a) Sunam mi Abisag hi nuhmeiah mîn neitir raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Bathseba chun, “Aw le, lal chu lo bepêk ka ti che,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Bathseba chu Adonija va bepêk dingin lal Solomon kuoma chun a fe ta a. Chun, lal chu ama lo lâwm dingin a tho a, a hmaa chun a kûn a, a lalṭhungphaa chun a ṭhung a, chun, lal nu ta ding chun ṭhungpha ân sietir a; a changtienga chun a ṭhung ta a.
Chuongchun, “Thil pakhat chiterek ka hni ding che a nih, mi remti nawpêk naw hrâm rawh,” a ta. Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Hni ta la, nu, remti nawpêk naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Sunam mi Abisag hi i unaupa Adonija nuhmeiah inneitir rawh,” a ta.

Chun, lal Solomon chun a dawn a, a nu kuoma chun, “Iengtiziea Sunam mi Abisag hi Adonija ta dinga hni am i ni leh? Ram khawm hi hnipêk law law ta la; ama chu ka u a ni annâwm, ama ta ding le thiempu Abiathar ta ding le Zeruia naupa Joab ta ding khawma hni raw chu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal Solomon chun, “
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, lal Solomon chun Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu a tir a, ama chu a va thaw a, a thi ta a.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Abiathar chu
Chun, “
Benaia chu,
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “A hril ang chun hang thaw la, phûm rawh, a san um dêr lova Joabin thisen ân suoa inthawka kha kei le ka pa sûnghai chu i sukfihlîm theina dingin.
Chuongchun, Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu a hang fe a, a hang thaw a, a that ta a; chun, thlalêra ama ina chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, lalin Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu sipaihai chungah a ai ân awtir a, chun, thiempu Zadok chu lalin Abiathar ai ân awtir a.
Chun, lalin Simei chu ân kotir a, a kuomah, “Jerusalema hin in bâwl la, chutaka chun um la, chutaka inthawk chun khâwlai dang khawm suok naw rawh.
I suok ni, Kidron vadung i kân ni le le chun i thi ngei ding a nih ti hre raw khai, chun, i thisen chu nangma lu chunga ngei um a tih,” a ta.
Simei chun lal kuomah,“An dik ie, lal ka puin a hril ang chun i siehlaw hin thaw pei a tih,” a ta. Chun, Simei chu Jerusalema chun sâwt rei chu a um a.
Chun, kum thum ân vawi hnung chun Simei siehlawhai pahni chu Gath khaw lal Maaka naupa Akis kuomah an zâm a. Chun, “Ngai ta, i siehlawhai chu Gath khuoah an um,” tiin Simei chu an hril a.
Simei chu a tho a, a sabengtung chu a buotsai a, siehlawhai zawng dingin Gath khuoa Akis kuoma chun a fe ta a; chun, Simei chun Gath khuoa inthawk chun a siehlawhai chu a va ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, Simei chu Gath khuoah a va fe a, Jerusalemah a hung nâwk tah, ti Solomon chu an hril a.
Chun, lal chun Simei chu ân kotir a, a kuomah, “ ‘I suok ni, ram danga i suok ni le lein i thi ngei ding a nih,’ ti khan
Iengdinga
Chun, lal ma chun Simei kuomah, “I lungril sûng rîtlozie, ka pa David chunga i thawziehai kha i hriet vawng a, chuongchun,
Lal Solomon ruok chu malsâwmin um a ta, David lalṭhungpha chu
Chuongchun, lal chun Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu thu a pêk a, ama chu a va thaw a, a that ta a. Chuongchun, ram chu Solomon kuta suknghetin a um ta a.
Chun, Solomon chun Aigupta lal Pharao le inkungkeina a siem a, Pharao naunu a nei a, ama in le
Mipuihai chu bâwlhmunahai an inthâwi el hlak a, chu hma chun
Solomon chun
Chun, lal chu inthâwi dingin Gibeon khuoah a fe a, chu chu bâwlhmun ropuitak a ni si a; Solomon chun chu maichâm chunga chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân sâng khat zet ân hlân a.
Chun, Gibeon khuoa chun zânah

Solomon chun, “I siehlaw ka pa David kha i mithmua thutak le, felnaa leh, lungril indiktak puta a um ang pei khan nang chun a kuomah lunginsietna nasatak în langtir a, nangin hi lunginsietna nasatak hi a ta dingin i sie pêk a, a lalṭhungphaa ṭhung ding naupa i pêk a, vawisûna a hung um ta ang ngei hin.
Chuongchun, aw
I siehlaw hi i mihai i thlanghai, mi tamtak, an tam leia tiem sêng ruollo le, a zât hriet sêng ruol lohai lai hin a um a na.
Chuongchun, i mihai rorêlpêkna dingin i siehlaw hi hrietna lungril hung pe la, a sie le a ṭha ka thlier theina dingin, i mi hieng zât zozai hi tuin am ro rêlpêk thei a ta le?” a ta.
Chun, Solomonin chu thil chu a hni leiin, chu thuhril chun

Chun, Pathien chun a kuomah, “Nangin i ta dinga dam sâwtna hni lo a, hieng ang hi i hni lem leiin le, i ta dinga hausakna khawm hni lo a, i hmêlmahai thina ding khawm hni lo a, i ta dinga rorêl thiemna i hni leiin, ngai ta, i hni ang chun ka thaw ta a;
ngai ta, varna le hrietna lungril ka pêk che a nih; chuongchun, i hmaah nangma ang hrim hrim tukhawm an um naw a, i hnunga khawm nanga ang hrim hrim chu tukhawm hung um ta naw bawk an tih.
Chun, i hni naw hausakna le ropuina khawm ka pêk bawk che; Chuongchun, i dam sûngin lalhai lai chun nanga ang hrim hrim um naw ni hai.
I pa Davidin a hraw anga, ka thuruothai le ka thupêkhai pawm dinga ka lampuihai i hraw chun indam sâwttir bawk ka ti che,” a ta.
Nuhmei pahni nawchizawr, lal kuoma chun an hung a, ama hmaah an hang ngîr a.
Chun, nuhmei pakhat chun, “Aw ka lalpa, hi nuhmei le hin in khata um ve ve kan na, chu ina a um ve lai chun nau ka nei a.
Chun, ka nau nei ni thum hnunga chun hi nuhmei khawm hin a nei ve a; um hmunkhat kan na, chu ina um keini pahni chau naw chu, chu ina chun tukhawm mikhuol um an um naw a.
Chun, hi nuhmei nau hi zânah a lo thi a; a delhlum a nih.
Chuongchun, zân lai chun a tho a, i suoknu hi a in kârin ka naupa ka kuoma um chu a lâk a, a pawm a, a nau thi chu a mîn pawmtir a.
A zînga zîngkâra ka nau nêne pe dinga ka hang tho chun a thi a lo ni zing el a, nisienkhawm, zîngkâra ka hang en chieng chun, ngai ta, ka naupa, ka inei kha a lo ni ta dêr da el a,” a ta.

Nuhmei dang chun, “Ni lo, a dam lem hi ka naupa a na, a thi hi i naupa a nih,” a ti ve a. Pakhat chun, “Ni lo, a thi hi i naupa a na, a dam hi keia naupa a nih,” a lo ti tlat bawk a. Chuong ang chun lal hmaa chun an hril ve ve a.
Chuongchun, lal chun, “Pakhatin, ‘A dam lem hi ka naupa a na, a thi hi i naupa a nih,’ a ti a, chun, pakhatin, ‘Ni lo, a thi hi i naupa a na, a dam hi ka naupa a nih,’ a ti bawk si a,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Kâwlhnâm mi hung lapêk ta u,” a ta. Chuongchun, kâwlhnâm chu lal hmaa chun an hung lâk a.
Chun, lal chun, “Nautê a dam kha tum hni insuo unla, a chenve chu pakhat kha pe unla, a chenve chu pakhat kha pe ro,” a ta.

Chuongchun, nautê dam lem a nu chun nautê chu a lainat êm êm el si a; lal kuoma chun, “Aw ka lalpa, nautê dam hi ama kha pe el rawh, a that chu that lul naw raw khai,” a ta. Pakhat lem chun, “Chang bîk naw tawp ka tih, nang khawma chang bîk naw bawk i tih, tanbawng el ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal chun a dawn a, “Nautê dam kha a hmasanu kha pe ro, that dêr naw ro, ama ngei kha a nu a ni kha,” a ta.
Chun, Israelhai po po chun chu thua lal rorêl dân chu an lo hriet a; lal chu an ṭi ta hle el a; rorêlna dinga Pathien varna amaa chun a um ti an hriet ta si a.
Lal Solomon chu Israelhai po po chungah lalin a um ta a.
Hienghai hi a mi lien neihai chu an nih: Zadok naupa Azaria chu thiempu a na, Sisa naupahai Elihoreph le Ahija chu lekha ziektu an na,
Ahilud naupa Jehosaphat chu chanchin ziektu a na.
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu sipai hotu a na; Zadok le Abiathar chu thiempu an nih;
Nathan naupa Azaria chu hotuhai chunga mi a na; Nathan naupa Zabud chu thiempu le lal ruolpa a na,
Ahisar chu insûng tieng hotu a na; Abda naupa Adoniram chu sinthawa ruoi luihai hotu a nih.

Solomon chun Israel po pohai chunga chun hotu sâwmpahni a nei a, chuonghai chun lal ta ding le a sûngkuohai ta ding chun fâk ding an ngaituo hlak a, mi pakhatin kum khatah thla khat pei fâk ding a ngaituo ding a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an hminghai chu a nih: Ephraim tlâng ramah Ben-hur;
Makaz khuoa dâm, Saalbim khuoa dâm, Beth-semes khuoa dâm, Elonbeth-hanan khuoa dâm chun Ben-dekar a na;
Aruboth rama chun Ben-hesed a na, ama chun Soko le Hepher ram po po a chang sa a;
Dor zosâng ram po poah, Ben-abinadab a na; ama chun Solomon naunu Taphath chu nuhmeiah a nei a;
Taanak khuo le Megiddo khuoa dâm, Jezreel khaw hnuoi Zarethan khaw bula um Beth-sean biel po poa dâm, Beth-seana inthawka Abelmeholah-a dâm, Jokmeam ram dep chenin Ahilud naupa Baana a na;

Ramoth-gilead khuoah Bengeber, ama chun Manasse naupa Jair khuo, Gilead rama umhai chu a chang sa a; Basan rama Argob biel, khaw ropuitak tak khaw sâwmruk, kul le a kalna dâr tluon neihai khawm a chang sa a;
Mahanaim khuoah Iddo naupa Ahinadab a na;
Naphtali ramah Ahimaz a na; ama khawm chun Solomon naunu Basemath chu nuhmeiah a nei a;
Aser le Bealoth khuohaia chun Husai naupa Baana a na;
Issakar ramah Parua naupa Jehosaphat a na;
Benjamin ramah Ela naupa Simei a na;
Amorhai lal Sihon le Basan lal Og ram Gilead ramah Uria naupa Geber; chu rama chun hotu pakhat a um.
Judahai le Israelhai chu tuisuoriet pang ṭieu phaiphin zât zetin an tam a: an fâkin an dâwn a, hlimtakin an um hlak a.
Solomon ni khat fâk khawp chu beiphit inditak tekhâwng sâwmthum le, beiphit narân tekhâwng sâwmruk a nih;
chun, bâwngchal thâutak sâwm, bâwngchal tla mi sâwmhni leh, berâm za leh, chuong naw khawm chu sakhihai dâm, sangaihai dâm, sakhi chalhai dâm, âr châwm thâuhai leh a nih.
Vadung râltieng ram po po, Tipsaa inthawka Gaza chenin; Vadung râla lalhai po po chunga chun ân lal a; a vêla mihai po po le chun râlmuongin an um hlak a.
Chun, Solomon dam sûng po chun Judahai le Israelhai chu Dana inthawka Beer-seba khuo chenin mi tin mâni grêphrui bula le mâni theichang kûng bula chun lungmuongtakin an um seng a.
Chuong hotuhai chun mâni chan thla peiah Solomon le lal Solomon dawkâna hung awt vetuhai po po fâk ding chu an ngaituo hlak a; pêk kim lo an nei ngai nawh.
Mi tinin an thaw dinga ruot ang peiin an umna ding hmuna chun sakawrhai le ran tlân hrâttakhai ta dingin buṭei le bupâwlhai an hung siekhâwl hlak a.
Chun, Pathienin Solomon chu varna le hrietna nasatak le, lungril lienna tuipui kama phaiphin ang el a nasa a pêk a.
Solomon varna chun khawsak nauhai po po varna le Aigupta mihai varna po po chu a khûm vawng a.

Thing chanchin hai khawm, Lebanon tlânga sidar thinga inthawka kula hung ṭo suok hussop chenin a hril hlak a; sa chanchin dâm, vate chanchin dâm, bawkinvâka lâwn mi chanchin dâm, nga chanchin dâm khawm a hril thei a.
Chuongchun, Solomon varna chanchin hre taphawthai chu khawvêla lalhai po poa inthawkin chi tina mi a varna ngai dingin an hung hlak a.
Chun, Tura lal Hiram chun Solomon kuoma chun a siehlawhai a tir a, a pa aia lal dingin hriek an nâl ti a lo hriet si a; Hiram chu David ngainatu a ni rawp hlak hrim a.
Chun, Solomon chun Hiram kuoma chun,
“Ka pa David khan
Tu ruok hin chu

Chuongchun, Lebanon tlânga mi sidar thinghai mi phûrpêk dingin thu pe la, ka siehlawhai khawm i siehlawhai lai hung ṭhang vêng an ta; chun, i siehlawhai hlaw ding chu i hril ang taphawtin pe pei ka ti che; Zidon mihai anga thing phûr thiem keini lai tukhawm an um nawh ti i hriet si a,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chun, Hiramin Solomon thu a lo hriet chun a lâwm ta êm êm el a, “Hieng mi tamtak chunga rorêl dinga naupa vartak David kuoma petu
Chun, Hiram chun Solomon kuomah, “I thu mi hung incha chu ka lo hriet a, sidar thing thu le fâr thing chu i mamaw ang peiin lo thâwng ka tih.

Ka siehlawhaiin Lebanon tlânga inthawkin tuisuoriet chenin hung la thlâng an ta; chun, i hmun mi ruotpêk dinga tuisuorieta tawl dingin intêltir ka ta; chun, chu hmuna chun insuttir ka ta, nangin lo lâng i ta; chun, nang khawma ka sûngkuohai fâk ding tumin ka mamaw chu i lo phuhrûk ve thung ding annâwm,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chuongchun, Hiram chun sidar thing le fâr thing chu Solomon chu a mamaw ang ang chun a pêk a.
Chun, Solomon chun Hiram chu a sûngkuohai fâk dingin bu tekhâwng sîng hni le hriek sâwr tekhâwng sâwmhni a pêk a, chu chu Solomonin kum tina Hiram a pêk ang dân chu a nih.
Chun,
Chun, lal Solomon chun Israel mihai po po laia chun mi sinthawa ruoi lui pâwl a siem a; ruoi lui pâwl chu mi sîng thum an nih.
Lebanona chun thla khata inthlâk peiin sîng khat a tir hlak a, thla khat Lebanona chun an hang um a, thla hni chu anni in tieng, Adoniram chu sinthawa sawr luihai hotu a nih.
Chun, Solomon chun thil phur mi sîng sari le, lung sut mi sîng riet tlânghaia chun a nei a;
Chuonghai chu tiem lovin Solomon chun a sin chunga hotubîk, sinthaw vêngtu sâng thum le za thum a nei bawk a.
Chun, lal thupêk angin lungphûm chu lung sutsaa rem dingin lung lientak tak el, lung man tamtak takhai an hung lâk a.
Chun, in bâwltuhai Solomon mihai le Hiram mihai le Gebal mihai chun lunghai chu an sut a, in bâwlna ding chun thing le lunghai chu an buotsai a.
Israel thlahai Aigupta rama an suok chena inthawk kum za li le kum sâwmrietna kum, Israelhai chunga Solomon inlal kum lina, Ziv thla, thla hninaa chun
Chun, Solomonin
Chun, chu ina Hmun inthieng hmaa tuolpûk chu a in khang tieng chen tawng sâwmhnia sei a na, a hma tienga mi khang tieng chu tawng sâwm a nih.
Chun, ina chun tukverhai a sûnga inthawka a puotienga chîn zuihai chu a siem a.
Chun, in bang vêlin, biekna in bang vêla khawm, biekna hmun inthieng bang vêla khawm chun, chu in bang sik chun in sâwng nei a bâwl a; chun, a vêl el chun pindanhai a siem a;

a sâwng hnuoi hnung tak chu a khang tieng tawng nga a na, a laia mi chu a khang tieng tawng ruk a na, a pathumna chu a khang tieng tawng sari a nih; kalkhanghai chu in banga chun rawl ngai loin, a puotienga chun a vêlin a bang hrûla chun ân nghatna a siem a.
Chun, in chu an bâwl lai chun, lung a chona hmuna sut sa vawnga bâwl a na, chuongchun, an bâwl sûng po chu tubau ri dâm, hreipui ri dâm, thîr hriemhrei ri hrim hrim chu ina chun hriet a ni naw a.
Pindan lailungtakhai kawtkhâr chu, chu in changtieng panga chun a um a, a laia chun kailâwn inhera hin an lâwn kai a; chun, a lailunga inthawk chun a pathumnaah.
Chuongchun, in chu a hang bâwl a, a zo ta a, in chu sidar tlungpûm le a phêkin ân khum a.
Chun, a in sâwng neihai chu in sik vawngin tawng nga senga insângin a bâwl a; chuonghai chu in le chun sidar thinga zawm a nih.
Chun,

“Hi in bâwl lai mêk chungchâng thu hi ka thuruothai i pawm a, ka rorêlhai i zâwm a, ka thupêk po pohai zâwm dinga i pawm phawt chun, i pa David kuoma ka lo hril tah ka thu kha i chungah sukdet ka tih.
Chun, Israel mihai laia hin chêng ka ta, ka mi Israelhai hi thlathlam naw ning ah,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun in chu a bâwl a, a zo ta a.
In sûng tienga bang ding chun sidar thingphêk a hmang a, a ṭuonga inthawka a inchung thuo bang chen chun thingphêk a bel vawng a, a ṭuonga chun fâr thing phêk a pha sa a.
Chun, in chawrtieng pang tawng sâwmhni chu a ṭuonga inthawka a bang chenin sidar thingphêkhaiin a siem vawng a, a biekna hmun, Hmun Inthieng tak ta ding khawm chun a sûngtienga chun a hmang a.
Chun, biekna hmun hma tieng biek in sûng chu a dung tawng sâwmli a na.
Chun, insûng tienga chun a kumûm le a pâr, pâr lima ker mawi sidar thing a um a, a rêng chun sidar thing vawng a nih; lung hrim hrim ân lang naw a.
Chun,

Chun, chu hmun inthiengtak chu a dung tieng tawng sâwmhni, a khang tieng tawng sâwmhni, ân sâng tieng tawng sâwmhni a nih; chu chu rângkachak hlirhlakin ân luon a; chun, sidar maichâm chu ân luon bawk a.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun chu in sûng tieng chu rângkachak inthiengin ân luon vawng a; chun, hmun inthiengtak hma tieng chu rângkachak khaidiethaiin a daidan a; chu chu rângkachakin ân luon a.
Chun, hmun inthienga chun tawng sâwmhni ve vea insângin cherub pahni Oliv thingin a siem a.
Cherub thla pakhat chu tawng nga a na, cherub thla khingtieng chu tawng nga bawk a nih; thla pakhat hmawra inthawka thla khingtieng hmawr inkâr chu tawng sâwm a nih.
Cherub pakhat insângtieng chu tawng sâwm a na, cherubhai chu intie chie le pieng dân inang ve ve a nih.
Cherub pakhat insâng tieng chu tawng sâwm a na, cherub pakhat khawm chu, chu chen bawk chu a nih.

Chun, cherubhai chu insûng ril lema chun a sie a; chun, cherubhai thla chu ân zar a, pakhat thla chun bang khingtieng a va tâwk a, cherub pakhat thla khawm chun bang khingtieng chu a tâwk bawk a; chu in lailungtaka chun an thla le an thla chu ân tâwk a.
In bang po po chu a vêlin cherubhai intûm thing le pâr par ta sa limhai leh, ker mawiin sûngtieng le a puotienga chun a siem a.
A in ṭuong chu sûngtieng le a puotienga chun rângkachak inthiengin ân luon a.
Chun, hmun inthiengtak lûtna dinga chun Oliv thingin kawtkhâr a siem a, kawtkhâr lu chung le kawtkhâr bienghai chu a bang hmun ngaa ṭhea hmun khat tie a nih.

Chuongchun, Oliv thingin kawtkhâr pahni a siem a, chutaka chun cherubhai, intûm thing le pâr par tasahai lim dâm ker mawiin a siem a, chuong chu rângkachakin ân luon a; chun, cherubhai le intûm thinghai chu rângkachak a nâl a.
Chun, biekin lûtna dingin bang hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat ruolin Oliv kawtkhâr ban a siem bawk a,
fâr thing kawtkhâr pahni leh; kawtkhâr pakhata phêk hni chu thlep thei a na, kawtkhâr pakhata phêk hnihai khawm chu thlep thei ma a nih.
Chuonghaia chun cherubhai, intûm thinghai pâr par tasahai lim chu a ker a, chuong ker mawihai chu nâmtakin rângkachakin ân luon a.
Biekin huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem chu lung sut sâwng thum le sidar thingphêk thuo khatin a siem a.
A kum lina Ziv thlaa chun
chun, kum sâwm le kum khatna Bul thla, thla rietnaah in chu remruot ang chiein, a iengkim chu zo vawng a na. Chuongchun, kum sari sûng a bâwl a nih.
Solomon chun ama in chu kum sâwm le kum thum a bâwl a, a in chu a zo vawng a.
Lebanon Rampui In sidar ban tlar li, ban chunga sidar thingphêk chunga chun a bâwl bawk a; a dungtieng chu tawng za a na, a khangtieng chu tawng sâwmnga a na, ân sângtieng chu tawng sâwmthum a nih.
Chun, banhai sâwmli panga chunga innghat pindanhai chunga chun sidar thingphêkhaia inkhum a na, banhai chu tlar khata chun sâwm le panga pei a nih.
Tlar thumin tukver a um a, var le varhai chu ân ep vawng a.
Kawtkhârhai le banhai po po chu thingphêkin kil li neia siem a na, var le varhai chu tlar thumin ân ep vawng a.
Chun, tuolpûk chu ban neiin a siem a, a dungtieng chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khangtieng chu tawng sâwmthum a na; chun, chuong hmaahai chun tuolpûk a siem a, banhai le a hmaa lûtna kailâwnhai leh.
Chun, a rorêlna ding lalṭhungpha tuolpûk, rorêlna tuolpûk chu a siem bawk a, chu chu ṭuong khingtienga inthawka khingtieng chena sidar thinga inkhum a nih.

Chuong po po chu lung man tamtak tak, a huntâwk ang chiea sut, âtnaa âta bâwl a na, a sûngtieng khawm, a puotieng khawm, lungphûma inthawka a lêr chenin; chun, chuong ang bawkin tuol tieng chun inhuon sûng tuolzâwl khawlai lientak chenin.
Chun, lungphûmhai chu lung man tamtak tak, lung lientak tak tawng sâwm dâm, tawng riet dâma rem a nih.
Chun, chu chung tieng chu lung man tamtak tak, lung a huntâwk ang chiea sut le sidar thing a na.
A vêlin inhuon sûng tuolzâwl lientak chu lung sut sâwmthum le Sidar thingphêk thuo khata inhuon a na;
Chun, lal Solomon chun mi a tir a, Tura khuoa inthawk chun Hiram a ko a.

Ama chu Naphtali hnam hmeithai nau a na, a pa chu Tura khuoa mi dâr suttu a na, ama dâr sut kawnga hrim hrim chun a varin a hrietthiemin a themthiem hle el a. Lal Solomon kuoma chun a fe a, a sin po po chu a thawpêk vawng a.
Dâr ban pahni a sûng kawrawngin, tawng sâwm pariet ve vea insângin a siem a, a lienzie chu tawng sâwmpahni ve ve le inchi li ve vea saa inkuol a nih.
Ban sîpa sie dingin dâr sung bâwk pahni a siem a, bâwk pakhat insâng tieng chu tawng nga a na, bâwk pakhat insâng tieng khawm chu tawng nga bawk a nih.
Ban sîpa bâwkhaia chun ṭiel chikchek le, inher chîlchielhai hi a um a, bâwk pakhata chun pasari a na, pakhat danga khawm chun pasari bawk.

Chuongchun, banhai chu a siem a, chuong ban sîpa a bâwkhai tuomna ding chun ṭiel chikchek theibufaihai leh pakhat chunga chun a vêlin tlar hni a um a; chuong ang bawk chun bâwk pakhat chunga khawm chun ân umtir a.
Chun, tuolpûka ban sîphaia bâwka chun lili lim hi a chuong a, tawng li a nih.
Chun, ban pahni sîpa bâwkhaia chun a reia ṭiel chikchek bul ela chun theibufaihai lim a um bawk a; chun, theibufaihai chu chuong bâwkhaia chun za hni ve vea intlarin a um a.
Chun, biek in tuolpûkhaia chun banhai chu ân ngîrtir a, changtieng ban chu ân ngîr a, a hminga chun Jakin ân bûk a, chun, vawitieng ban chu ân ngîr a, a hminga chun Boaz ân bûk a.
Chun, ban sîpa chun lili lim a chuong a; chuongchun, ban tieng sin chu zo a ni ta a.
Chun, dâr tuizêng, a reia inthawka a rei khingtieng chena tawng sâwm tla, ân sâng tieng tawng nga a sung a; a rei chu tawng sâwmthum biel vêl a nih.
A rei hnuoia chun kumûm lim hin a vêlsuok a, tawng sâwm a na, tuizêng rei vêla chun a um a; chuong kumûmhai chu tlar hniin an um a; sung sa nghâl an nih.

Chu chu bâwngchal sâwm le pahni chungah ân nghat a, pathumin hmartieng an ngha a, pathumin thlangtieng an ngha a, pathumin simtieng an ngha a, pathumin saktieng an ngha a. Chun, zêng chu an chungah ân ṭhut a, an mei tieng chun sûng tieng chu a ngha seng a;
kutpha bawka sa a nih; a rei chu lili pâr ang, no rei anga siem a na, bath sâng hni keng a nih.
Chun, inṭhutna sâwm dârin a siem a, inṭhutna pakhat seizie chu tawng li a na, a khangtieng chu tawng li bawk a na, ân sâng tieng chu tawng thum a nih.
Chun, inṭhutnahai siem dân chu hieng ang hi a nih: chuonghai chun khur a nei a, a khurhai chu a reihai inkâra chun a um a;
chun, a reihai inkâra khurhaia chun sakeibakneihai, bâwngchalhai, cherubhai a chuong a; a rei chunga chun innghatna a um a; chun, sakeibakneihai le bâwngchal hnuoia chun cheimawinahai a um nghien a.

Chun, inṭhutnahaia chun dâr tawlailîr pali le dâr kalru a um seng a, a kihai palia chun ân nghatna a um seng a, insâwpna bêl hnuoi tieng chun ân nghatna sunga sung a um a, a rei senga chun cheimawina a um seng a.

Chun, a suonkuol bau rei chu tawng khat tla a na, a rei tlâng chu suonkuol anga chêng a na, tawng khat le a chenve a nih, chun, a rei tlânghai chu cheimawi a na, a khurhai chu kil li a na, a chêng naw a.
Chun, tawlailîr palihai chu a khur hnuoi tiengahai chun a um a; chun, tawlailîr kalruhai chu inṭhutnaahai chun a um a, tawlailîr insâng tieng chu tawng khat le a chenve a nih.
Chu tawlailîrhai siem dân chu sakawr tawlailîr ke siem dân ang hi a na, a tlungzamhai, a suonkuolhai, a sunkalnahai, a laibâwkhai chu sung vawng a nih.
Chun, inṭhutna kil li senga chun innghatna pali a um a, chuong innghatnahai chu inṭhutna le chun pumkhat vawng an nih.
Chun, inṭhutna chunga chun suonkuol, tawng chenvea insâng hi a um a, inṭhutna chunga ân ṭhutna kalhai le a khurhai chu pumkhat vawng an nih.
Chun, ân ṭhutna kephêkahai le, a khurahai chun a lienzie ang peiin cherubhai, sakeibakneihai, intûm thinghai ân chuongtir a, a vêl chun cheimawina hi a um seng a.
Chuong ang vawng chun inṭhutna sâwmhai chu a siem a, a rêng chun pakhata sung an ni vawng a, intie seng, siem dân inang vawng an nih.
Chun, inṭhutnahai chu in changtieng chun panga ân ṭhut a, vawitieng panga chun panga, chun, tuizêng chu in changtieng panga saktienga sim nghain ân ṭhut a.
Chun, Hiram chun insâwpna bêlhai, vutluohai, maihûnhai a siem a.
Chuongchun, Hiram chun
chu tuomna ṭiel chikchek ta dinga theibufai za lihai dâm, ban sîpa bêl anga inbâwk pahni tuomna dinga ṭiel chikchek ve ve ta dinga theibufai tlar hnihai kha;
chun, inṭhutna sâwm le inṭhutna chunga insâwpna bêl sâwmhai dâm,
tuizêng pakhat le tuizêng hnuoia sebâwngchal sâwm le pahnihai dâm,
bêlhai, vutluohai le maihûnhai le dâm, chuong bûr le bêlhai po po Hiramin
Jordan phaizâwlah, Sukkoth le Zarethan inkâra bepil hmunah a nih lalpa chun a sung chu.
Chun, Solomonin chuong , bûr le bêlhai po po chu a tam êm leiin bûk suok lovin a sie el a, dâr bûk zât chu hriet suok ruol a ni nawh.

nohai, khâwnvar puon chepnahai, maihûnhai, haihawhai, riminhnik thlêng, meilâknahai, rângkachak hlîr hlak vawngin; in sûngril lem, hmun inthiengtak kawtkhârahai le, in (biek in chu) kawtkhâr inbûknahai chu rângkachakin.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Israel upahai le, an hnam lusahai po po dâm, Israel thlahai sûngkuo upahai chu Jerusalem khuoa lal Solomon kuoma chun David khawpui Ziona inthawkin
Chun, Israel mipui po po chu Ethanim thla (thla sarinaa chun) ruoiṭhenaah lal Solomon kuoma chun an inkhâwm ṭeu tâwl a.
Chun, Israel upahai po po chu an hung a, thiempuhai chun bâwm chu an zâwn a.
Chun, lal Solomon le Israel mi pungkhâwm po po, a kuoma hung inkhâwmhai chu bâwm hmaa chun an um tâwl a; berâm le bâwngchal a tam leia tiem sêng ruol lo le a zât hriet sêng ruol lo chun an inthâwi a.
Chuongchun, thiempuhai chun
Cherubhai chun bâwm umna chung zâwna chun an thlahai an zâr zing si a; cherubhai chun bâwm le a zâwnfunghai chu an huop vawng a.

Chun, a zâwnfunghai chu a sei khawp a, a zâwnfung hmawrhai chu biekna hmun hma, hmun inthienga inthawk chun ân hmu thei a: tuola inthawk ruok chun ân lang nawh; tu chen hin chutaka chun a la um zing a nih.
Chun, thiempuhai chu hmun inthienga inthawka an hung suok phingle chun
I chêngna ding in, kumkhuoa i umna ding in ka bâwlpêk ta che a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, lal chu a hnungtieng chun a ngha a, Israel hung pungkhâwmhai po po chu mal a sâwm a, chuongchun, Israelhai pungkhâwmhai po po chu an ngîr ṭhuop a.
Chun, ama chun, “

‘Aigupta rama inthawka ka mi Israelhai ka ṭhuoi suok nia inthawkin Israelhai hnam laia khâwlai khuo khawm hi ka hming umna dinga in bâwlna dingin ka la thlang ngai naw a, amiruokchu, ka mi Israelhai hotu ding chun David hi ka thlang a nih,’ tia lo hriltu ama kut ngeia hung sukpuitlingtu hi inpâkin um raw se.
Nisienlakhawm,
Chun,
Chutaka chun bâwm umna ding hmun chu ka lo ruot ta a, chutaka chun Aigupta rama inthawka a ṭhuoi suok laia ei puhai kuoma a lo thlung,
Chun, Solomon chu
“Aw
anih, nangin i bauin thu i hril a, i kutin i hung inhlawtlingtir ta a, vawisûna hung um ta ngei ang hin.
Chuongchun, aw Israelhai Pathien, nangin i siehlaw ka pa David kuoma thu i lo hril ta kha lunginsiettakin hung intlungtir ngei rawh.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chu hnuoia hin a um ngût ding am chu? Ngai ta, vân le vânhai vâna khawm i keng naw a na, hi ka in bâwla lem hin chu i vân leng naw nasa âwm ngei de!
Nisienlakhawm, aw
Chun, i siehlaw le i mi Israelhai hin hi hmun tieng nghaa an ṭawngṭai pha chun an hninahai chu lo ngaipêk hlak la, anih, i chêngna hmun vâna inthawk chun lo ngai la; chun, lo ngaiin ngaidam la.
“Mi tukhawma a vênghai chunga thil suksuolin, ṭawng inkhâmtir hiel lo ṭûl sienla, hi ina i maichâm hmaa hin hung inkhâm sienla;

nangin vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, châng la, mi suol chu ama lu chunga ngei a um dân innghata thiemnaw inchangtirin, mi fel chu a felna ang anga inhlawtir a, thiem inchangtirin i siehlawhai hi ro rêlpêk rawh.
“I mi Israelhai hin i chunga thil an suksuol leia hmêlmahai hmaa an lo tlâwm a, nanga tieng an hung ngha nâwk a, i hming an inpâk a, hi ina ṭawngṭaia thil an hung hni chun,
nangin vâna inthawkin lo ngaipêk la, i mi Israelhai suolna chu ngaidam la, an puhai ram i pêka chun ṭhuoi nâwk rawh.
I chunga thil an suksuol leia, vân a ping a, ruo dâm a hung sûr naw pha chun hi hmun tieng hi nghaa an ṭawngṭai a, i hming an inpâk a, anni i sukrimsi leia an suolhai an sim chun;
nangin vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, i siehlawhai le i mi Israelhai suolna hi ngaidam la, an fena ding lampui ṭha khîkhmu pei la, chun, i mihai an rochan dinga i pêk rama hin ruo hung insûrtir bawk la.

Kan rama hin ṭâm a hung tla a, hri dâm a hung inlêng a, ṭâwlna amanih, hmawnna amanih, khâuṭhikṭhi amanih, tuktulung amanih a hung um a, an hmêlmahaiin an kawtkhâr bulhaia an hung inhuol a, hri iengkhawm, natna iengkhawm a hung tlung chun;
i mi Israelhai po po laia mâni lungrila hri uma hre a, hi in tieng hi nghaha kut hung phar taphawthaiin ṭawngṭaina le hnina an hung inhlân hrim hrim chu,
i umna vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, ngaidam la, châng la, nang an lungril hretu, mi tin an um dân ang peiin inhlawtir la, (nang chu chu, nang chau hi mihriem nauhai po po lungril hretu i ni si a;)
Kan puhai i pêk rama an um sûng po hin an ṭi theina ding chein.
“I mi Israelhai ni lo hnam dang mi, nangma hming leia ram hla taka inthawka hunghai chungchâng thu khawm hi;
(i hming ropuitak hai, i kut hrâttak hai, i bân i phar thuhai hi an la hriet tâwl ding a ni si a;) chuong mihai chun hi in tieng ngha a, an hung ṭawngṭai pha chun;

nangin i umna vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, hnam dang mi chun a hni ang che chu lo thawpêk rawh; i mi Israelhai ang bawka khawvêla hnam tinin i hming an hriet a, an ṭi che a, hi ka in bâwl hin i hming a put a nih ti an hung hriet theina dingin.
“I mihaiin an hmêlmahai chu i tirna tieng poa chun thaw hai sienla, i khawpui thlang tieng ngha le, i hming dinga in ka lo bâwl tieng ngha a
an ṭawngṭaina le an hnina chu nangin vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, a chungthuah hung châng rawh.
I chungah thil an suksuol a, (tukhawm thil suksuol naw an um si naw a) an chungah i lunginsen a, hmêlma kuta i pêk a, hmêlma ram hlataka manih, hnaitaka manih khawma sala an ṭhuoi a;
sala an ṭhuoina rama an inngaituo suok a, an insîr a, ‘Thil ei lo suksuol a, indiknawtak le suoltakin ei lo thaw a ni tah,’ tia an hung ngên che a,

an hmêlma sala ṭhuoituhai rama an lungril tak le an lungvar taka nanga tieng an hung ngha nâwk a, an puhai i pêk ram tieng le, i khawpui i thlang tieng le i hming dinga ka in bâwl tieng nghaa i kuoma an ṭawngṭai chun;
an ṭawngṭaina le an hnina chu nangin i umna vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, an chungthua chun châng la;
chun, i mi i chunga thil suksuoltuhai le nanga chunga an bawsietna kawnga an bawsietnahai po po chu ngaidam la; sala ṭhuoituhai chun anni an lunginsiet theina dingin lunginsietna inneitir la;
i mi i rochan, Aigupta rama inthawka, thîr rawtuina sûnga inthawka i ṭhuoisuokhai an ni si a,
an ko taphawt chea anni i lo ngai dinga i siehlaw hnina le i mi Israel hnina tienga i mit în lên theina dingin;
Aw
Chun, Solomonin
Chun, a ngîr a, râwl inringtakin Israel mi pungkhâwmhai po po chu mal a sâwmpêk a:
Chun, a siehlaw thua le a mi Israelhai thua hin a mi zir ang peiin a châng theina dingin hieng ka thuhril,
Chuongchun, a thuruot anga um ding le, a thupêkhai zâwm dingin
Chun, Solomonin ân hlân inremna thilinhlân dinga inthâwina bâwngchal sîng hni le sâng hni le berâm nuoi khat le sîng hni ân hlân a. Chuong ang chun lal le Israel thlahai po po chun
Chu ni ma chun lal chun
Chuongchun, chu ṭum chun Solomon le Israelhai po po, mipui pungkhâwmhai tamtak, Hamath khaw lûtnaa inthawka Aigupta ram vadung chena mihai chu
A ni riet ni chun mipuihai chu ân ṭintir a; chun, lal chu mal an sâwm a, chuongchun,
Chun, Solomon chun
Chun,
Chun, nang khawm hi thu ka pêk ang taphawt chea thaw dinga i pa David um anga lungril ṭhatak put le lungril indiktak puta ka mithmua i uma, ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai i pawm zing chun.

Amiruokchu, nangniin amanih, in thlahaiin amanih in mi zui chu in mi kîrsan a, ka thupêkhai le ka thuruothai kân hriettirhai cheu hi in pawm naw a, pathien danghai rawng dâm in va bâwl a, in va biek chun,

Israelhai hi ram ka pêka inthawk hin sukbohmang ka ta; chun, hi in ka hming dinga ka sukthieng ta sa hi ka mithmu phâk nawah sawnhmang dai ka tih; chuongchun, Israelhai hi hnam tinrênghai laia chun tielna le a se tieng hrilkhinaa hmang la nîng an ta;
Chun, mihaiin, ‘
Chun, Solomon chun in pahni,
(Tura lal Hiram chun Solomon chu sidar thinghai, fâr thinghai, rângkachakhai a mamaw taphawt a tum vawng a na,) lal Solomon chun Hiram chu Galili rama khaw sâwmhni a pêk a.
Chun, Hiram chu Turaa inthawk chun Solomonin khuo a pêkhai chu en dingin a suok a, a ditzâwng a ni naw hle a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka unaupa, hieng i khaw mi pêkhai hi ieng khuo am an ni tâwl leh?” a ta. Chuongchun, tu chen hin Kabul ram an ti tah a nih.
Chun, Hiram chun lal chu rângkachak talent za le sâwmhni a thawn a.
Lal Solomonin sinthawa ruoi lui pâwl a siemna san chu hi hi a nih;
Aigupta lal Pharao chu a hang fe a, Gezer khuo a hang lâk a, a raw a, chu khuoa um Kanaan mihai chu a that a, a naunu Solomon nuhmei chu thuom thilpêka a lo pêk tah a nih.
Chun, Solomon chun Gezer khuo dâm, Beth-horon khuo thlang hnung lem dâm,
Baalath khuo dâm, Israel rama thlalêr rama Tamar khuo dâm,

Solomonin thil siekhâwmna a nei khuo po po dâm, a tawlailîr siena khuo dâm, a sakawr chung chuong mihai siena khuohai dâm, Jerusalem khuoa dâm, Lebanona dâm, a rorêlna ram sûng po poa Solomonin ân hawitirna dinga siem a tumhai po po chu a lo siem tah a na.
Chun, Israel thlahai ni ve lo, Amor mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Jebus mihai a la um sunhai po po kha,
an thlahai chuong ramhaia la um, Israelhaiin an sukbohmang vawng thei nawhai laia chun Solomonin siehlaw, sinthawa sawr lui pâwl a siem a, tu chen hin a la nih.
Israel mihai ruok chu Solomon chun chuong ang siehlawa chun a siem ve naw a, indo mihai, a lusahai, a mi lienhai, a sipai hotuhai, a tawlailîr le a sakawr chung chuong mi hotuhai an ni lem a.
Chuonghai chu Solomona sinthaw chunga hotu bîk, za nga le sâwmnga, sinthaw vêngtuhai chu an nih.
Pharao naunu ruok chu David khawpuia inthawk chu ama in, Solomonin a bâwlpêka chun a hang fe ta a; chuongchun, Millo chu a bâwl ta a.
Chun, lal Solomon chun Edom rama Tuipui Sen panga Eloth bula um Ezion-geber hmuna chun lawng ruol a siem a.
Chun, Hiram chun a siehlaw lawng mihai, tuipuia châng ṭhang, lawnga Solomon siehlawhai fepui dingin a tir a.
Chuonghai chu Ophira chun an va fe a, chutaka mi chu rângkachak talent za li le sâwmhni an hung phur a, lal Solomon kuoma chun an hung intlun a.
Chun,

Chun, Jerusalem khuoah, hnung zuitu tamtak ṭhuoiin, thil rim inhnik le rângkachak tamtak le lunghluhai phur sanghâwngseihai ṭhuoiin a fe a; chun, Solomon kuom a tlung chun a lungrila a thu pai po po chu phawr fai rêtin ama a biek a.
Chun, Solomon chun a thu indawnhai po po chu a dawn fai vawng a, lal ihriet naw, a hrilfie thei naw hrim a um dêr naw a.
Chun, Seba lalnuin Solomon varzie po pohai, a in bâwl dâm,
a dawkâna fâk ding dâm, a upahai ṭhung dân dâm, a rawngbâwltuhai chângvêl dân dâm, an inchei dân dâm, a no inhlântuhai dâm,
Chuongchun, lal kuoma chun, “I thilthawhai le i varzie hai, keia rama inthawka ka lo hriethai kha thuthang indik tak a lo ni ngei hi tie.

Nisienlakhawm, keiin ka mit ngeia ka hung hmu hmakhat chun an hril chu ka lo awi naw a, chuongchun, ngai ta, a zâtve khawm an mi lo hril naw a nih, an hril ka lo hriet nêkin i varzie le i ṭhatzie a lo nasa hle lem a ni hi.
I mihai, hieng i siehlaw, i bula um rawpa i varna thu ngai zing zing hlakhai hi an va hamṭha de aw!
Chun, a hni sa naw Solomonin a pêk tihai naw khawm chu lal Solomon chun Seba lalnu chu a dit taphawt, a hni taphawthai chu a pêk a. Chuongchun, a rawihai leh a umna ram tieng chun a fe nâwk ta a.
sumdâwngtuhaia inthawka siechawi lâklût le, thil zawrtuhai sukhlâwk, Arab lalhai sie-chawi po po le ram awptuhaia inthawka lût tiem lovin.
Chun, lal Solomon chun rângkachak sut phêkin phaw lien za hni a siem a, phaw pakhat chun shekel za ruk a dit a nih.
Chun, rângkachak sut phêkin phaw dang za thum a siem a, phaw pakhat chun rângkachak maneh thum pei a ngai a; chuonghai chu lal chun Lebanon rampui ina chun a sie a.
Chun, lal chun saiha lalṭhungpha ropuitak a siem bawk a, chu chu rângkachak ṭha chi takin ân luon a.
Lalṭhungpha hang lâwnnaa chun kalbi paruk a um a, chu lalṭhungpha hnungtieng chun a hung inkûm a, a ṭhungna sîrtuoka chun a dona a um ve ve a, chun a dona bulhaia chun sakeibaknei pahni an ngîr a.
Chun, kalbi paruka chun a sîrtuokah sakeibaknei sâwm le pahni an ngîr a, chuong ang chu khâwlai rama khawm an siem ngai hrim hrim naw a.

Chun, lal Solomon nohai po po chu rângkachak vawng an na, chun, Lebanon Rampui Ina bûr le bêlhai po po khawm chu rângkachak hlîr hlak vawng an nih; tangkaruo hrim hrim a ṭhang nawh, Solomon dam lai chun, chu chu ieng hûa khawm an ngai nawh.

Lal chun tuipuia chun Hiram lawng ruol inkawppuitu ding Tarsis lawng ruol a nei a, Tarsis lawng ruol chun kum thum dan peiah rângkachak dâm, tangkaruo dâm, saiha dâm, zâwng dâm, ârâwnhai dâm, a hung phur hlak a.
Chuongchun, lal Solomon chun khawvêla lal po po chu hausaka le vara chun a khûm vawng a nih.
Pathienin a lungrila varna thu a siepêk chu ngai dingin khawvêla mi po pohai chun Solomon chu an hung pan huoi huoi hlak a.

Mi tinin lâwmman kum tina pêk bi neiin tangkaraw bûr le bêlhai, rângkachak bûr le bêlhai, puonhai dâm, râlthuomhai dâm, thil riminhnikhai dâm, sakawrhai dâm, sabengtung lien chi hai dâm an hung pêk hlak a.

Aigupta rama inthawka tawlailîr chu tangkaruo shekel za ruk peiin an suktlung hlak a, chun, sakawr chu tangkaruo shekel za le sâwmnga peiin; chuong ang bawk chun Hit mihai lalhai po po le Suria lalhai khawm an suktlung pêk hlak a nih.
Chuongchun, nuhmei za sari, lal naunu a nei a, thaikêm za thum leh; chun, a nuhmeihai chun a lungril an ṭhuoi kâwipêk ta a.
Chun, Solomon chu a hung upat hnung chun, a nuhmeihai chun pathien dang kuom tienga chun a lungril an ṭhuoi kâwipêk ta a, chuongchun, a pa David lungril angin
Solomon chun Zidon mihai pathiennu Astoreth le Ammon mihai pathien tirdakumtak Milkom chu a lo zui ve ta a.
Chun, Solomon chun
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Jerusalem bula tlângah Moab mihai pathien tirdakumtak Kemos ta dingin le, Ammon mihai pathien tirdakumtak Molek ta dingin bâwlhmun a lo siem ta a.
Chuong ang bawk chun hnam dang a nuhmeihai po po an pathien kuoma inthâwia riminhnik raw hlakhai ta ding khawma a siempêk a.
Chuongchun,
pathien danghai a zui ding a ni nawh ti a
Chuleiin,
Amiruokchu, i pa David zârah i dam sûng êm chun thaw naw ningah; nisienlakhawm, i naupa chu ka lâkpêk ding a nih.
Ram po po ruok chu lâkpêk vawng naw ning a, nisienlakhawm, ka siehlaw David lei le ka ithlang Jerusalem lei hin hnam khat chu i naupa kuomah pêng ka tih,” a ta.
Chun,
Chun, David Edom rama a um laia an mi thathai phûm dinga sipai hotu Joab a hang fe a, Edom mi, naupasal taphawt chu a hang that vawng hnung khan,
Joab le Israel mihai po po chu thla ruk zet Edom rama pasal po po an sukhlum vawng hmakhat chun an um a nih:
Hadad chu a pa siehlawhai laia Edom mi ṭhenkhathai leh Aigupta rama tlân dingin an fe a, Hadad chu naupang chitê a la nih.

Midian rama inthawk chun an suok a, Paranah an fe a, chun, Parana inthawk chun mihai an ṭhuoi a, Aigupta ram, Aigupta ram lal Pharao kuom an zu tlung a; ama chun inhai a lo pêk a, fâk dinghai a lo ngaituopêk a, ram dâm a lo pêk bawk a.
Hadad chun Pharao mit a tlung hle el a, chuongchun, a nuhmei ngei zuorpuinu, lalnu Tahpenes zuorpui chu nuhmeiah ân neitir a.
Chun, Tahpenes zuorpuinu chun, naupasal Genubath a neipêk a, Tahpenes chun Pharao ina chun a nêne nêk bânna a siempêk a; chun, Genubath chu Pharao nauhai laia chun a um ta a.

Chun, Hadad chun Aigupta rama inthawka David chu a puhai kuomah a in ve tah ti le, sipai hotu Joab khawm a thi tah ti a lo hrietin, Hadad chun Pharao kuomah, “Ka rama ka fe theina dingin mîn suoktir ta la,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Pharao chun a kuomah, “Ka kuoma i um hin tlâksam ieng am i nei leh, ngai ta, chuonga in ram tienga fe nâwk i tum el chu?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Ieng dang rak khawm a ni chuong nawh; nisienlakhawm, mîn fetir hrim hrim el raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, Pathienin a hmêlma dingin Eliada naupa Rezon, a pu Hadadezer, Zoba lal kuoma inthawka tlânhmang ta kha a hung inngîrsuok nâwk ta a.
Davidin Zoba khuoa mihai a that khan, ama chun a kuomah mihai a kei khâwm a, sipai hotuah a hung ṭhang ta a; chun, Damaska khuoah an fe a, chutaka chun an um a, Damaska khuoa chun lalin a um ta a.
Hadad sukrinumna belsain Solomon dam sûng po chu Israelhai hmêlma an ni rawp hrim a; Israelhai chu a theida hle el a, Suria ram sûnga chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam, Zereda khuoa Ephraim mi, Solomon siehlaw khawm chun (a nu hming chu Zerua a na, hmeithai a nih) lal chunga chun a kut ân let ve a.
Lal chunga a kut a hung inletna san chu hieng ang hi a nih; Solomon chun Millo chu a siem a, a pa David khuo chu a sietna laihai chu a siem ṭha a.
Chu Jeroboam chu mi hrât huoisen a na, chuongchun, Solomon chun chu tlangvâl chu mi taimatak nia a hriet leiin Josef sûnghai po po chunga sinthaw hotuah a siem a.

Chun, chuong lai chun hieng ang hi a hung na, Jeroboam chu Jerusalem khuoa a fe suok chu Silo zâwlnei Ahija chun lampuia chun a lo hmu a; Ahija chun puon thar hi a sil a, an pahni chau chun phûla chun an um hmunkhat a.
Chun, Ahija chun a puon thar sil chu a lâk a, her sâwmpahniah a keithlêr a.
Jeroboam kuoma chun, “Her sâwm hi la raw khai,
Amiruokchu, ka siehlaw David lei le, Israel hnam po po laia ka thlang khawpui Jerusalem lei hin hnam khat chu nei a tih,

ama chun a mi mâksan a, Zidon mi pathiennu Astoreth hai, Moabhai pathien Kemos hai, Ammonhai thlahai pathien Milkom hai dâm a biek lei le ka mithmua thilṭha thaw ding le ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai hi pawm dinga a pa David anga ka lampuihai a hraw naw leiin.
Ram pumpui chu lâkpêk naw ning a, amiruokchu, ka thupêkhai le ka thuruothai pawmtu ka thlang, ka siehlaw David leiin a dam sûng chu lalah lân umtir hrîng ka tih,
nisienlakhawm, ram hi a naupa chu lâkpêk ka ta, nang hi ka pêk ding che a nih, hnam sâwmhai chu.
Chun, ka siehlaw Davidin ka hming inumtirna dinga ka thlang khawpui Jerusalema hin ka hmaa khâwnvar a nei zing theina dingin hnam khat chu a naupa chu pêng ka tih.
Nang hi ruot ka ti che a, i nuom ang angin ro rêl i ta; Israelhai lalin um i tih.

Chun, thu ka pêk ang taphawt che i pawm a, ka lampuihai i hraw a, ka siehlaw David anga ka thuruothai le ka thupêkhai zâwm dinga ka mithmua thilṭha i thaw chun i kuomah um pei ka ta, David kân ngîrpêk ang khan sûngkuo nghettak inngîrpêk ka ti che a, Israelhai hi pêng ka ti che.
Chuleiin, David thla chu ka sukrinum ding a nih, amiruokchu, kumkhuo chun chu ni naw nih,’ tiin” a ti a.

Chuongchun, Solomon chun Jeroboam chu that a tum ta a, nisienlakhawm, Jeroboam chu a tho a, Aigupta ramah, Aigupta ram lal Sisak kuomah a tlân ta a, Solomon thi hmakhat chun Aigupta rama chun a um ta a.
Solomon chanchin danghai le a thilthaw po pohai le a varna dâm chu Solomon thilthawhai ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Solomon chun Israelhai po po chunga Jerusalem khuoa ro a rêl sûng chu kum sâwmli a nih.
Chuongchun, Solomon chu a puhai kuoma chun a in ta a, a pa David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a; chun, a naupa Rehoboam chu ama aiaw chun ân lal ta a.
Chun, Rehoboam chu Sekem khuoah a fe a, Israelhai po po chu Sekem khuoa chun ama lala siem dingin an fe ta si a.
Chun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam chun chuong thu chu a lo hriet chun (lal Solomona inthawka a tlânhmangna Aigupta rama la um a na, chuongchun Jeroboam Aigupta rama la um zing chu an zûn kotir a),
Jeroboam le sipai pungkhâwmhai po po chu an hung a, Rehoboam kuoma chun,
“I pa khan kan rîngkawl a sukrik êm hlak a, chuleiin, i pa mi sawr rimsikna le, a rîngkawl riktak kan chunga ân nghat hi mi sukzângpêk la, chuongchun, i rawng bâwl kan tih,” tiin an hung hril a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ni thum sûng chu lo va fe kieng phawt unla, chun, ka kuomah hung nâwk ro,” a ta. Chun, mipuihai chu an fe kieng ta phawt a.
Chun, lal Rehoboam chun a pa Solomon dam laia a kâwla um hlak upahai chu, “Hieng mipuihai hi ka dawn dân ding ieng am mi ruotpui in ta le?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Tuhin hienghai siehlawa hin i um a, an rawng i bâwl a, anni chu i dawn a, an kuoma thu ṭhatak hril i tum chun, kumkhawtluongin i siehlawah um an tih,” tiin an hril a.
Nisienlakhawm, upahai remruotpui chu a pawm naw a, ama ruolpui tlângvâlhai, ama kâwla um hlakhai chu a râwn ta lem a.
An kuoma chun, “Hieng mipuihai, ka kuoma, ‘I pain ka chunga rîngkawl ân nghat hi mi sukzângpêk rawh,’ tia hriltuhai hi ka dawn dân ding rem ieng am in mi ruotpuia le?” a ti a.

Chun, ama ruolpui tlangvâlhai chun a kuomah, “Hieng mipuihai, ‘I pa khan kan rîngkawl a sukrik êm hlak a, nang chun chu mi sukzângpêk raw khai,’ i kuoma tituhai kuoma chun, hieng ang hin ti la, hieng ang hin an kuoma chun hril rawh, ‘Ka pa kâwng nêk chun ka kutte khawm hi a lien lem a.

Ka pa khan rîngkawl riktak a lo inbâttir cheu a, kei chun in rîngkawl chu ka belsa ding a nih, ka pa chun vuoknain a lo hrâwk hlak cheu a, kei ruok chun chu ainuvêtin ka hrâwk ding cheu a nih,’ tiin,” an hril a.
Chuongchun, Jeroboam le mipuihai po po chu lalin, ni thum chinah ka kuomah hung nâwk ro tia a hril ang khan a ni thum ni chun Rehoboam kuoma chun an va fe a.
Chun, lal chun mipuihai chu inrumtakin a lo dawn a, upahai remruotpui kha a pawm naw a,

tlangvâlhai remruotpui ang khan, “Ka pa chun in rîngkawl a lo sukrik a, kei chun chu in rîngkawl chu ka belsa ding a nih, ka pa chun vuoknain a lo hrâwk hlak cheu a, kei chun chu ainuvêtin ka hrâwk lem ding cheu a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal chun, mipuihai thuhril kha a pawm ta naw a, chu chu
Israel thla Juda ram khuoa umhai chunga ruok chun Rehoboam chun ro a rêl a.

Chuongchun, lal Rehoboam chun sinthawa sawr luihai hotu Adoniram chu a tir a, ama chu Israelhai po po chun lungin an lo dêng a, a thi ta a. Chun, lal Rehoboam chu Jerusalem khuoa tlân hmang tumin a taw lailîra chun a chuong kai vat ta a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai chu David sûnghai chunga chun an hung hel tah a nih, tu chen el hin.

Chun, Israelhai po po chun Jeroboam chu a hung kîr nâwk ti an hrietin, pungkhâwmnaa hung dingin an inkotir a, Israelhai po po chunga lalah an siem ta a; Juda hnam ti chau naw chu David sûnghai zui tukhawm an um nawh.

Chun, Rehoboam chun Jerusalem khuo a hang tlung chun, Israel sûnghai chu doa Solomon naupa Rehoboam ram la nâwk dingin Juda sûnghai po po le Benjamin hnam mi huoisen ruok thlang suok, nuoi khat le sîng riet zet ân khâwm a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Semaia kuomah Pathien thu a hung tlung a,
“Judai ram lal Solomon naupa Rehoboam le Juda le Benjamin sûnghai po po kuoma le mipui danghai kuoma chun,
Chuongchun, Jeroboam chun Ephraim tlâng rama chun Sekem khuo a siem a, chutaka chun a um a, chun, chutaka inthawk chun a suok a, Penuel khuo a siem a.
Chun, Jeroboam chun a lungrilin, “Ram hi David sûnghai ta hi a hung ni nâwk el âwm ie,
hienghairawi hi Jerusalem khuoa
Chun, pakhat chu Bethelah a sie a, pakhat chu Danah a sie bawk a.
Chu thil chu suol a hung ni ta a nih, mipuihai chu an pahnia be ding chun Dan chen rauin an va fe hlak si a.
Chun, bâwlhmun inhai a bâwl a, Levi nauhai ni lo, vântlâng laia mihai thiempuah a siem a.

Chun, Jeroboam chun Juda rama ruoiṭhe an nei hlak ang bawkin thla rietna, chu thla ni sâwm le ni nga ni chu ruoiṭhe niah a ruot ve a, maichâma chun an hang fe a, Bethela chun a bâwngte lim siem kâwla inthâwiin chuong ang chun an thaw a nih; chun, a siem bâwlhmun thiempuhai chu Bethela chun a sie a.
Chun, ngai ta, Judai rama inthawkin Pathien mi,
Chun, chu ni ma chun inchikna a pêk a, “Hi hi

Chun, Pathien miin Bethela maichâm a hang hrângkhum lalin a lo hriet chun, Jeroboam chun, “Man ro,” tiin maichâma inthawk chun a kutin a hei ban a. Chun, man tuma a banna kut chu a hung zeng ta a, chuongchun, a kut chu a lâk nâwk thei ta naw a.
Pathien miin
Chuongchun, lal chun Pathien mi kuoma chun, “Ka in tieng ka kuomah hung la, va châwl hadam hri raw khai, chun, lâwmman khawm ka pêk ding che annâwm,” a ta.
‘Bei va fain, tui hrim hrim khawm va dâwn naw la, i va fena lampuia khawm kîr nâwk ta naw rawh,’ tia
Chuongchun, lampui dangah a fe a, Bethel hung pana a hungna lampuia chun a fe nâwk ta naw a.

Chuong lai chun Bethel khuoa chun zâwlnei tar pakhat hi a um a, a naupasalhai chun chu nia Bethela Pathien mi thilthawhai po po chu ama chu an hril vawng a; lal kuoma a thu hril khawm chu an pa an hril a.
Chun, an pa chun an kuomah, “Khaw tieng lampui am a fe ta leh?” a ta. A naupasalhai chun Juda rama inthawka hung Pathien mi fe nâwkna lampui chu an khîkhmu a.
Chuongchun, a naupasalhai kuomah, “Sabengtung mi hung siempêk ta u,” a ta. Chuongchun, sabengtung chu an siempêk a, a chuong ta a.
Chun, Pathien mi chu a hnawt ta a, thingsaisaw hnuoia ṭhung hi a va hmu a, a kuomah, “Nang hi i ni maw Juda rama inthawka hung Pathien mi chu?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Nih e,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ka in tieng ka kuomah hung la, bei va fa raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “I ruola kîr nâwk thei ka ni naw a, i kuoma hung thei khawm ka ni bawk nawh; hi hmuna hin i kuomah bei fa naw ning a, tui hrim hrim khawm dâwn naw ning ah.
‘Bei va fain tui hrim hrim khawm va dâwn naw la, i va fena lampuia khawm kîr nâwk ta naw rawh,’ tia,
Chuongchun, a kuoma chun a kîr ve nâwk a, a ina chun bei dâm a fâkin tui dâm a dâwn ta a.
Chun, dawkân an awt lai chun a ṭhuoi kîrtu zâwlnei kuomah
Juda rama inthawka hung Pathien mi kuoma chun, “

i hung kîr nâwk a, ‘Bei va fain, tui hrim hrim khawm va dâwn naw rawh,’ a tina hmun ngeiah, bei i fâk a, tui dâm i dâwn leiin i ruong hi i puhai thlâna sie ni ve naw nih, tiin,” tiin a hril suok ta a.
Chun, bei dâm a fâk a, tui dâm a dâwn zo chun zâwlnei a ṭhuoi kîr nâwk chu sabengtung a siempêk a.

Chun, a fe chu lampuia chun sakeibaknei le an intuok ta a; a lo se ta a; a ruong chu lampuia chun inthal dêr hin a um a, sabengtung chu a kâwla chun a ngîr a, sakeibaknei khawm chu ruong bula chun a ngîr ve zing a.
Chun, ngai ta, mihai an va fe a, lampuia ruong inthal dêra um le, ruong bula sakeibaknei ngîr zing chu an va hmu a, zâwlnei tartak umna khuoa chun an va hril a.
Chun, lampuia va ṭhuoi kîr nâwktu zâwlnei chun chu thu chu a lo hriet phing chun, “Pathien mi,
Chun, a naupasalhai kuoma chun, “Sabengtung mi siemrêlpêk ta u,” tiin a hril a. Chun, an siempêk ta a.

Chun, a fe ta a, a ruong lampuia inthal dêra lo um le, sabengtung le sakeibaknei ruong bula lo ngîr zing chu a va hmu a; sakeibaknei chun ruong chu a lo la fâk naw a, sabengtung khawm chu a lo la sukpawp naw bawk a.
Chun, zâwlnei chun Pathien mi ruong chu ân hlawm a, sabengtung chunga chun a sie kai a, a kîrpui nâwk ta a; chuongchun, zâwlnei putar umna khuoa chun sûn ding le vûi dingin a lût ta a.
Chun, a vûi hnung chun a naupasalhai kuomah, “Ka thi pha chun Pathien mi phûmna thlâna hin mi hung phûm ve unla; a ru bula chun ka ruhai hi hung sie unla.
Pathien thua Bethela maichâm le, Samari ram khawpuihaia bâwlhmun inhai po po a hrângkhumna thu kha hung tlung ngei ngei ding a ni si a,” tiin a hril a.

Chuong thil hnunga khawm chun Jeroboam chun a umdân indiknaw chu a la bân chuong naw a, vântlâng laia mihai bâwlhmun thiempu dingin a la siem ta rawp a; bâwlhmun thiempuhai an um theina dingin a nuom taphawthai chu a la suktum ta rawp a.
Chun, thil chu Jeroboam sûng- kuo suolna, anni ngei sukchimittu le khawvêla inthawka sukbohmang hlautu a hung ni ta a.
Chuong lai chun Jeroboam naupa Abija chu a damnaw a.

Chun, Jeroboam chun a nuhmei kuomah, “Tho la, Jeroboam nuhmei a nih ti an hriet nawna ding chein insukdanglam la, Silo-ah va fe ta khai; ngai ta, chutaka chun zâwlnei Ahija, hieng mihai chunga lala ka la um dingzie, ka chungchâng thu hriltu kha a um ie.
Beiphêk sâwm le, bei tlang chitê tê, khuoizu bûr khat leh chawi la, a kuomah va fe ta, naupang um dân ding chu lo hril a ti che,” a ta.
Chun, Jeroboam nuhmei chun chuong ang chun a thaw a, a tho a, Silo-a chun a fe a, Ahija ina chun a va fe ta a, Ahija chun khuo khawm a hmu thei ta naw a, a upat leiin a mit ân thim si a.
Chun,

Chun, Ahija chun chuonga kawtkhâra a hung lût laia a ke sir ri a hei hriet phing chun, “Nang Jeroboam nuhmei, hung lût raw khai, iengtiziea mi danga insiem am i ni a? Chanchin ṭha nawtak hril ding chea hril ka nih i sawnnaw.
Fe nâwk ta la, Jeroboam kuomah, ‘

David sûnghai ram ka lâkpêk a, chu chu ka pêk che a; nisienlakhawm, nang chu ka siehlaw David angin i um ve naw a; ama chun chu ka thupêkhai a pawm a, ka mithmua thilṭha chau thaw tumin a lungril po poin a mi zui hlak a;
nang ruok chun chu i hmaa mihai po po nêkin thil i suksuol nasa bîk a, mi suklunginsenna dingin pathien danghai le milim sunghai i siem a, hnung i mîn nghatsan ta a,
Chuongchun, tho la, i in tieng fe nâwk el rawh, khawpui sûng i sir pha leh naupang chu a thi ding a nih.
Chuongchun, Israelhai po po chun sûn an ta, vui an tih; Jeroboam sûngkuo lai chun ama chau chu thlâna sie ding a ni ding a ni si a; Jeroboam sûngkuo lai hin ama chaua hin
Chun, Israelhai chu thil insuksuoltira a thaw Jeroboam suolnahai leiin Israelhai chu nghatsan a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Jeroboam nuhmei chu a tho a, a suok ta a, Tirza khuo chu a va tlung a, chun, in kawtkhâr bul a va tlung phingle chun naupang chu a thi ta a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Jeroboam rorêl sûng chu kum sâwmhni le kum hni a na; chun, a puhai kuoma chun a in ta a, a naupa Nadab chu a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Solomon naupa Rehoboam chu Judai ramah ân lal a. An lal tîr lai chun Rehoboam chu kum sâwmli le kum khat mi a na,
Judahai chun
Chun, lal Rehoboam chun chuong aia chun dâr phawhai a siem a, lal in kawtkhâr vêngtu hotuhai ân kawltir a.
Chun, lal chu
Rehoboam chanchin le a thilthaw danghai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Jeroboam le Rehoboam chu indo zing zingin an um hlak a.
Chun, Rehoboam chu a puhai kuomah a in ta a, David khawpuia a puhai kuoma chun an phûm ta a; a nu hming chu Naama, Ammon mi a nih. Chun, a naupa Abijam chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Tûn Nebat naupa lal Jeroboam chu kum sâwm le kum riet ân lal kum chun Judahai chungah Abijam chu ân lal ṭan a.
Jerusalem khuoah kum thum ân lal a, a nu hming chu Maaka, Abisalom naunu a nih.
A hmaa a pain thil suol a thawhai po po kha a thaw ve a; a pu David lungril angin a lungril chu
Abijam chanchin le a thilthaw danghai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Abijam le Jeroboam chu an indo hlak a. Chun, Abijam chu a puhai kuoma chun a in ta a, David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a; ama aiawin a naupa Asa chu ân lal ta a.
Israel lal Jeroboam chu kum sâwmhni ân lal kum chun Asa chu Judahai chungah ân lal ṭan a.
Chun, kum sâwmli le kum khat chu Jerusalemah ân lal a, a pi hming chu Maaka, Abisalom naunu a nih.
Asa chun a pu David ang bawkin
A pi Maaka khawm chu milim tirdakumtak Asera a siempêk leiin, a lalnu nina chu a bân a; chun, Asa chun a milim siem chu a sât thlûk a, Kidron vadungah a raw a.
Bâwlhmunhai ruok chu a sukbo naw a, nisienlakhawm, Asa lungril chu a dam sûng po chun
Chun, a pain thil a lo inhlân tasahai le ama ngeiin a lo inhlân tah, tangkaruohai, rângkachak dâm, bûr le bêlhai chu
Chun, Asa le Israel lal Baasa chu an inlal sûng po chu an indo zing hlak a.
Israel lal Baasa chun Judahai chu a hang rûn a, Juda lal Asa kuoma lût ding le suok ding dangna dingin Rama khuo a siem a.
Chuongchun, Asa chun

“Nang le keia kâra le ka pa le i pa kârah thuthlung a um a, ngai ta, lâwmman dingin tangkaruo le rângkachak ka hung thawn che; thaw ta, Israel lal Baasa hin a min kiensanna dingin a kuoma i thuthlung kha ṭhiek el ta,” tiin a thawn a.

Chun, Benhadad chun lal Asa thu chu a lo pawm a, chuongchun, Israel khuohai chu thaw dingin a sipai hotuhai a tir a. Ijon khuo dâm, Dan khuo dâm, Abel-beth-maaka khuo dâm, Kinneroth biel po po chu, Naphtali ram po po le chun a lâk ta a.
Chun, Baasa chun chu thu chu a lo hriet phingleh Rama khaw siem chu a ma a, Tirza khuoa chun a um ta a.

Chuongchun, lal Asa chun Judai ram po poa chun thu ân phur vêl ta a; tukhawm a âwl bîk hrim hrim an um nawh, chuongchun, Baasain Rama khaw siemna dinga thing le lung a hmanghai chu an thak a; chuonghai chu hmangin lal Asa chun Mizpa khuo le Benjamin rama Geba khuo a siem a.

Asa chanchin dang po pohai, a thilthawtheizie po pohai, a thilthaw po pohai, a khaw siemhai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih? Amiruokchu, a tar hnung chun a kea chun hri ieng amani a hung invawi ta a.
Chun, Asa chu a puhai kuomah a in ta a, a pu David khawpuiah a puhai lai chun an phûm ta a; a naupa Jehosaphat chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Jeroboam naupa Nadab chu Juda lal Asa inlal kum hninaa chun Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a; Israelhai chunga chun kum hni ân lal a.

Chun, Issakar sûnghai laia mi Ahija naupa Baasa chun ama chu a phier rûk a, Philistin mihai chan, Gibbethon khuoah Baasa chun a that ta a, Nadab le Israelhai po po chun Gibbethon khuo chu an inhuol lai tak a nih.
Juda lal Asa inlal a kum thumnaah a nih Baasa chun a that a, a aiah ân lal chu.
chu chu Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a thaw, Jeroboam suolnahai lei le
Nadab chanchin danghai le a thilthaw po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Asa le Israel lal Baasa chu an inlal sûng po chu an indo zing hlak a.
Juda lal Asa inlal kum thumnaa chun Ahija naupa Baasa chu Tirza khuoah Israelhai po po chungah ân lal ṭan a, kum sâwmhni le kum li ân lal a.
Chun, Baasa chungchâng thuah Hanani naupa Jehu kuomah

“Pilvuta inthawkin ka dawm sâng che a, ka mi Israelhai chunga hin hotuah ka siem che a, chun, nangin Jeroboam lampui hraw chu i hraw a, an suolnahaia an mi suklungsenna dingin ka mi Israelhai chu thil în suksuoltir a;
ngai ta, Baasa le a sûnghai hi ka sukbo hlau ding a nih; chuongchun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam sûnghai ang elin i sûnghai hi siem ka tih.
Baasa sûngkuohai laia khawpuia thi taphawthai chu uiin fâng an ta, chun, a sûngkuo laia mi rama thi taphawthai chu chunglêng vatehaiin fâng an tih,” tiin.
Baasa chanchin danghai, a thilthaw dâm, a thilthawtheizie dâm chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?

Juda lal Asa inlal kum sâwmhni le kum ruknaah Baasa naupa Ela chu Tirza khuoa Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a, kum hni sûng ân lal a.
Chun, a siehlaw Zimri, a tawlailîr zâtve chunga hotuin ama chu a phier rûk a, chuong lai chun Tirza khuoa chun, Tirza khuoa a insûng tieng hotu Arza inah a lo dâwn inrui a;
chun, Juda lal Asa inlal kum sâwmhni le kum sari kum chun Zimri chu a va lût a, a thaw a, a that a, ama aiawin ân lal ta a.

Juda lal Asa inlal kum sâwmhni le kum sari kum chun Zimri chu Tirza khuoa chun ni sari ân lal a. Philistin mihai chan, Gibbethon khuo chu mihai chun an inhuol a.

‘I tangka le i rângkachakhai kha ka ta a nih, i nuhmeihai le, i nauhai laia a ṭha ṭhahai kha ka ta vawng a nih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, Israel lal chun a lo dawn a, “Aw laltak ka pu, i hril ang chu a ni annâwm, keima le ka nei po po chu i ta a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a mi tirhai chu an fe nâwk a, “Benhadad chun hieng ang hin a tih, ‘I kuomah, i tangkahai, i rângkachakhai, i nuhmeihai le i nauhai leh i mi pêk ding a nih, tiin mi ka hung tir luo a;

amiruokchu, zîngah hi pha vêla hin ka mihai i kuomah hung tir ka ta, i in le i mihai inhai chu an hung dap ding a nih; chun, i thil ngainat zâwnghai chu lâng an ta, hung pui vawng an tih,’ tiin,” an ta.

Chuongchun, Israel lal chun a rama upahai po po chu a ko a, “Lo hre ta u khai, hi mipa hin thil ṭha nawtak thaw a tumzie hi; ka kuomah mi a hung tir a, ka nuhmeihai, ka nauhai, ka tangka dâm, ka rângkachak dâm a hung ngên a, ka lo sêl hlak khawm ni si lovin,” a ta.
Chun, upahai po po le mipuihai po po chun a kuomah, “Lo bengkhawn nuom naw rawh, rem khawm lo tipêk naw rawh,” an ta.

Chuongchun, Benhadad mitirhai kuoma chun, “Laltak ka pu kuoma chun, ‘I siehlaw kuoma mi tira i hung ngên hmasak ang po po khan chu thâwng ka ta, amiruokchu, hi hi chu chu thaw thei naw ning, a tih,’ ti ro,” a ta. Chun, a mitirhai chu an fe nâwk ta a, chu thu chu an vân tlun nâwk a.

Chun, Benhadad chun a kuomah mi a tir nâwk a, “Ka hnungzuituhai po po hin Samari khaw pilvut veikhat chau khawm an changkim thei ding chun pathienhaiin an law law mi law hai sienla, chu nêka nasa khawm a,” a ta.
