Chun, hieng ang hin thaw rawh, lalhai hi an rêngin thleng vawng la, an aia hin ram awptuhai sie lem la,

chun, sipaihai tawlailîr dâm, sakawr dâm, i chân ta zât ang chie kha sipaihai siemṭha nâwk la; chuongchun, phaizâwla thâwng kan ta, anni nêk chun hrât lem ngei kan tih,” an ta. Chun, an thu chu a awi a, chuong ang chun a thaw ta a.
Chun, a kum nâwka chun Benhadad chun Suria mihai chu a kei khâwm a, Israelhai chu thaw dingin Aphek khuoa chun a hang fe a.

Chun, Israel mihai chu an pungkhâwm a, fâk dinghai an thak khâwm zet zet a, do dingin an inthawk ta a; chun, Israel mipuihai chun kêlte tlâwmte pawl hnia ṭhe ang chau tê hin an va ep ve a; Suria mihai ruok chu a ram sip hin an sip mup el a.
Chun, Pathien mi chun Israel lal chu a va hnai a, a va biek a, a kuomah, “
Chun, ni sari sûng zet chu an inep zing a. Chun, a ni sari ni chun an inthaw ta a; chun, Israel mihai chun Suria mihai chu ni khatah sipai nuoi khat an that a.
Mi danghai ruok chu Aphekah khawpui sûnga chun an tlânlût a, a la umhai chu mi sîng hni le sâng sari kul chimin a delhlum a. Chun, Benhadad chu a tlânse a, khawpui sûnga pindan sûngrila a lût a.

Chun, a rawihai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Israel sûng kuohai laia lalhai hi mi lunginsietthei tak an nih ti thu kan hriet a, saiip puon bilin, ei lua hin hruia inkhitin Israel lal kuomah mi vân fetir raw khai; ama chun a hla nuom khiet rawi che mawh,” an ta.

Chuongchun, saiip puon chu an bil a, an lua chun hruiin an inkhit a, Israel lal kuoma chun an va fe a, “I siehlaw Benhadad chun, ‘Lunginsiettakin mi hla raw se,’ a ti che,” an ta. Ama chun, “A la dam a ni maw? Ka naupa a ni annâwm,” a ta.

Chuong mihai chun ngaiṭhatakin, a lungril thu tak a hril a ni ringin, “I unaupa Benhadad kha a nih,” an lo ti var a. Chuongchun, ama chun, “Va fe unla, ama chu hung ṭhuoi ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, Benhadad chu a hung suok a, a kuomah a fe a; chun, ama chun tawlailîrah a lo inchuongtir a.

Chun, Benhadad chun a kuomah, “Ka pain i pa kuoma inthawka khuo a lo lâkhai kha pe kîr nâwk ka ta; chun, ka pain Samari khuoa dâwrpui hmun a siem ang khan Damaska khuoah i dâwrpui hmun ding i siem ve ding annâwm,” a ta. Chun, Ahab chun, “Hi thuthlung le hin infetir ka ti che,” a ta. Chuongchun, a kuomah thu a thlung a, ân fetir ta a.
Chun, zâwlnei naupahai laia mi pakhat hin
Ama chun a vuok nuom naw a, Chuongchun, a kuomah, “
Chuongchun, mi dang a va hmu nâwk a, “Mi hang vaw ta khai,” a ta. Ama chun a hang vuok a, a vuok sil ta a.
Chuongchun, zâwlnei chu a fe a, lampuia hin lal chu a lo inchân a, a chal khitnaa a mit inkhumin ân siem danglam a.

Chun, lal a hung tlung chun lal chu a lo ko a, “I siehlaw hin indona rûnpui hmunah ka va fe a; chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat hi a hung ngha a, ka kuomah mi pakhat a hung ṭhuoi a, ‘Ama hi lo vêng tlat rawh, a tlânhmang hlau chun a hringna aiah i hringna chân i tih, annawleh tangka talent khat i pêk ding a nih,’ a ta.

Chun, i siehlaw hi ka buoi êm kâr chun a lo fe hmang dai el ta a,” a ta. Chun, Israel lal chun a kuomah, “Chuong ang tak chu a nih, i chunga thu tlu chu, nangma ngeiin i sukthlûk diem ta chu teh,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a mita inthawk chun a chal khitna chu a hlîp ta vak a; chun, Israel lal chun zâwlneihai laia mi a nih ti a hriet ta a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “
Chun, Israel lal chu ngûitak le lungâwi nawtakin a fe ta a; Samari khuoa chun a fe ta a.
Chun, Jezreel mi Naboth chun grêp huon a nei a, chu chu Jezreela Samari lal Ahab in bul ela um a nih.

Chun, Ahab chun Naboth chu, “Ka in bul a ni lei hin i grêp huon hi thlai huon dingin mi pe raw khai, a aia chun grêp huon ṭha lem pêng ka ti che; annawleh i nuom lem chun a tangkain a man tâwk chu pêng ka ti che,” a ta, a biek a.
Chun, Naboth chun Ahab kuomah, “Ka puhai ro hang pêk che chu ka ta dingin a âwmin a âwm nawh ie,” a ti a.

Chun, Jezreel mi Naboth chun a kuoma chuong ang thu chu a hril lei chun Ahab chu ngûitak le lungâwi nawtakin a inah a lût ta a, “Ka puhai ro pe thei naw ning che,” a ti tlat si a. Chuongchun, a khuma chun a zâl a, khingtieng a ngha a, bu hrim hrim khawm a fâk nuom ta naw a.
Chuongchun, a nuhmei Jezebel chu a va fe a, a kuomah, “Iengtiziea i lungril chuong lâwma a lungngai a, bu khawm fa lova um am i na ?” a ta.

Ama chun a kuomah, “Jezreel mi Naboth chu ka va biek a, a kuomah, ‘I grêp huon hi min châwktir rawh, annawleh i dit lem chun a aiah grêp huon dang pêng ka ti che,’ ka ti a, ama chun, ‘Ka grêp huon chu pe thei naw ning che,’ tiin a mi dawna a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a nuhmei Jezebel chun a kuomah, “Israel ram lal hi i nih a ni naw am a nih? Tho la, bu fa la, lungril hlimtakin um raw khai, Jezreel mi Naboth grêp huon chu keiin pêng ka ti che,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Ahab hming chun lekha a ziek a, a namna chun a nam a; chun, lekha chu a umna khuoa Naboth tuolbâwm upahai le mi ṭhahai kuomah ân phur a.
Chun, lekhaa chun, “Bu nghei thu lo phuong unla, mipui lai Naboth chu inhmatâwngtir unla,
mi pahni Belial nauhai a hmaa chun inṭhungtir unla, ‘Pathien le lal i hrilsiet a nih,’ tia a hêktu dingin lo siem ro. Chun, ama chu ṭhuoi suok unla, lo dêng hlum ro,” a ta.
Chun, a umna khuoa mi, a umna khuoa um upahai le mi ṭhahai chun Jezebelin ân phur lekhaa a ziek ang chun an thaw a.
Bu nghei thu chu an phuong a, mipuihai lai Naboth chu an inhmatâwngtir a.

Chun, mi pahni Belial nauhai chu a hmaa chun an va ṭhung a; chun, Belial mihai chun mipuihai hmaa chun, “Naboth hin Pathien le lal a hrilsiet a nih,” tiin ama Naboth chu an hêk a. Chuongchun, khuoa inthawk chun an ṭhuoi suok a, lungin an dêng a, a thi ta a.
Chuongchun, Jezebel kuoma chun, “Naboth chu lungin an dêng a, a thi tah,” tiin mi an tir a.

Chun, Jezebelin Naboth chu lungin an dêng a, a thi tah ti a hrietin Jezebel chun Ahab kuoma chun, “Tho la, Jezreel mi Naboth grêp huon, ân châwktir phal naw che kha nei ta raw le, Naboth chu a dam ta naw a, a thi tah a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Ahab chun Naboth a thi tah ti a hrietin Jezreel mi Naboth grêp huon chu nei dinga fe thla dingin Ahab chu a tho ta a.
“Tho la, Samari khuoa um, Israel lal Ahab be dingin zu fe raw khai, ngai ta, Naboth grêp huona chun a um a; nei tumin chutaka chun a fe thla a nih.

Ngai ta, i chunga hin thil ṭhanaw hung intlungtir ka ta, hung sukbohmang ka ti che a, Ahaba inthawk hin naupasal taphawt chu Israel rama mi khuokhira um amanih, khuokhir naw amani khawm chu sukbohmang ka ta,
nangin i mi suklungsen lei le, Israelhai chu thil în suksuoltir leiin Nebat naupa Jeroboam sûnghai le Ahija naupa Baasa sûnghai ang elin i sûnghai hi siem ka tih,” a ta.
Ahab sûngkuohai laia mi khawpuia thihai po chu uiin fâng an ta; rama thihai po chu chunglêng vatehaiin fâng an tih,” tiin.
Chun, Ahab chun chuong thu chu a hriet chun a puon a keithlêr a, saiip puon a sil a, bu a nghei a, saiip puon chungah a zâl a, ngûitakin ân lawn vêl a.
Chun,

“Ahab ka hmaa an ngaitlâwmzie hi i hmu am? Ka hmaa an ngaitlâwm lei hin ama dam sûng hin chu a chungah thil ṭha naw intlungtir naw ning, a naupaa inthawk ruok chun a sûnghai chungah thil ṭha naw intlungtir ka tih,” tiin.
Chun, kum thum sûng chu Suriahai le Israelhai chu indo lovin an um a.
Chun, a kum thum kum chun Juda lal Jehosaphat chu Israel lal kuomah a zu fe a.

Israel lal chun a siehlawhai kuomah, “Ramoth-gilead khuo hi eini ta a nih ti hre zing si a, iengtiziea Suria lal hi lâkpêk lova um am ei ni aw?” a ta. Chun, Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Ramoth-gilead khuo hi mi hang thawpui ve nuom i tim chu?” a ta.
Chun, Jehosaphat chun Israel lal kuoma chun, “Kei le nang, i mihai le ka mihai chu pumkhat ei na, ka sakawrhai le i sakawrhai chu pumkhat an nih annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, Jehosaphat chun Israel lal kuoma chun, “
Chuongchun, Israel lal chun zâwlneihai mi za li lai a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Ramoth-gilead khuo hi thaw dingin ka hang inthawk ding am inthawk lo ding?” a ta. Anni chun, “Hang inthawk rawh,
Nisienlakhawm, Jehosaphat chun, “Hitaka hin
Chun, Israel lal chun Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “
Chuongchun, Israel lal chun hotu pakhat a hang ko a, “Imla naupa Mikaia kha hung ṭhuoi vak ta,” a ta.

Chun, Israel lal le Juda lal Jehosaphat chu Samari khaw kul kawtkhâr lûtna bula hrizâwla chun an lal puona inthuomin an lalṭhungpha ve vea chun an ṭhung a; chun, zâwlneihai po po chun an hmaa chun thu an hril a.
Chun, Kenaan naupa Zedekia chun thîr kihai a siempêk a, “
Chuong ang bawkin zâwlnei po pohai chun, “Ramoth-gileada chun hang fe la, hang hlawtling raw khai,

Chun, Mikaia va ko dinga an tir chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta khai, zâwlneihai hin thu inang vawngin a ṭha tiengin lal kuoma hin thu an hril seng a, an hril ta ang seng chun hang hril ve la, a ṭha tiengin hang hril ve raw aw,” tiin a hril a.

Chun, lal kuoma a hang tlung chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Mikaia, Ramoth-gilead khuo thaw dingin ka hang inthawk ding am a ni, hang inthawk lo ding?” a ta. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Hang inthawk la, hang hlawtling raw khai,
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Thutak ngawt naw chu
Chun, Israel lal chun Jehosaphat kuomah, “Ka chungchâng thu hi a se tieng ngawt naw chu a ṭha tieng hrim hrim chu hril naw ni ti ka hril che a ni naw am a ni kha?” a ta.
Chun,
Chuongchun, thlarau pakhat hi a hung suok a,
Chun,
Chuongchun, ngai ta,
Mikaia chun, “Ngai rawh, pindan sûngrila inbi dinga i lût ni chun la hrieng i tih,” a ta.
Chun, Israel lal chun, “Mikaia hi ṭhuoi unla, khawpui awptu Amon le lal naupa Joas kuomah fepui ta u;
chun, lalin hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Hi mipa hi lung inah khum unla, lungmuongtaka ka hung nâwk hmakhat chun rinumna tui lo pe ro,’ tiin, ti ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Israel lal le Juda lal Jehosaphat chu Ramoth-gileada chun an hang fe a.

Chun, Israel lal chun Jehosaphat kuomah, “Insiem danglam ka ta, indonaa chun hang fe vêng ka ti a, nang ruok chun chu i lal puon sil la,” a ta. Chuongchun, Israel lal chu ân siem danglam a, indonaa chun a hang fe a.
Chun, Suria lal chun a tawlailîr chunga hotu sâwmthum le pahnihai kuoma chun, “Israel lal ngawt naw chu, mi lien khawm, mi chîn khawm a tu tukhawm thaw naw ro,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Chun, tawlailîr chunga hotuhai chun Israel lal a ni nawh ti an hriet chun, an hnawt lai chu an lêt nâwk ta a.

Chun, mi pakhat hin tum bîk neilo hin a thalngul a kuoi a, Israel lal chu âwmphaw le âwmphaw inkârah a kâp a, chuongchun, a tawlailîr khaltu kuoma chun, “Kei her la, sipaihai laia inthawk hi mi suokpui raw khai, hliemna natak ka tuok ta hi,” a ta.

Chun, chu ni chun inthawna chu a nasa ta hle el a, lal chu a tawlailîra chun Suria mihai hmua chun an inngîrtir a, chun, zântieng chun a thi ta a; ama inhliemnaa inthawk chun thisen chu tawlailîr sûnga chun a luong dup dup a.
Chun, nisa tlâk tâwm lai vêl chun, sipaihai lai chun, “Mi tin mâni in tieng seng, mi tin mâni ram tieng seng fe vawng ta raw hai se,” tiin an khêk vêl ta rak el a.
Chuongchun, lal chu a thi ta a, Samari khuoa chun an lûtpui a; Samari khuoa chun lal chu an phûm ta a.
Chuongchun, Ahab chu a puhai kuoma chun a in ta a; chun, a naupa Ahazia chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Jehosaphat chu ân lal ṭan lai chun kum sâwmthum le kum nga a na; Jerusalem khuoa chun kum sâwmhni le kum nga ro a rêl a. A nu hming chu Azuba, Silhi naunu a nih.
Chuongchun, Jehosaphat chanchin danghai dâm, a thilthawtheizie a suklang thuhai dâm, a râl do thuhai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, Ahab naupa Ahazia chun Jehosaphat kuomah, “Ka mihai hi i mihai leh lawngah fe hmunkhat raw hai se chu,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, Jehosaphat chun a remti naw a.
Chun, Juda lal Jehosaphat inlal kum sâwm le kum sari kum chun Ahab naupa Ahazia chu Samari khuoa chun Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a; Israelhai chunga chun kum hni ân lal a.
Chun, a pa thaw ang taphawt thawin Baal rawng a bâwl a, a biek hlak a,
Ahab thi hnung chun Moab ram chu Israel ram chunga chun a hel ta a.

Chun, Ahazia chu Samaria khuoa um a in pindan chunghnung inhuonna dai âwngkâra chun a tla a, a damnaw ta a; chun, tirtâwnhai a tir a, “Fe unla, Ekronhai pathien Baal-zebub chu hi natnaa inthawk hin ka dam nâwk ding am va râwn ta u,” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, Tisbe mi Elija kuoma chun
Tuhin,
Chun, mitirhai chu a kuomah an hung kîr nâwk a, an kuomah, “Iengtiziea hung kîr nâwk am in ni a?” a lo ti a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Mi pakhat keini mîn tuokpui dingin a hung a, kan kuomah, ‘Fe unla, kîr nâwk unla, lal a tirtu cheu kuoma chun hieng hin va hril ro,
Chun, an kuoma chun, “Nangni intuokpui dinga hung a, hieng thuhai hung hriltu cheu chu mi ieng ang hrim am a ni leh?” a ta.

Chun, lal chun sipai sâwmnga pâwl hotu pakhat, a rawihai sâwmnga le chun a tir ta a, chun, a kuoma chun a hang fe a, ngai ta, tlâng sîpa chun ama chu a lo ṭhung a. Chun, a kuomah, “Aw nang Pathien mi, lal chun, ‘Hung thla raw se,’ a ti che,” a ta.

Chun, Elija chun a dawn a, sipai sâwmnga pâwl hotu kuoma chun, “Pathien mi ka ni chun, vâna inthawkin mei hung thla sienla, nang le i rawihai sâwmnga kha kânghâwp vawng raw se,” a ta. Chun, vâna inthawk chun mei a hung thla a, ama le a rawihai sâwmnga chu a kânghâwp vawng ta a.
Chun, a kuoma chun sipai sâwmnga pâwl hotu dang le sâwmnga a tir nâwk a. Ama chu a hang fe a, a kuomah, “Aw nang Pathien mi, lal chun, ‘Hung thla raw se,’ a ti che,” a ta.

Chun, sipai sâwmnga pâwl hotu le a rawihai sâwmnga ma a tir nâwk a. Chun, sâwmnga pâwl hotu pathumna chu a hang fe a, a hung a, Elija hmaa dingṭhaṭhuonin, a ngên a, a kuomah, “Aw Pathien mi, ka ngên che hi, keia hringna le hi i siehlaw sâwmngahai hringna hi i mithmua chun hlutak ni raw se;

ngai ta, vâna inthawkin mei a hung thla a, kha sâwmnga pâwl hotu pahnihai kha, an rawihai sâwmngahai leh a kânghâwp vawng ta a; amiruokchu, tuhin ka hringna chu i mithmua chun hlutak ni raw se,” a ti a.
Chun,
Chun, a kuomah, “
Chuongchun, Elijân
Chun, Ahazia thilthaw danghai a thaw tahai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai chanchin ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun,
Chun, Elija chun Elisa kuomah, “Hitaka hin lo um hri rawh, ka ngên che hi,
Chun, Bethel khuoa zâwlnei naupasal umhai chu Elisa kuomah an hung a, a kuomah, “Vawisûn hin i chunga hotu hi
Chun, Elija chun, “Elisa, hitaka hin lo um phawt rawh, ka ngên che hi,
Chun, Jeriko khuoa zâwlnei naupasalhai chu Elisa kuomah an hung a, a kuomah, “Vawisûn hin i chunga hotu hi
Chun, Elija chun a kuomah, “Hitaka hin lo um rawh, ka ngên che hi,
Chun, zâwlnei naupasalhai mi sâwmnga an fe ve a, hlataka hin an hmazâwnah an ngîr a, anni chu Jordan vadung panga chun an ngîr ta a.
Chun, Elija chun a puon chu a hlîp a, ân têl a, tui chu a vuok ta a, chuongchun, khingtieng khingtieng chun a lo inṭhe a, an pahni chun hnuoi hula chun an fe kai ta a.

Ama chun, “Thil intaktak i hni a ni chu, iengkhawm ni sienla, i kuoma inthawka lâk hmanga ka um lai i hmu chun, chuong ang chun i chungah um a tih, i mi hmu naw ruok chun chuong ang chu ni naw nih,” a ta.
Chun, an fe pei a, an la ṭawng zing laiin, ngai ta, mei sakawr tawlailîr le mei sakawrhai a hung inlang a, chu chun anni chu an kâra tlain a ṭhe ta a; chun, Elija chu thlivira chun vânah a lâwn ta a.
Elija puon amaa inthawka hung tla chu a lâk a, a kîr a; Jordan vadung panga chun a ngîr ta a.
Chun, Elija puon amaa inthawka tla chu a lâk a, “Elija Pathien

Chun, zâwlnei naupasalhai Jeriko khuoa umhaiin ama chu an lo hmu nâwk chun, “Elija thlarau kha Elisa chunga hin a um ta ngei el,” an ti a, ama chu tuok dingin an hung suok a, a hmaa chun hnuoi sikin an kûn a, chibai an bûk tâwl a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, tuhin pasal hrât i siehlawhai kuoma hin sâwmnga an um a, kan ngên che hi, anni chu tir la i hotupa chu inzawngtir rawh, ama chu
Ama chu inzak khawp raka an phût an phût hnunga chun ama chun, “Tir ta unla,” a ta. Chuongchun, mi sâwmnga chu an tir a, ni thum sûng an zawng a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu zo naw a.
Chun, anni chu Jeriko khuoa a la châm sûng chun an hung tlung nâwk a, ama chun an kuomah, “Fe naw ro, ka ti hrim cheu a ni naw am a nih,” a lo ti a.

Chun, chu khawpuia mihai chun Elisa kuomah, “Ngai ta, kan ngên che hi, hi khaw um dân hi ân hawi hle a, kan pu hin i hmu ve zing a; nisienlakhawm, tui hi a ṭha naw a, a ram khawm hi a takchang naw a nih,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Tuiûm thar mi hung lapêk unla, a sûngah chi hung sie ro,” a ta. Chun, an hung lâkpêk ta a.
Chun, tuikhur hnârahai chun a hang fe a, chutaka chun chi chu a phul a, “
Chuongchun, Elisa thuhril ang ngei chun tu chen hin tuihai chu sukṭhat an ni ta a.

Chun, chutaka inthawk chun Bethelah a hang fe a, chun, lampuia a fe lai chun khawpuia inthawk hin naupang chitê tehai chu an hung suok a, ama chu an nuisan a, a kuomah, “Hang fe rawh, nang lusîp kawlpa,” an ta.
Chun, a hnungtieng a hei en chun anni chu a hmu ta a, chuongchun,
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun Karmel tlângah a fe a, chutaka inthawk chun Samari ramah a kîr nâwk ta a.
Juda ram lal Jehosaphat inlal kum sâwm le kum riet kum chun Ahab naupa Jehoram chun Israelhai chungah Samari khuoah ro a rêl ṭan a; kum sâwm le kum hni lai ro a rêl a.
Chuongchun,
Nisienlakhawm, Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolnaa Israel mihai ân suksuoltirnaa khan ân tûl tlat a, chutaka inthawk chun ân sie hmang ngai hrim hrim naw a.
Chun, Moab lal Mesa chu berâm vai mi a na, Israel lal kuoma chun berâmchal nuoi khat hmul le berâmte nuoi khat leiman dingin a pêk hlak a.
Nisienlakhawm, Ahab a hung thi hnung chun Moab lal chu Israel lal chunga chun a hel ta a.
Chun, chu lai chun lal Jehoram chu Samari khuoa inthawk a suok a, Israel mihai po po chu a ko khâwm a.

Chun, a fe a, Juda lal Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Hi Moab lal chu ka chungah a hel a, Moab mihai chu do dingin i mi hung zui ding am a nih?” ti dingin mi a tir a. Chun, ama chun, “Fe vêng ka tih, kei le nang, ka mihai le i mihai chu pumkhat ei nih; ka sakawrhai le i sakawrhai khawm pumkhat an nih,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin, “Khawtieng lampui âm fêng ei ta?” a ta. Ama chun, “Edom thlalêr lampui tieng khan,” tiin a dawn a.
Chuongchun, Israel lal chu, Juda lal le Edom lal le chun an fe ta a, chuongchun, ni sari chu lampui inhêl zâwngin an fe ta a, anni zuitu mipuihai le an sahai ta ding chun tui a um ta naw a.

Chun, Jehosaphat chun, “
Chun, Elisa chun Israel lal kuoma chun,“ Nang le kei hin ieng am inhmangna ei nei a? fe la, i nu le i pa zâwlneihai kuomah fe dai rawh,” a lo ti a. Chun, Israel lal chun a kuomah, “Ni lo e,
Chun, Elisa chun, “Sipaihai
Iengkhawm ni sienla, tuhin ṭingṭang keithiem mî mi hung ko pêk ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, ṭingṭang keithiemin a kei lai chun
Chun, ama chun, “
Chun,
Chun, hi thil hi

Chun, khawpui kul nei po pohai le, khawpui ṭhahai po po chu suksieng in ta, thing ṭhahai po po chu phûrthlu bawk in ta, chun, tuikhur tuihnâr nei tinhai chu sukbit in ta, ram ṭha po pohai chu lungin dêngsip bawk in tih,” a ta.
Chun, zîngkâr thilinhlân hun vêl lai hin hieng hi a hung na, ngai ta, Edom ram tienga inthawk chun tui a hung luong a, a ram chun tuiin a hung sip ta a.
Chun, Moab mihai chun lalhai chu anni do dingin an hung ti an hriet phingleh, anni chu an inko khâwm tâwl a; râlthuoma inthuom thei taphawt le, a chungtieng pohai chu ramria chun an lo ṭhang a.
Chun, zîngkâr chun inhmatakin an tho a, nisa chun chu tui chu a hung el tle pup a; chuongchun, Moab mihai chun an hmazâwna tui chu thisen ang elin an hmu a,
“Hi hi thisen a ni ngei hi, anni le anni chu an inthat tuo a, lalhai chu sukhlum vawng an ni ta ngei a ni hi. Moab mihai, râllâk sum chu vân chu ro khai,” an ta.
Chun, Israel mihai riebûka an hung chun, Israelhai chu an tho a, Moab mihai chu an that a; chuongchun, an hmaa chun an tlânse ta a, chuongchun, Moab mihai chu that peiin an ramah an hnawt lût ta a.

Chun, khawpuihai chu an sukchim a, ram ṭhatna hmun poah mi tinin lung an pei seng a, an suksip pei a; chun, tuikhur hnâr nei po po chu an sukbit bawk a, thing ṭhahai po po chu an phûrthlûk a, Kir-hareseth khuoa lung chau an mâksan a; nisienlakhawm, vailungdêngna dêng mihai chun an inhuola, an rûn ta a. .
Chun, Moab lal chun ama ta dingin indona chu a nasa taluo ti a hriet phingleh Edom lal umna hmun chen chu va nawr tlang dingin kâwlhnâm chawi mi za sari a ṭhuoi a, nisienlakhawm, an thei naw a.

Chun, a naupasal upatak ama aia rorêl ding chu a lâk a, kul chunga chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân dingin ân hlân ta a. Israel mihai chunga chun lunginsenna nasatak chu a um ta a, chuongchun, ama chu an mâksan a, an rama chun an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, zâwlnei naupasalhai nuhmeihai laia nuhmei tu amani chu a khêk a, Elisa kuomah, “I siehlaw ka pasal chu a thi ta a, i siehlaw chun

Elisa chun a kuomah, “I ta dingin ieng am thawpêk ka ti che a? Mi hril rawh, i inah ieng am i nei a?” a ta. Chun, amanu chun, “I siehlawnu hin inah hriek bûr khat ti chau naw chu iengkhawm ka nei dêr nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Ama chun, “Fe la, i tuolbâwmhai bêl po po, bêl ruokhai chu, haw khâwm ṭeu rawh; tlâwmte chu haw naw rawh.
Chun, lût i ta, i naupasalhai le nang chu kawt inkhârkhum in ta, chuongchun, chuong bêl po pohaia chun hriek chu sung rawh, chun a sip chu sie hmang pei bawk la,” a ta.
Chun, a kuoma inthawk chun a fe ta a, a naupasalhai le ama chu kawt an inkhârkhum a; chun, bêlhai chu a kuomah an hung lâk a, ama chun a lo thun pei a.
Chun, bêlhai po po chu a sip phingleh, a naupa kuoma chun, “Bêl dang mi la hung lapêk rawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Bêl dang a um ta nawh,” a ta. Chun, hriek chu a kang ta a.
Chun, a hung a, Pathien mi chu a hril a, ama chun a kuomah, “Fe la, hriek chu zawr la, i bat chu thung la, a la chuong chun nang le i naupasalhai chu inchâwmna ro,” a lo ti a.

Chun, ni khat chu hieng hi a hung na, Elisa chu Sunem khuoah ân zin a, chu khuoa chun nuhmei neinungtak hi a um a, ama chun Elisa chu bu fa dingin a lo ko ṭâl hlak a. Chun, chutaka a fe po le chun, chutaka chun bu fa dingin a lût hlak a.
Chun, ama chun a pasal kuomah, “Ngai ta, hi mipa mi hung sir rawp hlaktu hi Pathien mi inthieng a nih ti ka hriet a nih.
Ka ngên che hi, in sâwng chîtê bâwl ei ta, chutaka chun khum leh, dawkân leh, ṭhungna le khâwnvar siena sieng ei ta, a hung poleh chutaka a lût theina dingin,” a ta.
Chun, ni khat chu chutieng chun a hung inzin a, pindana chun a lût a, a zâl ta a.
Chun, a siehlaw Gehazi kuoma chun, “Hi Sunamnu hi hung ko ta,” a ta. Chun, a hang ko hnung chun, a hmaa chun a hung ngîr a.

Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, hi nangin theitâwpin i mi duot a, ieng am thawpêk vêng ka ti che a? Lal amanih, sipai hotu amanih biekpêk che i nuom am, tiin a kuoma hin hril ta,” a ta. Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Mâni chipui laia chêng ka nih annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ieng am a ta dinga ei thawpêk thei ding chu?” a ta. Gehazi chun, “Naupasal a nei naw a, a pasal khawm tar a ni tah,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ama chu hung ko rawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chu a hung ko chun kawtkhâra chun a ngîr a.
Chun, ama chun, “Hi hun pha hin, hun a hung inlet nâwk pha chun naupasal pawm tâng i tih,” a ta. Chun, ama minu chun, “Ni lo e, pu, nang Pathien mi, i siehlawnu kuoma hin khêl hril naw rawh,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chu ân rai a, a kuoma Elisain a hril hun, chu hun chu a hung tlung chun naupasal a nei ta a.
Chun, naupang chu a hung inṭhang lien a; ni khat chu a pa kuoma busîktuhai kuomah a fe ve a.
Chun, a pa kuoma chun, “Ka lu, ka lu,” a ta. Chun, ama chun a siehlaw kuoma chun, “A nu kuomah ama kha ṭhuoi rawh,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a pawm a, a nu kuom a hang tlungpui chun, a nu khûp chungah nisa inding chen chu a ṭhung a; chun, a thi ta a.
Chun, a hang fe a, ama chu Pathien mi khum chunga chun ân zâl ta a; chun, kawt a khârkhum a, ama chu a suok ta a.
Chun, a pasal chu a ko a, “Ka ngên che hi, Pathien mi kuomah ka va tlâna ka hung kîr nâwk vak theina dingin siehlaw pakhat le sabengtung pakhat kha mi hung ngaituopêk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Vawisûn kher kher iengdingin am ama kuoma chun fêng i ta? thla thar a ni naw a, Châwlni khawm a ni bawk si naw a,” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Ṭha tho de nih,” a ta.
Chun, sabengtung chunga chun a chuongpha a pha a, a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Khal la, hmatieng fe pei rawh, ka tir chau naw che chun mi sukmuong naw rawh,” a ta.

Chuongchun, a fe a, Karmel tlânga Pathien mi kuoma chun a hang fe ta a. Chun, Pathien mi chun ama chu hlataka a um lai chun a lo hmu a, a siehlaw Gehazi kuoma chun, “En ta, sawtaka saw Sunamnu kha a nih,
tuhin ama tuok dingin tlân la, a kuomah, ‘Nang i dam de maw? I pasal kha a dam de maw? Naupang kha a dam de maw?’ lo va ti rawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Dam e,” tiin a lo dawn pei a.

Chun, tlânga Pathien mi kuom a hung tlung chun a kephahai chu a chel tlat a. Gehazi chu ama hnawtkieng ding chun a hung hnai a, nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi chun, “Tosan phawt el rawh, a sûngah a lungril a lungngai a nih,
Ama chun a kuomah, “Pu, naupasal ka hni hrim che am a nih? Mi hlêm naw rawh, ka ti hrim a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.

Chun, ama chun Gehazi kuoma chun, “I dier kei ṭha la, i kutah ka hmawl kha chawi la fe raw khai; mi tukhawm în tuokpui chun chibai bûk naw la, chun, tukhawma chibai an bûk che khawma bûk thung naw rawh; chun, ka hmawl hi naupang hmai chunga chun innghat rawh,” a ta.
Chun, naupang nu chun, “

Gehazi chun anni chu a lo hmakhal a, naupang hmai chunga chun hmawl chu a lo innghat a; nisienlakhawm, ri hrim hriet a ni naw a, a hring a nih ti hriet theina a um bawk naw a. Chuleichun, ama chu lo tuok dingin Gehazi chu a va kîr a; “Naupang chu a meng naw tawp el,” a hung ti a.
Chun, Elisa chu in a hung lût chun ngai ta, naupang chu a thi ta a, khuma chun a lo zâl a.
Chuongchun, a va lût a, an pahni chun kawt ân khârkhum a,

Chun, a hang fe a, naupang chunga chun a hang bawk a; chuongchun, a bau chungah a bau, a mithai chungah a mithai, a kuthai chungah a kuthai a sie a; chuongchun, naupang chunga chun a zuk bawk nâwk a; chun, naupang taksa chu a hung lum ta a.

Chun, a hung kîr a, in sûnga chun hnungtieng hmatieng hin vawikhat ân lawn a; chun, a hang fe a, a chunga chun a hang bawk nâwk a; chun, naupang chu vawi sari a hung insim a, chuongchun, a mit a hung meng ta a.
Chun, Gehazi chu a ko a, “Sunamnu kha hung ko rawh,” a ta. Ama chun nuhmei chu a hung ko a, a kuoma a hung lût chun, a kuomah, “I naupa kha pawm rawh,” a ta.
Chun, ama minu chu a va lût a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin chibai a bûk a, chun, a naupa chu a pawm a, a suok ta a.

Chun, Elisa chu Gilgalah a fe nâwk a; chun, chu rama chun ṭâm nasatak a tla a; zâwlnei naupasalhai chu a hmaa chun an ṭhung a, a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Bel lientak inchuon la, zâwlnei naupasalhai ta dingin hmepawk suong rawh,” a ta.

Chun, mi pakhat chu ramah anhna zawng dingin a va fe a; grêp suok hrui hi a va hmu a; chutaka ûmzâm chu a pawm khawp ṭeuin a hung inkhâwm bawk a, a hung a, a channawi a, hmepawk bêla chun a thlâk ta a; an hriet si naw a.
Chun, mihai ta ding chun an fâk dingin an hung thur suok a, chun, an fâk lai chun, “Aw Pathien mi, bêla hin thina hri a um a nih,” tiin an khêk suok a. Chuongchun, an fâk thei ta naw a.
Ama chun, “Chuong a ni chun, beiphit hung la ro,” a ta. Bêl sûnga chun a dêng lût a, “Mipui fâk dingin thur suok ta ro,” a ti a. Chuongchun, bêl sûnga chun thil ṭha naw hrim chu a um ta naw a.
Chun, Baal-salisaa inthawkin mi pakhat a hung a, Pathien mi chu ra hmasa bei, buṭei bei sâwmhni le bu thar vui a ipin a hung chawipêk a. Elisa chun, “An fâk dingin mipuihai kha pe rawh,” a ti a.
A siehlaw chun, “Iengtin am hi hi mi za khat hmaa chun fâk dingin sieng ka ta?” a ti a. Nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “An fâk dingin mipuihai kuoma chun pe rawh,
Chuongchun, an hmaa chun a sie a, an fâk ta a,
Chun, Suria ram lal sipai hotu Naaman chu
Chun, Suria mihai chu a pâwl pâwlin râl an rêl a, Israel rama inthawkin sal nuhmeitê pakhat hi an hung ṭhuoi a; ama chun Naaman nuhmei rawng chu a bâwl hlak a.
Chun, a hotunu kuoma chun, “Ka pu hi Samari rama zâwlnei hmaa khan Pathien chun inumtir sien chu aw, ama chun ân phârna hi a sukdam el ding bah,” a ti hlak a.
Chun, Naaman chu a va lût a, “Israel rama nuhmeite khan, chuongchun, khâng khan a tih,” tiin a pu chu a va hril ta a.
Chun, Suria ram lal chun, “Va fe luo ta khai, Israel lal kuoma chun lekha thawn ka tih,” a ta. Chun, tangka talent sâwm le rângkachak tlang sâng ruk le silfên tuok sâwm le a chawi a, a fe ta a.
Chun, lekhathawn chu Israel lal kuoma chun a hung chawi a, “Hi lekhathawn hi lo hmu ngei i ta, ngai ta, ka siehlaw Naaman ân phârna, sukdam dingin i kuomah ka hung tir a nih,” tiin a hril a.

Chun, Israel lal chun lekhathawn chu a tiem phingleh, a puonhai a keithlêr a, “Hi mipa hin mi ân phârna sukdam dinga ka kuoma a hung tir hi sukdam ding le sukhlum dingin Pathien am ka nih? amiruokchu, ngaituo ta u, ka ngên cheu hi, keia chunga insêlna a zawngzie hi en ta u,” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Elisa Pathien mi chun Israel lal chun a puonhai a keithlêr ti a hriet phingleh lal kuoma chun mi a tir a, “Iengdinga i puonhai i keithlêr am a na? tuhin ama chu ka kuomah inhungtir la, chuongchun, Israel rama hin zâwlnei a um ti hrieng a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Naaman chu a sakawr hai le a sakawr tawlailîrhai leh a va fe a, Elisa in kawtkhâr bula chun a ngîr a.
Chun, Elisa chun tirtâwn a tir a, “Fe la, Jordan vadungah vawi sari insil la, chun, i taksa chu a pângngai hung nîng a ta, hung fai i tih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Naaman chu a lunginsen a, a fe hmang ta a, “Ngai ta u, ka kuoma hung suokin hung ngîr a ta, Pathien

Damaska vadung hieng Abana le Pharpar hai hi Israel rama vadunghai nêk chun a ṭha lem a ni naw am a nih? Chuonga hai chun insilin kân thieng el thei naw am a nih?” a ta. Chuongchun, a ngha kîr a, lunginsenin a fe hmang ta a.

Chun, a siehlawhai chu an hung hnai a, a kuomah, “Pa, zâwlnei chun thil khirkhântak thaw dingin tir sienla che, i thaw naw ding am a nih? ‘Insil la, lo inthieng ta rawh,’ a ti kha ti âwmtak hrim a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.

Chun, Pathien mi kuoma chun ama le a ruolhai po po leh an hung kîr nâwk a, a hmaa chun a ngîr a; ama chun, “Tuhin ngai ta, hnuoi chung po poah, Israel rama chau naw hin chu Pathien a um nawh ti ka hriet tah; chuleiin, tuhin ka ngên che a nih, i siehlaw thilpêk hi la rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “A hmaa ka ngîrna hlak,
Chun, Naaman chun, “Chuong a ni naw leh, ka hni che hi, i siehlaw hi sabengtung lien chi phur hni pil mîn lâktir rawh, i siehlaw hin tuta hnung chu
Hi thila hin i siehlaw chu
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Lungmuongtakin fe rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a kuoma inthawk chu a suok nâwk a, ieng chen amani chu a fe hman ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi siehlaw Gehazi chu, “Khâwm, ka pu hin Suria mi Naaman hi a thil hung chawihai hi la lovin ân fetir nâwk el a,
Chuongchun, Gehazi chun Naaman chu a hnawt ta a. Naaman chun tuin amanih a hung hnawt a hei hmu chun lo biek tumin a tawlailîra inthawk chun a ṭum a, “Ṭha tieng thu a ni de maw?” a ta.

Ama chun, “Ṭha tieng thu nih e. Ka puin ‘Ngai ta, Ephraim tlâng rama inthawkin zâwlneihai naupahai laia mi tlangvâl pahniin an mi hung sir ta thut el a, anni chu tangkaruo talent khat le silfên inthlengna ding pahni pe raw khai,’ tiin a mi hung tir a nih,” a ta.

Naaman chun, “Talent hni hi la raw khai,” a ta. Chuongchun, la ding chun a thlêm a, tangkaruo talent hni le silfên inthlengna ding pahnihai chu ip pahnia hin a thun a, a siehlawhai pahni chu ân phurtir a, a hmaa chun an fepui ta a.
Chun, tlâng a va tlung chun a lâkpêk a, in sûnga hin a sie a; chun, chuonghai chu ân fetir a, an fe ta a.
Ama ruok chu a va lût a, a pu hmaa chun a va ngîr a. Chun, Elisa chun a kuomah, “Khawtaka inthawkin am i hung a, Gehazi?” a lo ti a. Ama chun, “I siehlaw hi khâwlai khawm ka fe nawh ie,” a ta.

Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “A be ding chea a tawlailîra inthawka mi hung ṭum lai khan ka lungril chu i kuomah a fe ve pei a ni naw am a nih? Tangka dâm, silfên dâm, oliv huon dâm, grêp huon dâm, berâm dâm, sebâwng dâm, suokpa le suoknu dâm hi lâk hun a nîm a nih?
Chuongchun, Naaman inphârna khan man a ti che a, kumkhuoin i thlahai khawm man pei a tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, a kuoma inthawk chun vûr anga vâra inphârin a fe suok ta a.
Chun, zâwlneihai naupasalhai chun Elisa kuomah, “En ta hi, i hmaa kan ṭhung khâwmna hi kan ta dingin ân têp taluo a.
Jordan vadungah zu fêng kan ta, chutaka thing chu zu la seng kan ta, kan ṭhung khâwmna ding chutaka chun zu siem kan ti aw?” an ta. Ama chun a dawn a, “Fe ta unla,” a ta.
Chun, mi pakhat chun, “Lungâwi la, i siehlawhai lai hin fe ve ta la,” a ta. Ama chun, “Fe vêng ka tih,” tiin a dawn a.
Chuongchun, anni lai chun a fe ve ta a. Chun, Jordan vadung an tlung chun thing chu an hei phûr a.
Chun, mi pakhatin thing a hei phûr lai tak hin, a hreipui chu tuiah a tla ta a; chun, ama chun “E khai, pu, kan haw a ni bah,” tiin a khêk ta a.
Chun, Pathien mi chun, “Khâwlai tak âm a tla a?” a ta. Ama chun a tlâkna lai ân entir a. Chuongchun, thingtuoi hi a hei sât a, chutaka chun a hei pei lût a, thîr chu a hung inlâng ta a.
Chun, ama chun, “La raw le,” a ta. Chuongchun, a hei ban a, a lâk ta a.
Suria lal chun Israelhai chu a hung rûn a, “Chulai hmun khalai hmuna chun inchân ei tiu,” tiin a upahai chu a rawn a.
Chun, Pathien mi chun Israel lal kuomah, “Chuong ang hmuna chun fe lo dingin fîmkhur rawh, chutaka chun Suria mihai an hung thla ding a nih,” tiin mi a tir hlak a.
Chun, Israel lal chun Pathien miin a lo hril ta hmun chu a vân enthlittir hlak a; chutaka chun vawi hni vawi khat chau khawm ni lovin, a lo inhumhim hlak a.
Chuongchun, chu thua chun Suria lal lungril chu a lunginzîng hle a; chun, a upahai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Eini laia atu hîm Israel lal tienga ṭhang in mi hril nuom naw ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, upahai laia mi pakhat chun, “Tukhawm kan ṭhang nawh ie, pu, aw laltak, Israel rama um zâwlnei Elisa hin i pindan sûngrila i hrilhai hi Israel lal a hril pei a ni lem a nih,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Khâwlai am a um a, va zawng ta u, inmantir ka tih,” a ta. Chun, “Ngai ta, Dothan khuoah a um,” tiin an hril a.
Chuongchun, sakawr dâm, tawlailîr dâm, sakawr tamtakhai chutaka chun a tir a, zânah an va fe a, khuo chu an inhuol ta mup el a.

Chun, Pathien mi siehlaw chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, a va suok chun, ngai ta, sipaihai chun sakawr leh, tawlailîr leh khuo chu an lo inhuol mup el a. Chun, a siehlaw chun a kuomah, “E khai, pu, iengtin am thaw tâng ei ta?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ṭi da ta la, anni tienga ṭhang nêk chun, eini tienga ṭhang an tam lem annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, Elisa chu a ṭawngṭai a, “
Chun, ama tieng an hung thla chun, Elisa chun
Chun, Elisa chun an kuomah, “Hi chu lampui a ni naw a, khuo khawm a ni bawk naw a; mi zui unla in mi zawngpa kuoma chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu,” a ta. Chuongchun, Samari khuoa chun a ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, Samari khaw sûng an hang tlung chun Elisa chun, “
Chun, Israel lal chun anni chu a hmu chun Elisa kuomah, “Pa, that tâwl ka ti,? That tâwl ka ti?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “That lo e, i kâwlhnâm le i thalngula i sal manhai chu i that ding am a nih? Bei le tui hung pe la, fain dâwn hai sienla, an pu kuomah fe nâwk raw hai seh,” a ta.

Chuongchun, fâk ding nasatak a buotsaipêk a; chun, an fâk a, an dâwn zo chun ân fetir nâwk ta vawng a, an pu kuom tieng an fe nâwk ta a. Chuongchun, Suriahai chu Israel rama chun an fe nâwk ta ngai naw a.
Chu hnunga chun Suria lal Benhadad chun a sipai po po a ko khâwm vawng a, Samari khuo a hang inhuol a.
Chun, Samari khuoa chun ṭâm a nasa êm el a; ngai ta, an inhuol tlat a, sabengtung lu hi tangka sâwmrietin an zawr a; chun, vaṭhu êk hi kab hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat tangka pangaah an zawr hiel bawk a.
Chun, Israel lal chu kul khotlânga a fe lai hin nuhmei pakhat hin, “Aw laltak ka pu, mi ṭhangpui rawh,” a lo ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “

Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i ti a ni leh?” a ti nâwk a. Chun, ama chun a dawn a. “Hi nuhmei hin ka kuomah, ‘I naupa hi vawisûna ei fâk dingin thaw la, zîngah ka naupa hi ei fâk thung ding annâwm,’ a ta.
Chun, lal chun chu nuhmei thuhril chu a hriet chun a puon a keithlêr ta a, (kul khotlânga a fe lai a nih) chun, mipuihai chun an hang en a, ngai ta, a pang depa chun saiip puon hi a lo sil zing a.
Chuongchun, ama chun, “Vawisûn hin Saphat naupa Elisa chun a lu a la put hrim hrim chun, Pathien chun a law law mi law el raw se, chu nêka nasa hman khawm chun,” a ta.

Elisa chu a inah a ṭhung a, upahai khawm chu an ṭhung ve a, chun, laltak chun a kuomah mi pakhat a tir a, nisienlakhawm, a mi tir chun a kuom a hung tlung hmain upahai kuoma chun, “Hi tuolthattupa naupa hin ka lu la ve dingin mi a hung tir ti in hriet ve am? To ta u, a mi tir chu a hung tlung phingleh, kawt lo khâr unla, kawtkhâra khan lo dang tlat ro; a hnunga chun a pu kalchawi ri ân hriet a ni nghe nghe naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, chuonga anni a la biek lai mêk chun ngai ta, a mi tir chu a hung tlung thla ta a; chun, laltak chun, “Ngai ta, hi thil ṭha naw hi,
Elisa chun, “
Chun, sipai hotu, lalin a kut a ihung ringsan chun, Pathien mi chu a dawn a, “Ngai ta,
Chun, kul lûtna kawtkhâr bula chun inphâr pali an um a; anni chun, “Iengdinga thi nghâk ela ei inṭhung zing am a na?

‘Khaw sûnga hin lût ei tiu khai,’ ti ding ni inla, khaw sûng an ṭâm a, ei va thi el âwm si a; chun, hitaka hin ṭhung zing inla, ei thi tho tho bawk âwm si a. Chuleiin, thaw ta u, Suria sipaihai tieng hin tlu lût rawk el ei tiu, an mi hla leh ei hring nîng a ta, an mi that le hlak ei thi nîng a ta,” tiin an inbiek a.
Chuongchun, Suria mihai riekhmuna fe ding chun thimbut hin an inthawk suok ta a; chun, Suria mihai riekhmun tawntir an va tlung chun, ngai ta, tukhawm an lo um naw a.
Chuongchun, an tho a, inthim lai chun an tlânse ta a, an puon inhai, an sakawrhai, an sabengtunghai le an riekhmun chu a um ngai ngaiin an tlânsan a, an tlânse ta rak el a.

Chun, chuong inphârhai chun riekhmun tawntir an va tlung chun puon in pakhata hin an va lût a, an fâkin an dâwn a, chutaka tangkaruo dâm, silfênhai chu an lâk a, an va thuphmang a; chun, an va kîr nâwk a, puon in dangah an lût nâwk a, chutaka mi khawm chu an lâk a, an va thuphmang nâwk a.

A nakie chun, “Ei sukdik naw tawp el a, vawisûn hi chanchin lâwmum intlun ni a nih, eini hi ei to zing el a; khawvar ei nghâk chun hrem tuok el ei tih, chuongchun, thaw ta u, lal sûnghai va hril ei tiu,” tiin an inbiek a.

Chuongchun, khaw kawtkhâr vêngtu chu an va ko a, “Suria mihai riekhmunah kan va fe a; chun, ngai ta, tukhawm an lo um naw a, mihriem riva hrim hrim khawm a um naw a, sakawrhai le sabengtunghai chau a lo inthlung a, puon inhai khawm chu a um ngai ngaiin a um zing el,” tiin an hril a.
Chun, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu a ko a; chun, anni chun lal in sûnga mihai chu an va hril a.

Chun, lal chu zâna chun a tho a, a upahai kuoma chun, “Suria mihai mi thaw dân hi hril ka ti cheu, Ei phîngṭâmzie hi an hriet a, chuleiin, ‘Khawpuia inthawka an hung suok chun a hringin lo man ei ta, khawsûnga chun lût el ei tih,’ tiin rama inbihmang dingin an riekhmun an suoksan a ni hi,” a ta.

Chun, a upa pakhat chun a dawn a, “Khawpuia sakawr um sun panga hi tuhai amanih inṭhuoitir raw khai, (ngai ta, Israel mipuihai, a la damhai po po ang an ni tho tho va, ngai ta, Israel mipuihai thia ngaihai ang bawk an ni tho tho annâwm;) chuongchun, va tir phawt ei tiu khai,” a ta.
Chuongchun, tawlailîr keitu sakawr pahni an ṭhuoi a; chun, lal chun, “Va en phawt ta u,” tiin, Suria sipaihai hnawt ding chun a tir a.

Chun, Jordan vadung chenin an va hnawt a, chun, ngai ta, Suria mihai chun an inhmaw leia an pei silfênhai le thuomhnawhai chu lampui intluonin a um zel zul el a. Chun, a mi tirhai chu an hung kîr nâwk a, lal chu an hung hril a.
Chun, mipuihai chu an va suok a, Suria mihai riekhmun chu an va dap ta rak a. Chuongchun,

Chun, lal chun sipai hotu a kut a ihung ringsan kha kul kawtkhâr vêngtuah a ruot a; chun, mipuihai chun kul kawtkhâr bula chun an chîl ta nuoi nuoi el a, Pathien miin a kuoma lal a hung thla laia a lo hril ang khan a thi ta a.

Hieng hi a hung na, Pathien mi chun lal kuomah, “Zingah hieng tik phât hin Samari kul kawtkhâr bulah buṭei tekhâwng hni chu shekel khatah zawr an ta, beiphit indi mi tekhâwng khat chu shekel khatah,” a ti a;
chun, sipai hotuin Pathien mi chu a dawn a, “Ngai ta,
chuong ang ngei chun a chungah a hung tlung ta a; mipuiin kul kawtkhâr bula chun an chîl nuoi nuoi a, an chîlhlum ta a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei chu a tho a, Pathien mi thu ang chun a thaw a, a sûnghai le chun Philistin mihai ramah kum sari an va um ta a.
Chun, kum sari ân vawi hnung chun chu nuhmei chu Philistin mihai rama inthawk chun a kîr nâwk a; a in le lo chu lal kuoma hni dingin a va fe a.
Chun, lal chun Pathien mi siehlaw Gehazi chu, “Elisain thil ropui a thawhai po po mi hang hril ta khai,” tia a lo biek lai tak a na.

Chun, mi pakhat thi ta hnung a sukdam nâwk thu lal chu a lo hril lai tak chun, ngai ta, a naupa a sukdampêk nâwk nuhmei chun a in le lo chu lal a hung hni ve a. Chun, Gehazi chun, “Aw laltak ka pu, hi hi a ni hi nuhmei chu, chun, hi hi a ni a naupa Elisain a sukdampêk nâwk chu,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun nuhmei chu a hang indawn chun a hril ta a. Chuongchun, lal chun hotu pakhat a ruotpêk a, “A ta po po, a loa thil suok po po chenin, hi ram a suoksana inthawka tu chena mi hi pe nâwk vawng ro,” a ta.
Chun, Elisa chu Damaska khuoah a fe a, chun, Suria lal Benhadad chu a damnaw a; chuongchun, “Pathien mi hitaka hin a hung,” tiin an hril a.
Chun, lalin Hazael kuomah, “Lâwmman ding chawi la, Pathien mi chu be dingin va fe rawh, ka natna hi ka ṭha suok nâwk thei ding am

Chuongchun, Hazael chu ama be ding chun a va fe a, lâwmman dingin Damaska khuoa thil ṭha tinrêng sanghâwngsei sâwmli phur a chawi a, a hmaa chun a va ngîr a, “I naupa Benhadad, Suria lalin, ‘Ka na hi ka ṭha suok nâwk ding am?’ ti dingin i kuoma hin a mi hung tir a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Elisa chun a kuomah, “Fe nâwk ta la, a kuomah, ‘Ṭha suok nâwk mawl i tih, a tih,’ ti rawh, amiruokchu, a la thi ngei ding a nih ti chu
Chuongchun, a ta dinga inzakum khawp rauin a mel ta zing el a, chun, Pathien mi chu a ṭap ta a.

Chun, Hazael chun, “Iengdinga ka pu hi a ṭap el am a na?” a ta. Ama chun a dawn a, “Israel mihai chunga i thil ṭha naw thaw ding chu ka hriet leiin a nih, a kulhai la rawpêk i ta, an tlangvâlhai kâwlhnâmin la that i ta, an nau le têhai chu la pei nâwi i ta, nau vawn lai an nuhmeihai chu i la phirthlêr ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Elisa kuoma inthawk chu a suok a, a pu kuom tieng chun, a fe ta a, ama chun, “Elisa chun ieng am a lo hril che a?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Ṭha suok nawk mawl a tih, tiin a mi hril,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a zînga chun puon sâtak a lâk a, tuiah a phûm a, chu chun a hmai chu a lo hup pêk a, a thi ta a; chun Hazael chu a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Israel lal Ahab naupa Joram kum nga ân lal kum chun, (chuong lai chun Jehosaphat chu Juda lal a nih), Juda lal Jehosaphat naupa Jehoram chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ân lal ṭan lai chun kum sâwmthum le kum hni mi a nih; Jerusalem khuoa chun kum riet ro a rêl a.
Ahab sûnghai angin, Israel lalhai lampui hraw chu a hraw ve a; Ahab naunu chu nuhmeiin a nei a nih; chuongchun,

Chuongchun, Joram chu Zair khuoah a tawlailîrhai po po leh a va fe a; chun, zâna chun ân thawk suok a, anni inhuoltu Edom mihai le an tawlailîr chunga hotuhai chu a va do ta a; chun, mihai chu an puon in tiengahai an tlân ta vawng a.
Chuongchun, Edomhai chu tu chen hin Judahai chunga chun an la hel ta zing a nih. Chuong lai vêk chun Libna khuo khawm an lo hel ve a.
Chun, Joram chanchin danghai le a thilthawhai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Joram chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a, a pi le puhai lai David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a; a naupa Ahazia chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Israel lal Ahab naupa Joram inlal kum sâwm le kum hni kum chun Juda lal Jehoram naupa Ahazia chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ahazia chun, ro a rêl ṭan lai chun kum sâwmhni le kum hni mi a nih; chun, Jerusalem khuoa chun kum khat ro a rêl a. A nu hming chu Athalia, Israel lal Omri naunu a nih.
Ahab sûnghai lampui hraw chu a hraw ve a, Ahab sûnghai angin
Ama chu Ahab naupa Joramin Ramoth-gilead khuoa Suria lal Hazael a hang thawnaa chun a ṭhang ve a; chun, Suria mihai chun Joram chu an lo inhliem a.

Chun, lal Joram chu Suria lal Hazael an thawnaa Suria mihaiin Rama khuoa an lo inhliem chu Jezreel khuoah insukdam dingin a kîr nâwk ta a. Chun, Juda lal Jehoram naupa Ahazia chu Ahab naupa Joram a nat lei chun kan dingin Jezreel khuoa chun a zu fe a.
Chun, zâwlnei Elisa chun zâwlneihai naupasalhai laia pakhat chu a ko a, a kuomah, “I dier kei la, hi hriek bâwm hi chawi la, Ramothgilead khuoah va fe rawh;
i va tlung chun Nimsi naupa Jehosaphat naupa Jehu chu va zawng suok la, pindan sûngrilah lûtpui la.
Chuongchun, hriek bâwm hi la la, a lua chun buok la, ‘
Chuongchun, tlangvâl, zâwlnei tlangvâl chu Ramoth-gileada chun a fe ta a.

Chun, a va tlung chun, ngai ta, sipai hotuhai an lo ṭhung khâwm a; chun, ama chun, “Sipai hotu, i kuomah thu incha hril ding ka nei,” a ta. Chun, Jehu chun, “ tu tak kuoma hin am a ni a?” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Nanga kuoma hin a nih, sipai hotu,” a ta.
Ka siehlaw zâwlneihai thisen le
Ahab sûnghai po po chu bohmang vawng an ta; Ahaba inthawk hin naupasal taphawt chu Israel rama mi khuokhir amanih, khuokhir naw amanih khawm ka sukbohmang ding a nih.
Chun, Ahab sûnghai chu Nebat naupa Jeroboam sûnghai le Ahija naupa Baasa sûnghai angin siem ka tih.

Chuongchun, kawt a hawng a, a tlân suok ta a. Chun, Jehu chu a pu upahai lai chun a hung suok a; pakhat chun a kuomah, “Ṭha tieng thu am a nih? Kha invêtpa kha i kuoma iengtiziea hung am a ni leh?” a ta. Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “In hriet mi a na, a thu hril khawm kha in hriet annâwm,” a ta.
Anni chun, “Hre lo ve a, mi hang hril ta khai” an ta. Ama chun, “Hieng ang tak hin a mi ti a ni kha tie! ‘
Chuongchun, mi tinin an puon chu an hlîp hmawk hmawk a, kailâwn chunga chun an phapêk ta seng a, “Jehu chu lal a ni tah,” tiin tawtawrâwt an mût ta a.
Chuongchun, Nimsi nau Jehosaphat naupa Jehu chun Joram chu a phier rûk ta a. (Suria lal Hazael leiin Joram le Israelhai po po chun Ramoth-gilead khuo chu an vêng a;

lal Joram ruok chu Suria lal Hazael le an inthawnaa Suria mihaiin an inhliem kha Jezreel khuoah insukdam dingin a kîr nâwk kha.) Chun, Jehu chun, “Keia tienga ṭhang in ni chun Jezreel khuoah hieng thu hi hril dingin tukhawm khuoa inthawk hi insuoktir naw ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Jehu chu tawlailîrah a chuong a, Jezreel khuoah a fe a, Joram chu chutaka chun a zâl a na; chun, Juda lal Ahazia khawm Joram chu kan dingin a zu fe a.

Chun, Jezreel kula chun râlvêng a ngîr a, ama chun Jehu rawi hung chu a hang hmu a, “Mi tamtak el ka hmu ie,” a ta. Chun, Joram chun, “Sakawr chung chuong mi anni chu tuok dingin va tir la, ‘Ṭha tieng thu am a nih?’ va ti raw hai seh,” a ta.

Chuongchun, mi pakhat sakawr chunga chuong hi a tuok dingin a va fe a, “Lalin hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Ṭha tieng thu am a nih?’ tiin” a ti a. Chun, Jehu chun, “Ṭha tieng thu chu nanga lo hriet ding ieng am a um a? Ka hnunga hin va fe ve el rawh,” a ti a. Chun, râlvêngtu chun, “Ei mi tir chun an kuom chu a va tlung ngei a, nisienlakhawm, a hung kîr nâwk ta dêr nawh,” tiin a hril a.

Chuongchun, mi pakhat sakawr chunga chuong hi a tir nâwk a, ama khawm chun an kuom a va tlung a, “Lalin hieng ang hin a tih: ‘Ṭha tieng thu am a nih?’ tiin,” a ti a. Chun, Jehuin a dawn a, “Ṭha tieng thu chu nanga lo hriet ding ieng am a um leh? Ka hnunga hin va fe ve el rawh,” a ta.

Chun, râlvêngtu chun, “Ama khawma an kuom chu a va tlung ngei a, ama khawm chu a hung kîr nâwk ta dêr nawh; chun, a khal dân khawm saw Nimsi naupa Jehu khal dân chie a nih, mi invêt ang elin a khal hlak a nih,” a ta.

Chun, Joram chun, “Buotsai ta u,” a ta. Chun, a tawlailîr chu an buotsai a. Chun, Israel lal Joram le Juda lal Ahazia chu mâni tawlailîr ve vein an va suok a, Jehu chu tuok dingin an va fe a; Jezreel mi Naboth huonah an va hmu a.
Chun, Joramin Jehu a hei hmu chun, “Ṭha tieng thu am a nih, Jehu?” a hei ti a. Chun, ama chun a lo dawn a, “I nu Jezebel hin uiret le dâwi a chîng sûng chu ṭha tieng thu ieng am um thei a ta?” a ta.
Chun, Joram chun a kei her a, a tlân a, Ahazia kuomah, “Inhlêmna a um a ni hi, Ahazia,” a ta.
Chun, Jehu chun a thalngul chu a theitâwpin a kuoi a, Joram dâr le dâr inkâra chun a kâp a, thal chu a lungah a lût thleng a, a tawlailîra chun a awp ta rawk a.
Chuongchun, Jehu chun a sipai hotu Bidkar kuomah, “Pawm la Jezreel mi Naboth huon hmunah pei thla rawh, kha hmaa a pa Ahab hnunga ei pahnia ei chuong hmunkhat laia

Nisienlakhawm, Juda lal Ahazia chun chu chu a hmu chun Beth-haggan tieng a tlân ta a. Chun, Jehu chun a hnawt a, “Ama khawm tawlailîra khan that nghâl ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, Ibleam khaw kâwl, Gur hang fenaa chun an kâp hliem a. Chun, Megiddo khuoah a tlân lût a, chutaka chun a thi ta a.
Chun, a mihai chun Jerusalem khuoah tawlailîrin an fepui a, ama thlânah a pi le puhai lai David khawpuiah an phûm ta a.
Ahab naupa Joram kum sâwm le kum khat ân lal kumin Ahazia chu Judahai chungah ân lal ṭan a nih.
Chun, Jehu chu Jezreel khuo a va lût chun Jezebel chun a lo hriet a; chuongchun, a mithai a lo nâl a, a sam dâm a lo chei a, tukvera hin a lo dâk a.
Chun, Jehu chu kul kawtkhâra a hung lût lai takin, “Ṭha tieng thu am a ni, nang, mâni puhai thattu, Zimri?” a lo ti a.
Chun, ama chu tukver tieng ngha chun a hung dâk a, “Tu am ka tienga ṭhanghai chu? Tuhai am?” a ta. Mi tillâk pahni amanih, pathum amani hi ama tieng ngha chun an hung dâk a.
Chun, ama chun, “Hung the thla ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, an the thlâk a, a thi chun bang le sakawrhai chu a khieng nuol el a; chun, ama chun a lo chîl a.
Chun, a lût a, a fâkin a dâwn a; “Ṭawngsephurnu kha va ngaiven unla, va phûm ro, lal naunu a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, phûm dingin an va fe a; nisienlakhawm, a luru dâm, a ke bâwr dâm, a kutpha bâwr dâm ngawt naw chu an va hmu ta naw a.
Jezebel ruong chu Jezreel khaw kul bulah huona êk ang el la nîng a tih; chuongchun, hi hi Jezebel a ni hi aw, an ti nawna dingin,’ ti thu a hril kha a ni hi,” a ta.
Ahab chun Samaria chun naupasal sâwmsari a nei a. Chun, Jehu chun Samaria Jezreel khaw hotu, upahai kuoma le Ahab nauhai lo enkawl tleituhai kuoma chun lekha a thawn a.
“Hi lekha hi in hmu phingleh, in pu nauhai chu in kuoma um an na; tawlailîrhai, sakawrhai, kulpui nei khuohai dâm, râlthuomhai khawm in nei a na;
chuongchun, in pu nauhai laia a ṭha tak le a fel tak zawng suok unla, a pa lal ṭhungphaah inṭhungtir unla, in pu sûnghai do chu dopui ro,” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun an ṭi ta êm êm el a, “Ngai ta u, lal pahni khawm khan an hne ta naw a na, einin iengtin am hne thei hlak ei ta?” an ta.

Chun, lal in sûnga hotu tak dâm, khawpui awptuhai dâm, upahai le naupanghai lo enkawltuhai chun Jehu kuoma chun, “I siehlawhai kan nih, thaw dinga i mi hril ang phawt chun thaw pei kan tih; tukhawm lalah siem naw ning ung ah, nangin ṭha i ti ang angin thaw el rawh,” tiin mi an tir a.

Chun, an kuomah, “Keia tienga ṭhang in na, ka thu in awi ding chun in pu naupasalhai lu hang la unla, zîngah hieng tik phât hin Jezreelah ka kuomah hung ro,” tiin lekha a thawn nâwk a. Lal naupasalhai chu sâwmsari an na, khawpui mi lienhai, anni enkawl tleituhai kuoma chun an um a.
Chun, lekha chu an hmu chun lal naupahai chu an man a, a sâwmsari chun an that a, an luhai chu bâwmrângah an sie a, Jezreel khuoah a kuomah an inphur ta a.
Chun, thangko a hung a, “Lal naupasalhai lu chu an hung lâk tah,” tiin a hril a. Chun, ama chu, “Kul lûtna kawtkhâr bulah hmun hniah intieng khâwm unla, zinga chen um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a zînga chun a va suok a, a ngîr a, mi po po kuoma chun, “Mi fel in nih; ngai ta u, ka pu chu ka phier rûk a, ka lo sukhlum ta luo a; anleh, hienghai po po hi tu that am an ni a?
Chun, a tho a, a suok a, Samariah a fe ta a. Chun, lampuia berâmpuhai berâm hmul vâwna hmun a va tlung chun,
Jehu chun Juda lal Ahazia unauhairawi a hmu a, “Tuhai am in ni a?” a ta. Anni chun, “Ahazia unauhai kan na, lal nauhai le; lalnu nauhai chibai kan zu bûk ding a nih,” tiin an dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “A hringin man tâwl ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, a hringin an man tâwl a, berâm hmul vâwna in khur bula chun an that a, mi sâwmli le pahni zet an nih, pakhat khawm an hla nawh.

Chun, chutaka inthawka a suok hnung chun Rekab naupa Jehonadab, ama tuok dinga hung a va hmu a; chuongchun, chibai a bûk a, a kuomah, “I chunga lungril indik ka put ang hin lungril indik i put ve am chu?” a ta. Jehonadab chun, “Put e,” tiin a dawn a. “Anleh i kut mi hang pe ta,” a ta. Chuongchun, a kut chu a hang pêk a; chun, ama chun a kuomah a tawlailîr sûngah a kei lût ta a.
Chun, ama chun, “Ka kuomah hung ve la,
Chun, Samari a va tlung chun Ahab sûnghai Samaria la um sunhai chu a sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chun a that pei a, Elija kuoma a hril,
Chun, Jehu chun mipuihai po po chu a ko khâwm a, an kuoma chun, “Ahab khan Baal rawng hi a bâwl met chau a na, Jehu ruok hin chu nasatakin a nih a bâwl ding chu.

Chuongchun, Baal zâwlneihai po po le a betuhai po po le a thiempuhai po po ka kuoma hin hung ko khâwm ta u; tukhawm a kim naw um naw raw se, Baal kuoma hin inthâwina ropuitak inhlân ding ka nei a, tukhawm a kim naw taphawt chu hring dêr naw nih,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, Jehu chun Baal betuhai chu sukhlum tumin, var vervêkin a thaw a nih.
Chun, Jehu chun, “Baal hmingin ruoiṭhena ropui siem ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, chu chu an inthawn vêl ta a.

Chun, Jehu chun Israel ram po poah a thawn vêl a; chuongchun, Baal betuhai po po chu an hung a, ṭhang naw hrim hrim an um nawh. Chun, Baal ina chun an lût a; chun, Baal in chu kawtkhâra inthawka châwrtieng chenin an sip mup el a.
Chun, inthuomna puon enkawltu kuomah, “Baal betuhai po po hi inthuomna puon hung lapêk ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, inthuomna puonhai chu a hung lâkpêk a.
Chun, Jehu chu Rekab naupa Jehonadab le chun Baal inah an lût a, Baal betuhai kuoma chu, “Hitaka hin Baal betuhai ti lo,

Chun, inthâwinahai le pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân dingin an lût a. Jehu chun tuola chun mi sâwmriet a lo inngîr ta hrim a, “Hieng in kuta ka pêk ta cheu hi tukhawm an suok vai chun, ân suotu chun, a hringna aia chun ama hringna chu chân a tih,” a ta.

Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu ân hlân zo chun Jehu chun vêngtu sipai le an hotu kuoma chun, “Va lût unla, va that ro, tukhawm insuoktir naw ro,” a ta. Chun, kâwlhnâmin an sât rak el a; chun, vêngtu sipai le an hotuhai chun an pei suok a; chun, Baal in umna khuoa chun an fe a.
Chun, Baal ina milimhai chu an lâksuok a, an raw a.
Chun, Baal lungphun chu an sukchim a, Baal in chu an suksiet a, inhnâwmna inah an hmang ta a; tu chen hin an la hmang zing a nih.
Chuong ang chun Jehu chun Baal chu Israel rama chun a sukbohmang a nih.
Chun,
Nisienlakhawm, Jehu chun
Chuong lai chun
Jordana inthawka khawsak tieng, Gilead ram po po, Gadhai le, Reubenhai le, Manassehai dâm, Arnon ruoma Aroera inthawka Gilead le Basan ram tlung rakin.
Jehu chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai, a thilthawtheizie po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, Jehu chu a pi le puhai kuoma chun a in ta a, Samari khuoah an phûm ta a. Chun, a naupa Jehoahaz chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Samari rama Israelhai chunga Jehu rorêl sûng chu kum sâwmhni le kum riet a nih.
Chun, Ahazia nu Athalia chun a naupa a thi ti a lo hriet chun, a tho a, lal nauhai po po chu a that vawng a.

Ahazia naupa Joas ruok chu lal Joram naunu, Ahazia farnu Jehoseba chun lal naupasal an thathai laia inthawk chun a ṭhuoi hmang a, a enkawltu leh khum pindanah ân umtir a. Athalia hmu thei lo dingin an thuphmang a; chuongchun, that a ni ve ta naw a.
Chun, ama chu amanu le chun
Chun, a kum sarinaa chun Jehoiadain Kereth mihai le vêngtu sipaihai laia mi sipai za hotuhai chu ân kotir a,
Chun, ama chun, “In thaw ding chu hieng ang hi a nih; nangni laia châwlnia hung dinghai hi hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khatin lal in chu vêng in ta;

chun, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu Sur kul kawtkhârah um in ta; chun, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu vêngtuhai hnungtienga kul kawtkhâra chun um in tih; chuong ang chun in chu vêng in ta, a dangtuah in um ding a nih.
Chun, nangni laia pâwl hni, châwlnia ṭîn dinghai po po chun lal kâwl vêla
Chun, mi tinin hriemhrei chawiin lal chu inhuol vêl in ta; tukhawm huol sûnga hung lût taphawt chu lo that pei ding a nih; chuongchun, lal chu a lût le suok chu zui pei unla,” tiin thu a pêk a.

Chun, sipai za hotuhai chun thiempu Jehoiada thupêk ang po po chun an thaw vawng a; chun, mâni rawihai seng châwlnia hung dinghai le; châwlnia ṭîn dinghai chu an ṭhuoi a, thiempu Jehoiada kuomah an fe a.
Chun, thiempu chun sipai za hotuhai chu
Chun, vêngtu sipaihai chun hriemhrei chawi sengin, in changtieng panga inthawk vawitieng chenin, maichâm le in hrûla chun lal chu an ngîr huol tuou a.
Chuongchun, lal naupa chu a hung ṭhuoi suok a, lallukhum ân khumtir a, inhriettirna thu chu a pêk a, lalah an siem a, hriek an nâl a; chun, an kut an ben a, “Pathienin laltak humhim raw se,” an ta.
Chun, vêngtu sipaihai le mipuihai ri chu Athaliain a lo hriet chun,

chun, a hang en a, ngai ta, lal chu dân angin ban hrûla hin a lo ngîr a, sipai hotuhai le tawtawrâwt mûttuhai chu lal kâwlah an ngîr a; chun, chu rama mi po po chu an hlim êm êm a, tawtawrâwt dâm an mût an mût a. Chuongchun, Athalia chun a puonhai a keithlêr a, “Phier rûkna! Phier rûkna a ni tah ie,” tiin a khêk a.

Chun, thiempu Jehoiada chun sipai chunga hotua ruot sipai za hotuhai chu thu a pêk a, an kuomah, “Sipaihai kâra khan amanu kha insuoktir ro, tukhawm ama zui taphawt chu kâwlhnâma sât hlum ding nîng a tih,” a ta; thiempu chun, “
Chuongchun, lampui an inâwng a; chun, sakawr lûtna lampuiah lal inah a fe a; chutaka chun a nih an that chu.
Chun, Jehoiada chun
Chun, chu rama mi po pohai chu Baal inah an fe a, an sukchim a; a maichâmhai le a limhai chu an suknâwi vawng a; Baal thiempu Mattan khawm chu maichâm bulah an that a. Chun, thiempu chun
Chun, sipai za hotuhai, Kereth mi dâm, vêngtu sipaihai le, chu rama mi po po chu a ṭhuoi a,
Chuongchun, chu rama mi po po chu an lâwm a, chun, khawpui chu buoi lovin a um ta a; chun Athalia chu kâwlhnâmin lal inah an that a.
Jehoasin ro a rêl ṭan lai chun kum sari mi a nih.
Jehu kum sari ân lal kum chun Jehoas chu ân lal ṭan a; Jerusalem khuoah kum sâwmli ân lal a; a nu hming chu Zibia, Beer-seba khuoa mi a nih.
Chun, thiempu Jehoiadain Jehoas chu ân chûktir sûng po chu
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu sukbohmang a ni chuong nawh; bâwlhmunahai chun mihai chu an inthâwiin riminhnik an la raw zing tho a.
thiempuhaiin an hmêlhriethaia inthawkin lo la seng hai sienla, chuongchu, in sie siemṭhat ṭûlna lai hai siemṭhatnain hmang raw hai se,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, lal Jehoas chu kum sâwmhni le kum thum ân lal hnung khawmin thiempuhai chun in sie chu an la siem naw rawp a.

Chuongchun, lal Jehoas chun thiempu Jehoiada le thiempu danghai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Iengdinga in sietna laihai hi in siem naw am? Tuhin chu in hmêlhriethai laia inthawkin tangka chu la ta naw unla, in se siemna dingin pe suok lem ta ro,” a ta.
Chun, thiempuhai chun mihai kuoma inthawka tangka lâk ta lo le, in sietna lai siemtu ni lo chu an remti a.
Amiruokchu, thiempu Jehoiada chun bâwm a lâk a, a sîn a verpawp a,
Chun, bâwma chun tangka a tam ta hle ti an hriet po leh lal lekhaziektu le thiempu laltak chu an hang fe a, an fûn a,
Chun, an tangka tiem chu sinthawhai,
Amiruokchu,
sinthawtuhai an pêk hlak a;
Chun, sinthawtuhai an pêk dinga tangka an inkawltirhai khawm kha an enzuipui chuong naw a, anni chun ringumtakin an thaw hlak si a.
Chun, Suria lal Hazael chun Gath khuo a hang rûn a, a hang lâk a; chun, Hazael chu Jerusalema fe pei a tum a.
Chun, Juda lal Jehoas chun Juda lal a puhai Jehosaphat hai dâm, Jehoram hai dâm, Ahazia hai dâm, lo inhlân tah thil serhai po po le, ama thil serhai le
Chuongchun, Joas chanchin danghai, a thilthawhai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, a mihai chu an tho a, ama an phier rûk a, Joas chu Silla pan thlâkna lampuiah Millo inah an thaw a, an sukhlum a.
Ama mi Shimeath naupa Zozakar le Somer naupa Jehozabad chun an that a nih; chuongchun, a pi le puhai lai David khawpuia chun an phûm a; chun, a naupa Amazia chu a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Juda lal Ahazia naupa Joas kum sâwm hni le kum thum ân lal kum chun Jehu naupa Jehoahaz chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoa chun ân lal ṭan a, kum sâwm le kum sari ân lal a.
Chun,
Chun, Jehoahaz chun
Amiruokchu, Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a thaw Jeroboam sûnghai suolna kha an mâksan naw a; an la chîng ta zing lem a; chun, Samari khuoa chun Asera khawm chu a la um zing nghe nghe a.

Jehoahaz chu a mihai laia sakawr chung chuong mi sâwmnga le tawlailîr sâwm le, sipai sîng khat ti naw chu nei a phalpêk si naw a, Suria lal chun a sukbohmang vawng a, pilvut childip ang elin a siem a nih.
Chuongchun, Jehoahaz chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai, a thilthawtheizie dâm chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Jehoahaz chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a; chun, Samari khuoa chun an phûm a; chun, a naupa Joas chu a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Juda lal Joas kum sâwmthum le kum sari ân lal kum chun Jehoahaz naupa Jehoas chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoah ân lal ṭan a; kum sâwm le kum ruk ân lal a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Joas chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai dâm, Juda lal Amazia a thaw laia a thilthawtheizie dâm chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Joas chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a; chun Jeroboam chu a lal ṭhungphaah a ṭhung a, chun Joas chu Samari khuoah Israel lalhai lai an phûm ta a.
Chun, Elisa chun a kuomah “Thalngul le thalhai hung la ta,” a ta; chun, thalngul le thalhai a hung lâk a.
Chun, Israel lal kuoma chun, “Thalngul kha hang chel ta,” a ti a, chuongchun, a hang chel a. Chun, Elisa chun lal kut chunga chun a kut ân nghat a.
Chun, ama chun, “Saktieng tukver hang hawng ta,” a ta, chun, a hang hawng a. Chun, Elisa chun, “Kâp rawh,” a ta, chun, a hang kâp a, chun, ama chun, “
Chun, “Thalhai kha hung la ta,” a ti nâwk a; chuongchun, a hei lâk a. Chun, Israel lal kuoma chun, “Hnuoi kha hei sun ta,” a ta; chuongchun, vawi thum a hei sun a, a ma ta el a.

Chuongchun, Pathien mi chu a chunga chun a lunginsen ta a, “Vawi nga, vawi ruk lai i sun ding i sawnnaw; chuongchun, Suria mihai chu bohmang dêr khawpin i hne ding a nih. Amiruokchu, Suria mihai chu vawi thum chau i hne ding a ni ta hi,” a ta.
Chun, Elisa chu a thi a, an phûm ta a. Chun, kum a hung invawi po hin, Moab mihai chun an ram hi an hung rûn hlak a.

Chun, mi pakhat an phûm ding lai takin, ngai ta, rûntu pâwl pakhat an hei hmu a; chuongchun, ama chu Elisa thlâna chun an thlâk el ta a; chun, a ruong chun Elisa ruhai chu a zu tâwk phingleh, a hung hring nâwk a, a hung ngîr el ta a.
Chun, Suria lal Hazael chun Jehoahaz hun sûng chun Israelhai chu a nêksâwr zing a.
Nisienlakhawm,
Chun, Suria lal Hazael chu a thi a, a naupa Benhadad chu ama aiaw chun ân lal ta a.
Chun, Jehoahaz naupa Jehoas chun Hazael naupa Benhadadin a pa Jehoahaz a rûn a, khuo a lâkpêkhai kha a lâkpêk nâwk a, Joas chun vawi thum a hne a, Israel ram khuohai chu a lâk nâwk a.
Israel lal Jehoahaz naupa Joas kum hni ân lal kum chun Juda lal Joas naupa Amazia ân lal ṭan a.
Ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwmhni le kum nga mi a na, Jerusalemah kum sâwmhni le kum kuo ân lal a, a nu hming chu Jehoadin, Jerusalem mi a nih.
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai ruok chu sukbo a ni chuong nawh; bâwlhmunahai chun mihai chu an lân thâwiin, riminhnik an la raw zing hlak a.
Chun, a ram chu a hang indin nghet phingleh, a mihai a pa lal thattuhai kha a that ve thung a;
Edom mihai chu Machi Ruomah sîng khat a that a, Sela khuo chu a thaw a, a lâk a, a hming dingin Joktheel ân bûk a, tu chen hin an la ti a nih.
Chuongchun, Amazia chun Israel lal Jehu naupa Jehoahaz nau Jehoas kuoma chun, “Thaw ta, hmai sanah inentuong ei tih khai,” tiin mi a tir a.

Chun, Israel lal Jehoas chun, Juda lal Amazia kuomah, “Lebanon tlânga hlingin Lebanon tlânga Sidar thing kuomah ‘I naunu kha ka naupa nuhmeiah inneitir ta khai,’ tiin ân cha a; chun, Lebanon tlânga ramsa a hung a, hling chu a hung chîl thlûk dêr el ta a.

Nang hin Edom mihai chu i hne ngei luo a, i lungril a hung chapo tah a ni hi, i chapona kha intawmpui ṭawk ṭawk el rawh, nang le Juda ram puma sietna, i ta dinga thil ṭha naw ding iengdingin am i cho suok ding an leh,” tiin mi a tir ve a.
Nisienlakhawm, Amazia chun a lo ngai nuom naw a. Chuongchun, Israel lal Jehoas chu a hang fe a, Juda lal Amazia le chun Juda ram Bethsemes khuoa chun hmai sanah an inen ta ngei a.
Chun, Juda chu Israelhai hmaa chun a lo tlâwm ta a, mi tin chu mâni in tieng an fe ta seng a.

Chun, Israel lal Jehoas chun Juda lal Ahazia naupa Jehoas nau Amazia chu Bethsemesa chun a man a, Jerusalem khuoah a fe a, Jerusalem kul chu Ephraim kul kawtkhâra inthawka kul kil kawtkhâr chenin tawng za li zet a sukchim a.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Jehoas thilthaw chanchin danghai, a thilthawtheiziehai, Juda lal Amazia a thaw thu dâm chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Jehoas chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in a, Samari khuoah Israel lalhai lai an phûm a; chun, a naupa Jeroboam chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Juda lal Joas naupa Amazia chu Israelhai lal Jehoahaz naupa Jehoas thi hnungin kum sâwm le kum nga a la dam a.
Chuongchun, Amazia chanchin danghai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Jerusalem khuoah ama chu an phier rûk a, chuongchun, Lakis khuoah a tlân a; nisienlakhawm, Lakis khuoa chun mi an inhnawttir a, chutaka chun an that ta a.
Chun, a ruong chu sakawrin an fepui a, a pi le puhai lai David khawpui Jerusalema chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, Juda mi po pohaiin kum sâwm le kum ruk mi Azaria chu an ṭhuoi a, a pa Amazia aiah lalin an siem ta a.
Ama chun Elath khuo chu a siemṭha nâwk a, Juda ramah an bel nâwk a, chu hnunga chun lal chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a.
Juda lal Joas naupa Amazia kum sâwm le kum nga ân lal kum chun Israel lal Joas naupa Jeroboam chu Samari khuoah ân lal ṭan a, kum sâwmli le kum khat ân lal a.
Chun,

Chuongchun, Jeroboam chan-chin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai, a thilthawtheizie dâm, a râl do thu dâm, kha hmaa Juda ram chan ni hlak Damaska le Hamath khuo Israelhai ta dinga a hung lâkpêk nâwk thuhai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Jeroboam chu a pi le pu, Israel lalhai kuoma chun a in ve a; chuongchun, a naupa Zekaria chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Israel lal Jeroboam kum sâwmhni le kum sari ân lal kum chun Juda lal Amazia naupa Azaria chu ân lal ṭan a.
An lal ṭantir chun ama chu kum sâwm le kum ruk mi a na. Jerusalema chun kum sâwmnga le kum hni ân lal a; a nu hming chu Jekolia, Jerusalem mi a nih.
Chun, a pa Amazia thilthaw ang po thaw vein,
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu sukbo a ni chuong nawh, bâwlhmunahai chun mihai chu an lân thâwiin, riminhnik an la raw zing hlak.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Azaria chanchin dang a thilthawhai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmthum le kum riet ân lal kum chun Jeroboam naupa Zekaria chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoah thla ruk sûng ân lal a.
Chun, a puhai thaw ang bawk,
Chun, Jabes naupa Sallum chun ama a phier rûk a, mipuihai hmaa chun a thaw a, a that a, a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Zekaria chanchin danghai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Juda lal Uzzia kum sâwmthum le kum kuo ân lal kum chun Jabes naupa Sallum chu ân lal ṭan a; Samari khuoah thla khat sûng ân lal a.
Chun, Gadi naupa Menahem chu Tirza khuoa inthawkin a hang fe a, Samari khuoah a fe a; Jabes naupa Sallum chu Samari khuoa chun a thaw a, a that a, a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chuongchun, Sallum chanchin danghai, a phier rûkna thuhai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a nih.
Chuongchun, Menahem chun Tirzaa inthawk chun Tipsa khuo le a sûnga um po pohai le a ramhai chu a thaw a, an inhawng naw leiin a do a nih; chuonga nau vawnlai nuhmeihai po po chu a phirthlêr a.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmthum le kum kuo ân lal kum chun Gadi naupa Menahem chu Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a; Samari khuoah kum sâwm ân lal a.
Chun,
Assuria lal Pula chun an ram chu a hung thaw a; ram chu a nei nghetpui theina dingin Menahem chun Pula chu tangka talent sâng a pêk a.
Chun, Menahem chun Assuria lal pêk dingin Israel mi neinunghai po poa inthawk chun tangka shekel sâwmnga seng a dâwl a. Chuongchun, Assuria lal chu a kîr nâwk ta a, chu rama chun a um zing naw a.
Chuongchun, Menahem chan-chin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Menahem chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ve a; chun, a naupa Pekahia chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmnga ân lal kum chun Menahem naupa Pekahia chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoah ân lal ṭan a, kum hni sûng ân lal a.

A sipai hotu Remalia naupa Pekain ama chu a phier rûk a, a kuoma chun Gilead mi sâwmnga an um ve a; chuongchun, Pekahia chu Samari khuoa lal ina kulah Argob le Arie leh chun a that a; a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chuongchun, Pekahia chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmnga le kum hni ân lal kum chun Remalia naupa Peka chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoa chun ân lal ṭan a; kum sâwmhni ân lal a.
Chun,

Israel lal Peka inlal laiin Assuria lal Tiglath-pileser chun Ijon khuo dâm, Abel-beth-maaka khuo dâm, Janoa khuo dâm, Kedes khuo dâm, Hazor khuo dâm, Gilead le Galili ram dâm, Naphtali ram po po chu a lâk a; chun, Assuria rama chun salah a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Ela naupa Hosea chun Remalia naupa Peka chu a phier rûk a, a thaw a, a that a. Uzzia naupa Jotham kum sâwmhni ân lal kum chun a aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chuongchun, Peka chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Israel lal Remalia naupa Peka kum hni ân lal kum chun Juda lal Uzzia naupa Jotham chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwmhni le kum nga mi a na; Jerusalemah kum sâwm le kum ruk ân lal a; a nu hming chu Jerusa, Zadok naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa Uzzia thilthaw ang po thaw vein;
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu sukbo a ni chuong nawh; bâwlhmunahai chun mihai chu an lân thâwiin, rim inhnik an la raw zing hlak.
Chuongchun, Jotham chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuong lai chun Suria lal Rezin le, Remalia naupa Peka chu Judahai thaw dingin
Chun, Jotham chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a, a pi le puhai lai a pu David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a, a naupa Ahaz chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Remalia naupa Peka kum sâwm le kum sari ân lal kum chun Juda lal Jotham naupa Ahaz chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ahaz chu ân lal ṭantirin kum sâwmhni mi a nih; chun, Jerusalemah kum sâwm le kum ruk ân lal a. A pu David angin
Chun, bâwlhmunahai, tlângahai, thing hring hmun tin hnuoia dâm ân thâwi a, riminhnik a raw a.

Chuong lai chun Suria lal Rezin chun Elath khuo chu Suria rama dingin a lâk nâwk a, Judahai chu Elath khuoa inthawk chun a hnawtsuok a; chun, Suria mihai chun Elath khuo chu an va hluo a, tu chen hin an la um zing a nih.

Chuongchun, Ahaz chun Assuria lal Tiglath-pileser kuomah, “I siehlaw le i naupa ka nih annâwm, a mi thaw dinga hung inthawk, Suria lal kuta inthawk le Israel lal kuta inthawk hin mi hang sansuok ta khai,” tiin mi a tir a.
Chun, Ahaz chun

Chun, lal Ahaz chu Assuria lal Tiglath-pileser be dingin Damaska khuoah a fe a, Damaska khuoa maichâm chu a va hmu a; chuongchun, lal Ahaz chun chu maichâm lim le an siem dân ang chiea enkhi dingin thiempu Urija kuomah ân phur a.
Chun, thiempu Urija chun maichâm a hang siem a; lal Ahazin Damaska khuoa inthawka a thawn ang chie chun thiempu Urija chun Damaska khuoa inthawka lal Ahaz hung hma chun a lo siem hman diem a.
Chun, Damaska khuoa inthawka lal a hung tlung chun lal chun maichâm chu a hei hmu a; chun, lal chun maichâm chu a pan hnai a, a hang lâwn a.
Chun, maichâma chun a pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai rawin a beiphit thilinhlânhai chu ân hlân a; a dâwn ding thilinhlân chu a buok a, ân remna thilinhlân thisen chu a the bawk a.

Chun, lal Ahaz chun, “maichâm lientaka hin zingtienga pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai, zântienga beiphit thilinhlân dâm, lal pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm, a beiphit thilinhlân dâm, a ram mipui po po pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm, an beiphit thilinhlân dâm, an dâwn ding thilinhlân dâm le hin inhlânin raw la; chun, a chunga chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân thisen po po le, inthâwina thisen po po chu the rawh, dâr maichâm ruok chu ka biekna ding ning a ta,” tiin thiempu Urija chu thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, thiempu Urija chun lal Ahaz thupêk ang po po chun a thaw ta a.
Chun, châwl nia dinga chung neia lampui ina an siem le tuoltienga lal lûtna chu Assuria lal lei chun
Chuongchun, Ahaz thilthaw chanchin danghai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Juda lal Ahaz kum sâwm le kum hni ân lal kum chun Ela naupa Hosea chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoa chun ân lal ṭan a; kum kuo ân lal a.
Chun,
Assuria lal Salmaneserin a hang rûn a; chuongchun, Hosea chu a siehlawah a um ta a, sie dâm a pêk hlak a.

Chun, Assuria lal chun Hosea in a phier rûk thu a lo hriet a, Aigupta lal So kuomah mi a tir bawk a, kum tina a pêk hlak ang khan Assuria lal chu sie chu a pêk ta bawk si naw a; chuleiin, Assuria lal chun intângna inah khuop pumin a khum ta a.
Chuongchun, Assuria lal chun ram po po chu a hrût suok vawng a, Samari khuoa chun a hang fe a, kum thum sûng ân huol a.
Hosea kum kuo ân lal kum chun Assuria lal chun Samari khuo chu a lâk a, Israel mihai chu Assuria rama chun a ṭhuoi a, Hala rama dâm, Gozan rama Habor vadunga dâm, Media mihai khuoa dâm ân umtir a.
Chuong anga an umna san chu Israel mipuihai chun Aigupta lal Pharao kuta inthawkin, Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu
Chun, Israel thlahai chun
chuong bâwlhmunhai po poa chun
Chuong sa khawm chun an pawm nuom naw a, an pi le pu,
Chun, a thuruothai, an pi le puhai kuoma a thuthlunghai, an kuoma thu inhriettirhai chu an pawisa nuom naw a; thil teplo mei mei an pawm a, teplo mei mei an hung ni ta a; an chungchâng thua
Chun, an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai chu meiah an inlûttir a, aisân le dawi dâm an chîng a,
Chuleiin,
Judahai khawm chun
Chun,
Israelhai chu David sûnghai an nina chu a peipêk ta a, chuongchun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam kha lal dingin an siem a, chun, Jeroboam chun Israelhaiin
Chun, Israel thlahai chun Jeroboam thil suksuolna ang po po chu an thaw ve a, an mâksan ngai hrim hrim naw a,
chuonghai chu

Chun, Assuria lalin Babulon khuoa mihai, Kutha khuoa mihai, Ava khuoa mihai, Hamath khuoa mihai, Sepharvaim khuoa mihai ân cha suok a; Samari ram khuoahai chun Israel mihai hmun ân hluotir a, chuongchun, Samari ram chu an hluo a, a khuoahai chun an um ta a.
Chuongchun, chutaka an hang um hlim chun

Chuongchun, Assuria lal kuoma chun, “I hung sawn hnamhai hin, Samari ram khuo în hluotirhai hin hieng lai ram Pathien biek dân hi an hriet ve naw a; chuleiin, anni lai sakeibakneihai a tir ta a; chun, ngai ta, hieng lai ram Pathien biek dân an hriet naw leiin a se hlak a nih,” tiin an hril a.
Chuongchun, Assuria lal chun, “Khataka sala in ṭhuoihai laia mi thiempu pakhat ṭhuoi unla, hung um ve sienla, chu ram Pathien biek dân chu inchûktir raw se,” tiin thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Samari rama inthawka an ṭhuoihai laia thiempu pakhat chu Bethel khuoah a va um a,
Nisienlakhawm, hnam tin chun mâni pathien seng an siem a, Samari mihaiin bâwlhmun an lo siemahai chun hnam tinin mâni umna khuo sengah an sie a,
Babulon mihai chun Sukkothbenoth an siem a, chun Kut mihai chun Nergal an siem a, Hamath mihai chun Asima an siem a;
Ava mihai chun Nibhaz le Tartak an siem a; chun, Sepharvaim mihai chun Sepharvaimhai pathien Adrammelek le Anammelek hmingin an nauhai an raw hlak a.
Chuongchun,
chuongchun, thuruot dâm, rorêl dâm, dân dâm, thupêk dâm a lo inziekpêk ta cheu kha kumkhuoin in pawm zing ding a na; pathien danghai chu in ṭi ding a ni nawh,
chun, in kuoma thu ka thlung hi in theinghil bawk ding a ni naw a, pathien danghai chu in ṭi ding a ni bawk nawh;
Iengtin khawmin an pawm nuom chuong naw a, kha hmaa an thaw dân angin an la thaw zing a.
Chuongchun, chuong hnamhai chun
Chun, Ela naupa Israel lal Hosea kum thum ân lal kum chun Juda lal Ahaz naupa Hezekia chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwmhni le kum nga mi a nih; chun, Jerusalemah kum sâwmhni le kum kuo ân lal a; a nu hming chu Abi, Zekaria naunu a nih.
Chun, a pu David thilthaw ang po thaw vein,
Ama chun
Chuongchun,
Philistin mihai chu Gaza khuo chenin a ram chin po po leh, râl vêngtuhai in insânga inthawka kul nei khuo chenin a hne vawng a.
Chun, lal Hezekia kum li ân lal kum, Israel lal Ela naupa Hosea kum sari ân lal kum chun Assuria lal Salmaneser chun Samari khuo a hang thaw a, a hang inhuol a.
Chun, kum thum ân vawi kum chun a lâk ta a; Hezekia kum ruk ân lal kum, Israel lal Hosea kum kuo an lal kumin a nih Samari khuo chu a lâk chu.
Chun, Assuria lal chun Israelhai chu Assuria ramah a ṭhuoi a, Hala rama dâm, Gozan rama Habor vadunga dâm, Media mihai khuoa dâm ân umtir ta a;
Chun, lal Hezekia kum sâwm le kum li ân lal kumin Assuria ram lal Sennakerib chu Judai rama khuo kulpui nei po pohai chu thaw dingin a hang fe a; a lâk ta a.
Chun, Juda lal Hezekia chun Lakis khuoa Assuria lal kuoma chun, “Thil ka lo suksuol tah a nih, mîn kiensan nâwk el rawh,” tiin thu a thawn a.
Chun, Assuria lal chun Juda lal Hezekia chu tangka talent za thum le rângkachak talent sâwmthum a tuk a. Chuongchun, Hezekia chun
Chu ṭum ngei chun Hezekia chun,

Chun, Assuria lal chun Tartan dâm, Rabsaris hai dâm, Rabsake hai dâm sipai tamtak leh Lakis khuoa inthawkin Jerusalem khuoa lal Hezekia kuoma chun a tir a. Chun, Jerusalem khuo chu an hang tlung a. An hang tlung chun puon sâwptu phûl lampuia dîl sakhnung lem, tuilâkna kâwla chun an ngîr a.
Chun, lal chu an hang ko chun, insûng tieng hotu Hilkia naupa Eliakim hai, lekhaziektu Sebna hai, chanchin ziektu Asaph naupa Joa hai an kuomah an va suok a.
Chun, Rabsake chun an kuomah, “Hezekia kuoma chun hang hril ro khai, ‘lal ropuitak Assuria lal chun hieng ang hin a tih, I ring în nghatna hi ieng am a na?
Indonaa ding chun remruot thiem le hrâtna kan nei a nih i ti a; nisienlakhawm, chu chu ṭawngbau el a nih. Tu am i ring a, ka chunga hel i ni leh?
Ngai ta, hi luong hmawl pawr Aigupta hi i ring a ni âwm a; chu chu miin a ringsan chun a kutah sun a tih, Aigupta lal Pharao chu ama ringtuhai po po chunga chun chuong ang chu a ni hlak a nih.
Annawleh ka kuomah,
Chuongchun, ka pu, Assuria lal le chun thu intiem ro, chuongchun, sakawr sâng hni pêng ka ti che, a chunga chuongtu dinghai i hmu thei ding phawt chun.
Iengtin am tawlailîr le sakawr chung chuong mihai thua Aiguptahai chunga i ringna innghatin, ka pu mihai laia chîntak hotu pakhat khawm hi i dangkîr zo hrim ding am a nih?
Chun, hi ram hi

Chun, Hilkia naupa Eliakim le Sebna le Joa hai chun Rabsake kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin, i siehlawhai hi Suria ṭawngin mi be ta lem rawh; chu chu kan hriet thei si a; kul chunga mihai na hrieta hin Juda ṭawngin mi be ta naw rawh,” an ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Rabsake chun an kuomah, “Ka pu chun in pu kuom le nangni kuom chaua hieng thu hi hril dingin a mi tir am a nih? Kul chunga ṭhunghai, nangni le anni mâni êk la fa ding le mâni zun la dâwn dinghai kuoma hin a mi tir a ni bawk naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Rabsake chu a ngîr a, Juda ṭawngin râwl inringtakin a khêk a, “Lal ropuitak Assuria lal thu hi lo ngai ro.
Lal chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih, ‘Hezekia hlêmin um naw ro; ama chun ka kuta inthawkin a sansuok thei âwm si naw cheu a;
Hezekia chun,

Hezekia thu chu pawm naw ro, Assuria lal chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih: Mîn rempui unla, ka kuomah hung thla ro, mi tinin mâni grêp hruia mi le, mâni theichang kûnga mi fa seng unla, mi tinin mâni tuikhur tui tlân seng ro:
nangni ram anga bu le uoin ram, bei le grêp huon ram, oliv le khuoizu ram, thi lova in hring theina ding rama ka hung ṭhuoi hmakhat cheu chun; Hezekian,
Hnam tinhai pathien po po laia mi hrim hrimin an ram chu Assuria lala inthawkin an sanhim ta hlak am a nih?
Hamath le Arpad pathienhai kha khâwlai am an um ta leh? Sepharvaim dâm, Hena dâm, Ivva dâm pathienhai khawm kha khâwlai am an um ta leh? Samari khuo kha keia inthawkin an sanhim am a nih?
Ram tin pathienhai po po laia mi chun tuhai am an ram keimaa inthawka sanhim a,
Anni chu an to zing a, bau khat khawma an dawn nawh; lal thupêk dân chu, “Anni chu dawn naw ro,” ti a ni si a.
