Chuongchun, lal insûng tieng hotu Hilkia naupa Eliakim hai, lekhaziektu Sebna hai, chanchin ziektu Asaph naupa Joa hai chu an silfên keithlêrhai inbelin Hezekia kuoma chun an fe a, Rabsake thuhrilhai chu an hril a.
Chun, lal Hezekia chun chu chu a hriet chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, saiip puon ân bel a,
Chun, insûng tieng hotu Eliakim le, lekhaziektu Sebna hai, thiempu upahai chu saiip puon inbelin Amoz naupa zâwlnei Isai kuomah a tir a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Hezekia chun hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Vawisûn ni hi lunginzîngna ni le, halna ni le hmingsietna ni a nih; nauhai chu an pieng a hun ta si a, nei dingin hrâtna a um ta si nawh.
A pu Assuria lalin Pathien hring hming hrilse dinga a tir Rabsake thuhrilhai po po chu,
Chuongchun, lal Hezekia mihai chu Isai kuomah an fe a.
Isai chun an kuomah, “In lalpa kuomah hieng ang hin hril ro,’
Ngai ta, a sûnga chun thlarau inumtir ka ta, thuthang hrieng a ta, ama ramah fe nâwk a tih; chuongchun, ama ram ngeia chun kâwlhnâma sukthlûkin inumtir ka tih, a tih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Rabsake chu a kîr nâwk a, Assuria lal chun Libna khuo a lo thaw lai chu a va hmu a; Lakis khuoa inthawk chun a suok tah ti a hriet hrim a na.
Chun, “Ngai ta, nangma chu thaw dingin a suok tah,” tia Tirhaka, Ethiopia ram lal chungchâng thu Assuria lal Sennakerib mi hril a lo hriet chun, Hezekia kuomah mihai a tir a,
“Hieng ang hin Juda lal Hezekia kuoma chun hril ro, ‘I Pathien i ring chun Jerusalem khuo Assuria lal kuta pêk ni naw nih tiin hlêm naw raw se che.
Ngai ta, Assuria lalhaiin ram po po sukse vawnga, a chunga an thilthawhai kha i hriet a; nang hi sanhim i ni bîk ding am a nih?
Hnam tin pathienhai chun ka pi le puhaiin an sukbohmanghai kha an sanhim hlak am a nih? Gozan dâm, Haran dâm, Rezeph dâm, Eden nau hai Telassar khuoa umhai,
Hammath lal hai, Arpad lal hai, Sepharvaim khawpui lal hai, Hena lal dâm, Ivva lal dâm kha khâwlai am an um ta leh?’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, Hezekia chun a mitirhai kuta inthawk chun lekha a hmu a, a hang tiem a: chuongchun, Hezekia chu
Aw
an pathienhai chu meiah an pei bawk hlak a; chuonghai chu pathien an ni naw hrim a, mihriem kuta siem, thing le lung an ni lem a nih; chu lei chun an sukbohmang a nih.
Chuleiin, aw
Chuong lai chun Amoz naupa Isai chun Hezekia kuomah, “
Hi hi a chungchâng thu
Tu am i sukhmingsiet a, i hrilsiet? Tu chung âm i râwl i sukpuom a, i mit i meng insâng? Israel Mi Inthieng chunga hin annâwm.
I mitirhai hmangin
Ram dang tui ka cho suok a, ka tlân hlak a, ka kepha hnuoi hin Aigupta vadunghai po po chu sukkang vawng ka tih, i ti a.

Keimain inhmaa inthawka chuong chu ka thaw a nizie dâm, inhma laia chuong chu ka siem a nizie dâm chu i hriet naw am a nih? Khaw kul neihai chu in chim khâwm el anga suksetu dingin ka ruot ta che a ni hi.
Chuleiin, a sûnga umhai chun hrâtna an nei naw a, an zâm a, an hung muolpho ta kha; phûl hlobet ang le hna hring ang le, in chunga hlobet ang le, bu lien hmaa a hrîin a sukvuoi ang an ni kha.
Kei chun i ṭhung dâm, i lût le i suok dâm, ka chunga i lunginsen hi ka hriet i sawnnaw.
Ka chunga i lunginsen lei le, i ṭawng uong chu ka naa a hung lût tâk leiin ka hnâr inbûk chu i hnârah inbûk ka ta, ka thîrse chu i hmûrah, i hungna lampuia ngei khan inkîrtir nâwk ka ti che,’ tiin.
Chun, hi hi i ta dinga inchikna nîng a ta, tu kum hin bu inhli ring in ta, kum nâwk khawm bu inhli bawk; chun, a kum thumnaa chun buhai tu unla, sîk unla, grêp huonhai siem unla, a rahai fa ro.
Chuongchun, Juda sûnghai laia a la dam sunhai chun a suktiengin zung kei an ta, a tung zâwngin ra nâwk an tih.
Jerusalema inthawkin a la um sunhai, Zion tlânga inthawkin a la damhai chu an suok ding a nih:
Chuleiin,
An hungna lampuiah, chutaka ngei chun lêt nâwk a ta, hi khawpui hi hung tlung naw nih,’
Keima lei le ka siehlaw David leiin hi khawpui hi sanhim dingin ka vêng ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, chu zân chun hieng ang hi a hung na,
Chuongchun, Assuria lal Sennakerib chu a suok a, a kîr nâwk a, a fe nâwk ta pei a, Ninevi khuoa chun a um ta a.

Chun, a pathien Nisrok ina chun ama a biek laiin hieng ang hi a hung na, Adrammelek le Sarezer hai chun ama chu kâwlhnâmin an sukhlum ta a; chuongchun, Ararat rama chun an tlân lût ta a. Chun, a naupa Esar-haddon chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chuong lai chun Hezekia chu thi ngamin a na a. Chuongchun, Amoz naupa zâwlnei Isai chu a kuomah a hung a, a kuomah, “
Chuongchun, bang tieng ngha chun ân let a,
“Aw
Chun, Isai chun khawpui lailung vêl chu a tlung hmain hieng hi a hung na,
“Kîr nâwk la, ka mihai hotu Hezekia kuomah hril rawh, ‘

Chun, i dam sûng kumhai hi kum sâwm le kum ngain suksei ka ta; chun, nang le hi khawpui hi Assuria lala inthawk chun sanhim ka tih; chun, keima lei le ka siehlaw David leiin hi khawpui hi hum ka tih, a tih,’ tiin.”
Chun, Isai chun, “Theichang ra hlawm khat hung la ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, an hung lâk a, khuoihlia chun a bel a, a hung dam nâwk ta a.
Chun, Hezekia chun Isai kuomah, “
Isai chun, “
Hezekia chun a dawn a, “Hlim chu sirbi sâwm chena a hang intâwl chu a awl êm a, chu chu ni lo e, hlim chu sirbi sâwm chenin intâwl kîr lem raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, zâwlnei Isai chun
Chuong lai chun Baladan naupa Babulon lal Merodak-baladan chun lekhahai le thilpêk dâm Hezekia a thawn a, Hezekia chu a na ti a hriet leiin.

Chuongchun, Hezekia chun anni chu a lo lâwm a, a thil hlu siena in po pohai, tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, thil riminhnik dâm, hriek hlutak dâm, a râlthuom siena in sûng dâm, a ro umhai po po chu ân entir a; a ina mi le a ram sûnga mi Hezekia chun ân entir naw hrim hrim a um nawh.

Chuong lai chun zâwlnei Isai chu Hezekia kuoma chun a fe a, a kuomah, “Khahai khan ieng am an hril a? Khâwlaia inthawkin am i kuomah an hung a?” a ta. Chun, Hezekia chun, “Ram hlatak, Babulona inthawka hung an nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama chun, “I ina hin ieng ieng am an hmu a?” a ta. Chun, Hezekia chun, “Ka in sûnga um po po chu an hmu vawng a, ka ro laia thil kân entir naw hrim hrim a um nawh,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, Isaiin Hezekia kuoma chun, “
Chuongchun, Hezekia chun Isai kuomah, “I hril

Chuongchun, Hezekia chanchin danghai, a thilthawtheizie po po dâm, dîl le tuilâkna a siem a, khawpui sûnga tui a lâk lût thu dâm chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Hezekia chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in ta a; chuongchun, a naupa Manasse chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Manasse chu ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwm le kum hni mi a nih; Jerusalemah kum sâwmnga le kum nga ân lal a, a nu hming chu Hephziba a nih.
A pa Hezekiain a suksiet tah bâwlhmunhai chu a siem ṭha nâwk a; Israel lal Ahab thaw angin Baal maichâmhai a siem a, Aserahai a siem a, vâna um po po khi a biek a, an rawng a bâwl a.
Chun, a naupa chu meiah ân lûttir a, aisân dâm a chîng a, dawi dâm a hmang a, khawhri aisân thiem zâwlhai le dawithiemhai a ruoi hlak a;
Chun,
Nisienlakhawm, an pawm nuom naw a,
Chun,
“Juda lal Manasse hin hieng thil tirdakumtakhai hi a thaw a, a hmaa Amor mihai nêk hmanin a suksuol nasa a, Judahai hi a milimhaiin thil ân suksuoltir leiin:
Samari inkhina hrui le Ahab sûngkuo dârmûmkhai chu Jerusalem chungah keimar ka tih; chun, miin thlêng a hrûk a, ân let vêl angin Jerusalem chu hrûng ka tih.
Chun, ka rochan a la um sunhai chu pei thlâng ka ta, an hmêlmahai kutah pêng ka ta; an hmêlmahai po po man ding le râllâk ding nîng an tih,
an pi le puhai Aigupta rama an hung suoka inthawka vawisûn ni chen hin ka mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak an thaw a, an mi suklungsen lei hin,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Manasse chanchin danghai a thilthaw po pohai, a thil suksuolhai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Manasse chu a pi le puhai kuoma chun a in a, Uzza huona ama in bul huonah an phûm ta a; chuongchun, a naupa Amon chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Amon chu ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwmhni le kum hni a na; Jerusalema chun kum hni ân lal a; a nu hming chu Mesullemet, Jotba khuoa Haruz naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa Manasse thaw ang bawkin
A pa lampui hraw po po chu a hraw ve a, a pain milim rawng a bâwlhai chu a bâwl ve a, chibai a bûk a;
chuongchun,
Chun, a mihaiin Amon chu an phier rûk a, lal chu ama in ngeia chun an that a.
Nisienlakhawm, chu rama mihai chun lal Amon phier rutuhai po po chu an sukhlum ve ta vawng a; chu rama mihai chun a naupa Josia chu a aiawin lalah an siem ta a.
Chun, Amon thilthaw danghai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Uzza huonah ama thlânah an phûm a, chun, a naupa Josia chu ama aiawin ân lal ta a.
Chun,
Chun, lal Josia ân lal kum sâwm le kum riet kumin lal chun Mesullam naupa Azalia naupa lekhaziektu Saphan chu a tir a,
“Thiempu laltak Hilkia kuomah hang fe la, kawtkhâr vêngtuhaiin mihai kuoma an lo lâk khâwm
thingrem siemtuhai, in bâwltuhai, in se siemtuhai chun in a sietna lai siemna dingin thing le lung sutsa an inchâwk theina dingin,” tiin
Nisienlakhawm, tangka an pêk chu an enzuipui ta chuong naw a, ringumtaka an thaw hlak leiin.
Chun, thiempu laltak Hilkia chun lekhaziektu Saphan kuomah, “
Chun, lekhaziektu Saphan chu lal kuomah a fe a, lal kuomah thu chu a vân tlun nâwk a, “I mihai chun ina tangka um chu an pêk suok vawng a,
Chun, lekhaziektu Saphan chun, “Thiempu lal tak Hilkia chun lekhabu a mi lo pêk annaw,” tiin lal chu a hril a. Chun, Saphan chun lal hmaa chun a tiem a.
Chun, lal chun dân lekhabu thuhai chu a hang hriet chun a puonhai a keithlêr ta a.
Chun, lal chun thiempu Hilkia hai, Saphan naupa Ahikam hai, Mikaia naupa Akbor hai, lekhaziektu Saphan hai, lal mi Asaia hai kuoma chun,
“Kei le, mipui le, Juda mihai po po hi hi lekhabu hmua thu chuonga hin

Chuongchun, thiempu Hilkia hai, Ahikam hai, Akbor hai, Saphan hai, Asaia hai chu silfên enkawltu Harhas nau Tikva naupa Sallum nuhmei zâwlneinu Hulda kuoma chun an va fe a, an va râwn a. (Ama chu Jerusalem Misneha um a na).
Ama chun an kuomah, “
an mi mâksan a, pathien danghai kuomah riminhnik an raw a, an kutsuoka an mi suklungsen leiin hi hmuna hin ka lunginsenna chu a chawk nasa ding a na, rêm el naw nih.
Nisienlakhawm,
hi hmun le a sûnga chênghai hi sukrêm le ṭawngsephurin la um an tih ti thu ka hril kha i lo hriet a, i lungril dâm a hung innêm a,

Chuongchun, ngai ta, i pi le puhai kuomah ṭhuoi ka ti che a, thlânah lungmuongtaka ṭhuoiin um i ta, hi hmuna thil ṭha nawtak ka hung intlungtir ding chu i mitin hmu ve naw nih, a tih,’ tiin,” a ta. Chuongchun, thu chu lal kuoma chun an vân tlun nâwk a.
Chun, lal chun mi a tir a, Judai ram le Jerusalema upahai po po a kuomah an ko khâwm ṭeu a.
Chun, lal chu Judai rama mi po po leh, Jerusalem khuoa mi po po leh, thiempuhai le zâwlneihai leh, mipuihai po po le chun, a chîn a lienin
Chun, lal chu ban hrûlah a ngîr a, chu lekhabua chuong thuthlung thu chu sukdet dingin lungril po po le thlarau po poa
chun, mipui po po khawm chun an thlungpui a. Chun, lalin thiempu laltak Hilkia hai, a dawttu thiempu hai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu

Chun, milim betuhai thiempuhai, Juda lalhaiin Judai ram khawpui bâwlhmunahai, Jerusalem vêla riminhnik raw dinga an lo ruothai khawm chu ân bântir a; Baal ta ding dâm, nisa ta ding dâm, thla ta ding dâm, arasi ta ding dâm, vâna umhai po po ta dinga riminhnik rawtuhai khawm chu.
Chun, Asera puon khâwngtuhai nuhmei umna

Chun, Juda khawpuihaia inthawk chun thiempu po po a ṭhuoi suok a, thiempuhai riminhnik rawna bâwlhmunhai chu Gebaa inthawka Beer-seba chenin a sukbohmang vawng a; khawpui kawtkhâr lûta vawitieng panga, khawpui awptu Josua kawtkhâr lûta kawtkhârhaia bâwlhmunhai chu a sukchim a.
Bâwlhmun thiempuhai chu Jerusalema
Chun,
Chun, lungphunhai chu a suknâwi vawng a, Aserahai chu a phûrthlûk a, chuong hmunhaia chun mihriem ru a sie ta a.
Ama chun, “Tukhawma iengkhawm law naw ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, tukhawma a ruhai chu Samari rama inthawka zâwlnei hung ruhai le chun iengkhawm an law naw a.
Chun, Israel lalhaiin
Chuongchun, chutaka bâwl-hmun thiempu umhai po po chu maichâm chungah a that a; chuonga chun mihriem ruhai a raw a, Jerusalemah a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, lalin mi po po kuomah, “Hi thuthlung bua chuong ang hin
Israelhai chunga rorêltuhaiin ro an rêl chinah, Israel lalhai inlal sûng po po dâm, Juda lalhai inlal sûng po po khawma chuong angtaka Fekân Ruoiṭhe chu an la nei ngai nawh;
lal Josia inlal kum sâwm le kum riet kuma chun chu Fekân Ruoiṭhe chu Jerusalem khuoah
Chun,
Mosie dân ang po poa lungril po po le thlarau po po le hrâtna po poa
Chuong sa khawm chun
Chun,
Chuongchun, Josia chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai chanchin ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?

Ân lal lai chun Aigupta lal Pharao-Neko chu Assuria lal do dingin Euphrates vadungah a hang fe a; chun, lal Josia chun ama chu a hang thaw a; chun, Pharao-Neko chun ama chu a hmu phingleh Megiddo khuoah a that ta a.

Chun, a mihai chun Megiddoa inthawk chun a ruong chu tawlailîrin an fepui a, Jerusalemah an lûtpui a, ama thlânah an phûm ta a. Chuongchun, chu rama mihai chun Josia naupa Jehoahaz chu an ṭhuoi a, hriek an nâl a, a pa aia chun lalah an siem ta a.
Jehoahaz chu ân lal ṭantîrin kum sâwmhni le kum thum a na; Jerusalemah thla thum ân lal a; a nu hming chu Hamutal, Libna khuoa Jeremia naunu a nih.
Chun, a pi le puhai thaw dân ang po po
Chun, Pharao-Neko chun Jerusalema rorêl thei ta lo dingin Hamath rama Ribla khuoah ân tângtir a; chun, an ram chu tangka talent za khat le rângkachak talent khat ân chawitir a.

Chun, Jehoiakim chun tangka le rângkachak chu Pharao chu a pêk phawt a, an ramhai chu Pharao thupêk angin a tangka pe dingin sie ân chawitir ve thung a; Pharao-Neko kuoma pêk dingin mi tin chawi ding tuk zât ang peiin chu rama mihai ta tangka le rângkachak ân chawitir a.
Chun, a pi le puhai thaw dân ang po po
Chun,
A hmu phâk nawa sawn ding thu chu
pawitâwklo thisen an suo a, Jerusalem chu pawitâwklo thisena a suksip leiin,
Chuongchun, Jehoiakim chan-chin danghai le a thilthaw po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai chanchin ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, Jehoiakim chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in a, chun, a naupa Jehoiakin chu ama aiawiin ân lal ta a.
Chun, Aigupta lal chu a rama inthawkin a hung suok nâwk ta naw a; Babulon lal chun Aigupta ram vadungtêa inthawka Euphrates vadung chena Aigupta lal ram huop po po a lâk ta si a.
Jehoiakin chu ân lal ṭantirin kum sâwm le kum riet a na, Jerusalema chun thla thum ân lal a; a nu hming chu Nehusta, Jerusalema Elnathan naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa thaw dân ang po po thawin,
Chuong lai chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar mihai chu Jerusalema chun an hang fe a, khuo chu an hang inhuol ta a.
Chun, chuonga a mihaiin an inhuol lai chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chu khuoa chun a hang fe a;
Chun,

Chun, Jerusalema mi po po, mi lien po pohai, mi hrât huoisen ṭha po pohai dâm, sing khat zet, themthiem le thirsu po po salah a ṭhuoi vawng a; chu rama mi a pasie sie ti lo chu tukhawm an um ta naw a.
Chun, Babulon lal chun pasalṭha po po sâng sari zet le, themthiem le thirsu sâng khat, mi hrât ṭha indo thei mi ṭhieu chu Babulonah salah a ṭhuoi vawng a.
Chun, Jehoiakim thaw dân ang po po thawin
Chuongchun, lal Zedekia inlal kum sâwm le kum khatna chenin khuo chu an inhuol a.
Thla lina, ni kuo ni chun khuo chu an ṭâm ta êm êm el a, chutaka mihai ta ding chun fâk ding hrim hrim a um ta naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, Kaldai sipaihai chun lal chu an hnawt a, Jeriko phaiah an hnawt phâk a; a sipaihai po po chun an tlândarsan ta vawng a.
Chuongchun, lal chu an man a, Babulon lal kuomah Ribla khuoah an ṭhuoi a; chun, a chungchâng an rêl a.
Chuongchun, Babulon lal, lal Nebukadnezzar inlal kum sâwm le kum kuona, thla ngana, ni sari ni chun Babulon lal mi, vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzar-adan chu Jerusalemah a lût a;
Chun, vêngtu pâwl hotu kuoma um Kaldai sipaihai po po chun Jerusalem vêla kul chu an sukchim vawng a.
Chun, khawpui sûnga mi la um, inpehai, mipui la umhai chu vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzar-adan chun salah a ṭhuoi vawng a.
Chu rama pasie siehai ruok chu vêngtu pâwl hotu chun grêphrui enkawltu ding le lo neitu dingin a mâksan a.
Chun, meilâknahai le maihûnhai le chun, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun rângkachaka siemhai chu a rângkachak chu a lâk a, tangkaruoa siemhai chu a tangkaruo chu a lâk a.
Solomonin

Ban pakhat insâng tieng chu tawng sâwm le tawng riet a na, a sîpa chun dâr sungbâwk a um a; chu bâwk insâng tieng chu tawng thum a nih; a bâwk vêla chun ṭiel chikchek le theibufai lim a chuong a, dâr vawng a nih; chuong ang bawk chun ban pakhat khawm chu ṭiel chikchek a nih.
Chun, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun thiempu lal Seraia le a dawttu Ze-phania le kawtkhâr vêngtu pathum a man a,

chun, indo mihai chunga hotu pakhat leh, lal hmêl hmu phâk hlak, khawpui sûnga la um panga leh, mipuihai hming ziektu sipai hotu lekhaziektu leh, khawpui sûnga la um chu rama mi sâwmruk leh khawpui sûnga chun a man bawk a.
Chun, vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzaradan chun a ṭhuoi a, Babulon lal kuomah, Ribla khuoa chun a fepui a,
Chun, Babulon lal chun Hamath ram, Ribla khuoa chun a lo sukhlum a. Chuongchun, Juda chu a ram sûnga inthawka sala ṭhuoi suokin a lo um ta a.
Chun, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chun Judai rama mâksana umhai khawm chu an chunga chun Saphan naupa Ahikam naupa Gedalia chu awptu dingin a siem a.

Chuongchun, sipai pâwl hotuhai po po le an rawihaiin Babulon lalin Gedalia chu awptu dingin a siem ti an hriet chun Mizpa khuoah Gedalia kuomah an fe a; chuonghai chu Nethania naupa Ismael hai, Karea naupa Johanan hai, Netophath mi Tanhumeth naupa Seraia hai, Maaka mi naupa Jaazania hai, an rawihai leh an nih.

Chun, Juda lal Jehoiakin sala ân tâng kum sâwmthum le kum sarina, thla sâwm le thla hnina, ni sâwmhni le ni sari niin Babulon lal Evil-merodakin ân lal ṭan kumin Juda lal Jehoiakin chu intângna ina inthawkin a ṭhuoi suok a,
a kuomah ṭhatakin thu a hril a, Babulona lalruol um vehai lalṭhungpha chunga chun a lalṭhungpha chu a sie sâng ta bîk a.
Ân tângna in silfênhai chu a thleng a, a dam sûng po chun a kuomah thlaithlêng a awt ve ta rawp a.
Chuongchun, a châwmna dingin a hmu tâwk dingin lalin ni tin, a dam sûng po po chun chanvo a siempêk ta zing a.
Adam, Seth, Enos;
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;
Enok, Methusela, Lamek;
Noa, Sem, Ham le Japheth.
Japheth naupasalhai chu; Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mesek le Tira an nih.
Gomer naupasalhai chu: Askenaz, Diphath le Togarma an nih.
Javan naupasalhai chu: Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim le Rodanim an nih.
Ham naupasalhai chu: Kus, Mizraim, Put le Kanaan an nih.
Chun, Kus naupasalhai chu: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka an nih. Raama naupasalhai chu: Seba le Dedan an nih.
Kus chun Nimrod a nei a; hnuoia thilthawtheitak a hung ni ṭan ta a.
Chun, Mizraim chun Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim, Kasluhim (Philistin mihai hung suokna chu) le Kaphtorim a nei a.
Chun, Kanaan chun a nau lutirah Zidon a nei a, chun, Heth;
Chun, Jebus mihai, Amor mihai, Girgas mihai;
Hiv mihai, Ark mihai, Sin mihai;
Arvad mihai, Zemar mihai le Hamath mihai a nei a.
Sem naupasalhai chu: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether le Mesek an nih.
Arpaksad chun Sela a nei a, Sela chun Eber a nei a.
Eber-a chun naupasal pahni an pieng a: a pakhat hming chu Peleg a nih; ama hun lai chun hnuoi hi ṭhein a um si a; chun, a unaupa hming chu Joktan a nih.
Joktan chun Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jera;
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla;
Ebal, Abimael, Seba;
Ophir, Havila le Jobab a nei a. Hienghai po po hi Joktan naupasalhai chu an nih.
Sem, Arpaksad, Sela,
Eber, Peleg, Reu;
Serug, Nahor, Tera,
Abram, (hi hi Abraham leh thuhmun a nih);
Abraham naupasalhai chu Isak le Ismael.
Hi hi an inthla dân chu a nih. Ismael nau lutîr chu Nebaioth a na; chun, Kedar hai, Adbeel hai, Mibsam hai;
Misma hai, Duma hai, Massa hai, Hadad hai, Tema hai,
Jetur hai, Naphis hai, Kedema hai. Hienghai hi Ismael naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Abraham thaikêm Ketura naupasalhai chu: Zimran le, Joksan le, Medan le, Midian le, Isbak le Sua an nih. Chun, Joksan naupasalhai chu: Seba, Dedan.
Chun, Midian naupasalhai chu; Epha, Epher, Hanok, Abida, Eldaa an nih. Hieng po po hi Ketura naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Abraham chun Isak a nei a; Isak naupasalhai chu: Esau le Israel.
Esau naupasalhai chu: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeus, Jalam le Kora.
Eliphaz naupasalhai chu: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalek,
Reuel naupasalhai chu: Nahath, Zera, Samma le Mizza.
Chun, Seir naupasalhai chu: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer le Disan.
Chun, Lotan naupasalhai chu: Hori le Homam. Timna chu Lotan farnu a nih.
Sobal naupasalhai chu: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Sephi le Onam. Chun, Zibeon naupasalhai chu: Aia le Ana.
Ana naupasal chu Dison. Dison naupasalhai chu: Hamran, Esban, Ithran le Keran.
Ezer naupasalhai chu: Bilhan, Zaavan le Jaakan. Disan naupasalhai chu: Uz le Aran.
Tuhin hienghai hi Edom rama lal rorêltuhai chu an nih, chu hmaa Israel thlahai chunga lal rorêltuhai chu: Bela, Beor naupa; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a nih.
Bela chu a thi a, Bozraa Zera naupa Jobab chun ama aiin ro a rêl a.
Chun, Jobab chu a thi a, ama aia chun Teman mihai rama um Husam chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Husam chu a thi a, ama aia chun Bedad naupa Hadad, Moab phaia Midianhai hnetu khan ro a rêl a; chun, a khawpui hming chu Avith a ni nghe nghe a.
Chun, Hadad chu a hung thi a, ama aia chun Masrekaa um Samla chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Samla chu a thi a, ama aia chun Euphrates vadungpui panga Rehobotha um Saul chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Saul chu a hung thi a, ama aia chun Akbor naupa Baalhanan chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Baalhanan chu a thi a, ama aia chun Hadadin ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Pai a nih; chun, a nuhmei hming chu Mehetabel a na, ama chu Mezahab naunu, Matred naunu a nih.
Chun, Hadad chu a thi a. Chun, Edom ram awptuhai chu: Timna, Alia, Jetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hai an nih. Hienghai hi Edom ram awptuhai chu an nih.
Israel naupasalhai chu hienghai hi an nih; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Juda, Issakar, Zebulun,
Dan, Josef, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad le Aser.
Juda naupasalhai chu Era, Onan le Sela an nih; chuhai pathum chu Kanaan mi Bathsua le kâra pienghai chu an nih. Chun, Juda nau lutir Era chu
Chun, a monu Tamar chun Perez le Zera a neipêk a, Juda naupasalhai po po chu panga an nih.
Perez naupasalhai chu Hezron le Hamul an nih.
Chun, Zera naupasalhai chu Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol le Dara, an rêngin panga an nih.
Ethan naupasal chu Azaria a nih.
Hezron naupasalhai, amaa pienghai chu Jerahmeel, Rama le Kelubai an nih.
Chun, Rama chun Amminadab a nei a; Amminadab chun Nason a nei a; Juda thlahai lal naupa chu;
Nason chun Salma a nei a, Salma chun Boaz a nei a;
Boaz chun Obed a nei a, Obed chun Jessai a nei a.
Chun, Jessai chun a nau lutîrah Eliab a nei a, a pahnina chu Abinadab a na, a pathumna chu Simea a na;
a palina chu Nethanel a na, a pangana chu Raddai a na;
a parukna chu Ozem a na, pasarina chu David a nih;
chun, an farnuhai chu Zeruia le Abigail an nih. Chun, Zeruia naupasalhai chu pathum, hieng Abisai, Joab le Asahel hai hi an nih.
Chun, Abigail chun Amasa chu a nei a, Amasa pa chu Ismael mi Jether a nih.
Chun, Hezron naupa Kaleb chun a nuhmei Azuba (le Jerioth) leh nauhai chu a nei a; hienghai hi a naupasalhai chu an nih; Jeser, Sobab le Ardon hi.
Chun, Azuba a thi chun Kaleb chun Ephrath chu a nei a, ama chun Hur a neipêk a.
Hur chun Uri a nei a, Uri chun Bezalel a nei a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun, Hezron chun Gilead pa Makir naunu chu a pâwl a; ama chu kum sâwmruk a tling hnunga nuhmeia a nei a na; chuongchun, amanu chun nau Segub chu a hung neipêk a.
Segub chun Jair, Gilead rama khawpui sâwmhni le pathum neitu chu a nei a.
Gesur le Aram chun annia inthawkin Jair khawpuihai le Kenath chu an lâk a, a kâwl vêl khuohai, khaw sâwmruk leh. Hienghai po po hi Gilead pa Makir naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Kaleb-ephratha khuoa Hezron thi hnung chun, Hezron nuhmei Abija chun Asur, Tekoa pa chu a neipêk a.
Hezron nau lutîr Jerahmeel naupasalhai chu; Rama chu nau lutîr a na; Buna le Oren le Ozem le Ahija an nih.
Jerahmeel chun nuhmei dang a nei a, a hming chu Atara a nih; ama chu Onam nu chu a nih.
Jerahmeel nau lutîr tak Rama naupasalhai chu Maaz, Jamin le Eker an nih.
Onam naupasalhai chu Sammai le Jada an na; Sammai naupasalhai chu Nadab le Abisur an nih.
Abisur nuhmei hming chu Abihail a na, ama chun Ahban le Molid a neipêk a.
Nadab naupasalhai chu Seled le Appaim an na; amiruokchu, Seled chu nau nei lovin a thi.
Chun, Appaim naupasal chu Isi a nih. Isi naupasal chu Sesan a nih. Sesan naupasal chu Ahlai a na.
Chun, Sammai unaupa Jada naupasalhai chu Jether le Jonathan an na; Jether chu nau nei lovin a thi.
Jonathan naupasalhai chu Peleth le Zaza an nih. Hieng hai hi Jerahmeel naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Sesan chun naupasal nei lovin naunuhmeihai chau a nei a. Chun, Sesan chun siehlaw, Aigupta mi, a hming Jara chu a nei a.
Chuongchun, Sesan chun a naunu chu a siehlaw Jara kuoma chun a nuhmei dingin a pêk a; chuongchun, ama chun Attai a neipêk a.
Attai chun Nathan a nei a, Nathan chun Zabad a nei a;
Zabad chun Ephlal chu a nei a; Ephlal chun Obed a nei a.
Obed chun Jehu a nei a, Jehu chun Azaria chu a nei a;
Azaria chun Helez chu a nei, Helez chun Eleasa a nei a;
Eleasa chun Sismai a nei a, Sismai chun Sallum a nei a;
Sallum chun Jekamia a nei a, Jekamia chun Elisama a nei a;
Chun, Jerahmeel unaupa Kaleb naupasal hai chu a nau lutîr tak Mesa, Ziph-hai thlatu chu a nih; Hebron pa Maresa naupasalhai le chun.
Chun, Hebron naupasalhai chu Kora, Tappua, Rekem le Sema an nih.
Chun, Sema chun Jorkeam pa Raham chu a nei a; Rekem chun Sammai a nei a.
Sammai naupa chu Maon a na; Maon chu Bethzur pa a nih.
Kaleb thaikêm Epha chun Haran le Moza le Gazez a nei a; Haran chun Gazez ma a nei a.
Jahdai naupasalhai chu Regem, Jotham, Gesan, Pelet, Epha le Saaph an nih.
Chun, Kaleb thaikêm Maaka chun Seber le Tirhana chu a nei a.
Chun, Madmanna pa Saaph le Makbena pa Seva le Gibea pa chu a nei a; chun, Kaleb naunu chu Aksa a nih.
Ephratha nau lutîr Hur naupa Kaleb naupasalhai chu; Kiriath-jearim pa Sobal;
Beth-lehemhai thlatu Salma, Beth-gaderhai thlatu Hareph leh an nih.
Chun, Sobal pa Kiriath-jearim chun naupasalhai a nei a; Haroe le Menuhoth mi zâtve hai chu.
Chun, Kiriath-jearim sûngkuohai chu Ith mihai, Put mihai, Sumath mihai, Misra mihai hi an nih; annia inthawk chun Zorath mihai, Estaol mihai hi an hung suok a nih.
Salma naupasalhai chu Bethlehem hai, Netophath mihai le Atroth-beth-joab le Manahath mi zâtve Zor mihai chu an nih.
Chun, lekhaziektu sûngkuohai Jabez-a chênghai chu Tirath mihai, Simeath mihai, Sukath mihai hi an nih. Hieng mihai hi Rekab sûngkuo thlatu Hammath-a inthawka Ken mi hung suokhai chu an nih.
Hienghai hi David naupasalhai Hebrona pienghai chu an nih: nau lutîr Amnon, Jezreel mi Ahinoam inei, a pahnina, Daniel, Karmel mi Abigail inei;
a pathumna, Absalom, Gesur lal Talmai naunu Maaka naupa chu; a palina, Haggith naupa Adonija;
a pangana, Abital inei Sephatia; a parukna, a nuhmei Egla inei Ithream chu.
chun, Ibhar hai, Elisama hai, Eliphelet hai;
Noga hai, Nepheg hai, Japhia hai;
chun, Elisama hai, Eliada hai, Eliphelet hai, an rêngin pakuo.
A thaikêmhai naupasalhai tiem lovin hienghai po hi David naupasalhai chu an na; an farnu chu Tamar a nih.
Chun, Solomon naupa chu Rehoboam a na, ama naupa chu Abija a na; ama naupa chu Asa a na, ama naupa chu Jehosaphat a na;
ama naupa chu Joram a na, ama naupa chu Ahazia a na; ama naupa chu Joas a na,
Ama naupa chu Amazia a na; ama naupa chu Azaria a na; ama naupa chu Jotham a na;
ama naupa chu Ahaz a na, ama naupa chu Hezekiah a na, ama naupa chu Manasse a na;
ama naupa chu Amon a na, ama naupa chu Josia a nih,
Chun, Josia naupasalhai chu, a upa tak chu Johanan a na, a pahnina chu Jehoiakim a na, a pathumna chu Zedekia a na, a palina chu Sallum a nih.
Chun, Jehoiakim naupasalhai chu Jekonia le Zedekia an nih.
Chun, Jekonia, suok intâng, naupasalhai chu: a naupa Sealtiel,
Malkiram, Pedaia, Senazar, Jekamia, Hosama le Nedabia an nih.
Chun, Pedaia naupasalhai chu: Zerubbabel le Simei; chun, Zerubbabel naupasalhai chu: Mesullam le Hanania an na, an farnu chu Selomith a nih;
chun, Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia le Jusab-hesed, panga an nih.
Chun, Hanania naupasalhai chu: Pelatia le Jesaia: Rephaia naupasalhai, Arnan naupasalhai, Obadia naupasalhai, Sekania naupasalhai hi.
Chun, Sekania naupasalhai chu: Semaia, chun, Semaia naupasalhai chu: Hattus, Igal, Baria, Nearia le Saphat, paruk an nih.
Chun, Nearia naupasalhai chu Elioenai, Hizkia le Azrikam, pathum an nih.
Chun, Elioenai naupasalhai chu Hodavia, Eliasib, Pelaia, Akkub, Johanan, Delaia le Anani, pasari an nih.
Juda naupasalhai chu: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur le Sobal an nih.
Chun, Sobal naupa Reaia chun Jahath a nei a; Jahath chun Ahumai le Lahad a nei a. Hienghai hi Zorath sûngkuohai chu an nih.
Chun, hieng hi Etam pa naupasalhai chu an nih: Jezreel, Isma le Idbas hi; chun, an farnu hming chu Hazzelelponi a nih;
Gedor pa Penuel le Husa pa Ezer. Chun, hienghai hi Hur, Beth-lehem pa Ephratha nau lutîr, naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Tekoa pa Ashhur chun nuhmei pahni: Hela le Naara chu a nei a.
Naara chun Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni le Haahastari a neipêk a. Hienghai hi Naara naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Hela naupasalhai chu: Zereth, Izhar, le Ethnan hi an nih.
Hakkoz chun Anub, Zobeba le Harum naupa Aharhel sûngkuohai chu a nei a.
Chun, Jabez chu a unauhai nêkin inza a kai lem a, a nu chun, “Lungngaina puma ka nei a na,” tiin a hminga chun Jabez ân bûk a nih.

Jabez chun Israel Pathien chu, “Ka lungngai nawna dinga thil ṭhanawa inthawka mi vêngin, i kut chu ka chunga a um theina dingin, nangin mal mi hung sâwmin, ka ramrihai chu hung suklien ngei i tih,” tiin a ko a. Pathien chun a hni chu a phalpêk ta a.
Chun, Kelub, Suha unaupa chun Mehir a nei a; ama chu Eston pa a nih.
Eston chun Beth-rapha, Pasea le Irnahas pa Tehinna chu a nei a. Hienghai hi Reka mihai chu an nih.
Kenaz naupasalhai chu: Othniel le Seraia; chun, Othniel naupasalhai chu: Hathath le Meonothai
Meonothai chun Ophra a nei a; Seraia chun Geharasim
Chun, Jephunne naupa Kaleb naupasalhai chu: Iru, Ela le Naam an nih; Ela naupasal hai le Kenaz a nih.
Chun, Jehallelel
Ezra naupasalhai chu: Jether, Mered, Epher le Jalon an nih; hienghai hi Pharao naunu Mared nuhmei Bithia naupasalhai chu an nih; chun, Miriam, Sammai le Isba, Estemoa pa chu a nei bawk a.
Chun, a nuhmei Hajehudijah chun Gedor pa Jared le Soko pa Heber le Janoa pa Jekuthiel chu a nei a.
Chun, Naham farnu Hodia naupasalhai chu: Garmi mi Keila pa le Maakath mi Estemoa chu an nih.
Simon naupasalhai chu: Amnon, Rina, Ben-hanan le Tilon an nih. Chun, Isi naupasalhai chu: Zoheth le Ben-zoheth an nih.
Chun, Juda naupa Sela naupasalhai chu: Leka pa Era le, Maresa pa Laada le, Asbea sûngkuo, puon zai inhmi khâwngtuhai sûngkuohai po po chu an nih;
Chun, Jokim le Kozeba mihai le Joas le Moab rama ram neitu Saraph hai le, Jasubi-lehem hai leh an nih. Hienghai hi thu hlui an nih.
Hienghai hi bêlhemtu Netaim le Gederaa um hai chu an nih: chutaka chun a sinthaw dingin lal kuomah an um a nih.
Simeon naupasalhai chu: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zera le Saul an nih:
ama naupa Sallum, ama naupa Mibsam, ama naupa Misma.
Misma naupasal chu: Hamuel, ama naupa Zakkur, ama naupa Simei.
Simei chun naupasal sâwm le paruk le naunuhmei paruk a nei a; amiruokchu, a unauhai chun nau an hau ve nawh a, Juda thlahai angin an sûngkuo khawm chu an inthla pung rak nawh a.
Anni chu Beer-seba le Molada le Hazar-sualah an um a,
chun, Bilha, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth-markoboth, Hazar-susimah, Beth-biriah, Saaraima leh an um bawk a. Hienghai po po hi David rorêl chen khan an khawpuihai an nih.
Chun, an khawperhai chu: Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Token le Asan, khaw panga hi an nih; Baal chena a vêla an khuohai po po le chun.
Mesobab le Jamlek le Amazia naupa Josa;
chun, Joel Asiel naupa, Seraia naupa, Josibia naupa Jehu chu:
Elioenai, Jaakoba, Jesohaia, Asaia, Adiel, Jesimiel le Benaia leh;
Chun, Semaia naupa, Simri naupa, Jedaia naupa, Allon naupa, Siphi naupa Ziza;
hieng an hming hrila umhai hi an pahnama hotuhai an na; an pahnam sûngkuohai chu nasataka sukpungin an um a.
An ran ruolhai ta ding tlatna hmun zawngin phai ruom saktieng pang. Gedor lûtna chen khan an va fe a.
Chuongchun, ran ruol tlatna ding hmun ṭhatak le fâk ding tamna hmun chu an va hmu a, ram chu a lienin muong a umin, a re bawk a; chu rama lo um hmasatuhai chu Ham thlahai chu an nih.

Chun, hieng an hming ziekhai hi Juda lal Hezekia hun laiin an hung lût a, an puon inhai an suksiet a, chutaka Meunim le chun; chuongchun, tu chena hin suksiet letdêrin an um a; anni chu an hmuna chun an ran ruol ta dingin tlatna hmun ṭha a um bawk leiin an um ta a.
Chun, anni ṭhenkhat Simeon thlahai, mi za nga zet chu Seir tlângah an hang fe a, anni chun an hotuah Pelatia, Nearia, Rephaia le, Isi naupa Uzziel chu an hmang a.
Chun, Amalek mi lo tlânsuok a la mahlahai chu an that a, an hmuna chun vawisûn ni chen hin an um ta a.
Israel nau lutîr Reuben naupasalhai chu: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi an nih.
Joel naupasalhai chu: a naupa, Semaia; ama naupa chu Gog, ama naupa chu Simei,
ama naupa chu Mika, ama naupa chu Reaia, ama naupa chu Baal;
Chun, an pahnama a unauhai an thlahai an inthla thu lâk a ni lai chun lal chu:Jeiel le Zekaria le
Bela, Azaz naupa, ama chu Sema naupa, ama chu Joel naupa, Aroera inthawka Baal-meon le Nebo chen raka umhai chu an nih;
chun, Gilead rama chun an ran ruolhai chu an pung hle ta leiin vadungpui Euphratesa inthawka saktieng thlalêr lûtna chen khan an hluo ta a.
Saula dam laiin Hagar mihai leh an indo a, anni chu an hne a; chuongchun, Gilead sak ram po poah an puon inhai chu an zar ta a.
Chun, Gad mihai chu anni epin Basan ramah, Saleka chen khan an um ve thung a;
a lutak chu Joel, a pahnina Sapham le Janai le Saphat an nih Basana chun,
chun, an pahnamhai chu, an sûngkuo ang dungzuiin hieng hi an nih: Mikael hai, Mesullam hai, Seba hai, Jorai hai, Jakan, Zia le Eber, pasari hi an nih.
Hienghai hi Huri naupa, Abihail naupasalhai chu an nih: ama chu Jaroa naupa, ama chu Gilead naupa, ama chu Mikael naupa, ama chu Jesisai naupa, ama chu Jahdo naupa, ama chu Buz naupa;
Guni naupa Abdiel naupa Ahi chu a nih, an pahnama hotu chu.
Anni chu Basan rama Gileada le a khawpuihaia le Saron khawpuihaiah, an ramri chenin an um a.
Hienghai po po hi Juda lal Jotham inlal lai le Israel lal Jeroboam inlal laia inthla thu suinaa ziek an nih.
Reuben mihai le Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtve, mi huoisen phaw le thal chawi thei, thalngula kâp theia indonaa fe thei ṭhieu le indo thiem mi chu sîng li sâng li za sari le sâwmruk an nih.
Anni chu Nodab hai, Naphis hai, Jetur hai le Hagar mihai leh an indo a.

Anni chunga chun ṭhangpuiin an uma, Hagar mihai chu an kuta pêkin an um ta a; anni le um po pohai le chun; indonaa chun Pathien chu an ko a, ama chun anni chu a dawn a, anni chun amaa chun ringna an innghat si a.
An ran ruolhai chu an lâk a, sanghâwngsei sîng nga, berâm nuoi hni le sîng nga, sabengtung sâng hni, mihriem nuoi khat leh.
Mi tamtak chu thatin an um a, indona chu Pathien ta a ni si a. Chun, anni chu an aia chun sala ṭhuoi anni hma po chun an um ta a.
Chun, Manasse hnam zâtve thlahai chu chu rama chun an um a; anni chu Basana inthawkin Hermon tlâng le Senir le Baal-hermon chenin an insuklien a.
Chun, hienghai hi an pahnam luhai chu an nih: Epher, Isi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremia, Hodavia le Jahdiel hi; anni hi mi hrât khawkhêng, mi hming inthang, an pahnama luhai chu an nih.
Chun, an thlatuhai Pathien chunga chun an bawsiet ta a; an hmaa Pathienin a sukbohmanghai, chu rama mihai pathienhai chu bein an zâwm a.
Levi naupasalhai chu: Gerson, Kohath le Merari.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel an nih.
Amram nauhai chu: Aron, Mosie le Miriam. Aron naupasalhai chu: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar an nih.
Eleazar chun Phinehas a nei a, Phinehas chun Abisua a nei a;
Abisua chun Bukki a nei a; Bukki chun Uzzi a nei a;
Uzzi chun Zerahia a nei a, Zerahia chun Meraioth a nei a;
Meraioth chun Amaria a nei a; Amaria chun Ahitub a nei a;
Ahitub chun Zadok a nei a; Zadok chun Ahimaaz a nei a;
Ahimaaz chun Azaria a nei a; Azaria chun Johanan a nei a;
Johanan chun Azaria a nei a, (Jerusalema Solomon a in bâwla thiempu sinthaw ding tira um kha a nih).
Azaria chun Amaria a nei a, Amaria chun Ahitub a nei a;
Ahitub chun Zadok a nei a, Zadok chun Sallum a nei a;
Sallum chun Hilkia a nei a, Hilkia chun Azaria a nei a;
Azaria chun Seraia a nei a, Seraia chun Jehozadak a nei a;
Jehozadak chu sala ṭhuoiin a um a, Nebukadnezzar kuta
Levi naupasalhai chu: Gerson, Kohath le Merari an nih.
Chun, hienghai hi Gerson naupasalhai hming chu a nih: Libni le Simei hi.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel an nih.
Gerson naupa chu Libni a na, ama naupa chu Jahath, ama naupa chu Zimma,
ama naupa chu Joa, ama naupa chu Iddo, ama naupa chu Zera, ama naupa chu Jeatherai.
Kohath naupasalhai chu, Amminadab. Ama naupa chu Kora, ama naupa chu Assir,
ama naupa chu Elkana, ama naupa chu Ebiasaph, ama naupa chu Assir a na;
ama naupa chu Tahath, ama naupa chu Uriel, ama naupa chu Uzzia, ama naupa chu Saul.
Chun, Elkana naupasalhai chu: Amasai le Ahimoth.
Elkana thua chun, Elkana naupasalhai chu: ama naupa Zophai, ama naupa Nahath;
ama naupa Eliab, ama naupa Jeroham, ama naupa Elkana.
Samuel naupasalhai chu: nau lutîr chu Joel, a pahnina Abija.
Merari naupasalhai chu: Mahli, ama naupa Libni, ama naupa Simei, ama naupa Uzza;
ama naupa Simea, ama naupa Haggia, ama naupa Asaia.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu a um ṭawk ṭawk hnunga,
Chuongchun, Jerusalem khuoa Solomonin
Chun, hienghai hi a thawktu zinghai le an naupasalhai chu an nih. Kohath mi naupasalhai chu: hla sak mi Heman, Joel naupa, Samuel naupa chu;
Elkana naupa, Jeroham naupa, Eliel naupa, Toa naupa;
Zuph naupa, Elkana naupa, Mahath naupa, Amasai naupa;
Elkana naupa, Joel naupa, Azaria naupa, Zephania naupa;
Tahath naupa, Assir naupa, Ebiasaph naupa, Kora naupa;
Izhar naupa, Kohath naupa, Levi naupa, Israel naupa a nih.
Chun, a unaupa Asaph chu a changtienga ngîr hlak a na, chu Asaph ngei chu Berekia naupa a nih; Simea naupa;
Mikael naupa, Baaseia naupa, Malkija naupa;
Ethni naupa, Zera naupa, Adaia naupa,
Ethan naupa, Zimma naupa, Simei naupa a nih.
Jahath naupa, Gerson naupa, Levi naupa a nih.
Chun, vawitienga chun an unau Merari naupasalhai chu: Kisi naupa Ethan, Abdi naupa, Malluk naupa,
Hasabia naupa, Amazia naupa, Hilkia naupa;
Amzi naupa, Bani naupa, Semer naupa;
Mahli naupa, Musi naupa, Merari naupa, Levi naupa a nih.
Chun, an unauhai Levi mihai chu Pathien ina biekbûka rawngbâwlna po poa châng ding chun ruot an ni ta a.

Amiruokchu, Aron le a naupasalhai chu, Pathien siehlaw Mosiein thu a lo pêk ta po po ang khan Israelhai ta dinga intlanna siempêk dingin le, hmun inthiengtaka rawngbâwlna po poa ding chun pumrawhmang thilinhlânna maichâm chunga le riminhnik rawna michâm chunga chun thil an inhlân a.
Chun, hienghai hi Aron naupasalhai chu an nih: ama naupa chu Eleazar, ama naupa chu Phinehas, ama naupa chu Abisua;
ama naupa chu Bukki, ama naupa chu Uzzi, ama naupa chu Zerahia;
ama naupa chu Meraioth, ama naupa chu Amaria, ama naupa chu Ahitub;
ama naupa chu Zadok, ama naupa chu Ahimaaz a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an ram sûnga an riebûk hmun ang peia an umna hmun hai chu a nih: Kohath mi sûngkuo, Aron naupasalhai chu, chan hmasatak chu anni ta a ni leiin,
anni chu Juda rama Hebron le a vêlhai po po le chun pêk an na;
amiruokchu, a khawpui phûl le a khawperhai chu Jephunne naupa Kaleb kuomah an pêk a.
Aron naupasalhai kuoma chun himna khawpui Hebron chu a pêk a; Libna chu a vêl khuohai leh, Jattir le Estemoa, a vêl khuohai leh,
Hilen, a vêl khuohai leh, Debir, a vêl khuohai leh;
Asan, a vêl khuohai leh, Beth-semes, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Benjamin hnama inthawk chun; Geba, a vêl khuohai leh, Alemeth, a vêl khuohai leh, Anathoth a vêl khuohai leh. An pahnam po poa an khawpuihai po po chu khuo sâwm le pathum a nih.
Chun, Kohath naupasal danghai kuoma chun ṭhumvâwra pêkin, hnam sûngkuo tina inthawk le, hnam zâtvea inthawk, Manasse hnam zâtvea inthawkin khawpui sâwm a nih.

Gerson naupasalhai kuoma chun an pahnam ang peiin, Issakar hnam chanpuola inthawk le, Aser hnam chanpuola inthawk le, Naphtali hnam chanpuola inthawk le Basana Manasse hnam chanpuola inthawkin khawpui sâwm le pathum an pêk a.
Merari naupasalhai kuoma chun ṭhumvâwra pêkin, an pahnam ang peiin, Reuben hnam chanpuola inthawk le, Gad hnam chanpuola inthawk le Zebulun hnam chanpuola inthawkin khawpui sâwm le pahni an pêk a.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun Levi mihai chu khawpui le a vêl khuohai chu an pêk a.
Juda hnam chanpuola inthawk dâm, Simeon hnam chanpuola inthawk dâm, Benjamin hnam chanpuola inthawk dâmin hieng khawpui a hming hrila umhai hi, ṭhumvâwra pêk an nih.
Chun, Kohath naupasalhai pahnam ṭhenkhat chun an biel sûnga chun Ephraim hnam chanpuola inthawk dâmin khawpuihai an nei a.
An kuoma Ephraim tlâng rama himna khawpui Sekem chu a vêl khuohai le chun an pêk a; Gezer le a vêl khuohai le khawm chun;
chun, Jokmeam, a vêl khuohai le chun, Beth-horon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Aijalon, a vêl khuohai leh, Gath-rimmon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola inthawk chun: Aner, a vêl khuohai leh, Bileam, a vêl khuohai leh, Kohath naupasalhai pahnam danghai ta dinga pêk a na;
Gersom mihai kuoma chun ṭhumvâwrin, Manasse hnam zâtve chanpuola inthawkin Basana Golan chu a vêl khuohai leh pêk a na;
Issakar hnama inthawkin Kedes, a vêl khuohai leh, Daberath, a vêl khuohai leh;
Ramoth, a vêl khuohai leh, Anem, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Aser hnam chanpuola inthawkin: Masal, a vêl khuohai leh, Abdon, a vêl khuohai leh;
Hukok, a vêl khuohai leh, Rehob, a vêl khuohai leh;
Naphtali hnam chanpuola inthawkin: Galilia Kades, a vêl khuohai leh, Hammon, a vêl khuohai leh, Kiriath-aim, a vêl khuohai leh.
Levi mihai mi dang, Merari naupasalhai kuoma chun Zebulun hnam chanpuola inthawkin Rimmon, a vêl khuohai leh; Tabor, a vêl khuohai leh;
chun, Jordan râla Jeriko vêlah, Jordan saktieng panga chun Reuben hnam chanpuola inthawkin thlalêra Bezer, a vêl khuohai leh pêk an nih; Jahza, a vêl khuohai leh,
Kedemoth, a vêl khuohai leh Mephaath, a vêl khuohai leh;
Gad hnam chanpuola inthawkin Gilead rama Ramoth, a vêl khuohai leh, Mahanaim, a vêl khuohai leh,
Hesbon, a vêl khuohai leh, Jazer, a vêl khuohai leh.
Chun, Issakar naupasalhai chu: Tola, Pua, Jasub le Simron, pali an nih.

Tola naupasalhai chu: Uzzi, Rephaia, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam le Semuel; Tola chungthua hriet dingin, an pahnam luhai an nih; an ṭhanga mi hrât khawkhêng: David hun laia chun an tamzie chu sîng hni sâng hni za ruk an nih.
Chun, Uzzi naupasal chu: Izrahia; Izrahia naupasalhai chu Mikael, Obadia, Joel le Issia, panga hi, an rêngin ṭhuoitu takhai an nih.
Chun, anni lai chun an ṭhangah, an pahnam angin, indo mi pâwl an um a, sîng thum le sâng ruk an nih: nuhmei tamtak el an nei a, naupasalhai khawm an nei ṭeu a nih.
Chun, an unauhai Issakar hnam lai po poa mi mi hrât khawkhênghai chu an thla thu sui dâna sui an na, sîng riet le sâng sari an nih.
Benjamin naupasalhai chu, Bela, Beker le Jediael, pathum an nih.
Bela naupasalhai chu: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth le Iri, panga; pahnam luhai, mi hrât khawkhênghai an nih; an thla thu sui dânah sîng hni sâng hni sâwmthum le pali an nih.
Beker naupasalhai chu: Zemira, Joas, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abija, Anathoth le Alemeth an nih. Hienghai po po hi Beker naupasalhai chu an nih.
Thla thu sui dânah anni ṭhang peiah, pahnam luhai, mi hrât khawkhênghaia ngai, sîng hni le za hni an nih.
Jediael naupasal chu: Bilhan a na; chun Bilhan naupasalhai chu: Jeus, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zethan, Tarsis le Ahisahar an nih.
Hienghai po po hi Jediael naupasalhai chu an na, an pahnam lu an nina ang peiin, mi hrât khawkhêng an na, sîng khat sâng sari le za hni chu indonaa sipaia fe thei pâwl chu an nih.
Suppim le Huppim, Ira naupasalhai, Aher naupasal Husim le chun.
Naphtali naupasalhai chu: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer le Sallum: Bilha naupasalhai chu an nih.
Manasse naupasalhai chu: Asriel, a nuhmeiin a nei chu; (a thaikêmnu Aram mi khan Gilead pa Makir kha a neipêk a;
chun, Makir chun Huppim le Suppim farnu a hming Maaka kha nuhmeiah a nei a.) Chun, a pahnina hming chu Zelophehad a na; Zelophehad chun naunuhmeihai a nei a.
Makir nuhmei Maaka chun naupasal a nei, a hminga chun Peres a sak a; chun, a unaupa hming chu Seres a nih; a naupasalhai chu Ulam le Rakem an nih.
Ulam naupa chu Bedan a na; hienghai hi Manasse naupa Makir naupa Gilead naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, a farnu Hammoleketh khawm chun Ishod hai, Abiezer hai, Mahla hai a nei bawk a.
Chun, Semida naupasalhai chu Ahian, Sekem, Likhi le Aniam an nih.
Chun, Ephraim naupasalhai chu: Suthela a na, ama naupa Bered, ama naupa Tahath; ama naupa Eleada, ama naupa Tahath;
ama naupa Zabad, ama naupa Suthela le Ezer le Elead, an ran ruolhai la hmang dinga an hung thlâk leia Gath mi chu rama pienghaiin an thathai le chun.
An pa Ephraim chun ni tam tak anni chu a sûn a, ama thlamuon dingin a unauhai an hung a.
Chun, a nuhmei chu a pâwl a, ân râi a, naupasal a nei a, a hminga chun an sûngkuo chu a hung vângduoi hle tâk leiin Beria a sak a.
A naunu chu Seera, Beth-horon a sak hnung le a hnuoihnung le Uzzen-Seera indintu kha a nih.
Chun, Repha chu a naupa a na, Reseph leh; ama naupa chu Tela, ama naupa chu Tahan,
ama naupa chu Ladan, ama naupa chu Ammihud, ama naupa chu Elisama,
ama naupa chu Nun, ama naupa chu Josua a nih.

Chun, an chanpuol le an umhmun chu Bethel le chutaka a khawperhai le chun; saktieng chun Naaran, thlangtieng chun Gezer chutaka khawperhai le chun; chun, Sekem a vêla khawperhai le chun, Azza le a vêla khawperhai chen chun;

chun, Manasse thlahai ramri tienga chun Beth-sean le a khawperhaiah, Taanak le a khawperhaiah, Megiddo le a khawperhaiah, Dor le a khawperhaiah. Hienghaia hin Israel naupa Josef thlahai chu an um a nih.
Aser naupasalhai chu: Imna, Isva, Isvi le Beria, an farnu chu Sera a nih.
Beria naupasalhai chu Heber le Birzaith pa Malkiel.
Chun, Heber chun Japhlet le Somer le Hotham le an farnu Sua chu a nei a.
Chun, Japhlet naupasalhai chu: Pasak, Bimhal le Asvath. Hienghai hi Japhlet thlahai an nih.
Semer naupasalhai chu: Ahi, Rohga, Jehuba le Aram.
Chun, a unaupa Helem naupasalhai chu: Zopha, Imna, Seles le Amal an nih.
Zopha naupasalhai chu: Sua, Harnepher, Sual, Beri, Imra.
Bezer, Hod, Samma, Silsa, Ithran le Beera an nih.
Chun, Jether naupasalhai chu: Jephunne, Pispa le Ara.
Ulla naupasalhai chu Arah, Hanniel le Rizia.

Hienghai po po hi Aser thlahai, an sûngkaw pahnam luhai, mi ditum, mi hrât khawkhênghai, rorêltutak hai an nih. Chun, indona sinthaw dinga an thla suina dâna chun mi sîng hni le sâng ruka ngai an nih.
Chun, Benjamin chun a nau lutirah Bela a nei a, a pahninaa chun Asbel, a pathumnaah Ahara,
a palinaah Noha, a panganaah Rapha.
Chun, Bela chun naupasalhai a nei a, Addar, Gera le Abihud:
Abisua, Naaman, Ahoa;
Gera, Sephuphan le Huram an nih.
Hienghai hi Ehud naupasalhai chu an nih: Geba hluotuhai, an pahnama luhai an nih; anni chu Manahath-a chun an hnawthmang a.
Naaman le Ahija le Gera a hnawthmang a, Uzza le Abihud a nei a.
Chun, anni chu a tirhmang hnung chun Moab phûla khan Saharaim chun nauhai a nei a; Husim le Baara hi a nuhmeihai an nih.
Chun, a nuhmei Hodes le chun Jobab, Zibia, Mesa, Malkam;
Jeuz, Sakia le , Mirma a nei a. Hienghai hi a naupasalhai, pahnam luhai chu an nih.
Husim le chun Abitub le Elpaal a nei a.
Elpaal naupasalhai chu: Eber, Misam le Semed, Ono le Lod le a vêla khuohai siemtu chu.
Beria le Sema, Aijalon ram hluotuhai laia an pahnam luhai Gath hluotuhai intlânsiettirtuhai chu;
Ahio, Sasak le Jeremoth;
Zebadia, Arad le Eder;
Mikael, Ispah le Joha, Beria naupasalhai chu.
Zebadia, Mesullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ismerai, Izlia, Jobab, Elpaal naupasalhai chu.
Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel;
Adaia, Beraia, Simrat, Simei naupasalhai chu
Ispan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hanania, Elam, Antothija
Iphedeia, Penuel, Sasak naupasalhai chu;
Chun, Samserai, Seharia, Athalia;
Jaaresia, Elija le Zikri, Jeroham naupasalhai chu.
Hienghai hi mi langsârtak le an pahnama ṭhang po poa luhai chu an nih; annihai chu Jerusalemah an um a nih.
Chun, Gibeona chun Gibeon pa Jeiel chu a chêng a, a nuhmei hming chu Maaka a na;
a nau lutîr chu Abdon, Zura, Kis, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio le Zeker.
Chun, Mikloth chun Simea a nei a, anni khawm chu an unauhai epin, an unauhai kâwlah Jerusalema chun an chêng ve a.
Nera chun Kis chu a nei a; Kis chun Saula a nei a; chun, Saula chun Jonathan a nei a, Malkisua le Abinadab le Es-baal leh.
Chun, Jonathan naupa chu Merib-baal a na; Merib-baal chun Mika a nei a.
Mika naupasalhai chu: Pithon, Melek, Tarea le Ahaz an nih.
Ahaz chun Jehoadda a nei a, Jehoadda chun Alemeth, Azmaveth le Zimri a nei a; chun, Zimri chun Moza a nei a:
Moza chun Binea a nei a; ama naupa chu Rapha a na, ama naupa chu Eleasa a na, ama naupa chu Azel a na:
chun, Azel chun naupasal paruk a nei a, an hminghai chu: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Searia, Obadia le Hanan hai an nih.
Chun, a unaupa Esek naupasalhai chu a nau lutir Ulam, a pahnina Jeus, a pathumna Eliphelet a nih.
Chun, Ulam naupasalhai chu mi hrât khawkhêng, thal kâp mihai an na, naupasal tamtak an nei a, an tu-le-tehai za le sâwmnga an nih. Hienghai po po hi Benjamin naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai po po chu thla insui dâna tiem vawng an na, Israel lal lekhabua chun ziek an nih: Judahai ruok chu an bawsietna leiin Babulona sala ṭhuoihmangin an um a.
Chun, an hmun nei an khawpuihaia um hmasatakhai chu Israelhai, thiempuhai, Levi mihai, Nethinim mihai hi an nih.
Uthai, Ammihud naupa, Omri naupa, Imri naupa, Bani naupa a na; Juda naupa Perez thlahai an nih.
Chun, Silon mi chu a nau lutîr Assaia le a naupasalhai leh.
Zera naupasalhai chu: Jeuel, an unauhai leh za ruk le sâwmkuo.
Chun, Benjamin naupasalhai chu: Sallu, Mesullam naupa, Hodavia naupa, Hassenua naupa;
Jeroham naupa Ibneia le Uzzi naupa Ela, Mikri naupa le Sephatia naupa Mesullam, Reuel naupa, Ibnija naupa;
an unauhai leh an thla thu sui dân angin za kuo sâwmnga paruk an nih. Hienghai po po hi an pahnam ang peia an pahnam luhai an nih.
Chun, thiempuhaia chun: Jedaia, Jehoiarib, Jakin,
Azaria, Hilkia naupa, Mesullam naupa, Zadok naupa, Meraioth naupa, Ahitub Pathien ina rorêltu naupa a nih:
Jeroham naupa Adaia, Pashur naupa, Malkija naupa, Adiel naupa Maasai leh, Jahzera naupa, Mesullam naupa, Mesillemith naupa, Immer naupa;
an unauhai leh an pahnama luhai chu sâng khat za sari le sâwmruk an nih; Pathien ina rawngbâwlna sina dinga mi theitak ruok an nih.
Levi mihaia chun: Hassub naupa Semaia, Azrikam naupa, Hasabia naupa; Merari naupa hai an nih.
Bakbakkar, Heres, Galal le Mattania, Mika naupa, Zikri naupa, Asaph naupa,
Semaia naupa Obadia, Galal naupa, Jeduthun naupa, Asa naupa Berekia, Elkana naupa, Netophath mihai khuohaia umhai chu.
Chun, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu: Sallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman le an unauhai leh; Sallum chu a hotutak a na,
saktieng panga lal kawtkhâr chu a vêng a; Levi thlahai rabawk vêngtuhai an nih.
Chun, Kore naupa Sallum, Ebiasaph naupa, Kora naupa, a unauhai leh, an pahnama mi, Kora mihai chu, rawngbâwlna enkawltuhai chu an na, biekbûk kawtkhâr vêngtuhai an nih: an thlatuhai khawm chu
Kha hma po khan Eleazar naupa Phinehas chu an chunga rorêltu a na, a kuoma chun
Chun, Meselemia naupa Zekaria chu intuokna puon in kawtkhâr vêngtu a na.

Chun, hienghai po po dai kawtkhâra vêngtuhai ni dinga thlanghai po po chu za hni le sâwm pahni an nih. Hienghai hi an khuohaia an thla thu suidân ang peia tiem an na, David le zâwlnei Samuelin an rawngbâwlna ruot ang peia an lo namdethai chu an nih.
Chuongchun, anni le an thlahai chenin biekbûk in,
A sîr lia chun vêngtuhai chu an um a, saktieng, thlangtieng, hmârtieng le simtiengah.
Chun, an unauhai, an khuoa umhai chu, ni sari sûng peiah rawngbâwla anni le um dingin a châng chângin an hung hlak ding a na;
Levi mi, kawtkhâr vêngtu hotutak hai pali chu rawngbâwlna ruota chun an um a na, Pathien ina ro in le, pindanhai chu an enkawl a nih,
chun, zîng tin tina chu chu hawng chu an sin a na, chu enkawl chu an mawphurna a ni leiin Pathien in vêla chun an riek hlak a.
Chun, anni laia ṭhenkhat chu rawngbâwlna bûr-le-bêlhai chunga enkawltu an na; a ni zât tiema la suok a, a ni zât tiema sie lût hlak ding an ni si a.
Mi ṭhenkhat chu thuomhnawhai, hmun inthiengtaka bûr le bêlhai po po chunga dâm, beiphit indi chunga dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm, riminhnik dâm, beraw dâm, enkawl dinga ruot an nih.
Chun, thiempuhai naupasal ṭhenkhathai chun riminhnik chawkpawl chu an buotsai a.
Levi mi pakhat, Kora chi Sallum nau lutîr Mattithia chu thlêngdâra thil zêuhai tienga enkawlna sin nei a na.
An unau ṭhenkhathai, Kohath mihai thlahai chu entirna bei chunga sin nei, châwlni tina buotsaituhai chu an nih.
Chun, hienghai hi hlasaktuhai, Levi sûngkuo pahnama luhai, pindana um zinga sin danga châng ve lohai chu; an sina chun a sûn a zâna ruoi an ni si a.
Hienghai hi Levi sûngkuo pahnama an thla po poa luhai, mi thei pâwl, Jerusalema umhai chu an nih.
Gibeona chun Gibeon hai thlatu, Jeiel chu a um a, a nuhmei hming chu Maaka a nih,
a nau lutirtak chu Abdon a na. Zur, Kis, Baal, Nera, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekariah le Mikloth leh,
Chun, Mikloth chun Simeam a nei a. Anni khawm chu an unauhai hnaiah Jerusalema chun an chêng ve a.
Nera chun Kis chu a nei a, Kis chun Saula a nei a; Saula chun Jonathan, Malkisua, Abinadab le Esbaal a nei a.
Chun, Jonathan naupa chu Merib-baal a na; Merib-baal chun Mika a nei a.
Mika naupasalhai chu: Pithon, Melek, Tahrea le Ahaz an nih.
Ahaz chun Jara a nei a, Jara chun Alemeth a nei a, Azmaveth le Zimri leh. Zimri chun Moza a nei a,
Moza chun Binea a nei a; ama naupa chu Rephaia, ama naupa chu Eleasa, ama naupa chu Azel;
chun, Azel chun naupasal paruk a nei a, an hming chu hieng hi an nih: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ismael, Searia, Obadia le Hanan; hienghai hi Azel naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun Israelhai chu an hung do a, chuongchun, Israel mihai chu Philistin mihai hmaa inthawk chun an tlânsie a, Gilboa tlânga dâm chun anni chu thatin an tlu tâwl a.
Chun, Philistin mihai chun Saula le a naupasalhai chu nasatakin an hnawt a; chuongchun, Philistin mihai chun Saula naupasal Jonathan le Abinadab le Malkisua chu an that a.
Chun, Saula chunga chun indona chu a hung zuol ta hle el a, thal kâp mihai chun ama chu an nangchîng ta a; thal kâp mihai lei chun nasatakin a beidawng ta a.

Chun, Saula chun a râlthuom chawitu kuoma chun, “I kâwlhnâm kha phawi la, mi hung sunthleng el rawh; chuong naw chun, hieng sertan lohai hi hung an ta, mi hung sukbuoi rawi an tih,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, a râlthuom chawitu chu a nuom naw a, ama chu a ṭi êm êm leiin. Chuleiin, Saula chun a kâwlhnâm chu a lâk a, a baw lût ta a.
Chun, a râlthuom chawitu chun Saula chu a thi tah ti a hmu chun, ama khawm chu a kâwlhnâm chu a baw lût a, a thi ve ta a.
Chuongchun, Saula chu a thi ta a, a naupasal pathumhai leh; an sûngkuo chu an rêngin hmunkhata chun an thi ta a.

Chun, ruoma um Israel mihai po po chu an tlânsie a, Saula le a naupasalhai chu an thi ti an hriet phing chun an khuohai chu an tlânsan a, an tlânse ve tah a; chuongchun, Philistin mihai chu an hung a, chuongahai chun an hung chêng ta a.
Chun, a zînga Philistin mihaiin an râl thathai thuom chu hlîp dinga an hung chun Saula le a naupasalhai chu Gilboa tlânga chun an lo tlu ve zing ti an hmu ta a.
Ama chu a thuom an hlîp a, a lu chu an lâk a, a râlthuom leh, mipuihai le an milimhai kuoma chanchin intlun dingin Philistin rama chun an thawn vêl ta a.
Chuongchun, a râlthuomhai chu an pathienhai ina chun an sie a, a lu chu Dagon ina chun an târ a.
Chun, Jabes-gilead mihai po po chun Saula chunga Philistin mihai thilthaw po po chu an hrietin,

mi hrât huoisenhai po po chu an tho a, Saula ruong le a naupasalhai ruonghai chu an lâk hmang a, Jabes-a chun an hung lâk a, Jabes-a thingsaisuo hnuoiah an ruhai chu an phûm a, ni sari sûng bu an nghei a.
Chun, Israelhai po po chu David kuomah Hebrona chun an hung inkhâwm a, “Ngai ta, i ru le i tisahai kan ni hi.
Kha hmaa Saula lal a ni lai khawm khan, nangin i mi keihruoi a, Israel rama hin i mi hung lûtpui a na,
Chuongchun, Israel upahai po po chu Hebronah lal kuoma chun an hung a, David chun
Jebusa chênghai chun David kuomah, “Hitaka hin i hung lût ding a ni nawh,” an lo ti a. Nisienlakhawm, David chun Zion kul chu a lâk a; chu chu David khawpui a hung ni ta a.
David chun, “Tukhawm Jebus mi that hmasataktu chu sipai hotu tak nîng a tih,” a ta. Chun, Zeruia naupa Joab chu a hmasatak a na, chuongchun, hotua siem a ni ta a.
Chun, David chu kula chun a chêng ta a; chuleichun, David khawpui an ti ta a.
Chun, khawpui chu Millo le a vêl po po chu a vêlin a bâwl a; chun, Joab chun a la bâkhai chu a siemṭha bawk a.
Chun, David chu a hung ropui deu deu a, sipaihai
Chun, hienghai hi sipai huoisen bîkhai Davidin a nei, Israel chungthua
Hieng hi mi thilthawthei Davidin a nei chu an nih: Hakmon thlaa mi Jasobeam, sâwmthum chunga hotu; mi za thum chungah a fei ân let a, kâr lovin anni chu a that tâwl ta a.
Chun, ama hnunga chun Aho mi, Dodo naupa Eleazar, mi thilthawthei pathumhai laia pakhat chu a nih.
Pasdammima khan David kuomah a um a, chu hmuna chun Philistin mihai chu indo dingin an inkhâwm a, chutaka chun, hmun, buṭeia sip a um a; mipuihai chu Philistin mihai hmaa chun an tlânsie a.
Chun, chu bu hmun lailung laia chun an ngîr a, an hum tlat ta a; Philistin mihai chu an that a,
Chun, sipai sâwmthumhai chu lungpuiah, David kuomah, Adullam pûka chun an va fe a; chun, Philistin sipaihai chu Rephaim ruoma chun ruongchaichea thlâkin an um a.
Chun, David chu kula chun a um a; Philistin sipai ruol chu chu lai chun Bethlehema chun an um a.
Chun, David chun a châk a, “Kul kawtkhâr bula Bethlehem tuisunsuo tui kha dâwn dingin mi pe um hai sien chu aw!” a ta.

Chuongchun, mi pathumhai chun Philistin sipaihai chu an nêrthleng a, kul kawtkhâr bula Bethlehema tuisunsuoa inthawk chun tui chu an va chawi a, an hung lâk a, David kuomah an hung lâk ta a: nisienlakhawm, David chun tui chu a dawn naw a,

“Hi hi ka thaw ding hi ka Pathien chun mi khap raw se: an hringna ṭiumtaka sietuhai, hieng mihai hringna thisen hi ka dâwn ding am a nih? An hringna chân huoma hi hi an hung lâk a ni si a,” a ta. Chuleichun, a dâwn ta naw a. Hieng thil hi mi thilthawthei pathumhai chun an thaw a nih.
Chun, Joab unaupa Abisai chu sâwmthumhai laia hotu tak a na, ama chun za thumhai chunga chun a fei chu a phawi a, anni chu a that a, pathumhai laia chun hming ṭhat a hlaw a.
Sâwmthumhai lai chun ama chu inza a kai a; chuongchun, anni chunga hotua siem chu a ni ta a; nisienlakhawm, a hmaa pathumhai lai chu a ṭhang nawh.

Kabzeel mi, mi thilthawtheitak naupa, Jehoiada naupa Benaia, thil nasatakhai thawtu chu a nih: Moaba Ariel naupasal pahnihai chu a that a, a fe thla a, vûr tlâk hun laiin pûk sûnga chun sakeibaknei a that bawk a.

Chun, Aigupta mi, mi taksa lientak tawng ngaa insâng a that a; chu Aigupta mi kuta chun puon khâwngtu puonkawl ang hi fei a um a; ama chun hmawl leh a pan thlâk a, Aigupta mi kuta fei chu a lâkpêk a, ama fei ngei chun a that ta a.
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chun hieng thilhai hi a thaw a, mi thilthawthei pathumhai
Ngai ta, ama chu mi sâwmthumhai nêk khan nasatakin inza a kai a, amiruokchu, a hmasatak pathumhai lai chu a ṭhang nawh: David chun ama vêngtu pâwl hotua chun a siem a.
Chun, sipai pâwlhai laia mi thilthawtheihai chu: Joab unaupa Asahel, Bethlehema Dodo naupa Elhanan.
Haror mi Sammoth, Pelon mi Helez;
Teko mi Ikkes naupa Ira, Anathoth mi Abiezer;
Husath mi Sibbekai, Aho mi Illai;
Netophath mi Maharai, Netophath mi Baana naupa Heled;
Benjamin thlaa mi Gibeaa um Ribai naupa Ithai, Pirathon mi Benaia,
Gaas vadungtêa um Hurai, Arbath mi Abiel;
Baharum mi Azmaveth, Saalbon mi Eliahba;
Gizon mi Hasem naupasalhai, Harar mi Sage naupa Jonathan;
Harar mi Sakar naupa Ahiam, Ur naupa Eliphal,
Mekerath mi Hepher, Pelon mi Ahija;
Karmel mi Hezro, Ezbai naupa Naarai;
Nathan unaupa Joel, Hagri naupa Mibhar;
Ammon mi Zelek, Beroth mi Naharai, Zeruia naupa Joab râlthuom chawituhai chu:
Ithra mi Ira, Ithra mi Gareb;
Hit mi Uria, Ahlai naupa Zabad;
Reuben mi Siza naupa Adina, Reuben mi hotu le a kuoma mi sâwmthum hai leh;
Maaka naupa Hanan, Mith mi Josaphat,
Asterath mi Uzzia, Aroer mi Hotham naupasalhai Sama le Jeiel;
Simri naupa Jediael, Tiz mi a unaupa Joha;
Mahav mi Eliel, Elnaam naupasalhai: Jeribai le Josavia, Moab mi Ithma;
Mezoba mi Obed, Eliel le Jaasiel hai.
Chun, Kis naupa Saula leia an khâr khum tlat laia Ziklaga David kuoma hunghai chu hienghai hi an nih: anni chu mi thilthawtheihai laia tiemsa, indonaa ama ṭhangpuituhai chu an nih.
Thalngul leh an inthuom a; thalngula thal kâp ding le dêngvira lung dêng dingin vawitieng le changtieng an hmang thei ve ve a; Benjamin thla Saula unauhai an nih.
A hotu tak chu Ahiezer a na, chun, Gibeath mi Semaa naupa Joas; chun, Jeziel le Pelet, Azmaveth naupasalhai le chun; chun, Anathoth mi Jehu le Beraka leh;
sâwmthum chunga le sâwmthumhai laia mi thilthawtheitak Gibeon mi Ismaia leh; chun, Gederath mi Jozabad le, Johanan le Jahaziel le, Jeremia leh;
chun, Haruph mi Sephatia, Semaria, Bealia, Jerimoth le Eluzai;
Kora mihai Jasobeam, Joezer, Azarel, Issia le Elkana.
Gedora Jeroham naupasalhai Zebadia le Joela leh.

Chun, Gad mihai chu thlalêra kula khan David kuomah an um hran bîk a, mi hrât khawkhêng, indo dinga inchûkthiem mi phaw le thal chawi thiem mi; an hmaihai chu sakeibaknei hmai ang el le, an hrâtzie chu tlâng chunga sakhi anga hrât an nih;
a pakhatna chu Ezer, a pahnina chu Obadia, a pathumna chu Eliab,
a palina chu Mismanna, a pangana chu Jeremia;
a parukna chu Attai, a pasarina chu Eliel;
a parietna chu Johanan, a pakuona chu Elzabad;
a sâwmna chu Jeremia, sâwm le pakhatna chu Makbanai a nih.
Hieng Gad naupasalhai hi sipaihai hotuhai an na; anni laia a châutak chu mi za khat tluk a na, a hrâttak chu mi sâng khat tluk a nih.
Thla khatnaa Jordan vadung a kuong a liem pûr lai khawma kântuhai chu an nih; chuongchun, chu varuoma a saktieng le a thlangtienga umhai po po chu an intlânsiettir a.
Chun, chutaka chun Juda le Benjamin mihai chu David kuomah kula chun an hung a.

David chu anni tuok dingin a va suok a, anni chu a dawn a, an kuomah, “Kei mi ṭhangpui dinga muongumtaka hung in ni chun, ka lungril chu nangnia kawp tlat a ta, amiruokchu, ka kutin pawi a tâwk nawh ti hre zinga; ka hmêlmahai kuoma mîn mantir dinga hung in ni ruok chun, ei thlatuhai Pathien chun, chu chu en sienla cheu, kâwk raw se cheu,” a ta.

Chun, sâwmthum laia a hotu tak Amasai kuoma chun thlarau chu a hung tlung ta a, ama chun, “David, nangma ta kan na, nangma tienga ṭhang kan nih, nang Jesai naupa; inremna, nanga kuoma chun inremna um sienla, nangma ṭhangpuituhai che kuoma khawm inremna chu um raw se; i Pathien chun a ṭhangpui si che a,” a ta. Chun, David chun anni chu a lâwmlût ta a, sipai pâwl hotuhaiah a siem tâwl ta a.

Saula do dinga Philistin mihai le an hung lai khan, Manasse mi ṭhenkhat chu David tienga chun an pakai a; nisienlakhawm, anni chun an lo ṭhangpui naw a; Philistin mi hotuhai chun, remruotin ama chu an tir hmang a, “A hotupa Saula kuoma hin pakai a ta, ei lu inhmang rawi ei tih,” an ti si a.
Chun, ama chu Ziklaga a fe chun Manasse mi Adna, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikael, Jozabad, Elihu le Zillethai hai hi, sipai sâng pâwl hotuhai, Manasse hnama mi, ama tieng an ṭhang a.
Anni chun David chu inru pâwl laia inthawkin an ṭhangpui a; anni chu mi hrât khawkhêng ruok an ni si a, sipai pâwl lai khawm hotu an ni bawk a.
Chuongchun, a ni têlin sipai pâwl lientak, Pathien sipaihai ang hiel an ni hmakhat chun David kuoma chun an hung pei a.
Hienghi
Juda thlahai, phaw le fei chawia indo dinga inthuom chu sâng ruk le za riet an nih.
Simeon thlahai, indonaa mi hrât khawkhênghai chu sâng sari le za khat,
Levi thlahai chu sâng li le za ruk.
Chun, Jehoiada chu Aron sûngkuoa chun a ṭhuoitu a na, ama le chun sâng thum le za sari an um a;
chun, Zadok tlangvâl hrât khawkhêng, a pa pahnamah hotu sâwmhni le pahni.
Saula unauhai, Benjamin mihai chu sâng thum: anni a tam lem tak chu Saula tienga ṭhang an nih.
Chun, Ephraim mihai, an pa- hnama mi hming inthang le mi hrât khawkhênghai chu sîng hni le za riet.
Manasse hnam zâtvea chun sîng le sâng riet; anni chu David chu lala siem dinga fe dinga an hming pe ṭhalhai chu an nih.
Issakar mihai, Israel chun ieng am a thaw ding a na ti hre dinga thil umziehai hrethiem mihai; an hotuhai chu za hni an ni a; an unauhai po po chu an thu hnuoia chun an um a nih.

Zebulun mihai, sipai ni dinga fe suok thei ṭhieu, indona khawm a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mi, indo hriem tinrêng hmang thiem mi chu sîng nga; chuonghai chu indona chu pâwl tlar indiktaka rem thiem, lungril thuo hni nei ni lo an nih.
Naphtali mihai hotu sâng khat le, phaw le fei chawi mi sîng thum le sâng sari an nih.
Dan mihai indona chu a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mihai chu sîng hni le sâng riet le za ruk.
Aser mihai, sipai pâwla fe suok thei ṭhieu, indona chu a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mi sîng li.
Jordan râl tienga, Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai, indona hriem tinrêng hmang thiem mihai chu nuoi khat le sîng hni.

Hieng mi po po, indo thiem mi, indona chu a pâwl pâwla rêl fel thiem mihai hi, Israel po po chunga David chu lala siem dingin Hebrona chun lungril hmunkhat putin an hung tâwl a; chun, Israel laia mi dang hrim hrim khawm chu David chu lala siem ding thua chun lungril hmunkhatin an um a.
Chun, chutaka chun David rawi chun ni thum sûng chu faa dâwnin an um a; an unauhai chun an ta dingin an lo buotsaipêk si a.

Chu chau naw khawm chu, anni hnai deuhai; Issakar le Zebulun le Naphtali ram chen khawma, sabengtung dâmin, sanghâwngsei dâmin, sabengtung lienchi dâmin, bâwngchal dâmin, bei dâm, fâk ding tinrêng dâm, theichang bei dâm, grêp ra ṭâwl bâwr dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm, bâwngchal le berâm chen khawm tamtak an hung chawi a; Israel rama chun nasataka hlimna a um a.
David chun sâng chunga hotuhai le za chunga hotuhai le ṭhuoitu tinrênghai chu ân râwnpui a.
Chuongchun, David chun Israel mi hung inkhâwmhai po po kuoma chun, “Ṭha in ti zâwng a na,
ei kuomah ei Pathien bâwm kha hang la nâwk tâng ei tiu; Saula hun lai chena kha ei ngaisak ta dêr naw a ni si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui pungkhâwmhai po po chun thaw ding an ti ta a; chu thil chu mipui ngaia chun ân dik si a.
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu tawlailîr thar chungah an phur a; Abinadab ina inthawk chun an hung lâk suok a; Uzza le Ahio chun tawlailîr chu an khal a.
Chun, David le Israel mi po pohai chu Pathien hmaa chun, hlahai le, ṭingṭanghai le, perkhuonghai le, khuongtêhai le, dârbenthekhai le tawtawrâwthai mûtin an um a.
Chun, Kidon hrizâwl an hung tlung chun; bâwngchalhai chu an insui leiin bâwm chu chel dingin Uzza chun a kutin a hei ban a.
Chuongchun,
Chun, Uzza chunga
Chun, chu ni chun David chun Pathien chu a ṭi ta a, “Iengtin am ka inah ka kuomah Pathien bâwm hi hung la thei tâng ka ta?” a ta.
Chuongchun, David chun bâwm chu David khuoah ama kuoma chun a sawn ta naw a, amiruokchu, Git mi Obed-edom ina chun a lâk lût lem ta a.
Chun, Tura lal Hiram chun David kuomah mihai a tir a, sidar thing dâm, lung sut mihai dâm, thing rem mihai dâm a in bâwl dingin a tir bawk a.
David chun
David chun Jerusalema chun nuhmei tamtak a nei a, David chun naupasal le naunuhmei a la nei sa pei a.
Hienghai hi Jerusalema a nei, a nauhai hming chu a nih: Sammua, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon;
Ibhar, Elisua, Elpelet;
Noga, Nepheg, Japhia;
Elisama, Beeliada le Eliphelet.

Chun, Philistin mihai chun David chu Israel po po chunga lal dingin hriek nâl a ni tah ti an hriet chun, Philistin mihai po po chu David zawng ding chun an hang fe a; chun, David khawm chun a lo hrietin, anni chu tuok dingin a suok ta a.
Chuongchun, Philistin mihai chu an hung a, Rephaim ruoma chun an hung inzâr a.
David chun Pathien kuomah, “Philistin mihai chu ka hang do ding am a nih? Ka kutah anni chu i mi pêk ding am a nih?” tiin ân dawn a.

Chuongchun, Baal-perazim chenin an hang fe a; David chun chutaka chun anni chu a hne tâwl a; chun, David chun, “Pathien chun ka hmêlmahai chu ka kutah, tui ting inṭhe ang elin a sukdar tah a ni hi,” a ti a. Chuleiin, chu hmun hminga chun Baal-perazim an inbûk ta a.
Chun, anni chun an pathienhai chu chutaka chun an tlânsan a, David chun thu a pêk a, chuonghai chu meiin an raw ta a.
Philistin mihai chu phaizâwl tieng chun an la hung inzar nâwk ta rawp a.
David chun Pathien a rawn nâwk a, Pathien chun a kuomah, “Anni chu hang hnawt naw la, annia inthawkin inherhmang lem la, thingtheihmi kûng zâwna khan anni chu zu hnawt lem rawh.
Chun, thingtheihmi lêrhaia chun kalpên rihai i hriet pha chun indo dingin fe suok la; Pathien chu i hmaah Philistin sipaihai chu sukhlum dingin a fe suok tah a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Pathienin ama thu a pêk ang chun a thaw a; Gibeona inthawk Gezer chen rakin Philistin sipaihai chu a that pei ta a.
David chanchin chu ram po poah ân thang ta a; chuongchun,
David chun David khawpuia chun inhai a bâwl a; Pathien bâwm ta ding khawm chun hmun a buotsai a; chu ding chun puon in a kei a.
Chun, David chun Israel mihai po po chu
David chun Aron thlahai chu a khâwm a. Levi mihai leh;
Kohath naupasalhai chu: a hotu tak Uriel le a unauhai za khat le sâwmhni;
Merari naupasalhai chu: a hotu tak Asaia le a unauhai za hni le sawmhni;
Gerson naupasalhai chu; a hotu tak Joel le a unauhai za khat le sâwmthum;
Elizaphan naupasalhai chu: a hotu tak Semaia le a unauhai za hni;
Hebron naupasalhai chu: a hotu tak Eliel le a unauhai sâwmriet;
Uzziel naupasalhai chu: a hotu tak Amminadab le a unauhai za khat le sâwm le pahni:
Chun, David chun thiempu Zadok hai, Abiathar hai le Levi mihai; Uriel, Asaia le Joel, Semaia, Eliel le Amminadab chu a ko a,
an kuomah, “Levi mihai pahnam laia hotuhai in na, a hmun dinga ka buotsai tah hmuna
A hmasa khawm khan nangniin in phur naw leiin
Chuongchun, thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu
David chun Levi mihai an hotu tak kuoma chun an unauhai chu thilrimawihai, perkhuonghai, ṭingṭanghai, dârbenthekhai le hlim râwla khêk rak rak a, sut dingin hlasaktuhai ruot dingin a hril a.
Chuongchun, Levi mihai chu Joel naupa Heman; a unauhai Berekia naupa Asaph le an unau Merari naupasalhai laia mi chu an ruot a, Kusaia naupa Ethan hai dâm;

chun, anni laia an unauhai ân hnuoi pâwla chun Zekaria, Benaia, Jaaziel, Semiramoth; Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaia, Maaseia, Mattithia, Eliphelehu, Mikneia hai; chun, Obed-edom le Jeiel, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu an ruot bawk a.
Chuongchun, hlasaktuhai Heman, Asaph le Ethan, hai hi dâr dârbenthek inringtaka sut dinga ruot an na;
chun, Zekaria, Aziel, Semira-moth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseia, Benaia hai chu Alamoth bia sut dinga perkhuong pua ruot an na;
chun, Mattithia, Eliphelehu, Mikneia, Obed-edom, Jeiel le Azazia hai hi ṭingṭang Seminith biha per dinga ruot an nih.
Chun, Levi mi hotu Kenania chu hla hotu a na; a thiem leiin hla chu a ṭhuoi a.
Berekia le Elkana chu bâwm ta dinga kawtkhâr vêngtu an nih.
Sebania, Josaphat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zekaria, Benaia le Eliezer, thiempuhai chun, Pathien bâwm hmaa chun tawtawrâwthai an mût a; chun, Obed-edom le Jehia chu bâwm vêngtuhai chu an nih.
Chuongchun, David le Israel upahai le sâng khat chunga hotuhai chu Obed-edom ina inthawka
Chuong Levi mihai

David chu puon zai inhmi puonin ân thuom a, Levi mihai po po bâwm zâwntuhai le, hlasaktuhai le, hlasaktuhai hotu Kenania hai le chun chuong ang bawkin an inthuom a; David chun zakawsîng puon zai inhmi chu a hâk bawk a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai po po chun ri nasatak leh, saki mût rîk leh, tawtawrâwt ri leh, dârbenthek ri leh, ṭingṭang le perkhuonghaia inringtaka sakin
Chun,
Chun, Pathien bâwm chu an hung lâk lût a, Davidin a lo siem puon in lailung laitaka chun an inṭhut ta a; chun, Pathien hmaah pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le inremna thilinhlânhai an inhlân ta a.
Chun, David chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân le inremna thilinhlân chu ân hlân hnung chun,
Chun, Israel mihai mi tin el chu a nuhmei a pasalin, bei tlang le sa tlin le grêp ra ṭâwl a pêk seng a.
Chun, Levi mihai mi ṭhenkhat chu
a hotu tak chu Asaph a na, ama dawta chun Zekaria, Jaaziel, Semira-moth, Jehiel, Mattithia, Eliab, Benaia, Obed-edom le Jeiel hai; ṭingṭang le perkhuong puhai an nih;
Asaph chu dârbenthek inringtaka sutin; thiempu Benaia le Jahaziel hai chu Pathien thuthlung bâwm hmaa chun tawtawrâwt leh an um zing bawk a.
Chun, chu ni chun David chun Asaph le a unauhai
Aw,
Mi tin lai chun a thil thaw inhriettir ro.
Ama chawimmawiin hla sak unla,ama inpâkin sak ro;
A thilmak thaw po po thu hril ro.
A hming inthieng chu sawng ro;
A hmêl chu zawng rawp ro.
A thilmak thawhai chu hre zing ro,
A thilmakhai le a baua a rorêl suokhai chu:
Aw, a siehlaw Israelhai,
Jakob thla, a ithlanghai.
Ama chu
A rorêlhai chu hnuoi chung po poa hin a um.
A thuthlung chu kumkhuoin hre zing unla,
Suon sâng khat chena a thu lo pêk chu.
Isak kuoma a inkhâmna chu.
Chu ma chu thuruot ni dingin Jakob kuomah a sukdet a,
Israel kuoma kumkhawtluong thuthlung dingin;
I rochanpuol ding chu,” tiin.
Mi tlâwmte chau in ni lai khan,
Anih, mi tlâwmte chau, chutaka mikhuol in na;
Hnam tum tum kuomah an fe lawn an fe lawn a,
Ram tum tuma inthawkin mi tum tumhai kuomah.
Tu inêksâwr khawm a phal naw a.
Anih, anni leiin lalhai khawm a kâwk a;
Ka zâwlneihai pawi hrim hrim khawm tâwk naw ro,” tiin.
Leihnuoia um po pohai,
Ni tin a sandamna thu chu inhriettir ro.
Hnam tin lai chun a ropuizie hril unla,
Mi tinrênghai lai chun a thilmak thawhai hril ro.
Ama chu pathien po po nêka ṭi ding a nih.
Mipuihai pathienhai chu milimhai an ni si a,
Chawimawina le ropuina a hmaah an um a,
Hrâtna le hlimna chu a hmun inthiengah an um.
Mi tina chi tinrênghai,
Thil inhlân ding chawiin, a hmaah hung ro.
Aw, inthieng mawina inbelin
Leihnuoia um po pohai, a hmaa chun inthin ro;
Khawvêl khawm hi ân hnîng thei nawna dingin sukdetin a um a.
Vânhai khi lâwmtakin um sienla, hnuoi khawm hi hlimtakin um raw se;
Hnam tin lai chun,
Tuisuoriet le a sûnga um po po hi inri hum hum sienla,
Lo le a sûnga um po po hi lâwmtakin um raw se.
Chu pha chun ram hnuoia thing po po hi
Hnuoi ro rêl dingin a hung ding a ni si a.
Aw
A zângaina chu kumkhuoin a um zing si a.
A kuoma chun, “Aw Pathien, nang kan sandamna, mi sandam la,
Nangin mi ṭhuoi khâwmin, hnamhai laia inthawk chun mi sanhim la,
I hming inthieng kuoma lâwmthu hril ding le,
Nangma inpâknaa chawimawi ding in,” ti ro.
Chatuona inthawka chatuon chenin.
Chun, mipui po po chun, “Amen,” an lo tih a,
Chun, ni tina sin ṭûlzie ang peia rawngbâwl zing zing dingin, Asaph le a unauhai chu
Obed-edom le an unauhai sâwmruk le pariet hai leh; Jeduthun naupa Obed-edom le Hosa chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai ni dingin;
chun, thiempu Zadok le a unau thiempuhai chu Gibeon bâwlhmuna chun,
Israelhai kuoma thu a pêk tah,
chun, an kuoma chun Heman hai, Jeduthun hai, an hming lama thlanga umhai chu, a zângaina chu kumkhuoin a um zing leia

anni laia Heman le Jeduthun chu, ân ring zing ding dârbenthek le tawtawrâwt le chun an um a; Pathien hlahai sakna dinga hlasakna thuomhnaw kim le chun, chun, Jeduthun naupasalhai chu dai kawtkhâra um ding an nih.
Chun, mi po po chu mâni in sengah an ṭîn ta a; David khawm chu a insûng chu mal sâwm dingin a ṭîn ta a.
Chun, David chun a in chu a hung hluo phing chun, zâwlnei Nathan kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, kei chu Sidar thingphêk inah ka um a.
Chun, Nathan chun David kuomah, “I lungrila um ang po po chu thaw el rawh, Pathien chu i kuomah a um annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, chu zân le le chun Pathien thu chu Nathan kuoma chun a hung tlung ta a,
“Hang fe la, ka siehlaw David chu hang hril rawh, ‘
Israel thlahai Aiguptaa inthawka ka hung ṭhuoi suoka inthawk vawisûn ni chen hin inah ka la um ngai nawh a; puon in pakhata inthawka a dangah, biekbûk pakhata inthawka a dangah ka um lem kha.

Khâwlai hmuna khawm Israelhai ka fepuina taphawta chun, ka mihai châwm dinga thu ka ipêk, Israel rorêltuhai a tu tu kuoma khawm khan, Iengdinga Sidar in in mi bâwlpêk naw am a na? ka ti hlak am a nih?’
Chuleiin, ka siehlaw David kuoma chun tuhin hang hril la, ‘Sipaihai
i fena taphawtahai chun ka hung ve pei a, i hmêlmahai po po chu i hmaa inthawkin ka sat thlâkpêk che a; chuongchun, leihnuoia um, mi ropuitak hming angin i hming chu siem ka tih.
Ka mi Israelhai ta ding chun hmun ruot ka ta, anni chu phun ka tih, anni hmun ngeia chun an um a, an insawn nâwk ta nawna dingin. Chun, inhma ang khan rîtlona thlahai chun anni chu sukse ta naw nih,
ka mi Israelhai chunga um dinga rorêltuhai ka ruot nia ang khan; chun, i hmêlmahai po po chu tukdawl bawk ka tih. Chunawa khawm,
Chun, i thlatuhai kuoma i fena ding nihai a hung bikim pha chun, nangma hnunga hin i thla ngei hung inngîr ka ta, chu chu i naupasalhai laia mi ngei nîng a tih, chun, a ram chu sukdet bawk ka tih.
Ama chun in mi bâwlpêk a ta; kei khawma a ram chu kumkhuoin tungdingpêk bawk ka tih.
amiruokchu, ka ina le ka ramah kumkhuoin inngîr dettir lem ka tih; chuongchun, a lalṭhungpha chu chatuonin tungding nîng a tih,’ ” tiin.
Hieng thu po pohai ang tak le, hieng thilhmu po po ang tak hin Nathan chun David chu a hril ta a.
Chun, lal David chu a lût a,
Hi hi i mithmua chun thil chîtê a na, aw Pathien, nisienlakhawm, i siehlaw sûngkuo chunga thil la hung tlung ding thu chu i hril a, Aw
i siehlaw chawimawia a um chungthua hin, hi bâk hi David hin ieng am i kuoma la hril sa rawp a ta? I siehlaw chu i hriet chieng si a.
Aw
Aw

Aigupta rama inthawka i mihai an hmaa hnamhai chu hnawt suok peia în tlan suok, thil râpthlâk le thil ropuia i hming siempêk dinga, nangma ta ding ngeia nang Pathien feha în tlan suok hnam, i mi Israelhai ang hnuoi chunga hin ieng hnam am an um hrim a?
I mi Israelhai chu nangin i mihai ngei ni kumkhuo dingin i siem a; nang
Tuhin, Aw
‘Sipaihai
Aw ka Pathien, nangin i siehlaw kuoma hin sûngkuo i siempêk ding a nih ti i suklang ta si a; chuleiin, i siehlaw hin i hmaa a lungrila ṭawngṭai dingin a lo ngam tah a nih.
Chun, tuhin, Aw
chuongchun, tuhin i hmaa kumkhuoa a um zing theina dingin i siehlaw sûngkuo chu malsâwmpêk hi i lawmzâwngtak a na; Aw
Hi hnunga hin hieng hi a hung ni a, David chun Philistin mihai chu a hne a, anni chu a tukdawl a, Philistin mihai kuta inthawk chun Gath le a vêl khuohai chu a lâk ta a.
Chun, Moab khawm chu a hung hne a, Moab mihai chu David siehlawhai an hung ni tah a, chuongchun, siehai an hung chawi a.
Euphrates vadung chena a ram chu indin dinga a fe malamin, Zoba lal Hadarezer chu Mahath chenin David chun a hne bawk a.

David chun amaa inthawk chun sakawr tawlailîr sâng khat le, sakawr chung chuong mi sâng sari le, kea fe mi sîng hni leh a manpêk a, chun, David chun tawlailîr keimi sakawrhai chu, tawlailîr za khata ding chau a hla a, an ke tha a sat vawng a.
Chun, Damaskaa Suria mihai chu Zoba lal Hadarezer ṭhangpui dinga an hung chun David chun Suria mi sîng hni le sâng hni chu a that a.
Chun, David chun Damaskaa Suriaa chun sipai pâwl a sie a, chuongchun, Suria mihai chu David siehlawhai an hung ni ta a, chuongchun, sie dâm an hung chawi a. Chun,
Chun, David chun Hadarezer siehlawhai iphur rângkachak phawhai chu a lâk a, Jerusalemah a hung lâk a.
Chun, Hamath lal Tou chun Davidin Zoba lal Hadarezer a hne ti a hriet chun,

Hadarezer chu a do a, a hne ta lei chun, ama chu malsâwma chibai bûk dingin, a naupa Hadoram chu lal David kuoma chun a tir ta a; Hadarezer chu Tou le chun an lo indo rawp hlak ta a; chun, ama chun dârsen le tangkaruo le rângkachak bûr le bêl chi tinrêng elhai chu ama chu a thawn a.
Hieng po pohai, tangkaruo le rângkachak hnam tamtakhaia inthawka a lâkhai chu David chun
Chun, Edoma chun sipai pâwl a sie a, chuongchun, Edom mihai po po chu David khuo le tui an hung ni ta a. Chun,
Chun, David chun Israelhai po po chunga chun ro a rêl a; a mi po pohai chungah indiktak le feltakin ro a rêl a.
Zeruia naupa Joab chu sipai hotu a na; Ahilud naupa Jehosaphat chu thil inchiktu a na.
Ahitub naupa Zadok le, Abiathar naupa Abimelek
Jehoiada naupa Benaia chu Kereth le Peleth mihai chunga hotu a nih; chun, David naupasalhai chu lal tienga hotu an nih.
Hi hnunga hin hieng hi a hung na; Ammon mihai lal Nahas chu a thi a, ama aia chun a naupa chun ro a rêl ta a.

Chun, David chun, “A pa khan ka chungah lunginsietna ân entir leiin, Nahas naupa Hanun chunga hin lunginsietna inentir vêng ka tih,” a ta.
