Chuongchun, a pa chungthua chun, ama thlamuon dingin David chun mi a tir a. David siehlawhai chu ama thlamuon dingin Hanun kuoma chun Ammon mihai rama chun an hung ta a.

Amiruokchu, Ammon mihai laia an hotuhai chun Hanun kuoma chun, “David chun i pa chu ân za leiin i kuomah thlamuontuhai a hung tir ni dingin i ring am a nih? Hieng a siehlawhai hi thil zawng suok ding le, hre ding le ram chu enthlit dinga i kuoma hung an ni lem a ni naw maw?” an ta.
Chuongchun, Hanun chun David siehlawhai chu a man a, an hmul a vâwpêk a, an silfênhai chu a laiah, a mawng tlung rakin a thlêrpêk a, anni chu a tir hmang ta a.

Chun, mi tu amanih David kuoma chun a va fe a, mihai an lo sawisak dân chu a va hril ta a. Ama chun anni chu tuok dingin mi a tir a; mihai chu nasatakin an inzak si a. Chun, lal chun, “In khâkhmulhai ân ṭhang sei hmakhat chu Jerikoah um phawt el ro, chun, hung chau ro,” a ti a.

Chun, Ammon mihai chu David ta dingin theidaumin an insiem tah ti an hriet phing chun Hanun le Ammon mihai chun, Zobaa inthawk dâm, Aram-maakaa inthawk dâm, Mesopotamiaa inthawk dâma sakawr puhai le sakawr tawlailîrhai hawna dingin tangkaruo talent sâng khat an thawn ta a.

Chuongchun, sakawr tawlailîr sîng thum le sâng hni chu, Maaka lal le a mihai le chun an ruoi ta a; anni chu an hung a, Medeba phâk hmaa chun an inkul ta a. Chuongchun, Ammon mihai chu an khawpuihaia inthawk chun an hung pungkhâwm a, indo dingin an suok ta a.
Davidin chu chu a hriet chun, Joab le mi thilthawthei sipai pâwl po po chu a tir ta a.
Chun, Ammon mihai chu an hung suok a, khawpui dai kawtkhâra chun an intlar a; chun, lalhai a hung ṭhangvehai khawm chu an khâtin phûla chun an um a.
Joab chun indona chu hnungtieng le hmatienga chun an hung nawr a nih ti a hmu chun, Israel laia mi ditumhai chu a thlangsuok a, Suria mihai hmaa chun ân tlartir ta a.
Mi dang po po chu a unaupa Abisai kuta chun ân kawltir a, Ammon thlahai epa chun an intlar ve ta a.
Ama chun, “Suria mihai chu ka ta dinga an hung hrât talaw chun, mi ṭhangpui i ta; chun, Ammon mihai chu nanga ta dinga an hung hrât talaw bawk chun, keiin ṭhangpui thung ka ti che a.
Insukhuoi unla, ei hnam le ei Pathien khawpuihai sanin insukpasal ei tiu: chun, Pathien chun ṭha a ti ang peiin thaw raw se,”a ta.
Chuongchun, Joab le a kuoma mi umhai chun Suria mihai chu indo dingin an va hnai ta a; chuongchun, ama hmaa chun an tlânse ta a.

Chun, Ammon mihai chun Suria mihai chu an tlânsie ti an hriet phing chun, anni khawm chuong ang bawk chun a unaupa Abisai hmaa inthawk chun an tlânse ve ta a, khawpuia chun an lût ta a, Joab ruok chu Jerusalema chun a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Suria mihaiin Israelhai hmaa chun se nâwk zuol an ni tah ti an hriet chun mi an tir a, Vadungpui râla Suria mi umhai chu, Hadarezer sipaihai hotu Sophak rawiin an incha suok ta a.
Chu chu David kuoma chun an hril a; chun, ama chun Israel mihai po po chu a kei khâwm a, Jordan râl an hung kai a, anni chu an hmu a, thaw dingin an inzar ta a.

Chun, Israelhai hmaa chun Suria mihai chu an tlânsie a; chuongchun, David chun sakawr tawlailîr sîng sari puhai le, kea fe mi sîng li Suria mi chu a that ta a; chun, Sophak sipaihotu khawm chu a that ta a.

Chun, Hadarezer siehlawhaiin Israelhai hmaa chun an chan a se nâwk zuol an tah ti an hriet chun David le chun inremna an siem a, ama rawng chu an bâwl ta a; Suria mihai khawm chun Ammon mihai chu an ṭhangpui ngai ta hrim hrim naw a.

David chun an lal lua inthawk chun lallukhum chu a lâk a, rângkachak talent tluka rik a nih, lunghluhai khawm a um bawk a; chu chu David lu chunga chun inkhumtir a ni ta a, khawpuia râllâk sumhai chu a hung lâk suok a, tam tak el a nih.

Chutaka um mihai chu a hung ṭhuoi suok a, hreipui le thîr kuoikimhai le thing âtnahaiin anni chu sin ân thawtir tâwl a. Chuong ang seng chun David chun Ammon mihai khawpui po poa chun a thaw a. Chun, David le a mihai po po chu Jerusalema chun an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, hi hnunga hin Philistin mihai leh Gezerah indona a suok ta a; chun, Husath mi Sibbekai chun Rapha naupa Sippai chu a that a, anni chu an dawl ta a.

Chun, Gath-a chun indona a um nâwk a, chutaka chun mi lientak el hi a um a, a kepâr le kutpârhai chu sâwmhni le pali a na; kut pakhatah kutpâr paruk pei le, ke pakhatah kepâr paruk pei; ama khawm chu mi lien chia pieng hrim a nih.
Chun, ama chun Israel mihai a hung hrawk lai chun David unaupa Simea naupa Jonathan chun ama a that a.
Hienghai hi Gath khuoa mi lien hrima pienghai chu an nih; anni chu David le a siehlawhai kuta chun an lo tlu ta a.
Setan chu Israel mihai chunga chun a hung tho a, David chu Israel mihai chu ân tiemtir ta a.
David chun Joab le mipuihai hotuhai kuoma chun, “Fe unla, Beer-sebaa inthawka Dan chenin Israelhai chu hung tiem unla, an ni zât ka hriet theina dingin thu mi hung intlun ro,” a ta.
Joab chun, “
Nisienlakhawm, lal thu chun Joab chu a hne ta a. Chuongchun, Joab chu a fe suok a, Israel ram po po chu a fang suok a, Jerusalemah a hung nâwk a.

Chun, Joab chun mipuihai tiemna nizât chu David kuomah a pêk ta a. Chuongchun, Israel rama mi chu kâwlhnâm chawi thei ṭhieu mi maktaduoi khat le nuoi khat an na; Judaa chun kâwlhnâm chawi thei ṭhieu chu mi nuoi li le sîng sari an nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Benjamin chi le Levi mihai chu anni lai chun a tiem sa ve naw a; Joab ngaia chun lal thu chu theida a um vieu si leiin.
Chun, hi thila hin Pathien chu a lâwm ta naw hle el a; chuleiin, Israel ram chu a hung hrem ta a.

Chun, David chun Pathien kuomah, “Hi thil ka lo thaw taa hin, nasatakin thil ka suksuol a nih; amiruokchu, tuhin ka ngên che, i siehlaw khawhlona hi ngaidam rawh; invêt thlâktakin ka lo thaw ta si a,” a ta.
Chun,
Chuongchun, Gad chu David kuoma chun a fe a, a kuoma chun, “
kum thum sûng ṭâm amanih; i hmêlmahai kâwlhnâmin a hnawt phâk pha che a, ihmêlmahai hmaa thla thum sûng sukbohmanga um amanih; annawleh, Israel ram sûng po poa
Chun, David chun Gad kuoma chun, “Nasatakin ka lunginzîng a,
Chuongchun,
Chun, Pathien chun sukse dingin Jerusalema chun vântirko a tir a; chuonga a suksiet ding lai tak chun
Chun, David chu a hung dâk suok a,

Chun, David chun Pathien kuoma chun, “Mipuihai chu tiem dinga thu pe kha kei ka ni naw am a nih? Khawhlotaka thaw a, lo suksuol ta kha kei ngei ka nih; amiruokchu, hieng berâm ruolhai hin ieng am an thaw a? Aw
Chun,
Chun, Gad hril ang chun,
Chun, Ornan chu a hei ngha kîr chun vântirko chu a hmu a, a naupasalhai pali ama le umhai ruok chu an inbi a. Ornan chun bu
Chun, David chun Ornan a hung pan chun Ornan chun a hei en a, David chu a hmu a, hrizâwla inthawk chu a hung suok a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin David hmaa chun a kûn ta a.
Chun, David chun Ornan kuoma chun, “

Chun, Ornan chun David kuomah, “Nangmân la el rawh, ka pu lal hin a ngai a ṭha a ti ang peiin thaw el raw se; en ta, hi bâwngchal pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin ka pêk che a, bu vuokna thuomhnawhai hi a thing dingin, chun, bu hi bu thilinhlân dingin; a rêngin ka pêk vawng che a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal David chun Ornan kuoma chun, “Ni lo e a, a man kim chie ang takin kân châwk ding annâwm; nangma ta chu
Chuongchun, David chun Ornan kuoma chun rângkachak a bûk a, shekel za ruk a hmun man ding chun a pêk ta a.
Chun, Davidin chutaka chun maichâm chu
Chun,
Chu huna chun, Jebus mi Ornan hrizâwla chun
Nisienlakhawm, chu hmaa chun Pathien rawn dingin David chu a fe thei naw a,
David chun, “Hi hi
David chun Israel rama mikhuol umhai chu kei khâwm dingin thu a pêk a; Pathien in bâwlna dinga lung sut dingin lung suttuhai a ruot a.
David chun ân huonna kawtkhâra ding le a zawmna vêlhaia dingin thîr tamtak a kilna dingin a buotsai a; dârsen chi tamtak el a bûk hriet lo,
Sidar thing a nizât hriet lo; Zidon mihai le Tura mihai khan David kuomah Sidar thing an hung lâk ṭeu si a.
Chun, David chun, “Ka naupa Solomon hi a naupangin iengkhawm a hriet si naw a,
Chun, a naupa Solomon chu a ko a; Israelhai Pathien,
David chun Solomon kuomah, “Ka naupa, keia ta ding chun ka Pathien
Nisienlakhawm,

Ngai ta, naupasal hung nei i ta, ama chu mi sâwldamtak nîng a tih, a vêlin, a hmêlmahaia inthawk khawmin ama chu râlmuongna pêng ka ta, a hming khawm Solomon nîng a ta, ama hun laia chun Israel rama hin muongna le râlmuongna pêng ka tih;
Tuhin, ka naupa,
Israel chungthua
Tuhin ngai ta, ka theitâwk hu ang peiin,
Chunawa khawm, i kuomah sinthawtuhai tam tâwk tak, lung suttuhai, a âttuhai, thing thaw mi, sin tinrênga themthiem mihai;
rângkachak le, tangkaruo le, thîr le dârsena themthiemhai, nizât hriet sêng lo rau an na; tho la, thaw el rawh,
David chun Israel hotuhai po po chu a naupa Solomon chu ṭhangpui dingin thu a pêk bawk a;
Tuhin,
Chun, Israel upahai po po le thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu a ko khâwm vawng a.
Levi mihai chu kum sâwmthum chung tienga po chu tiem an na; an tiem dânbi ang chun an nizât chu, patling sîng thum le sâng riet an nih.
Hi laia mi sîng hni le za li hin
chun, sâng ruk dang chu hotuhai le rorêltuhai an nih; sâng li chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai an na; sâng li dang chun, “Inpâkna dinga ka siem,” Davidin a ti, chuong thuomhnawhai le chun
David chun anni chu a pâwl peiin, Levi naupasalhai ang peiin a ṭhe a; Gerson le Kohath le Merari hai hi.
Gerson mia chun Ladan le Simei an na.
Ladan naupasalhai chu: Jehiel chu a hotu tak le, Zetham le Joel, hi pathum hi.
Simei naupasalhai chu: Selo-moth, Haziel le Haran, hi pathum hi. Hienghai hi Ladan sûngkuo pahnam luhai chu an nih.
Chun, Simei naupasalhai chu: Jahath, Zina, Jeus le Beria an nih. Hieng palihai hi Simei naupasalhai an nih.
Chun, Jahath chu a hotu tak a na, Ziza chu a pahnina; amiruokchu, Jeus le Beria chun naupasal tamtak an nei naw a; chuleiin, tiem dânah thlâ khat an nih.
Kohath naupasalhai chu: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel, hi pali hi.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Mosie chu, a naupasalhai chu Levi hnam laia lam sa a na.
Mosie naupasalhai chu: Gerson le Eliezer an nih.
Gerson naupasalhai chu: Sebuel chu a hotu tak a nih.
Eliezer naupasalhai chu: Rehabia chu a hotu tak a nih. Eliezer chun naupasal dang a nei naw a; amiruokchu, Rehabia naupasalhai chu an tam hle.
Izhar naupasalhai chu: Selomith chu a upa tak a nih.
Hebron naupasalhai chu: Jeria a hotu tak a na, a pahnina chu Amaria, a pathumna chu Jahaziel, a palina chu Jekameam.
Uzziel naupasalhai chu: Mika chu a upa tak a na, a pahnina chu Issia.
Merari naupasalhai chu: Mahli le Musi. Mahli naupasalhai chu: Eleazar le Kis.
Chun, Eleazar chu a thi a, naupasal a nei nawh, naunuhmei chau a nei; chun, an unaupahai, Kis naupasalhai chun anni chu nuhmeiah an nei tâwl a.
Musi naupasalhai chu: Mahli leh, Eder leh, Jeremoth leh, pathum.
Hienghai hi an pahnam anga Levi naupasalhai chu an nih, tiemna laia an pahnamhai luhai chu an na,
David chun, “
David thu nuhnung tak angin, Levi thlahai chu, kum sâwmhni le a chungtienga po chu tiem an na.
An sinthaw chu Pathien ina rawngbâwlna sinhai: thil inthieng po pohai sukthieng dâm, pindanahai le inhuonna tuol sûnga
entirna bei ta ding dâm, bu thilinhlân dinga beiphit inditaka ding, chawl ṭhanglo bei amanih, bêl dara zêu amanih, a suonga suong amanih, ieng anga lien le ieng ang tiet ding khawmin;
zîng tina Pathien inpâk dinga ngîr dingin, chuong ang bawkin zântieng khawm;
châwlnihai dâm, thlatharhai dâm, ruoiṭhena bi ruotahai dâma
Aron naupasalhai pâwlhai chu hieng hi a nih: Aron naupasalhai chu: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar an nih.
Chun, David chun an rawngbâwlnaa an sinthaw ang peiin, Zadok, Eleazar nauhai le, Ahimelek, Ithamar nauhai chu a ṭhe a.

Ithamar naupasalhai laia nêk chun Eleazar naupasalhai laia chun hotu tam lem hmu a na; chuong ang chun ṭhe an na; Eleazar naupasalhai pahnam luhai chu sâwm le paruk an na, Ithamar naupasalhai chu an pahnam ang peiin pariet an nih.
Chun, ṭhumvâwra ṭhe an na, chi dân dang dangin, Ithamar naupasalhai le Eleazar naupasalhai laia chun Pathien in hotuhai le hmun inthienga hotuhai chu an um ve ve si a.

Chun, Nethanel naupa ziektu Semaia chun lal le, rorêltuhai le, thiempu Zadok le, Abiathar naupa Ahimelek le, Levi mihai le thiempu chihai pahnam luhai hmaa chun a ziek a; Eleazar ta dingin pahnam khat chan chu a tlu a; Ithamar ta dingin pahnam khat chan chu a tlu bawk a.
Chun, âna pakhatna chu Jehoiarib chungah a tlah a, a pahnina Jedaia chungah,
a pathumna Harim chungah, a palina Seorim chungah;
a pangana Malkija chungah, a parukna Mijamin chungah,
a pasarina Hakkoz chungah, a parietna Abija chungah,
a pakuona Jeshua chungah, a sâwmna Sekania chungah;
A sâwmpakhatna Eliasib chungah, a sâwmpahnina Jakim chungah.
A sâwmpathumna Huppa chungah, a sâwmpalina Jesebeab chungah,
A sâwmpangana Bilga chungah a sâwmparukna Immer chungah;
A sâwmpasarina Hezir chungah, a sâwmparietna Happizzez chungah.
A sâwmpakuona Pethahia chungah, a sâwmhnina Jehezekel chungah,
a sâwmhni pakhatna Jakin chungah, a sâwmhni pahnina Gamul chungah;
A sâwmhni pathumna Delaia chungah, a sâwmhni palina Maazia chungah,
Chun, Levi naupasal danghai chungthua chu: Amram naupasalhai laiah Subael, Subael naupasalhai laiah Jedeia,
Rehabia thlaah: Rehabia naupasalhai laiah Issia a hotu.
Izhar mia chun Selomoth; Selomoth naupasalhai laia chun Jahath.
Chun, Hebron naupasalhaia chun: a hotu tak Jeria, a pahnina chu Amaria, a pathumna chu Jahaziel, a palina chu Jekameam.
Uzziel naupasalhaia chun Mika; Mika naupasalhaia chun Samir.
Mika unaupa chu Issia; Issia naupasalhaia chun Zekaria.
Merari naupasalhai chu Mahli le Musi; Jaazia naupasalhaia chun Beno;
Merari naupasala Jaazia naupasalhai chu: Beno, Soham, Zakkur le Ibri.
Mahli naupasal chu: Eleazar, naupasal hrim neilo chu.
Kis naupasal chu: Jerahmeel.
Chun, Musi naupasalhai chu: Mahli, Eder le Jerimoth. An pahnam ang peia Levi naupasalhai laia lusahai chu hienghai hi an nih.

Hieng hai khawm hin an unau Aron naupasalhai ang bawkin, lal David, Zadok, Ahimelek, Levi mihai le thiempu pahnam luhai hmaah, an unau naupang lemhai le thlatuhai khawm inthuruolin ṭhum chu vâwr a ni ve a.

Chunawa khawm David le sipai hotuhai chun dârbenthek le, perkhuong le ṭingṭanghai le thu hril duol duola rawngbâwltu dingin Jeduthun le Heman le Asaph naupasalhai chu an ṭhe a; chun, an rawngbâwlna ang peia chuong sinthawhai sinthawtuhai nizât chu hi hi a nih:
Asaph naupasalhai chu: Zakkur, Josef, Nethania le Asarela hai hi Asaph naupasalhai chu an nih, lal thupêk anga Asaph hnuoia thuhriltuhai chu.
Jeduthun pâwl chu, Jeduthun naupasalhai chu Gedalia, Zeri, Jesaia, Simei, Hasabia le Mattithia hai, paruk hi an pa Jeduthun rawia ṭingṭang le
Heman pâwl chu: Heman naupasalhai chu: Bukkia, Mattania, Uzziel, Sebuel, Jerimoth, Hanania, Hanani, Eliatha, Giddalti, Romamtiezer, Josbekasa, Mallothi, Hothir le Mahazioth hai an na;
hienghai po po hi Pathien thua saki mûta lal zâwlnei Heman naupasalhai an nih. Pathien chun Heman chu naupasal sâwmpali le naunuhmei pathum a pêk a.
Hienghai po po hi Pathien ina rawngbâwlnaa, ṭingṭanghai le dârbenthekhai le perkhuonghai le
Chun, anni le an unauhai
Chun, a chîn ni leh, a lien ni leh, inchûktirtu le inchûktu khawm, angkhat vawngin, an thil thaw ding chu ṭhumvâwrin an en hlak a.
Asaph ta dinga ṭhumvâwr pakhatna chu Josef chungah a tla a; a pahnina chu Gedalia chungah; ama le a unauhai le a naupasalhai leh sâwm pahni an nih:
a pathumna chu Zakkur chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih.
a palina chu Izri chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai le chun sâwmpahni an nih;
a pangana chu Nethania chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai chu sâwmpahni an nih;
a parukna chu Bukkia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih:
a pasarina chu Jesarela chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a parietna chu Jesaia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a pakuona chu Mattania chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmna chu Simei chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpakhatna chu Azarel chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpahnina chu Hasabia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpathumna chu Subael chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpalina chu Mattithia chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpangana chu Jeremoth chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmparukna chu Hanania chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpasarina chu Josbekasa chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmparietna chu Hanani chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmpakuona chu Mallothi chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhnina chu Eliatha chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni pakhatna chu Hothir chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
sâwmhni pahnina chu Giddalti chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni pathumna chu Mahazioth chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih;
a sâwmhni palina chu Romam-ti-ezer chungah, a naupasalhai le a unauhai leh sâwmpahni an nih.
Kawtkhâr vêngtuhai pâwl ṭhea chun: Kora mihai chu: Kore naupa Meselemia le Asaph naupasalhai laia mi chu.
Meselemia chun naupasalhai a nei a, nâulutîr chu Zekaria, a pahnina Jediael, a pathumna Zebadia, a palina Jathniel;
a pangana Elam, a parukna Jehohanan, a pasarina Eliehoenai.
Chun, Obed-edom chun naupasalhai a nei a; nau lutîr chu Semaia a na, a pahnina chu Jehozabad, a pathumna chu Joa, a palina chu Sakar, a pangana chu Nethanel;
A naupa Semaia chun naupasalhai an pahnamhai chunga rorêltuhai chu an pieng a; anni chu mi hrât khawkhêng ruok an ni si a.
Semaia naupasalhai chu: Othni le, Rephael le, Obed le, Elzabad, a unauhai chu mi hrât khawkhêng an nih; Elihu le Semakia hi.
Hienghai po po hi Obed-edom naupasalhai thlahai chu an nih, anni le, an naupasalhai le an unauhai khawm mi hrât, rawngbâwlnaa thilthawtheitak ruok sâwmruk pahni, Obed-edom thlahai an nih.
Chun, Meselemia khawmin unauhai le naupasal mi hrâttak, sâwmpariet a nei bawk a.
Hosa, Merari thlaa mi khawm chun naupasalhai a nei a; a hotu tak chu Simri a nih (nau lutîr a ni nawh a chu a pa chun hotu takah a siem a nih),
a pahnina chu Hilkia, a pathumna chu Tebalia, a palina chu Zekaria; Hosa unauhai le naupasalhai po po chu an rêngin sâwmpathum an nih.
Dai kawtkhâr tina ding chun, an pahnam dungzui peiin, a chîn le lien ni leh ṭhum an vâwr pei a.
Chun, saktieng panga dinga ṭhumvâwr chu Selemia chungah a tla a. A naupa Zekaria, remruottu vartak ta ding chun ṭhum an vâwr a; a ṭhumvâwrna chu hmârtieng pang dingin a tla a.
Obed-edom ta ding chun simtieng pang a tla a, a naupasalhai ta dingin, thil siekhâwmna in chu a tla a.
Suppim le Hosa ta ding chun thlangtieng pang a tla a, Salleketh dai kawtkhâra inthawka intlar peia lam fe peia khan.
Saktieng panga chun Levi mi paruk an na, hmârtieng ni khatah pali, simtieng ni khatah pali, chun, thil siekhâwmna in ta dingin, pahni peiin.
Thlangtieng panga Parbar
Hienghai hi Kora mihai le Merari naupasalhai laia kawtkhâr vêngna sin an insem dân chu a nih.
Chun, Levi mihaia chun, Ahija chu Pathien ina rohai chunga le, thil inhlân tahaia rohai ta dinga enkawltu a nih,
Ladan naupasalhai: Ladana inthawka Gerson thlahai, Gerson mi Ladan kuoma ṭhang pahnamhai luhai chu: Jehieli.
Jehieli naupasalhai chu: Zetham, a unaupa Joel leh,
Amram mihai, Izhar mihai, Hebron mihai, le Uzziel mihai khawm chu sin pêk an nih.
Mosie naupa, Gersom naupa Sebuel chu sum siekhâwmna chunga rorêltu a nih.
A unauhai: Eliezer naupa Rehabia, a naupa Jesaia, a naupa Joram, a naupa Zikri le a naupa Selomoth hai an nih.
Hi Selomoth le a unauhai chu, thilinhlân, lal David le pahnam luhai le, sâng khat chunga hotuhai le za khat chunga sipai hotuhaiin an inhlânhai po po siekhâwmnahai chunga enkawltuhai an nih.
Indonahai hnênahaia râllâk thilhai chu
Chuong zâwlnei Samuel hai, Kis naupa Saula hai, Nera naupa Abner hai, Zeruia naupa Joab haiin an hlânthienghai le, mi tukhawma thil an hung pêkhai chu Selomoth le a unauhai kuta chun a um vawng a.
Izhar mihaia chun, Kenania le a naupasalhai chu Israel ram ta dinga puotienga sinthawnahaia hotuhai le rorêltuhai an nih.
Hebron mihaia chun, Hasabia le a unauhai chu, mi huoisen ṭhieu, sâng khat le za sari chu Jordan râl, thlangtienga Israel rama lal ta dinga rawngbâwlnaahai le,

Hebron mihaia chun, Jerija pahnam inthla dân anga Hebron mi chu a hotu a nih. David rorêl a kum sâwmlinaa chun nasataka zawng an na, Gileada Jazera chun mi hrât khawkhêng anni laia chun hmu suok an na.

Chun, a unau mi hrât khawkhênghai chu sâng hni le za sari an na; anni chu lal David chun an pahnam luhai chu, lal chungthua le Pathien thil chungthu tinrêngah Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai enkawltuhaia a siem an nih.

Chun, Israel thlahai an nizât chu kum khat sûng thla po poa, thla tina fe suok a, hung lût pâwlhai, thil iengkima lal rawngbâwl hlakhai, hotuhai le, za khat le sâng khat chunga hotuhai le an pahnam luhai po po le chun, pâwl tina chun sîng hni le sâng li an na.
Thla hmasataka pâwl hmasataka hotu ding chun Jasobeam, Zabdiel naupa a na, a pâwl chu sîng hni le sâng li an nih.
Perez thlaa mi a na, thla hmasataka dinga sipai pâwl hotuhai po po laia hotu tak a nih.
Chun, a thla hnina pâwla chun Aho mi Dodai chu a hotu a na, a pâwl chu: Mikloth chu rorêltu a na, a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a nih.
Thla thumna dinga sipai hotu pathumna chu Benaia a na, thiempu Jehoiada naupa, hotu chu a nih; chun, a pâwl chu sîng hni le sâng li an nih.
Hi Benaia hi, mi sâwmthum thilthawtheitakhai laia mi kha a nih; ama chu sâwmthumhai hotu kha a na, ama pâwl lai chun a naupa Ammizabad kha a ṭhang ve a.
A thla linaa dinga sipai hotu palina chu Joab unaupa Asahel kha a na, a naupa Zebadia khan a ai a aw a nih; chun, ama pâwla khawm chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla ngana dinga sipai hotu chu Izhar mi Samhuth a nih; ama pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla rukna dinga sipai hotu parukna chu Teko mi Ikkes naupa Ira a na, a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla sarina dinga sipai hotu pasarina chu Ephraim thlaa mi Pelon mi Helez chu a na, a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla rietna dinga sipai hotu parietna chu Zera hnama Husath mi Sibbekai kha a na; a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla kuona dinga sipai hotu pakuona chu Benjamin thlaa mi Anathoth mi Abiezer a na, a pâwl a chun chu sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla sâwmna dinga sipai hotu sâwmna chu Zera thlaa mi, Netophath mi, Maharai a na, a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla sâwm pakhatna dinga sipai hotu sâwm pakhatna chu Ephraim thlaa mi Pirathon mi Benaia a na, a pâwla chun sîng hni le sâng li an um a.
A thla sâwm pahnina dinga sipai hotu sâwmpahnina chu, Othniel naupa Netophath mi Heldai
Chunawa khawm chun Israel hnamhai chunga chun, Reuben mihai laia rorêltu chu Zikri naupa Eliezer a na; Simeon mihai laia chun Maaka naupa Sephatia a na;
Levi mihai laia chun Kemuel naupa Hasabia a na; Arnon thla lai Zadok;
Juda mihai lai David unauhai laia pakhat Elihu chu; Issakar hnam lai Mikael naupa Omri;
Zebulun hnamah Obadia naupa Ismaia; Naphtali hnamah Azriel naupa Jerimoth;
Ephraim hnam laia chu Azazia naupa Hosea; Manasse hnam zâtvea chun Pedaia naupa Joel;
Gilead rama Manasse hnam zâtve laiah Zekaria naupa Iddo, Benjamin thla laiah Abner naupa Jaasiel;
Dan hnamah Jeroham naupa Azarel. Hienghai hi Israel hnam laia hotuhai chu an nih.
Chun, lal sum siekhâwmna in chunga chun Adiel naupa Azmaveth chu hotu a na; hmun danga le, khawpuiahai le, khawperhaia sum siekhâwmna le, kulbîngahai Uzzia naupa Jonathan chu hotu a na;
chun, thil chîngna dinga lo inletnaa sin thawtuhai chunga chun Kelub naupa Ezri chu hotu a na;
grêp huon chungahai chun Ramath mi Simei chu a nih; uoin siekhâwmna khur dinga grêp huon zau pei thua chun Shipham mi Zabdi chu a hotu a nih;
chun, ram phaitienga theichang kûnghai le oliv thinghai chunga chun Geder mi Baal-hanan chu a na; hriek siena khurhai chunga chun Joas a na;
chun, Sarona bâwng ruol tlahai chunga chun Saron mi Sitrai a nih; chun, phairuoma bâwng ruol tlahai chunga chun Adlai naupa Saphat chu hotu a nih;
sanghâwngsei chunga chun Ismael mi Obil chu hotu a nih; sabengtunghai chunga chun Meronoth mi Jedeia hotu a na;
berâm ruol chunga chun Hagar mi Jaziz chu hotu a nih; Hienghai po po hi lal David thuomhnaw chunga rorêltuhai chu an nih.
David pami Jonathan chu rorêltu a na, ama chu mi hrietna nei, lekhaziektu a nih; chun, Hakmoni naupa, Jehiel chu lal naupasalhai inchûktirtu a na;
Ahitophel chu lal remruotpuitu a na, Ark mi Husai chu lal ruolpa a nih;
Ahitophel zoa chun, Benaia naupa Jehoiada a na, Abiathar leh; chun, lal sipaihai hotu chu Joab a nih.

Lal David chun Israel lal po pohai, hnam tina luhai, a pâwl pâwla lal sinthawtuhai hotuhai, sipai sâng khat pâwl chunga hotuhai, za khat pâwl chunga hotuhai, a naupasalhai le lal thilnei le thuomhnaw po po chunga rorêltuhai le, mi lienhai le, mi huoisen, mi hrât khawkhênghai po po chu Jerusalema chun a ko khâwm vawng a.
Chun, lal David chu a kein a ngîr a, “Ka unauhai, ka mihai, lo ngai ta u; keia ngaia chun
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chun, ‘Nang chun ka in bâwl naw ti nih, indo mi i na, thisen însuo hlak leiin,’ a ta.
Ngai ta u,
chun, ka naupasalhai po laiah (
Chun, ka kuomah a hril a, ‘I naupa Solomon hin ka in le ka tuollai sûng chu bâwl a tih, ama chu ka naupa ni dingin ka thlang ta a, kei khawm a pa nîng ka tih.
“Chuleiin, tuhin,
Chun, nang ka naupa Solomon, i thlatuhai Pathien chu hre la, lungril inhâwktak le lungril tlûntakin ama rawng chu bâwl rawh;
Tuhin fîmkhur la; hmun inthieng ta dinga in bâwl dingin

Chun, David chun a naupa Solomon kuoma chun biek in tuolpûk lim le chutaka a in le, a sum siekhâwmna in le, chutaka a pindan chunghnunghai le, a pindan sûngrilhai le, zângaina ṭhungpha hmun dinghai lim chu a pêk a;
a lungrila a lo hmu ta ang chun:
thiempuhai le Levi mihai a pâwl pâwla an umna ding hmun lim dâm, Lalpa ina dinga bûr le bêl po po hai lim dâm,
rawngbâwlna ding bûr le bêl chi tin, rângkachak bûr le bêl ding, rângkachak hmang zât ding,

rângkachak khâwnvar siena le a khâwnvar ding rângkachak hmang zât ding le, a sathâu khâwnvar siena le chutaka a khâwnvar ta ding chun rângkachak a bûka bûkin a pêk a; tangkaruo khawm tangkaraw sathâu khâwnvar siena dingin le a khâwnvar siena tin bûkzie ang pei chun a pêk a;
chun, entirna bei siena dinga dawkân dingin rângkachak, dawkân tin ta dingin; chun, tangkaraw dawkân ta dingin tangkaruo;
sa kuoikimhai le, châwtawlhai le nohai chu, rângkachak inthieng: rângkachak maihûn ding chun maihûn tin chu a bûk ang peiin, tangkaraw maihûn ding chun maihûn tin a bûk ang peiin;
chun, riminhnik râwna maicha-ma ding chun rângkachak sukthieng a bûka bûkin, chun, cherubhai
David chun, “Hieng po po hi
Chun, David chun a naupa Solomon kuoma chun, “Insukhrât la, insukhuoi la, thaw el rawh; ṭi naw la, beidawng bawk naw rawh;

Chun, ngai ta, Pathien ina rawngbâwlna po poa dingin Levi mihai le thiempuhai chu pâwl an um a; sin kawng chi tinrênga ding chun mi themthiem inhâwktak takhai i kuomah um an ta, rawngbâwlna kawng tinrênga ding chun; mipuihai hotuhai po po khawm chu i thu thuin an um ding a nih,” a ta.

Tuhin, ka Pathien in ta ding chun ka thei ang tâwp po po chu ka lo buotsai ta a; rângkachak thilhai dinga chun rângkachak, tangkaruo thilhai dinga chun tangkaruo, dârsen thilhai dinga chun dârsen dâm, thîr thilhai dinga chun thîr dâm, thing thilhai dinga chun thing dâm, berul lunghai, lung inbûk dinghai, lung a phûma phûm dinghai le, ze tum tum dinghai dâm, lunghlu chi tinrênghai le sailungvâr chihai leh; tam tâwk takin.

Chu nawa khawm chun, ka Pathien in dinga ditsakna tak ka nei leiin, rângkachak le tangkaruohai keima ta ngei siekhawl ka nei ti ka hmu chun, chu in inthieng ta dinga ka buotsaihai po po bâka chun, ka Pathien in ta ding chun ka pêk sa bawk a;
chu chu rângkachak talent sâng thum, Ophir rângkachak chu; tangkaruo inthieng, a in bang chu sûngtienga zûtna dingin talent sâng sari: rângkachak thilhaia dingin rângkachak,
tangkaruo thilhaia dingin tangkaruo, themthiemhai kuta siem dinga sin iengkima dinga hmang ding po pohai chu.
Chun, pahnam laia hotuhai le, Israel hnam laia hotuhai le, za khat le sâng khat pâwl chunga hotuhai leh, lal sin chunga rorêltuhai le chun phaltakin an inpêk ta a.
Chuongchun, Pathien in rawngbâwlna ding chun rângkachak talent sâng nga le, darik sîng khat le, tangkaruo talent sîng khat le dârsen talent sîng khat le, sâng riet le, thîr talent nuoi khat an pêk a.
Chun, lunghlu lo neituhai chun
Chun, mipuihai chu phaltaka an inhlân lei chun an hlim a, lungril tluongtaka
Chuleichun, David chun mipui inkhâwmhai po po hmaa chun

Hausaknahai le inzakainahai chu nangmaa inthawka hung suok a na, nang chun mi po po chungah ro i rêl a; nangma kuta chun thilthawtheina le hrâtna chu a um a; chun, i kuta chun mi tin kuoma hrâtna pêkna ding le sukropuina ding chu a um a.
Chuleiin, tuhin, kan Pathien, i hming ropui chu kan inpâkin, lâwmthu kan hril che.
Hieng anga inhâwktaka inhlân theina che kan hung nei hi, kei hi tu am ka na, ka mihai khawm hi tuhai am an na? thil po po chu nangmaa inthawka suok a na, nangma ta ma ma chu kan pêk el che a ni si a.
Kan thlatuhai po po ang bawk khan i hmaa hin pêm le mikhuol el kan ni si a; hi hnuoia hin kan nihai chu hlîm ang el a na; tukhawm um sawng hrim khawm an um nawh.
Aw

Ka Pathien, nang chun lungril chu i fie hlak a, felnaa chun lâwmna i nei ti khawm ka hriet a. Keia ngai chun, keia lungril tluongtakin hieng thilhai po po hi ka lo inhlân ta a; tuhin, i mihai hitaka umhai hin phaltaka i kuoma inhlân dingin anni chu hlimtakin ka hmu a nih.
Aw

ka naupa Solomon kuoma khawm, i thupêkhai le, i thu inhriettirhai le, i thuruothai chu zâwm dingin le, hieng thilhai po po hi thaw a, a châkkhai ka lo sielâwk tahai chun lalin bâwl dingin lungril ṭha famkim pe bawk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, David chun, mipui inkhâwmhai po po kuoma chun, “Tuhin
Chun,
chu ni chun hlimna nasatak leh
Chun, lalhai po po le, mi thilthawtheitakhai le a naupasalhai po po chu David naupasalhai ang tak khan lal Solomon kuoma chun an intuklût vawng tâwl a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Jesai naupa David chun Israel ram po po chunga chun ro a rêl a.
Ama chu upatakin, tarkûnin, hausatak le inzaumtakin a thi ta a; chuongchun, a naupa Solomon chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Chuongchun, lal David thilthawhai, a hmasa le a nuhnung khawm, zâwlnei Samuel chanchinbua chun ziekin a um a, zâwlnei Nathan chanchinbua le, zâwlnei Gad chanchinbua khawm chun ziek a nih;
rambunghaia lalramhai po po chunga le, Israelhai chunga le ama chunga hun lo liem tahai le, a thilthawtheizie le a rorêlhai po po chu chuonghaia chun ziek an nih.
Chun, David naupa Solomon chu a rama chun sukdet a ni ta a,
Solomon chun, Israel mi po pohai le, sipai za khat pâwl le sâng khat pâwl hotuhai kuoma le, rorêltuhai kuoma le, Israel rama lalhai po po kuoma le, pahnam luhai kuoma chun thu a hril a.
Chuongchun, Solomon le a kuoma mipui inkhâwmhai po po chu Gibeona bâwlhmuna chun an hang fe ta a;

Nisienlakhawm, Pathien bâwm chu David chun Kiriath-jearima inthawk khan a hung lâk a, Davidin a siena dinga a buotsai hmuna khan a lo sie ta a; Jerusalema khan, chu hmun ding chun puon in a lo zâr ta si a.
Chunawa khawm, dârsen mâichâm Hur naupa, Uri naupa Bezalelin a lo siem ta chu
Chun, Solomon chu
Chu zân chun Solomon kuomah
Solomon chun Pathien kuoma chun, “Ka pa David kuoma chun lunginsietna nasatak i lo inentir ta a, ama aia chun tuhin lalah i mi siem ta a.
Tuhin, Aw
Hi mipuihai hmaa hin ka lûta ka suok theina dingin tuhin varna le hrietthiem theina nangin mi pe la; chuong naw chun, hi i mihai hieng zât lâwm lâwm hi tuin am ro rêlpêk thei an ta?” a ta.

Pathien chun Solomon kuomah, “Hi hi i lungrilah a um a, hausaknahai, neinungnahai le inzaumnahai amanih, nangma theidatuhai che hringna amanih, i hni naw a, dam sâwtna khawm i hni bawk naw a, amiruokchu, ka mihai, an chunga lala ka siemnahai che chu ro i rêlpêk theina dinga nangma ta dinga varna le hrietthiem theina i hni lem leiin;

varna le hrietthiem theina chu i kuoma pêk a ni ta a; i hmaa lalhai tukhawma an nei dêr lo le, nangma hnunga tukhawma chuong anga an nei dêr lo ding hausaknahai le, neinungnahai le, inzâkaina pêng ka ti che,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Solomon chu a vân zinna Gibeona bâwlhmun, intuokna puon in hmaa inthawk chun Jerusalema chun a hung ta a; chuongchun, Israel chunga chun ro a rêl ta a.

Chun, Solomon chun sakawr tawlailîrhai le sakawr chung chuong mihai chu a kei khâwm a, sakawr tawlailîr sâng khat le za li le, sakawr chung chuong mi sîng khat le sâng hni a nei a; chuong chu sakawr tawlailîr khawpuiahai le lal kuomah Jerusalema chun a sie a.
Chun, lal chun tangka le rângkachak chu Jerusalema chun lung ang el le, Sidar thing chu phai rama theichang kûng ang ela tama intiengin a sie a.
Chun, Solomonin sakawr a neihai chu Aigupta rama inthawka inchâwk suok vawng an nih; lal sumdâwng mihai chun a ruol ruolin an lo khâr hlak a, a ruola inchâwk pei a nih;

chuongchun, an hung lâk a, Aiguptaa inthawkin sakawr tawlailîr chu tangkaruo shekel za ruk peiin an intlungtir bawk a; chun, sakawrhai chu Hit mi lalhai le Suria lalhai ta ding khawmin an suktlungpêk hlak a; sakawrhai chu tangkaruo shekel za le sâwmnga peiin an intlungtir a nih.
Chun, Solomon chun
Chuongchun, Solomon chun phurrik phur mi sîng sari le thing sak mi sîng riet le, anni chu enkawltu dingin mi sâng thum le za ruk chu a ruot ta a.
Chun, Solomon chun Tura lal Huram kuoma chun mi a tir a, “Ka pa David kha i lo ngaisak a, a umna dinga in bâwlna dingin sidar thinghai i lo thawn ang bawk khan, kei khawm mi hung thawn ve rawh.
Ngai ta,
Chu in ka bâwl chu a ropui hle a, kan Pathien chu pathien danghai po po nêkin a ropui lem hrim a.

Amiruokchu, vân le vânhai vân khawm chun ama chu a dâwl nawh ti hmuin tuin am ama ta ding chun in bâwl thei a ta? Ama hmaa riminhnik rawna ding ti chau naw chu, ama ta dingin in ka hang bâwlpêk chu, a tu ang am ka ni hrim a?

Chuleiin, tuhin rângkachak sina themthiem mi, tangkaruo le, dârsen le thîra thiem, a senêm le a senduk le, a dumpâwla thiem, ker dân kawng chi tinrênga thiem, ka pa Davidin a lo ruoi tah, Jerusalem le Juda rama mi thiemhai le thaw ding hin mi themthiem mi hungtir pêk rawh.

Sidar thinghai, fâr thinghai, algum thinghai Lebanona inthawk khan mi hung inphur bawk la; i mihai chu Lebanona thingphûr an thiem ti ka hriet si a; chun, ngai ta, i siehlawhai chu ka siehlawhai leh um an ta;
thing tamtak el mi buotsaipêk dingin, hi in ka bâwl ding hi nasataka ropui a ni ding a ni si a.
Chun, i mi thing âttuhai kuoma chun bupui tekhâwng sîng hni le, buṭei tekhâwng sîng hni le, hriek bath sîng hni le uoin bath sîng hni pêng ka tih,” tiin.
Tura lal Huram chun ziekin a dawn a, chu chu Solomon kuomah a thawn a, “
Huram bawk chun, “
Chun, tuhin hi mi themthiem, hrietthiemna nei mi, a hming Huramabi ka hung tir,

ama chu Dan naunuhmeihai thlaa mi a na, ama pa chu Tura mi hrim, rângkachak sina le tangkaruoa le, dârsena le thîra le lunga le, thinga le, a senêma le, a dumpâwla le, puon zai inhmia le a senduka thiem a na, ker dân chi tinrênga ker ding le, thaw dân kawng ruot ang thaw ding mi thiem a na; i themthiemhai le ka pu David i pa, mi thiemhai leh ama chun sin thâwng a ta.
Tuhin bupui
pawimaw ding ang zât zât chu Lebanona inthawkin thing chu hung sât kan ta, tuipuiah Joppa chen hung tawl kan ta, chutaka inthawk chun Jerusalemah nangin lâng i ta,” tiin.
Chun, Solomon chun Israel rama mikhuol um po pohai chu a tiem a, a pa Davidin a tiem hnunghai kha, chuongchun, nuoi khat sîng nga sâng thum le za ruk an tling a.
Chun, anni laia sîng sari chu thil phur mi dingin a ruot a; chun, sîng riet chu tlânga thing sak mi dingin; chun, sâng thum le za ruk chu mipuihai sin inthawtirtu dingin.
Chun, Solomon chun Moria tlânga a pa David kuoma
A rorêl a kum lina, a thla hnina, a ni hninaa chun a bâwl ṭan a.
Pathien in bâwlna dinga Solomonin a lungphûm a phûmhai chu hienghai hi an nih: a dungtieng chu tawnga inkhiin inkhina hmasa dâna chun tawng sâwmruk a na, a khangtieng chu tawng sâwmhni a nih.
Chun, a tuolpûk inpui hmaa mi chu, a dung chu a in khangtieng chen chie, tawng sâwmhni a na, ân sângtieng chu tawng za le sâwmhni a na, a sûng chu rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a.
A in lien lem chu fâr thingin ân khum a, rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a, a chunga chun intûm thinghai le khaidiet limhai a siem a.
Mawina dingin in chu lunghluhaiin a cheimawi a, a rângkachakhai khawm chu Parvaim rângkachak an nih.
Chutaka a kawtkhârhai, chutaka banghai le kalhai le ṭuong le chu in chu rângkachakin ân luon khum bawk a; bangahai chun cherub limhai a ker bawk a.

Chun, hmun inthieng tak chu a siem bawk a; chu a dungtieng chu a inpui khangtieng ang chiein, tawng sâwmhni a na; a khang khawm chu tawng sâwmhni bawk a nih; chun, rângkachak inthieng talent za ruk laiin ân luon khum bawk a.
Chun, a kilna rikzie chu rângkachak shekel sâwmnga tluk a nih. A pindan chunghnunghai chu rângkachakin ân luon khum a.
In inthiengtaka chun cherub pahni a lima cherin
Cherubhai thla chu tawng sâwmhnia sei a na; cherub pakhat thla chu, a in bang va sukin tawng nga a na, a thla khing tieng chu tawng nga bawk a na; cherub dang thla kha a va suk a.
Chun, cherub pakhat dang thla khawm chu bang va tâwkin tawng nga a na, a thla dang pakhat chun cherub thla dang kha va zawmin tawng nga a ni ve bawk a.
Chuongchun, hieng cherub thlahai hin tawng sâwmhni chu an zârhlie a; an kehaiin an ngîr a; an hmaihai chu insûng tieng chu an ngha a.
Chun, puonzâr dumpâwl le a senêm le, a senduk le puon zai inhmi a siem a, a chunga chun cherubhai ân chuon bawk a.
Chun, in hmatienga chun sûtpui pahni tawng sâwmthum pangaa insâng ve ve a siem a, chuong a lêrtâwpa a hmawrbâwkhai chu tawng nga ve ve an ni bawk a.
Chun, hmun inthienga chun khaidiethai a siem a, chuong sûtpuihai lêra chun a thlung a; chun, theibufai za khat a siem bawk a, chuong chu khaidieta chun a khai tâwl a.
Biekin tuola chun chuong sûtpuihai chu a phun a, pakhat chu changtieng, a dang chu vawitieng; chun, chu changtienga mi chu a hmingah Jakin ân bûk a, vawitienga mi chu a hmingah Boaz ân bûk bawk a.
Chunawa khawm dârsen maichâm a siem bawk a, a dungtieng tawng sâwmhni, a khangtieng tawng sâwmhni; ân sângtieng chu tawng sâwm.
Chun, dâr tuizêng inbiel a sunga sungin, a reia inthawka rei khingtieng tawng sâwm, intie vêl vawng, ân sângtieng tawng nga chu a siem bawk a; a rei a vêlin tawng sâwmthum vêltuok a nih.
Chun, a rei hnuoia chun kumûm ang a vêla vêlsuok, tawng khat pei sâwm seng, tuizêng vêla chun a siem a. Kumûm lim chu tlar hni a na, tuizêng le chun sung kawp a nih.

Bâwngchal lim sâwmpahni chunga inṭhut a na, pathum chun hmârtieng an ngha a, pathumin simtieng, pathumin thlangtieng, pathum bawkin saktieng an ngha a; chu dâr tuizêng chu an chunga chun inṭhut a nih; an hnungtieng chun sûngtieng a ngha seng a.
Chun, kutpha bawka sa a na; a rei chu no rei anga siem a na, lili pâr angin, bath sâng thum dawng a nih.

Insâwpna dingin châwtawl sâwm a siem a, panga chu changtieng pangah a sie a, panga dang chu vawitiengah; chuong thilhai chu pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai kha sâwpnaah an hmang hlak a, tuizêng ruok chu thiempuhai ta dinga insâwpna a nih.
Chun, anni chungthua thupek angin rângkachak sathâu khâwnvar siena sâwm a siem a, chuonghai chu biek ina chun a sie a, panga chu changtieng pangah, panga dang chu vawitiengah.
Chun, dawkân sâwm a siem a, biekina chun a sie a, panga chu changtieng pangah, panga dang chu vawitiengah. Chun, rângkachak thlêngkûm za khat a siem bawk a.
Chu nawa khawm chun thiempuhai tuolpûk le tuolpûk lien a siem a; chuong tuolpûk kawtkhârhai le chun, chuong kawtkhârhai chu dârsenin ân luon khum a.
Chun, maihûn chu a in pangah simsaktieng chun ân ṭhut a.
Chun, Huram chun bêlhai, thlêngkûmhai le suodûrhai chu a siem a. Chun, Huram chun Pathien ina lal Solomon ta dinga a sinthaw chu a thaw zo ta a,
sûtpui pahnihai, maihûnhai, sûtpui lêrhaia a hmawrbâwkhai, sûtpui pahnihai lêra a hmawrbâwkhai inkûm inkhumna dinga ṭiel chik chek lênhai le;
chuong lên pahnihai ta dinga theibufai zalihai le lên pakhat sûtpui hai chunga hmawrbâwkhai inkûm inkhumna ta dinga theibufai tlar hni pei le chun.
Chun, suonkuolhai a siem a, châwtawlhai chu suonkuol chunga inṭhutin a siem a;
tuizêng pakhat chu a hnuoia bâwngchal sawmpahni leh.
Bêlhai, suodûrhai, sakuoikimhai le chutaka bûr le bêlhai po po chu Huram chun
Zereda le Sukkoth inkâra tlakpil hmuna khan Jordan Phairuomah lal chun a lo sung a na.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun hieng bûr le bêlhai po po hi tam tâwk takin a siem a, dârsen lem chu a bûk zât khawm hriet suok ruol a ni naw a.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Pathien ina bûr le bêlhai po po chu a siem a, rângkachak maichâm le, entirna bei siena dawkânhai;
sathâu khâwnvar siena le a khâwnvarhai, hmun inthieng hmaa chun thupêk anga an chawk zing theina ding, rângkachak inthiengin a siem a;
a pârbâwrhai, khâwnvarhai, chaichehai, rângkachakin, rângkachak inthiengin a siem a;
khâwnvar vâm chepnahai, châwtawlhai, haihâwhai, meilâknahai chu rângkachak inthieng bawkin; chun, in lûtna chu, hmun inthiengtaka kawtkhâr sûngril lem le, in kawtkhârhai chu rângkachak an nih.
Chuongchun,
Chun, Solomon chun David khawpui Ziona
Israel mihai po po chu thla sarinaa ruoiṭhenaa chun lal kuoma chun an hung khâwm vawng a.
Israel upahai po po chu an hung a, Levi mihai chun bâwm chu an zâwn ta a.
Chun, bâwm le, intuokna puon in le puon ina bûr le bêl inthienghai po po le chun an zu lâk ta a; hieng thilhai hi thiempu Levi mihai chun an zu lâk a nih.
Lal Solomon le Israel mipui ama hmaa hung inkhâwmhai po po chun berâm le bâwngchal a tam tienga tiem sênglo le hril thei lo chun inthâwiin, bâwm hmaa chun an um a.
Chun, thiempuhai chun
Cherubhai chun an thlahai chun bâwm umna hmun chu an zârkhum a, cherubhai chun bâwm le chutaka a zâwnfunghai chu an inkhum sa si a.
Chun, a zâwnfunghai chu an sei êm a, zâwnfung hmawrhai chu hmun inthieng hmaa inthawkin ân hmu thei a; amiruokchu, puotienga inthawk chun ân hmu thei naw a; chutaka chun tu chen hin a um ta a.
Chu bâwm sûnga chun, Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia Israel thlahai kuoma
Chun, thiempuhai chu hmun inthienga inthawka an hung suok chun, (thiempu chutaka um po pohai chu an pâwl hunbi nghâk kher lovin sukthieng an ni hlak si a;

Levi mi chutaka hla saktuhai khawm chu an rêngin, Asaph hai, Heman hai, Jeduthun hai, an naupasalhai le an unauhai leh puon zai inhmi puona inthuomin, perkhuong leh, ṭingṭang leh dârbenthekhai leh maichâm tâwp saktieng panga chun an ngîr a; anni lai chun thiempu za le sâwmhni tawtawrâwt mûttuhai an um bawk a):
chuongchun, thiempuhai chu sûm lei chun rawngbâwl dingin an ngîr zing thei ta ngai naw a,
Chun, Solomon chun a hril a, “
Nisienlakhawm, kumkhuoa chêngna dinga hmun i ta dingin, i ta dinga umna ding in ka bâwlpêk ta che hi,” a ta.
Chun, lal chu a ngha kîr a, Israel inkhâwmhai po po chu mal a sâwm a; Israel mipuihai po po chu an ngîr ṭhup a.
Chun, ama chun a hril a, “Israelhai Pathien

ama chun, ‘Aigupta rama inthawka ka mihai ka ṭhuoi suok nia inthawk tah, Israel hnam po po laia inthawkin, ka hming um zingna dinga in bâwlna dingin khawpui ka ruot naw a; ka mi Israelhai chunga lala um dingin tukhawm ka thlang bawk nawh;
amiruokchu, ka hming umna dingin Jerusalem kha ka thlang a, chun, ka mi Israelhai chunga um dingin David chu ka lo thlang ta a,’ tiin.
Chuongchun, ka pa David lungrila chun Israelhai Pathien
Amiruokchu,
amiruokchu, in chu nang chun bâwl naw ti ni a, i naupa, i ṭhâla hung pieng ding chun, ka hmingin in chu bâwl lem a tih,’ a ta.
Chuongchun,
Chun, chutaka chun bâwm chu kân ṭhut ta a, Israel mipuihai le
Chun, Israel mipui inkhâwmhai po po hmaihmaah,

(Solomon chun dârsen ṭham tawng ngaa sei, tawng nga bawka lien, tawng thuma insâng a siem a, tuollai sûnga a laitaka a ilo daw ta chunga chun a ngîr a, Israel inkhâwmhai po po hmaa chun a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a kuthai chu vân tieng a phar a nih) ama chun a hril a;
“Aw
i siehlaw ka pa David kuoma khawm i thutiemhai chu i sukpuitling a; anih, i bauin i hril a, vawisûn ni ang bawk hin, i kuthai chun i sukpuitling hlak ta kha.
Chuleiin, tuhin aw
Chuleiin, tuhin, aw
Nisienlakhawm, thilthaw tinrêngah mihriemhai lai Pathien chu a khawsa ding am a nih? Ngai ta, vân le vânhai vân khawm chun nang chu a dâwl naw che a nih; hi in ka bâwl lem hi chu a chîn nasa âwm de!
I hmaa i siehlaw hnina, ṭawngṭaina le kona chu lo ngai dingin, Aw

i hmun tieng nghaa i siehlaw hin a ṭawngṭai pha, ṭawngṭaina chu lo ngai dingin, ‘Chutaka chun ka hming chu sieng ka tih,’ i tina hmun tieng ngei chu, chu in tienga chun a sûn a zâna i mit chu în lên theina dingin.
Hi hmun tieng hi nghaa an ṭawngṭai pha chun i mi Israelhai le i siehlaw hnina chu lo ngai la; anih, i umna vâna inthawk ngei chun lo hre la; chun, i lo hriet chun ngaidam bawk la.
“Miin a tuolbâwm chungah thil a suksuol a, vânni khâm dinga inkhâmtira um ding a lo ni chun, hi ina hin a hung a, i maichâm hmaa hin a hung inkhâm chun;

nang chun vâna inthawkin lo ngai la, thaw la, mi suol chu ama lu chung ngeia a maw phura thungin, i siehlawhai chungthu chu hung rêl rawh; ân dikna ang peia pêka um dingin mi fel chu thiem hung inchangtir bawk la.
Chun, i mi Israelhai hi an hmêlmahai hmaa chun i chunga an suolna leia hnein lo um hai sienla, hung ngha kîrin, i hming an hung ṭan a, hi ina hin an ṭawngṭaia hnina an hung siem chun;
nangin vâna inthawk chun lo hre la, i mi Israelhai suol chu ngaidam la, an thlatuhai le anni kuoma i pêk rama chun hung ṭhuoi nâwk rawh.
I chungah thil an suksuol leiin, ruo sûr lovin vân chu lo ping ta sienla, hi hmun tieng nghaa an ṭawngṭai a, i hming an ṭan a, anni chu i hrem laia an suol chu an nghatsan chun,
vâna chun lo hre la, an fena ding lampui ṭha închûktir lai chun i siehlawhai le i mi Israelhai suol chu nangin lo ngaidam la; i mihai kuoma rochan dinga i pêk, chu ram chunga chun ruo insûrtir rawh.

Chun, chu rama chun ṭâm amani a tla a, hri amanih ân lêng a, riel amanih, ṭêk amanih, khâu amanih, tuktulung amani an ṭuong chun; an hmêlmahai chun an khawpuiahai chun anni chu hung inhuol hai sienla, ieng hripui khawm inlêngin, ieng natna khawm um sienla;

i mi Israelhai po poin amanih, mi tukhawmin amanih hnina le ṭawngṭaina ieng ang khawm lo siem ta sienla, mi tin mâni hri ngei hretu le, mâni lungngaina ngei hretuin hi in tieng hin a bânhai a phar suok chun,

i umna vâna inthawk chun nangin lo hre la, ngaidam la, mi tin chu, a lungril chu nangin i hriet a, a lampuihai ang po po ngei chun nangin inhmutir rawh; (nang chun, nang chauin mihriem nauhai lungril chu i hriet si a;)
kan thlatuhai kuoma i pêk rama an um sûng po poa i lampuihai chu hraw dinga nangma chu an ṭi theina ding chein.

“Chu nawah i mi Israel mi ni lo, mikhuol chungthua chun; i kut phar lei le, i kut thahrât lei le, i hming ropui leia ram hlataka inthawka a hung chun; an hung a hi in tieng nghaa an ṭawngṭai pha chun;

i umna hmun vâna inthawk ngei chun lo hre la, mikhuolin a hung kona san tak ang che chu thawpêk rawh; hnuoi chunga mi po pohai chun i mi Israelhai anga, hi in ka bâwl hi i hming a put ti an hriet theina dingin le, i hming ropui chu an hriet a an ṭi theina ding chein.

I mihai chu an hmêlmahai chunga do dingin fe suok hai sienla, khaw tieng lampuia mani khawm nangin lo tir ta la, i hming dinga in ka ibâwl le, hi khawpui nangin i thlang tieng hi nghaa an ṭawngṭai chun:
vâna inthawk chun an ṭawngṭaina le hnina chu lo ngai la, an thu chu nangin ṭan rawh.
I chungah thil an suksuol a, (mi thil suksuol lo an um si naw a) an chungah i lung a sen a, hmêlma kutah i pêk a, ram hlaa manih, a hnaia manih anni chun sala an ṭhuoi hmang chun:

sala ṭhuoihmanga an umna rama chun anni chu an inngaituoh a, an hung ngha kîr a, sal an nina rama chun nanga kuomah hnina an hung siem a; ‘Thil kan suk suol ta a, rilotakin kan thaw ta a, khawhlotakin kan lo thaw tah a nih,’ tia;

sala an umna rama an lungril po po le an lungvar po poa nangma kuoma an hung ngha kîr a, sala ṭhuoihmang an nina hmuna chun i hming dinga in ka bâwl tieng le, nangin khawpui i thlang tieng le, an thlatuhai kuoma ram i pêkna tieng nghaa an ṭawngṭai chun;
i umna hmun vâna inthawk ngei chun, an hnina le an ṭawngṭaina chu lo hre la, nangin an thu chu ṭan la, i chunga thil suksuol i mihai chu nangin ngaidam rawh.
Tuhin, aw ka Pathien, ka ngên che, hi hmuna ṭawngṭaina hi, i mitin hmu sienla, i na chun lo ngai raw se.
Aw
Aw
Solomonin ṭawngṭaina chu a suktâwp chun, vâna inthawkin mei a hung tla a, inthâwinahai le pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu a kâng hmang a;
Mei a hung tla a, in chunga chun
Chun, lal le mipuihai po po chun
Chun, lal Solomon chun bâwngchal sîng hni le sâng hni le, berâm nuoi khat le sîng hniin inthâwina ân hlân a. Chuongchun, lal le mipuihai po po chun Pathien in chu an inhlân ta a.
Thiempuhai chu an sinthaw ang pei chun an ngîr a; an rawngbâwlnaa Davidin ân pâk laia, “A zângaina chu kumkhawtluongin a um zing si a,” tia,
Chunawa khawm, Solomon chun
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Israel mihai po po, mipui pungkhâwm nasatakhai, Aigupta vadungtêa inthawka Hamath lûtna chena mihai le chun ni sari sûng chu ruoi an ṭhe a.
Chun, a ni riet ni chun inkhâwmna huntâwp chu an nei a; maichâm inhlânna chu ni sari sûng khan an nei a, ni sari sûng ma chun ruoiṭhena an nei bawk a.
Chuongchun, thla sarinaa ni sâwmhni pathum ni chun mipuihai chu an puon in tienghai chun, a mi Israelhai chunga le Solomon chunga le David chunga
Chuongchun, Solomon chun lal in le
Chun, zâna chun
Vân chu ka sukping a, ruo a sûr naw chun amanih, khâuhai chu ram chu fa zo dinga thu ka pêkin amanih, ka mihai laia hin hripui ka hung tîrin amanih;

ka mihai, ka hming chawia kohai chu an insukhnuoi a, an ṭawngṭai a, an lampui rilohai chu nghatsan a ka hmêl an hung zawng chun, vâna inthawkin lo hrieng ka ta, an suol chu ngaidam ka ta, an ram khawm chu sukhrisêl bawk ka tih.
Chuongchun, hi hmuna ṭawngṭaina inhlâna umhai chu, ka mithai chu meng ka ta, ka nahai chun ngai a tih.
Kumkhawtluonga ka hming a um zing theina dingin hi in hi ka thlangin ka lo sukthieng ta si a; chuongchun, ka mithai le ka lungril khawm chu chutaka chun um châmchîng a tih.
Chun, nanga chungthua chu thu ka pêk po pohai che ang peia i thaw a, i pa David khawsak anga ka hmaah i khawsa a, ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai chu i zâwm chun;
‘Israel rama rorêltu ding intlâksamtir naw ning che,’ tia i pa David kuoma thu ka lo thlung ta ang khan i lalram lalṭhungpha chu sukdet ka tih.
Amiruokchu, i pêt hmang a, i hmaa thupêkhai le thuruothai ka siehai chu i nghatsan a, i fe a, pathien danghai rawng i bâwl a, anni chu chibai i bûk chun;

ram ka ipêk, ka rama inthawkin a zung pumin anni chu phawidawk ka ta, chun, hi in ka hminga ka lo sukthieng ta khawm hi ka hmu phâk nawah sawn hmang ka ta, hnam tin laia chun ti-elna le ṭawngnaa hmang dingin siem ka tih.
Chun, hi in hieng ang lâwma insâng hi, a fekhêltuhai taphawt chun mak la tîng an ta, ‘Hi in le hi ram hi
Chun, anni ma chun, ‘Aigupta rama inthawka anni ṭhuoi suoktu an thlatuhai Pathien
Chun, kum sâwmhni sûng, Solomonin ama in le
Huramin Solomon kuoma khawpui a pêkhai chu, Solomon chun a siem ṭha a, chuonga chun Israel mipuihai chu ân umtir a.
Chun, Solomon chu Hamathzobaa chun a va fe a, a va hne ta a.
Thlalêr hmuna chun Tadmor khuo chu a siem a, sie khâwmna khawpuihai po po chu Hamatha chun a bâwl a.
Beth-horon chunghnung le, Beth-horon thlanghnung lem chu a bâwl bawk a, chuong chu khawpui kul nei, bang neia dai kawtkhâr le kalna thîrhai nei an nih;

chun, Baalath le siekhâwmna khawpui Solomonin a neihai po po le, sakawr tawlailîrhai ta dinga khawpuihai po po le, sakawr chung chuong mihai ta dinga khawpuihai le, Lebanon le Jerusalem le, a rorêlna ram sûng po poah Solomonin a nuomsip tâwlna dinga bâwl a nuomhai po po chu a nih.
Chun, hnam po pohai, Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai, Jebus mihai a la umhai Israel mi ni lohaia le,
an thlahai chu rama an mâksana Israelhaiin an lo sukbohmang nawhai chunga chun vawisûn ni chen hin Solomon chun suok nina sie chu ân chawitir a.
Amiruokchu, Israel mipuihai chu Solomon chun a sinthawnaa chun siehlawah a siem naw a; indo mi le, a hotutakhai le, a sakawr chung chuong mihai le a sakawr tawlailîrhai chunga rorêltuhai an ni lem a.
Chun, hienghai hi Solomon hotutakhai, za hni le sâwmnga, mipuihai chunga ro phurtuhai chu an nih.
Solomon chun Pharao naunu chu David khawpuia inthawkin a in dinga bâwla chun a zu ṭhuoi a; “Israelhai lal David ina chun ka nuhmei chu a um ding a ni nawh, a hmunhai chu
Chun, tuolpûk hmaa

ni tinin vawi ieng zât pei amanih, châwlniahai, thla tharahai, ruoiṭhe hunahai Mosie thupêk ang peia inhlânin; kum khat sûngah vawi thum, chawl ṭhanglo bei ruoiṭhea le, hapta kâr ruoiṭhehaia le, bâwkte ruoiṭhehaia le chun.

Chun, a pa Davidin a lo sukdet ta angin, an rawngbâwlna dingin thiempuhai pâwl hun chu a ruotpêk a; chun, Levi mihai khawm chu sin tuk an nina, inpâk ding le thiempuhai hmaa rawngbâwl dingin, ni tina a ṭûl ang peia an bituk angin a ruot bawk a; dai kawtkhâr tinahai chun kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu an pâwl hun ang peiin, chuong ang chun Pathien mi David chun thu a lo pêk ta si a.
Chun, ro siekhâwmna in chungthu le, thu ieng kima hrim hrim Levi mihai le thiempuhai kuoma lal thupêkhai chu an ngaitha ngai dêr naw a.
Chuongchun,
Chun, Solomon chu Edom rama tuipui kama Eloth le Ezion-gebera chun a fe ta a.

Chun, Huram chun a siehlawhai kutin lawnghai le siehlawhai tuipui chanchin hre mihai chu ama kuoma chun a thawn a; chuongchun, anni chu Solomon siehlawhai le chun Ophira chun an fe a, chutaka inthawk chun rângkachak talent za li le sâwmnga an hung phur a, lal Solomon kuoma chun an hung lâk a.

Seba lalnu chun Solomon chanchin chu a lo hrietin, indawnna intak takhai le Solomon chu fie dingin rawi nasatak leh; sanghâwngsei, riminhnik le rângkachak tamtak le lunghluhai phurtuhai le chun Jerusalema chun a hung a; chun, Solomon kuom a hung tlung chun, a lungrila umhai po po thua chun ama chu ân biekpui ta a.
Chun, Solomon chun ân dawnnahai po po chu a dawn a, Solomon ihriet naw thil, a dawn thei naw iengkhawm a um naw a.
Chun, Seba lalnu chun Solomon varzie le, in a ibâwl ta le,
dawkâna a bu dâm, a siehlaw inṭhunghai le a rawngbâwltuhai ngîrzie dâm le, an incheinahai le, a no chawituhai le an incheinahai le, a kailâwn
Chun, lal kuoma chun, “I varzie le i thilthawhai keia rama ka lo hriet thuthanghai hi ân dik ngei a ni hi.

Kei ngei ka hung a, ka mit ngeia ka hung hmu hma khan chu an thuhai ka lo ring naw a; ngai ta, i varna nasatzie chenve khawm hi hril ka lo ni naw hi tie; i hminginthangna ka lo hriet hi i khûm dai a nih.
I mihai chu an vângnei a nih, i siehlaw i hmaa ngîr zing zinga, i varna thu ngai hlakhai chu an va vângnei de!
Ama chun lal chu rângkachak talent za le sâwmhni le, riminhnik tamtak le, lunghluhai a pêk a; Seba lalnuin Solomon kuoma a pêk ang hrim hrim riminhnik a la um ngai nawh.
Chun, Huram siehlawhai le Solomon siehlawhai Ophira inthawka rângkachak hung phurtuhai khan algum thing le lunghlu an hung phur a.
Chun, lal chun algum thing chu

Chun, lal Solomon chun Seba lalnu kuoma chun a dit taphawt, a hni phawt chu amain a hung chawi ang ni lo phawt kha chu a pêk ve a. Chun, a kîr a, ama ram ngeia chun ama le a siehlawhai chu an fe ta a.
Kum khat sûnga Solomon kuoma rângkachak hung lût bûk zât chu, rângkachak talent za ruk sâwmruk paruk a nih:
chu chu dâwrkaihai le sum dâwnghaiin an hung lâk lût tiemsa lovin a nih; chun, Arabia rama lalhai po po le ram sûnga rorêltuhai po po chun Solomon kuomah rângkachak le tangka an hung lâk lût a.
Chun, Solomon chun rângkachak âwmphaw a suta sutin za hni a siem a, âwmphaw pakhata chun rângkachak sutphêk shekel za ruk a lût a.
Chun, rângkachak a suta sutin phâw za thum a siem a, phaw pakhata chun rângkachak sutphêk shekel za thum a lût a; chun, lal chun chuonghai chu Lebanon ramhnuoi inah a sie a.
Chunawa khawm, lal chun saiha lalṭhungpha a siem a, rângkachak inthiengin ân luon khum a.
Chun, lalṭhungpha hang kaina chu kailâwn paruk sirpha rângkachak seng lalṭhungphaa zawmnghet a na; chun, ṭhungna hmun sir khing ve vea chun sakeibaknei lim pahni an ngîr bawk a.
Chun, kailâwn paruka chun sîr khatah sakeibaknei sâwm le pahni an ngîr a, a sîr khingtienga khawm chun; khâwlai rama khawm hieng anga siem hi a la um ngai nawh.
Chun, lal Solomon dâwnna nohai po po chu rângkachak an na, Lebanon ramhnuoi ina bûr le bêlhai po po khawm chu rângkachak inthieng an nih, Solomon hun lai hin tangkaruo hin hlutna a nei rak nawh.

Huram siehlawhai le Tarsisa fe hlak lal chun lawnghai inkawppui a nei si a, kum thum dan peiah Tarsis lawnghai chu hungin rângkachak dâm, tangkaruo dâm, saiha dâm, zâwng dâm, ârâwn dâm a hung phur hlak a.
Chuongchun, lal Solomon chun hnuoia lalhai po po chu varna le hausaknaa chun a khûm a nih.
Chun, hnuoia lalhai po po chun Pathienin a lungrila varna a sie chu ngai dingin Solomon chu an hung pan huoi huoi hlak a.

Chun, mi tin chun a thilpêk, rângkachak bûr le bêlhai, tangkaraw bûr le bêlhai,silfên dâm, râlthuom dâm, riminhnik dâm, sakawr dâm, sabengtung lien chi dâm, kum tina bituk angin an hung pêk seng hlak a.

Chun, Solomon chun sakawrhai le sakawr tawlailîrhai ta dingin in sâng li le, sakawr chung chuong mi sîng khat le sâng hni a nei a; sakawr tawlailîr khawpuihaia le lal kuoma Jerusalema a siehai chu a ni a.
Chun, lal po po vadungpuia inthawka Philistin mihai ram chenin, Aigupta ramri chena umhai chunga chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, lal chun a tam êm lei chun Jerusalema chun tangkaruo chu lung ang el le, Sidar thing chu phairuoma theichang thinghai ang elin a siem a.
Chun, Aiguptaa inthawk le ram tina inthawkin Solomon ta dingin sakawrhai chu an hung lâk a.

Solomon thilthaw danghai, a hmasa le tâwpna chenin zâwlnei Nathan ziek chanchin bua le, Silon mi Ahija hrillâwknaa le, Nebat naupa Jeroboam chungthua zâwlnei Iddo thil hmulâwkahai chun ziek a ni naw am a nih?
Solomon chun Israel po po chunga chun kum sâwmli Jerusalemah ro a rêl a.
Chun, Solomon chu a thlatuhai kuomah a in a, a pa David khuoa chun phûm a ni ta a; a naupa Rehoboam chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Rehoboam chu Sekema chun a fe a; Israelhai po po chu ama chu lala siem dingin Sekema chun an hung si a.
Chun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam chun chu chu a lo hriet chun, (Solomon hmaa inthawka a tlânhmangna Aigupta rama chun a la um a ni si a.) Jeroboam chu Aigupta rama inthawk chun a hung kîr ta a.
Chun, mi an tir a, ama chu an ko ta a; chuongchun, Jeroboam le Israelhai po po chu an hung a, Rehoboam kuoma chun an hril a,
“I pa khan kan rîngkawl chu riktakin a lo siem ta a; chuleiin, tuhin i pa rawngbâwlna riktak le, kan chunga rîngkawl rik ân nghat hi mi sukzâng pêk la, chuongchun, i rawngbâwl kan tih,” an ta.
Anni kuoma chun, “Ni thum hnungah ka kuomah hung nâwk ro,” a lo ti a, chuongchun, mipui chu an fe ta a.
Chun, Rehoboam chun mi upahai, a pa Solomon damlaia a hmaa ngîr hlakhai chu, “Hi mipuihai hi dawn kirna dingin ieng thurâwn am in mi pêk a,” tiin, a râwn a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Hi mipui chunga hin za i ngai a, anni hi i suklungawi a, an kuomah thu ṭha i hril chun kumkhuoin i siehlawhai nîng an tih,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, upahai thurâwn ama an pêk ta chu a nghatsan a, ama hmaa ngîr hlak, ama ruolpuihai tlangvâlhai chu a rawn ta a.
An kuoma chun, “Hieng mipui, ‘I pain kan chunga rîngkawl a innghat hi mi sukzângpêk rawh,’ tituhai hi ieng dawnna am ei inkîr thei ding ieng am thurâwn in nei a?” a ta.

Tlangvâlhai, ama ruolpuihai chun an hril a, a kuomah, “ ‘I pain kan rîngkawl a sukrik êm a, nangin keini mi sukzângpêk rawh,’ i kuoma tituhai mipui kuoma chun hieng ang hin ti la, hieng ang hin an kuoma chun hril rawh, ‘Ka kutte chu ka pa kâwngbâwr nêkin a lien lem a.
Tuhin ka pain rîngkawl rik a lo inphurtir ta cheu a; kei chun in rîngkawl chu belsâng ka tih; ka pain vuoknain a lo hrem cheu a ni chun, kei chun ainuvêtin hrem ka ti cheu,’ tiin,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Jeroboam le mipuihai po po chu ni thum ni chun lalin, Ni thum niah ka kuomah hung nâwk ro, tia a lo inthla ang khan a kuomah an hung ta a.
Lal chun vîntakin a lo dawn a; lal Rehoboam chun mi upahai thurâwn chu a nghatsan a,

tlangvâlhai thurâwn angin, “Ka pa chun in rîngkawl chu a lo sukrik hle ta a, keiin chu chu belsâng ka ta; ka pain vuoknain a lo hrem cheu a ni chun, kei chun chu ainuvêtin hrem ka ti cheu,” tiin a lo hril a.
Chuongchun, lal chun mipuihai thu chu a ngai naw a; Silon mi Ahija hmanga Nebat naupa Jeroboam kuoma a thu lo hril tah, a thu chu

Chuonga Israel po po chun lal chun an thu a ngai nawh ti an hriet chun mipuihai chun an dawn a, “David a hin chanvo ieng am ei nei hrim luo a? Jesai naupaa hin rochan ieng khawm ei nei bawk nawh; mi tin mâni puon in sengah fe ro, Aw Israelhai: David, tuhin nangma insûng ngei chu inngaituo ta,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Israelhai po po chu an puon inhaia chun an ṭin tâwl ta a. Amiruokchu, Judai ram khawpuihaia umhai Israel mipuihai chunga khan chu Rehoboam chun ro a rêl zing a.

Chun, lal Rehoboam chun Hado- ram, leiman hotu chu a tir a, Israel mipuihai chun ama chu lungin an lo dêng a, a thi ta a. Chun, lal Rehoboam chu a sakawr tawlailîrah a chuong a, inhmâwtakin Jerusalemah a tlânse ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel sûngkuo chu David sûngkuo chunga chun, vawisûn ni chen hin an hel ta a.

Rehoboam chu Jerusalem a hung tlung chun Benjamin le Juda sûngkuo, nuoi khat le sîng riet, thlang ṭhieu, Israelhai do dinga indo mi, Rehoboam ta dinga ram chu hung la kîr nâwk dingin a ko khâwm tawl a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Semaia kuoma chun
“Judai ram lal Solomon naupa Rehoboam le, Judai rama Benjamin mihai le Israel mi po pohai kuoma chun thu hril la,
Rehoboam chu Jerusalema chun a um a, Judai rama inhumhimna dingin khawpuihai a bâwl a.
Bethlehem dâm, Etam dâm, Tekoa dâm,
Beth-zur dâm, Soko dâm, Adullam dâm,
Gath dâm, Maresah dâm, Ziph dâm,
Adoraim dâm, Lakis dâm, Azeka dâm,
Zora dâm, Aijalon dâm, Hebron dâm, chuong chu Judai rama umhai le, Benjamin rama khawpui kul neihai a nih.
Chun, kul dettakhai chu a sukdet nâwk zuol a, chuonga chun hotuhai a sie a, fâk ding le hriek le uoin dâm ân khâwl bawk a.
Khaw tin hmun tamtaka chun feihai, phâwhai a sie a, nasatakin a sukhrât a. Judai hnam le Benjamin hnam chu ama tieng an ṭhang a.
Levi mihai le thiempuhai chu an umna sûnga inthawk chun ama kuomah Israel ram sûng po poa chun an hung pakai a.
Levi mihai chun an ram le an khuohai chu an mâksan a, Jerusalem le Judai rama chun an hung a; Jeroboam le a naupasalhai chun anni chu
chuongchun, ama siem bâwngtêhai, kêlchalhai le bâwlhmunhaia ding chun thiempuhai a ruot fâwm ta a.
Chun, an hnunga khawm chun, Israel hnamhai lai po poa mi, Israel Pathien
Chuongchun, kum thum sûng chun Judai lalram chu an sukdet tiel tiel a, Solomon naupa Rehoboam chu ân sukdet hle el ta a; kum thum sûng chu David le Solomon lampui chu an hraw si a.
Chun, Rehoboam chun David naupa Jerimoth le Jesai naupa Eliab naunu Abihail naunu Mahalath chu nuhmeiah a nei a;
amanu chun naupasalhai a neipêk a; Jeus le Semaria le Zaham.
Ama hnunga chun Absalom naunu Maaka chu a nei a; ama chun Abija, Attai, Ziza le Selomith a neipêk a.

Chun, Rehoboam chun a nuhmeihai le a thaikêmhai po po nêkin Absalom naunu Maaka chu a hmangai lem a, (nuhmei chu sâwmpariet a nei a, thaikêm sâwmruk leh; chun, naupasal sâwmhni pariet le naunuhmei sâwmruk a nei bawk si a).
Chun, Rehoboam chun Maaka naupa Abija chu lalah, a unauhai laia hotutakah a ruot a; ama chu lala siem a lungril si a.

Chun, vartakin a thaw a, Juda le Benjamin ram po poa chun a naupasalhai chu a semdar rak a, khawpui kul neihai po poa chun; fâk ding khawm tam tâwk takin a pêk bawk a. An ta dingin nuhmeihai khawm tamtak a zawngpêk bawk a.
Rehoboam ram chu sukdet a hung na, a hung hrât phing chun,
Chun, Rehoboam inlal kum nganaa chun Aigupta rama lal Sisak chun Jerusalem a hung rûn a,
sakawr tawlailîr sâng le za hni le sakawr chung chuong mi sîng ruk leh; Aigupta rama inthawka ama hung zuitu Lubim mihai, Sukkiim mihai, Ethiopia mihai le chu tiem sêng ruol lo an nih.
Chun, Judai rama khawpui kul neihai chu a lâk a, chuongchun, Jerusalema chun a hung pei a.
Chun, zâwlnei Semaia chu Rehoboam le hotu, Judai ram Sisak leia Jerusalema hung khâwmhai kuoma chun a hung a, an kuoma chun, “
Chun, lal tak le Israel upahai chu an insukhnuoi a, “
Amiruokchu, a siehlawhai hung nîng an ta, hieng ramhaia lalram rawngbâwlna le ka rawngbâwlna chu an hriet theina dingin,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Aigupta lal Sisak chun Jerusalem chu a hung rûn a, lal in rothilhai le
Chun, lal Rehoboam chun chuong aia chun dârsen phâwhai a siem a, lal in kawtkhâr vêngtu, vêngtu pâwl hotu kuoma chun ân kawltir a.
Chun, ama chu ân sukhnuoi tâk lei chun

Chuongchun, lal Rehoboam chu Jerusalema chun ân sukdet a, ro a rêl ta a, ro a rêl ṭan tir chun Rehoboam chu kum sâwmli le kum khat a ni ta a, chun, Jerusalemah, Israel hnam po po laia inthawka a hming um zingna dinga

Chuongchun, Rehoboam thilthawhai, a hmasa le nuhnunghai khawm, thla thu sui dân ang peiin zâwlnei Iddo le zâwlnei Semaia chanchinbuhaia chun ziek an ni naw am a nih? Chun, Rehoboam le Jeroboam inkâra hin indonahai a um zing zing bawk a.
Chun, Rehoboam chu a thlatuhai kuomah a in ta a, David khawpuia chun phûmin a um a; chun, a naupa Abija chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Jeroboam inlal kum sâwmparietnaa chun Abija chun Juda rama chun ro a rêl ṭan a.
Ama chun kum thum lai Jerusalemah ro a rêl a; a nu hming chu Mikaia, Gibea mi, Uriel naunu kha a nih. Chun, Jeroboam le Abija inkâra khawm chun indona a um a.

Abija chun indonaa mi hrât ruol sipai pâwl thlang ṭhieu nuoi li lai chun indonaa chun a hang thaw a; Jeroboam khawm chun mi hrât khawkhêng thlang ṭhieu nuoi riet leh indonaa chun ama chu a hung ep ve bawk a.
Abija chu Ephraim tlâng rama Zemaraim tlâng chunga chun a ngîr a.“Aw Jeroboam le Israel mi po pohai, mi lo ngai ta u;
David naupa Solomon siehlaw, Nebat naupa Jeroboam hi thoin, a pu chungah a lo hel el hi.

Chun, ama kuoma chun mi teplohai, mi hmangna bohai chu an inkhâwm a, Rehoboam chu a la naupanga, lungril dâwng a ni lai khan, anni chu Solomon naupa Rehoboam kalin an insukhrât a, ama chun a lo dang zo ta naw kha a na.
Chun, tuhin David naupasalhai kuta
Amiruokchu, keini chu
riminhnik thilinhlânhai le pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu zîng tin le zân tin
Chun, en ta u, Pathien chu kan hma tieng keini lai a um a; in chunga inlâuna sukri dingin suklauna tawtawrâwthai le thiempuhai chu an um bawk a; Aw Israel mihai, in thlatuhai Pathien
Nisienlakhawm, Jeroboam chun an hnung tienga hung dingin lambun pâwl a siem a; chuongchun, Juda hmaa chun an um a, lambun pâwl chu an hnunga chun an um bawk a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu an hei nghakîr chun, ngai ta, râl chu an hma le hnunga chun an um ta a;
Chun, Juda mihai chu an khêk a; chuonga Juda mihai an khêk chun, Pathienin Israelhai po po le Jeroboam chu Abija le Juda mihai hmaa chun a hung suktlâwm ta a.
Chuongchun, Juda mihai hmaa inthawk chun Israel mihai chu an tlânse a; chun, Pathienin an kuta chun anni chu a pêk ta a.
Abija le a mihai chun nasatakin anni chu an that ta a, chuongchun, thlang ṭhieu Israel mi nuoi nga chu thatin an tlu ta a.
Chuongchun, chu huna chun Israel thlahai chu sukhnuoiin an um ta a, Juda thlahai ruok chun an thlatuhai Pathien
Abija chun Jeroboam chu a hnawt pei a, amaa inthawk chun khawpuihai a lâk a; Bethel le chutaka a khawperhai leh, Jesana le chutaka a khawperhai leh, Ephron le chutaka a khawperhai leh.
Abija dam sûng chun Jeroboam chu a hrât suok nâwk ta ngai naw a;
Chun, Abija chun thil a hung thawthei deu deu a, nuhmei sâwm pali a nei a, naupasal sâwmhni pahni le naunuhmei sâwmparuk a nei a.
Abija thilthaw danghai, a thawdânhai le a thuhrilhai chu zâwlnei Iddo hrilfiena bua chun ziek an nih.

Chuongchun, Abija chu a thlatuhai kuoma chun a in ta a, ama chu David khawpuia chun an phûm a, a naupa Asa chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a; ama inlal sûng chun kum sâwm sûng chu ram chu râlmuongin a um a.
Chun, Asa chun a Pathien,
bâwlhmunhai le maichâm danglamhai chu a lâk hmang a, lungphunhai chu a sukthliek a, Asera chu a phûr thlûk bawk a;
chun, Juda mihai chu an thlatuhai Pathien
Juda ram sûng khawpui po pohaia inthawk chun bâwlhmunhai le nisa limhai chu a lâk hmang vawng a; ram chu ama hmaa chun a re ṭawk ṭawk a.
Juda rama chun khawpui kul neihai chu a bâwl a,
Chun, ama chun, Juda mihai kuoma chun, “Hieng khawpuihai hi bâwl ei tiu a, a banghai, a kulbîng insânghai, a dai kawtkhârhai le a kalna thîrhai siem ei tiu; ei Pathien

Chun, Asa chun Juda hnama inthawkin âwmphâw le fei chawi mi sipai nuoi thum a nei a; Benjamin hnama inthawkin phaw chawia thalngul kuoi mi nuoi hni le sîng riet a nei bawk a: hieng mihai po po hi mi hrât khawkhêng ruok an nih.
Chun, Ethiopia mi Zera chun sipai maktaduoi khat le sakawr tawlailîr za thum leh anni chu a hung thaw a; ama chu Maresa chenin a hung a.
Chun, Asa chu ama tuok ding chun a suok a, Maresaa Zephatha ruoma chun indo ding chun an inep ta a.
Asa chu a Pathien
Chuongchun,
Asa le a kuoma mipui umhai chun anni chu Gerar chenin an hnawt a; Ethiopia mihai chu nasatakin an thi a, ṭhang an khaw thei ta naw a;
Chun, Gerar vêla khuohai po po chu a thaw vawng a,
Ran ruol bûkhai chu an rûn pei a, berâm tamtakhai le sanghâwngsei leh an lâk ṭeu a, Jerusalemah an kîr ta a.
Chun, Oded naupa Azaria chunga chun Pathien thlarau a hung a;
Asa chu tuok dingin a va fe suok a, a kuoma chun, “Nangni Asa le Benjamin le Juda ram po pohai, mi lo ngai ta u; a kuoma in um sûng po chun
Chuongchun, hun sâwttak el chu Israel ram chu Pathien indiktak bo, inchûktirtu thiempu le dân boin an lo um ta a;
amiruokchu, an rimsiknaa chun Israel Pathien
Chuong lai hunahai chun mi hung lût ta ding le a suok ta ding khawm chun muongna hrim hrim a um naw a, ram po pohai hluotuhai chunga chun lunginzîngna nasatak a um lem a.
A tum tumin an insukdar vawng a, hnam chungah hnam dang, khawpui chungah khawpui dang; inhmêlmâkna tinrêngin Pathienin anni chu a suklungsen tâwl si a.
Amiruokchu, insukhrât unla; inthlada naw ro, in sinthaw chu lâwmman pêk in ni ding a ni si a,” tiin.
Asa chun hieng thu le, zâwlnei Oded thuhrilhai chu a hriet chun, ân sukhuoi a, Juda le Benjamin ram po poa le Ephraim tlâng rama khawpui a lâkhaia inthawka tirdakumnahai po po chu a sie hmang ta a;
Juda le Benjamin rama mi po po le, Ephraim le Manasse le Simeona inthawka chutaka hung inpêm lûthai chu a ko khâwm vawng a;
Chuongchun, anni chu Asa rorêl kum sâwmpanga kum thla thumnaa chun Jerusalema chun an hung inkhâwm tâwl a.
Chu ni chun râllâk thila an hung lâk, bâwngchal za sari le berâm sâng sariin
Chun, an lungvar po po le an lungril po po an thlatuhai Pathien
chuongchun, mi tukhawm Israel Pathien
Chun, rawsemhai, tawtawrâwthai le khêkriin, râwl inringtakin

A pain a lo inhlân tahai le amain ân hlân tahai, tangkaruo dâm, rângkachak dâm, bûr le bêlhai leh Pathien ina chun a hung lâk a.

Asa rorêl a kum sâwmthum paruk kum chun, Israel ram lal Baasa chun Juda ram a hang rûn a, Juda ram lal Asa kuoma mi a hung amanih, a suok amanih a phal nawna dingin Rama khuo chu a siem ta a.

Chuongchun, Israel ram lal le Juda ram lal Jehosaphat chu Ramothgileada chun an hang fe ta a.

Chun, Israel lal chun Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Insukdanglam ka ta, indonaah hang fêng ka tih; amiruokchu, nang chu i lal puon sil zing la,” a ta. Chuongchun, Israel lal chu ân sukdanglam a, indonaa chun an hang fe ta a.

Chun, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai chun Jehosaphat chu an hmu chun, “Israel lal a ni a,” an ta. Chuleiin, ama chu do dingin an inhuol ta a; amiruokchu, Jehosaphat chu a khêk a,
Chun, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai chun Israel lal a ni nawh ti an hmu chun, ama an hnawt lai chu an kîrsan ta a.

Chun, mi tuin amanih tum bîk nei lovin a thalngul chu a kuoi a, Israel lal chu a râlthuom inzawmna kâr taka chun a kâp ta a; chuleichun, a tawlailîr khaltu kuoma chun, “Kei her la, sipaihai laia inthawk hi mi fe suokpui raw khai, ka hliem nasa êm el,” a ta.
Chu ni chun indona chu a zuol pei a, ngai ta, Israel lal chu Suriahai chu doin a tawlailîra chun zântieng chenin a ṭhang zing a; chun, ama chu nisa tlâk hun lai taka hin a thi ta a.

A hril a, “Aw
Aw kan Pathien, i mi Israelhai hmaah hi ram hluotuhai hi i hnawt suokin, i ruolpa Abraham thlahai kuomah kumkhuoa dingin i pêk a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, chutaka chun an um a, i ta dingin i hmingin hmun inthieng chutaka chun an bâwlpêk che a,

‘Thil ṭha naw dâm, kâwlhnâm dâm, rorêlna dâm, hri amanih, ṭâm amanih kan chungah a hung tlung chun nangma hmaa le hi in hmaa hin ngîr kan ta, (i hming chu hi ina hin a um si a,) kan rimsiknaa chun nang hung ko kan ti che a, nang chun mi lo sandam i tih,’ tiin.
Tuhin, ngai ta, Ammon le Moab mihai le Seir tlâng Aigupta rama inthawka an hung suok laia nangin Israel mihai inrûntir lo le, insuksiettir lo a i în umtirhai khan,
ngai ta, nangin hluo dinga i mi pêk, i chana inthawka hunga mi hnawt suok dinga an mi hung thawzie hi lo hre la.

Aw kan Pathien, nangin an chungah ro i rêl ding a ni naw am a nih? Hieng keini mi hung thaw tum pâwl nasatak el chunga hin hrâtna kan nei si naw a; ieng am thaw ding a na ti khawm kan hriet bawk nawh; nangma tieng kan hung ngha a nih,” tiin.

ama chun a hril a, “Nangni Juda mi po pohai, Jerusalem hluotu po pohai le nang lal Jehosaphat, lo ngai ta u,

Chun, mipuihai chu ân fui zo hnung chun, sipaihai hmaa an fe suok phaa inthieng mawina chu inpâka
Chun, an inpâk a, hla an hang sak ṭan phing chun Juda ram hung rûntuhai Seir tlâng le, Moab le Ammon mihai chunga chun inchân rutuhai

Moab le Ammon mihai chu Seir tlâng khuo deltuhai chu that vawng a, anni sukbohmang dingin an hung tho ta a; chun, Seir tlâng hluotuhai an hung sukrêm hnunga khawm chun, mi tin chu mi dang dang insukbohmangtuo an tum seng ta a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu thlalêra vêngna in insânga an hang tlung chun; mipuihai chu an hei en a; chun, ngai ta, mithi ruong hnuoia tluhai chu an hmu a; tukhawm a damsuok hrim an um dêr naw a.

Chun, Jehosaphat le a mihai chu an thuom hlîppêk dinga an hung chun lunghluhai, silfênhai, hausakna nasatak elhai chu anni lai chun an hmusuok a, chuonghai chu an phur sêng lo rauin an lâk a; chuong ang lâwm chun a tam a, ni thum sûng zet chu râllâk thilhai chu an lâk a.
