Chuongchun, Jehosaphat ram huop sûng chu a re ṭawk ṭawk a; a Pathien chun a vêl po poa chun râlmuongna a pêk si a.
Jehosaphat chun Juda ram chunga chun ro a rêl a, a rorêl ṭan chun kum sâwmthum panga a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmhni panga a rêl a; a nu hming chu Azuba, Silhi naunu kha a nih.
A pa Asa lampui kha a hraw a,
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu lâk hmang a ni naw a; mihai khawm chun an thlatuhai Pathien tienga chun an lungrilhai an lân nghat chie naw a.
Jehosaphat thilthaw, a hmasa le a nuhnunghai chu, ngai ta, Hanani naupa Jehu chanchin bu, Israel lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a nih.
Chun, hi hnunga hin Juda ram lal Jehosaphat chu Israel ram lal Ahazia le chun an inzawm a ; ama chun khawhlotakin a thaw a;
lawnghai siema, Tarsisa fe dingin ama chu ân zawmpui a; chuong chun, Ezion-gebera chun lawnghai chu an siem ta a.
Chun, Maresaa Dodavahu naupa Eliezer chun Jehosaphat chunga chun a hrillâwk a, “Ahazia chu în zawmpui leiin,
Jehosaphat chu a thlatuhai kuoma chun a in ta a; David khawpuiah a thlatuhai kuomah chun phûmin a um ta a; a naupa Jehoram chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a;
chun, unauhai, Jehosaphat naupasalhai a nei a: Azaria, Jehiel, Zekaria, Azaria, Mikael, Sephatia; hienghai po po hi Israel ram lal Jehosaphat naupasalhai an nih.

Chun, an pa chun an kuoma chun thilpêk nasatak elhai , tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, thil hlutakhai dâm le Juda rama khawpui kul neihai leh a pêk a; amiruokchu, Jehoram chu nau lutîr a ni leiin lalram chu a pêk a.
Chuonga Jehoram chu a pa ram chunga chun a hung inlal a, a hung insukhrât phing chun a unauhai po po le Israel rama lal tamtak chu kâwlhnâmin a that tâwl ta a.
Rorêl a ṭan chun Jehoram chu kum sâwmthum pahni a na; Jerusalema chun kum riet sûng ro a rêl a.
Ama chun Ahab sûngkuoin an thaw ang khan, Israel ram lalhai lampuia bawk khan a fe a; Ahab naunu nuhmeiah a nei a;
Chun, Jehoram chu ama le a sakawr tawlailîr po pohai le a hotuhai le chun ân thawk a, zân lai a hang ṭhâwng a, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai le ama inhuoltu Edom mihai chu a thaw ta a.
Chuongchun, vawisûn ni chen hin Edom mihai chu Judahai chunga chun an hel ta zing a; chu huna bawk chun Libna khuo khawm chu an lo hel ve a; a thlatuhai Pathien
Chunawa khawm chun Juda ram tlângahai chun bâwlhmunhai a siem a, Jerusalema umhai chu ân uirettir a, chuongchun, Juda ram chu an lo ṭhuoi hmang ta a.
Chun, a kuoma chun zâwlnei Elija kuoma inthawkin lekha ziek a hung a, “I pu David Pathien

Israel lalhai lampuihai chu i hraw lem a. Ahab sûngkuoin an lo thaw ta angin, Jerusalema umhai le Juda rama mihai chu i lo inuirettir ta a; chun, i pahnama mi i unauhai nanga nêka ṭha lemhai chu i that bawk a,
ngai ta,
i phîng natna leiin nang khawma natna nasatak nei i ta; ni tin tinin, chu natna leia i rîlhai a suok zo vawng hmakhat chun nei i tih,’ ” tiin.
Chun, Ethiopia mihai kâwla um Arabia le Philistin mihai lungril chu Jehoram chunga chun

Juda ram chu an hung rûn a, an hung lût a; lal ina thil hmua umhai po po an lâk vawng a; a naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai leh, chuongchun, a naupasalhai laia a naupang tak Jehoahaz ti chau naw chu a naupasal hrim hrim mâksanpêk a ni naw a.
chun, hieng thilhai po po hnunga hin

Chuong anga kum hni ân vawi hnung chun, a natna lei chun a rîl chu a suok a, natna natakin a thi ta a. Chun, a mihai chun a thlatuhai chawimawinaa meipui an sêm ang khan, ama ta dingin meichawk an siempêk naw a.
Rorêl a ṭan chun kum sâwmthum pahni mi a na, Jerusalema chun kum riet ro a rêl a; ama chu ngainatna hlaw lovin a thi ta a; David khawpuia chun an phûm a, lalhai thlâna ruok chu ni lovin.

Jerusalema chênghai chun a naupa naupang tak Ahazia chu ama aia chun lalin an siem a; Arabia mihai le pâwl ruol bûka hunghai khan a upahai po chu an that vawng ta si a. Chuongchun, Judai ram lal Jehoram naupa Ahazia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Ro a rêl ṭan chun Ahazia chu kum sâwmli pahni mi a na, Jerusalema chun kum khat sûng ro a rêl a, a nu hming chu Athalia, Omri naunu a nih.
Ama khawma Ahab sûngkaw lampuihai kha a hraw ve a; a nu chu khawhlotaka khawsa dinga a thu rawtpuitu a ni si a.
Ahab sûngkuoin an thaw ang khan
An thu rawt ang pei chun a fe a, Suria ram lal Hazael chu do dingin Ramoth-gileada chun Israel ram lal Ahab naupa Jehoram le chun a hang fe ve a; Suria mihai chun Joram chu an lo inhliem a.

Chun, Suria ram lal Hazael a donaa Ramaa ama an inhliemnahai chu insukdam dingin Jezreela chun a kîr ta a. Chun, Judai ram lal Jehoram naupa Azaria chu, Ahab naupa Jehoram chu a damnaw leia Jezreela en dingin a zu fe a.
Chuongchun, Ahazia bohmangna chu Pathiena inthawk a na, Joram kuoma a hang fe lei tak chu a nih; chuonga a hung lai chun, Ahab sûngkuo chu sât thlatu dinga
Chun, Jehu chun thupêk Ahab sûngkaw ta dinga a pêk suok lai chun Juda ram lalhai le Ahazia unauhai naupasalhai chu Ahazia rawngbâwlin a hmu a, anni chu a that tâwl ta a.
Chun, Ahazia chu a zawng a, an man a, (Samariaa chun a lo in bihmang a na) Jehu kuoma chun an hung ṭhuoi a, an that ta a; chun, an phûm a, “A lungril po poa
Chun, Ahazia nu Athalia chun a naupa chu a thi tah ti a hriet chun, a tho a, Juda sûngkuo lal chi po chu a rawt ta vawng a.

Amiruokchu, lal naunu Jehosabeath chun Ahazia naupa Joas chu a lâk a, lal nauhai thata umhai laia inthawk chun ân rûkhmang a, khum pindanah ama dawntu le chun a sie ta a. Chuongchun, lal Jehoram naunu Jehosabeath, thiempu Jehoiada nuhmei chun (ama chu Ahazia farnu a ni si a,) Athaliaa inthawk chun a thuphmang a, chuongchun, a sukhlum ve naw a.
Pathien ina chun anni leh kum ruk sûng thupin a um a, chun, Athalia chun ram chunga chun ro a rêl a.

Chun, a kum sari kum chun Jehoiada chu ân sukhrât a, sipai za pâwl chunga hotuhai, Jehoram naupa Azaria hai, Jehohanan naupa Ismael hai, Obed naupa Azaria hai, Adaia naupa Maaseia hai, Zikri naupa Elisaphat hai le chun thu a thlung a.
Chun, Juda ram sûnga chun a fe vêl a, Juda khawpui po poa inthawk chu Levi mihai le, Israel pahnam ṭhuoituhai le chun a lâk khâwm a, Jerusalema chun an fe ta a.
Chun, mipui inkhâwmhai po po chun Pathien ina chun lal le thutiem an siem ta a. Chun, an kuomah a hril a, “David naupasalhai chungthu
Hi hi thil in thaw ding chu hung nîng a tih: Châwlnia hung hlak, thiempuhai le Levi mihai hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai nîng in ta;
a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lal inah um an ta, a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lungphûmna dai kawtkhâr bulah um an ta; chun, mipui po po chu
Amiruokchu, thiempuhai ti chau naw chu mi tukhawm
Levi mihai chun, mi tin an râlthuomhai chawi sengin lal chu ngîr huol an ta; amiruokchu, mi tukhawm

Chuongchun, Levi mihai le Juda mihai po po chun thiempu Jehoiadain thu a pêk ang tak chun an thaw ta a; mi tin chun anni mihai châwlnia fe suok dinghai le hung lût dinghai chu an ṭhuoi vêl a; thiempu Jehoiada chun a ṭîn ding pâwlhai chu ân thlengtir si naw a.
Thiempu Jehoiada chun Pathien ina um, lal David ta phawthai dâm, feihai dâm, âwmphâwhai dâm chu sipai za pâwl hotuhai kuoma chun a pêk suok tâwl a.
Mipuihai po po, mi tin el chu a râlthuom a kutah chawiin, lal sîrvêla le, in maichâm sirvêl po poa chun, in sîr changtieng panga inthawka in sîr vawitieng panga chen chun ân umtir a.

Chun, lal naupa chu an hung ṭhuoi suok a, lallukhum an inkhumtir a, thuinhriettir chu an pêk a; chuongchun, lalah an siem ta a; chun, Jehoiada le a naupasalhai chun ama chu hriek an nâl a, “Lal hi Pathienin sandam raw se,” an ti a.
Chun, Athalia chun mipui tlân vêl ri le lal an chawimawi ri chu a hrietin,

chun, a hei en a, lûtna bula chun lal chu a sûtpui kâwla chun a ngîr a, sipai hotuhai le tawtawrâwt puhai khawm chu lal kâwla chun an um a. Chuongchun, ram sûng mi po po chu an hlim bêk bêk a, tawtawrâwthai an mût a; hla saktuhai khawm chun hla sakna thuomhnawhai chu sutin, chawimawina hla chu an sak ta a. Chun, Athalia chun a puonhai chu a keithlêr a, “Phierrûkna, phierrûkna,” tiin a khêk a.

Chun, thiempu Jehoiada chun sipai pâwl chunga siea um, za pâwl hotuhai chu a hung ṭhuoi suok a, an kuomah, “Sipai tlarhai kâra khan insuoktir ro; tukhawm ama zui taphawt chu kâwlhnâma that nîng an tih, thiempu chun, ‘
Chuongchun, ama ta ding chun lampui chu an inken a, lal ina sakawr kawtkhâr lûtna tieng chun a fe a; chutaka chun an that ta a.
Chun, Jehoiada chun ama le mipuihai po po le, lal inkâra chun
Chun, mipui po po chu Baal ina chun an va fe a, an suksiet a, a maichâmhai le a limhai chu an suknâwi vawng a; Baal thiempu Mattan chu maichâm hmaa chun an that ta a.
Chun, Jehoiada chun
Chun,
Chun, za pâwl hotuhai, mi ṭhahai, mipui rorêltuhai le chu rama mi po pohai chu a ṭhuoi a,
Chuongchun, chu rama mipuihai po po chu an hlim êm êm a, khawpui chu râlmuongin a um a, Athalia chu kâwlhnâmin an that ta a.
Joas chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sari mi chau a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmli sûng ro a rêl a; a nu chu Beer-sebaa mi, a hming Zibia a nih.
Thiempu Jehoiada dam sûng po poa chun Joas chun Pathien mithmuah thil indikhai chu a thaw a.
Jehoiada chun nuhmei pahni ân neitir a; naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai a nei a.
Joas chun

Levi mihai le thiempuhai chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Juda ram khawpuiahai chun fe suok unla, kum tinin in Pathien in siem ṭhatna dingin Israel mihai po poa inthawk chun tangka dâwl unla; hi thil hi hung inhmaw hle dingin ngaituo ro,” a ta. Amiruokchu, Levi mihai chu an inhmaw naw hle el a.
Chun, lal chun thiempu laltak Jehoiada chu a ko a, a kuomah, “Thuthlungna puon ina dingin, Israel mipuihai le
Kha nuhmei rilo Athalia naupasalhai khan Pathien in chu an lo suksiet a;
Chuongchun, lal chun thu a pêk a, thingrem an siem a,
Chun, Jerusalema le Juda ram po poa chun, thlalêra Pathien siehlaw Mosiein Israel mihai po po chunga leiman bituk a lo siem ta chu
Chuongchun, lalhai po po le mipuihai po po chu an hlim hle a, an tangkahai an hung chawi a, thingrema chun an dâwl zo hmakhat chun an thlâk ta zing hlak a.

Chun, thingrem chu lal hotuhai hmaa Levi mihai chun an hung lâk po leh, tangka tamtak a um ti an hmu chun lal lekhaziektu le thiempu laltak hotu chu an hung a, thingrem chu an sukruok a, an lâk a, a hmuna bawk chun an va sie nâwk hlak a, chuong ang chun ni tin an thaw a, tangka tamtak an inkhâwl a.
Chun, chu chu
Chuongchun, sinthawtuhai chun sin an thaw a; sin chu anni thaw zo famkim a ni ta a , Pathien in chu a ngai ang bawk chun an bâwl ṭha a, an sukdet ta a.
Chun, an zo pha chun, tangka danghai chu lal le Jehoiada kuoma chun an hung chawi a; chuonghai chun
Nisienlakhawm, Jehoiada chu a hung upa a, a hung tar ta a, a thi ta a; a thi chun kum za le sâwmthum mi a nih.
Ama chu David khawpuiah lalhai laia chun an phûm a, Pathien le a in chunga le, Israel ram sûnga chun thil ṭha a thaw hlak leiin.
Jehoiada a thi hnung chun Juda ram lalhai chu an hung a, lal kuoma chun devânkaina an hung siem a. Chun, lal khawm chun an thu chu a lo ngai a.
An thlatuhai Pathien
Chun, thiempu Jehoiada naupa Zekaria kuoma chun Pathien thlarau a hung tlung a, mipuihai chunga chun a ngîr a, an kuomah, “Pathien chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Hlawtling thei nâwna pha el dinga iengdinga
Chun, ama chu an phierrûk ta a,
Chuongchun, lal Joas chun ama chunga a pa Jehoiada ngilneizie kha a hriet zing ta naw a, a naupa chu a that ta a. Chun, a thi chun, “

Chun, kum tâwpa chun Suria sipaihai chun ama chu an hung rûn ta a; chuongchun, Juda ram le Jerusalema khawm chun an hung lût a; an mi lienhai po po chu an sukbohmang vawng a, annia râllâk sum po po chu Damaska lal kuomah an inphur vawng a.
Suria sipai pâwlhai chu mi tlâwmte chau hi an hung a, amiruokchu,

Chun, ama chu an mâksan chun (na inrimtakin ama chu an mâksan si a), thiempu Jehoiada naupasalhai thisen lei khan ama siehlaw ngeiin ama chu a phierrûk ta a; a khum chunga ngei chun a that a, a thi ta a; David khawpuia chun an phûm a, nisienlakhawm, lalhai thlân ina khan chu an phûm nawh.
Hienghai hi ama phierrutuhai chu an nih: Ammon nu Simeath naupa Zabad hai, Moab nu Simrith naupa Jehozabad hai hi.
Chun, a naupasalhai chungthu le, ama chunga phurrik nasatak innghat le, Pathien in bâwl thu chu, ngai ta, lalhai chanchin ziekna bua chun an ziek a. Chun, a naupa Amazia chun ama aiin ro a rêl ta a.
Amazia chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmhni pakuo ro a rêl a, a nu hming chu Jehoaddan, Jerusalem mi a nih.
Lalram chu ama ta dinga sukdet a ni phing chun, a pa lal thattu a siehlawhai kha a that tâwl a.
Nisienlakhawm, an nauhai chu a that naw a,

Chunawa khawm Amazia chun Juda mihai chu a ko khâwm a, Juda le Benjamin chia mi po pohai chu za pâwl hotu hnuoia dâm, sâng pâwl hotu hnuoia dâm an pahnam ang peiin an inumtir a; kum sâwmhni le a chungtienga mi po chu a tiem a, phâw le fei hmang thei, indo dinga fe suok thei ṭhieu le thlangsuok ṭhieu mi nuoi thum an um a.
Chun, tangka talent za khatin Israel rama inthawkin mi huoisen nuoi khat a ruoi bawk a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi a kuomah a hung a, “Aw lalpa, Israel sipaihai hi nanga ruolin fe ve naw raw hai se, Israelhai kuoma chun

Nisienlakhawm, in fe suok a ni hrim hrim chun, huoitakin thaw la, indonaa chun va hrât rawh, hmêlmahai hmaa chun Pathien chun suktlâwm a ti che; Pathien chun ṭhangpui ding le pei thla dingin thilthawtheina a nei si a,” a ta.
Amazia chun Pathien mi kuoma chun, “Anleh, Israel sipaihai kuoma tangka talent za ka lo pêk ta chu ieng tin am thâwng ei ti leh?” a ta. Pathien mi chun, “Hi nêka tam khawm hi pe ding chein

Amazia chun, Ephraima inthawka a kuoma sipai hunghai kha an in tienga fe nâwk el dingin a ṭhe thlâk ta a; chuongchun, Judahai chunga chun an lungsen chu nasatakin a chawk ta a, lunginsen ṭiumtak chun in an inlawi nâwk ta a.
Chun, Amazia chu ân sukhuoi a, a mihai chu a ṭhuoi suok a, Chi Ruoma chun a fe ta a; Seir mihai sîng khat rau chu a hang hne ta a.

Chun, mi dang sîng khat bawk chu Juda mipuihai chun a hringin an ṭhuoi a, lungpui sîpa chun an hung ṭhuoi a, chuongchun, lungpui sîpa inthawk chun an pei thlâk a, an rêng chun an inphit vawng tâwl ta a.

Chun, sipai pâwla mihai chu, indo dinga ama le fe lo dinga Amazia chun a tirkirhai khan Samaria inthawk Beth-horon chenin Juda ram khawpuihai chu an hang rûn a, mi sâng thum an that a, râllâk sum tamtak an lâk bawk a.
Chun, Amazia chu Edom mihai that a hung kîr hnung chun, Seir mihai pathien chu a hung lâk a, a pathienhai ni dingin a sie a, an hmaa chun a kûn a, an kuoma chun riminhnikhai a raw ta a.
Chuleichun,

Chun, ama le an inbiek zing lai chun lal chun a kuomah, “Lal thurawnpuituah kan siem che am a nih? Fîmkhur rawh; iengdingin am thatin um i ta?” a ta. Chuongchun, zâwlnei chun, “Ka thurâwn chu i pawisa naw a, hi thil hi i thaw leiin, Pathien chun suksiet a tum che a nih ti ka hriet a nih,” a ta, a to ta a.
Chun, Juda ram lal Amazia chun thurawn a lâk a, Israel lal Jehu naupa Jehoahaz naupa Joas kuomah mi a tir a, “Hung ta, hmai le hmaisan ngeiah hang inen ei tih,” tiin.

Chun, Israel ram lal Joas chun Juda ram lal Amazia kuoma chun mi a tir a, “Lebanona hlingbukin Lebanona Sidar thing kâwlah mi tirin, ‘I naunu kha ka naupa nuhmei dingin pe rawh,’ tiin; chun , Lebanona ramsahai chu an hung a, hlingbuk chu an chîl thlûk ta a.

A ni luo, ‘Edom chu ka hang hne a’ i ta, i lungrilin uong dingin a dawm sâng che a ni hi; i inah um ṭawk ṭawk el rawh, i sietna ding chu chawksuok ṭâl dîm nîng a ti; nang tlûng i ta, nang ngei chu, chun nang le chun Juda ram chu tlu bawk a tih,” a ta.
Amiruokchu, Amazia chun a ngai chuong naw a, an hmêlmahai kuta a pêk theina dinga Pathien ithaw a nih, Edom pathienhai an lo zawng ta lei khan.
Chuongchun, Israel ram lal Joas chu a hang fe a; Juda rama Beth-semesa chun ama le Juda ram lal Amazia chu hmaisan ngeia chun an inen ta a.
Israel hmaa chun Juda chan chu a se nâwkzuol ta a; mi tin chu mâni puon ina seng an tlânse ta a.

Chun, Israel ram lal Joas chun Jehoahaz naupa Joas naupa Juda ram lal Amazia chu Beth-semesa chun a man a, Jerusalema chun a hung ṭhuoi a, Ephraim tienga dâi kawtkhâra inthawka a kia dâi kawtkhâr chen, tawng za li zet Jerusalem kul chu a vuok chim a.
Chun, Obed-edom le Pathien ina rângkachak le tangkaruo le bûr le bêlhai po po, lal ina ro thilhluhai le, hrên ding salhai le chun a lâk a, Samaria chun a kîr ta a.
Chun, Israel lal Jehoahaz naupa Joas thi hnung chun Juda lal Joas naupa Amazia chu kum sâwmpanga a la dam a.
Chun, Amazia thilthaw danghai, a hmasa le nuhnunghai khawm chu, ngai ta, Israel le Juda lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Amazia chu
Chun, a ruong chu sakawr chungah an hung lâk a, a thlatuhai laiah David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, Juda mihai po po chun Uzzia chu an ṭhuoi a, ama chu kum sâwm paruka upa a na, a pa Amazia hmuna chun lalah an siem ta a.
Eloth chu a bâwl a, Juda rama chun a pêk nâwk a; chu hnunga chun lal chu a thlatuhai lai chun a in ve ta a.
Uzzia chun ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmparuka upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmnga pahni sûng ro a rêl a, a nu hming khawm Jerusalema mi Jekolia a nih.
Ama khawm chun a pa Amazia lo thaw ta ang tak khan
Pathiena thil hmulâwk hrietthiemna nei Zekaria dam sûng po chun Pathien chu zawng dingin ân siem a;
Chun, a fe suok a, Philistin mihai ân dopui a; Gath kul le, Jabne kul le Asdod kul chu a suksiet a; chun, Philistin mihai laia le Asdod biela chun khuohai a siem bawk a.
Chun, Philistin mihai le Arabia mihai Gur-baal le Meunima umhai laia chun Pathien chun a ṭhangpui a.
Chuongchun, Ammon mihai chun Uzzia kuomah sie an hung chawi a, a hming chu Aigupta ram lûtna chen rauin a hung inthang ta a; a hung hrât êm êm el ta si a.
Chunawa khawm, Uzzia chun a Kil dâi Kawtkhâr bula dâm, Ruom dâi Kawtkhâra dâm, chun, kul hung kâwina hmuna dâm khan vêngna in insânghai a bâwl a, sipaihai a sie sip a.

Thlalêra dâm khawm vêngna in insânghai a bâwl a, tuisunsuohai tamtak a cho bawk a, ran ruol tamtak a nei si a, tlângṭhuta le phaizâwla dâm khawm chun; lo hmun ṭhahai le tlâng rama dâm chun huon puhai le grêp hrui enkawltuhai a nei a, huon siem vêl hi a châk zâwngtak a ni si a.
Chunawa khawm Uzzia chun indo mi, sipai pâwl, Hanania kut hnuoi, hotu Maaseia le lekhaziektu Jeielin anni tiema an nizât ang peia, a pâwl peia indoa fe suok hlakhai chu a nei bawk a.
Pahnamhai laia ṭhuoituhai, mi hrât khawkhênghai an rênga an nizât chu sâng hni le za ruk an nih.
Anni kut hnuoi a chun sipai inchûkthiem sa, hmêlma chunga lal chu ṭhangpui dinga, thilthawtheina nasatak le va do thei mihai chu nuoi thum, sâng sari le za nga an nih.
Chun, Uzzia chun an ta dingin, sipai po pohai ta ding chun, phâwhai, feihai, thîr lukhumhai, indona zakuohai, thalngulhai, dêngvira dinga lunghai le a siemrêl vawng a.

Jerusalema chun mi themthiemhai hmusuokin, khâwl lihai, vêngna in insânghaia um ding le, a kia vêngna in insânga ding chun, lunghai le thalhai chu kâp thei dingin, a siem bawk a. Chuongchun, a hming chu nasatakin ân dar a, a suksuol hma po khan chu maktaka ṭhangpuiin a um si a.
Nisienlakhawm, a hung hrât chun, a lungril a hung uong a, khawhlotakin a thaw ta a, a Pathien
Ama hnunga chun thiempu Azaria chu,
Uzzia chu a lunginsen a; riminhnik chu raw dingin riminhnik râwna mei lâkna chu a kuta chun a um zing a; chun, thiempuhai chunga a lunginsen lai chun, riminhnik râwna maichâm sîra,
Chun, thiempu laltak Azaria le thiempu danghai po po chun ama chu an en zing a, chun, ngai ta, a bâwka chun a hung inphâr ta a, chutaka inthawk chun inrangtakin an hnawtsuok ta a; anih,
Chuongchun, lal Uzzia chu a thi ni chen chun ân phâr ta a; ân phâr leiin in hranah a um a;
Chun, Uzzia thilthaw, a hmasa le a nuhnunghai khawm Amoz naupa Zâwlnei Isai chun a ziek a.
Jotham chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmparuk sûng ro a rêl a, a nu hming chu Jerusa, Zadok naunu a nih.
A pa Uzziain a lo thaw ta po po ang tak khan,
Chunawa khawm Juda tlâng rama chun khawpuihai a bâwl a; ramhnuoiahai khawm chun kulbînghai le vêngna inhai dâm a bâwl bawk a.

Ammon thlahai chu ân dopui a, anni a hne ta a. Chun, Ammon thlahai chun chu kum vêk chun tangka talent za, bu phur sîng khat le buṭei phur sîng khat leh an pêk a. Chuong ang lâwma tam chu Ammon thlahai chun ama chu an pêk a, a kum hnina le a kum thumnaa khawm.
Chuongchun, Jotham chu thil a hung thaw thei êm êm a, a lampuihai a Pathien
Chuongchun, Jotham thil thaw danghai, ân donahai po po, a lampuihai po po, ngai ta, Juda le Israel lalhai lekhabua chun ziek an nih.
Rorêl a ṭan chun ama chu kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a na; kum sâwmparuk Jerusalemah ro a rêl a.
Chuongchun, Jotham chu a thlatuhai lai chun a in ta a; ama chu David khawpuia chun an phûm ta a; a naupa Ahaz chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Ahaz chun ro a rêl ṭanin kum sâwmhnia upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmparuk sûng ro a rêl a; a thlatu David ang khan
amiruokchu, Israel lalhai lampui chu a hraw a, Baal ta ding chun milim a sunga sunghai chu a siem bawk a.
Chunawa khawm chun Hinnom naupa ruoma chun riminhnik a raw a ; Israel mipuihai hmaa
Thing hring tin hnuoia le muol haia le, bâwlhmunhaia chun riminhnik a raw a, ân thâwi bawk a.
Remalia naupa Peka chun Judai ramah, mi hrât khawkhêng ṭhieu nuoi khat le sîng hni ni khat sûngin a that a; an thlatuhai Pathien
Chun, Ephraima mi thil thawtheitak Zikri chun lal naupa Maaseia le insûng rorêltu Azrikam le lal dawttu Elkana chu a that bawk a.

Chun, Israel mipuihai chun an unauhai chu sal nuoi hni, nuhmei le naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai leh an ṭhuoi hmang a; chun, râllâk sum tamtak an lâk bawk a; chu râllâk sum chu Samariaa chun an hung lâk a.
Amiruokchu,
Tuhin Juda mipuihai le Jerusalema mihai chu suoknuhai, suokpahaia siem in lungril a na; amiruokchu, in Pathien
Chuleiin, tuhin mi lo ngai unla, in unauhai ngei sala in hung ṭhuoihai, salhai chu tirkîr nâwk vawng ro,

Chun, Ephraim mihai laia ṭhuoitu ṭhenkhathai, Johanan naupa Azaria hai, Mesillemoth naupa Berekia hai, Sallum naupa Jehizkia hai, Hadlai naupa Amasa hai chun indonaa inthawka hunghai chu an lo dang a,
an kuoma chun, “Hitaka hin salhai chu in hung ṭhuoi ding a ni nawh: ei bawsietna le ei suolnahai belsa dingin,
Chuongchun, inrâlthuomhai chun salhai le râllâk sumhai chu hotuhai hmaa le mipui inkhâwmhai hmaa chun an mâksan ta a.

Chun, khieng an hming hrila umhai khi an tho a, salhai chu an ṭhuoi a, râllâk thilhai chu anni laia saruoka umhai chu an insiltir a, anni chu an inthuom a, kekawk an inbuntir a, fâk ding le dâwn ding an pêk a, hriek an nâl a, anni laia hrât nawhai po po chu sabengtung chungah an inchuongtir a, an unauhai kuomah, intûm khawpui Jerikoa chun an hung ṭhuoi ta a; chun, chutaka inthawk chun Samariaa chun an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chuong hun laia chun lal Ahaz chun Assuria lal chu ama ṭhangpui dinga fiel dingin mi a tir a.
Edom mihai chu an hung nâwk a, Juda ram chu an hung rûn a, salah an ṭhuoi tâwl si a.

Philistin mihai khawma Juda ram Simtienga phaia khawpuihai chu an hung rûn a, Beth-semes hai, Aijalon hai, Gederoth hai, Soko hai an khawperhai leh, Timna le a khawperhai leh, Gimzo le a khawperhai leh an lâk a, chuongahai chun an um a.
Israel lal
Assuria lal Tiglath-pileser chu a kuomah a hung a, ama chu sukdet nêkin a sukrimsi hle a.
Ahaz chun
Chuongchun, hi lal Ahaz hi, a lunginzîng hun laia khawm chun

Damaska mihai, ama hung rûntuhai pathienhai chu a biek a, ama chun, “Suria lalhai pathienhaiin anni a ṭhangpui leiin, kei khawm an mi ṭhangpui theina dingin an kuomah inthâwi ka tih,” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, ama sietna le Israel ram sûng po po sietna a ni lem ta a.
Chun, Ahaz chun Pathien ina bûr le bêlhai chu a lâk khâwm a, Pathien ina bûr le bêlhai chu a vuoknawi vawng a;
Chun, Juda khawpui hmun tamtaka chun Pathien danghai kuoma riminhnik rawna dingin bâwlhmunhai a siem a, a thlatuhai Pathien
A thilthaw danghai chu, a nungchang tinrênghai leh, a hmasa le nuhnung khawm chu, ngai ta, Juda le Israel lalhai lekhabua chun ziek an nih.

Chun, Ahaz chu a thlatuhai laia chun a in ta a, khawpuiah, Jerusalema chun an phûm ta a; Israel lalhai an phûmna hlak thlâna chun an inzâl ve naw a; chun, a naupa Hezekia chun ama aiins ro a rêl ta a.
Hezekia chu kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a niin ro a rêl ṭan a; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmhni pakuo sûng ro a rêl a; a nu hming chu Abija, Zekaria naunu a nih.

A rorêl a kum khatna, a thla khatnaa chun

an kuomah a hril a, “Mi lo ngai ta u, nangni Levi mihai; tuhin nangni le nangni insukthieng unla, in thlatuhai Pathien
Ei thlatuhai khan an lo bawsiet a,

Chuleiin,
Ngai ta u, ei thlatuhai chu kâwlhnâma suktlâwm an ni ta a, ei naupasalhai, ei naunuhmeihai le ei nuhmeihai chu hi lei hin salah an um ta a.

Ka naupasalhai, tuhin ngaitha naw ro; riminhnikhai raw a, a rawngbâwltuhai nia, ama rawngbâwl ding le, a hmaa ngîr dingin

thiempuhai chun an that a, an thisen chun maichâm chunga chun suol thilinhlân chu an inhlân ta a, Israel mi po po ta dinga intlanna siempêk dingin pumrawhmang thilinhlân le suol thilinhlân chu Israel mi po po ta dinga thaw ding a nih tiin lal chun thu a lo pêk ta si a.

Hezekia chun Israel Pathien

Chuongchun, dâkpuhai chu lal thupêk ang takin lal le a hotuhaia inthawk chun lekhahai chawiin Juda le Israel ram sûng po poa chun an fe ta a; “Nangni Israel mihai, nangni Assuria lalhai kuta inthawk a suokdawkhai a la um sunhai tieng hi a hung ngha kîr theina dingin, Israel le, Isaak le Abraham Pathien,
Nangni chu in thlatuhai Pathien

kuom tieng in nghakîr nâwk chun, in unauhai le in thlahaiin sala ṭhuoituhai hmaa chun lunginsietna dawng an ta, hi rama hin hung nâwk an tih, ama kuomah in kîr phawt chun
Chun, dâkpuhai chu khaw tina Ephraim le Manasse ram sûng po po Zebulun chenin an fe pei a; amiruokchu, hmusitin an lo nuisan a, an lo nuiêu a.
Nisienlakhawm, Aser le Manasse le Zebulun hnama mi ṭhenkhat chu an insukhnuoi a, Jerusalema chun an hung a.
Chun, Juda rama khawm chun
Chun, a thla hninaa chun, mipui nasatak el chu, chawlṭhanglo bei ruoiṭhe chu hmang dingin Jerusalema chun an inkhâwm ta a.

Pathien mi Mosie dân ang peiin an indawtzie ang peiin an hmuna chun an ngîr a; thiempuhai chun thisen Levi mihai kuta inthawka an hmuhai chu an the a.

hmun inthieng inthien dân anga, thieng lo khawm ni sienla, Pathien, a thlatuhai Pathien
Chuongchun,

Juda ram lal Hezekia chun mipui inkhâwmhai chu inhlân dingin bâwngchal sâng khat le, berâm sâng sari a pêk a; chun, hotuhai chun mipuihai chu bâwngchal sâng khat le berâm sîng khat an pêk bawk a, thiempu tam tawk tak el chu an insukthieng bawk a.

Chun,
Hi ringumna le hieng thilhai thaw a ni hnunga hin Assuria lal Sennakerib chu a hung a; Juda ram a hung lût a, khawpui kulneihai chu ân huol a, ama ta dinga hne el dingin a ngaituoh a.

khawpui puotienga tuikhur tuihai chu hrukping dingin a mi thilthawtheihai le a upahai chu a rawn ta a; chun, ama chu an ṭhangpui ta a.

Chun, mipuihai chunga chun indona hotuhai chu a ruot a, khawpui dâi kawtkhâr bula hmun âwl liena chun ama kuomah a ko khâwm tâwl a; an kuoma chun thlamuongumtakin thu a hril a,
“Hrât unla, insukhuoi ro, Assuria lal lei chun ṭi naw unla, beidawng bawk naw ro; ama kuoma um mipui nasatakhai lei khawm chun, ama kuoma um nêk chun eini kuoma um chu a hrât lem si a;
ama kuoma chun tisaa sipai pâwl an na, amiruokchu, eini kuoma chu

Hi hnunga hin Assuria lal Sennakerib chun Jerusalemah a siehlaw a hung tir a (ama chu Lakis tlung hma el khan a um a, a sipaihai po po khawm ama kuoma chun an um a) Juda lal Hezekia le Jerusalema Juda umhai po po kuoma chun a hung tir a.
“Assuria lal Sennakerib chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Jerusalem lâk chu ieng am a na in ring nawna?
Hezekia hin, Assuria lal kuta inthawk chun

Hi Hezekia bawk hin bâwlhmunhai le maichâmhai chu a lâkhmangin, Juda ram le Jerusalema mihai chu, maichâm pakhat hmaa chun Pathien chibai bûk in ta, a chunga chun riminhnik khawm in raw ding a nih, tia thu pe kha?

Kei le ka thlatuhai chun ram tin, hnam tin chunga chun ieng angin am kan thaw hlaka ti in hriet naw am a nih? Hieng ramhaia hnamhai pathienhai hin ka kuta inthawkin an ram ieng kawng khawmin an sanhim thei hlak am a nih?

Ka puhaiin an lo sukbohmang letdêr ta hnamhai pathien po po lai chun tu am ka kuta inthawka a mihai sansuok thei ding a um a, in Pathien khawm chun ka kuta inthawkin a sansuok theina bîk ding cheu chu?

Chuleiin, tuhin Hezekia hin hlêm naw raw se cheu, hieng ang kawng hin thlêmthlu bawk naw raw se cheu, nangni khawma ring hrim hrim naw ro; ka thlatuhai le keima kuta inthawk hin, tu ram amanih, tu hnam amani pathien chun a mihai chu a sansuok thei hrim hrim ngai si naw a; ka kuta inthawk hin in Pathien chun a va sansuok thei âwm naw cheu de aw!’ ” tiin.

Israel Pathien

Nisienlakhawm, ama chunga ditsakna thaw ang huin Hezekia chun a ngaisak nâwk ta naw a; a lungril chu ân ngaisâng si a; chuleichun, ama chunga chun lunginsenna chu a um a, Jerusalem le Juda ram chunga khawm chun.
Amiruokchu, Hezekia chun a lungril chapona chu ân sîr nâwk a, ân sukhnuoi a; ama le Jerusalema umhai le chun; chuongchun, Hezekia dam sûng khan chu

Hezekia chun ropuina le hausakna nasatak el chu a nei a; tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, lung mantam dâm, riminhnik dâm, phawhai dâm, bûr le bêl ṭha tinrênghai ta dingin siekhâwmna inhai ama ta dingin a siem a;
hriek le uoin le bu hung punghai dinga siekhâwmna inhai dâm, ran ruolhai ta dinga inhai le, sa chi tinrêng po po ta dinga inhai a siem bawk a.
Chunawa khawm chun bâwng ruol dâm, berâm ruol dâm, khawpuihai dâm tamtak el a nei bawk a, Pathien chun thil tamtak el ama chu a pêk si a.
Hi Hezekia bawk hin Gihon tuikhur hnâr sakhnung lem kha a hrukping a, David khawpui thlangtieng panga khan a lâk thlâk a. Hezekia chu a sinthaw po poa chun a hlawtling pei a.

Nisienlakhawm, Babulon lalhai, chu rama thilmakhai chu indawn suok dinga a kuoma mi hungtirhai chungthua chun, a lungrila umhai po po chu a hriet theina dingin, fie dingin Pathien chun ama chu a thlathlam a.
Hezekia thilthaw danghai le, a thilthaw ṭhathai chu, ngai ta, Israel le Juda lalhai lekhabua chun, Amoz naupa zâwlnei Isai thil hmulâwkhaia chun ziek a nih.

Manasse chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmpahnia upa a na, Jerusalema chun kum sâwmnga panga sûng ro a rêl a.

Chuongchun, rimsitaka a hung um huna chun
Chun, ama kuoma chun a ṭawngṭai a, ama chu dawnsakin a um a, a hnina chu ngaiin a um a, ama ramah, Jerusalema chun hung ṭhuoi nâwkin a um ta a. Chun, Manasse chun

Chun, hi hnunga hin Nga dai Kawtkhâr lûtna, phairuom a, Gihon sîr thlang a, David khawpui dang a puo lema chun kul a bâwl a; Ophel tieng a sukkuol a, insângtakin a suksâng a; chun, Juda rama khawpui kul neiahai chun hotu thilthawtheitakhai a sie tâwl a.
Chun, Pathien danglamhai le, milimhai chu
Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chu bâwlhmunhaiah an lân thâwi ta rawp a chu,
Manasse thilthaw danghai le a Pathien kuoma a ṭawngṭaina dâm le Israel Pathien,

A ṭawngṭaina dâm, ama Pathienin a lo ngaisak dânhai dâm, a suolna po po le a bawsietna po po le, bâwlhmun a siemna hmunhai le, ama le ama ân sukhnuoi hmaa Asera a siem dâm le, milim ker a siemhai thu chu, ngai ta, Hozai chanchinbua chun ziek an nih.
Chuongchun, Manasse chu a thlatuhai lai a in ta a, ama ina ngei chun an phûm ta a, a naupa Amon chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Amon chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pahnia upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum hni sûng ro a rêl a.
A pa Manasse ang bawk khan,
A pa Manasse ân sukhnuoi ta ang khan ama hi chu
Chun, a siehlawhai chun ama chu an phierrûk a, ama in sûnga ngei chun an that ta a.
Amiruokchu, chu rama mihai chun lal Amon phierrutuhai po po an that a; chun, chu rama mipuihai chun a naupa Josia chu ama aia chun lalah an siem ta a.
Rorêl a ṭan chun Josia chu kum rieta upa a na, Jerusalema chun kum sâwmthum pakhat sûng ro a rêl a.

Naupang a la ni laiin, a rorêl a kum rietnaa inthawk chun a thlatu David Pathien chu a zawng ṭan a; chun, kum sâwmpahninaa chun Juda ram le Jerusalem chu Asera dâm, milim a kera kerhai dâm, milim a sunga sunghai dâm le bâwlhmun po poa inthawk chun a sukthieng ṭan ta a.

Ama hmaihmaa ngei chun Baal maichâmhai chu a sukchim a; nisa milimhai, chuonghai chung daia umhai chu a phûr thlûk a; Asera le milim a kera kerhai le a sunga sunghai chu a vuok nâwi vawng a, pilvutin a siem a, an kuoma lo inthâwi hlaktuhai thlân chungahai chun a phul a.
Chun, thiempuhai ruhai chu an maichâmhai chunga chun a raw a, Juda ram le Jerusalem chu a sukthieng a.
Chun, Manasse le Ephraim le Simeon khawpuihaia, Naphtali chenin, an sietna hmun vêlahai chun chuong ang chun a thaw bawk a.

Chun, maichâmhai chu a sukchim a, Asera chu, milim a kera kerhai le chun a vuok nâwi vawng a, Israel ram po poa inthawk chun nisa milimhai po po chu a phûr thlûk vawng a, Jerusalema chun a kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, chuonga ram le in chu a sukthieng laia a rorêlna a kum sâwm pariet kum chun, Azalia naupa Saphan hai, khawpui sûng rorêltu Maaseia hai, Joahaz naupa Joa, thil inchiktuhai chu a Pathien

Thiempu laltak Hilkia kuoma chun an hung a, Levi mi kawtkhâr vêngtuhaiin Manasse le Ephraim mihai kuta inthawk le, Israel mi a la um sun po poa inthawk dâm, Juda le Benjamin mi po poa inthawk dâm, Jerusalema chêngtuhaia inthawka an lâk khâwmhai, Pathien ina sum hung lâka umhai kha, an hung pêk a.
Chun, chu chu
in bâwltuhai le thingrem siemtuhai kuoma lung saksahai, thing a zawmna dinghai inchâwkna ding le, Juda lalin a lo suksiet tah in bâwlna dinga thingtumhai siemna dingin.

Mihai chun sin chu ringumtakin an thaw a; annihai enkawltuhai chu Merari naupasalhai, Levi mi Jahath le Obadia hai; Kohath mi naupasalhai Zekaria le Mesullam hai chu an nih; Levi mihai, thil ri sutna thilhaia themthiem taphawthai chu.
Chun, phurrik phurtuhai enkawltuhai khawm an ni bawk a, rawngbâwlna sin chu kawng ieng anga khawm an enkawl pei a; chun, Levi mihai chu ziektuhai, hotuhai le kawtkhâr vêngtuahai an um a.
Chun,
Chun, Hilkia chun a dawn a, lekhaziektu Saphan kuoma chun, “
Saphan chun lekha chu lal kuoma chun a chawi a; Saphan chun lal kuoma chun thu a hung intlun nâwk a, “I siehlaw hai kuoma thaw dinga pêk ang khan an thaw a;
Chun, ziektu Saphan chun lal kuoma chun, “Thiempu Hilkia chun lekhabu a mi lo pêk a,” a ta. Chun, chutaka chun Saphan chun lal hmaa chun a tiem ta a.
Chun, lal chun dân thuhai chu a hriet chun a puonhai a keithlêr a.
Chun, lal chun Hilkia hai, Saphan naupa Ahikam hai, Mika naupa Abdon hai le lekhaziektu Saphan le lal siehlaw Asaia chu thu a pêk a,
“Fe unla, kei le, Juda le Israel rama mâksana la umhai ta ding hin lekhabu hmu suoka um thu ang khan

Chuongchun, Hilkia le lalin a tirhai po po chu, silfên vêngtu Hasra naupa Tokath naupa Sallum nuhmei, zâwlneinu Hulda kuoma chun an fe ta a, (chuong lai chun Jerusalema vêng pahninaa chun a um a nih), a kuoma chun chuong thua chun thu an hril ta a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Israel Pathien

kei an mi lo nghatsan ta a; an kut sinthawhaia lunginsen dinga an mi chawktho theina dingin pathien danghai kuoma chun riminhnikhai an raw a; chuleiin, ka lunginsenna chu hi hmun chunga hin bunthlâk a ni ta a, sukre el ni ta naw nih,’ tiin.
Amiruokchu, Juda lal,

hi hmun le a sûnga chênghai chungthua, thuhai chu i hriet phinga i lungril ân nêm a, nangma le nangma chu Pathien hmaa chun în sukhnuoi leiin le, i puonhai i keithlêr a, ka hmaa chun i ṭap leiin kei khawma ka hung hriet ve che a nih.

Ngai ta, i thlatuhai kuomah infetir ka ti che a, i thlâna chun thlamuongtakin fêng i ta, hi hmun le a sûnga umhai chunga thil ṭha naw ka hung intlungtir dinghai po po chu i mithaiin hmu naw nih a tih,’ ti ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, lal chu, thu chu an hung intlun nâwk a.
Chun, lal chun mi a tir a, Jerusalem le Juda rama upahai po po chu a ko khâwm ta a.
Chun, lal chu
Chun, lal chu a hmuna chun a ngîr a,
Chun, Benjamin le Jerusalema umhai po po chu chuong anga um dingin a ti a. Jerusalema chênghai chun an thlatu Pathien, Pathien thuthlung ang chun an thaw a.
Chun, Josia chun Israel mihai ihluo ram po poa inthawk chun tirdakumna po po chu a lâk hmang a, Israel rama umhai po po
Josia chun
Thiempuhai chu an sinthawahai
Nangni khawm Israel lal David ziek ang le, a naupa Solomon ziek ang tak khan an pahnam ang peiin in pâwl bi chu insiem unla.
Chun, Levi hnam inṭhe dân ang pei le, in unau mipuihai pahnam inṭhe dân ang pei chun hmun inthienga chun ngîr unla.
Chun, fekân ruoiṭhena ding chu that unla, nangni le nangni chu inhlân thieng ro; Mosie hmanga
Chun, Josia chun chu hnam mipui, a umhai po kuoma chun ran ruol laia mi berâmte dâm, kêlte dâm sîng thum le bâwngchal sâng thum fekân ruoiṭhenaa inhlân dingin a pêk a; hi hi lal suma mi a nih.

Chun, a hotuhai chun Levi mihai le thiempuhai le mipui kuoma chun nuom thua thilinhlân dinghai chu an pêk bawk a. Hilkia le Zekaria le Jehiel, Pathien in rorêltuhai chun thiempuhai kuoma chun fekân ruoiṭhena dingin ran chîn sâng hni le za ruk le, bâwngchal za thum an pêk a.

Konania le a unauhai Semaia le Nethanel le, Levi mihai hotuhai Hasabia le, Jeiel le, Jozabad chun Levi mihai kuomah fekân ruoiṭhenaa thilinhlân dingin ran ruol chîn sâng nga le bâwngchal za nga an pêk bawk a.
Chuongchun, rawngbâwlna chu buotsai a ni ta a, lal thupêk ang tak chun thiempuhai chu an hmuna chun an ngîr a, Levi mihai chu an pâwl dân ang peiin an thaw ta a.
Chun, fekân ruoiṭhena ding chu an that a, thiempuhai chun an kutin thisen chu an the a, Levi mihai chun an inhlip a.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu an sie hmang a, Mosie lekhabua ziek anga

Chun, fekân ruoiṭhena ding chu dân ang peiin meiah an em hmin a, chun, thilinhlân inthienghai sa kha chu bêlhai le, bêl bau ûmhai le, bêl indarhaiin an suong a, mi po pohai kuoma chun inhmâwtakin an fepui ta a.

Chun, chu hnunga chun anni ta ding le thiempuhai ta ding chun an buotsai ta a; Aron naupasalhai thiempuhai chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân le a thâuhai chu zân chenin an buoipui ta a; chuleiin, Levi mihai chun anni le Aron naupasal thiempuhai ta ding chun an buotsai el a nih.

Chun, David le Asaph le Heman le lal zâwlnei Jeduthun thupêk angin hlasaktuhai, Asaph naupasalhai chu an hmuna chun an um a; chun, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu dâi kawtkhâr tina chun an um bawk a; an sinthawhai chu an mâksan a ṭûl naw a, an unau Levi mihai chun an ta dingin an buotsaipêk leiin.
Chuongchun, lal Josia thupêk angin,
Chun, Israel mipui chutaka umhai chun chu nia chun fekân ruoiṭhe chu an hmang a, chawlṭhanglo bei ruoiṭhe chu ni sari an hmang bawk a.

Zâwlnei Samuel hun laia inthawk ta khan chuonga fekân ruoiṭhe chu Israel rama lal tu khawma Josiain a hmang ang hin an hmang ngai naw a, thiempuhai le Levi mihai le, Israel le Juda chutaka umhai po po le, Jerusalema chênghai khawma an hmang ngai naw a.
Josia rorêl a kum sâwmparietnaa chun a nih a hi fekân ruoiṭhe hi hmanga a um chu.
Hieng po po hnunga hin, Josia chun biekin chu a siem ṭha zo chun Aigupta lal Neko chu Euphrates vadung panga Karkemis chu rûn dingin a hang fe a; Josia chu ama tuok ding chun a fe suok ta a.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chun aiâwtuhai a hung tir a, a kuomah, “Nang Juda lal, nang hi iengtin am ka thaw ding che a na? Vawisûn hi nang do ding chein ka hung naw a, amiruokchu, indona ka neipuihai chu do dingin a ni lem ka hung; chun, Pathien chun inhmaw dingin thu a mi pêk a, Pathien chu sukbuoi lo dingin insûm hrâm la, ama chu ka kuomah a um a, sukbohmang rawi a ti che,” tiin.

Nisienlakhawm, Josia chun ama chu a kîrsan chuong naw a, ama chu a do ngei theina dingin, ân sukdanglam a; Pathien baua inthawka Neko thu chu a ngaisak naw a, ama chu Megiddo ruoma do ding chun a suok ta a.
Chun, thal kâp mihai chun Josia chu an kâp a, chun, lal chun a siehlaw kuoma chun, “Ka hliem nasa hle el si a, mi sie hmang ro khai,” a ta.

Chuongchun, a siehlawhai chun sakawr tawlailîra inthawk chun an lâk suok a, a sakawr tawlailîr danga chun an sie a, Jerusalemah an hung ṭhuoi ta a; a thi a, a thlatuhai thlân ina chun phûmin a um ta a, Juda le Jerusalem po poin Josia chu an sûn a.

Chun, Jeremia khawm chun Josia chu a sûn a; vawisûn ni chen hin, hlasaktu pasal le hlasaktu nuhmeihai khawm chun Josia an sûnna hla chu an lân sam a; Israel rama chun thupêkhaiah an siem a, chuong chu, ngai ta, sûnnaa chun ziek an nih.
Josia thilthaw danghai le, a thilthaw ṭhathai chu,
a thilthawhai a hmasatak le a nuhnungtak chu, ngai ta, Juda le Israel ram lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a nih.
Chun, chu ram mipuihai chun Josia naupa Jehoahaz chu an ṭhuoi a, a pa aia chun Jerusalema lalah an siem ta a.
Jehoahaz chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pathuma upa a na; Jerusalema chun thla thum sûng ro a rêl a.
Aigupta lal chun ama chu Jerusalema chun ân lalna a suktlâwm a, an ram chu rângkachak talent khat le tangkaruo talent za khat ân chawitir a.

Chun, Aigupta lal chun a unaupa Eliakim chu Jerusalem le Juda ram chunga chun lalah a siem a; a hming chu Jehoiakim in a thleng ta a. Chun, Neko chun a unaupa Jehoahaz chu a ṭhuoi a, Aigupta ramah a fepui ta a.
Jehoiakim chu rorêl a ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pangaa upa a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmpakhat sûng ro a rel a; a Pathien
ama chu doin, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chu a hung a, thîrkawlhaiin a khuop a, Babulona ṭhuoi dingin.
Nebukadnezzar chun
Jehoiakim thil thaw danghai le, thil tirdakum a thawhai le, amaa hmua umhai chu, ngai ta, Juda le Israel ram lalhai lekhabua chun ziek a nih; chun, Jehoiakin, a naupa chun ama aia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Jehoiakin chu rorêl a ṭan chun kum rieta upa a na, thla thum le ni sâwm sûng Jerusalema chun ro a rêl a.
a Pathien
Chu nawa khawm chun, khawhri be mihai tirdakumna po po angin mipuihai le thiempu lalhai khawm chun nasatakin an bawsiet a; Jerusalema
A umna hmun le a mihai chu a lunginsiet leiin, an thlatuhai Pathien
nisienlakhawm, Pathien tirkohai chu an nuisan a, a thu chu an hmusit a, a zâwlneihai chu an nuiêu a, sukṭhat nâwk theina um ta lo hiel khawpa, mipuihai chunga

Chuleichun, an chunga chun Kaldai lal a hung tir a, anni chun hmun inthienghaia chun an tlangvâlhai dâm kâwlhnâmin an that a, tlangvâl amanih, nunghâkhai amanih, upa amanih, tar amani chunga khawm lunginsietna an nei naw a, chuongchun, an rêng chun a kutah a pêk a.
Pathien ina bûr le bêlhai, a lien le chînhai khawm,
Chun, Pathien in chu an raw a, Jerusalem kul chu an vuokchim a, chutaka a lal inhai po po chu meiin an raw a, chutaka bûr le bêl ṭhahai po po chu an suksiet bawk a.
Kâwlhnâma inthawka lo suok tahai chu Babulon tieng a ṭhuoi a; Persia ram rorêl a ni chen khan anni chu a nauhai le ama siehlawhai an na;
chu ram chun a châwlni a hmang hmakhat chu Jeremia baua
Persia lal Kura inlal kum khatnaa chun, Jeremia baua
“Persia lal Kura chun hieng ang hin a tih, Vâna Pathien
Persia lal Kura
“Persia lal Kura chun hieng ang hin a hril, ‘Leihnuoia ram po pohai chu
A mi po pohai, nangni laia mi tukhawm kuomah a Pathien chu um raw se! Juda rama Jerusalema chun hang fe sienla,
Chun, mi tukhawm ân pêmna hmun khâwlaia khawm mâksan
Chun, Juda le Benjamin pahnam luhai le thiempuhai le, Levi mihai, Jerusalema um
Chun, an vêla mi po pohai chun, inhâwktaka an inhlân po po bâka chun, tangka dâm, rângkachak dâm, thuomhnawhai dâm, ranhai dâm le thil hlutakhaiin an kuthai chu an sukhrât a.
Lal Kura khawm chun
Persia lal Kura chun, chuonghai ngei chu sum enkawltu Mithredath kutin a hung lâk suok a, Juda ram lal Sesbazzar kuoma chun a tiempêk ta a.
Chun, hi hi chuonghai nizât chu a nih; rângkachak thlêng lien sâwmthum, tangkaraw thlêng lien sâng khat, chemtê sâwmhni pakuo;
rângkachak no sâwmthum, tangkaraw no a chi dang za li le sâwm khat le bûr le bêl dang hrim hrim sâng khat leh.
Rângkachak le tangkaraw bûr le bêl po pohai chu sâng nga le za li an nih. Hienghai po po hi Sesbazzar chun, sal intânghai Babulona inthawka Jerusalema an hung ṭhuoi ruol chun a hung lâk ve a nih.
Hienghai hi chu ram mihai, sala ṭhuoihmanga um, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin Babulon tienga a ṭhuoi hung suok nâwk a, Juda le Jerusalema mâni khuo tieng senga hung kîr nâwkhai chu an nih;
chuonghai chu Zerubbabel, Jesua, Nehemia, Seraia, Reelaia, Mordekai, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum le Baana hai ruolin an hung ve a. Israel chi patling zât chu:
Paros thlahai chu sâng hni za khat sâwmsari pahni an nih.
Sephatia thlahai chu za thum sâwmsari pahni.
Ara thlahai chu za sari sâwmsari panga.
Jesua le Joab thlaa mi, Pahathmoab thlahai chu sâng hni za riet sâwmpahni.
Elam thlahai chu sâng khat za hni sâwmnga pali.
Zattu thlahai chu za kuo sâwmli panga.
Zakkai thlahai chu za sari sâwmruk.
Bani thlahai chu za ruk sâwmli pathum.
Bebai thlahai chu za ruk sâwmhni pathum.
Azgad thlahai chu sâng khat za hni sâwmhni pahni.
Adonikam thlahai chu za ruk sâwmruk paruk.
Bigvai thlahai chu sâng hni sâwmnga paruk.
Adin thlahai chu za li sâwmnga pali.
Hezekia thla Ater thlahai chu sâwmkuo pariet.
Bezai thlahai chu za thum sâwmhni pathum.
Jora thlahai chu za khat sâwm pahni.
Hasum thlahai chu za hni sâwmhni pathum.
Gibbar thlahai chu sâwmkuo panga.
Bethlehem thlahai chu za khat sâwmhni pathum.
Netopha mihai chu sâwmnga paruk.
Anathoth mihai chu za khat sâwmhni pariet.
Azmaveth thlahai chu sâwmli pahni.
Kiriath-arim, Kephira le Beeroth thlahai chu za sari sâwmli pathum.
Rama le Geba thlahai chu za ruk sâwmhni pakhat.
Mikmas mihai chu za khat sâwmhni pahni.
Bethel le Ai mihai chu za hni sâwmhni pathum.
Nebo thlahai chu sâwmnga pahni.
Magbis thlahai chu za khat sâwmnga paruk.
Elam mi dang thlahai chu sâng khat za hni sâwmnga pali.
Harim thlahai chu za thum sâwmhni.
Lod le Hadid le Ono thlahai chu za sari sâwmhni panga.
Jeriko thlahai chu za thum sâwmli panga.
Senaa thlahai chu sang thum za ruk sâwmthum.
Jesua sûngkuo, Jedaia thla thiempuhai chu za kuo sâwmsari pathum.
Immer thlahai chu sâng khat sâwmnga pahni.
Pashhur thlahai chu sâng khat za hni sâwmli pasari.
Harim thlahai chu sâng khat sâwm pasari.
Hodavia thlaa Kadmiel le Jesua thla Levi mihai chu sâwmsari pali.
Asaph thla, hlasaktuhai za khat sâwmhni pariet.
Kawtkhâr vêngtuhai thlahai: Sallum thlahai, Ater thlahai, Talmon thlahai, Akkub thlahai, Hatita thlahai, Sobai thlahai leh an rêngin za khat sâwmthum pakuo.
Nethinim mihai: Ziha thlahai, Hasupha thlahai, Tabbaoth thlahai;
Keros thlahai, Siaha thlahai, Padon thlahai;
Lebana thlahai, Hagaba thlahai, Akkub thlahai;
Hagab thlahai, Samlai thlahai, Hanan thlahai;
Giddel thlahai, Gahar thlahai, Reaia thlahai;
Rezin thlahai, Nekoda thlahai, Gazzam thlahai;
Uzza thlahai, Pasea thlahai, Besai thlahai;
Asna thlahai, Meunim thlahai, Nephisim thlahai;
Bakbuk thlahai, Hakupha thlahai, Harhur thlahai;
Bazluth thlahai, Mehida thlahai, Harsa thlahai;
Barkos thlahai, Sisera thlahai, Tema thlahai;
Nezia thlahai, Hatipha thlahai.
Solomon siehlawhai thlahai chu: Sotai thlahai, Hassophereth thlahai, Peruda thlahai;
Jaala thlahai, Darkon thlahai, Giddel thlahai;
Sephatia thlahai, Hattil thlahai, Pokereth-hazzebaim thlahai, Ami thlahai leh.
Nethinim mi po po le Solomon siehlawhai thlahai po po chu za thum sâwmkuo pahni an nih.

Chun, hienghai hi Telmelaa inthawk dâm, Tel-harsaa inthawk dâm, Cheruba inthawk dâm, Addana inthawk dâm, Immera inthawk dâma hang fe ve a; amiruokchu, Israel mi an ni le ni naw, an pahnam amanih, an chi amanih inentir thei lohai chu an nih;
Delaia thlahai, Tobia thlahai, Ne- koda thlahai, za ruk sâwmnga pahni.
Chun, thiempuhai thlahai: Habaia thlahai, Hakkoz thlahai, Barzillai, Gilead mi Barzillai naunuhmei nuhmeia neia anni hming put sâwngtu thlahai le chun.
Thlatu bul suinahaia chun an hming ziek an zawng a; nisienlakhawm, an hmu suok thei naw a, chuleiin, anni chu tling lova umah ngai an na, thiempu sina chun thîm an nih.
Ram awptu khawma an kuoma chun, thiempu chu Urim le Thummim
Mipui po po chu an rêngin sîng khat sâng hni za thum sâwmruk an nih;
chunawa chun an rawngbâwltu nuhmeihai le pasalhai chu sâng sari za thum sâwmthum pasari an na; chun, hlasak mi nuhmei le pasal khawm za hni an nei bawk a.
An sakawrhai chu za sari sâwmthum paruk an ni a; an sabengtung lien chi chu za hni sâwmli panga a ni a;
sanghâwngseihai chu za li sâwmthum panga; sabengtunghai chu sâng ruk za sari sâwmhni an nih.
Chun, an pahnama lu ṭhenkhathai chun, Jerusalema um,
sinthawna tienga sum ina chun an thei ang tâwk sengin an pêk a, rângkachak darik sîng ruk sâng khat, tangkaruo mane sâng nga bûk le thiempu silfên za khat leh an pêk a.
Chuongchun, thiempuhai, Levi mihai le chi ṭhenkhathai
Chun, thla sarina a hung tlung a, Israel mihai chu khuohaia an um phing chun, mipuihai chu inthuruoltak elin Jerusalema chun an inkhâwm ta a.

Chun, Jozadak naupa Jesua le a unau thiempuhai, Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le a unauhai le chun an tho a, Pathien mi Mosie dâna ziek angin, chutaka chun pumrawhmang thilinhlânna dingin Israel Pathien maichâm chu an siem ta a.
Chuongchun, maichâm chu ân ṭhutnaa chun an inṭhut ta a; chuong rama mihai lei chun an chunga chun ṭitna chu a um si a; chuongchun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu chutaka chun
Chun, bâwkte ruoiṭhe khawm chu an nei a, zieka a um angin, thupêk ang peiin, ni tina thaw ding ṭul ang pei chun, ni tinin pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu an inhlân ta a;
chu hnunga chun pumrawhmang thilinhlân châmchi le, thla thara sukthieng ta po pohai le, mi tinin
thla sarina ni khat nia chun

Lung sut mihai le themthiemhai kuoma chun sum an pêk a; chun, Persia lal Kuraa inthawka phalna an nei ang peiin, Lebanona inthawka tuisuorieta Joppa chena Sidar thinghai an hung lâkna dingin, Zidon mihai le Tura mihai kuoma chun bu le dâwn ding le hriek dâm an pêk bawk a.

Chun, Jerusalema Pathien ina an hung chin a kum hninaa, thla hninaa chun, Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le, Jozadak naupa Jesua le an unau dang thiempuhai le, Levi mihai le, sala intâng suoka Jerusalema hung po pohai chun an ṭan a; Levi mihai chu kum sâwmhnia upa le a chung tieng pohai chu

Chun, Jesua le a naupasalhai le a unauhai le, Kadmiel le a naupasalhai, Juda naupasalhai chu Pathien ina sinthaw mihai enkawl ding chun an tho ta a. Henadad naupasalhai le an naupahai le an unauhai Levi mihai le chun an tho ve ta a.
Chun, in bâwltuhai chun

Amiruokchu, thiempuhai, Levi mihai an pahnamhai laia mi tamtak, mi upahai chu in hmasa lo hmutuhai chu, an mithmu ngeia chu in lungphûm chu phûm a lo ni chun rawl inringtak elin an ṭap ta a, mi danghai ruok chu lâwmin an khêk a;
chuongchun, mipuihai chun lâwma khêkri le mipuihai ṭap ri chu an ṭhehran thei naw hiel a; mipuihai chu ri nasatakin an khêk tâwl a, ram hlataka inthawk khawma ân hriet hiel el si a.
Juda le Benjamin hai hmêlmahai chun sal intâng suokhai chun Israel Pathien,

Zerubbabel le pahnama upahai kuoma chun anni chu an hung a, an kuomah, “Nangni hi bâwlpui vêng kan ti cheu, in thaw ang bawkin in Pathien hi a ni sia kan zawng chu; chuongchun, Assuria lal Esar-haddon, hitienga keini mi hung ṭhuoitu huna inthawk ta kha ama kuoma chun kan inthâwi hlak tah a nih,” an ti a.

Nisienlakhawm, Zerubbabel le Jesua le Israel pahnam upa danghai chun an kuomah, “Kan Pathien ta dinga in bâwl dingin keini le hin iengkhawm thaw ding in nei nawh; Persia lal Kurain keini thu a mi pêk angin, Israelhai Pathien,
Chuongchun, chu rama mihai chun Juda mihai kut chu an sukhrâtnaw ta a, in bâwl thua chun an sukbuoi a,
an thiltum chu khap dingin an chunga rorêltuhai, Persia lal Kura dam sûng le, Persia lal Daria rorêl chen khan an ruoi ta a.
Chuongchun, Ahasuera rorêl lai, a rorêl ṭan hlimin Jerusalem le Juda rama umhai chunga hêkna an ziek ta a.
Chun, Artazerzia hun laiin, Bislam hai, Mithredath hai, Tabeel hai le a ruol danghaiin Persia lal Artazerzia kuoma chun lekha an ziek a, chu lekha chu Suria lekhaa ziek, Suria ṭawnga ziek a na.
Rorêltu Rehum le lekhaziektu Simsai chun Jerusalem chungthuah hieng ang hin lal Artazerzia kuoma chun an ziek a;
chuongchun, rorêltu Rehum le lekhaziektu Simsai le an ruol danghai rorêltuhai
hnam dang danghai, milien le ropui Osnapparin a hnawt dawk a, Samari ram khawpuihaia ân umtirhai le vadung râltienga an umtirhai le chun chu lekha chu an ziek a na.
Hieng hi an lekha ziek dân chu a nih; Laltak Artazerzia kuomah: “Vadungpui râla i siehlawhai leh, chuong ang peiin,

i kuoma inthawka Juda hunghai kha Jerusalemah kan kuomah an hung a nih ti hi lal chun lo hre raw se; khawpui sie le hel chu an bâwl a, a kulhai chu an zo ta a, a lungphûmhai chu an siem ṭha mêk a nih.
Hi khuo hi hienga an bâwl a, a kulhai an zo chun, leiman dâm, sie amanih, ram man amanih pe naw ni hai a, a tâwpa chun lalhai chu sukse ngei an tih ti hi lal chun lo hre bawk raw se.
Tuhin lal in ropui chi chu liek kan na, lal hang sukmuolpho chu kan ta dingin a âwm naw a nih, chuleiin, kan hung thawnin lal chu kan hrilfie a nih;

i pi le puhai thu ziekna lekhabua chun zawng ni sien la, chuongchun, chu thu ziekna lekhabua chun hmûng i ta, hi khuo hi khaw hel a na, ram le lalhai ta ding khawma pawitâwk a na, inhma khawma buoina an lo siem ta a; chuong lei chun hi khuo hi suksiet a nih ti hrieng i tih.
Hi khuo hi bâwl a hung na, a kulhai chu zo a hung ni ngei ngei chun vadung râla hin chu hieng ang hin chan hrim nei naw ti nih ti lal chu kan hung hrilfie a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, lal chun rorêltu Rehum le, lekhaziektu Simsai le Samaria um an ruol danghai kuoma le, vadung râla khawsa hlakhai kuoma chun dawnna chu ân phur ta a, “Inremna um raw se, chuong ang peiin.
Kan kuoma lekhathawn in hung inphur kha ka hma ngeiah chiengtaka tiem a ni ta a.
Chun, thu ka pêk a, zawngna chu siem a ni ta bawk a, chuongchun, inhmain hi khuo hin lalhai chungah helna lo siem tain, buoina le helna chu chutaka chun a lo um ta a nih ti hmu suok a ni ta a.
Vadung râl ram po po chunga rorêltu, Jerusalem vêla khan lal thilthawtheitak takhai an um a; an kuoma chun leiman dâm, ram man dâm, sie dâm pêk a ni hlak a.
Tuhin, hieng mihai hi suktâwp dingin thupêk siem unla, hi khuo hi bâwl pei ni ta naw raw se; keima ngeiin thupêk ka siem hmakhat chun.
Chun, hi thua hin vuoicha lo dingin fîmkhur rawh; lalhai sukpawi ding elin iengdingin am sietna chu a hung suok ding a na?” tiin.

Chun, lal Artazerzia lekha chu Rehum le, lekhaziektu Simsai le, an ruolhai hmaa tiem a ni phing chun, inhmâwtakin Judahai kuomah Jerusalema chun an fe a, thilthawtheina le thawluinain anni chu an suktâwp ta a.
Chuongchun, Jerusalema um, Pathien in sinthaw chu a lo tâwp ta a; Persia lal Daria rorêl kum hnina chen chun châwlsan a ni ta a.
Chun, zâwlneihai, Haggai le Iddo naupa Zekaria chun Juda ram le Jerusalema Juda umhai kuoma chun thu an hrillâwk a; Israel Pathien hmingin a nih anni chun thu an hrillâwk chu.
Chun, Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le Jozadak naupa Jesua chu an tho a, Jerusalema um, Pathien in chu an bâwl ṭan ta a; chun, an kuoma chun Pathien zâwlneihai chu anni ṭhangpuiin an um bawk a.
Chu hun lai chun vadung râl tieng rorêltu Tattenai le Setharbozenai le an ruolhai chu an kuomah an hung a, an kuomah, “Hi in bâwl ding le, kul hi siemzo dingin tuin am thu a pêk cheu a?” an ta.
Chun, an kuoma chun hieng ang hin thu kan hril a, “Hi in bâwltuhai hi an hming ieng am a na?” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, an Pathien mit chu Juda upahai chunga chun a fu a, chu thu chu Daria kuom a tlung a, a chungthua dawnna lekha chu a hung tlung hmakhat chun anni chu an suktâwp ta naw a.
Vadung râltieng rorêltu Tattenai le Sethar-bozenai le a ruolhai Apharsak mihai
a kuoma chun lekhathawn an inphur a, chutaka chun hieng anga ziek hi a nih: “Lal Daria kuomah, inremna po po um raw se.

Juda ram bielah, Pathien in ropuitaka chun kan fe a, chu chu lung ropuitakhaia bâwl a na, a banghai chu thinga siem a na; chun, sin chu taimataka thaw pei a na, an kuta chun a hung hlawtling hle el a nih ti hi lal chun lo hre raw se.
Chun, chuong upahai chu, ‘Hi in bâwl ding le kul hi siemzo dingin tuin am thu a pêk cheu a?’ tiin kan indawn a.
Hung hrilfie ding chein, anni laia lua um mihai hminghai chu kan hung ziek theina dingin, an hminghai khawm kan indawn bawk a.
Chun, anni chun hieng ang hin an mi dawn a, ‘Hnuoi le vân Pathien siehlawhai kan na, Israel lal ropuitakin a lo bâwl, kum tamtak a lo bâwl tah, in hi, kan bâwl a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, chu hnunga chun kan thlatuhai chun vân Pathien chu an lo suklungsen a, ama chun Kaldai mi, Babulon lal, Nebukadnezzar, hi in hi suksea, mihai chu Babulon tienga ṭhuoi sâwngtu kuta chun a pêk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Babulon lal Kura inlal kum khatnaa chun, lal Kura chun hi Pathien in hi bâwlna dingin thupêk chu a siem ta a nih.

Chun, rângkachak le tangkaraw bûr le bêlhai Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalem biekina inthawka a lâk a, Babulon biekina a hung lâkhai chu, chuonghai ngei chu lal Kura chun Babulon biekina inthawk chun a lâk suok a, mi pakhat a hming Sesbazzar, amain rorêltua a siem ngei kuoma chun chuong chu a pêk a nih;
ama kuoma chun, Hieng bûr le bêlhai hi la la, fe la, Jerusalema um biekina chun sie rawh; chun, Pathien in chu a hmun ngaia ngei bâwl ni raw se, a ti a.
Chun, chu Sesbazzar bawk chu a hung a, Jerusalema um Pathien in lungphûm a phûm ta a; chutaka inthawk tah tu chen hin bâwl a ni ta zing a, zo fel lo a la ni zing a nih,’ tiin.

Chuleiin, tuhin lalin ṭha a ti zâwng a ni chun chu Babulona lal sum inah zawng ni sienla, Jerusalema Pathien in hi bâwlna dingin lal Kura chun thupêk a lo siem ta chun chutaka chun a um âwm si a; chun, lal chun hi thu chungchânga hin ṭha a ti zâwng chu mi hung hril bawk raw se,” tiin.
Chun, lal Daria chun thupêk a siem a, Babulona ro siekhâwmna, lekhabu ina chun zawng a ni ta a.
Chun, Media biela lal inah Akmethaa chun lekha zuol hmu suok a ni ta a; chutaka chun hriet zingna dingin hieng anga ziek hi a na,

“Lal Kura inlal kum khatnaa chun, lal Kura chun thupêk a siem a; ‘Jerusalema Pathien in chungthua hin, in chu bâwl ni sienla, inthâwinahai an inhlânna hmun chu; chun, chu lungphûmhai khawm chu dettaka phûm ni nghe nghe raw se; chun, ân sângzie chu tawng sâwmruk, a khangtieng chu tawng sâwmruk bawk nîng a ta;
lung lientak takhai tlar thum le thing thar tlar khat leh: chun, sênghai chu lal ina inthawka pêk nîng a ta:

Chun, Pathien ina rângkachak le tangkaraw bûr le bêl Jerusalema um biekina inthawka Nebukadnezzarin a lâk suok a, Babulona a lâkhai kha pêkkîr nâwk ni sienla, Jerusalema um biekinah an hmun sengah hung lâk nâwk nîng a ta; chun, Pathien ina chun sieng i tih,’ tiin.
Chuleiin, tuhin vadung râltieng rorêltu Tattenai le, Sethar-bozenai le in ruol Apharsakhai, hitaka inthawk hin insiekieng unla, hi Pathien in sinthaw hi tosan el ro:
Juda rorêltu le Juda upahai chun hi Pathien in hi a hmun ngeia chun bâwl el raw hai se.

Chu bâka chun hi Pathien in bâwl chungthua hin Juda upahai kuoma chun ieng am in thaw ding a na ti hi thupêk ka hung siem bawk a nih; lal thuomhnaw, vadung râltieng leiman ngei khawm, danga an um nawna dingin sênghai ngei khawm chu ṭhahnemngaitaka hieng mihai hi pêk ding an nih.

Chun, an pawimaw ang taphawtin, vân Pathien ta dinga pumrawhmang thilinhlân dinga bâwngchal tuoi ni leh, berâmchal ni leh, berâmtehai ni leh, Jerusalema um thiempuhai thu ang peiin, bu dâm, chi dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm insam hlek lova ni tin tina pêk ni raw se;
vân Pathien kuoma riminhnik inthâwinahai an inhlân thei a, lal le a naupasalhai an dam sâwt theina ding khawma an ṭawngṭaipêk theina dingin.

Chun, hi thupêk khawm hi ka hung siem bawk a nih: tukhawm hi thu hi lo sukdanglam taphawt chu, a ina inthawka a tlungpûm chu kei dawk ni sienla, ama chu chutaka chun khai kânga khuopde ni raw se; hi lei hin a in chu êkpeinaa siem ni sienla:

chutaka ama hming um dinga siemtu Pathien chun lalhai le hnam po po, hi hi sukdanglam dinga an kut phara, Jerusalema Pathien in um hi sukse tumtuhai chu pei thla raw se. Keima Daria ngeiin thupêk ka siem a, ngaitha lova thaw ni raw se,” tiin.
Chun, lal Daria chun anni chu a tir lei chun vadung râltieng rorêltu Tattenai hai, Sethar-bozenai hai le an ruolhai chun chuong ang chun an thaw ta a.

Chu, zâwlnei Haggai le Iddo naupa Zekaria hril ang ngeiin Juda upahai chun an bâwlin an hlawtling ta ngei a, Israel Pathien thupêk ang le Persia lal Artazerzia le Daria le Kura thupêk ang ngei chun an bâwl a, an zo ta a.
Chun, hi in hi lal Daria rorêl kum rukna, Adar thla ni thum ni chun zo a ni ta a.
Chuongchun, Israel mipuihai le thiempuhai le Levi mihai le sala intâng suokhai mi danghai chun hi Pathien in hi hlimtaka inhlânna an nei a.
Chun, hi Pathien in inhlânnaa hin bâwngchal za khat, berâmchal za hni, berâmte za li an inhlân a; chun, suol thilinhlâna dingin Israel hnam lukipin kêlchal sâwmpahni an inhlân bawk a.
Mosie lekhabua ziek a ni angin, thiempuhai chu an pâwl sengin, Levi mihai chu an chanpuol ang sengin Pathien rawngbâwl ding chun an sie ta a.
Chun, sal intâng suokhai chun thla hmasatak ni sâwmpali ni chun Fekân ruoiṭhe chu an nei a.

Thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu anni le anni an lo insukthieng ta leiin, an rêng chun thieng an ni ta a; chuongchun, fekân ruoiṭhena ding chu sal intâng suokhai le an unauhai le thiempuhai le anni ta ding ngeiin an that ta a.
Chun, Israel mipuihai sala inthawka hung suok nâwk a, chu rama ringlo mi inthieng nawnaa inthawka Israel Pathien

chawl ṭhanglo bei ruoiṭhe khawm chu hlimtakin ni sari sûng an hmang a: Lalpa chun anni chu a sukhlimin, Israel Pathien, Pathien in sin thawa chun an kuthai sukhrât dingin Assuria lal lungril chu anni chungah ân hertir ta nghâl si a.
Hieng thilhai hnunga hin, Persia lal Artazerzia rorêl lai chu, Seraia naupa Ezra, Azaria naupa, Hilkia naupa,
Sallum naupa, Zadok naupa; Ahitub naupa,
Amaria naupa, Azaria naupa, Meraioth naupa,
Zerahia naupa, Uzzi naupa, Bukki naupa;
Abisua naupa, Phinehas naupa, Eleazar naupa, Aron thiempu laltak naupa:
hi Ezra hi Babulona inthawk chun a hang fe a: Israel Pathien
Chuongchun, lal Artazerzia inlal kum sarinaa chun Israel thlahai ṭhenkhat le thiempuhai le Levi mihai le hlasaktuhai le, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai le, temple siehlawhai chu Jerusalema chun an hang fe a.
Ama chu lal inlal a kum sarinaa, a thla nganaa chun a nih Jerusalema a hung chu.
Thla khatna, ni khat nia chun Babulona inthawk chun a fe suok ṭan a, a chunga Pathien kut ṭha innghat ang peiin thla ngana, ni khat ni chun Jerusalem chu a tlung ta a.
Ezra chun
Hi hi
“Lalhai lal, Artazerzia chun, thiempu Ezra, vâna Pathien dân ziektu Ezra kuomah muongna kim um raw se.
Ka ram sûnga Israel mihai po po, an thiempuhai le Levi mihai leh, mânia Jerusalema fe inhâwkna neituhai chu nanga ruola fe dingin thupêk ka siem a nih.
I kuta um i Pathien dân ang peia Jerusalem le Juda ram chungthu chu dâwpsuok dinga lal le a rorêltu pasarihai itir i ni leiin le;
Jerusalema um Israel Pathien kuoma phaltaka lal le a rorêltuhaiin an pêk rângkachak le tangkaruohai phur dingin le,
Babulon biel po poa mipuihai le thiempuhaiin Jerusalema an Pathien in ta dinga phaltaka an pêk, rângkachak le tangkaruo i hmu thei zât zât chu chawi dinga tir i nih:
chuleichun, hi sum hi fîmkhurtakin bâwngchalhai, berâmchalhai, berâmtehai, an bu thilinhlân le dâwn mi thilinhlânhai leh inchâwng i ta, Jerusalema um i Pathien ina maichâma chun inhlân i tih.
Chun, rângkachak le tangka la chuong chu i unauhai le nanga ngaia ṭha ang angin, in Pathien dit zâwngin hmang in tih.
I Pathien in rawngbâwlna dinga bûr le bêl an pêkhai che chu Jerusalema Pathien hmaa chun pe suok rawh.
Chun, pêkna hun i nei phaa i Pathien in ta dinga thil mamaw taphawt chu lal sum ina inthawkin pe suok el rawh.

Keima, kei Artazerzia ngei hin thupêk ka siem a, vadung râltienga sum enkawltuhai po po kuoma chun, ‘Thiempu Ezra, vân Pathien dân ziektu hin thil a hni taphawt cheu chu fîmkhurtaka thaw dingin thu ka pêk cheu:
tangkaruo talent za khat chen khawm, bu bûk za khat chen khawm, uoin bath za khat chen khawm, hriek bath za khat chen khawm, chi khawm ieng zât am ti um lo dingin.
Vân Pathienin a iphût ang taphawt chu, vân Pathien in ta ding chun thaw tei ni raw se; iengdingin am lal le a naupahai ram chunga hin a lunginsenna chu um a ta?

Chun, thiempuhai, Levi mihai, hlasaktuhai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai, temple siehlawhai amanih, Pathien in rawngbâwltuhai hrim hrim chungthua chun, anni chu leiman amanih, ram man amanih, sie amani khawm inchawitir chu dân ni naw nih tiin thu kan pêk bawk che a nih,’

Chun, nang Ezra hin, i kawl Pathienin varna a pêk che ang peiin vadung râltienga mihai chunga rorêl dingin i Pathien dânhai hre mihai ang chu ram awptu le rorêltuhai dingin thlang i tih, a la hre nawhai chu inchuktir unla.

Mi tukhawm i Pathien dân anga thaw lo le lal dân anga thaw lo chu a chungah inrangtaka rorêlthlûk ni sienla, thi dingin amanih, hnawtsuok dingin amanih, thuomhnawhai chân ding amanih, lungina khum ding amanih ni dingin,” tiin.
Jerusalema
Ama chun lal hmaa le a rorêltuhai hmaa le lal mi ṭhahai po po hmaa chun ka chungah zângaina a hung suklien ta a. Chuongchun, ka chunga ka Pathien
Hienghai hi an pahnam upahai chu an nih, Artazerzia rorêl laia Babulona inthawka keia ruola hang fe vehai phung sûtna chu hi hi a nih.
Phinehas naupahaia chun Gersom; Ithamar naupahaia chun Daniel; David naupahaia chun, Hattus;
Paros naupahaia, Sekania naupahaia chun, Zekaria; phung sût dâna chun, ama leh pasal za khat le sâwmnga an nih.
Pahath-moab naupahaia chun, Zerahia naupa Eliehoenai; ama le pasal za hni leh.
Jahaziel naupa, Sekania naupahaia chun, ama leh pasal za thum.
Adin naupahaia chun, Jonathan naupa Ebed; ama leh pasal sâwmnga.
Elam naupahaia chun, Athalia naupa Jesaia: ama leh pasal sâwmsari.
Sephatia naupahaia chun, Mikael naupa Zebadia; ama leh pasal sâwmriet.
Joab naupahaia chun, Jehiel naupa Obadia; ama leh pasal za hni sâwmpariet.
Josiphia naupa, Selomith naupahaia chun, ama leh pasal za khat le sâwmruk.
Bebai naupahaia chun, Bebai naupa Zekaria; ama leh pasal sâwmhni pariet.
Azgad naupahaia chun, Hakkatan naupa Johanan; ama leh pasal za khat le sâwm.
Chun, Adonikam naupahaia chun, chu chu a nuhnungtak a nih, hieng hi an hminghai chu a nih, Eliphelet, Jeuel le, Semaia hi; anni leh pasal sâwmruk.
Bigvai naupahaia chun, Uthai le Zakkur; anni leh pasal sâwmsari.
Anni chu Ahavaa luong lût vadunga chun ka kei khâwm tâwl a; chutaka chun ni thum lai chu kan riek a; chun, thiempuhai le mipuihai chu ka thlîr vêl chun Levi thlahai hrim ka hmu ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Eliezer, Ariel, Semaia, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekaria, Mesullam hai mi lutakhai chu kân cha a, Joiarib le Elnathan inchûktirtuhai chu kân cha sa bawk a.

Anni chu Kasiphia hmuna lal Iddo kuoma chun ka tir ta a; Pathien ina rawngbâwltu dinghai an mi hung ṭhuoipêk theina dingin, Kasiphia hmuna, Iddo le a unau Nethinim mihai kuoma an thuhril ding chu ka hril a.

Chun, ka chunga kan Pathien kut ṭhatzie ang peiin anni chun mi lungril indiktak Israel naupa Levi naupa Mahli naupahai laia mi, Serebia, a unauhai le a naupasalhai leh sâwmpariet an mi hung ṭhuoipêk a;
chun, Hasabia le Merari naupa- hai Jesaia, a unauhai le an naupasalhai leh sâwmhni;
chun, David le lalhaiin Levi mihai rawng bâwl dinga an pêk Temple siehlaw mi za hni le sâwmhni leh; an rêng chun hminga ko seng an nih.
Chun, kan thuomhnawhai po po le kan nau-le-têhai le keini ta dinga lampui tluong mi zawngpêk dinga, kan Pathien hmaa chun kan insukhnuoi theina dingin, Ahava vadunga chun bunghei ka rawt ta a.

Lal kuoma chun, “Ama zawngtuhai chunga chun Pathien kut chu ṭhatna dingin a um a, ama nghatsantuhai po po chunga ruok chun, thilthawtheina le lunginsenna a um a nih,” kan lo ti ta si leiin, lampuia hmêlmahaia inthawka mi ṭhangpui dinga sakawr chung chuong mi le sipai pâwl lal kuoma hni kân zak si a.
Chuongchun, bu chu kan nghei a, hi hi ding hin kan Pathien chu kan ngên a: chuongchun, keini ngênthlûkin ama chu a um ta a.
Chun, thiempuhai laia a bîk deuhai sâwmpahni, Serebia, Hasabia le an unauhai sâwm ka sie hran a;
chuongchun, tangka le rângkachak le bûr le bêlhai, kan Pathien in ta dinga thilpêk, lal le a rorêltuhai le, a mi ṭhahai le chutaka Israel umhai po poin an pêkhai chu anni chu ka bûkpêk ta a.
Kei ngei khawma an kuta chun tangkaruo talent za ruk sâwmnga le, bûr le bêlhai talent za khat ka bûkpêk a; rângkachak talent za leh;
rângkachak maihûn sâwmhni, darik sâng khat bûk seng, chun, rângkachak anga hlu ve bawk, dâr tle mi bêl pahni leh.
Chun, an kuomah ka hril a, “Nangni hi
Jerusalemah,
Chuongchun, thiempuhai le Levi mihai chun kan Pathien ina Jerusalema hung lâk dingin rângkachak le tangkaruo chuong ang bûk chu an lâk ta a.

Chun, Jerusalema fe ding chun Ahava vadunga inthawkin thla khatnaa ni sâwmpahni ni chun kan suok ta a; chuongchun, kan Pathien kut chu kan chunga chun a um a, ama chun hmêlmahai le lampuia mîn chântu kuta inthawk chun a mi sansuok a.
Jerusalem chu kan hung tlung a, chutaka chun ni thum lai chu kan hang um phawt a.

A ni li ni chun a nih, chuong rângkachak le tangkaruo le bûr le bêlhai chu kan Pathien ina chun thiempu Uria naupa Meremoth kuta bûkin kan inhlân chu; ama le chun Phinehas naupa Eleazar chu a um nghe nghe a; chun, anni le chun, Levi mihai, Binnui naupa Noadia le Jesua naupa Jozabad chu an um bawk a;
a rêngin a zât le a bûkin; a bûk zât chu, chu huna chun ziek a ni nghe nghe bawk a.

Chun, sal intâng mihai intângnaa inthawka hung suokhai chun Israel Pathien kuoma chun Israelhai po po puolah; bâwngchal sâwmpahni le, berâmchal sâwmkuo paruk, berâmte sâwmsari pasari le; kêlchal sâwmpahni suol thilinhlâna dingin; pumrawhmang thilinhlânah an inhlân ta a; hieng po po hi
Chun, lal thupêkhai chu vadung râla lal ram awptuhai le rorêltuhai kuoma chun an pêk suok ta a; chun, Pathien in le mipuihai chu ṭhangpuina an pêk ta a.

Hieng thilhai hi thaw a ni zo chun, mi ṭhahai chu ka kuomah an hung a, “Israel mipuihai le thiempuhai le Levi mihai hi hieng a rama um Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Periz mihai, Jebus mihai, Ammon mihai, Moab mihai, Aigupta mihai le Amor mihaia inthawk hin insiekieng lovin, an tirdakumnahai chu an thaw ve zing el a nih.

An naupasalhai le annihai ta ding ngei khawma an naunuhmeihai an nei si a; chuongchun, chi inthieng chu annia hin hieng rama mihai le hin ân chawkpawl ta a; anih, hi bawsietnaa hin mi ṭhahai le rorêltuhai hi a hmaṭhuoi an ni nghe nghe a nih,” an ta.
Hieng thu hi ka hriet phing chun ka silfên le ka zakawfuol chu ka keithlêr a, ka lua ka sam chu ka phawi ṭil a, ka khâkhmul leh; maktitakin ka ṭhung ta a.
Chun, sal intâng suokhai an bawsietna leia Israel Pathien thua lo inthin hlakhai po kha ka kuoma chun an hung inkhâwm a; chun, kei chu zântieng thilinhlân hun chenin maktiin ka ṭhung ta zing a.
Chun, zântienga thilinhlân hun ding lai chun ka silfên le ka zakawfuol inek pum chun ka lungngainaa inthawk chun ka tho suok a; ka khûpin ka dingṭhaṭhuon a,
“Aw ka Pathien, nanga tienga hung nghat khawm hi ka hmai a mâwkin kân zak a nih, ka Pathien, kan khawhlonahai chu kan lu chunga hin a hung pung deu deu a, kan suolhai chun vân a tawng ta a ni hi.

Kan thlatuhai hun laia inthawk tah vawisûn ni chen hin suol namên lovin kan suol ta a; kan khawhlonahai lei hin kan lalhai le kan thiempuhai chu hieng ram lalhai kuthaia hin pêk suokin an um ta a; vawisûn ni ang chen khawm hin hmêla hamhaina le, suksietnaa le sal intângnaa le kâwlhnâm kuoma pêkin an um hi.
Tuhin mitkhapkâr tawitea dingin kan Pathien

Sal intâng kan na, amiruokchu, kan sal intângnaa khawm chun kan Pathien chun a mi nghatsan ngai naw a, Jerusalem le Juda rama kulhai mi pe ding le, chutaka in siehai chu siem ṭha ding le kan Pathien in chu tungding dinga thathona mi pe dingin, Persia lalhai mithmua chun kan chungah lunginsietna a hung sukpung ta lem a.
Chuongchun, tuhin, Aw kan Pathien, hi thua hin iengam hril tâng kan ta? I thupêkhai chu kan lo nghatsan ta si a:

khâng i siehlaw zâwlneihai hmanga i lo pêk tah, ‘Chu ram hluo dinga in fena ding chu ram thiengnaw, a rama mihai inthieng nawnahaia sukthieng naw, an inthiengnawna kil khata inthawka kil khingtieng chena sip, chu an inthieng nawnaa inthieng naw chu a nih.

Chuleiin, tuhin, in naupasalhai chu an naunuhmeihai inneitir naw unla, in naunuhmeihai chu an naupasalhai khawm inneitir bawk naw ro; kumkhuoa dingin an hausakna amanih, anni le inremna amanih zawng bawk naw ro, chu ram thil ṭha chu in fâk a, in hung hrât a, kumkhuoa dinga in thlahai ta dinga rochan dinga in mâksanpêk theina dingin,’ ti kha.

Chuong po po hnunga chun kan suol nasatak lei le, kan suksuolnahai leiin kan chungah a hung tlung a, nang kan Pathien hin kan khawhlonahaiin a phutâwk nêka nêp lemin i mi hrem a, a mahla khawm i mi la hlapêk a nih ti hmu zing si hin,

i thupêkhai chu kan bawsiet nâwkin, hieng pawrchenahai thawtu mipuihai le hin ṭhe ruollovin kan lân zawm zing ding am a nih? A suok ding um dêr lova, a mahla khawm hla dêr lova i mi kânghmang dêr hmakhat chun nang chu i lungdam ding am a nih?
Aw

Ezra chu a ṭawngṭai a, thupha a chawi a, Pathien in tuola bawkkhupa a ṭap a ṭap sûng chun, pasal le nuhmei le naupang mipui nasatak el Israel mihai laia mi chu an hung inkhâwm ta ṭeu el a; mipuihai chu nasatakin an ṭap an ṭap el si a.

Elam naupasalhai laia pakhat, Jehiel naupa Sekania chun Ezra chu a dawn a, a kuomah, “Ei Pathien chunga chun ei bawsiet ta chu a na, hi rama mihai hmêlmak nuhmeihai chu nuhmeia dâm ei nei ta a, amiruokchu, hi chungthua hin Israel mi ta ding hin beisei um a la um a nih.

Chuleiin, tuhin, chuong nuhmeihai po po chu ma ding le, annia inthawka pieng taphawt chu sie hmang dingin, Lalpa le ei Pathien thupêka inthintuhai rorêl ang peiin, ei Pathien leh thuthlung siem ei tiu; chuongchun, dân ang taka thaw ni raw se.
Tho rawh, hi thu hi nanga chungah ân nghat a nih; chun, hi keini khawm nanga kuomah kan ṭhang ve bawk a, insukhuoi la, thaw el rawh,” tiin.
Chun, Ezra chu a tho a, thiempu laltakhai, Levi mihai, Israel mi po po hai le chun hi thu ang tak hin inkhâm dingin a tir ta a. Chuongchun, an inkhâm ta a.

Chun, Ezra chu Pathien in tuola chu a tho a, Eliasib naupa Jehohanan pindana chun a va fe ta a; chun, chutaka a va fe khawm chun, bei a fâk naw a, tui khawm a dâwn bawk naw a; sal intâng suokhai bawsietna lei chun nasatakin a lungngai si a.
Chun, Juda ram le Jerusalem vêl po poa chun sal intâng suokhai po po kuomah, Jerusalemah an hung khâwm vawng ding a na;

tukhawm ni thum sûnga hung naw chu mi ṭhahai le upahai rorêl dân angin a thuomhnaw po po chu chân a ta, ama ngei khawm chu sal intâng suokhai laia inthawk pâwlser nîng a tih, tiin thupuong an siem ta a.

Chuongchun, Juda le Benjamin rama mi po pohai chu ni thum sûngin Jerusalema chun an hung inkhâwm ṭeu el ta a; chu chu thla kuona, ni sâwmhni ni tak a nih: chuongchun, mipuihai chu ruopui nasatak lei le, hi thu lei hin inthin pumin Pathien in tuol hmun âwla chun an ṭhung tâwl ta a.
Chun, thiempu Ezra chu a ngîr suok a, an kuomah, “In bawsiet ta a, Israel ram khawhlona chu belsa dingin hmêlmak nuhmei in nei nâwk nghâl a.
Chuleiin, tuhin, in thlatuhai Pathien
Chun, mipui pungkhâwm po pohai chun an dawn a, râwl inringtakin, “Kan chungthu i hril ang tak chun, chuong ang ngei chun kan thaw ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mipui hi tamtak an na, ruo nasatak sûr lai a ni bawk a, tuola hin kan um zing thei naw a, ni khat ni hni sin el khawm a ni bawk naw a, hi thil chunga hin nasatakin kan lo bawsiet ta si a.

Kan mi ṭhahai hi mipui aiaw dingin thlang ni hai sienla, hi thil hi sukfel a ni hmakhat, kan chunga Pathien lunginsenna ṭiumtak chu hlîpthlâk a ni hmakhat chun, kan khuohaia hmêlmak nuhmei neituhai chu, khaw tina upahai le rorêltuhai leh hun ruotahai chun hung lem raw hai se,” an ta.
Asahel naupa Jonathan le Tikva naupa Jahzeia chau chun hi thu hi an kal a, Mesullam le Sabbethai Levi mihai chun anni chu an thlawp thung a.

Chuongchun, sal intâng suokhai chun chuong ang chun an thaw ta a. Chun, thiempu Ezra chu, an pahnam ang peiin, pahnam upa ṭhenkhathai leh, an rêngin an hming suot sengin an siehran ta a. Chuongchun, thla sâwmna, ni khat ni chun chu thil chu enfie dingin an ṭhung ta a.
Chun, thla khatna, ni khat ni chun hmêlmak nuhmei nei mihai po po chu an zo ta a.

Chun, thiempuhai naupasalhai lai ngei khawm chun hmêlmak nuhmei lo neituhai chu hmusuok an hung ni ta a: hming lamin hieng, Jozadak naupa Jesua naupasalhai, an unauhai leh; Maaseia, Eliezer, Jarib le Gedalia hai hi.
Anni chun an nuhmeihai chu ma dingin thu an tiem a; chuongchun, khawhlo an lo ni ta lei chun, an suol ta dingin berâm ruol laia mi berâmchal pakhat an inhlân ta a.
Immer naupasalhai chu: Hanani le Zebadia.
Harim naupasalhai chu: Maaseia, Elija, Semaia, Jahiel le Uzzia.
Pas-hur naupasalhai chu: Elioenai, Maaseia, Ismael, Nethanel, Jozabad le Elasa.
Levi mihai naupasalhai chu: Jozabad, Simei, Kelaia (ama chu Kelita a nih), Pethahia, Juda le Eliezer.
Hlasaktuhai naupasalhai chu: Eliasib. Kawtkhâr vêngtuhai naupasalhai chu: Sallum, Telem le Uri.
Israel laia chun: Paros naupasalhai chu: Ramia, Izzia, Malkija, Mijamin, Eleazar, Malkija le Benaia.
Elam naupasalhai chu: Mattania, Zekaria, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth le Elija.
Zattu naupasalhai chu: Elioenai, Eliasib, Mattania, Jeremoth, Zabad le Aziza.
Bebai naupasalhai chu: Jehohanan, Hanania, Zabbai le Athlai.
Bani naupasalhai chu: Mesullam, Malluk, Adaia, Jasub, Seal le Jeremoth.
Pahath-moab naupasalhai chu: Adna, Kelal, Benaia, Maaseia, Mattania, Bezalel, Binnui le Manasse.
Harim naupasalhai chu: Eliezer, Issija, Malkija, Semaia, Simeon,
Benjamin, Malluk le Semaria.
Hasum naupasalhai chu: Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasse le Simei.
Bani naupasalhai chu: Maadai, Amram, Uel,
Benaia, Bedeia, Keluhi,
Vania, Meremoth, Eliasib,
Mattania, Mattenai le Jaasu.
Binui naupasalhai chu: Simei,
Selemia, Nathan, Adaia.
Maknadebai, Sasai, Sarai,
Azarel, Selemia, Semaria,
Sallum, Amaria, Josef.
Nebo naupasalhai chu: Jeiel, Mattithia, Zabad, Zebina, Iddo, Joel le Benaia.
Hienghai po po hin hmêlmak nuhmei chu an lo nei ta a; ṭhenkhat lem chun an nuhmeihaia chun nauhai dâm an lo nei hiel ta a.
Hakalia naupa Nehemia thuhai chu: Hieng ang hi a hung na, kum sâwmhnina, Kisleu thlaa, Susa khawpuia ka um laiin,
ka unaupa pakhat Hanani le Juda rama inthawka mi ṭhenkhat an hung a; chun, Judahai sala intâng suok tahai chanchin le Jerusalem chanchin kân dawn a.
Ka kuoma chun, “Sala intâng suok tah, chu rama dama la umhai chu chan setak le hrilsietin an um a; chun, Jerusalem kul chu a chim rem rum ta a, a kawtkhârhai khawm a kâng a,” an ti a.
Chuong thu chu ka hriet chun ka ṭhung chawt a, ka ṭap a; ni ieng zât amani chu lungngaiin ka um a; chun, bu ka nghei a, vân Pathien hmaa chun ka ṭawngṭai a;
“Aw

Israel mipuihai suolna, i chunga kan suolna thupha ka chawi sûng hin i na lo sit la; i mit lo meng la, i siehlaw ṭawngṭaina, i kuoma a sûn a zâna i siehlaw Israel mipuihai ka ngênpêkna hi mi lo ngaithlapêk la; kei le ka pa sûnghai chu kan lo suol ta si a.
I chungah ṭha lotakin thil kan lo thaw ta a, i siehlaw Mosie kuoma i pêk, thupêkhai, dânhai, rorêlhai chu kan lo zâwm ta si naw a.
I siehlaw Mosie kuoma, ‘In bawsiet chun hnam tin laia chun sukdar ka ti cheu a;

amiruokchu, keia tieng in hung ngha nâwk a, ka thupêkhai in pawm a, in zâwm chun, nangni laia mi kâwlkawdawng chena hnawt suoka um khawm um hai sienla, chutaka inthawk khawm chun kei khâwm nâwk ka ti cheu a, ka hming ka înumtirna ding hmuna ka ruota chun ṭhuoi nâwk ka tih,’ tia thu i pêk kha lunginsiettakin hre zing rawh.
Chun, hienghai hi i siehlawhai le i mihai, i thilthawtheina nasatak le i kut thahrâta în tlan suokhai an na.
Aw
Chun, lal Artazerzia kum sâwmhni ân lal kum, Nisan thlaah uoin an hung pêk hnung chun, uoin chu ka lâk a, lal chu ka pêk a. Kha hma khan chu a hmaa hin lungngai hmêl ka la put ngai naw a;
lal chun ka kuomah, “I damnaw khawm chu a ni si naw a, iengtiziea lungngai hmêl i put am a na? thil dang ni naw nih, i lungril a lungngai a ni hi maw,” a mi ti a. Chuongchun, ka ṭi ta êm êm el a.
Kei chun lal kuoma chun, “Lal chu kumkhuoin dam raw se; a mi thlatuhai thlân umna khuo chu a ram ta a, a kawtkhârhai chu a kâng vawng ta si a, lungngai hmêl put lo thei am nîng ka ti?” ka ti a.
Chuongchun, lal chun ka kuomah, “Ieng am a na i hni chu?” a ti a. Chuongchun, vân Pathien kuoma chun ka ṭawngṭai ta a.
Chun, lal kuoma chun, “Lal remti zâwng a ni a, i siehlaw hin i mit ka lo tlung hlak a ni chun, Juda ramah a mi thlatuhai thlân umnaa chun mîn fetir la; khuo chu va siemthar nâwk ka tih,” ka ti a.

Lal chun ka kuomah, (lalnu khawm chu a kâwla chun a ṭhung ve a), “Ieng chen am va thang i ta, ieng tik am hung nâwk i ta?” a ti a. Chuongchun, lal chun lâwmtakin a mîn fetir ta a, kei khawm chun hunbi ka tiem bawk a.
Chu bak khawm chu ni lovin lal kuoma chun, “Lal remti zâwng a ni chun, vadung râla rorêltuhai inhmutir dingin, Juda ram ka tlung chen an mîn fetir theina dingin phalna lekha mi pe la;

chun, lal ramhâk vêngtu Asaph inhmutir dingin invêngna kulbîng kawtkhâr kal ding le, khawpui kul ding dâmin, ka va hluo ding ina hmang ding dâmin thing a mi pêk theina dingin lekha mi pe bawk rawh,” ka ti a. Chun, ka Pathien mi ditsakna ang peiin lal chun a mi pêk ta a.
Chuongchun, vadung râla rorêltuhai kuom chu ka va tlung a, lal lekhahai chu ka pêk a. Chun,lal chun ka kuoma chun sipai hotuhai le sipai sakawr chung chuong mihai ân fetir ve a nih.
