Chun, Horon mi Sanballat le Ammon mi siehlaw, Tobia haiin an lo hriet chun, Israel mipuihai thawvengna ding ngaituo dingin mi an hung a ni chu tie tiin an lo lungninaw hle el a.
Chuongchun, Jerusalem chu ka hang tlung a, ni thum ka hei um phawt a.

Chun, zâna chun ka tho a, kei le mi dang tlâwmtêhai le chun: Jerusalem ta dinga ka thaw ding, ka Pathienin ka lungrila a sie chu tukhawm ka hril naw a; ka chuongna sa ngawt naw chu sa dang ka kuoma um a um naw a.
Zâna chun Ruom kawtkhâra chun ka suok a, Dragon Tuisunsuo tieng le Hmunhnawk kawtkhâr tienga chun ka fe a; Jerusalem kul chimhai le a kawtkhâr kânghai chu ka en vêl a.
Chun, Tuisunsuo kawtkhâr le lal Dîl chen chun ka fe a, nisienlakhawm, ka chuongna sa a fethlengna ding hrim hrim a um naw a.
Chuongchun, zânah vadung chu a tungin ka zui a, kul chu ka en a; chun, ka lêt nâwk a, Ruom kawtkhâra chun ka lût a, chuong ang chun ka hung kîr nâwk ta a.

Rorêltuhai chun khâwlai am ka fe a, ieng am a na ka thaw ti khawm chu an hriet naw a; chun, Judahai, thiempuhai, mi ṭhahai, rorêltuhai le mi dang sin thawtu ding hrim hrim khawm ka la hril hri naw bawk a.

Chuongchun, an kuomah, “Ei chan a sietzie hi in hmu a, Jerusalem a ram ti dâm, a kawtkhârhai khawm a kâng ti khawm in hriet a; thaw ro, hrilsiet ei ni ta nawna dingin Jerusalem kul hi inngîr nâwk ei tiu,” ka ti a.

Chun, ka Pathienin a mi ditsak thuhai dâm chu ka hril a, ka kuoma lal thuhrilhai le chun. Anni chun, “Tho ei ta, inngîr takluong ei tiu khai,” an ti a. Chuongchun, chu sin ṭha thaw ding chun an kut an sukhrât a.

Amiruokchu, Horon mi Sanballat le Ammon mi siehlaw Tobia le Arab mi Gesemin an hriet chun, an mi nuisan a, an mi hmusit a, “In thil thaw hi iengtizie am a na? Lal chungah in hel am a nih?” dâm an ti a.

Chun, anni chu ka dawn a, an kuomah, “Vân Pathien chun mi suktluongtlung a ta; chuongchun, keini a siehlawhai chu tho kan ta, inngîr kan tih; nangni ruok chun Jerusalema hin chanvo amanih, thuneina amanih, hnûhma amani khawm in nei naw hrim hrim a nih,” ka ti a.
Chuongchun, thiempu lal Eliasib chu a unau thiempuhai le chun an tho a, Berâm kawtkhâr chu an siem a; an sukthieng a, kawtkhârhai chu an siem a; Hammea
A dawt chu Jeriko mihaiin an siem a. Anni
Chun, Nga kawtkhâr chu Hassena naupahaiin an siem a; a kalhai an sie a, a kawtkhâr kalhai an siem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai dâm an siem a.
Anni dawta chun Hakkoz nau Uria naupa Meremoth chun a siem a. Anni dawta chun Mesezabel nau Berekia naupa Mesullam chun a siem ṭha a. Anni dawta chun Baana naupa Zadokin a siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Tekoa-haiin an siem ṭha a; nisienlakhawm, an mi lienhai chun an hotu sina chun an rîng an va rawl nuom ve naw a.
Chun, kawtkhâr hlui chu Pasea naupa Joiada le Besodeia naupa Mesullam chun an siem ṭha a, a kalhai an khang a, a kawtkhâr chu an inkal a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu an rem a.
Chun, anni dawta Gibeon mi Melatia le Meronoth mi Jadon, vadung râl awptu thu hnuoia um Gibeon mihai le Mizpa mihai le chun an siem ṭha a.

A dawta chun rângkachak suttuhai laia mi Harhaia naupa Uzziel chun a siem ṭha a. Chun, a dawt nâwka chun riminhnik siemtu laia mi Hanania chun a siem ṭha a; a kul sâna lai chenin Jerusalem chu an siem ṭha a.
Chun, anni dawta chun Jerusalem biel chenve hotu Hur naupa Rephaia chun a siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Harumaph naupa Jedaia chun a in zâwn chu a siem ṭha a. A dawta chun Hasabneia naupa Hattus chun a siem ṭha a.
Harim naupa Malkija le Pahath-Moab naupa Hassub hai chun meipui sepna in insâng le hmun dang an siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Jerusalem biel chenve hotu Hallohes naupa Sallum chun a naunuhmeihai leh an siem ṭha a.

Ruom kawtkhâr chu Hanun le Zanoa umhai chun an siem ṭha a; an siem a, a kawtkhârhai chu an inkal a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu an rem a; chun, Hmunhnawk kawtkhâr chenin kul tawng sâng khat an siem bawk a.
Hmunhnawk kawtkhâr ruok chu Beth-Hakerem biel hotu Rekab naupa Malkija chun a siem ṭha a; a siem a, kawtkhârhai chu a rem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu a siem ṭha a.

Chun, Mizpa biel hotu Kolhoze naupa Sallum chun tuikhur kawtkhâr chu a siem ṭha a; a siem a, ân khum a, a kawtkhârhai a rem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu a rem a; chun, lal huon kâwla Sela dîl inhuonna chu David khuoa inthawka fe thla kaiṭen chen khan a siem ṭha bawk a.
A dawta chun Azbuk, Beth-zur biel chenve hotu naupa Nehemia chun David thlân zâwn le dîl tieng le mi huoisenhai in chenin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Levihaiin an siem ṭha a. Bani naupa Rehum hai rawi chun. A dawta chun Keila biel chenve hotu Hasabia chun ama biel hmingin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun an unauhaiin an siem ṭha a; Keila biel chenve hotu Henadad naupa Bavvai rawiin an siem ṭha a.
Chun, a dawta chun Mizpa hotu Jesua naupa Ezer chun hmun dang, kul kâwi ṭannaa râlthuom siena hang panna zâwn chu a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Zabbai naupa Baruk chun ṭhahnemngaitakin hmun dang, kul kâwi ṭannaa inthawka thiempu lal Eliasib in kawtkhâr chenin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Hakkoz naupa Uria naupa Meremoth chun hmun dang, Eliasib in kawtkhâra inthawka Eliasib in tâwp chenin a siem ṭha a.
Chun, a dawta chun chulai vêla thiempuhai chun an siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Benjamin le Hassub chun anni in zâwn chu an siem ṭha a. Anni dawta chun Anania nau Maaseia naupa Azaria chun ama in kâwl chu a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Henadad naupa Binnui chun hmun dang, Azaria ina inthawka kul kâwi ṭanna a kil chenin a siem ṭha a.
Uzai naupa Palal chun kul kâwi ṭanna zâwn le intângna in kâwl, lal in chunghnung lema inthawka va lawr in insâng zâwn a siem ṭha a. A dawta chun Paros naupa Pedaia chun a siem ṭha a.
Nethinimhai
A dawta chun Teko-haiin hmun dang, in insâng lientak va lawr zâwn le Ophel kul chenin an siem ṭha a.
Sakawr kawtkhâr chung tieng thiempuhaiin mâni in zâwn seng an siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Immer naupa Zadok chun ama in zâwn a siem ṭha a. Chun, a dawta chun saktieng kawtkhâr vêngtu Sekania naupa Semaia chun a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Selemia naupa Hanania le Zalaph naupa parukna Hanun chun hmun dang an siem ṭha a. A dawta chun Berekia naupa Mesullam chun a umna zâwn a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun rângkachak suttu laia mi Malkija chun Hamiphkad
Chun, a kil hang panna le berâm kawtkhâr inkâr chu rângkachak suttuhai le sumdâwngtuhai chun an siem ṭha a.
Nisienlakhawm, Sanballat chun kul kan siem ṭha ti a hriet chun, nasatakin a lunginsen a, a lungawi ta naw a, Judahai chu a dêusâw ta a.

Chuongchun, a unauhai le Samari sipaihai hmaa chun thu a hril a, “Hieng Juda mi hrâtlohai hin ieng am a ni leh an thaw? An inkul puitling vei ding am a ni ie? An inthâwi vei ding am a nih? Ni khat thil thuin an puitlin ding maw? Hmunhnawk um khâwm mei meia inthawk le lung kâng se ta sa an inngîr thartir ding maw?” a ti a.
Chun, a kâwla Ammon mi Tobia chun, “Hang inngîrtir hrim raw hai se chu, sihal khawm hang lâwn sien an lung kul chu sukchim el a tih,” a ti a.
Aw kan Pathien, en ta, hmusitin kan um hi, an mi hrilsietna chu anni lu chunga ngei inlêttir la, anni khawm khâwlai rama manih muolphotakin intângtir zing rawh;
an bawsietnahai chu inkhum naw la, an suolnahai chu i hmaa inthawka thaihmangin inumtir naw rawh; kul siemtuhai hmaah an suklungsen che hi.
Chuongchun, kul chu kan siem a, ân sâng tieng chenvein kul po po chu kan zawm suok vawng a; mipuihai chun thaw inhâwkna lungril chu an put hle a.
Amiruokchu, Sanballat hai, Tobia hai, Arab mihai, Ammon mihai le Asdod mihaiin kul chu siem ṭhat a ni pei ti an hriet chun an lunginsen ta hle el a;
chuongchun, Jerusalem chu hung thawa buoina siem chu an rawt tâwl ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni lei chun kan Pathien kuomah kan ṭawngṭai a, sûn le zânah anni chu a vêngtu ding kan sie zing a.
Chun, Juda chun, “Sinthawtuhai tha hlak a châu zo ta a, hmunhnawk hlak a nasa si a; kul chu ei siem thei ta naw ding a ni hi,” a ti a.
Kan hmêlmahai hlak chun, “Anni lai ei hang fe a, ei hang that a, sin chu ei hang suktâwppêk hmakhat chun hre naw ni hai a, mi hmu bawk naw ni hai,” an lo ti bawk a.
An kuoma Juda umhai an hung hlak khan hmun tum tuma miin vawi sâwm zet, “Kan kuomah in hung nâwk ding a nih,” an mi lo ti zawmzawt bawk a.
Chuleichun, kul phên, ân hnuoina lai tak, hmun inthâwlna fai laia chun mipuihai chu a sûng sûngin an kâwlhnâmhai, an feihai, an thalngulhai chawiin ṭhanghmun kân khuortir a.
Chun, ka hang en vêl a, ka tho a, mi ṭhahai le rorêltuhai le mi danghai kuoma chun, “Anni chu ṭi dêr naw unla,
Chun, kan hmêlmahai chun kan lo hriet ti le, an thil thaw tum chu Pathienin teploah a siem ti an hrietin, kul tieng mâni sinthawna sengah kan fe nâwk tâwl ta a.
Chutaka inthawk chu ka mihai a zâtve chun sin chu an thaw nâwk ta a; a zâtve danghai chun feihai, phawhai, thalngulhai, âwmphawhai chu an kawl a; chun rorêltuhai chu Juda sûnghai hnunga chun an um a,
chuong bang siemtuhai hnunga chun. Chun, chuong phurrik phurtuhai chu an inbel rik ṭeu a, an kut khingkhatin sin an thaw a, khingtiengin hriemhrei an chawi a;
a siemtuhai chun an kâwlhnâm an pâi seng a, chuong pum chun an siem a nih. Tawtawrâwt mûttu chu keia kâwlah a um a.
Chun, mi ṭhahai le rorêltuhai le mipuihai hmaa chun, “Sin hi a nasain a lien êm a, kula hin ei inhlatin ei indar hle el si a;
tawtawrâwt ri in hrietna hmun hmuna chun keini kuom tieng hung tlân khâwm unla; ei Pathien chun mi dopêk a tih,” ka ti a.
Chuong ang chun sin chu kan thaw a, chun, a zâtve chun vârṭiena inthawka arasi inlang chen feihai chu an kawl zing a.
Chuong ang bawkin chuong lai chun mipuihai kuoma chun, “Zâna mi vênga, sûna sin thaw dingin tukhawm an siehlawhai leh Jerusalem sûngah riek vawng raw hai se,” ka ti a.

Chuongchun, kei khawm, ka unauhai khawm, ka tlangvâlhai khawm, vêngtu a mi zui hlakhai khawm, tukhawma kan silfên kan hlîp hrim hrim naw a, hriemhrei inbel pum zingin tui tienga chun kan fe hlak a nih.
Chun, mipuihai le an nuhmeihai chu an unau Judahai chunga chierin an khêk ta mur mur el a,
“Eini rawi hi ei naupasalhai le ei naunuhmeihai leh tam tâwk tak ei na; bu hi inchûin inchû el ei tiu, ei fâka ei hring theina dingin,” ti dâm an um a.
Chun, ṭhenkat, “Ei lohai, ei inhai, ei grêp huonhai hrên dingin ei sie si a, ṭâm lei hin bu hi ân chûin inchû el ei tiu,” ti dâm khawm an um bawk a.
“Ei lohai, ei grêp huonhai hrên dinga siein lal kuoma dâm sie chawi dingin sum dâm ei pûk a.

Ei taksa chu ei unauhai taksa ang bawk a na; ei nauhai khawm an nauhai ang bawk an ni si a; nisienlakhawm, hi, ei naunuhmeihai, ei naupasalhai hi siehlawa um dingin suokah ei inlûttir takngiel ding a ni hi; ei naunuhmei ṭhenkhat lem chu suokah an lût ta nghe nghe a, san ngaina hre nghâl lo me; mihaiin ei huonhai le ei grêp huonhai chu an nei ta si a,” ti dâm an um nuol bawk a.
Chuong thuhai le an rihâu chu ka hrietin ka lunginsen êm êm el a.

Chuongchun, ka lungrilin ka ngaituo a, mi ṭhahai le rorêltuhai chu ka khak a, an kuomah, “Mi tinin in unauhai a pung hnawtin sum in inpûktir zing el a,” ka ti a. Chun, an chungchâng chu ngaituo dingin mi ka ko khâwm ṭeu el a.
An kuomah, “Hnam dang kuoma zawra um ei unau Judahai chu ei thei ang angin ei intlan a; nangni hin in unauhai hi zawr in tum a ni maw? Nangni
“In thil thaw hi a ṭha naw tawp el a nih: ei hmêlma, hnam danghai mi hrilsietna lei hin ei Pathien chu ṭia in um a ṭûl a ni naw am a nih?
Kei le ka unauhai le ka mihai khawmin kan sum le bu kan inpûktir ve bawk in sawnnaw. A pung hnawta inpûktir hi bân dai ei tiu khai.
Vawisûn ngei hin an lohai, an grêp huonhai, an oliv huonhai, an inhai le, an sum le an bu le an uoin le hriek hmun zaa hmun khat in lâk hlak khawm chu, pe nâwk vawng ro khai,” ka ti bawk a.

Chuongchun, anni chun, “Pe nâwk vawng kan tih, annia inthawkin iengkhawm phût naw ning ungah; i ti ang tak chun thâwng kan tih,” an ti a. Chuongchun, thiempuhai ka ko a, an hmaah chu thutiem ang taka thaw ngei ding chun kân khâmtir a.

Ka dierkei chu ka thin a, “Hi thutiem anga thaw naw taphawt chu Pathien chun a ina inthawk le a sinthawa inthawkin hieng ang hin thinthla raw se; hieng anga thin thlâkin um sienla, sukruokin um raw se,” ka ti a. Chun, a pungkhâwmhai po po chun, “Amen,” an ti a, Lalpa an inpâk a. Chun, mipuihai chun chu thutiem ang chun an thaw ta a.

Chu naw khawm chu Juda rama anni awptu dinga ruot ka ni china inthawk, lal Artazerzia kum sâwmhni ân lal kuma inthawka kum sâwmthum pahni ân lal kum chen, kum sâwm pahni sûng chun kei le ka unauhai hin ram awptu puol bei hrim hrim khawm kan fâk ngai naw a.

Nisienlakhawm, kha hmaa ram awptu ka hmaa lo umhai chu mihai chungah lu an lo ling hle a, tangka shekel sâwmli tiem lovin an beihai le uoinhai an lâkpêk hlak a; a chu nâksapah an siehlawhai chu mihai chunga chun an insuklal hle hlak a; amiruokchu, kei chun chu Pathien ṭina leiin chuong ang chun ka thaw ve nawh.
Anih, hi kul sin thaw hin ka um zing a, ram hrim hrim inchâwk khawm kân châwk naw a: ka mihai po po khawm sin chu thawin chutaka chun an um khâwm zing a nih.
Chu chau khawm chu ni lovin kan vêla hnam danghai laia inthawka hunghai tiem lovin Judahai le rorêltuhai laia mi ka dawkâna awt hlak mi za le sâwmnga an um zing a nih.

Chun, ni khat dinga an buotsai chu sebâwngchal pakhat le berâm paruk a ṭha ṭhieu a na; chun, ârhai khawm ka ta dingin an buotsai a, ni sâwm dan peiah uoin hran hran tam tâwk tak leh; chuong ang chun buotsai hai sienla khawm hieng mihai tuor hi a rik êm leiin ram awptu puol bei chu ka phût naw hrim hrim a nih.
Aw ka Pathien, hieng mihai ta dinga ka thilthawhai po po hi ka ṭhatna dingin hre zing raw aw.

Chun, Sanballat le Tobia le Arab mi Gesem le kan hmêlma dang hrim hrimhaiin kulhai ka siem a, a chimna lai hrim hrim a um ta nawh ti an hang hriet chun, (amiruokchu, chuong lai chun kawthaia chun kawtkhârhai chu ka la rem naw a),
Sanballat le Gesem chun, “Hung la, Ono phaia khuo pakhatah intuok khâwm ei tiu,” tiin thu an mi hung inphur a. Nisienlakhawm, ka chunga thil ṭha naw thaw tum an lo ni zing a.
Kei chun an kuomah, “Sin ropuitak ka thaw a, ka hung thla thei nawh, ieng dingin am in kuoma ka hung thlâk kârin sin chu châwl el a ta?” tiin mi ka tir a.
Chuong ang ruok chun vawi li thu an hung inphur a, chuong ang ruok chun kei khawma ka dawn a.
Chuongchun, Sanballat chun chuong ang bawk chun a vawi nganaa chun a siehlaw chu lekha châr lova chawiin ka kuomah a hung tir a;

chutaka chun, “Nang le Judahai hin hel in lungril a, chuleiin, kul chu i siem a nih ti thu hnam danghai lai chun ân thang a, Gesem khawm hin a hril bawk a; chun, an hril pei dâna chun nang hi an lal ding i ni âwm a.

Chun, ‘Juda rama chun lal a um,’ tia i chanchin Jerusalema hril vêl dingin zâwlnei khawm i ruot hiel ta bawk a; hieng thu hi lal kuoma chun hril vak ngei an ta. Chuleiin, hung la, lo inrâwn ei ti khai,” ti hi a chuong a.
Chuongchun, a kuomah, “I hril ang hrim hrim hin iengkhawm thaw a um nawh, i phuokfâwm el a ni hi,” tiin mi ka tir a.
“An sinthaw chu an puitling thei nawna dingin an kuthai chu suksietin um a tih,” tiha mi hrilṭi nuom ruok an nih. Chuongchun, aw Pathien, ka kuthai hi mi hung sukhrâtpêk raw aw.

Chu hnunga chun Mehetabel nau Delaia naupa Semaia, insuktumpa ina chun ka fe a; ama chun, “Pathien inah, biekin sûng ngeiah inhmûng ei ti khai; biekin kawtkhârhai chu khâr tlat ei ta; nangma that ding chein an hung ding a nih, zânah a nih that ding chea an hung nghe nghe ding chu,” a lo ti a.
Kei ruok chun, “Keia ang hi hang tlânse el ding khawm am ka nih? Mâni hringna humhim nuom chun tu am biekina chun lût an ta? Lût dêr naw ning,” ka ti a.
Chun, ka hang hriet dawk a, Pathien tir a lo ni dêr da el a; keima mi dodâlin chuong thu chu a hril a lo ni lem a, Tobia le Sanballatin an ruoi a lo ni zing a.
Ka ṭi a, chuong anga ka thaw a, thil ka suksuol a, a mi sukhmingsietna ding an nei theina dingin a nih an ruoi chu.
Aw ka Pathien, Tobia le Sanballat hi an thilthaw ang pei hin hre zing rawh, zâwlneinu Noadia le zâwlnei dang mi sukṭi tumtuhai po po le hin.
Chuongchun, kul chu ni sâwmnga le ni hniah, Elul thla ni sâwmhni panga niin zo a ni ta a.
Chun, kan hmêlmahai po poin chu chu an lo hriet chun, kan vêla hnam danghai chun an ṭi ta a, chan se ta hlein an inhriet a, sin chu kan Pathien thaw a nih ti an hriet ta si a.
Chu naw hrima khawm, chuong lai chun Juda mi ṭhahai chun Tobia chu lekha tamtak an inphur hlak a; chun, Tobia lekha khawm an hmu bawk hlak.
Ama chu Ara naupa Sekania mâkpa a ni leiin, Juda rama mi tamtak inkhâm hiela ama inthuruolpui an um a; chun, a naupa Jehohanan chun Berekia naupa Mesullam naunu chu nuhmeiah a nei a nih.
Ka hrieta chun a thilthaw ṭhahai chu an hril hlak a, ka thu hrilhai a kuoma chun an intlun bawk hlak. Chuongchun, Tobia chun mîn ṭhi dingin lekha dâm chu a hung thawn hlak a nih.
Chun, kulhai chu kan siem a, kawtkhârhai chu ka rem ta a, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai, hla saktuhai, Levihai ruot an ni zo chun,
ka unau Hanani le, kulbîng hotu Hanania chu Jerusalem chu kân awptir a; mi ringumtak, mi dang tamtak nêka Pathien ṭi mi a na.

Chun, an kuomah, “Jerusalem kawtkhârhai hi nisa inkâng hma chun hawng ni naw sienla; vêngtuhai an la ngir laiin kawthai chu khârin kal tlat raw hai se; chun, Jerusalema umhai laia mi vêngtuhai ruot unla, mi tin mâni ngîr hmun hmunah, mi tin mâni in zâwn sengah,” ka ti a.
Khuo chu a lienin ân dar hle si a, a mi umhai chu an tlâwm hle a, inhai khawm chu la bâwl lo an ni tâwl si a.

Chun, ka Pathien chun ka lungrilah, mi ṭhahai, rorêltuhai, mipuihai ko khâwm vawnga an thlatuhai dungzuia tiem dingin a mîn hriettir a. Chun, a phut taka hang fehai thlatuhai hming ziekna bu chu ka hmu suok a; chutaka chun hieng anga ziek hi ka hmu a:
Sala ṭhuoi Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin a ṭhuoihai laia, sala intâng suoka, Jerusalem le Juda rama mâni khuo senga kîr nâwka, chu rama um tahai chu hienghai hi an nih:
Zerubbabel, Jesua, Nehemia, Azaria, Raamia, Nahamani, Mor-dekai, Bilsan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum le Baana hai ruol hin an fe a nih. Israelhai laia mi vântlâng tam tieng chu:
Paros thlahai sâng hni, za sâwmsari pahni.
Sephatia thlahai za thum, sâwmsari pahni.
Ara thlahai za ruk, sâwmnga pahni.
Jesua le Joab thlahai laia Pahath-Moab thlahai sâng hni, za riet, sâwmpariet.
Elam thlahai sâng khat, za hni, sâwmnga pali.
Zattu thlahai za riet, sâwmli panga.
Zakkai thlahai za sari sâwmruk.
Binnui thlahai za ruk, sâwmli pariet.
Bebai thlahai za ruk, sâwmhni pariet.
Azgad thlahai sâng hni, za thum, sâwmhni pahni.
Adonikam thlahai za ruk, sâwmruk pasari.
Bigvai thlahai sâng hni, sâwmruk pasari.
Adin thlahai za ruk, sâwmnga panga.
Hezekia thlaa mi Ater thlahai sâwmkuo pariet.
Hasum thlahai za thum, sâwmhni pariet.
Bezai thlahai za thum, sâwmhni pali.
Hariph thlahai za sâwmpahni.
Gibeon thlahai sâwmkuo panga.
Bethlehem le Netopha khuoa mi za, sâwmriet pariet.
Anathoth khuoa mi za, sâwmhni pariet.
Beth-azmaveth khuoa mi sâwmli pahni.
Kiriath-jearim dâm, Kephira dâm le, Beeroth khuoa mi za sari, sâwmli pathum.
Rama le Geba khuoa mi za ruk, sâwmhni pakhat.
Mikmas khuoa mi za, sâwmhni pahni.
Bethel le Ai khuoa mi za, sâwmhni pathum.
Nebo danga mi sâwmnga pahni.
Elam dang thlahai sâng khat, za hni, sâwmnga pali.
Harim thlahai za thum sâwmhni.
Jeriko thlahai za thum, sâwmli panga.
Lod thlahai le, Hadid le Ono thlahai za sari, sâwmhni pakhat.
Senaa thlahai sâng thum, za kuo sâwmthum:
Thiempuhai: Jesua sûnghai laia mi Jedai thlahai za kuo, sâwmsari pathum.
Immer thlahai sâng khat, sâwmnga pahni.
Pas-hur thlahai sâng khat, za hni, sâwmli pasari.
Harim thlahai sâng khat sâwmpasari.
Levi-hai: Hodeva
Hlasaktuhai: Asaph thlahai za, sawmli pariet.
Kawtkhâr vêngtuhai: Sallum thlahai, Ater thlahai, Talmon thlahai, Akkub thlahai, Hatita thlahai, Sobai thlahai za khat, sawmthum pariet.
Nethinim hai: Ziha thlahai, Hasupha thlahai, Tabboath thlahai,
Keros thlahai, Sia thlahai, Padon thlahai,
Lebana thlahai, Hagaba thlahai, Salmai thlahai,
Hanan thlahai, Giddel thlahai, Gahar thlahai,
Reaia thlahai, Rezin thlahai, Nekoda thlahai,
Gazzam thlahai, Uzza thlahai, Pasea thlahai,
Besai thlahai, Meunim thlahai, Nephusesim thlahai,
Bakbuk thlahai, Hakupha thlahai, Harhur thlahai,
Bazlith thlahai, Mehida thlahai, Harsa thlahai,
Barkos thlahai, Sisera thlahai, Tema thlahai,
Nezia thlahai, Hatipha thlahai.
Solomon siehlaw thlahai: Sotai thlahai, Sophereth thlahai, Perida thlahai,
Jaala thlahai, Darkon thlahai, Giddel thlahai,
Sephatia thlahai, Hattil thlahai, Pokereth-hazzebaim thlahai, Amon thlahai.
Temple siehlaw po po le Solomon siehlawhai thlahai chu za thum, sâwmkuo pahni an nih.

Chun, Tel-mela dâm, Tel-harsa dâm, Kerub dâm, Addon dâm, Immera inthawk dâma hunghai chu hienghai hi an na; nisienlakhawm, an pi le puhai sûnghai le an thla peihai Israel mi an ni le an ni naw an sui thei ta naw a;
Delaia thlahai, Tobia thlahai, Nekoda thlahai za ruk, sâwmli pahni.
Chun, thiempuhai laia mi: Hobaia thlahai, Hakkoz thlahai, Gilead mi (Barzillai naunuhai laia mi nuhmeia neia, an hming put nghâl tah,) Barzillai thlahai chu.
chuonghai chun an thlatuhai ang peia tiemhai laia chun an hming ziekna an zawng a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu naw a; chuleiin, thieng lo anga ngaiin an um a, an thiempu nina chu an bân a.
Chun, ram awptu chun anni chu Urim le Thummim inbela thiempu a ngîr hmakhat chun thil serhai chu an fâk ding a ni nawh ti a hril a.
Mipui pungkhâwm po po chu sîng li, sâng hni, za thum le sâwmruk an nih,
an siehlaw nuhmei le pasal sâng sari, za thum, sâwmthum pasari tiem lovin; chun, hlasaktu nuhmei le pasal za hni, sâwmli panga an nei a.
An sakawr chu za sari, sâwmthum paruk a nih; an sabengtung lien chi chu za hni, sâwmli panga a nih;
an sanghâwngsei chu za li sâwmthum panga a nih; an sabengtung chu sâng ruk, za sari, sâwmhni a nih.
Chun, sûngkuo luhai ṭhenkhathai chun chu sina ding chun an pêk a. Ram awptu chun thawlâwmah rângkachak darik sâng khat, maihûn sâwmnga, thiempu silfên za nga le sâwmthum a thaw a.
Chun, sûngkuo lu ṭhenkhathai chun in bâwlna ding thawlâwmah rângkachak darik sing hni le, tangkaruo bûk sâng hni le za hni an thaw a.
Chun, mi dang po pohai pêk chu rângkachak darik sîng hni le tangkaruo bûk sâng hni le thiempu silfên sâwmruk le pasari a nih.

Chuongchun, thiempuhai, Levi mihai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai, hlasaktuhai le mi ṭhenkhathai le temple siehlawhai le Israel mi po po chu mâni khuo sengah an um ta a. Chuongchun, thla sarina a hung tlung chun Israel mi po po chu an khuohaia chun an um a.
Chun, mi po po chu lungril hmunkhatin Tui kawtkhâr zâwn hmun lienna laia chun an fe khâwm a; chun, lekhaziektu Ezra chu
Chuongchun, thla sarina, ni khat niin thiempu Ezra chun pungkhâwmhai nutling, patling le a hrethiem thei chin po po hmaa chun Dân chu a hung chawi a.

Chutaka mi chu Tui kawtkhâr hmazâwn hmun lienna laia chun nutling, patling le a hrethiem thei chinhai lai zîngtienga inthawkin sûn chenin a tiem a; mi po po chun Dân bu thua chun an na an sit ṭhuop el a.

Chun, chuong ang dinga an siem hrim thing dawkân insânga chun lekhaziektu Ezra chu a ngîr a, a sir changtienga chun Mattithia, Sema, Anaia, Uria, Hilkia le Maaseia hai an ngîr a; chun, a vawitienga chun Pedaia, Misael, Malkija, Hasum, Hasbaddana, Zekaria le Mesullam an ngîr a.
Chun, Ezra chun mi po po mithmua chun lekhabu ziel chu a hang sût a, (mi po po nêka insânga ngîr a na), chun, a hang sût chun mi po po chu an ngîr ta vawng a;
chuongchun, Ezra chun
Jesua, Bani, Serebia, Jamin, Akkub, Sabbethai, Hodia, Maaseia, Kelita, Azaria, Zojabad, Hanan, Pelaia, Levi mihai chun mipuihai kuomah Dân an hrilfie a: mipuihai chu an ngirhmuna chun an um zing a.
Chun, Lekhabu Pathien Dân bua mi chu fietakin an tiem a; a umzie an hrilfie a, chuongchun, an tiem chu an inhriettir pei a.
Chun, ram awptu Nehemia le thiempu le lekhaziektu ni fâwm Ezra le mipuihai inchûktirtu Levi mihai chun mipui po po kuoma chun, “Vawisûn ni hi
Chuongchun, ama chun an kuomah, “Fe unla, a thâu thâu fa unla, a thlum thlum dâwn unla, iengkhawm buotsai nei lohai ta dingin chanpuol inphur unla, vawisûn ni hi ei
Chuongchun, Levi mihai chun, “To ṭawk ṭawk ro khai, vawisûn hi ni inthieng a ni si a; lungngai khawm lungngai nuom naw ro,” tiin, mipui po po chu an sukto ta ṭhuop el a.
Chuongchun, thu a hrilfie chu an hrietthiem leiin mipui po po chu fa ding dâmin, dâwn ding dâmin, mi dang chanpuol thawn ding dâmin, hlimtaka um ding dâm chun an ṭîn ta vawng a.
Chun, a ni hni ni chun sûngkaw tinrênga a luhai dâm, thiempuhai dâm, Levi mihai chu Dân thu inchûk ding bawk chun lekhaziektu Ezra kuoma chun an fe khâwm a.
Chun,

an ziek anga, “Tlângah fe unla, oliv kauhai, oliv hlêm kauhai le inhmui kauhai, intûm kauhai dâm, thing lien taktak kauhai chu sâwlbûk bâwlna dingin va la ro,” tiin an khuo po poa le, Jerusalem khuoa chun an hrildar ding thu le, puong vêl ding a ni thu dâm chu an tiem a.

Chuong ang chun mipuihai chu an va fe a, mi po poin an in chunghaia dâm, an kawthaia dâm, Pathien in kawta dâm, Tui kawtkhâr hmun lienna laia dâm, Ephraim kawtkhâr hmun lienna laia dâm sâwlbûk an bâwl seng a.

Chun, sala suok pungkhâwmhai po po chun sâwlbûk an siem a. Sâwlbûkhaia chun an um a; Nun naupa Josua chena inthawk tah, Israel nauhai chun chuong ang lâwm chun an la thaw ngai naw a. Chuongchun, lâwmna nasatak a hung um ta a,
ni tin a ṭantir nia inthawka a tâwp chenin Pathien Dân bua mi an tiem bawk a. Ruoiṭhe chun ni sari an aw a; chun a ni riet ni chu thupêk anga a ṭumṭiekna ni chu a nih.
Chuongchun, chu thla ni sâwmhni pali ni chun Israel thlahai chu bu ngheia, saiip puon sila an lua pilvut kai nungin an fe khâwm tâwl a.
Chun, Israel hnam chu hnam danghai laia chun an insuktum a; an ngîr a, an suolnahai le an pi le puhai bawsietna thupha an chawi a.
Chun, mâni hmun sengah an ngîr a, chu ni hmun lia ṭhea hmun khat sûng chun
Chuongchun, Levi mihai dawkân insânga chun Jesua, Bani, Kadmiel, Sebania, Bunni, Serebia, Bani, Kenani hai chu an ngîr a; inringtakin
Chuongchun, Levi mi, Jesua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hasabneia, Serebia, Hodia, Sebania le Pethahia hai chun an hril a, “Ngîr unla,
“Nangma chau hi
Abram chu thlanga, Kaldai ram Ur khuoa inthawka ṭhuoi suoka, a hminga Abraham saktu,

chun, a lungril chu i hmaa chun ringumin i hriet a; Kanaan mihai, Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Periz mihai, Jebus mihai, Girgas mihai ram chu ama kuoma pe dingin, a thlahai chena pe dingin thu i thlung a; chun, i thu chu i hlen bawk a, feltak i ni si a.
Aigupta rama kan pi le puhai rinumzie chu i hmu zing a, Tuipui Sen kama an khêkri chu i hriet a;
Pharao le a siehlawhai po po le, a rama mi po pohai chungah inchikna le thilmakhai în langtir a; chapotakin an chunga thil an thaw ti i hriet si a, chuongchun, tu chen hin hming în siem ta a.
Chun, an hmaa chun Tuipui Sen chu i sukṭhe a, tuipui laiah hnuoi hulah chun in fe thlengtir a; anni hnawttuhai ruok chu tui inthûktakah, tui nasataka lung pei lût ang elin i pei lût a.
Sûna chun sûm ngîrin i ṭhuoi hlak a, zâna khawm an fena ding lampuia anni ên dingin meichawk ngîrin i ṭhuoi hlak.
Sinai tlânga chun i hung ṭum bawk a, vâna inthawkin an kuoma chun thu i hril a; rorêlna indiktakhai dâm, dân indiktakhai dâm, thuruot le thupêk ṭha takhai chu i pêk a;
i châwlni inthieng chu anni în hriettir a, i siehlaw Mosie hmangin thupêk dâm, thuruot dâm, dân dâm i pêk a;
an phîngṭam sukrena dingin vâna inthawkin bei i pêk a, an dangchâr sukrêna dingin lungpuia inthawkin tui i suksuokpêk a, i bân phar meua, ‘Pêng ka tih,’ i ti ram hluo ding thu i pêk a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni le kan pi le puhai chun, chapotakin thil an thaw a, an insukkâwmaw a, i thupêk chu an pawm naw a,

an awi nuom naw a, anni laia i thilmak thawhai khawm chu an hriet nuom ta bawk naw a; an insukkâwmaw a, an helin an suok nina tienga lêt nâwk dingin hotu an ruot lem a; amiruokchu, nang chu ngaidam dinga inzosa zing Pathien, mi lunginsiet thei, lainatnaa sip, lung inuoi, zainêmna hau i na, anni chu i nghatsan chuong naw a.
Anih, an ta dingin bâwngtê lim an siem a, ‘Hi hi a nih, Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoisuoktu che i pathien chu,’ an ti a, lunginsenumtak thil an thaw lai khawm khan,

i lunginsietna nasatak chun thlalêra khan i thlathlam chuong naw a: lampuia anni ṭhuoi dinga an chunga sûm ngîr chun sûnah anni a mâksan chuong naw a, anni ên ding le an fena lampui khîkhmu dinga meichawk ngîr khawm chun zânah a fesan bawk nawh.
Anni inchûktir dingin i thlarau ṭhatak chu i pêk bawk a, i manna chu an baua a lût i phal naw naw a, an dangchâr sukrêna dingin tui i pêk a.
Anih, thlalêra khan kum sâwmli i châwm a, iengkhawm an tlasam naw a; an silfênhai chu a hlui naw a, an kehai khawm chu ân vûng bawk naw a.
Chun, ram le hnamhai i pêk a, chuonghai chu an chanpuol i sempêk seng a; chuongchun, Sihon ram Hesbon lal ram le, Basan lal Og ram chu an hluo a.
An thlahai chu vâna arasi zâtin i sukpung bawk a; an hluo dinga an pi le puhai kuoma i lo hril tah rama chun i ṭhuoi lût ta a.
Chuongchun, an thlahai chun ram chu an hluo ta a, chun, nangin chu rama um Kanaan mihai chu an hmaah i suktlâwm a, an nuom nuom an law dingin an lalhai le chu rama mihai le chun an kutah i pêk a.

Kulnei khawpuihai le ram ṭhatak takhai chu an lâk a, thilṭha tinrênga sip inhai chu an hluo a, tuikhur huotsa hai, grêp huonhai, oliv huon dâm, thei kûng tamtakhai chu an nei a; chuongchun, an fâk a, an khawp a, an hung thâu a, i ṭhatna nasataka chun nuom an chên a.
Nisienlakhawm, an hung kâwmaw a, i chungah an hel a, i Dân chu an hnungsawn dai a, nangma tieng innghattir nâwk tumtu i zâwlneihai chu an that a, lungsenumtak tak thilhai an thaw a.

Chuleichun, anni sukrinumtu an hmêlmahai kuta chun i pêk a; an lunginzîng laia an ko lai che khan vâna inthawk chun i lo ngai a; i zainêmna nasatak chun an hmêlmahaia inthawkin sansuoktu ding sandamtuhai i pêk a.

Nisienlakhawm, râlmuonga an hung um hnung chun i mithmuah thil ṭha naw an thaw nâwk el a: chuleiin, an hmêlmahai kutah i pêk a; chuongchun, an chungah thu an nei a; nisienlakhawm, an hung inleta an ko lai che khan vâna inthawkin i lo ngai a; vawi tamtak i zainêmna chun i sansuok a.

“I dâna i ṭhuoi lût thei nâwkna dingin i kâwk hlak a; nisienlakhawm, chapotakin thil an thaw a, i thupêkhai an pawm naw a, i rorêlna kalin thil an suksuol a; (miin an zâwma an hringpui ding chu); chun, an tukhnungkhur an innghat a, an insukkâwmaw a, an ngai nuom naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, kum tamtak anni chu i daw a, i thlaraua i zâwlneihai hmangin i kâwk hlak a; nisienlakhawm, an na an suksêt a; chuleiin, chu rama mihai kuta chun i pêk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, i zainêmna nasatak chun an tâwp sawng elna ding chu în tlungtir naw a; i thlathlam chuong bawk nawh, Pathien mi lunginsiet theitak, lainatnaa sip i ni si a.

Chuleiin, kan Pathien, Pathien ropui, iengkim thawthei le ṭium, thuthlung hlena lunginsietna suklangtu chun keini chunga le kan lalhai, kan mi lienhai dâm, kan thiempuhai dâm, kan zâwlneihai dâm, kan pi le puhai le i mihai po po chungah, Assuria lalhai inlal laia inthawka tu chena rinumna hung tlung zozai hi thil chîn thamah ngai naw rawh.
Iengkhawm ni sienla kan chunga thil hung tlung po poa hin, nang chu i fel a; nang chun indiktakin thil i thaw a, keini ruok chun ṭha naw takin kan thaw a nih;
kan lalhai dâm, kan mi lienhai dâm, kan thiempuhai dâm, kan pi le kan puhai khawmin i Dân chu an zâwm naw a, i thupêk le i thuinhriettir, anni i kâwknahai chu an pawm bawk nawh.
An chunga i ṭhat thei vei leh, an ramah, ram lientak le ram ṭhatak i pêka chun i rawng an bâwlpêk si naw che a, an thil suksuol khawm an bân chuong bawk nawh.
Ngai ta, tu hlak hin mi salhai kan ni chu a ni el ta a; ram, a sûng thil ra le, thil ṭha kan pi le puhai fâk dinga i pêk hlak chu, ngai ta, chutaka chun salhai kan ni el ta a.
Kan suol leia kan chunga lal dinga i ruothai hlak chun an neinung pha a, kan taksa chunga le kan ranhai chung takngiela khawm an nuom nuomin thu an nei a, kan lunginzîng êm êm el a nih,” tiin.
Chuong po po lei chun thu dettak kan thlung a, kan ziek a, kan mi lienhai, kan Levi mihai le kan thiempuhaiin an namdetpui a.
Chuongchun, a mi namdetpuituhai chu Hakalia naupa, ram awptu Nehemia le Zedekia,
Seraia, Azaria, Jeremia,
Pas-hur, Amaria, Malkija,
Hattus, Sebania, Malluk,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadia,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruk,
Mesullam, Abija, Mijamin,
Maazia, Bilgai le Semaia hai: hienghai hi thiempuhai an nih.
Chun, Levi mihai chu: Azania naupa Jesua, Henadad naupahai laia mi Bennui, Kadmiel,
chun, an unau Sebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaia, Hanan,
Mika, Rehob, Hasabia,
Zakkur, Serebia, Sebania,
Hodia, Bani le Beninu hai.
Mipui hotuhai chu: Paros, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonija, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekia, Azzur,
Hodia, Hasum, Bezai,
Hariph, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpias, Mesullam, Hezir,
Mesezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatia, Hanan, Anaia,
Hosea, Hanania, Hassub,
Hallohes, Pilha, Sobek,
Rehum, Hasabna, Maaseia,
Ahia, Hanan, Anan,
Malluk, Harim le Baana hai an nih.

Chun, mi dang, thiempuhai, Levi mihai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai, hlasaktuhai, temple siehlawhai le Pathien Dân zâwm tuma chuong rama mihaia inthawka insiekienghai po po, an nuhmeihai, an naupasalhai, an naunuhmeihai, hrietna le hrietthiemna neihai taphawt chun,
an unauhai, an mi lienhai chu an chel tlat a, ṭawngsephur dinga inkhâm rauin thu an tiem a; Pathien siehlaw Mosie pêk Pathien Dân zâwm dinga
chu rama mihai chu kan naunuhmeihai inneitir lo a, kan naupasalhai ta dinga an naunuhmeihai nei bawk lo a,

chu rama mihaiin châwlnia thil zawr ding thuomhnaw amanih, fâk ding hrim hrim zawr amanih an hung lâk a, châwlnia manih, umni inser nia mania inchawpêk lo a; kum sarinaa ram sielui a, leiba po po ṭhin lo dingin.
Chun, kan Pathien in tienga rawngbâwlna dinga shekel hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat kum tina pêk dingin dân kan ta dingin kan siem bawk a;

bei inhlân ding le, beiphit thil inhlân ding le, pumrawhmang thilinhlân rawp ding dâmin, châwlnia ding dâmin, thla thara ding dâmin, hunbi nei ruoiṭhea ding dâmin, thil inthienga ding dâmin, Israel mihai ta dinga inremna siemna dinga suol inthâwinaa ding le, kan Pathien in tienga thaw ding po po thawna ding dâmin.
Kan pi le puhai sûngkuo ang peia kum tina hunbi ruota Dân bu ziek anga,
chun, kum tina kan loa thlai thar hmasa tak le, thing chi tinrêng ra hmasa tak
Dâna ziek anga kan naupasal le kan ran pieng hmasa takhai, kan bâwng ruol le berâm ruol laia pieng hmasa takhai khawm kan Pathien ina rawngbâwltu thiempuhai kuoma kan Pathien ina ṭhuoi ding dâm;

kan Pathien in pindana thiempuhai kuoma kan bei hmet hmasa tak dâm, a thêna thêna kan thilinhlânhai dâm, thing chi tinrêng rahai dâm, uoin le hriek chawi ding dâm; kan loa mi sâwmapakhat Levi mihai pêk ding dâmin dân kan ta dingin kan siem bawk a, anni Levi mihai chun kan khuo laia lohma nei khuo taphawtah sâwmapakhat an lâk hlâk a nih.

Chun, Levi mihaiin sâwmapakhat an lâk laiin Aron thla thiempu chu Levi mihai kuoma chun an um ding a nih; Levi mihai chun sâwma pakhat an ilâka sâwma pakhat chu kan Pathien inah ro siekhâwmna pindana chun an hung sie ding a nih.

Israel mipuihai le Levi naupasalhai chun bu le uoin le hriek a thêna thêna thilinhlân hmun inthieng bûr-le-bêl le rawngbâwltu thiempuhai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai dâm, hlasaktuhai umna pindana chun an sie ding a nih; chuong ang chun a nih, kan Pathien in chu thlathlam lo dinga dân kan insiempêk chu.
Mipuihai hotuhai chu Jerusalema chun an um a; sâwm laia pakhat pei khawpui inthieng Jerusalema um ding le sâwm laia pakuo khaw danga um dinghai inhrietna dingin, mi dang po chun ṭhum an vâwr a.
Lungnitaka Jerusalema um dinga inpehai po po chun mipuihai inpâk an hlaw a.
Jerusalema chun Juda mi le Benjamin mihai chu an um a. Juda mihai laia mi Perez thlahai laia mi Mahalalel naupa Sephatia, chu naupa Amaria, chu naupa Zekaria, chu naupa Uzzia, chu naupa Athaia le
Silon mi naupa Zekaria, chu naupa Joiarib, chu naupa Adaia, chu naupa Hazaia, chu naupa Kolhoze, chu naupa Baruk, chu naupa Maaseia.
Perez thlahai Jerusalema um chu mi huoisen za li, sâwmruk pariet an nih.
Chun, Benjamin mihai chu hieng hi an nih: Jesaia naupa Ithiel, chu naupa Maaseia, chu naupa Kolaia, chu naupa Pedaia, chu naupa Joed, chu naupa Mesullam, chu naupa Sallu.
Ama hnunga chun Gabbai hai, Sallai hai, mi za kuo, sâwmhni pariet.
Chun, Zikri naupa Joel chu an hotu a na; Hassenua naupa Juda chu khaw hotu tak dawttu a nih.
Thiempuhai laia mi; Joiarib naupa Jedai hai, Jakin hai,
Pathien in hotu Ahitub naupa Meraioth, chu naupa Zadok, chu naupa Mesullam, chu naupa Hilkia, chu naupa Seraia hai;
an unau, ina rawngbâwltuhai chu, za riet, sâwmhni pahni an nih; chun, Malkija naupa Pas-hur, chu naupa Zekaria, chu naupa Amzi, chu naupa Pelalia, chu naupa Jeroham, chu naupa Adaia,
le a unauhai, an sûngkaw luhai leh za hni, sâwmli pahni an nih; chun, Immer naupa Mesillemoth, chu naupa, Ahzai, chu naupa Azarel, chu naupa Amasai,
le an unau mi hrât huoisen za, sâwmhni pariet an nih; an hotu chu Haggedolim naupa Zabdiel a nih.
Chun, Levi mihai laia mi: Bunni naupa Hasabia, chu naupa Azrikam; chu naupa Hassub, chu naupa Semaia leh;
Levi mi an ṭhuoituhai laia mi Pathien in puotieng sin enkawltu Sabbethai le Jozabad;
Asaph naupa Zabdi, chu naupa Mika, chu naupa lâwmthu hrila ṭawngṭaina ṭantu tak Mattania le, a unauhai laia a dawttu Bakbukia; Jeduthun naupa Galal, chu naupa Sammua, chu naupa Abda hai.
Khawpui inthienga Levi mi um po po chu za hni, sâwmriet pali an nih.
Chuong naw khawm chu kawtkhâr vêngtu Akkub hai, Talmon hai le, an unauhai kul kawtkhâr vêngtuhai za, sâwmsari pahni an nih.
A bâk Israelhai le thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu Juda ram khaw tinah mâni ram sengah an um a.
Temple siehlawhai ruok chu Ophelah an um a; Ziha le Gispa chu temple siehlawhai hotu an nih.
Jerusalem khuoa Levi mihai hotu chu Asaph naupa hla saktuhai laia mi Mika, chu naupa Mattania, chu naupa Hasabia, chu naupa Bania, chu naupa Uzzi a nih; Pathien in tieng sin ngaituotu a nih.
An sûngkaw chungchâng thuah lal thupêk a um a, hlasaktuhai chu ni tina an tlâk tâwk ding ruotpêk ding thu a um bawk a.
Juda naupa Zera thlaa mi Mesezabel naupa Pethahia chu mipuihai chungchâng thua iengkima lal aiaw a nih.
Chun, an khuo le an ram thua chun, Juda thlaa mi ṭhenkhathai chu, Kiriath-arba le a khawpera dâm, Dibon le a khawpera dâm, Zekabzeel le a khawpera dâm;
Jesuaa le Moladaa le Bethpeleta dâm,
Hazarsuala dâm, Beer-sebaa le a khawpera dâm;
Ziklaga dâm, Mekonaa le a khawpera dâm;
En-rimmona dâm, Zoraa dâm, Jarmuth-a dâm;
Zanoaa dâm, Adullama dâm, le an khawpera dâm, Lakis le a rama dâm, Azeka le a khawpera dâm chun an um a. Chuongchun, Beer-sebaa inthawkin Hinnom ruom chenin umhmun an khuor a.
Chun, Benjamin mihai chu Geba khêl tieng, Mikmas-a dâm, Aija-a dâm, Bethel le a khawperahai dâm:
Anathoth-a dâm, Nob-a dâm, Anania-a dâm,
Hazor-a dâm, Rama-a dâm, Gittaim-a dâm,
Hadid-a dâm, Zeboim-a dâm, Neballat-a dâm,
Lod-a dâm, themthiemhai ruom Ono-a dâm an um a.
Chun, Juda rama um hlak Levi mihai pâwl ṭhenkhat chu Benjamin rama chun an ṭhang ta a.
Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le Jesua kuoma fe ve thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu hieng hi an nih; Seraia, Jeremia, Ezra,
Amaria, Malluk, Hattus,
Sekania, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abija,
Mijamin, Maadia, Bilga,
Semaia, Joiarib, Jedaia,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkia le Jedaia. Hieng- hai hi Jesua dam laia thiempuhai lai le an unauhai laia hotuhai an nih.
Chuong naw khawm Levi mihai chu: Jesua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Serebia, Juda, lâwmthu hrila hotu Mattania, ama le a unauhai leh.
Bakbukia le Unno le an unauhai khawm chu a pâwl pâwlin inepin an ngîr hlak a.
Chun, Jesua chun Joiakim chu a nei a, Joiakim chun Eliasib a nei a, Eliasib chun Joiada a nei a,
Joiada chun Jonathan a nei a, Jonathan chun Jaddua a nei a nih.
Chun, hienghai hi Joiakim dam lai chun thiempu, an sûngkaw luhai chu an nih: Seraia thlaa mi Meraia; Jeremia thlaa mi Hanania;
Ezra thlaa mi Mesullam, Amaria thlaa mi Jehohanan;
Malluki thlaa mi Jonathan, Sebania thlaa mi Josef;
Harim thlaa mi Adna; Meraioth thlaa mi Helkai;
Iddo thlaa mi Zekaria; Ginnethon thlaa mi Mesullam;
Abija thlaa mi Zikri; Miniamin thlaa mi; Moadia thlaa mi Piltai;
Bilga thlaa mi Sammua; Semaia thlaa mi Jehonathan;
Joiarib thlaa mi Mattenai; Jedaia thlaa mi Uzzi;
Sallai thlaa mi Kallai; Amok thlaa mi Eber;
Hilkia thlaa mi Hasabia; Jedaia thlaa mi Nethanel.
Eliasib, Joiada, Johanan le Jaddua hai dam laia Levi mihai chu sûngkaw luhaia ziek an na; Persia mi Daria inlal laia thiempuhai khawm chu.
Eliasib naupa Johanan dam lai chen khawmin Levi nauhai sûngkaw luhai chu chanchin ziekna bua chun ziek an nih.
Chun, Levi chia a luhai: Hasabia, Serebia, Kadmiel naupa Jesua le an unau, Pathien mi David thupêk anga a pâwl pâwla inkhienga
Mattania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mesullam, Talmon le Akkub hai chu kawtkhâr kâwla thuomhnaw siekhâwmna le kawtkhâr vêngtuhai an nih.
Hienghai hi Jesua, Jozadak naupa Joiakim dam laia mi le ram awptu Nehemia le Ezra, thiempu le lakhaziektu dam laia mi an nih.

Jerusalem kul an inhlânnaa chun dârbenthekhai, perkhuonghai, ṭingṭanghai le hla sak le, lâwmthu hril lâwmtaka an inhlânnaa ṭhang dinga Jerusalema hung ṭhuoi dingin Levi mihai chu an hmun po poa inthawk chun an zawng suok a.
Jerusalem kâwl vêl le, Netophath mihai khuohaia inthawk dâmin hla sak hotu nauhai chu an fe khâwm a;
Beth-gilgal le, Geba le, Azmaveth rama inthawk dâm khâwmin hlasaktuhai chun Jerusalem vêla chun khuo an lo siem tâwl ta si a.
Chun, thiempuhai le Levi mihai chu an insukthieng a, chun, mipuihai, kulhai, a kawtkhârhai an sukthieng a.

Chuongchun, Judahai mi lienhai chu kul chunga chun ka hang ṭhuoi a; lâwmthu hrilna hla saktu ding pâwl lientak ve ve pahni ka ruot a; pâwl khat chu hmunhnawk kawtkhâr tieng, kul chung changtieng pangah an fe a;
chun, anni chu Hosaia le Juda mi lien zâtve hai;
Azaria, Ezra Mesullam,
Juda, Benjamin, Semaia, Jeremia,
tawtawrâwt chawi thiempu nau ṭhenkhathai le, Asaph naupa Zakkur, chu naupa Mikaia, chu naupa Mattania, chu naupa Semaia, chu naupa Jonathan, chu naupa Zekaria hai;
a unau Semaia, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Juda, Pathien mi David sut hlak thilhai chawi Hanani hai chun an zui a; chun, lekhaziektu Ezra chun an hma a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, tuikhur kawtkhâr an tlungin kul hang kai ṭannaa an hmazâwn David khaw kailâwna hang fein David in saka chun an fe a, saktieng panga Tui kawtkhâr tlung rakin.
Chun, lâwmthu hriltu pâwl danghai chu anni le intuok dingin vawi tieng pangah an fe a, chun, keiin mipui zâtve hai leh Meipui sepna Insâng sakah, kul chungah kullien chenin ka zui a,
Ephraim kawtkhâr chunga dâm, Kawtkhâr hluia dâm, nga kawtkhâra dâm, Hananel insânga dâm, Za insânga dâm, Beram kawtkhâr tlung rakin; chun, Vengtu kawtkhâra chun an ngîr a.
Chuongchun, lâwm thu hriltu pâwl hnihai chu Pathien inah an ngîr a, kei le rorêltu zâtve hai leh;
chun, tawtawrâwt chawi thiempuhai Eliakim, Maaseia, Miniamin, Mikaia, Elioenai, Zekaria le Hanania,
chun, Maaseia, Semaia, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkija, Elam le Ezer leh. Chun, hlasaktuhai chun an hotu Jezrahia rawiin inringtakin an sak a.

Chu ni chun inthâwina nasatak an inhlân a, an hlim hle el a; Pathienin hlim namên lovin a sukhlim a nih; chun, nuhmeihai le naupanghai chen khawmin an hlim hle a; chuongchun, Jerusalem hlimna chu hlataka inthawk khawmin ân hriet a.

Chun, chu ni chun thawlâwmhai, a thêna thêna thilinhlân dâm, thlai thar hmasa tak dâm, sâwmapakhat dâm, siekhâwmna pindanhaia hotu, dânin a ruot ang thiempu le Levi mihai chanvo khaw tin lohma izir ang pei la khâwmtu dinghai an ruot a; Judahai chu rawngbâwltu thiempu le Levi mihai lei chun an lâwm hle a.
An Pathien rawngbâwl dân ding le, insukthiengna dân chu an zâwm a, hlasaktuhai le kawtkhâr vengtuhai khawmin, David le a naupa Solomon thupêk ang chun.
Tienlaia David le Asaph dam lai chun hlasak pâwl hotu an um hlak a, Pathien inpâkna hla le lâwmna hla an sak hlak a nih.

Zerubbabel dam lai le, Nehemia dam lai chun Israel po poin hlasaktuhai le kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu ni tina an tlâk tâwk ding chanvo an siempêk hlak a; chun, Levi mihai chu chanvo a suktumpêk bawk a; chun, anni Levi mihai chun Aron naupasalhai chanvo chu an suktumpêk hlak a.
Chu ni chun mipui na hrieta chun Mosie lekhabu an tiem a; chutaka chun Ammon mihai le Moab mihai chu Pathien mihai inkhâwmnaa chun ieng lai khawmin an ṭhang ve dêr ding a ni nawh ti hi a chuong a;
Israel thlahai bei le tuia tuok lo a, anni ṭawngsie inphur dinga Balaam an ruoi lei khan; nisienlakhawm, ei Pathien chun ṭawngsie chu malsâwmnaah ân changtir ta lem a.
Chun, Dân chu an hang ngai zo chun Israel mihai laia inthawk chun anni chawkpawltu mipuihai chu an suktum ta a.
Chu hma chun kan Pathien in pindanhaia hotu dinga ruot thiempu Eliasib, Tobia tieng mi chun

kha hmaa Levi mihai, hlasaktuhai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chanvo, beiphit thilinhlân dâm, riminhnik dâm, bûr le bêlhai, bu sâwma pakhat dâm, uoin le hriek le thiempuhai ta ding a thêna thên thilinhlânhai an siena hlak pindan lientak Tobia ta ding chun a buotsaipêk a.

Nisienlakhawm, chuong thil po pohai um lai chun Jerusalem khuoah ka um naw a; Babulon lal Artazerzia kum sâwmthum pahni ân lal kumin lal kuoma chun ka fe a nih, ni ieng zât amani hnunga chun phalna ka hni nâwk a;
chun, Jerusalem khuoah ka va fe a, Pathien in inhuonna tuolsûng laia chun pindan buotsaipêka Tobia ta dinga Eliasab thil ṭha naw lo thaw chu ka hriet ta a.
A mi suklungninaw êm êm el a; chuleiin, Tobia in sûng thuomhnaw po po, chu pindana inthawk chun ka the suok vawng a.
Chun, thu ka pêk a, pindanhai chu an inthiel fai a; chuongchun, Pathien in bûr le bêlhai chu beiphit thilinhlânhai le riminhnikhai le chun ka lâklût nâwk a.
Chun, Levi mihai chu chanvo pêk an ni naw leiin, Levi mihai le hlasaktuhai chu mâni lo tieng sengah an tlândar ta ti ka hriet nâwk ta bawk a.
Chuongchun, rorêltuhai chu ka khak a, “Ieng dinga Pathien in hi thlathlam a ni zing el am a ni leh?” ka ti a. Anni chu ka ko khâwm vawng a, an hmun sengah kân umtir nâwk a.
Chuongchun, Juda mihai po po chun, bu sâwmapakhat dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm thawlâwm sie khâwmnaa chun an hung lâk khâwm tâwl a.

Chun, thiempu Selemia le lekhaziektu Zadok le Levi mihai laia mi Pedaia hai chu thawlâwm sie khâwmnahai hotu dingin ka siem a, anni ṭhangpuitu ding chun Mattania nau Zakkur naupa Hanan a um a; ringuma ngai an na; an sinthaw chu an unauhai laia thil sem vêl a nih.
Aw ka Pathien, hi thua hin mi hre zing la, ka Pathien in le a rawngbâwlna dinga ka thil thaw ṭhathai chu thaihmang lul naw rawh.

Chuong lai chun Juda rama chun châwlnia uoin sâwrna khura sir sâwr dâm, buphal hung phur dâm, uoin dâm, grêp dâm, theichang dâm, phurrik tinrêng inphurtir dinga siem sabengtung siem lai mêk dâm ka hmu a; chuong chu châwlniah Jerusalemah an hung phur lût a; fâk ding zawr nihaia chun ân dik nawzie kân hriettir a.
Tura rama mi chutaka chêng vehai khawmin ngahai le thuomhnaw tinrênghai an hung lâk a, châwlniin Juda mihai kuoma le Jerusalemah an zawr a.
Chuongchun, Juda mi lienhai chu ka khak a, an kuomah, “Châwlni sukpawrchea in thil ṭha naw thaw hi ieng am a ni a?

In pi le puhai khawm khan hieng ang hi an thaw a ni naw am a nih? Chun, ei Pathien chun hieng thil ṭhanawhai po po hi ei chunga le hi khaw chunga hin a hung intlungtir tah a ni naw am a nih? Chuong sa sa khawmin châwlni sukpawrchein Israel mihai chungah lunginsenna in lân tlungsatir rawp el hi,” ka ti a.

Chun, châwlni dinga Jerusalem kul kawtkhâr ân thim deu hlek phingleh kawtkhârhai chu khâr dingin thu ka pêk a; chun, châwlni a bo hmakhat chun hawng lo dingin thu ka pêk bawk a; châwlnia thil phur hrim hrim an lâklût nawna dingin ka mihai ṭhenkhat chu kawtkhâr kân vêngtir a.
Chuongchun, sumdâwng mihai le thuomhnaw tinrêng zawr mihai chu vawi khat amanih, vawi hni amani chu Jerusalem puotienga chun an riek a.

Chuongchun, ân dik nawzie chu kân hriettir a, an kuomah, “Iengdinga kul bula riek am in na? Hieng anga in thaw nâwk chun in chungah ka kut thlâk ka tih,” ka ti a. Chu chena inthawk chu châwlni chun an hung nâwk ta naw a.

Chun, Levi mihai chu inthien faia, châwlni sukthiengna dinga kul kawtkhâr hung vêng dingin thu ka pêk a. Aw ka Pathien, hi thua khawm hin mi hre zing la, i lunginsietna nasatzie ang peiin mi hla rawh.
Chuong lai chun Juda mi, Asdod nuhmei dâm, Ammon nuhmei dâm, Moab nuhmei dâm nuhmeia neihai chu ka hmu a;
an nauhai chu Asdod ṭawngin an ṭawng lem hman hman a, chuonghai ṭawng dân ang chau naw chun Juda ṭawngin an ṭawng thei nawh.

Chun, anni chu ka khak tâwl a, ṭawngsie kân phur a, ṭhenkhat lem chu ka vuok a, an sam dâm ka kei phawipêk a, an naunuhmeihai chu chuong naupasalhai chu inneitir lo ding le, chuonghai naunuhmeihai chu an naupasalhai ta dingin amanih, anni ta ding khawma nei lo dingin Pathien sâlin ṭawng kân khâmtir a.

“Israel lal Solomon khawm kha hieng thilhaia hin a suol a ni naw am a nih? Chuong sa khawm chun hnam tamtak laia ama ang lal an um naw a, a Pathien mi dit zâwng tak a na, Israel ram po po chungah Pathienin lalah a siem bawk a; nisienlakhawm, ama meu khawm chu ram dang nuhmeiin an suksuol el ta a nih.
Chuongchun, ram dang nuhmeihai neia ei Pathien chunga hin thil ṭha nawtak el hi thaw dingin in thu ei zâwm ding am a nih?” ka ti a.
Chun, thiempu lal Eliasib nau, Joiada naupa pakhat Horon mi Sanballat mâkpa a na, chuleiin, ka kuoma inthawk chun kân tlânhmangtir ta a.
Aw ka Pathien, thiempu nina sin le, thiemputna sin thuthlung le, Levi mihai thuthlung an sukpawrche leiin hre zing tâwl raw khai.
Chuong ang chun ram dang mihaia inthawkin ka sukthieng a, thiempu dâm, Levi mihai ta dinga an sinthawna sengah an rawngbâwl dân ding ka ruotpêk a;
a hun ruot senga thing inhlân ding le thlai thar hmasa tak ta ding dâmin. Aw ka Pathien, a ṭha tiengin mi hre zing rawh khai.
Ahasuer hun lai chun hieng hi a hung na, (hi Ahasuer hi Indiaa inthawka Ethiopia chena, rambung za sâwmhni pasari chunga rorêltu a nih),
chuong nihaia, lal Ahasuer chu Susa khawpuia, a lalram lalṭhungphaa a ṭhung laiin,
a rorêl a kum thumnaa chun a mi ṭhahai le a siehlawhai po po ta dingin ruoi a ṭhe a; Media le Persia ram thilthawtheihai, mi ṭhahai le lal nauhai, chu rambunga mihai chu a hmaa chun an um a;
chu huna chun ama chun a lalram ropuitak hausaknahai le ân lalzie inzaûmna chu ni tamtak el, ni za khat le sâwmriet sûng zet ân entir a.
Chun, chuong nihai chu a hung tlungkim chun, lal in huon sûng tuollaia chun, ni sari sûng zet, lal in Susaa um mi lien le mi chinhai po po kuoma chun lal chun ruoi a ṭhe ta a;

puon a vâr, a dum le dumpâwl chu sailungvâr banhaia tangkaruo suonkuola puon zai inhmi a êma khitdea khâiin a um a; sailungvâr sen le a dumpâwl le a vâr le a dum phêk chungah, rângkachak le tangkaruo ṭhungphahai chu rem an ni a.
Anni chu rângkachak nohaiin dâwn ding chu an pêk a, (chuong rângkachak nohai chu a danglam seng an nih), lal kut ang pei chun, lal uoin chu tam tâwk zetin an pêk bawk a.
Chun, dâwn dân khawm chu dân ang takin a na; tukhawma an thawlui thei naw a; lal chun mi tinin mâni nuom tâwk ang senga an thawna dingin a ina manmihai chu mi po po ta dinga vêngtu dingin a ruot a.
Lalnu Vasti khawm chun nuhmeihai ta bîk dingin lal Ahasuer lal ina chun ruoi a ṭhe a.
Ni sari niha, uoin leia lal lungril chu a hung hlim hle phing chun, Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar le Karkas, lal Ahasuer hmaa rawngbâwl hlakhai, mi tillâk pasari chu,
lalnu Vasti chu lallukhum khuma lal hmaa chun hung ṭhuoia, mi ṭhahai le mipuihai chu a hmêl ṭhatzie chu inentir dingin thu a pêk ta a; hang en hin ama hlak chu a hmêl a ṭha hle el bawk si a.
Nisienlakhawm, mi tillâkhai kuoma lal thupêk chu lalnu Vasti chun a sêl a, a hung nuom naw a; chuleiin, lal chu a lunginsen ta êm êm el a, a lunginsen chu a chawk hin a chawk ta a.
Chun, lal chun mi varhai, a hunhai hretuhai kuoma chun, (dân le rorêl dân hretuhai po po kuoma chun, hi hi lal thaw dân a ni hrim a:
ama dawta chun Media le Persia mi lien pasari, lal hmêl chu hmu hlak a, lalrama khawm chun a ṭhung hmasatuhai Karsena, Sethar, Admatha, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena le Memukan hai chu an nih.)
“Lal Ahasuerin mi tillâkhai hmanga a thupêk hi lalnu Vasti hin a thaw ta naw lei hin dân angin ieng anga ei thaw ding am ning a ta,” a ta.

Chun, lalhai le lal hmaa chun Memukan chun a dawn a, “Lalnu Vasti hin lal chunga chau hin a suksuol a ni naw a, amiruokchu, lal Ahasuer rambung po poa mipui po po le mi ṭhahai po po chunga khawm a suksuol a nih.

‘Lal Ahasuer chun lalnu Vasti chu a hmaa hung ṭhuoi dingin thu a pêk a, ama hlak chu a hung si naw a,’ tiin hril dar a ni pha chun, an pasalhai an mithmua entlêuna dingin hi lalnu thilthaw hi nuhmei po po chun an hung chîng ve ngei ding a ni hi.

Chuongchun, vawisûna Media le Persia lalnauhai, lalnu thilthaw lo hretuhai chun lalpa mi ṭhahai kuoma chun chuong ang bawkin an ti ve ngei ding a na; chuleiin, inkhingna le lunginsenna nasatak a hung suok ngei ding a ni hi.

Lal hin ṭha a ti zâwng a ni chun lal kuoma inthawk hin lal thupêk chu suok sienla, ‘lal Ahasuer hmaa hin Vasti hi hung ta ngai hrim hrim naw raw se,’ tiin Media le Persia dân thleng nâwk ngai ta lohai ang chun ziek ni raw seh; chun, lal hin a lalnu nina hi ama nêka ṭha lem mi dang kuomah pe bawk raw seh.

Chuongchun, lalin thupêk a siem ding chu a lalram po poa sukdar a ni pha chun ( a lien âwm si a) nuhmeihai po po chun, an pasal, mi lien le mi chînhai kuoma khawm chun inzâna an nei ta ding a nih,” tiin.
Chu thuhril chun mi lienhai le lal chu a suklâwm a, lal chun Memukan thu ang tak chun a thaw ta a;

a rambung po poa chun lekha a thawn a, rambung tinah ziek ang tak le, mi chi tin kuomah an ṭawng ang ngei le, pasalin mâni insûng ro chu a phurna ding le, a mihai ṭawng ang ngeia a hrildar theina dingin.
Hieng thilhai hnunga lal Ahasuer lunginsenna chu a hung rê hnunga chun, Vasti le a thilthaw le, a chunga thupêk um chu a hriet zing a.
Chun, lal siehlaw ama rawngbâwltu chun thurawt a siem a, “Lal ta ding hin nunghâk tleirawl hmêl ṭhahai zawng ni raw se.

Susa khawpuia nuhmeihai inah hieng nunghâk tleirawl hmêl ṭhahai po po hung ṭhuoi khâwm dingin lal hin a rambung sûng po poa dingin hotuhai ruot bawk sien. Anni chu nuhmeihai kawltu, lal mitillâk Hegai enkawlna hnuoiah sie ni hai sien; chun, incheimawina hmangruohai pêk ni bawk hai sien.
Chun, nunghâk lal suklungâwitu chu Vasti aiah lalnu hung ni raw se,” tiin. Chu thil chun lal chu a suklâwm a, chuong ang tak chun a thaw ta a.
Susa khawpuia chun Juda mi, a hming Mordekai, Benjamin mi Kis naupa, Simei naupa, Jair naupa chu a um a;
ama chu Juda lal Jehoiakin ruola Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin a ṭhuoi hmang sal intânghai ruola Jerusalema inthawka ṭhuoi hmang a ni ve a.

Ama chun a pami naunu Hadassa, chu chu Esther a nih, chu a châwmlien a, amanu chun nu amanih, pa amani khawm a nei si naw a; chu nunghâk chu hmêl ṭha ditumtak a na; chuongchun, a nu le a pa an thi chun Mordekai chun ama naunu dingin a lâk a nih.

Chuongchun, lal thupêk le a thu sukthlûk chu hriet a na, nunghâk tamtakhai chu Susa khawpuia Hegai enkawlna hnuoia chun ṭhuoi khâwm an ni phing chun, nuhmei enkawltu Hegai enkawlna hnuoiah lal ina chun Esther khawm chu ṭhuoi a ni ve ta a.

Chu nunghâk chun ama chu a suklâwm a, a lungsietna chu a hlaw ta a; lal chun incheimawina hmangruohai le a fâk ding chanpuol chu lal ina mi nunghâk thlang suok pasari leh inhmawtakin a pêk a; nuhmeihai in hmun ṭhatna taka chun ama le a nunghâkhai chu a sie ta a.
Esther chun a chihai le a laibunghai lai khawm a hrillang naw a; Mordekai chun hrillang lo dingin a khap si a.
Chun, Esther chu ieng angin am a thaw a, ieng am a chang a ti hre dingin, nuhmei in tuol puoa chun Mordekai chu ni tin hin a fe hlak a.

Nunghâk chu lal Ahasuer kuoma a lût hun a tlung hma chun nuhmeihai ta dinga incheimawina hun ruot thla sâwmpahni a hmang zo ding a na, thla ruk sûng chu mura hriek leh, thla ruk dang chu riminhnik danghai leh.
Chun, nunghâk chu lal kuoma a lût dân ding chu hieng ang hi a nih: lal ina va fe dinga nuhmeihai ina a dit zâwng taphawt chu chawi dinga pêk a na.

Zântieng chun chutaka chun fêng a ta, zingkâr chun nuhmeihai in pahnina, thaikêmhai enkawltu, lal mitillâk Saasgaz enkawlna hnuoia chun hung kîr a ta. Lal chu a chungah a lâwm naw a, a hminga a ko naw chun lal kuoma chun a kîr nâwk ta ngainaw ding a nih.

Chuongchun, a naunu dinga ama enkawltu Mordekai pami Abihail naunu Esther ta dinga lal kuoma lût hun a hung tlung chun, iengkhawm a ngên naw a, nuhmeihai enkawltu, lal mitillâk Hegaiin a ruotpêkhai chau naw chu.
Chun, a hmu taphawthai mithmuah Esther chun ditsakna a hlaw a. Chuongchun, a rorêl kum sarina. Tebeth thla, thla sâwmnaa chun, a lal inah, lal Ahasuer kuoma chun Esther chu ṭhuoi lût a ni ta a.

Chuongchun, nuhmei danghai po po nêkin lal chun Esther chu a ditzâwng a, nunghâk po pohai nêk chun a mithmua chun lunginsietna le ditsak a hlaw nasa lem a; chuongchun, a lua chun lallukhum ân khumtir a, Vasti aia chun lalnuah a siem ta a.
Chun, lal chun a lalhai le a siehlawhai po po ta dingin, ruoi ropuitak, Esther ruoiṭhe, chu a siem ta a, rambunghai ta dingin châwl a siem a, lal tiktlâina ang peiin lâwmmanhai khawm a pêk bawk a.
Nunghâkhai an hung inkhâwm a vawihninaa chun Mordekai chu lal kul kawtkhâra chun a ṭhung a,
Esther chun a sûnghai le a hnam khawm a la hrillang naw a, Mordekai chun a khap leiin; ama a umpui lai ang bawk khan Esther chun Mordekai thu chu a awi si a.
Chuong nihaia Mordekai chu lal in kawtkhâra a ṭhung lai chun, mi tillâk pahni, Bigthan le Teres, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai chu an lunginsen a, lal Ahasuer chunga kut thlâkna ding an zawng a.
Chu thil chu Mordekai chun a lo hriet a, ama chun lalnu Esther kuoma chun ân hriettir a; chuongchun, Esther chun Mordekaia hming chun lal chu a hril ta a.

Chuonga chu thu chu dâwpsuokna siem a hung ni chun, chuong ang ngei chu a ni ti hmusuok a ni ta a, anni chu thinga khai hlum an ni ve ve ta a; chun, lal hmaa chun lal chanchin ziekna bua chun ziek a ni nghe nghe a.
Hieng thil hnunga hin lal Ahasuer chun Agag mi Hammedatha naupa Haman chu ân kaisângtir a, ama chu a siesâng a, a ṭhunghmun chu ama ruolpui milienhai po po chunga chun a sie a.

Chuongchun, lal siehlaw, lal kul kawtkhâra um hlakhai po po chun Haman chu chibai an bûk a, an inza êm êm hlak a; ama chungthua chun lal chun chuong ang ding chun thu a pêk hrim a ni si a. Amiruokchu, Mordekai chun chibai a bûk naw a, ama chu inzâ khawm ân zâ bawk naw a.
Chuongchun, lal siehlaw, lal kul kawtkhâra umhai chun Mordekai kuoma chun, “Iengdinga lal thupêk i bawsiet am a na?” an ta.

Ni tinin ama chu an hril a, anni chu a ngai naw phing chun hieng hi a hung na, Haman kuoma chun Mordekai chungthu chu a ngaimaw le maw naw hrietna dingin an hril a, ama chun Juda mi a ni ti anni a lo hril ta si a.
Chun, Hamanin Mordekai chun ama chu chibai a bûk naw a, inza khawm ân za nawh ti a hriet chun, Haman chu a lunginsen ta êm êm el a.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chun Mordekai chung chaua kut thlâk chu inzâpuiumah a ngai a; Mordekai chipuihai ngei chu ama an lo inhriettir ta si a; chuongchun, Haman chun Ahasuer ramawp sûng po poa, Juda mihai po po, Mordekai chipuihai ngei chu sukbohmangna ding a zawng ta a.
Lal Ahasuer inlal kum sâwm pahnina, thla khatna, Nisan thlaa chun, ni tin tin le thla tin tin hin, thla sâwm pahnina, Adar thla chen chun Haman hmaa chun Pur, chu chu ṭhumvâwr a nih, an vâwr hlak a.

Chun, Haman chun lal Ahasuer kuoma chun, “I ram sûng rambung po poa mihai laia indara umdar chi khat an um a nih; an dânhai chu mi danghai dân hrim hrima inthawkin a danglam bîk rieu a, lal dânhai khawm hi an zâwm chuong bawk naw a; chuleiin, anni ngaithei zing hi lal ta dinga ṭhathnemna a ni nawh.

Lal remti zâwng a ni chun, anni chu sukbohmang ding an nih tia ziek hi ni el raw se; chun, keiin lal sum inhaia an hung sie dingin lal sinthawnaa enkawltuhai kuta chun tangka talent sîng khat pêng ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuta kutsebi chu a lâk a, Judahai hmêlma, Agag mi Hammedatha naupa Haman kuoma chun a pêk ta a.
Chun, lal chun Haman kuoma chun, “Nangin an chunga ṭha i ti ang anga thaw dingin mihai le tangka khawm chu i kuoma pêk a nih,” a ta.

Chun, thla khatna, ni sâwmpathum ni chun lal lekhaziektuhai chu ko an ni ta a, chi tinhai lalhai kuoma le, rambung tina rorêltuhai kuoma le, lal ram awptuhai kuoma chun Hamanin thu a pêk ang taphawt chun lekha chu ziek a ni ta a, rambung tinah chutaka inziek ang tak le, chi tin kuomah an ṭawng ang ngeiin; lal Ahasuer hminga ziek a na, lal kutsebi ngeia namdet a ni bawk a.

Adar thla, thla sâwmpahnina, ni sâwmpathum ni ngeia, ni khat sûnga, Juda mi po po, naupang le upa, nuhmei le, naupangtehai khawm, sukchimit vawng ding le, sukhlum ding le sukbohmang vawng ding le annia inthawka râllâk sum chu lâk el dingin, lal rambung po poa chun lekhahai chu dâka thawn a ni ta a.
Lekhaziek chu thupêk rambung tina thawn dar ding chu, chu ni ngeia an lo inzosa hieu theina dingin mi po pohai kuoma chun sutsuok a ni ta a.

Lekhathawn phurnahai chu lal thupêkin inhmâwtakin a fe suok ta a; chun, thupêk chu Susa khawpuia inthawka siem a ni bawk a: chun, lal le Haman chu zu dâwn dingin an ṭhung a, Susa khawpui sûng ruok chu buoi namênin a buoi naw a.

Mordekaiin chuong thil thawa umhai po po a hriet chun, Mordekai chun a puonhai a keithlêr a, vut laia saiip puon silin, khawpui kawtthlêra chun a fe suok a, râwl inringtaka khêkin, lungsetakin a ṭap a;
lal kul kawtkhâr hmaa ngei khawm chun a hung a, saiip puon silin tukhawm lal kul kawtkhâr chu an lût thei ngai naw hrim a na.

Chun, rambung tin elah, lal thupêk le a thu sukthlûk a tlungna taphawta chun, Judahai laia chun lungngaina nasatak el le bungheina dâm le, ṭapna le inrûmna dâm chu a um ta a; tamtak lem chu saiip puon silin pilvut chungah an zâl a.

Esther nunghâkhai le a vêngtuhai chu a kuomah an hung a, ama chu an hril a; chuongchun, lalnu khawm chu nasatak elin a lungngai ta a; a saiip puon chu lâk hmangpêk a, Mordekai chu insiltir dingin silfênhai a thawn a; nisienlakhawm, ama ruok chun a lo lâk naw a.
Chun, Esther chun, lal vêngtu pakhat, amanu vêngtu dinga lalin a iruot Hathak chu a ko a, hi thil hi ieng am a na, ieng lei am a ni leh ti hre dingin Mordekai kuoma chun fe dingin a tir ta a.
Chuongchun, Hathak chu lal kawtkhâr puoa khawpui khawlaidunga chun Mordekai kuomah a va fe ta a.
Mordekai chun a chunga thil hung tlung po po le anni sukbohmangna dinga, Judahai ta dinga lal sum inhaia Hamanin sum pêk a tiem zât char chu a hril a.

Anni sukbohmang dinga Susaa inthawka thupêk pêk suoka um chu Esther kuoma inentira, ama kuoma chun hrilfie dingin a pêk bawk a; chun, a chihai ta dinga lal kuoma chun fe a, a kuoma chun ngênna siem a, a hmaa chun hni dingin phût a ni bawk a.
Hathak chu a hung a, Mordekai thuhai po po chu Esther chu a hril ta a.
Esther chun Hathak kuoma chun thu a hril a, Mordekai kuoma chun thucha ân phur a;

“Tukhawm, nuhmei ni sien, pasal ni sien khawm, ko ni si lova, lal tuollai sûnghnung lema hung lût ta ding chun, ama chu hring a tih, tia lalin a rângkachak hmawl chu a lo lâk kâng si naw chun dân pakhat chau, ama chu that ngei nîng a tih, ti dân hi a um a nih ti lal siehlawhai po po le, lal rambunga mihai po po chun an hriet chieng hle a; nisienlakhawm, kei chu hieng ni sâwmthum sûng hin lal kuoma lût dinga koin ka um dêr naw a,” tiin.
Chun, Esther thuhai chu Mordekai chu an hril a.
Mordekai khawm chun a dawnna chu Esther kuoma chun ân phurkîrtir nâwk a, “Juda mihai po po pumpel naw chu, lal ina nang khan pumpel bîk dingin inngaituo naw rawh.

Hi hi huna i to ṭawk ṭawk a, Judahai ta dinga himna le sansuokna hmun danga inthawkin a hung suok khawmin, nang le i pa sûngkuo chu bohmang tho ei tih; hieng ang lai huna ding hin a ni el thei i sawnnaw, lal nina i chang hi,” tiin.
Chun, Esther chun Mordekai kuomah a dawnna chu ân phurkîr nâwk a.

“Fe la, Susaa Juda mi umhai po po chu kei khâwm rawh; chun, ka ta dingin bu nghei unla; sûn le zânah, ni thum sûng chu fain dâwn hlek naw ro, ka nunghâkhai le kei khawma chuong ang bawk chun nghei kan ta; chuongchun, dân lo ang ni sien khawm lal kuoma chun lût el ka ta; ka bohmang leh ka bohmang ni el raw se,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mordekai chu a fe a, Estherin thu a pêk ang pei chun a thaw ta a.
A ni thum ni chun, Esther chu a lal puonin ân thuom a, lal in zâwn tak, lal in tuollai sûnghnung lema chun a ngîr ta a; lal khawm chu in lûtna zâwn takah, lal ina lalṭhungphaa chun a ṭhung a.

Chun, lalnu Esther chu tuollaia ngîr a hmu chun, a mithmua chun ditsakna a hlaw ta a; chuongchun, lal chun rângkachak hmawl a kuta a chawi chu Esther kuoma chun a lâk kâng ta a. Chuongchun, Esther chu a hung hnai a, rângkachak hmawl hmawr chu a them ta a.
Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i dit a, lalnu Esther, ieng am a na i hni chu? Ram chenve rau khawm ni sien i kuoma pêk nîng a tih,” a ta.
Esther chun, “Lal hin ṭha a ti zâwng a ni chun, a ta dinga thlaithlêng vawisûna ka buotsai hi, fa dingin lal le Haman chu hung raw hai se,” a ta.
Lal chun, “Esther hril ang ngeia thaw a ni theina dingin Haman chu hung inhmâwtir ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, lal le Haman chu Estherin thlaithlêng a buotsaia chun an hung ta a.

Chun, lal chun uoin dâwn huna chun Esther kuoma chun, “I hnina chu ieng am a na? I kuomah phal a ni ngei ding a nih, i ngên khawm chu ieng am a na? Ram chenve rau khawm ni sienla thaw nîng a tih,” a ta.
Esther chun a dawn a, “Ka hnina le ka ngênna chu;

lal mithmua hin ditsak tlâk ka ni a, ka hnina hi phal ding le ka ngênna hi thaw dinga lal ṭhati zâwng a ni chun, an ta dinga thlaithlêng ka buotsai dinga hin lal le Haman hi hung ngei raw hai se; chun, chu chu lalin a hril ta angin zînga hin hril ka tih,” tiin.

Chu ni chun Haman chu lungril lâwmtak le hlimtak chun a fe suok ta a; nisienlakhawm, lal kul kawtkhâra chun ama ta dinga châng lova, a ngîr khawm lo ngîr lo Mordekai a hmu chun, Mordekai chungah nasatakin a lunginsen ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Haman chu ân sûm a, a inah a fe ta a; mi a tir a, a ruolhai le a nuhmei Zeres a ko ta a.

Chuongchun, Haman chun an kuoma chun, a hausaknahai ropuizie dâm, a nauhai tamzie dâm, lalin ama chu ân kaisângtirna thilhai po po dâm, lal siehlawhai le lalhai chunga ama a siechungzie dâm chu a hril ta a.

Chu naw khawm chu, Haman chun, “Anih, lalnu Esther chun kei ti chau lo chu lal le thlaithlêng a buotsai awt dingin tukhawm a fiel ngai naw bawk a; chuongchun, zinga khawm hin kei chu lal leh fiel ka ni a.
Anachu lal kul kawtkhâra Juda mi Mordekai ṭhunga ka hmu sûng phawt chu hieng thilhai po po hin a mi sukhawi chuong nawh,” a ta.

Chun, a nuhmei Zeres le a ruolhai po po chun a kuomah, “Khaihlumna tawng sâwmngaa insâng inphuntir la, chun a zinga chun, chutaka chun Mordekai chu khai hlum ni raw se, tiin lal chu hril la; chuongchun, lal le chun thlaithlêng awtnaa chun hlimtakin um el la a ni el annâwm,” an ti a. Chun, chu thil chun Haman chu a suklâwm ta a; chun, khaihlumna chu ân phuntir ta a.
Chu zân chun lal chu a in thei ta naw a; lal chanchin hriet zing dinga ziekna lekhabu chu hung la dingin thu a pêk a; chuongchun, lal hmaa chun tiem an ni ta a.
Lal Ahasuer chunga kut thlâkna zawngtuhai, kawtkhâr vêngtu, lal vêngtu pahni Teres le Bigthan chanchin chu Mordekaiin a hril a nih tia hmu suok a ni ta a.

Chun, lal chun, “Hi hi ding hin Mordekai chunga chun ieng chawimawina le insângna am siem a ni ta a?” a ta. Chun, lal siehlaw, ama rawngbâwltuhai chun, “Ama ta dingin iengkhawm thaw a ni nawh,” an ta.
Lal chun, “Tu am a na tuollaia um saw?” a ta. Chulaitak chun, Haman chu ama ta dinga a buotsai khaihlumnaa Mordekai chu khaihlum ding thu hril dingin, lal tuollai puo lema chun a hung lût a.
Chun, lal siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, Haman chu tuollaia saw a ngîr zing ie,” an ta. Lal chun, “Hung inlûttir ro,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Haman chu a hung lût ta a. Chun, lal chun a kuomah, “Lalin chawimawi a nuom mi kuoma chun ieng anga thaw ding am nîng a ta?” a ta. Chuongchun, Haman chun a lungrilin, “Kei naw chu lal hin tu dang am chawimawi nuom a ta?” a ta.
Chuongchun, Haman chun lal kuoma chun, “Lalin mi chawimawi a nuom chu,
lalin a sil hlak lal puon le, lal chuongna hlak sakawr, a lua lallukhum khum chu hung lâk ni sienla;

chun, ‘Lalin mi a chawimawi nuom chunga chun hienga thaw hi a ni ding a nih,’ tia, a hmaa khêk a, kawtthlêra chun sakawr chunga inchuongtir a, lalin chawimawi a nuom mi chu an inthuomtir vawng theina dingin lal mi ṭhatakhai laia pakhat kutah sakawr le silfên chu pêk ni raw se,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun Haman kuoma chun, “Inhmaw la, i hril ang chun lal silfên le sakawr chu la la, lal kul kawtkhâr bula ṭhung, Juda mi Mordekai chunga chun va thaw rawh; i hril ang ta po po chu ienghawm kimlo um hlek lovin,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Haman chun lal silfên le sakawr chu a lâk a, Mordekai chu a thuom a, “Lalin mi a chawimawi nuom chunga chun hienga thaw hi a ni ding a nih,” tia khêk peiin, kawtthlêra chun ân chuongtir ta a.
Chun, Mordekai chu lal kul kawtkhâra chun a hung nâwk a. Haman ruok chu a lu inkhumin, lungngaitakin a in tieng a fe ta a.

Chun, Haman chun a nuhmei Zeres le a ruolhai po po kuoma chun a chunga thil hung tlunghai chu a hril nâwk ta a. A mi varhai le a nuhmei Zeres chun a kuomah, “Mordekai, a hmaa i tlûkna chu, Juda chia mi a ni hrim hrim chun, ama chu ngam naw ti ni, a hmaa chun tlu ngei lem i tih,” an ta.
Chuonga ama an biek zing lai chun, lal vêngtuhai chu an hung a, Estherin a buotsai thlaithlêng awt ding chun Haman chu an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chuongchun, lal le Haman chu lalnu Estherin thlaithlêng a buotsai chu an awt ta a.

Chun, uoin dâwn huna a ni hni ni chun lal chun Esther kuoma chun, “I hnina ieng am a na, lalnu Esther? Phalpêk ni ngei i tih, i ingên chu ieng am a na? Ram chenve rau khawm ni sienla thaw pei nîng a tih,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, lalnu Esther chun a dâwn a, “I mithmua hin ditsak tlâk ka na, aw lalpa, lal ṭhati zâwng a ni chun; ka ingêna hin ka chipuihai le, ka ihnia hin keima hringna ngei hi hla ni el raw se:

sukchimit ding le, that ding le, sukbohmang ding sa, kei le ka chipuihai hi zawr kan ni ta si a. Amiruokchu, siehlawpahai, siehlawnuhai ding ang dâma zawr ni inlang chu, lal sietna ding chu hmêlma chun a thung zo naw ding khawma, ka to ṭawk ṭawk ding a na,” a ta.
Chun, lal Ahasuer chun a biek a, lalnu Esther kuoma chun, “Chuong ang thil a lungrila thaw ngam chu khawlai am a um a? Ama chu tu am a na?” a ta.
Esther chun, “Hmêlma le khingpui chu hi mi rilotak Haman hi a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, Haman chu lal le lalnu hmaa chun a ṭi ta a.

Chun, lal chu a lunginsen chun uoin dâwn lai chu a tho a, lal in huona chun a va fe ta a; chun, lalnu Esther kuoma a hringna ta dinga ngên dingin Haman khawm chu a ngîr ta a; a chunga chun thiltum ṭha nawtak lal chun a nei ti a hmu ta si a.

Chun, lal chu lal in huona inthawk chun uoin dâwnna hmuna chun a hung kîr nâwk a; Esther umna ṭhungpha chunga chun Haman chu a bawkkhup a. Chun, lal chun, “Ina hin ka hmaa ngei khawm lalnu chu a sukpawrche ding a ni maw?” a ta. Lal baua inthawka thu a hung suok ta lei chun, Haman hmai chu an inkhum ta a.

Chun, lal hmaa um hlak, mi tillâkhai laia mi pakhat Harbona chun, “Ngai ta, lal ta dinga thu ṭha hriltu Mordekai ta dinga khaihlumna tawng sâwmngaa insâng Hamanin a siem chu, Haman ina khun ân phun a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun, “Chutaka chun ama kha khai hlum ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, Mordekai ta dinga khaihlumna a buotsaia chun Haman chu an khai hlum ta a. Chun, lal lunginsen chu a hung dam ta a.

Chu ni chun lal Ahasuer chun Judahai hmêlmapa Haman in chu lalnu Esther kuoma chun a pêk ta a. Chun, Mordekai khawm chu lal hmaa chun a hung ta a; Esther chun ama chu a ieng am a ni chu a lo hril ta si a.
Chun, lal chun Hamana inthawka a lâk, a kutsebi chu a lâk thlâk a, Mordekai kuoma chun a pêk ta a. Chun, Esther chun Haman in chu Mordekai chu ân enkawltir ta a.
Chun, Esther chun lal kuoma chun thu a la hril nâwk a, a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, Agag mi Haman thil sukpawi le, Juda mihai chunga a thil phierrûkna rawt chu siehmang dingin mitthli pumin a ngên a.
Chun, lal chun rângkachak hmawl chu Esther kuoma chun a lâk kâng a.

Chuongchun, Esther chu a tho a, lal hmaa chun a ngîr ta a. Chun, ama chun, “Lal ṭha ti zâwng a na, a mithmua hin ditsakna ka chang a, hi thil hi lal kuomah indika ân lang chun, le a mit ka tlung chun, Agag mi Hammedatha naupa Hamanin Juda mi lal rambung po poa umhai sukbohmangna dinga a ziek lekhathawnhai chu sukdanglam dinga ziek ni raw se:
ka chipuihai chunga chuong thil ṭha naw hung tlung ding chu iengtin am tuor thei ka ta? Annawleh, ka chi le kuonghai suksieta an umna chu ka en ngam ding am a nih?” a ta.

Chun, lal Ahasuer chun lalnu Esther kuoma le Mordekai Juda mi kuoma chun, “Ngai ta u, Haman in hi Esther kuoma chun ka pêk ta a, ama chu khaihlumnaa chun an khai hlum ta bawk a; Juda mihai chunga a kut ân let leiin.
Chuongchun, ṭha in ti angin, lal hmingin Judahai kuoma chun lekha ziek unla, lal kutsebi hin nam ro; lal hminga lekha ziek a, lal kutsebia nam chu, tukhawma an sukdanglam thei âwm si naw a,” a ta.

Chuongchun, chu huna chun, thla thumna, Sivan thla, chu thla ni sâwmhni pathum ni chun lal lekhaziektuhai chu koin an um ta a; chuongchun, Mordekaiin Juda mihai kuoma thu a pêk ang po poin, rambung za sâwmhni pasari, Indiaa inthawka Ethiopia chena rambunga lalhai, rorêltuhai le ram awptuhai kuoma chun, rambung tin kuoma chutaka ziek ang peiin, chi tinhai kuomah an ṭawng ang peiin. Juda mihai kuomah an ṭawng ang pei le an ziek dân ang peiin, ziek a hung ni ta a.
Chun, ama chun lal Ahasuer hmingin a ziek a, lal kutsebi chun a nam a, lal sinthawnaa hmang hlak sakawr hrât mi sakawr sâwizawi chunga chuongin, sakawr chungah lekhathawnhai chu dâkah a thawn ta a;

chutaka chun lal chun Juda mihai khaw tina umhai chu inkei khâwma, lo invêng him dingin a ti a. Khâwlai rambung le mihai thilthawtheina khawm, anni sukse tumtuhai po po chu, lo thaw ve a, an nau le têhai le an nuhmeihai khawm lo sukbohmang ding le, that ding le sukchimit dingin le, annia inthawka râllâk sumhai khawm lo la ve el dingin a phalpêk a.
Lal Ahasuer rambung po poah ni khat sûng, Adar thla, thla sâwm pahnina, ni sâwmpathum ni sûng chun chu;

Judahai chu an hmêlmahai chunga an phuba la ve dingin chu ni chun an inzosa zing ding a nih ti le, rambung tina thupêk pêk suok dinga ziek, zieksâwng chu chi tinhai kuoma chun ziek suok vawng a ni ta a.
Chuongchun, dâk phur mihai, lal sinthawnaa hmang hlak sakawr hrâthai chunga chuonghai chu, lal thupêk inawr zing chun inhmawtakin an fe suok ta a; thupêk chu Susa khawpuia inthawka pêk a nih.

Chun, Mordekai chu lal puon dumpâwl zai inhmi leh, rângkachak lallukhum ropuitak leh, lal silfên dumpâwl le vâra inthuomin lal hmaihmaa chu a fe suok ta a; chuongchun, Susa khawpui chu lâwmin a khêk ta a.
Chun, Judahai khawm chun var le lâwmna le hlimna le chawimawina chu an chang ta bawk a.

Chun, rambung tin le khaw tinah, lal thupêk a tlungna taphawta chun, Judahai chun lâwmna le hlimna an nei a, ni ṭha le ruoiṭhena dâm an nei ta bawk a. Chun, chu rama chi tamtakhai laia mi chu Juda an hung ni ve ta a; an chunga chun Juda mihai ṭitna chu a tlung ta si a.

Chun, thla sâwmpahnina, Adar thlaa ni sâwmpathum nia, lal thupêk le a thu sukthlûk chu thaw ding ni a hung hnai chun, chuong nia Juda hmêlmahaiin an chunga ro nei an beisei huna chun; a naw zâwngin a hung um ta thut a, Judahai chun anni theidatuhai chunga chun ro an nei lem ta a;

anni suknat tumtuhai chunga kut thlâk dingin, lal Ahasuer rambung po poa chun Judahai chu an khawpuihaia chun an inko khâwm tâwl a; tukhawma an dang zo si naw a, anni ṭitna chu hnam po pohai chunga chun a tlung ta si a.
Chun, rambunghaia lalhai le, ram awptuhai le, rorêltuhai le lal sin thawtuhai chun Judahai chu an ṭhangpui a; Mordekai ṭina chu an chunga chun a um tlat ta leiin.
Mordekai chu lal ina chun ropuitak a ni si a, a chanchin chu rambung po poa chun ân thang a; chu Mordekai chu a hung inṭhang lien tiel tiel el si a.
Chuongchun, Judahai chun an hmêlmahai po po chu kâwlhnâma sâtin an sât hlum tâwl a, suksietna le thatnain anni theidatuhaiin an chunga an thaw ding ang tak chun an thaw ta a.
Lal khawpui Susaa ngei khawm Judahai chun mi za nga an sukbohmang a.
Chun, Parsandatha, Dalphon, Aspatha;
Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha;
Parmasta, Arisai, Aridai le Vaizatha hai;
Judahai hmêlma Hammedatha naupa Haman naupasal sâwmhai khawm chu an that a; amiruokchu, râllâk suma ruok chun an kut an rawl naw a.
Chu ni chun Susa khawpuia thata umhai nizât chu lal kuoma chun hung lâk a na.

Chun, lal chun lalnu Esther kuoma chun, “Judahai chun Susa khawpuia hin mi za nga le Haman naupasalhai sâwm an thatin an sukbohmang ta a nih; lal rambung danghaia chun ieng ang khieuin am an thaw ding chu. Tuhin i hnina chu ieng am a na? Phalpêk ning i tih; annawleh, ieng am a na i la hni rawp ding? Thaw ni bawk a tih,” a ta.

Chun, Esther chun, “Lal ṭha ti zâwng a ni chun, vawisûna thupêk ang bawk hin, Susaa Juda umhai chu zinga khawm thaw dinga phal ni hai sienla, Haman naupasal sâwmhai chu khaihlumnahaia chun khai kâng ni raw hai se,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun chuong anga thaw ding chun thu a pêk a, Susaa inthawk chun thupêk chu pêk suok a ni ta a; chuongchun, Haman naupasal sâwmhai chu an khâi kâng ta a.
Chun, Adar thla ni sâwmpali ni khawm chun Susaa Juda mi umhai chu an inkei khâwm a, Susaa chun mi za thum an that a; nisienlakhawm, râllâk suma ruok chun an kut an rawl naw a.

Chun, lal rambung danga Juda umhai khawm chu anni le anni chu an inkei khâwm tâwl a, an hringna sanin an ngîr a, an hmêlmahaia inthawk chun râlmuongin an um a, anni theidâtuhai sîng sari le sâng nga an that a; amiruokchu, annia râllâk sum chu an lâk naw a.
Adar thla ni sâwmpathum ni chun hi hi thaw a ni ta a; chun, chu thla ma ni sâwmpali ni chun an châwl a, lâwmna le ruoiṭhena niin an hmang a.
Amiruokchu, Susaa Juda mi umhai chu, chu thla ni sâwmpathum ni le sâwmpali ni khawm chun an inkhâwm a; chu thla ma ni sâwmpanga ni chun an châwl a, lâwmna le ruoiṭhena niin an hmang a.
Chuleiin, khaw kul neilova umhai Juda khuoa mihai chun Adar thlaa ni sâwmpali ni chu lâwmna le ruoiṭhena le, ni ṭhaa le, thilpêk inthawn niah an hmang ta a.
Chun, Mordekai chun hieng thilhai hi a ziek a, lal Ahasuer rambung po poa Juda um po pohai kuomah, a hla le hnaia khawm,
Adar thla ni sâwmpali ni le ni sâwmpanga ni hi kum tinin inser dinga sukdet dingin lekhathawnhai ân phur ta a;

chuong nihaia chun Juda mihai chun an hmêlmahaia inthawka châwl an neina nihai a ni lei le, chu thla chu an ta dinga lungngaina lâwmnaa inchangna le ṭapna ni ṭhaa inchangna thla a ni leiin: hlimna le ruoiṭhena ni, chanvohai inphurtuona ni le, mi pasiehai kuoma thilpêkhai pêkna nihaiah an nei ding thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Juda mihai chun, Mordekaiin an kuoma a ziek ang ngei le, an lo ṭan ta ang chun thaw dingin an nei ta a;
Agag mi Hammedatha naupa Haman, Judahai po po hmêlmapa chun, anni sukbohmang dingin a lo phierrûk a, anni sukbohmanga sukchimit dingin Pur, chu chu ṭhum vâwr a nih, a lo vâwr ta a;

amiruokchu, chu thil chu lal kuom a hung tlung chun, a dawhâ ṭha lotak, Judahai chunga dawhâ a nei chu, ama lu chung ngeiah a tla lem ding a nih tiin lekha ziekin thu a pêk a, ama le a naupasalhai ngei khawm chu khaihlumnahaia chun khai kâng an ni ding a nih, tiin.
Chuleiin, hieng nihai hi Pur hming chawi chun Purim an lo inbûk ta a. Chuleiin, chu lekha thuziek po po lei le, chu chungthua an ihmu ta ang lei le, an chunga thil hung tlungna lei chun,

Judahai chun, anni le an thlahai le anni hung sûngkhattuhai po po chunga chun belin, an namdet ta a; kum tinin chutaka a ni ruot ang tak le, chutaka ziek ang taka chu ni hnihai chu insera bâwpel ngai hlek lo dingin;

khaw tina le rambung tina le sûngkaw tinah, suon po po chenin hi nihai hi hriet zinga inser ding a na; hieng Purim nihai hi Juda mihai laia chun bâwpel a ni ngai ding a ni naw a, an thlahai laia chun hriet zing an nina hi a bohmang bawk naw ding a nih.
Chun, Abihail naunu, lalnu Esther le Juda mi Mordekai chun hi Purim lekha pahnina hi sukdet dingin thuneitakin an ziek ta a.
Chun, Juda mi po pohai kuomah, Ahasuer lalram, rambung za sâwmhni pasaria chun, thudik le thlamuonna thuhai le chun lekhathawnhai chu a thawn ta a;

Juda mi Mordekai le lalnu Estherin anni an ruotpêk ang le, an ṭap khêk râwl le an bungheina chungthua an thlahai le anni ta dinga an ruotpêk ang ngeia, hieng Purim nihai hi a hun ruothaia sukdet dingin.
Chun, Esther thupêk chun hi Purim chungthu hi a sukdet a; lekhabua chun ziek a ni ta a.
Chun, lal Ahasuer chun ram le tuipui thlierkârhai chunga chun leiman a siem a.

Chuongchun, a thilthawtheizie le a hrâtna thilthawhai po po le, Mordekai ropuizie chanchin famkim, lalin ama ân kaisângtir nasatzie chu Media le Persia lalhai chanchin ziekna bua chun a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
