Chun, mithi ruong phairuom pumpui le, vut phairuom le Kidron vadungtê chen, saktienga sakawr dai kawtkhâr chen ram po po kha,
Juda ram lal Zedekia inlal kum sâwmnaa
Chuongchun, chu huna chun Babulon lal sipaihai chun Jerusalem chu an inhuol a; chun, zâwlnei Jeremia khawm chu Juda ram lal ina vêngtu kulbînga chun khârkhumin a um a.
Juda ram lal Zedekia chun ama chu a khum a, “Ieng dinga hienga thu hi i hril am a na?, ‘

Juda ram lal Zedekia khawm chu Kaldaihai kuta inthawk chun suokthleng naw ni a; amiruokchu, Babulon lal kuta chun matheilovin pêk ni lem a tih, ama chu bau le bau inphâkin bieng a ta, a mithai chun ama mithai chu hmu bawk a tih;
chun, Zedekia chu Babulona chun ṭhuoi a ta, ka va sir hmakhat chun chutaka chun um zing a ta,
Jeremia chun a hril a, “
Ngai ta, i pami Sallum naupa Hanamel chu i kuomah hung a ta, ‘Anathotha um ka lo inchaw rawh, inchaw dinga intlansuokna thuneina chu nangma ta a ni si a,’ tîng a ta.
Chuongchun, ka pami naupa Hanamel chu vêngtu kulbînga chun
Chun, kei chun chu chu
Chun, thuziek chu suoi ka thaw a, ka nam ta a, chun, hrietpuitu ka ko a, ama chu bûkna chun tangka chu ka bûkpêk ta a.
Chun, dân ang le hmangchâng ang peiin, inchâwkna thuziek chu ka lâk a, chu chu hawng a na;

vêngtu kulbînga Juda ṭhanghai po po hmaa chun, inchâwkna thuzieka hrietpuitu mithmua chun, ka pami naupa Hanamel hmaihmaah, inchâwkna thuziek chu Maaseia naupa, Neria naupa Baruk kuoma chun ka pêk ta a.
An hmaa chun Baruk chu thu ka pêk ta a,
‘Sipaihai
Sipaihai
“Chun, Neria naupa Baruk kuoma inchâwkna thuziek chu ka pêk hnung chun
‘Aw
nang chun sâng kuoma zângaina inentira, pahai suolna chu an nauhai ângsûnga thungna petu, Pathien thilthawthei, ropui le, sipaihai
rorêlnaa ropui le, sinthawa thilthawthei tak, mihriem nauhai umdân po po hmu zing hlak; mi tin chu ama um dân le a thilthawhai ang peia pe dingin;
ama chun vawisûn ni chen hin Aigupta rama chun inchiknahai le thilmakhai chu a thaw a, Israel rama le mi danghai kuoma khawm; vawisûn nia ang hin ama chun hming a siempêk che a.
Aigupta rama inthawkin i mi Israelhai chu inchiknahai dâm, thilmakhai dâm, kut hrât dâm le, bân phar dâm le ṭium nasatak leh i hung ṭhuoi suok a;
hi ram nênetui le khuoizua luong ram, an thlatuhai kuoma pêk dinga i lo tiem ta ram hi an kuoma chun i pêk ta a;

chuongchun, an hung lût a, an nei a, nisienlakhawm, i râwl chu an awi naw a, i dân khawm chu an zâwm bawk naw a; anni chun thaw dinga thu i pêkhai a iengkhawm chu an thaw naw a; chuleiin, thil ṭha naw tinrêng chu an chunga chun în tlungtir a,

en ta u, khawpui lâkna dingin hnuoi dêng pâwnghai an hung um ta hi, nangin hung tlung dinga i hril angin, hripui le, ṭâm le kâwlhnâm leiin, a hung dotu Kaldaihai kuta chun khawpui chu pêk a ni ta a; en ta, i hmu zing hi.
Ka kuoma chun Aw
Chun,
“Ngai ta, mi tinrêng Pathien,
Chuleiin,

chun, hi khaw hung dotu Kaldaihai chu hung an ta, hi khuo hi meiin hung râwng an ta, a inhai a chunga Baal kuoma riminhnik an râwna le, kei mi suklungsenna dinga pathien danghai kuoma dâwn mi thilinhlânhai an lo bunthlâkna inhai le chun kâng a tih.
An naupang laia inthawk tah Juda mihai le Israel mihai hin ka mithmuah thil suol chu an lo thaw hlak si a; Israel mihai chun an kut sinthawhai chun an mi lo suklungsen si a,
Hi khawpui hi an bâwl ṭan nia inthawk vawisûn ni chen hin, keia ta ding chun ka ṭiumna le ka lunginsenna chawkthona chau a nih; chuongchun, ka hmaihmaa inthawkin ka sawn hmang ding a nih;

Juda mihai le Israel mihai suolna po po, mi suklungsenna ding ela, anni le an lalhai le an rorêltuhai le, an thiempuhai le, an zâwlneihai le, Juda rama mihai le Jerusalem hluotuhaiin an lo thaw tahai lei chun.
Chun, kei chu hmatieng ni lovin, hnungtieng an mînnghat a, inhmataka thoa anni inchûktirin, anni chu ka lo inchûktira chu, inchûktirna chu hre dingin an ngai si naw a.
Amiruokchu, an tirdakumna chu ka hming chawia sak in chu sukpawrche dingin an sieh a.

Hinnom phairuoma um Baal bâwlhmunhai chu Molek kuoma an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai meia infethlengtirna dingin an bâwl a, Juda chu suol inthawtir dingin, hi tirdakumna dâm hi thâwng an tih ti ka lungrila khawm a lût ngainawh.
“Chuleiin, tuhin, hi khawpui, ‘Hripui le, ṭâm le, kâwlhnâmah Babulon lal kuta pêk a ni tah,’ i ti chungthua hin Israel Pathien
Ngai ta u, ka lunginsenna le ka ṭiumna le, ka lunginthaka anni ka hnawt hmangna ram po poa inthawk chun anni chu kei khâwm ka ta; hi hmuna hin hung ṭhuoi nâwk ka ta, himtakin inchêngtir ka tih;
anni chu ka mihai nîng an ta, kei khawm an Pathien nîng ka tih;
kumkhuoa an mi ṭi theina dingin anni chu lungril pakhat le lampui pakhat chau pêng ka tih; anni le an hnunga an thlahai ṭhatna dingin.
Chun, ‘Ramsahai le mihriem boin, râusan a ni ta a; Kaldaihai kuta pêk a ni tah,’ in ti, hi rama hin lohai chu inchâwk nîng a ta.

Mihaiin lohai chu tangka sumin inchâwng an ta, thuziek chu ziek det an ta, châr an tih, hrietpuituhai ko an ta, Benjamin rama dâm, Jerusalem vêla hmunahai dâm, tlângram khawpuiahai dâm, phairuoma khawpuihaia dâm, Sima khawpuiahai dâm chun: an sal intângnaa inthawkin kân kîrtir ding a ni si a,
Chu nawa khawm vêngtu kulbînga khârkhum a ni sûng chun a vawi hninaah Jeremia kuoma chun
Kei mi hung ko la, lo dawn ka ti che a, thil ropui le inthup i hriet naw hai chu inentir ka ti che.
Hi khawpui inhai chungthua le Juda ram lalhai in kâwlhnâm le hnuoi dêng pâwng lama inthawka dangna siemna dinga sukchima umhai chungthua chun Israel Pathien
Kaldaihai chu do dingin an hung a, ka lunginthaknaa le ka lunginsennaa ka that ding mi ruonghaia suksip dingin, an suolnahai po po leiin hi khawpuia inthawk ka hmai ka thup ta si a.
Ngai ta u, hrisêlna le sukdamna intlungtir ka ta, anni chu sukdam ka tih; chun, an kuoma chun thudik le thlamuongna tamtak chu suklang bawk ka tih.
Juda sal intângna le Israel sal intângna chu inlamlêttir ka ta, a tîra ang khan anni chu rem ka tih.

Chun, hnuoi chunga hnam po pohai, an chunga thil ṭha ka thaw po po hretuhai le, thil ṭha po po le thlamuongna po po a ta dinga kân neitir hretuhai ṭiin inthin an tih; ka ta dingin hi khawpui hi hlimna hming le, inpâkna ding le ropuina ding hung nîng a tih.
Sipaihai

Tlângrama khawpuiahai le, phairuoma khawpuiahai le, Sima khawpuiahai le, Benjamin rama khawpuiahai le, Jerusalem vêl hmunhaia le, Juda khawpuiahai chun berâm ruolhai chu anni tiemtu kut hnuoiah la tla nâwk an tih,
“Ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung,
Chuong nihaia chun Juda chu sandam ni tâng a ta, Jerusalem khawm chu himtakin chêng tâng a tih: chun, ‘
Chun,

chuong ang bawk chun a lalṭhungphaa ṭhung ding naupasal nei lo dingin ka siehlaw David le ka thuthlung khawm hi suksiet thei nîng a tih; ka rawngbâwltuhai, thiempuhai le Levi mihai le thuthlunghai khawm chu.
Vâna umhai chu tiem sêng an ni naw a, tuisuoriet phaiphin chu inkhi ruol a ni naw ang bawkin; ka siehlaw David chithla chu sukpung ka ta, keia ta dinga rawngbâwltu Levi mihai le chun” tiin.
Chun, Jeremia kuoma chun
“Hi mi, Hnam pahni

Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai thlahai chunga rorêltuhai ding ka lâk nawna dingin, ka siehlaw David le Jakob thla chu peihâwn vêng ka tih; an sal intângna chu kân kîrtir ding a na, an chunga chun zângaina ka nei ding a ni si a”tiin.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar le a sipaihai po po le, a ram sûnga hnuoi chunga lalram po pohai le mi po poin Jerusalem le a khawpuihai po po an do laia

nang khawm a kuta inthawk chun suok naw ti ni a, ṭhuoi ni ngei ngei i ta, a kuta pêk i ni ding a nih: Babulon lal mithai chu nanga mithai ngei chun hmûng a ta, ama chun bau inphâkin i kuomah thu hril a tih; chun, nang chu Babulonah fe bawk i tih.
Amiruokchu, Juda lal Aw Zedekia,

thlamuongtakin thîng i tih; thlatuhai, i hmaa lal hmasa lo um tahai riminhnik an rawpêk ang khan, nangma ta ding khawma riminhnik râwng an ta, “Aw lalpa!” tiin ṭâng an ti che; hi thu hi ka lo hril ta si a,
Chun, Jeremia chun Juda ram lal Zedekia kuoma chun hieng thuhai hi Jerusalema chun a hril a;

chuong lai chun Babulon lal sipaihai chun Jerusalem dâm, Juda rama khawpui mâksana la umhai po po dâm, Lakis le Azeka dâm chu an hung rûn mêk a; hieng khawpuihai chau hi Juda rama chun khawpui kul neia um sun chu an ta si a.
Lal Zedekiain Jerusalema mipuihai po po kuoma, an kuoma zalênna thu phuong dinga thuthlung a siem hnunga Jeremia kuoma
“Mi tin chun a siehlawpa amanih, a siehlawnu amanih, Hebraipa amanih, Hebrainu amanih a ni chun, zalênin insuoktir a ta; a unau Juda chanpui rawngbâwlpêkin tukhawm a um ding a ni nawh”, tiin;

chun, mipui po po le rorêltuhai po po chun an remti a; thuthlung chu an awi ta a, chuongchun, mi tin chun mâni siehlawpa amanih, mi tin chun mâni siehlawnu amani chu zalênin insuoktir a ta, tukhawma ama rawng chu bâwlpêk ni ta naw ni; chu chu an awi a, an infetir tâwl ta a:

nisienlakhawm, chu hnunga chun an lamlêt a, siehlawpahai le siehlawnuhai chu zalêna an lo insuoktir tahai chu kîr dingin an ti nâwk a, siehlawpahai ding le siehlawnuhai ni dingin thununna hnuoiah an lâk lût nâwk ta a;
chuleiin,

‘Mi tinin a unaupa Hebrai mi nia, ama kuoma zawra lo um amanih, ama chu kum ruk sûng rawng lo bâwlpêk ta chu, kum sari tâwpa chun infetir in ta, nangmaa inthawk chun a thlâwnin în fetir ding a nih,’ tiin, nisienlakhawm, in thlatuhai chun an mi ngai naw a, an na khawm an sit nawh.

Chun, tu el khawm in hung lamlêt a, mi tinin mâni tuolbâwm ta dinga zalênna puongin, ka mithmuah thilindik chu in thaw ta a; chun, ka hming chawia ko ina chun ka hmaah thuthlung khawm chu in lo siem ta bawk a.

Amiruokchu, in inher a, ka hming chu in sukpawrche ta a; mi tin chun a siehlawpa le a siehlawnu, an nuom anga zalêna in infetir tahai chu in inkîrtir nâwk ta a; thununna hnuoia chun in lâklût nâwk a, in ta dinga siehlawpahai le siehlawnuhai ni dingin.
Chuleiin,
Chun, ka thuthlung bawsetu mihai, bâwngtê chu tum hnia chana a kâra fethleng ka hmaa an thuthlung thuhai thaw si lohai chu pêng ka ta;
Juda ram lalhai, Jerusalema rorêltuhai, mi tillâkhai, thiempuhai le, rama mi po po chu bâwngtê tum hni inkâra lût thleng tahai chu;
anni khawm chu an hringna zawngtuhai le, an hmêlmahai kuta chun pêng ka tih; chuongchun, an taksa thihai khawm chu hnuoia ramsahai le chunglêng vatehai ta dinga bu nîng a tih.
Chun, Juda ram lal Zedekia le a rorêltuhai khawm chu an hmêlmahai kuta le, an hringna zawngtuhai kuta le, nangnia inthawka hang fe, Babulon lal sipaihai kuta chun pêng ka tih.
Ngai ta u, thu pêng ka ta, hi khawpuia hin hung inkîrtir ka tih;
Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim hun laia
“Rekab mihai ina chun va fe la, an kuomah thu va hril la,
Chun, Habazzinia naupa, Jeremia naupa Jaazania le a unauhai le a naupasalhai po po le, Rekab sûngkuohai po po chu ka ṭhuoi a;
Pathien mi Igdalia naupa Hanan naupasalhai pindan, kawtkhâr vêngtu Sallum naupa Maaseia pindan chunga um, rorêltuhai pindan sîra um
chun, Rekab sûngkaw naupasalhai hmaa chun maihûn uoina sip le nohai ka sie a, an kuoma chun, “Uoin hi dâwn ro,” ka ti a.

Nisienlakhawm, anni chun an dawn a, “Uoin chu dâwn naw ning ungah; kan thlatu Rekab unaupa Jonadab chun hieng hin thu a mi pêk si a: ‘Kumkhuoin nangniin amanih, in naupasalhai khawmin amanih uoin hi dâwn ngai naw ti niu a;

in khawm bâwl ngai naw ti niu a, thlai chi khawm thlâk nâwng in ta, grêp huon khawm chîngin amanih, nei khawm nei bawk naw ti niu; nisienlakhawm, in nihai po po chu puon inah chêng in ta, in inpêmna rama chun ni tamtak in um theina dingin,’ tiin.
Chuongchun, kan thlatu Rekab naupa Jonadab râwl chu, kan dam sûng po poa, keini le kan nuhmeihai le kan naupasalhai le, kan naunuhmeihai le, uoin dâwn lo dinga a mi tiem chu kan awi a;
kan chêngna dinga inhai bâwl lo bawk ding dâmin, thlai chi dâm, lohai dâm, grêp huonhai dâm khawm kan nei bawk naw a;
puon inahai chun kan chêng a, kan thlatu Jonadabin thu a mi pêk ang taphawt chun kan zâwm a nih.

Amiruokchu, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chu hi rama hin a hung lai khan, ‘Thaw ro, Kaldai sipaihai ṭi lei le, Suria sipaihai ṭi leiin, Jerusalemah hang fêng ei tiu,’ kan ti a; chuongchun, Jerusalema chun kan hang chêng ta a,” tiin.
Chun,
“Sipaihai

Uoin dâwn lo dinga thu a naupasalhai a ipêk, Rekab naupa Jonadab thupêkhai chu sukpuitlingin a um a, vawisûn ni chen hin an dâwn naw a, an thlatu thupêk chu an pawm leiin: amiruokchu, zîngkâra thoa thuhrilin, in kuoma chun thu ka hrila chu in ngai si naw a.

Chun, zîngkâra thoa anni hung tirin, ‘Mi tin chu mâni lampui suola inthawk chun hung kîr unla, in thilthawhai chu siemṭha unla, pathien danghai chu an rawng bâwl dingin zui bawk naw ro, chuongchun, nangni le in thlatuhai kuoma ram ka ipêk cheua hin chêng in tih,’ tiin, ka siehlaw zâwlneihai po po chu in kuomah ka hung tir a; nisienlakhawm, in nâ khawm in sit naw a, ngai khawm in mi ngai naw kha.
Rekab naupa Jonadab naupasalhaiin an pain thu a pêk an thaw vei leh, hi mihai hlak hin an mi ngai si naw a;
chuleiin,
Chun, Jeremia chun Rekab sûngkuohai kuoma chun a hril a, “Sipaihai
sipaihai
Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim inlal kum linaa chun hi thu hi

“Lekhabu zuol la la, chutaka chun Israel ram chungthu le, Juda ram chungthu le, hnam po pohai chungthu, Josia hun laia inthawka i kuoma thu ka hril nia inthawka vawisûn ni chena mi hi, thu ka hrilhai po po chu ziek rawh.
An chunga thil ṭha naw thaw ka tum chu Juda sûngkuohai chun an hrietin, an suolna chu ka ngaidam theina dingin mi tin chu mâni um dân suola inthawk chun an hung kîr rawi mawh,” tiin.
Chun, Jeremia chun Neria naupa Baruk chu a ko a; Baruk chun
Jeremia chun Baruk chu thu a pêk a, “Kei chu khum ka na,
chuleiin, nang va fe la, lekhabu zuola ka baua inthawka
An hnina chu
Chun, Neria naupa Baruk chun,
Chun, Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim inlal kum ngana, thla kuonaa chun Jerusalema mi po pohai, Juda ram khawpuihaia inthawka Jerusalema mipui hung po pohai chun
Chun, mipui po po na hrieta chun,
Chun, Saphan naupa, Gemaria naupa Mikaia chun lekhabua

lekhaziektuhai pindanah lal ina chun a zu fe thla ta a; chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun lalhai po po, lekhaziektu Elisama, Semaia naupa Delaia, Akbor naupa Elnathan, Saphan naupa Gemaria, Hanania naupa Zedekia le lalhai po po chu an inṭhung a.
Chun, Mikaia chun mipui na hrieta Barukin lekhabu chu a tiem laia a lo hriet thuhai po po chu anni kuoma chun a hrilfie ta a.

Chuleiin, lalhai po po chun Kusi naupa Selemia, chu naupa Nethania naupa Jehudi chu Baruk kâwlah an tir a, “Mipuihai na hrieta lekha zuol i tiemna kha la la, hung chawi la, hung rawh,” tiin. Chuongchun, Neria naupa Baruk chun Lekhabu zuol chu a kutin a lâk a, an kuoma chun a hung ta a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Tuhin ṭhung la, kan na hrieta hin tiem ta,” an ti a. Chuongchun, Baruk chun an na hrieta chun a tiem ta a.
Chun, chuong thuhai po po chu an hriet chun, anni le anni chu an inṭi tuo seng ta a, chuongchun, Baruk kuoma chun, “Hieng thuhai po po hi lal chu hril ngei ngei kan tih,” an ti a.
Chun, Baruk kuoma chun, “A baua inthawk chun hieng thuhai po po hi ieng tiziea ziek am i na, mi hril rawh,” tiin an indawn a.
Baruk chun anni chu a dawn a, “A bauin hieng thuhai po po hi ka kuomah a hung hril a, kei chun lekhabua chun lekhatuiin ka lo ziek el a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, lalhai chun Baruk kuoma chun, “Fe la, Jeremia le nang chu inbihmang ro, khaw lai am in um ti tukhawm inhriettir naw ro,” an ti a.
Chun, anni chu huong sûng tuollaia chun lal kuomah an va fe a; amiruokchu, lekhabu zuol chu lekhaziektu Elisama pindana khan an mâksan a; chuongchun, lal na hrieta chun thuhai po po chu an hril ta a.

Chuongchun, lal chun Jehudi chu lekhabu zuol chu hung la dingin a tir a; ama chun lekhaziektu Elisama pindana inthawk chun a lâk suok a. Jehudi chun lal na hrieta le, a sîra ngîrhai lalhai po po na hrieta chun a tiem ta a.
Thla kuona a na, lal chu thlasik ina chun a ṭhung a, a hmaa chun meithuk chawklai hi a um a.
Chun, Jehudi chun phêk thum amanih, phêk li amanih a tiem phing chun lal chun chemtê hin a ât thlâk a, meithuka meiin lekhabu zuol chu a kâng zo vawng chenin, meithuka meia chun a pei lût pei ta a.
Anni chu an ṭi naw a, an silfênhai khawm an keithlêr bawk naw a, hieng thuhai hretu lal le a siehlawhai hrim hrim khawm chun.
Chu naw khawm Elnathan le Delaia le Gemaria chun lal kuoma chun lekhabu zuol chu raw lo dingin hnina an siem a, nisienlakhawm, anni chu a ngai naw a.
Chun, lal chun lal naupa Jerahmeel le, Azriel naupa Seraia le, Abdeel naupa Selemia chu lekhaziektu Baruk le zâwlnei Jeremia chu man dingin thu a pêk a; nisienlakhawm,
Chun, Jeremia baua inthawka Barukin thu a ziekhai le, lekhabu zuol chu lal chun a raw zo vawng chun Jeremia kuomah
“Lekhabu zuol dang la nâwk la, Juda ram lal Jehoiakimin a raw tah, lekhabu zuol hmasaa um thu hmasahai po po kha ziek rawh.
Chun, Juda ram lal Jehoiakim chungthua chun hieng ang hin hril i tih; ‘
Chuleiin, Juda ram lal Jehoiakim chungthua chun

Chun, ama le a thla le siehlawhai chu an suolna leiin hrem ka ta, chun, an chunga le, Jerusalem hluotuhai chunga le, Juda rama mihai chunga chun, an chunga tlung dinga ka hril, thil ṭha nawhai po po kha intlungtir ka tih; nisienlakhawm, an la ngai naw rawp a,” tiin.

Chun, Jeremia chun lekhabu zuol dang chu a lâk a, Neria naupa Baruk, lekhaziektu kuoma chun a pêk ta a; ama chun Juda ram lal Jehoiakimin a lo raw tah lekhabua thuhai po po chu Jeremia baua inthawk chun a ziek ta a; chu naw khawm chu thu angkhat tamtakhai chu an kuoma belsain a um a.
Chun, Jehoiakim naupa Konia aia Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin Juda ram lala a lo siem Josia naupa Zedekia chun ro a rêl ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, amain amanih, a siehlawhaiin amanih, chu rama mipuihai chun amani khawm, zâwlnei Jeremia hmanga a hril
Chun, lal Zedekia chun Selemaia naupa Jehukal le, thiempu Maaseia naupa Zephania chu zâwlnei Jeremia kuomah, “Tuhin keini ta dingin,
Chuonglai chun Jeremia chu lung ina an sie ta naw leiin, mipuihai lai chun a lûtin a suok hlak a.
Aigupta rama inthawk chun Pharao sipaihai chu an hung a; chun, Jerusalem inhuoltu Kaldaihai chun anni chanchin chu an lo hriet phing chun, Jerusalema inthawk chun an indar ta a.
Chuongchun,
Chuongchun, Kaldaihai hung nâwk an ta, hi khawpui hi hung do an ta, lâng an ta, meiin râwng an tih.

Nangma hung dotu che Kaldai sipaihai po po khawm chu lo that ta la khawm, anni laia chun mi hliemhai chau chu la umin, chuong khawm chun, mi tin chu mâni puon inhaia chun tho an ta, hi khawpui hi meiin râwng an tih,” tiin.
Chun, Pharao sipaihai ṭi leia Kaldai sipaihai chu Jerusalema inthawka an indar hnung chun,
Jeremia chu Benjamin ramah va fea, chu hnam laia a chanvo chu la dingin, Jerusalema inthawk chun a suok ta a.

Ama chu Benjamin dai kawtkhâra a um lai chun, vêngtu sipai hotu chutaka chun a lo um a, a hming chu Hanania naupa Selemia naupa Irija a nih; ama chun, “Kaldaihai kuomah în pe a nih,” tiin zâwlnei Jeremia chu a man ta a.
Jeremia chun, “Thukhêl a nih; Kaldaihai kuomah kân pêk nawh,” a ta; nisienlakhawm, ama chun a ngai naw a; chuongchun, Irija chun Jeremia chu a man a, rorêltuhai kuoma chun a hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, rorêltuhai chu Jeremia chunga chun an lunginsen a, ama chu an vuok a, lekhaziektu Jonathan ina chun an khum ta a; chu chu lung inah an siem ta si a.
Jeremia chu khur thima le kulbîngahai chun a hung chun, chutaka chun Jeremia chu ni tamtak a um a;
chun, lal Zedekia chun mi a tir a, a hung ṭhuoi a, a ina chun lal chun a rûkin ân dawn a, a kuomah, “
Chu nawa khawm lal Zedekia kuomah Jeremia chun, “Nanga chunga amanih, i siehlawhai chunga amanih, hi hnam chunga hin amanih khaw lai am ka suksuola lung ina i mi khum a na?
I zâwlneihai, ‘Babulon lal chun hi ram amanih, nang amani khawm hung do naw ni,’ tituhai kha khaw lai am an um a?

Chun, tuhin lo hre ta, aw ka pu lal, ka hni che, ka hnina hi, ka ngên che, i hmaa hin pawm ni raw se: lekhaziektu Jonathan ina khan mîn kîr tir nâwk ta naw rawh, chuong naw chun thi rawi ka tih,” a ta.

Chun, lal Zedekia chun thu a pêk a; Jeremia chu vêngtuhai kula chun an sie a, khawpui sûnga bei po po chu hmang vawng a ni chenin bei siemtuhai kawtthlêra inthawkin ni tin bei an pêk a. Chuongchun, Jeremia chu vêngtuhai kula chun a um zing ta a.
Chun, Mattan naupa Sephatia le, Pashur naupa Gedalia le, Selemia naupa Jukal le, Malkija naupa Pashur chun mipuihai po po kuoma Jeremiain hienga a hril hi an lo hriet a,
“Lalpa chun hieng hin a tih: Khawpui sûnga umhai chu kâwlhnâm le ṭâm le, hripuiin thîng an ta; Kaldaihai kuoma va fe chu hring an tih; a hringna chu insanhim a ta, hring a tih,

Chun, rorêltuhai chun lal kuoma chun, “Kan hni che hi, hi mipa hi sukhlum ni ngei raw se; chuong thuhai chu an kuoma hrilin, mipui po pohai kuthai, hi khawpuia indomi umhai kuthai chu a sukzuoi a nih; hi mipa hin hi hnam ṭhatna ding hi a zawng naw a, sietna ding a zawng lem a nih”, an ta.
Chun, lal Zedekia chun, “Ngai ta u, in kuta um a nih annâwm; lal chu nangni kal zâwnga thil thaw thei mi ding a ni si naw a,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Jeremia chu an man a, lal naupa Malkija khurthim, vêngtuhai kul sûnga uma chun an sie lût ta a; chuongchun, Jeremia chu khuopnahai le chun an infe thlâktir ta a. Chun, chu khurthim sûnga chun chirhak ti chau naw chu tui khawm a um naw a, chuongchun, Jeremia chu chirhaka chun ân chie ta a.
Chun, Ethiopia mi, Ebed-melek, mi tillâk, lal ina um chun Jeremia chu khurthim sûnga chun an sie ti a hriet chun chu lai chun lal chu Benjamin dai kawtkhâra khan a ṭhung a.
Ebed-melek chu lal ina inthawk chun a suok a, lal kuoma chun thu a hang hril ta a:

“Ka lalpa, lal, hieng mihai hin zâwlnei Jeremia chunga an thilthawhai po poa hin thil ṭhanaw an thaw a nih, ama chu khurthima chun an peilût a; chutaka chun ama chu phîngṭâma thi el âwm a nih; khawpui sûnga hin bei dang hrim a um ta naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun Ethiopia mi Ebed-melek chu thu a pêk a, “Hitaka inthawkin mi pathum ṭhuoi la, zâwlnei Jeremia chu a thi hmain khurthima inthawk chu va la suok ro,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Ebed-melek chun mihai chu a ṭhuoi a, lal ina ro ina chun a va fe a, chutaka inthawk chun sahmul puon ṭawphai le, savun puon hluihai chu a lâk a, hruiin Jeremia kuomah khurthim a chun ân khaithlâktir ta a.

Chun, Ethiopia mi Ebed-melek chun Jeremia kuoma chun, “Tuhin hieng sahmul puon ṭawphai le, savun puon hluihai hi i zakhnuoiah hruihruolhai hnuoia khan sil rawh,” a ta. Jeremia chun chuong ang tak chun a thaw a.
Chuongchun, Jeremia chu hruihruol chun ân khai a, khurthima inthawk chun an lâk suok ta a; chun, Jeremia chu vêngtuhai kulbînga chun a um zing a.
Chun, lal Zedekia chun mi a tir a,
Jeremia chun Zedekia kuoma chun, “Ka hrilfie chun i mi that ngei naw ding am a nih? thurâwn pe lang che khawm nang chun mi ngai bawk naw ti ni,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal Zedekia chun inrûkin Jeremia kuoma chun ân tiemkam ta a, “
Chun, Jeremia chun Zedekia kuoma chun, “Sipaihai Pathien, Israel Pathien
amiruokchu, Babulon lal rorêltuhai kuomah în pêk naw chun hi khawpui hi Kaldaihai kuta chun pêk nîng a ta, meiin râwng an ta, an kuta inthawk chun nang khawm suokthleng naw ti ni,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Jeremia chun, “Nang chu pe suok naw ni hai che.
Amiruokchu, vân pêk chu i nuom naw chun, hi hi a nih

Ngai ta, Juda ram lal ina nuhmei mâksana umhai po po kha Babulon lal rorêltuhai kuoma hung ṭhuoi suok nîng an ta; chuong nuhmeihai chun, ‘I ruol hmêlhriettakhai chun an hlêm che a, an hne ta che a ni hi; tuhin i kehai chu chirhaka chun a tluma, an hnungkîr nâwk a ni ta hi,’ tîng an ta.

Chun, i nauhai le i nuhmeihai po po chu Kaldaihai kuoma chun hung la suok an ta, nang khawm an kuta inthawk chun suokthleng naw ti ni: amiruokchu, Babulona lal kuta man nîng i ta; hi khawpui hi meia raw dingin siem i tih,” a ta.
Chun, Zedekia chun Jeremia kuomah, “Hieng thuhai hi tukhawm inhriettir naw la, thi naw ti ni.

Nisienlakhawm, rorêltuhai chun kân biekpui che ti an hrieta, i kuomah an hunga, i kuomah, ‘Lal kuoma i thu hril kha mi hrilfie rawh, kan kuomah ip naw la, sukhlum naw ning ung che; chun, ieng am lal chun i kuomah a hril a an ti chun,’
an kuoma chun, ‘Jonathan ina thi el dinga min kîrtir nâwk lo dingin, lal chu ka hnina ka pêk a nih’, tîng i ta,” tiin.

Chuongchun, rorêltuhai po po chu Jeremia kuoma chun an hung a, an indwn ta ngei a, ama chun lalin thu a pêk ang tak pei chun a hril ta a. Chuongchun, ama le inbiek chu an ma a, a thu tak chu hril a ni si naw a.
Chuongchun, Jeremia chu vêngtuhai kulbînga chun Jerusalem chu lâka a um ni chen chun a um ta a.
Juda ram lal Zedekia inlal kum kuona, thla sâwmnaa chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chu a sipaihai po po leh Jerusalemah a hung a, a hung rûn ta a;
chun, Zedekia inlal kum sâwmpakhatna, thla lina, chu thla ni kuo ni chun chu khawpuia chun suksietna chu a um ta a.

Jerusalem lâk a ni ni chun, Babulon lal rorêltuhai po po chu an hung lût a, dai kawtkhâr lailung, Nergalsarezera dâm, Samgarneboa dâm, Sarsekima dâm, Rabsarisa dâm, Rabmaga dâm, Babulon lal rorêltu dang po pohai le chun an ṭhung tâwl a.

Chun, Juda ram lal Zedekia le indo mihai po po chun chu chu an hmu chun an tlânsie a, kul pahni inkâra dai kawtkhârah, lal huon lampuia chun a zân a zân chun an tlânsuok ta a; chuongchun, ama chu Araba lampuia khan a fe a.

Nisienlakhawm, Kaldai sipaihai chun anni chu an hnawt a, Zedekia chu Jeriko phairuoma chun an hnawt phâk a, chun, ama chu an man chun, Hamath rama Riblaa Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a, ama chun a chungah ro a rêlthlûk a.
Riblaa chun a mithmu ngeiah Nebukadnezzar chun Zedekia naupasalhai chu a that a; chun, Babulon lal chun Juda mi ṭhahai po po khawm chu a that bawk a.
Chu nawa khawm chun, Zedekia mithai chu a kheldawk a, thîrkawl ân buntir a, Babulona ṭhuoi dingin.
Chun, Kaldaihai chun lal in le mihai inhai chu meiin an raw a, Jerusalem kulbanghai chu an sukchim ta a.
Chun, Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun khawpuia mi la um sunhai le, tlân hmangtuhai le, ama kuoma hung lûthai le, mipui a la mahla la um sunhai po chu Babulon tieng chun salah a ṭhuoi ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun mi rimsihai iengkhawm nei lohai chu Juda rama chun a mâksan a, grêp huonhai le lohai anni chu a pêk nghâl tâwl bawk a.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chun Jeremia chu Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu, kuoma chun enkawl dingin a pêk a,
“Ṭhuoi la, ama hi ṭhatakin enkawl la, sukpawi naw rawh; amiruokchu, i kuoma a hril ang ang chun thawpêk lem rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu le Nebusazban, Rabsaris, Nergalsarezer, Rabmag le Babulon lal rorêltuhai po po chun,

mi an tir a, Jeremia chu vêngtuhai kulbînga inthawk chun an ṭhuoi suok a, Saphan naupa Ahikam, chu naupa Gedalia kuoma chun an pêk a, in tienga ṭhuoi dingin; chuongchun, mipuihai laia chun a um ve ta a.
Chun,
Nisienlakhawm, nang chu, chu ni chun sansuok ka ti che a, mi iṭihai kuta chun pêk ni naw ti ni,
Sandam ngei ngei ka ti che a, kâwlhnâmah i tlu naw ding a ni si a; amiruokchu, i hringna chu nangma ta dinga sanhim nîng a tih; i ringna chu keimaa hin i sie leiin,
Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotuin ama chu Ramaa inthawka ân fetir a, Juda rama mi le Jerusalema sal intânghai Babulon tienga sala ṭhuoihai laia khaidieta khuopa ama a ṭhuoi hnunga
Vêngtu pâwl hotu chun Jeremia chu a ṭhuoi a, a kuomah, “
chuongchun,

Tuhin, ngai ta, vawisûn ni hin i kuta khaidiet umhaia inthawk chun kân suo che a nih. Babulon tienga kei mi zui hi i ngaia a ṭha chun, hung la, amiruokchu, Babulon tienga kei mi hung zui chu i ta dinga rin a um chun, ṭhul el rawh; ngai ta, ram po po chu i hmaa chun a um a, khaw tienga khawm i ta dinga ṭha le, i ta dinga remchângna tieng tienga chun, chu tienga chun fe rawh,” a ta.

Chun, chuonga a la fe hma chun, ama chun, “Fe el rawh; Babulon lal Juda ram khawpuihai chunga rorêltua a siem Saphan naupa, Ahikam naupa Gedalia kuoma chun kîr nâwk la, mipuihai lai chun ama kuoma chun va um el rawh; annawleh, fena dinga remchâng i tina tieng tieng chun fe el rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, vêngtu hotu chun fâk ding le thilpêk a pêk a, ân fêtir ta a.
Chun, Jeremia chu Mizpaa Ahikam naupa Gedalia kuoma chun a fe ta a, mipui chu rama mâksana la umhai laia chun ama kuomah a va chêng ta a.

Chun, rama sipai hotuhai po po le an mihaiin Babulon lalin Gedalia Ahikam naupa chu chu rama rorêltuah a siem a, a kuoma chun pasalhai, nuhmeihai, naupanghai, mi rimsitak takhai, Babulona sala ṭhuoia um nawhai chu ân kawltir ti an hriet chun,

Mizpaa Gedalia kuoma chun, Nethania naupa Ismael, Karea naupasal Johanan le Jonathan, Tanhumeth naupa Seraia, Netophath mi Ephai naupasalhai, Maakath mi naupa Jezania le anni le an mihai chu an hung tâwl a.

Chun, Saphan naupa, Ahikam naupa Gedalia chun inkhâmin, anni le an mihai kuoma chun a hril a, “Kaldaihai hi an rawng bâwlpêk chu ṭi naw ro; rama chun chêng unla, Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl unla, in ta dingin ṭhâng a tih.

Keia chungthua chun, ngai ta u, eini kuoma hunghai, Kaldaihai hmaa ngîr dingin Mizpaa hin ka chêng ding a na; amiruokchu, nangni chun uoin le nipui theirahai chu la khâwm unla, hriek leh, in bâwmahai chun sie unla, khawpui in lâk tahaia chun chêng el ro,” tiin.

Chuong ang bawk chun Moab rama Juda chênghai po po le, Ammon thlahai laia chêng le, Edoma mihai le, ram po poa chênghai chun, Babulon lal chun hlâbîk Juda rama chun mâksan a la nei a, Saphan naupa, Ahikam naupa Gedalia chu an chunga chun a sie ti an hriet chun,
Judahai po po chu hnawthmang an nina hmun senga inthawk chun an hung kîr a, Juda ramah, Mizpaa Gedalia kuoma chun an hung a, uoin le nipui thei rahai chu tamtak el chu an lâk khâwm ta a.
Chu nawa khawm Karea naupa Johanan le sipaihai hotuhai ramhnuoia umhai po po chu Mizpaa chun Gedalia kuoma chun an hung a,
a kuomah, “Ammon mihai lal Baalis chun Nethania naupa Ismael chu i hringna la dingin a hung tir ti i hriet am?” an ti a. Nisienlakhawm, Gedalia, Ahikam naupa chun anni chu a taksâwn naw a.

Chun, Karea naupa Johanan chun Mizpaa Gedalia kuoma chun inrûkin thu a hril a, “Mi tir la, ka ngên che hi, Nethania naupa Ismael chu that el ka tih; tukhawma hre hliek naw ni hai; ieng dingin am i hringna chu lain, Juda i kuoma hung inkhâwm sunhai chu sukdara umin, Juda rama la um sunhai chu bohmang el an ta?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Ahikam naupa Gedalia chun Karea naupa Johanan kuoma chun, “Hi thil hi i thaw ding a ni nawh, Ismael chungthuah khêl dêr i hril a ni si a,” a ta.

Chun, thla sarinaa chun lal chi Elisama naupa Nethania, chu naupa Ismael le, lal hotu lientak pakhat le, ama kuoma mi sâwmhai le chun, Mizpaa chun Ahikam naupa Gedalia kuoma chun an hung ta a; chutaka Mizpaa chun bei dâm an fâk hmunkhat tâwl a.
Chun, Nethania naupa Ismael le a kuoma mi sâwm umhai chu an tho a, Saphan naupa, Ahikam naupa Gedalia, Babulon lalin chu rama rorêltu dinga a sie chu kâwlhnâm leh an thaw a, ama chu an that ta a.
Ismael chun Gedalia kuoma Juda umhai po po Mizpaa umhai le, Kaldai mi, chutaka um, indo mihai khawm chu a that vawng a.
Chun, Gedalia chu a thata mi tukhawma an hriet naw ni hnina hnunga chun hieng hi a hung na;

Mi ṭhenkhat Sekema inthawk dâm, Siloa inthawk dâm, Samaria inthawk dâmin mi sâwmriet zet, an khâkhmul vawa, an puonhai keithlêra, anni le anni chu inât a, an kuta bu thilinhlânhai le riminhnikhai chawiin,

Chun, Nethania naupa Ismael chu Mizpaa inthawk chun, a fe malama ṭap pei pumin anni chu tuok dingin a fe suok ta a; chun, anni chu ân tuokpui chun an kuoma chun, “Ahikam naupa Gedalia kuomah hung ro,” a ti a.
Chun, chuong ang tak chun a hung na, khawpui sûnga an hung phing chun Nethania naupa Ismael chun anni chu a that ta a, ama le a kuoma mi umhai chun anni chu khur sûnga chun an pei thlâk ta a.

Chun, anni laia chun mi sâwm Ismael kuoma, “Keini chu mi that naw rawh; rama chun bu dâm, buṭei dâm, hriek dâm, khuoizu dâm thuphmangna khur chu kan nei si a,” tituhai chu an um a. Chuongchun, anni chu a hla ta a, an unauhai laia chun a that ve ta naw a.

Chun, chu khur, Ismaelin Gedalia sîra mi a thathai ruong po po a pei thlâkna chu (chu chu Israel lal Baasa a ṭi leia lal Asain a lo siem kha a nih) Nethania naupa Ismael chun chu chu mi thathai chun a suksip ta a.

Chun, Ismael chun Mizpaa mi dam la umhai po: lal naunuhmeihai le vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzaradanin Ahikam naupa Gedalia ân kawltir, Mizpa khuoa la um po po leh chun salin a man ta vawng a; Nethania naupa Ismael chun chuonghai chu sala ṭhuoiin Ammon mihai ram fethleng dingin a fe suok ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Karea naupa Johanan le, ama kuoma um sipai hotuhai po po chun Nethania naupa Ismaelin thil ṭhanaw a thawhai po po chu an lo hriet chun,
mi po po chu an ṭhuoi a, Nethania naupa Ismael chu do dingin an fe suok ta a; ama chu Gibeona tuipuihai kâwla chun an va hmu a.
Chun, Ismael kuoma mipui um po pohai chun Karea naupa Johanan le sipai hotuhai po po le a kuoma umhai po po chu an hmu chun an lâwm ta êm êm el a.
Chuongchun, Mizpaa inthawka Ismael sal intâng dinga a ṭhuoihai po po chu an inlêt a, an hung kîr a, Karea naupa Johanan kuoma chun an fe tâwl ta a.
Amiruokchu, Nethania naupa Ismael chu mi pariet leh Johanana inthawk chun a suokthleng a, Ammon mihai kuoma chun a fe ta a.

Chun, Karea naupa Johanan le, a kuoma sipai hotu umhai po po chun, Nethania naupa Ismaela inthawka mipui la um sun an lâk dawkhai po po chu, Ahikam naupa Gedalia le, indo mihai, nuhmeihai, naupanghai le, mitillâkhai, Gibeona inthawka a hung ṭhuoi nâwkhai a that hnunga, a lâk suokhai chu Mizpaa inthawk chun an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chuongchun, an fe a, Kaldaihai leia Aiguptaa lût dinga fe dingin Bethlehem kâwla Geruth-kimhama
Ahikam naupa Gedalia Babulon lalin chu ram chunga rorêltu dinga a sie kha Nethania naupa Ismael khan a that leiin anni chu an ṭi êm êm a.
Chun, sipai hotuhai po po, Karea naupa Johanan hai, Hosaia naupa Jezania hai, mipui po po a chîn taka inthawka a lien tak chenin an hung hnai a,
zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma chun hieng hin an hril a, “Kan ngên che hi, kan hninahai hi i hmaa chun pawm ni raw se; hieng tuta la mahlahai po po ta ding hin,
Chun, zâwlnei Jeremia chun an kuomah, “In thu chu ka hriet ta a; ngai ta u,
Anni chun Jeremia kuoma chu, “
A ṭha amanih, a sie amanih khawm ni sienla,
Chun, ni sâwm hnunga chun,
Ama chun Karea naupa Johanan le, an kuoma um sipai hotuhai po po le, mi po po a chîn taka inthawka a lien tak chenin a ko a.
an kuomah a hril a, “A hmaa in hninahai chu intlun dinga in mi tirna,
Hi rama hin in chêng zing chun, ṭhiek lovin tungding ka ti cheu a, phâwi lovin phun ka ti cheu; in chunga sietna kan tlungtir hi pawi ka ti si a.
In iṭitak Babulon lal chu ṭi naw unla, ama chu ṭi naw ro,
Chun, zângaina phalpêk ka ti cheu a, in chungah zângaina a neia, in ram ngeiah ân kîrtir nâwkna ding cheuin.
Amiruokchu, ‘Hi rama hin um zing nâwng ei tiu,’ in ti a, in Pathien
‘Ni lo, Aigupta ramah fe lem ei ta, chutaka chun indona hlak hmu nâwng ei ta, tawtawrâwt ri hlak hre nâwng ei ta, bei tlâksam hlak hre bawk nâwng ei ta, chutaka chun chêng ei tiu,’ ti in ni chun;
Aw Juda la um sunhai, tuhin

hieng hi hung nîng a tih: chu Aigupta rama chun kâwlhnâm in ṭi hlak khan hung hnawt phâk a ti cheu a, ṭâm in iṭi khan chu Aigupta rama chun a hung hnawt rak rak ding cheu a nih; chuongchun, chutaka chun thîng in tih.

Va mikhuol dinga Aiguptaa fe dinga an hmaihai innghat chie chuong mihai po po chu chuong ang chu nîng an tih; kâwlhnâmah thîng an ta; ṭâm le hripuia leh; an chunga thil ṭha naw ka hung intlungtir dinga inthawk chun tukhawm suokthlengin amanih, tukhawm um zing naw ni hai.
Sipaihai
Aw Juda la um sunhai, nangni chungthuah
In thlarauhai chunga chun hmusitumtakin in lo thaw ta a; ‘
vawisûn hin in kuomah ka hrilfie ta a, nisienlakhawm, in kuoma a mi hung tirna ang thil ienga khawm chun
Chuleiin, tuhin, chutaka va mikhuol in nuomna hmuna chun, kâwlhnâm le, ṭâm le hripuiin thîng in tih ti hi hre ngei ngei ro,” tiin.
Chun, hieng thuhai po po,

Hossia naupa Azaria hai, Karea naupa Johanan hai, mi chapo po pohai chun Jeremia kuomah thu an hril a “Thukhêl i hril dêr a nih: ‘Chutaka va mikhuol dingin, Aigupta rama chun in fe ding a ni nawh,’ ti dingin
Neria naupa Baruk chun an mi that theina ding le, Babulona sala an mi ṭhuoi theina dingin Kaldaihai kuta mîn hlân dingin, nang hi kan chunga chun a hung tir che a ni hi,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Karea naupa Johanan hai, sipai hotuhai po po le mipuihai po po chun Juda rama chêng zing ding thu
Chuongchun, Karea naupa Johanan le, sipai hotuhai po po chun Juda rama la um sunhai, Juda rama hnawthmang an nina hnamhaia inthawka hung kîr nâwkhai,
pasalhai, nuhmeihai, naupanghai, lal naunuhmeihai le, mi tin Nebuzaradanin Saphan naupa Ahikam, chu naupa Gedalia le zâwlnei Jeremia le, Neria naupa Baruk kuoma a mâksanhai chu an ṭhuoi a;
Aigupta rama chun an fe ta a;
Chun, Tahpanhesa chun Jeremia kuomah
“Lung lientak takhai i kutin la la, Juda mihai mithmua chun, Tahpanhesa Pharao in lûtna bula um, ṭêklei siemna hmuna a chârna chira chun phûm rawh;
chun, an kuoma chun, ‘Sipaihai
Ama chu hung a ta, Aigupta rama chu hung hrem a ta, thinaa pêk dinghai chu thinaah, sala intâng dinghai chu salah, kâwlhnâma dinghai chu kâwlhnâm kuoma pêk nîng an tih.

Chun, Aigupta pathienhai ina chun mei sêm a ta; ama chun râwng a ta, salah ṭhuoi hmang a tih; berâmpu chu ama silfêna ân chei angin, ama chu Aigupta ram chun inchei a tih; chutaka inthawk chun thlamuongtakin fe suok tâng a tih.
Chun, Beth-semes sûtpuihai Aigupta rama um khawm chu sukthliek bawk a ta, Aigupta ram pathienhai inhai khawm chu meia raw ni bawk an tih,’ a tih, ti rawh,” tiin.
Aigupta rama Juda chêng po pohai, Migdola dâm, Tahpanhesa dâm, Nopha dâm, Pathros rama chênghai dâm chungthua Jeremia kuoma thu hung tlung chu,
“Sipaihai

lunginsennaa mi chawktho dingin an thlatuhaiin amanih, anni ngei khawma an hriet lohai pathien danghai chu an rawng bâwl ding le, an kuoma riminhnik raw dinga an fe a, chuong khawhlonahai an thawna lei chun,
Zingkâra tho a, anni hung tirin, ka siehlaw zâwlneihai po po, ‘Aw hi thil tirdakum ka theida hi chu thaw naw ro,’ tiin in kuomah ka hung tir a.
Nisienlakhawm, an ngai naw a, Pathien danghai kuoma riminhnik rawa an khawhlonahai chu nghatsan dingin an nahai khawm an sit naw a:

Chuleiin, ka lunginsenna le ṭîumna chu Jerusalem kawtthlêrhaia le Juda ram khawpuihai chunga chun bunthlâkin a um a, mûtchawkin a um ta a ni kha; chuongchun, vawisûn ni chena an ni angin, suksiet le râusan an ni ta a.
Chuleiin, tuhin

chuongahai chun in kut sinthawhai chun in mi suklungsen a, in va mikhuolna tiengahai chun Aigupta rama pathien danghai kuoma chun riminhnik dâm in raw a; chuong chu hi hnuoia hnam po pohai laia thusekawk le, ṭawngsephur le, sâtthlâk in ni theina ding chau a ni naw am a nih?

In thlatuhai khawhlona dâm, Juda ram lalhai khawhlona dâm, an nuhmeihai khawhlona dâm le nangni khawhlona dâm ngei khawm, in nuhmeihai khawhlonahai Jerusalem kawtthlêrhaia le, Juda rama an thawhai kha in hriet zing naw am a nih?

Vawisûn ni chen khawm hin an insukhnuoi naw a, an ṭi bawk naw a, ka dân khawm chu an zâwm bawk naw a, ka thuruothai khawm chu an hraw nawh; chuong in thlatuhai le nangni hma ngeia ka lo sie tahai kha.
Chuleiin, sipaihai

Juda la um sunhai chu ṭhuoi ka ta, chutaka va mikhuol dinga Aigupta ram tieng an hmai innghathai chu; chun, anni chu bohmang vawng an ta, Aigupta rama chun tlûng an ta; ṭâmna le kâwlhnâmin anni chu sukbohmang nîng an tih; thîng an ta, a chîn taka inthawka a lien tak chenin kâwlhnâm le ṭâmin thîng an tih; chuongchun, anni chu hnâwmhnawk le, makti ding le, ṭawngsephur le ṭawngsekawk nîng an tih.
Hripui le ṭâmna le kâwlhnâma Jerusalem ka hrem ang bawk khan Aigupta rama chênghai chu ka hrem ding a ni si a;

chuongchun, Juda la um sun, va mikhuol dinga Aigupta rama va fehai chu tukhawm, Juda ram hung kîr nâwka chêng an inhâwkna rama hung kîr nâwk ding hin suokthleng naw ni hai a, um zing bawk naw ni hai; a suokthlenghai ti chau naw chu tukhawm an hung kîr nâwk âwm si naw a,” tiin.

Chun, mi an nuhmeihaiin pathien danghai kuomah riminhnik an raw ti hretuhai po po le, nuhmei lo ngîr vehai po po le, inkhâwm nasatakhai, Pathrosa Aigupta rama mi chêng po pohai chun Jeremia chu an dawn a,

Amiruokchu, kan baua thu suok po pohai, vâna lalnu kuoma riminhnik raw ding dâm, a kuoma dâwnmi thilinhlân buok ding dâm, Jerusalem kawtthlêrhaia le Juda ramhaia, keini le kan thlatuhai le, kan lalhai le kan rorêltuhai leh kan lo thaw ta hlak ang khan thaw ngei kan tih; chuong lai chun fâk ding tinrêng kan neiin, a ṭha hlea, a sietna kan hmu nawh.
Amiruokchu, hi vân lalnu kuoma riminhnik raw kan mâka, dâwnmi thilinhlân buok kan mâk china chu thil iengkim kan tlasamin, ṭâmna le kâwlhnâmin a mi sukbohmang zo a ni ta hi.
Chun, vân lalnu kuoma riminhnik kan raw a, dâwnmi thilinhlân kan buok lai chun, kan pasalhai ṭhang lovin dâwnmi thilinhlân chu kan buokin, ama biekna ding beithlumhai kan siem am a nih?” an ti a.
Chun, Jeremia chun, mipui po po, pasalhai, nuhmeihai, mi po po chu dawnnaa ama dawntuhai kuoma chun a hril a,
“Jerusalem kawtthlêrahai le, Juda rama nangni le, in thlatuhai le, in lalhai le, in rorêltuhai le, chu rama mihaiin riminhnik in raw hlak kha
Thil tirdakum in thawhai lei le, in thilthawhai suol lei chun
Riminhnik chu in raw leiin,
Chu nawa khawm chun Jeremia chun mipuihai po po kuoma le nuhmeihai kuoma chun, “Aigupta rama Juda um po pohai,
sipaihai
Chuleiin, Aigupta rama Juda chêng po pohai,

Ngai ta u, thil ṭha tiengah ni lovin, thil ṭha naw tienga dingin anni chu ka enkai dêk a nih: Aigupta rama Juda mi um po pohai chu, an ram dêr hmakhat chun, ṭâmna dâm le kâwlhnâm dâma anni chu sukbohmang nîng an tih.

Chuong kâwlhnâma inthawka suokthlenghai, mi tlâwmte chau chu Aigupta rama inthawk chun Juda rama chun hung kîr nâwk an tih; chuongchun, va mikhuol dinga Aigupta rama Juda la um sun va fehai po po khan, keia thu am a ni, anni thu a ieng am a dingchang lema ti hre tâng an tih.
Chun, hi hi in ta dinga inchikna nîng a tih,
Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim inlal kum, kum linaa, Jeremia baua inthawka lekhabua thuhai a ziek laia, Neria naupa Baruk kuoma zâwlnei Jeremia thuhril thu chu:
“Aw Baruk,
Chuongchun, ama kuoma chun hieng hin hril i tih:
Chun, nang chun i ta dingin thil ropuihai chu i zawng a ni maw? Zawng naw rawh, ngai ta, mihriem po po chungah thil ṭhanaw ka hung intlungtir ding a ni si a,
Hnamhai chungthua zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma
Aigupta chungthuah: Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim inlal kum li kuma Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin a rûn, Aigupta lal Pharao-neko sipai Euphrates vadungpui panga Karkemisa umhai chungthu chu:
Âwmphaw le phaw buotsai unla, indona chu hnai ro.
Sakawrhai chu râlthuom unla, nangni sakawr chung chuong mihai, chuong unla, in lukhumhai leh ngîrsuok ro; feihai chu nâwttle unla, râlthuom chun inthuom ro.
Mi hrât chu tlân hmang naw sienla, mi thilthawthei khawm chu suokthleng naw raw se; hmâra chun Euphrates vadungpui panga chun an insui a, an tlu a.
Nile vadung, vadungpuihai ang ela tuihai invawr let anga ngîr dawk chu tu am a na?

Aigupta ram chu Nile vadung ang chun a hung lien a, a tuihai chu vadungpui tuihai ang elin ân vawr let a; ama chun, “Hung lien ka ta, leihnuoi hi inkhum ka tih; khawpuihai le chutaka a hluotuhai chu sukbohmang bawk ka tih,” a ta.

Nangni sakawrhai, hang fe unla, nangni sakawr tawlailîrhai, lunginsen ro; mi thilthawtheihai khawm chu fe suok raw hai seh; Ethiopia le Put mihai, phaw hmang mihai le, Lud mi thalngul kuoi hmang mihai chu.
Chu ni chu
Gileada chun hang fe la, thinghnai damdâwi hang la rawh, aw Aigupta naunu nunghâk inthieng, a thlâwn elin damdâwi tamtak i lo hmang ta a; i ta dingin damna hrim a um naw a.
Hnamhai chun în zakna chu an lo hriet a, i khêkri chun hnuoi chu a sip zo tah; mi thilthawthei chu mi thilthawtheia ma chun ân suithlu a, an pahni hni chun an tlu rêl a nih.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chu hung a ta, Aigupta ram chu ieng angin am a hung rûn ding a na, ti thua zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma
Aiguptaa chun hril unla, Migdola chun puong unla, Nopha khawm chun puong unla, Tahpanhesa le chun: “Ngîr dawk la, inbuotsai rawh; i vêla chun kâwlhnâm chun a fâk zo pei ta si a,” ti ro.
I mi hrâthai chu iengdingin am lên hmangin um an ta?
Mi tamtak chu insuithlu dingin a siem a, anih, an intlûk thuo pei a, “Tho unla, hi kâwlhnâm nêksâwrnaa inthawk hin eini mihai laia ngei le, ei piengna ram ngeia khan fe nâwk ei tiu,” an ti a.
Chutaka chun an khêk a, “Aigupta lal Pharao hlak chu ri mei mei el chau a ni si a; hun ruothai chu ân feliemtir pei a,” tiin.
Laltak a hming khawm sipaihai
Aw nang naunuhmei Aigupta rama chêng, sala intâng dinga fe dingin incheibâwl rawh, Noph chu râusan nîng a ta, hluotu boin a kâng ding a ni si a.
Aigupta hi bâwngla hmêl ṭhatak a na, nisienlakhawm, hmârtienga sietna chu a hung a, a hung tlung mêk a nih.

A sûnga mi inhlawfahai khawm chu, ran ina bâwngtêhai ang an nih; anni khawm chu an hnungkîr a, an tlânhmang hmunkhat a; an ngir hrim hrim nawh; an lunginzingna ni, anni hremna hun chu an chungah a hung tlung si a.
A rî chu rûlpui rî ang a na; a hmêlmahai chun kalchawiruolin, hreipuihai leh thing phûrtuhai angin an hung rûn a.
Zawng suok thei ni naw sien khawm, a rampui hnuoihai chu phûr thlûng an tih,
Aigupta naunu chu sukzak nîng a ta; hmârtienga mihai kuta chun pêk suok nîng a tih.
Sipaihai
anni chu an hringna zawngtuhai kuta le, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar kuta le, a siehlawhai kuta chun pe suok ka tih; chu hnunga chun, tienlaia ang bawk khan hluoin um tâng a tih;

Nisienlakhawm, aw Jakob ka siehlaw, ṭi naw rawh, aw Israel, beidawng bawk naw rawh, ngai ta, hlataka inthawkin nang le, i chithlahai chu sala an intângna rama inthawk chun ka sandam ding cheu a ni si a; Jakob chu hung kîr nâwk a ta, to ṭawk ṭawk a ta, muongtakin um a tih, tukhawma sukṭi ta naw ni hai.
Aw ka siehlaw Jakob, ṭi naw rawh,
Pharaoin Gaza a rûn hmaa, Philistin mihai chungthua zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma
A mi hrâthai ketin tet rîka le, a sakawr tawlailîrhai tlân rîka le, tawlailîr kehai innâwt rîka chun pahai chu an ṭi a, an nauhai enkai theilo lêkin an kuthai a zawi thla a;
ṭhangpuitu la um taphawthai chu Tura le Zidona inthawka sât thlâk dingin, Philistin mihai po po suksietna dinga ni hung tlung chu a ni leiin, Kaphtor thlierkâra la umsunhai, Philistin mihai chu
Gazaa chun châtvaina a hung tlung a, an phairuom la um sun, Askelon hlak chu iengkhawm lova siem a ni ta a; chun, nang le nang ieng chen am în ât ding a na?
Aw nang
Moab chungthu chu, Sipaihai

Moab inpâkna chu a um ta naw a; Hesbona chun a chungah thil ṭhanaw chu an rawt a, ‘Thaw ro, hnam ninaa inthawkin ama chu tuithlâr ei tiu,’ tiin. Nang khawm Aw Madmen, sukto ṭawk la nîng i tih; kâwlhnâmin hung hnawt bawk a ti che.
Horonaima inthawka khêkri chu, suksietna le sukbohmangna nasatak a ni a!
Moab chu suksiet a ni ta a, a têhai chun khêkri hriet dingin an hung thaw a.
Luhith hang fenaa chun ṭap pum zing zingin an hang fe hlak ding a ni si a; Horonaim zuk fenaa chun sukbohmangna khêkri rinum tuor ri chu an hriet si a.
Tlân hmang unla, in hringnahai chu sanhim unla, thlalêra sabengtung ang chu ni unla.
Khawpui tina chun suksetu hung tlung a ta, khawpui ieng khawm suokthleng naw ni, phairuomhai khawm chu suksiet nîng a ta, phaizâwl khawm chu sukbohmang nîng a tih;
Moab kuoma chun a vuong hmang theina dingin thlahai pe la: a khawpuihai chu râusan a ni ding a na, mi a chêng hrim hrim um lovin.

Moab chu a tleirâwl laia inthawk ta khan nuomtâwla um hlak a ni a, uoin nawng ang elin dettakin a um zing a, bêl pakhata inthawka bêl dangah bun ruokin a la um ngai naw a, sala khawm a lân tâng bawk nawh; chuleiin, amaa rim inhnikna chu a la um zing a, a rim inhnikna chu suksiet a la ni nawh.
“Chuleiin, ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk,
An ringtak Bethel chu Israel sûngkaw ta dinga inzapuium a ni ang khan, Moab chu Kemos chun inzapui a tih.
‘Mi thilthawthei, indonaa mi hrât khawkhênghai ei nih,’ ieng tin am in ti thei a?
Moab chu suksietin a um a, a khawpuihai hlak chu meiin a khu a, a tlangvâlhai hlak chu that thlâk zo an ni ta a, Laltak, a hming sipaihai
Moab lunginzîngna ding chu a hung tlung vâng vâng ta a, sukrinuma a umna ding khawm chu a hung inhmaw tah.
Nangni a vêla um po pohai, ama chu ṭa unla, a hming hretuhai po po chun, ‘Lalhmawl ngartak el, hmawl mawitak el chu iengtiziea tliek el am a na?’ ti ro.
“Aw nang Dibona chêng naunuhmei, i ropuinaa inthawkin hung thla la, dangchârin ṭhung rawh; Moab suksetu chu i chungah a hung tlung a, i kul nghethai chu a suksiet ta si a.
Aw Aroer hluotuhai, lampui sîrah ngîr unla, enthlit ro; a suokthleng ta le, a tlân hmanghai kha indawn unla, ‘Ieng am thaw a ni ta leh?’ ti ro.
Moab chu sukzakin a um a; suksiet a ni ta si a; ṭap inrûm unla, ṭap ro; Arnona chun va hril unla, Moab suksieta a um tâk thu chu.
“Phaizâwl ram chunga chun rorêlna a hung tlung a; Holon chunga dâm, Jahza chunga dâm, Mephaath chunga dâm;
Dibon chunga dâm, Nebo chunga dâm, Beth-diblathaim chunga dâm;
Kiriathaim chunga dâm, Bethgamul chunga dâm, Beth-meon chunga dâm;
Kerioth chunga dâm, Bozra chunga dâm; Moab rama khawpui hla le hnaiahai po po chunga dâm chun.
Moab ki chu sât thlâk a ni a, a bân khawm chu suktliek a ni tah,
“Ama chu vairui ta u,
Nanga ta ding chun Israel chu hrilsîm a ni naw am a nih? Inruhai lai hmu a ni am a nih? Ama thu chu i hril poleh, lu i lei el si a.
“Aw Moab hluotuhai, khawpuihai chu mâksan unla, râwlahai chun va chêng ro; pûk bau sîra a bu septu vâṭhu ang chu ni ro.
Moab chapona chu kan hriet a, a chapo êm êm el a; ân suksângna le, a chapona le, a uongna le, a lungrila uongthuongna le chun.
A lunginsenna chu ka hriet a,
Chuleiin, Moab ta ding chun ka ṭap inrûm ding a nih; anih, Moab po po ta ding chun khêk ka tih; Kir-heres mihai chu ka ṭa ding a ni si a.

Aw Sibmaa grêphrui, Jazer ta dinga ṭap nêk hmana nasa khan i ta dingin ṭap ka ta; i kauhai chun tuipui râl an kai a, Jazer chu an va tlung hiel a; i nipui theihai chunga le i grêp rahai chunga chun suksetu a tlung ta a.

Moab rama inthawk le lo rahlâwkna hmunhaia inthawk chun hlimna le lâwmna dâm chu lâk hmang a ni ta a; uoin sâwrna khurhaia inthawk chu uoin chu kân kangtir ta a; tukhawma khêk pumin sirsâwr naw ni hai a; khêk ri khawm chu lâwmna khêk ri ni naw ni.
“Hesbona inthawka Elea chen le, Jahaz chen rauin khêkria inthawk chun an râwl an insuo a, Zoara inthawka Horonaim chen, Eglath-selesia chenin; Nimrim vadunghai khawm chu râusanin a um ding a ni si a.
Chu nawa khawm, Moaba chun bâwlhmuna thilinhlân le, ama pathien kuoma riminhnik râwtu chu suktâwp ka tih,
Chuleiin, Moab ta dingin ka lung chu theihle angin ân ri a, Kirheresa mihai ta dingin ka lung chu theihle angin ân ri a nih; chuleiin, tamtak a ihmu tahai khawm chu a bohmang tah a nih.
“Lu tin chu a kâwk a, khâkhmul tin kildein a um a; kut po pohai chun thil chepnawi an chawi a; kâwnghai chunga chun saiip puonhai a um bawk a.
Moab in chungsâng tinahai le, kawtthlêrahai hmun tinah ṭap ri a um a; Moab chu bêl ditna umlo ang chun ka sukkhawi ta a,
Ieng anga sukkhawi am a na? Ieng angin am an ṭap inrûm a? Moab chun inzak leiin iengtin am a hnunginnghat el a; chuongchun, Moab chu a vêla umhai ta ding chun lungsukzîngna le hrilsîm nîng a tih.
Kerioth chu lâkin a um a, kul dethai chu maktiin an um a; chu ni chun Moab mi thilthawthei lungril chu nuhmei na tuor lai lungril ang nîng a tih.
Chun, Moab chu
Ṭitna le, khurthim le, châng chu i chungah a um, Aw Moab ram hluotu,
Ṭitnaa inthawka tlân chu khurthima chun tlâng a ta, khurthima inthawka suok chu chânga chun âwk a tih; anni hremna kum chu ama chungah, Moab chunga ngei chun, kân tlungtir ding a nih,

Chuong a tlân hmanghai chu hrâtna nei lovin, Hesbon hlima chun an ngîr a, mei chu Hesbona inthawk chun a fe suok a, meichawk chu Sihona inthawkin a fe suok a, Moab ram sîr le, chawkbuoituhai lua lallukhum chu a kâng hmang ta a.
Aw Moab, i chung a va rik de! Kemosa mihai chu hmanglo an nih, i naupasalhai chu sala ṭhuoiin an um a, i naunuhmeihai khawm chu salah an intâng si a.
Nisienlakhawm, Moab sal intângna chu nakie tieng niahai chun la hung la kîr nâwk ka tih,
Ammon mihai chungchâng thu chu:
Chuleiin, ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk,

Aw Hesbon ṭap inrûm rawh, Ai chu suksiet a ni ta si a; nangni Rabba naunuhai, khêk unla, saiip puon inbel unla, ṭap unla, a daihai laia chun hnungtieng hmatieng tlân inlawn ro; Milkom chu a thiempuhai leh a rorêltuhai leh sala intâng dingin a fe ding a ni si a.
Iengdinga phairuomhaia chun în chawimawi am a na? I phairuomhai chu an luonghmang zo tah, Aw nang naunu hnungtawl, ‘Tu am ka kuomah hung a ta?’ tia mâni rohai ringtu.

Ngai ta, i chunga chun ṭitna ka hung intlungtir ding a nih, sipaihai PATHIEN, Lalpa chun a tih: i vêla umhai po poa inthawk chun inumtir ka ta; mi tin chu hnawt suok letdêr an ti cheu a, ân vâkhmang tahai chu kei khâwmtu ding tukhawm um naw ni hai.
Edom chungthu, Sipaihai
Tlân hmang unla, hnung kîr unla, chêng inthûk unla, Aw Dedan hluotuhai, ama chunga chun Esau lunginzîngna chu ka hung intlungtir ding a ni si a, ama ka hrem hun ngei chu.
Grêp ra lotuhai chu i kuomah hung hai sienla, grêp hmu ṭhel ṭhenkhat an mâksan naw ding maw? Zânah inru hung sienla, an dittâwk an nei hmakhat chu an suksiet naw ding maw?
Esau chu ruoka ka sie a na, ân bîkna hmunhai chu ka suklangpêk a, ama le ama chu inthup thei naw nih; a chi chu suksiet a na, a unauhai le a tuolbâwmhai le, ama chu a um ta nawh.
I nau, pa bohai kha mâksan la, keiin hringin hlâng ka tih; chun, i hmeithai khawm chun mi ring bawk raw se.
Keima insâlin kân khâm ta si a,
Ngai ta, hnamhai laia a china le, mihai laia hmusitumah ka siem ta che a.

I ṭiumna chungthua chun, i lungril chapona chun a hlêm che a nih; Aw nang lungpui kak kârhaia chêngtu, muol insângnahai cheltu: i bu chu mupui bu anga insânga chun sep la khawm, chutaka inthawk chun ka hung sukhnuoi ding che a nih,
“Chun, Edom khawm chu maktia um ding el ni bawk a ta, mi a fe khêltu tinhai chun mak tîng an ta; a sietna po poa chun inchek an tih.
Sodom le Gomorra le chu kâwl vêla khawpuihai suksiet ang khan, chutaka chun tukhawm chêng naw ni hai, tukhawm inzinah va fe bawk naw ni hai,

Ngai ta u, ama chu tlatna hmun pângngaia chun Jordan vadung fâwna inthawk chun sakeibaknei ang elin hung a ta; amiruokchu, ama kuoma inthawk chun intlânsiettir vak ka tih; chun, mi tukhawm thlanga um chu, ama chunga chun ruot ka ta, tu am keia ang an um a? Tuin am hun mi ruotpêk a ta? Berâmpu ka hmaa ngîr ding chu tu am a na?
Chuleiin, Edom khaw chungthua
An tlûk ria chun hnuoi chu ân thin a; an khêk ri chu Tuipui Sena chun hriet a na.
Damaska chungthu chu. Hamath chu ân zak, Arpad leh; chanchin ṭha lo an lo hriet a, an intuihmang ta si a; tuisuoriet infâwn re thei lo angin an buoi a.
Damaska chu a hung hrât naw a, tlân hmang dingin ân her a; inthinnain ama chu a man a; thuokdawngna le lungngaium chun ama a chel tlat ta a; nuhmei nauhase nat tuor ang elin.
Iengtiziea inpâkna khawpui, ka hlimna khawpui hi nghatsana um am a na?
Chuleiin, a tlangvâlhai chu a kawtthlêrahai chun tlûng an ta, chu ni chun indo mihai po po khawm chu sukto ṭawk ṭawk nîng an tih, sipaihai
Kedar le Hazor ram Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin a rûnhai chungthu chu.
Tlânse unla, hlatakah invâk unla, tlumhmang dai ro, Aw Hazor hluotuhai,
Tho unla, hnam nuomsipa khawsa le pawisak hrim nei lo an khâta chênga, dai kawtkhâr amanih, kawtkhâr thîrhai amani khawm nei lo hai chu thaw ro,

Chun, an sanghâwngseihai chu râllâkthilhai nîng an ta, an ran ruolhai khawm chu râllâksum ni bawk an tih; chun, barêp vawhai chu kâwlkil po poah sukdar ka tih, chun, anni kil tina inthawk chun an lunginzingna ding chu hung intlungtir ka ta,
Chun, Hazor chu sihalhai ta dinga chêngna hmuna le, kumkhaw râusan nîng a ta, chutaka chun tukhawm chêng naw ni hai a, mihriem nau tukhawm chutaka chun inzin khawm vân zin bawk naw ni” tiin.
Juda lal Zedekia rorêl ṭantir lai Elam chungthua zâwlnei Jeremia kuoma
“Sipaihai

Chun, Elam chunga chun vân hmun palihaia inthawka thli palihai chu hung inhrângtir ka ta, chu thli fena tienga chun anni chu sukdar vawng ka tih, Elama inthawka hnaw dawkhai tlung nawna hnam hrim hrim um naw ni hai.
Chuongchun, Elam chu an hmêlmahai hmaa beidawng dingin siem ka ta, an hringna zawngtuhai hmaa le chun. Chun, an chunga chun thil ṭha naw, ka lunginsenna ṭiumtak chu hung intlungtir ka tih,
chun, Elama chun ka lalṭhungpha chu inṭhut ka ta, chutaka lal le rorêltuhai chu sukbohmang ka tih;
Amiruokchu, ni nuhnungahai chun hieng hi hung nîng a ta; Elam sal intângna chu hung la kîr nâwk ka tih,
Zâwlnei Jeremia hmanga, Kaldaihai ram chungthu, Ba- bulon chungthua

“Hnamhai laia chun hril la, puong rawh, chun, puonzâr chu khai la, puong la, thup naw rawh, ‘Babulon chu lâkin a um a, Bêl chu sukzak a na, Merodak chu a beidawng a, a milimhai po po chu sukzakin an um a, a milimhai chu an beidawng zo tah,’ ti rawh.
Hmârtienga inthawk chun hnam pakhat a ram chu râusana siema tukhawm chêng lo dinga siem dingin a hung mêk a; an tlânse a, mihriem le ramsahai khawm chu, an fe hmang zo ta a.
Chuong niahai chun, chuong hunahai chun,
Hma sawngin Zion chu râwn an ta, ‘Hung ve ro, theinghila um ta ngai lo ding chatuon thuthlung chun

“Ka mihai chu berâm inhmanghai an lo ni ta a, an vêngtuhai chun anni chu tlângahai chun inherhmangtirin, an ṭhuoi hmang a; tlânga inthawkin muola dâm chun an fe a, an riekna hmun chu an theinghil ta a.
A hmu taphawthai hlak chun anni chu an fâkzo a, an hmêlmahai chun, ‘Thudik umna

Ngai ta u, hmârtieng rama inthawka hnam ropuitak inkhâwm chu Babulon hung rûn dingin hung chawktho ka ta, in hungtir ka tih; a chunga chun hung intlar an ta; chutaka inthawk chun lâkin um a ta, an thalhai chu mi hrât indo thiemtak a thlâwna kîr nâwk ngai naw ang a nih.
Chuongchun, Kaldai chu râllâk sum hung nîng a ta, ama suksetuhai taphawt chu lungawi êm êm an tih,
Aw nangni ka rochan hung rûntuhai, in hlima in lâwm lei le, sazukpui bu chilse a, sakawr hrâttak inhrâm anga in tha a fân leiin; in nu chu nasatakin inzak a tih;
nangni neitu cheu chu buoi a ta, ngai ta u, hnam po poa hnuoihnung tak, thlalêr le, ram ṭâwl le fienriel hmun nîng a tih.
Babulon chu a vêlin nangni khawma intlar khum ro, thalngul kuoituhai, ama chu kâp unla, thal chu ren naw ro,

Babulona inthawk chu chi thetu chu sât thla unla, busîk laia kâwite hmangtu le chun; nêksâwrna kâwlhnâm ṭi leiin mi tin chu mâni mihai tiengah kîr seng an ta, mi tin chu mâni rama seng chun tlân an tih.

“Israel chu berâm indar a nih: sakeibakneihai chun ama chu an lo hnawt hmang ta a; a hmasatak chun Assuria lal chun anni chu a fâkzo a; a tâwpah Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar hin a ruhai chu a sukthliek ta a.
Chuleiin, sipaihai
Israel chu a tlatna hmuna chun hung ṭhuoi nâwk ka ta, Karmel le Basana chun tlâng a ta, a thla chu Ephraim le Gilead tlângahai chun lungawi tâwk tâng a tih.
Chuong niahai chun, chuong pha chun,
“Merathaim ram chu, chu ngei chu, Pekod hluotuhai le chun hang rûn ro; anni chu that unla, sukbohmang vawng ro,
Suksietna ropuitak le, indona ri chu rama chun a um a.
Hnuoi chung po po tubau iengtiziea tlieka innawi el am a ni aw! Iengtiziea Babulon chu hnamhai laia chun râusana um el am a ni aw!
I ta dingin châng ka kam a, i âwk a ni tah, aw Babulon, i lo inring naw a,
Kil tina inthawk chun ama chu hung rûn unla, a siekhâwmna inhai chu hawng unla, ama chu pil dêng pâwng angin dêng pâwng unla, sukse letdêr ro; a ieng iengkhawm hlain um naw raw se.

A bâwngchalhai po po chu that vawng unla, sa thattu kuomah infetir ro; an chung a va rik de! an ni, anni hung hremna hun chu a hung tlung ta si a. Babulon rama inthawka tlânsea suokthlenghai râwlhai chu e!

“Thalkâptuhai, thalngul kuoi- hai po po chu Babulon chunga chun ko khâwm ro; a vêl el chun riekngha unla, chutaka inthawk chun tukhawm insuokthlengtir naw ro; a sinthaw ang pei chun ama chu thung unla, a lo thaw ta ang tak khan ama chungah thaw ve ro;
Chuleiin, a tlangvâlhai chu a kawtthlêrahai chun tlûng an ta; chu ni chun a mi indo mihai po po khawm chu sukto ṭawk ṭawk nîng an tih,
Ngai ta, nang ka dodâl che a nih, Aw nang mi chapo,
Chun, mi chapo chu insui a ta, tlûng a tih, tukhawma ama chu keitho naw ni hai; a khawpuiahai chun mei sêm ka ta, ama vêla umhai po po chu kâng hmang vawng a tih.
“Sipaihai
Anni sanhimtu chu a hrât a, a hming khawm, sipaihai
Kâwlhnâm chu Kaldaihai chunga dâm, Babulon hluotuhai chunga dâm, a rorêltuhai le a mivarhai chunga chun a um a nih,
Chapohai chunga chun kâwl- hnâm chu a um a, invêtpui an ta, kâwlhnâm chu a mi thilthawtheihai chungah a um a, beidawng an tih.

Kâwlhnâm chu an sakawrhai chunga dâm, an sakawr tawlailîrhai chunga dâm, ama sûnga mi chilakhai po po chunga dâm chun a um a, chuongchun, anni chu nuhmei ang el nîng an ta, kâwlhnâm chu a ro inhai chunga chun a um a, inrûkin um a tih.
A tuihai chunga chun kangna a um a, kangchat an tih; milem kerfâwm ram a na, milimah an invêt ri ngawt el a ni si a.

“Chuleiin, thlalêr ramsa hrânghai chu sihalhai leh chutaka chun chêng an ta; vangalsânghai khawm chêng an ta; kumkhuoin hluo hrim hrim ni ta naw ni; suona inthawka suon dang chena khawm hluo ni naw ni.
Pathien chun Gomorra le Sodom le a vêl khuohai chu a pei thlâk lai ang khan,
Ngai ta u, hmâr tienga inthawkin hnam pakhat an hung a, hnam ropuitak el, lal tamtakhai le chun leihnuoi kilkhâwrtaka inthawk chen chun chawktho nîng an ta.

Anni chun thalngul le fei an chawi a; an rilo hle a, lunginsietna an nei nawh; an râwlhai chu tuisuoriet angin ân rûm a, sakawr chungahai chun an chuong a; Aw Babulon naunu, nangma chunga chun, indonaa mi angin, mi tin chu an intlar a nih.
Babulona lal chun an ri chu a lo hriet a, a kuthai chu a hung chau a, ama chu lunginzîngna chun a man ta a, nuhmei nauhase nat tuor angin a na ta a.

“Ngai ta u, umhmun det chu doin, Jordan chaponaa inthawk chun sakeibaknei angin hung suok a ta; amiruokchu, amaa inthawk chun intlânsiettir vak ka tih; chun mi ama chunga thunei ding chun ruot ka ta; kei ang hi tu am an um hrim a? Tuin am hun mi ruotpêk a ta? Berâm vêngtu ka hmaa ngîr ding chu tu am a na?
Chuleiin, Babulon chungthua
Babulon lâkna ria chun hnuoi chu ân thin a, hnamhai laia chun a khêk ri chu hrietin a um a,” tiin.
Chun, Babulona chun ama zâptu ding tir ka ta, ama ram chu zâpfai an tih; buoina niahai chun a vêlin ama kaltuhai ruok an ni ding a ni si a.
Thalkâptu chun a thalngul chu kuoi naw raw se, ama chu a îndona thuom chun inthuom bawk naw raw se, a tlangvâlhai chu hla naw unla, a sipaihai po po chu sukse fai rêt ro.
Kaldai rama chun thata umin tlûng an ta, an kawtthlêrhaia chun sunthlengin um an tih.
Israelhai amanih, Judahai amanih, an Pathien, sipaihai
Babulon chu a tlu thut a, suksietin a um a; ama ta dingin ṭap inrûm unla; a natna ta dingin thinghnai damdawi la unla, chuongchun, a hung dam khiet rawi mawh.

Babulon chu sukdam ka tum a, nisienlakhawm, sukdamin a um si naw a; ama chu mâksan unla, mi tin chu mâni ram sengah fêng ei tiu; a chungthu rêlna chun vân a tlung ta si a; vânhai chena dawm sâng chu a ni ta si a.
Thalhai chu tâtngei unla, phawhai chu chel det ro;
Aw nang tui tamtakhai chunga chêng, hausaknaa bit, i tâwpna a hung tlung mêk a, i hringna hrui ân tan tah.
Sipaihai
“A thilthawtheinân hnuoi chu a siem a, a varnain khawvêl chu a tungding a, a hrietthiemna chun vânhai khi a keiphar bawk a;

a râwl a hung insuo pha chun, vânhaia tuihai ân ri hum hum a; leihnuoi tâwphaia inthawk chun tuihu dâm chu ân zâmkaitir bawk a, ruo ta dingin kâwlinlephai chu a siem a, a robâwmhaia inthawk chun thlihai chu a hung lâk suok a.

Mi tin el chu an lo intlaw ta a; hrietna boin an lo um ta a, rângkachak suttu tinhai khawm chu an milem kera siemhai lei chun sukzakin an um ta a, an milim sunghai chu khêlhlip el a ni si a, annia chun inthuokna khawm a um si naw a.
Teplo el an nih, thil suol sinthaw, anni chu hrem an ni pha chun bohmang an tih.
Jakob chan chu hieng ang hi chu a ni nawh; ama chu thil po poa hmasa a na, Israel khawm chu a rochana a chipui a nih; Sipaihai
“Nang chu ka indona hrei le, ka hriemhrei i nih; nangma chu hmangin hnamhai chu suknawi vawng ka tih; nangma chu hmangin lalramhai chu suksieng ka ta;
nangma chu hmangin sakawr le a chunga chuong khawm chu suknawi vawng ka tih;

chun, nangma chu hmangin sakawr tawlailîr le a chunga chuong khawm suknawi vawng ka ta, nangma hmangin nuhmei khawm pasal khawm suknawi bawk ka tih; nangma hmangin upa le naupang khawm suknawi vawng ka ta; nangma hmangin tlangvâl le nunghâk khawm suknawi vawng ka tih;

nangma hmangin berâmpuhai le a ran ruol suknawi vawng ka ta, nangma hmangin lo neitu le a bâwngchal tuokhai khawm suknawi vawng ka tih; chun, nangma hmangin ram awptuhai lal aiawtuhai chu suknawi vawng ka tih.
Chun, Babulon kuoma le, Kaldai hluotuhai po po chunga chun i mithmua Ziona thil ṭha naw an lo thaw tahai po po kha thung ka tih,
“Ngai ta, Aw suksetu tlâng, hnuoi po po suksetu, nang ka dodâl che a nih,
Chun, a kia lung dingin amanih, lungphûm dingin amanih nangmaa inthawk chun la naw ni hai a; amiruokchu, kumkhuoa râusan ni lem i tih,

Rama chun indo puonzâr chu khai unla, hnamhai laia chun tawtawrâwt mût unla, hnamhai chu ama do dingin buotsai ro; ama chunga chun Ararat dâm, Minni dâm, Askenaz lalramhai chu ko khâwm unla, a chunga chun sipai hotu lien inruot unla, sakawrhai chu khâu hawn angin inhungtir ro.
Ama chunga chun, hnamhai, Media lalhai, an ram awptuhai, an lal aiawtuhai po po, a huop sûng ram po pohai chu buotsai ro.
Ram chu ân thin a, a na a; Babu- lon chunga

Babulon mi thilthawtheihai chun indo chu an ṭhul a, an kulahai chun an um zing a; an thilthawtheina khawm a thlâwn a, nuhmeihai ang el an ni ta a; a chêngna hmunhai chu meia rawin a um a, ân huonna thîrhai khawm chu sukthliekin a um ta a.
Thangko pakhat chu a dang intuokpui dingin tlân a ta, mi tir pakhat chu a dang intuokpui dingin tlân bawk a ta, Babulon lal chu kil tina inthawkin khawpui chu lâk a ni tah ti hril dingin;
fenahai chu khârin a um a, phairuonghai chu meiin an raw a, indo mihai khawm chu suklâuin an um ta a,” tiin.
Sipaihai
“Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chun a mi fâk zo a, a mi suknawi a, ama chun bêl ruokah a mi siem ta a, rûlpui ang elin a mi lem a, kân hnikna chun a phîng chu a suksip a, a mi peisâk ta a.
Ka chunga le ka taksa chunga thawluina hi Babulon chungah um raw se,” Zion hluotuhai chun, tîng an ta; “Ka thisen hi Kaldai hluotuhai chungah um raw se,” Jerusalem chun ti bawk a tih.
Chuleiin,
Babulon chu hmun dêng pâwng el, sihalhai ta dinga chêngna hmun ding le, maktia um ding le, hluotu um lova inchek khum el ding nîng a tih.
Sakeibaknei vânglaihai angin a ruolin inrûm an ta, sakeibaknei têhai angin innghir an tih.
Suklum an ni pha chun, an ta dingin ruoi ṭhêng ka ta, anni chu sukrui ka ta, chuongchun, an hlim a, tho nâwk ta lo dinga kumkhuoa innaa chun an in theina dingin,
Sa thattu kuoma berâmtehai ang le, kêlchalhai le berâmchalhai angin anni chu hung lâng ka tih.
Sesak chu iengtiziea lâka um el, hnuoi pumpuiin an inpâkna chu maktia um el chu! Hnamhai laia chun iengtiziea Babulon chu râusana um el!
Babulon chunga chun tuisuoriet chu a hung luong a, tuifâwn tamtakhai chun a hung inkhum ta a.
A khawpuihai chu râusan, ram ṭâwl, thlalêr ram, ram mi chêng nawna hmun, mihriem nau tukhawm sir ngai lo ram a lo ni ta a.

Babulona Bêl chu hrem ka tih; a ilem tahai khawm chu a baua inthawkin hung la suokpêk ka tih; chuongchun, hnamhai chu ama kuoma chun luong hmunkhat ta ngai naw ni hai a, anih, Babulon kulbang chu chim a tih.
“Ka mihai, a sûnga inthawk chun fesuok unla, mi tin chu

In lungrilhai chu thidang naw sienla, chu rama thuthang hriet ding lei khawm chun ṭi bawk naw ro; kum khat chu thuthang chu hung a ta, chu hnunga chun kum dangah thuthang bawk chu hung a tih, thawluina le, rorêltu le rorêltu inkalna dâm.
Chuleiin, ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk, Babulona milem kera siemhai chunga chun rorêl ka ta, a ram pumpui chu inzak a tih; a ithathai po po khawm chu a sûnga chun tlûng an tih.
Chun, vân le hnuoi le an sûnga um po pohai chu Babulon chunga lâwm lei chun hla sak an ta; hmârtienga inthawkin a kuoma chun suksetu a hung ding a ni si a;
Babulon chun Israelin a thathai a lo intlûktir ta ang khan, ram po po thathai chu chuong ang bawk chun Babulona chun tlûng an tih.
“Nangni kâwlhnâma inthawka suokthlenghai, fe unla, ngîr ṭawk ṭawk naw ro, hlataka inthawk chun
Kâwkna chu ei hriet tâk leiin ei inzak a, buoinahai chun ei hmaihai khawm an inkhum ta a,
Chuleiin, ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk, a milim kera siemhai chunga chun rorêlna nei ka ta, a ram sûng po poa chun hliemhai chu inrûm an tih,
Babulon chu vân chenin vûm sienkhawm, a hrâtna insâng khawm chu la sukhrât zuol pei sienkhawm, keia kuoma inthawkin suksetuhai an hung ding a ni si a,
Babulona inthawka ṭap ri le, Kaldaihai rama suksietna nasatak chu e!
ama chunga chun suksetu chu a hung ta si a, Babulon chung ngeia chun; a mi thilthawtheihai chu manin an um a, an thalngulhai khawm chu a tliek innawi vawng a;
Chun, a lalhai le a mi varhai le, a rorêltuhai le, a lal aiawtuhai le a mi thilthawtheihai chu sukrui ka ta; kumkhuoa innaa chun in an ta, tho ta naw ni hai, Laltak, a hming khawm sipaihai
Babulon kulbang lientakhai khawm chu sukchim nîng an ta, a dai kawtkhârhai chu meia raw nîng an ta, a mipuihai chu a thlâwn elin inrim an ta, hnamhai khawm chu mei leiin inrim an ta, sipaihai
A rorêl a kum li kuma, Juda lal Zedekia le Babulona an hang fe laia, Maaseia naupa Neria, chu naupa Seraia kuoma zâwlnei Jeremia thupêk thuhai chu. Tun Seraia chu khawtlâng hotu lien tak a na.
Chun, Jeremia chun Babulon chunga thil ṭha naw hung tlung dinghai po po, Babulon chungchângthua thu zieka umhai po po chu, lekhabua chun a ziek a.
Chun, Jeremia chun Seraia kuoma chun, “Babulona i va fe pha chun, hieng thuhai po po hi en la, tiem la,
‘Aw
Chun, hi lekhabu hi i tiem zo pha pha chun, lung leh khit dêng i ta, Euphrates vadunga chun va pei lût i tih;
Zedekia chu rorêl a ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pakhat mi a na; Jerusalema chun kum sâwmpakhat sûng ro a rêl a; a nu hming chu, Libnaa Jeremia naunu Hamutal a nih.
Chun, ama chun

Chun, a rorêl kum kuona, thla sâwmnaa, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar le, a sipaihai po po chu Jerusalem do ding chun an hung a, an umngha ta a; a vêl ela chun kulhai an bâwl khum ta a.
Chuongchun, khawpui chu lal Zedekia inlal kum sâwm pakhatna chen inhuolin a um a.
A thla linaa, chu thla ni kuo ni chun khawpui sûnga ṭâmna chu a nasa ta êm êm a; chu rama mipuihai ta ding chun bei hrim a um ta naw a.

Chun, khawpuia chun lamrel siem a ni ta a, lal huon sîra, bang pahnihai inkâra dai kawtkhâr lampuia chun zânah indo mihai po po chu an tlân suok ta a (chuongchun, Kaldaihai chun khawpui chu a vêlin an umngha a na) Araba tieng lampuia chun an fe ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Kaldai sipaihai chun lal chu an hnawt ta a, Jeriko phairuoma chun Zedekia chu an va hnawt phâk ta a; chuongchun, a sipaihai po po chun ama chu an indar san ta a.
Chun, lal chu an man a, Hamath rama Riblaa chun Babulon lal kuoma chun an ṭhuoi ta a; chun, ama chun a chungthu a lo rêlthlûk ta a.
Chun, Babulon lal chun a mithmu ngeia chun Zedekia naupasalhai chu a that ta a; chun, Riblaa chun Juda ram lalhai po po chu a that vawng bawk a.
Chun, Zedekia mithai chu a kheldawkpêk a, Babulon lal chun ama chu thîrkawl ân buntir a, Babulon tieng a ṭhuoi a, a thi ni chenin lung inah a sie ta a.
Chun, thla nganaa, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun, chu chu Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar inlal kum sâwmpakuona a nih; vêngtu hotu Nebuza-radan lal hmaa ngîr hlak chu Jerusalema chun a hung a,
Chun, Kaldai sipaihai vêngtu pâwlhai la umhai po po chun Jerusalem kulbang chu a vêlin an sukchim ta a.

Chuongchun, vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzaradan chun, mi rimsihai pâwl le, khawpuia a mahlaa mâksana la um pâwlhai le, hung inrelruhai, Babulon lal kuoma hung tlân lûthai le, mipui la um sunhai hrim hrim chu sal dingin a ṭhuoi tâwl a.
Nisienlakhawm, Nebuzaradan chun chu rama mi inrim zuol taluohai chu lo neitu dinghaia le, grêp huon enkawltu dinghaiah a mâksan a.
Chun,
Chun, bêlhai, vutluohai, mei chepnahai, maihûnhai, thîrhaihawhai, bûr le bêl dârsena siemhai po po rawngbâwlnaa an hmang hlakhai chu an lâk hmang vawng a.
Chun, nohai, vutluohai, maihûnhai, bêlhai, chawtawlhai, rângkachaka siemhai chu rângkachakin tangkaruoa siemhai chu tangkaruoin, vengtu pâwl sipai hotu chun a lâk vawng a.
Sûtpui pahnihai, chawtawl
Sûtpui chungthua chun, sûtpui pakhat seizie chu tawng sâwmpariet a nih; chun, tawng sâwmpahni vêltuok a nih; chu chu sazie chu kut bel li bawk a na, kawrawng a nih.

Chun, a chunga chun dâra siem a lubâwk a um a, a lubâwk pakhat insângzie chu tawng nga a na, a vêl chun lênkal le, theibufai chu a lubâwk chunga dârsena siem vawng a um a, chun, sûtpui pahnina khawm chun chuong ang bawk chu, theibufaihai le chun a ni ve bawk a.
A sîra chun theibufai chu sâwmkuo le paruk an na; a lênkal chunga a vêla theibufai po po chu za a nih.
Chun, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun thiempu laltak Seraia le, a dawttu Zephania le, kawtkhâr vêngtu pathum a ṭhuoi a;

khawpui sûnga inthawk chun indo mihai enkawltu hotu a ṭhuoi bawk a; chun lal hmaa ngîr hlak, chu khawpuia hmua um mi pasari leh; indo mihai hotu ziektu, a ram mihai hming ziektu, le khawpui sûnga mi hmua um chu ram mi sâwmruk leh a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun anni chu a ṭhuoi a, Babulon lal kuomah Riblaa chun a hung ṭhuoi tâwl a.
Babulon lal chun anni chu a hrem a, Hamath rama Riblaa chun anni chu a that tâwl ta a. Chuongchun, a rama inthawk chun Juda chu sala intâng dinga ṭhuoi a ni ta a.
Hienghai hi Nebukadnezzarin sala intâng dinga a ṭhuoihai chu an nih: kum sari kum chun Juda mi sâng thum le sâwmhni pathum;
Nebukadnezzar inlal kum sâwmpariet kum chun Jerusalema inthawkin mi za riet le sâwmthum pahni a ṭhuoi a;

Nebukadnezzar inlal kum sâwmhni pathum kum chun Nebuzaradan, vêngtu pâwl hotu chun Juda mi sala intâng ding chu za sari, sâwmli panga a ṭhuoi a; chuongchun, mihriem po po chu sâng li le za ruk an nih.Jehoiakin insuoa a um thu le Babulona chawisânga a um thu.

Chun, Juda ram lal Jehoiakin sala ân tâng kum sâwmthum pasarina, thla sâwm pahnina, chu thla ni sâwmhni panga ni chun Evil-merodak Babulon lal ân lal kum, kum khatnaa chun Juda lal Jehoiakin lu chu a dawm kâng a, lung ina inthawk chun a hung ṭhuoi suok ta a;
a kuoma chun ngilneitakin thu a hril a, a lalṭhungpha chu Babulona lal um mi danghai nêka insânga chun a siepêk a.
Chun, a lung in intângna silfênhai chu a thlengpêk a, a kuoma chun ni tinin a dam sûng po chu bu a fâk ve hlak a.
ṭhung el am an ta a!
Hnamhai laia khânga ropui kha, iem a tia hmeithai ang a hung ni ta el chu!
Rambunghai laia a lalnu ni hlak kha, chîn lem
A hmangaituhai po po lai tukhawm ama thlamuongtu ding a nei nawh;
A ruolhai po po chun khawhlotakin ama an sawisak a;
A hmêlmahai an hung ni vawng el ta ie.
Sukrinumna le sal nina nasatakah Juda chu salin a fe ta a,
Awi naw mihai laia chun a khawsa a,
châwl hrim a hmu nawh;
Ama sukrimsituhai po po chun hmun inchêptakah an nangchîng a.
Inkhâwmpui hunbi neia chun tukhawm an hung naw leiin Zion lampui chun a sûn a,
A dai kawtkhârhai po po chu râusanin a um a,
a thiempuhai chu an inrûm a;
A nunghâkhai chu
sukrinumin
ama khawm chu khâknaa chun a um a.
A bawsietna tamtak el lei chun
A nau le têhai chu a hmêlmahai hmaa chun salah an fe a.
Zion nâunua inthawk chun a lal nina po po a fe hmang a,
A lalhai khawm sakhi hlo petna ding hmu lohai ang an ni zo a;
Anni hnawttuhai hmaa chun hrâtna neilovin an tlân a.
Jerusalem chun sukrinuma a um nihaia le, a rimsik
A tienlai inhawitirna po po kha;
A mipuihai chu hmêlma kuta an tlûk lai chun an ṭhangpui naw a,
Hmêlmahai chun an hmu a, râusana a umnaa chun an nuisan a.
A saruokna chu an hmu leiin, ama lo inza hlaktuhai po po khawm khan an hmusit ta a;
Anih, ân rûm a, nawtieng a ngha a.
Chuleiin, maktakelin a tlâwm a, thlamuongtu hrim a hmu nawh;
En ta, aw
Awinaw mi chu a hmun inthiengtaka chun a lût ti a hmu si a,
I mipui inkhâwmnaa lût lo dinga i khaphai ngei kha.
A mihai po po chu an thuok dawngin bei an zawng a,
An thil hluhai chu an hringna sukhrâtna dingin bu manah an pêk a;
Aw
Ngai unla, ka kuoma thaw anga, ka lungngaina ang hrim hi lungngaina a um am en ta u,
Ka kehai ta dingin lên a pha a, a mi keikîr ta a;
Râusanah a mi siem a, chauin ka um ni tin a.
Ama kuthai ngeiin a khit têl a;
Ka rîngah ân bâttir
Ka ido zo lohai kutah
Ka tlangvâlhai sukse dingin ka chungah pungkhâwmhai a ko a;
Juda nau nunghâk inthieng chu
Thlamuongtu ka lungril sukhartu ding kha keimaa inthawka a hlat êm leiin.
Hmêlmahai chun an hne ta leiin, ka nauhai chu râusanin
Zion chun a bânhai a phar vêl a, ama thlamuongtu ding tukhawm an um nawh,
Jerusalem chu anni laia chun thil thiengnaw
Ngai ta u, ka ngên cheu, nangni hnam po pohai, ka lungngaina hi en ta u,
Ka nunghâkhai le ka tlangvâlhai chu salah an fe ta a.
Ka hmangaituhai chu ka hei ko a, nisienlakhawm, an mi hlêm a,
Ka thiempuhai le ka upahai chu khawpuia chun an bohmang ta a,
An hringnahai sukhrât dinga bu an zawng lai chun.
Ngai ta, aw
Ka lung chu ka sûnga chun ân her a, khawhlotakin ka lo hel ta si a;
Kawtthlêra chun kâwlhnâm chun a sukfahra a, ina chun thina a um a.
Ka thuok dawngna chu an hriet a, a mi thlamuong ding tukhawm an um nawh;
Ka hmêlmahai po po chun ka buoina chu an lo hriet a, nangin i thaw a ni leiin an lâwm a;
Ni i puong ta chu la hung intlungtir i ta, anni khawm keia ang bawk nîng an tih.
Ka bawsietnahai po po leia ka chunga i thaw ang khan an chunga khawm thaw ve rawh.
Ka thuokdawngnahai chu tamtak an na, ka lungril khawm a chau a nih.
ân khum am a na!
Israel mawina chu vâna inthawkin hnuoiah a hung pei thlâk a;
A lunginsen nia chun a ke innghatna khawm chu a hriet zing ta nawh.
Juda naunu kul dethai chu a lunginsen chun a keichim a;
Hnuoiah a hung tethlûk a;
Lalram le lalhai khawm chu a suktlâwm ta a.
Hmêlma hmaa inthawkin a kut changtieng chu a keitîm a;
Meichawk angin Jakob chu, arêng arama kâng hmangin a raw ta a.
Zion naunu puon ina mita hmu inhâwkumhai po po chu a that vawng a;
A lunginsenna chu mei angin a bunthlâk a,
A in ropuihai po po a lem zo a, a kul dethai a sukchim a,
Juda naunua chun sûnna le lusûnna a sukpung bawk a.
Ân khâwmna hmun chu a suksiet bawk a;
A lunginsenna nasatna chun a thiempu le lal chu a hmusit ta a.
A in ropui kulhai chu hmêlma kuta chun a pêkpêk bawk a.
Inkhâwmpui hunbi nei nihai ang elin,
Rînin ân khi vawng ta a, suksietnaa inthawk chun a kut keitîm ta naw ni;
Kul le a daihai chu ân sûntir a, an ngui hmunkhat ve ve a.
A lal le hotuhai chu dân um nawnaa hnamhai laia chun an um a;
Anih, a zâwlneihai khawma
An luhai chunga chun pilvut an vânvawr a; saiip puonin an inthuom a;
Jerusalem nunghâkhai khawm hnuoi tieng an luhai an kûn el a nih.
Ka mîtkhâ chu hnuoi chungah bunthlâkin a um a, ka mihai naunuhai suksietna lei chun;
Naupang dâwnghai le nêne ne laihai chu kawtthlêrhaia chun an inkawn el a.
An nuhai kuoma chun, “Bu le uoin khâwlai am a um a?” an ti a,
Khawpui kawtthlêrhaia hliem anga an inkawn el lai le,
An thlahai chu an nuhai ângsûnga an hringna a ṭuoi ral lai chu.
Aw Jerusalem naunu?
Nang chu ka thlamuon theina ding chein, ieng tluk chau am ka ni ding a na,
Aw Zion naunu nunghâk?
I sietna chu tuisuoriet angin a lien a, tuin am sukdam thei a ti che a?
I sal nina hung lakîr dingin, i suolna hlak an hmusuok thei si naw a.
Nanga ta dingin hlêmna le, teplo thu mei mei chau chu an hmupêk che a.
Jerusalem naunu chunga hin an sisi a, an luhai an thin a,
“Hi hi a ni maw mihaiin, Mawina famkimna, Leihnuoi po poa khawpui an ti chu?,” tiin.
An sisi a, an ha an rawt a, “Ama chu ei lem zo tah,
Ah, hi ni hi annâwm ei thlîr zing kha, ei hmusuok ta a, ei hmu ta hi,” an ti a.
Tienlai nihaia thu a pêk thuhai chu a hung sukpuitling ta a;
A pei thlâk ta a, a lunginsiet naw a;
Hmêlmahai chu lâwmin a siem ta a;
I hmêlmahai ki chu a chawimawi ta a ni hi.
Aw Zion naunu kul, sûn le zânin mitthli chu vadung angin inluongthlâktir rawh;
Sâwldamna chu nang le nang inpe naw la;
i mitthli luong chu ma naw raw se.
I nau le têhai hringna dingin ama tienga chun i kuthai phar rawh,
Chuong kawtthlêr tâwp tina phîngṭâma châuhai ta ding chun.
Nuhmeihai chun an rîla ra, naupanghai, kuta tâwma umhai chu, an fâk el ding maw?
Ka nunghâkhai le ka tlangvâlhai chu kâwlhnâmah an tlu a;
I lunginsenna nia chun anni chu i sukhlum a,
Anni chu i that a, i lunginsiet naw a,
Ka tâwm a, ka dawn tleihai chu ka hmêlma chun a sukbohmang zo ta a.
A lunginsenna hmawla hremna hmu tah mihriem chu ka na,
Ama chun a mi ṭhuoi a, varah ni lovin, inthimah a mîn lâwntir a.
Keia chungah sûnnithlâkin a kut a thlâk takzet a.
Ka chunga chun dai a rem ta a, nauhase nat le khâknain
Ka lampuihai chu lung a saka sakhaiin ân huon
Ka lampuihai chu a herkâwi a, a mi keinâwi vawng a; râusanin a mi siem ta a.
Ka mihai ta dinga nuizatbûr le, ni tin tina an hla ka lo ni ta a.
