Nangin ka thla chu thlamuongnaa inthawka hlataka chun i sie hmang a; hlawtlingna khawm ka theinghil rau a.
Ka lungril chun a hrietzing zing a, keimaa chun a kûn a.
Hi hi ka lungrilah ka hung hrietsuok nâwkin, chuleiin, ka beisei hlak.
Lungngaina intlungtir hlak sien khawm, a zângaina hauzie ang peiin lunginsietna chu nei a tih.
Hnuoia lungin intânghai po po kea sirde dingin.
A chunghnungtak hmaihmaa mihriem thuneina herhmang ding le,
Ei lampuihai chu thaw ṭâl ei ta, zawngsuok ei ta,
Lunginsennain în khum a, keini i mi hnawt a; i that a, i lunginsiet naw a.
Kan hninahai chu a fethleng thei nawna dingin, nang chu sûmpui chun în khum a.
Kan hmêlmahai po po hlakin kan chungah an bau an ka pêkpûk a.
ân bunthlah a;
Ka khawpui naunuhai po po lei chun, ka mit chun ka thla chu a sukna a.
ka chunga an thiltum dânhai chu i hmu vawng kha.
Aw
Ka chunga hung ṭuongtuhai hmûr le,
ni tin tina ka chunga an ngairuotnahai chu.
Anni kuoma i ṭawngsie,
lungril ngarna chu nangin pe rawh.
Rângkachak chu a vân thim ta de!
Rângkachak inthieng khawm chu a va danglam ta de!
Hmun inthieng lunghai chu kawtthlêr tâwp tina chun bunthlâkin a um a.
Iem a tia bêlhemtu kuta siem, pil bêlhai ang chaua ngainat an ni el chu!
Ka mihai naunu ruok chu, thlalêra varîngseihai angin a khawhlo a ni ta hi.
Naupanghai chun bei an hni a, mi tukhawm hlaka an khawipêk si naw a.
Sen inlâra enkawl tleihai khawm khan êkdûr chu an pawm a.
Chu chu mitkhapkâr loa peihâwnin a um a, a chunga chun kut hrim innghat a ni nawh.
A miṭhahai chu vûr nêkin an inthieng lem a, nênetui nêkin an ngo lem a,
Taksaa chun lunghluhai
An hmêl chu sapphir
An vun chu an ruhaia chun a kawp ri ngawt a, a vuoi a, hmawl ang el a nih.
Kawlhnâma thata umhai chu phîngṭâmnaa thata umhai nêkin an hamṭha lem a,
Lo thlairahai tlâksamnaa vuoka umin, hieng hai hi an luong hmang si a.
Ka mihai naunu suksieta a umnaa chun an buhai an nih.
Ziona chun mei a sukchawk a, a lungphûmhai kâng hmangtu chu.
Jerusalem dai kawtkhârhai chun hmêlma le râldo chu hung lût an tih ti,
Hnuoia lalhai chun an ring naw a,
khawvêl hluotuhai khawmin an ring nawh.
A sûnga mi fel thisen an insuona lei khan a nih.
Chuleiin, mi tukhawma an silfênhai chu an them thei nawh.
“Tir hmang ro, Tir hmang ro,
Tâwk naw ro”,
Tlânsie le invai an hung ni ta a,
Hnamhai lai chun mihaiin,
Eini lai um ta naw raw hai se,
Thiempu mi nina chu an inza naw a, upahai khawm an ditsak bawk nawh.
Ei nghâknaa chun hnam sandam thei lo ding chu ei nghâk a.
Ei tâwpna chu a hnai a, ei nihai chu suk tlung a na, ei tâwpna chu a hung tlung ta leiin.
Tlânghai chunga chun an mi hnawt a, thlalêra chun eini an mîn chân a.
“Ama hlim hnuoia chun hnamhai laia chun chêng ei tih,” ei ti a.
Nanga kuoma khawm no chu hung tlung a ta; inrui i ta; chun, nang chu ruokin insiem i tih.
Sal ninaa chun hrên zing ta naw ni che a,
Aw Edom naunu, i rîtlona chu hung hrem a ta;
I suolnahai chu hmusuok a tih.
Ngai la, kan muolphona hi en ta.
Kan inhai chu ram dang mihai kuomah.
Fahrahai le pa nei lohai kan na,
Kan nuhai chu hmeithai ang an nih.
Kan tui chu tangka manah kan dâwn a,
Kan thinghai khawm chu kan kuoma zawrin a um a.
Kan sâwl hle a, châwl kan hmu nawh.
Kut chu Aigupta mihai kuomah kan daw a,
Assuria mihai kuoma leh, beia suktlai dingin.
Kan thlatuhai chu an lo suol ta a, an um ta naw a,
Keiniin an khawhlona chu kan phur a nih.
Siehlawhai chun kan chungah ro an rêl a,
An kuta inthawka mi sansuok ding tukhawm an um nawh.
Kan bei chu kan hringna lungngaithlâk leh kan hlaw a;
Thlalêra kâwlhnâm lei chun.
Kan vun chu ṭâmna kâng lumna lei chun,
Meithuk ang elin a lum a.
Nuhmeihai chu Zionah suollui an ni a,
Nunghâkhai chu Juda khawpuihaiah an suollui a.
Lal nauhai chu an kut ngeiin an khâi hlum a;
Upahai hmâi inzâna hrim a um nawh.
Tlangvâlhai chu bu râwt dingin an lâk a,
Naupanghai chu thing puta pêm ṭâng ṭângin an tlu a.
Upahai chun dai kawtkhâr an rielsan a,
Tlangvâlhai chun an rimawihai chu an tâwpsan a.
Kan lungril hlimna a bo a,
Kan lâmna chu lusûnaah ân chang a.
Kan lua inthawk lallukhum chu a tla a,
Kan chung a va rik de! kan lo suol ta si a.
Hi lei hin kan lungril chu a chau a;
Hieng thilhai lei hin kan mithai chu ân thim a.
Zion tlâng chu râusana umin,
Sihalhai chu a chungah an inlawn a.
Aw
I lalṭhungpha khawm chu suon khata inthawka suon dang chenin a nih.
Iengdinga keini mi theinghil kumkhuoin,
Chuong chen lâwm lâwm iengdinga mi nghatsan el am i na?
Aw
Tienlai hun ang khan kan nihai hung sukthar rawh!
Annawleh, nangin i mi hnâwl let dêr el am a nih?
Kan chungah i lung a sen êm êm el am a nih?
Kebar vadung panga Kaldaihai rama chun, Buzi naupa thiempu Ezekiel kuoma chun
Chun, ka hang en a, ngai ta, hmârtienga inthawkin thlipui nasatak a hung hrâng a, sûm nasatak, meia inlap pup pup, a vêl po poa var, a mei lai tak darsen tle anga tle zur zur a um a.
Hmai pali an nei chit a, thla pali an nei chit bawk a.
An kehai chu ke intluon ringawt hi an na; an kephahai chu bâwngtê kepha ang a nih; dârsen nâwttle angin an tle a.
An sîr lia an thlahai hnuoia chun mihriem kuthai ang kut an nei a; chuongchun, an pali chun chuong ang chun thlahai le hmaihai chu an nei a;
an thlahai chu ân zawmtuo seng a, an fe pha khawmin an inher ngai naw a; an rêng el chun hmatieng ngawt an fe el hlak a nih.
Chun, a chungtienga chun an thlahai an zâr a; an rêng chun, an thla pahnihai chu an zâr zawm a; pahnihai chun an taksa chu ân khum a.
Chun, an rêng el chun, hma tieng zâwng ngawtin an fe a; thlarau fena tieng tienga chun an fe ve a; an fe lai chun sîrtieng an inher ngai nawh.
Chun, thilhringhai chu kâwl inlep var inkhaw ang hin an tlân a, an kîr nâwk a.
Chu thilhringhai ka en zing lai chun, thilhringhai sîra chun tawlailîr ke, pakhat chutaka hmai palihai pakhat senga dingin, hnuoi chunga chun ka hmu a.
Chu tawlailîr ke inlang dân le an sinthaw chu berul lung zie ang a na, an pali chun inangna an nei seng a; an inlang dân le an sinthaw dân chu tawlailîr kekuol sûnga tawlailîr kekuol um ang a nih.
An fe pha khawm, an sîr lia chun an fe a; an fe pha chun an inher ngai nawh.

Thilhringhai chu an fe pha chun, tawlailîr kekuolhai khawm chu an sîra chun an fe ve pei a, chun, tawlailîr kekuolhai chu, thilhringhai chu hnuoia inthawka dawm kâng an ni pha chun, an inkâng ve pei a.

Khâw tieng tieng khawm thlarau a fena tienga chun an fe a; thlarau chu a fena tieng tienga chun tawlailîr kekuolhai khawm chu an sîra chun dawm kângin an um a; thilhringhai thlarau chu tawlailîr kekuolhaia chun a um si a.

Thilhringhai an fe pha, anni khawm hi an fe a; thilhringhai an ngîr pha anni khawm hi an ngîr a; chuonghai chu hnuoia inthawka dawm kâng an ni chun, tawlailîr kekuolhai khawm chu an sîra chun dawm kâng an ni ve a, thilhringhai thlarau chu tawlailîr kekuolhaia chun a um si a.
Chun, vân ang hnuoia chun an thlahai, tuok khat chu thilhring dang tâwkin ân zâr a; tuok khat dang chun an taksa an inkhum a.
Chun, an luhai chunga vân chunga chun râwl ri a um a; an ngîr pha chun, an thlahai chu an sie thlâk a.
An luhai chunga, vân chunga chun, lalṭhungpha ang, sapphir lung anga inlang a um a; lalṭhungpha angtak chunga chun mihriem anga inlang a um a.

Chun, a kâwng chungtienga po chun ṭhihna zie ang, a vêla a sûnga mei anga inlang ka hmu bawk a; chun, a kâwng le a hnuoitieng inlang dâna chun, mei anga inlangin ka hmu a, ama vêla po po chun var chu a um a.
Ruo sûr nia sûma sumrisâng inlang angin, a vêla varna inlang dân chu a um a. Hi hi
Chun, ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i kehai chun ngîr la, inbiekpui ka ti che,” a mi ti a.
Chun, ka kuoma thu a hril lai chun thlarau chu ka sûnga chun a hung lût a, ka kehai chun a mîn ngîrtir a; chun, ka kuoma thuhriltu chu ka ngai ta a.
Ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, Israel thlahai, hnam helhai, keima chunga helhai kuoma chun tir ka ti che; vawisûn ni chen hin, anni le an thlatuhai khawmin ka chungah an bawsiet a nih.
Chu thla chu zakmawtak le lungril ngar an na; an kuoma chun ka tir che a ni hi; chun, an kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril i tih, ‘Lalpa
Chun, an lo ngai khawma, an lo ngaisak naw khawmin amanih, anni laia zâwlnei a um ti chu hre chêk an tih, (sûngkaw hel an ni si a).

Chun, nang mihriem naupa, anni chu ṭi naw la, hlo hlingnei le buorhai i kâwla chun umin, ainuvêt laia chun chêng la khawm, an thuhai chu ṭi chuong bawk naw la; sûngkaw hel hmang ni hai sien khawm an thuhaia chun ṭi naw la, an hmêl enin beidawng bawk naw rawh.
Chun, an lo ngai khawma, an lo ngaisak naw khawma, an kuoma chun ka thuhai chu hril hrim hrim i ta; hel hmangtak el an ni si a.
Chun, ka hang en a, ngai ta, keia tieng hin bân hin a mi hei ban a; chun, ngai ta, chutaka chun lekhabu zuol hi a um a;
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, i hmu kha fa la, hi lekhabu zuol hi fa la, chun, fe la, Israel sûngkuohai lai chun thu va hril rawh,” a mi ta.
Chuongchun, ka bau chu ka ka a, lekhabu zuol chu a mîn fâktir ta a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, hi lekhabu zuol ka pêk che hi fa la, i phîng kha sukkhawp rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, ka fâk ta a; ka baua chun ân hnik dân chu khuoizu ang el a nih.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah a hril a, “Mihriem naupa, fe la, Israel sûngkuohai kuomah va fe ta, an kuoma chun ka thu hi va hril rawh.
Mi ṭawng danglam le ṭawng intakhai kuoma tir i ni naw a, Israel sûngkuohai kuoma tir i ni lem;
hnam tamtak ṭawng danglam le ṭawng harsatakhai, an ṭawnghai i hriet thei nawhai kuoma tir i ni nawh. Matheilovin, an kuomah ka tir che chun, i thu chu ngai ding chu an ni a.
Amiruokchu, Israel sûngkuohai chun i thu ngai naw ni hai a, keia thu an ngai naw ding leiin; Israel sûngkuohai po po chu chal changtak, lungril ngartak ruok an ni leiin.
Ngai ta, i hmêl chu an hmaisana chun ka sukngar ta a, an chalhai hmaihmaa chun i chal chu ka sukchang ta bawk a nih.
Lungrâl chu meitâwklung nêka a chang lem angin, i chal ka siem ta a; anni chu ṭi dêr naw rawh, anni hei hmua chun beidawng bawk naw la, sûngkaw hel hmangtak ni hai sien khawm” tiin.
Chu nawa khawm ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, i kuoma thu ka hril ding po pohai chu i nahai chun ngai la, i lungrila chun pawm rawh.

Chun, fe la, an sal intângnaa chun, i mihai thlahai kuoma chun fe la, an kuomah thu hril la, anni chu hril rawh; an ngai khawmin, an ngaisak naw khawma, ‘Lalpa Pathien chun hieng hin a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
Chun, thlarau chun a mi dawm kâng a, ka hnungtieng chun râwl ri nasatak ang ka hriet a, “Ama hmuna inthawka suok
Thilhringhai thlahai intawk ri le, an sîra tawlailîr kekuolhai tlân khâwm ri nasatak chu a nih ka hriet chu.
Chuongchun, thlarau chun a mi dawm kâng a, a mi lâk hmang ta a; lungawilotak le lunginsen êm êmin ka fe ta a; chun,
Chun, sal intânghai, Kebar vadung panga Tel-abiba umhai, an umna hmun ngeia chun ka va feh
Chun, ni sarihai tâwpa chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo vêngtu dingin ka siem che a nih: chuleiin, ka baua thu chu ngai la, keimaa inthawkin vaulâwkna chu pe rawh.

Mi rilo kuomah thu ka hril a, ‘Nang chu matheilovin i thi ngei ding a nih,’ ka ti a, ama chu vaulâwkna khawm i lo pêk naw a, a hringna chu sanhimna dinga mi rilo chu a lampui rilova inthawk hung kîr dinga vaulâwkna i lo hril si naw chun; chu mi rilo chu ama suol ngeia chun thîng a tih, amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu nangmaa chun ka hung phût ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, mi rilo chu i vaulâwk a, a rîtlonaa inthawkin amanih, a lampui rilova inthawkin amanih a kîr naw chun a suola chun thîng a tih; nisienlakhawm, nang chun i thla chu sansuok i tih.

Chu bâkah mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân herhmang a, suol a thaw pha chun, ama hmaa chun tlûkna lung ka sie a, ama chu thi ngei a tih; ama chu vaulâwkna chu i lo pêk naw leiin, a suolnaa chun thîng a ta; chun, a thil fel thawhai chu hriet zing ni ta naw ni; amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu nangma kutah hung phût ka tih.
Chun,
Chun, ka tho a, phaia chun ka fe ta a, chun, ngai ta, Kebar vadung sîra ropuina ka hmu ang el khan, chutaka chun
Chun, thlarau chu keimaa chun a hung lût a, ka kehai chun a mîn ngîrtir ta a; chun, a mîn biekpui a, ka kuomah, “Fe la, i inah inkhâr khum rawh.
Chun, nang mihriem naupa, ngai ta, i chunga chun khuopnahai sieng an ta, chuonghai chun khuop an ti che a, anni lai chu fe suok naw ti ni:
Nisienlakhawm, nanga kuoma thu ka hung hril pha chun, i bau chu hawng ka ta, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
“Nang khawma, mihriem naupa, ṭêklei phêk la la, a chunga chun khawpui, Jerusalem khawpui lim chu inngîr la;
chu chu rûn la, kulhaiin bâwl khum la, a vêla chun hnuoi dêng pâwng la, puon inhai kei khum bawk la, chun, a vêl el chun kâphmunhai siem bawk rawh.

Chun, thîr phêk la la, nang le khawpui inkâra chun bang dingin intung la, chun, i hmai chu chu tieng chu hei innghat la, inhuol angin siem la, chun, nangin inhuol rawh. Hi hi Israel sûngkaw inchikna chu nîng a tih.
“Chu nawa chun, i vawitieng delin zâl la, i chunga chun Israel sûngkaw suolna chu innghat rawh; chu chu chunga i zâl ni zât ang pei chun, an suolna chu phur i tih.
An suol kum zât chu i ta ding chun i ni dingin, ni za thum le sâwmkuo ni dingin ka ruot ta si a, chuongchun, Israel sûngkaw suolna chu i phur ding a nih.

Chun, hi hi i thaw vawng pha chun, i changtieng pang delin zâl nâwk i ta; Juda sûngkaw suolna chu phur thung tâng i tih; ni sâwmli sûng, ni tin chu kum khata dingin, i ta dingin hieng ang hin ka ruot ta si a.
Jerusalem rûna um tieng chu i hmai innghat i ta, i bânhai hlîmin, chun, a chungthua chun hrillâwk i tih.
Chun, ngai ta, khuopnahai i chungah sieng ka ta, i rûnna nihai chu i sukkim hmakhat chun sîr khat sîr khatah în her nawna dingin.
Bu le, buṭei le bê le, si le, butun le, havai la la, bêl pakhatah sie la; chutaka inthawk chun bei siem rawh; a sîra i zâl ni zât ang peiin; chu chu ni za thum le sâwmkuo sûng fâng i tih.
Chun, i bu i fâk ding chu a bûka bûk nîng a ta, ni tina shekel sâwmhni; hunbi nei takin i fâk chau ding a nih.
chun, tui khawm inkhi bawkin dâwn i ta, hin hmun ruka ṭhea hmun khat pei, a hunbi nei takin dâwn i tih.
Chun, an mithmua chun mihriem êk leh meiah em i ta, buṭei bei angin fâng i tih,” tiin.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “En ta, hi mihriem êk aiah bâwng êk ka pêk che a, chuongchun, i bei chu i buotsai ding a nih,” a ta.

Chu nawa chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, beia Jerusalem châwmna chu suktâwp ka ta, bei chu inkhia inkhiin fâng an ta, fîmkhurtak elin; chun, tui khawm maktitakin, inkhia inkhiin dâwn bawk an tih;
bei le tui chu an tlâksama, anni le anni chu mak an inti senga, an suolnaa chu lâk hmang an ni theina dingin.
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, kâwlhnâm ngei la la, luvâwtu hmulvâw chem angin hmang la, i lu le i khâkhmul vâw rawh; chun, bûknain bûk la, sam chu ṭhe rawh.

Khawpui lailunga chun a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu meiah râwng i ta, chu pha chun khawpui rûnna chu suktlung nîng a ta; a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu lâng i ta, a vêlin kâwlhnâmin sât nawi i ta; chun a hmun thuma ṭhe a hmun khat dang chu thliah vawr dar i ta, chu hnunga chun keiin kâwlhnâm keidawk ka tih.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun tlâwmterek lâng i ta, i puon hmawrah inbâwk i ta.
Chu chu la nâwk i ta, meiah peilût i tih; meia chun râwng i tih; chun, chutaka inthawk chun Israel in
Lalpa
Hnamhai nêka rîtlona thawin ka rorêl chunga chun a hel ta a; ram a vêla umhai nêkin ka thuruot chunga chun a hel
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Lalpa

Chuongchun, i sûnga chun pahai chun naupahai chu fâng an ta, naupahai chun an pahai chu fa bawk an tih; chun, nangmaa chun rorêl chu hung sukthlûng ka ta, nangmaa la mahlahai po po khawm chu thedar vawng ka tih.

Chuleiin, ka hring zing angin, i tirdakumna po po le i thilpawrchehai po po chun ka hmun inthieng chu i lo sukpawrche tâk leiin hung sukriral ngei ngei ka ti che a, ka mit khawma hla naw ni che a, kei khawma lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning che.

Nanga hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu hripuiin thîng an ta, i sûnga chun ṭâmnaa fâkzoin um an tih; chun, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu i vêla chun kâwlhnâmah tlûng an ta; chun, a hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat dang chu the dar ka ta, an hnunga chun kâwlhnâm keidawk ka tih.
Chu nawa khawm chun, i vêla hnamhaia le, nang hung fe khêltuhai po po che mithmua chun râusana le mi ṭawngdawngah siem ka ti che a.
chu pha chun, an
“Mihriem naupa, Israel tlâng tiengahai sawn ngha la, an kuomah thu hril la,
‘Nangni Israel tlânghai, Lalpa
In maichâmhai chu râusan hung nîng an ta, in nisa milimhai khawm chu suktliek nîng a ta, in mi thathai chu in milimhai hmaa chun hung pei thlâng ka tih.
Chun, Israel thlahai thiruonghai chu an milimhai hmaa chun sieng ka ta; in ruhai chu in maichâmhai vêla chun the dar ka tih.

In chêngna hmunhaia po po chun khawpuihai chu suksiet nîng an ta, bâwlhmunhai chu râusan nîng an ta; in maichâmhai chu râusan le suksiet a ni theina ding le in milimhai chu suktliek le suktâwp a nia, in nisa milimhai chu phûr thlûk a na, in sinthawhai chu suktâwp a ni theina dingin.
Chun, thata umhai chu nangni lai ngei tlûng an ta, chun,
Amiruokchu, ṭhenkhat la hlâng ka ta, ramhaia sukdara in um pha chun, hnamhai laia chun ṭhenkhat chun kâwlhnâm chu pumpel in tih.
Chun,
Lalpa

Hlataka umhai chu hripuiin thîng an ta; a hnaia umhai chu kâwlhnâmah tlûng an ta, chun, umhmuna uma inhuol khuma um chu ṭâmin thîng a tih: chuong ang chun ka lungsenna chu an chunga chun ka sukpuitling ding a nih.

Chun, an mi thathai chu an maichâm vêla an milimhai laia a um a, muol insâng tina dâm, tlâng sâng sîp tinahai dâm, thing hring tin hnuoiahai dâm, thingsaisuo lien hnuoi tinahai dâm, an milimhai kuoma riminhnik an inhlânnahai po poa chun an um pha chun
Chun, an chunga chun ka kut chu inlet ka ta, thlalêra inthawka Dibla tieng, an hluona sûng po po chu, ram chu râusana siemin suksieng ka tih; chun,
Chu nawa khawm,
Tuhin tâwpna chu i kuoma chun a um a, i chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka hung tir ding a nih; i umdânhai ang peiin i chungthu rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai leiin hrem ka ti che.
Ka mit chun hla naw ni che a, lunginsietna khawm nei naw ning che; nisienlakhawm, i um dânhai leiin hrem ka ti che, i tirdakumna chu nangmaah a um si a; chun,
“Lalpa
Tâwpna a hung tlung a, tâwpna chu a hung tlung tah; i chunga chun a hung tho a, ngai ta, a hung a nih.

Tuhin sâwt nawteah ka lunginsenna chu i chungah hung bunthlâng ka ta, i chunga ka lunginsenna chu sukpuitling ka tih; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah ro rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai po po leiin hrem ka ti che.
Ka mit chun hla naw ni, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah hung intlungtir ka ta; i tirdakumnahai chu nangmaah a um si a; chun, kei
Ngai ta, ni chu, ngai ta, a hung tlung; i chungrikna chu a fe suok ta a, hmawl
A hun chu a hung tlung a, a ni chu a hung hnai tah; inchawtu chu hlim naw sienla, a zawrtu khawma pawiti bawk naw raw se; mi po po chungah lunginsenna chu a um si a.
An dam zing sûng chun, a zawrtu chu zawra um tah kuoma chun a kîr nâwk âwm si naw a; hi thilhmulâwk
Tawtawrâwt chu an mût ta a, mi po po chu an inringtir vawng ta a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm indonaa chun an fe naw a; ka lunginsenna chu mipui po po chunga chun a um si a.
“Kâwlhnâm chu puotieng a um a, ṭâmna le hripui chu sungtienga chun a um a; loa um chu kâwlhnâmah thîng a ta, khawpui sûnga um chu hripui le ṭâmna chun fa zo a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, chutaka lo suokthleng chu suokthleng an ta, vaṭhu angin tlângahai chun um an ta, an rêng el chun sûn an tih, mi tinin mâni suolna seng chu.
Kuthai po po chu hrât lovin um an ta, khûphai po po chu tui anga zawiin um an tih.
Saiip puonhaiin inchei an ta, ṭitnain anni chu inkhum a tih; an hmaihai chunga chun inzakna um a ta, an luhai po po chunga chun lukâwkna um a tih.
An tangkahai chu kawtthlêrhaia chun dehâwn an ta, an rângkachakhai khawm chu thil thieng naw ang hung nîng a tih; an tangka le rângkachak chun
Man dingin ramdang mihai kutah pêng ka ta, mi rilohai kuomah râllâk dingin; chuongchun, sukpawrchêng an tih.
Ka hmai chu an kuoma inthawkin la hmang ka ta, ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrchêng an tih; inru hmanghai chu a sûngah lût an ta, sukpawrchêng an tih;
Khaidiet chu siem rawh; ram chu thisen insuo thusiein a sip a, khawpui sûng chu inpâwngnêknain a sip si a.
Chuleichun, awi naw mi ṭha nawtakhai chu hung ṭhuoi ka ta, an inhai chu neipêk an tih; mi hrâthai chapona chu suktâwp bawk ka ta; chun, an hmun inthienghai chu sukpawrche nîng an tih.
Bohmangna chu a hung tlung mêk a, inremna chu zawng an tih; anachu um naw ni.

Sietna chunga siet nâwk zuolna hung tlung a ta, thuthang chunga chun thuthang um a ta; chun, zâwlnei thilhmulâwkhai chu zawng an ta, nisienlakhawm, thiempua inthawkin dân le, mi hluihaia inthawkin thurâwn chu bohmang tâng a tih.

Lal chu lusûnin um a ta, hotu khawm chu beidawngnain inthuom a tih; chun, rama mipuihai kuthai chu sukbuoi nîng a ta; an um dânhai ang peiin an chungah thâwng ka tih; chun, an ngaithana ang peiin rorêlpêk ka ta; chun,
Chun, kum ruknaa thla ruknaa, chu thla ni nga ni chun, ka ina chun ka ṭhung a, ka hmaa chun Juda upahai an ṭhung laiin, Lalpa

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i mit khan hmâr tieng hang en rawh,” a mi ti a. Chuongchun, hmâr tieng ka mit chun ka hei en a, maichâm kawtkhâr hmâr tieng panga chun a lûtnaah îtthîkna milim chu ka hmu a.
Chun, tuolsûng tuollai kawtkhâra chun a mi ṭhuoi a; chun, ka hei en chun, banga chun âwng ka hmu ta a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, tuhin bang kha hang ker rawh,” a ta. Chun, bang ka hei ker chun, kawtkhâr ka hmu a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Va lût la, hitaka tirdakumna suol an thaw chu va en rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ka va lût a, ka va en a, ngai ta, thilhring bawka invâk chi tinrênghai, ramsa tirdakumhai le, Israel sûngkuo milimhai po po chu bang chunga chun a vêla limziekin ka hmu a.

An hmaa chun Israel sûngkuoa upahai sâwmsari an ngîr a, anni laia chun Saphan naupa Jaazania chu a ngîr a, mi tin chun an kutah riminhnik râwna thlêng an chawi seng a; chuongchun, riminhnik khu rim chu a hang fe a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Tirdakumna an thaw nasatak dang khawm la hmûng i tih,” a ti bawk a.
Chun,
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Aw mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am? Hieng nêka tirdakumna nasa lem la hmu nâwk i tih,” a ta.
Chun,

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Aw mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am? Tirdakumna hitaka an lo thaw ta hi, Juda sûngkaw ta ding chun thil chîn tham am a nih? Ram chu inpâwngnêknain an suksip a, lunginsen dingin an mi chawktho nâwk a, en ta, an hnârah sâwlhna an sie a.
Chun, râwl inringtakin ka naa chun a hung khêk a, “Mi tinin mâni suksietna hriemhrei a kuta chawiin, khawpui enkawltuhai chu hung inhnaitir rawh,” a ta.

Chun, ngai ta, hmârtienga um, dâi kawtkhâr chunghnung lema chun mi paruk, mi tinin mâni sukhlumna hriemhrei chu kuta chawiin an hung a; anni laia pakhat chu puonzai inhmiin ân chei a, a kâwngah lekhaziektu lekhatui bûr a pai a. Chun, anni chu an va lût a, dârsen maichâm bula chun an ngîr ta a.
Chun, Israel Pathien ropuina chu, a umna hmuna inthawk chun in kawtkhâr bula chun a hang fe a; chun, mi puonzai inhmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhaziektu lekhatuibûr neitu chu a ko ta a.
Chun, mi dang kuoma khawm keia hrieta chun, “Ama hnunga chun khawpui chu va fang la, va sukhlum rawh; i mitin hla naw sienla, lunginsietna nei bawk naw rawh;
Chun, an kuoma chun, “In chu sukpawrche unla, tuollaihai chu mi thathai chun suksip ro; fe ro le,” a ta, chun, an fe suok a, khawpuia chun an that ta a.
Chun, an that zing lai chun keia khâta mâksanin ka um a, ka hmaia hnuoi sikin ka bawkkhup a, ka khêk a, “A, Lalpa
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Juda le Israel sûngkaw suolna chu a nasa êm êm a, ram chu thisenin a sip a, khawpui sûng chu rorêlna pawisak nawnain a sip a, ‘
Chuongchun, keia ta ding khawma, ka mitin hla naw ni a, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning, amiruokchu, an suol man chu an lu chungah innghat lem ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, mi puonzai inhmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhatuibûr neitu khan thu chu a hung hrilsâwng a, “Nangin thu i mi pêk ang tak khan ka thaw tah,” tiin.
Chun, mi chu a va lût lai chun cherubhai chu in changtieng panga chun an ngîr a; chun, sûm chun tuollai sûng ril lem chu a suksip ta a.
Chun, cheruba inthawk chun
Chun, cherubhai thla ri chu Pathien Iengkimthawtheiin thu a hril laia a râwl angin, tuollai puo lema inthawk khawm chun ân hriet a.

Chun, mi puonzai inhmia inchei kuoma chun, “Tawlailîr kekuol invir zinghai inkâra inthawk chun, cherubhai inkâra inthawk chun, mei la la,” tia thu a pêk chun, a va lût a, tawlailîr kekuol sîra chun a va ngîr ta a.

Chun, cherub pakhat chun cherubhai inkâra inthawk chun, cherubhai inkâra mei chu a kutin a hei ban a, a hei lâk ta a, chun, chu chu mi puonzai inhmia inchei kuthaia chun a sie a, ama chun a lâk a, a fe suok ta a.
Chun, cherubhai thla hnuoia chun mihriem kut ang hi a hung inlang ta a.
Chun, ka hei en a, ngai ta, cherubhai sîra chun kekuol pali, cherub pakhat sîrah kekuol pakhat, cherub dang sîrah kekuol dang pakhat ka hmu a. Chuong kekuolhai inlang dân chu berul lung ang el a nih.
Chun, an inlang dâna chun, an pali chun inangna an nei seng a, kekuol pakhat chu kekuol dang sûnga um ang elin.

An lâwn pha chun, an sîr lia chun an lâwn a; an lâwn lai chun sîrzâwngin an inher ngai naw a; amiruokchu, a hmasatak chun a nghatna tieng tienga chun an zui pei a; an lâwn lai chun sîrzâwngin an inher nawh.
Chuong kekuolhai chu, ka hrieta chun kekuol invir zinghai tia inbûk an nih.
Chun, cherubhai chu dawm kângin an um a, hi hi a nih Kebar vadung panga thilhring ka hmu chu.

Cherubhai chu an lâwn pha chun, kekuolhai khawm chu an sîra chun an lo lâwn ve a; cherubhai chun hnuoia inthawka inlakâng dinga an thlahai an suksâng pha chun kekuolhai khawm chu anni sîra inthawk chun an inher hmang chuong naw a.
An ngîr pha chun, hieng hi an ngîr ve a, an indawm kâng pha chun hieng hi anni ruolin an indawm kâng ve a; annia chun thilhring thlarau chu a um si a.
Chun,
Chun, cherubhai chun an thlahai chu an zâr a, an fe suok lai chun ka mithmua ngei chun hnuoia inthawk chun an insukkâng a; kekuolhai khawm chu an sîrhaia chun an um ve a; chun,
Kebar vadung panga, Israel Pathien hnuoia thilhring ka hmu chu hi hi a nih; chun, cherubhai an nih ti ka hriet bawk a.
Cherub tin chun hmai hran pali seng an nei a, thla pali seng leh; chun, an thlahai hnuoia chun mihriem kut angpui a um bawk a.
Chun, an hmêl ka hmuhai ang kha an na, an inlang dân le annihai hrim hrim chu; anni chu tlûntakin hmatieng an fe seng a.
Chu nawa chun thlarau chun a mi hang dawm kâng a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, hi khawpuia thurâwn rilo pea, suolna suksuoktuhai chu hieng mihai hi an nih.
Anni chun, ‘Inhai bâwlna ding hun a hnai ta a ni nâwm a nih?
Chuleiin, an chunga chun thu hrillâwk la, aw mihriem naupa, hrillâwk rawh,” a ta.
Chun,
Hi khawpuia hin in mi thathai chu in sukpung a, chutaka kawtthlêrhai chu mi thathaiin in suksip a.
“Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun la suok ka ti cheu a, hmêlhrietlohai kutah pêng ka ti cheu a, chun, nangni lai chun rorêlna chu tirsuok ka tih.
Kâwlhnâmah tlûng in ta, Israel ramria chun ro rêlpêk ka ti cheu a; chun,
Hi khawpui hi in sumbepui chu ni naw ni a, nangni khawm a sûnga sa chu ni nâwng in tih; Israel ramria chun ro ka rêlpêk ding cheu a nih;
chun,
Chun, thu ka hril lai chun Benaia naupa Pelatia chu a thi ta a. Chun, ka hmaia hnuoi sikin ka bawkkhup a, râwl inringtakin ka khêk a, “A khai, Lalpa
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, i unauhai, i unauhai ngei, i chipuihai, Israel sûngkuo
chuleiin, hril la, Lalpa
Chuleiin, ‘Lalpa
Chun, chutaka chun hung an ta, chutaka inthawk chun thil tirdakumhai po po le thil pawrchehai po po chu la hmang an ta.
Anni chu lungril hmunkhat
Ka thuruothaia an fe theina ding le, ka dânhai chu an kawl a, an thaw theina dingin; chun, ka mihai hung nîng an ta, kei khawm an Pathien nîng ka tih.
Nisienlakhawm, an lungrilhaia an tirdakumna le an pawrchenahai zâwmtuhai chu, an lu chunghaia ngei chun an suol maw chu innghat ka tih, Lalpa
Chun, cherubhai chun an thlahai chu an zâr a, kekuolhai chu an sirahai chun a um a; chungtienga chun Israel ropuina chu an chungah a um a.
Chun,
Chun, thlarau chun a mi dawmkâng a, Pathien thlaraua thilhmulâwknaa chun Kaldaia sal intânghai kuoma chun a mi ṭhuoi ta a. Chuongchun, ka thilhmulâwk hmu chun chungtieng a mi fesan ta a.
Chun, sal intânghai kuoma chun

Chuleiin, nang mihriem naupa, sal intâng ding angin thuomhnaw intêl la, sûnah an mithmu ngeiah fe suok rawh; chun, an mithmua chun i hmuna inthawkin hmun dangah insawn rawh; sûngkaw hel hmang an ni nâka chu an ngaituo thei rawi mawh.
Chun, i thuomhnaw chu sûnah an mithmuah hung la suok i ta, sal intâng ding angin; chun, sal intânga fe dinghai thaw angin zântieng hunah an mithmuah nang ngei chu fe suok i ta.
An mithmua chun bang chu ver âwng la, chutaka chun i thuomhnaw chu la suok rawh.
An mithmua chun i liengkoah phur i ta, inthima chun phur pei i ta; i hmai khawm hnuoi hmu lo dingin în khum ding a nih; Israel sûngkuohai ta dinga inchiknaah ka sie ta si che a,” tiin.

Chun, chuonga thu pêka ka um ang tak chun ka thaw ta a; ka thuomhnaw chu sûnah ka hung lâk suok a, sal intâng ding ang tak chun; chun, zântieng chun ka kutin bang chu ka ver âwng a; thuomhnaw chu inthima chun ka hung lâk suok a, an mithmua chun ka liengkoah ka phur ta a.
Chun, zîngkâr chun
“Mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo, sûngkaw hel hmang chun i kuomah, ‘Ieng am i thaw a?’ an ti che a ni naw maw?
an kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa
Hril la, in ta dinga inchikna ka na, ka thaw ta angin an kuoma chun hung tlung a tih, hnawt suoknaa chun, salah an fe ding a nih.
Chun, ka lên khawm chu a chunga chun dêngkhum ka ta, ka chânga chun âwk a tih; chun, Kaldaihai ram Babulona chun ṭhuoi ka ta; chutaka chun thi naw ding ni sien khawm, hmu chu hmu naw ni.
Chun, a pâwlhai po po le, ama vêla ama ṭhangpuituhai ding po po chu kil tinah the dar ka ta; an hnunga kâwlhnâm chu phawi ka tih.
Chun, ramhaia ka hnawt dar pha le, hnamhai laia ka sukdar pha chu

Amiruokchu, anni laia mi tlâwmte chu kâwlhnâma manih, hripuia manih, ṭâmnaa inthawkin amani chun hlâng ka ta; an fena tieng tienga hnamhai kâwla chun an tirdakumna po po chu an phuongdar theina dingin; chun,
Chu nawa khawm
“Mihriem naupa, i bei kha inthin pumin fa la, i tui khawm kha inthin pum le ṭitak pumin dâwn rawh;

chun, kha rama mipuihai kuoma chun, Israel ram le Jerusalem hluotuhai chungthua chun Lalpa PATHIENIN hieng ang hin a tih; an bei chu ṭitumna leh fâng an ta, an tui chu maktina leh dâwn bawk an tih, chutaka chêngtuhai po po pâwngnêkna leiin, chutaka umhai po pohaia inthawka chu ram chu râusan a ni theina dingin.
Chun, khawpui, hluoa umhai chu suksiet nîng a ta, ram chu râusan nîng a tih; chun,
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, hi thuvar Israel rama in inei, ‘Nihai chu sukseiin a um a, thilhmulâwkhai tin chu a puitling ta nawh,’ ti hi ieng tina am a na?
Chuleiin, an kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa
Israel sûngkaw sûnga chun thilhmulâwk teplo amanih, aiena inhlêmna hrim hrim a um ta naw ding a ni si a.
“Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, Israel sûngkuohai chun hieng hin an ta, ‘Thil hmulâwk a hmuhai hi ni sâwttak la hung tlung dinghaia mi ding chu a na, hun la hlataka mi dinghai chu a lo hril a nih,’ tiin.
Chuleiin, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
“Mihriem naupa, Israel rama zâwlnei, anni lungrila inthawk ela thuhrillâwkhai hril hlaktuhai kuoma chun thu hril la, ‘
A âwnga chun in hang fe naw a,
Keiin ka hril naw a, ‘
Chuleiin, Lalpa
‘Inremna,’ tiin ka mihai chu an ṭhuoi suol a; inremna chu a um naw a, chun, miin bang a siem lai chun, ngai ta, chirhak inhnâk lovin an bel a;
chuong chirhak inhnâk lova beltuhai kuoma chun, a tla nâwk el ding a nih ti hril rawh, ruo a hrâta hrât hung sûr a ta, riel nasatak tlâng a ta, thlipui nasatakin nuoi a tih.
Ngai ta u, bang chu a tla pha chun in kuomah, ‘In ibelna chu khâwlai am a um leh?’ an ti naw ding cheu maw?
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chuongchun, bang chirhak inhnâk lova in bel kha suksieng ka ta, hnuoiah hung la thlâng ka tih; chuongchun, a lung phûm chu inlang tâng a ta, tlûng a ta, chu sûnga chun sukbohmangin um in tih; chun,
Chuong ang chun ka lunginsenna chu bang chunga le chirhak inhnâk lova beltuhai chunga chun sukpuitling ka ta; in kuoma chun, ‘Bang chu a um ta naw a, a beltuhai khawm,’ tîng an tih.
Zâwlneihai Jerusalem chungthu hrillâwktu le inremna um silo inremna dinga thilhmulâwk hmuhai chunga chun, Lalpa
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, an lungrila inthawka thu hriltuhai, i mihai naunuhai tieng chu ngha rawh; anni kalin thu hril la,
Lalpa

Buṭei vei khat le bei hlek hmu dingin ka mihai lai chun, mi thi lo dinghai chu that ding le, mi hring lo dinghai chu sandam dingin, thu khêl ngai hlak ka mihai chu hlêmin, ka mihai lai chun i mi lo sukhmingsiet ta a.
Chuleiin, Lalpa
In rawmawlhai chu keithlêr ka ta, ka mihai chu in kuta inthawkin sansuok ka tih; chun, pêl dingin in kuta chun um ta naw ni hai; chun,
Mi fel lungril ka suklungngai naw chu thukhêla in suklungzîng tâk leiin mi rilo kuthai khawm in lo sukhrât ta a, a lampui rilova inthawka a kîr nâwk nawna dingin hringna thu in tiem a;
chuleichun, teplo chu hmu nâwk ta naw ti niu a, vântieng thilhmulâwkhai khawm chu; chun, ka mihai chu in kuta inthawkin sansuok ka ta,
Chun, Israel upa ṭhenkhat ka kuomah an hung a, ka hmaa chun an ṭhung a.
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, hieng mihai hin an milimhai chu an lungrilhaia chun an lâk tlat a, an hmaihmaa chun an suolna tlûkna lunghai chu an sie ta a; annihai thu indawn hin ka la um rawp ding am a nih?
Chuleiin, an kuoma chun thu hril la, an kuomah, ‘Lalpa
an milimhai leia keimaa inthawka an invâkhmang vawng tâk leiin, Israel sûngkuo chu an lungrilhai ka lâk theina dingin’ tiin.
Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hril la, ‘Lalpa

Israel sûngkuoa mi tin amanih, Israel rama mikhuol inzin mikhuol amanih khawm keimaa inthawka pêthrana, a milimhai chu lungrila la tlata, a hmaihmaa a suolna tlûkna lung sie a, ama ta dinga ka kuoma thu indawn dinga zâwlnei kuoma hung si chu; kei
chu mipa chunga chun ka hmai innghat ka ta, thuvara inchikna dingin thilmakah siem ka ta, ka mihaia inthawk chun ama chu sât thlâng ka tih; chun,
Chun, zâwlnei chu hlêmin a um a, thu a hril chun, kei
Chun, an suol maw chu phur an ta; zâwlnei suolna chu mi ama kuomah zawngtu suolna ang ngei chu nîng a tih;

Israel sûngkuo chu keimaa inthawka an fe pêt ta nawna ding le, an bawsietnahai po po leia anni an insukpawrche ta nawna dingin; amiruokchu, ka mihai an hung ni theia, an Pathien ka ni theina dingin, Lalpa
Chun,

“Mihriem naupa, bawsietna thil chu thawin ram chu ka chungah lo suol ta sienla, chun, keiin a chungah ka kut inletin, bei a ringsan chu suksein, a chunga chun ṭâmna tirin, amaa inthawk chun ramsa le mihriemhai khawm lo sât thla ta lang;
hi mi pathumhai Noa, Daniel le Job hai meu khawm hi a sûnga chun umhai sien, an felna chun anni hringna chau chu an sanhim ding a nih, Lalpa
Chun, chu ram chu ramsa tuorhlaumhai chun fe thlengin, sukse hai sien, râusana umin, ramsahai lei chun mi fe paw ngam lovin umhai sien;
a sûnga chun hieng mi pathumhai hi um hai sienkhawm, Lalpa
Annawleh, chu ram chunga chun kâwlhnâm ka hung intlungtir a, ‘Kâwlhnâm, ram chu fe thleng rawh’, tia, amaa inthawka ramsa le mihriemhai ka sât thlâk chun,
hieng mi pathumhai hi a sûnga chun um sienkhawm, Lalpa
Annawleh, rama chun hripui ka tir a, a chunga chun, ramsa le mihriemhai chu sât thla dinga, thisenin ka lunginsenna ka bunthlâk chun,
Noa le Daniel le Job chu a sûnga chun um hai sienkhawm, Lalpa

Amiruokchu, ngai ta, chutaka chun a mahla lâksuok la ni rawp an ta, an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai chu; ngai ta, in kuoma chun hung suok an ta, an umdân le an thilthawhai chu lo hmûng in tih, chun, Jerusalem chunga thil ṭha naw ka hung intlungtir thua le a chunga ka hung intlungtir po po thua chun sukthlamuongin um in tih.
An um dânhai le an thilthawhai i hmu pha chun sukthlamuong an ti che a, a sûnga ka ithaw tahai po po chu a san um lovin ka thaw nawh ti hre tâng in tih,’ Lalpa
“Mihriem naupa, grêphrui kûng, grêp hrui kâu ramhnuoi thing laia um ve bawk chu, thing dang nêkin ieng am a danglam bikna?
Ieng ang sin khawm thawna dingin chutaka inthawk chun thing lâk suok thei a ni ding am a nih? Annawleh, mihaiin bûr le bêl, khaina dingin a kâute an lâk ding am a nih?
Ngai ta, thing tia hmang dingin meia peilût a nih, a hmawr ve ve chu mei chun a kâng hmang a, a lai chu a hung kâng a; ieng sina ding khawma a ṭhahnem am a nih?
Ngai ta, a pumpuia a um lai khawma ieng sina ding khawma a tlâktlai naw a, meiin a kâng hmang zo hnung lem chun a va tlâktlai naw nasa âwmin, a kâng hnung chun ieng sina dingin am tlâktlai tâng a ta!
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chun, bawsietna thil chu an thaw leiin, ram chu râusanah siem ka tih, Lalpa
“Mihriem naupa, Jerusalem chu a tirdakumna chu hre dingin siem la,
I pieng dâna chun, i pieng ni chun i laihrui chu ât a ni naw a, nang chu sukfai ding chein tuia sâwp khawm i ni bawk naw a; chia saw hrim khawm i ni naw a, dawm khawm i ni bawk naw a.

I chunga lunginsietna nei dingin le, hieng thilhai hi thawpêk ding chein, tu mit khawma a lunginsiet naw che a; amiruokchu, khawhnâwmah hnawt suok i ni ta lem a; chuong ang chun i pieng ni chun i mi nina chu tenin a lo um ta a.
Chun, i sîra ka khêl lai a, i thisena insukpawrche vawnga ka hmu chein, i kuoma chun, “I thisena khânga um kha ni la khawm, dam rawh,” ka ti a.

Ramhnuoi hnader anga pung dingin ka siem che a, i hung pung ngei a, i hung ropui a, incheina ṭha bîktak ang chu i hung ni ta a; i nênehai a hung in siem a, i sam dâm khawm a hung ṭo a, amiruokchu, saruok le ruok i la ni tlat el a.

Chun, i sîr ka hung khêl a, ka hung en che chun, ngai ta, i hun chu hmangaina hun a ni ta a; ka puon chu i chunga chun ka keiphar a, i saruokna chu kân khum ta a; anih, i kuoma chun kân khâm a, nangma le chun thuthlung ka lo siem ta a, Lalpa
Chun, tuiin kân sil che a; anih, i thisen chu nangmaa inthawk chun ka sâwpfai vawng a, hriek ka nâl che a.
Puon cheimawiin kân thuom che a, seal vun kekawk kân buntir che a, puonzai inhmiin ka hrên che a, tuktulungêk puonin ka tuom che kha.
Incheina thuomhaiin ka chei che a, i kuta chun bânbunhai kân buntir che a, i rîngah khaidiet leh.
Chun, i hnârah hnârbê le, i nahaia chun nabêhai le, i lu chungah lukhum mawitak ka sie a.

Chuongchun, rângkachak le tangkaruoa cheiin i um a; i silfênhai khawm, puonzai inhmi dâm, tuktulungêk puon dâm le puon cheimawi dâm an nih; beiphit indîtak le khuoizu le hriek chu i fâk a; i hung hmêlṭha êm êm el a; chun, lalnu khawm chu i hung tling pei ta a.
I mawina leiin i hming chu hnamhai laia chun ân darsuok a; kân lalna leia i chunga ka lo sie ta chu, ṭhat famkimna a ni si a.’ Lalpa
“Nisienlakhawm, i hmêl ṭhatna chu i ring a, i hming inthangna lei chun nawchizawrah i um ta a; nangma hung khêltu taphawthai chunga chun i châkna chu i phal a; ama ta a ni ta a.

I silfênhai chu i lâk a, i bâwlhmunhai chu ze dang dangin i chei a; a chunga chun nawchizawrna thil chu i thaw ta a; chuong ang thil chu um nâwk ta ngai naw ni a, chuong ang chu a la ni ngai bawk nawh.
Ka rângkachak le ka tangka în cheina hluhai ka pêkhai che chu i lâk a, mihriemhai limhaia chun i siem a, anni le chun nawchizawrna thil chu i thaw ta a;
i puon cheimawihai chu i lâk a, anni chu în khum a; an hmaa chun ka sahriekhai le riminhnikhai chu în tung a;
ka bei ka ipêk che, beiphit indîtak, hriek le khuoizu leh, ka châwmna che chu, an hmaa chun riminhnika dingin i sie ve bawk a, chuong chu a nih, Lalpa
Chu nawa khawm chun, naunuhmeihai le naupasalhai i mi neipêkhai chu i lâk a, an kuomahai chun fâkzoa um dingin inthâwinain i hmang a.
I nawchizawrna chu thil chîn tham a ni ding maw? Ka nauhai i that a, meia infethlengtir dinga an kuoma i pêk hi!
I nawchizawrna le i tirdakumnahai poa hin i tleirâwl lai nihai, saruok le ruoka i um a, i thisena în sukpawrche lai kha i hriet zing ta naw a nih.
“Chun, i rîtlona po po hnunga chun (i chung a rik, i chung a rik! Lalpa
hmun langsârtak takhai chu i ta dingin i bâwl a, kawtthlêr tinahai chun hmun insângtakhai chu i ta dingin i siem ta a.
Lam tluongpui tinahai chun i hmun insânghai chu i bâwl a, i mawina chu tirdakumnain în changtir a, mi a hung khêl taphawt che kuoma chun în hlîm a, i hurna chu i sukpung ta a.
I tuolbâwm, tisa ropuina, Aigupta mi le khawm chun i lo uire ta a; lunginsennaa mi chophâwk dingin i hurna chu i sukpung ta a.
Chuleichun, ngai ta, i chungah ka kut kân let a, i bu pângngai chu ka suktlâwm ding a nih, chun, Philistin naunuhai, i lampui tirdakum inzapuituhai, nangma theidatuhai duthusâmah pe suok ka ti che.
Mumal boa i um lei khan Assuria mihai kuoma khawm nawchizawrah i lo insiem ta a; anih, an kuoma chun nawchizawr thil chu i lo thawa chu i lungawi tâwk si naw a.
Chu nawa khawm chun Kanaan rama chun, Kaldai ram chenin i hurna chu i sukpung a; chu khawm chun i la lungawi tâwk naw a.
Hieng thil, nuhmei châk tawm tawmhai sin i thaw hi hmuin, ‘I lungril chu a va khawhlo de!’ Lalpa
Lampui tluong tinahai chun i hmun langsârhai chu i bâwl a, kawtthlêr tinahai chun i hmun insânghai chu i siem bawk a; hawman khawm i lâk nawnaa hin nawchizawr el ang khawm i ni nawh.
Nuhmei uirenu, mâni pasal nêka mikhuolhai la

Nawchizawrhai po po kuoma chun miin thilpêkhai an pêk hlak a, nang ruok chu i hmangaihai po po chu thilpêkhai i pêk a, anni chu i tham a, i châknaa ding chun sîr tina nangma kuoma an hung theina dingin.

I nawchizawrnaa hin nuhmei danghai nêka danglamna a um a, nang chu mi tukhawma nawchi zawr dingin an hung zui naw chea hin; nang chun a man chu i pêk lem a, nangma kuoma chun a man chu pêk a ni naw a, chuleiin, i danglam a nih.
“Chuleiin, aw nang nawchizawr,
Lalpa
ngai ta, chuleichun, i hmangaihai po po chu ko khâwm ka ta, inhawi i lo chênpuihai
Chun, nuhmei inneina dân bawse le, mâni nau thisen insuo chunga rorêl angin i chungah rorêl ka tih; i chunga chun îtthîkna le lunginsenna thisen chu hung intlungtir ka tih.

Chun, anni kuta chun pe bawk ka ti che a, i hmun langsârhai chu peisieng an ta, i hmun insânghai chu sukchim an tih; i puon sil chu hlîppêk an ti che a, în cheina thil hluhai chu lâng an tih; chuongchun, saruok le ruokin mâksan an ti che.
Nangma chunga chun inkhâwmpuina nei bawk an ta, lunghaiin dêng an ti che a, an kâwlhnâmhaiin sunthleng bawk an ti che.

I inhai chu meiin râwng an ta, nuhmei tamtak mithmua chun i chunga rorêlna chu sukthlûng an ta; chun, nawchizawr anga um chu ma dingin siem ka ti che a, chun, hawman khawm pe ta ngai hrim hrim naw ti ni.
Chuongchun, ka lunginthakna chu i chungah hrîtthlâng ka ta, ka îtthîkna chu nangmaa inthawk chun fe hmang tâng a ta, to ṭawk ṭawk ka ta, lunginsen nâwk ta naw ningah.
I tleirâwl lai nihai kha i hriet zing ta naw a, amiruokchu, hieng thilhaia hin i mi suklungsen a; chuleiin, ngai ta, kei khawma i nun suol maw chu i lu chungah hung intlungtir ka tih, Lalpa
“Ngai ta, mi tukhawm thuvarhai hmangtu chun hi thuvar hi i chungah hung hmang an tih, ‘A naunu khawm a nu ang bawk,’ ti hi.

Nang chu i nu naunu, a nauhai le a pasal khawm dawnsaklo naunu chu i na, nang chu i zuorpuihai, mâni nauhai le pasalhai khawm dawnsaklohai unaunu chu i na; in nu chu Hit mi a na, in pa khawm Amor mi a nih.
I zuorpui upa lem le a naunuhmeihai chu i vawitienga chêng Samaria hi a na; chun, i zuorpui naupang lem i changtienga chêng chu Sodom le a naunuhmeihai hi an nih.
An lampuihai chu i hrawin, an tirdakumnahaia chun i lungawi tâwk naw a; amiruokchu, hun sâwt nawtê sûngin i um dân po poah anni nêk hmanin i se lem a.
Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
Ngai ta, hi hi i zuorpui Sodom suolna chu a nih; ama le a naunuhaia chun chapona, bei ditkhawp, hausaka inhawitirna a um a, mi tlasamhai le mi rimsihai chu a ṭhangpui chuong nawh.
An chapo a, ka hmaa chun tirdakumna an thaw a, chuleiin, ṭha ka ti ang peiin anni chu ka lâk hmang ta a.

Samaria khawm chun i suol zâtve khawm a thaw naw a, nang ruok chun anni nêkin i tirdakumna chu i sukpung nasa lem a, chuleiin, tirdakumna i thawhai po po chun i zuorpuihai chu felah în langtir tah a nih.

I zuorpuihai fel lema în langtirna hin nang ngeiin i muolphona chu phur rawh, anni nêka tirdakumna nasa lem thawha i suolnahai leiin anni chu nanga nêkin an fel lem a nih, i zuorpuihai chu fel lema în langtir leiin.
“An sal nina chu inlet ka ta, Sodom le a naunuhmeihai sal nina, Samaria le a naunuhmeihai sal nina le, anni laia i salhai sal nina khawm inlet ka tih,
an ta dinga thlamuongtu nia i thil lo thaw tahai po poa khan în zak a, i muolphona chu i phur theina dingin.
I zuorpuihai Sodom le a naunuhmeihai le Samaria le a naunuhmeihai chu an um dân hmasaa bawk kîr nâwk an ta, nang le i naunuhmeihai khawm in um dân hmasaa bawk kîr nâwk in tih.
I chapo ni khan i zuorpuinu Sodom chu i ṭawngse hnâwkna
i rîtlona suklang a ni hma khan? Tuhin amanu angin Suria
I hurna le i tirdakumna hremna chu i phur a nih,
“Lalpa
Nisienlakhawm, i tleirâwl lai nihaia nang le ka thuthlung chu hre zing ka ta; chun, nang le chun chatuon thuthlung indin ka tih.
I unauhai, i unu le i sangnu i pawmlût pha chun naunuhmeihai dingin anni chu i kuomah pêng ka tih, i thuthlung lei ruok chu ni lovin.
Chun, ka thuthlung chu nang leh sukdet ka tih, chun
Thil i lo thawtahai po poa ka ngaidam pha che chun i hriet zing a, i hmai a mâwk a, în zak leia i bau i kâk dêr ta nawna dingin, Lalpa
Lalpa
a zîk insâng tak chu a chuk tan a, Kanaan rama chun a put hmang ta a; sumdâwng mihai khawpuia chun ân thlâk ta a.
Chun, chu ram thlai chi chu a lâk bawk a, leihnuoi ṭhataka chun a phun ta a; tui tamtak kâwla chun a sie a; phahrâm thing angin a sie a.

Chun, a hung inṭhang chun, grêphrui inhnuoitaka inzâm mi a hung na, a kâuhai chu ama tieng chun ân zâm lêt a, a zunghai chu ama hnuoia chun an um a; chuongchun, grêphrui a hung na, kâuhai a hung nei a; dâwnhai a hung insuo ta a.

Chun, mupui dang ropuitak thla ropuitakhai le hmul tamtak nei a um bawk a; chun, ngai ta, grêphrui chun a zunghai chu ama tieng chun ân kawmtir a, a kâuhai khawm chu ama tienga bawk chun ân dâwn suoktir a, tui a buok zing theina dingin. A phunna hmuna inthawk chun,
tui tamtakhai sîrah hnuoi ṭhatna hmuna chun phunsawn a ni ta a, kâuhai a hung insuo a, ra a hung nei a, grêphrui ṭhatak a hung ni theina dingin.
Hril rawh, Lalpa
Anih, ngai ta, phunin um de sienkhawm a puitling ding am a nih? Sak thliin a hung mût pha chun, a vuoi vawng el naw ding am a nih? A ṭona hmuna inthawk ngei chun vuoi a tih,” tiin.
Chu nawa khawm chun

“Sûngkaw hel hmanghai kuoma chun thu hril la, ‘Hieng thilhai hi ieng tina am a na ti in hriet naw maw?’ tiin, hril rawh, ngai ta, Babulon lal chu Jerusalema chun a hung a, chutaka lal le, chutaka lal nauhai chu a ṭhuoi a, ama kuomah Babulona chun a fepui ta a;
chun, lal chi khawm chu a ṭhuoi a, ama le chun thuthlung a siem ta a, chun, ama khawm chun inkhâmna hnuoiah a hung ṭhuoi a, rama mi thilthawtheihai chu a lâk hmang a;
lalram chu a hung inhnuoi a, ama khâta ân dawm kâng thei nawna dingin, chu a thuthlung chu a zâwm lei chaua a ngîr theina dingin.
Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
Mi tamtak chu sât thla dinga kulhai bâwla, tlângpâwnghai siema an um pha chun, Pharao le a sipai pâwl thilthawtheitakhai le, a pâwl ropuitakhai chun indonaa dingin iengkhawm thawpêk naw ni hai.
Thuthlung chu bawsein, inkhâmna chu a lo pêk ta a, amiruokchu, hieng thilhai po po hi a la thaw ta rawp si a; pumpel naw hrim hrim a tih.
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chun, a chunga chun ka lên chu keiphar ka ta, ka chânga chun ama chu âwk a ta, ama chu Babulonah hung ṭhuoi ka ta, chutaka chun a bawsietna, ka chunga a lo bawsietna chu a kuomah phût ka tih.
Chun, a pâwlhai po po laia a tlân hmanghai po po chu kâwlhnâmah tlûng an ta, chun, a la um zinghai khawm chu kil tinah sukdar ni bawk an tih; chun, kei
“Lalpa
Chun, chu lova thing po pohai chun kei
“Hi thuvar Israel rama in hmang, ‘Pahai chun grêp thûr an fâk ta a, nauhai hahai chu a ṭim,’ ti hi ieng tinâm a na?
Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
Amiruokchu, mi chu a fel a, thil indik le dân ang chu a thaw a,
tlânghai chunga chun a fâk bawk naw a, Israel sûngkuohai milimhai tieng chun a mithai ân lên bawk naw a, a tuolbâwm nuhmei chu a lo sukpawrche naw a, nuhmei insiehran lai a hung hnai bawk naw a;
tukhawm ân suksuoltir naw a, battu kuoma chun a hnina chu ân hmutir a, thawluinain tukhawm a suksiet naw a, mi phîngṭâmhai chu bei a lo pêk ta a, saruokhai chu silfên a lo inkhum ta a;
a pung hnawt dinga pe suok ngai lo a, a pung khawm la ngai lo a, suolnaa inthawka a kut keitîm a, mi le mi inkâra rorêlna indiktak lo hmang hlak a,
indiktaka thaw dinga ka rorêlhai zâwm a, ka thuruothai a pawm chun, ama chu mi indik a na, hring ngei ngei a tih, Lalpa
Amiruokchu, naupasal a nei a, suomhmang a ni a, thisen insuotu, hieng thilhai a ieng amani hi thaw a,
hieng thil thaw dinghai hi thaw lo a, amiruokchu, tlâng chunga lo fa ta a, a tuolbâwmhai nuhmei lo sukpawrche ta a,

a pung um dinga lo pe suok ta a, a pung khawm lo la ta hlak chu, ama chu a hring ding am a nih? Ama chu hring naw ni a, hieng tirdakumnahai po po thawtu hi chu thi ngei ngei a ta, a thisen chu ama chunga chun a um ding a nih.
Chun, ngai ta, ama chun naupasal hung nei ve sien, a pain suolna a thawhai po po chu lo hmu ta a, ama chun ṭi a, chuonga thaw ve lo a,
tlânghai chunga khawm lo la fa lo a, Israel sûngkaw milimhai tienga a mithai khawm lân lên ngai lo a, a tuolbâwm nuhmei khawm lo la sukpawrche lo a,
mi tu chunga khawm lo suksuol ngai lo a, hninaa thutiem la ngai lo a, thawluinaa la sukse ngai lo a, amiruokchu, a bei chu tlasamhai kuoma pe a, saruok chu silfêna lo inkhum ta a,

mi rimsihaia inthawka kut lo keitîm ta a, a pung hnawta lo inpûktir lo a, a pung khawm la lo a, ka rorêlnahai lo thaw ta a, ka thuruothai lo zâwm tah; chuong ang mi chu a pa suolna lei chun thi naw ni a, hring ngei ngei a tih.
A pa chungthua chun, ama chun rilotakin a lo nêksâwr ta a, thawluinain a unau chu a lo suksiet ta a, a mihai laia thil ṭha naw chu a lo thaw leiin ngai ta, a suolnaa chun thi ngei a tih.

Amiruokchu, nang chun, iengdinga naupa chun pa suolna chu a phur nâwm a na? i ti a ni thei a. Naupa chun dân ang le thil indik chu a thaw pha chun, ka thuruothai chu a pawm bawk a, a thaw bawk chun, hring ngei a tih.
“Amiruokchu, mi rilo chu a thil suksuolhaia inthawk chun ân her hmang a, ka thuruothai chu a zâwm a, ân dik le dân ang thilhai chu a thaw chun, hring ngei a ta, thi naw nih.
A bawsietnahai po po a ieng khawm chu ama chunga chun hriet zing ni ta naw ni a, chun, a felna a ithaw ngeia chun ama chu hring a tih.

Nisienlakhawm, mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân her hmang a, suolna a thaw chun, mi rilovin a thaw hlak anga tirdakumnahai po po kha a thaw ve chun, a hring ding am a nih? A thilthaw felhai, a lo thaw tahai a ieng ieng khawm kha hriet zing ni ta naw ni a, a bawsietnaa a bawsietna le, a suolnaa a suksuolna chun, chuongahai chun a thi ngei ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, Lalpa lampui chu ân ang rawp naw a, in la ti a ni thei a; tuhin ngai la, Aw Israel sûngkuo, ka lampui chu ân ang vawng an nâwm a nih? In lampuihai ni lo am a ni ân ang vawng naw chu?
Mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân her hmang a, thil suol a thaw chun thîng a ta, suolna a ithawa chun thîng a tih.
Chu nawah, mi rilo chu a rîtlonaa rîtlona a lo thaw tahaia in thawka ân her hmang a, chun, ân dik le dân ang thilhai chu a thaw chun, a thlarau chu hringin sanhim a tih.
Ama chun a ngaituo a, a lo thaw tah, a bawsietnahai po poa inthawk chun ân her hmang tâk leiin thi naw ni a, hring ngei ngei a tih.

Israel sûngkuo chun, Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng lêm, an la ti rawp khawm a ni theia, Aw Israel sûngkuo, ka lampuihai chu ân ang vawng a ni naw maw? Nanga lampuihai lem an nâwm a nih ân ang naw chu?
Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuo, mi tin chu a thilthawhai ang peiin rêlpêk ka tih, Lalpa
Chu nawa chun Israel lalhai ta ding chun sûnna hla
phuok la,
I nu chu ieng am a na? Sakeibakneipui a nih,
A bawk a, a têhai châwmin,
sakeibaknei tuoihai laia chun.
A têhai pakhat chu a hung châwm tlei a,
Sakeibaknei tuoi a hung na, fâkding man ân chûk a;
Mihriemhai chu a fâk zo ta a.
Hnamhai khawm chun a chanchin an lo hriet a,
An khura chun lâkin a um a;
Khaidieta khitin Aigupta rama chun an hung ṭhuoi ta a.
A te dang a lâk vak a, sakeibaknei tuoiah a siem nâwk a.
Sakeibakneihai lai a suk a tungin ân lawn a,
Sakeibakneituoi a hung na, fâkding man an chûk a;
Mihriemhai chu a fâk zo ta a.
An in ropuihai chu a hriet a, an khawpuihai
Ân rûm ri leiin ram chu râusanin a um a, a bitna lai po po le chun.
Rambunghaia inthawk sîr tinah hnamhaiin ama an hung kal a,
A chungah an lênhai an keiphar a, an khura chun a tla ta a.
Kul dettak sûngah an ṭhuoi a,
A râwlhai chu Israel tlânghaia inthawk hriet a ni nâwk ta nawna dingin.
I nu chu i thisena chun tuihai kâwla phun, grêphrui,
Tuihai tam leia ra nuomtak le kâua sip ang a nih.
A kâu ngartakhai chu rorêltu lalhmawla hmang an hung ni a,
A buk samup laia khawm chun an dâwk lûr bik a;
Kâu tamtakhai laiah ân sâng leiin an hmu bîk lûr bawk a.
Hnuoia pei thlâkin a um a,
Sak thliin a sukṭâwl a, a ra a mût ṭil a,
A kâu ngartak khawm chu suktliek a hung na,
A vuoi ta a, meiin a kâng hmang ta a.
Tuhin chu thlalêrah,
Ram ṭâwl le tuihulnaah phunsawn a ni tah.
A kâu kuonghaia inthawk mei a suok a, a ra a kâng hmang zo a,
Chuleiin, kâu ngartak rorêlnaa lalhmawla hmang thei khawm a um ta nawh.
Hi hi sûnna chu a na, sûnna hla chu la hung nîng a tih.
Kum sarina, thla ngânaa, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun, Israel upa ṭhenkhathai chu
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel upahai kuoma khan thu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
Anni chu ro rêlpêk i ti, mihriem naupa, anni chu ro rêlpêk i ti? An thlatuhai tirdakumnahai chu inhriettir la;
an kuoma chun, Lalpa
chu nia chun Aigupta rama inthawka, ram po pohai ropuina nenetui le khuoizua luong ram an ta dinga ka lo enthlit tah rama hung ṭhuoi dingin, an kuoma chun ka bân ka phar a.
An kuoma khawm chun, a mithmua tirdakumnahai po po chu nangni mi tinin peithla unla, Aigupta ram milimhai chun insukpawrche naw unla;

Nisienlakhawm, ka chungah an hel a, ka thu an ngai naw a; mi tin chun an mithmua an tirdakumnahai chu an pei thlâk naw bawk a; Aigupta milimhai khawm chu an nghatsan bawk naw a; chun, kei chun, ‘an chunga chun Aigupta ram sûnga an chunga ka lungsenna sukpuitling dingin ka lunginsenna chu ka bunthlâk ding a nih,’ ka ti a;
nisienlakhawm, ka hming leiin,
chuongchun, Aigupta rama inthawka suok dingin ka siem a, thlalêra chun anni chu ka hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Ka thuruothai le ka rorêlhai, chuong chu miin an thaw a, an hring pui dinghai chu, an kuomah ka pêk a, kân entir bawk a.

Amiruokchu, Israel sûngkuo chu thlalêra khan ka chungah an hel a, ka thuruotahai chun an fe naw a, chuong chu miin a thawa a hringna dinghai ka rorêlhai khawm chu an dang kîr a; ka châwlni khawm chu nasatakin an suksiet a, chun, kei chun thlalêra chun anni chu kânghmang dingin ka lunginsenna chu an chungah ka bunthlâk ding a nih ka ti ta a.
Chun, ka hming leiin, hnamhai anni mithmua anni ka hung ṭhuoisuoknahai, chuonghai mithmua chun hrilsiet a ni ding a ni nawh tiin ka thaw a.
ka rorêlhai chu an dang kîr a, ka thuruothai chu an hraw naw a, ka châwlnihai chu an bâwsiet ta leiin; an lungrilhai chun an milimhai chu a zui si a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni suksietnaa inthawk chun ka mit chun a hla a, thlalêra khan anni chu ka lo suktâwp dêr el bawk naw a.
Chun, an thlahai kuomah thlalêra khan, ‘In thlatuhai thuruothai chu hraw naw unla, an rorêlhai chu pawm bawk naw unla, an milimhai chun nangni le nangni insukpawrche bawk naw ro;
ka châwlni khawm chu inza bawk unla;

Nisienlakhawm, chuong thlahai chu ka chungah an hel ta rawp a, ka thuruothai chu an hraw naw a, ka rorêlhai khawm chu thaw dingin an zâwm bawk naw a; chuong chu miin a thaw chun chuonga chun hring a tih; ka châwlni khawm an sukpawrche a; chun, kei chun thlalêra an chunga ka lunginsenna chu sukpuitling dingin an chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka bunthlâk ding a nih ka ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, an mithmua anni ka hung ṭhuoi suokna hnamhai mithmua chun sukhmingsiet a ni nawna dingin, ka hming leiin ka thaw a, ka kut chu ka keitîm ta a.
ka rorêlhai chu an phursuok naw a, ka thuruothai khawm an dangkîr bawk leiin le, ka châwlnihai khawm chu an sukpawrche a, an thlatuhai milimhai chu an mit chun a en zing leiin.
Chu nawa khawm chun thuruot a ṭha ni lo, rorêlnahai an hringna ding ni lohai khawm chu ka pêk bawk a;
chun, anni thilpêkhaia ngei, sul hung hawngtu taphawt meia an infethlengtirnaa chun, anni chu râusana ka siem theina ding le, a tâwpa chun
“Chuleiin, mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun thu hril la, an kuomah Lalpa

Ka bân phara anni pe dinga ka ti, chu rama anni ka hung ṭhuoi lai chun tlâng insângtak le rampui inthim mup an hmu a, chutaka chun an inthâwina chu an inhlân ta a, chutaka chun an thilinhlân chimum chu an pêk a, chutaka chun an riminhnik khawm chu an bun bawk a.
Chun, keiin an kuomah, ‘In va fena bâwlhmun kha ieng am in ti a?’ ka ti a. Chuongchun, a hminga chun vawisûn ni chen hin Bama an inbûk ta a.
Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuohai kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa

In thilpêkhai in inhlân lai le, in naupasalhai chu meia in infethlengtir lai khan, in milimhaia khan vawisûn ni chen hin in insukpawrche a ni nâwm a nih? Aw Israel sûngkuo, nangni mi râwn hin ka um rawp ding maw? Ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
“In lungrila in ingaituo, ‘Thing le lung rawng bâwl dinga rambunghaia sûngkuohai le hnamhai ang nîng ei ta’ in ti ang kha hung ni tawp naw ti niu.
“Lalpa
hnam danghai laia inthawkin la suok ka ti cheu a, sukdara in umna ramhaia inthawk khan kut tha hrât le, bân phar le lunginsenna bunthla hielin kei khâwm ka ti cheu;
chun, hnamhai thlalêra chun hung ṭhuoi ka ti cheu a, chutaka chun hmai san ngeiah phût tâng ka ti cheu.
In thlatuhai Aigupta ram thlalêra ka phût ang khan, nangni khawm ka phût ding cheu a nih, Lalpa
Chun, vuokfung hnuoiah infetir ka ti cheu a, thuthlung khuokhirna hnuoiah lalût ka ti cheu;
nangni laia inthawkin mi helhai chu sukfai ka ta, chuong keia chunga bâwsetuhai le chun; an mikhuolna rama inthawk chun hung ṭhuoi suok ka tih; amiruokchu, Israel rama chun chu lût naw ni hai; chun,
Nangni ta ding chun, Aw Israel sûngkuo, Lalpa
Lalpa
Chun, in thlatuhai kuoma pêk dinga ka bân ka lo phar tah, chu ram, Israel rama chun ka hung ṭhuoi pha cheu chun

chutaka chun, in lampuihai le in thilthawhai po po, in lo insukpawrchenahai chu hre zing in tih; chun, in suolnahai po po, in lo suksuol tahaia chun in mithmu ngeia chun nangni le nangni intheida tâng in tih.
Chun, in lampui suolhai ang ni lova, in thilthaw khawhlohai ang khawm ni lova, ka hming leia nangni le sin ka thaw pha chun,
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, i hmai kha simtieng innghat la, i thu chu simtienga chun inthla la, Sim rama phûl rampui chunga chun thu hril rawh;
chun, Sim rampui kuoma chun, ‘
Chun, taksa tin chun kei
Chun, kei chun, “E, Lalpa
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, i hmai chu Jerusalem tieng innghat la, i thu chu hmun inthieng tieng inthla la, Israel ram chunga chun thu hril rawh;
chun, Israel ram kuoma chun hieng hin hril la,
Nangmaa inthawka mi fel le mi rilohai chu ka sât thlâk ding a nih ti hmuin, simtienga inthawka hmârtieng chenin, ka kâwlhnâm chu tisa po po chu doin a bâwma inthawk chun phawi suok nîng a ta;
chun, tisa tin chun kei
Chuleiin, inthuok huoi la, nang mihriem naupa, i kâwng chu namin rinumtitakin an mithmua chun inrûm rawh.

Chun, i kuomah, ‘Ieng am i thuokindawng pui leh?’ an ti pha chun, ‘Chanchinhai leiin, a hung tlung mêk si a,’ tîng i ta; chun, lungril tin chu intui a ta, kut po pohai chu hung châu an ta, thlarau tin chu hung châuhâwp an ta, khûphai po po khawm chu tui angin hung zawi an tih; ngai ta, a hung mêk a, thaw khawm a ni ngei ding a nih, Lalpa
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, thu hril la,
Kâwlhnâm, kâwlhnâm tâtngeiin a um a,
Nâwttlêt a ni bawk a.
A that a that theina dinga tâtngei a na,
Kâwlinlep ang a ni theina dingin nâwttlêt a ni bawk a!
Hlimna ei la siem rawp ding am a nih?
Ka naupa hmawl chun thing tinhai chu a hung hmusit a.
Chun, hmang a ni theina dingin nâwttlêt dinga pêk a na;
Kâwlhnâm chu, tâtngei a na,
Anih, thattu kuta pêk dingin nâwttlêtin a um a nih.
Mihriem naupa, khêk la, inrûm rawh; ka mihai chunga tlung a na,
Israel lalhai po po chungah a tlung si a;
anni chu ka mihai leh kâwlhnâm kuoma chun pêkin an um a;
Chuleiin, i êlpui chu ben rawh.
Fiena a um si a;
iengtin am ni tâng a ta,
Hmawl a hmusittu khawm a um ta naw ding si chun?
Lalpa

“Chuleiin, nang mihriem naupa, thu hril la, i kuthai chu ben la, a ṭum thumnaa chun kawlhnâm chu nawn ni sienla, thina khawp hliemna kâwlhnâm chu; thi khawp raua hliem mi pakhat ropuitak kâwlhnâm a nih; an pindanhaia lût chu.
An dâi kawtkhârhai po poah chun kâwlhnâm inzum chu kân nghat a, an lungrilhai chu a hung intui a, mi tamtak an tlûk theina dingin. E, kâwlinlep anga siem a ni chu aw! dettaka chel a ni ta a.
Inkeikhâwm la, changtieng fe la, vân tlar la, vawi tieng fe la, chu tieng chun i hmai chu innghat la.
Kei khawma ka kuthai ben tuong ka ta, lunginsenna chu sukdei ka tih; kei

“Nang mihriem naupa, Babulon lal kâwlhnâm chu a hung theina dingin lampui pahni ruot bawk rawh; An pahni chun ram pakhata inthawkin hung suok an ta; hmun pakhat inchik an ta, khawpui lûtna lam tluongpui laia chun inchik an tih.
Ammon thlahai Rabba kuoma le inhumhimna Juda rama Jerusalema kâwlhnâm hungna dingin lampui ruot la;
Babulon lal chu lampui inṭhena lai, lampui pahnihai inchinna taka chun, dawi hmang dingin a ngîr zing si a; hnungtieng hmatieng thalhai chu a hêm vêl a, milimhai chu a râwn a, sathin chu a en bawk a.

A changtieng kuta chun Jerusalem ta dinga, kâphmunhai siemna ding le, thattuhai ta ding bau kâk ding le, khêka râwl insuo ding le, dâi kawtkhârhai epa kâphmunhai siem ding le, hnuoi dêng pâwnghai siem a, kulhai bâwl ding thu aisânna chu a um a.
An kuoma ṭawngsiehaia lo inkhâm ta khawm chu an mithmu chun an ta dingin aisânna teplo nîng a tih; amiruokchu, chu chun suolna chu hriet zing dingah a hung lâk a, anni chu lâk an ni theina dingin.
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chun, nang aw thi khawp raua hliem mi rilo, Israel lal, ama ni chu a hung tlung mêk a, a tâwpnaa hremna huna hin;
Lalpa
Inletling ka ta, letling ka ta, letling ka ta, hi khawm hi um ta naw ni a, a thuneitu a hung hmakhat chun; chun, ama kuoma chun pêng ka tih.
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, thu hril la, Ammon thlahai le anni vaulâwkna, chungthua chun Lalpa
an hremna nuhnungtak ding hun, mi rilo tâwpkhâwkhai ringa innghat ding ni tlung mêk zing laiin thilhmulâwk teplo hmupêk chein aisânna khêlhlip an hrilpêk che a nih.
A bâwma chun thun kîr nâwk el rawh. Siema i umna hmunah, i piengna ram ngeia chun i chungah ro rêl ka tih.
I chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu hung bunthlâng ka ta, ka lunginsenna mei chu i chunga chun hung mût ka tih; chun, mi hrânghai, that dân thiemtakhai kuta chun pesuok ka ti che.
Chu nawa khawm chun
“Nang mihriem naupa, khawpui thisen insuo hmang chungthu hi i rêl ding am a nih, i rêl ding am a nih? A tirdakumnahai po po chu inhriettir vawng rawh.
Chun, hieng hin tîng i ta, Lalpa

I thisen i lo insuotahaia chun thiemlo chang i lo ni ta a; milim i lo siemahai chun nang chu i lo insukpawrche ta bawk a; i nihai chu hung hnai dingin i siem a, i kumbi ruothaia chun i hung tlung ṭêp ta bawk a,
Chuong nanga hnaia umhai le nanga hlata umhai chun, nang buoinaa sip le, hmingse ta chu nuisan an ti che a.
Ngai ta, Israel lalhai mi tin chu a thilthawtheina ang peia, thisen insuo dingin i sûnga chun a um a nih.
I sûnga chun nu le pa chu hmusitin an um a; i sûnga chun mikhuolhai chu nêksâwrin an sawisa a; i sûnga chun pa neilohai le hmeithai chu an sukkhawhlo ta a.
Nang chun ka thil inthienghai chu i hmusit a; ka châwlnihai khawm chu i lo bawsiet ta a.
I sûnga chun thisen insuo dingin mi bautamhai an um a; i sûnga chun tlâng sâng chungahai chun an fâk bawk a; i sûnga chun hurna thil khawhlo khawm chu an lo thaw ta a.
I sûnga chun an thlatuhai saruokna chu an hlîmpêk a; i sûnga chun nuhmei inthieng naw lai zâlpui an um a,
Mi pakhat chun a tuolbâwm nuhmei chunga chun thil tirdakum chu a thaw a; mi dang chun hurtakin a monu chu a sukpawrche bawk a; mi dang chun i sûngah a pa naunu, a farnu chu ân tlâwm bawk a.
I sûnga chun thisen insuo dingin thamnahai an lâk a; a pung hnawtna le a pung chu i lâk a; nêksâwrnain i tuolbâwmhai chunga chun duâmtakin i lo hlêp ta a; kei i mi lo theinghil tah a nih, Lalpa
Chuleiin, ngai ta, i hlêpna ringum lo, i lo thaw tah le, i sûnga i thisen i lo insuo tâk chunga chun ka kuthai ka ben el a nih.
Nangma chu ka sawisak nihaia che chun i kuthai chu a hrât tâwkin, i lungril chun a tuor zo ding am a nih? Kei
Hnamhai laia chun sukdar ka ti che a, rambunghaia chun sukdar bawk ka ti che; i tirdakumna chu nangmaa inthawk chun sukbohmang tâng ka tih,
Chun, hnamhai mithmua chun nangma le nangma ngei chu insukhmingsieng i ta; chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo hi ka ta dingin êksie an ni tah; pûm meia chun an rêng chun darsen dâm, rângva dâm, thîr dâm, suon dâm an na; tangkaraw êksie chu an nih.
Chuleiin, Lalpa

Tangkaruo dâm, dârsen dâm, thîr dâm, rângva dâm, suon dâm pûmmeia an mût dinga suktui dinga an lâk khâwm angin, ka lunginsenna le ka ṭiumnain la khâwm ka ti cheu a, chutaka chun sieng ka ti cheu a, suktui ka ti cheu.
Anih, la khâwm ka ti cheu a, ka lunginsenna meiin râwng ka ti cheu; chuongchun, chutaka chun intui in tih.
Tangkaruo chu pûmmeia ân tui angin chuong ang chun chutaka chun intui in tih, chuongchun, kei
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, amanu kuoma chun hril la; Ram thienglo le, lunginsenna nia a chunga ruo tlâk nawna ang chu i nih, ti rawh.

Sakeibaknei inrûmin a sa fâk ding ân rûm khum angin, a sûnga chun a zâwlneihai chu phierrûkna a um a; mi tin hringin an fâk zo a, thil hluhai le thil rohai chu an lâk a, a sûnga chun hmeithai tamtak an siem a.

A thiempuhai chun ka dâna chun thawluina an hmang a; ka thil inthienghai chu an sukpawrche a; thil pângngai le thil inthieng khawm chu an ṭhe hran naw a, chuongchun, mihai khawm chu thil inthieng le thienglo chu hre hran dingin an siem naw a; ka châwlnia inthawkin an mithai an hup a; anni laia chun sukhmingsiet ka ni tah a nih.
A sûnga a lalhai chu satene an sa fâk ding innghir khumhai ang chu an na; thisen insuoa, mi hring sukbohmanga hlâwkna indik lo an hmuna dingin.
Chun, a zâwlneihai chun an kuoma aisân inkhêlhai le, teplohai chu hmuin anni ta ding chun chirhak sukhnâk lo chun an chârkhum a;
Chu ram mipuihai chun nêksâwrna an hmang a, inrûk an chîng bawk a; anih, tlasamhai le mi rimsihai chu an suklungngai a; mikhuol chu indik lotakin an nêksâwr a.
Anni lai chun mi, ram chu ka suksiet nawna dinga dâi chu siem ṭha ding le, ram ta dinga, ân âwngnaa ka hmaa ngîr ding ka zawng a, nisienlakhawm, tukhawm ka hmu naw a,
Chuleiin, ka lunginsenna chu an chunga chun ka bunthlâk a, ka lunginsenna mei chun anni chu ka kâng hmang ta a; an lampuihai chu anni lu chunga ngei chun ka hung intlungtir ta a, Lalpa
“Mihriem naupa, Nuhmei pahni, nu pakhat naunuhmeihai chu an um a;
Aiguptaa chun nawchizawr sin an thaw a, an tleirâwla inthawkin nawchizawr sin chu an thaw a, an nênehai chu hmet a na, chuongchun, an nunghâk inthieng lai nêne chu hmet zêk a na.

An hminghai chu, a upa lem chu Ohola a na, a sangnu chu Oholiba a nih; ka ta an hung ni a, naupasalhai le naunuhmeihai an hung nei ta a. Chun, an hming thua chun Ohola chu Samaria a na, Oholiba chu Jerusalem chu a nih.
Chun, Ohola chun ka ta a ni sûng khawm chun nawchi a zawr a; a dit zâwnghai a tuolbâwm Assuria mihai ân saipuia,
a dum pâwla incheihai, ram awptuhai le rorêltuhai le tlangvâl ditumtak tak sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai chu.
An kuoma chun a nawchizawrna chu a pêk a, an rêng chun Assuria mi ditumtak takhai an na, chun, tukhawm ân saipui taphawthai chu, an milimhaia chun ama chu ân sukpawrche ve pei ta a.

Aiguptaa umna nihaia inthawk ta khan a nawchizawr chu a ma naw a, a tleirâwl lai an lo zâlpui a; a nunghâk inthieng nêne hmûrhai chu an lo sukhliem ta si a; chuongchun, an hurna chu a chunga chun an lo bunthlâk ta a.
Chuleichun, a hmangaihai kutah, ân saipui Assuria mihai kuta chun ka pêk suok ta a.

Chuonghai chun a saruokna chu an hlîmpêk a, a naupasalhai le a naunuhmeihai chu an lâkpêk a; ama le chun kâwlhnâmin an that a, ama chu nuhmeihai laia ṭawngnaa hmang a lo ni ta a, ama chunga chun rorêlna chu an lo sukthlûk ta si a.

“Chun, a unaunu Oholiba khawm chun hi hi a hmu zing a, anachu, ama chu a mi insaipuinaa chun ama nêk hin nasatakin ân suksiet lemin, a nawchizawrnaa khawm chun a unaunu nawchizawrna nêkin a nasa lem a.
Ama chun Assuria mihai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, a tuolbâwmhai chu, ropuitaka incheihai, sakawr chung chuong mi sakawr chunga chuonghai, an rênga tlangvâl ditumtak takhai chu ân saipui a.
Chun, ama chu an sukpawrche ti ka hmu a, an pahni chun lampui thuhmun an hraw leiin.
Chun, a nawchizawrna chu a sukzuol pei a, bang chunga chun mihriemhai lim zieka umhai chu a hmu si a; Kaldaihai lim sen mawia incheia ziek,
an kâwnghaia kâwngkhitnaa inkhit an luhaia lukâwm sukdum kâwma, hang en khawma lalhai ang, an piengna rama Kaldaia Babulon mi nina nei chie ruok an nih.
Chun, a hmu phingle chun ama chun ân saipui a; Kaldaia chun an kuomah mitirhai a tir a.
Chun, Babulon mi chu a kuoma inditna khuma chun a hung a, an nawchizawrna chun ama chu an sukpawrche a, anni le chun a lo pawrche ta a, a lungril chun anni chu a ngei ta hle a.
Chuongchun, a nawchizawrna chu langchangtaka a thaw a, a saruokna a hlîm chun, ka lungril chu amaa inthawk chun ân her a, a unaunua inthawka ka lungril a lo inher ta ang bawk khan.
Nisienlakhawm, Aigupta rama nawchizawr thil a thaw lai, a tleirâwl lai nihai chu hre zingin, a hurnahai chu a la belsa ta rawp a.
An tisa khawm sabengtunghai tisa ang, an thilsuok khawm sakawrhai thilsuok ang, an mi lepchiehai chu ân saipui a.
Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i tleirâwl lai nênehai an hmeta, a hmûrhai an hmet zêk lai a, i tleirâwllai hurna chu i ngai a.
“Chuleiin, Oholiba, Lalpa

Babulon mihai, Kaldai mihai po po le, Pekod mihai, Soa mihai, Hoa mihai, anni le Assuria mihai po po leh; tlangvâl ditumtak takhai, ram awptuhai, rorêltuhai, an rêngin lal nauhai, mi hming inthanghai, an rêngin sakawr chunga chuong mihai chu.

Chun, nanga chunga chun hriemhreihai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, tawlailîrhai, mipui inkhâwm nasatak leh hung do an ti che a; a vêlin, thîr lukhumhai, âwmphawhai le phawhai le an hung ep ding che a nih; chun, an kuoma chun rorêlna dân ang peiin i chungah rorêlpêk an ti che.

I chunga chun ka îtthîkna chu sieng ka ta, i chunga chun lunginsen pumin thâwng an tih; i hnâr le i nâhai chu la hmang an ta; i la mahlahai chu kâwlhnâmah tlûng an tih; i naupasalhai, i naunuhmeihai chu lâng an ta, i la mahlahai chu meiin kâng hmang vawng a tih.
Chun, nang khawm i silfênhai chu hlîppêk an ti che a, în cheina man tamhai chu la hmang an tih.

Chuongchun, Aigupta rama i nawchizawrna hung lâk le, i hurna chu nangmaa inthawka bo ta dingin siem ka ta; chuongchun, anni chu i mithai chun mel ta ngai naw ni a, Aigupta chu hre zing ta bawk naw ti nih.
Hieng hin Lalpa
theida hlêng an ti che a, i sinthaw inrimna po po chu la hmang vawng an ta, saruok le silfên boin mâksan an ti che; chun, i hurna saruokna chu hlîm nîng a ta, i hurna le i nawchizawrna chu.
Hieng thilhai hi i chungah thawin a um ding a nih; khawhri be mihai hnung chu châkin i lo hnawt ta a, an milimhai chun i lo insukpawrche ta si leiin.
I unaunu lampuia chun i lo fe ta a; chuleiin, ama no chu i kutah ka pêk ding a nih.
“Lalpa
I unaunu no tung lientak chu i dâwn ding a nih,
Hmusita nuisanin um i ta, hrilinsîm ni bawk i tih,
A keng râwn hle si a;
Lungngaina le inruinain sip tâng i ta,
Râusanna le maktina no, i zuorpuinu Samaria no le chun
Dâwn khawm dâwn ngei i ta, thlâksuok i ta,
Chutaka a nâwihai chu, sawi i ta,
I nênehai chu sukhliem i tih;
Ka lo hril ta si a,
Lalpa
“Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chu nawa khawm chun

An lo uire ta si a, an kuthaia chun thisen a kai a; an milimhai chun uiretna thil chu an lo thaw ta a; chun, an naupasalhai an mi neipêkhai khawm chu, an kuomah fâk zoa um dingin meia chun an infethlengtir a.
Chu naw khawm chu hi hi ka chungah an thaw bawk a; a ni pângngaia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu an sukpawrche a, ka châwlnihai khawm chu an lo bawsiet ta a.
An milimhai kuoma an nauhai an that laiin, chu nia ma chun ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrche dingin an hung si a; chun, ngai ta, ka in sûnga chun chuong ang chun an thaw a nih.

Chu nawa chun, hlataka inthawka hung ding mihai ta ding chun mi i tir a, an kuoma chun mitir chu tir a na; chun, ngai ta, an hung ta a; chuong ta ding chun în sâwp a, i mithai i nâl a, incheinahaiin în chei a;
lal khum a hmaa dawkân buotsaia um chunga chun i ṭhung a, chu chunga chun ka riminhnikhai le ka hriek chu i sie kha.

Chun, mipui râwl inhawitihai chu a kuoma chun a um a; chun, mi chi narânhai le chun thlalêra inthawkin zu inrui mihai chu hung ṭhuoi an na. An kuthaia chun bânbunhai chu a thuoin an inbuntir a, an luhai chunga chun lallukhum mawitakhai le chun.
Chun, kei chun uirea a upa lemnu kuoma chun, ‘Tuhin anni chun ama le uiretna thil chu an thawin, ama khawma anni le a thaw ding am aw?’ ka ti a.
Nuhmei nawchizawr hlak kuoma an lût hlak angin, anni chu ama kuoma chun an lût ta a; chuongchun, nuhmei hur, Ohola le Oholiba kuoma chun an lût ta a.
Mi felhai chun, anni chu uirenu chunga rorêl ang le, nuhmei thisen insuotu chunga rorêl angin rorêlpêk an tih; uirenuhai an na, an kutahai chun thisen a kai bawk si leiin.
Lalpa
Chun, mipui inkhâwmhai chun anni chu lungin dêng an ta; an kâwlhnâmhai chun that an ta; an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai chu that an ta, an inhai chu meiin raw hâwp an tih.
Chuongchun, hurna chu chu rama inthawka bo dingin siem ka ta, nuhmeihai po po chu in hurna ang thaw lo dinga inchûktir an ni theina dingin.
Chun, in hurna chu in chungah thung an ti cheu a, in milimhai suolna chu phur in ta, chun, Lalpa
Kum kuona kum, thla sâwmna, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun
Chun, sûngkaw hel hmanghai kuoma chun tekhithu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
Sumbepui inchuon unla, inchuon unla,
A sûnga chun tui buok unla;
Chun, chutaka chun a sa tlinhai thlâk unla,
A tlang ṭha deu deuhai, a mal le a dârhai le
A ru tuihnâihai chun suksip ro.
Ran ruol laia ditumtak chu la unla,
A ruhai chu a hnuoi tieng sie unla,
Insoṭhattir hle unla, a ruhai chu but ro;
“Chuleiin, Lalpa
A thisen chu ama sûnga chun a um si a, lungpui ruok chunga chun ân suo a; pilvuta zuk vurkhum theina ding, leihnuoi chunga chun a bunthlâk si naw a.
Phuba la dinga hung tlung dinga lunginsenna chu ân umtir theina dingin, a thisen chu lungpui ruok chunga chun kân suo a, inkhum a ni nawna dingin.
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Thing buk ṭeu la, mei ti chawk ṭha la, sa chu intlawk ṭhattir hle la, a tuihâng chu hâng deuin, a ruhai chu râw hmang ni raw se.

Chun, meiling chunga chun a ruokin inchuon la, a hung luma, a dârsen chu a hung inling theina dingin, chuongchun, ân thieng nawna chu a sûnga chun a hung intui theina dingin le, a tuiêkhai chu a hung kânghmang theina dingin.
Sâwl neng khawpa thaw hnung khawmin a tuiêkna chu amaa inthawk chun a tlan hmang si naw a; a tuiêkna chu mei khawma a sukbo thei nawh.
I pawrchenaa chun hurna a um a; ka sukfai che a, sukfaia i um naw leiin, i pawrchenaa inthawkin sukfai ni ngai ta hrim hrim naw ti ni, ka lunginsenna hi i chunga ka suklungâwi hmakhat chun.
Kei
“Mihriem naupa, ngai ta, thâwkkhatin i mithai châkna chu nangmaa inthawkin ka lâk hmang ding a nih; ṭap naw ti ni a, sûn bawk naw ti ni, i mitthlihai khawm luong thla bawk naw ni.

Inthuok huoi la, amiruokchu, inring lovin, mithi ta ding chun sûnna siem naw la, i lukâwm chu kâwm la, i kehaia chun i kekawkhai chu bun la, i hmûrhai chu hup naw la, lusûntuhai bei chu fa naw rawh,” tiin.
Chuongchun, zîngkâr chun mipuihai kuoma chun thu chu ka hril a, a zântieng chun ka nuhmei chu a thi ta a; chun, thu pêka ka um ang chun zîngkâr chun ka thaw ta a.
Chun, mipuihai chun ka kuoma chun, “Hieng thil i thawhai hi, keini ta dingin ieng am an niha i mi hril naw ding maw?” an ta.
Kei chun an kuomah, “
‘Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hril la, Lalpa
Chun, ka thaw ta ang khan thâwng in ta; in hmûrhai chu inkhum naw ti niu a, mihriemhai bei chu fa bawk naw ti niu.
In lu haia chun in lukâwmhai chu kâwm in ta, in kekawkhai chu in kehai chun bun in ta; ṭap naw ti niu a, sûn bawk naw ti niu; amiruokchu, in suolnaa chun riral lem in ta, insûntuo lem in tih.
Chuongchun, Ezekiel hi in ta dingin inchikna nîng a ta; amain a thaw ang tak hin thaw vêng in tih; hienghai hi a hung tlung pha chun
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, an kul det, an ropuina hlimna, an mithai châkna le, an lungril an sienahai, an naupasalhai le an naunuhmeihai ka lâk pha chun,
chu nia chun a pumpeltu chu i kuomah hungin a hung inhriettir naw ding che am a nih?
Chu nia chun chu a pumpeltu kuoma chun i bau chu ka tâng i ta, thu hril i ta, ṭawng theilovin um ta naw ti ni; chuongchun, an ta ding chun inchikna nîng i ta; chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Ammon thlahai tieng chun i hmai innghat la, an chungchânga chun thu hril rawh;
Ammon thlahai kuoma chun hieng hin hril la, Lalpa

ngai ta, an nei ding chein khawsak mi thlahai kuoma chun ka pêk ding che a nih; an chêngna hmunhai chu i sûnga chun siem an ta, an umna hmunhai chu innghat an tih; chun, i tui chu dâwnin i nênetui khawm chu dâwn bawk an tih.
Rabba chu sanghâwngseihai ta dinga inah siem ka ta, Ammon thlahai hmun chu berâmhai ta dinga bawk khâwmna hmunah siem ka tih; chun,
Lalpa
“Lalpa
Ngai ta, Moab
saktieng mihai thlahai kuoma chun an nei dingin Ammon thlahai leh pêng ka tih; Ammon thlahai chu hnamhai laia hriet zing a ni ta nawna dingin.
“Lalpa
Lalpa
“Lalpa
chuleiin, Lalpa
Kum sâwm pakhatna, chu thlaa ni khat ni chun

“Mihriem naupa, Tura chun Jerusalem chunga chun, E he, hnam tinhai dâi kawtkhâr chu a tliek a ni ta hi; tuhin keia kuom tieng a hung inher ta a, kei chu hluosip nâwkin um ka ta; tuhin ama chu suksiet a ni hi, a ti leiin,
Lalpa
Chun, anni chun Tura kul banghai chu suksieng an ta, a in insânghai chu sukchim an tih; kei khawma a pilvut chu amaa inthawkin zietthlâng ka ta, ama chu lungpui fil ruouah siem ka tih.
Tuipuia lênhai keimarna hmun hung nîng a ta, Lalpa
A naunuhmeihai rama umhai chu kâwl hnâma sukhlum nîng an ta,
Lalpa
Rama i naunuhmei umhai chu ama chun kâwlhnâmin that a ta; kul bâwl khum a ti che a; hnuoi dêngpâwng khum a ti che a, phaw chawihai inhuol khumtir a ti che.
I kul chu epin a kâpna khâwlhai chu rem a ta; i in insânghai chu a hreipuihaiin sukchim a tih.

A sakawrhai tam lei chun pilvut chun hung inkhum an ti che a; khawpuia lûtna siema uma, mihai an lût anga, i dâi kawtkhârhaia chun a hung lût pha chun sakawr tawlailîrhai, tawlailîrhai le sakawr chung chuong mihai ri chun i kul bang chu inhnîng a ta.
A sakawrhai ketinhai chun i kawtthlêrhai po po hung chîl a ta; i mihai chu kâwlhnâmin that a ta, i hrâtna bulpui lungphunhai khawm chu hnuoi chungah tlûng an tih.

I hausaknahai chu râllâk sumah siem an ta, i sumdâwngna thilhai khawm chu lâng an tih; i kulhai chu hung suksieng an ta, i in inhawitak takhai chu sukse bawk an ta, i lunghai, i thinghai i thil nawihai chenin tuihai laia chun sieng an tih.
Chuongchun, lungpui fil ruouah siem ka ti cheu a, lênhai keimarna hmun hung nîng i tih; chun, bâwl khawm ni nâwk ta naw ti ni; kei
“Lalpa

Tuipuia lalhai po po chu an lalṭhungphahaia inthawk chun ṭhung thlâng an ta, an lal puonhai chu sieng an ta, an silfên cheimawihai chu hlîp an ta, anni chu inthinnain inthuom tâng an tih; leihnuoi chungah ṭhung an ta, ieng lai khawmin inthin an ta, nangma chu mak tîng an ti che.
‘Khawpui hmingthang, tuipuia chêng mihai ihluo,
Ama le a hluotuhai khawm tuipuia hrât,
A hluotuhai po po chunga an ṭiumna inumtir thei hiel chu,
Iengtiziea suksieta um el am i ni ta leh!
I tlûkna nia chun thlierkârhai chu inthin ngei an tih,
Anih, i fe hmang tâk lei chun tuipuia thlierkârhai chu beidawng an tih,’ tîng an tih.
“Lalpa

Chun, tienlaia mihai vânsama ṭumhai kuoma chun ṭhuoi ka ti che a, vânsama lo fe thla tahai lai, tienlaia inthawka râusana um tah hmuna hai, leihnuoi hnuoi tieng panga chêng dingin siem ka ti che a; hluo ni ta ngai hrim hrim naw ti ni; chun, mi hring rama chun i ropuina chu sie bawk ta naw ning;
“Nang mihriem naupa, Tura ta dingin sûnna hla siem la,
Tura kuoma chun, Aw nang tuipui lûtnaa chênga, thlierkâr tamtakhai kuoma hnamhai dâwrkaitu, Lalpa
Nang aw Tura, ‘Mâwinaa chun ka famkim an nâwm,’ i ti a.
I ramrihai chu tuipuihai rila chun a um a,
Nanga lo bâwltuhai che chun i mâwina an lo sukfamkim ngei el che,
I thingphêkhai chu an siem, Senir fâr thing vawngin,
I lawngngulhai dingin Lebanon sidar thinghai an lâk a.
I lawngzâpna an siem Basan thingsaisuohaiin,
I ṭuong chu Kittima thing tlo chi saihaa tuomkhumin.
Nangma inchikna bîk a nina dingin
I puonzâr chu Aigupta mi puonzai inhmi ṭiel a nih.
I inchung chu Elisa thlierkâra inthawka dumpâwl le sendukin.
