Zidon le Arvada chênghai chu i lawngkartu an na,
I
I Lawngpuhai an nih.
Gebala upahai le mi varhai chu,
I sûnga chun i lawng siemtu an na,
Tuipui lawng lienhai po po le an lawngpuhai chu
I sûngah an um, i sumdâwngna thilhai thleng vêl dingin.
“Persia le Lud le Put mihai chu, i sipai pâwl indo mihai chu an nih; anni chun nangmaa chun thîrlukhum le phaw chu an khai a, i ngainobeina chu an târlang a nih.
Arvad
Hausakna tinrêng tam leiin Tarsis chu i sumdâwngtu a na; tangkaruo le, thîr le rângva le, suonin i chan dingin an sumdâwng a.
Javan, Tubal le Mesek chu i sumdâwngtu an na, mihriemahai le, dârsen bûr le bêlhaiin i sum dingin an sumdâwng a.
Togarma sûngkuohai chu i chan dingin sakawrhai, indona sakawrhai le sabengtung lien chi haiin an sumdâwng a.
Dedan mihai chu i sumdâwngtuhai an ni bawk a; thlierkâr tamtakhai chu i kuta sumdâwngna thilhai chu an na; thalhrit le saiha kihai chu an hung thlengpêk che a.
I kutsuok thil tam leiin Suria
Juda le Israel ram chu i sumdâwngtuhai an na, i thuomhnaw dingin, Minnith bu le, pannag leh, khuoizu le hriek le, thinghnai damdawiin an sumdâwng a.
I kut sinthaw tam lei le, hausakna chi tinrêng tam leiin, Damaska khawm chu i sumdâwngtu a na; sahmul var chi le Helbon uoin chun a sumdâwng a.
Vedan le Javan khawm chu i thuomhnaw dingin Uzal uoinin an sumdâwng a, i sumdâwngna thuomhnaw lai chun thîr tle mi dâm, thingzungthak dâm, mafu dâm an ṭhang a.
Dedan chu chuongpha puon hlutak takhaia i sumdâwngtu a nih.
Arabia le Kedar lalhai po po chu i kuta sumdâwngtuhai an na; berâmtehai, berâmhai, kêlhaiin, hienghaia hin i sumdâwngtuhai an nih.
Seba le Raama sumdâwngtuhai chu i sumdâwngtuhai an na; i thuomhnaw dingin rângkachak dâm, lung hluhai po po dâmin, riminhnik bîk taktakhai dâmin an sumdâwng a.
Haran le, Kanne le Eden, Seba sumdâwngtuhai chu, Assur le Kilmad leh i sumdâwngtuhai an nih.
Hienghai hi thuomhnaw dittuihai a dumpâwl fûn le, cheimawihai le, sidara siem, hruihaia khuop silfên hlu bâwmhai le, i sumdâwngna thilhai laia sumdâwngtuhai chu an na.
Tarsis lawnglienhai chu i dâwr thuomhnaw phurtuhai an nih:
Nang chu hluosip nâwka umin tuipuihai lairila chun ropuitaka siemin i um a,
I lawngkartuhai chun tui nasataka chun an hung ṭhuoi che a,
Sak thli chun tuipuihai lairila chun a suksiet che a.
I hausaknahai, i thuomhnawhai, i dâwrsumhai, i lawngpuhai,
I ṭhuoituhai, i lawng remtuhai, i dâwrsum thleng vêltuhai,
I indo mihai i sûnga um po pohai,
I sûnga i pâwlhai um po pohai le chun,
I sietna nia chun tuipui lairila chun tlâng in tih.
I lawngpuhai khêk ri chun a vêl mihai inthin an tih.
Lawngkarna cheltuhai po po le lawngpuhai le
Tuipuia lawng puhai po po chu,
An lawnghaia inthawk hung thlâng an ta, hnuoiah hung ngîr an ta;
An râwlhai chu i chunga hriet dingin siem an ta,
Lungna takin ṭap an tih.
Chun, an lu chunga chun pilvutin inthêkhum an ta,
Vuta chun anni chu inbuol an tih.
I ta dingin invâwkawl an ta, saiip puonin inthuom an ta,
Rinumtitaka sûna, lungrila natitakin ṭâng an ti che!
An ṭapinrûm chun ṭap hla insamin
Nangma chu sûn an ti che a,
‘Tura anga tuipuia to ṭawka um dinga siem hi tu am an um a?
I thuomhnawhai chu tuipuia inthawka a fe suok lai chun
Hnam tamtakhai chu i suksip a;
I dâwrsum le i hausaknahai chun hnuoia lalhai chu i sukhausa ta a,
Tui inthûkhaia tuipuihaiin a suksiet lai che khan,
I dâwrsumhai, i pâwlhai po po i sûnga mi chu nangma leh an tlum ta a.
Thlierkâr hluotuhai po po chu nangmaa chun mak an ti a,
An lalhai chu nasatakin an ṭi a, an hmêl khawm a buoi zo a.
Nangma chu ṭium i lo ni ta a, iengtika khawm um nâwk ta naw ti nih,’ ” tiin.
ngai ta, Daniel nêkin i var lem a nih; nangmaa inthawka thup thei ding thurûk hrim hrim a um naw a,
i varna lei le i hrietthiemna leiin hausaknahai în siempêk a, i ro inhaia chun rângkachak le tangkahai i nei a,
I varna nasatak le i sumdâwngnaa chun i hausaknahai chu i sukpung a, i hausakna lei chun i lungril chu a lo insâng ta a,
chuleiin, Lalpa
chuleiin, ngai ta, i chungah mikhuolhai ka hung ṭhuoi ding a nih, hnamhai ṭisimtak el chu; i varna mawina chunga chun an kâwlhnâmhai chu phawi an ta; i tlêtna chu sukpawrchêng an tih.
Khur sûnga chun la thlâng an ti che a, thata um tahai thîna anga chun, tuipui lairila chun thîng i tih.
Nangma sukhlumtu che hmaa chun, ‘Pathien chu ka nih,’ i la ti rawp ding am a nih? Mihriem chau i ni si a, Pathien ni lo, nangma inhliemtu che kuta chun.
Mikhuolhai kuta chun sertanlohai thi angin thîng i ta, keiin ka lo hril ta si a, Lalpa
Chu nawa khawm chun
“Mihriem naupa, Tura lal ta dingin sûnna hla siem la, a kuoma chun, Lalpa
Ṭha famkim, varnaa sip le mawinaa famkim i na,
Pathien huon Edena chun i lo um ta a;
Lunghlu tinrênghai chu i în khumna a na,
Hieng sardion dâm,
topaz dâm, rubi lung dâm, onik dâm, jaspi dâm,
Sapphir dâm, karbankle dâm, lunghlu dang dang le,
Rângkachakhai, an inṭhutna le ziek kermawihai,
Kut themthiema siemhai chu i sûnga chun an um a.
Nang chu siema i um ni chun chuonghai chu buotsai an ni ve a.
Cherub hrieknâla um, zârkhumtu chu i na,
Kân umtir che a, Pathien tlâng inthienga chun i um a,
Mei lunghai laia chun a suk a tungin i lo inlawn ta a:
Felnâwna nangmaa hmu suok a ni hmakhat khan chu,
Siema i um nia inthawk khan i lampuia chun i ṭhafamkim hlak a.
I sumdâwngna thil tam taluot leiin,
I sûng chu inpâwngnêknain an suksip ta a;
Thil i suksuol a, chuleiin, sukpawrchea um angin,
Pathien tlânga inthawk chun ka hnawt suok ta che a,
Ka suksiet ta che a nih, aw inkhumtu cherub,
Mei lunghai laia chun ka suksiet che a nih.
I mâwina leiin i lungril a lo insâng ta a,
I tlêtna lei chun i varna chu i lo suksiet ta a,
Hnuoiah ka pei thlawr che a,
An hmu theina ding chein lalhai hmaa chun kân zâltir che a nih.
I sumdâwngnaa fel nâwnaa suolna tam leiin,
I hmun inthienghai chu i lo sukpawrche ta a;
Chuleiin, i sûnga inthawk mei ka hung lâk suok a,
A kâng hmang che a, hnuoia pilvutah kân changtir che a,
Nangma entuhai po po che mithmua chun,
Hnamhai laia nanga hretuhai po po che chun maktîng an ta,
Nang chu mi ṭîsim i ni ta a, um khawm um nâwk ta naw ti nih,” tiin.
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Sidon tieng chun i hmai innghat la, a chungah thu hril rawh,
hieng hin ti la, Lalpa
Ngai ta, aw Sidon, ka dodâl che a nih,
I sûnga chun ka ropuina suklang ka tih:
Chuongchun,
Amaa ka rorêlnahai chu ka sukpuitling a,
Ama ka sukthieng pha chun;
A kawtthlêrhaia chun thisen le hripuihai ka hung tir ding a ni si a,
Chun, a hliemhai chu sîr tinah an chunga kâwlhnâmhai leh tlûng an tih.
Chun,
“Chun, Israel sûngkuoa chun a suntu hling um ta naw ni a, an sîr vêla hling buoipuiumhai anni sukhmingse dinghai chu um ta naw ni a, chun, Lalpa
“Lalpa
Kum sâwmna, thla sâwmna, chu thlaa ni sâwmpahni ni chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta lal Pharao tieng chun i hmai innghat la, Aigupta ram po po le, ama chunga chun thu hril la,
hieng hin ti rawh; Lalpa
‘Ngai ta, Aigupta lal Pharao,
Rûlpui a vadungpuihai laia bawk a,
Ka vadungpui hi keia ta bîk a na,
Keima ta dingin ka siem tah,’ titu, ka dodâl che a nih.
I khâka chun ngakuoihaiin inkuoitir ka ta,
I vadungpuia ngahai chu i phuhlipa chun inkawptir tâwl ka tih;
Chuongchun, i phuhlipa kawp i vadungpuia i ngahai po po le chun,
I vadungpuia inthawk chun hung la suok ka ti che a.
Thlalêra chun peihâwna umin mâksan ka ti che,
Nang le i vadungpuia ngahai po po le chun;
Ram hmun âwng chunga chun tlâng i ta,
Lâk khâwm ni ta naw ti ni a,
phûm khawm ni ta naw ti nih.
Hnuoia ramsahai le chunglêng vatehai ta dingin,
Bu dingin ka pêk ta che a nih.
I kuta an chel lai che chu în tleng dawk a, an liengkohai po po i sukthlêrpêk a; chun, an innghai pha che khawma, în tâwl hmang a, an kâwnghai chu inhnîng
Chuleiin, Lalpa
Chun, Aigupta ram chu ram sie le râusan hung ni tâng a ta; ama chun, Vadungpui chu ka ta a na, keia siem a nih, a ti tâk lei khan,
Chuleiin, ngai ta, ka dodâl che a nih; i vadungpuihai khawm chu; Aigupta ram chu se letdêr le râusanah Suene in insânga inthawka Ethiopia ramri chenin ka siem ding a nih.
Mihriem ke chun fethleng ta naw ni a, sa ke khawm chu fethleng ta bawk naw ni; chun, kum sâwmli sûng chu hluoin um bawk ta naw nih.

Aigupta ram chu ram râusana umhai laia chun râusanah siem ka ta, a khawpuihai khawm chu suksieta um khawpuiahai kum sâwmli sûng chu râusanin um a tih; chun, Aigupta mihai chu hnamhai laia chun sukdar ka ta, rambunghaia chun anni chu sukdar ka tih.
Lalpa
chun, Aigupta sal nina chu hung intlungtir nâwk ka ta, an piengna Pathros rama chun inkîrtir nâwk ka ta; chutaka chun lalram inhnuoi nîng an tih.
Lalrama chun ân hnuoi tak nîng a ta; hnamhai chunga chun ama le ama chu indawm sâng ngai ta naw ni a; hnamhai chunga ro an rêl nâwk ta nawna dingin anni chu suktlâwm ka tih.
Anni chu enkawl dinga an hung kîr pha, suolna chu hriet zing dinga siemin, Israel sûngkuoa chun ringumna hrim um ta naw ni a; chun, Lalpa
Kum sâwmhni pasarina, thla hmasatakah, chu thlaa ni khat ni chun,

“Mihriem naupa, Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar chun Tura dodâlin a sipai pâwlhai chu rawngbâwlna nasatakin sin ân thawtir a; lusîp tin chu a kawl a, liengko tin chu ân khawk bawk a; ama dodâla a sinthawnaah Turaa inthawkin, ama le a sipaihai khawm chun hlaw iengkhawm an hmu naw a;
chuleiin, Lalpa
Keia ta dinga sin an lo thaw ta leiin, a sinthaw mana thungna ding chun Aigupta ram chu ka pêk tah a nih, Lalpa
“Chu nia chun Israel sûngkuoa chun ki hung inder suok dingin thâwng ka ta, anni laia chun bau kâkna chu pêng ka ti che a; chun,
“Mihriem naupa, hril la, hieng hin hril rawh, Lalpa
Ṭapinrûm unla, chungrikna ni chu!
Sûm zingna ni,
Hnamhai sietna ni chu nîng a tih.
Aigupta chunga chun kâwlhnâm chu hung a ta,
Ethiopiaa chun tuorna nasatak um a tih;
Aiguptaa mi thata umhai an tlûk pha chun,
A mipuihai chu la hmang an ta,
A lungphûmhai khawm chu sukchim nîng a tih.
Ethiopia, Put le Lud mi chi inpawlhai chu,
Kus mihai leh, ram ṭhangruolhai mihai chu anni le chun kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih.
Aigupta chelngirtuhai khawm chu tlûng an ta;
A thilthawtheina chapona khawm hung inhnuoi a tih;
Migdola inthawka Suene
Lalpa
Ram râusana umhai sûnga chun râusanin um vêng an ta,
A khawpuihai khawm chu khawpui suksieta umhai laia chun ṭhang vêng a tih.
Aigupta rama chun mei ka sêm a,
A ṭhangpuituhai po po sukbohmanga an um vawng pha chun,
“Lalpa
Ama le, a kuoma a mihai, hnamhai ṭisim chu ram sukse dinga hung ṭhuoilût nîng an ta, Aigupta chu doin an kâwlhnâmhai phawi an ta, ram chu mi thatin suksip an tih.
Chun, vadungpuihai khawm chu sukkangchat ka ta, ram chu mi rilohai kutah zawr ka tih; mikhuolhai kut hmangin ram le a sûnga umhai po po chu râusanah siem ka tih, kei
“Lalpa
Pathros chu râusanah siem ka ta, Zoana chun mei hung sêm ka ta, Noa rorêlnahai chu sukpuitling ka tih.
Chun, ka lunginsenna chu Sin chunga chun hung bunthlâng ka ta, Aigupta kul dettak chu; Noa mihai chu sât thlâng ka tih.
Aigupta rama chun mei hung tîng ka ta, Sin chu rinum nasatakin um a ta; Noa chu suksietin um a tih; chun, Noph chu lunginzîngtakin ni tin um a tih.
Aven le Pi-beseth tlangvâlhai chu kâwlhnâmin tlûng an ta, chun, hieng khawpuihai hi sala ṭhuoiin um an tih.

Tehaphnehesa chun ni chu hung inthim a ta, chu pha chun Aigupta rîngkawlhai chu suktliek ka ta, amaa chun a thilthawtheina chapona chu tâwp tâng a tih; ama chu sûmpuiin hung inkhum a ta, a naunuhmeihai chu salah fêng an tih.
Chuong ang tak chun Aiguptaa chun rorêlna chu sukpuitling ka ta; chun,
Kum sâwmpakhatna, thla khatna, chu thla a ni sarinaa chun,
Babulon lal kuthai chu sukhrât ka ta, ka kâwlhnâm chu a kutah sieng ka tih; nisienlakhawm, Pharao bânhai chu suktliek ka ta, ama hmaa chun mi thi khawp raua hliem inrûmin inrûm a tih.
Chun, Aigupta mihai chu hnamhai laia chun sukdar ka ta, rambunghaia chun hnawt dar ka tih; chun,
Kum sâwmpakhatna, thla thumna, chu thlaa ni khat ni chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta lal Pharao le a mipuihai kuoma chun hi hi hril rawh;
I ropuinaa hin tu ang am i na?
Ngai ta, Assuria chu Lebanona thingkau ṭha tak nei,
Buk hlim nei, dung tieng insâng
A lêrzîk khawm chu kâu inbuk tak laia chun a um a.
Tuihai chun ama chu a châwm a, li inthûk chun ân ṭhangtir a,
A phunna sîr vêla chun a vadunghai chu a luong a,
A tui luongnahai chu lova thing tin kuoma chun a tir a.
Chuongchun, ân sângzie chu lova thing po pohai chunga chawisângin a um a,
A kauhai chu a tam a, a zârhai chu tui tam lei chun,
An hung inzar suok sei tâwl a.
A zârhai hnuoia chun rama ramsahai po po chun têhai an nei a,
A hlim hnuoiah hnam ropuihai po po chu an chêng ta a.
A kâuhai seizie le a ropuinaa chun chuong anga mâwi chu a na,
A zung chu tui tamtaka chun a um si a.
Fâr thinghaiin a kau khawm an tluk nawh,
Insethingin a zâr khawm a tluk naw a,
A mâwinaa chun ama ang Pathien huonah thing hrim a um nawh.
A zârhai tam lei chun ka siem mawi a,
Chu lei chun, Pathien huona um
Edena thing po pohai chun ama an îtthîk a.
“Chuleichun, Lalpa
hnamhai laia mi thilthawtheitak kutah ama chu pe suok ka ta; ama chu sawisa ngei a ta, a rîtlona lei chun ama chu ka hnawt suok tah a nih.

Ram dang mi hnamhai ṭisimhai chun, ama chu an sât thlâk a, ama chu an mâksan ta a; tlâng chungahai le phairuom po poahai chun a kâuhai chu an tla a, a kâuhai po po chu rama tui luongnahai chun an suktliek bawk a; hnuoia hnam tinhai chu a hlima inthawk chun an fe thla a, an mâksan ta a.
Suksieta a umnaa chun chunglêng vatehai po po chu chêng an ta, ram hnuoia sahai po po khawm chu a kâuhai chunga chun um an tih;

a tâwpa chun tuihai kâwla thinghai po po chun an insâng leiin anni le anni inchawimawi ta ngai naw ni hai a, a kâubuk satak laia chun an lêrzîk khawm chu sie ta bawk naw ni hai a, tui dâwn ta po po chu, an thilthawtheihai chu an insâng ang chun ngîr ta naw bawk an tih; vânsama fe thla tahai, mihriem nauhai laia chun, leihnuoi hnuoi tienga chun anni chu thina kuoma pêk an ni ta si a.
“Lalpa

Vânsama ṭum tahai laia, hremhmuna ka pei thlâk lai chun, a tlûkna ria chun hnamhai chu ka sukthin a; Eden thing po po Lebanona thing ṭhatak le ditumhai, tui lo dâwn tahai po po chu hnuoi khingtieng panga chun sukhlimin an um a.
Kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai kuomah, ama ruolin hremhmuna chun an fe thla ve a; anih, a bân lo ni taa, hnamhai laia a buk hlim hnuoia lo chêng tahai chu.

“Edena thinghai laia hin ropuina le mawinaah ieng le hin am in inang a? Hnuoi khingtieng panga chun Eden thinghai le chun nang chu sukhnuoi i la ni ding a nih; kâwlhnâma thata lo um tah, sertan lohai laia chun i zâl ve ding a nih; Hi hi Pharao le a mipuihai chu an nih, Lalpa
Kum sâwmpahnina, thla sâwmpahnina, chu thlaa ni khat ni chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta lal Pharao ta dingin sûnna hla siem la, a kuoma chun hril rawh;
Nang chu hnamhai lai chun sakeibaknei vânglaiah în ngai a,
Amiruokchu, tuipuia rûlpui ang chu i nih;
I vadungpuihaia chun i hung inper a,
I kehaiin tuihai chu i hung chawkvir a,
An vadungpuihai chu i hung suksiet ta a.
Lalpa
Mipui tamtakhai le chun i chungah ka lên hung keiphar kan ta,
Ka lêna chun hung fûn dawk kan ti che.
Chun, hnuoi chungah mâksan ka ti che a,
Ram palailakah peihâwn ka ti che a;
Chunglêng vatehai po po chu i chungah in umtir ka ta,
Nangmaa chun hnuoi pumpuia ramsahai chu suktlai ka tih.
Tlânghaia chun i sa
Phairuomhai chu i nge in
Chun, în hlieuna ram chu tlânghai chen rauin i thisenin buok ka ta,
Tui luongnahai chu nangmaa suksipin um an tih.
Vân chu inkhum ka ta,
Arasihai chu inthimtir ka tih.
Nisa chu sûmin inkhum ka ta, thla khawma a varna insuo naw nih.
Vâna thil var tlêhai po po chu i chunga chun sukthim ka ta,
I ram chunga chun inthim inlêngtir ka tih
Lalpa
“Rambung i hriet ngailohai laia, hnamhai laia i bohmangna kân tlungtir pha chun, hnam tamtakhai lungrilhai chu suklungsen ka tih.

Anih, hnam tamtakhai chu nangmaa chun mak intitir ka ta, nangma leiin an lalhai chu nasatakin ṭîng an tih, an hma ngeia ka kâwlhnâm kân let pha chun; inthin zing an ta, i tlûk ni chun mi tin chu mâni hringna ding sengin inthin an tih.
Lalpa
Mi thilthawthei tak kâwlhnâmhaia chun i mipuihai chu intlûktir ka tih; hnamhai ṭisimhai chu an ni vawng a;
Aigupta chapona chu suksieng an ta,
A mipuihai po po sukbohmang ni bawk an tih.
Tui tamtakhai kâwla ramsahai po po khawm chu sukbohmang ka ta,
Mihriem ke chun anni chu sukbuoi ta ngai naw ni hai a,
Ramsa ketinhai khawm chun anni chu sukbuoi ta naw bawk an tih.
“Chun, an tuihai chu hung sukvâr ka ta,
An vadung tuihai chu hriek angin inluongtir ka tih, Lalpa
Aigupta ram chu suksiet le râusan le,
Ram hausa, sukruoka umah ka siem a,
Chutaka umhai chu an rênga ka hrem pha chun,
“Hi hi ṭap hla an isûnna ding chu a nih; chu chun hnam tin naunuhmeihai chun sûn an ta, Aigupta le a mipuihai po po ta dingin sûn an tih, Lalpa
Kum sâwmpahnina, chu thla
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta mipui ta ding chun ṭap inrûm la, vânsama lo fe thla tahai le chun, hnuoi khingtieng panga chun, hnam hming inthangtak tak naunuhmeihai le, ama leh pei thla rawh.
Mawinaa hin tu am i khêl a? Fe thla la, sertan lohai laia chun zâl rawh.
Kâwlhnâma thata umhai laia chun tlu vêng an ta, kâwlhnâm kuoma chun pêk a ni ta a, ama le a mipuihai po po le chun hnûk hmang rawh.
Mi hrât khawkhêng laia mi hrât chun hremhmuna inthawk chun, ama ṭhangpuituhai le chun lo bieng an ta; an fe thla ta a, an zâl zing a; chuong sertanlo, kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai chu.
Assuria chu a pâwlhai leh chutaka chun a um a; a thlânhai chu ama vêlahai po po chun a um a; an rêng chun kâwlhnâma lo tlu tah, thata lo um tah an nih;
chuonghai thlânhai chu vânsam kilkhâwrtakahai chun siein a um a, an rêng chun kâwlhnâma lo tlu tah, thata lo um tah, mi hringhai rama ṭitumna lo inumtirtuhai chu an nih.

Elam khawm chu a mipuihai po po leh a thlân sîrvêlahai chun an um a; an rêng chun kâwlhnâma lo tlu tah, thata lo um tahai, hnuoi khingtieng panga sertan lova lo fe thla ta a, mi hring rama chun an ṭitumna chu lo inumtir ta a, vânsama fe tahai le an inzakna chu lo phur tahai chu an nih.

A pâwlhai po po leh thata lo um tahai laia chun a khum chu an lo daw ta a; an thlânhai chu ama sîrvêlahai chun a um a; an rêng el chun sertanlo, kâwlhnâma lo tlu tahai an nih; an ṭitumna chu mi hring rama chun inumtirin a lo um ta a, vânsama lo fe tahai le chun an inzakna chu an phur a; thata lo um tahai laia chun ama chu sie a lo ni ta a.
Mesek le Tubal le an mipuihai po po leh an um a, an thlânhai chu a sîrvêlahai chun a um a, an rêng el chun sertanlo, kâwlhnâma lo tlu tah an na, mi hring rama chun an ṭitumna chu an lo inumtir ta a.

Anni chu mi thilthawtheihai, sertanlova lo tlu taa, an indona hriemhreihai le hremhmuna lo fe thla taa, an luhai hnuoia an kâwlhnâmhai lo siea, an suolnahai chu an ruhaia umhai laia chun anni chu zâl ve naw ni hai a; mi hring rama chun mi hrâthai ṭisimhai chu an lo ni ta si a.
Nisienlakhawm, nang chu sertanlohai laia chun suknawi nîng i ta, kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai laia chun zâl vêng i tih.
Edom chu a um a, a lalhai le a rorêltuhai po po chu an thilthawtheinain kâwlhnâma lo tlu tahai laia chun inzâltirin an um a; anni chu sertanlohai laia chun zâl an ta, vânsama lo fe tahai laia chun.

Hmârtienga rorêltuhai an rêngin, Zidon mihai po po leh, thata umhai laia lo fe thla tahai chu an um a; an thilthawtheinaa ṭitumnahai an lo inumtirhai po poa chun an inzak a; kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai le chun sertan lovin an zâl ta a, chun, vânsama lo fe tahai le chun an inzakna chu an phur a.
Pharao chun anni chu hmûng a ta, a mipuihai po po chunga chun ama chu thlamuong a tih; Pharao le a sipai pâwl kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai po po ngei kha, Lalpa
Mi hring rama chun a ṭitumna chu ka sie ta si a; kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai laia chun, sertan lohai kuoma chun inzâltirin um a tih; Pharao le a mipuihai po po ngei chu, Lalpa

“Mihriem naupa, i chipui thlahai kuoma chun thu hril la, an kuomah hieng hin ti rawh: ‘Ram chunga chun kâwlhnâm ka hung intlungtir pha, rama mihai chun anni laia mi an lâk a, an ta dinga vêngtu anga an sie chun;
ram chunga chun kâwlhnâm chu a hung tlung phaa a lo hmu chun tawtawrâwt mût sienla, mipuihai chu vaulâwk raw se;
tukhawma tawtawrâwt ri chu hrea, vaulâwkna pawisa lo chu, kâwlhnâm chu a hung tlung a, ama chu lâk hmang a ni chun, a thisen chu ama lu chunga ngei chun um a tih.
Tawtawrâwt ri chu a hriet a, nisienlakhawm, vaulâwkna chu a pawisa naw a; a thisen chu ama chunga chun um a tih, vaulâwkna chu lo pawisa ni sien chu a nun chu a sanhim ding a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, vêngtu chun kâwlhnâm hung tlung chu a hmu a, tawtawrâwt a mût naw a, mipuihai chu vaulâwk an ni naw a, kâwlhnâm chu a hung tlung a, anni laia mi tukhawm chu a lâk hmang chun; a suolnaa chu lâk hmang a na; amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu vêngtu kuta chun phût ka tih,’ tiin.
Chuongchun, nang mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo ta ding chun vêngtuah ka sie ta che a nih; chuleiin, ka baua thu chu hre la, anni chu keimaa inthawka vaulâwkna chu pe rawh.

Mi rilo kuoma chun, ‘Aw mi rilo, i thi ngei ding a nih,’ ka ti a, mi rilo chu a um dân bânsan dinga vaulâwkna thu i hril si naw chun mi rilo chu ama suolnaa chun thîng a ta, amiruokchu, a thisen maw chu nangmaa chun ka phût ding a nih.

“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hieng hin hril rawh, ‘Hieng ang hin in ti a; Ei bâwsietnahai le ei suolnahai chu ei chungah a um a, annia chun ei riral hmang a ni hi, iengtin am hring ei ta?’ tiin.

Chun, nang mihriem naupa, i chipuihai thlahai kuoma chun hieng hin hril rawh; mi fel felna chun ama chu a bâwsietna nia chun sanhim naw ni a; mi rilo rîtlona thua chun, a rîtlonaa inthawka a hung kîr nia chun a rîtlonaa chun tlu naw nih; chun, mi fel chu a suksuolna nia chun a felnain hring bawk naw nih.

Mi fel kuoma chun a hring ngei ding a ni ka ti pha chun, a felna chu a ring a, suolna a thaw chun, a thil thaw felhai chu a ieng khawm hriet zing ni naw ni a; amiruokchu, a suolna a lo thaw taa chun thîng a tih.
Chun, mi rilo kuomah, ‘I thi ngei ding a nih,’ ka ti ve a; ama chu a suolnaa inthawk chun a hung kîr a, ân dik le dân thil chu a thaw chun;
mi rilo chun bathai chu a thung a, arûka a lâk tahai chu a pêk nâwk a, nun dân thuruot chu a hraw a, thil a suksuol naw chun, hring ngei ngei a ta, thi naw nih.
Ama chunga chun thil a lo suksuol tahai hrim hrim a ieng khawm chu hriet zing ni ta naw ni a; ân dik le dân thil chu a lo thaw tâk lei chun a hring ngei ding a nih.
Amiruokchu, i chipui thlahai chun, ‘Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng naw a,’ an ti chun, anni chungthua ruok chun, anni lampui chu ân ang vawng naw lem a.
Mi fel chu a felnaa inthawka ân herhmanga thil suol a thaw chun, chutaka chun a thi ngei ding a nih.
Chun, mi rilo chu a rîtlonaa inthawka ân her hmanga, ân dik le dân thil chu a thaw chun, chutaka bawk chun hring a tih.
Amiruokchu, ‘Lalpa lampui chu ân ang vawng nawh,’ in la ti rawp chun, Aw Israel sûngkuo, mi tin chu ama lampuihai ang sengin, a chungah rorêl ka tih,” tiin.
Chun, chu hung tlân suok hung hma, zântieng chun
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel rama hmun se tahai hluotuhai chun thu an hril a, ‘Abraham chu pakhat chau a na, ram chu a lo hluo ta a; eini hlak chu tamtak ei na, ram chu hluo dinga pêk ei ni tho a,’ tiin.
Chuleiin, an kuoma chun, Lalpa
In kâwlhnâm chu in ring a, thil pawrche chu in thaw a, mi tinin mâni tuolbâwm nuhmeihai chu in sukpawrche a; ram chu in chang hrim ding am a nih?
Hieng hin an kuoma chun hril rawh; Lalpa
Ram chu râusanah siem ka ta, maktia um ding leh; a thilthawtheina chapona chu re tâng a ta, Israel tlânghai chu râusan ni tâng a ta, tukhawm fethleng ta naw ni hai.
An thil pawrche lo thaw tahai po po leia ram chu râusan le maktia um dinga ka siem pha chun,

“Nangma chungthua chu, mihriem naupa, i chipuihai thlahai chu bang hrûla le in kawtkhârhaia chun nanga chanchin an hril a, anni le anni an inbiek a, mi tinin a unau kuoma chun, ‘La hung ta, ka ngên che hi,

Mipuihai chu an hung angin i kuoma chun anni chu an hung a, ka mihai angin i hmaa chun an ṭhung a, i thuhai chu an ngai a, amiruokchu, thaw si lovin; an bau chun nasatakin hmangaina an inlangtir a, amiruokchu, an lungrilhai chun an hlâwkna chu a hnawt si a.
Ngai ta, an ta ding chun nang chu mi pakhat râwl ṭhatak neia, thil sutmihai sut thiem mi hla ditumtak ang
Chun, hi hi a hung tlung pha chun, (ngai ta, a hung tlung mêk) anni lai chun zâwlnei a lo um zing a nih, ti hre tâng an tih,” tiin.
Chun,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel berâmpuhai chungah thu hril la, thu hril la, berâmpuhai kuom ngeia chun, an kuoma chun hril rawh; Lalpa
Thâu chu in fâk a, sahmulin in inthuom a; châwm thâuhai chu in that a; nisienlakhawm, berâmhai chu in châwm naw a.

A hrât naw chu in sukhrât naw a, a na khawm chu in sukdam bawk naw a; a tliek khawm chu in tuom naw a, khal hmanga um ta khawm chu in hung ṭhuoi nâwk bawk nawh, ân hmang khawm chu in zawng bawk nawh; amiruokchu, thawluina le, hrohrângsetakin an chungah ro in rêl a.
Ka berâmhai chu tlâng po po le muol insâng tinahai chun an invâk a; anih, ka berâmhai chu leihnuoi pumpui chunga chun an indar tah a ni hi; mi tukhawm anni chu zawnga hmusuok tum an um si nawh.
Chuleiin, nangni berâmpuhai,
Lalpa
chuleiin, nangni berâmpuhai,
Lalpa
“Lalpa

Berâmpu chun sûnah a berâm ruol chu a zawng a, berâm a lo indarhai laia chun a um hlak angin, ka berâmhai chu zawng suok ka ta; inthim le sûmzîng nia an lo invâk darna hmunhai po poa inthawk chun anni chu zawng suok ka tih.

Hnamhai laia inthawk chun hung ṭhuoi suok ka ta, rambunghaia inthawk chun kei khâwm ka ta, anni ram ngeia chun ṭhuoi lût ka tih; chun, Israel tlâng chungahai le, tui luongna sîrahai le, chu ram, hluoa a umna hmun po poahai chun anni chu intlattir ka tih.

Hlo pet ding ṭhatak chun anni chu châwm ka ta, Israel insângna tlâng chungahai chun an in chu um a tih; in ṭhatak sûnga chun bawk an ta, Israel tlâng chungahai chun hlo petna hmun tuihnâitaka chun tlâng an tih.
Lalpa
Chun, nangni thua chu, Aw ka berâm ruol, Lalpa

Hlo pet ding ṭha hmuna tlat chu in ta ding chun thil chînthamah ân lang thei a, nisienlakhawm, in hlo pet mahlahai chu in kehaiin in sirde naw ding am a nih? Tui inthiengtakhai hang dâwn ding khawm chun a mahla chu in kehai chun in pal siet naw ding am a nih?
Chun, ka berâm ruolhai chun, in kehaia in sir chen ta hnunghai chu an fâk a, in kehaiin a lo pal siet tahai chu an dâwn bawk a ni hi.
“Chuleichun, Lalpa
Liengko le sîrin in hneng a, in sukdar phier hmakhat chun in kihai chun a damnawhai chu in sik leiin,
An chunga chun berâmpu pakhat sieng ka ta, ka siehlaw David ngei chu, ama chun anni chu châwm a ta, an ta dingin berâmpu nîng a tih.
Anni le inremna thuthlung siem ka ta, rama inthawk chun ramsa rilohai chu inrêmtir vawng ka tih; thlalêra chun himtakin chêng an ta, rampui hnuoia chun zâl an tih.
Chun, ka tlâng sîra hmunhai le anni chu malsâwmah siem ka ta; ruohai khawm a huntakah hung insûrtir ka ta; malsâwmna ruohai sûr hlak a tih..

Loa thinghai chun ra hung insuong an ta, leihnuoi khawma a hlâwkna hung insuo bawk a tih; chun, an ram sûnga chun him an ta, an rîngkawl thîrtluonhai ka suktliek a, an rawng an bâwlpêkhai kuta inthawka ka sansuok pha chun
Chun, khawhri be mihai ifâk zoin um ta ngai naw ni hai a, hnuoia ramsahai khawma anni chu fa zo bawk naw ni hai; amiruokchu, himtakin chêng an ta, tukhawma anni chu sukṭi ta naw ni hai.
Anni lai chun hming inthang khawp
Chun, kei
Chun, nangni ka berâmhai, ka hlo petna hmuna berâmhai chu mihriemhai hi in na; chun, kei in Pathien chu ka nih, Lalpa
Chu nawa khawm chun
“Mihriem naupa, Seir tlâng chu i hmai innghat la, a chunga chun thu hril la,
a kuoma chun hieng hin ti rawh: Lalpa
I khawpuihai chu suksietin inumtir ka ta, nang khawm râusanin um i tih; chun,
Hun tâwpa hremna huna, an vângsiet lai hunah Israel thlahai chu kâwlhnâm thilthawtheina kuoma i lo pêk a, anni chu hmêlmâkna rê lo i nei leiin;
ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
Chuongchun, Seir tlâng chu râusan le maktia um dingin siem ka ta; chun, amaa inthawka fe suokhai le, kîr nâwkhai chu sâtthlâng ka tih.
I tlânghai chu a mi thathai chun suksip ka ta; i muolahai, i phairuomahai le i tui luongnahaia chun kâwlhnâma thata umhai chu tlûng an tih.
Kumkhuoa râusanah siem ka ta, i khawpuihai chu hluo ni nâwk ta ngai naw nih; chun,
“Nang chun, ‘Hi hnam hnihai le hi ram pahnihai hi ka ta nîng a ta, nei ka tih,’ i ti leiin, chutaka chun
chuleiin, ka hring zing angin, Lalpa
Chuongchun, ‘Suksietin an um ta a, ei kuomah fâk zo el dingin pêkin an um ta a ni hi,’ tia Israel tlânghai chunga thu i lo hril a, anni i lo demnahai po po chu kei
Chun, i bauin keia chungah nang le nang în chawimawi a, ka chunga i thuhrilhai i sukpung a; ka hriet a nih.
Lalpa
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Israel tlânghai chungah thu hril la, hieng hin hril rawh, Nangni Israel tlânghai,
Lalpa
hril la, hieng hin ti rawh; Lalpa
nangni Israel tlânghai, Lalpa
Lalpa
“Chuleichun, Israel ram chungchâng thua chun thu hril la, tlânghai kuoma dâm, muolhai kuoma dâm, tui luongnahai kuoma dâm, phairuomhai kuoma dâm chun hril la; Lalpa
chuleiin, Lalpa
Nisienlakhawm, nangni, Aw Israel tlânghai, in kauhai chu inzâmdawktir in ta, in rahai chu ka mi Israelhai in pêk ding a nih; hung nghâl el ding an ni si a.
Ngai ta u, kei chu in ta ding ka ni si a; in kuomah hung kîr ka ta, chun, inlet le chîng nîng in tih;
chun, nangniah mihai, Israel sûngkuo po po chu, an rêng elin, sukpung ka ta, khawpuihai chu hluoin um an ta, hmun suksieta um tahai khawm chu siem nîng an tih;

in sûnga chun mihriem le sa khawm sukpung ka ta; pung an ta, ra hlâwk an tih; chun, a hmaa in lo um dân pângngai ang bawk khan hluoa um dingin siem ka ti che a, in um ṭantir lai nêk hman khan in chungah thaw ṭha lem ka tih; chun,

Anih, in chunga chun mihai inlâwntir ka ta, ka mi Israelhai ngei chun nei an ti che a, nang chu an rochan hung nîng i tih; chuongchun, chu chena inthawk chu an thlahai chu thisanin inumtir ta naw ti ni.
Lalpa
chuleiin, mihriem hrim hrim chu fa zo ta ngai naw ti ni a, i hnamhai khawm chu sukrêm ta ngai bawk naw ti ni, Lalpa
chun, hnamhai inzakna chu inhriettir ta ngai bawk naw ning che a, hnamhai kâwkna chu phur ngai ta bawk naw ti ni; chun, i hnamhai chu insuithlu dingin siem nâwk ta ngai bawk naw ti ni, Lalpa
Chu nawa khawm chun

“Mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkuo chu anni ram ngeia an chêng lai khan, an thil thawhai le an lampuihai chun an sukpawrche a; an lampui chu ka kuoma chun nuhmei ân siehran laia ân thieng nawna ang chu a nih.
Chuleiin, ram chunga an lo bunthlâk thisen chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka bunthlâk a; an milimhaia an lo sukpawrche ta leiin;
hnamhai laia chun ka sukdar ta a, rambunghaia chun an lo indar ta a; an um dân ang pei le, an thil thawhai ang peiin an chunga chun ro ka rêl a.
Chun, hnamhai laia an hung chun, an fena tieng tieng ka hming inthieng chu an sukpawrche a; chutaka chun mihai chun, ‘Hienghai hi
Nisienlakhawm, Israel sûngkuohaiin an fena tieng tienga an sukpawrche tah, ka hming inthieng chu ka lunginsiet a.
“Chuleiin, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hieng hin hril la; Lalpa
Chun, ka hming ropuitak chu, hnamhai laia sukpawrchea lo um tah, anni laia in lo sukpawrche ta chu sukthieng ka ta; chuongchun, hnamhai chun
Hnamhai laia inthawk chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu a, rambung po poa inthawkin kei khâwm ka ti cheu a, in rama ngei chun ṭhuoi ka ti cheu.
Tui inthieng chu thinkhum ka ti cheu a, inthieng tâng in tih; in inthiengnawna po poa inthawk le in milimhai po poa inthawkin sukthieng ka ti cheu.
Chun, in inthiengnawna po poa inthawkin sandam ka ti cheu a, chun, bu ko ka ta, sukpung ka ta, in chungah ṭâm inumtir naw ningah.
Thing rahai le hnuoi ra hlâwkhai chu sukpung ka ta, hnamhai laia chun ṭâm leia deusâwna tuok ta ngai naw ti niu.
Hi thil hi nangni leia thaw ka ni nawh ti hi nangni ihriet ni raw se, Lalpa
“Lalpa
A fethlengtuhai mithmua râusana a lo um ta angin, ram râusana lo um ta khawm chu inlet nîng a ta.
Anni chun, ‘Ram râusana lo um ta hi, Eden huon ang a hung ni nâwk a; khawpui se tah, suksieta um taa râusana um tahai khawm chu hluo an ni tah,’ tîng an tih.
Chun, nangni vêla hnam mâksana la umhai po po chun kei
“Lalpa
Inthawina
chun, anni lai chun a mi ṭhuoi vêl a; ngai ta, phairuom âwla chun a tama tam hi an um a; ngai ta, an ṭâwl tâwl khawp el a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, hieng ruhai hi hring thei an ti?” a ta. Chun, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, nangin i hriet ,” tiin, ka dawn a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hieng ruhai chunga hin thu hril la, an kuoma chun, ‘Aw nangni ru ṭâwlhai,
Nangnia chun thahai sieng ka ta, taksain in chungah hung sukbit ka tih, chun, vunin inkhum ka ti cheu, nangnia chun thuok
Chuongchun, thu pêk ka ni ang chun thu chu ka hril ta a; chuonga thu ka hang hril chun ri a hung um a, ngai ta, simkhawlei a hung inhnîng a, ruhai chu mâni zawmpui sengah an hung fe khâwm ta a.
Chun, ka hei en a, ngai ta, an chungahai chun thahruihai chu a um a, taksa chu a hung insukbit a, a chunga chun vun chun ân khum ta a; nisienlakhawm, anniahai chun thuok chu a la um naw a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Thli kuomah thu hril la, mihriem naupa thu hril rawh, thli kuoma chun, Lalpa

Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, hieng ruhai hi Israel sûngkuohai po po chu an na, ngai ta, anni chun, ‘Ei ruhai hlak a ṭâwl zo ta a, ei beisei hlak a bo dêr ta a; sâtthlâk ei ni ta a ni hi,’ an ti a.
Chuleiin, thu hril la, an kuomah hieng hin ti rawh: Lalpa
Chun, aw ka mihai, in thlânhai chu ka hung hawng a, in thlânhaia inthawka kân suoktir pha cheu chun
Chun,

“Mihriem naupa, nangin hmawl pakhat la la, a chunga chun ziek la, ‘Juda ta ding le, Israel thlahai a pâwlhai ta ding,’ tiin. Chun, hmawl dang la nâwk la, a chunga chun ziek la, ‘Josef Ephraim hmawl ding le, a pâwlhai Israel sûngkuo ta dingin,’ tiin.
Chun, nanga ta dingin hmawl pakhata chun zawm la, hmawl pakhat angin, i kuta chun pakhat an ni theina dingin.
Chun, i chipuihai thlahai chun i kuomah, ‘Hi ieng i tina am a na, i mîn entir naw ding maw?’ an ti pha chun,
an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
Chun, hmawl a chunga i ziekhai chu an mithmua ngei chun i kutah an um ding a nih.
Chun, an kuoma chun, ‘Lalpa
chu rama chun Israel tlânghai chunga chun anni chu hnam khatah siem ka tih; chun, lal pakhat an rênga lal nîng a ta; hnam hni ni ta naw ni hai a, lalram pahnia khawm inṭhe bawk ta naw ni hai;

Anni chu an milimhai chun insukpawrche ta ngai naw ni hai a, an thil pawrchehai hrim hrim khawm chun, an bawsietnahai chun insukpawrche ta bawk naw ni hai; an umna hmun po po, an hnungtawlna, an lo suol tâkna hmunhaia chun anni chu sandam ka ta, sukthieng bawk ka tih; chuongchun, ka mihai nîng an ta, kei khawm an Pathien nîng ka tih.
Chun, ka siehlaw David chu an chunga lal nîng a ta, chuongchun, berampu pakhat nei an ta, ka rorêlhai khawm chu hrâwng an ta, ka thu- ruothai chu pawmin thaw bawk an tih.

Ka siehlaw Jakob kuoma ram ka pêk, in thlatuhai chêngnaa khan chêng an ta; chutaka chun kumkhuoa dingin chêng an ta, anni le an nauhai leh, an nauhai nauhai leh; chun, ka siehlaw David chu kumkhuoa dingin an lal nîng a tih.

Chu nawa khawm chun anni le chun inremna thuthlung siem ka ta, anni le chatuona thuthlung nîng a tih; chun, anni chu sieng ka ta, sukpung ka ta, anni laia chun ka hmun inthieng chu kumkhawtluongin sie tâng ka tih.
Chun, kumkhawtluonga, anni laia ka hmun inthieng chu a um pha chun hnamhai chun kei
Chun,
Lalpa

i hnung innghattir ka ti che a, i khâkruhaia chun ngakuoihai kuoi ka ta, nang le i sipai pâwl po po, kâwlhnâm hmangtuhai po po, âwmphaw le phaw hmanga pâwl nasatakhai leh, râlthuom famkima inthuomhai po po le, sakawrhai le i sakawr chung chuong mihai po po leh ka khai dawk ding cheu a nih,
anni lai chun Persia le Kus le Put an ṭhang ve a; an rêngin thîr lukhum le phaw hmangin;
Gomer le a rawihai po po leh; chun, a hmârtieng tâwptaka chun Togarma sûngkuohai le a rawihai po po leh; hnam tamtakhai chu nang le ṭhang an nih.
Inbuotsai la, anih, nangma chu inbuotsai la, pâwlhai nanga kuoma hung inkhawmhai po po chunga chun nang chu a vêngtu ni la.

Ni tamtak hnunga chun ko khâwm ning i ta, kum nuhnungahai chun indonaa inthawka sansuok, hnam tamtakhaia inthawka lâk khâwmhai umna ram, Israel tlâng- hai, râusana um zing zing el chu hung tlung i tih; anni chu hnamhai laia inthawka lâk suok an na, an rêng chun himtakin an chêng ding a nih.
“Lalpa
khuohai kul neilova an umna rama chun hang fêng ka ta, to ṭawk ṭawka chênghai, himtaka chênghai kuoma chun; an rêngin kul neilovin an chêng a, dai kawtkhârhai le kalna thîrtluonhai bovin;

Râllâk sumhai la ding le, râlhai man ding le, tuta hluoa um tah hmun se tahai le, hnamhaia inthawka mipui lâk suokhai, hnuoi lailia chênga ran ruolhai le thuomhnawhai neia khawsahai chunga chun kut inlet dingin fêng ka tih, tîng i ta.

Seba le Dedan le, Tarsis sumdâwng mihai le, chutaka sakeibaknei tuoihai chun i kuomah, ‘Râllâk sumhai chu la dinga hung am i nih? Râl chu man dingin i pâwlhai chu i kei khâwm ta am a nih? Rângkachak le tangka dâm phur hmang ding le, ran ruolhai chu ṭhuoi hmanga, thuomhnawhai chu la hmang a, râllâk sum nasatak el la ding chun?’ tîng an ti che a.
“Chuleiin, mihriem naupa, thu hril la, Gog kuoma chun hieng hin ti rawh, Lalpa

ka mi Israelhai chu hung do i ta, sûmpuiin ram a hung tuom ding ang elin; chun, ni nuhnungahai chun aw Gog, an mithmu ngeia nangmaa sukthienga ka um phaa hnam tamtakhai chun an mi hriet theina dingin, ka ram chu indodâl tir ka ti che.
Lalpa
“Gog chun Israel ram chu a hung do pha, chu nia chun, Lalpa
Ka îtthîkna le ka lunginsen lai chun ka hril ta si a: Matheilovin, chu ni chun Israel rama chun inhnîngna nasatak um a ta,

chuongchun, tuipuia ngahai dâm, chunglêng vatehai dâm, rama ramsahai dâm, hnuoi chunga bawkvâka invâk thilhringhai po po dâm, hnuoi phêk chunga mihriem umhai po po dâm, ka hmaihmaa chun inthin an ta, tlânghai chu pei thlûkin um an ta, hmun inṭênhai chu tlathlâng an ta, kulbang tinhai chu hnuoiah tlâng an tih.
Ka tlânghai po po kuoma chun, ama
Chun, kei le kei inchawimawiin, insukthieng ka ta, hnam tamtakhai mithmua chun kei chu insukhmêlhriet ka ta; chun,
“Chun, nang, mihriem naupa, Gog chunga chun thu hril rawh, hieng hin ti la, Lalpa
nang chu i hnung tieng innghattir ka ti che a, ṭhuoi ka ti che a, hmârtieng kilkhâwr tak hmunhaia inthawk chun hung insuoktir ka ti che a, Israel tlânghai chunga chun ṭhuoi ka ti che;
i vawitienga i thalngul chu lâkpêk ka ti che a, i kut changtienga inthawkin i thalhai chu intlâktir ka tih.
Hmun palailênga chun tlûng i tih, ka hril ta si a; Lalpa
Magog le thlierkâra chêngtuhai chunga chun mei tir ka ta; chun,
Chun, ka hming inthieng chu ka mi Israelhai laia chun suklangsâr ka ta, ka hming inthieng sukpawrchea a um ding hrim hrim chu ngai thei naw ningah, chun, hnamhai chun
Ngai ta, a hung tlung mêk a nih, thaw a ni ngei ding a nih, Lalpa

Chun, chuong Israel khawpuihaia chêngtuhai chu fe suok an ta, hriemhrei meihai chu siem an ta, râwng an tih; âwmphaw le phawhai dâm, thalngul le thalhai dâm, hmawlfunghai dâm, feihai dâm, râwng an ta, chun, chuonghai chun kum sari sûng mei chu tîng an tih;

chuongchun, rama inthawkin thing la naw ni hai a, rampui hnuoia inthawkin pakhat khawm phûr bawk naw ni hai; hriemhreihaiin mei an ti ding a ni si a; anni suksetuhai chu suksieng an ta, anni inruhmangtuhai chu inruhmang an tih, Lalpa

“Chun, chu nia chun, Israela chun, tuipui saktieng panga fethlengtuhai phairuom chu Gog ta ding chun inphûmna hmun dingin pêng ka ta; chutaka chun Gog le a mihai po po chu phûm an tih; chun, anni chun ‘Hamon-gog Phairuom’ ti nghe nghêng an tih.
Chun, ram chu an sukthieng theina dingin Israel sûngkuohai chun anni chu thla sari sûng phûm an ta.
Anih, chu rama mihai po po chun phûm an ta, chawimawia ka um nia chun anni ta ding chun hriet zing tlâk nîng a tih, Lalpa
Chun, ram chu sukfai dinga ram fang suok a, ruong phûm lova umhai phûm dinga sina nei ding mi ruot hran an ta, anni chun thla sari tâwpah zawng ṭan an tih.
Chun, chuong ram fangtuhai chun fang an ta, mi tukhawma mihriem ru a hmu chun, a sira chun inchikna târ a ta, a phûmtuhaiin Harmon-gog
(Chutaka chun khawpui a hming Hamona
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Lalpa
Mi thilthawtheihai sa chu fâng in ta; hnuoia lalhai le, berâmchalhai le, berâmtehai le, kêlhai le, bâwngchalhai, Basan rama châwmthâuhai po po thisen chu dâwn in tih.
In ta dinga kân thâwina thâu chu in khawp hmakhat fâng in ta, thisen chu in inrui hmakhat dâwn bawk in tih.
Chun, ka dâwkâna chun sakawrhai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, mi thilthawtheitakhai le indo mihai po po chun sukkhawpin um in tih, Lalpa
Chun, ka ropuina chu hnamhai laia chun sieng ka ta, chuongchun, hnam po pohai chun rorêlna ka suktlung ta le, an chunga ka kut kân nghat chu hmûng an tih.
Chun, chu nia inthawka a hnungtieng chen chun Israel sûngkuo chun

Chun, hnamhai chun Israel sûngkuo chu an suol leia sala intâng an nih ti hrieng an ta; ka chungah an lo bawsiet ta a, kei khawma ka hmai ka thuppêk bawk leiin; chuongchun, an hmêlmahai kutah anni chu ka pêk a, an rêng el chun kâwlhnâma chun an lo tlu ta a.
An inthieng nawna ang pei le, an bawisietnahai ang peiin an chunga chun ka lo thaw ta a; chun, ka hmai chu ka thuppêk bawk a.
“Chuleiin, Lalpa
An rama chun himtakin an chêng a, tukhawma anni chu an sukṭi naw pha chun, an inzakna, an bawsietnahai po po, ka chunga an lo bawsietnahai chu phur an tih;
hnamhai laia inthawka anni ka hung ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a, an hmêlmahai rama inthawka anni ka kei khâwma, hnam tamtakhai mithmua annia chawimawia ka um pha chun.
Chun, hnamhai laia sala intâng dinga kân fetir a, anni rama ngei chun ka ṭhuoi khâwm nâwka hin,
annia inthawk chun ka hmai chu thuppêk ta bawk naw ning a; Israel sûngkaw chunga chun ka thlarau ka buok ta si a, Lalpa
Kan sal intâng kum sâwmhni panga kum, chu kum kum ṭantir, chu thla ni sâwm ni, khawpui chu suksieta a um hnung kum sâwm pali kum, chu ni le le chun

Chu mi chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, i mithai khan en la, i nahai khan lo ngai bawk la, ka în hmutir dinghai che po po chunga chun i lungril sie rawh; i kuoma kân hmutir theina ding chea hi tienga hung ṭhuoi i ni hrim a; chuongchun, i hmuhai po po chu Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun puong rawh,” a ti a.
Chun, saktieng ngha dâi kawtkhâra chun a hung a, chutaka kailâwnhaia chun a hang fe a; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khi a, luonghmawl khat a na, tuolpûk dang khawm chu luonghmawl khat bawk a nih.

Chun, vêngna pindan tinhai chu luonghmawl khata sei, luonghmawl khata lien a nih; vêngna pindan inkâr chu tawng nga a na; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu, a in tieng panga tuolpûka chun luonghmawl khat a nih.
In tieng panga a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk khawm chu ân khi a, tawng riet a nih.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng riet a nih, chun, kawtkhâr bieng chu tawng hni; chun, a dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk chu in tieng panga chun a um a.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr vêngna pindanhai chu, saktieng hi tieng panga chun pathum a na; pathum chu intie seng an na; chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai khawm chu hi tieng le saw tienga chu intie an nih.
Chun, a kawtkhâr kawt lien khangtieng chu ân khi a, tawng sâwm a na; a kawtkhâr seizie chu tawng sâwmpathum;
chun, vêngna pindan hmaa a rei sîr chu hi tieng sîrah tawng khat, khing tieng sîra chun tawng khat bawk; chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîra chun tawng ruk, khing tieng sîra chun tawng ruk bawk.
Chun, vêngna pindan chunga
Chun, tuolpûk chu ân khi a, tawng sawmhni
Chun, lûtna dâi kawtkhâr tuolthlâka inthawka dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk sûngril lem tuolthlâk chen chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.

Dâi kawtkhâr chun a vêlin, pindan kêm kawtkhâr bieng tienga chîn inzui pei tukverhai a nei a. Chuong ang bawkin a tuolpûk sûngtieng a vêlin tukverhai an um bawk a, a banhaia chun intûm thing lim a um a.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, ngai ta, pindanhai le lungpha, a vêla huon sûng tuollai dinga an siem chu a um a; lungpha chunga chun pindan sâwmthum a um a.
Lungpha chu dâi kawtkhârhai sîra chun a um a, dâi kawtkhârhai le inchen chie, lungpha hnuoihnung lem chu a nih.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr hnuoihnung lema tuolthlâka inthawka, a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem tuolthlâk khangtieng chu ân khi a, a saktieng le a hmârtieng chu tawng za khat ve ve a nih.
Chun, a huon sûng tuollai puo lem dâi kawtkhâr,

Chun, vêngna pindanhai chu hi tieng sîrah pathum, khingtieng sîrah pathum bawk a nih; chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu a dâi kawtkhâr pakhatna tie seng chu a na; a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmnga a na, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhni panga.
A tukverhai le, a tuolpûk le, chutaka intûm thinghai chu, saktieng panga ngha dâi kawtkhâra mi tie seng kha an nih; chun, sirbi pasariin a hang tlung a, chun, tuolpûk chu sûngtienga chun a um a.

Chun, dâi kawtkhâr dang zâwna chun, tuollai sûng sûngril lema dinga dâi kawtkhârhai a um a; saktieng panga le hmârtieng panga chun dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawtkhâr chen chun tawng za khatin ân khi a.
Chun, sim tieng panga chun a mi ṭhuoi a, simtienga dâi kawtkhâr chu ka hmu a, chuongchun, hi inkhina dân ang pei hin chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai le a tuolpûkhai chu ân khi a.

Chun, a hang kaina dinga chun sirbi pasari a um a; a tuolpûkhai chu chuonghai hmaa chun a um a; chun, chutaka a kawtkhâr bienghai chunga chun intûm thinghai, hi tiengah pakhat, khing tiengah pakhat bawk a um a.
Chun, simtieng panga chun a huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema dâi kawtkhâr chu a um a; chun, simtienga a dâi kawtkhâra inthawka dâi kawtkhâr chu tawng za khatin ân khi a.
hieng inkhina dân ang hin a vêngna pindanhai, kawtkhâr bieng- hai le tuolpûkhai chu ân khi a; chun, a vêlin a tuolpûkhai le chun tukverhai a um a; tawng sâwmngaa sei, tawng sâwmhni pangaa lien a nih.
Chun, a vêlin tuolpûkhai tawng sâwmhni pangaa sei, tawng ngaa lien a um a.
Chun, a tuolpûkhai chun huon sûng tuollai puo lem tieng a nghaa, a kawtkhâr bienghai chunga chun intûm thinghai an um a; a hang kainaa chun kailâwn pariet a um a.
Chun, saktieng panga huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, hieng inkhina ang pei hin dâi kawtkhâr chu ân khi a,
a vêngna pindanhai, a kawtkhâr bienghai, a tuolpûkhai chu hieng inkhina dân ang hin ân khi a; chun, a tuolpûkhaia le a vêlin tukverhai an um a, tawng sâwmngaa sei, tawng sâwmhni pangaa lien a nih.
A tuolpûkhai chun huon sûng tuollai puo lem tieng a ngha a, a kawtkhâr bienghaia chun, hi tieng le khing tienga khawm intûm thinghai an um a, chun a hang kaina chu sirbi pariet a nih.
Chun, hmâr tieng dâi kawtkhâra chun a mi ṭhuoi a; ama chun hieng inkhina dân ang hin ân khi a;
a vêngna pindanhai, a kawtkhâr bienghai, a tuolpûkhai chu; chun, chutaka chun a vêlin tukverhai a um a, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmnga, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhni panga a nih.

Chun, kawtkhâr bienghai chu huon sûng tuollai puo lem tienga chun a na, chun, chutaka kawtkhâr bienghaia chun, hi tieng sîra le khing tieng sîra khawm chun intûm thinghai an um a; a hang fe kaina chu sirbi pariet a nih:
Chun, dâi kawtkhârhaia kawtkhâr bienghai sîra chun pindan le kawtkhârhai an um a; chutaka chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu an sâwp hlak.

Chun, dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lût- naa chun, hi tieng sîrah dawkân pahni, khing tieng sîrah dawkân pahni bawk, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dâm, suol thilinhlân dâm, bawsietna thilinhlân dâm thatna dingin a um a.
Chun, hmârtieng dâi kawtkhâra lûtnaa hang fe a, sîr khat a puotienga chun, dawkân pahni a um a; chun, a sîr khata chun, dâi kawtkhâra tuolpûka ṭhangsaa chun dawkân pahni bawk a um a.
Hi tieng sîrah dawkân pali, khingtieng sirah dawkân pali bawk; dâi kawtkhâr sîra chun an um a; chuong dawkân pariethai chunga chun inthâwinahai chu an that hlak.

Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânna dingin lung a saka sak, tawng khat le a chenvea sei, tawng khat le a chenvea lien, tawng khata insâng dawkân pali an um a; chuong chunga chun inthawina le pumrawhmang thilinhlân ding an thatna ding hriemhreihai chu an sie a.
Chun, in sûnga chun a vêlin kuoikimhai kutpha bawka lienhai chu inbûk an na; chun, dawkânhai chunga chun inthâwina sa chu a um a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi pindan, a nghat dân sim sawng hi in enkawl sin kawltu thiempuhai ta ding a nih.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai chu ân khi a, tawng zaa sei, tawng zaa lien, kil li inchen a nih; chun, maichâm chu in tuola chun a um a.

Chun, in tuolpûka chun a mi ṭhuoi a, tuolpûk kawtkhâr bienghai chu ân khi a, hi tieng sîrah tawng nga, khing tieng sîrah tawng nga bawk; chun, kawtkhâr khingtieng chu hi tieng sîrah tawng thum, khing tieng sîrah tawng thum
Chun, tuolpûk seizie chu tawng sâwmhni a na, a lien tieng chu tawng sâwmpahni
Chun, ama chun Pathien biek ina chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chun, kawtkhâr bieng

A lûtna khang tieng chu tawng sâwm a na; lûtna sîr chu sîr khatah tawng nga a na, sîr danga khawm tawng nga bawk a nih; chun, chu dung tieng chu tawng sâwmliin ân khi a, a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmhniin.
Chun, a sûngah a lût a, lûtna kawtkhâr bieng chu tawng hniin ân khi a; a lûtna chu tawng rukin; a lûtna khang tieng chu tawng sariin.
Chun, pindan chu ân khi a, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmhniin ân khi a, a khang tieng khawm tawng sâwmhni bawkin; chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi hi hmun inthiengtak chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, in bang chu ân khi a, tawng ruk a na, sîr tinah a in vêl chun, pindan kêmhai khang tieng chu tawng li pei a na.

A sîr pindanhai chu pathum a na, pakhat chungah a dang, chuong ang peia sâwmthum chena indawt peiin; Inpui banga chun inbûkna nei lova, chutaka chun inbûkna an nei thei lemna dingin, a vêla pindan kêmhai ta ding hrima ruot inpui banga filawrhaia chun an vân bûk a.

Pindan kêmhai chun in chu an vêl sâng deu deu chun an lien deu deu a; in sîr vêl chun a pindan inzâwnpui ang peiin a lien tung pei a; chuongchun, in vêlin a sûngpui chu a chin deu deu pei a, in sîra chun leilâk a fe tung pei a; chuongchun, mi chun pindan hnuoihnung taka inthawka a chunghnung taka chun pindan lailung hraw tlangin a fe a nih.
Chun, in chun a vêlin a rei sukkho a nei ka hmu bawk a; chun, pindan kêmhai lungphûmhai chu luonghmawl tling tawng ruk a nih.
Chun, pindan kêmhai bang sazie chu a puotiengah tawng nga a nih; chun, chutaka la mahla chu pindan kêmhai a sûnga umhai sîr thlâk chu a la nih.
Chun, inpui lungrem le pindan kêmhai inkâr chu sîr tinah a in vêl suokin, tawng sâwmhnia lien a um a.

Chun, pindan kêmhai kawtkhârhai chu chu hmun la âwl tieng chun hawng a na, kawtkhâr pakhat chu hmârtieng nghain, kawtkhâr dang chu simtieng nghain; chun, chu hmun âwl chu a khang tieng chu a vêlin tawng nga a nih.
Chun, in thlangtieng panga hmun âwl hmaa in chu tawng sâwmsaria lien a na; chun, chu in chu a bang sazie chu a vêlin tawng ngaa sa a nih, a dung tieng chu tawng sâwmkuo a nih.
Chun, in chu tawng zaa seiin ân khi a; chun, hmun daidana um le a in le, chutaka banghai le chun tawng za chu a nih;
chun, in hmai khang tieng saktieng panga hmun âwla um chu tawng za a nih.

Chun, chu hnungtienga um hmun âwla in seizie chu ân khi a; chutaka a dawdanhai le, sîr khat le sîr khingtienga dawdanhai le chun tawng za a nih; chun, biekin sûngril lem, huon sûng tuollaia tuolpûkhai, a kawtkhâr bienghai, thingphêka inthuo a na;
a tukver inkhâr zinghai, a sâwng thuma a dawdanhai a vêlin a um a; a inpui kawt lûtnaa inthawk, a vêla thingphêka remin ṭuonga inthawka tukver chen rem a nih;
chuongchun, tukverhai chu inthuo an na; kawtkhâr lu chung hmun, in sûngril lem le puo lem, a vêlin a puo le sûngah banghai chun, inkhi thlapa inkhum
Chun, cherubhai le intûm thinghaia chei a na; intûm thing chu cherub le cherub inkâra chun a um a, chun, cherubhai chun hmai pahni seng an nei a;

chuongchun, sîr khata chun intûm thing tieng chun mihriem hmai chu a ngha a, chun, sîr khingtienga chun intûm thing tieng ngha ma chun sakeibaknei tuoi hmai chu a ngha a; in chu a vêlin chuong ang taka siem suok vawng chu a nih.
Hnuoia inthawka kawtkhâr lu chung chen chun cherubhai le intûm thinghaia siem a na; biekin bang chu chuong ang chu a nih.
Biekin thua chun, a kawtkhâr bienghai chu kil li nei an na; chun, hmun inthieng tak hmaa chun, thinga siem maichâm ang a um a.
Chun, maichâm chu thing a na, ân sâng tieng chu tawng thum a na, a sei tieng chu tawng hni a nih; a kihai le, a mawnghai le a banghai chu thing ruok a nih; chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hi hi
Chun, biekin le hmun inthieng tak chun kawtkhâr pahni a nei a.
Kawtkhârhai chun, phêk hran pahni, phêk hni inthlep a nei a, kawt- khâr pakhat ta dingin, phêk hni, kawt- khâr dang ta dingin phêk hni bawk.
Chun, an chunga chun, biekin sûtpui kawtkhârhaia chun cherubhai le intûm thinghai lim siem an na, bang chunghaia siem ang bawk khan; chun, tuolpûk puotieng hmaa chun thingpum lientak tak a um a.
Chun, tukver inkhârhai le, tuol-pûka chun sîr khata le sîr khingtienga khawm chun intûm thinghai chu an um a; pindan kêmhai le thingphêk satakhai chu chuong ang chu a nih.
Chun, hmârtieng lampuia, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi suok a; hmârtieng panga in zâwna um, hmun daidan epa pindan kêma chun a mi ṭhuoi lût a.
Hmartieng panga pindan chu a sei tieng tawng za khat a na; a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.
Huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema ṭhang tawng sâwmhni zâwna le, huon sûng tuollai puo lem epa lungpha zâwna chun dawdan inep ṭhieuin sâwng thumin a um a.
Chun, pindanhai hmaa chun, sûnglûtin inlawnna tawng sâwma lien, tawng za khata sei a um a; chun, an kawtkhârhai chu hmar sawng an nih.
Chun, pindan chunghnung lemhai chu an tawi lem a; dawdanhai chun a hnuoihnung le a laitak nêkin ina chun hmun an aw lien lem si a.
Sâwng thum an ni si a; huon sûng tuollaia sûtpuihai ang kha sûtpui an nei ve naw a; chuleiin, a chunghnung tak chu a hnuoia nêkin ân têp a, a hnuoihnung tak nêkin a lailung chu ân têp lem a.
Pindan kêmhai zâwn pei puoah, tuollai puo lem tiengah pindanhai epa ân huonna chu tawng sâwmngaa sei a nih.
Huon sûng tuollai puo lema pindan chu a dung tieng tawng sâwm- nga an ni si a; chun, ngai ta, biekin tuola chun tawng za khat a nih.
Hieng pindanhai hnuoia hin saktieng pangah lûtna a um a, huon sûng tuollai puo lema inthawka lûtna chu.
Chutaka chun puo tieng bang ân ṭan a. Simtienga khawm huon sûng tuollai le inepa chun pindanhai an um bawk a.
An hmaa lampui chu hmârtienga pindanhai lampui ang bawk kha a na; an seizie le a khang tieng khawm ân ang; a suokna lampuihai le an rem dân dâm, a kawtkhârhai chenin ân ang vawng a nih.
Simtieng panga pindanhai hnuoia chun saktieng pangah lûtna a um a, chu chu fe thlengna lampui chu a nih. Chuonghai epa chun pindanna bang a um a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hmârtienga pindanhai le simtienga pindanhai, hmun âwl hmaa umhai hi, pindan inthieng, thiempu

Thiempuhai chu an lût pha chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun hmun inthienga inthawk chun an fe suok ding a ni naw a, amiruokchu, chutaka chun, an rawngbâwlnaa chun an silfênhai sieng an ta; an inthieng si a; silfên dangin inbel an ta, chun, mipui tieng chu an hung hnai chau ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, in sûngril lem chu inkhi zo hnung chun, dâi kawtkhâr, saktieng nghaa chun a mi ṭhuoi suok a, chun, a vêl chun ân khi ta a.
Inkhina luonghmawl chun sak-tieng chu ân khi a, inkhina luonghmawl chun a vêlin tawng za nga a nih.
Chun, hmârtienga khawm chun a vêlin, inkhina luonghmawl chun tawng za ngain ân khi bawk a.
Inkhina luonghmawl chun, simtieng pang khawm chu tawng za ngain ân khi a.
Chun, thlang tieng chu ân khi nâwk a, inkhina luonghmawl chun tawng za ngain ân khi a.
Chu hnunga chun dâi kawtkhâr, saktieng ngha dâi kawtkhâra chun a mi ṭhuoi ta a;

Chun, thilhmulâwk ka ihmu tah, khawpui chu sukse dinga a hung laia thilhmulâwk ka hmu ang tak, chu thil hmulâwk chu Kebar vadung panga thilhmulâwk ka hmu ang kha a nih; chuongchun, ka hmaiin hnuoi ka sik ta a.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr, saktieng nghaa inthawk chun
Thlarau chun a mi dawm kâng a, huon sûng tuollai sungril lema chun a mi ṭhuoi ta a; chun, ngai ta,
Mi pakhat ka sîra a ngîr zing lai chun, ina inthawk chun mi pakhat hin ka kuomah thu hrilin ka hriet a;

ka kuoma chun, “Mihriem naupa, hi hi ka lalṭhungpha hmun le ka kehai innghatna hmun, Israel thlahai kuoma chatuona ka chêngna ding chu a ni hi. Israel sûngkuo chun ka hming inthieng chu sukpawrche ta naw ni hai a, anni khawmin, an lalhai khawm, an hurnain amani, an bâwlhmunhaia an lalhai ruonghai khawmin amanih sukpawrche naw ni hai,

an tuolpûk chu ka tuolpûk kâwla siein, an kawtkhâr bieng chu ka kawtkhâr bieng sîrah, anni le keia kâra chun bang chau a uma chu; an tirdakumna an lo thaw tahai chun ka hming inthieng chu an lo sukpawrche ta a; chuleiin, ka lunginsenna chun anni chu ka kâng hmang ta a.
Tuhin an hurna le an lalhai ruonghai chu keimaa inthawka hlatakah sie hmang hai sienla, anni lai chun chatuonin chêng tâng ka tih.
“Nang mihriem naupa, Israel sûngkaw kuoma chun in kha inentir rawh, an suolhai leia an inzak theina dingin; chuongchun, a riruong kha inkhitir rawh.

Chun, an thil lo thaw tahai po po kha an inzâpui a ni chun in riruong, a hmêlput dân, a fe suokna, a lûtna, a hmêl umziehai po po le chutaka dânhai po po leh inhriettir la, an mithmu ngeia chun ziek la, chu chu hmêl put dân po po chu an vawng zinga, dânhai po po khawm chu an kawla an zâwm theina dingin.
Hi hi in dân chu nîng a tih; tlâng sîp chunga a huop chin chin chu hmun inthiengtak nîng a ta; Ngai ta, hi hi in dân chu nîng a tih.

“ Chun, hieng hi tawnga inkhia maichâm lienzie chu a nih; (tawng chu tawng le kutpha bawk a nih) a mawng chu tawng khat nîng a ta, a khang tieng khawm tawng khat bawk; a rei sira a tlâng chu a vêlin khâp khat nîng a ta, hi hi maichâm mawng chu nîng a tih.

Chun, hnuoi ân ṭhutnaa inthawk chun a rei hnuoihnung lem chen chun tawng hni nîng a ta, a khang tieng chu tawng khat; chun, a rei chîn lema inthawka a rei lien lem chen chu tawng li nîng a tih, chun, a khang tieng chu tawng khat.
Maichâm chunghnung lem chu tawng li nîng a ta; maichâm thuk le a chung tienga chun kihai pali um a ta.
Maichâm thuk chu tawng sawmpahnia sei, tawng sâwmpahni maa lien nîng a tih, a sîr palia chun intiet seng nîng a tih.

A sîrhai pali chun a rei chu tawng sâwmpalia sei a, tawng sâwmpali maa lien nîng a tih; a tlâng chu a vêlin tawng chenve nîng a ta; chu mawng chu tawng khat lai ni bawk a ta; a sirbihai chu saktieng nghâng a tih.
Chun, ka kuomah a hril a, “Mihriem naupa, Lalpa
Levi mi thiempuhai, Zadok thlaa mi ngei chu, keia rawngbâwl dinga kei a mi hnaihai kuoma chun suol thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pêng i tih, Lalpa
Chun, chu thisen chu lâng i ta, a kihai pali chun nâl i ta, a rei ki lia le, a tlâng a sîrvêl poa hai le chun; chuongchun, sukthieng i ta, ama ta ding chun intlanna siem i tih.
Suol thilinhlân dinga bâwngchal khawm chu lâng i ta, chu ina hmun ruot hmun inthieng tuola chun râwng i tih.
Chun, a ni hni nia chun suol thilinhlân ding chun kêlchal demkailo inhlân i tih; bawngchal hmanga maichâm sukthieng a ni ang bawk khan, maichâm chu sukthieng nîng a tih.
Chun, sukthiengna thil chu i thaw zo pha chun bâwngchal tuoi demkailo le, a ruol laia berâmchal demkailo chu inhlân i tih.
Chun, nang chun
Ni sari sûng chu ni tin, suol thilinhlân dingin kêl buotsai i ta; chun, bâwngchal tuoi le berâmchal a ruol laia mi demkailo i buotsai bawk ding a nih.
Ni sari sûng chu maichâm ta ding chun intlanna siempêk an ta, sukthieng an tih, chuongchun, inhlânthieng an tih.

Chun, nihai chu an hmang zo pha, ni rietnaa inthawk chu, thiempuhai chun in pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu maichâma chun thâwng an ta, in inremna thilinhlânhai le chun; chuongchun, lo pawm ka ti cheu, Lalpa
Chun, hmun inthieng dâi kawtkhâr tuol hnai lema, saktieng nghaa chun a mi ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a, a lo inkhâr zing a.
Chun,
Chun, lal chungthua chun,
Chun,
Chun, mi helhai, Israel sûngkuo kuoma chun hieng hin hril la: Lalpa

lungrila sertan lo le tisa khawma sertan lo, hmêlmakhai ka hmun inthienga um ding le, sukpawrche dinga ka in ngeia in hung lâklût leia in tirdakumna hi huntâwk ta raw se; Bei dâm, sathâu dâm, thisen dâm chu in inhlân lai chun, ka thuthlunghai chu in bawsiet a, in tirdakumnahai chu belsa ding chauin.
Chun, ka thil inthienghai vêng ṭhatna sin chu in kawl naw a, amiruokchu, chu ka hmun inthienga chun in aia ka sinhai kawltu dinghai in ruot lem a.
“Lalpa
Nisienlakhawm, Israelhai, an milimhai hnawta an invâk hmang laia keimaa inthawka hlataka fe tahai Levi mihai chun anni suolna chu phur an tih.

Ina chun rawngbâwlin, in dâi kawtkhârhaia chun enkawlin, ka hmun inthienghaia chun rawngbâwltu nîng an tih; mipuihai ta dinga inthawina le pumrawhmang thilinhlâna ding chu that an ta, anni rawngbâwlpêk dingin an hmaa chun ngîr an tih.

An milimhai hmaa chun an rawng an lo bâwlpêk ta leiin Israel sûngkuo ta ding chun suolnaa tlûkna lung an lo ni ta a; chuleiin, an chunga chun ka kut kân let a, an suolna chu anni ngeiin phur an tih, Lalpa

Keia ta dingin thiempu sin chu thaw dingin, keima hnaia chun an hung ding a ni naw a; ka thil inthieng a ieng khawm, le thil inthiengtakhai chu an hung hnai ding a ni nawh; amiruokchu, an lo thaw tah, an tirdakumnahai le an inzakna chu anni ngeiin phur an tih.
Amiruokchu, anni chu in sinhaia enkawltuhaiah siem ka ta, chutaka rawngbâwlnahai po poa ding le, chutaka thaw dinghai po poa chun.

“Amiruokchu, thiempu Levi mihai, Zadok naupasalhai, keimaa inthawka Israelhai an invâk hmang lai khawma ka hmun inthieng enkawlna sin kawltuhai chu, ka ta dinga rawngbâwl dingin keia hnaiah hung an ta; sathâu le thisen chu inhlân dingin ka hmaa chun ngîr an tih, Lalpa
ka hmun inthienga chun lût an ta, ka rawng mi bâwlpêk dingin ka dawkân hnaia chun hung an ta, ka sin chu kawl an tih.

Chun, huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema dâi kawtkhâra an lût pha chun hieng hin nîng a ta, puonzai inhmi puonin an inthuom ding a nih; huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem le, dâi kawtkhâra a sûnga rawng an bâwl lai chun, an chungah sahmul puon an inbel ding a ni naw a.

Thubuoia chun rorêltuin an ngîr ding a na; keia rorêl dân dungzui peiin ro an rêl ding a nih; ka ruoiṭhe hunbi neihaia chun ka thuruothai, ka dânhai chu an zâwm ding a nih; chun, ka châwlni khawm chu an inser bawk ding a nih.
Chun, sukthieng a ni hnunga chun ama chu ni sari tiempêk an tih.
Chun, hmun inthienga, huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema, hmun inthienga rawngbâwl dinga a fe ni chun, a suol thilinhlân chu ân hlân ding a nih, Lalpa
Bu thilinhlân dâm, suol thilinhlân dâm, bawsietna thilinhlân dâm chu fâng an ta; Israel laia thilhlân tinrênghai chu an ta nîng a tih.
“Chu nawa khawm chun, rochan dinga aisâna ram chu i sem pha chun,
Hi sûnga hin hmun inthieng a dung tawng za nga, a khang tawng za nga bawk a um ding a nih; a vêla inchenin; chun, a sîr a vêlin hmun ruok tawng sâwmnga um bawk a tih.
Chun, hi hi tiet hi inkhîng i ta, a dung tawng sîng hni sâng nga, a khang sîng khat; chu sûnga chun hmun inthieng, ân thieng tak chu a um ding a nih.
Ram hmun inthieng chu a na, thiempuhai hmun inthienga rawngbâwltuhai,
Chun, a dung tawng sîng hni sâng nga le a khang tawng sîng khat chu Levi mihai, chu ina rawngbâwltuhai, chêngna khawpui dingin, an chan ding chu nîng a ta.
Chun, khawpui iṭhut ding hmun tawng sâng ngaa lien, tawng sîng hni sâng ngaa sei, chan inthieng inhlânna epa khan ruot i ta, chu chu Israel sûngkuo pumpui ta ding nîng a ta.

Chun, lal ta dinga hmun chu sîr khata chun nîng a ta, a sîr khing tienga chun hmun inthieng thil inhlânna, khawpui sûng ṭhut le, hmun inthieng inhlânna hmatieng chu nîng a ta, saktienga chun khi saktiengah, thlangtienga inthawk chun khu thlangtiengah, chun, a dung tieng chu, thlangtieng ramria inthawka saktieng ramri chenin hmun pakhat ep chu nîng a tih.

Chu ram chu Israelhai laia ama ta dinga a chan chu nîng a ta; ka lalhai chun ka mihai chu nêksâwr ta ngai naw ni hai a; amiruokchu, Israel sûngkuo laia chun an hnam ang peiin ram chu pe lem tâng an tih.
“Lalpa

Epha le bath chu inkhina angkhat nîng an ta, bath chun homer hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat keng a ta, epha khawm chun homer hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat bawk, chu inkhina chu homer dungzui pei a ni ding a nih.
Shekel
“Hi hi thilinhlân in inhlân dinghai chu nîng a tih; bupui homer
chun, hriek chan ruot thua chun, kor tinah bath hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat nîng a tih; chu chu bath sâwm tluk a na, homer khat a nih.

chun, berâm ruol za hni peiah berâm pakhat, Israel ram hlopetna hmun ṭhataka inthawkin, bu thilinhlâna ding le, pumrawhmang thilinhlâna ding le, inremna thilinhlâna dinga an ta dinga intlanna siempêk dingin pêk nîng a tih, Lalpa
Rama mipuihai po po chun hi thilinhlân ang hi Israel rama lal ta ding chun an pêk ding a nih.

Chun, ruoiṭhenahaia le, thla tharhaia le, châwlnihaia le, Israel sûngkuo ruoiṭhena hunbi neihaia chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai, bu thilinhlânhai, dâwnmi thilinhlânhai inhlân chu lal chan chu ni ve thung a tih; Israel sûngkuo ta dinga intlanna siemna dingin, suol thilinhlânhai, bu thilinhlânhai, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai, inremna thilinhlânhai chu a buotsai ding a nih.
“Lalpa
thiempu chun suol thilinhlâna thisen chu lâng a ta, chu in kawtkhâr bienghaia le, maichâm rei kil lia le, huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem dâi kawtkhâr biengahai chun nâl a ta.
Chuongchun, chu thla ni sari ni chun mi thil lo suksuol ta tinhai ta ding le, mi lo thawpalhai ta dingin thâwng i ta; chuongchun, in ta ding chun intlanna chu siem in tih.
Chu ni chun lal chun ama ta ding le, chu rama mipuihai ta ding chun suol thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal buotsai a tih.
Chun, ruoiṭhe ni sari sûnga ding chun
Chun, bu thilinhlân, bâwngchal pakhatah epha khat, berâmchal pakhatah epha khat, ephaa chun hriek hin khat pei leh buotsai bawk a tih.
“Lalpa

Dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lampuia chun lal chu lût a ta; dâi kawtkhâr bieng sîra chun ngîr a ta, chun, thiempu chun a pumrawhmang thilinhlân ding le, a inremna thilinhlân dinghai chu buotsai a ta; dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûka chun chibai bûk a ta; chun, fe suok nâwk a ta, amiruokchu, zântieng chen chun dâi kawtkhâr chu khâr ni naw nih.
Chun, châwlnihaia le thla tharhaia chun chu ram mipuihai chun
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân lalin
chun, bu thilinhlâna ding chun berâmchal pakhatah epha khat; chun, berâmtehai pakhatah bu thilinhlân ding chu a pêk thei ang ang nîng a ta, chun, epha peia hriek hin khat leh.
Chun, thla thar nia ding bâwng- chal tuoi demkailo pakhat nîng a ta; berâmte paruk le berâmchal leh; an rêngin demkailo an ni ding a nih;

bu thilinhlân ding chu buotsai a ta, bâwngchal ding chun epha khat, berâmchal ding chun epha khat bawk; chun, berâmtehai ta ding chun ân hlân thei ang tâwk tâwk nîng a ta; chun, ephaa chun hriek hin khat a ṭhang pei ding a nih.
Chun, lal chu a va lût pha chun dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lampuia khan a fe ding a na; chutaka bawk chun a suok nâwk ding a nih.
“Nisienlakhawm, chu rama mihai ruoiṭhe hunbi neia

Ruoiṭhenahaia le, ruoiṭhe hun- bi neihaia chun bu thilinhlân chu bâwngchal pakhatah epha khat nîng a ta, berâmchal dingin epha khat bawk, chun, berâmtehai ta ding chun a pêk thei zât zât le, epha khata chun hriek hin khat pei leh.
Chun, lal chun mâni nuomthua thilinhlân, pumrawhmang thilinhlân amanih, inremna thilinhlân amanih, mâni nuomthua
Ni tin

Chun, zîng tin tin chun chu le chun bu thilinhlân khawm buotsai i ta, epha hmun ruka ṭhea hmun khat le, hriek hin hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat, chu beiphit inditak chu suktlawr dingin; chun, dân um zing angin,
Chuong ang chun berâmte chu buotsai an ta, bu thilinhlân le, hriek leh, zîng tin tina pumrawhmang thilinhlân zing zing ni ding chun.
“Lalpa

Amiruokchu, a suok pakhat kuoma chun a rochan chu thilpêk anga a pêk chun; ama chu insuo a ni kum chen chun a ta nîng a ta; chu zoa chun lal kuoma ma chun inkîr nâwk nîng a tih; ama rochan hrim kha chu a naupasalhai ta ding nîng a tih.

Chu nawa khawm chun, lal chun an thil neihaia anni nêksâwr dingin mihai rochan chu a lâkpêk ding a ni naw a; an in le loa inthawk a hnawt suok ding a ni nawh, ama thil neia inthawk ngeiin a naupasalhai chu rochan a pêk lem ding a na, chuongchun, ka mihai chu mâni thil neia inthawka mi tin chu an indar nawna dingin,” tiin.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr sîra um lûtna chu a mi fethlengpui a, thiempuhai pindan inthieng sim sawnghaia chun a mi ṭhuoi ta a; chun, ngai ta, a saktieng pang hnungtienga chun hmun hi a um a.

Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi hi a nih thiempu haiin bawsietna thilinhlân chu an suongna ding le, suol thilinhlân an suongna ding hmun chu; bu thilinhlân khawm hitaka hin em bawk an tih; chuongchun, mipui chu inhlânthieng dingin biekbuk tuolzawl a puo lema chun an hung ṭhuoi suok ding a ni nawh,” a ta.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chuongchun, huon kil lia chun a mîn fethlengtir a; chun, ngai ta, chu huon ki tina chun tuollai hi a um a.
Huon sûng tuollai kihai pali chun tuollai inhuonkhum, tawng sâwmlia sei, tawng sâwmthuma lien hi a um a; hieng a kihai pali hi intiet seng an nih.
An sûnga hmun li sûnga a vêl el chun lung an rem tlar a, chun, a vêl el chun chu tlarhai hnuoia chun suongna thukhai siem a na.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hieng hi thil suongna in, hi in rawngbâwltuhaiin mihai inthâwinahai an suongna ding chu a nih,” a ti a.

Chun, in kawtkhâra chun a mi ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a; chun, ngai ta, in tuolpûk saktieng panga chun tui hi a suok a, (chu in hmai chu saktieng ngha a ni si a); chun, tui chu a hnuoia inthawk chun, in changtieng pangah, maichâm simtieng panga inthawk chun a hung luong thla a.
Mi a kuta thil tluon chawia saktienga fe peia inkhiin, tawng sâng khat ân khi a, kemit chen tlum tui chu a mîn fekaitir a.
Chun, tawng sâng ân khi nâwk a, tui khûp tlumah, tui chu a mîn fekaitir nâwk a. Chun, sâng ma ân khi nâwk a, tui kâwng tlumah, tui chu a mîn fekaitir nâwk a.
Chu hnunga chun sâng ân khi nâwk a, vadungpui a hung ni ta a, ka fethleng thei ta naw a; tui chu a hung insâng a, vadungpui kai theilo hiel, inhlieuna khawp a hung ni ta a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Mihriem naupa, hi hi i hmu am?” a ti a. Chun, a mi ṭhuoi a, vadungpui kamah a mîn kîrtir nâwk ta a.
Chun, chuonga ka kîr lai chun, ngai ta, vadungpui kama chun hi tieng sîr le khing tieng sîra khawm chun thing tamtak an um a.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hieng tuihai hi saktieng rama inthawka hung suok an na, Arabaa chun fe thlâng an ta; chun, tuipui tieng fe pei an ta, tuipui tui al chu tui inthiengah inchangtir an tih.

Chun, thilhring tinrêng vadungpuihai fena tieng tienga hung inkhâwmhai chu hring an tih; chun, nga tamtak el hung um an ta; chuongchun, vadungpui luongna phawta tuipui tuihai ân thiengna ding le thil tinrênghai an hring theina dinga hung luong an nih.
Chun, nga mantuhai chu a sîra chun ngîr an ta, En-gedia inthawka En-eglaim chenin lênhai dêngna hmun a ni ding a nih; an ngahai chu chi tum tum, tuipui lientak ngahai angin a tama tam nîng an tih.
Amiruokchu, chutaka dûm hmunhai le dieldâwk hmunhai chu sukthieng ni naw ni hai a, chi dinga mâksan ni lem an tih.
Lalpa
Chun, hluong in ta, inang sengin; chu dinga in thlatuhai kuoma pe dinga ka bân ka lo phar tah, hi ram hi in ta dinga rochan dingin a tlu ding a nih.
Hi hi hmârtienga ramri chu nîng a tih; tuipui liena inthawka Hethlon lampui zuiin, Zedad lûtna chenin;
Hamath le, Berotha dâm, Sibraim dâm, chu chu Damaska ramri le Hamath ramri inkâra chun a um a; Hazer-hattikon chu Hauran ramri sîra chun a um bawk a.
Chun, tuipuia inthawka ramri chu Damaska ramria Hazarenon
Saktieng panga chun, Hauran le Damaska le Gilead le Israel ram inkâra chun, Jordan chu um a ta; hmârtieng ramria inthawk chun saktieng tuipui chen chu inkhi ding a nih. Hi hi saktieng chu nîng a tih.
Chun, simtienga sim khâw zâwnga chun, Tamara inthawka Meriboth-kades tuihai chen le, Aigupta vadungtê hrawin, tuipui lienah. Hi hi sim tienga, sim khâw zâwng chu a nih.
Thlangtienga chun tuipui lien nîng a ta, simtieng ramria inthawka Hamath hang lûtna ep chen khan. Hi hi thlangtieng pang chu nîng a tih.
Chuongchun, ram chu Israel hnam ang peiin nangni lai chun insem in tih.

Chun, in ta dinga rochan ding le, nangni laia mikhuol pêm um vehai nau le tê nei tahai ta ding chun ṭhum vâwrin sem in ta; Israel thlahai laia chun anni chu a ram mi ang bawk nîng an tih; Israel hnamhai lai chun nangni leh rochan chu an chang ve ding a nih.
Chun, chu pêm chu a tu hnama khawm lo mikhuol sien, chu hnama chun ama chu a rochan chu pêk nîng a tih, Lalpa
Chun, hienghai hi hnamhai hminghai chu an nih: hmâr tâwpa inthawka, Hethlon lampui sîr peiah, Hamath lûtna, Hamath sîr hmârtienga, Damaska ramri Hazarenon
Dan ramri sîra chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang; Aser, chan khat bawk.
Aser ramria, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen; Naphtali, chan khat.
Naphtali ramria chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen chu, Manasse, chan khat.
Manasse ramria chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen chu; Ephraim, chan khat.
Ephraim ramria chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen chun; Reuben, chan khat.
Reuben ramria chun, saktienga inthawka thlangtieng chena chun; Juda, chan khat.

Chun, Juda ramria chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen chu, ram thilinhlân in inhlân ding chu nîng a ta, a khang tieng tawng sîng hni sâng nga, a dung tienga chun, saktienga inthawka thlangtieng chena chan khat ang kha nîng a ta; chun, biekin chu a laia chun um a tih.
Chun, ram thilinhlân

Chun, hi hi ding hin, thiempuhai ta ding ngei chun, thilinhlân inthieng chu a um ding a nih; hmârtienga chun a dung tieng tawng sîng hni sâng nga, thlangtienga chun a khang tieng sîng khat, chun, simtienga chun, a dung tieng sîng hni sâng nga, chun
Thiempu Zadok naupasalhai hlânthienga um, ka rawngbâwltuhai ta ding chun a ni ding a nih; Levi mihai an invâk hmang a, Israel thlahai an invâk hmang lai khawma invâk hmang ve lohai chu.
Chun, an ta ding chun ram thilinhlân laia thilinhlân, ân thieng tak, Levi mihai ramria chun a ni ding a nih.

Chun, thiempuhai ramri zûl peiah, Levi mihai chun a dung tieng sîng hni sâng nga, a khang tieng sâng khat an nei ding a nih; a dung tieng hrim hrim chu sîng hni sâng nga ni vawng a ta, a khang tieng chu sîng khat.
An zawr ding a ni naw a, inthleng khawm inthleng bawk naw ni hai; chu ram ra hmasatakhai khawm chu mi dang chana siem ding a ni nawh;

Chun, sîng hni sâng nga hmaa, a khang tieng sâng nga mâksana la um chu, hmang narâna ding nîng a ta, khawpui ding le chêngna ding le, khawpui khawhnâwma dingin; chun, khawpui sûng chu, chu laia chun a um ding a nih.
Khawpui chun khawperhai nei a ta; hmârtienga chun tawng za hni sâwmnga, simtienga chun za hni sâwmnga bawk; saktienga chun za hni sâwmnga, thlangtienga chun za hni sâwmnga bawk nei a tih.

Chun, a dung tieng a la mahla, ram thilinhlân chen chie la um chu, saktienga chun sîng khat nîng a ta, thlangtienga khawm chun sîng khat bawk nîng a tih; ram thilinhlân zui peiah a ni ding a nih; chutaka rasuok chu khawpuia sinthawtuhai fâk ding nîng a tih.
Chun, Israel hnamhai po po laia khawpuia sin thaw mihai chun inlet an tih.
Ram thilinhlâna siem po po chu sîng hni sâng nga le sîng hni sâng nga bawk inep nîng a tih; chun, thilinhlân inthieng chu a sîr li inangin, khawpui iṭhut sûng ding chun în hlân ding a nih.

Chun, a la mahla chu lal ta ding nîng a ta, ram thilinhlân inthieng sîr hi tieng le khing tiengah, khawpui sûng ṭhut, thilinhlân saktieng sîra, tawng sîng hni sâng nga hma kha; chun, thlangtieng panga ramria chun, thlangtienga chun sîng hni sâng nga hma bawk kha, chanhai zui pei kha lal ta ding nîng a tih; chun, ram thilinhlân inthieng le in hmun inthieng chu, chu laia chun a um ding a nih.
Chu nawa khawm chun, Levi mihai chana inthawk khan khawpui iṭhutnaa inthawk le khan, chu chu lailia chun lal chan chu a um a, Juda ramri le Benjamin ramri inkâra chun, chu chu lal ta ding nîng a tih.
Chun, hnam danghai chungthua chun, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chen, Benjamin, chan khat.
Benjamin ramria, saktienga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Simeon, chan khat.
Simeon ramria, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Issakar, chan khat.
Issakar ramria, saktienga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Zebulun, chan khat.
Zebulun ramria, saktieng panga inthawka thlangtieng pang chenah, Gad chan khat.
Gad ramriah, sim khâw zâwnga simtiengah, a ramri chu Tamar-a inthawka Meribath-kades tuihai chen, Aigupta vadungtê chen, tuisuoriet lien
Hi hi Israel hnamhai kuoma aisâna rochan dinga i sem ding ram a nih; chun, hienghai hi an hmun hran hran tamtakhai chu a nih; Lalpa
Chun, hienghai hi khawpuia inthawka suoknahai chu an nih; hmâr tieng panga chun, inkhia tawng sâng li za nga a na;
chun, khawpui dâi kawtkhâr chu Israel hnamhai hming ang pei nîng a ta, hmârtieng panga chun dâi kawtkhâr pathum: Reuben dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Juda dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Levi dâi kawtkhâr pakhat;
chun, saktieng panga khawm chun tawng sâng li za nga bawk nîng a ta, chun, dâi kawtkhâr pathum; Josef dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Benjamin dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Dan dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat;
simtieng panga chun inkhia tawng sâng li za nga nîng a ta; dâi kawtkhâr pathum: Simeon dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Issakar dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Zebulun dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat;
thlangtieng panga chun tawng sâng li za nga bawk nîng a ta, dâi kawtkhâr pathum leh; Gad dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat, Aser dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat; Naphtali dâi kawtkhâr, pakhat.
A vêl chun tawng sîng khat sâng riet nîng a ta; chu khawpui hming chu chu nia inthawk chun, “Jehova Samma

Chun, Juda lal Jehoiakim chu Pathien ina bûr le bêl ṭhenkhat leh Lalpa chun ama kuta chun a pêk tah a; Sinar rama a pathien ina chun a lâk a, chuong bûr le bêlhai chu a pathien sum ina chun a hung lâk ta a.
Chun, lal chun a mitillâkhai chunga hotu Aspenaz kuoma chun Israel nauhai mi ṭhenkhat lal chi ngei le miṭha chi ngei hung ṭhuoi dingin a hril a;
Lal chun kum thum sûng a châwm a, a tâwpa chun lal hmaa an ngîr theina dingin lal bu fâk le a uoin dâwn ngei chu ni tina an chanpuol dingin anni chu a ruotpêk a.
Hieng hai laia Juda nauhai chu Daniel, Hanania, Misael le Azaria an nih.
Chun, mitillâk hotu chun anni chu hming tharhai a pêk a; Daniel chu Beltesazzar ân bûk a, Hanania chu Sadrak, Misael chu Mesak, Azaria chu Abednego.

Nisienlakhawm, Daniel chun a lungrilin lal bu fâk le a uoin dâwnhai chun ama chu insukpawrche lo a tum tlat a: chuongchun, mitillâkhai hotu kuoma chun ama chu ân sukpawrche naw theina ding kawng chu a hni a.
Chun, Pathien chun Daniel chu mitillâkhai hotu mithmua lunginsietna le ditsakna hlaw thei dingin a siem a.

Chun, mitillâkhai hotu chun Daniel kuoma chun, “Lal, in dâwn ding le in bu fâk ding ruotpêktu cheu ka lalpa chu ka ṭi a nih, i kum inangpui tleirâwl danghai nêka se lemin i hmêl chu a hmu si naw ding am a nih? Chuong a ni chun, lal kuomah ka lu hi ṭitumtakah i sie a ni ding a nih,” a ta.
Daniel chun mitillâkhai hotuin anni Daniel, Hanania, Misael le Azaria vêngtu dinga a ruot, Hammelzar kuoma chun,
“Ka ngên che hi, i siehlawhai hi ni sâwm sûng ensin raw khai; fâk dingin thlai chau le dâwn dingin tui chau mîn pêktir la.
Chun, tleirâwl dang lal bu fâk fahai hmêlput dân le, keini hmêlput dânhai chu enkhi ni raw se; chun, chutaka i hmu ang ang chun, i siehlawhai hi i law law law el rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, hi chungchâng thuah anni thu chu a ngai a, ni sâwm sûng chu a ensin ta a.
Ni sâwm hnunga chun tleirâwl dang lal bu fâk fatuhai po po nêk chun an hmêlput dânhai chu a hung inlang ṭha lem ta a.
Chuongchun, anni vêngtu chun an bu fâk ding le uoin an dâwn ding chu a sie hmang a, thlai chau a pêk lem ta a.
Chun, hieng tleirâwlhai pali hi Pathien chun varna le thiemna po poa bengvarna le hrietna a pêk a; chun, Daniel chun thilhmulâwkhai le manghai chung po poa chun hrietthiemna a nei a.
Chun, lalin anni hung ṭhuoilûtna dinga a ruot nihai tâwpa chun mitillâkhai hotu chun anni chu Nebukadnezzar hmaa chun a hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Lal chun anni chu a lo biek tâwl a, an rênga lai chun Daniel hai, Hanania hai, Misael hai le Azaria hai ang tukhawm an um naw a, chuleiin, anni chu lal hmaa chun an ngîr ta a.
Chun, varna le hrietthiemna kawng tinrêngah, lalin a indawn ta hrim hrima chun, a ram sûnga aisânthiemhai le mitvaidawi thiemhai po po nêka le sâwma var lemin anni chu a hriet a.
Chun, Daniel lem chu Kura inlal kum khatna chenin a um zing ta a.
Chun, Nebukadnezzarin ro a rêl a, a kum hninaa chun Nebukadnezzar chun manghai a mang ta a, a lungril chu a hung buoi ta a, in khawm a in ṭha thei ta naw a.
Lal chun an kuomah, “Mang ka nei a, chu mang chu hre suok nâwk dingin ka lungril a buoi ngawt el a nih,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun a dawn a, Kaldai mihai kuoma chun, “Chu thil chu keimaa inthawkin a fe hmang tlat ta a: mang le hrilfiena chu in mîn hriettir naw chun sât nawi vawng nîng in ta, in inhai chu êk pei khâwmna hmuna siem ni bawk a tih.

Nisienlakhawm, mang le a hrilfiena chu in mîn hriettir thei chun keimaa inthawkin thilpêkhai le lâwmmanhai le inzaumna nasatak hai hmûng in tih; chuleiin, mang le a hrilfiena chu mîn hmutir ro,” a ta.
Chun, an dawn nâwk a, “Lal chun a siehlawhai hi mang chu hril phawt raw se, chun a hrilfiena chu hril kan tih,” an ta.
