Chun, lal chun a dawn a, “Chu thil chu keimaa inthawkin a fe hmang tlat tah ti in hmu lei hin, chu chu hun remchâng takah in hmang a nih ti ka hriet chieng a nih.

Nisienlakhawm, mang chu in mîn hriettir naw chun, in ta dingin dân pakhat chau a um a nih: hun a hung inthleng hmakhat chu ka hmaa hin thu sie le khêl hril dingin in inbuotsai a ni si a; chuleiin, mang chu mi hril unla; chun mang chu a hrilfiena in mîn entir thei ngei a nih ti ka hriet ding annâwm,” a ta.

Kaldai mihai chun lal chu an dawn a, “Hnuoi chung hrim hrima hin lal chungchâng thu hi ân entir thei ding tukhawm an um nawh: chuleichun, lal khawmin, laltak khawmin, rorêltu khawmin hieng ang thil hi mitvaidawithiemhai amanih, aisânthiemhai amanih, Kaldai mihai kuoma mani khawm an indawn ngai hrim hrim nawh.
Hi thil chunga hin lal chu a lunginsen a, ṭi a um ta êm êm a, Babulona mi var po pohai chu sukbohmang dingin thu a pêk ta a.
Chuongchun, thupêk chu a fe suok ta a, mi varhai chu sukhlum ding an lo ni ta a; Daniel le a ruolhai khawm chu sukhlum dingin an zawng ta a.
Chun, Daniel chun, Babulon rama mi varhai sukhlum dinga fe suok, lal vêngtu sipai pâwl hotu Ariok chu vartak le fimkhurtakin a lo dawn ta a;
lal sipai hotu Ariok chu a dawn a, “Lala inthawka thupêk iengdinga pawimaw êm êm am a ni a?” a ta. Chun, Ariok chun Daniel kuoma chun thil chu ân hriettir a.
Chun, Daniel chu a va lût a, ama chu hun ruotpêk a, a mang umzie chu lal chu inentir dingin lal chu a ngên a.
Chun, Daniel chu a ina chun a va fe a, a ruolhai Hanania hai, Misael hai, Azaria hai chu thil chu ân hriettir ta a;
Babulona mi var danghai lai chun Daniel le a ruolhai chu an thi ve nawna dinga, hi thurûk chungchâng thua hin vâna Pathien zângaina chu an ngên theina dingin.
Chun, zâna inlârnain Daniel kuoma chun chu thurûk chu puongin a um ta a. Chun, Daniel chun vâna Pathien chu ân pâk ta a.
Daniel chun a dawn a,
“Pathien hming chu chatuon chatuon chenin inpâkin um raw se,
Varna le hrâtna dâm chu ama ta a ni si a.
Hunhai le hunbihai chu a sukdanglam a,
Lalhai chu a suktlâwmin lalhai chu a tungding a;
Mi varhai kuoma chun varna a pêk a, hrietna neihai kuoma chun hrietthiemna a pêk bawk a;
Thurûkhai le thil inthûkhai chu an kuomah a puong a,
Inthima thil um chu a hriet a, var chu amaa chun a um a nih.
Aw nang kan thlatuhai Pathien, varna le hrâtna mi petu,
Kân pâk che a, i kuomah lâwmthu ka hung hril hi,
Kan hung ngên chu i mîn hriettir ta a,
Lal thu chungchâng hi kan kuomah i hung inhriettir ta si a,” tiin.

Chuongchun, Daniel chu lalin Babulona mi varhai sukbohmang dinga a ruot Ariok kuoma chun a va lût a, a va fe a, a kuoma chun, “Babulona mi varhai hi sukbohmang naw rawh; lal kuoma chun mi ṭhuoi lût la, mang umzie chu lal chu inentir ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Ariok chun Daniel chu lal hmaa chun inhmâwtakin a hung ṭhuoi lût a, a kuoma chun, “Juda ram mi sal intânghai lai hin, a mang umzie lal chu inhriettir ding mi pakhat ka hmu suok tah,” a ta.
Lal chun a dawn a, Daniel, a hming Beltesazzar kuoma chun, “Mang ka ihmu tâk le a umzie chu nang hin i mîn hriettir thei ding maw?” a ti a, ân dâwn a.
Daniel chun lal hmaa chun a dawn a, “Thurûk lalin a iphût hi mi varhaiin amani, aisânthiemhaiin amani, mitvaidawithiemhaiin amani, vânghriltuhaiin amani khawm lal chu inentir thei naw ni hai;

amiruokchu, vânah Pathien, thurûkhai phuongtu chu a um a, ama chun lal Nebukadnezzar chu ni nuhnunga thil um dinghai chu ân hriettir a nih. I mang le i khum chunga i lua i thil hmulâwkhai chu hienghi an nih:

nanga ta ding chun, aw lalpa, hi hnunga thil la hung tlung dinghai chu i khum chungah i ngaituonahai chu i lungrilah a hung lût a nih; thurûkhai puongtu chun thil la hung tlung ding chu ân hriettir che a ni chu.

Keima chungthua chun, mi dang hrim nêka varna ka hau lem leia hi thurûk hi phuong a ni naw a; amiruokchu, a umzie chu lal kuoma inhriettir a ni theina ding le i lungrila i ngaituohai chu i hriet theina dingin a ni lem.
Aw lalpa, ngai ta, milim ropuitak el i hmu a, i en zing a. Chu milim nasatak el le, a varna nasatak el chu i hmaa chun a ngîr a; a hmêlputzie chu râpthlâktak el a na.
Hi milim chung thu chu, a lu chu rângkachak inthieng a na, a âwm le a bânhai chu tangkaruo a nih; a phîng le, a êlpuihai chu dârsen a na,
a kehai chu thîr a na, a kephahai chu a ṭhen thîr, a ṭhen chu bepil a nih.
Chun, kut lovin lungpui a hung insât thlâk a, chu milim thîr le pil kehaia ngîr chu a hung del a, nawi tamtaka a suknawi vawng chen i en a.

Chun, thîr dâm, pil dâm, dârsen dâm, tangkaruo dâm le rângkachak dâm chu inang rawngin an innawi ta a; nipui laia hrizâwlhaia busi ang el an hung ni ta a; chun, anni ta ding hrimin hmun hmu a ni ta naw a, thli chun a lên hmang vawng ta a; chun, kha lung milim deltu kha tlâng ropuitak a hung na, khawvêl po po a hluo sip ta a.
Hi hi mang chu a na, chu chu umzie chu lal hmaa hin kan hril ding a nih.
Aw lalpa, nang chu lalhai lal, vâna Pathienin ram dâm, thilthawtheina dâm, hrâtna dâm le ropuina dâm a pêk che chu i nih;

mihriem nauhai chêngna taphawt le, ramhnuoia ramsahai le chunglêng vatehai umna taphawt chu i kutah a pêk vawng a, an rênga chunga chun rorêl dingin a siem che a: chuongchun, nang chu rângkachak lu chu i nih.
Chun, nanga hnunga hin ram dang nanga nêka chîn lem la hung suok a ta; chun, ram pathumna dârsen chun khawvêl chung po poa rorêlna chu nei a tih.

Chun, ram palina chu thîr anga hrât nîng a ta; thîr chu a nawiin ân nawi ta a, thil po po hne angin; chu thîr chuong thil po po suknâwitu ang chu nawi tamtakah sukdar nîng a ta, râwtnawi la nîng a tih.

Chun, a kehai le a kepârhai chu aṭhen bêlhemtu pil le aṭhen thîra i hmu ang khan, ram inṭhe hung nîng a tih, nisienlakhawm, bepil chu thîr le inpawla i hmu ang tak khan amaa chun thîr hrâtna chu um a tih.
Chun, kehai, kepârhai chu aṭhen thîr a na, aṭhen chu pil a ni ang khan, chu ram khawm chu aṭhena chu hrât hlêng a ta, aṭhena chu hrât naw hlêng a tih.
Chun, thîr chu bepil inhnâk le inpawla i hmu ang tak khan anni chu mihriem chiah inchawkpawl an ta; nisienlakhawm, thîr chun pil chu ân pâwlpui thei naw ang bawkin anni chu inzawm tlat naw ni hai.

Chun, tlânga inthawka lung chu kuthai ṭhang lova sât thlâka uma, thîr dâm, dârsen dâm, pil dâm, tangkaruo dâm le rângkachak dâm chu a nâwia a sukkawi i hmu ta ang khan, Pathien ropuitak chun hi hnunga thil hung um ding lal kuoma chun a hung inhriettir a ni hi; mang chu indik ngei a ta, a umzie khawm chu indik bawk a tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal Nebukadnezzar chu a bawkkhup a, Daniel chu chibai a bûk a, ama kuoma chun riminhnikhai le inthâwina inhlân dingin thu a pêk ta a.
Chun, lal chun Daniel chu a dawn a, “Indiktakin, i Pathien chu pathienhai Pathien, lalhai Lalpa, hi thurûk hi i puong theizie hmu hrim hin, thurûkhai puongtu chu a ni ngei hi,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun Daniel chu ropuitakin a siem a, thilpêk ropuitakhai a pêk a, Babulon rama mi var po po chunga hotu tak le Babulon biel sûng po poa rorêl dingin a siem ta a.
Chun, Daniel chun lal chu a hni a, ama chun Sadrak hai, Mesak hai, Abednego hai chu Babulon chungchâng thuha hotu dingin a ruot a. Daniel ruok chu lal rorêlna ina chun a um ta lem a.
Lal Nebukadnezzar chun rângkachak milim a siem a, ân sângzie chu tawng sâwmruk a na, a khangtieng chu tawng ruk a nih; Babulon biel sûnga Dura phaizâwla chun ân ngîrtir ta a.

Chun, lal Nebukadnezzarin milim ân ngîrtir chu inhlân dinga hung dingin, lal Nebukadnezzar chun biel awptuhai, ram awptuhai, sipaihotuhai, lalhai, tangka sum enkawltuhai, rorêltuhai, dân hre mihai le ram bunga rorêltuhai po po chu a ko khâwm vawng a.

Chun, biel awptuhai, ram awptuhai, sipaihotuhai, lalhai, tangka sum enkawltuhai, rorêltuhai le dân hre mihai le ram bunga rorêltuhai po po chu lal Nebukadnezzarin milim ân ngîrtir inhlânnaa chun an hung khâwm vawng a; chuongchun, Nebukadnezzarin milim ân ngîrtir hmaa chun an ngîr tâwl a.
Chun, tlângsam chu inringtakin a hung khêk a, “Aw mipui po pohai, hnam po pohai le, ṭawng po pohai, in kuomah hieng anga thupêk hi a nih:

tawtawrâwt dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm, rawsem dâm, perkhuong dâm, baza dâm le rimawi chi tinrêng inri in hriet pha leh, lal Nebukadnezzarin rângkachak milim ân ngîrtir hmaa hin bawkkhup in ta, chibai in bûk ding a nih;

Chuleiin, chu lai chun, mipuihai chun tawtawrâwt dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm, rawsem dâm, perkhuong le rimawi tinrênghai ri chu an hriet chun, mipui po po le, hnam po pohai le, ṭawng po pohai chu lal Nebukadnezzarin rângkachak milim ân ngîrtir hmaa chun an bawkkhup a, chibai an bûk ta a.
Anni chun lal Nebukadnezzar kuoma chun, “Aw lalpa, kumkhuoin dam rawh.

Aw lalpa, nang chun thupêk i siem a: tawtawrâwt dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm, rawsem dâm, perkhuong dâm le rimawi tinrêng an hriet pha chun mi tin chu bawkkhup an ta, rângkachak milim chu chibai an bûk ding a na;
chun, tukhawm bawkkhupa chibai bûk naw taphawt chu meithuk chawklai râpthlâktaka chun pei lût nîng an tih, tiin.

Juda mi ṭhenkhat hieng Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego hai Babulon biel sûng chungchânga hotua i ruothai kha, khânghai rawi khan, aw lalpa, an pawisa naw che a nih, i pathienhai rawng chu an bâwl naw a, rângkachak milim în ngîrtir khawm kha chibai an bûk bawk nawh,” an ta.
Chun, Nebukadnezzar chun a lungsenna le a ṭitumna chun Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego hai chu hung ṭhuoi dingin thu a pêk a. Chun, chuong mihai chu lal hmaa chun an hung ṭhuoi ta a.
Nebukadnezzar chun a dawn a, an kuomah, “Aw Sadrak, Mesak, Abednego, ka pathien rawng chu in bâwl naw a, rângkachak milim kân ngîrtir khawm hi chibai in bûk nawh ti hi ân dik am a nih?

tuhin tawtawrâwt dâm, theihle dâm, ṭingṭang dâm, rawsem dâm, perkhuong dâm, baza le rimawi tinrêng ri chu in hriet pha pha, in bawkkhupa milim ka siem chu chibai in bûk ding chun a ṭha; amiruokchu, chibai in bûk naw chun, chu dârkâr sûng ngeia chun meithuk chawklai râpthlâktaka chun peiin um in tih; ka kuta inthawka sansuok ding cheu pathien chu tu am a ni leh?” a ta.
Sadrak, Mesak le, Abednego chun an dawn a, lal kuoma chun, “Aw Nebukadnezzar, hi thil chungchâng thua hin kan dawn che a ṭûl nawh.
Chuong chu a ni ding chun, kan Pathien a rawng kan ibâwl chun meithuk chawklai râpthlâka inthawk chun a mi sanhim thei a; aw lalpa, i kuta inthawk khawmin a mi sanhim thei a nih.
Chuong chu ni naw ding khawm ni sien, i pathienhai chu an rawng bâwl naw ning ung a, rângkachak milim în ngîrtir khawm chu chibai bûk bawk nawng kan tih,” an ta.

Chun, Nebukadnezzar chu lunginsennain a sip a, a hmêl umzie chu Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego chunga chun a hung danglam ta a; chuleiin, a hril a, meithuk chu a lum hlak ang let saria suklum dingin thu a pêk ta a.
Chun, a sipai pâwl laia mihrâttakhai chu Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego chu khuop a, meithuk chawklai râpthlâktaka chun pei lût dingin thu a pêk a.
Chun, chuong mihai chu an kekawrhai, an lukâwmhai, an kawrfuolhai le an silfên danghaia chun khuopa umin meithuk chawklai râpthlâktakah chun peiin an um ta a.
Chuongchun, lal thupêk chu a nasa êm a, meithuk chu a lum nasa êm lei chun, meichawk chun Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego pei lûttuhai chu a sukhlum ta a.
Chun, chuong mi pathum, Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego chu khuop hlawm saa umin meithuk chawklai râpthlâktakah chun an tla lût ta a.

Chun, lal Nebukadnezzar chun mak a ti ta hle a, inhmawtakin a tho a, a rorêltuhai chu a biek a, an kuomah, “Mi pathum kha khuop sain mei lai ei pei lût a ni naw am a ni kha?” a ta. Anni chun an dawn a, lal kuoma chun, “Aw lalpa, pei e,” an ta.
Ama chun a dawn a, “En ta u, mei laia khun mi pali sût sain inlawnin ka hmu a, na hrim an ti nawh; a palina hmêl putzie chu pathienhai naupa ang a nih,” a ta.

Chun, Nebukadnezzar chu meithuk chawklai râpthlâktak bula chun a hung hnai a, “Sadrak, Mesak, Abednego, nangni Pathien Chunghnungtak siehlawhai, hung suok unla, hi tieng hin hung ro,” tiin a biek a. Chun, Sadrak, Mesak le, Abednego chu mei laia inthawk chun an hung suok ta a.

Chun, biel awptuhai, ram awptuhai, sipai hotuhai le lal rorêltuhai hung inkhâwmhai chun chuong mihai chu an taksahai chunga chun meiin thilthawtheina a nei naw a, an lua sam khawm chu a kângkin naw a, an zakuohai khawm chu a danglam chuong naw a, anni chu mei rim khawm an innam nawh ti chu an hmu a.

Chun, Nebukadnezzar chun a hril a, “Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego hai Pathien, a vântirko hung tir a, a siehlaw ama ringtuhai hung sanhimtu chu inpâkin um raw se; lal thuhai chu a hung sukdanglam a, an Pathien chau naw chu pathien dang hrim hrim chu a rawng an bâwla chibai an bûk nawna dingin an taksahai chu a humpêk ta a.

Chuleichun, thupêk ka siem, mi tin, hnam tin, le ṭawng tin, hieng Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego hai Pathien chunga thil hril suol taphawt chu, sât nawi vawng nîng an ta, an inhai khawm chu êk siekhâwmnaa siem nîng a tih; hieng ang kawnga mi sanhim thei pathien dang hrim an um naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, Babulon biel sûnga chun lal chun Sadrak, Mesak le Abednego hai chu a ân kâisângtir ta a.
Lal Nebukadnezzar chun, Mi po po, hnam po po, ṭawng tinhai le hnuoi chunga chêng taphawthai kuoma chun, in kuomah inremna hi sukpungin um raw se.
Pathien Chunghnungtakin ka kuomah inchiknahai le thilmakhai a thaw chu inentir hi ṭhain ka hriet a.
Ân chiknahai chu a va ropui ngei de!
A thilmakhai chun thil a va thaw thei ngei de!
A ram chu chatuon ram a na,
A rorêlna khawm chu ṭhanga inthawk ṭhang nâwksâwng chen a nih.
Kei Nebukadnezzar hi ka ina chun inhawitakin ka um a, ka lal ina chun chênghnâwngtakin ka um a.
Mang mi sukṭi êm êm el chu ka hmu a, ka khum chunga ka ngaituonahai le, ka lua ka thil hmulâwknahai chun a mi suklungzîng êm êm a.
Chuleichun, mang umzie chu an mi hrilfie theina dingin Babulon rama mi var po pohai hung ṭhuoi khâwm dingin thupêk ka siem ta a.
Chun, mitvaidawithiemhai, aisânthiemhai, Kaldai mihai le vânghriltuhai chu an hung lût a: chun, an hmaa chun mang chu ka hril a; nisienlakhawm, a umzie chu an mîn hriettir thei naw a.

Amiruokchu, a tâwp taka chun ka hmaa chun Daniel chu a hung lût a, a hming chu ka pathien hming ang peiin Beltesazzar a nih; amaa chun pathien inthienghai thlarau chu a um a; chuongchun, a hmaa chun mang chu ka hril ta a;

“Aw Beltesazzar, mitvaidawithiemhai hotu, pathien inthienghai thlarau chu nangmaa chun a um a, thurûk chun nang a sukbuoi ngai naw che ti ka hriet leiin, ka manga thil hmulâwkhai ka hmu ta le, a umzie chu mi hril rawh.
Ka khum chunga ka lua thil hmulâwkhai ka hmu chu hieng ang hi a nih; hnuoi lailung lai hin thing ka hmu a, ka en zing a, ân sângzie chu a nasa hle a.
Thing chu a hung inṭhang a, a hung lien a, ân sângzie chun vân a hung phâk a, ân hmu theina chun khawvêl po po tâwp chen a huop bawk a.
Ka khum chunga thil hmulâwkhai ka hmua chun, ngai ta, vâna inthawkin vêngtu le mi inthieng pakhat a hung thla a.

Ama chu inringtakin a khêk a, ‘Thing kha phûr thlu unla, a kâuhai kha tan thla ro, a hnahai kha sâwi ṭil unla, a ra kha the dar bawk ro; a kâuhaia vatehai le, a hnuoia ramsahai kha fe hmang raw hai seh.

Amiruokchu, a zunghai kûng- hmui kha chu rama hlobet innêm lai, thîr le dârsen hnânga khuopin hnuoia khan mâksan ro; chun, vâna inthawka daidaw chun sukhuin um sienla, a fâk chu ramsahai angin hnuoia hlobet ni sienla;
a lungril khawm chu mihriem lungrila inthawka sukdanglam ni sienla, a kuoma chun ramsahai lungril chu pêk ni raw se; chun, hun sarihai chu ama chungah bo raw se.

Hi thu sukthlûk hi vêngtuhai thupêk le, mi inthienghai thua phût: hringna nei taphawt chun Achunghnungtak chun mihriemhai rama chun ro a rêl a, a nuomna kuoma chun a pêk a, mi inhnuoitakhai khawm a chunga chun a sie thei ti an hrietna dingin a nih,’ tiin.

Hi mang hi kei Nebukadnezzar hin ka hmu ta a, Aw Beltesazzar, a umzie chu hrilfie rawh, ka ram sûnga mi varhai chun a umzie chu an mîn hriettir thei si naw a: nisienlakhawm, nang chun i thei a nih; pathien inthienghai thlarau chu nangmaa chun a um si a,” ka ti a.

Chun, Daniel a hming dang Beltesazzar chu chawmkhat tak chu mak ti takin a um a, a ngaituonahai chun ama a sukbuoi vieu a. Lal chun a dawn a; “Beltesazzar, mang chun amanih, a umzie chun amanih sukbuoi naw raw se che.” a ta. Beltesazzar chun a dawn a. “Ka lalpa, mang chu nangma theidatuhai che ta ding a na, a umzie chu i hmêlmahai ta ding a nih.
Chu thing i hmu, hung inṭhang a, hung lien a, ân sângzie chun vân hung tawng a, ân hmu theina chen chu hnuoi po po huop a,
Aw lalpa, nang hi i nih: i hung inṭhangin i hung hrât a, i ropuina chu a hung lien a, vân a hung tawng a, i ram hlak chu hnuoi tâwp chen a ni bawk si a.

Chun, lalin vâna inthawka vêngtu le mi inthieng hung thlaa, Thing kha phûr thlu unla sukbohmang ro, amiruokchu, a zunghai kûnghmui ruok chu hnuoia hlobet innêm lai thîr le dârsen hnânga khuopin mâksan ro, vâna inthawka daidâw chun hu hlak sienla, a fâk ding khawm chu ramhnuoia ramsahai fâk ang chu ni raw se; ama chunga hun sarihai a fe liem hmakhat chun, ti thu an hung hril ruok hi chu,
a umzie chu hieng ang hi a nih: Aw lalpa, hi hi Achunghnungtak thupêk chu a nih, ka pu lal chunga hung tlung hi;

chuongchun, mihriem laia inthawka hnawt hmang nîng i ta, i chêngna chu rama ramsahai lai nîng a tih; chun, bâwngchalhai anga hlobet infâktir nîng i ta, vâna inthawka dâidâw chun sukhu ni bawk i tih; chun, hun sarihai chu i chunga chun fe liem a tih; mihriemhai ram chunga hin Achunghnungtak chun ro a rêl a, a nuom nuom kuomah a pêk hlak ti i hriet hmakhat chu.
Chun, thing zunghai kûnghmui hla dinga thu an pêk chungthua hin chu; i ram hi chu nangma ta ni zing a ta; chu hnunga chun vânhai chun ro an rêl ngei a nih ti hre tâng i tih.

Chuleiin, aw lalpa, ka thurâwn hi i kuoma chun pawmtlâka ngai ni raw se; i suolnahai chu felnain thleng la, i khawhlonahai chu mi rimsihai chunga lunginsietna inentir bawk rawh; i tluongtlungna hi sukseia a um theina dingin,” a ta.
Hieng thil po po hi lal Nebukadnezzar chunga chun a hung tlung ta a.
Thla sâwm pahnihai tâwpa chun Babulon ram lal ina chun a fe a.
Lal chun a hril a, “Hi hi Babulon ram ropuitak, ka thilthawtheina hrât nasatak chun, lal chêngna ding le, ka în lalna ropuina dinga ka siem chu a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Lalin chuonga thu a hril lai zing chun, vâna inthawkin râwl a hung thla a, “Aw lal Nebukadnezzar, nangma kuoma inthawkin ram chu ṭhe hmang a ni tah ti hi i kuomah hril a nih.

Chun, mihriemhai laia inthawka hnawt hmang nîng i ta, i chêngna ding chu rama ramsahai lai nîng a tih; bâwngchal anga hlobet infâktir nîng i ta; chun, hun sarihai chu i chungah fe liem a tih; mihriemhai ram chunga hin Achunghnungtak chun ro a rêl a, a nuom nuom kuomah a pêk hlak ti i hriet hmakhat chun,” a hung ti a.

Chu dâr ngeia chun chuong thil chu Nebukadnezzar chunga chun intlungtir a ni ta a, mihriem laia inthawka hnawt hmangin a um a, bâwngchal angin hlobet a pet a, a taksa chu vâna inthawka dâidâw chun a sukhu a, a samhai chu mupui hmul ang el a hung ni a, a tinhai chu vatehai tin ang a hung ni chen chun.

Chuong nihai tâwpa chun, kei Nebukadnezzar hin ka mithai chu vântieng ka tang a, ka hrietna chu ka kuomah a hung kîr nâwk a, Achunghnungtak chu mal ka sâwm a, chatuona hring zing chu ka chawimawiin kân pâk a:
A rorêlna chu chatuon rorêl a na,
A lalram chu ṭhanga inthawk ṭhang sâwng tamtak chen a ni si a;
Hnuoi chung hluotuhai po po chu iengkhawm ni lo anga ngai an na,
Hnuoi chung hluotuhai le vâna sipai pâwl ruolhai chunga chun
A nuom ang angin a thaw a,
Tukhawmin a kut chu an chel thei naw a.
“Nangin ieng am i thaw an leh?” an ti thei bawk nawh.

Chu chu huna chun ka hrietthiemna chu ka kuomah a hung kîr nâwk a; ka ram ropuina le ka înlalna le êngna chu ka kuomah an hung kîr nâwk si a; chun, ka upahai le ka lalhai chun an mi zawng a; ka rama chun tungdingin ka um a, ropuina nasatak el chu ka kuomah belsain a um ta a.
Tuhin, kei Nebukadnezzar hin vâna Pathien chu ka chawimawiin, ka chawisângin kân pâk a; a sinthawhai po po chu indikna a na, a lampuihai chu felna a nih; chun, chapoa fehai chu a sukhnuoi thei a nih.
Lal Belsazzar chun a lalhai sâng khat ta dingin ruoi ropuitak a ṭhe a, sâng khat hmaa chun uoin a dâwn ta a.

Belsazzar chun uoin chu a hang dâwn chun, lal le a lalhai le a nuhmeihai le, a thaikêmhai chun an dâwnna dingin, a pa Nebukadnezzarin Jerusalem Templea inthawka a lâk, rângkachak le tangkaruo bûr le bêlhai chu hung la dingin thu a pêk ta a.
Chun, Jerusalema Pathien in Templea rângkachak bûr le bêl an lâk tahai chu an hung lâk ta a; lal le a lalhai le, a nuhmeihai le a thaikêmhai chun chuonga chun uoin an dâwn ta a.
Uoin chu an hang dâwn a, rângkachak dâm, tangka dâm, dârsen dâm, thîr dâm, thing dâm, lung dâm pathienhai chu an inpâk ta a.
chun, chu dâr ma chun mihriem kut kutpârhai a hung suok a, lal in bang nâl vâr chunga chun sathâu khâwnvar sana chun a ziek ta a; chun, lal chun chu kut bawng, chu hung ziektu chu a hmu a.
Chun, lal hmêlput dân chu a hung danglam a, a ngaituonahai chun ama a sukbuoi ta a; a kâwngru insuktuoknahai chu a hung inthâwt a, a khûp le khûp chu an invuoktuo ta a.

Chun, aisânthiemhai, Kaldai mihai le vânghriltuhai chu hung ṭhuoi dingin lal chu inringtakin a khêk ta a. Lal chun Babulona mi varhai kuoma chun, “Tukhawm hi lekhaziek hi tiem a, a umzie mîn entir thei taphawt chu puon senduk insiltirin a rînga chun rângkachak khaidiet inhlitir nîng a ta, hi ram rorêltu pathumna chu ni bawk a tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal mi varhai po po chu an hung lût a; nisienlakhawm, lekhaziek chu an tiem thei naw a, a umzie khawm chu lal chu an inhriettir thei naw a.
Chuongchun, lal Belsazzar chu nasatakin a lunginzîng tah a, a hmêl chu a hung danglam a, a lalhai khawm chu an lunginzîng nasa hle a.

Chuongchun, lal le a lalhai thuhai lei chun ruoiṭhena ina chun lalnu chu a hung lût a, lalnu chun a hril a, “Aw lalpa, kumkhuoin dam rawh, i ngaituonahai chun sukbuoi naw sienla che, i hmêlput dân khawm danglam bawk naw raw se.

I rama hin mi pakhat amaa pathien inthienghai thlarau umna chu a um a; i pa damlai khawm êngna dâm, hrietthiemna dâm, pathienhai varna anga varna dâm amaa chun hmu suokin a um tah a: aw lalpa, i pa Nebukadnezzar, i pa chun ama chu mitvaidawithiemhai, aisânthiemhai, Kaldai mihai le vânghriltuhai hotuah a siem a,

lalin Beltesazzar ân bûk Daniela chun, thu ringhla umhai sukfelin, thu khirtakhai a umzie inentirin le manghai hrilfiein, amaa chun hrietna dâm, thiemna dâm le lungril ṭha bîk chu hmu suokin a um a. Tuhin Daniel chu inkotir la, a umzie chu inentir el a tih,” a ta.
Chun, lal hmaa chun Daniel chu an hung ṭhuoi lût a, lal chun Daniel kuomah, “Ka pa lalin Juda rama inthawka a hung ṭhuoi, Juda mi sal intânghai laia mi, Daniel chu i ni maw?
I chanchin ka lo hriet a, pathienhai thlarau chu nangmaah a um a, nangmaa chun êngna le thiemna le varna ṭha bîk chu hmuin a um ti ka lo hriet bawk a.
Tuhin, hi lekhaziek hi an tiema a umzie an mîn hriettir theina dingin mi varhai le aisânthiemhai chu ka hmaah ṭhuoi lûtin an um a; nisienlakhawm, thil umzie chu an inentir thei naw a.

Amiruokchu, a umziehai chu i hril theiin, thu ringhlaumhai khawm chu i sukfel thei tiin i chanchin hi ka lo hriet a; tuhin, lekhaziek hi i tiem thei a, a umzie chu i mîn hriettir thei chun puon senduk insiltir nîng i ta, i rîngah rângkachak khaidiet inhlitir ni bawk i ta, hi rama hin rorêltu pathumna chu nîng i tih,” a ta.

Daniel chun a dawn a, lal hmaa chun, “I thilpêkhai chu nangma ta ni lem sienla, i lâwmmanhai chu mi dang kuomah pe lem rawh, amiruokchu, lekhaziek chu lal kuoma chun tiem ka ta, a umzie chu inhriettir ka tih.
Aw nang lalpa, Achunghnungtak Pathien chun i pa Nebukadnezzar chu ram dâm, ropuina dâm, nasatna dâm, inlalna dâm a pêk a;

ropuina a pêk lei chun a hmaa chun mi po pohai, hnam po pohai le ṭawng tinhai chu an inthinin an ṭi a; a nuom nuom a that a, a nuom nuom chu an hringna a hla bawk a; a nuom nuom chu a kei sâng a, a nuom nuom chu a kei hnuoi bawk a.

Nisienlakhawm, a lungril chu a hung insâng a, a lungril a hung ngar phingle chun chapotakin a thaw ta a, ân lalna lalṭhungphaa inthawk chun sie hnuoiin a um ta a, amaa inthawk chun a ropuina chu an lâk hmang a,

chun, mihriem nauhai laia inthawk chun hnawt hmangin a um a; a lungril chu ramsahai lungril anga siem a hung na; a umna hmun chu ram sabengtunghai lai a ni ta a; chun, bâwngchal angin hlobet chu a ring a, a taksa chu vâna inthawka daidawin a sukhu ta bawk a: mihriemhai ram chunga hin Pathien Chunghnungtakin ro a rêl a, a nuom nuom chu a chunga chun a sie hlak ti a hriet hmakhat chun.
Aw Belsazzar, nang a naupa hin hi thil po po hi i hriet sa khawma i lungril i sukhnuoi naw a;

Vâna Lalpa chu kalin nang le nang în chawisâng ta lem a; a ina bûrlebêlhai chu i hmaa chun an hung lâk a, nang le i lalhai le i nuhmeihai le i thaikêmhai chun chuonga chun uoin in dâwn ta a; chun, tangka le rângkachak dâm, dârsen le thîr dâm, thing le lung dâma a siem pathienhai, hmu thei lo le, hre thei lo le, hrietna neilohai chu in inpâk a; Pathien a kuta i hringna umna le ama i lampui po po neitu chu i chawimawi naw a,
ama hmaa inthawk chun hi kut bawng hi hungtir a ni ta a, hi lekhaziek hi a hung ziek ta a nih.
Chun, hi hi lekhaziek hung inziek chu a nih: MENE, MENE, TEKEL UPHARSIN.
Chu thil umzie chu hi hi a nih: MENE chu ‘Pathien chun i ram chu a tiem zo ta a, a tâwp chu ân tlun tah a nih,’ tina a na.
TEKEL chu ‘Bûknahaia chun bûkin i um a, tling lova hmu i nih,’ tina a nih.
PERES chu ‘I ram chu ṭhe a ni ta a, Media le Persia mihai kuoma chun pêk a ni tah,’ tina a nih,” tiin.
Chu zân chun Kaldai lal Belsazzar chu thatin a um ta a.
Chun, Media mi Daria chun ram chu a nei ta a, ama chu kum sâwmruk pahnia upa a nih.
Daria chun, ram sûng po poa chun biel awptu za sâwmhni sie ding ti le

an chunga chun hotu pathum, a pakhat chu Daniel chu ni dingin ti chu ṭha a ti a; chun, hieng biel awptuhai hin anni kuoma chun sum sêng dân chanchin chu pêng an ta; chuongchun, lal chun sietna a tuok nawna dingin.
Chun, hi Daniel hi amaa chun lungvar ṭha bîk a um leiin biel awptuhai le an hotuhai nêk chun a danglam bîk rieu a; chuongchun, lal chun a ram po po chunga hotua siem a lungril a.

Chun, hotuhai le biel awptuhai chun ram chungthuah Daniel chunga chun remchâng an zawng ta a; nisienlakhawm, ama chu ring a um a, amaa chun indiknawna le suksuolna hrim hmu a ni naw leiin a suksuolna le hêkna remchâng chu an hmu thei dêr naw a.
Chun, chuong mihai chun, “A Pathien dân chung thuah ama kalna ei hmu ti ngawt naw chu, Daniel chunga hin remchâng ei hmu thei ngai âwm nawh,” an ta.
Chun, hieng hotuhai le biel awptuhai hi lal kuoma chun an hung inkhâwm a, a kuomah, “Lal Daria, kumkhuoin dam rawh.

Hi rama hotuhai, ram awptuhai, biel awptuhai, sipai hotuhai le rorêltuhai po po kan inkhâwm a, aw lalpa, ni sâwmthum sûng chu nangma kuoma chau naw chu tukhawmin mi dang amanih, pathien amani kuoma hnina a siem hrim hrim chu, ama chu sakeibakneihai pûka pei lût ni raw se tia dân dettak siem dingin kan inbiekthlûk tah a nih.
Tuhin, aw lalpa, chu dân chu sukdet la, Media le Persia mihai dâna sukdanglam a ni nâwk nawna dingin i hming ziek rawh,” an ta.
Chuongchun, lal Daria chun chu lekhaziek le thupêka chun a hming a ziek ta a.

Daniel chun chu lekhazieka chun hming ziek a ni tah ti a hriet phingleh a inah a fe ta a; (a pindana a tukverhai chu Jerusalem khuo tienga hawng zing a na) chun, a khûpin ni khatah vawi thum pei a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a Pathien hmaa chun, a hmaa a lo thaw rawp tah angin a ṭawngṭai a, lâwmthu a hril ta a.
Chun, chuong mihai chu an in- khâwm a, Daniel chu a Pathien hmaa hnina siema ṭawngṭaiin an hmu ta a.

Chun, an hung hnai a, lal hmaa chun lal thupêk chungchang thu chu an hril ta a; “Aw lalpa, nangma kuomah ti chau lo chu, ni sâwmthum sûng mi tukhawmin mi dang amani, pathien kuoma mani hnina siem chu sakeibakneihai pûka pei lût ding ti thupêka khan i hming i ziek an nâwm a nih?” an ta. Lal chun a dawn a, “Media mihai le Persia mihai dân sukdanglam thieng lo ang tak chun chu chu ân dik a nih,” a ta.

Chun, an dawn a, lal kuoma chun, “Kha Daniel Juda ram mi salintângpa khan, aw lalpa, nang a pawisa naw che a, i thupêk i hming ziek khawm kha a pawisa naw a, ni tin hnina vawi thum a siem zie a nih,” an ta.
Chun, lal chun hieng thu hi a hriet phingleh nasatakin a lungni ta naw a, Daniel chu sansuok dingin a lungril chu a fu ta tlat a; nisa tlâk hmakhat chun sansuok thei dan ding nasatakin a ngaituo a.

Chun, chuong mihai chu lal kuomah an hung inkhâwm a, lal kuoma chun, “Aw lalpa, thupêk amanih, dân amanih lalin a siem ta chu sukdanglam thieng lo a nih ti hi Media le Persia mihai dân a nih ti hi hre rawh,” an ta.

Chun, lal chun thu a pêk a, Daniel chu an hung ṭhuoi a, sakeibakneihai pûka chun an pei lût ta a. Lal chun a hril a, Daniel kuoma chun, “I Pathien a rawng i bâwl zing hlak chun sansuok a ti che, ” a ta.

Chun, lung chu an hung lâk a, a pûk baua chun an indel tah a; chuongchun, lal chun ama hming namna le a rorêltuhai hming namna chu Daniel chungchâng thua chun thil sukdanglam hrim hrim um lo dingin a nam ta a.
Chun, lal chu a lal ina chun a fe a, chu zân chu bungheiin a hmang zo tah a; a hmaa chun thil rimawihai hung lâkin a um ta naw a, a imu chu amaa inthawkin a zâm hmang ta a.
Chun, lal chu zîngkâr inhmatakin a tho a, sakeibakneihai pûka chun inhmatakin a va fe ta a.

Daniel kuomah, sakeibakneihai pûk kâwl chu a hung tlung hnai chun, ṭap râwlin a khêk a; lal chun Daniel kuoma chun, “Aw Daniel, Pathien hring siehlawpa, i Pathien a rawng i bâwl zing zing hlak chun sakeibakneihaia inthawkin a sansuok thei che am a nih?” a ta.
Daniel chun lal kuoma chun, “Aw lalpa, kumkhuoin dam rawh.

Chun, lal chu nasatakin a lâwm tah a, Daniel chu pûka inthawka la suok ding chun anni chu thu a pêk tah a, chuongchun, Daniel chu pûka inthawk chu lâk suokin a um a, ama chun Pathien chu a ring tlat leiin amaa chun suknatna iengkhawm hmuin a um naw a.

Chun, lal chun thu a pêk a, chuong Daniel hêktuhai chu an hung ṭhuoi a; anni leh, an nauhai leh, an nuhmeihai le chun sakeibakneihai pûka chun an pei tah a; anni chu sakeibakneihai chun an lo thaw tah a, an ruhai chu a nawi nawiin an suktliek vawng a, pûk ṭuong chu an tlung hman naw hiel lem a nih.
Chun, lal Daria chun hnuoi chung po poa chêng mi po po le ṭawng tinrênghai kuoma chun lekha a ziek tah a, “In kuomah inremna sukpungin um raw se.
Thupêk chu ka siem a; ka ram leilunga mi po pohai chun Daniel Pathien chu ṭiin a hmaa chun inthin raw hai se.
Ama chu Pathien hring, chatuona pângngai zing a ni si a,
A ram khawm chu suksiet ni ngai naw ni a,
A rorêlna chu chatuonin um zing lem a tih.
Ama chun a sansuokin a sanhim a,
Hnuoi le vâna khawm thilmakhai le inchiknahai a thaw a,
Ama chu sakeibakneihai thilthawtheinaa inthawka Daniel sanhimtu chu a nih,”
tiin.
Chuongchun, Daniel chu Daria rorêl sûng le Persia mi Kura rorêl sûng po chu a hung hlawtling ta hle a.
Babulon lal Belsazzar inlal kum khatnaa chun Daniel chun mang neiin a khum chunga chun a lua thil hmulâwkhai chu a hmu tah a; chun, mang chu a ziek a, chuong thilhai umzie chu a hril bawk a.
Daniel chun a hril a, “Zâna hin ka thil hmulâwkna chun, ngai ta, vân thli hai pali chu tuipui lien chunga an hrâng hi ka hmu a.

A hmasatak chu sakeibaknei ang a na, mupui thlahai a nei a; a thlahai chu sukthlawnga uma, hnuoia inthawka dawm kânga uma, mihriem anga ke pahnia inngîrtir a hung na, mihriem lungril a kuoma pêk a ni chen chun ka en zing a.

Chun, ngai ta, sahrâng dang, a pahnina chu, savawm ang, a khingkhata indawm kâng a na, a baua a hahai kârah chun nâkru pathum a um a; chun a kuoma chun, ‘Tho la, taksa tamtak fa zo vawng rawh,’ an ta.
Lalṭhungphahai dâwin a um a,
Tienlai mi pakhat hi a hung ṭhung tah a,
A silfên chu vûr angin a vâr a,
A lua sam chu sahmul inthiengtak ang a nih.
A lalṭhungpha chu meichawk ṭiumtak a na,
A kekuolhai chu meichawklai a nih.
A hma bula inthawk chun a hung suok a,
Sâng sânga sângin a rawng an bâwl a,
Sang sâwm sâwma vawi sâng sâwm a hmaa chun an ngîr a;
Rorêlna chu ṭan a ni tah a,
Lekhabuhai chu hawngin a um ta a.
Chun, sahrâng danghai ruok kha chu, an ram chu lâkpêk an ni tah a; nisienlakhawm, an hringnahai ruok chu hunbi khat le hun khat chenin suksei a nih.
Zâna thil hmulâwkhai ka hmu a, chun, ngai ta,
Mi pakhat mihriem naupa ni âwm tak vân sûmhai le um a hung a,
Tienlai mi kuoma ngei chun a hung a,
Ama hmaa chun an hung ṭhuoi a.
A rawng an bâwl theina dingin a kuoma chun
Rorêlna dâm, ropuina dâm, lalram dâm an pêk a,
A lalram chu chatuon lalram bo ta ngailo ding le,
A ram suksieta um ta ngailo ding chu a nih.
“Kei Daniel ruok chu, ka taksa sûnga chun ka lungril chu suknatin a um a, ka lua thil hmulâwkhai chun an mi suklungzîng hle a.
Ka kâwla ngîrhai laia pakhat kuom chu ka hung hnai a, hi po po chungthua thudik chu kân dawn ta a. Chuongchun, ama chun a mi hril a, thil umziehai chu a mîn hriettir ta a.
‘Hieng sahrâng pali hi, lal pali hnuoi chunga la hung suok dinghai chu an nih.
“Chun, sahrâng palina, a danghai nêka danglam bîk, ṭiumtak, a hahai thîr nia, a tinhai chu dârsen nia, fa zo vawng a, suknâwi a, a mahla chu a kehaia sirdetu chungthua thudik chu hriet ka nuom tah a,
Chun, ama chun a hril a, ‘Sahrâng palina chu hnuoi chunga ram palina, ram dang po poa inthawka danglam tak ding, hnuoi po po chu lem zo a, sirde a, a suknâwia suknâwitu ding chu a nih.

Achunghnungtak chu kalin thu hril a ta, Achunghnungtak mi inthienghai chu hung suksieng a tih: chun, hunhai le dân chu sukdanglam dingin ngaituong a ta, hun khat le hunhai le hun chenve sûng chu a kuta pêk nîng an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, rorêlna chu um a ta, a tâwp chena suksiet a, sukbohmang dingin a ram chu lâkpêk an tih.
“Hi hi thu tâwpna chu a ni a; kei Daniel ta ding chun ka ngaituonahai chun a mi sukbuoi hle a, ka hmêlputziehai chu a hung danglam a; nisienlakhawm, chu thil chu ka lungrilah ka vawng zing a,”tiin.
Lal Belsazzar rorêl a kum thumnaa chun thil hmulâwkhai, a hmaa ka kuoma hung inlang hnunga khan, ka kuomah, kei Daniel kuoma ngei a hung inlang a.

Chun, ka mit ka hang meng a, ngai ta, vadung kâwla chun berâmchal ki pahni nei a ngîr ka hmu a; chu kihai pahni chu ân sâng hle a; amiruokchu, a ki pakhat chu a dang nêk chun ân sâng lem a; ân sâng lem chu a hung suok nuhnung lem chu a na.

Berâmchal chu thlangtieng le, hmârtieng le, simtieng chu panin ka hmu a; a hmaa hrim hrim chun ramsa dang ngîr thei an um naw a, a kuta inthawka la dawk thei hrim hrim khawm tukhawm an um naw a; chuongchun, a nuom ang angin a thaw a, ama le ama chu ân chawimawi ta a.
Chun, ka ngaituo lai chun, ngai ta, hnuoi chung po po dâpin thlangtienga inthawkin kêlchal a hung a, hnuoi hrim hrim a tâwk naw a; chun, kêl chun a mithai inkâra chun ki maktak el a nei a.
Chun, berâmchal ki pahni nei, vadung kâwla ngîr ka hmu kuoma chun a hung a; chuongchun, a theipatâwpin ama chu a baw ta a.

Chun, berâmchal hnaia hung chu ka hmu a, a chunga chun lunginsentakin a châng a; berâmchal chu a sik a, a kihai pahni chu a suktliek ta a; ama hmaa ngîr dingin berâmchala chun thilthawtheina hrim a um naw a; chuleiin, hnuoi chungah a tethlûk a, ama chu sirdein a chîl a; chuongchun, ama kuta inthawka berâmchal sansuok thei hrim hrim chu an um naw a.
Chun, kêlchal chu ama le ama nasatakin ân chawimawi a, a hrât hle lai chun a ki ropuitak chu a tliek ta a; a aia chun vân thli palihai tienga chun ki maktak pali a hung suok a.
Anni laia pakhata inthawk chun ki chitê a hung suok a, chu chu simtieng le, saktieng le ram ropui tieng chun ropuitakin a hung um ta a.
Anih, mipuihai lal kuoma ngei khawm chun ama le ama chu ân chawimawi a; pumrawhmanga inthawina zing zinghai chu amaa inthawkin a lâk hmang a; a Hmun Inthiengtak chu a pei thlâkpêk a.
Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Zântienghai le zîngtienghai sâng hni za thum chen nîng a tih; chun, Hmun Inthiengtak chu sukthieng nîng a tih,” a ta.
Berâmchal ki pahni nei i hmu kha Media le Persia lalhai an na.
Kêlchal nunsetak kha Grik ram lal a nih; chun, a mithai kâra ki ropuitak kha lal hmasatak chu a nih.
Chun, a tliek a, a hmuna pali hung suok kha, chu hnama inthawk chun lal pali hung ngîrsuok an ta; nisienlakhawm, a thilthawtheina le chu ni naw ni.
Chun, an ram hun nuhnung tienga, bawsetuhai an hung puitling pha chun lal hmêl ṭiumtak, thu khir- tak takhai hre thei hung ngîrsuok a ta.

A thilthawtheina chu hrâttak nîng a ta, nisienlakhawm, ama thilthawtheina hran ngat chu ni naw ni; râpthlâktakin suksieng a ta, hlawtling a ta, a nuom nuom thaw bawk a tih; mi inthienghai le mi hrâttakhai chu sukse bawk a tih.

A remruot dân hmangin a kuta chun vervêkna chu inhlawtlingtir a ta; a lungrila chun ama le ama chu inchawimawi a tih; chun, an inring naw kârin mi tamtak chu suksieng a ta, lalhai lal chungah ngîrsuok bawk a ta, nisienlakhawm, kut lova suksiet nîng a tih.
Chun, zântienghai le zîngtienghai thilhmulâwka thil hril chu ân dik a nih; nisienlakhawm, thil hmulâwk chu la khâr hri phawt rawh; ni la hung tlung ding tamtakhai ta ding chu a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, kei Daniel chu ka châu a, ni iengzât amani chu ka damnaw a; chun, ka tho a, lal sin chu ka thaw ta a: nisienlakhawm, thilhmulâwka chun mak ka ti êm êm a, tukhawma an hriet thiem si naw a.
Kaldai mihai rama lala siema um, Media chi Ahasuera naupa Daria kum khat kum;
Chun, vut laia saiip puon le inṭhunga bungheiin, hnina le ṭawngṭainaa zawng dingin
kan lo suol ta a, indiklotakin kan lo thaw ta a; khawhlotakin kan lo thaw ta a, kan lo hel ta a; i rorêlnahai le thupêkhaia inthawka lo inher hmangin;
i siehlaw zâwlneihai, kan lalhai le, kan ṭhuoituhai le, kan thlatuhai le hi rama mi po po kuoma nangma hminga thu lo hril hlakhai thuhril chu kan ngaisak bawk naw a.
Aw
Aw
Zângaina le ngaidamna chu Lalpa kan Pathien ta a nih; ama chunga chun kan lo hel ta si a;
a siehlaw zâwlneihai hmanga kan hmaa ân entir a, a dânhai chu hraw dingin kan Pathien

Anih, Israel mihai po po chun i râwl chu awi lo dinga inherhmangin i Dân chu an lo bawsiet ta a; chuleiin, ṭawngsie chu kan chungah, Pathien siehlaw Mosie dâna inkhâmna zieka um le chun buokin a um ta a; chuonga chun thil kan lo suksuol ta si a.

Kan chungah thil ṭha naw chu intlungtirin, keini le kan rorêltuhai, kan chunga rorêltuhai chungah a thu a hrilhai chu a hung sukdet ta a; Jerusalem khaw chunga thaw a ni ta ang hin vân hnuoi po po khâwlai khawm thaw a ni ngai si naw a.
Mosie Dâna ziek a ni angin hieng thil ṭha naw po po hi kan chungah a hung tlung a nih; chuong khawm chun, i thudik chu chîktaka ngaituona nei ding le kan rîtlonahaia inthawka inher hmang dingin
Chuleiin,
Tuhin, aw
Aw
Chuleiin, tuhin, aw kan Pathien, i siehlaw ṭawngṭaina le a hninahai chu ngai la, Lalpa zâra chun i Hmun Inthiengtak sukrêma um ta chunga chun i hmai chu invartir rawh.

Aw ka Pathien, i na hung sit la, hung ngai ta; i mithai hung meng la, sukrêma kan umnahai le, i hming inchawia sak khuo hi hung en ta; kan felnahai ni lovin, amiruokchu, i zângaina leiin kan hninahai chu i hmaah kan hung intlun a ni lem si a.
Aw
Chun, ṭawngṭaia, ka suolna le ka mi Israelhai suolna chu thuphachawia, ka Pathien tlâng inthieng ta dinga ka Pathien
ṭawngṭaia ka ṭawng lai zing chun, mi pakhat Gabriel, a tîra thil hmulâwka ka hmu khan, zântienga thilinhlân hun lai hin, hrâttaka invuongtira umin a mi them a.
Chun, hre dingin a mi khîkhmu a, kei a mi biek a, “Aw Daniel, hrietna tienga thiemtaka siem ding chein ka hung a nih.
I hninahai în tlun tîra inthawk khan thu chu a hung suok a, chun, hril ding chein ka hung ta a; nasataka ditsak i ni si a; chuleiin, thil chu ngaituo la, thilhmulâwk thu chu a ngaina lo hre rawh.

Hapta sâwm sarihai chu i mihai le khaw inthieng ta dinga bawsietnahai insûmna ding le suolnahai bânsanna ding le, khawhlona ta dinga inremna siema, kumkhuoa felna chu insuona ding le, thilhmulâwk le hrillâwkna chu khârkhumna ding le, Hmun Inthiengtak chu hriek nâlna hun dinga pêk a nih.

Chuleiin, hre la, hrethiem rawh, Jerusalem khuo bâwl ding le siem thar dinga thupêk hung suoka inthawk Messie, Lal Naupa chen chu hapta sari le, hapta sâwmruk pahni nîng a ta, a kawtthlêr le a banghai chu siem nîng a tih, hun buoithlâktaka khawm chun.

Chun, hapta sâwmruk pahni hnunga chun Messie chu sât thlâk nîng a ta, ama ta dingin ni lovin, chun, lal mihai hung dinghai chun khawpui le Hmun Inthiengtak chu suksieng an ta, a tâwpna chu tuilêt nîng a ta, a tâwpa chun indona nîng a tih; sukrêma umna ding chu ruot a ni ta si a.

Persia lal Kura inlal kum thumnaa chun a hming Beltesazzar inbûk, Daniel kuomah thil suklangin a um a, chu thil chu thil indik, indona ropuitak a na, chu thil chu a hriet a, thilhmulâwk chu hrietthiemna a nei bawk a.
Chuong nihai lai chun kei Daniel hi hapta thum zet chu lungngaiin ka um a.
Bei inhnikin ka fâk naw a, sa le uoin hrim hrim khawm ka bauah a lût naw a, hriek hrim hrim khawm kân nâl ngai naw a, hapta thum pumhlûm a tling hmakhat chun.
Chun, thla hmasatak ni sâwmhni pali ni chun, Hiddekel vadung ropuitak panga ka um lai chun,
ka mithai vân tieng ka hang inlên a, ka en a, mi pakhat puon zai inhmia inthuom, a kâwnga Uphaz rângkachak inthienga inkhit hi ka hmu a;
Chun, kei Daniel chau chun chu thilhmulâwk chu ka hmu a; ka kâwla mi um vehai chun thilhmulâwk chu an hmu ve naw a; amiruokchu, inthinna nasatak an chungah a tla a, anni chu inbi dingin an tlân ta a.

Chuongchun, ka khât chaua mâksanin ka um a, hi thilhmulâwk ropuitak hi ka hmu ta a; chun, keimaa chun hrâtna hrim hrim a um ta naw a: ka hmêl mawina chu sietnaa ân chang ta leiin, hrâtna hrim ka nei ta naw a.
A thuhril ri chu ka la hriet ta rawp a: chun, a thuhril ri chu ka hriet phingleh, hnuoitienga ka hmai innghatin ka bawkkhup a, inhniktakin ka in ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, kutin a mi hung them a, chuongchun, dingṭhaṭhuonin ka bawkinvâk a.

Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Aw nang nasataka ditsaka umpa Daniel, i kuoma ka thuhrilhai chu a ngaina hre la, ngîr inzang rawh; tuhin i kuoma hung tir ka ni si a,” a ta. Hi thu hi ka kuoma a hung hril phing chun inthin pumin ka ngîr ta a.
Chun, hieng thuhai ang peia ka kuoma thu a hung hril chun, ka hmai chu hnuoi tieng ka kûn a, ṭawngtheilovin ka um ta a.

Hi ka lalpa siehlaw hin hi ka lalpa kuoma hin iengtin am thu hril thei ka ta? Kei hlak chu kârlovin hrâtna hrim nei lovin ka um el si a, keimaa chun inthuokna hrim hrim khawm a um ta bawk si naw a,” ka ti a.
Chun, mihriem hmêl angtak put pakhat hin a mi hung them nâwk a; a mi sukhrât ta a.
Chun, ama chun, “I kuomah iengdinga hung am ka na ti i hriet am? Tuhin Persia lal chu do dingin kîr nâwk ka ta; chun, ka fe suok pha chun, ngai ta, Grik ram lal chu hung a tih.
“Chun, kei chu, Median mi Daria kum khatna kum chun ama chu sukhrâta sukdet dingin ka ngîr ta a.

“Chun, tuhin thudik chu inentir ka ti che. Ngai ta, Persiaa hin lal pathum la hung ngîrsuok an ta; a palina chu anni po po nêk chun nasatakin hausa lem a tih: chun, a hausakna leia a hung hrât chun, Grik ram do dingin mi po po chawktho a tih.
Chun, lal thilthawtheitak, ram ropuitaka rorêltu ding chu hung ngîrsuok a ta, a nuom ang ang chu hung thâwng a tih.

A hung ngîrsuok phingle chun a ram chu sukkhawi nîng a ta, kawlkil palihai anga chun sem dar nîng a tih; a thlahai amani le a rorêlna ram dungzui chun ni chuong naw ni a, a ram chu hieng mihai titâk lo khawm mi danghai ta ding khawma sukthlawng a ni ding a ni si a.
“Chun, simtieng lal chu hung hrât a ta, a lalhai laia pakhat leh; ama nêk chun hung hrât a ta, lal ram chu hung nei a tih; a lal ram chu ram ropuitak hung ni bawk a tih.

Kum iengzât amani hnunga chun anni chu hung inzawm khâwm an ta, simtienga lal naunu chu hmârtienga lal kuoma chun inremna siem dingin hung a tih; nisienlakhawm, a kut hrâtna chu nei sawng naw nih; amapa chu ngîr naw ni a, a kut khawm châng bawk naw ni; nisienlakhawm, chuong nihaia amanu lo sukhrâttu le amanu lo thlatupa le, ama hung ṭhuoituhai chu amanu le chun bânsanin um an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, a zunghai puoksuoka inthawkin mi pakhat a hmuna chun hung ngîrsuok a ta, ama chu sipai pâwl leh hung a ta, hmârtieng lal kula chun hung lût a ta, anni chu do a ta, hne bawk a tih;

an pathienhai le, an milim sunga sunghai le, an tangkaruo le rângkachak bûrlebêl ṭhatak takhai chu râllâkin Aigupta rama chun phur hmang bawk a tih; chun, kum tam lem sûng chu hmârtieng lal nêkin inlal a tih.
“Chun, simtieng lal rama chun hung lût a ta, nisienlakhawm, ama rama bawk kîr nâwk a tih.
A naupasalhai chun sipai ropuitak tamtak el khâwm an ta, do an ta, chu chu hung an ta, a luongin hung luong liem an ta, fe thleng an tih; chun, hung kîr nâwk an ta, a kul ngei chu hung do an tih.
Chun, simtieng lal nasataka suklungsenin um a ta, hung suok a ta, hmâr tieng lal ngei chu hung do a tih; chun, mipui nasatak chu hung tir suok a ta, chu mipui nasatak chu a kutah pêk nîng a tih.
Chun, mipui chu ṭhuoi hmang hung nîng an ta, ama chu a lungril chu hung inchawisâng a ta, sâng sâwm tamtak chu hung pei thlûng a ta, nisienlakhawm, hrât pha ngai naw ni.
Hmâr tieng lal chu hung kîr nâwk a ta, a hmasa nêka mi tam lem chu hung ṭhuoi a ta; chun, kumhai tâwpah, hunhai tâwpa chun sipai nasatak le hausakna tamtak leh hung a tih.

“Chuong hun haia chun simtieng lal chunga chun mi tamtak hung ngîrsuok an ta, i mihai laia dân hmanglo mihai ngei khawm thilhmulâwk chu hung suktlung dingin hung inmawrkâng an ta, nisienlakhawm, tlûng an tih.

Chun, hmârtieng lal chu hung a ta, tlâng hung siem a ta, khawpui kulnei khawm chu hung lâng a tih; simtieng kuthai chun dangkîr naw ni a, a mi thlanghai khawmin, a dang kîr zo ding hrâtna hrim hrim um naw ni.
Chuongchun, ama hung rûntuhai chu a nuom nuom lo lâwng a ta, ama hmaa chun tukhawm ngîr thei naw ni hai: ram ropuia chun ngîr a ta, a kuta chun suksietna um bawk a tih.

A hmêl chu amaa mi ngîlhai le, a ram pumpui hrâtna le hung dingin nghâng a ta; a nuom nuom thâwng a ta, nuhmei naunuhai chu sukkhawhlo dingin ama chu pêng a ta; nisienlakhawm, amanu chu a kuomah ngîr naw ni a, a ta ni thei bawk naw ni.

Hi hnunga hin, thlierkâr tienga chun nghâng a ta; tamtak chu lâng a tih; nisienlakhawm, sipai hotu chun zilna amain a pêk chu suktâwp a ta, anih, chu naw khawm chu, a zilna chu ama chungah inumtir bawk a tih.
Chun, ama rama kul tieng ngei chu nghâng a ta; nisienlakhawm, insui a ta, tlûng a ta, ama chu hmu ni ta ngai naw ni.

“Chun, ama hmuna chun mi pakhat, ram ropuinaa leiman khawna infethlengtirtu ding chu hung ngîrsuok a ta, nisienlakhawm, indona amanih, lunginsenna amani khawm ni lovin, ama chu ni sâwtnawtêah sukbohmang nîng a tih.
Chun, ama hmuna chun mi hmusitumtak hung ngîrsuok a ta, ama kuoma chun ram ropuina chu pêk ni naw ni; nisienlakhawm, muongna hun laitak hung a ta, simbudawiin ram chu lâng a tih.
Ama hmaa chun tuilêt hrâtnain anni chu la hmang a ta, suksiet nîng an tih; anih, thuthlung hotu ngei khawm chu suksiet nîng a tih.
Chun, ama le inzawmna siem a ni hnung chun, hmusitumtakin sin thâwng a ta; ama chu mi tlâwmte leh hung a ta, a hrât hle ding a ni si a.

Inrem lai huna chun ram buoina um nawna hmun hmunahai chun hung a ta, a thlatuhai thlatuhai amani, a thlatuhaiin amani thil an thaw ngailo chu hung thâwng a tih; chun, anni lai chun hausakna dâm, râllâk thil dâm le râlthat dâm chu the dar a ta; anih, vawikhat nana na chu a tumnahai chu kul dettak tieng chu innghat a tih.

Chun, sipai ropuitak le a thilthawtheina le a huoina chu simtieng lal chunga chun chawktho a ta; simtieng lal chun ama chu sipai hrâttak le ropuitak el le chun indonaa chun do a ta; nisienlakhawm, ngîr zo naw nih, ama chunga chun rem chu a lo ruot ding a ni leiin.
Anih, ama bu fatuhai chun ama chu suksieng an ta, a sipaihai chu a luongin luong liem an ta; mi tamtak chu sukhluma umin tlûng an tih.

Chun, hi lal hai ve ve hi chu; an lungrilhai chu thil suol thawna lungril nîng a ta; dawkân hmunkhata chun thukhêlhai hril an tih; nisienlakhawm, hlawtling naw ni a, a tâwpna chu hun ruota chun a la ni ding a ni si a.
Chun, ama rama chun thuomhnaw tamtak le chun kîr nâwk a ta; a lungril chu Thuthlung Inthieng kal zâwng ni tâng a ta, a nuom ang angin thâwng a tih; chun, ama ram bawka chun kîr nâwk a tih.
“Hun ruota chun hung kîr nâwk a ta, simtieng hung a tih; nisienlakhawm, a hun nuhnung lema chun a hun hmasa lem ang kha ni ta naw ni.

Kittima lawnghai chun ama an hung rûn ding a ni si a; chuleiin, lungngai a ta, hung kîr nâwk a ta, Thuthlung Inthieng chunga chun lunginsenna nei a ta, a nuom ang angin thâwng a tih; kîr nâwk a ta, chuong Thuthlung Inthieng nghatsantuhai chu ngaisak a tih.
Chuonga Thuthlung chunga khawhlotaka thawin, simbudawiin suk hmingsieng a tih; nisienlakhawm, chuong mihai an Pathien hretuhai chu hung hrât an ta, thil nasatak hung thâwng an tih.
Chun, mihai laia a varhai chun, mi tamtak inchûktir an ta; ni tamtak sûng, râllâk le, sala manin mei le kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih.
An tlûk pha chun, anni chu ṭhangpuina tlâwmtêa ṭhangpui nîng an ta; nisienlakhawm, mi tamtak chun anni chu simbudawiin hung zâwm an tih.
Chun, chuong a varhai chu hun tâwpa chun anni chu sukvar ding le, sukfai ding le, sukṭha dingin tlûng an tih; hun ruota ding chu a la ni leiin.
Nuhmeihai châkna amanih, a thlatuhai pathienhai amani khawm chu ngaisak naw ni a, pathien hrim hrim ngaisak naw ni, chuong chung po poa chun ama chu ân chawisâng ding a ni si a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama hmuna chun kulhai pathien chu inza thung a ta, a thlatuhaiin pathien an hriet ngainaw chu thil ṭhahai le, lungmantamhai le, tangka le rângkachakin chawimawi a tih.
Chun, pathien danglam ṭhangpuiin kulhai chu thâwng a ta, tukhawm ama hrefu taphawt chu ropuina sukpungpêk a ta, mi tamtak chunga rorêltu dingin siem a ta, ram chu man neiin sem dar bawk a tih.

Chun, hun tâwpa chun simtieng lal chun ama chu nawr a ta; hmârtieng lal chun lawng tamtakhai leh, sakawr chung chuong mihai leh, sakawr tawlailîrhai leh phaivaw hrâng ang elin ama chu hung rûn a tih; chun, ramhaia chun hung lût a ta, palzêl a ta, fe thleng a tih.
Ram ropuia khawm chun hung lût a ta, ram tamtak chu hne hung nîng an tih; nisienlakhawm, hieng Edom hai, Moab hai, Ammon thlahai lal hi a kuta inthawk chun sansuok nîng an tih.
Ramhai chunga chun a kut chu inlet a ta; Aigupta ram khawm chun pumpel bîk naw ni.
Nisienlakhawm, Aigupta rama thil hluhai po po le, tangka le rângkachak ro bâwmhai chunga chun thuneina nei a ta; Libua mihai le Ethiopia mihai chu a kaiza vêng chun um an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, saktieng le hmârtienga thuthanghai chun ama chu sukbuoi an ta, mi tamtak chu sukbohmang dêr ding le sukse dingin lunginsentakin fe suok a tih.
Chun, a lal chêngna puon in chu tlâng inthienga tuipui inkâra chun kei a ta; nisienlakhawm, a tâwpna tlung tho a tih, tukhawma ama chu an ṭhangpui si naw a.
Chun, kei Daniel chun ka en a; chun, ngai ta, mi dang pahni, pakhat chu vadung pang khingtieng sîrah, a dang chu vadung pang khingtieng sîrah, an lo ngîr a.
Chun, pakhat chun vadung tuihai chunga um, puon zai inhmia inthuompa kuoma chun, “Hieng thilmakhai tâwpna chu iengtik am nîng a ta?” a ta.
A ri chu ka hriet a, a ngaina ruok chu ka hriet naw a; chun, kei chun, “Aw ka
Ama chun, “Daniel, fe el rawh, hun tâwp chena dingin hieng thuhai hi khârkhum tlat le chârde tlat an ni si a.
Inring zinga, ni sâng khat za thum sâwmthum pangaa lût chu a hamṭha.
Nisienlakhawm, nang chu fe pei la, a tâwp a tlung hma chun, ni tâwpahai chun châwl i ta, i chantâwka chun i ngîr ding a ni si a,” a ta.
Hosea hmanga
Chuongchun, a fe a, Diblaim naunu Gomer chu a nei ta a; chun, nau a vawn a, naupasal a neipêk a.
Chun, chu nia chun Jezreel ruomah Israelhai thalngul chu suktliek ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, nau a vawn nâwk a, naunuhmei a nei a. Chun, a kuomah, “A hmingah Lo-ruhama sak rawh; Israel sûnghai chu ka lainat ngai ta naw ding a nih, ka ngaidam vak ta âwm si naw a.
Juda sûnghai ruok chu lainat ka ta, thalngul amanih, kâwlhnâm amanih, indona amanih, sakawr amanih, sakawr chung chuong mi amania anni sandam lovin,
Chun, Lo-ruhama chu nêne nêk ân bântir a, chun, nau a vawn nâwk a, naupasal a nei a.
Chun,
Chun, Juda mipuihai le Israel mipuihai chu pung khâwm an ta, an lu ding ruot an ta, chu rama inthawk chun hang fêng an ta, Jezreel ni chu a ropui ding a ni si a.
In naupahai kuoma chun, “Ka mihai” ti unla, in farnuhai kuoma chun, “Lunginsietna dawngtu” ti ro.
In nu hi ngên ro, ngên ro;
Ama hi ka nuhmei a ni si naw a.
Kei khawm a pasal ka ni nawh;
A mit hmua inthawkin a nawchizawr chîng hi pei hmang sienla,
A ṭânghai laia inthawkin a uiret chîng hi pei thla raw se.
Chuong naw chun saruokin siem ka ta,
A pieng nia a um angin inumtir ka tih,
Thlalêr angin siem ka ta,
Ram ṭâwl angin inumtir ka ta,
Dangchârin sukhlum ka tih.
A nauhai khawm lainat naw ning,
Nawchizawr nauhai an ni si a.
An nu chun nawchi a zawr hlak a,
Anni vawntu chu inzâpuiumtakin a um a;
Ka bu dâm, ka tui dâm, ka sahmul dâm,
Ka pat dâm, ka hriek dâm le, ka dâwn dinghai mi petu,
ami hmangaituhai chu hnawt ka tih, a ti a nih.
Chuleiin, ngai ta, i lampui chu hlingin hruk ka ta,
Ama dang dingin dai sak ka ta,
A lampuihai chu hmu naw nih.
Chun, a dit zâwnghai chu hnawt a ta,
Hnawt phâk naw nih.
Anni chu zawng a ta, hmu naw nih;
Chuongchun, Ka pasal hmasa kuomah kîr nâwk ka tih.
Tulai nêk hin kha hma kha ka ta dingin a ṭha lem si, tîng a tih.
Bu dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm hi,
Tangka ka sukpungpêkhai hi,
Rângkachak Baal ta dinga an hmanghai leh;
Keima pêk a nih ti a hriet si naw a;
Chuleiin, ka bu chu a hunah,
Ka uoin khawm chu a hunah la kîr nâwk ka ta,
Ka sahmul le ka pat,
a saruok inkhumna ding chu lâkpêk ka tih.
Chuongchun, a dit zâwnghai mithmua chun,
A saruok zâmaw chu suklang ka tih;
Ka kuta inthawk chun tukhawma sansuok naw ni hai.
A hlimna po po, a ruoiṭhe dâm, a thla thar dâm,
A châwlni dâm le a hunbi ruoiṭhehai po po khawm suktâwp vawng ka tih.
A grêp hrui le a theichang kûng,
Hieng hi ka dit zâwnghai mi pêk, ka hlaw chu a nih,
A ti hlakhai chu sukrêm ka tih.
Ramhnuoiah siem ka ta, ramsahaiin fâng an tih.
Riminhnik a rawpêk hlak Baal nihai chu a chungah thung ka ta,
Chuong lai chun a nabehai le a în cheinahai chu ân bel a,
A dit zâwnghai a pan a, kei a mi theinghil a nih,
Ti hi
Chuleiin, ngai ta, thlêm ka ta, thlalêrah ṭhuoi ka ta,
Bau ṭhatakin ama chu bieng ka ta,
Akor ruom khawm beiseina kawtkhâr dingin.
Chutaka chun a tleirâwl lai nihai le,
Aigupta rama inthawka a hung suok ni ang khan dawn a tih.
Chun, chu nia chun,
A baua inthawkin Baal hminghai hi ka lâkhmangpêk ding a ni si a; an hming hi sâm ni ta hrim hrim naw nih.

Chu nia chun ramsahai, chunglêng vatehai, hnuoia thilhringhai le an ta dingin thuthlung siem ka ta; thalngulhai, kâwlhnâm dâm le indo nahai hi hnuoia inthawkin sukbohmang ka ta, himtakin inum hmunkhattir ka tih.
Kumkhawtluongin ka ta dingin huol tlat ka ti che a, felna dâm, rorêlna dâm, lunginsietna dâm, lainatna dâmin ka ta dingin huol ka ti che.
Ringumnain huol ka ti che a, chuongchun,
Chu ni chun,
Vânhai bieng ka ta, annin hnuoi bieng an tih;
Chun, hnuoi chun bu dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm bieng an ta;
Chun, anni chun Jezreel
Lo-ruhama chu lainat ka ta,
Ka mi nilo chu “Ka mi i nih” tîng ka ta,
Chun, ama chun, “Ka Pathien i nih,” tîng a tih.
Chun,
Chuongchun, tangka sâwmpanga le buṭei

chun, a kuomah, “Ni tamtak sûng chu ka ta dingin i um ding a nih, nawchi i zawr ding a ni naw a, tu nuhmei khawm i ni bawk ding a ni nawh; chuong ang bawk chun kei khawm i kuoma chun um ka tih,” ka ta.
Israel mipuihai chu ni tamtak laltak le mi lien le, inthawina le lungphun inser, thiempu zakuo amanih, milimhai amanih, nei lovin an um ding a ni si a.
Chu hnunga chun Israel mipuihai chu hnungkîr an ta,
Israel mipuihai,
Hi rama hin thutak le lunginsietna le Pathien hrietna a um naw leiin,
Inkhâm dâm, inhlêm dâm, inthat dâm, inrûk dâm.
Uiret chîng dâm a pung a, tuolthatna hlak chu ân phaman a.
Chuleiin, ram chun sûn a ta,
A sûnga chêng tinrêng chu chau an tih,
Ramsahai le chunglêng vatehai leh;
Anih, tuipuia ngahai chenin lâk hmang nîng an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, tuhai khawm inhêk naw raw hai se,
Tukhawm inkâwk bawk naw raw hai se;
I mihai chu thiempu hêktuhai ang an ni si a,
Aw thiempu, nanga chungah a nih ka lungni naw chu,
Sûna chun tlûng i ta, zâwlnei khawm chu i kuomah zânah tlûng a tih;
I nu khawm sukbohmang ka tih.
Ka mihai chu hrietna tlâksam leiin sukbohmang an na,
Hrietna chu i dit naw leiin kei khawma ka thiempu i ninaa inthawk chun dit naw ve tâng ka ti che.
I Pathien dân chu i theinghil vei a,
Kei khawmin i nauhai theinghil vêng ka tih.
An pung dep leh ka chungah an suol tul tul a,
An ropuina chu muolphonaah inchangtir ka tih,
Ka mihai suolna an fâk a,
An khawhlonaa chun an lungril an innghat a;
A mipui ni leh, a thiempu ni leh angkhat nîng an tih,
An lampuihai lei chun anni chu hrem ka ta,
An thilthawhai chu thung ka tih.
Fa chu fa dêng an ta, tlai si naw ni hai;
Nawchizawr chîng an ta chu, pung chuong naw ni hai,
Nawchizawr dâm, uoin dâm, uoin thar dâm chun
Hrietthiemna a lâk hmang hlak.
Ka mihai chun an thing an râwn a.
An hmawl chun a hril hlak.
Nawchizawrna lungril chun a ṭhuoi hmang a,
An Pathien chu tlânsanin nawchi an zawr ta a.
Tlâng sîphaia chun an inthâwi a,
Muolhaia chun riminhnik an raw a;
Thingsaisuo le beraw le tarpin thing hnuoia chun,
A hlim chu ân hawi leiin.
Chuleiin, in naunuhmeihai chun nawchizawr an chîng a,
In mohai chun uiret an chîng a nih.
In naunuhmeihaiin nawchi an zawr a,
In mohaiin uiret an chîng khawma hrem naw ning,
Anni ngei khawm nawchizawrhai leh an fe pêt a,
Nawchizawrhai leh an inthâwi hmunkhat si a;
Chuong chun, hrietthiemna nei lo mipuihai chu tlusieng an tih..
Israel, nang chun nawchizawr chîng la khawm,
Juda chu tlu ve lul naw raw se.
Gilgala chun hung naw unla, Beth-avena khawm hang fe naw ro;
Bâwngla kâwmaw ang elin Israelhai chu an kâwmaw a,
Tuhin
Ephraim chun milim ân zawmpui ta a;
A um umin um raw se.
An zu dâwn chu an ṭîn a, nawchizawrah an insiem a,
An ropuina nêkin thil inzapuium chu an ngaina lem a.
Thli chun a thlahai chun a tuom khum ta a;
An inthâwinahai lei chun lân zak ngei an tih.
Aw nangni thiempuhai, hi hi lo hre ta u,
Nangni Israel sûnghai, lo ngai ta u,
Aw laltak sûnghai, na lo sit ta u,
Rorêlna chu nangni chunga ding a ni si a;
Mizpaa chun châng in ni a, Tabor tlânga lên in zar leiin.
Mi helhai chun sukhlum hi an uor êm êm a,
Kei ruok chu an rênga kâwktu ka nih.
Ephraim chu ka hriet a, Israel chu keimaa thup a ni nawh,
Tuhin, aw Ephraim, nawchizawr i chîng leiin,
Israel chu sukpawrche a na;
An Pathien tienga nghakîr dingin,
An thil thaw hlakhai chu an bânsan naw a;
Nawchizawr lungril anni lai a um si a,
Israel sawngtawlawi chun a hmai sanah ân hriettir a,
Chuongchun, Ephraim le Israel chu an khawhlonaa chun tlûng an ta;
Juda khawm anni lai tlu vêng a tih.
An berâm ruolhai le an bâwng ruolhai leh,
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu hmu nâwng an tih,
An kuoma inthawkin ân siekieng ta a nih.
Hnam dang nauhai an nei si a;
Thla thar chun an lohma chen leh bohmangna intlun a tih.
Gibea khuoa chun tawtawrâwt mût unla,
Rama khuoa chun tawtawrâwt mût ro;
Beth-avena chun khêk rak rak unla,
Aw Benjamin, i hnung tieng kha!
Ephraim chu hremna nia chun sukrêm nîng a ta,
Thil hung ni ngei ding chu Israelhai laia chun kân hriettir ta a nih.
Juda mi lienhai chu ramri sawntuhai an na,
An chungah ka lunginsenna chu tui angin bunthlâng ka tih.
Ephraim chu thil teplohai zui a nuom vieu leiin,
Nêksâwrin a um a, rorêlnaa chun suksietin a um a nih.
Chuleiin, Ephraim ta ding chun hângthim ang ka na,
Juda sûngkuohai ta ding chun hmawnna ang ka nih.
Ephraim chun a natna a hmu a,
Juda chun a hliem a hmu a,
Chuongchun, Ephraim chu Assuria kuomah a fe a,
Laltak Jareb kuoma chun mi a tir a;
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a sukdam thei naw cheu a,
In hliemna chu a sukdampêk thei bawk naw cheu.
Ephraim ta ding chun sakeibaknei ang,
Juda ta ding chun sakeibaknei vânglai ang ka ni ding a ni si a;
Keima, keima ngeiin keithlêr ka ta,
Fêng ka ta, fe hmangpui ka tih;
Sansuoktu ding tukhawm um naw ni hai.
An thiemnawzie an inhriet a, ka hmêl an zawng hma chun,
Fêng ka ta, ka hmunah kîr nâwk ka tih;
An tuornaa chun mi zawng an ta, hieng hin tîng an tih:
“Hung ta u,
A mi kei nâwi taa chu a mi lo sukdam nâwk ding a ni si a,
A mi lo vuok ta nâka chu a mi tuom nâwk ding a ni si a;
Ni thum nia chun mi keitho a ta, a hmaah um ei tih.
Zîng khawvar anga inkhêl ruol lovin ân thawk suok ngei hlak;
Ei kuomah ruo angin, ruo nuhnung, hnuoi sukhûtu ang elin hung tlung a tih,” tiin.
Aw Ephraim, iengtin am ka thaw ding che a na?
Aw Juda, iengtin am ka thaw ding che a na?
In ṭhatna chu zîngkâr ṭieusûm le daidaw hung bo vak hlak ang hi a ni si a.
Chuleiin, zâwlneihai hmangin anni ka râwt a,
Ka baua thuhaiin anni ka sukhlum a nih.
I chunga rorêlnahai chu var fe suok pup pup ang hi a nih.
Pumrawhmang thilinhlân nêk chun Pathien hrietna ka dit lem a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Adam angin thuthlung chu an bawsiet a,
Chutaka chun vervêktakin ka chungah an thaw a nih:
Gilead chu khawhlona thawtuhai khawpui a na;
Thisen a kai pheng phung a nih.
Suomhmang ruolin mi an inchân hlak angin,
Thiempu pâwlhai chun Sekem lampuiah mi an that hlak;
Anih, thil suol an thaw ta a nih.
Israel sûngkuoa chun thil râpthlâktak ka hmu a,
Ephraima chun nawchizawrna a um a,
Israel chu sukpawrchein a um a nih.
Ka mihai sal intângnaa inthawka ka ṭhuoi kîr pha chun,
Aw Juda, i ta ding khawma ra sîk ding ruot a nih.
Israel sukdam ka tum leh Ephraim khawhlona a hung
inlang a.
Samaria rîtlona leh, hlêm an chîng a nih.
Sûng tieng inru a hung lût a,
Tuol tienga chun suomhmang ruolin an suom si a,
An rîtlona po po chu ka hriet zing ti
An lungrilin an ngaituo nawh;
Tuhin chu an thilthawhai ngeiin a chîm vêl tlat ta a,
Ka hmaihma ngeiah an um a nih.
An rîtlona chun laltak an suklâwm a;
An thu khêlin mi lienhai an suklâwm bawk a.
An rêngin uire an na,
Bei siemtuin thuk a ur lum,
Beiphit a hmethnâk a tho hmaa,
Mei tâwl a châwlsan hri ang hi an nih.
Ei laltak nia chun mi lienhai chu uoin inruitakin an insukrui a,
Ama chun hmusittuhai ruolin a kut a phar a.
Inrûka an inchân laiin an lungril chu thuk ang elin an siem ta a;
An lunginsen chu zânkhawvârin a dei a,
Zîngkâr chun meichawk angin a hung chawk a.
Thuk ang elin an sa vawng a, an rorêltuhai an sukbohmang a;
An laltak taphawthai chu an tlu a,
Anni lai tukhawm a mi ko an um nawh.
Ephraim hlak chu hnam danghai lai ân zêlsa a,
Ephraim chu bei inlet lo a nih.
Mikhuolhai chun a hrâtna an fâk zopêk a,
Ama chun chu a hriet nawh;
Hmul inṭuokin ama chu a bâwm nuol ta a,
Ama chun chu a hriet nawh.
Israel chapona chun ama thiemnawzie ân hriettir a,
Nisienlakhawm, hieng po poa khawm hin,
Ama chu an zawng bawk nawh,
Ephraim chu vaṭhu inhai, hrietthiemna nei lo ang a lo na,
Aigupta tieng an ko vak a, Assuria tienga chun an fe vak a;
An fe chu an chungah ka lên hei dêng ka ta,
Chunglêng vate man angin man ka tih;
An thil suol thaw ang huin anni hrem ka tih.
An chung a rik ie; ka kuoma inthawkin an fe hmang ta si a!
Bohmangna an chungah a tlung ie, ka chungah an hel ta si a!
Kei chun anni sandam ka nuom a,
Anni ruok chun khêl an mi hril khum a,
An lungril takin an mi ko naw a,
An khum laizâwlah an chierinthluok mei mei a nih;
Bu le uoin dingin an inkhâwm a, ka chunga chun an hel si a.
Kei chun an bânhai chu inchûktirin ka sukhrât a,
Nisienlakhawm, ka chungah thil ṭha naw an suongtuo a nih.
An ngha kîr a, Achunghnungtak kuomah ni lovin;
Thalngul rul ang an nih,
An mi lienhai chu an ṭawng pâwngpawr leiin kâwlhnâmin tlûng an tih;
Hi hi Aigupta rama nuizatbûr an nina nîng a tih.
Tawtawrâwt chu i hmûrah inbûk rawh;
Ka thuthlung an bawsiet a,
Ka dân an helsan leiin.
“Ka Pathien, keini Israelhai hin chu kan hriet che,”
Tiin ka kuomah an khêk a.
Israelhai chun thil ṭha chu an hnâwl a;
Hmêlma chun anni hnawt a tih.
Ka thaw ni lovin, annîn lal an siem a,
Ka hriet lovin hotuhai an siem a;
An bohmangna dingin an tangkaruo le an rângkachakin milim an siem a.
Aw Samaria, i sebâwngte lim chu a
An chungah ka lunginsen êm êm a nih.
Nun tluongtlama an um thei hma chu ieng chen tak am a ni ding chu.
Israela inthawk chun hi hi a ni si a,
Sinthawtu siem a na, Pathien a ni nawh;
Anih, Samaria sebâwngte lim chu suknâwi vawng nîng a tih.
Thli an chîng a, thli sie an sîk ding a ni si a,
Kûng ngîr a nei naw a, a zîk khawm chun ra insuo naw ni;
Insuo khawm ni sienla, mikhuolhaiin fa zo an tih.
Israelhai chu lem zoin an um a nih,
Bêl, a sûnga lâwmna um lo angin tuhin hnam dang laia chun an um a nih.
Ram sabengtung khât tla angin Assuria ramah an hang fe si a;
Ephraim chun a dit zâwnghai a tlawn ie!
Anih, hnam danghai laia chun intlawn chîng sienla khawm,
Tuhin anni chu kei khâwm ka tih,
Lal le hotuhai rikphur leiin an kiem ṭan a nih.
Ephraim chun maichâm a sukpung hi an thil suksuolna chau a na,
An ta dingin maichâm hrim hrim chu suolna el a nih.
Ka dânhai chu ziekpêk ṭeu lang khawm,
chuonghai chu thil danglam tak angin an ngai a nih.
Ka ta dingin inthawinahai inhlânin,
inthawina sahai fa hai sien khawm,
Lalpa chun a pawm nawh.
Chuongchun, an rîtlona hre zing a ta, an suol hrem a ta,
Aigupta ramah kîr nâwk an tih.
Israel chun a siemtu a theinghil a,
In ropuihai a bâwl a;
Juda chun khawpui kul neihai a sukpung a;
Nisienlakhawm, a khawpuihaia chun mei tir ka ta,
A in ropuihai chu kâng zo a tih.
Aw Israel, lâwm naw ta,
Hnam danghai angin hlim so luom naw rawh;
I Pathien chu nawchi i zawr san a,
Hrizâwl tina chun nawchizawr ruoi man chu i ngaina si a.
Hrizâwl le grêp sâwrna khurhai chun anni suktlai naw ni a,
Uoin thar ding hlawsam a tih.
Ephraim chu Aigupta tieng kîr lem a tih;
Assuria rama chun bu thieng naw fâng an tih.
An thilinhlânhai chu a ta dingin lâwmum ni bawk nâwng a tih;
An bei chu lusûnhai bu ang nîng a ta,
A fa taphawthai chu sukpawrche nîng an tih.
An bei chu an hringna ta ding chau nîng a ta,
Inkhâwmpui ursûntak nia le,
Ngai ta u, sietna chu an mâksan a,
Aigupta chun anni chu lo kei khâwm lem a tih,
Memphis chun lo phûm a tih;
An tangkaruo thil ditumhai chu zakthlaiin bâwm a ta,
An puon inhaia chun hlo hlingnei um a tih,
Thungna nihai chu a hung tlung ie!
Israel chun chu chu hrieng a ta;
I rîtlona chu a tamin intaina a tam leiin.
Zâwlnei chu ân vêt a, thlarau mi chu ân hâi a nih.
Ephraim râl vêngtu chu ka Pathien kuoma um a na,
Zâwlnei hlak chu a lampui intluonin chângkamtu châng kam a um a;
A Pathien ina khawm intaina a um.
Nasatakin anni le anni an insukkhawhlo a;
An rîtlona chu hre zing a ta,
An suolnahai chu thung a tih.
In pahai chu, theichang hun hmasaa a hmin hmasa angin ka hmu.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chu Baalpeor hmunah an hung a.
Thil inzakumtaka chun an inpumpêk ta a;
An ingainat tak ang bawk chun tirdak an um ve ta a nih.
Ephraim ropuina chu vate angin vuong hmang a ta,
Nau nei dâm, nau vawn dâm, inrai dâm um naw ni hai.
An nauhai hung sukpuitling hai sien khawm, pasal hrim um lo dingin,
Insûntir tho tho ka tih;
Anih, anni ka nghatsan pha chun,
An chung a va rik zuol âwm de!
Tura ka hmu ang bawkin, Ephraim chu hmun inhawitaka siein a um a,
Nisienlakhawm, Ephraim chun a nauhai chu thattu kuomah la ṭhuoi a tih.
Aw
Sul nau insiet hlak le, nêne vuoihai chu inneitir rawh.
An rîtlona po po chu Gilgal khuoah a um a;
Chutaka chun anni chu ka theida si a.
An thilthaw rîtlona lei chun ka ina inthawkin hnawt suok ka tih;
Annirawi hi hmangai ta naw ning;
An hotuhai po po chu hel hmang an ni si a.
Ephraim chu vuokin a um a, an zung chu a vuoi zo tah,
Ra insuo naw ni hai;
Anih, insuo hai sien khawm, an sul ra ditumtak chu
That tho tho ka tih.
Ka Pathien chun anni chu peihâwn a tih.
Ama an ngaisak naw leiin;
Chuongchun, hnam danghai lai chun invâiin um an tih.
Israel chu grêp hrui inbuktak, ra hautak a nih;
A ra tam hu ang peiin a maichâm a sukpung a,
A ram ṭhatzie ang peiin lung inser
A lungril chu sukṭhein a um a,
Tuhin chu thiemnaw changin um tâng an tih.
An maichâmhai chu amân vaw chim a ta,
An lung inser phunhai chu suksieng a tih.
“Lal tak tak chu ei nei nawh,
Chu lal chun ieng am mi thawpêk thei a ta?” tiin, tuhin chu hril ta ngei an tih.
Thuthlung an siemna tienga chun khêla inkhâmin.
Thu teplo an hril a;
Chuleiin, leilet changkuong thlûra hlo tûr nei ang elin
Inkhingna a hung inder suok a nih.
A kuoma inthawka a bo ta leiin chutaka mihai chu lungngai an ta;
Chutaka thiempuhai a ropuina chunga lo lâwm hlakhai khawm.
Ama ngei khawm chu Laltak Jareb kuoma pêk dingin,
Assuria rama fe hmangpui nîng a tih.
Ephraim chun inzakna hmûng a ta.
Israel khawm chun ama thurawt ngei chu inzâpui a tih.
Samaria ram hlak chu tui chunga thing hlek nawi ang el hin,
A lal chu sukbohmang a na.
An maichâmahai chun hling le hlohlingnei hung ṭo a tih.
Tlâng kuoma chun, “Mîn khum rawh,” tîng an ta;
Muol kuoma chun, “Mi del rawh,” tîng an tih.
Chutaka chun an la ngîr zing a;
Rîtlona nauhai dona chun
Gibea ngeiah chun a hnawtphâk tâwl naw ding maw?
Ka nuom pha chun anni chu hrem ka ta,
Chun, an bawsietna pahnia an intâng pha chun,
An chungah mipuihai chu pungkhâwm an tih.
Ephraim chu bâwngla inchûktir tah,
Bu chîl hrâttak a nih;
Nisienlakhawm, kei ngei hin a rîng mawitaka chun
Rîngkawl inbâttir tâng ka ta;
Ephraim chunga chun mi inchuongtir ka tih;
Juda khawm chun hnuoi inlet a ta,
Jakob chun a pil tlanghai chu suknâwi a tih.
Chuongchun, lunginsietna ang peiin sîk ro;
In hnuoi chuongtlâihai chu inlet ro,
Ama chu zawng hun a ni si a.
Rîtlona hnuoi in inlet a, khawhlona in sîk a,
Khêlhlip ra in fâk a nih.
I tawlailîrhai le i mi hrâthai tam hi i ring vei a.
Chuleiin, i mihai laia chun indo buoi mup mupna hung suok a ta,
I kulhai po po chu suksiet nîng a tih;
Salman chun indona nia Beth-arbel a suksiet a,
Nu chu a nauhai leh peinawia an um lai ang khan.
I rîtlona nasatak leiin,
Chuong ang chun Bethel chun thâwng a ti che;
Israel lal chu vârṭien laiin sukbohmangdêr nîng a tih.
hmangai a,
Aigupta rama inthawkin ka naupa dinga ka ko suok a nih.
Ka ko râwn po leh an mi hlat zuol det a,
Baalhai kuomah an inthâwi zing a.
Mi lim siem fâwmhai kuomah riminhnik an raw lem a nih.
Kei ruok chun Ephraim chu ka kuta chelin lâwn kân chûktir a,
Keiin ka sukdam a nih ti ruok chu an hriet nawh.
Mihriem hruihruol, hmangaina hruihai chun anni ka kei a,
An ta ding chun an khâka kawl hlîppêktu ang chu ka na,
Duottakin an hmaah fâk ding ka pêk a.
Aigupta rama chun kîr nâwk ta naw nih;
Nisienlakhawm, hnungkîr an nuom naw leiin,
Assuria chu a lal nîng a tih.
A khawpuihaia chun kâwlhnâm inletin um a ta,
A kulhai chu sukbohmang a tih,
Anni thu lo râwn ang ngeiin sukbohmang a tih.
Ka mihai chun mi nghatsan an tum zing a,
Chuongchun, an ta dingin rîngkawl ruotpêk an nih,
Chu chu tukhawma hlîppêk naw nih.
Aw Israel, iengtin am inthla thei ka ti che a?
Iengtin am Adma angin siem thei ka ti che a?
Iengtin am Zeboiim angin inumtir thei ka ti che a?
Ka sûnga hin ka lung hi ân lêt a,
Ka lunginsietnahai chu ân mûtâi nâwk ta lem a.
Ka lunginsen nasatak chu hlen naw ning a,
Ephraim chu sukbohmang tum nâwk ta naw ning.
Kei chu mihriem ni lovin, Pathien ka ni si a,
Nangmaa um Mi Inthieng chu;
Khawpui chu hung hlûkhum naw ning.
Sakeibaknei anga inrûm ding chu;
Anih, inrûm ngei a ta,
Khaw thlang tienga inthawkin a nauhai chu
Inthin pumin hung an tih.
Aiguptaa inthawk chun chawngzawng angin,
Assuriaa inthawk chun vaṭhu angin thla zâp sieu sieuin hung an tih;
Chun, an in lum inhluotir ka ta,
ti hi
Ephraim chun khêl thuin a mîn huol vêl a,
Israel sûnghai chun hlêmnain;
Juda ruok chu Pathien ihriet zingin a um a,
Mi Inthieng chunga chun ring a um a nih.
Ephraim chun thli a ring a,
Khaw sakthli chu a zui hlak a;
Khêl thu le inṭhedarna thu a sukpung tiel tiel a,
Assuria leh thu an thlung a,
Aigupta tieng chun hriek a phur lût a.
Jakob chu a um dân angzie peiin hrem a tih;
A thilthaw angzie peia thungin.
Sula khawm khan a unaupa chu a kekhawngah a hung man a,
A hung puitling khan Pathien chu ân beipui a,
A ṭap a, ditsakna a ngên a,
Bethel hmuna chun ama a hmu ta a,
Chutaka chun a kuomah thu a hril a;
Chuongchun, nang chun i Pathien tieng ngha la,
Lunginsietna le rorêlna hmang la;
I Pathiena chun innghat rawp rawh.
Sumdâwngtu a na, a kutah bûkna indik naw a um a,
Hlêm ngawt a châk hlak a nih.
Ephraim chun, “Ka hausa takzet el ta a,
Kân sukmuk takmeu el ta a nih;
Ka sinthaw po poahai hlak chun
Keimaa thil suol an hmu ding hlak um dêr lo,” a ti a.
Ruoiṭhe hun lai ang khan puon inah lân chêngtir nâwk ka ti che.
Zâwlneihai hmangin thu ka hril hlak a,
Inlârnahai ka sukpung a;
Zâwlneihai hmangin tekhina ka siem hlak;
Gilead chu rîtlona a ni naw am a nih?
Teplo el an ni annâwm;
Gilgala chun bâwngchal an inhlân hlak a.
Anih, an maichâmhai chu leilet changkuonga
Lung dêng khâwm ang el an nih.
Israel chun nuhmei man a tuok ta a;
Nuhmei man ding chun berâm a vêng a nih.
Zâwlnei bawk hmang chun a hum bawk a.
Ephraim hlak chun a suklungsen nasa êm êm el a,
Chuleiin, a thisen insuo chu ama chungah a tla a,
A hrilsietna chu ama chungah
Ephraimin thu a hril chun inthinna khawp a tling
hiel hlak,
Israel mihai laia chun ngai ropui a ni mieu si a.
Baal kuoma a tlûk china hin chu a thi ta a nih.
Tu khawm hin an suol zuol ta deu deu a,
An tangkaruoin milim a sunga sung an insiem fâwm a,
Anni ngaidân ang peia milim chu:
Chuonghai po po chu themthiemhai kutsuok a ni sa khawmin,
Inthâwina inhlântu taphawthai chun
Bâwngtê chu fâwp raw hai se, an ti hlak.
Chuleiin, zîngkâr ṭieusûm ang le,
Dâidaw inhmataka bo nâwk el hlak ang,
Hrizâwla bu si thlivirin a lâk hmang hlak ang,
Meikhu suokna meikhu ang nîng an tih.
Kei ruok hi chu Aigupta rama inthawk ta a,
Kei ti naw chu Pathien dang i hriet ngai naw a;
Kei naw hi chu sandamtu dang an um nawh.
An fâk ding dawnga chun an tlai a,
An tlai chu an lungrilin an chapo pha a,
Chuongchun, an mi theinghil ta a nih.
Chuleiin, an ta dingin sakeibaknei ang nîng ka ta,
Keitê angin lampuiah anni inchân ka tih.
Savawm a tê chân angin anni chu thâwng ka ta,
An lung tuomtuhai chu keithlêr vawng ka ta,
Chu hmuna chun sakeibaknei angin
Anni fa zo ka tih;
Ramsain a kei dar vawng ding angin.
Aw Israel, nangma ṭhangpuitu i mi do hi,
I sietna a nih ie.
I lal chu tuhin khâwlai am a um a?
Lal le hotuhai mi pe rawh, i itihai,
I rorêltuhai chu khâwlai am an um a?
Ka lunginsenin ka lâk hmang nâwk ta a nih.
Ephraim rîtlona chu ka înkhâwl khâwm a na,
A suolnahai chu inchik a nih.
Nuhmei nauha invawi lungngaina ang chu a chungah hung tlung a tih,
Ama chu naupa varna nei lo a nih,
A huntakah nau hung suokna hmunah a um si nawh.
Thinaa inthawkin anni chu sansuok ka tih;
Aw thina, i hripuihai chu khâwlai am?
Aw Seol, i suksietna chu khâwlai am?
Lunginsietna chu ka mita inthawkin thup nîng a tih.
A unauhai laia chun a tluongtlung tak ni sien khawm,
Khaw sak thli hung inthawk a ta,
Thlalêra inthawka
A tuihnârhai chu kang a ta,
A tuikhurhai chu ṭâwl zo a tih;
Bûr le bêl ṭhahai po po, a ro chu sukse vawng a tih.
Samaria chu sukrêmin um a tih,
A Pathien chungah a hel si a;
Kâwlhnâma sukthlûkin um an ta,
An nautêhai chu peinawi nîng an tih,
An nuhmei nau vawn laihai chu phirthlêr nîng an tih.
Aw Israel,
I rîtlona lei ngei chun i tlu ta hi.
Thu chawi pumin
A kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril rawh,
“Rîtlona po po chu la hmang la,
A ṭha taphawt chu pawm la,
Chuongchun, kan hmûr rahai chu,
Bâwngchal aiah hung inhlân kan tih.
Assuria chun mi sandam naw ni a,
Sakawr chunghaia chun chuong nâwng kan ta,
Kan kutsuokhai kuoma chun,
‘Kan Pathien in nih,’ ti ngai ta nâwng kan tih,
Fahrahai chun nangmaa hin
Lunginsietna an lo hmu hlak a ni si a,” tiin.
An hnungtawlna hi sukdam ka ta,
Annia inthawka ka lunginsenna chu ân kieng ta leiin,
Anni chu ka hmangai hrim hrim ding a nih.
Israel kuoma chun daidaw ang nîng ka ta,
Ama chu lili angin hung vul a ta,
Lebanon tlânga thing zung angin a zung thlâk dar a tih.
A zârhai chu inbuk luoi a ta,
A mawizie chu oliv thing ang el nîng a tih;
Lebanon tlâng ang elin a rim inhnik a tih.
A hlima chênghai chu hung kîr an ta,
Bu ang hring thar an tih,
Grêp hrui angin hung inno an ta;
A rim inhnikzie chu Lebanon uoin ang nîng a tih.
Aw Ephraim, milimhai leh inzâwlna ieng am ka nei a?
Kei hi a suklâwmtu che ka na,
A tungdingtu che khawm ka nih.
Kei chu fâr thing hring dup ang ka na,
I ra ṭhahai chu keima kuoma inthawk a nih.
Tu am vara hieng hi hrethiem thei ding?
Tu am var hlea hre thei ding?
Mi indikhai chun an hraw ding a ni si a;
Bawsetuhai ruok chu chutaka chun
An insui thlu ding a nih.
Pethuel naupa Joel kuoma
Tarsiehai, hi hi hre unla, hi rama um po pohai, na lo sit ro.Hi in hun lai le in puhai hun laia khawm a um ta hlak am a nih?
Chu chu in nauhai hril unla, in nauhai chun an nauhai hril sienla, an nau nâwksâwnghai chun suon dang hril pei raw hai se.
Thilngein a fâk mahla po chu khauṭhikṭhiin a fâk a, khâuṭhikṭhiin a fâk mahla po chu thingngein a fâk a; thingngein a fâk mahla po chu tuktulungin a fâk zo a.
Inruihai, har unla, ṭap ro; uoin dâwn po pohai, a uoin thlum lei chun khêk rak rak unla, in baua inthawka lâk hmang a ni ta si a.
Ka grêp hrui a suksiet a, ka theichang kûng hâwng a khek a, a khek fai vawng a, a peihâwn a; a kâuhai chu a fil vâr vawng a.
Nunghâkin saiip puon bil a, a ṭhatlai pasal a sûn angin ṭap rak rak ro.
Beiphit inhlân dâm, dâwn ding inhlân dâm chu
Lo chu suksiet a na, ram chu a lungngai a, bu chu suksiet a na, uoin thar chu a kang a, hriek khawm chu a chau a.
Aw, nangni lo neituhai, inzak unla, nangni grêp hrui enkawltuhai, bupui le buṭei leiin khêk rak rak ro; loa bu sîk ding chu a bohmang ta si a.

Grêp hrui chu a vuoi a, theichang kûng chu a châu a, theibufai kûng dâm, intûm dâm le apple thei kûng dâm, loa thing po pohai khawm chu a ṭuoi ta a; mihriem nauhai laia lâwmna chu a vuoi hmang ta si a.

Nangni thiempuhai, saiip puon dierkei unla, ṭap ro; nangni maichâm rawngbâwltuhai, khêk rak rak ro; nangni ka Pathien rawngbâwltuhai, hung unla, saiip puon silin zânkhawvârin zâl ro: in Pathien ina inthawk chun beiphit inhlân le dâwn ding inhlân chu khap a ni si a.
Bu nghei hun inser thieng unla, inkhâwmpui ursûn siem unla,
Ei mithmua fâk ding sukbo a ni naw am a nih? Anih, ei Pathien ina inthawka hlimna le lâwmna leh?
Chihai chu hnuoitlang hnuoia chun a hmawn a; zênghai chu a sie a, bu inhai chu ṭhiekin a um a, a bu chu a vuoi zo ta si a.
Ranhai chu an inrûm nasa de! Bâwng ruolhai chu an lunginzîng a, hlohna hring hmun an nei naw leiin; anih, berâm ruolhai chu an rêm zo ta a.
Aw
Anih, ramsahai chu nanga ngaiin an inthuok huom huom a, vadungtêhai chu a kang intan a, mei chun thlalêr hmun hlohna hmun chu a kâng fai ta si a.
Ziona chun tawtawrâwt mût unla, ka tlâng inthienga chun inrâlringna sukri ro, hi ram sûnga mi po pohai chu inthin raw se;

inthimna le vâninnîmna ni, sûm zîng ni le inthim sâ ni, tlâng chunga vârtle var rên ruon ang; mipui nasatak le hrâttak, chuong ang la um ngai lo, chuong hnunga suon tamtak chen khawma um nâwk ta ngailo ding chu.
An hmatieng chu meiin a kâng fai a, an hnungtieng meichawkin a hlieu bawk a; an hmaa ram chu Eden huon ang a nih; an hnungtieng chu thlalêr ram ṭâwl a nih, iengkhawmin chuong chu an pumpel ta nawh.
An inlang dân chu sakawr inlang dân ang a nih; sakawr chuong mi angin an tlân a.
An hmaa mipuihai chu an thlaphâng a, an hmêlhai chu a hung dâng vawng ta a.
Mi hrâttak angin an tlân a, indo mi angin bangah an lâwn a; mâni zâwn sengah an fe a, an intlar dân an sukbuoi nawh.
An inhneng bawk naw a, mâni lampui sengah an fe a, hriemhreihai an nêrthleng a, an fe pêt nawh.
Khawpui chunga chun an inchâwm a; kul chungah an tlân a; in sûngahai chun an hang lâwn a; inru angin tukverahai an lût a.
in puon ni lovin, in lungril thlêr ro,” a tih.
Ziona chun tawtawrâwt mût unla, bu nghei hun inserthieng ro; inkhâwmpui ursûntak chu siem ro,

mipui inkhâwm unla, inkhâwmpuihai chu sukthieng unla, tarsiehai, naupanghai, nenê ne laihai kei khâwm unla, moneitu chu a pindana inthawkin hung suok sienla, mo khawm a pindan sûngrila inthawk chun hung suok raw se.
Thiempu,

amiruokchu, in kuoma inthawkin hmârtieng sipai ruol chu sawnhmang dai ka ta, ram ṭâwl le râusannaah infetir ka tih, a hmasa pâwl saktieng Tupuiah, a nuhnung pâwl thlangtieng Tupuiah; hung ṭhuoi suok a ta, rimsetakin hung innam a tih, thil nasatak a thaw ta leiin.
Aw ram, ṭi naw la, hlimin lâwm rawh,
Ranhai, ṭi naw ro, thlalêr hlobet hmun a hung inder a; thing chu a hung ra a, theichang kûng le grêphruihai chu a hung inno si a.
Nangni Zion nauhai, lâwm ro,
Ṭuonghai chu buin hung sip a ta, uoin le hriek chu bêlahai chun sip liem a ta.
Nangni laia ka sipai ruol tamtak ka itir, tawktawngang dâm, khâuṭhikṭhi dâm, thingnge dâm, tuktulung dâmin an fâk zo kumhai kha thung nâwk ka ti cheu.
Tamtak nei in ta, tlai in tih, maktaka ngaituo hlaktu cheu
Chun, Israelhai lai hin ka um ti le,
chuong niahai chun suokpahai le suoknuhai chunga khawm ka thlarau buok ka tih.
Vâna le hnuoiahai thilmakhai inhmutir ka ta, thisen dâm, meikhu dâm, meikhu ngîr dâm leh.
“Ngai ta u, chuong niahai le chuong pha chun, Juda le Jerusalem sala an um chu ka ṭhuoikîr nâwk pha chun,
