hnam po po kei khâwm ka ta, anni chu Jehosaphat kâwnah hung ṭhuoi thlâng ka ta, ka ram an sem dar a, hnamhai laia an sukdar, ka mihai le ka rochan Israelhai ta ding chun anni chu chutaka chun khing ka tih.
Ka mihai ta dingin ṭhum an vâwr a, nawchizawr man dingin pasal naupang an pêk a, uoin an dâwn theina dingin, a man dingin nuhmei naupang an zawr a.

Anih, aw Tura le Sidon le Philistin ram po pohai, ka ta dingin ieng am in ni a? In mi thung ding am a nih? In mi thung chun, hrâttakin, inhmawtakin in mi thungna chu in lu chung ngeiah thung vêng ka ti cheu.
Ka tangkaruo le ka rângkachak in lâk a, ka thil ṭhatak, ditumtakhai, in biekin sûngahai in chawi lût vei a;
Juda nauhai le Jerusalem nauhai khawm an ramria inthawka hlataka in sawn hmang theina dingin Grik naupasalhai kuomah in zawr el si a;
ngai ta u, in zawrna hmuna inthawk khan chawkthoin insuoktir ka ta, in thungna chu in lu chung ngeiah thung vêng ka tih.
“Hi hi hnamhai lai chun hril dar unla, indona buotsai unla, mi hrâttakhai chawktho unla, indo mi po pohai hung hnai hai sienla, hung raw hai se.
A vêla hnam po pohai, inhmaw unla, pungkhâwm unla, hung tâwl ro; aw
Hnamhai chu inchawktho sienla, Jehosaphat kâwna chun hung tâwl raw hai se, chutaka chun a vêla hnam po po hai chunga rorêl dingin ka ṭhung ding a nih.
Mipuihai, thusukthlûkna kâwna mipui um mur murhai!
Nisa le thla dâm an inthim a, arasihaiin an varna an thup a.
Chuongchun,
“Chu ni chun tlâng insânghai chun uoin thlum infartir an ta, tlânghai chu nênetuiin luong a tih, Juda ram vadungtêhai po po chu tuiin luong a ta;
Juda nauhai chunga nunsetaka thawa, an ramah mi thiem thisen an insuo leiin Aigupta ram chu bo a ta, Edom ram chu thlalêr ram ṭâwl nîng a tih.
Juda ram ruok chu kumkhuoin um zing a ta, Jerusalem chu suona inthawka suon dang chenin.
Chun, an thisen ka isâwpfai naw chu sâwpfai ka ta,
chuleiin, Hazael ina chun mei tir ka ta, Benhadad lal inhai chu kâng vawng a tih.
chuleiin, Gaza khaw kul chunga chun mei tir ka ta, a lal inhai chu kâng vawng a tih;
chuleiin, Rabba khaw kul chungah mei sêm chawk ka ta; chun, indo nia khêk le, thlivir nia thlipui leh, a lal inhai chu kâng vawng a ta;
chuleiin, Moab chungah mei tir ka ta, Kerioth lal inhai chu kâng vawng a ta; chun, Moab chu buoina le khêk ri le tawtawrâwt riin thîng a ta,
an pahai chîng hlak khêlhrilhai khan anni chu a ṭhuoi hmang leiin; chuleiin, Juda chunga chun mei tir ka ta, Jerusalem khaw lal inhai chu kâng vawng a tih,” tiin.
rimsi lu chunga pilvut phul châk ngawi ngawi le, zainêmhai lampui sukkâwipêk hlakhai chu: chun, mi pakhat chu a pa leh nunghâk pakhat kuoma ka hming sukse dingin an fe hmunkhat hlak a!
maichâm tin bula puon siekham chunga chun an zâl hlak a, an Pathien ina chun mi an inchawitir manhai chun uoin an dâwn hlak a.
Amor mihai ram chu nei dingin Aigupta rama inthawkin ka ṭhuoi suok cheu a, thlalêra khan kum sâwmli sûngin ka ṭhuoi cheu a.
“Nisienlakhawm, Nazirit mihai kuomah uoin dâwn ding in pêk a, zâwlneihai kuomah, ‘Thu hril naw ro’, tiin thu in pêk a.
Ngai ta u, buphala sip, tawlailîr ichîl angin in hmuna khan chîl ka ti cheu.
Chun, mi tlân hrâthai hrâtna chu bo a ta, mi hrâtin a tha chu sukhrât thei bawk naw ni; mi hrâttak khawm inhum thei naw ni a,
thalngul hmangtu khawm chu ngîr thei bawk naw ni; ngalhrât mi khawm inhum thei bawk naw ni; sakawr chung chuong mi khawm inhum thei bawk naw nih;
chu nia chun mi thilthawtheitak laia mi huoisen khawm chu saruokin tlân hmang a tih,”
Aw, Israel nauhai, Aigupta rama inthawka ka ṭhuoi suok sûngkuohai,
“Nangni chau hi khawvêla sûngkuo po po laia ka hriet in na; chuleiin, in khawhlona po poahai chun hrem ka ti cheu.
An inrem chau naw chun mi pahni chu an intlawn ding am a nih?
Sakeibakneiin sa a man naw lai ramhnuoiah ân rûm hlak am a nih? Sakeibaknei vânglaiin iengkhawm a man naw chun a pûka inthawk chun ân rûm hlak am a nih?
A ta dinga tawktar a um naw chun vate chu hnuoia châng chun a âwk hlak am a nih? Châng chu iengkhawm âwk lovin hnuoia inthawk chun ân chim hlak am a nih?
Khawpuiah tawtawrâwt an mûtin, mi ṭi lovin an um hlak am a nih?
Sakeibaknei ân rûm a, tuin am ṭi nâwng a ta? Lalpa
Asdod lal inhaia le Aigupta ram lal inhaia chun hril unla, “Samari tlâng chunghaia chun inkhâwm unla, chun, chutaka buoina lientak umhai le nêksâwrna umhai chu en ro.
An lal inahai pâwngnêkna le suomhmangna siekhâwmtuhai chun sukdik dân an thiem si nawh,”
Chuleiin,
Ngai unla, Jakob sûnghai chunga chun inhriettir ro,” sipaihai Pathien, Lalpa
Chun, thlasik in le nipui in vaw sieng ka ta, saiha inhai chu bohmang a tih, in ropuihai chun tâwpna nei an tih,”
Nangni Basan hmun sebâwngpui, Samari tlâng chunga um, rimsihai nêksâwr a, tlasamhai nêk a, an lalhai kuomah, “Hung la unla, dâwn ei tiu,” tituhai, hi thu hi lo hre ro.
Chun, bang âwngahai fe suok in ta, mi tin chu tlûntakin fêng an tih, Harmon hmuna chun inpeihâwn in tih,”
“Bethela chun hung unla, bawse ro, Gilgala chun hung unla, bawsietna chu sukpung ro; chun, in inthâwinahai chu tûk tin hung la unla, in sâwma pakhathai chu ni thum dan peiah hung la ro,
chawl ṭhang lâwmthu hrilna inthâwina chu inhlân unla, mâni nuomzâwnga inhlânhai chu hril unla, puong ro; Aw Israel nauhai, hi hi in nuom sih a,” Lalpa
“Chun, kei khawma in khawpui po pohaia ha faina le in hmun po pohaia tlâksamna ka pêk cheu a, chuong sa khawm chun ka kuomah in hung kîr naw a,”

“Chun, bu sîk hun ding thla thum a la ni laiin in chunga ruo sûr ding khawm ka chel a, khawpui pakhat chungah kân sûrtir a, khawpui dang chungah kân sûrtir naw a; hmun khat chungah a sûr hlak a, a sûr nawna hmun chu a ṭâwl hlak.
Chuongchun, khawpui pahni amanih, pathum amani chu khawpui pakhatah tui dâwn dingin an invâk a, an khawp naw a, chuong sa khawm chun ka kuomah an hung kîr nawh,”

“Ṭâwlna le apnain ka hrem cheu a, in huonhai, in grêp huonhai, in theichang kûnghai, in oliv thinghai zozai chu thingnge tuktulung chun a fâk zo vawng tah a nih; chuong khawm chun ka kuomah in hung kîr nawh,”

“Aigupta ram angin nangni lai hripui ka tir a, kâwlhnâmin in tlangvâlhai chu ka that ta a, in sakawrhai ka ṭhuoi hmang tah a nih; chun, in sipai hmun rimsie chu hnâra innam khawpin kân umtir a, chuong khawm chun ka kuomah in hung kîr nawh,”
“Chuleiin, aw Israel, i chungah hieng ang hin ka thaw ding a nih; i chungah hi hi ka thaw ding a ni leiin, aw Israel, i Pathien chu tuok dingin insiem
Ngai ta, tlânghai inngîr suok a, thli siem a, mihriem kuoma chun a ngaituona chu ieng am a na ti hrilsuokpêk a, zîngkâr chu sukthim a, hnuoi hmun insâng sirtu chu a hming
Aw, Israel chihai, hi thu nangni sûnna dinga ka hril hi hre ro:
“Nunghâk, Israel chu a tlu ta a, ngîr nâwk ta naw nih: a ram chunga chun pei thlâk a ni tah a nih, ama chu inngîrtir dingin tukhawm an um nawh.”
Lalpa

nisienlakhawm, Bethel khuo chu zawng naw unla, Gilgala chun lût naw bawk unla. Beer-seba khuoah kai bawk naw ro; Gilgal khuo chu matheilovin sala manin a um ding a ni si a; Bethel khuo chu teplo hung nîng a tih.”
rorêlna sairam thinga inchangtir a, felna chu hnuoia pei thlahai;
kul chunga bohmangna hung tlung khawpa, mi hrâthai chunga bohmangna intluntu chu.
Kawtkhâra kâwktu chu an theida a, thu fel hriltu chu an tirdak a.
Chuleiin, mi rimsihai sirdein bu in lâkpêk a, lung intieng inhai in bâwl a, nisienlakhawm, a sûngah chêng naw ti niu; grêp huon inhawihai in siem a, nisienlakhawm, a uoin dâwn naw ti niu.
In bawsietnahai tamzie le, in suolnahai a nasatzie ka hriet si a; mi felhai suknawmna a, thamna la a, kawtkhâra tlasamhai an chantâwk nghatsantuhai.
Chuongchun, mi var chu chuong ang huna chun to zing a ta, hun ṭha naw a ni leiin.
In hring theina dingin ṭhat nawna zawng lovin, ṭhatna zawng unla; chun, in hril angin,
Suolna chu theida unla, ṭhatna ngaina unla, kawtkhâra rorêlna chu inngîr nghet ro; Josefhai laia hlabîkhai chunga chun
Chuleiin,
Chun, grêp huon po poa chun ṭap rak rakna um a ta, nangni lai ka fethleng ding a ni si a,”
Sakeibaknei mâksan a, savawm intuokpui mi ang le, ina lût a, bang chunga kut innghat a, rûlin a chuk ang chu a nih.
In ruoiṭhehai ka theidain ka hmusit a, in inkhâwmpui ursûnahai chun lâwm bawk naw ning.
I ṭingṭang ri mawi chu ngai naw ningah, chuleiin, ka kuoma inthawkin i hla nasêtum chu la hmang rawh.
Nisienlakhawm, rorêlnahai chu tuihai angin le felna chu vadungpui angin luong raw se.
“Aw Israel sûngkuohai, kum sâwmli sûngin thlalêra khan inthâwinahai le thil inhlânhai ka kuomah in hung lâk am a nih?
Anih, in laltak Sikkuth in Molok puon inhai le, in Kiun milimhai, in arasi pathien, mâni ta dinga in siem chu in phur a.
“Zion tlânga inhawitir taluoa umhai le, Samari tlânga himtaka umhai le hnam lientak mi ropuihai, an kuoma Israel sûngkuohai an fenahai chu an chung a rik ie!

Kalne khuoa chun fe unla, en ro; chun, chutaka inthawkin Hamath khaw ropuia chun fe unla, en ro; chun, Philistin ram Gath khuoa chun fe thla unla, hieng ramhai nêk hin an ṭha lem am? In ram nêkin an ram chu a lien lem am?
Nangni sietna ni hlataka sie a, tharuma rorelna inhnaitir hai;
saiha khuma zâl a, an ṭhungpha sei chunghaia inzi a, berâm ruol laia berâmte le sebâwng umna laia sebâwng tuoihai fa a;
ṭingṭanga zawmthâwtna hlahai sak a, David anga mâni ta dinga hla thlûk hmangruohai siem a;
berbu liena uoin dâwn a, hriek ṭhataka innâl hlakhai chu; nisienlakhawm, Josefhai rinumna leiin an lungngai nawh.
Chuongchun, tuhin sala fe hmasahai leh salah fêng an ta, inzihai hlimna bur bur chu bo tâng a tih.”
In pakhatah mi sâwm an la um chun thi vawng an tih.

Chun, mithi sungkuo hnai an ruonghai râwtu ding ruonghai inhlawm dinga chu ina hung chun, insungrila mi pakhat kuomah chun, “I kuomah a dang an la um am?” tîng a ta. Ama chun, “an um ta nawh” tîng a ta. Chun ama chun, “To zing rawh,
Ngai ta u,
Sakawrhai chu lungpui chungah an tlân ding am a nih? Chutaka chun miin sebâwngin hnuoi an inlet ding am a nih? Nangnîn rorêlna chu thina hloa le, felna chu sairam thingah in inchangtir hi;
nangni iengkhawmlo chunga lâwm a. “Eini hrâtnain a ni nâwm a ni kihai ei lâk?” tituhai.
“En ta u, Aw Israel sûngkuohai, nangni hi do dingin hnam hung inngîrsuotir ka ta, chun, Hamath khaw kawtsuoa inthawkin Araba vadung chenin suknawmnâng an ti cheu,”
Hieng ang hin Lalpa
Chun, chu rama hlohna chu an fâk zo hnungin, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, ngaidam rawh, ka ngên che hi; Jakob chu iengtin am ngîr thei a ta, ama a chîn si a?” ka ti a.
Hi thuah hin
Hieng ang hin Lalpa
chun, keiin, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, ma rawh, ka ngên che hi, Jakob chu iengtin am ngîr thei a ta, ama a chîn si a?” ka ta.
Hi thuah hin
Hieng ang hin a mîn entir a, chun, en ta u, Lalpa chu enremnaa siem bang kâwlah a ngîr a, a kuta chun enremna chu a chawi a.
Chun,
chun, Isak bâwlhmunhai chu rausan hung nîng an ta, Israel hmun inthienghai chu suksiet nîng a tih, chun, Jeroboam sûnghai chu kâwlhnâmin do ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Bethel khaw thiempu Amazia chun Israel lal Jeroboam kuomah, “Amos chun Israel sûnghai lai chun a phierrûk che a, ram chun a thuhril po po chu a tuor thei nawh.
Amos chun hieng ang hin a ti si a, ‘Jeroboam chu kâwlhnâmin thîng a ta, matheilovin a rama inthawkin Israel chu salah ṭhuoi suok a ta,’ tiin thu a thawn a,” tiin.
Chun, Amazia chun Amos kuomah, “Aw nang zâwlnei, fe la, Juda ramah tlân hmang la, chutaka chun bu fa la, thu hril rawh;
nisienlakhawm, Bethel khuoah thu hril nâwk ta naw rawh: lal hmun inthieng le lal in a ni leiin,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, Amos chun Amazia kuomah, “Zâwlnei ka ni naw a, zâwlnei naupa khawm ka ni bawk nawh; ran ruol vêngtu le theichang kûng enkawltu ka ni lem a nih;
Chuongchun, tuhin
chuleiin,
Hieng ang hin Lalpa
Chun, ama chun, “Amos, ieng am i hmu a?” a ta. Keiin, “Nisapuithei bâwm,” ka ti a. Chun,
Lalpa
Chun, hi hi ngai ta u, nangni tlasamhai fa zo nuom a, ram mi rimsi sukbo nuomhai,

“Bu ei zawr theina dingin thla thar chu iengtik âm bo a ta, beiphit bu ei insuo theina dingin châwlni chu iengtik âm a bo ding a na? Epha sukchîna, shekel suklien a, indik nawtaka hlêmna bûkna hmang a,
tangkaruoa mi rimsi inchaw a, mi tlasamhai chu kekawk bun khata inchaw a, busi ei zawr theina dingin,” tiin.
Hi hi lei hin ram chu ân thinin, a sûnga um taphawthai chu an lungngai naw ding am a nih? Anih, Vadung ang chun hung lien vawng a ta, Aigupta ram Vadung angin hung buoiin hung kang a tih.
Chun, Lalpa

In ruoiṭhehai chu lungngainaa le in hlahai po po chu ṭapnaah inchangtir ka tih; kâwng po po chu saiip puon indierkeitir ka ta, lu tin sîpa chun kâwkna hung intlungtir ka tih; chun, naupa khât nei sun ta dinga lungngaina ang le, a tâwpna chu khâkna ni angin siem ka tih.
Lalpa
Lalpa thu hre châka zawngin, tuipuia inthawka tuipui dangah, Hmartienga inthawkin saktieng tlânvêl an ta, nisienlakhawm, hmu naw ni hai.
Chu nia chun nunghâk ṭha le tlangvâlhai chu dangchârin thidang an ta,

Samari khaw suolna sâla ṭawng inkhâm a, ‘Aw Dan, i Pathien a hring angin,’ le, ‘Beer-seba fena lampui a hring zing angin,’ tihai kha, chuong mihai khawm chu tlûng an tih, tho nâwk dêr naw ni hai,” tiin.

Maichâm bula ngîrin Lalpa chu ka hmu a, chun, ama chun, “Kawtkhâr bulhai an inhnîng theina dingin a sîp bâwkhai chu vaw la, an rênga lu chungah suknâwi vawng rawh; chun, a thi mahlahai chu kâwlhnâmin that ka ta, pakhat khawm tlân hmang naw ni hai a, pakhat khawma pumpel naw bawk an tih.
Mithi khuo chenin cho tlang hai sien khawm, chutaka inthawk chun ka kutin la suok ka ta, vânah lâwn hai sien khawm, chutaka inthawk chun hnûk thlâng ka tih.

Karmel tlâng sîpah inbihmang hai sien khawm, zawng suok ka ta, chutaka inthawk chun anni chu la thlâng ka tih; chun, tuisuoriet mawngah ka mithmu nawah inbihmang hai sien khawm, chutaka rûl chu thu pêng ka ta, anni chu chuk a tih.
An hmêlmahai hmaah salah fe hai sien khawm, chutaka kâwlhnâm chu thu pêng ka ta, anni chu sât hlum a tih, ṭhatna ni lovin, ṭhat nawna dingin an chungah ka mit infûktir ka tih,”
Ram chu tâwk a, suktuiraltu chu Lalpa, sipaihai
vâna a pindanhai siem a, hnuoi chunga pindan inkuol siem a, tuisuoriet tuihai ko a, hnuoi chunga bunthlatu, a hming chu
Ngai ta u, Lalpa
“Ngai ta u, thu ka pêk ding a ni si a, chun, sihria bu an rel angin, Israel sûngkuohai chu hnam po po lai chun rel ka tih; nisienlakhawm, a mal chîn tak khawm hnuoi chungah tla naw ni.
Ka mihai mi suol po po, ‘Sietna chun mi hnawt phâk naw ni a, mi nang bawk naw ni,’ tihai chu kâwlhnâmin thîng an tih.
“Chu nia chun David bâwktê chim chu inngîr ka ta, a âwnghai chu phâwk ka ta, a sietnahai chu rem nâwk ka ta; tienlaia a um ang khan bâwl ka tih,

Chun, ka mi Israelhai chu sala inthawkin ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka ta; khaw ṭâwphai chu siem nâwk an ta, hluong an tih; chun, grêp huonhai siem an ta, a uoin dâwn an tih; huonhai khawm siem an ta, a ra chu fâng an tih.
An ramah anni chu phun ka ta, an kuoma ka pêk an rama inthawk phawidawkin um nâwk ta naw ni hai,”
Ngai ta, hnamhai laia chun ka sukchîn ta che a na, nasataka hmusitin i um tah.
Aw nang, lungpui kak kâra chêng a; hmun insâng hluotu, “Tuin am hnuoiah mi sukthlâng a ta?” ti lungriltu, i lungril chapona hin a hlêm ta che a nih.
Mu angin insângtakah hang vuong la khawm, i bu chu arasi lai khin sep ni sienla khawm, chutaka inthawk chun la thla el ka ti che,

I kuomah rûkruhai, suomhmanghai zânah hung hai sienla, (sukbohmang i va ni nasa âwm de!) an dittâwkin an inrûk naw ding am a nih? I kuomah grêp sîk khâwmtuhai hung sienla, grêp sîk ding ṭhenkhat an mâksan naw ding am a nih?
Aw iengtinam Esau thilhai zawngsuok ni tâng a ta! Iengtinam a robâwm thuphmanghai chu dap suok ning a ta!

I tienga ṭhanghai po poin ramri hiel an hung intlun che a, mi inremtaka i umpuihai khan an hlêm che a, an hne ta che a nih; i bei fatuhai khan i hnuoiah châng an kam a: Amaa chun hrietthiemna hrim a um naw a nih.
Chu nia chun Edoma inthawk mi varhai chu ka sukbohmangin, Esau tlânga inthawka hrietthiemna ka sukbohmang naw ding am a nih?
Aw Teman, Esau tlânga inthawka mi tin sukbohmanga an um vawngna dingin, i mi hrâthai chu nasatakin ṭîng an tih.
I unaupa Jakob chunga inpâwngnêkna leiin inzaknain inkhum a ti che a, kumkhuoa sukbohmangin um i tih.
Khingtienga i ngîr nia, mikhuolhaiin a sum an lâk hmang nia, hnam dang mihai a kul kawtkhâra an hung lûta, Jerusalem chunga ai an sân lai khan nang khawm anni laia ṭhang angin i um kha.

Nisienlakhawm, i unaupa sal intangna niah khan a ni kha in thlîr el ding a ni naw a; Juda nauhai sietna niah khawm khan an chungah i hlim ding a ni nawh; an rinumna niah khawm khan chapotakin i ṭawng ding a ni nawh.

Ka mihai an vângduoi ni khan an kul kawtkhâra khan i lût ding a ni nawh; anih, an vângduoi ni khan an tuornahai kha i thlîr el ding a ni nawh, an vângduoi ni khan an sum le pai chunga i kuthai în nghat ding ân nawh.
A mi ṭhenkhat tlânsuokhai kha that dingin lampui ṭhuomah i ngîr ding a ni naw a, rinumna nia mi la um sunhai kha în mantir ding a ni bawk nawh.
Hnam po po chungah
Ka tlâng inthienga in dâwn ta ang khan, hnam po po chun an dâwn rawp âwm si a; anih, dâwn an ta, lem an ta, pieng naw ang elin um an tih.
Zion tlânga ruok chu a tlân suokhai chu um an ta, inthieng a tih; chun, Jakob sûnghai chun an rochan chu chang an tih.

Jakob sûnghai chu mei nîng an ta, Josef sûnghai chu meichawk nîng an tih. Esau sûnghai chu bupâwl ding nîng an ta, anni lai chun chawk an ta, kâng hmang vawng an tih; Esau sûnghai chu a mahla hrim um naw ni hai;
Simtieng mi chun Esau tlâng chu chang an ta, ram phaia mihai chun Philistin ram chu chang an tih; Ephraim lo le Samari lo chu chang an tih;

Benjamin chun Gilead ram chang a tih. Kanaan mihai laia hi Israel thla sal intâng mipuihai hin Phoiniki ram Zarephath chenin, chang an tih; Sepharad rama Jerusalem khaw mihai sal intâng chun Simtieng khawpuihai chu chang an tih.
Zion tlânga chun Esau tlâng rêlpêk dinga sansuoktuhai hung an ta, chun ram chu
“Tho la, Ninevi khuo, khawpui ropuitaka chun fe la, a chunga thu tlânginsampui rawh; an rîtlona chu ka hmaah a hung tlung ta si a,” tiin.

Chun, a kuoma chun, “Hi thil ṭha naw ei chunga um hi tu lei am a nih mi hril rawh, kan ngên che hi? Ieng sinthaw am i na? Khâwlaia inthawka hung am i ni a? Khâw tieng ram mi am i na, khâwlai ieng hnam am i na?” an ti a.
Chun, mihai chun an ṭi nasa ta êm êm a, a kuoma chun, “Ieng am i lo thaw an leh?” an ti a; a hril ta lei chun mihai chun
“Ei ta dinga tuipui infâwn a re theina dingin i chungah ieng am kan thaw ding? Tuipui hlak chu ân fâwn nasa deu deu el si a,” an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, mihai chun khawmuola kîr dingin an kar rak rak a, amiruokchu, an thei naw a, tuipui hlak chu an chungah ân fâwn nasa deu deu el si a.
Chun, Jona chu nga phîng sûnga inthawk chun
“Ka rinumna leiin
Ama chun a mi lo dawn a;
Seol phîng sûnga inthawk chun ka ko a,
Nangin ka râwl chu i hriet a.
Tui tamtak chu ka vêlin a um a;
I tuifâwnhai le i tui insawkhai po po chun an mi chîmpil a.
Nisienlakhawm, i biekin inthieng tieng ngha nâwk ka tih,’ ka ta.
Tui inthûk chu ka vêlin a um a;
Hlohnahai chun ka lu a tuom vêl a nih.
Hnuoi chun kumkhawa dingin a kalnahai chun a mi khâr khum a;
Amiruokchu, nangin aw
Ka ṭawngṭaina chu i biekin inthienga chun i kuomah a hung tlung a nih.
An ta dinga ngilneina chu an nghatsan a nih.
Thu ka tiem ta chu hlen ka ta,
Sandamna chu
Chun,
Chun,
“Tho la, Ninevi khuo, khaw ropuitaka chun fe la, thu hril ding ka tuk che hi va tlânginsampui rawh,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Jona chu a tho a,
mihriem le ranhai chun saiip puon sil lem hai sienla, nasatakin Pathien ko raw hai se, anih, mi tinin mâni lampui ṭha naw le, an kuta inpâwngnêkna chu nghatsan raw hai se.
Amiruokchu, chu thil chun Jona chu a suklungni ta naw êm êm a, a lunginsen a,

Chuongchun, Jona chu khawpuia inthawk chun a fe suok a, khawpui saktieng panga chun a ṭhung a, chutaka chun sâwlbûk a bâwl a, khawpui chunga thil hung tlung ding chu hmu tumin a hnuoi inhlima chun a ṭhung ta zing a.
Chun,
Amiruokchu, Pathienin a zînga chun khawfingchat laiin, thilnge a ruot a, chu chun ûm chu a rêt a, a hung vuoi ta a.
Chun, nisa a hung suok chun Pathienin khawsak thli lum a ruot a; nisa chun Jona lu chu a em a, a thidang a, a ta ding chun thi a hni ta a; “Keia ta dingin dam nêkin thi a ṭha lem,” a ti ta a.
Pathien chun Jona kuomah, “Ûm chungchâng thua I lunginsen hi i thaw dik am a nih?” a ta. Ama chun, “Thi pha khawp hiela ka lunginsen hi ka thaw dik a nih,” a ta.
Ninevi khuo, khaw ropuitak, a sûngah mi nuoi khat le sîng hni nêka tam, an changtieng le vawitieng khawm thlier thei lohai le ran ruol tamtak umna hi, ka lunginsiet naw ding am a nih?” a ta.
Ngai ta u,
Mei bula khuoihlu ang le hmun inṭêna tui inkhaw thla ang elin, tlânghai chu a hnuoia chun intui an ta, vadung ruomhai chu kakintan an tih.
Hieng po po hi Jakob bawsietna le Israel sûngkuo suolnahai lei a nih. Jakobhai bawsietna chu ieng am a na? Samaria ni lo am a nih? Juda bâwlhmunhai chu ieng am a na? Jerusalem ni lo am a nih?
Chuleiin, Samaria chu phûla thil se um khâwm angin siem ka ta, grêp huon hmun ang elin; chun, chu hmuna lunghai chu vadung ruom tieng inhlum thlâng ka ta, a lungphûmhai chu suklang ka tih.

A milem siemfâwmhai po po chu sukkawi hâwp vawng nîng an ta; a nawchizawr manhai chu meia raw hmang nîng a tih, a milemhai po po chu sukbohmang ka tih; nawchizawr mana a lâk khâwm a ni leiin, nawchizawr man bawkin ṭhang an tih.
Hi hi lei hin ṭap ka ta, khêk rak rak ka ta, ke lâwng le saruokin invâk ka ta, sihalhai angin khêk ka ta, varîngseihai angin inrûm ka tih.
A hliemnahai chu sukdam thei a ni nawh; Juda ram a tlung ta hiel si a; ka mihai kawtkhâr, Jerusalem meu khawm a tlung a nih.
Gath khuoa chun hril naw unla, ṭap dêr naw ro; Beth-le-Aphra khuoa chun pilvutah inbuol ro.
Aw Sapphir mi, saruok le inzaktakin fe hmang rawh; Zaanan mi chu a hung suok nawh; Bethezel ṭapna chun ngîr chankhal a ti cheu.
Maroth mi chun chanṭha chang a nghâkhla hlie hlie el a,
Aw Lakis mi, tawlailîr chu sakawr hrâta chun bel rawh; ama hi Zion naunu suolna bul a nih, Israelhai bawsietnahai chu nangmaa hin a um a lo ni si a.
Chuleiin, Moreseth-gath kuoma chun inthlana thilpêk i pêk ding a nih: Akzik inhai chu Israel lalhai ta dingin hlêmna nîng a tih.
Aw Maresa mi, nangma neitu ding i kuomah la hung ṭhuoi ka tih; Israelhai ropuina chu Adullam chen rauin hung a tih.
Invâw kawl la, i nau dittakhai lei chun invâw kawl rawh; mulukawl ang elin insukkawl nasa rawh, i kuoma inthawka sala ṭhuoiin an um ta si a.
An khum laizâwla khawhlona suongtuotuhai le thil ṭha naw ngaituo suoktuhai chu an chung a rik de! Zîngkâra khuo a hung var hin chu chu an thaw hlak a, anni kut thilthawtheina a ni si leiin.
Mi lohai an inhnar a, an lâkpêk a, inhai an inhnar a, an lâk el bawk a; mi le an sûnghai, mi le an ro chenin an hnuoisie a.
Chuleiin,

Chu nia chun nangni demin tekhithu hril an ta, ṭap hla lungriemithlâk umtaka inzâwtin, “Rawk vawngin ei um ta a nih, ka mihai chan a sukdanglam a, ka kuoma inthawkin a tâwl hmang tah a ni hi! Hel hmanghai kuomah ei lo a sem dar tah a ni hi,” tîng an tih.
Chuleiin,
“Thu hril naw rawh,” tiin an hril hlak a. Hieng mihai kuoma hin thu hril naw ni hai, hrilsietna chu inkieng naw bawk a tih.
Aw Jakob sûnghai,
Nisienlakhawm, ka mihai chu tulai hnaia hin hmêlma angin an hung ngîrdawk a nih; indo nuom lo a, râlmuongtaka mi inlawnhaia inthawkin an silfên zakawfuolhai in hlîppêk a.
Ka mi nuhmeihai chu an in inhawitaka inthawkin in hnawt dawk a, an naupangtêhaia inthawkin ka ropuina chu in lâk hmang sawng a nih.
Tho unla, fe hmang ro; hi hi in châwlna hmun a ni si naw a; sietna nasatak chena sukse hlaktu inthiengnawna chu a um leiin.
Mumal neilo le indik nawtaka, “Uoin le zu chungchang thu i kuomah hril ka tih,” tia miin khêl a hril chun hieng mihai zâwlnei hi ni chau a tih.

Aw Jakobhai, in rêngin ko khâwm ngei ka ti cheu a; Israel mi la um sunhai chu ṭhuoi khâwm ngei ka tih; Bozra khaw berâm angin sie khâwm ka ta, ran ruol an hlo petna hmuna um angin; mipui an ni lei chun sa mur mur an tih.
Nêr thlengtu chu an hmaa chun fêng a ta, nêr thleng an ta, kawtkhâr chenin fe pei an ta, chutaka chun fe suok an tih: chun, an lal chu an hmaa chun fêng a ta,
Aw nangni Jakobhai hotuhai le Israel sûngkuo rorêltuhai; ngai unla, ka ngên cheu hi, ka ti a nih; rorêl dân chu in hriet ding an nâwm a nih?
Thil ṭha in theida a, thil ṭha naw in ngaituo a, an vun in inhlippêk a, an rua inthawkin taksa chu in sâwkthlâk a,
ka mihai sa in fâk bawk a, an vun an hîk thlâk a, an ru an suktliekpêk a; anih, bêla suong ding angin an chan nawi a, sabêl sûnga sa chan nawi ang elin.
Chu pha chun
Ka mihai insuksuoltirtu, sawi nei pumin, “Muongna,” tia khêk a, an baua inba naw taphawt do buotsai hieltu zâwlneihai chungchâng thu chu

Chuleiin, inlârna bo hiel dingin in kuomah zân hung tlung a ta, hrillâwkna um thei nawna khawpin in kuomah inthimna hung tlung a tih; zâwlneihai ta ding chun nisa liem a ta, sûn khawm an chunga chun khaw inthim nîng a tih.
Hmutheituhai chu inzak an ta, aisânthiemhai chu muolpho an tih; anih, an rêngin an hmûr hup an tih; Pathien dawnna a um si naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, Jakobhai kuoma an bawsietna inhriettir dingin le, Israelhai kuoma an suolna inhriettir dingin
Nangni Jakobhai sûngkaw hotuhai le Israel sûngkaw hotuhai le Israel sûngkaw rorêltu, rorêlna tirdaka, indikna tinrêng suklinglettuhai, hi hi lo ngai ro, ka ngên cheu hi.
Zion chu thisenin an bâwl a, Jerusalem chu khawhlonain.
Chutaka hotuhai chun lâwmman beiseiin ro an rêl a, chutaka thiempuhai chun hlaw beiseiin an inchûktir a, chutaka zâwlneihai chun tangka beiseiin ai an sân a nih: Chuong sa khawm chun, “
Nisienlakhawm, ni nuhnungahai chun hieng ang hi hung nîng a ta;
Chun, hnam tamtakhai chu fêng an ta, “Hung unla,
Chi tin mâni pathien hming sengin um an ta, eini khawm
kebai chu hlâbîkah siem ka ta, hlataka hnawt hmanga um chu hnam hrâttakah siem ka tih: tuta inthawk chu Zion tlângah kumkhuoin
Aw nang, ran ruol kul, Zion naunu umna tlâng, i kuomah hung tlung a tih: anih, inlalna hmasa chu hung tlung a tih, Jerusalem naunu inlalna chu.
Iengdinga i ṭap rak am a na? I sûngah laltak chu a um naw am a nih? I remruottu chu a bohmang ta am a nih? Nuhmei nau invawi anga natnain a man el ta che chu!

Aw Zion naunu, nuhmei nau invawi nau nei ding angin na tuor la, invawi rawh; tuhin khawpuia inthawk fe suok i ta, ramah chêng i tih. Babulon chen khawmin i fe ding a ni si a: chutaka chun sansuokin um i ta, chutaka chun i hmêlmahai kuta inthawkin
Tuhin hnam tamtak chu nangma doin an inkhâwm a, “Sukpawrchein um sienla, ei mit hin Zion chunga a châk zâwng chu hmu raw se,” an ti a.
Nisienlakhawm,
Aw sipai ruol naunu, tuhin sipai ruolah inpunkhâwm la, ama chun a mîn huol tah a na, Israelhai rorêltu chu a bekah hmawlin vuong an tih.

Nisienlakhawm, nang Bethlehem Ephratha, Juda rama sâng tamtakhai laiah chun chîn hle la khawm, nangmaa inthawk hin Israelhai rorêltu ding chu ka ta ding hung suok a tih; a hung inṭanna chu tiena chatuona inthawk ta khan a nih.
Chuleiin, nau invawitu chun a nei hmakhat chun anni chu nghatsan a tih: chuongchun, a unau la um sunhai chu Israel thlahai lai chun kîr nâwk an tih.
Ama chu ngîr a ta,
Chun, hi hi ei inremna ding nîng a tih, Assuria mi chu ei ramah a hung a, ei lal inhai a hung sir pha chun ama do dingin berâmpu pasari le mi ropui pariet inthlangsuok ei tih.
Jakob mi la um sun chu chi tamtakhai laia

Jakob mi hlâbîkhai chu hnamhai laia le chi tamtakhai laia chun ramhnuoi sahai laia sakeibaknei ang le berâm ruol laia sakeibaknei vânglai angin um a tih; ama chun a fe thleng phawt chun, a sirde a, a keinâwi a, santu ding khawm tukhawm an um nawh.
I kut chu nangma dotuhai chunga inletin um sienla, i hmêlmahai po po chu sukbohmangin um raw se.
Chu nia chun,
i ram khawpuihai sukbohmang ka ta, i kul po po sukchim ka tih;
i kuta inthawkin dawi thiemnahai chu sukbohmang ka ta, aisân thiemnahai chu nei ta naw ti ni;
i kuoma inthawkin i milem siemfâwmhai le i lungphunhai chu sukbohmang ka ta; i kutsuok thil chu be ta naw ti ni.
I kuoma inthawk i Aserahai chu phawidawk ka ta, i khawpuihai chu suksieng ka tih.
Chun, thu ngai naw hnamhai chunga chun lunginthakna le lunginsennain phuba lâkna intlungtir ka tih.
Aw tlâng lienhai,
“Aw ka mihai, in chungah ieng am ka thaw a? Ieng kawng âm ka suksâwl cheu a? Mi hung khing ta u.
Ieng lêm
Aw mihriem, a ṭha chu ân entir ta che a nih;
Mi rilo ina chun rîtlona robâwmhai chu a la umin inkhina dawrâwm tirdakumtakhai chu a la um rawp am?
Bûkna indik nawhai le ip rik dân dawhahai leh inthieng ka ni thei ding am a nih?
Chutaka mi hausahai chu pâwngnêknain an sip si a, chutaka chênghai chun khêl an hril a, an bau sûnga an lei chu mi hlêm hmang a nih.
Chuleiin, kei khawma nataka hliemin ka vuok ta che a, i suolnahai leiin râusanah ka siem ta che a nih.
Fâk chu fâng i ta, nisienlakhawm, khawp naw ti ni; i kuoma chun i tlâwmna chu um a ta, sawn i ta, nisienlakhawm, himin thak hmang naw ti ni; i fe hmangpuihai khawm chu kâwlhnâmah pe suok tho ka tih.
Chîng chu chîng i ta, sîk naw ti ni, oliv rahai chu sirsâwr i ta, nisienlakhawm, a hriek chu nâl naw ti ni; grêp ra chu sâwr la khawm, a uoin chu dâwn naw ti ni.

Omri thuruothai chu vawng zing a ni si a, Ahab sûngkuo thilthaw po pohai leh; an remruothaia chun in fe a nih; chuleiin, hmun râusanah ka siem ta ding che a nih, a sûnga chênghai hi nuizatbûr dingin; chun, ka mihai hmingsietna chu phur in tih.”
Ka chung a va rik de! nisapui thei an sîkkhâwm laia um ang le grêp lo hun laia grêp hmu ṭhel lo ding ang ka ni si a; ra bâwr fâk ding a um nawh; ka hringna hin theichang hmin hmasa a châk a nih;
Pathien ngaisak mi chu hnuoia inthawk hin an bohmang a, mihriem lai hin mi indiktak hrim an um nawh; thisen insuo dingin an inchân vawng a, mi tinin mâni unau chu lênin an ve a nih.

An kuthai chu thil ṭha naw chungah taimataka thaw dingin an innghat a; lal chun thamna a ngên a, rorêltu chun lâwmman a ngiet a; milien chun a lungril thil suksuolna a hril suok a; chuong ang chun an inthuruol tâwl a nih.
Anni laia mi ṭhatak khawm chu buor ang a na, mi indiktak khawm chu hlohlingnei nêkin a se lem; i vêngtuhai ni, fanga i um ni ngei chu a hung tlung tah, chu chu an lunginzîngna ni nîng a tih.
Ruol chu ring naw unla, ṭhuoitua chun ringna innghat naw ro; i ângsûnga umnu kuom ngeia khawm chun i bau kawtkhârhai chu vêng ṭha rawh.
Naupa chun pa hming a suksiet a,
Kei ruok chun chu
Aw ka hmêlma, mi diriem el naw rawh, ka tlûk pha khawm tho nâwk ka tih; inthima ka ṭhung khawmin
Chuongchun, ka hmêlma ka kuoma, “Khâwlai am
I kul banghai siemna ni ding chu! chu nia chun thuruot chu hlatak chena suklien nîng a tih.

Chu nia chun Assuria rama inthawka Aigupta khawpuihai dâm, Aigupta khawpuihaia inthawka Euphrates vadung dâm, tuipuia inthawka tuipui dang le tlânga inthawka tlâng danga inthawk dâm chun i kuomah hung an tih.
Chuong sa khawm chun ram chu a sûnga chênghai le a thilthaw ra lei chun râusan nîng a tih.
Karmel tlâng kâra khawsâwttaka um i rochan berâm ruol, I mihai chu i hembâwk hmangin châwm la, inhma ang khan Basan le Gileada châwmin um tâwl raw hai se,
Aigupta rama inthawka i fe suok lai ang khan a kuomah thil maktakhai inentir ka tih.
Hnam tinin chu chu hmûng an ta, an thilthawtheina po po chu inzâpui an tih; an hmûr hup an ta, an nahai sêt a tih.
Rûl angin pilvut liek an ta; hnuoia bawkinvâka fehai angin an umna kuoa inthawk chu inthin pumin hung an ta;
Nang anga khawhlona ngaidamtu le a rochan la um sun bawsietna fekhêltu Pathien tu am an um a?A lunginsenna chu kumkhuoin a vawng zing nawh, lunginsietnaa chun a lâwm êm êm hlak leiin.
Ngha kîr nâwk a ta, ei chungah lunginsietna nei a tih; ei khawhlonahai chu a ke hnuoiah sirdêng a tih; nangin an suolnahai po po chu tuipui mawng inthûktakhaia chun pei lût i tih.
Tienlaia kan puhai kuoma ṭawng i lo inkhâm tah, Jakob kuoma thutak le Abraham kuoma lunginsietna sukpuitling i tih.
Ninevi khaw phurrik chu, Elkos mi Nahumin inlârna hmu inziekna lekhabu chu.
Tuipui chu a hal a, a kang chat a, vadunghai po po khawm chu an kang zo a, Basan ram le Karmel tlânghai an chul zo a, Lebanon tlâng pârhai an chuoi zo.
Tlâng lienhai chu ama leiin an inhnîng a, tlâng chînhai chu an intuihmang a; a hmaa chun hnuoi hi ân thin a, anih, khawvêl le a sûnga um po pohai le chun.
A lungninawna hmaa chun tu am ngîr thei an ta, a lunginsenna nasataka chun tu am um thei an ta? A lunginsenna chu mei anga bunthlâk a na, lungpuihai chu a sukkawi vawng a nih.
Amiruokchu, tui lien luong liemna hmangin chu hmun bohmang vawngna chu intlungtir a ta, hmêlmahai chu inthimnaah hnawt lût a tih.
Hling bawn anga umin an uoin dâwn chun chie hu hnêp angin um sienla khawm, bupâwl ṭâwl ang ela sukbohmang vawng nîng an tih.
Nangmaa suok mi pakhat
Tuhin chu i kuoma inthawkin a rîngkawl chu suktliek ka ta, nangma khuopna hruihai chu suktan vawng ka tih.
Sukkawinâwitu chu i hmaihmaa chun a hung suok ie, kulbîng chu enkawl la, lampui chu vêng rawh, i kâwng chu sukngar la, i thilthawtheina chu hrâttakin siem ṭha rawh.
Israelhai ropuina angin Jakobhai ropuina chu

A mi hrâthai phaw chu a sen a, mi huoisenhai chu a sen inlârin an inthuom a, an inbuotsaina nia chun tawlailîrhai chu kâpathîr tlêtin a tle zawr zawr a, feihai chu râpthlâktakin ân lap zawk zawk a nih.
Tawlailîrhai chu kawtthlêra chun an tlân bur bur a, lamlien lienhaia chun an insuk sawk sawk a, meiser angin an inlang a, kâwlinlep angin an tlân thuok thuok a nih.
A mi lienhai chu a hrietsuok a, an fe inruol chu an pêm a; kul bang tieng pan chun an inhmawh a, thil phên ding an siem a.
Vadung kawtkhârhai chu hawng a na, lal in chu sukramin a um a.
Chun, Huzzab chu an hlîp a, an fe hmangpui a, a suoknuhai
Tienlaia inthawk tah Ninevi khuo hi dîl ang a na; amiruokchu, an tlân hmang a, “Ngîr ro, ngir ro,” tiin an ko a, nisienlakhawm, tukhawm an ngha kîr nawh.
Tangkaruo râllâkhai chu lâkpêk unla, rângkachak râllâk sumhai chu lâkpêk ro; thil sêkkhâwl le thuomhnaw ṭha po po ropuizie chun tâwpintai a nei si nawh.
Sukruokin a um a, sukrêm a ni a, suksiet dêr a nih, lungril chu ân tuihmang a, khûphai chu ân vuoktuo a, kâwng po po chu a na ngawi ngawi a, an rênga hmêl chu a dâng zo vawng a nih.
Tukhawm isukṭit lova an umna, sakeibakneichal dâm, sakeibakneipui dâm, an fe vêlna sakeibaknei bu zâwl le sakeibakneitehaiin an fâkna hmun chu khâw lai am a na?
Sakeibakneichal chun a têhai khawp tâwk a keinâwi a, sakeibakneipuihai ta dingin a se hlum a, a pûkhai chu a sasein a suksip a, a bu zâwlhai chu saruong kei nâwiin.
Sipaihai
Thisen insuo hmang khawpui chu a chung a rik ie! Khêl le inrawknain a sip vawng a; an sase chu a chatlak nawh.
Vuokna vai rîk dâm, tawlailîr ke innghawr ri dâm, sakawr inchâwm dâm, tawlailîr tlân tlut tlut dâm leh;
Sakawr chungchuong mihaiin kâwlhnâm tât tle le fei inlet de zawt zawtin hma an nawr a. Mi tamtak thatin an um a, mithi ruong tiemsênglo a um a, ruonghaia chun an inpal nawk nawk a.
chuong chu, nawchizawr hmêl ṭha, dawithiemnu, a uiretna leia hnam zawr a, dawi chîngna leia sûngkuo zawrtu uiretna nasatak leia hung um a nih.
Sipaihai
Hmunhnawk tirdakumtakin thêng ka ti che a, inzakumtakin siem ka ti che a, ennuom dingin sieng ka ti che.

Chun, hieng ang hi hung nîng a ta, a hmu taphawt che chu i kuoma inthawkin tlân hmang an tih. Ninevi khuo chu a hung tâwp tah a nih; tuin am sûn a ta? Khâwlaia inthawkin am i ta dingin lungmuongna ei zawng ding chu aw! tîng an tih.
Vadunghai kâra um, No-amon, a vêla tuiin ân huol, a kul dinga tuipui hmanga, a kul bang ding tuipui nei nêk khan i ṭha lem am a nih?
Ethiopia le Aigupta chu a hrâtna a na, chu chu tâwp chin nei lo a nih; Put le Lubim chu nangma ṭhangpuituhai an nih.
Chuong sa khawm chun lâk hmangin a um a, salah ân tâng a: kawtthlêr tin tâwpah a naupangtehai chu an pei nawipêk a; a mi ṭhahai ta dingin ai an sân a, a mi lienhai po po chu khaidieta khuop an nih.
Nang khawm inrui bawk i ta, thuphmangin um i tih; hmêlma leiin kul det zawng bawk i tih.
I kul po po chu theichang kûng, ra hmin hmasa put ang nîng an ta, an inhnîng phawt chun a fatu bauah an tla lût hlak.
Ngai ta, i sûnga i mipuihai chu nuhmei an na, i hmêlmahai ta dingin i ram kawtkhâr chu ân hawng huoi a, în kalna thîr tluonhai chu meiin a kâng hmang a nih.
Inhuol vêla i um sûnga dingin tui chawi la, i kulhai sukdet rawh; pilpawk umnaa chun fe la, lung chârna chu chîl la, ṭêklei râwna thuk chu sukdet rawh.
Chutaka chun meiin kâng hmang a ti che a, kâwlhnâmin sât hlum a ti che, khâu angin sukbohmang a ti che: khâu angin insukpung la, khâuhawn angin insukpung rawh.
I sumdâwngtuhai chu vâna arasi- hai nêka tamin i sukpung a, khâu chun a suksiet a, a vuong hmang el hlak.

I mi lallukhum khumhai chu khâuhawn ang an na, i sipai hotuhai chu khaw dei nia khâu ruol pala fu khâwm ang an nih, amiruokchu, nisa a hung suok a, an vuong hmang a, an umna hmun hrim hriet a ni nawh.
Aw Assuria lal, i berâm vêngtuhai chu an inlusu ie, i mi lienhai chu an châwl a, i mipuihai chu tlânghaia chun an indar zo a, ṭhuoi khâwmtu tukhawm an um nawh.
I na chu a damna ding a um nawh, i hliemna chu a nasa hle a nih; i ri hre taphawt chun kut an benkhum che; i rîtlona hin a chîm rawp naw tu am a um a?
Zâwlnei Habakkukin chungrikna a hmu chu:
Ngai lova i um ding chu?
“Inpâwngnêkna” tiin ka ko che a.
I sandam naw el ding chu?
Iengdinga suolnahai hi i mîn hmutirin,
Iengdinga lungngaina hi i mîn entir am a na?
Suksietna le inpâwngnêkna
Insuolna a um a, indona a hung suok hlak a nih.
Chuleiin, dân chu a dul a, rorêlna chu a zîksuok thei naw a,
Mi rilohai chun mi fel chu an inhuol vêl si a;
Chuleichun, rorêlna chu a fe suol hlak a nih.
Ngaisak unla, maktitakin ngaituo ro.
Hril ni unla khawm in âwi nâw ding
In hunahai hin sin ka thaw ding a nih.
Kaldaihai kân ngîr suok a nih,
Hnam ti rawk rawk le khatak elhai chu.
Anni chu, anni ta khawm ni lo umna hmunhai chu,
Nei dingin hnuoi khang dâpin an hung a.
Anni chu ṭium le pangzatumtak an na;
Annia inthawk chun an rorêl le inlalna chu a fe suok a.
An sakawrhai chu keitêhai nêkin an hrât lem a,
Zântienga satenehai nêkin ṭi an um lem a nih;
chapotakin an inân a;
An sakawr chung chuongmihai chu hlataka inthawkin an hung a,
Mupuiin hrâttaka sa a baw angin an vuong a.
An rêngin pâwngnêk dingin an hung a,
Khawsak thli ang elin an hmêlhai chun a ngerin an nger a,
Salmanhai chu phaiphin angin an lâk khâwm a.
Anih, lalhai chu an nuisan a,
Mi lienhai chu an ta ding chun hmusitum an ni a,
Kul det tinrênghai chu an nuisan a, pilvut a sungvûmin a lâk nâwk hlak si a.
Thli angin an mût a, bâwthleng an ta,
Thiemnaw changin um an tih,
Anni thilthawtheina ngei pathiena neituhai chu.
Aw
Nang chu chatuona inthawk tah i ni nâwm a nih?
Thi nâwng kan tih.
Aw
Aw lungpui, nangin ama chu sukdikna dingin în ngîr a ni kha.
Nang chu suolna hmûna hlak nêka mit inthieng lem nei i na,
Khawhlona chu i en thei naw a nih,
Chuleiin, khawhlotaka thawtuhai chu hmu zingin,
Mi rilovin ama nêka mi fel lem a lem zo lai khawmin,
Iengdinga i tosan ṭawk ṭawk am?
Mihriemhai chu tuipui ngahai anga,
Thilhring bawka invâk, an chunga rorêltu nei lohai
Anga siemtu chu i ni nâwm a nih?
Ama chun anni po po chu ngakuoiin a lâk a,
A lênin a man tâwl a,
A keihrui chun a hnûk khâwm a;
Chuleichun, a hlimin a lâwm a nih.
Chuongchun, a lên kuoma chun ân thâwi a,
A keihrui kuoma chun riminhnik a raw a,
Anni zâra a chan chu a hung thâu a,
A bu chu a hung tam leiin.
Chuleiin, a lên chu sukruok nâwk hlakin,
Hnamhai that zing el chu a ma naw ding am a nih?
Chun,
“Inlârna thu chu ziek la,
Lungphêkhai chunga chun fietak elin,
A tiemtu chun tlân puma a tiem theina dingin.
A tâwp chu a hnai mêk zing a, inkhêl bawk naw nih;
A muong khawma nghâk zing la,
A hung tlung ngei ding a ni leiin,” tiin.
Mi fel ruok chu a ringna lei chun hring a tih.
Anih, chu nawa khawm uoin he chu bawsetu,
Mi chapo, a ina um ngailo chu a nih;
Ama chun a châkna chu hremhmun angin a suklien a,
Ama chu thina ang a na, suktlai ruol a ni nawh.
Chi po pohai chu a kuoma chun a kei khâwmin,
Hnam po pohai chu a kuomah a lâk khâwm lem a nih.
Hieng po pohai hin ama chunga tekhina hung hrilin, ama chunga hrilinsîm thu hrilin,
“Ama ta ni si lova insukpung chu ieng chen am nei a ta?
Mâni le mâni inrûkthila insukpungtu chung chu a va rik de!” an ti naw dîm a nih?
Anni chun thâwklekhatin nang hung sêtu ding che chu suktho an ta,
Hmatieng hnungtienga nawrtu ding chu hung sukharin,
An ta dinga râllâk thil i ni el naw ding maw?
Hnam tamtak i suksiet ta leiin, mihriem thisen le
Ram le khawpui le a sûnga chênghai chunga
Mihriem thisen le inpâwngnêkna
Nang khawm chi a la um sunhai po po chun sukse vêng an ti che.
Mi suol kuta inthawka sansuok a ni theina dinga,
A bû insângtaka a sep theina dinga,
A insûng ta dinga hlâwkna indik naw latu chu a chung a rik ie!
Mi tamtak chu sât thlain,
I insûng ta ding chun inzakna în tlun ta a;
I hringna chung ngeia khawm thil i suksuol ta a nih.
Banga inthawk chun lung chuhung khêksuok a ta,
Thing laia tlungpûm chun a hung dawn ding a ni si a.
Khuo chu thisena indin a,
Khawpui chu khawhlonaa inngîrtu chung chu a rik ie!
En ta u, hnamhai chu teploah anni an insuklungkham a,
Chi tinhai chun mei ta dinga sin an inrim hi,
Sipaihai
A tuolbâwm kuoma dâwn ding pe a,
Chutaka chun a tûr chu pawl a,
An saruokna chu a hmu theina dinga
Sukruitu chung chu a rik ie!
Ropuina dinga inzaknaa suksip i ni ta a,
Nang khawma dâwn la, saruok chu ni el rawh!
I ropuina chunga chun inzakna tirdakum chu um a tih!
Lebanon chunga inpâwngnêkna le,
Ramsahai chunga suksietna, anni sukṭi hlakna chun,
Ram le khawpui le a sûnga chênghai chunga le,
Mihriemhai thisen le thil lo thaw ta po po lei chun,
Nang chu ân khum ding che a nih.
Milem a kera ker, a siemtuin a iker chun
Ieng am ṭangkaina a nei?
Milim a sunga sung le khêlhlip inchûktirtu,
Milim ṭawng thei nawhai siem a,
A siemtuin ama sinthaw nâk nâk a ringzoa hin,
Ṭangkâina ieng am a um a?
Thing kuoma chun, “Har rawh,” ti a,
Lung kuoma chun, “Tho rawh,” titu chu a chung a rik ie!
Hi hin ân chûktir ding am a nih?
En ta u, rângkachak le tangkaruo inluon khum a na,
Amaa hin inthuokna hrim a um dêr nawh.
Leihnuoi po po chu a hmaah to ṭhiep raw se.
Sigionoth chunga zâwlnei Habakkuk ṭawngṭaina chu:
Aw
Aw
Kumhai laia hin hung inhriettir la,
Lunginsennaa khawm zângaina chu hre zing rawh.
Pathien chu Temana inthawkina hung a.
Mi Inthieng chu Paran tlânga inthawkin.
A ropuina chun vânhai chu ân khum a,
Leihnuoi chu ân pâknain a sip a nih.
A êngna chu var ang a na;
A kuta inthawk chun varkêhai a hung suok a,
A thilthawtheina inbîkna chu a um a nih.
A hmaa chun hri chu a fe a;
A kehaia inthawk chun meiling inling a fe suok a.
A ngîr a, hnuoi chu ân hnîng a;
Hnamhai chu a en a, a hnawt dar ta a;
Kumkhaw tlânghai khawm chu sukdarin an um a,
Chatuon muolhai chu an kûn bawk a;
A lampuihai chu chatuona mi an nih.
Kushan puon inhai chu sukrimsika a um lai ka hmu a;
Midian ram puonzârhai chu ân thin a.
Vadunghai chunga chun i lunginsenna chu a umin,
Tuipui chunga chun i lunginsenna chu a um am a nih?
I sakawrhai chunga chun i chuongin,
I sandamna sakawr tawlailîrhaia chun i chuong hi?
I thalngul chu sukruok dêr ana;
Thalhai chu a hruiah înbûk a,
Nang chun leihnuoi chu vadunghaiin i ṭhe ta a.
Tlânghai chun an hmu che a,an ṭi a;
Tui insawkhai khawm chu an fe hmang ta a;
Li inthûk chun a râwl ânsuo a,
A kuthai chu chungtieng a phar a.
Nisa le thla chu an umnaa chun an ngîr zing a,
I thalhai kâp suoka umhai vara le,
I fei tle zawr zawr vara chun.
Lunginthakin ram chu i fethleng a,
Lunginsenin hnamhai chu i chîl hrep a.
I mihai sandamna dingin i fesuok a,
I hriek nâl sandamna ding chun.
Mi rilo sûngkuoa inthawk
chun lu chu i sukhliem a,
Ring chenin a lungphûm chu i suklang ta a.
A indo mihai lu chu ama hmawl ngei chun i sunthleng a,
Kei mi sukdar dingin thlivir angin an hung a:
An hlimna chu mi rimsi arûka fâk hmang chu a nih.
I sakawrhai le chun tuipui chu i chîl ta a,
Tui nasatak umkhâwmhai chu.
Ka hriet a, ka phîngsûng chu ân thin a,
Ka hmûrhai chu râwlria chun ân thin hlawp hlawp a;
Ka ruhaia chun hmawnna a hung lût a,
chuongchun, ka hmuna chun kân thin a nih;
Buoina nia chun châwl kata,
Mipui, sipai pâwl anga mi rûntu chunga an hung tlung pha chun.
Theichang kûng chu pâr naw sien khawm,
Grêphruia chun a ra um naw bawk sien khawm;
Oliv leia sin inrimna chu hung thlâwnin,
Lohai chun bu insuo naw bawk hai sien;
Berâm ruol chu a ina inthawka sât thlâka umin,
Bâwng ina chun bâwng ruol khawm um naw bawk hai sien khawm,
Ka sandamna Pathiena chun lâwm ka tih.
Ka kehai chu sazukpui kehai angin a siem a,
Ama chun ka bâwlhmunhaia chun mîn fetir a tih.
“Leihnuoi chunga inthawkin thil tinrêng chu sukbohmang vawng ka tih,”

“Mihriem le sa khawm sukbohmang ka ta, chunglêng vatehai le, tuipuia ngahai le mi khawhlohai insuithlûktir ka ta; chun, sukbohmang vawng ka ta; chun, leihnuoi chunga inthawk hin mihriem chu tuithlâr ka tih,”
“Juda le Jerusalema chênghai po po chunga chun ka kut phar ka ta; thiempuhai laia milim bie hmingput le, Baal milim la um sunhai chu hi hmuna inthawk hin pei thlâng ka tih;
chun, inchung sîpa inthawka vâna thil umhai chibai bûktuhai le, Milkom hminga inkhâmtuhai le,
Chun,
Chun, chu ni chun hlêmna le nunsietna leia an hotuhai in suksip hlaktuhai, hrizâwl chunga inchâwm hlakhai chu hrem bawk ka tih.
Chun, chu ni chun nga kawtkhâra inthawk chun khêk ri nasatak um a ta, muolhaia inthawka kawihâwp ri nasatak le Misneha inthawka ṭap inrûm ri nasatak um bawk a tih,
Nangni Maktes hmuna chênghai, inrûm inrûm ro; Kanaan sumdâwngtuhai po po chu hmangna bo an ni ta a, tangkaruo bûk hlaktuhai po po khawm chu sukbohmang an ni ta si a.
Chuong huna chun, Jerusalem chu khâwnvarhai sitin dap ka ta, mi an in kilkhâwrhaia chêng a, an lungrila, “

Chuongchun, an hausaknahai chu râllâk sum ang hung nîng a ta, an inhai chu râusan hung nîng a tih: anih, inhai chu bâwl hlak an ta chu, a hluo ruok chu hluo ngai naw ni hai a, grêphruihai khawm phun an ta, nisienlakhawm, chutaka a uoin chu dâwn dêr naw ni hai.
Chu ni chu lunginsenna ni, buoina le rinumna ni a na, sietna le sukrêmna ni, inthimna le lungzîngna ni, sûm zîngna le inthim sâmup ni,
in insâng kilkhâwr takhai chunga le khawpui kul neihai chunga suklâuna le tawtawrâwt mût ni chu a nih.
Chuongchun, mihriemhai chunga chun rinumna intlungtir ka ta,
Nangni le nangni inkei khâwm unla, anih, inkei khâwm ro, aw inzakna hre lo hnamhai;
thupêk chu lâk suok a ni hma hin, busi anga ni chu a liem el hma hin, in chunga
Nangni a rorêlnahai anga thawtu, hnuoi chunga zainêm po pohai,
Gaza chu mâksanin um a ta, Askelon chu râusanin, Asdod chu sûn changlai hnawt suok an ta, Ekron chu a zunga phawi dawk a ni ding a ni si a.
Kereth hnam, tuipui kama chênghai chu an chung a va rik de! Aw Kanaan, Philistin mihai ram,
Tuipui panghrûl chu ran ruolhai ta dinga inhai le, berâmpuhai ta dinga inhai umna hmun le ran ruol tlatna hmun hung nîng a tih.
Moab mihai hrilsietna le, Ammon thlahaiin an chierkhumnahai, ka mihai an hrilsieta an ramrihai ngeiah an vân suklien thu chu ka lo hriet a.
Sipaihai
Chun, ama chun hmârtienga chun a bân phar a ta, Assuria chu suksieng a ta; Ninevi chu râusan le thlalêr anga ṭâwlin siem a tih.

A sûnga chun ran ruolhai riek an ta, ran chi tinrênghai chu: kaikuongrâl le saku chu, a khawpui laia chun riek an ta, an râwlhai chu tukvera inthawka hriet nîng a ta: sidar thinga remhai khawm chu a sukruok ta si a.
Khawpui nêksâwra um, sukpawr- chea um le hela um chu a chung a va rik de!
Ama chun râwl chu a pawisa naw a, sukdikna chu a pawm naw a,
A sûnga chun a mi ṭhahai chu sakeibaknei inrûm lai ang an na; a rorêltuhai chu zâna sihalhai ang an nih; a zînga chen dingin iengkhawm an hla naw a nih.
A zâwlneihai khawm chu mi ngaisam le mi khawhlo an na, a thiempuhai hlak chun hmun inthieng chu an sukpawrche ta a, dâna chun inpâwngnêkna chu an hmang ta a nih.
Ama sûnga chun

Hnamhai chu ka sât thlâk a, an in insânghai chen khawm chu râusanin a um ta a; an kawtthlêrhai chu ka suksiet vawng a, tukhawma an hraw ta naw a; an khawpuihai chu suksietin a um a, chuongchun, mi an um ta naw a, a hluotu khawm an um ta nawh.

Ama chungthua ka lo ruot ta ang po poin, a chêngna chu sâtthlâk a ni nawna dingin. “Matheilovin kei mi ṭîng i ta, sukdikna chu hmu bawk i tih,” ka ta; nisienlakhawm, zîngkâr an tho a, an thilthawhai po poa chun an sukdik naw a.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun hmûr inthieng put chihai kuoma chun kîr nâwk ka ta, lungril hmunkhata a rawng bâwl dinga
Ethiopia vadunghai khêla inthawk chun ka riminhnik râwtuhai, ka hnawtdarhai naunuhmeihai ngei chun, ka thil inhlânhai chu hung chawi an ta.

Chu nia chun i thil thawhai po po, ka chunga i bawsietnahai lei chun inzak ta naw ti ni a; nanga sûnga inthawkin nasataka nang chapopuituhai che chu ka lâk suok ding a ni ta si a; chuongchun, ka tlâng inthienga chun chapo ta ngai hrim hrim naw ti nih.
Amiruokchu, i sûnga chun mi pasiehai le mî sukrimsika umhai chu mâksan ka ta,
Aw Zion naunuhai, hla sak ro; aw Israel, khêk suok rawh;
Aw Jerusalem naunu, lungril po poin hlimin lâwm rawh.
I hmêlma khawm chu a hnawt dawk tah a nih;
Israel Lal, Lalpa ngei chu nangmaa chun a um a,
Thil ṭha naw hril ṭi ta dêr naw ti nih.
Chu ni chun Jerusalem kuoma chun, “Ṭi ta naw rawh:
Aw Zion, i kut chu inzawitir naw rawh.
Nang chu hlimnain lâwm a ti che a, a hmangainaa chun châwl
Hla sakin nangmaa chun hlim a tih.
Nangma ta, sie hmanga um tahai, hrilsietna riktaka phurtuhai chu
inkhâwmna ursûntaka dingin kei khâwm ka tih.
Ngai ta, chu pha chun nangma sukrimsituhai che chu keiin sawisâng ka ta:
A ngîr chu sandam ka ta, hnawt hmanga um chu kei khâwm ka tih;
Hnuoi chung po poa an hmaimâwkna lo um ta chu,
Hming le inpâkna siempêk ka tih.
Chu pha chun hung la lût kati che a, chu pha chun la khâwm ka ti cheu;
In mithmu ngeia in sal intângna ka hung lâk kîr pha chun,
Leihnuoia hnam po polaia chun,
inpâkna le hming ka siempêk ding cheu a ni si a,”
Sipaihai
Chuongchun, zâwlnei Haggai kuoma chun
“Hi in hi hienga se zing siin, nangni ta dingin in, inchungthuo inhaia chun chêng zing a hun ta am a nih?”tiin.
Chuleiin, tuhin sipaihai

In tu ṭeu a, tlâwmte chau in lâk lût a, in fâka chu khawp lêm in nei naw a; in dâwna chu in khawp si nawh; in inthuom a, tukhawm in lum si nawh; chuongchun, hlawhai hlawtu khawm chu ip mawng inâwnga thlâk el dingin a hlaw a nih,” tiin.
Sipaihai
Tlâng rama chun hang fe unla, thing hung la unla, in chu bâwl ro; chuongchun, a sûnga chun inhawi tîng ka ta, chawimawiin um bawk ka tih,”
“Tamtak chu in zawng hlak a, anachu, tlâwmte a hung ni el hlak; ina in hung lâk lût pha khawmin, ka lo mût hmang el hlak. Ieng leiin am?” Sipaihai
Chuleiin, nangni leiin vân chu daidaw intlâktir lo ding le, hnuoi chu ra insuo lo dinga khap an nih.

Hnuoi chunga dâm, tlânghai chunga dâm, buvui chunga dâm, uoin chunga dâm, hriek chunga dâm, leihnuoiin a hung insuotir taphawt le, mihriemhai chunga le, bâwng ruol chunga le, kut sininrim ra suok po po chunga chun khuo ka sukṭhâl a nih”, tiin.
Chuongchun, Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel le, Jehozadak naupa, Josua, thiempu lal le, chu chi la um sunhai chun
Chun,
Chuongchun,
Daria inlal kum hnina, a thla rukna, ni sâwmhni pali ni chun.
A thla sarina, ni sâwmhni pakhat nia chun zâwlnei Haggai kuoma chun
“Juda ram awptu Sealtiel naupa Zerubbabel kuoma le, Jehozadak naupa Josua, thiempu lal kuoma le, mipui la um sunhai kuoma chun hril la,
Anachu, Aw Zerubbabel, tuhin insukhrât rawh,’
hnam po pohai chu sukhnîng ka ta; hnam tin thil duthusâmhai chu hung tlung a ta, chun, hi in hi ropuinain suksip ka tih, sipaihai
Tangka chu ka ta a na, rângkachak khawm chu ka ta a nih, sipaihai
Hi in hi, hi hnungtienga a ropuina chu a hmasa nêk khan la nasa lem a tih, sipaihai
Daria inlal a kum hninaa, thla kuona ni sâwmhni pali ni chun zâwlnei Haggai kuomah
“Sipaihai

‘Miin a silfên puonhmawrin sa inthieng a pai a, chu puonhmawr chun bei amanih, thil suonghruoi amanih, uoin amanih, hriek amanih, sa amani khawm a tâwk chun inthieng a hung ni ding am a nih?’ ti hi,” tiin. Chuongchun, thiempuhai chun an dawn a, “Ni lo e,” an ta.
Chun, Haggai chun a dawn a, “Hi mipui hi chuong ang chie chu an na, hi hnam hi ka hmaa chun chuong ang chie chu an nih,” sipaihai
Chuleiin, Vawisuna inthawkin fimkhur takin ngaituo ro,
khânglai sûng hrim hrim khan, miin tekhâwng sâwmhni vûma a ruota chun sâwm chau a lo na: miin sâwrna khura bûr sâwmnga thâl dinga a hung chun sâwmhni chau a lo na.
In kut sinthawnahai po poa chun riel le kumthu le ṭêk tlain ka hrem cheu a, anachu ka kuom tieng in la hung ngha naw rawp el hi,”
“Ka ngên cheu hi, vawisûna inthawka hi hnungtieng po po ngaituo ro; thla kuona, ni sâwmhni pali ni,

Bu ina chun a chi chu a la um rawp am a nih? Grêphrui dâm, theichang kûng dâm, theibufai dâm, oliv thinghai le chun ra an insuo ngai naw a; vawisûna inthawk hin chu mal ka sâwm ding cheu a nih,” tiin. Zerubbabel kuoma Lalpa thutiem
Chu thla, ni sâwmhni pali ni chun
“Zerubbabel, Juda chunga rorêltu kuoma chun hril la, ‘Hnuoi le vânhai chu sukhnîng ka ta:

ramhai lalṭhungpha khawm chu pei thlâng ka tih; chun, hnamhai lalram hrâtna chu sukse bawk ka tih; chun, tawlailîrhai chu pei thlâng ka ta, a chunga chuongtuhai le chun; sakawrhai le a chunga chuong, mi tin chu mâni unau kâwlhnâm ngeia suktlâwm ni tâng a tih,’ tiin.
‘Chu nia chun, Aw Zerubbabel ka siehlaw, Sealtiel naupa, chel ka ti che,’ sipaihai
“In thlatuhai chunga khan
Chuleiin, nangin an kuomah,
Inhmaa zâwlneihaiin an kuoma, ‘Sipaihai
In thlatuhai chu khâw lai am an um ta a? Zâwlneihai khawm chu an dam zing am a nih?

Amiruokchu, ka thuhai le ka thuruothai, ka siehlaw zâwlneihai thu ka ipêkhai chu, chuonghai chun in thlatuhai chu an hnawtphâk tah ni lo am a nih? Anni chu an ngha kîr a, ‘ei thilthawhai ang pei le, ei um dân ang peia sipaihai
Daria inlal kum hnina, thla sâwmpakhatna Sebat thla, ni sâwmhni pali ni chun
Chun, keiin ‘Aw pu, hienghai hi ieng am an ni a?’ ka ta. Vântirko kei mi betu chun ka kuomah, ‘Hieng hi ieng am an ni inentir ka ti che,’ a ta.
Chun, inhmui thing buk laia ngîrpa chun a dawn a, ‘Hienghai hi
Chun, anni chun
Chun,
Chun, vântirko kei mi betu chu
Chuongchun, vântirko a mi betu chun ka kuomah, ‘Hieng ang hin khêk rawh: Sipaihai
Chuongchun, hnam nuomsaa umhai chunga chun ka lungni naw êm êm a; lungni naw dep chu ka ni de a, anni chun sukrinumna chu an sukzuol pei si a, tiin,’ a ta.
Chuleiin,
La khêk nâwk la, sipaihai
Chun, ka mithai ka hang inlên a, ka en a; chun, ki pali hi ka hmu a. Chun, vântirko a mi betu kuoma chun, “Hieng hi ieng am an ni a?” ka ti a.
Ama chun, “Hi kihai hi Juda le Israel le Jerusalem sukdartuhai chu an nih,” tiin a mi dawn a.
Chun,

Chun, keiin, “Hieng hi ieng thaw dinga hung am an na?” ka ti a. Ama chun, “Hieng hi Juda sukdartu kihai chu an ni a, tukhawma an lu dawm kâng an ngam ngai naw a; nisienlakhawm, hienghai hi, sukdar dinga Juda ram chunga an ki inlettu hnamhai kihai chu pei thla dinga, anni chu sukhmang dinga hung an nih,” a ti a.
Chun, ka mithai chu ka hang inlên a, ka en a, mi a kuta inkhina hmawl chawi hi ka hmu a.
Chun, keiin, “Khawtienga fe ding am i na?” ka ta. Ama chun ka kuomah, “Jerusalem chu inkhi dingin, a khang chu ieng ruol am a na, a dungtieng ieng chen am a na ti hre dingin,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, vântirko a mi betu chu a fe suok ta a, chun, vântirko dangin ama chu ân tuokpui a, a kuomah,
“Tlân la, hi tlangvâl kuoma hin, ‘mipui tam lei le ranruol leiin Jerusalem chu khuo kul um lohai anga hluo el nîng a tih,’ tiin hril rawh.
A vêlin kei a mei kul bang nîng ka ta, a sûnga chun kei chu a ropuina ka ni ding a ni si a,
“Hung ro, hung ro, hmâr rama inthawk dâm chun hung tlân suok ro,
Babulon naunu le chêng hmunkhat Zion, hung la, hung suok rawh.
Ngai ta u, anni chunga chun ka kut chu thin ka ta, chuongchun, anni rawng bâwlpêktuhai ta dingin râllâk sum hung ni tâng an tih; chun, sipaihai
Aw Zion naunu, hlim la, hla sak rawh, en ta, ka hung mêk a, nangni lai chun ka chêng ding a ni si a,
Chun, chu nia chun hnam tamtakhai chu
Chun, ram inthienga chun
Mi po pohai,
Chun, Josua chu silfên ṭawptakin ân thuom a, vântirko hmaa chun a ngîr ta a.

Vântirko chun, a hmaa ngîrhai kuoma chun, “Amaa inthawkin silfên ṭawptak kha la hmang ro,” a ta. Chun, ama kuoma khawm chun, “Ngai ta, i suolna chu nangmaa inthawkin kân fe hmangtir ta a, silfên man tamtakin kân thuom ding che a nih,” a ta.
Chun, keiin, “A lu chungah lukâwm mawitak inkâwmtir raw hai se,” ka ta. Chuongchun, a lua chun lukâwm mawitak chu an inkâwmtir a, ama chu silfênhai chun ân thuom a; chun,
Chun,
“Sipaihai
Tuhin thiempu lal aw Josua, nang le i hmaa i rawihai ṭhung hlakhai le chun ngai ta u; inchikna dinga mihai an ni si a; ngai ta u, a Kau, ka siehlaw chu ka hung lâk suok ding a ni si a.
En ta u, Josua hmaa chun lung pakhat sîr sari nei ka sie a; ngai ta u, chutaka chun thil ziek ker ka ta, sipaihai
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu a hung nâwk a, mi a in lai sukhar angin a mi hung sukhar ta a.
Ka kuoma chun, “Ieng am i hmu a?” a ta. Kei chun, “Rângkachak sathâu khâwnvar siena, a sîpa a thlêng le, chu chunga khâwnvar pasari um, khâwnvar tin chunga a dâwt pasari seng um ka hmuh,
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu kân dawn a, “Pu, hieng hi ieng am an na?” tiin.
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chun ka kuomah, “Hieng hi ieng am an ni i hriet naw maw?” tiin a mi dawn a. Kei chun, “Aw pu, ka hriet nawh,” ka ta.
Aw tlâng lien, tu am i na? Zerubbabel hmaa chun phaizâwl hung ni el i tih, chun, ama chun a chungah, “Zângaina, zângaina,” ti khêkrihai leh lung chunghnungtak chu hung la suok a tih.
Chu naw khawm chu
“Hi in lungphûm hi Zerubbabel kuthai chun a lo phûm ta a; a kuthai chun zo khawm zo ngei a tih; chun, nang chun sipaihai
A vawi hninaa khawm kân dawn nâwk a, a kuomah, “Rângkachak hriek hung suokna rângkachak dâwt pahni kâwla oliv kau pahnihai hi ieng am an ni a?” ka ta.
“Hieng hi ieng am an ni i hriet naw maw?” a ta, a mi dawn a. Kei chun, “Ka hriet nawh, ka lalpa” ka ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Hieng hi hrieknâl naupasal pahnihai chu an nih, leihnuoi po po
Chun, ka mithai chu ka hang inlên nâwk a, lekha zuol vuong lai ka hmu a, ka en zing a. Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Ieng am i hmu a?” a ta.
Keiin, “Lekhabu zuol vuong lai ka hmu a; a dungtieng chu tawng sâwmhni a na, a khangtieng chu tawng sâwm a nih,” tiin ka dawn a.

Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi hi ṭawngsie ram pumpui chunga fe suok hlak chu a nih, tukhawm inru taphawt chu phêk khingkhata ziek anga pei thlâk nîng a ta, tukhawm inkhâm taphawt chu phêk khingtienga ziek anga pei thlâk a ni ding a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, sipaihai
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu a fe suok a, ka kuomah, “Tuhin i mit hang inlên la, hi a fe suok hi ieng am a na en ta,” a ta.
Kei chun, “Ieng am a na?” ka ta. Ama chun, “Hi hi bâwm a fe suok chu a nih,” a ta. “Hi hi ram po poa an khawhlona chu a nih,” a ti bawk a.
Ngai ta, a sînna talent khata rik suon chu hawng a ni a, chun, nuhmei bâwm sûnga ṭhung hi a um a.
Chun, “Hi hi Khawhlona a nih,” a ta; bâwm sûnga chun a nam lût nâwk a; a bau chu suon riktak chun a sîn nâwk a.

Chun, ka mithai ka hang inlên a, nuhmei pahni hung suok hi ka hmu a, ka en zing a, an thlahaia chun thli hi a um a; anni chun vakâwl thlahai ang hi thla an nei a; chun, vân le hnuoi inkâra chun bâwm chu an khai a.
Chun, vântirko a mi betu kuoma chun, “Hienghai hin bâwm hi khâwtieng am an fepui ding a na?” ka ta.
Ama chun, “Sinar rama a in bâwlpêk dingin, bâwl zo a ni pha chun chutaka chun bâwm chu ama inṭhutna ngeia chun sie nîng a tih,” a ti a.
Chun, ka mithai ka hang inlên nâwk a, tlâng pahni inkâra sakawr tawlailîr pali hung suok hi ka hmu a, ka en zing a; chu tlânghai chu dârsen tlâng an nih.
Tawlailîr pakhatnaa chun sakawr senhai an um a; tawlailîr pahninaa chun sakawr dumhai an um a;
Chun, vântirko a mi betu chu ka dawn a, a kuomah, “Pu, hienghai hi ieng am an na?” ka ta.
Tawlailîr sakawr dum ihnûk chu hmâr ram tieng a fe suok hlak a; a vâr ihnûk chun a zui a; chun, a râng ihnûk chu simtieng rama chun a fe suok a.

A senhai chu an fe suok a, hnuoi chung kil tin kil tanga an fe thei dân ding an zawng a; “Hitaka inthawkin suok unla hnuoi chung kil tin kil tangah fe ro,” a ta. Chuongchun, hnuoi chung kil tin kil tanga chun an fe ta a.
Chun, ka kuomah a hung khêk a, “Ngai ta, hmâr tieng rama fehai khan hmâr tieng rama chun ka lungril chu an suksâwldam tah,” a ta.
Chun, Lalpa thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,
“Heldai hai, Tobija hai, Jedaia hai, sala intânghaia inthawkin la la; chun, chu ni ma chun hung la, Babulona inthawka an hungna, Zephania naupa Josia ina chun fe rawh:
anih, tangkaruo le rângkachak lapêk la, lukhum siem la, Jehozadak naupa thiempu lal Josua lua chun bel rawh;
Chun, lallukhum chu Heldai hai, Tobija hai, Jedaia hai le Zephania naupa Josia hai ta dinga,
Chun, ram hlataka umhai khawm chu hung an ta,
Chun, Daria inlal kum linaa chun, Kisleu, thla kuona ni li ni chun Zekaria kuomah
Chuong lai chun, Bethel mihai chun Sarezer hai, Regemmelek hai, an mihai leh
sipaihai
Chun, sipaihai

“Hi rama mi po pohai le thiempuhai kuoma chun hieng ang hin thu hril rawh, ‘Hi kum sâwmsari sûnga thla sarina le thla nganaa bu in ngheia in insuklungngai hin, keia kuoma, keima kuom ngeia bu nghei am in ni ngût le?
In fâk a in dâwn lai khawmin in ta dingin in fâkin in dâwn ni lo am a nih?
Hausakna le Jerusalem le a vêla khawpuihai le Simtieng le ramphaihai chu hluo a ni laia, zâwlnei hmasahai hmanga
Chun, Zekaria kuoma chun
Rorêlna ṭha chu suksuok unla, mi tinin mâni unau chungah zângaina le lunginsietna inlangtir raw se;
hmeithai amanih, fahrâ amanih, mikhuol amanih, mi pasie amani khawm chu nêksâwr naw unla, chun, nangni tukhawma mâni unau chungah a lungrilin thil suol suongtuo naw raw se,” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, an pawisa nuom naw a, an liengko an herhmang a, an hriet nawna dingin an nahai an suksêt a.
Anih, an lungrilhai chu lungthîr angin an siem a, chuong ni naw sien chu dân le inhmaa zâwlneihai hmanga a thlaraua sipaihai
Chun, ama a khêk laiin an ngai naw a; chuongchun, anni chu khêk an ta, kei khawma ngai naw ningah, sipaihai

amiruokchu, an la hriet ngailo hnam po po laia chun thlivirin anni ka sukdar ta a. Chuongchun, ram chu râusanin a um ta a, tukhawm an fe thlengin an kîr nâwk ngai ta naw a: ram duthusâm tak chu râusanah an siem ta leiin.

Chun, a khawpui kawtthlêrhai chu pasaltê le nuhmeitê kawtthlêrhaia inhnelin la sip bawk an tih,” tiin.

anni chu hung ṭhuoi ka ta, Jerusalem sûnga chun chêng an tih; chun, anni chu ka mihai nîng an ta, kei chu, felna le indiknain an Pathien nîng ka tih,” tiin.
Sipaihai

Khâng nihaia khan chu mihriem ta dingin inhlawfâkna a um naw a, ran ta ding khawma inhlawfâkna hrim a um naw a; hmêlma leiin mi a lût le suok ta ding khawma muongna hrim a um nawh: mi po po mâni tuolbâwmhai kalin ka sie si a.
Amiruokchu, tuhin chu hi chi hlaa umhai ta ding hin chu khâng lai nihaia ang kha chu ka ni ta naw ding a nih, sipaihai

Inremna chi chu a um ta ding a ni si a; grêphrui chun a ra insuong a ta, leihnuoi khawm chun a hlâwkna chu insuo bawk a ta, vânhai khawm chun daidaw chu hung pêng an ta; hi chi hlaa umhai hi chuong thilhai po po chu inhluotir ka tih.

Chun, hnam tinhai laia ṭawngsephur in ni ang khan, aw Juda sûngkuo le Israel sûngkuo, hung sanhim ka ti cheu a, malsâwmna hung ni tâng in tih: ṭi naw unla, in kuthai chu sukhrât phawt phawt el ro,” tiin.

chuong ang tak chun, hieng nihaia hin Juda insûng le Jerusalem chunga hin thil ṭha thaw ka lungril a nih, ṭi dêr naw ro.
nangni laia mi tukhawma mâni tuolbâwm chungah thil ṭha naw a lungrilah suongtuo hlek naw raw se; inkhâmna indik naw chu ngaina naw unla, hienghai ku hi a nih thil ka theida chu, sipaihai

Hamath inripuitu chu ni bawk a ta; Tura le Sidon khawm, var hle hai sienkhawm.
Tura chun kul dettakhai a ta dingin a bâwl a, tangka chu pilvut ang el le rângkachak inthieng chu khawlai chirhak ang elin a siekhâwl a.

Askelon chun hmûng a ta, ṭîng a tih; Gaza khawmin hmûng a ta, nasataka suknatin um a tih; chun, Ekron khawm, a beiseina chu a thlâwn ding a ni si a; Gazaa inthawk chun lal chu bohmang a ta; Askelon khawm chu hluo ni ta naw ni.
Asdoda chun hnam inthlapawl chu chêng an ta; Philistin mihai chapona chu sât thlâng ka tih.

Chun, sipai râl vêng pâwl angin ka in vêla chun umnghâng ka ta, tukhawm fe thlengin kîr naw ni hai a; nêksâwrtuhai khawm fe thleng nâwk ta ngai hrim hrim naw ni hai, tuhin keia mit ngeiin ka hmu ta si a.
Chun, nanga chungthua chun, i thuthlung thisen leiin i sal intânghai chu khur sûng tui um nawnaa inthawk chun ka tir suok ta a.
Nangni beiseina lungin intânghai, kul ngheta chun hung kîr nâwk ro; a lêt hniin ka pêk ding cheu a nih ti vawisûn ngei hin ka phuong hi.

Ka thalngul dingin Juda chu ka kuoi a, Ephraim chu a thalah ka siem a; Aw Zion, i naupasalhai chu i naupasalhai chunga ngei chun ka chawktho ding a nih; aw Grik, mi hrâttak kâwlhnâm angin siem ka ti che.

Chu ni chun
A ṭhatna chu a va nasa lâwm lâwmin, a mawina chu a va nasa lâwm lâwm de aw! bu chun tlangvâlhai chu sukhlim a ta, uoin thar chun nunghâkhai chu sukhlim a tih.

Amaa inthawkin a kia lung dâm, amaa inthawkin a kilna dâm, amaa inthawkin indona thalngul dâm, amaa inthawkin rorêltu dâm an hung suok tlâng vawng ding a ni si a.
Chun, indona chun an hmêlmahai chu kawtthlêra chirhak chîl anga chîlin mi thilthawtheitakhai hung nîng an ta,

Chun, Juda insûng chu hung sukhrât ka ta, Josef insûng chu sandam ka tih; chun, anni chu hung ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka tih, an chungah lunginsietna ka nei si a; chun, anni chu ka lo pei thlâk naw ang hrimin um tâng an tih; chun, an thu chu ngai bawk ka ta,
Chun, Ephraimhai kha chu mi thilthawtheitak ang nîng an ta, uoin leiin an lungril chu hlim a tih; anih, an thlahai chu hmûng an ta, lâwm an tih; an lungril khawm chu
An ta dingin faifûk ka ta, anni ko khâwm ka tih; anni chu kân tlan ta si a; a lo pung ta ang bawk khan hung insukpung an tih.
Chun, anni chu mipuihai laia chun tûng ka ta; ram hlataka khawm mi hre zing an tih; chun, an nau le têhai leh um an ta, hung kîr nâwk an tih.
Aigupta rama inthawk khawmin anni chu hung ṭhuoi suok nâwk ka ta. Assuria rama inthawkin la khâwm nâwk ka tih; Gilead le Lebanon rama chun ṭhuoi lût ka ta; an ta dinga hmun indai naw hielin.

Chun, ama chun sukrinumna tuipui chu fe thleng a ta, tuipui fâwnhai chu vuok hnuoi ning a ta. Nile li inthûkhai po po khawm chu kang intan a tih; chun, Assuria chapona chu sukhnuoi nîng a ta, Aigupta lalhmawl chu fe hmang tâng a tih.
Chun, anni chu
Aw Lebanon, i kawtkhârhai hawng rawh,
I sidar thinghai chu meiin a kâng hmang theina dingin!
Aw fâr thing, inrûm rawh, sidar chu a tlu leiin;
A ṭhatakhai chu suksiet an ni ta si a!
Basana thingsaisuohai, inrûm ro,
Ramhâk chu a chau ta si a!
Berâmpuhai inrûm ri chu e,
An ropuina suksiet a ni ta si a!
Chu, sakeibaknei vânglai inrûm râwlri chu!
Jordan ramngaw chu suksiet a ni ta si a.
ân chawtuhai chun anni chu an that a, anni chu suolah an inngai naw a; chun, anni zawrtu khawm chun, ‘
Ram hluotuhai chu ka lunginsiet ta naw ding a ni si a,

Chuongchun, sathattu berâm ruol chu ka châwm a, berâm ruol chautak el nang chu. Chun, hmawl pahni ka lâk a, pakhat chu Ditsak kân bûk a, a dang chu Pumkhatna kân bûk a; chun, berâm ruol chu ka châwm ta a.
Chun, thla khat sûngin berâmpu pathumhai chu ka pei thlâk a; ka lungrilin anni chu a nghawk a, anni lungril khawma kei an mi nghawk bawk si a.
Chun, kei chun, “Châwm ta naw ning cheu, a thi thi chu thi sienla; pei thlâka um um chu pei thlâkin um sienla; a la damhai khawm chun anni le anni sa chu infatuo raw hai seh,” ka ta.
Chun, ka hmawl Ditsak chu ka lâk a, ka sât bawng ta a, hnamhai po po le ka thuthlung ka siem chu ka sût theina dingin.
Chuongchun, chu ni chun sût a lo ni ta a, chuongchun, berâm ruol, nang kei mi pawisatu chun
Chun, an kuoma chun, “In ngaia a ṭha chun ka hlaw chu mi pe unla, a ni naw chun, hrên el ro,” ka ta. Chuongchun, ka hlaw ding chun tangka sâwmthum an bûk ta a.
Chun, ka hmawl dang pakhat Pumkhatna chu ka sât bawng nâwk a, Juda le Israel inkâra inunauna chu ka suktan theina dingin.
Chun,

En ta, rama chun Berâmpu pei thlâka umhai chu kankuo ngailo ding le, sukdara um chu zawng ngailo ding le, suktlieka um khawm chu sukdam ngailo ding chu, ka tungding nâwk ding a ni si a; ama chun a hliem le a hrisêl khawm chu châwm chuong naw ni a, a thâu thâu sa chu fa lem a ta, an tinhai chu nawi tamtakin kei nawi a tih,” a ta.
Berâmpu, berâm ruol mâksantu chung chu a va rik de!
Kâwlhnâm chu a kut chunga chun um a ta.
A mit changtieng chunga leh;
A bân ṭâwl zo vawng a ta,
A mit changtieng khawm chu inthim tlat a tih!
Israel chungthua
“Ngai ta, a vêla hnamhai po po ta dingin Jerusalem chu inthinna noah siem ka ta, chun, Juda chunga khawm, Jerusalem inhuol nia chun chuong ang chu nîng a tih.

Chu nia chun hieng hi hung nîng a ta, hnam po pohai ta dingin Jerusalem chu lung phurriksakah siem ka ta, chuonga amaa insukriktuhai po po nasataka sukhliem nîng an ta; chuongchun, hnuoi chunga hnam po pohai a chunga chun inhâwrkhâwm an tih,” tiin.
Chun, Juda lalhai chun an lungrilin, ‘An Pathien sipaihai

“Chu nia chun Juda lalhai chu thing laia mei thuk ang le, buphal laia meiser angin siem ka ta; vawitienga le changtienga, an vêla hnam po pohai chu sukbo an ta; chun, Jerusalem chu ama hmun Jerusalema ngei chun a la chêng ding a nih,” tiin.
Chu ni chun
Chun, chu nia chun Jerusalem hung thawtu hnam po pohai chu suksietna ding zawng vêng ka tih.
Chu ni chun, Megiddo ruoma Hadad-rimmon ṭa angin, Jerusalema chun nasataka sûnna um a tih.
Ram chun sûngkaw tinhai chu a tum sengin sûn a tih; David sûngkaw pahnam chu a tumin, an nuhmeihai khawm a tumin; Nathan sûngkaw pahnam chu a tumin, an nuhmeihai khawm a tumin;
Levi sûngkaw pahnam chu a tumin, an nuhmeihai khawm a tumin; Simei sûngkaw pahnam chu a tumin, an nuhmeihai khawm a tumin;
sûngkuo po po a umhai chu, sûngkaw tin chu a tumin, an nuhmeihai khawm a tumin.

Sipaihai
Chun, anni mi tukhawma an thu an la hrillâwk zing chun, an nu le pa anni neitu ngei chun, ‘Dam naw ti ni;
Chun, chuong ni chun hieng hi hung nîng a ta, thu a hrillâwk lai chun, zâwlnei po pohai, mi tin el chun mâni thilhmulâwk chu inzâpui an ta; hlêm dingin puon inhmul sil naw bawk an tih;
amiruokchu, ‘Zâwlnei ka ni naw a, hnuoi inlettu ka ni lem, ka tleirâwla inthawk tah siehlawa siem ka ni ta si a,’ tîng a tih.
Chun, a kuoma chun mi dangin, ‘Khâng i kut inkâra inpânhai kha ieng am an na?’ tîng a ta. Ama chun, ‘Hieng hi ka ruolhai ina ka hliemna chu an nih,’ tiin dawn a tih.

Chun, a hmun thumna chu meiah infethlengtir ka ta, tangkaruo chu sukthieng a ni angin sukthieng ka ta, rângkachak chu fie a ni angin fieng ka tih: chun, ka hming lam an ta, kei khawma anni chu ngai tâng ka tih; ‘Ka mihai an nih,’ tîng ka ta; chun, anni khawma, ‘
Ngai ta,

Jerusalem chu do dingin hnam po po chu ka kei khâwm ding a ni si a; khawpui chu lâk nîng a ta, inhai chu kâpkhumin um an ta, nuhmeihai chu ṭhuoi hmangin um an ta, chun, a khawpui chenve zet chu salah fêng an ta, mi la um sunhai ruok chu khawpuia inthawka sât thlâk ni naw ni hai.
Chun,

Chu nia chun a kehai chu Oliv tlânghai, Jerusalem sak ela umhai chunga chun ngîr a ta, chun, Oliv tlânghai chu a laia chun saktieng le thlangtienga chun kakintan a ta, chuongchun, ruom nasatak hung um a tih; chun, chu tlâng chenve chu hmârtieng insawn a ta, a chenve dang chu simtieng insawn a tih.

Chu ni chun a var khawm chu var ta naw ni a, inthim lem tâng a ta;
amiruokchu, ni khat,

Ram po po chu Araba, Gebaa inthawka Jerusalem sima Rimmon tienga a lêtkîr angin inher tâng a ta; chun, Jerusalem chu chawisângin um a ta, ama hmun ngei, Benjamin in kawtkhâra inthawka kawtkhâr hmasatak, kul kil kawtkhâr chen le, Hananel in insânga inthawka lal uoin sâwrna khur chenin, chang tâng a tih.

Ngai ta u, nangni leiin chu chi chu kâwk ka ta, in inthâwina êkhai chu in hmaihai chunga chun thêng ka ta, chun, a chu le chun nangni chu lâk hmangin um in tih.

“Inmâk hi ka theida a nih,”
Chun, Jerusalem le Juda thilinhlân chu tienlai kumhai le inhma nihaia ang khan
Ṭawngsie chun ṭawngsie inphur in nih; hi hnam pumpui el hin in mîn rûkpêk si a.
Chun, nangni lei chun a fa zotuhai chu hal ka ta, in leilunga rahai hrim hrim chu sukse dêr naw ni; chun, in loa in grêphrui khawm chun a hun hmain a ra chu sukṭil dêr naw ni, sipaihai
“In thuhai chu ka chungah a hrawmhraw êm el, sipaihai
Sipaihai
Amiruokchu, nangni ka hming ṭituhai chunga ruok chun felna nisa, a thlahaia sukdamna leh hung suok a ta; chuongchun, fe suok in ta, ran ina bâwngtêhai inhnel angin inhnel tâng in tih.
Chun, mi khawhlo chu sirde tâng in ta; ni ka isiem ngei ding nia chun in kepha hnuoia chun pilvut ang el an ni ta ding a ni si a, sipaihai
“Israelhai po po ta dinga Horeba ka ipêk, rorêlna le thuruothai, ka siehlaw Mosie dân chu hre zing ro.
Ngai ta u,
Ama chun pahai lungril chu nauhai tieng innghatir a ta, nauhai lungril chu an pahai tieng; chuong naw chun hung ka ta, ram chu ṭawngsiein hung hrem rawi ka tih,” tiin.
Abraham naupa, David naupa, Isu Krista thlatuhai inthlazie chanchin chu:
Abrahamin Isak a thla a; Isakin Jakob a thla a; Jakobin Juda le a unauhai a thla a;
Aramin Amminadab a thla a; Amminadabin Nason a thla a; Nasonin Salmon a thla a;
Salmonin Rahab leh, Boaz a thla a; Boazin Ruth leh, Obed a thla a; Obedin Jessai a thla a;
Jessaiin lal David a thla a; chun Davidin Uria nuhmei leh, Solomon a thla a;
Solomonin Rehoboam a thla a; Rehoboamin Abia a thla a; Abiain Asa a thla a;
Asain Jehosaphat a thla a; Jehosaphatin Jehoram a thla a; Jehoramin Uzzia a thla a;
Uzziain Jotham a thla a; Jothamin Ahaz a thla a; Ahazin Hezekia a thla a;
Hezekiain Manasse a thla a; Manassein Amos a thla a; Amosin Josia a thla a;
Chun, Babulon tienga sala an ṭhuoi hnungin Jekoniain Salathiel a thla a; Salathielin Zerubbabel a thla a;
Zerubbabelin Abiud a thla a; Abiudin Eliakim a thla a; Eliakimin Azor a thla a;
Azorin Sadok a thla a; Sadokin Akim a thla a; Akimin Eliud a thla a;
Eliudin Eleazar a thla a; Eleazarin Matthan a thla a; Matthanin Jakob a thla a;
Jakobin Josef Mari pasal chu a thla a; chu Maria chun Isu Krista an ti hi a hung insieng ta a.

Chuongchun, suon po po chu Abrahama inthawk David chenin suon sâwmpali, Davida inthawka Babulon tienga sala an ṭhuoi chenin suon sâwmpali, Babulon tienga sala an ṭhuoia inthawka Krista chenin suon sâwmpali an nih.
Chun, a pasal Josef chu mi feltak a na; tlâng ihriet a nuom naw a; arûka mâk el a nuom a.

Nisienlakhawm, chuong thu chu a ngaituo laiin, ngai ta, a mangah Lalpa vântirko a kuomah a hung inlâr a, “Josef, nang David naupa, Mari chu nuhmeia nei ṭi naw rawh; a nau vawn chu Thlarau Inthienga inthawk a nih i sawnnaw.
Lalpain zâwlnei baua,
Naupasal nei a ta;
A hming dingin Immanuel sak an tih,”
tia a hril kha a hung tlung theina dingin chuong po po chu a hung um a nih. (Immanuel chu, “Ei kuomah Pathien a um” tina a nih).
Chuongchun, Josef chu a in a tho a; Lalpa vântirkoin a kuoma thu a pêk ang chun a thaw a; Mari chu a nei ta a;
Chun, lal Herod inlal laia, Juda rama Bethlehemah Isu a hung piengin, ngai ta, khawsak tienga inthawkin mi varhai Jerusalemah an hung a,
“Judahai lal hung pieng chu khâwlai am a um a? A arasi khawsak tieng kan hmu a, ama chibai bûk dingin kan hung a nih,” an ta.
Lal Herod chun a hriet phingleh a lunginzîng ta a, Jerusalema mi po po khawm an lunginzîng ve a.
Chuongchun, thiempu lalhai le mihai Dân inchûktirtu po po a ko khâwm a. Krista piengna ding chu ân dawn a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Juda rama Bethlehemah hieng ang hin zâwlneiin a ziek kha,
Juda khawpuihai laiah i chîn tak naw tawp;
I sûnga inthawkin awptu a hung suok ding a ni si a,
Ka mi Israelhai vêngtu ding chu,’
ti hi,” an ta.
Chu hnunga chun Herodin mi varhai chu arûkin a ko a, arasi inlang hun chu nguntakin anni ân dawn a.
Anni chu Bethlehemah ân fetir ta a, “Fe unla, nautê thu chu nguntakin indawn suok ro; chun kei khawmin ama chu chibai ka hung bûk ve theina dingin, in hmu phingleh mi hung hril nâwk ro,” a ta.
Chun, lal thu chu an hriet a, an fe ta a; chun, ngai ta, khawsak tienga arasi an hmu kha nautê umna chung zâwn a tlunga a ngîr hmakhat chu an hmaah a fe pei a.
Chun, arasi chu an hmuin an hlim nasa bêk bêk a.
In sûngah an va lût a, a nu Mari kuoma nautê chu an hmu a, an bawkkhup a, chibai an bûk a. Chun, an ro bâwmhai an hawng a, a kuomah lâwmna rângkachak dâm, beraw dâm, murra dâm an pêk a.
Herod kuoma kîr nâwk lo dingin manga hrila an um leiin, lampui dangah an khuo tieng an kîr ta a.

Chun, an fe hnungin, ngai ta, Lalpa vântirko Josef kuomah a mangah ân lâr a, “Tho la, nautê le a nu ṭhuoi la, Aigupta ramah tlân hmang rawh, ka hril nâwk hmakhat che chu chutaka chun um zing rawh; Herodin nautê sukbo dingin a zawng ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a tho a, azân azânin nautê le a nu a ṭhuoi a, Aiguptaah a fê ta a.

Chun, Herodin mi varhai hlêmin a um ti ân hriet phingin a lung a sen bêk bêk a, mi a tir a, a hun laitak thu mi varhai nguntaka ân dawn suo ang khan, Bethlehem le a vêl po poa pasal naupang kum hnia inthawka hnuoitieng po po chu an rêngin a that ta vawng a.
Chuong lai chun zâwlnei Jeremiain hieng thu a hril hi a hung tlung ta a:
Ṭap dâm, mithi ngaia khêk rawng rawng dâm;
Rakil chun a nauhai a ṭa a,
An um ta naw leiin thlamuong thei a ni nawh,”
ti hi.
Nisienlakhawm, Herod chu a thi hnungin, ngai ta, Lalpa vântirko Aiguptaa chun Josef kuomah mangah ân lâr a,
“Tho la, nautê le a nu ṭhuoi la, Israel ramah fe rawh; nautê that tumtuhai kha an thi tah,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a tho a, nautê le a nu chu a ṭhuoi a, Israel ramah a lût ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Arkelaus a pa Herod aiawin ân lal ti a hrietin chutaka fe chu a ṭi ta a; chun, a manga hrila a um leiin Galili tieng a fe ta dai a.
Chuong lai chun Baptistu Johan chu, Judai thlalêrah thuhrilin a hung a,
“Thlalêra mi khêk rawl chun,
‘Lalpa lamlien buotsai unla,
A lampuihai suktlûn ro,’ a tih,”
tia a hril kha.
Chu lai chun Jerusalema mi dâm, Juda rama mi po po dâm, Jordan vadung vêla mi po po an suok a, a kuom tieng an fe a;
an suolhai thupha chawiin Jordan vadungah ama kuomah Baptisma an chang tâwl a.
Chuongchun, sim hming input tlâkin ra ro.

Kei chun chu simna dingin tuiin ka baptis hlak cheu a; nisienlakhawm, ka hnunga hung ding chu keia nêkin a ropui lem a, a kekawk chawi tlâk khawm ka ni nawh. Ama chun Thlarau Inthieng le meiin baptis a ti cheu.
A kutin a leipup a chawi a, a hrizâwl zâp fai hieu a ta, a pangah a bû hlûng a ta, a si ruok chu mei rêm thei lovin râw hmang a tih,” a ta.
Chu lai chun a kuoma baptisma chang dingin Isu Galili rama inthawkin Jordan vadungah Johan kuomah a hung a.
Johan ruok chun, “I mi baptis ka ṭûl lem si a, ka kuomah i hung lem a ni maw?” tiin khap a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a kuomah, “Tuhin remti hrâm rawh, hieng anga felna po po sukkim hi ei ta dingin a mawi a nih,” tiin a dawn a. Chuongchun, rem a ti ta a.
Chun, Isu baptisma a chang phingleh, tuia inthawk chun a suok nghâl ta a; chun, ngai ta, a ta dingin vân a hung inhawng a, Pathien Thlarau chu vaṭhu anga hung ṭuma a chunga hung fu a hmu a.
Chun, ni sâwmli le zân sâwmli a nghei hnungin a phîng a hung ṭâm ta a.
Chun, thlêmtu chu a hung a, a kuomah, “Pathien Naupa i ni chun, hieng lunghai hi beia inchang dingin thu pe rawh,” a ta.
Chu zoa chun diebol chun khaw thienghlima chun a ṭhuoi lût a, Pathien biekin sîp zuma chun a sie a;
‘I chungchânga chu a vântirkohai chu thu pêng a ta,
An kutin dawm an ti che a,
Chuong naw chun I kein lung sui hlau rawi i tih,’
ti ziek a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, diebol chun tlâng insângtakah a ṭhuoi nâwk a, khawvêl ram po po le a ropuina chu ân entir a.
A kuomah, “Bawkkhupin chibai i mi bûk chun, hieng po po hi pe vawng ka ti che,” a ta.
Chu hnunga chun diebol chun a zâmsan ta a. Chun, ngai ta, vântirkohai hungin a rawng an bâwlpêk ta a.
zâwlnei Isai baua,
“Dîl tienga Jordan râlah,
Zebulun le Naphtali ram,
Jentailhai Galili;
Inthim hnuoia ṭhunghai chun var nasatak an hmu a,
Thina hmun le a hlima ṭhunghai chunga chun,
Var a hung suok ta a,”
tia a hril kha a hung tlung theina dingin.
Chun, Galili dil panga a lêng malamin, unau pahni, Simon (Peter an ti chu) a unau Andri leh dila chun lên dêngin a hmu a; nga mantu an ni hrim a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Mi zui ro, chuongchun, mihriem mantuin siem ka ti cheu,” a ta.
Lênhai chu mâksanin an zui nghâl ta a.
Chutaka inthawk chun a fe pei a, unau dang pahni, Zebedai naupa Jakob le a unau Johan chu, an pa Zebedai kuoma lawngah an lênhai siemṭhain a hmu a, anni chu a ko ta a.
Chuongchun, lawng le an pa chu an mâksan a, an zui nghâl ta a.

Chun, Suria ram po poah a chanchin ân thang ta a; chuongchun, mi damnaw po po, damnawna le natna tinrênga nahai, khawhri imanhai, hringawl invawihai, zenghai a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a, a lo sukdam tâwl a.
Galili rama inthawk dâm, Deka-poli khuoa inthawk dâm, Jerusalema inthawk dâm, Judai rama inthawk dâmin le Jordan râla inthawk dâm chun mipui nasatakin ama an zui bawk a.
