Chuongchun, mipuihai chu a hmuin tlângah a lâwn a; chun, a ṭhung a, a inchûktirhai a kuomah an hung a;
chuongchun, thu a hril a, anni ân chuktir a:
“Thlaraua pasiea inhriehai chu an hamṭha; vân ram an ta a ni si a.
“Mi chunga zângaitheitakhai chu an hamṭha; zângaina an la hlaw ding a ni si a.
“Inremna siemtuhai chu an hamṭha; Pathien nauhai inbûkin an la um ding a ni si a.
Chuong ang bawkin in var chu mi mithmuah var raw se; chuongchun, in thilthaw ṭhathai hmûng an ta, in Pa vâna mi chawimawi thei an tih.
“Dân thu amanih, zâwlneihai thu amanih sukbo dinga hung ka ni ring naw ro, sukbo dinga hung ka ni naw a, sukkim dinga hung ka ni lem.

Chuongchun, tukhawm hieng thupêk laia pakhat, a chîntak khawm bawsea, chuonga thaw ve dinga mihai inchûktir taphawt chu, vân rama chun mi chîn tak tîng an tih; amiruokchu, tukhawm zâwma inchûktir taphawt chu, vân rama chun mi lien tîng an tih.
In felnain Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai felna a khûm naw chun vân ramah lût naw tawp in tih ti ka hril cheu a ni hi.

kei ruok chun, tukhawm a unau chunga lunginsen taphawt chu rorêlna hmabâk zingin um a tih; chun tukhawm a unau kuoma, ‘Hmangnabopa’ ti taphawt chu rorêlna hmabâk zingin um a tih; chun tukhawm, ‘Invêtpa’ ti taphawt chu Hremhmun meia pei hmabâk zingin um a tih ti ka hril cheu hi.
Chuongchun, maichâm bula i thilpêk în hlân lai taka, i unauin i chungah lungninawna a nei ti i hriet dawk nâwk chun,
chutaka maichâm hmaa chun i thilpêk chu mâksan la, fe la, i unau rem zet la, chu hnunga chun i thilpêk chu inhlân rawh.

I khingpui chu lampuia in intlawn laiin rem vat rawh; chuong naw chun, i khingpui chun rorêltu inmantir a ti che a, rorêltu chun mi man hotu kuomah pêng a ti che a, intângna inah khum hlau rawi an ti che.
Titakzetin ka hril che hi, pawisa khat chena i pêk kim nek hma chun, chutaka inthawk chun suok naw tawp i tih.
Kei ruok chun, tukhawm nuhmei dit ena en taphawt chun, a lungrilah a uire zing a nih ti ka hril cheu hi.
Chun, i mit changtiengin a suk- thlûk che chun khel dawk la, pei dai rawh; i taksa a puma Hremhmuna peia a um nêkin, i taksa pêng pakhat bo chu i ta dingin a ṭha lem a nih.
I lu sâlin în khâm ding a ni bawk naw a, samzai pakhat khawm i sukvârin, i sukdum thei si naw a.
‘A nih,’ in ti chu ‘a nih,’ ni sienla, ‘A ni nawh’ in ti chu ‘a ni nawh’ ni el raw se, chuonghai bâk chu suola inthawka suok a nih.
Kei ruok chun ka hril cheu hi, mi suol khing naw ro. I bieng changtienga ben taphawt che chu a khing tieng khawm dawpêk lem rawh.
Tukhawmin i kuomah thupawi siemin, i zakuo lâk a tum chun, i puon khawm inlâktir nghâl rawh.
Mêl khat fe dinga phût luitu taphawt che kuoma chun mêl hni fe rawh.
A hnitu che kuoma chun pe la, i kuoma pûk nuomtu chu nghatsan naw.
Kei ruok chun ka hril cheu hi, in hmêlmahai chu hmangai unla; a suknawmnatuhai cheu chu ṭawngṭaipêk ro;
in Pa vâna mi nauhai in ni theina dingin; ama chun mi suolhai le mi ṭhahai chunga chun a nisa ân suoktir a, mi fel le mi fel nawhai chunga khawm ruo ân sûrtir hlak a nih.
A hmangaituhai cheu chau in lunginsiet hin lâwmman ieng am hmûng in ta? Siedâwltuhai khawmin chuong angin an thaw ve a ni naw am a nih?
chun, in unauhai chau chibai in bûk hin a ieng am in thaw tam bik a? Jentailhai khawmin chuong angin an thaw ve a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, in Pa vâna mi a ṭhafamkim angin in ṭhafamkim ding a nih.
Chuongchun, mi kuoma thil i pêkin, mi vervêkhaiin mi inpâk an hlaw theina dinga, inkhâwmna inhaia le, kawtthlêrhaia an thaw hlak angin, i hmaah tawtawrâwt inmûttir naw.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu, an lâwmman chu an hmu zo tah. Nang ruok chun mi kuoma thil i pêkin, i kut changtiengin a thaw chu i kut vawitiengin hre naw raw se; i thilpêk chu a rûk a ni theina dingin;
chuongchun, i Pa a rûka hmutu che chun thung a ti che.
Nang ruok chun i ṭawngṭaiin, i pindan sûng rilah lût la, i kawt khâr la, i Pa arûka um kuoma chun ṭawngṭai rawh; chuongchun, i Pa arûka hmutu che chun thung a ti che.
“Chun in ṭawngṭaiin, Jentailhai angin hril ngai hril mei mei naw ro; an ṭawng tam leiin hrein an ring a nih.
Chuongchun, anni angin um naw ro; ama in hni hmain in Pa chun ieng ieng am in pawimaw ti chu a hriet zing a nih.
“Chuongchun, nangni chu hieng ang hin ṭawngṭai ro:
Kan Pa vâna mi,
I hming inzaum raw se,
I ram hung tlung raw se.
I dit zâwng vâna mîn an thaw angin, hnuoia mîn thaw raw hai se,
Nitin kan fâk khawpin bu mi pe la,
Kan chunga thil suksuoltuhai kan ngaidam angin,
Nang khawmin kan thil suksuolhai mi ngaidam la,
Suol dinga thlêmnaa chun mi ṭhuoi lût naw la,
Mi suol laka chun mi sanhim lem rawh. “Ramhai, thilthawtheinahai, ropuinahai, chatuona i ta a ni si a, Amen.
“Mi an bawsiethai in ngaidam chun, in Pa vâna mîn ngaidam vêng a ti cheu.

“Bu in nghei pha khawmin, mi vervêkhai angin ngui hmêl put naw ro; anni chun mi mithmua bungheia an inlang theina dingin an hmêl an sukpawr hlak si a. Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, an lâwmman chu an hmu zo tah.
Nang ruok chun bu i nghei pha i lu sahriek nâl la, i hmai phi rawh;
chuongchun, i Pa arûka um mithmua chau naw chun, mihriem mithmuah bungheiin inlang naw ti ni; chuongchun, i Pa arûka hmutu che chun thung a ti che.
Vânah, hângthim le tuiêkin a fâk siet nawnaah, inruhaiin an verpawpa an inrûk nawnaa chun, in ta dingin rohai siekhâwl lem ro;
i ro umna taphawtah i lungril khawm a um ding a ni si a.
“Taksa khâwnvar chu mit hi a nih; i mit a var chun i taksa a rêngin var suok a tih.
I mit a se ruok chun i taksa a rêngin inthim vawng a tih. Chuongchun, i sûnga var chu inthim ni sien chu, inthim chu a va nasa awm ngei de!
“Tukhawmin hotu pahni rawng bâwl kawp thei naw ni hai; pakhat theidain pakhat dit an tih, annawleh, pakhat ṭanin pakhat hmusit an tih. Pathien le sum rawng bâwl kawp thei naw ti niu.

“Chuleichun, ka hril cheu hi, ‘Ieng am dâwnin ieng am fa tâng ka ta?’ tiin, in hringna thu le, ‘Ieng am silin bil ka ta aw?’ tiin, in taksa thu lungkham naw ro. Fâkding nêkin hringna a hlu lem a ni naw am a nih? Silfên nêkin taksa khawm a hlu lem a ni naw am a nih?

“Chunglêng vatehai hi en ta u; bu an tu naw a, an sîk bawk naw a; bu ina khawm an sêklût bawk nawh, nisienlakhawm, in Pa vâna mi chun a châwm si a. Nangni chu anni nêkin nasatakin in hlu lem a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, nangni lai tuin am lung- kham leiin mâni dung
Chun, silfên thuah iengdinga in lungkham am a na? Ram tûktinpâr inṭhangzie hi ṭha takin ngaituo ro; sin an thaw nawh, pat khawm an kher bawk nawh;

Chuongchun, ram hlohna, vawisûn anga hringa, a zînga thuka ti nâwk el ding hman Pathienin chuong ang lâwma a chei chun, aw! nangni ringna tlâwmhai, silfên a pêk lem hman hman ding cheu a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, ‘Ieng am fâng ei ta?’ ‘Ieng am dâwn ei ta?’ amanih, ‘Ieng silin am um ei ta?’ ti amanih, lungkham naw ro. Jentailhaiin chuong po po chu an zawng hlak a nih.
Chuong po po chu in pawimaw ti in Pa vâna miin a hriet zing a nih.
A ram le a felna chu zawng hmasa lem ro; chuongchun, chuong po po chu a pêk sa ding cheu a nih.
Chuongchun, a zînga dingin lungkham naw ro, a zîng chun ama ding chu a lungkham fâwm ding a ni si a. Ni khat dingin ni khat rimsik a hun a nih.
“Sawisêl naw ro, sawisêla in um nawna dingin.
Chun, iengdinga mâni mita tlung- pûm um ngaituo si loa; i unau mita hmawl hlek um chu i hmu am a na?
Iengtin am i unau kuomah, ‘I mita hmawl hlek kha mîn lâk dawktir rawh,’ ti thei i ta? Ngai ta, nanga mit ngeiah tlungpûm chu a um zing si a.
Mi vervêk! I mita inthawkin tlungpûm kha la suok hmasa rawh; chuongchun, i unau mita inthawka hmawl hlek lâk suok ding chu feltakin hmu thei i tih.
“Ui kuoma dâm thil inthieng chu pe naw ro; vawk hmaa dâm in lunghlu pei bawk naw ro; chîl se hlau rawi an ta; ngha lêtin phirthlêr rawi an ti cheu.”
“Hni ro, chuongchun, pêkin um in tih; zawng ro, chuongchun, hmûng in tih;
nawk ro, hawngpêkin um in tih; tukhawm a hni taphawt chun an hmu hlak; tukhawm a zawng chun an hmu hlak; tukhawm a nawk chu hawngpêk ning an tih.
“Anleh, nangni rawi tukhawm, in naupain bei hni sienla cheu, tuin am lung pêng in ta?
Annawleh, nga hni sienla tuin am rûl pêng in ta?
Chuongchun, nangni mi suol hmanin in nauhai thil ṭha pêk nachang in hriet chun, in Pa vâna mi chun a hnituhai chu thil ṭha a pêk lem hman hman naw ding am a nih?
“Kawtkhâr chîna chun lût ro; bohmangnaa fena kawtkhâr chu a lien a, a lampui khawm a lien bawk a, chu tienga lût chu tam khawm an tam hle a nih.
Hringnaa fena kawtkhâr chu a chîn a, a lampui khawm ân têp bawk a, a hmutuhai khawm tlâwmte an nih.
“Zâwlnei tehlêmhai lai chun fîmkhur ro; chuonghai chu berâm vun silin in kuomah an hung hlak a; an sûng tienga ruok chu satene hnukinrâwltakhai an ni si a.
Anni chu an raah hre el in tih. Hrui hlingnei kûngah grêp an lo hlak am a nih? Lênhlinga khawm theichang an lo hlak am a nih?
Chuong ang bawkin thing ṭha taphawt chu a ra ṭha hlak; thing ṭha naw ruok chu a ra se hlak.
Thing ṭha a ra se thei naw a, thing ṭha naw hlak a ra ṭha thei bawk nawh.
“ ‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ a mi ti nazawng chu vân ramah lût naw ni hai, ka Pa vâna mi dit zâwng thawtuhai ruok chu lût an tih.
Chu nia chun mi tamtakin, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa, i hmingin thu kan hrilin, i hmingin khawhri dâm kan hnawtdawkin, i hmingin thilmak tamtak kan thaw hlak a ni naw am a nih?’ la tîng an tih.
Chu pha chun, ‘Nangni thil suol thawhai, ka hriet ngai naw cheu, ka kuoma inthawkin fe hmang ro,’ tiin la hril ka tih.
“Chuongchun, mi tin hieng ka thu hrea zâwm taphawt chu, mi var lungpui chunga in bâwltu leh hrilkhi ding a nih.
Ruo dâm a hung sûr a, tui dâm a hung lien a, thli dâm a hung hrâng a, chu in chu a hung nam sawk sawk a; nisienlakhawm, a chim naw a; lungpui chunga rem tlat a ni leiin.
Chun, mi tin hieng ka thu hrea zâwm naw taphawt chu mi invêt phaiphin chung ela in bâwltu leh hrilkhi ding a nih.
Ruo dâm a hung sûr a; tui dâm a hung lien a, thli dâm a hung hrâng a, chu in chu a hung nam sawk sawk a; a chim ta a; a chim chu nasatak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chuong thil chu a hril zo phingleh, mipuihaiin a thu inchûk tir chu mak an ti hle a;
Tlânga inthawka a hung ṭumin mipui nasatakin ama an zui ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, a kuomah phâr a hung a, “Lalpa, i nuom chun i mi sukthieng thei,” tiin chibai a bûk a.
Isûn a hang ban a, a them a, “Ka nuom ie, lo inthieng ta rawh,” a ta, kâr lovin a phâr chu a lo inthieng nghâl ta a.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Tukhawm hril lo dingin fîmkhur raw aw; amiruokchu, thiempu kuomah vân entir la, Mosiein pêk dinga a ruothai kha inhlân rawh, an hriet felna dingin,” a ta.
Chun, Kapernaum a lûtin, a kuomah sipai za hotu a hung a,
“Lalpa, ka naupang a zeng a, inah a zâl zing a, nasataka suknatin a um a nih,” tiin a ngên a.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Hung ka ta, sukdam ka tih,” a ta.
Sipai za hotu chun, “Lalpa, ka in sûng i lûtna tlâk a ni naw ie; thu chau hril la ka naupang dam el a tih.

Kei khawm mi thua um ka na, ka hnuoiah sipaihai an um a; chu mipa kha mipa chu, ‘Fe rawh,’ ka ti leh a fe hlak; mi dang kuoma khawm, ‘Hung rawh,’ ka ti leh a hung hlak, ka suok kuoma khawm, ‘Ahi thaw rawh,’ ka ti leh a thaw hlak,” tiin a dawn a.
Isûn chuong thu chu a hrietin mak a ti hle a, ama zuituhai kuoma chun, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu, Israelhai lai khawm hieng ang lâwma ringna nasa hi ka hmu nawh.
Ka hril cheu hi, sak le thlanga inthawkin mi tamtak hung an ta, vân rama chun Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai kuomah ṭhung an ta;
ram nauhai ruok chu tuol inthima chun hnawt dawkin um an ta; chutaka chun ṭap le harâwt chu um a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn sipai za hotu kuoma chun, “Fe ta rawh, i ring angin i chungah hung tlung raw se,” a ta. Chuongchun, naupang chu chu dâra chun a lo dam ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Peter ina a lûtin, a nuhmei nu chu khawsika zâlin a hmu a.
Chuongchun, a kut chu a them pêk a, a khawsik chu a bo ta a, chun, a tho a, a rawng a bâwlpêk ta a.
Chun, khuo a hung inhnu chun, a kuomah khawhri imanhai tamtak an hung ṭhuoi a; thuin khawhrihai chu a hnawt dawk a, damnaw po po chu a sukdam bawk a:
Chun, Isûn, mipui nasatak a vêla a hmuin râl khingtienga fe dingin thu a pêk a.
Chun, Dân Inchûktirtu pakhat a hung a, a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, i fena taphawtah zui ka ti che,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Sihalhaiin kuo an nei a, chunglêng vatehai khawmin bu an nei a, Mihriem Naupa ruok hin chu a lu innghatna a nei nawh,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai laia mi dangin a kuomah, “Lalpa, fea ka pa hung vui hmasa phawt dingin mi phal rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a kuomah, “Mi zui rawh, mithiin anni mithi chu vui raw se,” a ta.
Chun, lawngah a chuong a, a inchûktirhai chun an zui a.
Chun, ngai ta, dila chun thlipui nasatak a hung hrâng a, chuongchun, tuifâwn chun lawng chu a chîm pup pup el a; ama ruok chu a in a.
A kuomah an hung a, an keitho a, “Lalpa, mi sanhim rawh, kan bohmang ding annâwm hi,” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ringna tlâwmhai, iengdinga in ṭi?” a ta. Chuongchun, a tho a, thli le dîl chu a hal a, chun, a hung re ta duok el a.
Mihai chun mak an ti hle a, “Hi mipa hi mi ieng am a na, thli le dîl chen khawma a thu an awi hi?” an ta.
Chun, râl khingtieng Gadarin mihai ram chu a tlungin, khawhri iman pahni, thlâna inthawka hung suokin, an hung intuokpui a; an hrâng bêk a; chuongchun, chu lampuia chun tukhawm an fe thei naw a.
Chun, ngai ta, anni chun, “Pathien Naupa, nang le keini ieng am ei inzâwlna? A hun tlung hmain a mi sawisa dinga hitaka hung am i nih?” tiin an khêk a.
Chun, an kâwla inthawka hla reia chun vawk ruol tamtak an tla a.
Khawhrihai chun, “I mi hnawt dawk chun vawk ruol sûngahai sawn mîn fetir rawh,” tiin a kuomah an ngên a.

Ama chun an kuomah, “Fe ta ro am,” a ta. Chuongchun, an hung suok a, vawkhai sûnga chun an va lût a; chun, ngai ta, vawk ruol po po chu râwlah an tlân thla hum hum el a; dîlah an tla lût a, tuia chun an tla hlum ta a.
Chun, a vâituhai chu an tlân a, khuoa chun an fe a, iengkim an hril ta a, khawhri iman chunga thil tlunghai khawm chu.
Chun, ngai ta, akhuoin Isu tuok dingin an hung suok a; chun ama an hmu phingleh an rama inthawka suok dingin an ngên ta a.
Chun, Isu lawngah a chuong a, dîl chu a râlkai a, a umna khuo chu a tlung a.
Chun, ngai ta, zeng pakhat khuma zâl pumin a kuomah an hung zâwn a. Isûn an ringzie a hmuin, zeng kuoma chun, “Ka nau, lungmuongtakin um rawh; i suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, Dân Inchûktirtu ṭhenkhathai chun an lungrilin, “Hi mipa hin Pathien a hrilsiet a ni tie,” an ta.
Isûn an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, “Iengdinga in lungrila suol in ngaituo am a na?
‘I suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,’ ti le, ‘Tho la kein fe rawh,’ ti hi a ieng am ti a awl lem a?
Iengkhawm ni sienla, khawvêlah Mihriem Naupa hin suol ngaidam theina a nei ti in hrietna dingin,” a ta, (zeng kuoma chun), “Tho la, i khum la la, i inah fe rawh,” a ta.
Chun, a tho a, a inah a fe ta a.
Chun, mipuihai chun chu chu an hmuin an ṭi a, mihriemhai kuoma chuong ang thuneina petu Pathien chu an inpâk a.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawkin a fe pei a, sie chawina hmuna ṭhung mi pakhat, a hming Matthai, a hmu a; a kuomah, “Mi hung zui rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a tho a, a zui ta a.
Chun, ina chun thlaithlêng a awt laiin, ngai ta, siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai tamtak an hung a, Isu le a inchûktirhai chu an awtpui tâwl a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a hriet phingleh, “Mi hrâthai chun dâktawr an ngai naw a, mi hrivawisiehai lemin an ngai a nih.
Chu lai chun, Johan inchûktirhai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Iengdinga keini le Pharisaihai hin bu kan nghei rawp a, i inchûktirhai hlak hin an nghei si naw a?” an ta.

Isûn an kuomah, “Mo ṭhuoituhai kuoma a pasal ding chu a um sûng phawt chun mo ṭhuoituhaiin an sûn thei am a nih? Nisienlakhawm, a pasal ding chu an kuoma inthawka ṭhuoi hmang nihai la tlung a ta, chu pha ruok chun la nghei an tih.
Chun, tukhawmin puon hlui puon la rin mar lo hlekin an phâwk ngai nawh; a phâwk pingna ding chun puon chu keithlêr lem a ta, a tlêr nasa lem ding a ni si a.

Tukhawmin uoin thar savun uoin peng hluiah an thun ngai nawh; chuong naw chun savun penghai chu a puok khawi a, uoin chu ân buo a, savun penghai chu a se hlak; uoin thar chu savun peng tharhaiah an thun lem hlak a nih; chuongchun, ṭhatakin a um rêl hlak,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu an kuoma a hril lai takin, ngai ta,hotu pakhat a hung a, chibai a bûk a, “Ka naunu tu el khan a thi a; nisienlakhawm, hung la, a chungah kut innghat la dam nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Isu a tho a , a zui ta a, a inchûktirhai khawmin an zui ve a.
Chun, ngai ta, nuhmei pakhat, kum sâwmpahni thipûta damnaw, a hnungah a hung a, a puon hmawr a them a,
“A puon hmawr chau khawm them lang sukdamin um el ka tih,” a ti lungril a.
Chun, Isu a ngha a, ama chu a hmu a, “Ka naunu, lungmuongtakin um rawh, i ringna hi i dampui a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, nuhmei chu chu dâr chena chun a hung dam ta a.
Chun, Isu hotu inah a lût a, theihle mûthai le mipui inri mur mur a va hmu chun,
“Suok ro, naupang chu a thi nawh, a in a ni lem in sawnnaw,” a ta. Anni chun ama chu an nuisan ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, mipui chu a hnawt suok hnung chun a lût a, a kutah a chel a, naupang chu a hung tho ta a.
Chu chena inthawk chun, chuong ram po poa chun chu chanchin chu ân thang suok ta a.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawkin a fe pei a, mitdel pahniin, “David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tia khêkin an zui a.
Chun, inah a lût chun, mitdelhai chu a kuomah an hung a; chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Hi hi thaw thei dingin in mi ring am?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Ring e, Lalpa” an ta.
Ama chun an mit a them a, “In ring angin in chungah tlung raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an mit chu a hung var ta a. Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tukhawm ihriet naw dingin fimkhur ro,” a ti tlat a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chu an suok a, chu ram po poa chun a chanchin an sukthang ta a.
Chun, an suok lai takin, ngai ta, khawhri iman ṭawng thei naw pakhat a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, khawhri chu a hnawt dawk phingleh ṭawng thei naw chu a hung ṭawng ta a. Mipuihai chun mak an ti hle a, “Israelhai lai khawm hieng ang hi hmu a ni ngai nawh,” an ta.
Chuongchun, a inchûktirhai kuoma chun, “Bu sîk ding a tam hle si a; nisienlakhawm, a sinthawtuhai an tlâwm.

Chun, a inchûktir sâwm le pahnihai chu a ko a, anni hnawt dawk theina dingin khawhri inthiengnawhai chunga thuneina a pêk a; damnawna tinrêng le natna tinrêng sukdam theina dingin thuneina a pêk bawk a.
Tirko sâwm le pahni hai hming chu hieng hi an nih: A hmasataka chun Simon (Peter an ti) le a unau Andri hai, Zebedai naupa Jakob le a unaupa Johan hai;
Philip le Bartholomai hai; Thoma le siedâwltu Matthai hai; Alphai naupa Jakob le Thaddai hai,
Kanaana mi Simon le a inmantirtu Juda Iskariot hai hi an nih.
Chuong sâwm le pahni hai chu Isûn a tir suok a, an kuomah thu a pêk a: “Jentailhai lampuiah fe naw unla, Samari mihai khuo hrim hrima khawm lût naw ro;
amiruokchu, Israel hnam berâm inhmanghai kuoma chun fe lem ro.
Damnawhai sukdam unla, mithi- hai keitho unla, phârhai sukthieng unla, khawhrihai hnawt dawk ro, a thlâwnin in hmu a, a thlâwnin pe ro.
In kâwngkhihaiah rângkachak tangka amanih, tangka manih, dâr tangka amanih chawi naw ro.
“Chun, khaw liena manih, khaw chîna manih, in lûtna taphawta chun ân tlungtir tlâk ding cheu mi zawng dawk unla, in suok nâwk hmakhat chutaka chun tlung zing ro.
Chun, ina chun in lût dingin chibai bûk ro.
Chun, ina mihai chu intlungtir tlâk cheu an ni chun, in thlamuongna thu chu an chungah tlung sienla; an tlâk naw ruok chun in thlamuongna thu chu in chungah hung kîr nâwk raw se.
anih, hotuhai le lalhai hmaah annihai le Jentailhai inhriettirna dingin, keima leiin la ṭhuoi an ti cheu.
Nisienlakhawm, an inmantir pha cheu khawm, ‘Iengtin am, ieng thu am ka hril ding?’ tiin lungkham naw ro; in hril ding chu a hun taka chun ân hriettir ding cheu a ni si a.
A hriltu chu nangni in ni âwm si naw a, in Pa Thlarau nangnia thu hriltu khan a hril lem ding a nih.
“Chun, sukhlum dingin unaupa le unaupa inmantir an ta, pa khawmin a nau inmantir bawk a tih; nauhai khawmin an nu le pahai do an ta, insukhlumtir bawk an tih.
“Chuongchun, hi khuoa hin an suknawmna pha cheu, khaw dangah tlân san ro; titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Mihriem Naupa a hung hmain Israel khuohai chu fang suok naw ti niu.
Inthima ka hril cheu hi varah hril ro, na bula in hriet hi in chunga chuongin tlânginsampui ro.
“Chun, taksa sukhluma thlarau sukhlum thei nawhai chu ṭi naw unla, Hremhmuna thlarau le taksa sukbo thei ruok chu ṭi ro.
Chawngzawng pahni dâr tangka pakhatin an zawr hlak a ni naw am a nih? nisienlakhawm, anni laia pakhat khawm in Pa boin hnuoiah tla naw ni.
In samzai chen khawm hi tiem vawng a nih in sawnnaw.
Chuleichun, ṭi naw ro; chawngzawng tamtak nêkin in hlu lem a nih.
“Chuongchun, mihai hmaa a mi ṭan taphawt chu, ka Pa vâna mi hmaah ṭan vêng ka tih.
“Khawvêla hin inremna inlêngtir dinga hung am ka nih mi sâwn naw ro; inremna inlêngtir dinga hung ka ni naw a, kâwlhnâm inlêngtir dinga hung ka ni lem.
Mi a pa indotir dingin, naunu a nu indotir dingin, mo le a pi indotir dinga hung ka nih in sawnnaw.
“Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih keia nêka hmangai lem chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh; tukhawm naupa amanih, naunu amanih keia nêka hmangai lem chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh.
Tukhawm a kraws puta mi zui naw chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh.
Tukhawm zâwlnei chu zâwlnei a ni leia lâwm chun, zâwlnei lâwmman hmûng a tih; tukhawm mi fel chu mi fel a ni leia lâwm chun mi fel lâwmman hmûng a tih.
Chun, tukhawm hieng mi chîntak laia pakhat kuoma hin, tirko a ni leia tuisik no khat chau khawm pe taphawt chun, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, a lâwmman chu chân naw tawp a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a inchûktir sâwm le pahni hai chu thu a pêk zo phingleh chutaka inthawkin an khuohaia inchûktir le thu hril dingin a fe ta a.
Chun, Johanin Krista thilthawhai chu intângna inah a lo hrietin a inchûktirhai ân palaitir a, a kuomah,
“A hung ding chu i ni, mi dang kan la ngai ding?” tiin.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Fe nâwk ta unla, thil in hmu le in hriet hi Johan kuomah va hril ro;
Chun, tukhawm ka chunga lungninawna hmu naw chu, a hamṭha,” tiin a lo dawn a.
Chun, chuhai chu an fe phingleh, Isûn mipui kuoma chun Johan thu a hril ta a, “Ieng en dingin am thlalêrah in fe suok kha? Luong thli imût hnîng maw?
Annawleh, ieng en ding takin am in fe suok kha? Puon innêm sil maw? Ngai ta u, puon innêm silhai chu lal inahai in sawnnaw an um.
Annawleh, ieng lei takin am in fe suok kha? Zâwlnei en dingin maw? A ni ngei kha, ka ti cheu hi, zâwlnei nêk khawma ropui lem,
Ama chun i hmaah i lampui siem a tih,’
tia a chanchin an inziek kha ama hi a nih.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, nuhmei sûnga insieng laiah Baptistu Johan nêka ropui lem an la suok ngai nawh, nisienlakhawm, vân rama mi chîn deu khawm ama nêkin an ropui lem si a.
Baptistu Johana inthawk tu chen hin vân ram chun thaw rakna a tuok hlak a, a thaw rakhai chun an pâwnglâk hlak.
Tukhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se.
“Nisienlakhawm, tulai ruoltharhai hi ieng lêm hrilkhîng ka ta? Naupang dâwr hmunahai ṭhung a, an ruolhai ko a,
‘Theihle kan mût pêk cheu a, in lâm si naw a,
Kan ṭap rak a, âwm in chum si naw a,’ tihai ang hi an nih.
“Johan chu a hung a, a fâkin a dâwn naw a, ‘Khawhri a zâwl a ni hi,’ an ta.
Mihriem Naupa a hung a, a fâkin a dâwn a, ‘En ta u, bu he mi, uoin he mi, siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai ruolpa saw,’ an ti si a. Nisienlakhawm, Varna chu a thilthawhaiin thiem ân changtir,” a ta.
Chun, an sim naw leiin a thilmak thaw tamna tak khuohai chu a hal ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, ka ti cheu hi ngaituo nia chun nangni tuor nêkin Tura le Sidon tuor chu a dân um lem a tih.
Chu lai chun Isûn a biek a, “Aw Pa, hnuoi le vân Lalpa, nangin mi var le mi bengvârhai kuomah hieng thu hi i ip a, nautehai kuomah i puong lei hin kân pâk che.
Anih, Pa, chuong anga thaw chu i ngaiin a ṭha a nih.
“Nangni sininrim le phur rik phur po pohai, ka kuomah hung unla, keiin inchâwltir ka ti cheu.
Ka rîngkawl chu ân hâwi a, ka phur khawm a zâng a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisaihaiin chu chu an hmu chun a kuomah, “En ta, i inchûktirhaiin Châwlnia thaw thieng naw chu an thaw hi,” an ta.
Iengkhawm ni sien, Pathien biekin nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um ti ka hril cheu hi.
Mihriem Naupa hi Châwlni Lal a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun a fe a, an inkhâwmna inah a va lût a.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat kut zeng a lo um a, chun, an hêk theina dingin, “Châwlniin sukdam a thieng am?” tiin Isu an indawn a.
Berâm pakhat nêk chun mihriem pakhat chu a va hlu lem de! Chuleichun, Châwlnia sukṭhat a thieng,” a ta.
Chu phingleh, chu mipa kuoma chun, “I kut phar rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a phar a, a khing tieng angin a dam ta var a.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai chu an suok a, ama an sukhlum theina ding dân ngaituoin an inrâwn a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn chu chu a hrietin, chutaka inthawk chun a fe hmang ta a.
Chun, mi tamtakin ama an zui a, an rêngin a lo sukdam vawng a, a chanchin puong lo dingin an kuomah a ti tlat a.
Zâwlnei Isaiin hieng thu a hril hi a hung tlung theina dingin:
“En ta, ka siehlaw, ka ithlang,
Ka idittak, ka lungrilin a ilâwm bêk bêk hi;
A chungah ka Thlarau sieng ka ta,
Chuongchun, Jentailhai kuomah rorêlna thu hril a tih.
Sêl naw ni a, khêk bawk naw ni a;
Kawtthlêrhaia khawm tukhawmin a râwl hre bawk naw ni hai.
Hne dinga rorêlna a tir dawk hma khat chun
Luong pawr suktan naw ni a,
Pat khu khawm sukmit naw ni.
Chu lai chun, mitdel ṭawngtheinaw khawhri iman pakhat a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; chun, ama chun a lo sukdam a, chuongchun, ṭawngtheinaw chu a hung ṭawng theiin, a hung hmu thei ta a.
Chun, mipuihai po po chun mak an ti hle a, “Hi mipa hi David naupa chu a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, an kuomah, “Khâwlai ram khawm mâni indo taphawt chu an bo hlak; khâwlai khuo khawm sûngkhat khawm, mâni indo taphawt chu ngîr suok naw ni hai.
Setanin Setan bawk a hnawt dawk chun, mâni indo nîng a tih in sawnnaw; a ram chu iengtin am ngîr suok a ta?
Kei Beelzebub
Amiruokchu, kei Pathien Thlarau leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka ni chun, Pathien ram in kuomah a hung tlung tah nîng a tih.
Chuongchu a ni si naw chun, miin mi hrât chu a khuop hmasa bak naw chun, iengtin am mi hrât inah lûtin a sum lapêk thei a ta? Chu hnunga ruok chun a in chu inrampêk el a tih.
“Chuleiin, ka ti cheu hi, mi an suolna tinrênga le, Pathien an hrilsietna tinrênga chun ngaidam nîng an ta, Thlarau Inthieng meu hrilsetu ruok chu ngaidam ni naw ni hai.
Mi ṭha chun a robâwm ṭhaa inthawkin thil ṭhahai a the dawk hlak, mi suol chun a robâwm siea inthawkin thil ṭha naw a the dawk hlak.
Chun, ka hril cheu hi, mihaiin thu teplo an hril taphawt, chuong thu chanchin chu ngaituo nia chun hril an tih.
I thuhril chun thiem inchangtir a ti che a, i thuhril bawk chun thiemnaw inchangtir a ti che i sawnnaw,” a ta.
“Chun, khawhri inthieng naw chu mi sûnga inthawka a suokin, châwlna zawngin tui um nawna hmunahai ân vâk ân vâk a, a hmu ngai si naw a.
Chun, ‘Ka suokna ina khan kîr nâwk el ka tih,’ a ta; chun, a va tlung chun, a ruoka, phît faia cheiṭhatin a hmu a.

Chu phingleh a va fe a, ama nêka suol lem khawhri dang pasari a hung ṭhuoi a, chutaka chun an lût a, an um zing hlak a, chu mihriem um dân nuhnung lem chu a hmasa nêkin a hung ṭha naw lem hlak a nih. Chuong ang bawkin tulai ruolthar suol takhai chunga hin la um a tih,” tiin a dawn a.
Mipuihai kuoma thu a la hril lai chun, ngai ta, a nu le a unauhai chu ama biek tumin tuolah an ngîr a.
Chun, mi pakhatin a kuomah, “Ngai ta, i nu le i unauhai biek che tumin tuola sawn an ngîr zing ie,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun a hriltu kuoma chun, “Ka nu chu tu am a na? Ka unauhai khawm chu tuhai am an na?” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, a inchûktirhai tieng a kut a phar a, “En ta u, ka nu le ka unauhai hi!
Tukhawm ka Pa vâna mi dit zâwng thaw taphawt chu, ka unau le, ka farnu le, ka nuhai an nih in sawnnaw,” a ta.
Chu ni chun Isu chu ina inthawkin a fe suok a, dîl panga chun a ṭhung a.
Chun, a kuomah mipui nasatak an hung inkhâwm a, chuongchun, lawngah a chuong a, a ṭhung a; mipui po po ṭieuphoah an ngîr a.
Chun, tekhithuin an kuomah thu tamtak a hril a, “Ngai ta u, bu chi thetu chu bu chi the dingin a fe a.
Chun, a the laiin a ṭhen lampui sîrah a tla a, vatehaiin an hung tlân zo ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen pielthlêng leihnuoi inphânna hmunah a tla a, leihnuoi a sa naw leiin a mâwng nghâl ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, nisa a hung insâng deuin em vuoiin a hung um a, zung a nei naw leiin a rawp el ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen hlohlingnei lai a tla a, hlo chu a hung mâwng sâng a, a dîp hmang ta a.
A ṭhen hnuoi ṭhaah a tla a, ṭhenkhat a lêt za dâm, ṭhenkhat a lêt sâwmruk dâm, ṭhenkhat a lêt sâwmthum dâmin a hung ra ta a.
Tukhawm na nei chun hre raw se,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chu an hung a, a kuomah, “Iengdinga an kuomah tekhithua i hril am?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a dawn a, an kuomah, “Vân ram thurûk chu nangni ihriet chu phal a nih, anni ihriet ruok chu phal a ni nawh.
Tukhawm a nei taphawt chu pe sâng an ta, nei ṭeu an tih; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm a nei naw taphawt chu, an nei sun khawm lâkpêk an tih.
Chuleichun, tekhithuin an kuomah ka hril a nih; hmu hai sien khawm an hmu ngai naw a, nain hrehai sien khawm an hriet ngai naw a, a ngaina khawm an hriet ngai naw leiin.
Chun, Isai thuhrillâwk kha an chungah a hung tlung a ni hi;
‘Na chun hre dêng in ta chu, a ngaina ruok chu hre tawp naw ti niu;
Hmu chu hmu dêng in ta chu, hriet ruok chu hre tawp naw ti niu;
Hi chihai lungril hi a lo ngawng ta a,
An nahai a lo sêt ta a,
An mit an insîm bawk a.
Chuong naw chun an mitin hmûng an ta,
An nain hrieng an ta,
An lungrilin hre bawk an ta,
Ngha kîr nâwk an ta,
Keiin anni sukdam hlau rawi ka tih,’ a ti kha.
“Nangni mit chu a vângnei a nih, a hmu hlak leiin; in na khawm a vângnei a nih, a hriet hlak leiin.

Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, zâwlnei tamtakhai le mi fel tamtakhai khawmin, in thil hmuhai hi hmu an inhâwk a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu si naw a; in thil hriethai khawm hi hriet an inhâwk a; nisienlakhawm, an hriet si naw a!
“Chuongchun, bu chi thetu tekhithu chu hre ro:
Tukhawmin ram thu chu naa a lo hriet a, a ngaina a hriet si naw chun, mi suol chu a hung a, a lungrila the sa chu a lâkpêk hlak. Chu chu lampui sîra the chu a nih.
Chun, pielthlêng hmuna the chu, thu hre a, lâwmtaka pawm nghâl hlak hi a nih;
nisienlakhawm, amaa chun zung a um naw leiin sâwt nawte chau a um a; chun, thu lei chun, rinumna amanih, suknawmnatna amanih a hung um phingleh a tlu nghâl el hlak.
Chun, hlohlingnei laia the chu, thu hretu a na; nisienlakhawm, khawvêl lungkhamna le hausakna hlêmna chun thu chu a dîp a, ra lovin a um hlak.

Chun, leihnuoi ṭha chunga the chu, thu chu naa hre a, a ngaina hre bawk hi a nih. Chu chu a ra ngei a, ṭhenkhat a lêt za dâm, ṭhenkhat a lêt sâwmruk dâmin, ṭhenkhat a lêt sâwmthum dâmin a pung hlak,” a ta.
Tekhithu dang an kuomah a hril nâwk a, “Vân ram chu, mi a loa chi ṭha thetu le chun hrilkhi a nih;
nisienlakhawm, mi an in kârin a hmêlma a hung a, bu lai chun bu tehlêm a the a, a fe hmang nâwk ta a.
Chun, bu chu a hung mâwng a, a hung vui chun, bu tehlêm chu a hung inlang ve ta a.
Chun, in neitu suokhai chu an hung a, a kuoma chun, ‘Pu, i loah chi ṭha i the a ni naw am a nih? bu tehlêm saw khâwlaia hung um am a ni leh?’ an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, ‘Chu chu hmêlmain a lo thaw a ni ta chu,’ a ta. Chun, suokhai chun a kuomah, ‘Chuong chu la khâwm el inlang rem i ti?’ an ta.
Ama ruok chun, ‘Ti lo e; bu tehlêm chu in lâk khâwm chun bu chu phawi sa hlau rawi in tih.

Bu sîk chenin um hmun khat raw se; chun, bu sîk pha chun, bu âttuhai kuomah, bu tehlêm chu la khâwm hmasa phawt unla, raw dingin intêl ro, bu ruok chu ka inah sêk lût ro, la tîng ka tih,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Tekhithu dang an kuomah a hril nâwk a, “Vân ram chu anṭam chi mal khat mîn a lâk a, a loa a the ang chu a na;

chu chu chi po poa chîn tak a na: nisienlakhawm, a hung mâwng sâng pha chun, thlaihai nêk chun a lien lem a, thing a hung ni hlak a, chuongchun, chunglêng vatehai chu an hung a, a zârhaia chun an riek hlak a,” a ta.
Tekhithu dang an kuomah a hril nâwk a, “Vân ram chu chawl, nuhmeiin a ilâk, beiphit tekhâwng thum laia arênga a tho vawng hmakhata a iphûm ang chu a nih,” a ta.
Chuong po po chu Isûn tekhithuin mipuihai kuomah a hril a, tekhithu nawin iengkhawm a hril nawh:
zâwlneiin,
“Tekhithuin ka bau kâng ka ta,
Leihnuoi insieng tîra inthawka thil inthup chu hril dawk ka tih,”
tia a hril kha a hung tlung theina dingin.
Chu lai chun mipuihai chu a fesan a, ina chun a lût ta a; chun, a inchûktirhai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Loa bu tehlêm tekhithu kha mi hrilfie rawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a dawn a, “Chi ṭha thetu chu Mihriem Naupa hi a nih;
Lo chu khawvêl hi a na; chi ṭhahai chu Ram nauhai an na; bu tehlêmhai chu suol nauhai an nih.
Hmêlma a thetu chu diebol a na; bu sîk chu khawvêl tâwpna ding a na; bu sîktuhai chu vântirkohai an nih.
Chuongchun, bu tehlêmhai chu an lâk khâwma meiah an raw ang hin khawvêl tâwpnaa chun la um a tih.
Mihriem Naupa hin a vântirkohai chu tir dawk a ta, a rama inthawka insuksuoltirtuhai le thil suksuoltuhai po po chu thlang dawk an ta,
rawtuina meia chun pei an ta, chutaka chun ṭap le harâwt chu la um a tih.
Chu pha chun, mi felhai chu an Pa rama chun nisa angin var tâng an tih. Na nei chun hre raw se.
“Vân ram chu loa ro phûmrûk ang a nih; chu chu miin a hmu a, a thup hmang a, a lâwm leiin a fe a, a nei po po chu a va zawr a, chu lo chu ân châwk ta a.
“Chun, vân ram chu sumdâwng mi lunghlu ṭhatak zawngtu ang chu a ni nâwk a,
chun, ama chun lunghlu hlutak pakhat a hmu a, a fe ta a, a nei po po chu a va zawr a, ân châwk ta a.
“Chun, vân ram chu lênkhang tuisuorieta dênga, chi tinrêng fûn khâwmna ang chu a ni nâwk bawk a.
Chu chu a sip phingleh vapangah an hnûk dawk a; chun, an ṭhung a, a ṭha po chu bâwmah an lâk khâwm a, a sie ruok chu an pei a.
Khawvêl tâwp pha chun chuong ang bawk chun la um a tih; vântirkohai chu hung suok an ta, mi fel laia inthawkin mi suol hai chu ṭhêng an ta,
rawtuina meia chun pei an ta; chutaka chun ṭap le harâwt chu um a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Chuong po po chu in hriet am?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Hre e,” an ta.

Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Chuong a ni chun Dân inchûktirtu vân ram lampui inchûktira um taphawt chu, in neitu, a ro bâwma inthawka thil tharhai le, thil hluihai phawr dawk hlaktu ang chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chuong tekhithuhai chu a hril zo phingleh, chutaka inthawk chun a fe ta a.

Chun, a umna khuo tieng chu a tlung a, an inkhawmna ina chun anni ân chûktir ta a; chuongchun, mak an ti hle a. “Hi mipa hin, hieng varna le, thilmak thaw theinahai hi, khâwlaia inthawka a hmu am a ni leh?
Hi mi pa hi thingrem siemtu naupa kha a ni naw am a nih? A unauhai khawm, Jakob, Josef, Simon, Juda an tihai chu an ni naw am a nih?
A farnuhai khawm ei kuoma um an ni vawng a ni naw am a nih? Hi mi hin khâwlaia inthawk hrima hieng po po hi a hmu am a na?” an ta.
Chuongchun, a chungah an lungni ta naw a. Nisienlakhawm, Isûn an kuomah, “Zâwlnei chu ama khuo tieng le ama ina chau naw chu inpâk lovin a um ngai nawh,” a ta.
Chun, an ring naw leiin chutaka chun thilmak tam a thaw ta naw a.
Chu lai tak chun lal Herod chun Isu chanchin a lo hriet a,
a siehlawhai kuomah, “Chu chu Baptistu Johan kha a ni chu, mithi laia inthawkin a tho nâwk tah a ni chu tie; chuleiin, chuong thilthawtheinahai chun amaah sin a thaw a ni chu,” a ta.
Chun, Johan chu sukhlum a tum leh mipui a ṭi a, zâwlneiin an ruot si leiin.
Nisienlakhawm, Herod pieng champhaphâk ni chu a hung tlungin Herodi naunu chu a laiah a lâm a, Herod chu a suklâwm ta a.
Chuleichun, a ihni taphawt pe dingin inkhâmin ân tiem ta a.
Chun, ama chun a nu infuiin, “Hiva hin thlêngin Baptistu Johan lu mi pe rawh,” a ta.
Chun, lal chu a lungngai ta a; nisienlakhawm, a thutiem le a thlaithlêng awtpuihai lei chun pêk ding thu a pêk a;
chuongchun, mi a tir a, intângna ina Johan lu chu ân tantir a.
Chun, a lu chu thlêngin a hung lâk a, naupangnu kuoma chun an pêk a; ama chun a nu kuomah a fepui ta a.
Chun, a inchûktirhai chu an hung a, a ruong chu an inhlawm a, an phûm a; chun, an fe a, Isu an va hril ta a.
Chun, Isûn chu chu a hrietin, chutaka inthawkin thlalêr hmun tieng lawngin a tumin a fe ta a. Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chun an hriet phingleh khuoa inthawk dâm chun kea fein an zui ta a.
Chuongchun, ama chu vapanga a suok chun, mipui nasatak a hmu a; a lunginsiet bêk bêk a, an damnawhai a sukdam a,
Chun, zântieng a hung ni chun, inchûktirhai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Ahi thlalêr hmun a na, an ta dinga fâk ding an inchâwk theina dingin mipuihai hi infetir ta la,” an ta.
Isu ruok chun an kuomah, “An fe hmang a ngai naw ie; nangniin fâk ding pe ro,” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Ahin beiphêk panga le nga pahni chau kan nei a nih,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Ahin ka kuomah hung la ro,” a ta.

Chun, hlo chunga ṭhung dingin mipui chu thu a pêk a, beiphêk panga le nga pahni chu a lâk a, vân tieng enin mal a sâwm a, a khawi a, beiphêk panga chu inchûktirhai kuomah a pêk a; inchûktirhai chun mipui kuoma chun an pêk a.
Chun, an rêngin an fâk a, an khawp tâwl ta a; an fâk mahla nawi khawm chu bâwmrâng sâwm le pahni an rût sip a.
A fatuhai chu nuhmei le naupang tiem lovin patling ruok khawm sâng nga rau an nih.
Chun, mipuihai chu ân ṭîntir vêl sûngin, a fe hmaa râlkhing tienga fe dingin inchûktirhai chu lawngah ân chuongtir nghâl a.
Chun, mipuihai chu ân ṭîntir hnungin ṭawngṭai dingin tlânga chun a tumin a hang fe a; chun, zântieng a hung ni chun ama chauin chutaka chun a um ta a.
Lawng ruok chu dîl lailung takah a um ta a; thliin annaw tieng a mût leiin tuifâwnin a vawr ta a.
Chun, vârṭien tâwmin dîl chunga kea lâwnin an kuom tieng a hung pan a.
Inchûktirhai chun, ama chu dîl chunga kea lâwn an hang hmu chun, “Thla a ni saw,” tiin an thlaphâng a, an ṭi a, an khêk ta rak el a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn anni chu a biek nghâl ta a, “Lungmuongtakin um ro, kei ka ni annâwm, ṭi naw ro,” a ta.
Chun, Peterin a dawn a, “Lalpa, nang i ni chun, tui chunga i kuoma hung thu mi pe rawh,” a ta.
Ama chun, “Hung ta la,” a ta. Peter chu lawnga inthawk chun a ṭum a, Isu kuom tieng panin tui chunga chun kein a fe ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, thli hrâng chu a hmuin a ṭi a; chun a tlum vâng vâng a, “Lalpa, mi sandam rawh” tiin a khêk ta a.
Chun, Isûn a ban nghâl ta a, ama chu a chel a, a kuomah, “Nang ringna tlâwm, iengdinga i ringhla am a na?” a ta.
Chun, lawngah an chuong chun thli chu a ma ta el a.
Lawnga umhai chun, “Pathien Naupa i lo ni tak zet hi,” tiin chibai an bûk a.
Chun, râlkhing tieng an kai chun, Gennesaret ram khawmuol an tlung ta a.
Chu hmuna mihai chun ama an hriet phingleh, chu kâwl vêl ram po poa chun mi an tir a, damnaw po po chu a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a;
chun, a puon hmawr bêk them thei an hni a; chun, a them phawt chu an hung dam ta pei a.
Chu lai tak chun, Jerusalema inthawkin Pharisaihai le Dân inchûktirtuhai Isu kuomah an hung a,
“Iengdinga i închûktirhaiin upahai thurosie chu an bawsiet hlak am a na? Bei an fâk pha kut an sâwp ngai si naw a,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni khawm iengdinga in thurosie leia Pathien thupêk in bawsiet am a na?
Pathienin, ‘I nu le pa chawimawi rawh,’ ‘Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih hrilse taphawt chu thi tei tei raw se,’ a ti si a.
Nangni ruok chun tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih kuoma, ‘I mi sawrna ding hi Pathien kuoma pêk a ni tah, ti taphawt chun,
a nu
Vervêkhai Isai hin in chungchâng thu a lo hrillâwk indik ngei el:
‘Hi hairawi hin an bauin an mi chawimawi a,
An lungril ruok chun an mi hlat si a.
Iengkhawm ni sienla, an inchûktirnaah mihriem thupêk an inchûktir leiin,
An mi biek hlak hi a thlâwn el a nih,’
tiin,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, mipui chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Ngai unla, a ngai lo thiem ro;
baua lût chu mihriem sukthieng nawtu a ni naw a, baua suok, achu ngei chu mihriem sukthieng nawtu a ni lem,” a ta.
Chu lai chun, a inchûktirhai an hung a, a kuomah, “Pharisaihaiin kha thu kha an hriet a, an lungninaw kha i hriet am?” an ta.
Ama ruok chun, “Kûng po po ka Pa vâna mi phun naw chu phâwidawkin um an tih.
Anni chu pawisa naw ro; ṭhuoitu mitdel an nih. Chuongchun, mitdelin mitdel ma a ṭhuoi chun khurah tla rêl an tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Peterin a kuomah, “Tekhithu kha mi hrilfie ta la,” tiin a dawn a.
Ama chun, “Tu chen hin nangni khawm hrietna nei lovin in la um rawp maw?
Baua lût taphawt chu phîngah a tla thla a, inhnawmnaah pei dawkin a um ti in hriet naw am a nih?
Baua suokhai ruok chu lungrila hung suok a na; chuong ngei chun mihriem a sukthieng naw hlak a nih.
Lungrila hin ngaituona suolhai, tuolthatna hai, uiretna hai, inditna hai, inrûkna hai, inhêkna hai, hrilsietna hai a hung suok hlak si a.
chuong chu mihriem sukthieng nawtu a nih; kut sâwp lova bu fâk ruok chun mi a sukthieng naw nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawk chun a suok a; Tura le Sidon bielah a fe ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, chuong rama inthawk chun Kanaan nuhmei pakhat a hung suok a, “Lalpa, David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh, ka naunu khawhriin a man tlat a nih,” tiin a khêk a.
Ama ruok chun bau khat khawmin a dawn nawh. Chun, a inchûktirhai chun, “Ei hnungah a khêk a khêk si a, infetir el ta la,” tiin an hung ngên a.
Ama ruok chun, “Israel hnam laia berâm inhmang kuoma naw chu tir ka ni nawh,” a ta, a dawn a.
Nisienlakhawm, nuhmei chu a hung a, “Lalpa, mi san rawh,” tiin chibai a bûk a.
Chun, ama chun, “Nauhai bei lâkpêk a, uihai kuoma pêk chu a mawi nawh ie,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun, “Lalpa, ni chu a nih; nisienlakhawm, uihai khawmin an pu dawkâna inthawka bei nawi tla chu an fâk hlak annâwm,” a ta.
Chu phingleh Isûn a kuomah, “Nuhmei, i ringna a nasa êm el; i dit ang takin i chungah um raw se,” a ta, a dawn a. Chuongchun, a naunu chu, chu chena chun a hung dam el ta a.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawk chun a fe a, Galili dîl kâwl a hung tlung a; chun tlânga chun a hang fe a, chutaka chun a ṭhung ta a.
Chun, mipui nasatak, kebaihai, mitdelhai, ṭawngtheinawhai, piengsuolhai hung ṭhuoiin a kuomah an hung a, a ke bulah an sie a; chun, a lo sukdam tâwl a.

Chuongchun, mipui chun, ṭawngtheinawhai chu hung ṭawng a, piengsuolhai chu hung ṭha a, kebaihai chu kea lâwn a, mitdelhai chu hmu theia an hmuin, mak an ti hle a; chuongchun, Israelhai Pathien chu an inpâk ta a.

Chun, Isûn a inchûktirhai chu a ko a, “Mipuihai hi tuhin ka kuomah ni thum an um ta a, fâk ding iengkhawm an nei naw leiin ka lungsiet bêk bêk a nih; bu ngheiin kân fetir nuom nawh ie, chuong naw chun lam kârah châu rawi an tih,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Mipui hieng zât zât khawpna khawp beiphêk chuong zât lâwm lâwm thlalêrah khâwlai am hmûng kan ta?” an ta.
Chun, an kuomah, “Beiphêk iengzât am in nei a?” a ta. Anni chun, “Phêk sari, ngatê tlâwmte leh,” an ta.
Ama chun hnuoia ṭhung dingin mipui chu thu a pêk a.
Chun, bei pasari le ngatê chu a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril a, a khawi a, inchûktirhai kuomah a pêk a; inchûktirhai chun mipuihai kuomah an pêk a.
Chun, an rêngin an fâk a, an khawp tâwl ta a, an fâk mahla khawm chu bâwmrâng sari an rût sip a.
A fatuhai chu nuhmei le naupang tiem lovin patling ruok khawm sâng li an nih.
Chun, mipuihai chu ân ṭintir hnungin lawngah a chuong a, Magadan ram a hung tlung a.
Chun, Pharisaihai le Saddukaihai an hung a, ama fiena dingin vâna inthawka inchikna anni inentir dingin an hni a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “Zântieng a hung ni pha, ‘Khuo a ṭha ding nîng a tih, kâwl a sen êm el,’ in ti hlak a.
Chun, a zîngkâr chun, ‘Vawisûn chu khuo a se ding nîng a tih, kâwl a sen a, vân ân nîm êm el,’ in ti hlak a.
Ruolthar suol tak le uire hmanghai chun inchikna an zawng a; nisienlakhawm, Jona inchikna chau naw chu an kuomah inchikna hrim pêk ni naw ni,” a ta, a dawn a. Chun, anni a fesan a, a fe ta dai a.
Chun, inchûktirhai chu râlkhing tieng an tlung chun, bei an lo chawi theinghil a,
Isûn an kuomah, “Pharisaihai le Saddukaihai chawla inthawk chun invêng unla, fîmkhur ro,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun, “Bei ei chawi dêr nawh,” tiin an inngaituo a.
Chun, Isûn chu chu a hriet a, “Ringna tlâwmhai, iengdinga bei in nei naw leia in inngaituo am a na?
Tu khawm hin in lungrilin in la hriet naw rawp maw? Mi sâng nga beiphêk panga le, in bâwm rût sip zât kha in hriet zing naw am a nih?
Mi sâng li beiphêk pasari le, in bâwmrâng rût sip zât khawm kha?
Bei thu in kuomah ka hril nawh ti iengtiziea in hriet naw am a na? Pharisaihai le Saddukaihai chawla inthawk ruok chun fîmkhur ro,” a ta.
Chu phingleh, bei chawla inthawka fîmkhur dingin a ti naw a, Pharisaihai le Saddukaihai inchûktirnaa inthawka fîmkhur dingin anni a ti lem ti an hung hriet ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Philip Kaisari biel a hung tlung chun, a inchûktirhai kuomah, “Mihaiin Mihriem Naupa hi tu am a nih an ti a?” tiin ân dawn a.
Anni chun, “Ṭhenkhatin, ‘Baptistu Johan an ti che a,’ ṭhenkhatin, ‘Elija’, ṭhenkhatin, ‘Jeremia amanih, zâwlnei tu amanih’ an ti che” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “An leh, nangnîn tu am a nih in mi ti a?” a ta.
Simon Peterin, “Krista Pathien hring Naupa chu I nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Simon Bar-Jona, i hamṭha ie; tisa le thisenin ân hriettir che a ni si naw a, ka Pa vâna mîn ân hriettir lem che a nih.
Chun, nang Peter i nih ti ka hril che; hi lungpui chunga hin ka kohran rem ka ta, mithi khuo kul kawtkhârhai chun chu chu ngam naw ni hai.
Vân ram chabihai pêng ka ti che a, hnuoi chunga iengkhawm i phuor taphawt vânah phuor ning a ta; hnuoi chunga iengkhawm i sût taphawt chu vânah sût ning a tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chu hnunga chun Krista a ni ti tukhawm hril lo dingin inchûktirhai chu a ti tlat a.

Chu chena inthawk chun, Isûn Jerusalema a fe dingzie dâm, upahai, thiempu lalhai, Dân inchûktirtuhaia inthawka thil tamtak a tuor dingzie dâm, sukhluma a um dingzie dâm le ni thum nia keithoa a um dingzie dâm chu a inchûktirhai chu ân hriettir phut ta a.
Chun, Peter chun ama chu a tumin a ṭhuoi a, “Lalpa, Pathienin lunginsiet raw se che!; chuong chu i chungah tlung naw tawp a tih,” tiin a kâwk ta a.
Ama ruok chu a ngha a, Peter kuoma chun, “Setan, ka hnungah fe rawh, keia ta dingin tlûkna i nih; Pathien thil ngaituo lovin mihriem thil i ngaituo lem a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a închûktirhai kuomah, “Tukhawmin mi zui a nuom chun, mâni inhnâwlin, a kraws putin, mi zui raw se.
Tukhawm a hringna hum nuom taphawt chun chân a tih; tukhawm keia leia hringna chân phawt chun hum a tih.
Mîn khawvêl hi a pumin nei sien, ama hringna chân si sienla, a ta dingin ieng am ṭhahnem a ta? Annawleh, mîn a hringna sikin ieng am pêng a ta?
Mihriem Naupa hi a vântirkohai leh, a Pa ropuinaa inthuomin a hung ding a ni si a; chu pha chun mi tin an thilthaw ang peiin thung seng a tih.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hitaka ngîr a ṭhen hi, Mihriem Naupa a rama a hung an hmu hmakhat chun, thina intem tawp lo ding an um,” a ti a.
Chun, ni ruk hnung chun Isûn Peter hai, Jakob hai, a unau Johan hai a ṭhuoi a, a tumin tlâng insângtakah a hang fepui a;
an hmaa chun a hmêl umzie chu a hung danglam ta a; a hmai nisa angin a hung var a; a silfênhai chu vûr angin a hung vâr ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, Mosie le Elija an hung inlâr a, ama chu an inbiekpui a.
Chun, Peterin Isu a biek a, “Lalpa, ei ta dingin hitaka um hi a ṭha; i nuom chun hitaka hin bâwkte pathum khâwng ka ta; i ta dingin pakhat, Mosie ta dingin pakhat, Elija ta dingin pakhat,” a ti a.
Inchûktirhai chun chu chu an hrietin bawkkhupin an tlu a, an ṭi ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, Isûn anni chu a hung them a, “Tho unla, ṭi naw ro,” a ta.
Chun, an hang dâk a, Isu chau naw chu tukhawm an hmu ta naw a.
Chun, tlânga inthawka an ṭum lai chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Mihriem Naupa hi mithi laia inthawka a thonâwk hmakhat chu in thil hmu kha tukhawm hril naw ro,” tiin thu a pêk ta a.
Ama chun, “Elija chu a hung ding hrim a nih, tinrêng siem ṭha bawk a tih.
Chu phingle chun inchûktirhai chun, Baptistu Johan thu an kuomah a hril a ni ti an lo hriet ta a.
Chun, mipui kuom an hung tlung chun, mi pakhat a kuomah a hung a, a hmaa dingṭhaṭhuonin,
“Lalpa, ka naupa saw lunginsiet rawh, hringawl invawi a na, a tuor nasa êm el; vawi tamtak meiah a tlu hlak, vawi tamtak tuiah a tlu bawk hlak a nih.
I închûktirhai kuomah ka hung ṭhuoi a, an sukdam thei si naw a,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn, “Ruolthar ringna nei loa kawmawhai, ieng chen am in kuomah um ka ta, ieng chen am ngai thei ka ti cheu a? Ama chu ka kuoma hin hung ṭhuoi ro,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Isûn khawhri chu a hal a, a sûnga inthawk chun a suok ta a; chu dâr chena inthawk chu naupang chu a hung dam ta a.
Chun, inchûktirhai chu a tumin Isu kuomah an hung a, “Iengdinga keinîn kan hnawt dawk thei naw am a na?” an ta.
[Amiruokchu, hieng ang hi ṭawngṭai le bunghei chau naw chun a suok thei nawh]”
Chun, Galili rama an hung inkhâwm laiin, Isûn an kuomah, “Mihriem Naupa hi mihriemhai kuta inmantirin a um ding a nih;
chun, sukhlum an ta, chun, ni thum nia chun keithoin um a tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, an lungngai ta bêk bêk a.

Chun, inah a va lût chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Simon, iengtin am i ngai a? Hnuoia lalhai hin leiman le sie chi hran hranhai hi tuhaia inthawkin am an dâwl hlak a? An nauhaia inthawkin am, mi danghaia inthawkin?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, Peterin, “Mi dang kuomah,” a ti phingleh, Isûn a kuomah, “Chuong a ni si chun nauhai chu an âwl ni naw ni.
Nisienlakhawm, nang dîlah va fe la, ngakuoi inchie la, nga hung suok hmasa chu man rawh; chun, a bau i keika phingleh tangka
Ama chun, naupangte a ko a, anni lai ân ngîrtir a,
Chuongchun, tukhawm hi naupangte anga inngaitlâwm taphawt, ama chu vân rama chun ropuitak a tih.
Chun, tukhawm ka hming leia hieng ang naupangte pakhat lâwm taphawt chu keia mi lâwm nîng a tih.

“Amiruokchu, tukhawm hieng a mi ringtu mi chînhai laia pakhat khawm suola sukthlu taphawt chu, a rîngah bu râwtnawina lung lientak inhlîtirin tuisuoriet inthûktakah thlâk dai hai sien a ta dingin ṭha lem a tih.
“Tlûknahai leiin khawvêl chung a rik de! tlûknahai chu hung um ding chu a nih; nisienlakhawm, tlûkna inumtirtu chung chu a rik!

Chun, i kutin amanih, i kein amanih a sukthlûk che chun, tan la, pei dai rawh; kut pahni amanih, ke pahni amanih neia kumkhaw meia peia um nêk chun, piengsuolin amanih, ke baiin amanih hringnaa lût i ta dingin a ṭha lem.
“Hieng mi chîn laia pakhat khawm hi hmusit naw dingin fîmkhur ro; an vântirkohaiin vânah ka Pa vâna mi hmêl an hmu rawp hlak ti ka hril cheu hi,”
“Ieng angin am in ngai a? Mi tukhawmin berâm za nei sienla, an laia pakhat invâk hmang sienla, sâwmkuo le pakuo chu mâksan a, tlânghaiah hang fein, ân hmang chu a zawng naw ding am a nih?
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, a hmu nâwk hlau chun, sâwmkuo le pakuo ân vâk hmang nawhai chunga nêk chun a chungah lâwm lem a tih.
Chuong ang bawkin, hieng mi chînhai laia pakhat bohmang khawm hi in Pa vâna mi dit zâwng a ni nawh.
“Chun, i unauin i chungah thil suksuol ta sienla, fe la, ama le nang chau hrietah a suolnaa chun kâwk rawh, i thu a ngai chun i unau chu i hne ni tâng a tih.
Chun, anni khawm chu a ngai nuom naw chun, kohranah intlun el rawh; chun, kohran thu khawm a ngai naw chun ama chu i ta dingin Jentail le siedâwltu ang ni raw se.
“Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hnuoi chunga hin nangni laia mi pahni amanih an thil hni chunga an inthuruol chun, ka Pa vâna mi thawpêkin um an tih.
Mi pahni amanih, pathum amanih, ka hminga an inkhâwmna taphawta chun anni lai ka um si hlak a,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “ ‘Vawi sari chenin,’ ka ti naw che, ‘Vawi sari hmun sâwmsari chenin,’ ka ti lem che a nih.
“Chuleichun, vân ram chu, laltak tu amanih, a suokhai kuoma sum chanchin sukfel tumtu le chun hrilkhi a nih.
Chun, a hang sukfel hlim chun, mi pakhat talent sing khat bat a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
Pêk ding a nei naw leiin, a pu chun a nuhmei leh, a inei po po leh zawra thung ding thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, a suokpa chun, ‘Pu ka chungah za la ngai phawt la, arêngin pe vawng ka ti che,’ tiin bawkkhupin chibai a bûk a.
Chuongchun, suok neitupa chun a lunginsiet ta bêk bêk a, ân thla a, a bat chu a ngaidam ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, chu suok chu a va fe suok a, a suok chanpui laia pakhat, a duli
Chuongchun, a suok chanpui chu a bawkkhup a, ‘Ka chungah za la ngai phawt la, la pêng ka ti che,’ tiin a ngên rak a.
Nisienlakhawm, a nuom naw a; a ibat chu a tlâk hmakhat chu intângna inah a va khum ta a.
Chuongchun, a suok chanpuihai chun a thilthaw chu an hmuin, an lungngai bêk bêk a; a thilthaw po pohai chu an pu an va hril ta a.
Chu phingleh a pu chun a ko a, a kuomah, ‘Suok rilo, i mi hni rak leiin i bat po po kha ka ngaidam che a na,
ka lunginsiet che ang khan nang khawmin i suok chanpui i lunginsiet ve ding a ni naw am a nih?’
Chun, a pu chu a lunginsen a, a ibat po po a thung hmakhat chu sawisatuhai kuomah a pêk ta a.
Mi tinin in lungril taka in unauhai in ngaidam naw chun, ka Pa vâna mi khawmin chuong ang bawkin in chungah thaw vêng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chuong thu chu a hril zo phingleh Galili rama inthawk a suok a, Jordan vadung râla Judai rama chun a va fe a;
chun, mipui nasatakin an zui a; chutaka chun anni chu a sukdam ta a.
Chun, Pharisaihai a kuomah an hung a, ama fie dingin, “Ieng lei khawmin mîn a nuhmei a mâk a thieng am?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Hi thu hi in tiem ngai naw am a nih? A tîra inthawka anni siemtu khan nuhmei le pasalin a siem le,
Chuongchun, pahni an ni ta naw a, tisa pumkhat an ni ta lem a nih. Chuleiin, Pathienin a izawm ta chu mihriemin ṭhe naw raw se,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Mosiein in lungril ngar leiin annâwm in nuhmeihai mâk a phal; nisienlakhawm, a tîra inthawkin chuong ang a ni si nawh.
Inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei kawngah pasal thu chuong ang a ni si chun, innei a ṭha naw ie,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun an kuomah, “Chu thu chu mi nazawngin an pawm thei nawh, a ipêkhai chau naw chun.

Mi tillâk an nu phîng sûnga inthawka chuong anga insieng hrim an um a; mi tillâk mihriem kuta lâk khawm an um bawk a; mi tillâk vân ram leia tillâka insiem fâwm khawm an um bawk a. Tukhawm a pawm thei taphawt chun pawm raw se,” a ta.
Chun, an chunga a kut innghat a, a iṭawngṭaipêk dingin a kuomah naupangtêhai an hung ṭhuoi a; chun, inchûktirhai chun an lo hal a.
Isu ruok chun, “Naupangtêhai ka kuomah inhungtir unla, khap naw ro; vân ram chu hieng ang mi ta a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, an chungah a kut ân nghat a, chutaka inthawk chu a fe ta a.
Chun, mi pakhat a hung a, a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, kumkhuoa hringna ka nei theina dingin thil ṭha ieng am thâwng ka ta?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Thil ṭha thu iengdinga i mîn dawn? Ṭha chu pakhat chau a um, iengkhawm ni sienla, hringnaa lût i nuom chun thupêkhai chu zâwm rawh,” a ta.
Tlangvâl chun a kuomah, “Chuong thu po po chu ka zâwm hlak, ieng am ka la bâk a?” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Ṭha famkima um i nuom chun, fe la, i nei chu zawr la, pasiehai kuomah pe rawh; chuongchun, vânah ro nei i tih; chun hung la, mi hung zui rawh,” a ta.
Tlangvâl ruok chun chuong thu chu a hrietin lungngaitakin a fe hmang ta a; sum tamtak nei a ni leiin.
Chun, Isûn a inchûktirhai kuoma chun, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, mi hausa ta dingin vân rama lût chu intak tak a nih.
Ka hril nâwk cheu hi, mi hausa Pathien rama a lût nêkin, sanghâwngsei ṭhimnaa a lût thleng a awl lem,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun chu chu an hriet chun, mak an ti nasa bêk bêk a, “Tu am sandam ni thei a ta?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn anni chu a en a, an kuomah, “Chu chu mihriem ithaw ruol a ni naw a; Pathien ding ruok chun iengkim thaw thei a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Peterin a kuomah, “Ngai ta, keinin iengkim mâksanin kan zui ta che a; ieng am hmûng kan ta le?” a ta, ân dawn a.

Chun, mi tukhawm inhai amanih, unauhai amanih, farnuhai amanih, pa amanih, nu amanih, nuhmei amanih, nauhai amanih, ramhai amanih, ka hming leia fesan taphawt chun, a let za hmûng an ta, kumkhuoa hringna chang bawk an tih.
“Vân ram chu in neitupa, a grêp huona sinthawtuhai ruoi dinga zîngkâr inhmataka suok ang chu a ni si a.
Chun, ama chun, sinthawtuhai le chun ni khata duli
Chun, vairik lai vêlin a va suok a, mi dang dâwr hmuna ngîr mei meihai a hmu a;
an kuomah, ‘Nangni khawm grêp huonah va fe ta u, a mawi tâwk ang pei pêng ka ti cheu,’ a ta. Chuongchun, an fe ta a.
Chun, nisa inding vêl le zân bu suong pha vêl lai chun a va suok nâwk a; chuong ang bawkin a thaw nâwk a.
Chun, zântieng chun a va suok a; mi dang lo ngîrhai chu a hmu a; an kuomah, ‘Iengdinga sûnnithlâka hitaka ngîr mei mei cheu am?’ a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, ‘Tukhawmin an mi ruoi naw leiin,’ an ta. Ama chun an kuomah, ‘Nangni khawm grêp huonah va fe ta u,’ a ta.
Chun, zântienga a iruoihai chu an hung chun duli an hmu seng a.
Chun, a hmasatakhai an hung chun hmu tam deu an inring a; nisienlakhawm, anni khawm chun duli bawk an hmu seng a.
Chuongchun, an lâk lai chun, in neitupa chungah an chier a,
‘Hieng a nuhnungtakhai hin darkâr khat chau an thaw a, keini sûn rinum le khawsa dotuhai tlukin i siem si a,’ an ta.
Ama ruok chun anni laia mi pakhat kuomah, ‘Ruola, i chungah iengkhawm ka suksuol lêm; duli hlaw dingin ei inrem naw am a nih?
I ta kha la la fe el rawh; nang ka ipêk che ang bawk kha, hi a nuhnung tak kuoma khawm hin ka pêk nuom a nih.
Ka ta nâknâk chu ka nuom ang anga ka thaw a thieng naw am a nih? Annawleh, kei ka ṭhat leiin nangin i thîk am a nih?’ tîn a dawn a.
Chun, Isu Jerusalema a hang fe laiin, inchûktirhai sâwm le pahni chu a tumin a ṭhuoi a, lampuia chun an kuomah,
“Ngai ta u, Jerusalemah ei fe ding a ni hi. Mihriem Naupa hi thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai kutah inmantirin a um ding a nih; chun, anni chun thi dingin a chungah thu sukthlûng an ta;
nuiza siemna dinga hmang ding le, vuok ding le krawsa hemde dingin Jentailhai kuomah pêng an tih; chun, ni thum niin keithoin um a tih,” a ta.
Chu lai chun, Zebedai naupasalhai nu chu, a naupahai ṭhuoiin a kuomah a hung a, chibai a bûk a, ieng amanih a hni a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ieng am i dit a?” a ta. Ama chun a kuomah, “Hieng ka naupahai pahni hi i ramah i changtiengah pakhat, i vawitiengah pakhat an ṭhung theina dingin thu pe ta la,” a ta.
Isu ruok chun “In hni hi in hriet naw a nih, ka no dâwn ding chu in dâwn thei am a nih?” a ta, a dawn a. Annîn a kuomah, “Thei e,” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka no chu dâwn ngei in tih; nisienlakhawm, ka changtieng le ka vawitienga ṭhung ding thu chu keia pêk ding a ni naw a, ka Pa ibuotsaipêkhai ta ding ni lem a tih,” a ta.
Chun, sâwm hai chun chu chu an lo hrietin unau pahni hai chunga chun an lunginsen ta a.
Isu ruok chun anni chu a ko a, “Jentailhai chunga rorêltuhai chu an chungah an inlal bêk bêk hlak a, an mi lienhai chun an chungah thu an nei bêk bêk hlak ti in hriet.
Mihriem Naupa hi rawngbâwlpêka um dinga hung a ni naw a, rawngbâwl ding le mi tamtak intlanna dinga, a hringna pe lem dinga a hung ang hin,” a ta.
Chun, Jerikoa inthawka an suok laiin mipui nasatakin ama an zui a.
Chun, ngai ta, mitdel pahni lam sîra ṭhunghai chun Isu a fe ti an hriet phingleh, “Lalpa, David Naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin an khêk a.
Chun, mipui chun to dingin an hal a; nisienlakhawm, anni chun “Lalpa, David Naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin an khêk nâwk zuol a.
Chun, Isu a ngîr a, anni a ko a, “In chungah ieng ang am ka thaw in nuom a?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, mit var kan nuom,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Isûn a lunginsiet bêk bêk a, an mit a them a; chuongchun, an hmu thei nghâl ta a, ama chu an zui ta a.
Chun, Jerusalem an tlung dinga Bethphage khuo, Oliv tlâng chu an tlung chun Isûn a închûktirhai pahni a tir a,
an kuomah, “In hma zâwna khuoa sawn va fe unla, sabengtung thlung, a kâwla a tê leh hmûng in ta; sût unla, ka kuomah hung kei ro.
Tukhawmin in kuomah, iengkhawm an lo hril chun, ‘Lalpain a mamaw a nih,’ tîng in ta; chun, ama chun hung tîr nghâl el a tih,” a ta.
Zâwlnei baua hieng thu hrila um ta kha a hung tlung theina dingin chuong chu a hung um ta a nih.
Sabengtung chungah, sabengtungtê chunga ngeia chuongin,
I kuomah a hung ding a nih,’ tiin,
Zion naunu chu hril rawh,”
ti hi.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chu an va fe a, Isûn an kuoma thu a pêk ang ngeiin an thaw a,
sabengtung le a tê chu an hung kei a, an chunga chun puonhai an pha a, ama chun a chuongpha ta a.
Chun, mipui laia a tam lemin lampuia chun an puonhai an pha a, mi dangin thinga sâwlhna an sât a, lampuiah an pha bawk a.
“David naupa kuomah Hosanna!
Lalpa hminga hung chu inpâkin um raw se!
Achunghnungtaka khin, Hosanna!”
tiin an khêk a.
Chun, Jerusalem a lût chun, a khuoin, “Hi mipa hi tu am a na?” tiin an inhnîng sup sup a.
Chun, mipuihai chun, “Hi hi zâwlnei Isu, Galili rama, Nazaretha mi chu a nih,” an ta.
Chun, Isu Pathien biekina chun a va lût a, biekina iengkhat zawrtuhai le inchawtuhai po po chu a hnawt dawk a, tangka thlengtuhai dawkânhai le vaṭhu zawrhai ṭhungphahai dâm chu a nam thlûkpêk a,
Chun, Pathien biekina chun mitdelhai le kebaihai a kuomah an hung a, anni a sukdam a.
Nisienlakhawm, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun a thilmak thawhai le, biekina, “David naupa kuomah Hosanna” tia, naupang khêkhai chu an hmuin, an lungninaw bêk bêk a,
‘Nautêhai le nene ne laihai baua suok chun,
Inpâkna i sukṭhafamkim tah,’
ti hi in tiem ngai naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, anni chu a mâksan a, khawpuia inthawk chun a suok a, Bethaniah a fe a; chutaka chun a riek ta a.
Chun, zîngkâra khawpui tienga a kîr nâwk laiin a phîng a hung ṭâm ta a.
Chun, lam sîra chun theichang kûng a hmu a, a va pan a, a hna chau naw chu iengkhawm a hmu naw a.

Chun, a kuomah, “Kumkhawtluongin lo ra ta dêr naw rawh,” a ta. Chun, theichang chu a thêm nghâl el ta a. Chun, inchûktirhai chun chu chu an hmuin, “Iengtiziea theichang hi a thêm nghâl el am a na?” tiin mak an ti hle a.
Chun, iengkim ringtaka ṭawngṭaia in hni taphawt chu hmûng in tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Pathien biekina a lût hnunga ân chûktir lai chun, thiempu lalhai le vântlâng upahai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Tu thuin am hieng thil hi i thaw a? Tuin am thu a pêk che a?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Kei khawmin thu bau khat indawn vêng ka ti cheu, chu chu in mi hril chun tu thuin am hieng thilhai hi ka thaw, hril vêng ka ti cheu.
Johan baptisma kha khâwlaia mi thu am a na? Vâna mi thu am a ni mihriem thu?” tiin, ân dawn a. Chun, an inngaituo a, “Vâna mi thu, ei ti chun, ‘Iengdinga a thu in awi naw am a na’ mi ti sîng a ta.
Chun, ‘Mihriem thu’ ei ti chun mipui chu ei ṭi si a; mi po poin Johan chu zâwlneiin an ngai si a,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Isu an dawn a, “Kan hriet nawh,” an ta. Ama khawm chun an kuomah, “Kei khawmin tu thuin am hieng thil hi ka thaw a hril bîk naw ning cheu.
“Nisienlakhawm, nangnîn iengtin am in ngai a? Mi tuin amanih naupasal pahni a nei a. Pakhat kuoma chun a va fe a, ‘Ka nau, vawisûn grêp huonah sin va thaw rawh,’ a ta.
Ama chun, ‘Ka nuom nawh,’ a ta, a dawn a; nisienlakhawm, a nakie chun a lungril ân thleng a, a fe ta a.
Chun, pakhat kuoma khawm chun a va fe a, chuong ang bawkin a va ta. Ama chun, ‘Pu, fêng ka tih’ a ta, a dawn a, nisienlakhawm, a fe ta si naw a.

Chuonghai pahni atu lem chun am an pa dit zâwng an thaw a?” a ta. Anni chun, “A hmasa lem chun,” an ta. Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, siedâwltuhai le nawchizawrhai chun, Pathien ramah an lût khal ding cheu a ni hi.
Chun, a ra lo a hun ding chun, a ra lo dingin lo enkawltuhai kuomah a suokhai a tir a.
Chun, lo enkawltuhai chun a suokhai chu an lo man a, pakhat an vuok a, pakhat an sukhlum a, pakhat lungin an dêng a.
Chun, suok dang a hmasa pâwl nêka tam lem a tir nâwk a; annihai chunga khawm an hmaa mihai an thaw ang bawkin an lo thaw nâwk a.
Chu hnunga ruok chun, ‘Ka naupa hi chu inza ngei an tih,’ tiin a naupa chu an kuomah a tir a.
Nisienlakhawm, lo enkawltuhai chun a naupa chu an lo hmu phingleh, ‘Hi mipa hi rohluotu ding chu a nih; that ei tiu a, a ro hluo ding hi nei pêk ei tiu,’ an ta.
Chuongchun, ama chu an man a, grêp huona inthawk chun an pei dawk a, an sukhlum ta a.
Chuongchun, grêp huon neitupa a hung pha chun chuong lo enkawltuhai chunga chun iengtin am thaw tâng a ta le?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Chuong mi suolhai chu rimsitakin sukbohmang a ta, grêp huon chu lo enkawltu dang, a lo pha po leh a rahai chu a kuomah pe pei dinghai kuomah thlohlaw dingin pêng a tih,” an ta.
‘In bâwltuhai lung dit naw kha,
Chu ngei chu a kia lung ṭhangkai tak a hung ni tah.
Chu chu Lalpa thaw a na,
Ei mithmua hin a mak a nih,’
ti hi in tiem ngai naw am a nih?
“Chuleichun, ‘Pathien ram chu in kuoma inthawkin lâk hmang nîng a ta, ra insuo ding hnam kuomah pêk nîng a tih,’ ti ka hril cheu hi.
Chun, chu lung chunga tlu chu kawi dar a ta; a idel lem chu râwt nawi a tih”
Chun, thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai chun a tekhithuhai chu an hrietin, anni chungthu a hril ti an hriet ta a.
Chun, ama chu man an tum a; nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chu an ṭi si a, zâwlneiin an ruot leiin.
Chun, Isûn anni a biek a, an kuomah tekhithuin a hril nâwk a,
“Vân ram chu lal tu amanih, a naupa ta dinga inneina ruoiṭhena siem le chun tekhi a nih.
Chun, inneina ruoiṭhe fa dinga a fielhai chu ko dingin a suokhai a tir a; nisienlakhawm, an hung nuom naw a.

Chun, ama chun, ‘Ka ifielhai kuoma khan, ngai ta u, ka ruoi chu kân zo tah; ka bâwngchalhai le ka ran châwm thauhai ka that a, iengkim inzo a ni tah, inneina ruoi fa dingin hung ta ro ti ro,’ tiin suok dang a tir nâwk a.
Nisienlakhawm, an lo ngaisak naw a, an fe hmang el ta a, pakhat chu loah a fe a, pakhat chu sumdâwngnaah,
mi danghai chun a suokhai chu an man a, inzakumtakin an siem a, an sukhlum el ta a.
Chuongchun, lal chu a lunginsen ta a; a sipaihai a tir a, chuong tuolthathai chu a sukbo a, an khuo khawm a rawpêk ta a.
“Chun, a suokhai kuoma chun, ‘Inneina ruoi inzo a ni tah; fielhai ruok kha chu fa tlâk an ni nawh.
Chuongchun, lampêt ṭhuomhaiah fe unla, mi in hmu taphawt inneina ruoi fa dingin fiel ro,’ a ta.

Chuongchun, chu suokhai chu an suok a, lampuihaia chun an va fe a, an hmu taphawt, mi suol le mi ṭhahai khawm an ṭhuoi khâwm ta vawng a; chuongchun, inneina ruoi pindan chu mi fiel haiin an lo sip ta a.
“Nisienlakhawm, lal chu mi fielhai en dinga a hung lût chun, inneina puon sil lo mi pakhat chutaka chun a hmu a.
Chuongchun, a kuomah, ‘Ruola, iengtizie am a na, inneina puon boin hitaka hin i hung lût el a?’ a ta. Chun, ama chu a to zing a.
“Fielhai chu tamtak an na, thlang hai ruok chu tlâwmte an nih” a ta.
Chu lai chun, Pharisaihai chun a thu hrila an man theina zie ding an vân râwn a,

Chun, an inchûktirhai, Herod pâwla mihai leh an tir a; chuonghai chun, “Inchûktirtu, mi indiktak i na, titakzetin Pathien thu kawng în chûktir hlak a, pawisak bîk tukhawm i nei nawh ti kan hriet a; tukhawm thlierbîk i nei si naw a.
Chuongchun, ieng angin am i ngai a? mi hril raw khai! Kaisar kuomah sie chawi hi a thieng am, a thieng naw?” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn an suolzie chu a lo hriet a, “Vervêkhai, ieng dinga in mi fie?
Sie tangka chu mîn entir ro,” a ta. Chun, a kuomah duli
Ama chun an kuomah, “Hi hi tu lim le tu hming am a na?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Kaisar,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “A ni sa chun, Kaisar thilhai chu Kaisar kuomah pe unla, Pathien thilhai chu Pathien kuomah pe ta unla,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu an hrietin mak an ti hle a, ama an mâksan a, an fe ta dai a.
Âwle, keini lai sal sari an um a; a upa takin nuhmei a nei a, a thi a; chun, suon a nei naw leiin a nuhmei chu a unaupa ihluo dingin a mâksan a;
chuongang bawkin a pahnina leh, a pathumna leh, a pasarina chenin an hluo seng a.
Chun, an rênga an thi hnung chun nuhmei khawm chu a thi ta a.
Chuongchun, thonâwk pha chun pasarihai lai chun atu nuhmei tak am nîng a ta? an rêngin an nei si a,” tiin an indawn a.
Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Pathien Lekha thu le, Pathien thilthawtheina in hriet naw leiin in ngai suol hlak a nih.
Thonâwknaah nuhmei pasal innei ta naw ni hai a, vâna vântirkohai ang an ni ta lem ding a nih in sawnnaw.
Chun, mithi thonâwkna thua Pathienin in kâwla hienga a hril kha in tiem naw am a nih?
Chun, mipuihai chun chu chu an hrietin, a thu inchûktir chu mak an ti hle a.
Pharisaihai ruok chun, Isûn Saddukaihai a sêldawng ti an hrietin an inkhâwm ta a.
Chun, anni laia mi pakhat dânhretu hin ama fiena dingin,
“Inchûktirtu, Dân thua chun ieng thupêk am a ropuitak a?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chu chu thupêk ropui le pawimaw tak a nih.
Chun, Pharisaihai chu an inkhâwm lai chun, Isûn anni chu thu ân dawn a,
“Krista chu ieng angin am in ngai a, tu naupa am a na?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “David naupa,” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Iengtiziein am David chun Thlarauin ‘Lalpa’ tiin,
Ka chang tieng ṭhung rawh;
I hmêlmahai i kepha hnuoia ka sie hmakhat chu,’
a ti a? a ta.
“David chun ama chu, ‘Lalpa,’ a ti si chun iengtin am a naupa ni thei a ta?” a ta.
Chun, tukhawmin bau khat khawma an dawn thei ta naw a; chu ni chena inthawk chu tukhawmin thu dang hrim hrim khawma an indawn ngam ta nawh.
Chun, Isûn mipuihai le a inchûktirhai kuomah thu a hril a,
“Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chu Mosie ṭhungphaah an ṭhung hlak.
Chuleichun, thaw dinga an hril taphawt cheu chu zâwm unla, thaw pei ro, an thilthaw ang ruok chu thaw ve naw ro, hril chu an hril hlak a, an thaw ngai si naw a.
Phurrik rinumtakhai an siem a, mihai an hnâwk hlak a; anni ruok chun an kutpâr khawmin an tâwk nuom nawh.
ruoiṭhenaah hmun ṭhatakhai, inkhâwmna inah ṭhungpha ṭhatakhai,
dâwr hmuna chibai bûkhai, mihaiin, ‘Rabbi’ an itihai an ngaina hlak si a.
“Nangni ruok chu, ‘Rabbi’, tia koin um naw ro; in inchûktirtu chu pakhat chau a nih; nangni po po chu unau in ni si a.
Chun, hnuoi chunga hin tukhawm, ‘Pa,’ ti naw ro; in Pa chu pakhat chau a nih, vâna mi khi.
‘ṭhuoituhai’ tia ko khawmin um naw ro; in ṭhuoitu chu pakhat chau a nih, Krista chu.

“Nisienlakhawm, nangni Dân inchûktirtu le Pharisai vervêkhai, in chung a rik; vân ram lampui chu mihai in khâr pêk si a; nangni hlak in lût si naw a, mi a lût dinghai khawm in inlûttir phal ngai si naw a.
[Nangni Dân inchûktirtu le Pharisai vervêkhai, in chung a rik! Hmeithaihai sum in fâk zo a, mi hlêmna dingin sâwttak tak in ṭawngṭai a; chuleiin, thiemnaw changna nasa nâwkzuol hmûng in tih.]

Nangni Dân inchûktirtu le Pharisai vervêkhai in chung a rik; Saphun pakhat khawm siem dingin tuisuoriet le khawmuol in fe huol si a, chun, chuong anga a hung um phaleh ama chu nangni lethni rauin Hremhmun naupaah in siem hlak.
“Nangni ṭhuoitu mitdel, ‘Tu- khawm Pathien biekin sâla inkhâm po chu iengkhawm a ni nawh; tukhawm Pathien biekina rângkachak sâla inkhâm po chun hlen ding a nih,’ tituhai, in chung a rik!
Nangni mi invêt, mitdelhai, a ieng am a ropui lem a, rângkachak am, Pathien biekin rângkachak sukthiengtu chu?
Chun, ‘Tukhawm maichâm sâla inkhâm po chu iengkhawm a ni nawh, a chunga thilpêk sâla inkhâm po ruok chun hlen ding a nih,’ in ta.
Nangni mitdelhai! A ieng am a ropui lem a, thilpêk am, maichâm thilpêk sukthiengtu chu?
Chuongchun, tukhawm mai- châm sâla inkhâm taphawt chun maichâm le a chunga um po po sâlin ân khâm hlak.
Tukhawm Pathien biekin sâla inkhâm taphawt chun, Pathien biekin le a sûnga um chu sâlin ân khâm hlak.
Tukhawm vân sâla inkhâm taphawt chun Pathien ṭhungpha le a chunga ṭhung chu sâlin ân khâm hlak a nih.
Nangni ṭhuoitu mitdel, thosi thlitfaia sanghâwngsei lem si hlakhai!
“Dân inchûktirtu le Pharisai vervêkhai, in chung a rik! no le thlêng puo tieng in sâwp fai a, a sûng ruok chu hlêprûkna le insûm nawnain a sip si a.
Nang Pharisai mitdel, no le thlêng sûng tieng chu sâwp fai hmasa rawh, a puo tieng khawm a hung fai theina dingin.”
Nangni khawm chuong ang takin puo tieng chun, mihriem mithmua chun feltakin in inlang hlak, in sûng tienga ruok chun vervêkna le suolnain in sip si a.
“Nangni Dân inchûktirtu le Pharisai vervêkhai, in chung a rik! zâwlnei thlân inhai in bâwl a, mi fel thlânhai khawm in cheimawi a,
‘Ei puhai dam lai khan lo um ve inla khawm, zâwlneihai thisen an insuonaa chun ṭhang ve nâwm ei nih,’ in ti hlak a.
Chuongchun, zâwlneihai thattuhai nau in nih ti in inhriettir a nih.
In puhai inkhîna chu suksip nghâl nghâl ro.

“Ngai ta u, chuleichun, in kuomah zâwlneihai, mi varhai, inchûktirtuhai, ka hung tir ding a nih; ṭhenkhat sukhlum in ta, krawsah hemdêng in tih, ṭhenkhat inkhâwmna inhaiah savun hruiin vuong in ta, khaw tinah suknawmna zui pei in tih.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, chuong po po chu tulai ruoltharhai chunga hin la tlung a tih.

“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem! zâwlneihai thattu, i kuoma an hung tirhai lunga lo dêng hlumtu, ârpuiin a têhai a thla hnuoia a awp khâwm angin, i nauhai vawi iengzât am awp khâwm ka tum a! Nisienlakhawm, in nuom si nawh.
En ta u, in in chu a ruoka mâksan cheuin a um tah.
Chun, Isu Pathien biekina inthawk chun a suok a, a fe ding a na.

Chun, a inchûktirhai chu Pathien biekinhai inentir dingin a kuomah an hung a. Ama ruok chun, an kuomah, “Hieng po po hi in hmu maw? Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, sukchim loa lung inthuo hrim hrim hitaka hin um naw ni,” a ta, a dawn a.

Chun, Oliv tlânga a ṭhung laiin inchûktirhai chu anni khâtin a kuomah an hung a. “Chuong chu iengtik am hung um a ta? I hung nâwkna le khawvêl tâwpna inchikna chu ieng am nîng a ta? mi hril rawh,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Tukhawmin an hlêm nawna ding cheuin fîmkhur ro.
Mi tamtakin, ‘Krista chu ka nih,’ tiin keia hming sâlin hung an ta, mi tamtak an hlêm ding a ni si a.
Chun, indo thu le indo thuthang la hrieng in ta; in lunginzîng nawna dingin fîmkhur ro; chuong chu a hung tlung ding hrim a nih; nisienlakhawm, tâwpna chu la ni hri naw nih.
Hnam tum le hnam tum indo an ta, ram tum le ram tum indo an ta; hmun tum tumah ṭâmhai tlâng a ta, simkhawleihnuoihai inhnîng a tih.
Chuong po po chu nauhase phutna a nih.
Chu phâ chun mi tamtak tlûng an ta, inmantir tuo tâwl an ta; intheida tuo tâwl an tih.
Zâwlnei tehlêm tamtak khawm hung suok an ta, mi tamtak hlêm an tih.
Chun, suol a la pung ding a ni leiin mi tam lem hmangaina chu la dei a tih.
“Chun, hi Ram Chanchin Ṭha hi hnam po poin an hrietna dingin khawvêl po poah hrilin um a tih; chu zoa chun tâwpna chu la tlung a tih.
Juda rama umhai chu tlânga dâm tlân hmang raw hai se;
chun, loa um chu a puon inchû dingin kîr nâwk naw raw se;
Chuong nia chun inrâihai le nautesen pawmhai chung chu rik a tih!
Chun, in tlân hmang ding hun chu thlasik amanih, châwlni amania a hung tlung nawna dingin ṭawngṭai ro;
Chun, chuong nihai chu suktâwi ni naw sien chu mihriem hrim hrim damin suok naw ni hai; nisienlakhawm, thlanghai lei chun chuong nihai chu suktâwi nîng a tih.
“Chu phâ chun, tukhawmin in kuomah, ‘En ta, Krista chu hitaka hi a um,’ amanih, ‘Hiva hi,’ amanih an ti chun awi naw ro;
Krista tehlêm le zâwlnei tehlêmhai an hung suok ding a ni si a; thei hai sien la chu, thlanghai rau khawm an hlêm theina dingin inchikna le thilmak ropuitakhai thâwng an tih.
Ngai ta u, ka hril lâwk ta cheu hi.
Kâwl saktieng a hung inlep a, thlangtieng chen khawmin ân lang hlak. Mihriem Naupa hung nâwkna chu chuong ang chu a ni ding a ni si a.
Chun, a vântirkohai chu tawtawrâwt ri nasatak leh tir suok a tih. Anni chun a ithlanghai chu kâwl kil lia inthawkin, vân tâwpa inthawka a tâwp khing tieng chenin lâwr khâwm an tih.
“Chuongchun, theichang kûnga hin chu tekhithu chu inchûk ro. A kâu a hung indâwn a, a hna a hung inder chun, nipui a ni ding a nih ti in hriet.
Chuong ang bawkin nangni khawmin chuong po po chu in hmu phâ chun, ama chu a hung hnai ta a, kawtkhâr bulah a um ti hre ro.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, chuong po po chu a tlung kim hmakhat chu tulai ruoltharhai hi bo naw ni hai.
Hnuoi le vân bo a ta, ka thu ruok chu bo naw ni.
“Nisienlakhawm, chu ni le a phâ thu chu Pa chau naw chun, tukhawmin, vâna vântirkohai khawmin, Naupa khawmin an hriet nawh.
Chun, Noa damlai ang bawk khan Mihriem Naupa hung nâwkna chu nîng a tih.
Chuong ni tuilêt hmahai chun, Noa lawnga a lût ni chenin an fâkin an dâwn a, nuhmei pasal an innei hlak;
tui a hung lêt a, an rênga a lâk hmang vawng hmakhat chu iengkhawm an hriet naw a; Mihriem Naupa hung nâwkna chu chuong ang bawk chu nîng a tih.
Chu phâ chun, loah mi pahni um an ta, pakhat chu fe hmangpuiin um a ta; pakhat chu mâksanin um a tih.
Nuhmei pahni bu râwtnawina chun bu râwtnawiin um an ta, pakhat chu fe hmangpuiin um a ta; pakhat chu mâksanin um a tih.
Chuongchun, ngaiven ro, ieng ni am in Lalpa a hung ding in hriet si naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, hi hi hre ro, inru a hung ding pha in neituin hre sienla vêng a ta, a in inverpawptir naw ni.
Chuleiin, nangni khawm inring zingin um ro, in ring naw hunah Mihriem Naupa a hung din g a ni si a.
“Suok ringum vartak, a puin a hun po leh an bu chan ding sem pêk dinga a sûnghai chunga hotua a siem chu tu tak am nîng a ta le?
A pu a hung phâleh suok chuong anga thawa a hung hmu ding chu a hamṭha.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, a inei po po chungah hotûn siem a tih.
Amiruokchu, suok suol chun a lungrilin, ‘Ka pu a hung vak naw ding a nih,’ tiin,
a suok chanpuihai lo vaw ta sienla, mi inruihai kuomah fain dâwn sienla,
chu suok pu chu a ring naw niah, a hriet naw laiin hung a ta,
tum hni hung insuong a ta, mi vervêkhai chan ang hung inchangtir a tih; chutaka chun ṭap le harâwt chu um a tih.
Anni lai chun panga an var a, panga an invêt a.
Ân vêthai chun an khâwnvarhai an chawiin a tui an chawisa si naw a.
A varhai ruok chun an khâwnvartui bûrhaiah a tui thunin, khâwnvarhai leh an chawi a.
Chun, mo neitu chu a hung intak leiin, an rêngin an lo inlusu a, an lo in ta a.
Chun, zân rila chun, ‘Ngai ta u, mo neitu chu a hung ie! a tuok dingin hung suok ro khai,’ tiin khêkri a hung um ta a.
Chu phingle chun nunghâk inthienghai chu an tho vawng a, an khâwnvarhai chu an siemrêl a.
Chun, ân vêthai chun a varhai kuomah, ‘In khâwnvartui kha mi pe ro, kan khâwnvarhai a thi ding a nih,’ an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a varhai chun, ‘Keini le nangni ta dingin indai naw ni; a zawrtuhai kuomah fe unla, inchaw lem ro,’ tiin an dawn a.
Chun, inchaw dinga an fe hmang kâr chun, mo neitu chu a hung tlung ta a; chuongchun, ân zohai chu ama le chun inneina ruoi fa dingin an lût a; chun, kawt chu an khâr ta a.
Ama ruok chun, ‘Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, ka hriet naw cheu a nih,’ a ta, a dawn a.
Chuongchun, ngaiven ro, a ni le a hun chu in hriet si naw a.
Suok pakhat kuomah talent nga a pêk a, suok dang kuomah talent hni, suok dang kuomah talent khat: an thaw thei tâwk ding ang sengin a pêk a; chuongchun, a fe ta a.
Chun, talent nga dawngtu chu chuonghai chun a va sumdâwng nghâl ta a, talent nga dang a sukdawk ta a.
Chuong ang bawkin talent hni dawngtu khawm chun talent hni dang a sukdawk ta a.
Talent khat dawngtu ruok chu a va fe a, hnuoi a cho a, a pu tangka chu a thup hmang ta lem a.
“Chun, sâwttak hnungah chuong suokhai pu chu a hung a, an kuomah a sum chanchin a sukfel a.
Chuongchun, talent nga dawngtu chu a hung a, talent nga dang a hung chawi a, ‘Pu, nangin talent nga i mîn kawltir kha en ta, talent nga dang ka sukdawk,’ a ta.
A pu chun a kuomah, ‘Suok ṭha le ringum, i thaw ṭha ie! tlâwmte chungah ring i um a, tamtak chungah inumtir ka ti che, i pu lâwmnaah lût rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, talent hni dawngtu khawm chu a hung a, ‘Pu, nangin talent hni i mîn kawltir kha, en ta, talent hni dang ka sukdawk,’ a ta.
A pu chun a kuomah, ‘Suok ṭha le ringum, i thaw ṭha ie! tlâwmte chungah ring i um a, tamtak chungah inumtir ka ti che; i pu lâwmnaah lût rawh,’ a ta.
“Chun, talent khat kawltu khawm chu a hung a, ‘Pu, mi ti kher kher i nih ti ka hriet che; i tu nawnaa khawm i sîk hlak a, i the dar nawnaa khawm în khâwm hlak a nih;
Chuongchun, ka ṭi a, ka fe a, i talent kha hnuoiah ka thup hmang a, en ta, i ta ngai kha i hmu nâwk hi,’ a ta.
A pu chun a kuomah, ‘Suok suol le zawmthawpa, ka itu nawnaa khawm ka sîka, ka the dar nawnaa khawm kân khâwm ti i hriet maw?
Chuong a ni sa chun, ka tangka chu sumdâwngtuhai kuomah lo sie ding i ni ta an nâwm; chuongchun, ka hung nâwk hin ka ta hi a pung leh ka hmu nâwk ding a nih.
Chuongchun, a talent khat kha lâkpêk unla, talent sâwm neitu kuomah pe ro.
a hmaa chun hnam tin inkhâwm an tih; berâm chingtuin kêl laia a berâmhai a ṭhe angin anni rawi chu ṭhêng a ta;
berâmhai chu a changtieng sieng a ta, kêlhai ruok chu a vawi tieng sieng a tih.
“Chu phâ chun, Laltak chun a changtienga mihai kuomah, ‘Ka Pa vochuomhai, hung unla, khawvêl siem tîra inthawka, in ta dinga ram buotsai chu chang ro;
ka phîng a ṭâmin nangnîn fâk ding in mi pêk a, ka dang a chârin dâwn ding in mi pêk a; mikhuol ka niin in mîn tlung tir a;
saruok ka niin puon in mîn siltir a; ka damnaw a, in mi kan a, intâng inah ka umin in hung si a,’ la tîng a tih.
“Chu phâ chun, mi felhai chun, ‘Lalpa, iengtik âm phîngṭâmin kan hmu che a, fâk ding kan pêk che? dangchârin kan hmu chea dâwn ding kan pêk che?
Iengtik âm mikhuolin kan hmu che a kan intlungtir che? saruokin kan hmu chea puon kan insiltir che?
Iengtik âm damnawin amanih, intâng ina manih kan hmu chea i kuomah kan hung?’ tiin la dawn an tih.
Chun, Laltak chun an kuomah, ‘Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hieng ka unau chîntakhai laia mi pakhat chunga in thaw chu, ka chunga thaw in nih,’ tîn la dawn a tih.”
