“Chu zoa chun a vawitienga mihai kuoma khawm chun, ‘ṭawngsephurhai, kumkhuo mei diebol le a tirkohai ta dinga an buotsaia chun mi fe hmangsan ro;
ka phîng a ṭâmin nangnîn fâk ding in mi pêk naw a; ka dang a chârin nangnîn dâwn ding in mi pêk naw a,
mikhuol ka niin in mîn tlungtir naw a, saruok ka niin puon in mîn siltir naw a; damnaw le intâng ina ka umin in mi kan si naw a,’ la tîng a tih.
Chu phâ chun, anni khawmin, ‘Lalpa, iengtik âm phîngṭâmin amanih, dangchârin amanih, mikhuolin amanih, intâng ina manih kan hmu che a, i rawng kan bâwlpêk naw che?’ tiin la dawn an tih.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, ‘Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hieng mi chîntak laia mi pakhat chunga in thaw naw chu ka chunga thaw naw in nih,’ tiin la dawn a tih.
Chun, Isûn chuong thu po po chu a hril zoin, a închûktir hai kuomah,
Chu lai chun, Thiempu laltak Kaiapha an ti in inhuon sûnga chun thiempu lalhai le vântlâng upahai an inkhâwm a;
Isu chu zâwra mana, an sukhlum theina dingin an inrâwn a.
Nisienlakhawm, “Ruoiṭhe sûng chu ni naw sien la, chuong naw chun vântlâng lai buoina hung um rawi a tih,” an ta.
Chun, Isu Bethaniah inphâr Simon inah a um lai chun,
Nisienlakhawm, inchûktirhaiin chu chu an hmu chun an lunginsen a.
“Iengdinga hienga a sukrîral mei mei am a na? Hi hriek hi man tamtaka zawra, pasiehai kuoma pêk thei a ni si a,” an ta.
Isu ruok chun chu chu a hrietin an kuomah, “Nuhmei hi iengdinga in sukbuoi am a na? Ka chunga hin thil ṭhatak a thaw a nih.
Hi hriek rim inhnik ka taksaa a ibuok hi, phûm dinga mi buotsai dingin a thaw a ni hi.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, khawvêl po poah khâwlai khawm hi Chanchin Ṭha hi an hrilna poah, hi nuhmei thil thaw khawm hi ama hriet zingna dingin hril ve pei an tih,” a ta.
Chu hnunga chun sâwm le pahni laia mi pakhat, Juda Iskariot an ti chu, thiempu lalhai kuomah a fe a,
“Ama chu inmantir ka ti cheu a ieng am mi pêng in ta?” a ta. Chun, tangka sâwmthum an bûkpêk ta a.
Chu chena inthawk chun inmantirna remchâng a zawng ta a.
Chun, Chawlṭhanglo Bei Ruoiṭhe ni, ni hmasataka chun, inchûktirhai chu Isu kuomah an hung a, “Fekân ruoi bu fâkna dingin khâwlai am buotsai pêk inlang che i nuom a?” an ta.
Ama chun, “Khawpuiah tu amani kuomah fe unla, a kuomah, ‘Inchûktirtu chun, ka hun a hnai ta a; ka închûktirhai leh Fekân ruoi i inah ṭhêng kan tih, a tih,’ va ti ro,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuoma a ti ang chun inchûktirhai chun an thaw a, Fekân ruoi ding chu an buotsai ta a.
Chun, khuo a hung inhnu chun, inchûktir sâwm le pahnihai leh buthlêng an awt a;
chun, an fâk laiin ama chun, “Titakzetin ka ti cheu hi, in laia mi pakhat hin mîn mantir a tih,” a ta.
Chun, an lungngai ta bêk bêk a, a kuomah, “Lalpa, kei am ka nih?” an ti ta seng a.

Mihriem Naupa hi a chanchin an ziek angtak khan a fe ding a nih, nisienlakhawm, Mihriem Naupa inmantirtu ding mipa chung chu a rik! chu mihriem chu insieng naw sien la, a ta dingin ṭha lem a tih,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, ân mantirtu ding Juda chun a dawn a, “Rabbi, kei am ka nih?” a ta. Ama chun a kuomah, “în ti zing chu teh,” a ta.
Chun, an fâk laiin Isûn bei a lâk a, mal a sâwmpêk a, a khawi a; chun, inchûktirhai kuomah a pêk a, “La unla, fa ro, hi hi ka taksa a nih,” a ta.
Chun, no a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril a, an kuomah a pêk a, “In rêngin dâwn ro;
Nisienlakhawm, ka hril cheu hi, ka Pa rama nangni le a thar ka dâwn ni a tlung hmakhat chun tuta inthawkin grêp hrui raa hi dâwn nâwk ta naw ning,” a ta.
Chun, hla an sak zoin an suok a, Oliv tlânga chun an fe ta a.
Peter ruok chun a kuomah, “An rêngin i chungthuah lungnilovin umhai sien khawm, kei chu lungnilovin um nâw tawp ka tih,” tiin a dawn a.
Isûn a kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril che, vawizân hin âr a khuong hmain, nangin vawithum mîn phat i tih,” a ta.
Peterin a kuomah, “I thinaa chun thi ve ding ni lang khawm inphat naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta. Chuong ang bawk chun, inchûktirhai po po chun an ti ta seng a.
Chu zoa chun Isu annihai le chun, hmun pakhat Gethsemane an ti chu an tlung a, chun, ama chun a închûktirhai kuomah, “Sawtaka ka va ṭawngṭai sûng po hitaka hin lo ṭhung ro,” a ta.
Chun, Peter le Zebedai nauhai pahni chu a ṭhuoi a, a lungngaiin a lunginzîng ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Ka lungril a lungngai bêk bêk a; thina khawp rau a nih. Hitaka hin um unla mi vêngpui ro,” a ta.
Chun, tlâwmtên hma tieng a va fe dep a, a bawkkhup a, “Aw Pa, a thei chun, hi no hin mi khêl hrâm raw se; nisienlakhawm, keima thu ni lovin, nangma thu thu ni lem raw se,” tiin a ṭawngṭai a.
Chun, inchûktirhai kuoma chun a hung a, anni chu inin a hung hmu a, Peter kuomah, “E khai! nangnîn dârkâr khat khawm in mi vêngpui thei naw a ni maw?
Thlêmnaa in lût nawna dingin inring zingin ṭawngṭai ro; thlarau chun chu a pei a, taksa ruok chu a hrât naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, vawi hninaah a va fe a, a ṭawngṭai nâwk a, “Aw Pa, ka dâwn lova hi no hin a mi khêl thei lul naw chun, nangma thu thu ni raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a hung nâwk a, anni chu inin a hung hmu nâwk a, an îmu a suok hle si a.
Chun, a fe san nâwk a, a vawi thumnaah a thu hril ngai hrilin a ṭawngṭai nâwk a.
Chu zoa chun, inchûktirhai kuomah a hung nâwk a, an kuomah, “Tuhin chu in unla châwl ta ro! Ngai ta u; a hun chu a hung tlung ta a, Mihriem Naupa hi mi suolhai kutah an inmantir ding a ni hi.
Tho unla, fêng ei tiu, a mîn man-tirtu ding chu a hung hnai ta hi,” a ta.

Chun, a la hril lai zingin Juda, sâwmpahni hai laia mi pakhat chu, a hung tlung ta a, ama ruol chun thiempu lalhai le upahai kuoma inthawkin mipui nasatak, kâwlhnâm le hembâwk chawiin an hung tlung bawk a.
Chun, ân mantirtu ding chun inchikna ding a lo hrillâwk hieu a, “Ka ifâwp taphawt chu ama nîng a tih, man el ro,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Isu chu a va pan nghâl ta a. “Chibai, Rabbi,” tiin a fâwp ta ngâwi ngâwi a.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Ruola, i hungna san chu thaw rawh,” a ta. Chu phingleh Isu chu an chel a, an man ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, Isu rawihai laia pakhat chun a kutin a ban a, a kâwlhnâm a phawi a, Thiempu Laltak suok chu a sât a; a nakâwr a sât thlâkpêk a.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “I kâwlhnâm kha a sienaah sie nâwk rawh, kâwlhnâm ruoituhai po po chu kâwlhnâm bawkin an thi ding a ni si a.
Tukhawm hin vântirko sâng ruk
Nisienlakhawm, ngên ang lang, iengtin am Pathien Lekha Thu-hieng anga hung um ding thu hi-tlung thei a ti leh?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, zâwlnei lekha thuhai a tlung theina dingin hieng po po hi a hung tlung tah a ni hi,” a ta. Chu lai chun, inchûktirhai po po chun ama an thlathlam a, an tlân hmang ta vawng a.
Chun, Isu mantuhai chun, Thiempu Laltak Kaiapha ina Dân Inchûktirtuhai le upahai um khâwmnaa chun ama chu an ṭhuoi ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin hlataka inthawkin ama chu a zui a, Thiempu laltak in inhuonna sûng tuol chenin; chun, a va lût a, a tâwpna hmu dingin siehlawhai lai chun a ṭhung ve a.
Chun, ama an sukhlum theina dingin thiempu lalhai le rorêltuhai po po chun Isu hêkna an zawng a;
hretu tehlêm tamtak hung hai sien khawm an hmu si naw a. A nakie ruok chun mi pahni an hung a,
Chuongchun, Thiempu Laltak chu a ngîr suok a, a kuomah, “Iengkhawmin i dawn naw maw? Hienghaiin an hêkna che hi iengtizie am a na?” a ta. Isu ruok chu a to zing a.
Chun, Thiempu Laltak chun a kuomah, “Pathien hring hmingin ka vau che, Krista, Pathien Naupa chu i ni am a nih? mi hril rawh,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “I hril ang chun ka nih; chu nawa khawm, ka hril cheu hi, hi hnung leh Mihriem Naupa hi thilthawtheina changtienga ṭhunga, vân sûm chunga hung in la hmu ding a nih,” a ta.

Chun, Thiempu Laltak chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, “Pathien a hrilsiet tah; hretu dang iengdingin am ngai tâng ei ta? Ngai ta u, Pathien a hrilsietzie chu tuhin in hriet tah. Iengtin am in ngai a?” a ta.
Anni chun, “Thi tlâk a nih,” tiin an dawn a.
Chun, a hmaiah chil an sâk a, kutin an hnek a; a ṭhenin an ben a,
“Nang Krista, tuin am a ben che a? mi hril rawh,” an ta.
Chun, Peter chu in inhuon sûng tuollaia chun a ṭhung a; chun, nunghâk pakhat a kuomah a hung a, “Nang khawm, Isu, Galili rama mi kuoma um kha i ni hi,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun, “I thu hril chu ka hriet dêr nawh,” tiin an rênga hmaah ân phat a.
Chun, tuol kawt bula chun a va suok phingleh nunghâk dangin ama chu a hmu a, chutaka umhai kuoma chun, “Hi mipa khawm hi Isu Nazareth mi kuoma um kha a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, “Chu mihriem chu ka hriet nawh,” tiin inkhâmin ân phat nâwk a.
Chun, sâwt nawte hnungah a kâwla ngîrhai chun Peter kuomah, “Nang khawm an laia mi i ni ngei el, i ṭawngah ân hriet annâwm,” an ta.
Ama chun, “Chu mihriem chu ka hriet nawh” tîn ṭawngsie inphur rauin ân khâm ta a. Chun âr a khuong nghâl ta a.
Chun, Peter chun, Isûn “âr a khuong hmain nangin vawi thum mîn phat i tih,” a ti kha a hung hriet nâwk ta a. Chun, a suok a, a ṭap ta ngâwi ngâwi a.
Chun, zîngkâr a hung ni chun, thiempu lalhai le vântlâng upahai po po chu Isu sukhlum dingin a chungthuah an inrâwn a;
chun, an khuop a, an ṭhuoi a, Bawrsâp Pilat kuomah an pêk ta a.
“Mi thiem thisen kân mantir kha thil ka suksuol a nih,” a ta. Anni ruok chun, “Chu chu kan ta dingin ieng am pawi a ta? Nangin i thaw thawin thaw rawh,” an ti san a.
Chun, ama chun tangka chu hmun inthienga chun a pei lût a; a fe hmang a, a vân âwkhlum ta a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai chun tangka chu an lâk a, “Hi hi thawlâwm bâwma sie a thieng naw ie, thisen man a ni si a,” an ta.
Chuongchun, an inrâwn a, mikhuolhai phûmna dingin bêlhemtu hmun chu an inchâwk ta a.
Chu lei chun a nih, chu hmun chu tu chena, “Thisen Hmun,” an ti chu.
Chu lai chun, zâwlnei Jeremiain hieng thu a hril hi a hung tlung ta a:
“Chun, tangka sâwmthum,
An isak man,
Israel thla tuhaiin amanih an isak man chu,
An lâk a;
Belhemtu hmun man dingin an pêk a,”
ti hi.
Chun, Isu chu Bawrsâp hmaa chun a ngîr a. Chun, Bawrsâp chun, “Judahai lal i ni?” tîn ân dawn a. Chun, Isûn, “I hril ang chun ka nih,” a ta.
Chun, thiempu lalhai le upahaiin an hêk laiin iengkhawmin a dawn naw a.
Chuongchun, Pilatin a kuomah, “An hêkna zozai che hi i hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, bau khat khawmin a dawn naw a; chuongchun, Bawrsâp chun mak a ti hle a.
Chun, Bawrsâpin ruoiṭhe ni chun, mi intâng pakhat an dit taphawt mipuihai chu ân suopêk hlak a.
Chun, chu lai chun, mi intâng hming inthangtak Barabba an ti chu an nei a.
Chuongchun, an hung inkhâwm chun, Pilatin an kuomah “Tu am insuopêk lang cheu in nuom a? Barabba am, Isu, Krista an ti chu?” a ta.
Thîkna leiin ama chu an inmantir ti a hriet si a.
Chun, rorêlna ṭhungphaa ân ṭhung lai chun, a nuhmeiin, “Kha mi feltak chunga khan iengkhawm thaw naw rawh; vawisûn hin ama leiin mangah thil tamtak ka tuor a nih,” tiin ân cha a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai le upahaiin Barabba hnia, Isu sukhlum dingin mipuihai chu an thlêm a.
Bawrsâp ruok chun anni chu a biek a, “Anni pahni chu a tu lem am insuopêk lang cheu in nuom a?” a ti nâwk a. Anni chun, “Barabba” an ti a.
Pilatin an kuomah, “Isu, Krista an ti hi iengtin am thâwng ka ti leh?” a ta. An rêngin, “Krawsah inhemdêtir rawh,” an ti a.
Chun, ama chun, “Iengdingin am ie? Ieng am a suksuol leh?” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, anni rawi chun “Krawsah inhemdêtir rawh,” tiin an khêk rak rak a.
Chun, vântlâng po po chun, “A thisen chu keini chunga le, kan nauhai chungah um raw se,” tiin an dawn a.
Chu zoa chun Barabba chu ân suopêk ta a; Isu ruok chu a vuok a, krawsa hemde dingin a pêk ta a.
Chu zoa chun, Bawrsâp sipaihai chun Isu chu lal inah an ṭhuoi lût a, an pâwla mi po po a kuomah an ko khâwm a.
Chuongchun, a puonhai dâm an hlîppêk a, puon sen an insiltir a.
Chun, hling lukhum an phier a, an inkhumtir a, a kut changtieng luong an inchawitir a; a hmaah an dingṭhaṭhuon a, “Chibai, Judahai lal,” tiin nuiza siemnain an hmang a.
Chun, chil an sâk khum a, luong chu an lâkpêk a, a lua chun an vuok a.
Chun, nuiza siemnaa an hmang zoin, puon chu an hlîppêk a, ama puonhai chu an insiltir nâwk a; krawsa hemde dingin an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, an fe suok laiin Kurini khuoa mi, a hming Simon an hmu a; chu mipa chu a kraws put dingin an man a.
Chun, Golgotha an ti hmun an hung tlung a, (chu chu, “Luru hmun,” tina a nih)
uoin thûr, thil kha le pawl, a dâwn dingin an pêk a, nisienlakhawm ân tem phingin a dâwn nuom ta naw a.
Chun, chutaka chun an ṭhung a, an vêng a, a hêkna
“HI MIPA HI ISU JUDAHAI LAL A NIH,” tia ziek a lu chungah an bel a.
Chun, ama ruol chun, suomhmang pahni an hemde ve a, a changtieng pakhat a vawitieng pakhat.
Chuong ang bawkin thiempu lalhai chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le upahai leh tielin,
“Mi dang hman a sukdam hlak a; ama le ama ân sukdam thei si naw a. Israel lal a nih annâwm, tuhin krawsa inthawkin hung ṭum ta sien la, chuongchun, ama awi nâwm ei ni!
Suomhmang an hemde vehai khawm chun, chuong ang bawkin an ti el ve a.
Chun, nisa indinga inthawka zânbu suong pha chenin khawvêl a hung inthim ta vawng a.
Chun, a kâwla ngîr ṭhenkhathai chun chu chu an hrietin, “Hi mipa hin Elija a ko a nih,” an ta.
Chun, mi danghai chun, “Um raw se, ama la dingin Elija a hung am en ei tiu,” an ta.
Chun, Isu chu râwl inringtakin a khêk nâwk a, a thlarau ân thla ta a.
thlânhai an hung inhawng a; mi inthieng in tahai taksa tamtak khawm keithoin an um ta a;
chuonghai chu a thonâwk hnunga chun, thlâna inthawka hung suokin khaw inthienga chun an lût a, mi tamtak kuomah an inlâr ta a.
Chun, sipai za hotu le a kuoma Isu vênga um vehai chun, simkhawleihnuoi inhnîng le thil umziehai chu an hmu chun an ṭi ta bêk bêk a, “Hi mipa hi Pathien Naupa a ni ngei el,” an ta.
Chun, chutaka chun nuhmei tamtak, a rawngbâwlpêk pum peia Galili rama inthawka Isu hung zuitu- hai chu an um a; hlatakah an thlîr a;
chuonghai lai chun Mari Magdalin hai, Jakob le Josef nu Mari hai, Zebedai naupahai nu hai an ṭhang a.
Chun, zântieng a hung ni chun, mi hausa, a hming Josef, Arimathaia mi a hung a, ama ngei khawm chu Isu inchûktir a ni bawk a.
Chu mipa chu Pilat kuomah a va fe a; Isu ruong chu a hni a. Chun, Pilatin pêk din gin thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Josef chun ruong chu a lâk a, puon zai inhmi fâitakin a tuom a;
ama thlân thar, lung a iverkuoa chun ân zâl a, thlân kawtkhâr chu lung lientakin ân del a, a fe ta a.
Chun, chutaka chun, Mari Magdalin le Mari dang chu an um a, thlân hma zâwna chun an ṭhung a.
Chun, a zînga chun (chu chu Inringlâwk ni zo tûk a nih) thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai chu Pilat kuomah an um khâwm dup a,

Chuongchun, thlân chu ni thum ni chen vêng ṭha dingin thu pe rawh, chuong naw chun a inchûktirhai chu hungin, ama chu inru hlau an ta, vântlâng kuomah, ‘Mithi laia inthawkin a thonâwk ta a nih,’ ti rawi an tih; chuongchun, hlêmna nuhnung lem chu a hmasa nêk khan ṭha naw nâwk zuol a tih,” an ta.
Pilatin an kuomah, “Vêngtu sipaihai in nei annâwm, fe unla in thei ang angin invêngṭhattir ta unla,” a ta.
Chuongchun, vêngtu sipaihai leh an fe a, thlân chu an invêng ṭhattir a, lung chu an inchik a.
Chun, Châwlni zo, ni saria ni hmasatak dinga khuo a var tâwmin, Mari Magdalin le Mari dang chu thlân en dingin an fe a.
Chun, ngai ta, simkhawleihnuoi nasatakin a hung inhnîng a, Lalpa vântirko vâna inthawkin a hung ṭum a, lung chu a hung inhlum a, a chungah a ṭhung ta a.
A hmêl umzie chu kâwlinlep ang a na, a silfên chu vûr angin a vâr a.
Ama an ṭi leiin vêngtuhai chu an inthin a, mithi ang elin an hung um ta a.
Chun, vântirko chun nuhmeihai chu a biek a, an kuomah, “Nangni chu ṭi naw ro! Isu an hemde kha in zawng ti ka hriet!
Hitaka hin a um ta nawh; a hril ang ngeiin a thonâwk ta a nih. A zâlna hi hung en hman ta u.

Chun, fe vak unla, a inchûktirhai kuomah, ‘Mithi laia inthawkin a thonâwk ta a nih, ngai ta u, Galili ramah in hmaah a fe, chutaka chun ama chu hmûng in tih,’ tiin hril ro. Ngai ta u, ka hril ta cheu hi,” a ta.
Chun, ṭi le lâwm bêk bêk pumin thlâna inthawk chun an fe vat vat a, a închûktirhai hril dingin an tlân ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, Isûn anni chu ân tuokpui a, “Chibai” a ti tâwl a. Chuongchun, anni chun a ke chu an va chel a, chibai an bûk a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah “Ṭi naw ro, fe unla, Galili rama fe dingin ka unauhai va hril ro; chutaka chun mi hmûng an tih,” a ta.
Chun, an va fe lai chun vêngtu sipai ṭhenkhat chu khawpuiah an va lût a, thil umzie po po chu thiempu lalhai kuomah an va hril a.
Chun, upahai leh an inkhâwma an inrâwn zoin sipaihai kuoma chun tangka tamtak an pêk a,
“ ‘Zânah kan in kârin a închûktirhai chu an hung a, ama an inrûk a nih,’ ti ro.
Chun, Bawrsâpin chu chu a hriet chun ama chu thlêm kan ta, lunginhâng lovin siem kan ti cheu,” an ta.
Chuongchun, tangka chu an lâk a, an iti ang pei chun an ti ta a; chuongchun, tu chen hin chu thu chu Judahai laiah an la hril ta pei a nih.
Chun, ama an hmu chun chibai an bûk a, ṭhenkhat ruok chun an ringhla a.
“Chuongchun, fe unla, hnam tina mi inchûktirin siem unla, Pa le, Naupa le, Thlarau Inthieng hming chun baptist unla;
thu ka ipêk po po cheu pawm dingin inchûktir ro. Chun, ngai ta u, kei kumkhuoin khawvêl tâwp chen khawmin in kuomah um pei ka tih,” a ta.
Pathien Naupa Isu Krista Chanchin Ṭha hung tlung phutna chu.
“Ngai ta, ka tirko i hmaah ka tir a,
Ama chun i lampui siem a tih,”
‘Lalpa lamlien buotsai unla,
A lampuihai suktlûn ro,’ a tih,” tia inziek ang khan.
Johan, thlalêra Baptistu kha suksuolnahai ngaidamna dingin simna baptisma thu hrilin a hung suok a.
Chun, Judai rama mi po po le Jerusalema mi po pohai chu a kuomah an fe a, an suolhai thupha chawiin Jordan vadungah a kuomah baptisma an chang tâwl a.
Chun, “Ka hnungah keia nêka ropui lem a hung zing a nih; kûna a kekawk hrui sût tlâk khawm ka ni nawh.
Kei chun tuiin ka baptis hlak cheu a; ama ruok chun chu Thlarau Inthiengin a baptis ding cheu a nih,” tiin a hril a.
Chuong nihaia chun Isu Galili rama Nazaretha inthawkin a hung a, Jordan vadungah Johan kuomah baptisma a chang ta a.
Chuongchun, tuia inthawka a hung suok phingle chun, vân inhawnga Thlarau vâṭhu angin ama chunga hung ṭum a hmu ta a.
Chun, “Nang ka Naupa dittak i nih, i chungah ka lungni bêk bêk a nih,” tiin vâna inthawkin râwl a hung suok a.
Chu phingleh Thlarau chun thlalêrah ama a tir suok ta a.
Chuongchun, Setan ithlêmin ni sâwmli zet thlalêra chun a um a, ramsahai lai a um a, vântirkohai chun a rawng an bâwlpêk a.
Chun, Johan an man hnungin Isu, Pathien Chanchin Ṭha hrilin Galili ramah a hung a;
Chun, Galili dîl panghrûla a fe laiin Simon le Simon unaupa Andri chu dîla chun lên dêngin a hmu a; nga mantu an ni hrim a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Mi zui ro, chuongchun, mihriem mantu dingin siem ka ti cheu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lênhai chu mâksanin an zui ta a.
Chun, tâwite a hei fe chun, Zebedai naupa Jakob le a unau Johan chu a hmu a, anni khawm chu an lênhai siemṭhain lawnga bawk an um a.
Chun, anni khawm chu a ko nghâl ta a: chuongchun, an pa Zebedai chu inhlawfa an iruoihai kuoma chun lawngah an mâksan a, an zui ta a.
Chun, Kapernaumah an va fe a, chun Châwlni chun inkhâwmna inah a lût a, ân chûktir nghâl ta a.
Chun, an inkhawmna ina chun khawhri inthieng naw nei mi pakhat a lo um a;
ama chun, “Nazareth Isu, keini le nang ieng am ei inzâwlna a um a? Mi sukbohmang dingin i hung am a nih? Nang ka hriet che, Pathien mi inthieng i nih,” tiin a khêk suok nghâl ta a.
Chun, Isûn a hal a, “To la, a sûnga inthawkin hung suok rawh,” a ta.
Chun, khawhri inthieng naw chun ama a sawisa a, inringtakin a khêk a, a sûnga chu a hung suok ta a.

Chun, an rêngin mak an ti ta bêk bêk a, chuongchun, “Ahi ieng am a ni ta leh, inchûktirna thar a ni hi tên! Khawhri inthieng naw khawm thuneitakin thu a pêk a, a thu an awi pei el hi,” tiin an insêl a.
Chun, Galili ram vêl po poah, ram tinah a chanchin ân thang nghâl ta a.
Chun, inkhâwmna ina inthawka an suok chun, Simon le Andri inah Jakob leh Johan leh an lût a.
Chun, Simon tarpinu khawsikin a na a, a lo zâl a; chuongchun, a umzie chu Isu an hril nghâl ta a;
chun, ama chun, a kut a va chel a, a keitho ta a. Chuongchun, a khawsik chu a bo ta a, an rawng a bâwlpêk ta a.
Chun, zântienga nisa tlâk hnung chun, damnaw po po le khawhri iman dâm a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
A khuo chun kawtkhâr bulah an hung inkhâwm mup el ta a.
Chuongchun, mi tamtak natna tinrêng invawihai chu a sukdam a, khawhri tamtak a hnawt suok bawk a; khawhrihai chun ama an hriet leiin an ṭawng a phal naw a.
Chun, zîngkâr inhmatakin, khawvar hma daiin a tho a, a suok a, hmun fienrielah a va fe a, chutaka chun a ṭawngṭai a.
Chun, Simon le a ruolhai chun an hnawtzui a;
ama an va hmu chun, a kuomah, “Mi po poin an zawng che i sawnnâwm ie,” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Hmun danga khaw hnaiahai dâm chun fêng ei tiu, chuonga hai khawm chun thu ka hril theina dingin, hi lei taka hung ka ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, a kuomah phâr a hung a, “I nuom chun i mi sukthieng thei,” a ta, a hmaah a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a ngên rak el a.
Ama chun a lo lunginsiet bêk bêk a; a hei ban a, a them a, “Ka nuom ie, sukthiengin lo um ta rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, kârlovin ân phârna chu a bo nghâl el ta a, a hung inthieng ta a.
Chun, ama chu hril lo dingin thu a pêk tlat a, ân fetir ta a;

Nisienlakhawm, ama chu a suok a, tlânginsamin chu thu chu a puong dar phut el ta a; chuongchun, Isu chu uolautakin khuo a lût thei ta naw a; thlalêr hmunahai a um lem ta a; chun hmun tina mi a kuomah an hung hlak a.
Chun, ni ieng zât amani hnunga Kapernaum a hung lût nâwkin, inah ama a um ti thu ân thang ta a.
Chuongchun, kawt bula khawm umna um naw khawp rakin, mi tamtak an hung khâwm a; an kuoma chun thu a hril ta a.
Chun, mi zeng pakhat, mi palia zâwn a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, mipui leia Isu kâwl hnai an tlung thei naw leiin, a umna in chung chu an ṭhiek ta a; chuonga an ṭhiek zo phing chun mi zeng chu a puonpha pum chun an zuk thlâk ta a.
Chuongchun, Isûn an ringzie chu a lo hmu a, mi zeng kuoma chun, “Naupa, i suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,” a ta.
Chun, Dân inchûktirtu ṭhenkhat chutaka chun an ṭhung a, an lungril chun hieng hin an ngaituo a,
“Hi mipa hin ieng dinga hieng thu hi hril am a ni leh? Pathien a hrilsiet a ni hi. Mi pakhat, Pathien chau naw chun tuin am suolhai a ngaidam thei a?” tiin.
Chun, chuong thu chu an ngaituo a ni ti Isûn a lungrilin a hriet nghâl ta a, an kuomah, “Chuong thu chu iengdinga in lungrila in ngaituo am a na?
Zeng kuoma chun, ‘I suol ngaidam a ni tah,’ ti le, ‘I puonpha la la, kein fe ta rawh,’ ti hi a ieng am hril a awl lem a?
Iengkhawm ni sienla, khawvêla hin, Mihriem Naupain suol ngaidam theina a nei ti in hrietna dingin,” (Zeng kuoma chun)
“Tho la, i puonpha la la, i inah fe ta rawh, ka ti che,” a ta.

Chuongchun, ama chu a tho a, a puonpha chu a lâk a, an rênga mithmu ngei chun a suok ta a; chuongchun, an rêngin mak an ti hle a, “Hieng ang hrim hrim hi ei la hmu ngai nawh,” tîn Pathien an inpâk ta a.
Chun, a suok nâwk a, dîl panga chun a fe ta a; chun mipui po po chu a kuomah an va fe a, a lo inchûktir ta a.
Chun, a fe malamin, Levi, Alphai naupa chu siechawina hmuna ṭhung a hmu a, a kuomah, “Mi hung zui rawh,” a ta. Ama chu a tho a, a zui ta a.
Chun, Isu chun Levi inah thlaithlêng a awt a; siedâwltuhai le mi suol tamtakin a închûktirhai chu an awtpui tâwl a, tamtak el an na, ama chu an zui ve bawk hlak.
Chun, Pharisaihai laia Dân inchûktirtuhaiin Isûn mi suol le siedâwltuhai a awtpui an hmuin, a închûktirhai kuoma chun, “Iengtiziea siedâwltuhai lai a fâkin a dâwn am a na?” an ta.

Chun, Isûn chu chu a lo hriet a, “Mi hrâthai chun dâktawr an ngai naw a, mi hrivawisiehai lemin an ngai a nih; mi feltakhai indawn ding a hung ka ni naw a, mi suolhai lem indawn ding a hung ka nih,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisai le Johan inchûktirhai chun bu an nghei a; chun, “Ieng dinga Johan inchûktirhai le Pharisai inchûktir haiin bu an nghei hlak a, i închûktirhai hlakin an nghei ve ngai naw?” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Mo ṭhuoituhai kuoma a pasal ding chu a um sûng po chu mo ṭhuoituhai chun bu nghei thei naw ni hai,
nisienlakhawm, a pasal ding chu an kuoma inthawka ṭhuoi hmang ni la hung tlung a ta, chu nia ruok chun la nghei an tih.
Tukhawmin puon hlui puon thar hlekin an phâwk ngai nawh; phâwk ang sienla, a phâwkna chun keiek lem a tih, a thar chun a hlui chu keiek a ta, inek nasa det lem a tih.

Chun, tukhawmin uoin thar savun uoin peng hluiahai an thun ngai nawh; thun ang sienla, uoin chun savun peng chu mawrdar a ta, uoin le savun peng chu bo hmang ve vêng a tih, uoin thar chu savun uoin peng tharahai an thun lem hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isu chu châwlniin bu bilahai a fe thleng a, chuongchun, a închûktirhai chun an fe malamin buvûihai chu an thliek ta a.
Chun, Pharisaihai chun a kuomah, “En ta, iengdinga châwlnia thaw thieng naw chu an thaw am a na?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “David le a ruolhai an tlâksama, an phîng a ṭâm laia an thil thaw kha in tiem naw am a nih?
Khânga Abiathar Thiempu Laltak a ni laia Pathien inah a lût a, Thiempuhai chau naw chun fâk thieng lo bei chu a fâk a, a ruolhai khawm a pêk ve thu kha?” a ta.
Chun, ama bâwkin an kuoma chun, “Châwlni hi mihriem ta dinga siem a na, mihriem hi Châwlni ta dinga siem a ni nawh;
chuongchun, Mihriem Naupa hi Châwlni chunga chen khawm Lal a nih,” a ta.
Chun, inkhâwmna ina chun a lût nâwk a, chutaka chun mi pakhat kutzeng hi a lo um a.
Chun, ama an hêk theina dingin Châwlnin a sukdam ding le sukdam naw ding an enthlit a.
Ama chun kutzeng kuoma chun, “Hung ngîr dawk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, an kuoma chun, “Châwlni hin sukṭhat am a thieng, suksiet? sandam am a thieng sukhlum?” tiin ân dawn a. Nisienlakhawm, an to zing a.
Chun, an lungril ngar zie chu pawitipêk bêk bêkin, lungsen puma anni a en vêl hnungin, chu mipa kuoma chun, “I kut phar rawh,” a ta. Chun, a hang phar dawk a, a kut chu a dam ta a.
Chun, Pharisaihai chu an suok a, ama an sukhlum thei dân ding ngaituoin Herod pâwla mihai le chun an inrâwn nghâl ta a.
Chun, Isu chu a inchûktirhai le chun dîl tieng an fe hmang ta a, chuongchun, Galili rama inthawkin mipui nasatakin an zui ta a.
Chun, a thil thaw ropuizie chu an hrietin, Judai rama inthawk dâmin, Jerusalema inthawk dâmin, Idumai rama inthawk dâmin, Tura le Sidon khuo vêla inthawk dâmin mipui nasatak a kuomah an hung ve a.
Chun, mipui lei chun a ta dinga lawnglêng pakhat lo siemrêlpêk dingin a închûktirhai a hril a. “Chuong naw chun mi hneng hut hut rawi an tih,” a ta.
Khawhri inthieng nawhai khawmin ama an hmu po leh a hmaa bawkkhupin, “Nang Pathien Naupa chu i nih,” tiin an khêk hlak a.
Chun, ama chun a chanchin chu puong lo dingin an kuomah a ti tlat pei a.
Chun, tlânga chun a hang fe a, amain a dit pohai chu a ko a, chuongchun, anni chu a kuomah an hang fe a.
Chun, sâwm le pahni a ruot a
khawhrihai hnawt dawkna thu nei dinga a tir dawk theina dingin.
Chuonghai chu, Simon, Peter a înbûk hai;
Zebedai naupa Jakob le Jakob unaupa Johan hai dâm, (chuonghai chu “Boanerges” ân bûk a, chu chu “Vâninrûm Nauhai,” tina a nih.)
Andri hai, Philip hai, Bartholomai hai, Matthai hai, Thoma hai, Alphai naupa Jakob hai, Thaddai hai, Kanaana Simon hai;
a înmantirtu Juda Iskariot hai dâm kha an nih.
Chun, inah a va lût a. Chun, mipui chu an hung khâwm nâwk a, chuongchun, bei takngiel khawm an fâk thei ta naw a.
Chun, a sûnghai chun chu chu an hriet a, “ân vêt a ni chu tie,” tiin, ama man tumin an inthawk a.
Chun, Isu chun Dân inchûktirtuhai chu a ko a, tekhithuin an kuomah, “Setanin Setan bawk iengtin am hnawt dawk thei a ta?
Ram khawm ama le ama ân do chun, chu ram chu ngîr suok thei naw ni.
Sûng khat khawm anni le anni an indo chun, chuhai sûng chu ngîr suok thei naw ni hai.
Setan khawm ama le ama indo a, ân khing si chun, ngîr suok thei naw ni a, bohmang el lem a tih.
Tukhawm mi hrât ina lûtin a sum chu a lâkpêk thei ngai nawh, mi hrât chu an phier hmasa zet naw chun; chu hnunga ruok chun a in chu inrampêk el an tih.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, mihriem nauhai hi an suolna po poa le, Pathien an hrilsietna kawng tinrênga khawm chun ngaidam nîng an tih;
(“Khawhri inthieng naw a zâwl a nih,” an ti lei khan chu chu a hril a nih.)
Chun, a nu le a unauhai chu an hung a, tuolah an ngîr a, ama ko dingin mi an tir a.
Chun, a sîr vêl lai chun mipui an lo ṭhung tâwl a; chun, a kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, tuola sawn i nu le i unauhaiin an zawng che,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ka nu le ka unauhai chu tuhai am an na?” tiin an dawn a.
Chun, a kâwla ṭhunghai chu a hei en vêl a, “En ta u, ka nu le ka unauhai hi!
Tukhawm Pathien dit zâwng thawtu phawt chu, chuonghai ngei chu ka unauhai, ka farnuhai, ka nuhai an nih annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, tekhithuin thu tamtak ân chûktir a, ân chûktirnaa chun,
“Ngai unla en ta u, bu chi thetu bu chi thein a fe a,
chun, a the laiin a ṭhen lampui sîrah a tla a, vatehaiin an hung tlân zo ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen chu pielthlêng chung, hnuoi inphânna lai a tla a, hnuoi a sa naw leiin a mâwng nghâl ta a,
nisienlakhawm, nisa a hung insâng pha em vuoiin a um a, zung a nei naw leiin a rawp ta el a.
Chun, a ṭhen chu hlohlingnei lai a tla a, hlo chu a hung mâwng sâng a, a dîp hmang ta a, ra hrim hrim a ra ta naw a.
Chun, a ṭhen hnuoiṭhaah a tla a, a mâwng a, ân ṭhang lien a, a ra ta a; sâwmthum dâm, sâwmruk dâm, za dâmin a pung tâwl ta a,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin, “Tukhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se,” a ta.
Chun, fienriela a um laiin a kuoma sâwm le pahnihai le um mi danghai chun tekhithuhai chu an indawn fel a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Pathien ram thurûk chu nangni hai hriet chu phal a na, puotienga mihai ta ding ruok chun iengkim tekhithua hril a nih;
Chun, ama bawkin, an kuoma chun, “Hi tekhithu hi in hriet thei naw maw? Chuongchu a ni chun iengtin am tekhithu danghai po po chu hre hrim in ta?
Bu chi thetu chun thu chu a the a nih.
Chun, lampui sîra thu thênahai chu hieng hi an nih; thu an hriet phingleh Setan chun an lungrila thu thea um chu a lâkpêk nghâl hlak.
Chun, chuong ang bawk chun pielthlêng chunga the chu hieng hi an nih: thu chu an hriet phinga lâwmtaka pawm nghâl el hlakhai hi;
nisienlakhawm, annia chun zung hrim an nei naw a, sâwt nâwte chau an um a, thu leia rinumna amanih, suknawmnatna amanih a hung um phing leh an tlu nghâl el hlak a nih.
Chun, mi danghai chu hlohlingnei laia the chu an nih, chuonghai chun thu chu an hriet ta a;
nisienlakhawm, khawvêl lungkhamnahai, hausakna hlêmnahai, thil dang châknahai chu a hung lût a, thu chu a dîp a, ra lovin a lo um hlak.
Chun, hnuoi ṭhaa thehai chu hieng hi an nih: thu chu hrea, pawm a, a lêt sâwmthum dâm, a lêt sâwmruk dâm, a lêt za dâma rahai hi,” a ta.
Tukhawmin hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin, “Pathien ram chu hieng ang hi a nih; mîn hnuoia hin chi the sienla, zâna inin sûnah tho hlak sienla;
a umzie a hriet lovin hung mâwngin hung inṭhang sienla, chuong ang chu a nih.
Hnuoi hin amain ra a hung insuo hlak, a phut chun a kûng, chu zoa chun a ra, chun chu zo nâwka chun a vûia bu mal kim chu.
Chun, ra chu a hung hmin pha, bu lâk a lo hun ta leiin kâwite a kei suok nghâl hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin, “Pathien ram chu ieng lêm hrilkhîng ei tih aw? annawleh, ieng tekhithu lêm hrilkhîng ei ta?
Anṭam chi mal khat hnuoia an thein, hnuoi chunga thlai chi po po nêkin chîntak sienla khawm;

the zo hnung ruok chun a hung mâwng a, thlâi po po nêkin a hung lien lem ta a, zâr lientak tak dâm a hung nei a, chuongchun, chunglêng vatehai chu a buka chun an riek thei hlak; chuong ang chu a nih,” a ta.
Chuong ang tekhithu tamtakin, an ihriet thei tâwk tâwkin, thu chu an kuomah a hril hlak.
Tekhithu naw chun an kuomah thu a hril ngai nawh; ama inchûktirhai kuoma ruok chun fienrielah iengkim a hrilfie hlak a.
Chun, chu ni ma, zântieng chun ama chun an kuomah, “Râlkhing tieng sawn kai ei tiu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui chu mâksanin, ama chu a um ngai chun lawnga chun an fepui nghâl ta a. Lawng dang dâm khawm a kuomah a um a.
Chun, thlipui nasatak a hung hrâng a, tuifâwnhai dâm chu lawnga chun a hung insawk lût hlawp hlawp a; chuongchun, lawng chu a hung sip vâng vâng el ta a.
Chun, ama chu lukham chu khamin lawng mei tieng chun a lo in a; chun, an keitho a, a kuoma chun, “Inchûktirtu, kan bohmang hi pawi i ti nâwm a nih?” an ta.
Chun, ama chu a hung har a, thli chu a hal a, dîl kuoma khawm chun, “To la, um ṭawk ṭawk rawh,” a ta. Chun, thli chu a ma a, a hung re ta ṭhup el a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga chuong bêk bêka ṭi am in na? Ringna hrim in la nei naw a ni maw?” a ta.
Chuongchun, an ṭi ta bêk bêk a, “Hi mipa hi tu am a ni lie? thli le dîl chen khawmin a thu an awi hi,” an inti tâwl a.
Chun, dîl râl, Gerasin
Chun, lawnga inthawka a suok chau chun mi pakhat, khawhri inthieng naw iman thlâna inthawka hung suok chun ân tuokpui ta a;
chu mipa chun thlâna dâm chun umna a nei hlak a, tukhawmin khaidiet khawmin an khit thei ta naw a;
kawlhai le khaidiethai khawmin an khit rawp ta hlak a, anachu khaidiethai dâm chu a keitan a, kawlhai dâm khawm chu a sukbawng pei hlak a; tukhawmin an sukdawl zo naw a.
A sûn a zânin thlânahai le tlângahai chun a khêk hlak a, lung dâm khawmin ân ât rawp hlak a.
Chun, hlataka inthawkin Isu chu a hei hmu phingleh a tlân a, chibai a va bûk a.
(Isu chun a kuomah, “Nang khawhri inthieng naw, mihriem sûnga hi suok rawh,” a lo ti nghâl ta a.)
Chun, Isu
Chun, chu rama inthawk chun anni tir hmang lo dingin Isu kuomah a ngên ṭal ta a.
Chun, chutaka tlâng panga chun vawk ruol tamtak an tla a.
Chun, khawhri inthieng nawhai chun, “Vawkhai kuoma sawn mîn fêtir rawh; an sûnga kan lût theina dingin,” tiin a kuomah an ngên a.

Ama chun a phal pêk a. Chuongchun, khawhri inthieng nawhai chu an suok a, vawkhai sûnga chun an lût a, chuongchun, vawk ruol chu (sâng hni lai an na) rawlah an tlân thla a, dîlah an tlân lût a; chuongchun, dîla chun tui an inhâk hlum ta a.
Chun, a vâituhai chu an tlân a, khuo le lohaia dâm chun an hril a. Chun, “Ieng am a ni ta leh?” tia en dingin an hung khâwm tâwl a.
Chun, Isu kuom an hung tlung a, khawhri iman, Legion iman kha, puon sila, lungril ngai puta ṭhung an hmu a, chuongchun, an ṭi ta a.
Chun, a hretuhai chun khawhri imanpa chunga thil hung tlung zie le, vawk chanchinhai chu chuonghai kuoma chun an lo hril a.
Chun, chuonghai chun Isu chu an rama inthawka suok dingin an ngên ta a.
Chun, lawnga a chuong ding lai takin, khawhri imanpa khan Isu kuoma um zing a ngên a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a phal naw a, a kuomah, “I ina i ruolhai kuomah fe la, Lalpain thil a thawpêk che hi a ropuizie le a lunginsietzie che hi va hril rawh,” a ti ta lem a.
Chun, Isu chu lawnga râl khing tieng a hung kai nâwk chun, mipui nasatak a kuomah an hung khâwm a, ama chu dîl panga chun a um a.
Chun, inkhâwmna hotuhai laia mi pakhat, a hming Jaira chu a hung a, Isu a hmu phingleh a ke bulah a bawkkhup a,
“Ka naunu naupangte a thi vâng vâng a, a hung hara, a hung dam theina dingin, hunga a chunga i kut innghat dingin ka ngên che,” tiin a ngên ṭal a.
Chuongchun, Isu chu ama le chun an va fe a, chun, mipui nasatakin an zui a, an hneng sup sup a.
Chun, nuhmei pakhat kum sâwmpahni thipûtin a damnaw a,
dâktawr tamtak kuomah nasatakin a tuor ta a, a nei po po khawm chu a sêng zo ta a, ṭhathnem nêkin a zuol deu deu lem a.
Chu minu chun Isu chanchin a lo hriet a, a hnungah mipui lai chun a hung a, a puon chu a them a,
“A puon chau khawm them lang sukdamin um el ka tih,” a ti lungril a nih.
Chuongchun, kârlovin a thipût chu a hung bo nghâl ta a, a natna chu sukdam a ni tah ti a taksa chun ân hriet ta a.
Chun, Isu chun a sûnga thilthawtheina chu a suok ti a lo hriet a, mipui lai chun a ngha vêl nghâl ta a, “Tu am a na ka puon them kha?” a ta.
Chun, a inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Mipuiin an hneng sup sup che hi i hmu nghâl a, ‘Tu am a na a mi them,?’ iengtiziea ti am i na?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a themtu chu hmu tumin a en vêl a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei chun a chunga Isu thil thawzie chu hrein ṭi le inthin pumin a hung a, a hmaah a bawkkhup a, a kuomah thu indiktakin a hril vawng ta a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ka naunu, i ringna hi i dampui a nih, lungmuongtakin fe la, i natna chu lo dam sawng ta raw se,” a ta.
A la ṭawng zing laiin inkhâwmna in hotu ina inthawkin mi an hung a, “I naunu a thi tah, iengdingin am inchûktirtu hi la suksâwl rawp i ta?” an ta.
Isu ruok chun, an thu hril chu ngaisak lovin inkhâwmna in hotu kuoma chun, “Ṭi naw, awi el rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Peter hai, Jakob hai, Jakob unau Johan hai chau naw chu tukhawm ama zui ve a phal ta naw a.
Chun, inkhâwmna in hotu in chu an va tlung a, Isu chun an lo buoi mur mur le, an lo ṭap veng vung a, an khêk tuor tuor chu a va hmu a.
Chun, a va lût chun, an kuomah, “Iengdinga inri veng vunga ṭap am in na? naupang chu a thi nawh, a in lem a nih,” a ta.
Anni hlak chun an nuisan el a; ama hlak chun an rêngin a hnawt dawk a, naupang nu le pa le a kuoma umhai chu a ṭhuoi a, naupang umnaa chun a va lût a.
Chun, naupang kut chu a chel a, a kuoma chun,“Talitha kumi,” a ta. Chu chu, “Bawinu tho rawh ka ti che,” tina a nih.
Chun, naupangnu chu a hung tho a, a fe thei nghâl ta a; ama chu kum sâwmpahni mi a ni hrim ta a. Chun, anni chun namênin mak an ti naw a.

Chun, Châwlni a hung na, inkhâwmna inah ân chûktir ta a. Chuongchun, mi tamtak a thu hre hai chun, “Hi mipa hin hieng thu hi khawlaia inthawka a hriet am a na? Hi mipa kuoma pêka um hi ieng varna am a na? A kut ngeiin thil mak tak tak a thaw hi iengtizie am a na?

Hi mipa hi Mari naupa, Jakob hai, Jose hai, Juda hai, Simon hairawi unaupa, thingrem siemtu kha a ni naw am a nih? A farnuhai khawm hitaka ei kuoma um an ni nâwm a nih?” an ta, mak an ti hle a. Chuongchun, a chungah an lungni ta naw a.
Chun, mi damnaw tlâwmte chunga kut innghata a sukdam ti chau naw chu, chu hmuna chun thilmak dang hrim a thaw thei naw a.
An awi nawna chu mak a ti hle a. Chun, inchûktir pum peiin khuohai chu a fang vêl a.
Chun, sâwm le pahni hai chu a ko a, pahni peiin a tir suok ta a; khawhri inthieng nawhai chunga thuneina a pêk bawk a.
kekawk ruok chu bun ding a ti a. “Zakuo pahni hâk naw ro,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuomah, “Khawlai khawm in tlungna ina chun chu hmuna inthawka in suok nâwk hmakhat chu, tlung zing pei ro.
Chuongchun, an fe suok a, mipuihai kuomah simna thu an hril a.
Mi dang ruok chun, “Elija a ni chu,” an ta; mi dangin, “Zâwlnei a ni chu, zâwlneihai laia pakhat ang kha,” an ta.
Herod ruok chun a lo hrietin, “Johan, a lu ka itanpa ngei kha a hung tho nâwk a ni chu,” a ta.
Johan chun Herod kuomah, “I unaupa nuhmei i nei pêk hi a thieng naw a nih,” a lo ti ta bawk a.
Chuleichun, Herodi chun ama chu a hmêl huot rieu a, sukhlum a nuom a; nisienlakhawm, a thei si naw a;
Chun, Herod chun a pieng ni champha phâk nia a mi ropuihai, sipai hotu lienhai dâm, Galili rama mi lienhai rawi ta dinga, zâna ruoi a ṭhe laiin hun remchâng a hung um ta a.
Herodi naunu ngei chu a hung lût a, a lâm a, Herod le a thlaithlêng awtpuituhai chu a suklâwm ta a; chuongchun, lal chun naupangnu kuoma chun, “I dit dit mi hni rawh, pêng ka ti che,” a ta.
“Iengkhawm i mi hni phawt chu, ka ram chenve rau khawm pêng ka ti che,” tiin a kuomah a lo inkhâm ta bawk a.
Chun, ama chu a suok a, a nu kuoma chun, “Ieng am hnîng ka ta?” a va ta. Chun, ama chun, “Baptistu Johan lu,” a lo ta.
Chun, ama chu inhmawtakin lal kuoma chun a va lût nghâl ta a, “Thlêngin Baptistu Johan lu i mi pêk nghâl ka nuom a nih,” tîn a hni a.
Chun, lal chu a lungngai ta bêk bêk el a; nisienlakhawm, ân khâmnahai le a thlaithlêng awtpuituhai lei chun a sêl nuom naw a.
Chun, lal chun a vêngtu sipai pakhat a tir nghâl ta a, a lu chu hung lâk ding thu a pêk a. Chun, ama chun intângna ina chun a lu a va tan a,
a lu chu thlêngin a hung lâk a, naupangnu kuoma chun a pêk a, ama chun a nu kuomah a pêk a.
Chun, a închûktirhai chun an hriet phingleh a ruong chu an vân hlawm a, thlânah an inzâl ta a.
Chun, tirkohai chu Isu kuomah an hung inkhâwm a, iengkim an thil thaw tahai, an thu inchûktir tahai po po chu an hril a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni rawi ngawtin thlalêr hmunah a tumin hung unla, châwl phawt ro,” a ta. (Mi tamtak an insûl zut zut a, bu takngiel khawm an fâk hman nghâl naw a.)
Chuongchun, thlalêr tieng lawngin a tumin an va fe ta a.
Chun, an va fe lai chu mipuihai chun an hmu a, mi tamtakin anni chu an hriet a, khaw tina inthawkin chu hmuna chun kein an tlân khâwm a, an lo lekhal ta a.
Chun, khuo chu a hung inhnu ta hle a, a inchûktirhai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Ahi thlalêr hmun a na, khuo khawm ân hnu ta bawk nghâl a.
Anni rawi hi ei kâwl vêl lova dâm le khuoa dâm an fâk ding ieng amanih bêk an inchâwk theina dingin infetir tâwl ta la,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun an kuomah, “Nangnîn fâk ding pe ta unla,” tiin a dawn a. Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Bei duli zahni man vân chawin fâk ding kan pêk ding am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Beiphêk iengzât am in nei a? hung en ta u,” a ta. Chun, an nei zât an hriet phingleh, “Panga, ngatê pahni leh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun, an rêngin hlo hring chunga chun apâwl peia inṭhungtir dingin an kuomah thu a pêk a.
Chun, atlarin za khat dâm, sâwmnga dâm peiin an ṭhung tâwl a.

Chun, ama chun bei panga le ngatê pahni chu a lâk a, vân tieng nghain mal a sâwm a, beiphêkhai chu a khawi a, mipui chu infâktir dingin a inchûktirhai kuomah a pêk a, ngate pahni khawm chu mi po po lai chun a sem a.
Chun, an rêngin an fâk a, an khawp tâwl ta a.
Chun, bei nâwi le nga nâwihai chu bâwm sâwm le pahni an rût sip a.
Bei fatuhai chu patling ruok khawm sâng nga hiel an nih.
Chun, ama ngeiin mipui chu ân ṭintir sûngin râl khing tienga Bethsaidaa lo fe hmasa dingin a inchûktirhai chu lawngah ân chuong tir nghâl ta a.
Chun, anni ân ṭintir hnung chun ṭawngṭai dingin tlangah a fe ta a.
Chun, zântieng inhnu deu a hung ni chun lawng chu dîl lai taka chun a lo um a, ama chu a khât chauin khawmuola chun a um a.
Chun, an lawng kar chu an lung a zîng hlein a hmu a, thliin a ni naw tieng panga a mût leiin. Vârṭien ding lai vêlin dil chunga kea lâwnin anni tieng a hung pan a, anni chu fe khêl a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun ama chu dîl chunga kea lâwn an hang hmu chun thlâ amani an sâwn a, an khêk ta rak el a; an rêngin ama an hmu a, an thlaphâng hle a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun anni chu a biek nghâl ta a, an kuomah, “Lungmuongtakin um ro, keima ka nih annâwm, ṭi naw ro,” a ti ta a.
Chun, lawnga chun an kuomah a hang chuong ve a, thli hrang chu a ma ta a; chuongchun, an lungril chun mak an ti hle a,
bei thu kha a ngaina an hrietthiem si naw a, an lungril a ngar leiin.
Chun, râl khingtieng an kai chun Gennesaret ram, khawmuol an tlung a, vapanga chun lawng chu an thlung a.
Chun, lawnga inthawka an suok chun, mihai chun ama chu an lo hriet nghâl ta a;
chu ram vêla chun an tlân vêl ta sup sup a, a um ti an hrietna taphawta chun damnawhai dâm an zâlphaa zâl pum zingin an zâwn vêl ta ruoi el a.

Chun, khaw chînhaia dâm, khaw lienhaia dâm, lohaia dâm, khawlai a lûtna taphawta chun damnawhai chu dâwr hmuna dâm an inzâltir tâwl a; a puon hmawr bêk khawm them thei an hni a. Chuongchun, ama tâwk po chu an dam pei ta a.
Chun, Pharisaihai le Dân inchûktirtuhai laia mi tuhai amanih Jerusalema inthawka hunghai chu a kuomah an hung inkhâwm a.
Chuonghai chun a închûktir aṭhenhaiin kut bala bei an fâk an lo hmu ta a. Bal ti hi sâwplo tina a nih.
(Pharisaihai thurosie chu an pawm tlat leiin an kut fâitaka an sâwp naw chun an fâk ngai si nawh.
Chun, dâwr hmuna inthawk an inlâwi khawmin an insil naw chun an fâk ngai naw a. Chun, thu dang tamtak pawm tlat ding an lâksâwnghai chu a um a, nohai, bêlhai, sumbêlhai sâwp hai ang hi.)
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun, “Iengdinga i închûktirhai hin ruolhlui thurosie ang peia um lova kut bala bei an fâk el hlak am a na?” tiin an indawn a.
‘Hi hai rawi hin an bauin an mîn pâk a,
An lungril ruok chun an mi hlat si a.
An inchûktirnaa mihriem thupêkhai an inchûktir leiin,
An mi biek khawm hi a thlâwn el a nih,’
ti ziek ang khan.
Pathien thupêkhai chu lungkham lovin, mihriem thurosie chu in chel tlat a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuomah, “Nangni thurosiehai in pawm theina dingin Pathien thupêkhai chu in dit naw hi, rem chu in hriet ngawt hi aw!
nangni ruok chun hieng hin in ti hlak a, ‘Mîn a nu amanih, a pa amani kuomah, I mi sawrna ding hi Korban a ni tah,’ a ti chun, (chu chu Pathien kuoma pêk tina a nih),
a nu amanih, a pa amani ta dingin iengkhawm a thawpêk in phal ta ngai naw a;
in thurosie peksâwng hin Pathien thu chu in baw hmang hlak a nih; chuong ang chu tamtak in thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, mipui chu a ko nâwk a, an kuomah, “In rêngin ka thu hi lo ngâi seng unla, a ngâi lo thiem ta u;
Mihriem puotienga inthawka a phîng sûnga lût ama sukthieng naw thei iengkhawm a um nawh, mihriem phîng sûnga inthawka hung suokhai chu mihriem sukthieng nawtu an ni lem a nih,” a ta.
[Tukhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se.]
Chun, mipuihai chu ina a lûtsan hnungin, a inchûktirhaiin tekhithu chu ama an indawn fel a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni khawm chuong ang lâwma hrietna nei naw in ni maw? Hi hi in hriet naw maw? Iengkhawm puotienga inthawka mihriem sûnga lût po chun ama a sukthiengnaw thei nawh;
a lungrila lût lovin, a phîngah a lût a, inhnâwmnaah a suok lem hlak leiin, ti hi?” a ta. (Chu chu fâkding tin rêng fâk a thieng, a tina a nih.)
Chun, ama bâwkin, “Mihriem phîng sûnga inthawka hung suok chun, chu tak chun mihriem a sukthieng naw hlak a nih.
Sûng tienga um mihriem lungrila inthawkhai chun, ngaituona suol dâm a hung suok hlak nghâl a; inditna dâm, inrûkna dâm, tuolthatna dâm, uirena dâm,
inhnarna dâm, suolna dâm, hlêmna dâm, hurna dâm, îtsîkna dâm, hrilsietna dâm, chapona dâm le invêtna dâm hi;
chuong suolhai po po chu sûngtienga inthawkin a hung suok a, mihriem chu a sukthieng naw hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a tho a, chutaka inthawk chun Tura le Sidon
Chuongchun, nuhmei pakhat naunu khawhri inthieng naw iman nei chun a chanchin a lo hriet a, a ke bulah a va bawkkhup nghâl ta a.
Chu nuhmei chu Grik mi a na, insiengna tieng chu Surophoiniki mi a nih. Ama chun a naunu sûnga khawhri hnawt dawk dingin a ngên a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Nauhai chu khawp hmasa phawt raw hai se, nauhai bei lâkpêk a, uihai kuoma pêk a mawi nawh ie,” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, ni chu a nih; nisienlakhawm, dawkân hnuoia uihai khawmin nauhai bei nâwi chu an fâk hlak annâwm,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “I thu hril lei chun fe ta raw le; khawhri chu i naunu sûnga inthawkin a suok tah,” a ta.
Chun, a ina chun a fe ta a, a nau chu khawhri isuoksan zoa khuma zâl a va hmu ta a.
Chun, Tura rama inthawkin a suok nâwk a, Sidon khuo sirin Dekapoli ram fe thleng peiin Galili dîl chu a tlung ta a.
Chun, mi pakhat nasêt, ṭawng khawm ṭawng fel thei lo hi a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a, a chunga a kut innghat dingin an ngên a.
Chun, ama chun mipui laia chu, a khât chauin a tumin a ṭhuoi a, a kutpârhaiin a nakuo chu a khîkpêk a, chil a sâk a, a lei a them pêk a.
Chun, vân tieng nghain ân thuok huoi a, a kuomah, “Ephatha,” a ta. Chu chu, “Lo inhawng rawh,” tina a nih.
Chuongchun, a nahai chu a hung inhawng a, a lei khitna khawm chu a hung insût a, chiengtakin a ṭawng thei ta a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah tukhawm hril lo ding a ti tlat a; nisienlakhawm, a khap nasa zuol po leh, ṭhahnemngaitakin an puongdar nâwk zuol a.
“Ama chun iengkim ṭhatakin a thaw a; nasêt dâm a sukvarpêk a, ṭawng thei naw dâm khawm ân ṭawngtir hlak,” an ta, mak an ti nasa bêk bêk a.
Chuong lai chun mipui tamtak an hung um nâwk a, chuonga fâk ding iengkhawm an nei naw lai chun, ama chun a închûktirhai chu a ko a, an kuomah,
“Tûn mipuihai hi ka kuomah ni thum an um ta a, fâk ding iengkhawm an nei naw leiin ka lunginsiet bêk bêk a nih.
Bu ngheia an in tieng kân fetir el chun, lam kâr lakah an châu ding a ni si a, a ṭhen lem chu an hungna a hla hle si a,” a ta.
Chun, a închuktirhai chun, “Tuin am hienghai rawi hi sukkhawp thei an ta?” tiin ama an dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “Beiphêk iengzât am in nei a?” tiin anni chu ân dawn a. Chun, anni chun, “Phêk sari,” an ta.

Chun, mipuihai chu hnuoia ṭhung dingin thu a pêk a, chuongchun, bei phêk sari chu a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril zoin a khawi a; anni laia sem dingin a închûktirhai a pêk a; chuongchun, mipui lai chun an sem ta a.
Ngatê tlâwmte an nei bawk a, ama chun chu khawm chu mal a sâwm a, chuonghai khawm chu mipui laia sem ding thu a pêk a.
Chuongchun, an fâk a, an khawp tâwl ta a; an fâk mahla nawi khawm chu bâwmrâng sari zet an rût sip a.
Anni rawi chu sâng li lai an na; ama chun anni chu ân ṭintir ta a.
Chun, ama chu a închûktirhai lai lawngah a chuong nghâl ta a. Dalmanutha
Chun, anni chu a mâksan a, râl khing tieng a fe ta a.
Chun, a închûktirhai chun bei an chawi theinghil a, bei phêk khat chau naw chu lawnga chun bei dang hrim hrim an nei si naw a.
Chun, anni chun, “Bei ei nei dêr naw a,” tîn an in ngaituo a.
Chun, Isûn chu chu a lo hriet a, an kuomah, “Bei in nei naw leisek chun iengdinga in inngaituo am? Tu khawm hin in lungrilin in la hriet rawp naw maw? In lungril chu in sukngar ta am a nih?
Sâng nga laia bei phêk nga ka khawi lai khan a nâwi kha bâwm iengzât am in rût sip kha? In la hriet zing naw maw?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Sâwm le pahni,” an ta.
Chun, “Sâng li laia pasari ka khawi khan a nâwi kha bâwmrâng iengzât am in rût sip a?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Bâwmrâng sari,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Tu khawm hin a ngaina in la hriet rawp naw maw?” a ti ta a.
Chun, Bethsaida chu an hung tlung a. Chun, a kuomah mitdel an hung ṭhuoi a, ama chu them dingin Isu an ngên a.
Chun, ama chun mitdel kut chu a chel a, khaw kâwl tieng a fepui a; chun, a mita chun chil a sâk a, a chungah a kut ân nghat zoin, “I hmu thei ta?” tîn ân dawn a.
Chun, a hang tang a, “Mihriem chu ka hmu a, anachu thing lâwn angin ka hmu,” a ta.
Chun, a mita chun a kut ân nghat nawk a, chuongchun, ama chun a en zing a, a hung dam el ta a, iengkim chiengtakin a hmu thei ta a.
Chun, Isu chun, “Khuoa khawm hin lût ta naw la,” tîn a in tieng ân fetir ta a.
Chun, Isu le a închûktirhai chu an fe suok a, Philip Kaisari khawperhaia chun an fe a; chun, fe malamin a închûktirhai kuomah, “Mihaiin tu am a nih an mi ti a?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, ama chun a chanchin thu chu tukhawm hril lo ding a ti tlat a.

Chun, Mihriem Naupa chun thil tamtak a tuor dingzie dâm, upahai, thiempu lalhai le, Dân inchûktirtuhai dit nawa a um ding dâm, sukhluma a la um ding dâm, ni thum hnunga a thonâwk dingzie dâm anni ân chûktir ṭan ta a.
Chuong thu chu chiengtakin a hril a. Chun, Peter chun ama chu a tumin a ṭhuoi a, a kâwk a.
Ama ruok chu a ngha kîr a, a închûktirhai chu a en a, “Setan, ka hnungah fe rawh. Pathien thilhai ngaituo lovin, mihriem thilhai i ngaituo a ni hi,” tîn Peter chu a kâwk ta a.
Mîn khawvêl hi a pumin nei sienla, a hringna chân si sienla, ieng am ṭhahnem a ta?
Mîn a hringna sikin ieng am pe thei a ta?

Tukhawm tulai ruolthar uire le suksuol hmanghai laia kei le ka thu inzapuihai po chu, Mihriem Naupa hin vântirko inthienghai le a Pa ropuinaa inthuoma a hung pha chun, ama chu hung inzapui ve thung a tih,” a ta
Chun, ama bawkin an kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hitaka ngîr aṭhenhai hi Pathien ram chu thilthawtheina le a hung tlung an hmu hmâkhat chu thina intem tawp naw ding an um,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a silfênhai chu hnuoia puon sâwptu hrim hrimin an sâwp vâr thei naw ding khawp rakin a hung vâr a, a hung tle ta sur el a.
Chun, Elija le Mosie chu an kuomah an hung inlâr a, Isu le chun an inbiek ta a.
Chun, Peterin Isu a biek a, “Rabbi, ei ta dingin hitaka um hi a ṭha; bâwkte pathum khâwng ei ta, I ta dingin pakhat, Mosie ta dingin pakhat, Elija ta dingin pakhat,” a ta.
An ṭi bêk bêk leiin hril ding mumal a hriet si naw a.
Chun, an hang en vêl vat a, Isu chau naw chu tukhawm an kuomah chun an hmu ta naw a.
Chun, tlânga inthawk an ṭum laiin, Mihriem Naupa mithi laia a thonâwk hnunga chau naw chu an thil hmu chu tukhawm hril naw ding a ti tlat a.
Chuongchun, chu thu chu an vawng zing a, “Mithi laia a thonâwk chu ieng tina am nîng a ta?” tiin anni rawi chu an indawn tuo hlak a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Elija chu hung hmasa hrim a ta, iengkim a siem ṭha ding a nih: thil tamtak tuorin, mi hmusitin a um ding a nih ti Mihriem Naupa chanchin iengtiziea ziek am an na?
Nisienlakhawm, ka hril cheu hi: Elija chu a hung ta a nih. Chun, a chanchin an ziek ang ngei khan, a chungah an nuom nuomin an thaw ta hrim bawk a,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai kuom an zuk tlung chun, an vêla mipui nasatakhai le Dân inchûktirtuhaiin an lo sêl lai an zu hmu a.
Chun, mipui po po chun ama an hmu phing chun mak an ti hle a, a kuom tieng an tlân tâwl a, chibai an va bûk a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Annihai rawi leh ieng thu am a na in insêl?” tîn ân dawn a.
Mipui laia mi pakhatin an kuomah, “Inchuktirtu, ka naupa khawhri ṭawng thei naw iman chu i kuomah ka hung ṭhuoi a.
A manna taphawtah a the thlûk hlak a, chuongchun, a chilhuomhai a tla a, a hahai a rawt a, a hung khawng hlak a. Hnawt dawk dingin i închûktirhai ka ngên a, an thei si naw a,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ruolthar ringna nei nawhai, ieng chen am in kuomah um ka ta? Ieng chen am ngai thei ka ti cheu a? Ama chu ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi ro,” tiin a dawn a.

Chun, ama chu Isu kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; chuongchun, khawhri chun ama a hmu phingleh, naupang chu nasatakin a sawisa nghâl ta a; chuongchun, hnuoiah a tlu a, chilhuom tla reiruiin ân tleng ta tawp tawp a.
Chun, ama chun a pa kuomah, “Hienga a um phutna hi ieng chen am a ni ta a?” tiin ân dawn a. Ama chun, “A naupang laia inthawkin a ni tah;
hieng hin ama sukbohmang dingin vawi tamtak meia dâm, tuia dâm a nam thlûk ta a; nisienlakhawm, nangin iengtin amanih bêk i thaw thei chun mi lunginsiet la, mi ṭhangpui rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn, a kuomah “ ‘I thei chun’ i ti maw? Awitu ta ding chun iengkim thaw thei a nih i sawnnaw,” a ta.
Chuongchun, naupang pa chun, “Ka awi, ka awinawnaa hin mi ṭhangpui rawh,” tîn a khêk suok nghâl ta a.

Chun, Isûn mipui an hung tlân khâwm chu a hmuin khawhri inthieng naw chu a hal a, a kuomah, “Nang thlarau ṭawng thei naw le nasêt, thu ka pêk che hi, a sûnga inthawk hung suok la, lût nâwk ta naw rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a khêk suok a, nasataka a sawisak zo chun a hung suok ta a, chun, naupang chu thi ang elin a um a, chuongchun, mi tam lem chun, “A thi a nih,” an ti a.
Isu ruok chun a kutah a chel a, a keitho a; chuongchun, a hung tho el ta a.
Chun, Isu chu in a va lût chun, a închûktirhaiin, “Iengdinga keinîn kan hnawt dawk thei naw am a na?” tiin fienrielah an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Hieng ang hi ṭawngṭaina
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun, an fe suok a, Galili ram chu an fe thleng a, tu ihriet khawm a nuom naw a.
A închûktirhai chu a hril a, an kuomah, “Mihriem Naupa hi mihriemhai kuta inmantirin a um ding a nih, sukhlum bawk an ta; chun, sukhlum hnung ni thum chenah tho nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a thu hril chu a ngaina an hriet naw a; ama hlak chu an indawn ngam si naw a.
Chun, Kapernaum chu an hung tlung a; chun, in sûnga chun a um laiin an kuomah, “Lampuia khan ieng thu am a na in insêl?” tîn ân dawn a.
Chun, naupangte a kei a, anni lai ân ngîrtir a, chun, a kutin a kuo a, an kuomah,
Johan chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, tuin amanih i hmingin khawhrihai a hnawt dawk kan hmu a, a mi zui ve naw leiin kan khap tah annaw,” a ta.
Isu ruok chun, “Khap ta naw ro,tûkhawm ka hminga thilmak thaw si a, a mi hrilse thei an um naw a nih.
“Chun, tûkhawm hieng a mi awitu chîtêhai laia pakhat chau khawm sukthlu taphawt chu, a rîngah bu râwtna lung lientak inhlitirin tuisuorietah thlâkin um sienla, a ta dingin ṭha lem a tih.
[Chu hmuna chun an nge a thi ngai ta naw a, mei khawm chu a rêm ngai ta nawh.]
Chun, i kein a sukthlûk che chun tan rawh; ke pahni neia Hremhmuna peia i um nêk chun, ke baia hringnaa i lût i ta dingin a ṭha lem.
[Chu hmuna chun an nge a thi ngai ta naw a, mei khawm chu a rêm ngai ta nawh.]
Chun, i mitin a sukthlûk che chun khel dawk el rawh, mit khingkhat neia Pathien rama lût i ta dingin a ṭha lem: mit khinghni neia Hremhmuna
Mi tin meia
Chun, a tho a, chutaka inthawk chu Judai ram le Jordan râlah a fe ta a; chun, mipuihai chu a kuomah an hung inkhâwm nâwk a, chuongchun, a thaw dân pângngaiin a lo inchûktir nâwk a.
Chun, Pharisaihai ṭhenkhat a kuomah an hung a, ama fiena dingin “Mîn a nuhmei a mâk a thieng am?” tiin an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Mosien iengtin am thu a pêk cheu a?” tîn a dawn a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn an kuomah, “In lungril ngar leiin a nih in sawnnaw chu thu chu ân ziekpêk cheu chu.
‘Chuleichun, pasalin a nu le pa mâksan a ta, a nuhmei chel a ta;
Chuleiin, Pathienin a izawm ta hnung chu mihriemin ṭhe naw raw se,” a ta.
Chun, ina chun, a închûktirhaiin chuong thu chu an indawn nâwk a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Tûkhawm a nuhmei ma a, mi dang nei taphawt chun a nuhmei chu a retsan a nih;
ama khawm chun a pasal inṭhepuia mi dang a nei chun a uire a ni bawk,” a ta.
Chun, a ithem dingin naupangtehai an hung ṭhuoi a; chun, inchûktirhai chun an lo hal a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn chu chu a hmuin a lung a ni naw bêk bêk a, an kuoma chun, “Naupangtêhai ka kuomah inhungtir unla, khap naw ro; Pathien ram chu hieng ang mihai ta a ni si a.
Chun, annirawi chu a hang kuo a, an chungah kut innghatin mal a sâwmpêk ta a.
Chun, fe dinga a suok laitakin mi pakhat a kuom tieng a hung tlân a, a hmaah a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu ṭha, kumkhuoa hringna ka nei theina dingin ieng am thâwng ka ta?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, Isu chun a kuomah, “Iengdinga ṭha i mi ti? Mi pakhat chau naw chu tukhawm ṭha an um nawh, chu chu Pathien a nih.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, chuong thu po po chu naupang chîte ka ni laia inthawkin ka zâwm hlak,” a ta.

Chun, Isûn ama chu a en a, a hmangai ta a, a kuomah, “Kawng khat i la bâk, fe la, i nei taphawt zawr la, pasiehai kuomah pe rawh, chuongchun, vânah ro nei i tih; chun, hung la mi hung zui rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, chuong thu lei chun a hmêl chu a hung inthim khup el a, lungzîngtakin a fe hmang ta a, sum tamtak nei mi a ni si a.
Chun, Isûn a en vêl a, a închûktirhai kuoma chun, “Sumhauhai chu Pathien rama lût a vân tak âwm de e,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun, a thu hril chu mak an ti hle a, Isu ruok chun a dawn nâwk a, an kuomah, “Nauhai, sum ringhai ta ding chun Pathien rama lût a vân tak hlak de aw;
Mihausa Pathien rama a lût nêkin sanghâwngsei ṭhim naa a lût thleng awl lem a tih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun mak an ti nasa bêk bêk a, a kuomah, “Anleh, tu am sandam ni thei an ti leh?” an ta.
Isûn anni chu a en a, “Chu chu mihriem ta dingin thaw ruol a ni naw a, Pathien ta ding ruok chun thaw ruol lo a ni nawh; Pathien ta dingin iengkim thaw thei a ni si a,” a ta.
Peterin a kuomah, “Ngai ta, keinîn iengkim mâksanin kan zui che a,” tiin a hang hril phut a.
Isu chun, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu, tûkhawm keia lei le Chanchin Ṭha leia in amanih, unaupahai amanih, farnuhai amanih, nu amanih, pa amanih, nauhai amanih, ram dâm khawm amanih fe san taphawt chu,
hi dam sûng ngei khawm hin, inhai, unaupahai, farnuhai, nuhai, nauhai, ramhai dâm a lêt zain, suknawmnatnahai leh, hmu naw ding tukhawm an um nawh, hun la hung tlung dinga chatuona hringna leh.
Chun, Jerusalema hang fe dingin lampuiah an um a; Isu chu a hmasa a. Anni chun mak an ti hle a, a hung zuituhai chun an ṭi a. Chun, ama chun sâwm le pahnihai chu a tumin a ṭhuoi nâwk a,

“Ngai ta u, Jerusalemah ei hang fe nâwk ding a ni hi; Mihriem Naupa hi thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai kuoma inmantirin a la um ding a nih. Anni chun thi dingin a chungah thu rêlthlûng an ta, Jentailhai kuomah pêng an tih.
Chun, nuizat siemnân hmang an ta, chil sâk khum an ta, vuong an ta, sukhlum an tih; chun, ni thum chenah thonâwk a tih,” tiin a chunga thil hung tlung dinghai chu an kuomah a hril ta a.
Chun, Zebedai naupahai Jakob le Johan chun ama chu an hung hnai a, a kuomah,“Inchûktirtu, i kuomah kan hni dinghai hi i mi thawpêk kan nuom,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “In ta dingin ieng am thawpêk inla cheu in nuom a?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “I ropuinaa chun i changtieng pakhat, i vawitieng pakhat mîn ṭhungtir raw aw?” an ta.
Isu ruok chun an kuomah, “In hni chu in hriet naw a nih. Ka no dâwn ding chu in dâwn thei am a nih? Ka baptisma chang ding khawm chu in chang thei am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Thei e,” an ti a. Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Ka no dâwn ding chu dâwn in ta, ka baptisma chang ding khawm chu chang vêng in tih;
Nisienlakhawm, ka changtienga manih ka vawitienga manih, ṭhung ding thu chu keia pêk ding a ni naw a, an
Chun, sâwmhai chun chu chu an lo hrietin Jakob le Johan chunga chun an lungninaw ta bêk bêk a.
Nangni lai ruok chun chuong chu ni naw nih, tukhawm in laia mi lien ni nuom phawt chu in rawngbâwltuin a um lem ding a nih!
Mihriem Naupa meu khawm rawngbâwlpêka um dinga hung a ni naw a, mi tamtak intlanna dinga a hringna pe ding lema hung a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, Jeriko an hung tlung a; chun, Isu Jerikoa inthawk chun a închûktirhai leh, mipui nasatak leh a suok laiin kutdaw mitdel, Timai naupa Bartimai chu lampui sîrah a lo ṭhung a.
Chuongchun, Nazareth Isu a nih ti a hriet phingin, “Isu David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin a khêk ta a.
Mi tamtakin to dingin an hal a; nisienlakhawm, ama chun, “David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin a khêk zuol det a.
Isu chu a lo ngîr a, “Ama chu hung ko ta u,” a ta. Chun, mitdel chu an ko a, a kuomah, “Lungmuongtakin um rawh, a ko che,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a puon a pei a, ân châwm tho a, Isu kuomah a fe a.
Chun, Isûn ama chu a lo biek a, “I chungah ieng ang am ka thaw i nuom a?” a ta. Chun, mitdel chun a kuomah, “Rabboni, hmu thei ka nuom,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn, “Fe ta rawh, i ringna hi i dampui a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, a hmu thei nghâl ta a, lampuia chun Isu a zui ta a.
Chun, Jerusalem an tlung tâwm a, Oliv tlânga Bethphage le Bethani khuo kâwl an tlungin, a închûktirhai laia mi pahni a tir a,
an kuomah, “In hma zâwn khuoa sawn fe unla; chun, in hei lût hlimin sabengtungte thlung, tukhawm la chuongna ngainaw va hmûng in ta; chu chu sût unla hung kei ro.
Chun, tûkhawmin, ‘A kha iengding am in ti a?’ an ti cheu chun, ‘Lalpain a mamaw a nih, ahin hung insietir nâwk vak a tih,’ ti ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an fe ta a, kawtthlêra kawtkhâr puotienga sabengtungte inthlung an va hmu a. Chun, chu chu an sût ta a.
Chun, chutaka ngîr tuhai amani chun an kuomah, “Sabengtungte kha iengdinga in sût?” an ta.
Chun, anni chun, Isu hril ang tak khan an kuoma chun an hril a; chuongchun, an fe an phal ta a.
Chun, sabengtungte chu Isu kuomah an hung kei a, a chunga chun puonhai an pha a; chuongchun, a chungah a chuong ta a.
Chun, mi tamtakin lampuia chun an puon an pha a; mi dangin lova sâwlhna an va sât a, an pha bawk a.
“Hosanna, Lalpa hminga hung chu inpâkin um raw se;
Ram hung tlung ding ei Pa David ram chu, inpâkin um raw se;
A chunghnungtaka khin Hosanna,”
tiin an khêk a.
Chun, Jerusalema Pathien biekina chun a va lût a; iengkim a en vêl zo chun; zântieng khawm a lo ni ta a, a suok a, sâwm le pahnihai leh Bethaniah an fe ta a.
Chun, azîng Bethania inthawka a suok hnungin a phîng a ṭâm ta a.
Chun, theichang kûng hna nei hlataka hin a hei hmu a, “A ra ka hmu duoiin,” tiin a va fe a; a va tlung chun a hna chau naw chu iengkhawm a hmu naw a; theichang ra pha a ni naw hrim a.
Chuongchun, Isûn thing chu a biek a, “Tuta hnung kumkhawtluongin i ra hrim hrim tukhawmin fa ta naw raw hai se,” a ta. A închûtirhai rawi chun chu chu an hriet a.

Chun, Jerusalem chu a tlung a, Pathien biekinah a va lût a, biekina iengkhat zawrtuhai le ân chawtuhai chu a hnawt suok ta a. Tangka thlengtuhai dawkânhai le, vaṭhu zawrtuhai ṭhungphahai khawm chu a nam thlûk pêk bawk a.
Chun, Pathien biekina chun tukhawmin thuomhnaw an chawi thleng chu a phal ta bawk naw a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun chu chu an hriet a, a sukbo theina ding zie an zawng a. Mipuihai po po chun a închûktirna chu mak an ti hle leiin ama an ṭi bawk si.
Chun, zântieng a hung ni chun, Isu le a inchûktirhai chu khawpuia inthawk chun an fe suok a.
Chun, zîngkâra an fe malam chun theichang kûng chu a zung chena thêm zo vawngin an hmu ta a.
Chuongchun, Peterin a hriet suok nâwk a, a kuomah, “Rabbi en ta, theichang kûng ṭawngsie în phur kha a lo thêm vawng tah,” a ta.
Chun, Isu chun an kuomah, “Pathienah ringna nei ro.
Chuleichun, ka ti cheu hi, iengkim ṭawngṭaia in hni taphawt chu, hmusain inngai unla, chuongchun, hmûng in tih.
Chun, ṭawngṭai dinga in ngîr pha po leh tu chunga khawm thupawi ieng am a nih in nei chun ngaidam ro; vâna in Pa khawmin in bawsietnahai chu a ngaidam theina ding cheu in.
Chun, Jerusalem chu an tlung nâwk a; chun, Pathien biekina a lêng laiin thiempu lalhai, Dân inchûktirtuhai, upahai chu a kuomah an hung a,
a kuoma chun, “Tu thuin am hieng hi i thaw a na? Hienghai hi thaw dingin tuin am thu a pêk che a?” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Kei khawmin thu bau khat indawn vêng ka ti cheu; mi dawn unla, chuongchun, tu thuin am hieng hi ka thaw hril ka ti cheu.
Johan baptisma kha vâna mi thu amani, mihriem thu? mi dawn ro,” a ta.
Chun, an inngaituo a, “ ‘Vâna mi thu,’ ei ti chun, ‘Ieng dinga a thu in awi naw?’ a mi ti âwm si a.
‘Mihriem thu,’ ei ti el ding am a ni chu?” an ta. Nisienlakhawm, mipui chu an ṭi a, mi po poin Johan chu zâwlnei takin an ngai tâwl si a.
Chuongchun, Isu chu an dawn a, “Kan hriet nawh,” an ta. Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Kei khawmin tu thuin am hieng hi ka thaw a, hril bîk naw ning cheuah,” a ta.
Chun, a lo pha chun huona ra chu a chanâi lo enkawltuhai kuoma va la dingin lo enkawltuhai kuoma chun suok pakhat a tir a.
Chun, chu mipa chu an lo man a, an vuok a, kut ruokin an infetir ta a.
Chun, suok dang an kuoma chun a tir nâwk a; chu khawm chu a lu an lo sukpawp a, inzakumtakin an lo sawisa a.
Chun, suok dang a tir nâwk pei a, chu mipa chu an lo sukhlum a. Suok dang tamtak khawm aṭhen an lo vuok a, aṭhen an lo sukhlum a.
Chun, pakhat, naupa dittak chu a la nei a, ‘Ka naupa hi chu inza êm naw ni hai am,’ tiin ama chu a nuhnungtakah an kuomah a tir a.
Nisienlakhawm, chuong lo enkawltuhai chun, ‘Hi mipa hi rohluotu ding chu a nih; that ei tiu khai; chuongchun, a ro hluo dinghai hi ei ta a ni el ding a nih,’ an in ti a.
Chuongchun, ama chu an lo man a, an sukhlum a, grêp huona inthawk chun an the suok ta a.
Chuongchun, huon neitu chun iengtin am hung thâwng a ta? Lo enkawltuhai chu hung sukbo a ta, huon chu mi danghai pêng a tih.
Hi Pathien Lekha Thu hi in tiem naw am a nih?
‘In bâwltuhai lung dit naw kha,
Chu ngei chu a kia lung ṭhangkaitak a lo ni tah.
Ei mithmua hin a mak a nih,’
ti hi,” a ta.
Chun, ama chu man an tum ta a, nisienlakhawm, mipui an ṭi si a, chu tekhithu chu anni demin a hril a nih ti an hriet si a. Chuongchun, ama chu an mâksan a, an fe hmang ta a.
Chun, a thu hrila inthawka man dingin Pharisaihai le Herod pâwla tuhai amanih a kuomah an tir a.

Chun, anni chu an hung tlung chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, mi indiktak i na, tukhawm pawisak chuong i nei nawh ti kan hriet a, tukhawm thlier bîk nei lovin, theipatâwpin Pathien thu în chûktir hlak a. Kaisar kuoma sie chawi hi a thieng am a ni a thieng naw? kan pêk ding am a ni, kan pêk naw ding?” an ta.
Ama ruok chun an vervêkziehai chu hre zingin, an kuomah, “Iengdinga in mi fie am a na? Duli
Chuongchun, an hung lâk a. Ama chun an kuomah, “Hi hi tu lim le tu hming am a na?” a ta. Anni chun, “Kaisar,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Isûn an kuomah, “Kaisar thilhai chu Kaisar kuomah pe unla, Pathien thilhai chu Pathien kuomah pe ta unla,” a ta. Chuongchun, mak an ti bêk bêk a.
Awle, Sal sari hi an um a, a upatakin nuhmei a nei a, suonmawngin a thi a .
Chuongchun, a pahnina chun a nuhmei chu a hluo a, suon mawngin a thi nâwk bawk a; pathumna khawmin chuong bawk chun.
Chuongchun, sal sarihai chu suon hrim hrim nei lovin suon mawngin an thi vawng el ta a. A nuhnungtaka chun nuhmei khawm chu a thi ta a.
Thonâwk phaleh a tu tak nuhmei am nîng a ta? An pasari chun nuhmeiin an nei seng si a,” tiin an indawn a.
Isûn an kuomah, “Hi lei hin a nih in ngai suol rawp hlak, Pathien Lekha Thu le Pathien thil thaw theizie in hriet naw leiin.
Mithi laia an tho nâwk hnungin nuhmei pasal innei ta naw nihai a, vâna vântirkohai ang an ni lem ta ding a nih.
Chun, mithihai keithoa an um ding thu chu, Mosie lekhabua chîmbuk thua khan Pathienin ‘Kei Abraham Pathien, Isak Pathien, Jakob Pathien ka nih,’ tia a biekzie kha in tiem naw am a nih?
Ama chu mithi Pathien a ni naw a, mi hring Pathien a ni lem; in ngai suol nasa hle a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai laia mi pakhat a hung a, an insêl chu a lo ngai zing a, Isûn annirawi chu ṭhatakin a dawn ti a hriet a, a kuomah, “Thupêk po po lai ieng him a ropui
Isun “A ropui tak chu hi hi a nih, ‘Israelhai, ngai ta u, Lalpa ei Pathien chu Lalpa pakhat chau a nih,
David ngeiin, Thlarau Inthiengin,
‘Lalpa chun ka Lalpa kuomah,
Ka changtieng ṭhung rawh,
I hmêlmahai i kepha hnuoia ka sie hmakhat chu,’ a ti a,
“David ngei chun ama chu, ‘Lalpa,’ a ti si a, khâwlai am a naupa ni hlak a ta?” tîn a dawn a. Chun, vântlânghai chun a thu chu lâwmtakin an ngai a.
Chun, a închûktirnaa chun, “Dân inchûktirtuhai lai hin fimkhur ro, anni chun zakuo fuol hâka lêng an nuom hlak a, dâwr hmuna chibai bûk dâm,
inkhâwmna ina ṭhungpha ṭhatak dâm, thlaithlêng awtnaa dâm hmun ṭhatak an ngiet hlak a.
Hmeithai sum an fâk a, vântlâng hlêmna dingin sâwt tak tak an ṭawngṭai hlak a, chuonghai chun thiemnaw chang nasa zuol an tih,” a ta.
Chun, thawlâwm bâwm zâwna chun a ṭhung a, thawlâwm bâwma mipuihai tangka thlâkzie chu a en a, mihausa tamtakin tamtak an thlâk a.
Chun, hmeithai pasetak a hung a, dâr tangka dere
Isu chun a închûktirhai chu a ko a, an kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, thawlâwm bâwma thlâktu po po hai nêkin hi hmeithai pasetak hin a thlâk tam lem.
Hienghai po po hin an nei chuongliem an thlâk a na, ama ruok hin chu a ditlai tak, a neisun tak, a întodelna ding po chu a thlâk a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Pathien biekina inthawka a fe suok lai chun, a închûktirhai laia mi pakhatin a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, en ta, a lung le inhai hi a ropui hle a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Hieng in nasatak hi in hmu maw? Sukchim lova lung inthuo hrim hrim hitaka hin um naw ni,” a ta.
Chun, Oliv tlâng Pathien biekin zâwna a ṭhung laiin Peter hai, Jakob hai, Johan hai, Andri hai chun a kuomah, “Chuong chu iengtik am hung um a ta?
Chuonghai po po a hung tlung ding pha inchikna ieng am um a ta? mi hril rawh,” tîn inrûkin an indawn a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tukhawmin an hlêm nawna ding cheuin fimkhur ro.
Mi tamtakin, ‘Krista chu ka nih,’ tîn keia hming sâlin hung an ta, mi tamtak hlêm an tih.
Chun, indo thu le indo thuthang dâm in hriet pha leh lunginzing naw ro; chuongchu hung tlung ding hrim a nih; nisienlakhawm, tâwpna chu la ni hri naw ni.
Hnam dang le hnam dang indo an ta; ram tum le ram tum indo an ta; hmun dang dangah simkhawleihai inhnîng a ta, ṭâmhai tlâng a ta. Chuong chu nauhase phut ang hi nîng a tih.
“Nisienlakhawm, fimkhur ro, rorêltuhai an inmantir ding cheu a nih; inkhâwmna inhaiah vuong an ti cheu a, keia leiin hotuhai le lalhai hmaah anni inhriettirna dingin la ngîr bawk in tih.
Chun, Chanchin Ṭha hi hnam po po laia hril hmasak ding a nih.
Chun, sukhlum dingin unau khawm inmantir an ta, pa khawmin a nau inmantir bawk a ta, nauhai khawmin an nu le pahai do an ta, insukhlumtir bawk an tih.
chun in chunga um chu ṭum naw raw se, a in sûnga thuomhnaw inchu ding khawmin lût naw raw se;
Chuong nia chun inrai le naute pawm laihai chu an chung rik a tih.
Chun, chuong chu phalbi laia a tlung nawna dingin ṭawngṭai ro.
Chun, Lalpân chuong nihai chu suktawi naw sien chu mihriem hrim hrim damin suok naw ni hai; nisienlakhawm, mi thlang a iruothai leiin nihai chu a suktawi a.
“Chun, chu phâle chun, tûkhawmin in kuomah, ‘En ta, Krista chu hiva hin a um,’ amanih, ‘En ta, sawva saw,’ amanih an ti chun awi naw ro.
Krista tehlêm le zâwlnei tehlêmhai an hung suok ding a ni si a; chuonghai chun inchikna le thilmak tak tak thâwng an tih, thei hai sienla, thlanghai rau khawm an hlêm theina dingin.
Nangni ruok chu fimkhur ro, ngai ta u, iengkim ka hril lâwk ta cheu hi.
Chun, vântirko chu tir suok a ta, a thlanghai chu kâwl kil lia inthawkin, hnuoi tâwpa inthawka vân tawp chenin lâwr khawm a tih.
“Chuongchun, theichang kûnga hin chu tekhithu chu inchûk ro; a kau a hung indâwn a, a hna a hung inder chun nipui a ni ding a ni tah ti in hriet hlak.
Chuong ang bawkin nangni khawmin, chuong chu a hung tlung in hmu phâ chun ama chu a hung hnai ta a, kawtkhâr bul ngeiah a um tah ti hre ro.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, chuong po po chu a tlung hmakhat chu, tulaia ruoltharhai hi bo naw nihai.
Hnuoi le vân bo a ta, ka thu ruok chu bo naw ni.
Fimkhur unla, inring zinga umin ṭawngṭai ro, a hun chu in hriet si naw a.
Chuongchun, inring zingin um ro, in neitupa hung ding phâ chu zântienga manih, zâna manih, ârkhuona manih, zîngkara mani ding in hriet si naw a;
chuong naw chun hung phut a ta, inin hung hmu hlau rawi a ti cheu.
Chun, in kuoma ka hril hi mi po po kuoma hril ka nih, inring zingin um ro,” a ti ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, “Ruoiṭhe sûng chu ni naw sienla, chuong naw chun vântlâng lai buoina hung um hlau rawi a tih,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a ṭhen chu an lung a sen tâwla, “Iengdinga hriek rim inhnik hi a sukriral mei mei am a na?
Hi hriek hi duli
Isu ruok chun, an kuomah, “To san ro, iengdinga ama in sukbuoi am a na? ka chunga hin thil mawi tak a thaw a nih.
A thaw thei ang tâwk a thaw a nih; ka taksa hi phûm dingin a lo nâl lâwk a ni hi.
Chuongchun, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, khawvêl po poah, khâwlai khawm Chanchin Ṭha an hrilna taphawta chun hi nuhmei thil thaw hi ama hriet zingna dingin hril sa pei an tih,” a ta.
Chun, Juda Iskariot, sâwm le pahni laia mi pakhat khan, Isu chu an kuoma ân mantir theina dingin thiempu lalhai kuomah a va fe a.
Chun, anni chun an hriet phingleh an lâwm hle a, a kuoma tangka pêk an tiem a, chuongchun, ân mantir dân ding remchâng a zawng ta a.
Chun, Chawlṭhanglo bei Ruoiṭhe ni hmasatak Fekan Ruoiṭhena berâmte an thatna hlak nia chun a închûktirhaiin a kuomah, “Fekân Ruoi bu i fâk theina dingin khâwlai am va siem inlang i nuom a?” an ta.
Chuongchun, a închûktirhai laia mi pahni a tir a, an kuomah, “Khawpuiah va lût unla, pasal bêla tui putin intuokpui a ti cheu a, ama chu zui lût ro.
Chun, a lûtna naa chun, chu in neitupa kuoma chun, ‘Inchûktirtu chun, ka închûktirhai le Fekân Ruoi bu kan fâkna ding ka mikhuol pindan chu khâwlai am a na? a tih’ ti unla.
Chuongchun, ama ngei chun pindan chunghnung lientak, thuomhnaw umsa, inrêlsa diem, inentir a ti cheu a, chu hmuna chun ei ta dingin va siem ro,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chu an fe a, khawpuia chun an va lût a; an kuoma a hril ang khan an va hmu a, chun, Fekân Ruoi bu chu an siem ta a.
Chun, zântieng a hung ni chun, ama chu sâwm le pahnihai le chun an va fe ta a.
Chun, an lungngai ta hle a, pakhat khatin a kuomah, “Kei am ka nih?” an ti seng a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Sâwm le pahni laia mi pakhat thlênga a mîn chiepuitu hi a nih.

Mihriem Naupa hi a chanchin an ziek ang tak khan a fe ding a nih; nisienlakhawm, Mihriem Naupa inmantirtu ding mihriem chung chu a rik; chu mipa chu lo insieng naw sienla a ta dingin ṭha lem a tih,” a ta.
Chun, an fâk laiin Isûn bei a lâk a, mal a sâwm zoin a khawi a, an kuomah a pêk a, “La ro, hi hi ka taksa a nih,” a ta.
Chun, no a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril zoin anni a pêk a, chuongchun, an rêngin an dâwn ta seng a.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Pathien rama a thar ka dâwn ni a tlung hmâkhat chu, grêp hrui raa hi dâwn nâwk ta naw ning,” a ta.
Chuongchun, hla an sak zo chun an fe suok a, Oliv tlânga chun an fe ta a.
Peter ruok chun a kuomah, “An rêngin lungnilovin um hai sienla khawm, kei chu um naw ning,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril che, vawisûn hin, vawizân la la hin âr vawi hni a khuong hmâin nangin vawi thum mîn phat i tih,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun nasatakin, “I thinaa chun thi ve ding ni lang khawm, inphat naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta. Chuongchun, ama ang chun an ti ta seng a.
Chun, Gethsemane an ti hmun chu an tlung a; chuongchun, ama chun a închûktirhai kuomah, “Ka ṭawngṭai sûng po hitaka hin lo ṭhung ro,” a ta.
Chun, Peter hai, Jakob hai, Johan hai chu a ṭhuoi a; nasatakin a thlaphângin a lunginzing ta bêk bêk a.
Chuongchun, an kuomah, “Ka lungril a lungngai bêk bêk a, thipui khawp rau a nih, hitaka hin um unla inring zing ro,” a ta.
Chun, hmatieng chun a va fe met a, hnuoia chun a bawkkhup a, thaw thei ni sien chu chu hun chun ama khêl dingin a ṭawngṭai a.
“Abba, (Pa,) iengkim i thaw thei a, hi no hi ka kuoma inthawkin la sawn rawh; nisienlakhawm, keia thu ni lovin, nangma thu thu ni lem raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a hung a, annirawi chu inin a hung hmu a; chuongchun, Peter kuomah, “Simon, i in a ni maw? Dâr kâr khat khawm inring zingin i um thei naw maw?
Thlêmnaa in lût nawna dingin inring zingin ṭawngṭai ro. Thlarau chun chu a pei a, taksa ruok chu a hrât naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, a va fe nâwk a, a thu hril ngai bawk chu hrilin a ṭawngṭai nâwk a.
Chun, a hung kîr nâwk chun annirawi chu inin a hung hmu nâwk a, an îmu a suok hle si a, ama dawn ngaina an hriet naw a.
Chun, a hung a, a vawi thumnaa chun an kuomah, “Tuhin chu in unla châwl ta ro, a hun tâwk tah! a hun chu a tlung a ni ta hi! Ngai ta u, Mihriem Naupa hi mi suolhai kutah an inmantir ding a ni hi.
Tho unla fêng ei tiu, en ta u, a mîn mantirtu ding chu a hung hnai ta hi,” a ta.

Chun, a la hril lai zingin, Juda, sâwm le pahnihai laia mi pakhat chu a hung tlung nghâl el ta a, ama ruol chun thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai le upahai kuoma inthawk, mipui chu, kâwlhnâm le hembâwk dâm chawiin an hung tlung bawk a.
Chun, a înmantirtu ding chun, “Ka ifâwp chu ama nîng a ta, man unla feltakin ṭhuoi hmang el ro,” tîn a hmân inchikna dâm a lo hril vawng ta sa a na.
Chuongchun, a tlung phingleh ama a va pan nghâl ta a, “Rabbi,” tiin a fâwp ngâwi ngâwi a.
Chun, ama chu an chel a, an man ta a.
Chun, a kuoma ngirhai laia tuin amanih a kâwlhnâm a phawi a. Thiempu Laltak suokpa chu a sât a, a nakâwr a sât thlâkpêk a.
Chun, Isûn anni chu a biek a, an kuomah, “Kâwlhnâmhai, hembâwkhai chawiin suomhmang man ding ang elin, mi man dingin in hung a ni maw?
Chun, an rêngin ama chu an zâmsan a, an tlân hmang vawng ta a.
Chun, tlangvâl tu amanih puon zai inhmi chaua inbelin, ama chu a zui a; chuongchun, ama chu an lo man a.
Nisienlakhawm, a puon zai inhmi chu a mâksan a, ruokin a tlân hmang ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Thiempu Laltak kuomah an ṭhuoi a; ama ruol chun thiempu lalhai, upahai, Dân inchûktirtuhai po po an hung khâwm a.
Chun, Peterin hlataka hin ama chu, Thiempu Laltak in inhuonna sûng tuol chen chun a zui a; chuongchun, manmihai lai chun mei lum awiin a ṭhung ve a.
Chuongchun, Isu chu an sukhlum theina dingin thiempu lalhai le rorêltuhai po po chun ama hêkna an zawng a; an hmu si naw a.
Mi tamtakin khêlin an hêk a; nisienlakhawm, an hêkna thuhai chu ân hmu thei si naw a.
Chun, tuhai amanih an ngîr a, khêlin an hêk a,
Chuong khawm chun an hêkna thu ân hmu thei chuong naw a.
Chun, Thiempu Laltak chu a ngîr suok a, Isu kuomah, “Iengkhawmin i dawn naw maw? Hienghaiin an hêkna che hi ieng tizie am a na?” tiin ân dawn a.
Ama ruok chu a to zing a, iengkhawmin a dawn naw a. Thiempu Laltak chun a kuomah, “Krista, Inpâk tlâk Naupa chu i ni maw?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, Thiempu laltak chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, “Hretu dang ieng dingin am ngai tâng ei ta?
Chuongchun, ṭhenkhat lem chun chil an sâk khum ṭan ta nghâl a, a hmai an tuom a, an vuok a, a kuomah,“Hril rawh!” an ti a. Chun, manmihai khawm chun chel pumin an ben sawk sawk a.
Chun, Peter chu hnuoi tienga in inhuonna sûng tuollaia a um laiin, Thiempu Laltak rawngbâwltu nunghâkhai laia pakhat a hung a.
Peter mei lum awi chu a hma a, a en zing a, “Nang khawm hi Isu Nazareth mi kuoma um kha i ni hi,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun, “I thu hril chu ka hriet naw tawp el, a ngaina hrim hrim khawm ka hriet naw tawp el,” tîn ân pha a. Chun, tuolkawt bula chun a va suok a, chuongchun, âr a khuong ta a.
Chun, nunghâk chun a hma a, a kâwla ngîrhai kuoma chun, “Hi mipa hi anni laia mi a nih,” a ti nâwk a. Nisienlakhawm, ân pha nâwk a.
Chun, a nakie deu chun a kâwla ngîrhai chun Peter kuomah, “Anni laia mi i ni ngei hi maw, Galili rama mi i ni si a,” an ti a.
Ama ruok chun, “Chu mihriem in hril chu ka hriet naw tawp,” tiin ṭawngsie inphurin ân khâm a.

Chun, âr khuong vawi hnina chu a khuong nghâl ta a; chun, Peter chun Isûn a kuoma, “Âr vawi hni a khuong hmain nangin vawi thum mîn phat i tih, ” a ti thu kha a hung hriet suok ta a. Chuongchun, chu thu chu a ngaituoin a ṭap ta a.
Chun, zîngkâr a hung ni phingleh thiempuhai chu upahai le Dân inchûktirtuhai le rorêltuhai po po leh an inrâwn a, Isu chu an phier a, an ṭhuoi a, Pilat kuomah an pêk nghâl ta a.
Chun, Pilat chun a kuomah, “Judahai lal i ni am a nih?” tiin ân dawn a; ama chun, “I hril ang chun ka nih,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, thiempuhai chun kawng tamtakin an hêk a.
