Chuongchun, Pilatin ân dawn nâwk a, a kuomah, “Iengkhawmin i dawn naw maw? Ngai ta, an hêkna zozai che hi,” a ta.
Isu ruok chun iengkhawmin a dawn ta naw a: chuleichun, Pilat chun mak a ti hle a.
Chun, Pilatin Ruoiṭhe ni chun mi intâng pakhat an ngên taphawt chu ân suopêk hlak a.
Chun, mi pakhat Barabba an ti chu, helhai laia phiera intâng ve zing a na, chuonghai chun an helnaa chun tuol an that a nih.
Chun, mipuihai chu an hang fe a, an ta dinga a thawpêk hlak anga thaw dingin an ngên ta a.
Chuongchun, Pilatin an kuomah, “Judahai lal hi insuopêk lang cheu in nuom am?” a ta.
(Thiempu lalhaiin an îtsîk leiin an hung ṭhuoi a ni ti a hriet si a).
Nisienlakhawm, Thiempu lalhai chun mipuihai chu Barabba chu insuopêk lem dinga hni dingin an infui a.
Chun, Pilat chun an kuomah, “Anleh Judahai lal in ti hi iengtin am thaw tâng ka ta?” tiin a dawn nâwk a.
Anni chun, “Krawsah hemde rawh,” tiin an khêk nâwk a.
Pilat chun an kuomah, “Iengdingin am ie? Ieng am a suksuol leh?” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, anni chu, “Krawsah hemde rawh,” tiin an khêk zuol sau a!
Chuongchun, Pilatin mipuihai suklungawi a nuom a, Barabba chu ân suopêk ta a. Chun, Isu chu a vuok zoin krawsa hemde dingin a pêk ta a.
Chun, sipaihai chun in inhuonna sûng tuollai Praitorion an tia chun ama chu an ṭhuoi lût a, an pâwla mi po po an ko khâwm a.
Chuongchun, puon sen duk an insiltir a, hlingin lukhum an phier a, an inkhumtir a.
Chuongchun, “Chibai, Judahai Lal,” tiin chibai an bûk a.
Chun, a lua chun luongin an vuok a, chil an sâk khum a, dingṭhaṭhuonin chibai an bûk a.
Chun, nuiza siemnaa an hmang zo chun, puon sen duk chu an hlîp a, ama puon an insiltir nâwk a. Krawsah hemde dingin an ṭhuoi suok ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Golgotha hmunah an ṭhuoi a, (chu chu “Luru hmun” tina a nih).
Chun, uoin murra le pawl an pêk a, nisienlakhawm, a lâk nuom naw a.
Chun, Isu an hemde hun chu vairik lai a nih.
Chun, a hêkna lekha a chungah an ziek a, “JUDAHAI LAL,” tiin.
Chun, ama ruol chun suomhmang pahni an hemde ve a, a changtieng pakhat, a vawitieng pakhat.
insukdam la kraws lêra kha hung ṭum ta la,” tiin an ti el a.
Chuong ang bawkin thiempu lalhai chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai leh, anni lai chun ti elin, “Mi dang hman a sukdam hlak a, ama ân sukdam thei si naw a.
Ei hma a, ei awi theina dingin Krista, Israelhai lal chu, tuhin kraws lêra inthawkin hung ṭum ta sienla,” an ta. Chun, ama ruola an hemde vehai khawm chun ama chu an hal a.
Chun, nisa inding huna chun, zânbu suong pha chenin khawvêl a hung inthim ta vawng a.
Chun, a kuoma ngîr ṭhenkhat chun chu chu an hrietin, “Ngai ta u, Elija a ko a nih,” an ta.
Chun, Isu chu râwl inringtakin a khêk a, a thlarau ân thla ta a.
Chun, a hmaa sipai za hotu ngîr chun, a thlarau chuonga ân thla a hmu chun, “Hi mipa hi Pathien Naupa a ni ngei el,” a ta.

Chun, nuhmeihai khawm hlataka thlîrin an um a; chuhai lai chun, Mari Magdalin hai, Mari, Jakob chîn le Jose nu hai dâm, le Salomi hai an ṭhang a, (chuonghai chu Galili rama a um laia ama zuia a rawng bâwlpêk hlak hai chu an nih);
Chun, zântieng a hung ni chun Inringlâwk ni a ni leiin (chu chu Châwlni hmaa ni hi a nih),
Josef Arimathaia mi, rorêltu inzaum, Pathien ram beisei ve mi bawk, a hung a, huoitakin Pilat kuomah a lût a, Isu ruong chu a hni ta a.
Chuongchun, Pilatin a thi vak chu mak a ti hle a; sipai za hotu chu a ko a, a thina a sâwt ta amanih ti ân dawn a.
Chun, sipai za hotu baua thu a hriet phing chun a ruong chu Josef kuomah a pêk a.
Chun, ama chun puon innêm ân châwk a, ama chu a lâk thlâk a, puon innêm chun a tuom a, thlân, lung inkerkuoah ân zâl a, thlân kawtkhâr chu lungin ân del a.
Chun, Mari Magdalin le Josef nu Mari chun an inzâlna chu an hmu zing a.
Chun, Châwlni a hung bo chun Mari Magdalin hai, Mari Jakob nu hai, Salomi hai chun ama nâl dinga an va fe theina ding chun thil riminhnik an inchâwk a.
Chuongchun, ni saria ni hmasataka, zîngkâr nisa suok hnungin, thlân chu an va tlung a.
Chun, “Thlân kawta lung chu tuin am mîn hlum hmangpêk a ta?” an inti lai zingin,
an hang ngha a, lung chu inhlum hmang sain an hang hmu ta a, a lien hle si a.
Chun, thlân sûngah an lût a, tlangvâl pakhat puon vâr silin changtieng panga ṭhung an hmu a; an lunginzîng ta a.
Chuongchun, ama chun an kuomah, “Lunginzing naw ro, Isu Nazareth mi, an hemde kha in zawng a ni âwm a, a thonâwk ta a, hi hin a um ta nawh; en ta u, an inzâlna hi.
Chuongchun, an inthin a, an lunginzîng hle lai chun, an suok a, thlâna inthawk chun an tlân ta vang vang a, an ṭi luotin tu kuoma khawm iengkhawm an hril naw a.
[Chun, ni saria ni hmasatak, zîngkâra a thonâwk chun, Mari Magdalin, a sûnga inthawka khawhri pasari a hnawt suokpêk kuoma khan ân lâr hmasatak a.
Chun, ama chu Isu umpui hlakhai kuomah a va fe a, mithi ngaia an ṭaplai chu a hril ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun, a hring nâwk a, hmu khawm a hmu ti chu an hriet dea chu an awi si naw a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun anni laia pahni ram tieng pana an fe laiin hmêl danglam putin an kuomah ân lâr nâwk a.
Chun, anni chun inchûktir danghai kuomah an va hril a, anni thu khawm chu an awi chuong naw a.

Chun, chu hnung nâwka chun buthlêng an awt laiin sâwm le pakhat hai kuom ngeiah ân lâr nâwk a, a thonâwk hnunga a hmutuhai thu chu an awi naw leiin an awi nawna le an lungril ngar kawnga chun a kâwk tâwl a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Khawvêl po poah fe unla, thilsiemhai po po kuomah Chanchin Ṭha hi hril ro.
Awia, baptisma chang chu sandamin um an tih; a awi naw ruok chu thiemnaw changin um an tih.
Chun, hieng inchiknahai hin a awituhai chu zui pei a tih: Ka hmingin khawhrihai hnawt dawk an ta, ṭawng tharhaiin ṭawng an tih.
Rûlhai kut chungah dawm an ta, thina tûr iengang khawm dâwn hai sienla iengkhawm ti naw ni hai; damnawhai chungah an kut innghat an ta, dam pei an tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, anni chu an fe suok a, ram tinah thu an hril ta a; Lalpain anni ân thlawppui a, a zuitu inchiknahai chun an thu chu a sukdet pei a, Amen]
Eini laia thil hung tlung tahai chanchin,
a tira inthawka mita hmutuhai le thu rawngbâwltuhaiin, an mi hril sawng ang tak khan, mi tamtakin ziek an tum ta hlak a;
chuleiin, Theophil inzâumtak, a bula inthawkin iengkim fimkhur taka suiin, kei khawmin chanchin indawt thlapin ziek pêk lang che ṭhain ka hriet a;
kha hmaa thu an inchûktir che kha indiktak a nih ti i hriet theina dingin.
An pahni chun Pathien mithmuah feltakin an um a, Lalpa thupêk le a dân po po chu sawisêlboa zâwm hlak mi an nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Elizabeth chu a ching leiin nau an nei naw a, an pahni chun upatak an ni si a.
Chun, a pâwlhai thaw dân ang peia Pathien hmaa thiempu sin a thaw laiin,
thiempu dân angin Lalpa biekina lût le riminhnik raw sin a chang a.
Chun, riminhnik chu a raw hun laiin mipui chu an rêngin tuolah an ṭawngṭai a.
Chun, Lalpa vântirko pakhat thil riminhnik râwna maichâm changtieng chun a hung inlâr a.
Chun, Zakaria chun a hmu phing- leh a lunginzîng a, ṭi khawm a ṭi a.
Nisienlakhawm, vântirko chun a kuomah, “Zakaria, ṭi naw, i hni kha hriet a nih, i nuhmei Elizabethin naupasal neipêk a ti che, a hmingah Johan i sak ding a nih.
Chun, nang hlimin lâwm i ta, ama a pieng chun mi tamtak lâwm bawk an tih.
Israel thlahai tamtak Lalpa an Pathien kuom tieng innghattir nâwk a tih.
Chun, Zakariain vântirko kuomah chun, “Chu chu iengtin am hrieng ka ta? kei putar ka na, ka nuhmei khawm pitar a ni si a,” a ta.
Ngai rawh, ka thu hrilhai, a hun taka hung tlung ding chu i awi naw leiin chuong thil chu a hung tlung hmakhat chu to zing i ta, ṭawng thei naw ti ni,” a ti a.
Chun, mipuihai chun Zakaria chu an lo nghâk a, Pathien biekin sûnga a um sâwt lei chun mak an ti hle a.
Chun, a hung suok chun an kuomah thu a hril thei ta naw a; chuongchun, biekinah inlârna a hmu a nih ti an hriet ta a; anni chu kut zâizirin a biek hlak a, chun ṭawng thei lovin a um ta zing a.
Chun, a rawngbâwlna ni chu a kim phingleh a inah a fe ta a.
Chu hnunga chun a nuhmei Elizabeth chu a hung inrai a, thla nga ân thup a.
“Mi kuoma ka hming sie inkhumna dingin, Lalpain a mi hmu a, hieng ang hin a mi thawpêk a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, a thla ruknaa chun Pathienin vântirko Gabriel chu Galili rama khuo pakhat Nazareth an tia chun,
Chun, vântirko chu a kuomah a lût a, “Chibai, Vochuom, Lalpa i kuomah a um
Chun, chu thu hril lei chun a lunginzîng ta bêk bêk a, “Iengtiziea chibai a mi bûk am nîng a ti aw,” tiin ân ngaituo a.
Chun, vântirko chun a kuomah, “Mari, ṭi naw, Pathien ngaisak zâwng i nih.
Ama chu mi lien la nîng a ta, Achunghnungtak Naupa tîng an tih; Lalpa Pathienin a thlatu David ṭhungpha chu pêng a ta;
Chun, Mari chun vântirko kuomah chun, “Chuong chu iengtin am ni thei a ti leh, pasal ka nei si naw a?” a ta.

Chun, vântirko chun a dawn a, a kuomah, “Thlarau Inthieng i chungah hung tlung a ta, Achunghnungtak thilthawtheina chun hliekhûng a che; chuleiin, naupang hung pieng ding khawm chu mi inthieng, Pathien Naupa tîng an tih.
Chun, ngai ta, i zuorpuinu Elizabeth khawmin tar hnungin naupasal a vawn ta a; a ching an ti hlak kha, tuta thla hi a thla rukna a ni tah.
Chun, Marin, “Ngai ta, Lalpa suoknu ka nih, i hril ang tak chun ka chungah tlung raw se,” a ta. Chun, vântirko chun a fe san ta a.
Chuong lai chun Mari chu a tho a, thingtlângah, Judai rama khuo pakhata chun a fe ta a;
chun, Zakaria inah a lût a, Elizabeth chibai a bûk a.
Chun, Elizabethin Mari chibai bûk chu a hriet phingleh, a phîng sûnga naute chu a châng a; chun, Elizabeth chu Thlarau Inthiengin a sip ta a;
râwl inringtakin a khêk a, “Nang chu nuhmei lai poah inpâktlâk i nih; i rîla ra khawm inpâktlâk a nih.
Ka Lalpa nu ka kuoma i hung hi iengtizie am a na?
Ngai ta, i chibai bûk ri ka naah a lût phingleh a lâwm leiin nautê ka phîng sûngah ân châwm a nih.
A kuoma Lalpân thu a hril kha a tlung ding a ni ti ringnu chu a hamṭha,” a ta.
“Ka hringnân Lalpa a chawimawi a,
Ka thlarau khawm a mi sandamtu
Pathien chungah a lâwm bêk bêk a,
A suoknu tlâwmzie a hmu a, a lunginsiet a,
Ngai rawh, tuta inthawkin ruolthar po poin hamṭha an mi ti ding a nih.
Mi hrât khan ka chungah thil ropuitak a mi thawpêk a,
A hming khawm ân thieng a nih,
A ṭituhai chu suon po po chenin a lunginsiet pei hlak.
A bânin a tha hrâtzie ân entir a,
An inngaituonaa chapohai chu a sukdar ta a.
An ṭhungphaa lal inṭhunghai chu a hnûk thlâk a.
Mi inhnuoihai chu a dawm sâng ta a.
Phîng ṭamhai chu thil ṭhatakin a sukkhawp ta a,
Hausahai chu kutruokin ân fe hmangtir ta a.
A siehlaw Israelhai chu a sawmdâwl ta a,
Ei thlatuhai kuoma a lo hril ta ang ngei khan;
Chun, Mari chu thla thum lai a kuomah a um a; chun, a in tieng a fe nâwk ta a.
Chun, Elizabeth nau nei chu a hung hun ta a; naupasal a nei ta a.
Chun, a vênghai le a laibunghai chun, Lalpân a lunginsiet ti an lo hriet a, an lâwmpui a.
Chun, ni riet nia chun nautê ser tan dingin an hung a; a hmingah a pa hming bawk, Zakaria sak an tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, a nu chun, “Ni lo e, ama chu Johan sak lem ding a nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, annîn a kuomah, “I laibunghai lai hi hming put hi tukhawm an um lêm,” an ta.
Chun, a pa kuoma chun kut zaizirin, “A hmingah ieng am sak inla i nuom a?” an ta.
Chun, lekha ziekna lung phêk a hni a, “A hming Johan a nih,” tiin a ziek a. An rêngin mak an ti hle a.
Chun, kârlovin a lei le a bau chu a hung insût a. Pathien inpâkin a hung ṭawng suok ta a.
Chun, an vêla umhai po po chun an ṭi ta a. Chun, chuong thu chu Judai ram thingtlâng po poah ân thang ta a.
A hre taphawt chun an lungrilah lungkhamah an nei a, “Chu nautê chu iengtin takin am la hung um a ti aw,” an ta; Lalpa kutin ama a ṭhangpui si a.
Chun, a pa Zakaria chu Thlarau Inthiengin a sip a, a hrillâwk a,
“Lalpa Israel Pathien chu, inpâkin um raw se,
A mihai chu a hung kan a, intlanna a siempêk a,
A siehlaw David sûnghai lai chun,
Sandamna ki a mi siempêk ta si a;
(Leihnuoi insieng tîra a zâwlnei inthienghai baua a hril ang khan).
Ei hmêlmahai le a mi theidatuhai po po kuta inthawka mi sansuok dinga a lo intiem thu dâm;
Ei thlâtuhai kuoma a ngilneina suklang a lo tiem thu le,
A thuthlung inthieng hre zing dingin,
Chu thuthlung chu inkhâmin ei thlâtu Abraham kuomah a lo tiem ta a;
Chuongchun, ei hmêlmahai kuta inthawka mi sanhimin, ṭi lova a rawng ei bâwl theina ding le,
Ei dam sûnga a mithmua inthieng le feltaka ei um zing theina ding chu, a mi hung ruotpêk ta a nih.
A lampuihai siem dingin Lalpa hmaah i fe ding a ni si a;
An suolhai ngaidamna dinga,
A mihai kuoma sandamna thu inhriettir dingin;
Ei Pathien lunginsietna leiin,
Chungtienga inthawkin nisa suokin mi hung sir a ta,
Thlamuongna lampuia ei kehai mîn pêntir dingin,” tiin.
Chun, nautê chu a hung lien deu deu a, a thlarau tieng a hung hrât ta deu deu a, Israelhai kuoma a hung insuklang hmakhat chu thlalêrah a um zing a.
Chun, Kaisar Augustain khawvêl ram po po hming ziek ding thu a pêk a.
Chu chu Suria rama Kurini Bawrsâp a ni laia hming ziek hmasa tak chu a nih.
Chuongchun, mi po po chu an hming ziek dingin anni khuo sengah an fe a.
Josef khawm, David sûnghai le a thla a ni leiin, Galili rama Nazareth khuoa inthawka Judai rama David khuo Bethlehem an tia chun a fe a,
a nuhmei huol Mari, naupai inhlâtak pum le chun an hming ziek dingin.
Chun, chutaka an um lai chun a naunei chu a hung hun ta a.
Chun, a nau lutîrah naupasal a nei a; puonin a tuom a, khuolbûkah an inleng ve naw leiin ran bu pêkna thlêngah ân zâltir a.
Chun, chu rama ma chun berâm vêngtuhai an um a, zânah an berâmhai an vêng a, phûlah an riekngha a.
Chun, Lalpa vântirko pakhat an kâwlah a hung ngîr a, Lalpa ropuinân an vêl chu a hung sun var a; chuongchun, an ṭi ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, vântirko chun an kuomah, “Ṭi naw unla, ngai ro, mi tin ta ding chanchin ṭha lâwmum bêk bêk ka hung intlun cheu a nih.
Vawisûn hin in ta dingin David khuoah Sandamtu a pieng tah, Lal Krista chu.
Chun, hi hi in ta dingin inchikna ding a nih; naute puona tuom, ran bu pêkna thlênga zâl hmûng in tih,” a ta.
Chun, kârlovin vântirko kuoma chun vâna mihai mipui an hung um ta huk el a, Pathien an inpâk a,
“A chunghnungtakah Pathien ropuitakin um raw se,
hnuoi chunga a ditsak mihriemhai kuomah, inremna thu inlêng raw se.”
an ti a.
Chun, vântirkohai chun vân tieng an fe san phingleh, berâm vêngtuhai chun, “Tuhin Bethlehem chenin fêng ei ta, Lalpain thu a mi hril hung tlung chu en ei tiu,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, an fe vat vat a, Mari le Josef leh, ran bu pêkna thlênga nautê zâl le chun an hmu a.
Chun, an hmu chun nautê chanchin thu vântirkoin a hril kha an hril vêl a.
Chun, a hre taphawt chun berâm vêngtuhai thu hril chu mak an ti hle a.
Mari ruok chun thu hril po po chu a lungrilin a ngaituo a, a vawng zing a.
Chun, berâm vêngtuhai chun vântirko hril ang ngeia iengkim an hmua an hriet leiin, Pathien chawimawi le inpâk pei pumin an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Mosie dân anga an inthien ni a hung tlung chun ama chu Jerusalemah an hung ṭhuoi a,
Lalpa kuoma inhlân ding le vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârva tê pahni amanih Lalpa Dân thua ziek anga that dingin.
Chun, ngai ta, Jerusalema chun mi pakhat a hming Simeon a um a; ama chu mi feltak le Pathien ngaisaktak a na; Israel thlamuongtu ding chu a nghâk zing a, a chungah Thlarau Inthieng a um a.
Chun, Lalpa Krista chu a hmu hmakhat chu thi naw ni ti Thlarau Inthiengin a lo inhriettir ta hrim a.
Chun, Thlarau inhriettirin Pathien biekina chun a va lût a; nautê Isu chu a nu le a pain Dân pângngai anga a chunga thawpêk dinga an hung ṭhuoi lût lai chun,
ama chun a lo pawm a, Pathien ân pâk a;
“Lalpa, tuhin i thu ang peiin i suok hi thlamuongtakin în fetir ding a na;
I sandamna chu ka mitin a hmu ta a,
Mi tin mithmua I siem kha;
a ta.
Chun, nautê thu a hril chu a nu le a pa chun mak an ti hle a.
Chun, Simeon chun mal a sâwmpêk a, a nu Mari kuomah, “Ngai rawh, hi naupang hi Israel lai mi tamtak tlûkna ding le ngîrsuokna dinga ruot a nih, mi isawisêl ding inchikna ni bawk dingin:
anih, nanga lungril khawm ngûnhnâmin la sun thleng a tih, mi tamtakin an lungrila an ngaituohai chu ân langna dingin,” a ta.
Chun, mi pakhat zâwlnei Anna, Phanuel naunu, Aser hnama mi a um a. Ama chu tartak a na, a nunghâk mâka inthawk a pasal leh kum sari a um a.
Kum sâwmriet pali zet hmeithaiin a um a. Ama chun Pathien biekin fesan lovin asûn azâna bu nghei dâma ṭawngṭaiin Pathien a biek hlak a.
Chun, chu lai tak chun ama chu a hung a, Pathien kuomah lâwmthu a hril a, Jerusalem intlan beiseihai taphawt kuoma chun Isu chanchin a hril a.
Chun, nautê chu a hung inṭhang lien deu deu a, a hung hrât deu deu a, varnain a sip ta a, Pathien lunginsietna a chungah a um bawk a.
Ama chu kum sâwmpahni a niin ruoiṭhe dân pângngaiin an hang fe a.
An ṭumṭieka an hung chun, naupang Isu chun Jerusalemah a um san ta a; a nu le pa chun an hriet si naw a.
An intlawnpuihai lai a um ve zing amanih an ta, ni khat lam zet an fe ta a, an laibunghai le an hmêlhriethai lai an zawng a.
Chun, an hmu naw leiin zawng pei pumin Jerusalemah an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, ni thum chena chun, Pathien biekinah, inchûktirtuhai laia ṭhungin, an thu lo ngai a, lo indawnin an hmu ta a.
Chun, a thu hre taphawt chun a hrietzie le a dawnzie chu mak an ti hle a.
Chun, a nu le pa chun ama an hmu chun mak an ti hle a, chuongchun, a nu chun a kuomah, “Ka nau, iengdinga hienga i mi thaw? Ngai ta, i pa le keiin thlaphângtakin kan zawng che a nih,” a ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga in mi zawng am a na? Ka pa ina ka um ding in hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, an kuoma a thu hril chu a ngaina an hriet naw a.
Chun, anni chu a zui thlâk a, Nazareth chu a hung tlung a, an thu zâwmin a um a. Chun, a nu chun chuong thil po po chu a lungrilah a vawng zing a.

Chun, Tiberia Kaisar ân lala inthawka kum sâwmpanga kumah (Pontia Pilat chu Judai ram Bawrsâp a na, Herod chu Galili ram lal a nih, a unau Philip chu Iturea le Trakonitis ram lal a nih, Lusani chu Abilene ram lal a nih.
Anna le Kaiapha chu Thiempu Laltakhai an nih), thlalêra Zakaria naupa Johan kuoma chun Pathien thu a hung tlung a.
Chun, ama chu Jordan vadung pang vêl ram tinah a fe a, thil suksuol ngaidamna dingin simna baptisma thu a hril pei a.
Zâwlnei Isai thu buah,
“Thlalêra mi khêk râwl chun,
‘Lalpa lamlien buotsai unla;
A lampuihai suktlûn ro;
Ruom tin sung sip ni vawng a ta,
Tlâng tin, muol tin sukhnuoi ni bawk a tih.
Lampui kâwihai hung tlûn a ta,
Lampui inṭumnawhai hung inruol bawk a tih;
Chun, mi po poin Pathien sandamna hmûng an tih,’ a ta,” tia ziek ang khan.
Chun, ama chun baptisma chang dinga a kuoma mipui hung suokhai kuoma chun, “Rûl thlahai, lungsen hung tlung ding hi tlânsan dingin tuin am a kâwk cheu a?
Chun, mipuihai chun a kuomah, “Anleh ieng am kan thaw ding a na?” an ta, an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Tukhawm zakuo pahni nei chun a nei naw kuomah pe raw se; tukhawm fâk nei chun chuong ang bawkin thaw raw se,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “An rêlpêk cheu bâk chu va phût naw ro,” a ta.
Chun, sipaihai khawmin a kuomah, “Keini teh ieng am kan thaw ding?” an ta, an indawn a. Ama chun an kuomah, “Tukhawm suknawmnain va hêk naw ro; in hlaw tâwk taphawta chun lungawi ro,” a ta.
Chun, mihaiin an beisei a, mi po poin Johan chungthu an lungrilah, “Krista a lo ni el khat rawi am?” tia an ngaituo laiin,

Johan chun a dawn a, an rênga kuomah, “Kei chun chu tuiin ka baptis hlak cheu a; nisienlakhawm, keia nêka ropui lem a hung ding a nih, a kekawk hrui sût tlâk khawm ka ni nawh; ama chun Thlarau Inthieng le meiin baptis a ti cheu a,
a kutin leipup a chawi a, a hrizâwl zâp fai hieuna ding le, a bupanga a bu hluna dingin; a si ruok chu mei rêm thei lovin raw hmang a tih,” a ta.
Chun, infuina thu dang tamtakin mihai kuomah Chanchin Ṭha a hril hlak a.
Nisienlakhawm, Lal Herod chu a unaupa nuhmei Herodi chung thua le a suksuol po po chunga chun Johan chun a kâwk leiin,
Chun, mi po poin baptisma an chang zoin, Isu khawmin baptisma a chang a, a ṭawngṭai a, vân a hung inhawng a,
Chun, Isûn ân chûktir ṭan lai vêl khan ama chu kum sâwmthum lai a ni ta a, mi ngai chun Josef naupa a na,
Ama chu Heli nau a na,
Ama chu Matthat nau a na,
Ama chu Levi nau a na,
Ama chu Melki nau a na,
Ama chu Janai nau a na,
Ama chu Josef nau a na,
Ama chu Mattathi nau a na,
Ama chu Amos nau a na,
Ama chu Nahum nau a na,
Ama chu Esli nau a na,
Ama chu Naggai nau a na,
Ama chu Maath nau a na,
Ama chu Mattathi nau a na,
Ama chu Semei nau a na,
Ama chu Josek nau a na,
Ama chu Joda nau a na,
Ama chu Joanan nau a na,
Ama chu Rhesa nau a na,
Ama chu Zerubbabel nau a na,
Ama chu Sealtiel nau a na,
Ama chu Neri nau a na,
Ama chu Melki nau a na,
Ama chu Addi nau a na,
Ama chu Kosam nau a na,
Ama chu Elmadam nau a na,
Ama chu Era nau a na,
Ama chu Josua nau a na,
Ama chu Eliezer nau a na,
Ama chu Jorim nau a na,
Ama chu Matthat nau a na,
Ama chu Levi nau a na,
Ama chu Simeon nau a na,
Ama chu Juda nau a na,
Ama chu Josef nau a na,
Ama chu Jonam nau a na,
Ama chu Eliakim nau a na,
Ama chu Melea nau a na,
Ama chu Menna nau a na,
Ama chu Mattatha nau a na,
Ama chu Nathan nau a na,
Ama chu David nau a na,
Ama chu Jessai nau a na,
Ama chu Obed nau a na,
Ama chu Boaz nau a na,
Ama chu Salmon nau a na,
Ama chu Nason nau a na,
Ama chu Aminadab nau a na,
Ama chu Aram nau a na,
Ama chu Hesron nau a na,
Ama chu Perez nau a na,
Ama chu Juda nau a na,
Ama chu Jakob nau a na,
Ama chu Isak nau a na,
Ama chu Abraham nau a na,
Ama chu Tera nau a na,
Ama chu Nahor nau a na,
Ama chu Serug nau a na,
Ama chu Reu nau a na,
Ama chu Peleg nau a na,
Ama chu Eber nau a na,
Ama chu Sela nau a na,
Ama chu Kainan nau a na,
Ama chu Arphaksad nau a na,
Ama chu Sem nau a na,
Ama chu Noa nau a na,
Ama chu Lamek nau a na,
Ama chu Methusela nau a na,
Ama chu Enok nau a na,
Ama chu Jered nau a na,
Ama chu Mahalalel nau a na,
Ama chu Kainan nau a na,
Ama chu Enos nau a na,
Ama chu Seth nau a na,
Ama chu Adam nau a na,
Ama chu Pathien nau a nih.
Chun, Isu chu Thlarau Inthiengin a sip a, Jordan vadunga inthawkin a kîr nâwk a, thlalêrah ni sâwmli Thlarau ṭhuoia umin Diebol thlêmin a um a.
Chun, chuong nihaia chun iengkhawm a fâk naw a; chuongchun, a tâwpa chun a phîng a hung ṭâm ta a.
Chun, Diebol chun a kuomah, “Pathien Naupa i ni chun hi lung hi beia inchang dingin thu pe rawh,” a ta.
Diebol chun a ṭhuoi tung a, mit khap kâr lovin khawvêl ram po po ân entir a.
Chun, a kuomah, “Hieng po po chunga thuneina le ropuina hi pêng ka ti che; ka kuomah pêk a ni ta si a, ka nuom taphawt kuomah ka pêk hlak bawk a nih.
Chuongchun, chibai mi bûk la, a rêngin i ta vawng nîng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Diebol chun Jerusalemah a ṭhuoi a, Pathien biekin sîp zuma chun a sie a; a kuomah, “Pathien Naupa i ni chun, hitaka inthawk hin tla thla rawh;
‘Nangma humhim ding chein
A vântirkohai chu thu pêng a tih,’ ti le,
Chuong naw chun i kein lung sui hlau rawi i tih,’ ti ziek a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, Diebolin a thlêmna ding tinrênga a thlêm zo chun, a remchâng phaa dingin a fe san ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Thlarau thilthawtheina putin Galili ramah a fe nâwk ta a; chun, a chanchin chu chu lai vêl ram tina chun ân thang ta a.
Chun, an inkhâwmna inahai ân chûktir pei a, mi po po inpâkin a um a.
Chun, a seilienna khuo Nazareth chu a hung tlung a; Châwlnia a thaw dân pângngaiin inkhâwmna inah a lût a, tiem dingin a ngîr a.
Chun, zâwlnei Isai lekhabu chu a kuomah an pêk a, Lekhabu ziel chu a sût a, hi thu ziekna lai hi a phar a,
Lalpa Thlarau chu ka chungah a um;
Ama chun salhai kuoma suokna thu le,
Mitdelhai kuoma mitvar nei nâwkna thu hril ding dâm,
Suknawmnat tuorhai insuoktirna ding dâm,
Lalpa lungawi kum thu hril ding dâmin,
A mi tir a nih,” ti hi.
Chun, lekhabu chu a ziel a, rawngbâwltu a pêk nâwk a, a ṭhung ta a. Chun, inkhâwmna ina mi po po mit chu ama chungah a fu a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Hi Pathien Lekha Thu hi vawisûn hin in ihrietah a hung tlung tah,” tiin a hril ṭan a.
Chun, an rêngin ama an inpâk a, a bausuok lunginsietna thu dâm chu mak an ti hle a. “Hi pa hi Josef naupa a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.

Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Hi ṭawngbau hi, ‘Dâktawr, nang insukdam rawh,’ ‘Kapernauma i thilthaw kan lo hriet taphawt kha, nangma khuo tieng khawm hin thaw ve rawh,’ tiin in mi la ti ngei âwm de hi,” a ta.
Chuongchun, indiktakin ka hril cheu, Elija dam laia kum thum le thla ruk vân a ping a, khawvêla ṭâm nasatak a hung tla khan, Israel ramah hmeithai tamtak an um a;
nisienlakhawm, anni laia tukhawm kuomah Elija tir a ni naw a, Sidon ram tienga Sarepta,
Chun, zâwlnei Elisa dam lai khawm khan Israel ramah inphâr tamtak an um a; nisienlakhawm, Naaman Suria rama mi chau naw chu anni laia tukhawm sukthiengin an um naw kha,” a ta.
Chun, inkhâwmna ina mi po po chun, chuong thu chu an hriet phingleh an lunginsen ta bêk bêk a,
an tho tâwl a, khuoa inthawk chun an nam dawk a, pei thlâk dingin an khuo umna râwl khoa chun an ṭhuoi ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu an kârah a fe thleng a, a fe ta pei a.
Chun, Galili rama khuo pakhat, Kapernauma chun an zu fe a, Châwlni chun mihai ân chûktir a;
Chun, inkhâwmna ina chun khawhri inthieng naw thlarau nei mi pakhat a lo um a; ama chu râwl inringtakin,
“A! Nazareth Isu, keini le nang ieng am ei inzâwlna? A mi sukbohmang dingin i hung a ni maw? Nang ka hriet che, Pathien Mi Inthieng i nih,” tiin a khêk suok a.
Chun, Isûn a hal a, “To la, a sûnga inthawkin hung suok rawh,” a ta. Chun, khawhri chun a laiah a sukthlûk zet a, sukna lovin a sûnga inthawk chu a hung suok ta a.
Chun, an rêngin mak an ti hle a, “Hi hi ieng thu am a ni leh? Thu neitak le thilthawtheitakin khawhri inthieng nawhai thu a pêk a, an suok hi,” tiin an inbiek a.
Chun, chu lai ram khaw tinah a chanchin ân thang ta a.
Chun, a tho a, inkhâwmna ina inthawk chu a suok a, Simon inah a lût ta a. Chun, Simon nuhmei nu chu nasatakin a khuo a sik a, chuongchun, a ta dingin an lo ngênpêk a.
Chun, a kâwlah a ngîr a, khawsik chu a hal a, a bo ta a; chun, a tho nghâl ta a, an rawng a bâwlpêk ta a.
Chun, nisa tlâk ding laiin natna tum tuma na, damnaw nei taphawtin a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a; chun, an rênga chunga chun kut ân nghat seng a, a sukdam ta pei a.
Chun, khawhrihai khawm, “Pathien Naupa i nih,” tia khêkin, mi tamtak sûnga inthawkin an hung suok a. Chun, anni a hal a, Krista a nih ti an hriet leiin an ṭawng a phal naw a.
Chun, khawvar phingleh a suok a, thlalêr hmunah a fe a; chun, mipuihai chun an zawng a, a kuomah an hung a, anni a fe san nawna dingin chel an tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “Khaw dangahai khawm Pathien ram Chanchin Ṭha ka hril ding a nih, chu lei tak chun tir ka ni si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Judai
Chun, dîl panga chun lawng pahni a um a hmu a; nisienlakhawm, nga mantuhai chu an suok a, an lênhai an sâwp a.
Chuongchun, lawng pakhat Simon ta lema chun a chuong a, a kuomah vapanga inthawka tlâwmtea intâwl lût hret a hni a. Chun, a ṭhung a, lawnga inthawk chun mipuihai chu ân chûktir ta a.
Chun, thu hril a ma chun, Simon kuomah, “Li inthûk tieng pan la, nga man dingin, in lênhai dêng rawh,” a ta.
Chun, an hei dêng chun nga nasatak an inkhum a, an lênhai chu ân tan ṭhawt ṭhawt a.
Lawng danga an pâwl umhai chu anni hung ṭhangpui dingin kutin an hui a. Chun, an hung a, lawng pahni chu tlum vâng vâng khawpin an sung sip ve ve a.
Chun, Simon Peterin chu chu a hmu chun, Isu khûp bulah a bawkkhup a, “Lalpa, mi fe san rawh, mi suol ka ni hi,” a ta.
An nga man chu ama le a ruolhai chun mak an ti hle a.
Simon ruolhai bawk, Zebedai naupa Jakob le Johan khawmin mak an ti hle bawk a. Chun, Isûn Simon kuomah, “Ṭi naw, tuta hnung chu mihriem man tâng i tih,” a ta.
Chun, an lawnghai chu vapangah an ṭhuoi kai a, iengkim mâksanin ama an zui ta a.
Chun, khaw pakhata a um laiin, ngai ta, mi pakhat inphârnain a bâwm hi a um a, ama chun Isu a lo hmu a, hnuoi sikin a bawkkhup a, “Lalpa, i nuom chun i mi sukthieng thei,” a ta, a ngên a.
Chun, ama chun a hei ban a, a them a, “Ka nuom ie, hung inthieng ta raw khai,” a ta. Chun, kârlovin a phârna chu a hung bo nghâl ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, a chanchin thu chu ân thang nâwk zuol det a; mipui nasatak a thu hre nuom le an natnahai sukdam nuomin an hung inkhâwm a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu thlalêra dâm atumin a fe a, a ṭawngṭai hlak a.

Chun, chuong lai chun, ni khat chu ân chûktir a. Chun, a kâwlah Pharisaihai le dân hretuhai ṭhungin an um a, chuonghai chu Galili ram le, Judai ram khaw tina inthawk le Jerusalema inthawka hung suok an na; chun mi sukdamna dingin Lalpa thilthawtheina chu a kuomah a um a.
Chun, ngai ta, khum pumin zeng pakhat an hung zâwn a; a hmaa sie dingin zâwn lût an tum a.
Chun, mipui lei chun zâwn lûtna hrim an hmu naw a, in chungah an hang lâwn a, in chunga inthawkin a laitakah, Isu hmaah, a khum pumin an inkhai thlâktir a.
Chun, an ringzie chu a lo hmuin, a kuomah, “Mihriem, i suolhai ngaidam a ni tah ie,” a ta.
Chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chun, “Pathien hrilsie hi tu am a ni leh? Pathien chau naw chun tuin am suolhai a ngaidam thei a?” tiin an ngaituo a.
Chuongchun, Isûn an ngaituo chu a hriet a, an kuomah, “In lungrilah ieng am in ngaituoh a?
‘I suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,’ ti le, ‘Tho la kein fe rawh’ ti hi a ieng am hril a awl lem a?
Iengkhawm ni sienla khawvêlah Mihriem Naupa hin suol ngaidam theina a nei ti in hrietna dingin,” a ta, (zeng kuoma chun) “Tho la, i khum la la, i inah fe rawh ka ti che hi,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an mithmuah a tho nghâl ta a, a zâlna chu a lâk a, Pathien inpâk pum peiin a inah a fe ta a.
Chun, an rêngin mak an ti hle a, Pathien an inpâk a, “Vawisûn chu thil maktak ei hmu a nih,” an ti a, an ṭi bêk bêk a.
Chun, chuong zoa chun, a suok a, sie chawina hmuna ṭhung, siedâwltu pakhat a hming Levi a hmu a; chun, a kuomah, “Mi hung zui rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, iengkim a mâksan a, a tho a, a zui ta a.
Chun, Levi chun a inah Isu ta dingin ruoi ropuitak a ṭhe a; chuongchun, siedâwltuhai, mi danghai leh mi tamtakin anni an awtpui tâwl a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Mi hrisêlhai chun dâktawr an ngai naw a, mi hrivawisiehai lemin an ngai a nih.
Mi feltakhai lam dinga hung ka ni naw a, mi suolhai lama insimtir dinga hung ka ni lem,” a ta, a dawn a.

Chun, annîn a kuomah, “Johan inchûktirhaiin bu an nghei rawp a, an ṭawngṭai hlak; Pharisai inchûktirhai khawmin chuong ang bawkin an thaw hlak; nisienlakhawm, i închûktirhai hin an fâkin an dâwn hlak,” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Mo ṭhuoituhai kuoma a pasal ding chu a um sûng po mo ṭhuoituhai chu in inngheitir thei hlak am a nih?
Nisienlakhawm, a pasal ding chu an kuoma inthawka ṭhuoi hmang nihai la tlung a ta, chu ni ruok chun la nghei an tih,” a ta.
Chun, an kuomah tekhithu khawm a hril a; “Tukhawmin puon thar kei thlain puon hlui an phâwk ngai nawh; phâwk ang sienla a thar chun sukthlêr a ta, a thar hlek le a hlui chu inhme bawk naw ni.
Chun, tukhawmin uoin thar savun uoin peng hluiahai an thun ngai nawh; thun ang sienla, uoin thar chun savun penghai chu mawr kawi a ta, inbuong a ta, savun penghai khawm chu sieng a tih.
Uoin thar chu savun peng tharahai an thun lem ding a nih.
Chun, tukhawmin uoin um sâwt dâwn zoin uoin thar an du ngai nawh; ‘a um sâwt a ṭha lem’ an ti si a,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisai tuhaiin amani chun, “Ieng dinga Châwlnia thaw thieng naw chu in thaw am a na?” an ti a.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuoma chun, “Mihriem Naupa hi Châwlni Lal a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Châwlni danga chun inkhâwmna inah a lût a, ân chûktir a; chutaka chun mi pakhat kut changtieng zeng a lo um a.
Chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chun, a hêkna ding an hmu theina dingin, châwlni chun a sukdam ding le ding naw an enthlit a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an lungril chu a hriet a, kut zeng kuoma chun, “Tho la, a laiah ngîr dawk rawh,” a ta. Chun, a tho a, a ngîr dawk ta a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Châwlni hin sukṭhat am a thienga, suksiet? Sandam am a thienga, sukhlum? kân dawn cheu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, an rêng chun a en vêl a, a kuomah, “I kut phar rawh,” a ta. Chun, a phar a, a kut chu a dam ta a.
Chuongchun, an lungsen chun an puokkawi vâng vâng a, Isu chunga an thaw dân ding an inrâwn a.
Chun, chuong lai chun a suok a, ṭawngṭai dingin tlângah a fe a, Pathien kuomah zânkhuon a ṭawngṭai a.
Chun, khawvar phingleh a închûktirhai chu a ko a; anni laia mi sâwm le pahni a thlang a, an hminga khawm tirko ân bûk a;
chuonghai chu Simon (Peter ân bûk bawk chu) le a unau Andri hai, Jakob le Johan hai, Philip le Bartholomai hai,
Matthai le Thoma hai, Alphai naupa Jakob hai, Simon Zelot an ti hai,
Jakob naupa Juda hai, ân mantirtu ding Juda Iskariot hai an nih.

Chun, anni ruolin a fe thla a, hmun inzâwlah a ngîr a, a închûktirhai mipui nasatak leh, Judai ram po poa inthawk le Jerusalema inthawk le Tura le Sidon khuo tienga tuisuoriet panga inthawk mi tamtak leh;
chuonghai chu a thu ngai nuom le an natnahai insukdam nuomin an hung a nih; chuongchun, khawhri inthieng naw isawisakhai khawm an hung dam ta a.
Chun, a kuoma inthawka thilthawtheina suoka mi tin a sukdam pei leiin, mipui po po chun ama them an tum a.
Chun, a dâk suok a, a închûktirhai chu a en a,
“Nangni rimsihai, in hamṭha ie,
Pathien ram in ta a ni si a.
“Nangni tuta phîngṭamhai, in hamṭha ie; in la khawp ding a ni si a.
“Nangni tuta ṭaphai, in hamṭha ie; in lân nui ding a ni si a.
Chu ni chun lâwm unla, hlimin inchâwm ro; ngai ta u, vânah in lâwmman a um râwn si a; chuong ang bawkin an thlatuhaiin zâwlneihai chungah an thaw hlak kha.
“Amiruokchu, nangni mi hausahai, in chung a rik ie; in thlamuongna in hmu ta si a.
“Nangni tuta khawphai, in chung a rik ie; in phîng a la ṭâm ding a ni si a.
“Nang ni tuta innuihai, in chung a rik ie; lungngaiin in la ṭap ding a ni si a.
“Mi po poin an inpâk pha cheu in chung la rik a tih; chuong ang bawkin an thlatuhaiin zâwlnei tehlêmhai chungah an thaw hlak kha.
“Ka thu ngaituhai, ka hril cheu hi, in hmêlmahai chu hmangai unla, a theidahai cheu chu an ṭhatna ding thaw unla,
ṭawngsie inphurtuhai cheu chu malsâwmpêk unla, a sawisatuhai cheu chu ṭawngṭaipêk ro.
“Bieng khing tienga bentu cheu chu khing tieng khawm dâwpêk ro; chun, i puon lâkpêktu che kuoma chun i zakuo lâk khawm sêl naw.
“A hnitu taphawt che kuomah pe rawh; chun, i thil lâkpêktu che kuoma chun hni nâwk ta naw rawh.
“Chun, nangni hmangaituhai chau in hmangai hin, lâwm ieng am hlâwng in ta? Mi suolhai khawmin anni hmangaituhai chu an hmangai hlak annâwm.
Chun, in chunga ṭhahai chunga chau in ṭha hin lâwm ieng am hlâwng in ta? Mi suolhai khawmin chuong ang bawkin an thaw annâwm.
Chun, hmu nâwk beiseina kuom chaua thil in inpûktir hin lâwm ieng am hlâwng in ta? mi suolhai khawmin a ngai bawka hmu nâwk dingin misuolhai kuomah an inpûktir hlak.

Amiruokchu, in hmêlmahai hmangai unla, an ṭhatna ding thaw unla, inpûktir ro, beidawng dêr lovin; chuongchun, in lâwmman tam a ta, Achunghnungtak nauhai ni bawk in tih; ama chun mi lâwmnachâng hre lohai le mi suolhai a lunginsiet hlak.
In Pain mî a lunginsiet angin mî lunginsiet ve ro.
“Sawisêl naw ro, chuongchun, sawisêlin um naw ti niu. Tukhawm thiemnawah ruot naw ro, chuongchun, inthiemlovin um naw ti niu. Ngaidam ro, chuongchun, ngaidamin um in tih.
Pe ro, chuongchun pêkin um in tih, ṭhahnemngaitaka inkhia, namdêna, sâwi muka, liem zar zara, in mal chungah pêk nîng in tih. In inkhîna ngai bawkin inkhipêk in ni ding a ni si a,” a ta.
“Chun, ieng dinga mâni mita tlungpûm um chu ngaituo si lova, i unau mita hmawl hlek um chu i hmu am a na?

Mâni mita tlungpûm um chu hmu si lovin, i unau kuomah, ‘Unau, i mita hmawl hlek um kha mîn lâk dawk tir rawh,’ iengtin am i ti thei a? Mi vervêk! i mita inthawkin tlungpûm kha la dawk hmasa rawh, chuongchun, i unau mita inthawka hmawl hlek lâk dawk ding chu fietakin hmu thei i tih.
“Thing ṭha hrim hrim ra sea ra a um nawh; thing ṭha naw hlak ra ṭhaa ra a um bawk nawh.
“Chun, nangnîn ieng dinga ka thu zâwm si lova, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ in mi ti hlak am?
Mi tin ka kuoma hunga, ka thu hrea zâwm taphawt chu tû ang am an nih inhriettir ka ti cheu:
In bâwltu, inthûktaka choa, lung- pui chunga lungphûm remtu ang chu an nih. Chun, tui a hung lienin tui hrâtin chu in chu a khaw a, a sukhnîng thei naw a, a bâwl ngun leiin.
Amiruokchu, hrea zâwm naw chu, lung phûm lova, hnuoi chung ela in bâwltu ang chu an nih; tuihrâtin chu chu a khaw a, a chim nghâl ta a: a chim chu nasatak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, mihai hrieta a thu po po a hril zoin, Kapernaumah a lût a.
Chun, sipai za hotu tû amanih a suok dittak a dam naw a, a thi vâng vâng a.
Chuongchun, Isu chanchin a hriet phingleh a suok chu hung sukdam dinga ngên hrâm dingin a kuomah Juda upahai a tir a.
Chun, anni chu Isu kuom an va tlung a, ṭhahnemngaitakin an ngên a, “Ama hi, i thawpêk tlâk a nih:
ei hnam dâm a hmangai a, kan inkhâwmna in dâm a mi bâwlpêk a nih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Isu chun anni a zui ta a. Chun, in an tlung vâng vângin sipai za hotu chun a kuomah a ruolhai a tir a, “Intak sakin hung naw rawh, ka in sûng i lûtna tlâk a ni nawh;
chuleiin, i kuoma hung tlâk khawm niin kân ring naw a, thu chau hril la ka naupang dam el a tih.

Kei khawm mi thua um ka na, ka hnuoiah sipaihai an um a; hi mipa kuoma hin, ‘Fe rawh’ ka ti leh a fe a; mi dang kuoma khawm, ‘Hung rawh’ ka ti leh a hung hlak; ka suok kuoma khawm, ‘Hi hi thaw rawh,’ ka ti leh a thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chuong thu chu a hrietin ama chu mak a ti hle a, a ngha a, mipui a zuituhai kuoma chun, “Ka hril cheu hi, Israelhai lai khawm hieng ang lâwma ringna nasa hi ka hmu nawh,” a ta.
Chun, a mi tirhai chu in tieng an fe nâwk a, suok chu damin an hmu ta a.
Chun, sâwt nawteah khaw pakhat Nain an tia chun a fe a; a închûktirhai le mipui nasatak a kuomah an fe ve a.
Chun, kul kawtkhâr kâwl a tlungin, ngai ta, mithi an hung zâwn dawk a, a nu naupa nei sun a na, ama hlak hmeithai a ni si a; an khuohai tamtak chu a kuomah an um a.
Chun, Lalpa chun hmeithai chu a hmu phingleh a lunginsiet bêk bêk a, “Ṭap naw,” a ta.
Chun, a va hnai a, hlâng chu a them a; chuongchun, a zâwntuhai chu an ngîr a. Chun, “Tlangvâl, tho rawh ka ti che hi,” a ta.
Chun, mithi chu a ṭhung dawk a, a hung ṭawng ta a. Chun, Isûn a nu kuomah a pêk ta a.
Chun, mi po poin an ṭi a, Pathien an inpâk a, “Eini lai zâwlnei ropuitak a hung um ta a ni hi,” an ta. “Pathienin a mihai a hung sîr tah a nih,” an ti bawk a.
Chun, chu mipa chungchâng thu chu Judai ram po po le a kâwl vêl ram tinah ân thang suok ta a.
Chun, Johan inchûktirhai chun chuong thu po po chu Johan an hril a.
Chuongchun, Johan chun a închûktirhai pahni a ko a, Lalpa kuoma chun a tir a, “A hung ding chu i ni, mi dang am kan la ngai ding?” tiin.
Chun, mihai chu a kuom an hung tlung chun, “Baptistu Johanin, ‘A hung ding chu i ni, mi dang am kan la ngai ding?’ ti dingin i kuomah a mi hung tir a nih,” an ta.
Chun, chuong lai tak chun Isûn damnaw dâm, hripui invawihai, khawhri imanhai tamtak a sukdam a, mitdel tamtak khawm an mit a sukvar a.
Chun, tûkhawm ka chunga lungninawna hmu naw chu an hamṭha,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Johan mi tirhai chu an fe hnungin Isûn mipuihai kuoma chun Johan thu a hril ta a, “Ieng en dingin am thlalêra khan in hang fe a? Luong thli imût hnîng maw?
Annawleh, ieng en ding takin am in hang fe a? Puon innêm sil maw? Ngai ro, puon innêm sil le mi inhawitirhai chu lal inahai in sawnnaw an um.
Annawleh, ieng en ding takin am in hang fe a? Zâwlnei maw? A ni ngei kha, ka ti cheu hi, zâwlnei nêk khawma ropui lem,
Ama chun i hmaah i lampui siem a tih,’
ti, a chanchin an iziek kha, ama hi a nih.
Nuhmei sûnga insieng laia chun Johan nêka ropui lem an um nawh; nisienlakhawm, Pathien rama mi chîn tak khawm ama nêkin an ropui lem,” a ta.
Pharisaihai le dânhretuhai ruok chu a kuoma baptisma lo chang tah an ni ve naw a, anni ta dinga Pathienin rem a iruotpêk chu an pawm nawh.
Chuongchun, Isu bawkin, “Tulai ruoltharhai hi ieng lêm hrilkhîng ka ti aw?
Naupang dâwr hmuna ṭhunga, ‘Theihle kan mûtpêk cheu a, in lâm si naw a; kan ṭap rak a, in ṭap si naw a,’ tia inkhêkkhumhai ang hi an nih.
Baptistu Johan chu a hung a, bei a fâk naw a, uoin khawm a dâwn naw a, nangnîn, ‘Khawhri a zâwl a nih,’ in ti a.
Mihriem Naupa a hung a, a fâkin a dâwn a, ‘En ta u, bu he mi, uoin he mi, siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai ruolpa saw!’ in ti si a.
Nisienlakhawm, Varna chu a nau po poin an inthiem,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisaihai laia mi pakhatin a kuomah bu fa dingin a fiel a. Chun, Pharisai ina chun a lût a, thlaithlêng a awt a.
A hnungah a ke bula chun ṭap pumin a ngîr a, a mitthliin a ke a lo far hu a, a samin a hrûk a, a ke chu a fâwp a, hriek rim inhnik chun a nâl a.
Chun, a fieltu Pharisai chun a hmu chun, a lungrilin, “Hi mipa hi zâwlnei a ni chun a themtu nuhmei hi tu am a ni, mi ieng ang am a ni hre âwm tak, mi suol a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Simon, i kuomah thu bau khat hril ding ka nei,” a ta, a dawn a. Chun, ama chun, “Hril ta la, Inchûktirtu,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn “Tangka inpûktirtu tuin amanih leibattu pahni a nei a; pakhatin duli za nga a bat a, pakhatin sâwmnga.
An thung thei naw leiin, a ngaidam ve ve a. Chuongchun, chuhai chun a tû lem chun am ama chu hmangai lem an ta?” a ta.
Simon chun, “A ingaidam tam lem chun niin ka ring,” a ta, a dawn a. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “I ti dik ie,” a ta.

Chun, nuhmei tieng chu a ngha a, Simon kuoma chun, “Hi nuhmei hi i hmu? I inah ka hung lût a, nangin ka ke sâwpna ding tui i mi pêk naw a, ama ruok hin chu a mitthliin ka ke a sukhu a, a samin a hrûk a nih.
Nangin fâwp hrim hrim i mi fâwp nawh; ama ruok hin chu ka hung lût hlima inthawk ka ke fâwp a ma nawh.
Nangin ka luah hriek i mi nâl nawh; ama ruok hin chu ka kepha hriek rim inhnik a nâl.
Chuleiin, ka ti che hi, a suol tamtak kha ngaidamin a um tah; ama khawmin a hmangai ta bêk bêk a ni hi; amiruokchu, ngaidam tlâwm chun, tlâwmtêin a hmangai hlak,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei kuoma chun, “I suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,” a ta.
Chun, a thlaithlêng awtpuihai chun, “Suolhai khawm ngaidam hi tu am a na?” an in ti a.
Chun, ama chun nuhmei kuoma chun, “I ringna hi sandam I ni pha a nih, thlamuongtakin fe rawh,” a ta.
Chun, a nakie deu chun Isu thu hril le Pathien ram Chanchin Ṭha intlun pei pumin khaw lien le khaw têhai a fang pei a, a kuomah sâwm le pahnihai chu an um a;
nuhmei tuhai amanih, khawhri zâwl dam nâwkhai leh, na dam nâwkhai leh, chuong nuhmeihai chu Mari, a sûnga inthawka khawhri pasari suok Magdalin an iti hai,
Chun, mipui nasatak an hung inkhâwm a, khaw tina mi a kuomah an hungin, tekhithuin thu a hril a.
“Bu chi thêtu bu chi thê dingin a fe a. Chun, a thê laiin a ṭhen lampui sîrah a tla a, mîn an sir a, chun, vatehaiin an tlân zo ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen pielthlêng chungah a tla a; a mâwng phingleh a hnâwng naw leiin a rawp ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen hlohlingnei lai a tla a, hlo chun a mâwng ruolpui a, a dîp hmang ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen hnuoi ṭhaa a tla a, a hung mâwng a, a lêt zain a ra ta a,” a ta. Chun, chuong thu chu a hril laiin a khêk a, “Tûkhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a închûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Hi tekhithu hi ieng tina am a na?” tiin an indawn a.
“Tekhithu kha hi hi a nih; Bu chi chu Pathien thu a nih.
Chun, lampui sîra mi chu thu hre tahai hi an nih; chun, diebol chu a hung a, an awi naw a, sandam an ni thei nawna dingin an lungrila inthawkin thu a lâkpêk hlak.
Chun, pielthlêng chunga mi chu hieng hi an nih; an hriet phingleh thu chu lâwmtaka pawmhai hi; nisienlakhawm, zung hrim an nei nawh, sâwt nawtê chau an awi a, thlêma an um phaleh an bânsan nâwk hlak.
Chun, hlohlingnei laia tla chu hieng mi hi an nih; thu an hriet hnunga an fe pei laiin dam sûng khawsak lungkhamnahai, inhawitirnahai, hausaknahai chun a dîp a, an ra puitling ngainaw a nih.
Hnuoi ṭhaa mi chu hieng hi an nih; lungril ṭha le felin thu chu an hriet a, an vawn zing a, tuorseltakin an ra hlak.
Chun, a nu le a unauhai chun Isu kuom tieng an hung pan a, nisienlakhawm, mipui lei chun a kuom an hung tlung thei si nawh.
Chun, “I nu le i unauhai nang hmu ding chein tuola sawn an ngîr zing ie,” tiin an hril a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Hieng Pathien thu hrea zâwmhai hi ka nu le ka unauhai an nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, chuong lai chun ni khat chu lawngah a chuong a, a închûktirhai leh; chun, an kuomah, “Dîl râl khingtieng sawn kai ei tiu,” a ta. Chuongchun, lawng chu an sût a, an fe ta a.
Chun, an fe laiin Isu a lo in innghil a; chun, dîla chun thlipui a hung hrâng a, an lawng chu tuiin a sip vâng vâng a, nasataka ṭitumnaah an um ta a.
Chun, a kuomah an va fe a, an keitho a, “Inchûktirtu, Inchûktirtu, kan bohmang ding a ni hi teh,” an ta. Chun, ama chu a hung har a, thli le tuifâwn chu a hal ta a; chun, a ma a, a re ta a.
Chun, an kuomah, “In ringna khâwlai am a um a?” a ta. Chun, an ṭi a, mak an ti hle a, “Hi mipa hi tu am a ni leh? thli le tui chen khawm thu a pêk a, an awi hi,” an inti tâwl a.
Chun, Galili ram zâwna Gerasin
Chun, khawmuola a suokin, khuoa mi khawhri iman tûin amanih ân tuokpui a; ina hrim khawm a um naw a, thlânahai a um lem hlak a.
Chun, Isu a hmu phingleh a khêk a, a hmaah a bawkkhup a, râwl inringtakin, “Isu, Pathien Achunghnungtak Naupa, kei le nang ieng am ei inzâwlna a um a? mi sawisa lul naw rawh, ka ngên che,” a ta.

(Isûn khawhri inthieng naw chu, chu mipa sûnga inthawka suok dingin thu a lo pêk ta si a. Chu mipa chu khawhri chun a man rawp hlak a nih; mihaiin khaidiet le kawl an inbuntir hlak a, an vêng zing hlak a; nisienlakhawm, a khuopnahai chu a suktan a, khawhri chun thlalêrahai a hnawt suok hlak).
Chun, Isûn, “I hming ieng am a na?” tiin ân dawn a. Ama chun, “Legion,”
Chun, vânsama fe thu an kuoma pe lo dingin Isu kuomah an ngên a.
Chun, chutaka chun tlângah vawk ruol tamtak an tla a; chun, a kuomah, vawkhai sûngah lût theina thu an ngên a. Chun, ama chun thu a pêk a.
Chun, khawhrihai chu chu mipa sûnga inthawk chun an suok a, vawkhai sûnga chun an lût a; chun, vawk ruol chu râwlah an tlân thla hum hum a, dîlah an tlân lût a, tui inhâkin an thi ta a.
Chun, a vaituhai chun chu thil umzie chu an hmu a, an tlân a, khuoa le loahai chun an hril a.
Chun, thil um dân chu en dingin mihai an suok tâwl a; chun, Isu kuom an hung tlung a, khawhri isuoksanpa chu puon sila lungvar pângngai putin, Isu ke bula ṭhung an hung hmu a; chuongchun, an ṭi ta a.
Chun, a hretuhai chun khawhri iman a sukdamzie chu chuonghai chu an lo hril a.
Chun, a vêl Gerasin
Chun, khawhri isuoksanpa ruok khan chu Isu kuoma um zing a ngên a.

Nisienlakhawm, Isûn, “I in tieng fe la, Pathienin i ta dinga thil a thawpêk che ropuizie hi va hril rawh,” tiin ân fetir ta a. Chuongchun, a fe a, khawpui sûng po poa chun Isûn a ta dinga thil a thawpêk ropuizie chu a khêkpui ta a.
Chun, Isu a hung kîr nâwk chun mipuiin ama an lâwm a, ama lo nghâk zinga um an ni tâwl leiin.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat a hming Jaira, inkhâwmna in hotu chu a hung a, Isu ke bulah a bawkkhup a,
a naunu neisun, kum sâwmpahni vêl chaua upa, thihmunsuola zâl zing a ni leiin a ina fe dingin a ngên a. Chun, Isu a fe laiin mipuihaiin an hneng sup sup a.
Chun, nuhmei pakhat kum sâwmpahni thipûtin a damnaw a, a sum nei po po dâktawrhai kuomah a sukthâm zo ta si a, tukhawmin an sukdam thei ta si naw a;
ama chu a hnungah a hung a, a puon hmawr a them a, kârlovin a thipût chu a bo nghâl ta a.
Chun, Isûn, “A mi them kha tu am a na?” a ta. Chun, “Kei chu ka ni nawh,” an ti seng a. Peter le a ruolhaiin, “Inchûktirtu, mipuihaiin an hneng sup sup che a, an bûm tul tul che annâwm,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, “Tûin amanih chu a mi them a nih, thilthawtheina ka sûnga inthawkin a suok nghe nghe ti ka hriet a nih,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun ân thup thei naw a hriet a, inthin pumin a hung a, a hmaah a bawkkhup a, a them san le kârlova a dam tâk elzie chu mi po po hmua chun a hril ta a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Ka naunu, i ringna hi i dampui a nih, thlamuongtakin fe rawh,” a ta.
A la ṭawng zing laiin inkhâwmna in hotu ina inthawk chu mi pakhat a hung a, “I naunu a thi tah, inchûktirtu suksâwl nuom naw,” a ta.
Isu ruok chun chu thu chu a hriet chun, “Ṭi naw rawh, ring el rawh, chuongchun, dam nâwk a tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, in chu a va tlung chun, Peter, Jakob le Johan hai, naupang nu le pa chau naw chu tukhawm lût ve a phal naw a.
Chun, an rêngin an lo ṭap rak rak a, an âwm an inchum a; chuongchun, ama chun, “Ṭap naw ro, a thi nawh, a in innghil a ni lem,” a ta.
Chun, a thi tain an hriet zing si a, an nuisan el a.
Isu ruok chun a kut a chel a, “Bawinu, tho rawh,” a ta, a ko a.
Chun, a thlarau chu a hung kîr nâwk a, a tho nghâl ta a; chun, iengkhat fâk ding pêk ding thu a pêk a.
Chun, a nu le pa chun mak an ti hle a; nisienlakhawm, ama chun, a thilthaw chu tukhawm hril lo dingin a ti tlat a.
Chun, Isûn sâwm le pahnihai chu a ko khâwm a, khawhri po po chunga thilthawtheina le thuneina le natnahai sukdam theina a pêk a.
Chuongchun, Pathien ram thu hril ding le, damnawhai sukdam dingin a tir suok ta a.
Chun, in tlungna in taphawtah tlung zing pei unla, chu ina inthawk chun suok ro.
Chuongchun, an fe ta a, khuo an fang pei a, ram tinah Chanchin Ṭha an hril a, mi an sukdam pei a.
ṭhenkhatin, “Elija a hung inlâr tah a ni hi,” an ta, ṭhenkhatin, “Tienlaia zâwlnei tû amanih a tho nâwk tah a ni hi,” an ti leiin.
Chun, Herod chun, “Johan lu chu ka tan ta kha; nisienlakhawm, hieng ang lâwma a thu ka ihriet hlak hi tû am a na?” a ta. Chun, ama chun hmu a tum ta a.
Chun, tirkohai chu an hung nâwkin, a kuomah an thilthawhai an hril a. Chun, ama chu anni atuma ṭhuoiin Bethsaida an ti khuoa chun a fe ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chun an hriet a, an zui pei a; chun, ama chun anni chu a lo lâwm a, Pathien ram thu a hril a, sukdam ngaihai chu a sukdam a.

Chun, khuo a hung inhnu ding a ni ta a, sâwm le pahnihai chu an hung a, a kuomah, “Ei kâwl vêl khuoahai le loahai fea, tlung in le fâk ding an hmu theina dingin mipui hi infetir ta la; hi, thlalêr hmuna um ei ni si a,” an ta.

Ama ruok chun an kuomah, “Nangnîn fâk ding pe ro,” a ta. Anni chun, “Hieng mi po po ta ding hin fâk ding kan vân châwkpêk naw chun, beiphêk panga le nga pahni chau naw chu iengkhawm kan nei nawh,” an ta.
(Patling ruok khawm sâng nga lai rau an ni si a). Chun, a închûktirhai kuomah, “Apâwl peiin inṭhungtir ro, sâwmnga lai peiin,” a ta.
Chuong ang chun an thaw a, an inṭhungtir ta vawng a.
Chun, beiphêk panga le nga pahni chu a lâk a, vân tieng enin mal a sâwm a, a khawi a, mipui hmaa sem dingin a inchûktirhai kuoma chun a pêk a.
Chun, an fâk a, an khawp ta vawng a; an fâk mahla nawi chu bâwm sâwm le pahni an rût sip a.
Chun, Isûn a khât chaua a ṭawngṭai laiin, a închûktirhai chu a kuomah an um a, an kuomah, “Mipuihaiin tu am a nih an mi ti a?” tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, chu thu chu tukhawm hril lo ding ti tlatin, thu a pêk a.
“Mihriem Naupa hin thil tamtak a tuor ding a na, upahai, thiempu lalhai, Dân Inchûktirtuhai dit nawin a um ding a na, thatin a um ding a na, ni thum niah keithoin a um bawk ding a nih,” a ta.
Tûkhawm a nun humhim nuom phawt chun chân a ta; tûkhawm keia leia nun chân taphawt chun, ama ngei chun humhim a tih.
Mîn khawvêl hi a pumin nei sienla, insukboin amanih insukse sienla, a ta dingin iengam ṭhahnem a ta?
Tûkhawm kei le ka thu inzapui taphawt chu, Mihriem Naupa hin ama ropuina leh, a Pa ropuina leh, a vântirko inthienghai ropuina leh a hung pha chun ama chu hung inzapui vêng a tih.
Indiktakin ka hril cheu hi, hitaka ngîrhai a ṭhen hi Pathien ram an hmu hmakhat chun thina intem tawp lo ding an um,” a ta.
Chun, a ṭawngṭai laiin a hmêl umzie chu a hung danglam a, a silfênhai chu a hung vâr a, mi elkhal theiin a um ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pahni ama leh an inbiek a, chuhai chu Mosie le Elija an nih;
ropuinaa inthuomin an inlâr a, Jerusalem khuoa a thi tleitlâkna ding thu an hril a.
Peter le a ruolhai ruok chu an inlusu a; chun, an har phingleh a ropuizie le a kâwla mi pahni ngîr chu an hmu ta a.

Chun, anni chun Isu an mâksan ding laiin, Peterin Isu kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, ei ta dingin hitaka um zing hi a ṭha; bâwkte pathum khâwng kan tih, i ta dingin pakhat, Elija ta dingin pakhat, Mosie ta dingin pakhat,” a ta, a thu hril khawm hre lovin.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril laiin sûm a hung zîng a, anni a hlie ta a; sûma chun an lût laiin an ṭi a.
Chun, râwl chu a bo phingleh, Isu chu khât chauin an hmu ta a. Chun, an to zing a, chuong lai vêl chun an thil hmu chu tukhawm an hril nawh.
Chun, a zîngah tlânga inthawka an ṭum hnung chun, mipui nasatakin ama chu an lo tuok a.
Chun, ngai ta, mipui lai chun, mi pakhat a khêk a, “Inchûktirtu, ka naupa hi en dingin ka ngên che, ka nau nei sun a ni si a.
Ngai ta, khawhriin a man hlak a, a khêk suok thut hlak, chuongchun, a chilhuom tla khawpin a sawisa hlak a, nasataka sukhliemin a mâksan ṭâwk hlak.
Chun, i închûktirhai kuomah hnawt dawk dingin ka ngên a, an thei si naw a,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn “Ruolthar ringna nei lova kâwmawhai, ieng chen am in kuomah um ka ta, ngaithei ka ti cheu a? I naupa chu hitaka hin hung ṭhuoi rawh,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, mi po poin Pathien ropuizie chu mak an ti hle a.
Chuongchun, mi po po chun a thilthaw po po chu mak an ti lai chun, Isûn a închûktirhai kuoma chun,
“Chuong thu chu in naah lût raw se, Mihriem Naupa hi mihriemhai kuta inmantirin a um ding a ni si a,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a thu hril chu a ngaina an hriet naw a, an hriet thei nawna dingin ân thup a nih, chu thu hril chanchin chu ama hlak an indawn ngam si naw a.
Chuongchun, Isûn an lungrila an ngaituo chu a hriet a, naupangte a kei a, a sîrah ân ngirtir a,
an kuomah, “Tûkhawm, ka hming leia hi naupangte lâwm taphawt chu kei a mi lâwm ning a ta, tukhawm kei mi lâwm chu a mi tirtu lâwm nîng a tih, nangni laia chîntak hi a nih a ropui chu,” a ta.
Chun, Johan chun, “Inchûktirtu, tu amanih i hminga khawhrihai hnawt dawk kan hmu a, kan zuina chea a ṭhang ve naw leiin kan khap el annaw,” a ta, a dawn a.
Isu ruok chun a kuomah, “Khap ta naw ro, tûkhawm nangni sêlkal naw chu in tienga ṭhang a ni si a,” a ta.
Ama chu vân tienga ṭhuoi hun a hung hnai chun, Jerusalem tieng fe tumin a ngha tlat a,
a hmaah thu intluntu ding mi a tir lâwk a, chun, an fe a, ama lo buotsaipêk dingin Samari khuo pakhatah an lût a.
Chun, a mitmei chu Jerusalem tieng pana ân lang leiin ama an lâwm nawh.
Ama ruok chu a hang ngha a, a baukhat a.
Chun, khaw dangah an fe ta a.
Chun, lampuia an fe laiin tuin amanih a kuomah, “I fena taphawtah zui ka ti che,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Sihalhaiin kuo an nei a, chunga vatehai khawmin bu an nei a, Mihriem Naupa ruok hin chu a lu innghatna a nei nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn mi dang kuomah, “Mi zui rawh,” a ta. Ama chun, “Lalpa, ka pa mîn vuitir zet rawh,” a ta.
Isu ruok chun a kuomah, “Mithiin anni mithi chu vui raw se; nang chun Pathien ram thu va hril dar lem rawh,” a ta.
Chun, mi dang khawmin, “Lalpa, zui ka ti che, amiruokchu, ka ina mihai bau ṭhain mîn thlatir zet rawh,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Tukhawm hnuoi inletnaa kut innghata, hnung tieng ngha chu Pathien rama mi ni tlâk a ni nawh,” a ta.
Chu zoa chun Lalpân mi dang sâwmsari
“Fe ro, ngai ta u, satene laia berâmte um angin ka tir cheu hi.
Chun, in in lûtna taphawtah a hmasatakin, ‘Hi ina hin thlamuongna tlung raw se,’ ti ro.
Chun, chutaka chun thlamuong nau a um chun in thlamuongna thu chu a chungah um zing a tih; a um naw ruok chun in chungah hung kîr nâwk a tih.
“Chun, khuo in lûtna taphawtah an lâwm cheu chun an pêk ang ang cheu chu fa ro;
an khuoa damnaw umhai khawm sukdam unla, an kuomah, ‘Pathien ram in kuomah a tlung tah,’ ti ro.
‘In khaw pilvut kan kephaa kai khawm hi in chungah kan hrûk fai hi; nisienlakhawm, Pathien ram in kuomah a hung tlung tah ti hi hre ro,’ ti ro.
Nisienlakhawm, ngaituo nia chun nangni tuor nêk chun Tura le Sidon tuor ding chu a zie um lem a tih.
Chun, sâwmsarihai
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Kâwlinlep angin Setan vâna inthaw- ka hung tla kha ka hmu annaw.
Nisienlakhawm, khawhrihai in thu thua an um leiin lâwm naw ro; vâna in hming ziek a ni leiin lâwm lem ro,” a ta.

Chun, chu lai tak chun Isu chu Thlarau Inthiengah a lâwm bêk bêk a, “Aw Pa, hnuoi le vân Lalpa, nangin mi var le mi bengvârhai kuomah hieng thu hi i ip a, nautêhai kuomah i puong lei hin kân pâk che; anih, Pa, chuong anga thaw chu i ngaiin a ṭha a nih.
Chun, inchûktirhai kuom tieng chu a ngha a, inrûkin, “In thil hmuhai hi a hmûna mithai chu a vângnei ie!

Ka ti cheu hi, zâwlnei tamtak le, lal tamtakhai khawmin in thil hmuhai hi hmu an inhâwk hlak a; nisienlakhawm, an hmu si nawh; naa in hriethai khawm hi hriet an nuom hlak, nisienlakhawm, an hriet si naw a nih,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Dân lekhabuah ieng am ziek a na? chutaka chun ieng am i tiem hlak a?” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “I dawn dik ngawt el ie; chuong ang chun thaw la hring i tih,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun thiem inchangtir a tum a, Isu kuomah, “Anleh, ka vênghai chu tuhai am an na?” a ta.
Isûn a dawn a, “Mi pakhat Jerusalema inthawkin Jeriko tieng a fe thla a, suomhmanghai ân tuokpui hlau a, chuhai chun a silfên an hlîppêk vawng a, an vuok hrep a, thi vâng vângin an fe san ta a.
Chun, thiempu pakhat chu lampuia chun a zu fe hlau a, a hmu phingleh lampui sîr khat tieng a hêl el ta a.
Chun, chuong ang bawkin Levi chi mi pakhat khawm chu hmun chu a hung tlung a, a hmu phingleh lampui sîr khing tieng a hêl ve el ta a.
Amiruokchu, Samari rama mi tû amanih ân zin fe hin a umna chu a hung tlung a, a hmu phingleh a lunginsiet bêk bêk a.
A kuomah a va fe a, a pawpahai chun hriek le uoin dâm a nâl a, a tuom a, ama sa chungah ân chuongtir a, khuolbûkah a fepui a, a enkawl ta a.
Chun, a zînga chun duli
“Chuhai pathum laia chun suomhmang tuokpa vênghai chu a tû tak chu am ni dingin i ring a?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Ama lunginsiettu chu,” a ta. Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Nang khawm chuong ang bawk chun va thaw ve rawh,” a ta.
Ama chun zuorpui pakhat a nei a, Mari a na; ama chu Lalpa ke bulah a ṭhung a, a thu a ngai a.

Martha ruok chu rawngbâwl ngawtin a buoi hle a; chuongchun, a kuomah a hung a, “Lalpa, ka zuorpuinu hin keia khât chau rawng bâwl dinga a mi dânde hi pawi i ti naw am a nih? mi ṭhangpui dingin hril raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, Lalpain, “Martha, Martha, thil tamtak i ngaituoa i buoi a ni hi,
thil pakhat chau a pawimaw; Mariin chan ṭha a thlang a, chu chu lâkpêk ding a ni nawh,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Isu khâwlai hmuna manih a ṭawngṭai a, a ṭawng- ṭai zo chun a închûktir mi pakhatin a kuomah, “Lalpa, ṭawngṭai dân Johanin a închûktirhai ân chûktir ang khan mîn chûktir ve ta la,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “In ṭawngṭai chun hieng ang hin ti ro,
‘Kan Pa,
I hming inzaum raw se.
I ram hung tlung raw se,
Ni tin kan fâk khawpin bu mi pe la,
Kan suolhai mi ngaidam la,
Keini khawmin kan chunga thil suksuoltuhai kan ngaidam hlak angin.
Thlêmnaa chun mi ṭhuoi lût naw rawh,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, ama bawkin an kuomah, “Nangni laia tûin amanih ruol nei sienla, zânrilah a kuomah fein, ‘Ruola, beiphêk pathum mîn pûktir rawh;
ka ruolpa inzinin a mi hung sir a, ama infâktir ding iengkhawm ka nei si nawh,’ ti sienla,
in sûnga mîn, ‘Mi sukbuoi naw, tuhin chu kawt khâr a ni ta a, ka nauhai khawm ka kuomah khumah an zâl ta a, thoin ka va pêk thei naw che,’ tiin dawn sienla.
Ka ti cheu hi, a ruolpa a ni leiin thoin a va pêk nawa chu, a hni tlut tlut leiin, a dit zât zât va pêng a tih.
“Chuongchun, ka ti cheu hi, hni ro, chuongchun, pêkin um in tih; zawng ro, chuongchun, hmûng in tih; nawk ro, chuongchun, hawngpêkin um in tih.
Tûkhawm a hni taphawt chun an hmu hlak; tûkhawm a zawng chun an hmu hlak, tûkhawm a nawk chu hawngpêk ning an tih.
Nangni laia pa hi, a naupain beiphêk hni sienla, tûin am lung pêng a ta? anleh, nga hni sienla, tûin am nga aiah rûl pêng a ta?
Anleh, ârtui hni sienla, ainuvêt a pêk ding am a nih?
Chuongchun, nangni mi suol hmanin in nauhai thil ṭha pêk nachâng in hriet chun, in Pa vâna mi chun a hnituhai chu Thlarau Inthieng a va pêk âwm ngei de e!” a ta.
Chun, Isûn khawhri ṭawngtheinaw pakhat a hnawt dawk a. Chun, khawhri chu a suok phingleh ṭawngtheinaw chu a ṭawng ta a; chuongchun, mipuihaiin mak an ti hle a.
Chun, a ṭhenin ama fiena dingin vâna inthawkin inchikna an hni a.
Ama ruok chun, an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, an kuomah, “Khâwlai ram khawm mâni le mâni indo taphawt chu an bohmang hlak; sûng khat khawm mâni le mâni indo chu an bohmang hlak.
Setan khawm ama le ama ân do chun, a ram iengtin am ngîr suok a ta?
Chun, kei Beelzebub
Amiruokchu, kei Pathien kut pâr leia khawhrihai hnawt dawk hlak ka ni chun, Pathien ram in kuomah a hung tlung tah nîng a tih.
“Mi hrât chun hriem famkim chawia a in a vêng sûng po, a sum chu himtakin a um zing hlak;
nisienlakhawm, ama nêka hrât lemin a hung thaw a, a hne pha chun, ân ringna râlthuom famkim chu a lâkpêk a, a râllâk thil chu a sem dar hlak.
“Khawhri inthieng naw chu mi sûnga inthawka a suokin, châwlna zawngin tui um nawna hmunahai ân vâk a. Châwlna hrim hrim a hmu naw a, ‘Ka suokna ina khan kîr nâwk el ka tih,’ a ta,
chun, a va tlung chun phît faia cheimawiin a va hmu a.
Chu phingleh a fe a, ama nêka suol lem khawhri dang pasari a hung ṭhuoi a, chutaka chun an lût a, an um zing hlak a; chu mihriem umzie nuhnung chu a hmasa nêkin a hung ṭha naw lem hlak a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril laiin, mipui laia nuhmei pakhat a khêk suok a, a kuomah, “Nangma vawnna phîng chu a hamṭha ie, i nêne nêk khawm,” a ta.
Ama ruok chun, “Anih, nisienlakhawm, Pathien thu hrea zâwmhai hi mi hamṭha an ni lem,” a ta.

“Simtieng lalnu kha ngaituo pha chun tulai ruoltharhai kuoma hin tho vêng a ta, thiemnaw inchangtir a tih; Solomon var ngai ding hmanin kâwlkawdawnga inthawkin a hung si a; ngai ta u, Solomon nêka ropui lem hitaka hin a um.
“I taksa khâwnvar chu i mit a nih, i mit a var chun i taksa khawm apumin a var suok hlak; a se ruok chun i taksa khawm ân thim zo vawng hlak.
Chuongchun, i sûnga var um chu inthim a lo ni el râwm, fîmkhur rawh.
Chuongchun, i taksa hi khâwlai khawm inthim lova a puma a var suok chun, khâwnvar var nasatakin a el che angin var suok a tih,” a ta.
Chun, a hril laiin, Pharisai pakhatin ama chu a kuoma bu fa dingin a fiel a; chuongchun, a lût a, buthlêng chu a awt a.
Chun, Pharisai chun bu fâk hmaa a kut a sâwp naw chu a hmuin mak a ti hle a.
Chun, Lalpa chun a kuomah, “Nangni Pharisaihaiin no le thlêng puo tieng chu in sâwp fai hlak luo a; in sûng tieng ruok chu hlêprûkna le suolin a sip si a.
Mi invêthai, a puo tieng siemtu chun a sûng tieng khawm a siem naw am a nih?
Nisienlakhawm, a sûnga thil um chu mi rimsihai kuoma pêk dingin hmang ro; chuongchun, ngai ro, in ta dingin iengkim ân thieng tah a nih.
Nangni Pharisaihai in chung a rik ie! Inkhâwmna ina ṭhungpha ṭhatak le dâwrhmuna chibai bûkhai in ngaina si hlak a.
In chung a rik ie! Thlân ti inhriet lo, a chunga hre lova mi an fe hlakna ang chu in nih,” a ta.
Chun, Dânhretu pakhatin a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, hieng thu i hril hi keini khawm mi hal i ni hi,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun, “Dân hretuhai, nangni khawm in chung a rik ie! Thil phur rinumtakhai mihai in bel hlak a, nangni chun phurhai chu in kutpâr pakhat khawmin in them ngai si nawh.
In chung a rik ie! Zâwlneihai thlân inhai in bâwl hlak a, in thlatuhai ithat an ni si a.
Chuongchun, in thlatuhai thilthawhai chu in hrietpuiin in remtipui a nih; annîn an that a, nangnîn an thlân inhai in bâwl si a.
Chuleiin, Pathien varna khawm- in, ‘An kuomah zâwlneihai le tirkohai tir ka ta, a ṭhen that an ta, a ṭhen suknawmnâng an tih;
zâwlnei po po thisen, leilung insieng tîra inthawka kha tulai ruoltharhai chunga phuba lâk a ni theina dingin.
Nangni Dân hretuhai, in chung a rik ie! Varna chabi chu in fe hmangpui a; nangni hlak in lût nuom si naw a, mi lût ding hlak in khap si a,” a ta.
Chun, chutaka inthawka a suok chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chun an tai ta rân a, thu tinrêng an inhriltir a;
a ṭawng suol hlaua man tumin an inchân zing a.
Chu sûnga mipui sâng tamtak insir nuk nuk khawp hiel an hung inkhâwm chun, Isûn a hmasatakin a închûktirhai kuomah, “Pharisaihai chawl, vervêknaa inthawk chun fîmkhur ro.
Chuleiin, inthima in hril taphawt kha varah la hrieng an tih; pindan sûngrila, na bula in thu hril kha in chunga chuongin la khêkpui an tih.
Chun, ka ruolhai, ka hril cheu hi, taksa sukhluma, chu hnunga iengkhawm thaw nâwk thei ta nawhai chu ṭi naw ro.
Amiruokchu, tû am in ṭi ding hril lâwk ka ti cheu; a sukhlum hnung khawma Hremhmuna pei theina thuneitu chu ṭi ro; anih, ka hril cheu hi, ama mawl chu ṭi ro.
Chawngzawng panga dâr tangka pahniin an zawr hlak a ni naw am a nih? nisienlakhawm, anni laia pakhat khawm Pathienin ân hmai ngai si nawh.
In samzai chen hin tiem vawng a nih in sawnnaw. Ṭi naw ro; chawngzawng tamtak nêk chun in hlu lem a nih.
“Chun, ka hril cheu hi, mihai hmaa a mi ṭan taphawt chu Pathien vântirkohai hmaah Mihriem Naupa hin ṭan vêng a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, mihai hmaa mîn phat chu Pathien vântirkohai hmaah inphat ni vêng a tih.
chu pha taka chun, ieng am in hril ding ti Thlarau Inthieng chun hril a ti cheu,” a ta.
Mipui laia mi tuin amanih Isu kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, ka u kuomah ro mi sem ve dingin hril rawh,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a kuomah, “Mihriem, nangni chungah tûin am rorêltu le, sum semtuah a mi siem a?” a ta.
Chun, an kuomah, “Fimkhur unla, inhnarna hrim hrima inthawk chun invêng ro, sum hau hi mihriem dam san a ni nawh,” a ta.
Chun, an kuomah tekhithu a hril a, “Mi hausa tû amanih a lohma a hung hlâwk bêk bêk a.
Chuongchun, ân ngaituo a, ‘Iengtin am thâwng ka ti aw? ka bu le bâl sie khâwmna ka nei si naw a,’ a ta.
Chun, ‘Hieng hin thâwng ka tih; ka bu inhai ṭhiek ka ta, a nêka lienin bâwl ka tih; chutaka chun ka bu le ka sum po po sie khâwm ka tih.
Chun, ka thlarau kuomah, Thlarau, kum tamtak sûnga dingin sum tamtak în khâwl hi; châwl la, fain dâwn rawh, tîng ka tih,’ a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathienin a kuomah, ‘Invêt, vawizân hin i thlarau an hni ding che a nih; i thil suksuokhai kha tû ta am ni tâng a ta le?’ ” a ta.
“Mâni ta dinga sum inkhâwl a, Pathien tienga hau si naw chu, chuong ang chu a ni hlak,” a ta.
Chun, a inchûktirhai kuomah, “Chuleiin, ka hril cheu hi, ‘Ieng am fâng ka ta aw?’ tiin in hringna thu le, ‘Ieng am silin bil ka ta aw?’ tiin in taksa thu lungkham naw ro.
Fâk ding nêkin hringna a thupui lem a nih, silfên nêk khawmin taksa a thupui lem a nih.
Vaâkhai hi ngaituo ro, bu an tu ngai nawh, an sîk ngai nawh, bupanghai, bu inhai khawm an nei nawh; nisienlakhawm, Pathienin a châwm si a; nangni chu vatehai nêk chun in hlut lemzie chu.
Chun, nangni lai lungkham leiin tûin am mâni dung
Hi el khawm hi thaw thei lo cheu a, iengdinga thil dang in lungkham am a na?
Chuongchun, ram sâwlhna vawisûn anga hring, a zînga thuka ti nâwk el ding hman, Pathienin chuong ang lâwma a chei chun, aw, nangni ringna tlâwmhai, chuonghai nêk chun silfên a va pêk âwm cheu de e!
“Chun, in fâk dinghai, in dâwn dinghai zawng naw ro; lungâwpinkaiin um bawk naw ro.
Khawvêla hnam po poin chuong po po chu an zawng hlak, chuong chu in mamaw ti in Pa vâna miin a hriet zing si a.
Ama ram zawng lem ro, chuongchun, chuong thil khawm chu a pêk sa ding cheu a nih.
“Pâwl tlâwmhai, ṭi naw ro; ram pêk cheu hi in Pa lâwm zâwng tak a nih.
In nei taphawt chu zawr unla, pasiehai kuomah pe ro; vânah rukru fe nawnaah, hângthim fâk siet nawnaa chun, tangka ip hlui thei nawhai, ro inhmang thei nawhai, inkhâwl ro.
In ro umna taphawtah in lungril khawm a um ding a ni si a.
“Dier kei zingin, in khâwnvar khawm chawk zingin um ro;
An pu a hung phaa suok lo nghâk zinga a hmu dinghai chu an hamṭha. Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, ama chun a dier hung kei a ta, anni chu thlaithlêng awtin inṭhungtir a ta, an rawng hung bâwlpêk a tih.
Zân rila manih, tho phain amanih a hung a, chuong anga a hung hmu chun, chuong suokhai chu hamṭhâng an tih.
Amiruokchu, hi hi hre ro, inru a hung ding hun in neitu chun hre sienla, vêng a ta, a in inverpawptir naw ni.
Chun, Peterin a kuomah, “Lalpa, hi tekhithu hi keini chau am a nih i mi hril, mi po po?” a ta.
Chun, Lalpain, “Sum enkawltu ringum, var tak, a puin a hun poa an bu chan ding sempêk dingin a sûnghai chunga hotua a siem ding chu tû tak am nîng a ta?
A pu a hung phaleh suok chuong anga thawa a hung hmu ding chu a hamṭha.
Indiktakin ka hril cheu hi, a nei po po chunga hotuah siem a tih.
Amiruokchu, chu suok chun, a lungrilin ‘Ka pu hung vak naw ni,’ tiin suoknuhai, suokpahai lo vaw sienla, fain dâwnin lo inrui ta sienla;
chu suok pu chu a ring naw niah, a hriet naw kâr hung a ta, bawng hni hung insuong a ta, mi ringum nawhai chan ang hung inchangtir a tih.
Suok a pu dit zâwng hre zing sia, lo inring lova, a pu dit zâwng ang khawma thaw lo chu, vawi tamtak vuong an tih.
Amiruokchu, hriet naw leia vuokna khawp thil thaw chu, vawi tlâwmtê vuong an tih. Tûkhawm tamtak an ipêk kuoma chun tamtak phût an tih; tûkhawm tamtak an inkawltir kuoma chun tam deu phût an tih.
“Khawvêlah mei thlâk thla dinga hung ka nih; tu khawm hin kâng nghâl ta sien ka va ti de!
Khawvêlah inremna inlêngtir dinga hung in mi sâwn am a nih? Teu lo e, ka hril cheu hi, indo inlêngtir dinga hung ka ni lem a nih;
tuta hnung chu sûngkhata mi panga indo an tih, pathumin pahni, pahniin pathum.
Chun, mipui kuoma khawm chun, “Thlang tienga sûm suok in hmu chun ‘Ruo a sûr ding a nih,’ in ti nghâl hlak a, chun, a hung ni ngei hlak.
Chun, sim thli hrâng in hriet chun, ‘Khuo a sa ding a nih,’ in ti hlak a; chun, a hung ni ngei hlak.
Nangni vervêkhai, khawvêl le vân umzie khawm in hriet fie thei si a, iengdinga tulai thil in hriet fie thei naw am a na?
“Iengdinga nangnîn a fel chu in ngaituo naw am a na?

Rorêltu hmaa i khingpui leh i fe pha, fe malamin amaa inthawka fihlîmna mawl zawng rawh; chuong naw chun rorêltu hmaah ṭhuoi ṭâl a ti che a, rorêltu chun mi man hotu inmantir a ti che a, mi man hotu chun intângna inah khum hlau rawi a ti che.
Ka hril cheu hi, dâr tangka dere
Chun, chulai tak chun, tuhai amanih an lo um a, chuonghai chun an inthawina thisen chu Galili mihai thisen leh Pilatin a chawkpawl thu chu Isu an hung hril a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Chu Galili rama mihai chu, chuong ang thil an tuor lei chun Galili rama mi danghai po po nêkin suol bîkah in ngai am a nih?
Ni lo e, ka hril cheu hi, nangni khawm in sim naw chun, chuong ang bawk chun bohmang vawng in tih.
Chun, Siloam in insângin mi sâwm le pariet a del hlumhai khawm kha, Jerusalema um po po nêkin mi suol bîk ni dingin in ring am a nih?
Ni lo e, ka hril cheu hi, nangni khawm in sim naw chun, chuong ang bawk chun bohmang vawng in tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, hi tekhithu hi a hril a, “Tûin amanih a grêp huonah theichang phun pakhat a nei a; chun, a kûnga chun a ra a hung zawng a, pakhat khawm a hmu naw a.

Chuongchun, grêp huon enkawltu kuomah, ‘Ngai rawh, kum thum sûng hin hi theichang kûnga hin a ra ka zawng hlak a, pakhat khawm ka hmu si nawh; phûr rawh; iengdinga hmun hluo saka a um zing am a na?’ a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘Pu, tu kum bêk hi um sienla, a vêlin cho ka ta, êkin vur phawt ka tih;
chun a hung ra chun ṭhâng a ta, a ra naw ruok chun phûr el rawh,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Chun, Châwlni chun ama chun inkhâwmna in pakhatah ân chûktir a.
Chun, ngai ta, kum sâwmpariet hrâtnawna khawhri iman nuhmei pakhat a um a; ama chu a kûn zing a, a khât chun a ngîr tlûn thei naw a.
Chun, Isûn a hmu phingleh a ko a, a kuomah, “Nuhmei, i hrât nawna chun ân thla ta che,” a ta.
Chun, a chungah a kut ân nghat a; chuongchun, kârlovin a ngîr tlûn nghâl ta a, Pathien ân pâk ta a.
Lalpa ruok chun a kuomah, “Nangni vervêkhai, Châwlniin mâni sebâwng amanih, sabengtung amanih a bu fâknaa inthawka sûtin, tui dâwn dingin in ṭhuoi dawk seng hlak a ni naw am a nih?
Hi nuhmei, Abraham naunu, Setanin kum sâwmpariet a khuop hi, Châwlni khawmin hi khuopna hi hang sûtpêk naw ziezâng am a nih?” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuongchun, ama chun, “Pathien ram chu iengang am a na? Ieng le hin am hrilkhîng ka ta?
Anṭam chi mal khat miin a lâk a, huona a the ang chu a nih; chu chu a hung mâwng a, thing a hung na, chunga vatehai chu a zârahai chun an riek a,” a ta.
Chun, “Pathien ram chu ieng lêm hrilkhîng ka ta?” a ti nâwk a.
“Chawl nuhmeiin a lâk a, beiphit tekhâwng thum laia a rênga a tho vawng chena a phûm ang chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun inchûktir pei puma, Jerusalem tieng panin, khaw lien le khaw chînhai a sir pei a.
Chun, tûin amanih a kuomah, “Sandamhai chu tlâwmterek am an nih?” a ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Kawtkhâr chîna chun lût tum hrâm ro; ka hril cheu hi, mi tamtakin lût tum an ta, lût thei si naw ni hai.

In neitu chu a tho a, kawt a khâr hnung chun, nangnîn tuola ngîrin, ‘Lalpa, kawt mi hawngpêk rawh,’ tia kawtkhâr in hung nawk pha, ama chun, ‘Khâwtieng mi am in na, ka hriet naw cheu,’ tiin dawn a ti cheu.
Chu pha chun nangnîn, ‘I hmuah kan fâkin kan dâwn ta hlak kha, kan kawtthlêrahai khawm în chûktir hlak kha,’ la tîng in tih.
Chun, ama chun, ‘Ka hril cheu hi, khâwtienga mi am in ni ka hriet nawh; nangni thil suol thaw po pohai, mi fe hmang san vawng ro,’ la tîng a tih.
Chuonglai tak chun Pharisai tuhai amanih an hung a, a kuomah, “Suok la, hitaka inthawkin fe hmang rawh; Herodin sukhlum che a nuom bêk bêk a nih,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Chu sihal kuoma chun hi thu hi va hril ro, ‘Ngai rawh, vawisûn le zîngah khawhrihai hnawt dawk ka ta, damnawhai khawm sukdam ka ta, a zîngnâwk zo ka tih.’
Ieng khawm ni raw se, vawisûn leh, zînga leh, a zîngnâwk leh ka fe pei ding a nih; Jerusalem khaw puo tieng zâwlnei thi thei a ni naw ie,” a ta.

“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem! zâwlneihai thattu, i kuoma an hung tirhai lunga lo dêng hlumtu; ârpuiin a têhai a thla hnuoia a awp khâwm angin, i nauhai vawi iengzât am awp khâwm ka tum kha! Nisienlakhawm, in nuom si nawh.
Chun, Châwlniin Pharisai hotu pakhat ina bu fa dinga a fe laiin, an enthlit a.
Chun, ngai ta, a hmaa chun damnaw invûng mi tû amanih a um a.
Chuongchun, Isûn Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai chu a biek a, an kuomah, “Châwlni hin sukdam a thieng am a thieng naw?” a ta.
Anni ruok chu an to zing a; ama chun damnaw chu a chel a, a sukdam a, ân fetir ta a.
Chuong thu chu an dawn thei naw nâwk bawk a.
Chun, an mi fielhaiin ṭhungpha ṭhatak an thlang hlakzie a hmu a, an kuomah tekhithu a hril ta a;
chuongchun, a fieltu che chun, ‘Hi pa ṭhungna ding hi inkien rawh,’ hung tîng a che a; chun, nang inzaktakin ṭhungpha ṭha nawtakah i ṭhung nâwk si ding a nih.

An fiel che chun ṭhungpha ṭha naw takah va ṭhung lem hlak rawh; chuongchun, a fieltu che a hung pha leh, i kuomah, ‘Ruola, ṭhungpha ṭha deua hin hung ṭhung rawh,’ ti thei a ti che. Chuongchun, i thlaithlêng awtpuihai mithmua chun chawimawiin um i tih.

Chun, a fieltu kuoma khawm chun, “Sûna manih, zâna manih ruoi i ṭhe pha leh, i ruolhai, i unauhai, i laibunghai, i vêng hausahai chu fiel naw rawh; chuong naw chun, fiel ve nâwk an ti che a, thung nâwk kher an ti che.
Ruoi i ṭhe pha chun, pasiehai, piengsuolhai, keinbaihai, mitdelhai fiel lem rawh;
chuongchun, la hamṭhâng i tih; anni chun thungna ding che nei naw ni hai a, chuongchun, mi fel tho nâwk pha chun thungin i um ding a ni si a,” a ta.
Chun, a thlaithlêng awtpui tûin amanih chuong chu a hriet a, a kuomah, “Pathien rama bu fa ding chu a hamṭha ie!” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Mi tûin amanih ruoi ropuitak zânah a ṭhe a, mi tamtak a fiel a;
chun, a fâk huna chun a mi fielhai kuomah, ‘Hung ta ro khai, tuhin iengkim inzo a ni tah,’ ti dingin a suok a tir a.
Chun, an rêngin inthuruolin suonlam an siem seng a. A hmasatak chun a kuomah, ‘Lo kân châwk ta a, a ena ka fe a ṭûl a nih; mi lunginsiet la mi hung inphatpêk rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, mi dangin, ‘Sebâwng tuok nga kân châwk ta a, a sie le ṭha fie dingin ka fe ding a na, mi lunginsiet la mi hung inphatpêk rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, mi dangin, ‘Nuhmei ka nei ta a, chuleiin, ka hung thei nawh,’ a ta.

Chun, suok chun a pu kuomah chuong thu chu a va hril a. Chun, in neitu chu a lunginsen a, a suok kuoma chun, ‘Suok la, kawtthlêrahai, kâwmkârahai, fe zeu zuou la, pasiehai, piengsuolhai, mitdelhai, keinbaihai, hitaka hin hung ṭhuoi lût rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, suok chun, ‘Pu i thu mi pêk ang khan ka thaw ta a, nisienlakhawm, hmun a la chuong ta rawp,’ a ta.
Chun, a puin suok kuoma chun, ‘Suok la, lamlienahai, khawhnâwmahai fe la, ka in sipna dingin mî hung thlêm lût hrâm rawh.
Ka hril che hi, mi ka ifielhai khan pakhat khawmin ka ruoiṭhe fa naw ni hai,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Chun, mipui nasatak ama leh an fe ve a; chuongchun, ama chu a ngha a, an kuomah,
“Nangni laia tûkhawm hin in insâng bâwl tum unla, a tirin ṭhungin, bâwl zona khawp sum in nei le nei naw hre dingin, a man ding chin tuin am sût nâwng in ta?
Chuong naw chun, lung phûm ta zeta a bâwl zo thei si naw chun, a en taphawtin nuisan an ta,
‘Hi mipa hin in ân kal zet a, a bâwl zo thei si naw a,’ tîng an tih.
“Annawleh,lal tuin am, lal dang do dinga fe suokin, inṭhung hmasa zetin, ama do dinga sîng hni ruol le hung inthawk chu, sîng khat leh a lo do lêt ngam ding le ding naw, mî râwn nâwng a ta?
Chuong a ni naw leh, lal dang chu hlataka a la um laiin, inremna tieng thutiem hni dingin palai tir a tih.
Chuong ang bawkin, nangni lai hin tûkhawm a nei po po mâksan naw chu, ka închûktir ni thei naw nih.
“Machi hi a ṭha; nisienlakhawm, machi khawm a da ta chun, iengin am sukal nâwk an ta?
Leihnuoi dingin ṭha naw ni a, êkdûr dingin ṭha bawk naw nih; mîn an peihâwn hlak. Tûkhawm hrietna dinga na nei chun hre raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisaihai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun, “Hi mipa hin mi suolhai a pâwl a, an kuoma hai bu a fâk ve hlak,” tiin an chier ve ve a.
Chuongchun, ama chun an kuomah hi tekhithu hi a hril a;
“Nangni lai tûkhawmin berâm za nei sienla, an laia pakhat inhmang ang sienla, thlalêrah sâwmkuo le pakuohai chu mâksanin ân hmang chu a hmu nâwk hmakhat tûin am zawng nâwng a ta?
Chun, a hmu nâwk chun, lâwmtakin a liengkoah a put hlak.
Chun, in a tlung phingleh a ruolhai le a vênghai a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, ‘Mi lâwmpui ro, ka berâm inhmang kha ka hmu nâwk tah ie,’ a ti hlak.
Ka hril cheu hi, chuong ang bawk chun, mi fel sâwmkuo le pakuo sim chuong ding nei nawhai chunga nêkin mi suol pakhat sim chunga hin vânah lâwmna um lem a tih.
“Chun, nuhmei tûkhawm duli
Chun, a hmu nâwk chun, a ruolhai le a vênghai a ko khâwm a, ‘Mi lâwmpui ro, ka duli
Ka hril cheu hi, chuong ang bawkin, mi suol pakhat sim chunga hin Pathien vântirkohai an lâwm hlak a nih.
“Mi tûin amanih naupasal pahni a nei a;
chun, a naupang lem chun a pa kuomah, ‘Pa, ro ka chanâi mi pe rawh,’ a ta. Chuongchun, a sum chu an kuomah a sem ta a.
Chun, ni sâwt nawtê hnunga chun a naupa naupang lem chun a chanâi po po chu a lâk khâwm vawng a, khaw ram hlatakah a fe ta a, chutaka chun inhawi taluoin a um a, a sum chu a sukthâm ta mei mei a.
Chun, a sukthâm vawng phingleh, chu khuoa chun ṭâm nasatak a hung tla a; fâk ding a hung tlasam ta a.
Chuongchun, chu ram mi, mi pakhat a va bêl a; chu mipa chun vawk bu pe dingin a lo tieng a tir a.
Chun, iengkhat kâwm vawkin an fâkhai chun insukkhawp a nuom bêk bêk a; tukhawmin iengkhawm an pêk si nawh.
“Chun, ân hriet suok phingleh, ‘Ka pa kuoma inhlâwfahai bu fâk sêng lova nei an tam vei leh, kei hlak chu hitaka hin phîngṭâmin ka thi ding a ni si a!
Tho ka ta, ka pa kuomah fêng ka ta, Pa, vâna mi chunga le nanga mithmuin thil ka suksuol a.
I naupaa înbûk tlâk khawm ka ni ta nawh; i kuoma inhlâwfa pakhat angin mi siem ve rawh, tîng ka tih,’ a ta.
“Chuongchun, a tho a, a pa kuomah a fe ta a. Chuongchun, hlataka a la um laiin a pain a lo hmu a, a lunginsiet bêk bêk a, a tlân a, a kuo a, a fâwp ta ngâwi ngâwi a.
Chun, a kuomah a naupa chun, ‘Pa, vâna mi chungah le nanga mithmuin thil ka suksuol a; i naupaa inbûk tlâk ka ni ta nawh,’ a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a pa chun a suokhai kuomah, ‘Zakawfuol a ṭhatak kha hung la vat unla, inhâktir ro; a kutah kutsebi inbuntir unla, a keah kekawk inbuntir ro;
sebâwngte thâu tak kha hung la unla, that ro, hlimtakin fâng ei tiu;
hi ka naupa hi a thi a, a hung hring nâwk tah a ni hi; ân hmang a, ei hmu nâwk tah a ni hi,’ a ta. Chuongchun, hlimtakin an um ṭan ta a.
“Chun, a naupa upa lem chu loah a um a; chun, in a hung tlung tâwm chun iengkhat mûtrîk le lâm ri a hriet ta a.
Chuongchun, siehlaw pakhat a ko a, ‘Chu ieng am a ni ta leh?’ tiin ân dawn a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘I sang a hung a, himtaka a hmu nâwk leiin i pain sebâwngtê thâutak kha a that a nih,’ a ta.
Chun, a lunginsen a, a lût nuom ta naw a; chun, a pa a hung suok a, a thlêm a.

Nisienlakhawm, ama chun a pa kuomah, ‘Ngai rawh, kum hieng chen hi i rawng ka bâwlpêk che a, i thu hlak hi ka awi naw ngai si naw a, ka ruolhai le hlimna ka siemna dingin kêltê khawm i mi pêk ngai si nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, hi i naupa nawchizawrhai kâwla i sum fa zo vawngtu hi a hung phingleh ama ta dingin sebâwngtê thâutak kha i lo thatpêk vei a,’ a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘Ka naupa, ka kuoma um zing i nih annâwm; ka nei po po hi i ta a nih.
Hlimtak le lâwmtaka um ding a ni hrim annâwm; hi i sang hi a thi a, a hung hring nâwk ta a; ân hmang a, ei hmu nâwk tah a ni si a,’ a ti a,” a ta.
