Chun, Isûn a inchûktirhai kuomah hi thu khawm hi a hril a; “Mi hausa tuin amanih sum enkawltu a nei a; chu pa chun a sum a sukthâmpêk mei mei chungah a kuomah an hêk a.
Chuongchun, ama chu a ko a, a kuomah, ‘I chungchâng thu ka hriet hi iengtizie am a na? I sum enkawl chanchin hung ziek vawng rawh; tuta hnung chu sum enkawltu hin ṭhang thei ta naw ti ni,’ a ta.
“Chun, sum enkawltu chun, a lungrilin, ‘Ka puin ka sum enkawl a mi bân ding hi iengtin am thâw tâng ka ti aw? hnuoi cho ka pei si naw a, kut daw hlak chu kân zak si a.
Sum enkawl a mi bân phaa mîn an ina an mîn umtirna dingin ka thaw dân ding ka hriet tah,’ a ta.
Chuongchun, a pu sum battuhai chu a ko seng a, a hmasatak kuoma chun, ‘Ka pu kuomah iengzât am i bat a?’ a ta.
Ama chun, ‘Hriek tekhâwng za khat,’ a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘I lekha la la, ṭhung vat la, sâwmnga ziek rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, mi dang kuomah, ‘Nang iengzât am i bat a?’ a ta. Ama chun, ‘Bu tekhâwng za khat,’ a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘I lekha la la, sâwmriet ziek rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, a pu chun, sum enkawltu fel naw chu a rem hriet leiin ân pâk ta a; var nauhai nêkin khawvêl nauhai hi an tulai dâna hin an var lem a nih.
“Ka hril cheu hi, sum tehlêmin in ta dingin ruolhai siem ro; sum a bohmang pha leh chatuona umnaa chun inumtira in umna dingin.
Tukhawm tlâwmte chunga ringum chu tamtak chunga khawm ring a um hlak. Tukhawm, tlâwmte chunga ringum naw chu tamtak chunga khawm ring a um nawh.
Sum tehlêm chunga hman ring in um naw chun, tûin am sum tak chu inkawltir a ti cheu a?
Mi dang ta chunga hman ring in lo um ta naw chun, nangni ta ding chu tûin am pêng an ti cheu a?
Chun, Pharisai tangka ngainatuhai chun chuong thu chu an hriet a, an nuisan a.
Chuongchun, ama chun an kuomah, “Mi mithmua insukfel el in nih, nisienlakhawm, Pathienin in lungril a hriet si a; mihriem laia an ichawimawi chu Pathien mithmua chun tirdakumtak a nih.
“Chun, mi hausa tû amanih a um a, puon senduk le puon zai inhmitak a sil a, ni tin inhawitirtakin a um hlak a.
Chun, a hming Lazar, kutdaw pakhat pânna ibâwm sip, a kawtkhâr bulah an inzâltir hlak a,
mi hausa dawkâna a fâk nawi tla chu fâk a nuom a; uihai hlak chun a pânna chu an liekpêk hlak a.
Chun, hieng ang hi a na, kutdaw chu a thi a, vântirkohaiin an fepui a, Abraham ângsûngah an sie a. Mi hausa khawm chu a thi a, phûmin a um ta a.
Chun, mithi khuoa chun natak tuorin a um a, a hang dâk a, hlataka Abraham, a ângsûnga Lazar um leh a hmu ta a.
Chun, a khêk a, ‘Pa Abraham, mi lunginsiet la, Lazar kha hung tir rawh, a kutpâr tuiah inchie sienla; ka lei sukdeina dingin; hi meichawka hin ka na bêk bêk el,’ a ta.

“Nisienlakhawm, Abrahamin, ‘Ka naupa, i dam lai khan thil ṭha i hmu a, chuong ang bawkin Lazarin thil ṭha naw a hmu kha hre zing ta la; nisienlakhawm, ama chu tuhin hitaka hin thlamuongtakin a um a, nang chu i na a ni kha.

Hieng naw khawm hi, hitaka inthawka nangni kuoma fe tumhai chu an fe thei nawna dingin le, tukhawm khataka inthawka keini kuom tieng an hung kai thei nawna dingin, keini le nangni inkâra hin hnuoi kak nasatak an siem tlat a nih,’ a ta.
“Chun, ama chun, ‘Anleh, pa, ama chu ka pa ina bêk infetir dingin ka ngên che;
piengpui pasal panga ka nei si a; hi na umnaa hin hung ve rawi an tih, ṭhahnemngaitakin hril raw se,’ a ta.
Abraham ruok chun, ‘Mosie le zâwlneihai an nei annâwm; chuhai thu chu ngai raw hai se,’ a ta.
Chun, ama chun, ‘Pa Abraham, ni lo e, mithi laia mi meu an kuomah fe sienla, sim an tih,’ a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘Mosie le zâwlneihai thu an awi naw chun, mithi laia mi tho nâwk sienla khawm awi chuong naw ni hai,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a închûktirhai kuomah, “Tlûknahai hi um hlak sienla khawm, tlûkna inumtirtu chung chu a rik!
Hieng mi chînhai laia pakhat khawm sukthlûk nêk chun, a sukthlutu ding rînga chun bu râwt nawina lung inhlitirin, tuisuorietah thlâk ni sienla, a ta dingin ṭha lem a tih.
Ni khatah vawi sari i chungah thil suksuolin, vawi sari, ‘Kân sîr,’ tia nanga tieng a ngha nâwk chun, i ngaidam ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, tîrkohai chun Lalpa kuomah, “Kan ringna sukphui deu raw khai,” an ta.
Chun, Lalpa chun, “Anṭam mu mal khat ang ringna in nei chun, hi thingtheihmi kûng kuoma hin, ‘Hung inphawi la, tuisuorietah lo inphun rawh,’ tîng in ta, in thu awi el a tih.
“Nisienlakhawm, nangni laia tûkhawm hnuoi inletin amanih, berâm vêngin amanih, suok nei sienla, a lo fe hung pha, ‘Bu hung fa nghâl rawh,’ a lo ti ding am a nih?
‘Ka fâk ding mi siempêk la, puon dierkei la, ka fâk ka dâwn khawp hmakhat chun ka rawng bâwl rawh; chu hnunga chun nangin fain, dâwn i tih,’ a lo ti lem naw ding am a nih?
In thu anga a thaw leiin in suok kuomah lâwmthu in hril hlak am a nih?
Chuong ang bawkin, nangni khawmin in kuomah thupêk ang po poa in thaw zo phaleh, ‘Suok ṭhahnem naw kan ni ie; kan thaw ding hrim kan thaw a nih,’ ti ro,” a ta.
Chun, Jerusalema an fe dingin, Samari le Galili ram chu a fe thleng a.
Chun, khaw ienga manih a lût dingin, mi inphâr ruok sâwmin an intuokpui a; chuonghai chu hlatakah an ngîr a,
chun, râwl inringtakin, “Isu inchûktirtu, mi lunginsiet rawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun anni chu a hang hmu chun, “Thiempuhai kuomah vân entir ro,” a ta. Chun, an fe lai chun an hung inthieng tâwl ta a.
Chun, anni laia pakhat chun a dam tah ti ân hriet phingleh, râwl inringtaka Pathien inpâk pei pumin a kîr nâwk ta a;
chun, a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, a lâwmthu a hril a; chun, ama chu Samari mi a ni nghe nghe a.
Chuongchun, Isûn a dawn a, “Mi sâwm kha in hung inthieng tah a ni naw am a nih? Pakuohai kha khâwlai am an um a?
Pathien inpâk dinga kîr nâwk, hi hnam dang mi chau naw hi tukhawm hmuin an um naw a ni maw?” a ta.
Chun, a kuomah, “Tho la, fe rawh, i ringna hi i dampui a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, Pharisaihaiin Pathien ram hung tlung ding hun an indawn leiin an kuomah, “Pathien ram chu hmu theiin a hung tlung naw ie,
‘En ta, hitaka hi,’ amanih, ‘Sawtaka saw,’ amanih ti bawk naw ni hai; ngai ta u, Pathien ram chu nangniah
Chun, inchûktirhai kuoma chun, “Mihriem Naupa dam lai nihai ni khat bêk hi in hmu nuom nihai la um a tih; nisienlakhawm, hmu ta si naw ti niu.
Chun, in kuomah, ‘En ta sawtaka saw!’ ‘En ta, hitaka hi!’ tîng an ti cheu; fe suok naw unla, anni chu zui bawk naw ro,
kâwlkawdawng khing tienga kâwl ân lep a, kâwlkawdawng khing tieng chenah a var hlak ang hin, Mihriem Naupa hi a hung ni chun a um ding a ni si a.
Nisienlakhawm, chu hma chun thil tamtak tuor a ta, hi ruoltharhai ditnawin um bawk a tih.
“Noa dam laia thil umzie ang khan, Mihriem Naupa a hung nâwk nihai chun um bawk a tih.
nisienlakhawm, Sodom khuoa inthawka Lota a suok ni chun vâna inthawkin mei le kâtin a sûr a, an rêngin a sukhlum vawng ta a.
Chuong ang bawk chun Mihriem Naupa hung inlâr ni chun um a tih.
“Ka hril cheu hi, chu zân chun khum pakhatah mi pahni um an ta, pakhat chu fe hmangpuiin um a ta, pakhat chu mâksanin um a tih.
Nuhmei pahni bu râwtnawiin um an ta, pakhat chu fe hmangpuiin um a ta, pakhat chu mâksanin um a tih.
[Mi pahni loah um an ta, pakhat chu fe hmangpuiin um a ta, pakhat chu mâksanin um a tih,”]
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, khâwlai am ie?” an ti a, an dawn a. Ama chun an kuomah, “Saruong umna taphawtah mulukawlhai khawm um khâwm an tih,” a ta.
Chun, beidawng lovin an ṭawngṭai rawp ding a nih ti, inhriettirna dingin an kuomah tekhithu a hril a;
“Khaw ienga manih rorêltu pakhat a um a; ama chun Pathien a ṭi naw a, mihriem hlak a ngaisak bawk nawh.
Chun, chu khuoa chun hmeithai pakhat a um a; ama chun, ‘Ka khingpui chungah ka phuba mi lapêk rawh,’ tiin a kuomah a fê rawp a.
Chun, ama chu sâwt rei chu a nuom naw a; nisienlakhawm, nakie chun a lungrilin, ‘Pathien ṭi lovin mihriem ngaisak naw lang khawm,
hi hmeithai hin a mi sukbuoi leiin a phuba chu lapêk el ka tih; chuong naw chun, a hung rawp hin mi la suksâwl zêk rawi a tih,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Chun, Lalpa bawkin, “Rorêltu fel naw thu hril chu hre ro.
An chungah zai la daw hri sien khawm, a mi thlang, asûn azâna ama kotuhai phuba chu Pathienin a lâkpêk naw ding am a nih?
Ka hril cheu hi, an phuba chu lapêk vak a tih. Nisienlakhawm, Mihriem Naupa hi a hung pha chun khawvêlah ringna a hung hmu ding am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, mi feltak ni inringa, mi dang po po hmusit hlak, tuhai amani kuoma khawm chun hi tekhithu hi a hril a:
“Mi pahni Pathien biekinah ṭawngṭai dingin an hang fe a; pakhat chu Pharisai a na, pakhat chu siedâwltu a nih.

Pharisai chu a ngîr a, ama khât chauin hieng ang hin a ṭawngṭai a, ‘Pathien, mi dang hlêpruhai, fel nawhai, uirehai ang ka ni naw lei le, hi siedâwltu ang khawm hi ka ni naw leiin i chungah ka lâwm ie.
Châwlkâr khatah vawi hni bu ka nghei hlak a; ka nei taphawt sâwmah pakhat ka pêk hlak,’ a ta.
Siedâwltu ruok chu hlatakah a ngîr a, vân tieng khawm a dâk ngam naw a, ‘Pathien, kei mi suol hi mi lunginsiet rawh,’ tiin a âwm ân chum ân chum ta lem a.
Chun, a them dingin a kuomah an nautêhai an hung ṭhuoi a; inchûktirhai ruok chun chu chu an hmu phingleh an lo hal a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isu chun a ko a, “Naupangtêhai ka kuomah inhungtir unla, khap naw ro; Pathien ram chu hieng ang mihai ta a ni si a.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm Pathien ram chu naupangtêin a lâwm anga lâwm naw phawt chu a sûngah lût naw tawp an tih,” a ta.
Chun, hotu tûin amanih a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu ṭha, chatuona hringna ka nei theina dingin ieng am thâwng ka ta?” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Iengdinga ṭha i mi ti? mi pakhat chau naw chu tûkhawm ṭha an um nawh, chu chu Pathien a nih.
Chun, ama chun, “Chuong thu po po chu naupangte ka ni laia inthawkin ka zâwm pei hlak,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn chu chu a hrietin a kuomah, “Tu khawm hin kawng khat i la bâk ie; i nei po po zawr la, pasiehai kuomah sem rawh, chuongchun, vânah ro nei i tih; chun, hung la, mi hung zui rawh,” a ta.
Ama ruok chu chuong thu chu a hrietin a lungngai bêk bêk a, a hausak bêk leiin.
Chuongchun, Isûn ama chu a en a, “Sum hauhai chu Pathien rama lût a vân tak âwm de aw!
Mi hausa Pathien rama lût nêkin sanghâwngsei ṭhimnaah lût thleng a awl lem a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chu thu hrehai chun, “Anleh, tu am sandam ni thei a ta?” an ta.
Ama ruok chun, “Mihriem thaw ruollo hi Pathien thaw thei a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Peterin, “Ngai ta, keinîn kan in le lo mâksanin kan zui che a!” a ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm Pathien ram leia in amanih, nuhmei amanih, unauhai amanih, nu le pa amanih, nauhai amanih mâksan taphawt chu,
hi dam sûng ngei khawm hin a nêka tam lem hmu naw ding tûkhawm an um nawh, hun la hung tlung dinga chatuona hringna leh,” a ta.
Chun, sâwm le pahnihai chu a kuomah a tumin a ṭhuoi a, an kuomah, “ngai ta u, Jerusalemah ei hang fe ding a ni hi; zâwlneihai thu ziek po po kha Mihriem Naupa chunga hin tlung a tih.
Jentailhai kuomah pêng an ta, nuiza siemna dingin hmang an tih, inzakumtakin siem an ta, chil sâkkhum an ta,
chun, vuong an ta, sukhlum an tih; chun, ni thum niin tho nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu hrim hrim chu a ngaina an hriet naw a; a thu hril chu anni ta dingin thupin a um a, ieng hril am a ni khawm an hriet nawh.
Chun, Jeriko a tlung tâwmin mitdel tu amanih lampui sîrah kut dawin a lo ṭhung a;
ama chun mipui fe ri chu a hriet a, iengtizie am a ni taa ti ân dawn a.
Chun, anni chun Nazareth Isu a fe a nih ti an hril a.
Chuongchun, ama chu, “Isu David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin a khêk a.
Chun, a hmasahai chun to dingin an hal a; nisienlakhawm, ama chu, “David Naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tiin a khêk zuol det a.
Chuongchun, Isu a ngir a, a kuoma hung ṭhuoi dingin thu a pêk a;
chun, a kâwl a hung tlung chun, “I chungah ieng ang am ka thaw i nuom a?” a ta, a lo indawn a. Chun, ama chun, “Lalpa, hmu thei ka nuom,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Hmu thei ta raw khai, i ringna hi i dampui a nih,” a ta.
Chun, kârlovin a hmu thei nghâl ta a, Pathien inpâk pum peiin ama chu a zui ta a; chun, mi po po chun, chu chu an hmu chun Pathien an inpâk a.
Chun, Isu Jeriko khuoah a lût a, a fethleng ding a na.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat a hming Zakai a um a; ama chu siedâwl hotu a na, a hausa hle a.
Chun, Isu chu mi ieng ang am a ni hmu a tum a; mipui leiin a hmu thei naw a, ama hlak ân hnuoi si a.
Chuongchun, a tlân khal a, a en dingin theichang lêrah a lâwn a; chu lampui chu a hung hraw ding a ni leiin.
Chun, Isu chu chu hmun a tlung chun a tang a, a kuomah, “Zakai, hung ṭum vak rawh; vawisûn i inah ka tlung ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, inhmawtakin a ṭum a, hlimtakin ama chu ân tlungtir ta a.
Chun, chu chu an hmu phingleh an rêngin, “Mi suol kuoma tlung dingin a lût ta saw,” an ti a, an chier a.
Chun, Zakai chu a ngir a, Lalpa kuoma chun, “Ngai ta, Lalpa, ka sum zâtve pasiehai kuomah pêng ka ta; chun, tu chunga khawm thil ieng khawm lo hlêpru ka ni chun a lêt liin thung nâwk ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn Zakai chungthu a hril a, “Vawisûn hi ina hin sandamna a hung tlung tah, ama khawm Abraham naupa a ni si a.
Chuongchun, hieng thu hi a hril a, “Mi ṭha tû amanih ram awpna thu laa hung kîr nâwk dingin ram hlatakah a fe a.
A fe dingin a suokhai sâwm a ko a, an kuomah rângkachak tangka sâwm a pêk a, an kuomah, ‘Ka hung tlung nâwk hmakhat chu hi hin lo sumdâwng ro,’ a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, a khuohaiin an theida a, ‘Hi mipa hi kan lal dingin kan dit nawh,’ ti dingin a hnungah palai an intlântir ve a.
“Chun, ram awpna thu chu a lâka a hung kir nâwk chun, a suok tangka a ipêkhai chu, an sukpung dân inhrietna dingin ân kotir a.
Chun, a hmasatak chu a hung a, ‘Pu, i rângkachak tangka kha sâwmin a pung,’ a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, ‘Suok ṭha, i thaw ṭha ie, tlâwmtê chungah ring i um leiin khaw sâwm chungah hotuin um rawh,’ a ta.
Chun, a dawttu chu a hung a, ‘Pu, i rângkachak tangka kha pangain a pung ie,’ a ta.
Chun, ama chun ama kuoma khawm chun, ‘Nang khawm khaw panga chungah hotuin um rawh,’ a ta.
“Chun, mi dang a hung a, ‘Pu, en ta, hi i rângkachak tangka kha! thlanhrûkna puonin ka fûn zing;
mi vîntak i ni leiin ka ṭi che a nih; i sie naw khawm i lâk hlak a, i tu naw khawm i sîk hlak si a,’ a ta.
“Chun, ama chun a kuomah, ‘Suok suol, i ṭawngbau suok ngeiin kân thiem naw che. Mi vîntak ka na, ka sie naw khawm ka lâk a, ka tu naw khawm ka sîk hlak ti i hriet maw?
A ni sa chun, ka tangka hi iengdinga sumdâwng ina i sie naw am a na? Chuongchun, ka hung hin a pung leh ka hung ṭhîn ding bah,’ a ta.
Chun, a kâwla ngirhai kuomah, ‘A rângkachak tangka kha lâkpêk unla, rângkachak tangka sâwm neitu kuomah pe ro,’ a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, ‘Pu, ama chun rângkachak tangka sâwm a nei annawm’ an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng a mi dotuhai an lal dinga mi dit nawhai hi hung ṭhuoi unla, ka hmaah that ro,’ a ti a,” a ta.
Chun, chuong ang thu a hril zo chun Jerusalem panin a hmasa a.
Bethphage le Bethani khaw kâwl, Oliv tlâng an ti chu a tlung chun, inchûktirhai laia mi pahni a tir a,
“In hma zâwn khuoa sawn va fe unla, chuongchun, in lût hlimin sabengtungtê thlung tukhawm la chuongna ngai naw va hmûng in tih; chu chu sût unla, hung kei ro.
Chun, tûkhawmin, ‘Iengdinga in sût am?’ tia an indawn cheu chun, ‘Lalpain a mamaw a nih,’ tiin hril ro,” a ta.
Chun, a tirhai chu an fe ta a, an kuoma a hril ang ngeiin an va hmu a.
Chun, sabengtungtê chu an sût lai chun, a neituhaiin an kuomah, “Sabengtungtê kha iengdinga in sût am?” an ta.
Chun, anni chun, “Lalpain a mamaw a nih,” an ti a.
Chuongchun, Isu kuomah an hung kei a; chun, sabengtungtê chunga chun an puonhai an pha a, a chungah Isu an inchuongtir a.
Chun, a fena ding lampuia chun an puonhai an pha pei a.
Chun, a tlung ding tâwmin, Oliv tlâng liem tâwmin inchûktir mipui po po chun a thilmak thawhai po po an hmu leiin an lâwm a, râwl inringtakin Pathien an inpâk a,
Chun, mipui laia Pharisai ṭhenkhatin a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, i închûktirhai hi kâwk rawh,” an ta.
Ama ruok chun, “Ka hril cheu hi, hienghai hi an to zing chun, lunghai bêk an khêk suok ding a nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, a tlung ding ṭepin, khuo chu a hmu a, a ṭap ngha a,
“Aw, nang hin tuta sûng hin thlamuongna ding thu hi lo hre hrâm la chu aw! Nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu i hmu thei nawna dingin ân thup ta si a.
Hieng ang nihai hi i chungah a la tlung ding a ni si a; i râlhaiin i vêlin hnuoi kul siem an ta, inhuol an ti che a;
i sûngah i nauhai le nang leh hnuoiah pei rak an ti che; i sûngah lung inthuo hrim hrim hla naw ni hai, an fang lai che i hriet naw leiin,” tiin.
Chun, Pathien biekina chun a va lût a, iengkhat zawrtuhai chu a hnawt dawk ta a;
nisienlakhawm, mihaiin ṭhahnemngaitaka thu an ngai leiin, a thaw ngaina an hriet si nawh.
Chun, ni khat chu, Pathien biekina mihai ân chûktir a, Chanchin Ṭha a hril laiin, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chu, upahai leh a kuomah an hung thut a;
a kuomah, “Tû thuin am hieng thil hi i thaw a? Tûin am thu a pêk che a? mi hril rawh,” tiin an indawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Kei khawmin thu bau khat indawn vêng ka ti cheu: mi hril ro,
Johan baptisma kha vâna mi thu am, mihriem thu?” a ta, ân dawn a.
Chun, an inngaituo a, “ ‘Vâna mi thu,’ ei ti chun, ‘Iengdinga a thu in awi naw?,’ mi ti sîng a ta.
Chun, ‘Mihriem thu,’ ei ti chun, mi po poin lungin mi dêng an tih; Johan chu zâwlnei a ni an ring si a,” an ta.
Chuongchun, an dawn a, “Khâwtieng lem thu am a ni kan hriet nawh,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Kei khawmin, tû thuin am hieng thil hi ka thaw a, hril bîk naw ning cheu,” a ta.
A lo hun chun huona ra chu a chanâi an lo pêk dingin lo enkawltuhai kuoma chun suok pakhat a tir a; nisienlakhawm, lo enkawltuhai chun an lo vuok a, kutruokin an infetir nâwk ta a.
Chun, suok dang a tir nâwk a; chu khawm chu an vuok nâwk bawk a, inzakumtakin an siem a, kutruok bawkin an infetir nâwk ta a.
Chun, a pathumna a tir nâwk a; chu khawm chu an lo suksil a, an pei suok ta a.
“Chun, grêp huon neitupa chun, ‘Iengtin am thâwng ka ta? Ka naupa dittak tir el ka tih; ama hi an lo inza duoiin,’ a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, lo enkawltuhai chun ama chu an hmu phingleh, ‘Ama hi rohluotu ding chu a nih, that ei tiu; chuongchun, a ro chu ei ta nîng a tih,’ tiin an inrâwn a.
Chuongchun, grêp huona inthawk chu an the suok a, an sukhlum ta a. Grêp huon neitupa chun an chungah iengtin am hung thâwng a ta?
Lo enkawltuhai chu hung sukbohmang a ta, huon chu mi danghai pêng a tih,” a ta. Chun, chu chu an hrietin, “Chuong êm chu tlung naw raw se!” an ta.
“Hi thu an ziek hi ieng am a na?
‘In bâwltuhai lung dit naw kha,
Chu ngei chu a kia lung ṭhangkai tak a lo ni tah,’ ti hi.
Tûkhawm chu lung chunga tlu taphawt chu kawi dar a ta; a del lem chu râwt nawi a tih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong lai tak chun Dân inchûktirtuhai le thiempu lalhaiin man an tum a; nisienlakhawm, mipui chu an ṭi a; chu tekhithu chu anni demin a hril ti an hriet si a.
Chun, ama chu Bawrsâp rorêlna le thuneinaa pêk dingin, a thu hril suol la dingin an inchân zing a, enthlittu, mi ṭha anga inlang tehlêmhai chu an tir a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, indiktakin thu i hrilin în chûktir a, tûkhawm thlier bîk lovin, thaw taktakin Pathien kawng thu în chûktir hlak ti kan hriet a;
Kaisar kuoma sie kan chawi a thieng am a thieng naw?” an ta, an indawn a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an dâwp a nih ti a hriet a, an kuomah,
“Duli
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Kaisar thilhai chu Kaisar kuomah pe unla, Pathien thilhai chu Pathien kuomah pe ta unla,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui hmaah a thu hril suol lâk ding an hmu naw a; a dawnna chu mak an ti hle a, an to zing a.
Âwle, sal sari an um a; a upatakin nuhmei a nei a, nau nei lovin a thi ta a.
A pahnina chun a hluo a; nau nei lo bawkin a thi ta a;
a pathumna chun a hluo nâwk a; chuong ang sengin pasarihai chu nau nei lovin an thi pei a.
Chu hnunga chun nuhmei khawm chu a thi ta a.
Chuongchun, thonâwk pha chun a tû nuhmei tak am nîng a ta? an pasari chun nuhmeiin an nei seng si a,” tiin an indawn a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tulai mihai hi nuhmei pasal an innei hlak;
nisienlakhawm, chuong phaa ṭhang tlâk le mithi laia inthawka thonâwknaa ṭhang tlâka ruot taphawthai chu, nuhmei pasal innei ta naw ni hai,
thi khawm thi nâwk thei ta naw ni hai, vântirkohai tlukin an um ding a ni si a; thonâwkna nauhai an ni leiin Pathien nauhai nîng an tih.
Ama chu mithi Pathien a ni naw a, mi hring Pathien a ni lem ie; amaa chun mi po po an hring vawng si a,” a ta.
Dân inchûktirtu tuhaiin amanih, “Inchûktirtu, i hril indik ngawt el!” an ta, an dawn a.
Thu dang an indawn ngam ta si naw a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Krista chu David naupa a nih ti iengtiziea ti hlak am an na?
Inpâkna Hla buah David ngeiin,
‘Lalpa chun ka Lalpa kuomah,
Ka changtieng ṭhung rawh,
Chuongchun, David chun ama chu, ‘Lalpa,’ a ti si a, iengtin am, a naupa a ni thei leh?” a ta.
Chun, mi po po hrietin a închûktirhai kuomah, “Dân inchûktirtuhai lai chun fîmkhur ro;
anni chun zakaw infuol hâka lêng an nuom hlak, dâwr hmuna chibai bûkhai, inkhâwmna ina ṭhungpha ṭhatakhai, ruoiṭhenaah hmun ṭha takhai an ngaina hlak a;
hmeithai sum an fâk a, tlâng hlêmna dingin sâwt tak an ṭawngṭai hlak; chuonghai chun thiemnaw chang nasa zuol an tih,” a ta.
Chun, a dâk suok a, mi hausahaiin thawlâwm bâwma an thawlâwm thlâk lai a hmu a.
Chun, hmeithai pasetak tûin amanih dâr tangka dere
Chuongchun, “Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hienghai po po nêkin hi hmeithai pasetak hin a thlâk tam lem;
hieng po po hin an nei liema inthawkin thawlâwm an thlâk a nih; ama ruok hin chu a dit laitak, a khawsakpui dinga a nei sun chu a thlâk vawng a nih,” a ta.
Chun, tuhaiin amanih Pathien biekin thu, lung ṭhatak le thilpêka an icheimawizie chu an hril laiin, ama chun,
“Hieng in thil hmu hi, sukchim lova lung inthuo hrim hrim hitaka hin um naw ni; chuong ang ni chu la tlung a tih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, chuong chu ieng tik am hung um a ti leh? Chuong chu a hung tlung ding pha inchikna ieng am um a ta?” tiin an indawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “An hlêm nawna ding cheuin fîmkhur ro. Mi tamtakin, ‘Krista chu ka nih,’ ‘Ahun a tlung ding a ni tah,’ tiin keia hming sâlin an hung ding a nih; chuonghai chu zui naw ro.
Chun, indo thu le buoi thu in hriet pha ṭi naw ro; chuong chu a tlung hmasa ding hrim a nih, tâwpna ruok chu tlung nghâl el hri naw ni,” a ta.
Chun, an kuomah, “Hnam hran le hnam hran indo an ta, ram tum le ram tum indo an ta;
simkhawleihnuoi nasatakin inhnîng a ta, hmun tum tumah ṭâmhai tlâng a ta, hrihai inlêng bawk a ta; vâna inthawkin thil ṭium le inchikna nasatakhai um a tih.
Nisienlakhawm, chuong po po tlung hma chun, man an ti cheu a, inkhâwmna ina mihai le intângna ina mihai kuoma ṭhuoiin suknawmnâng an ti cheu, keia hmingin lalhai le hotuhai hmaah ṭhuoi an ti cheu.
Chu chu in ta dingin thuinhriettirna remchâng la ni hman hman a tih.
Chuongchun, dawnna ding ngaituo lâwk lo dingin in lungril sukdet ro,
Chun, in nuhai le in pahai, in nauhai, in laibunghai, in ruolhai khawmin inmantir an ti cheu a, a ṭhen insukhlumtir an ti cheu.
Keia hming leiin mi po po theida nîng in tih.
Nisienlakhawm, in sam zai khat khawm bohmang naw nih.
In selnain in hringna sanhim in tih.
“Nisienlakhawm, sipaihaiin Jerusalem an inhuol in hmu pha, a bohmang ding a nih ti hre ro.
Chu pha chun Judai rama umhai chu tlângahai tlân hmang raw hai se, a sûnga umhai chun suoksan raw hai se, rama umhai chu a sûngah lût naw raw hai se.
Chuong ni chun inraihai le nautê pawmhai chung rik a tih, khawvêla hin rinum nasatak a tlung ding lei le, hi chihai chunga hin lunginsenna a tlung ding a ni leiin.
Chun, kâwlhnâmin thîng an ta, hnam tin kuomah sala ṭhuoiin um an tih; chun, Jentailhai ni a kim hmâkhat chu Jerusalem chu Jentailhai sirdein um a tih.
mihai, thlabâr lei le khawvêla thil hung tlung ding ngaituo leiin thidang an tih; vân thilthawtheinahai chu ân hnîng ding a ni si a.
Chun, chuong thil chu a hung tlung hlimin, dâk suok unla, hang en ro; in intlanna ding a hnai ta leiin,” a ta.
Chun, an kuomah tekhithu a hril a, “Theichang kûng le thing po po en ro,
ân der phingleh chu chu in hmu a, nipui a hung tlung ding a nih ti in hriet nghâl hlak.
Chuong ang bawkin nangni khawmin chuong chu a hung tlung in hmu phaleh, Pathien ram a hung hnai tah ti hre ro.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, thil po po a tlung kim hmakhat chu tulai ruoltharhai hi bo naw ni hai.
Hnuoi le vân bohmang a ta, ka thu ruok chu bohmang naw ni.

“Amiruokchu, fîmkhur ro, chuong naw chun, fâk khawp taluo leh, zu inrui leh, dam sûng khawsak ngaituo leh in lungril sip taluo hlau a ta, chu ni chun châng âwk angin kârlovin in chungah hung tlung phut a tih.
Chuong ang tak chun, hnuoi chung po poa umhai chungah a tlung seng ding a nih.
Chuongchun, chuong thil hung tlung dinghai po po chu pumpel tlâk le Mihriem Naupa hmaa ngîr tlâka ruot in ni theina dingin, ieng lai khawmin ṭawngṭai pumin ngaiven ro,” a ta.
Chun, zîngkâr inhmatakin a thu ngai dingin mi po po Pathien biekinah a kuomah an hung hlak.
Chun, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun ama sukhlum dân ding an zawng a, vântlâng an ṭi si a.
Chun, sâwm le pahnihai laia ṭhang, Juda Iskariot an iti sûnga chun Setan a lût a.
Chuongchun, ama chu a va fe a, Isu ân mantir thei dân ding thuah thiempu lalhai le manmihai a va râwn a.
Anni chu an lâwm hle a, tangka pêk an tiem ta a.
Ama chun a remtih a, mipui umnaw kâra inmantirna remchâng a zawng ta a.
Chun, Chawlṭhanglo Bei ruoiṭhe ni, Fekân Ruoiṭhena berâmte thatna ding ni chu a hung tlung ta a.
Chuongchun, Isûn Peter le Johan chu, “Fekân Ruoi bu ei fâk dingin va buotsai ro,” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Khâwlai am va buotsai inlang i nuom a?” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ngai ta u, khawpuia in lûtin, pasal bêla tui putin intuokpui a ti cheu a, a lûtna inah zui lût el ro.
Chun, in neitupa kuoma chun, ‘Inchûktirtuin, ka închûktirhai le Fekân Ruoi bu kan fâkna ding mikhuol pindan chu khâwlai am a na? a ti che,’ ti ro.
Chuongchun, ama chun pindan chunghnung lientak, thuomhnaw umsa inentir a ti cheu a; chutaka chun buotsai ro,” a ta.
Chun, an fe ta a, an kuoma a hril ang takin an hmu a; chun, Fekân Ruoi chu an buotsai ta a.
Chun, a fâk a hung hun chun, ama chun thlêng a awt a, a tirkohai chun an awtpui ve a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Ka thil tuor hma hin hi Fekân Ruoi hi fâkpui cheu ka nuom bêk bêk a nih.
Ka hril cheu hi, hi hi Pathien rama sukfamkim a ni hmakhat chu ka fâk nâwk ta naw ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, no a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril zoin, “Hi hi la unla, insem ro,
ka hril cheu hi, tuta inthawk Pathien ram a hung tlung hmakhat chu grêp hrui raa hi ka dâwn nâwk ta naw ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, bei a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril zoin, a khawi a, an kuomah a pêk a, “Hi hi ka taksa [in aia pêk chu a nih; in mi hriet zingna dingin hi hi thaw hlak ro,” a ta.
“Nisienlakhawm, ngai ta u, a mîn mantirtu ding kut chu ka kuomah dawkân chungah a um zing a nih.
Mihriem Naupa hi ruot ang ngeiin a fe ding a nih; nisienlakhawm, ân mantirtu ding mihriem chung chu a rik ie!” a ta.
Chun, annin, “Eini laia thil chuong ang thaw ding chu tû am nîng ei ta le?” an ta, anni le anni an indawn a.
“Rinum ka tuok sûng po nangni a mi umpuituhai in na;
ka Pain ram a mi ruotpêk angin ram ka ruotpêk cheu hi,
“Simon, Simon, ngai ta, Setanin, bu rel anga a rel theina ding cheuin, nangni rawi hi a hni cheu annaw;
nisienlakhawm, i ringna a bo nawna dingin ka ṭawngṭaipêk che a nih, i ngha kîr nâwk pha nangin i unauhai sukdet rawh,” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, intângna ina le thinaa khawm i kuoma fe ve ka huom a nih,” a ta.
Ama chun, “Peter, ka hril che hi, i mi hrietnaa hin vawi thum i mîn phat hmakhat chu vawisûn hin âr khuong naw ni,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Tu ruok hin chu tûkhawm tangka ip nei chun chawi raw se, mansa leh; tûkhawm kâwlhnâm nei naw chun a puon zawr sienla inchaw raw se.
Chun, anni chun, “Lalpa, en ta, hi kâwlhnâm pahni a um,” an ta. Ama chun an kuomah, “A hun chu,” a ta.
Chun, ama chu a suok a, a dân pângngaiin Oliv tlânga chun a fe ta a; inchûktirhai khawmin an zui a.
Chun, a hmun chu a va tlung chun an kuomah, “Thlêmnaa in lût nawna dingin ṭawngṭai ro,” a ta.
Chun, lung dêng phâk chenah a tumin a va fe a; chun, a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a ṭawngṭai a,
“Pa, rem i ti chun, hi no hi ka kuoma inthawkin la hmang rawh; nisienlakhawm, keia thu ni lovin, nangma thu thu ni lem raw se,” a ta.
[Chun, vâna inthawkin vântirko pakhat a sukhar dingin a hung inlâr a.
Chun, a lung ân rim bêk bêk leiin ṭhahnemngai nâwk zuolin a ṭawngṭai a, a thlan chu thi far lientak angin, hnuoiah a zuk far a.]
Chun, a ṭawngṭai zoa a thoin, inchûktirhai kuomah a hung a, an lungngai leiin an lo in a hmu a;
chun, an kuomah, “Iengdinga in in am? Thlêmnaa in lût nâwna dingin tho unla, ṭawngṭai ro,” a ta.
Chun, a la hril zing laiin, ngai ta, mipui an hung a, sâwm le pahni laia ṭhang Juda an iti khan an hma a hung ṭhuoi a; chun, fâwp tumin Isu a hung pan a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isu chun a kuomah, “Juda, Mihriem Naupa hi fâwpin în mantir ding a ni maw?” a ta.
Chun, a vêla mihai chun thil hung tlung ding chu an hrietin, “Lalpa kâwlhnâmin sât kan ti?” an ta.
Chun, anni laia tûin amanih Thiempu Laltak suok chu a sât a, a nakâwr chang tieng a sât thlâkpêk a.
Chun, Isûn a biek a, “Hi po hi ni raw se,” a ta, a nakâwr chu a them a, a sukdam ta a.
Chun, Isûn a kuoma hung thiempu lalhai, Pathien biekin hotuhai le, upahai kuoma chun, “Kâwlhnâmhai, hembâwkhai chawiin, suomhmang man ding ang elin in hung a ni maw?
Chun, an man a, an ṭhuoi a, Thiempu Laltak ina chun an ṭhuoi lût ta a.
Chun, Peterin hlataka inthawkin a zui a. Chun, in inhuon sûng tuollai chun mei an sêm a, an ṭhung khâwm a, Peter chu anni lai a va ṭhung ve a.
Chun, mei vara a ṭhung laiin, nunghâk tûin amanih a hmu a, a en zing a, “Hi mipa khawm hi a kuoma um kha a ni hi,” a ti a.
Ama ruok chun, “Nuhmei, ama chu ka hriet nawh,” tiin ân phat a.
Chun, anakie deu chun mi dangin a hung hmu nâwk a, “Nang khawm anni laia mi i ni hi,” a ta. Peter ruok chun, “Mihriem, ka ni naw ie,” a ta.
Chun, dâr kâr khat lai hnunga chun, mi dangin , “Hi mipa khawm hi a kuoma um kha a ni ngei el; Galili ram mi a nih annâwm,” a ti tlat a.
Chun, Peterin, “Mihriem, i thu hril chu ka hriet nawh,” a ta. Chun, kârlovin, a ṭawng laitak chun âr a khuong nghâl ta a.
Chun, Lalpa chu a ngha a, Peter chu a en a. Peter chun Lalpain, “Vawisûn hin âr a khuong hmain vawi thum mîn phat i tih,” a kuoma a ti thu kha a hung hriet dawk nâwk ta a.
Chun, a suok a, a ṭap ta ngawi ngawi a.
Chun, Isu cheltuhai chun nuiza siemnân an hmang a, an vuok a.
Chun, a mit an tuom a, “Hril rawh, tûin am a vuok che a?” tiin an indawn hlak a.
Thu dang tamtak khawmin an hrilsietin an hal a.
Chun, khawvar phingleh, vântlâng upahai, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chu an inrâwn khâwm a, an rorêlnaa chun an ṭhuoi a;
“Krista i ni tak zet chun mi hril rawh,” an ti a. Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Hril lang cheu khawm awi naw ti niu;
indawn lang cheu khawm dawn naw ti niu.
Nisienlakhawm, tuta inthawk chu Mihriem Naupa hi Pathien thilthawtheina changtieng ṭhung tâng a tih,” a ta.
Chun, an rêngin, “Nang hi Pathien Naupa chu i ni am a nih?” an ta. Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ka nih ti in hril zing chu teh,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun, “Ieng hrietna dang am ngai tâng ei ta? Eini ngeiin ama bau suok ei hriet tah annâwm,” an ta.
Chun, a pung khâwmhai po po chu an tho a, Isu chu Pilat kuomah an ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, “Hi mipa hin kan chihai a sukkhawhlo a, Kaisar kuomah sie chawi a khap bawk a, Krista, lal ân ti khawm kan hriet,” tiin an hêk a.
Chun, Pilatin a kuomah, “Judahai lal i ni maw?” tiin ân dawn a. Ama chun a kuomah, “I hril angin ka nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Pilatin thiempu lalhai le mipuihai kuoma chun, “Hi mipa chunga hin iengkhawm suol ka hmu naw ie,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun, “Galili ramah a phut a, hi hmun chen hin, Judai ram khaw tina inchûktirin, mi po po a chawkbuoi hlak a nih,” tîn an thaw nâwk zuol a.
Chun, Pilatin chu chu a hrietin, ama chu Galili rama mi a ni le ni naw ân dawn a.
Chun, Herod biela mi a nih ti a hriet phingleh, Herod kuomah a tir ta a; chuong lai chun ama khawm Jerusalemah a um bawk a.
Chun, Herodin Isu a hmu chun a lâwm bêk bêk a; a chanchin a hriet leiin inhmaa inthawkin hmu a nuom a.
Chun, thu tamtak ân dawn a, iengkhawmin a dawn si naw a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai le Dân inchûktirtuhai chun ngîrin nasatakin an hêk an hêk a.
Chun, Herod le a sipaihai chun Isu an suknawmna a, an nuisaw a; chun, puon ropuitak insiltirin Pilat kuomah a tir nâwk ta a.
Chu ni tak chun Herod le Pilat chu an inngei ta a; chu hma po chu an intai hlak a.
Chun, Pilatin thiempu lalhai, hotuhai, mi po pohai a ko khâwm a,
an kuomah, “ ‘Mihai a sukkhawhlo,’ tiin hi mipa hi ka kuomah in hung ṭhuoi kha a na; chun, ngai ro, in hma ngeiah ka suosal a, in hêkna thua khan hi mipa chunga hin iengkhawm suol ka hmu naw a nih;
Herod khawmin a hmu bawk nawh; ei kuomah a hung tir nâwk el a ni hi; ngai ro, thina khawp meuin iengkhawm a thaw naw ie.
Vuong ka ta, kân suo nâwk el ding a nih,” a ta.
[Chun ruoiṭhe ni chun mi intâng pakhat ân suopêk ngei dân a na.]
Nisienlakhawm, inruoltakin an khêk a, “Hi mipa hi chu sukbohmang la, Barabba kha mîn suopêk lem rawh,” an ta.
(Chu mipa chu khawpuia helna ieng amanih lei le tuol a that leiin intângna ina intâng a nih).
Pilat ruok chun Isu insuoktir a nuom a, an kuomah thu a hril nâwk a;
nisienlakhawm, an khêk a, “Krawsah hemde rawh, krawsah hemde rawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun a vawi thumnaah an kuomah, “Ieng dingin am ie? Hi mipa hin ieng am a suksuol a? Thina khawp meu, a chungah iengkhawm ka hmu nawh; vuong ka ta, kân suo el ding a nih,” a ta.
Anni ruok chun inringtakin krawsa hemde dingin an ngên ṭal a. Chun, an râwl chun a vau dei ta a.
Chun, Pilat chun an ngên anga thaw dingin thu a sukthlûk ta a.
Helna le tuolthat leia intângna ina intâng an ihni kha ân suo a, Isu ruok chu an nuom nuoma an thaw dingin a pêk ta a.
Chun, an ṭhuoi hmang laiin Simon, Kurinia mi, rama inthawka hung an man a. Isu hnung tienga put dingin a chungah kraws chu an innghat a.
Chun, mipui le nuhmei âwm inchum inchuma ṭap ṭaphai, mipui nasatakin an zui a.
Isu ruok chun anni tieng a ngha a, “Jerusalem naunuhai, mi ṭa naw ro, nangni le in nauhai ta dingin ṭap lem ro.
Ngai ta u, a ni la hung tlung a tih, chuong nia chun, ‘Nuhmei chinghai, nau vawn ngai nawna phînghai, nau nêk ngai naw nênehai chu an hamṭha ie,’ la tîng an tih.
Thing hringa hman hieng ang an thaw chun, a ṭâwla chun iengtin takin am an thaw ding chu?” a ta.
Chun, a kuomah mi dang pahni, mi suol, sukhlum dingin an ṭhuoi ve a.
Chun, “Luru” an ti hmun chu an tlungin, chutaka chun krawsah an hemde a, mi suolhai leh, a changtieng pakhat, a vawitieng pakhat.
“Judahai lal i ni tak zet chun insukdam rawh,” an ta.
Chun, a chung tienga chun, “HI MIPA HI JUDAHAI LAL A NIH” ti lekha ziek
Chun, an mi suol khai pakhat chun Isu a hal a, “Krista chu i ni naw am a nih? Insukdam la, keini khawm mi sukdam ta la,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, pakhat chun dawn malamin a kâwk a, “Pathien meu khawm i ṭi naw maw? thuhmun zingin an hrem che hi.
Eini chu ei tuor âwm tak hrim tuor ei nih, ei thilthaw man indiktak hmu ei ni lem; ama ruok hin chu iengkhawm a suksuol si nawh,” a ta.
Chun, “Isu, i ramah lala i hung phaleh, mi hre zing rawh aw,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “Titakzetin ka hril che hi, vawisûn hin ka kuomah Paradisah um vêng i tih,” a ta.
Chun, nisa inding lai a hung na, chu chena inthawk zânbu suong pha chenin khawvêl a hung inthim ta vawng a, nisa var a hung bo ta a;
Chun, sipai za hotu chun thil umzie chu a hmu chun, “Hi mipa hi matheilovin mi feltak a ni phawt el,” a ta. Pathien ân pâk ta a.
Chun, chu ennuom chu thlîr dinga mipui hung inkhâwmhai po po chun thil umziehai chu an hmu chun, an âwmhai inchum inchumin in tieng an fe ta a.
Chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat a hming Josef, rorêltu mi ṭhatak, feltak a um a,
(an rorêl le an thilthaw khawm kha a remti naw hrim a nih), Judai khuo Arimathai mi a na, Pathien ram a beisei hlak a.
Ama chu Pilat kuomah a fe a, Isu ruong a hni a.
Chun, a lâk thlâk a, puon zai inhmiin a tuom a, thlân lung ver kuok, tukhawm lân zâlna ngai nawnaah ân zâl ta a.
Chun, chu ni chu Inringlâwk ni a na, Châwlni a ni vâng ta si a.
Chun, nuhmei Galili rama inthawka ama le hunghai khan an zui pei a, thlân le a ruong inzâlzie chu an hmu a.
Ni saria ni hmasataka ruok chun, khaw var tâwmin, thil rim inhnik an buotsaihai chu chawiin thlâna chun an va fe a.
Chun, thlâna inthawka lung chu inhlum sawnin an hmu a;
chun, an lût a, Lal Isu ruong chu an hmu si nawh.
Chun, chuong leia an lunginzîng lai chun, ngai ta, mi pahni puon mi elkhal thei silin an kâwlah an hung ngîr a;
chun, an ṭi a, an hmaia hnuoi an sik el lai chun, anni chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga mithi laia mi dâm in zawng am?
‘Mihriem Naupa hi mi suolhai kuta inmantirin um a ta, krawsah hemdêng an ta, ni thum ni chun a tho nâwk ding a nih,’ a ti kha,” an ta.
Chun, a thu hrilhai chu an hriet suok ta a,
thlâna inthawk chun an fe nâwk ta a, sâwm le pakhathai kuoma le mi po po kuomah chuong thil po po chu an hril ta a.
(Chuong nuhmeihai chu Mag- dalin Mari hai, Joanna hai, Jakob nu Mari hai an nih; an kuoma nuhmei danghai khawmin tirkohai kuoma chun chuong thu chu an hril bawk a.
Nisienlakhawm, chuong thu chu thu mei meiah an ruot a, an awipêk naw a).
[Nisienlakhawm, Peter chu a tho a, thlâna chun a tlân ta a; chun, a kûn a, a bi a; puon zai inhmi umhai chu a hmu a; chuongchun, thil umzie chu mak titakin in tieng a fe nâwk ta a.]
Chun, ngai ta, chu ni tak chun anni laia mi pahni chu khaw pakhat Emmau an tia chun an fe ding a na, chu chu Jerusalema inthawkin fing sâwmruk a nih.
Chun, thil hung tlung po po chu an hril malam pei a.
Chun, an hohlima an hril tlâng lai chun Isu ngeiin a hung pan a, ân tlawnpui ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu an hriet thei nawna dingin an mit chu sukvaiin a um a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Fe malama in thu hril kha ieng am a na?” a ta. Chun, nguitakin an ngîr ta a.
Chun, a hming Kleopa lem chun a kuomah, “Jerusalemah makhât chauin amanih i um? Tulaia thil umzie i hriet naw a,” a ta, a dawn a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ieng thil am ie?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Nazareth Isu, Pathien le mi po po mithmua, a thu le a thilthaw zâwlnei hminginthang tak chanchin thu;
thiempu lalhai le kan hotuhaiin that thu pêk dingin an ṭhuoi a, krawsa an hemdezie dâm thu kha.
Keiniin Israel intlantu ding a ni kan beisei vei leh; chuong ta nêk hmanin chuong thil tlungna chen chu vawisûn leh ni thum a ni tah.
Chuong naw khawm chu kan pâwlhai nuhmei ṭhenkhat, zîngkâr a thlânah an va fe a, an mi hung suklungzîng rak a;
a ruong hmu si lovin, ‘Pathien vântirkohai inlâr kan hmu a, chuhai chun a hring nâwk tah ti an hril,’ an hung ti a.
Chun, kan umpui laia ṭhenkhat thlâna chun an fe a, nuhmeihai hril ang ngeiin an hmu a, nisienlakhawm, ama chu an hmu si naw a,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Mi invêthai, zâwlneihai thu hril po po awi kawnga ngawnghai!
Kristain chuong thil chu tuorin a ropuinaah a lût ding a ni hrim naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Mosie le zâwlneihai po po lekhaah a phut a, Pathien Lekha po poa ama chanchin ziek taphawt chu anni a hrilfie pei a.
Chun, an fena ding khuo chu an hung hnai ta a; chun, ama chu hla deua fe tum angin a um a.
Chun, ṭawngbauin an chel a, “Kan kuomah um ta la; khuo ân hnu ding an ta hi, nisa khawm a tla ding a ni ta hi,” an ta. Chuongchun, an kuoma um dingin a lût ta a.
Chun, an kuoma buthlêng awta a ṭhung laiin bei a lâk a, mal a sâwm a, a khawi a, an kuomah a pêk a.
Chun, an mit a hung var a, a hmêl an hung hriet ta a; chun, ama chu a bo el ta a.
chun, anni chun, “Lampuia a mi biek laia Pathien Lekha Thuhai a mi hrilfie lai khan ei lungril a har huoi hrim naw am a ni kha?” an in ti a.
Chun, an tho nghâl ta a, Jerusalemah an kîr nâwk ta a, sâwm le pakhathai le an ruolhai um khâwm chu an hmu a,
“Lalpa chu a lo thonâwk takzet a nih; Simon kuoma khawm ân lâr tah,” an lo ti a.
Chun, anni khawmin lampuia thil hung tlung le, bei a khawia, a hmêl an hung hrietziehai chu an hril ve a.
Chun, chuong thu chu an hril laiin ama ngei chu anni lai a hung ngîr a, [an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se,” a ta.]
Nisienlakhawm, râpthlâk an ti bêk bêk a, an ṭi a, thlarau hmuah an inruot a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga in lunginzîng am? Iengdinga in lungrila ringhlâna a hung um am?
Ka kuthai, ka kephahai hi en ro; hi keima ngei kha ka ni hi! Mi them unla en ro; in mi hmu ang hin chu thlarau chun taksa le ru a nei ve nawh,” a ta.
[Chun, chu chu a hril zoin a kuthai, a kephahai an kuomah ân entir a.]
Chun, an lâwm taluo leiin an la awi naw ta rawp a; mak an ti sûngin an kuomah, “Hitaka hin iengkhat fâk ding in nei am?” a ta.
Chun, nga raw tlin khat an pêk a.
Chun, a lâk a, an hmaa chun a fâk ta a.

Chun, an kuomah, “Hieng hi ka thu kha a nih, Mosie Dâna hai, Zâwlnei Lekhabua hai, Inpâkna Hla bua hai ka chanchin ziek taphawt chu a hung tlung dingzie in kuoma ka um laia ka hril hlak cheu kha,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Pathien Lekha Thu hrietna dingin an lungvar a sukvar ta a,
chun, an kuomah, “Hieng ang hin ziek a nih, ‘Krista chun rinum tuor a ta, ni thum niin mithi laia inthawkin thonâwk a tih,
ama hmingin simna thu le suol ngaidamna thu Jerusalema inthawkin hnam tin kuoma hril nîng a tih,’ tiin.
Chuong thil po po chu a hrepuitu in nih.
Chun, mal a sâwmpêk lai takin anni chu a mâksan a, [vâna zuk ṭhuoiin a um ta a.]
Chun, [chibai an bûk a,] lâwm bêk bêkin Jerusalemah an kîr nâwk ta a;
chun, Pathien biekina chun Pathien inpâkin an um rawp hlak.
A tîrin Thu a um, Thu chu Pathien kuomah a um, Thu chu Pathien a nih.
Ama chu a tîrin Pathien kuomah a um.
Iengkim a rêngin amaa siem a nih; thil siem po po hi ama ṭhang lova siem iengkhawm a um nawh.
Amaa chun hringna a um; chu hringna chu mihriemhai var a nih.
Var chu inthim lai a hung var a, inthimin chu chu a hriet nawh.
Ama chu inhriettir dingin a hung a, var thu chu inhriettir dingin; ama leia mi po poin an awina dingin.
Ama chu var chu a ni nawh, var thu chu inhriettir dinga hung a ni lem.
Var indik tak mi tin sukvar hlak kha a um a, khawvêlah a hung zing a nih.
Ama chu khawvêlah a um a, khawvêl ama siem a na, khawvêlin ama a hriet si nawh.
Ama mihai
Nisienlakhawm, ama lo lâwma a hming ringtu taphawthai kuomah chun, Pathien nauhai ni theina ding a pêk.
Chuong mihai chu thisena nei an ni naw a, tisa dit zâwnga nei an ni bawk naw a, pasal dit zâwnga nei khawm an ni naw a, Pathien inei an ni lem.
Chun, Thu chu taksain
Johan chun a thu ân hriettir a, a khêk a, “ ‘Ka hnunga hung ding chu ka nêka ropui lem a nih, ka um hmaa um ta hrim a ni leiin,’ tia a thu ka hril kha ama hi a nih,” a ta.
A famkimna ei chang seng, lunginsietna chunga lunginsiet nâwksâwnna leh.
Dân chu Mosie hmanga pêk a na, lunginsietna le thutak chu Isu Krista leiin a hung um.
Tukhawmin ienglai khawmin Pathien an hmu nawh; a Naupa khât nei sun, Pa ângsûnga um ngei khan a chanchin a hril tah a nih.
Chun, Judahaiin, “Tû am i na?” tia indawn dingin Jerusalema inthawkin a kuomah thiempuhai le Levi chia mihai an tir lai khan, hieng hi Johan thu lo inhriettir chu a nih:
“Kei chu Krista chu ka ni nawh” tiin inphat lovin ân puong a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Anleh, tû am i na? a mi tirtuhai kan dawn theina dingin mi hril ta la. I chanchin hrim ieng am i hril ding a na?” an ta.
Mi tirhai chu Pharisaihai kuoma mi an nih.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Krista bêk, Elija bêk, zâwlnei amani bêk i ni si naw chun, iengdinga i baptis hlak am a na?” an ta, an indawn a.
Chun, Johan chun an kuomah, “Keiin tuiin ka baptis hlak, nangni lai in hriet naw mi pakhat a ngîr a nih,
ama chu ka hnunga hung ding chu a na, a kekawk hrui sût tlâk khawm ka ni nawh,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuong thil chu Jordan râla Bethania Johanin a baptisnaa kha thaw an nih.
Chun, a zînga chun Johanin Isu a kuoma hung ding a hmu a. Chun, a hril a, “En ta u, Pathien Berâmte khawvêl suol fepuitu ding saw!
Saw saw a nih, ‘mi pakhat ka nêka ropui lem, ka hnunga hung ding a um, ama chu ka um hmaa um ta hrim a nih,’ ka ti kha.
Ama chu ka lo hriet si nawh; nisienlakhawm, Israelhai kuoma a hung inlangna dingin, tuia baptis-in ka hung a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Johanin a thu ân hriettir a, a hril a, “Thlarau chu vaṭhu angin vâna inthawka ṭum ka hmu a, a chungah a fu zing a.

Ama chu ka hriet si naw a, nisienlakhawm, tuia baptis dinga a mi tirtu khan ka kuomah, ‘Tû chunga khawm Thlarau zu fua, a chunga um zing i hmu chun, ama chu Thlarau Inthienga baptistu ding chu nîng a tih,’ a ti a.
Chu chu ka hmu ta a, ama hi Pathien Naupa a nih ti kân hriettir tah,” a ta.
Chun, a zîng nâwk chun Johan a ngîr a, a închûktirhai pahni leh;
chun, Isu invâk vêl lai chu an en a, “En ta u, Pathien Berâmte saw,” a ta.
Chun, a închûktirhai pahni chun a thu hril chu an hriet a, Isu an zui ta a.
Chun, Isu a ngha a, an hung zui chu a hmu a, an kuomah, “Ieng am in zawng a?” a ta. Anni chun, “Rabbi, (chu chu inchûktirtu tina a nih), khâwlai am i um a?” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Hung unla, hmûng in tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, an fe a, a umna chu an hmu a, chu ni chun a kuomah an um zing a; zânbu suong pha vêl a nih.
Johan thu hril hrea Isu zuihai pahni chu, a pakhat lem chu Andri, Simon Peter unau a nih.
Ama chun a hmasatakin ama unau Simon a hmu a, a kuomah “Messie kan hmu tah,” a ta, (chu chu Krista tina a nih.)
Chuongchun, Isu kuomah a hung ṭhuoi a, Isûn ama chu a lo en a, “Johan naupa Simon i nih, Kipha tîng an ti che,” a ta, (chu chu Peter tina a nih.)
Chun, a zînga chun Isu Galili ramah fe a tum a, Philip a hmu a, “Mi zui rawh,” a ta.
Philip chu Bethsaida khuoa mi a nih, chu chu Andri le Peter umna khuo bawk a nih.
Philip chun Nathanael a hmu a, a kuomah, “A chanchin Mosiein Dân lekhabua a ziek le, zâwlneihaiin an ziek kha, ama chu kan hmu tah, Nazareth Isu, Josef naupa chu,” a ta.
Chun, Nathanael chun a kuomah, “Nazareth khuoah thil ṭha a suok thei am a nih?” a ta. Philip chun a kuomah, “Hung la, en rawh,” a ta.
Isûn Nathanael a kuoma hung ding chu a hmu a, a chanchin a lo hril a, “En ta u, Israel mi tak, rîtlona hrim hrim nei lo saw,” a ta.
Nathanael chun a kuomah, “Nangin iengtin am i mi hriet a?” a ta. Isûn a kuomah, “Philipin a ko hma che a, theichang bula i um lai khan ka hmu che annâwm,” a ta, a dawn a.
Nathanaelin a kuomah, “Rabbi, Pathien Naupa i nih, Israelhai Laltak i nih,” tiin a dawn a.
Isûn a kuomah, “ ‘Theichang bulah ka hmu che,’ i kuoma ka ti leiin i ring a ni maw? Hieng nêka thil ropui lem la hmûng i tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, ni thum niah, Galili rama Kana khuoah inneina ruoiṭhe a um a, chutaka chun Isu nu a um a.
Isu le a închûktirhai khawm inneinaa chun an fiel a.
Chun, uoinin a dai ta naw a, Isu nu chun a kuomah, “Uoin an tlasam ta ie,” a ta.
Isu chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei, nanga mi lo hrietpêk ding ieng am a um a? ka hun a la tlung nawh,” a ta.
Chun, a nu chun rawngbâwltuhai kuomah, “In kuoma a hril taphawt chu thaw pei ro,” a ta.
Chun, Judahai inthien dân angin lung tuibêl paruk, bûk sâwmli hmun hni amanih, hmun thum amanih keng seng chutaka chun an intung a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tuibêlahai tui suksip ro,” a ta. A rei inruolin an suksip seng a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Tuhin thâl unla, ruoiṭhe hotu kuomah fepui ro,” a ta. Chun, an fepui ta a.
Chun, ruoiṭhe hotu chun tui uoina hung inchang chu ân tem a, a suokna chin a hriet naw a, (tui thâl rawngbâwltuhai ruok chun an hriet a), nuhmei nei tupa chu a ko ta a,
a kuomah, “Mi tinin a tirin uoin ṭha an sie suok hlak, chun, a tam deu an dâwn hnungin a ṭha naw deu chu an sie suok hlak, nang ruok chun tu chen hin uoin ṭha i la nei zing a,” a ta.
Isûn hi a thilmak thaw phutna hi Galili ram Kana khuoa chun a thaw a nih, a ropuizie ân langtir a; chun, a inchûktirhai chun ama chu an ring ta a.
Chun, Pathien biekina sebâwnghai, berâmhai, vaṭhuhai zawrtuhai le tangka thlengtuhai ṭhung a hmu a.
Chun, hruihruol invuokna a siem a, sebâwng le berâm an rêngin Pathien biekina inthawk chun a hnawt dawk a, tangka thlengtuhai tangka chu a bunthlâk a, an dawkânhai a nam thlûkpêk bawk a;
chun, vaṭhu zawrtuhai kuoma chun, “Hieng thilhai hi hitaka inthawkin fepui ro, ka Pa in sumdâwngna inin siem naw ro,” a ta.
Chun, Judahaiin a kuomah, “Hieng thil i thaw hi inchikna ieng am i mîn hmutir thei a?” tiin ama an in dawn a.
Chun, Judahai chun, “Hi in hi kum sâwmli paruk sûng bâwl a nih, nangin ni thum sûngin inngîr i ti maw?” an ta.
(Nisienlakhawm, a taksa in chu hril a lo ni lem si a.
Chuleiin, mithi laia inthawka a thonâwkin, chu thu chu a hril tah ti a închûktirhai chun an hriet nâwk ta a; chun, Pathien Lekha Thu le Isu thu hril chu an ring ta a).
Chun, Fekân Ruoiṭhea Jerusalema a um lai chun, a thilmak thawhai an hmu a, mi tamtakin a hming an ring ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isu chu anni lai a ngam nawh, mi po po a hriet a.
Mihriem thu tukhawm ihril a ngai nawh, ama chun mihriem sûnga um taphawt chu a hriet si a.
Chun, Pharisaihai laia mi, a hming Nikodem, Judahai hotu pakhat a um a;

ama chu zânah Isu kuomah a hung a, a kuomah, “Rabbi, Pathiena inthawka inchûktirtua hung i ni ti kan hriet; Pathien an chungah a um naw chun hieng thilmak i thawhai hi tukhawmin thaw thei naw ni hai,” a ta.
Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril che hi mi tûkhawm an pieng thar naw chun, Pathien ram hmu thei naw ni hai,” a ta.
Nikodemin a kuomah, “Mi a tar hnungin iengtin am pieng thei a ta? A nu sulah vawi hni lûtin a pieng ding am a nih?” a ta.
Isûn a dawn a, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril che hi, mi tûkhawm tuia le Thlaraua an pieng naw chun Pathien ramah lût thei naw ni hai,
taksaa pieng taphawt taksa a nih, Thlaraua pieng taphawt chu thlarau a nih.
In pieng thar ding ka ti che hi mak ti naw rawh.

Thli khâwlai khawm a nuom nuomin a hrâng hlak, a ri i hriet deh, nisienlakhawm, khâwtaka inthawka hung am, khâwlai am a fe ding ti i hriet si nawh; tûkhawm Thlaraua pieng chu chuong ang chu an nih,” a ta.
Chun, Nikodemin a dawn a, a kuomah, “Chuong thil chu iengtin am um thei a ta?” a ta.
Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Israelhai inchûktirtu i ni si a, chuong chu i hriet naw maw?
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril che hi, keinîn kan hriet chu kan hril hlak, kan hmu chu kan inhriettir hlak; nisienlakhawm, kan thu inhriettir in awi ngai si nawh.
Khawvêla thil ka hril hmana awi lo cheu a, vâna thil hril lang cheu iengtin am awi in ta?
Vânah tukhawm an lâwn ngai nawh, vâna inthawka hung ṭum Mihriem Naupa
tûkhawm a ring taphawt chun ama leia chatuona hringna an neina dingin.
Pathienin khawvêl a hmangai bêk bêk a, chuongchun, a Naupa khât nei sun chu a pêk a, ama chu tûkhawm a ring taphawt chu an bohmang naw a, chatuona hringna an nei lemna dingin.
Khawvêl thiemnaw inchangtir dingin Pathienin a Nau khawvêlah a tir nawh, khawvêl ama leia an dam theina dingin a tir a ni lem.
“Tûkhawm ama ring chu inthiemlovin um naw ni hai, tukhawm a ring naw chu tuta inthawkin inthiemlovin an um nghâl a nih, Pathien Naupa khât nei hming an ring naw leiin.
Hi hi thiemnawna a nih, var khawvêlah a hung a, nisienlakhawm, mihaiin var nêkin inthim an dit lem a, an thilthawhai a suol leiin.
Tûkhawm thil suksuol taphawt chun var an theida hlak, vara khawm an hung nawh, chuong naw chun, an thilthawhai inlang a tih.
Amiruokchu tûkhawm a thaw dik phawt chu, an thilthawhai Pathien leia thaw an ni ti ân langna dingin, varah an hung hlak,” a ta.
Chuong hnunga chun Isu chu a inchûktirhai leh Judai ramah an fe a, chutaka chun Isu an kuomah a um zing a, a baptis hlak a.
Johan khawmin Ainonah, Salim kâwlah, a baptis bawk a, chutaka chun tui a tam leiin, chun, mi an hung a, baptisma an chang tâwl a.
Chun, Johan inchûktirhai le Juda pakhat inthien dân thuah an lo insêl a.
Johan kuomah an hung a, a kuomah, “Rabbi, Jordan râla i kuoma um, a thu mi în hriettir khan, ngai ta, kha pa khan mi a baptis a, mi po po a kuomah an hung a nih,” an ta.
Johanin a dawn a, “Mihriemin iengkhawm an nei thei nawh, vâna mi pêk a ni naw chun,
Moneitu chu a pasal chu a nih; nisienlakhawm, pasal ṭhien ngîr puma a thu hretu chu, pasal râwl leiin a lâwm bêk bêk hlak; hi ka lâwmna a tlung tah a ni hi.
Ama chu tlatlum ding a nih, kei ruok chu inlâng ding ka nih.
“Chung tienga hung chu mi po po nêka chunghnungtak a nih; hnuoia pieng chu hnuoia mi a nih, hnuoi thu a hril hlak, vâna inthawka hung chu mi po po nêka
A hmu le a hriet taphawt ân hriettir hlak a nih; tukhawmin a thu inhriettir an awi nawh.
A thu inhriettir awi chun, ‘Pathien chu mi indiktak a nih,’ tiin a hming namin a ziek.
Pathien itir chun Pathien thu a hril hlak; ama chu Pathienin inkhi kherin Thlarau a pêk si nawh.
Tûkhawm Nau ring taphawt chun chatuona hringna an nei tah, nisienlakhawm, tûkhawm Nau thu awi naw taphawt chun hringna nei naw hi hai, Pathien lunginsenna an chungah a um zing lem a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn Johan nêkin inchûktir tam lem a siem le a baptis ti Pharisaihaiin an hriet ti Lalpa chun a hriet phingleh,
(nisienlakhawm, Isu meu chun a baptis naw a, a închûktirhaiin an baptis lem hlak),
Judai ram chu a fe san a, Galili ramah a fe ta a.
Chuongchun, Samari ram a fe thleng ding a na.
Jakob tuisunsuo khawm kha chutaka chun a um. Chuongchun, Isu chu a fe sâwl leiin tuisunsuo sîra chun a ṭhung chawt a; sûn bufâk pha a nih.
Samari nuhmei pakhat tui chawi dingin a hung a, Isûn a kuomah, “Dâwn ding mi pe rawh,” a ta.
(A închûktirhai hlak chu fâk ding inchaw dingin khuoah an fe ta si a.)
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Pathien thilpêk le, ‘Dâwn ding mi pe rawh,’ i kuoma titu hi hre la chu nangin a kuomah i hni lem ding a nih; chun, ama chun tui hring a pêk ding che a nih,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Pu, khaina iengkhawm i nei si naw a, tuisunsuo ân thûk vei leh, khâwlaia inthawkin am tui hring chu i hmu a?
Kan pu Jakob nêkin i ropui lem am a nih? Ama chun hi tuisunsuo hi a mi pêk a, ama khawmin a dâwn a, a nauhai le a ranhai leh,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Tûkhawm hi tui dâwn taphawt chu an dang châr nâwk a tih;

tûkhawm an kuoma ka pêk ding tui dâwn taphawt ruok chu, kumkhuoin dangchâr naw ni hai, keiin an kuoma tui ka pêk ding chu, an sûngah tuihnâr hung um a ta, chatuona hringna chenin inchik dawk a tih,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Pu, chu tui chu mi pe rawh, ka dangchâr nawna ding le hi chen chena tui chawi dinga ka hung nawna dingin,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “I pasal va ko la, hitakah hung nâwk rawh,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Pasal ka nei le,” a ta, a dawn a. Isûn a kuomah, “Pasal ka nei le, i ti hi i ti dik ie;
pasal panga i nei tah, tuta mi i nei hi i pasal a ni naw hrim a nih, hi thu hi i ti dik ie,” a ta.
Nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Pu, zâwlnei i nih ti ka hriet tah.
Keini thlatuhai chun hi tlânga hin Pathien chibai an bûk hlak; nisienlakhawm, nangni chun, ‘Mihriemin Pathien chibai an bûkna hmun ding chu Jerusalemah a um,’ in ti hlak,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Nuhmei, ka thu awi rawh, hi tlânga kher naw khawm, Jerusalema kher naw khawm, Pathien chibai in bûk hun a tlung ding a ni tah.
Nangnîn in hriet naw chibai in bûk hlak, keini chun chu kan ihriet chu chibai kan bûk hlak. Sandamna Judahaia inthawkin a hung suok ding a ni si a.

Chuongchun, a hun a tlung ding a ni tah, tu khawm hin a tlung zing tah, chu pha chun Pathien chibai bûktu taktakhaiin thlarau le titaktakin Pa chibai bûk an tih, Pa chun chuong ang mi chu ama chibai bûktu dingin a zawng a nih.
Pathien chu Thlarau a nih; ama chibai bûktuhaiin thlarau le titaktakin chibai an bûk ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun a kuomah, “Messie, Krista an ti chu a hung ding a nih ti ka hriet a, ama chu a hung phaleh iengkim mi la hril a tih,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Kei a betu che hi ama chu ka ni annâwm,” a ta.
Chuong lai chun a închûktirhai chu an hung a, nuhmei a biek chu mak an ti hle a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawmin, “Ieng am i zawng? Iengdinga nuhmei i biek am?” khawm an ti nawh.
Chun, nuhmei chun a tuibêl a mâksan a, khuoah a fe a, mihai kuomah,
“Ka thilthaw taphawt mi hril peitu mi pakhat a um a, hung unla, en ta u, Krista a ni thei âwm am?” a ta.
Chun, anni chu khuoa inthawk chun an hung suok a, a kuom tieng an pan ta a.
Chu kâr chun inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, fa rawh,” an lo ti an lo ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “Bu in hriet naw fâk ding ka nei,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chu an inbiek a, “A fâk ding miin an hung chawipêk am a ni aw,” an in ti a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah a hril a, “A mi tirtu dit zâwng thaw le, a sin thaw zo ding hi ka bu a nih.
Nangnîn, ‘Bu sîkna ding thla li a la um,’ in ti a ni naw am a ni? Ngai ro, ka hril cheu hi, dâk unla, lohai en ro, tuta inthawkin sîk dingin a hmin a nih.
A sîktu chun hlaw a hmu hlak a, chatuona hringna chena um dingin ra a sîk hlak, a tutu le a sîktu an lâwm rêl theina dingin.
‘Pakhatin a tu a, mi dangin a sîk hlak,’ ti thu hi, chutaka chun ân dik hle a nih.
In inrimpui naw sîk dingin ka tir cheu hi; mi dangin a thaw a, nangnîn a thawsa chu in sunzawm a nih,” a ta.
Chun, nuhmei chun, “Ka thil- thaw po a mi hril pei,” tia ân hriettirna thu lei khan, chu khuoa um Samari mi tamtakin Isu an ring ta a.
Chuongchun, Samari mihai chu Isu kuomah an hung a, an kuoma um dingin an ngên an ngên a; chuongchun, chutaka chun ni hni a châm a.
Chun, mi dang tamtakin ama thu leiin an ring ve ta a.
Chun, anni chun, nuhmei kuoma chun, “Tu zet hin chu i thu hril leia ring kan ni ta nawh; keini ngeiin a thu hril kan hriet ta a, hi mipa hi khawvêl Sandamtu a ni ngei ti kan hriet tah,” an ta.
Chun, chu ni hni hnunga chun chutaka inthawkin a suok a, Galili ramah a fe ta a.
Chuongchun, Galili ram a hung tlungin Galili rama mihaiin an lo lâwm a, Jerusalema ruoiṭhe laia a thilthaw po po an hmu lei khan; anni khawm chu ruoiṭhenaa chun an fe ve si a.
Chun, Isu Judai rama inthawkin Galili ramah a hung ti a hriet phingleh a hang fe a, a naupa zu sukdam dingin a ngên a, a thi vâng vâng si a.
Isûn a kuomah, “Inchiknahai le thilmakhai in hmu naw chun ring tawp naw ti niu,” a ta.
Chun, upa chun a kuomah, “Pu, ka nau thi hmain hung thla ta la,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Fe nâwk el ta rawh, i naupa chu a dam ta ie,” a ta. Ama chun Isûn a kuoma thu a hril chu a ring a, a fe ta a.
Chun, a fe thlâk lai zingin a suokhaiin ama an lo tuok a, “I naupa chu a dam tah,” an lo ti a.
Ama chun an kuomah a dam phut hun lai ân dawn a. Anni chun a kuomah, “Zâni nisa inhêm chau khan a khawsik a bo tah a nih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, a pain Isûn a kuoma, “I naupa chu a dam tah ie,” a ti lai tak chu a nih, ti a hriet ta a; chun, ama le a sûnghaiin an rêngin an ring ta a.
Chu chu Isu Judai rama inthawka Galili rama a hung hnunga a thilmak thaw vawi hnina a nih.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Judahai ruoiṭhe pakhat a um a; Isu Jerusalemah a hang fe a.
Chun, Jerusalema chun berâm kawtkhâr kâwlah dîl a um a, chu chu Hebrai ṭawngin Bethesda
Chuonga chun damnawhai, mitdelhai, ke inbaihai, zenghai tamtak an zâl tâwl a, [tui infâwn hun an nghâk a.
Akâr po leh dîla chun vântirko a zu fe a, tui chu a sukfâwn hlak a; mi tukhawm ieng ang natna nei khawm ni hai sien, tuifâwn zu pal hmasatak taphawt chu an dam pei hlak si a.]
Chutaka chun, kum sâwm thum pariet natna nei mi tu amanih a um a.
Isûn a zâl chu a hmu a, chuong ang chun sâwttak a um tah ti a hriet a, a kuomah, “Sukdam i nuom am?” a ta.
Chun, damnaw chun, “Pu, tui a hung fâwn pha dîla mi sietu ding ka nei naw a, ka fe sûngin mi dangin an mi fe khêl nâwk hlak,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Tho la, i puonpha la la, kein lâwn ta rawh,” a ta.
Chun, kârlovin ama chu a dam nghâl ta a, a puonpha a lâk a, a fe ta a. Chu ni chu Châwlni a nih.
Ama chun an kuomah, “A mi sukdamtu ngeiin ka kuomah, ‘I puonpha la la, kein lâwn ta rawh,’ a mi ti a nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “ ‘I puon- pha la la, kein lâwn ta rawh,’ titu che chu tu am a na?” an ta, an indawn a.
Nisienlakhawm, sukdama um chun tû a ni a hriet naw a, chutaka chun mipui an um leiin Isu a fe hmang ta si a.
A nakie chun ama chu Isûn Pathien biekinah a hmu a, a kuomah, “Ngai rawh, i dam ta hi, thil suksuol nâwk ta naw rawh, chuongnaw chun, thil ṭha naw nâwk zuol i chungah hung um rawi a tih,” a ta.
Chun, ama chu a va fe a, Judahai kuoma chun, ama sukdamtu chu Isu a nih ti a hril a.
Chuongchun, Châwlnia chuong thilhai chu a thaw leiin Judahaiin Isu an suknawmna ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn anni chu a biek a, an kuomah, “Ka Pain tu chen khawmin sin a thaw hlak, kei khawmin ka thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, Judahaiin sukhlum an tum nâwk zuol a, Châwlni a bawsiet lei chau khawm a ni naw a, Pathien ama paah ân bûk a, Pathien tluka ân siem lei khawmin a nih.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Naupa hin a khâtin iengkhawm a thaw thei nawh, Pa thilthaw a hmu chau naw chu; thil a thaw ang taphawt chu Naupa khawmin a thaw ve hlak.
Pain Naupa a hmangai a, a thilthaw taphawt a kuomah ân entir hlak; hieng nêka thil ropui lem hi a kuomah lân entir a tih, mak in ti dingin.
Pain mithihai a keithoa a sukhring hlak angin, Naupa khawm- in a nuom nuom a sukhring hlak.
Pain tû thu khawm a rêlpêk ngai nawh, thu po po Naupa ân rêltir lem a;
mi po poin Pa an inza angin Naupa khawm an inzana dingin. Tûkhawm Naupa inza naw chu Pa, ama tirtu inza naw a nih.
“Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm ka thu hrea a mi tirtu ring chun chatuona hringna a nei tah, inthiemlovin a um naw a, thinaa inthawkin a suok a, hringnaah a lût lem ta a nih.
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, a hun a tlung ding a ni tah, tu khawm hin a tlung zing tah, chu pha chun mithihaiin Pathien Naupa râwl hrieng an ta, a hre taphawt hring an tih.
Pa chun mânia hringna a nei ang bawkin, Naupa mânia hringna neiin a siem;
chun, Mihriem Naupa a ni leiin a kuomah rorêl ding thu a pêk.
Hieng hi mak ti naw ro, a hun a tlung ding a ni tah, chu pha chun thlâna um po poin a râwl hrieng an ta,
“Keia khâtin iengkhawm ka thaw thei nawh; naa ka hriet ang peiin ro ka rêl hlak; ka rorêl chu indiktak a nih, keia thu thuin um ka tum naw a, a mi tirtu thu thua um ka tum lem hlak leiin.
Mâni chanchin inhriettir lang, ka thu inhriettir indik naw ni.
Ka chanchin inhriettirtu chu mi dang a nih; ama chun ka chanchin ân hriettir chu ân dik ti ka hriet.
Thu inhriettir ka ipawm ruok chu mihriem thu a ni nawh, nisienlakhawm, in damna dingin hieng thu hi ka hril a ni hi.
Chu Johan chu khâwnvar chawktak le var tak a nih, a varah lân sukhlim in nuom kha.
“Nisienlakhawm, inhriettirna ka nei hi Johan inhriettirna nêk khan a ropui lem a nih; Pain thil thaw zo dinga a mi pêk, ka thilthaw ngei hin Pain a mi tir a ni ti ka chanchin ân hriettir a nih.
A thu khawm in lungrilah in pai zing ngai nawh; a itir hi in ring naw leiin.
Pathien Lekha in tiem ngun hlak a, a sûnga chatuona hringna um dinga in ring leiin; chuong Lekha chu ka chanchin inhriettirna chu a ni si a.
Nisienlakhawm, hringna nei dingin ka kuomah in hung nuom si nawh.
“Mihriem ichawimawina ka pawm nawh.
Nangni ka hriet cheu, Pathien hmangaina in lungrilah in nei nawh ie.
Ka Pa hmingin ka hung a, nangnîn in mi lâwm si nawh; mi dang mâni hmingin hung sienla, ama chu lâwm in tih.
“Nangni inchawimawituo lâwmhai, iengtin am ring thei in ta? Pathien tak chaua suok chawimawina chu in zawng si nawh.
Keiin Pa kuoma ka hêk cheu ring naw ro, nangni hêktu cheu chu pakhat a um, in iring Mosie hi.
Mosie in ring chun, kei khawm mi ring ve ding in nih; ama chun keia chanchin in sawnnaw a ziek.
Nisienlakhawm, a thu ziek chu in ring si naw chun, iengtin am ka thu ring in ta?” a ta.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Isu chu Galili dîl, Tiberi dîl an ti râlkhing tieng chun a fe ta a.
Chun, damnaw chunga thilmak a thawhai chu an hmu leiin mipui tamtakin ama an zui a.
Chun, Isu chu tlânga chun a hang fe a, chutaka chun a închûktirhai lai a ṭhung a.
Fekân Ruoiṭhe (Judahai Ruoiṭhe chu) a hnai ta a.
Chun, Isu a dâk a, mipui tamtakin a kuom tieng hung panin a hmu a, Philip kuomah, “Hienghai fâk ding bei khâwlai am inchâwng ei ta?” a ta.
Chuong thu chu ama infiena dingin a hril a nih; a thaw ding chu amân a hriet zing si a.
Philip chun a kuomah, “Mi tinin tlâwmtêa an chang seng ding khawm bei duli
Chun, a închûktirhai laia mi pakhat Simon Peter unau Andri chun a kuomah,
“Buṭei
Chun, Isûn “Mihai chu inṭhungtir ro,” a ta. Chu hmuna chun hlobet tamtak a um a. Chuongchun, patlinghai chu an ṭhung a; an tamzie chu sâng nga lai an nih.
Chun, Isûn beiphêkhai chu a lâk a, lâwmthu a hril zoin a ṭhunghai lai chun a sem a, chuong ang bawkin ngahai khawm chu an dit tâwkin a sem bawk a.
Chun, an khawp hnungin, a inchûktirhai kuoma chun, “Ieng khawm inhmang lo dingin a mahla nawihai kha rût ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an rût a, buṭei beiphêk panga fatuhai fâk mahla chun bâwm sâwm le pahni an suksip a.
Chun, mihai chun thilmak a thaw chu an hmu phingleh, “Hi mipa hi zâwlnei, khawvêla hung ding kha a ni ngei hi,” an ta.
Chuongchun, ama chu lala siem dinga man el tumin an hung ding a nih ti Isûn a hriet a, tlângah ama khât chauin a tumin a fe nâwk ta a.
Chun, khuo a hung inhnu chun, a închûktirhai chu dîla chun an zu fe a.
Lawngah an chuong a, dîla chun Kapernaum an pan a. Khuo a hung inthim ta a, Isu hlak chu an kuom a la tlung si nawh.
Thlipui nasatak a hrâng leiin tui chu a fâwn insâng deu deu a.
Chun, fîng sâwmhni panga amanih, fîng sâwmthum amanih an kar chun, Isu chu dîl chunga chun kea lâwna, lawng hung hnaiin an hmu a, an ṭi a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “Kei ka nih annâwm, ṭi naw ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lawnga chun inchuongtir an nuom ta a; chun, kârlovin lawng chun an pan khawmuol chu a tlung nghâl ta a.

A zînga chun dîl râl khing tienga mipui ngîrhai chun, lawng pakhat naw chu lawng dang a um naw a, Isu chu a închûktirhai lai lawnga chun a chuong ve naw a, a închûktirhai anni khât chauin an fe ti an hriet a.
(Nisienlakhawm, Lalpain lâwm- thu a hril hnunga, bei an fâkna hmun kâwla khan Tiberi khuoa inthawkin lawng chînhai a hung tlung si a).
Chuongchun, mipui chun Isu le a închûktirhai chu an um ta nawh ti an hrietin, anni khawm lawng chînhaia chun an chuong a, Isu zawngin Kapernaum an hung tlung a.
Chun, dîl râla an hung hmu chun a kuomah, “Rabbi, iengtik am hi tieng i lo tlung a?” an ti a.
Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, thilmakhai in hmu leia mi zawng in ni naw a, bei in fâk khawp leia mi zawng in ni lem hi.

Bu bohmang nâwk el hlak zawng hin inlap rak rak naw ro, chatuona hringna chena um zing ding bu, Mihriem Naupain a pêk ding cheu chu zawng lem ro; Pa Pathien chun ama chu ân chik ta si a,” a ta, a dawn a
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Pathien sin kan thaw theina dingin ieng am thâwng kan ta?” an ta.
Isu chun an kuomah, “Pathien sin thaw chu hi hi a nih, a mi tir hi ring unla,” a ta, a dawn a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Inchikna ieng am thâwng i ta, kan hmua kan ring theina ding chein? Thil ieng am thâwng i ta?
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, vâna inthawka bei in hmu kha Mosie pêk cheu a ni nawh, ka Pa ruok chun vâna inthawkin bei tak tak a pêk cheu a ni hi.
Pathien bei chu vâna inthawka hung ṭuma, khawvêl kuoma hringna petu hi a nih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, chu bei chu kumkhuoin mi pe rawh,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Kei hi hringna bei chu ka nih, tûkhawm ka kuoma hung chu phîngṭâm naw ni, tûkhawm a mi ring chu iengtika khawm dangchâr naw ni.
Nisienlakhawm, nangnîn in mi hmu khawma in mi ring si nawh ti ka hril cheu kha.
Pain a mi pêkhai po po ka kuomah hung vawng an tih; tûkhawm ka kuoma hung chu hnawt suok naw tawp ka tih.
Mâni nuom zâwng thaw dinga vâna inthawka hung ka ni naw a, a mi tirtu dit zâwng thaw dinga hung ṭum ka ni lem.
Hi hi a mi tirtu dit zâwng chu a nih, amân a mi pêk po po iengkhawm inhmang naw lang, ni kin nia chun keitho lem lang.
Chun, hi hi ka Pa dit zâwng a nih, tûkhawm Nau hmua ring taphawt chun chatuona hringna nei sienla; chun, keiin ni kin nia chun ama chu kei tho lang,” a ta.
Chun, “Vâna inthawka bei hung ṭum chu ka nih,” a ti leiin, Judahai chu a chungah an chier a.
“Hi mipa hi Josef nau Isu a ni naw am a nih? A nu le Pa khawm ei hriet hi. ‘Vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka nih,’ iengti tia ti am a ni leh?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Chier chier naw ro.
Pa a mi tirtuin a hîp naw chun tukhawm ka kuomah hung thei naw ni hai; chun, keiin ni kin nia chun a hung chu keitho ka tih.
Zâwlneihai Lekhabuah, ‘Pathien inchûktirin um vawng an tih,’ ti ziek a nih. Mi tin Pa thu hrea inchûk taphawt chu ka kuomah an hung hlak.
Tukhawmin Pa an hmu hlak ka ti nawh, Pathien kuoma inthawka hung suok chau naw hin chu; ama chun Pa chu a hmu.
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm a ring chun chatuona hringna a nei tah a nih.
Kei hi hringna bei chu ka nih.
“In thlatuhaiin thlalêrah manna kha an fâk a, an thi tho a.
Hi hi vâna inthawka bei hung ṭum chu a nih, mîn a fâka a thi nawna dingin.
Kei hi vâna inthawka bei hring hung ṭum chu ka nih, tûkhawmin hi bei hi a fâk chun chatuonin hring zing a tih, anih, khawvêl hringna dinga ka ipêk ding bei chu, ka taksa hi a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Judahai an insêl a, “Hi mipa hin iengtin am a taksa fâk dingin mi pe thei a ta?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Mihriem Naupa taksa in fâka, a thisen in dâwn bawk naw chun, nangni khâtin hringna nei nghâl lo cheu.
Tûkhawm, ka taksa faa, ka thisen dâwn chun, chatuona hringna a nei tah, chun, ni kin nia chun ama chu keitho ka tih.
Ka taksa hi bu tak a na, ka thisen hi dâwn ding tak a ni si a.
Tûkhawm ka taksa faa, ka thisen dâwn chu, keimaah a um zing hlak, kei khawm amaah ka um zing hlak.
Pa hring zing chun a mi tir a, Pa zâra hring ka ni ang bawkin, tûkhawm a mi fa chu keia zârin hring vêng a tih.
Hi hi vâna inthawka bei hung ṭum chu a nih, chi thlatuhaiin bei an fâk ang kha a ni nawh, anni chun an fâka, an thi ta a; tûkhawm hi bei hi fa chu chatuonin hring zing a tih,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu inkhâwmna inah a hril a, Kapernauma ân chûktir lai khan.
Chuongchun, a închûktirhai tamtakin chuongchu an hrietin, “Hi hi thu khir tak a nih, tuin am ngai phâk an ta?” an ta.
Chuongchun, chu thua chun a închûktirhai an chier ti Isûn a lungrilin a hriet a, an kuomah, “Hi thu hin a suklungninaw cheu am a nih?
Mihriem Naupa hi inhmaa a umna ngaia hang lâwna in hmu chun ieng am lâwng in ta?
Sukhringtu chu thlarau a nih, tisa chu ienga ṭhangkai a ni nawh; in kuoma thu ka hrilhai hi thlarau a nih, hringna khawm a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, nangni laia a ṭhen ring naw in um,” a ta. Isûn a ring nawtu le ama inmantirtu ding chu a tîra inthawkin a hriet zing si a.
Chun, ama bawkin, “Hi lei hin a nih in kuomah, 'Pain a ṭhangpui naw chun, tukhawm ka kuomah hung thei naw ni hai,' ka ti kha,” a ta.
Chu phingle chun a închûktirhai tamtak an fe hmang a, ama an pâwl nâwk ta naw a.
Chuongchun, Isûn sâwm le pahnihai kuoma chun, “Nangni khawm fe hmang in nuom ve am?” a ta.
Simon Peterin a kuomah, “Lalpa, tu kuom am fêng kan ta? Nangin chatuona hringna thu i nei annâwm;
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Nangni sâwm le pahnihai hi keia thlang in ni naw am a nih? Nangni laia pakhat diebol a ni nâwk nghâl si,” a ta.
(Simon Iskariot naupa Juda, sâwm le pahnihai laia ṭhang ve thu kha a hril a nih, ama chu ân mantirtu ding chu a ni si a.)
Chu zoa chun Isûn Galili ram a fang a, Judahaiin ama sukhlum an tum leiin Judai ram chu a fang nuom naw a.
Chuongchun, a unauhaiin a kuomah, “Hitaka inthawkin Judai ramah va fe rawh, i închûktirhai khawmin i thilthaw hi an hmu theina dingin.
Tûkhawmin mâni hming inthang nuom siin arûkin thil iengkhawm an thaw nawh. Hieng thilhai hi i thaw tak zet chun, khawvêl kâwlah inentir rawh,” an ta.
(A unauhai khawm chun ama an ring si naw a).
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Ka hun a la tlung nawh; nangni hun ruok chu a tlung zing a nih.
Khawvêlin nangni an theida thei naw cheu, kei ruok chu an mi theida hlak, an thilthawhai a suol ti ka hrilfie hlak leiin.
Nangni ruoiṭhenaah hang fe ro, kei chu hi ruoiṭhea hin la fe hri naw ning, ka hun a la tlung naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu an kuomah a hril a, Galili ramah a la um zing a.
Nisienlakhawm, a unauhai chu ruoiṭhenaa an hang fe hnung chun, ama khawm vântlâng ihriet lovin, arûkin a hang fe ve a.
Chun, Judahaiin ruoiṭhenaa chun ama chu an zawng a, “Khâwlai am a um a?” an ti a.
A chungah mipuihai laia mi an chier sup sup a, a ṭhenin, “Mi ṭha a ni ie,” an ti a; ṭhenkhatin, “Teu lo e, mipui a hlêm lem hlak a nih,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Judahai an ṭi leiin tûkhawmin a chungchâng thu an hril lang nawh.
Chun, ruoiṭhe ṭhat lai takin, Isu Pathien biekinah a hang fe a, ân chûktir a.
Chun, Judahaiin, “Hi mipa hin inchûk ngai lovin iengtin am lekha a hriet a?” an ta, mak an ti hle a.
Chun, Isûn anni chu a dawn a, “Ka thu inchûktir hi ka ta a ni naw a, a mi tirtu ta a ni lem.
Tûkhawm ama dit zâwng thaw nuom chun, thu inchûktir hi Pathien suksuok am a ni, keia phuokfâwma ka hril, hrieng a tih.
Tûkhawm mâni phuokfâwm thu hril chu mâni mawina zawng a nih; a tirtu mawina zawng ruok chu, ama chu mi tak zet a nih, amaa chun indik nawna hrim a um nawh.
Mosiein Dân chu a pêk naw cheu am a nih? Nisienlakhawm, nangni lai tukhawmin Dân chu in hraw si nawh. Nangnîn iengdinga mi sukhlum in tum am?” a ta.
Chun, mipui chun, “Khawhri zâwl i ni hi, tuin am sukhlum a tum che leh?” an ta, an dawn a.
Isu chun a dawn a, an kuomah, “Thil pakhat ka thaw kha nangni po poin mak in ti kha.
ân lang angin ngaituo naw unla, feltakin ngaituo lem ro,” a ta.
Chun, Jerusalema mi ṭhenkhatin, “Hi mipa hi sukhlum an itum chu a ni naw am a nih?
En ta u, ân langin thu a hril a, a kuomah iengkhawm an hril si nawh. Ama hi Krista a ni ti hotuhaiin an hriet tak tak am a ni tah aw?
Hi mipa hi a piengna chenin ei hriet si a, Krista ruok chu a tlung pha chun a piengna chin tukhawmin hre naw ni hai,” an ta.

Chuong lei chun Isûn Pathien biekina ân chûktir malamin a khêk a, “Nangnîn in mi hriet, ka piengna chin khawm in hriet deh. Nisienlakhawm mâni thua hung ka ni nawh, a mi tirtu hi mi tak zet a nih, ama chu in hriet si nawh.
Kei ruok chun ama chu ka hriet; a kuoma inthawka hung suok ka na, ama chun a mi tir a ni si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama chu man an tum a, nisienlakhawm, a hun a la tlung naw leiin tukhawmin a chungah kut an thlâk si nawh.
Mipui laia tamtak ruok chun ama chu an ring a, “Krista chu a hung tlung pha khawm, hi mipa thaw nêka tam thilmak a hung thaw ding am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, Pharisaihaiin a chunga mipui chier rûknahai chu an hriet a, chuongchun, thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai chun ama man dingin manmihai an tir ta a.
Chun, Isûn “Sâwt nawtê in kuomah la um hri phawt ka ta, chun a mi tirtu kuomah fêng ka tih.
Nangnîn mi zawng in ta, mi hmu si naw ti niu; ka umnaa khawm hung thei naw ti niu,” a ta.
Chun, Judahai an inbiek a, “Ei hmu naw dingin hi mipa hi khâwlai am a fe ding a ni leh? Grikhai laia Inpêmdarhai laia fein Grikhai chu ân chûktir ding am nîng a ti?
‘Nangnîn mi zawng in ta, mi hmu si naw ti niu a; ka umnaa khawm hung thei naw ti niu,’ a ti hi, ieng a tina am a na?” an ta.
Chun, ruoiṭhe ṭumṭiek ding ni, ni ropuitaka chun Isu a ngîr a, a khêk a, “Tûkhawm a dangchâr chun ka kuomah hung sienla, dâwn raw se.
Tûkhawm a mi ring chu Pathien Lekha hril angin, tui hring vadunghai a phînga inthawkin hung luong suok a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui laia ṭhenkhatin chuong thu chu an hrietin, “Hi mipa hi zâwlnei chu a ni ngei hi,” an ta.
Ṭhenkhatin, “Hi hi Krista chu a nih,” an ta. Ṭhenkhatin, “Khâwlai am Krista chu Galili ramah hung suok hlak a ta?
Chuongchun, ama leiin mipui chu an inṭhe a, an inkhing ta a.
Ṭhenkhat chun man an nuom a, nisienlakhawm, tukhawmin a chungah kut an thlâk si nawh.
Chun, manmihai chu thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai kuomah an hung nâwk a, chun, anni chun an kuomah, “Iengdinga in hung ṭhuoi naw?” an lo ti a.
Manmihai chun, “Hi mipa thuhril ang hrim hin tukhawmin thu an hril ngai nawh,” an ta, an dawn a.
Chun, Pharisaihai chun an kuomah, “Nangni khawm hlêmin in um ve tah a ni maw chu?
Hotuhai le Pharisaihai laia mi hrim hrim ama ring an um ta am a nih?
Hieng dân hre naw mipuihai hrep hi ṭawngsephur an nih in sawnnaw,” an ta, an dawn a.
“Ama bau ngeia a thu hriet le a thilthaw hriet hmain ei dânin mi thiemnaw ân changtir hlak am a nih?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Nang khawm chu Galili mi i ni ve am a nih? Zawng la, Galili rama chun zâwlnei tukhawm an suok ngai nawh ti hrieng i tih,” an ta, an dawn a.
[Chun, mi tin mâni in sengah an fe ta a.
Isu ruok chu Oliv tlângah a fe ta lem a.
Chun, zingkâr inhmatakin Pathien biekinah a lût nâwk a, mi po po a kuomah an hung a; chun, ama chu a ṭhung a, anni ân chûktir a.
Chun, Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihaiin nuhmei pakhat a uiret leia an man an hung ṭhuoi a; a laiah an inngîrtir a.
Isu kuomah, “Inchûktirtu, hi nuhmei hi a uiret lai an man a nih, a uiret lai takin.
Chu thu chu ama fiena dingin an thaw a nih, a hêkna ding an hmu theina dingin. Chuongchun, Isu a kûn a, a kutpârin hnuoi a ziek a.
Chun, an indawn sek sek leiin ama chu a tho a, an kuomah, “Nangni laia suol nei naw naw chun ama chu lungin dêng hmasa raw se,” a ta.
Chun, a kûn nâwk a, a kutpârin hnuoi a ziek nâwk a.
Chun, anni chun a thu hril chu an hrietin, a upatakin a phut a, a tâwp chenin, pakhat khatin an inrel hmang ta pei a; chuongchun, Isu chau a um ta a, nuhmei a laia a umna ngaia um le khan.
Chun, Isu a tho a, a kuomah, “Nuhmei, khâwlai am an um ta a? Tukhawmin thiemnaw an inchangtir naw che a ni maw?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Lalpa, tukhawmin an mîn changtir nawh,” a ta. Chun, Isûn, “Kei khawmin thiemnaw kân changtir naw che; fe la, tuta hnung chu suksuol nâwk ta naw,” a ta.]
Chun, Isûn an kuomah thu a hril nâwk a, “Kei khawvêl êntu ka nih, tûkhawm a mi zui chu inthimah lêng tawp naw ni; hringna var nei lem a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihaiin a kuomah, “Mâni thu inhriettir i nih, i thu inhriettir ân dik nawh,” an ta.

Isûn an kuomah, “Mâni thu inhriettir lang khawm ka thu inhriettir ân dik a nih; keiin ka hung suokna le ka fena ding chin khawm ka hriet a; nangni chun chu ka hung suokna le ka fena ding chin khawm in hriet si nawh.
Nangnîn tisa dânin in sawisêl hlak; kei ruok chun tukhawm ka sawisêl nawh.
Anih, sawisêl lang khawm ka sawisêlna chu indik a tih; keia khât chau ka ni naw a, kei le Pa a mi tirtu leh kan ni lem leiin.
Anih, in Dân Lekhabua khawm, ‘Mi pahni thu ân dik,’ ti ziek a ni bawk annâwm.
Kei hi mâni thu inhriettirtu ka nih, Pa a mi tirtu chun ka thu ân hriettir bawk,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “I pa khâwlai am?” an ti a. Isûn “Nangnîn kei in mi hriet nawh, ka Pa khawm in hriet nawh; kei mi hrie ni unla chu, ka Pa khawm hrieng in tih,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu Pathien biekin- ah inchûktir malamin, thawlâwm siena hmunah a hril a; tukhawmin ama an man si nawh, a hun a la tlung naw leiin.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Ka fe hmang ding a ni hi, nangnîn mi zawng in ta, in suol nei zingin thîng in tih; ka fena dingah hung thei naw ti niu,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, Judahaiin, “ ‘Ka fena dingah hung thei naw ti niu,’ a ti hi ân sukhlum ding am a nih?” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Nangni hnuoi tienga inthawka suok in nih, kei chu chung tienga suok ka nih; nangni hi khawvêla suok in nih, kei chu hi khawvêla suok ka ni nawh.
Chuleiin, in kuomah, ‘In suol nei zingin thîng in tih,’ ka ti kha; ama chu ka nih ti in awi naw chun, in suol nei zingin thi mawl in tih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Tû am i ni leh?” an ti a. Isûn an kuomah, “A tira inthawkin in kuomah ka hril hlak kha.

Nangni chungchâng thua hin thil tamtak hril ding le ngaituo ding ka nei; ieng khawm ni raw se, a mi tirtu chu mi indiktak a nih; a kuoma inthawka thu ka hriet taphawt khawvêl kuomah ka hril hi,” a ta.
Pa thu an kuomah a hril ti an hriet nawh.

Chuongchun, Isu bawkin, “Nangnîn Mihriem Naupa hi in khai kâng hnungin, ama chu ka ni le, kei mâni thuin thil iengkhawm ka thaw naw a, Pain a mi hril ang peiin hieng thu hi ka hril a nih ti la hung hrieng in tih.
A mi tirtu chu ka kuomah a um, a mi thlâthlam nawh; a thil lâwm zâwng taphawt ka thaw pei hlak leiin,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril laiin mi tamtakin ama chu an ring ta a.
Chuongchun, Isûn a ringtu Judahai kuoma chun, “Ka thua in um zing chun, ka inchûktirhai ni taktak in tih;
chun, thutak hrieng in ta, thutak chun suok ni bân a ti cheu,” a ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm thil suksuol taphawt chu suol suok a nih.
Suok chu kumkhuoin inah a um zing nawh; naupa ruok chu kumkhuoin a um zing hlak.
Chuongchun, Naupa hin ân zalêntir cheu chun, zalên tak tak tâng in tih.
Abraham thlahai in nih ti ka hriet deh; ni unla khawm mi that in tum si, ka thu hin in lungrilah umna a nei naw leiin.
Keiin ka Pa kuoma thil ka hmu chu ka hril hlak; nangni khawmin in pa kuoma thil in hriet chu in thaw hlak,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Kan pa Abraham a nih,” an ti a, an dawn a. Isûn an kuomah, “Abraham nauhai in ni chun, Abraham thil thaw naw ti niu am.
Nisienlakhawm, tuhin mi that in tum si. Pathien kuoma inthawka thutak ka ihriet hriltu cheu ka nih in sawnnaw; Abraham chun hieng hin a thaw naw kha.
