Nangni chun chu in pa thil chu in thaw hlak,” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Uire naua pieng kan ni naw ie, Pa pakhat chau kan nei, Pathien chu,” an ta.

Isûn an kuomah, “Pathien in Pa a ni chun nangnîn mi hmangai naw ti niu am; Pathien kuoma inthawka suok le a kuoma inthawka hung ka ni si a; keima thua hung ka ni bawk nawh, ama chun a mi tir lem a nih.
Iengdinga ka ṭawng umzie in hriet naw am a na? Ka thu hril in ngai phâk naw lei a nih.

Nangni chu in pa Diebola inthawka suok in na, in pa dit zâwng thaw in nuom a nih. Ama chu a tîra inthawk tuolthattu a nih, thutakah a ngîr ngai nawh, a sûngah thutak hrim a um naw leiin. Khêl thu a hrilin a mizie dungzuiin a hril hlak, khêlhlip a ni si; thukhêl pa khawm a nih.
Thutak ka hril leiin nangnîn in mi ring naw a nih.
Nangni lai tûin am suol kawngah thiemnaw mîn changtir a ta? Thutak ka hril khawmin nangnîn iengdinga in mi ring naw am a na?
Pathien kuoma inthawka suok chun Pathien thu a pawm hlak; hi lei hin in pawm naw a nih, Pathien kuoma inthawka suok in ni naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, Judahai chun a kuomah, “Samari mi khawhri zâwl i nih kan ti kha kan ti indik ngawt a ni naw am a nih?” an ta, an dawn a.
Isûn, “Khawhri zâwl ka ni naw ie, ka Pa ka chawimawi a ni lem; nangnîn ka hming in suksiet hi.
Mâni mawina zawng ka ni nawh; a zawngtu le a ngaituotu mi pakhat a um a nih.
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, miin ka thu a zâwm chun, kumkhuoin thi ni hmêl hmu naw ni,” a ta.
Judahaiin a kuomah, “Khawhri zâwl i nih ti tuhin kan hriet tah. Abraham a thi tah, zâwlneihai leh, nangin, ‘Miin ka thu a zâwm chun, kumkhuoin thina intem naw nih,’ i ti si a.
Kan thlatu Abraham nêkin i ropui lem am a nih? Ama khawm a thi tah, zâwlneihai khawm an thi tah; tuin am însiem leh?” an ta.
Chun, Isûn “Mâni inchawimawi lang, ka mawi ienga ding khawm a ni nawh: ‘Kan Pathien,’ in ti, ka Pa chu, a mi chawimawitu a nih;
nangnîn ama in hriet si nawh; kei ruok chun ama ka hriet; ‘Ama ka hriet nawh,’ ti lang nangni anga khêlhlip bawk nîng ka tih; chuongchun, ama ka hriet a, a thu khawm ka zâwm hlak.
In thlatu Abraham kha ka ni hmu ding a ni leiin a hlim bêk bêk hlak; chun, a hmu ngei a, a lâwm hle a,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Judahai chun a kuomah, “Nang kum sâwmnga khawm la tling lo el che a, Abraham i hmu am a nih?” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Abraham um hma khawmin ka um,” a ta.
Chuongchun, ama dêngna dingin lung an rût a; nisienlakhawm, Isu ân bi hmang a, Pathien biekina inthawk chu a suok ta a.
Chun, Isûn a fe malamin a pieng tîra inthawka mitdel pakhat a hmu a.
Chun, a închûktirhaiin a kuomah, “Rabbi, mitdel saa a pieng hi tuin am thil a suksuol, ama hin am, a nu le a pain?” an ta, an indawn a.
Isûn, “Hi mipa hin a suksuol nawh, a nu le a pain an suksuol bawk nawh, Pathien sinthaw a chunga ân langna dingin a ni lem.
Sûn a ni laiin a mi tirtu sin ei thaw ding a nih, zân a ni ding a ni ta hi, chu pha chun tukhawmin thaw thei naw ni hai.
Chuong anga a hril zo chun, hnuoiah chil a sâk a, chil chun pilpawk a siema, pilpawk chu a mitah a nâl a,
chun, a kuomah, “Siloam dîlah va sâwp rawh,” a ta. (Siloam chu, “Tir,” tina a nih.) Chun, a va fe a, a sâwp a, mit varin a hung ta a.
Chuongchun, a vênghai le inhmaa a kutdaw hmu hlakhai chun, “Hi mipa hi ṭhung puma kut daw hlak kha a ni naw am a nih?” an ta.
Ṭhenkhatin, “Ama kha a ni hi,” an ta. Mi dangin, “A ni nawh ie, ân angpui a ni lem hi,” an ta. Ama chun, “Kha kha ka nih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “I mit iengtin am a hung var leh?” an ta.
Ama chun, “Isu an ti khan pilpawk a siem a, ka mitah a nâl a, ‘Siloam dîlah va sâwp rawh,’ a mi ti a. Chuongchun, ka va fe a, ka sâwp a, mitvarna ka hmu tah a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Ama chu khâwlai am a um a?” an ta. Ama chun, “Ka hriet nawh,” a ta.
Chun, chu hmaa mit indel chu Pharisaihai kuomah an ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Isûn pilpawk a siem a, a mit a sukvar ni kha châwlni a na.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihaiin mitvarna a hmu dân an indawn nâwk a. Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka mitah pilpawk a sie a, ka sâwp a, ka hmu thei el a nih,” a ta.

Chun, Pharisai ṭhenkhatin, “Chu mipa chu châwlni a hlutsak naw leiin Pathien kuoma inthawka suok ni naw ni,” an ta. Ṭhenkhat ruok chun, “Mi suolin iengtin am hieng ang thilmak hi thaw thei a ta?” an ta. Anni lai inṭhena a hung um ta a.
Chun, mitdel kuoma chun, “I mit a sukvar kha nang ieng angin am i ngai a?” an ti nâwk a. Ama chun, “Zâwlnei a nih,” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Judahaiin mitvarna hmutu nu le pa chu an ko hmakhat chu mitdel a na, mitvarna a hmu ti, a chungchâng thu chu an awi naw a.
Chun, a nu le pa kuoma chun, “Hi mipa hi in naupa, mitdel saa pieng a nih in ti kha a ni am a nih? Iengtin am tuhin a hmu thei ta a?” tiin an indawn a.
A nu le pa chun, “Hi mipa hi kan naupa a nih ti kan hriet, mitdel sain a pieng ti khawm kan hriet,

nisienlakhawm, iengtin am tuhin a hung hmu thei tah a na kan hriet nawh, a mit sukvartu khawm kan hriet bawk nawh; ama indawn ro; patling a nih annâwm, ama thu chu ama bawkin hril raw se,” an ta, an dawn a.
Judahai an ṭi leiin a nu le pa chun chuong thu chu an hril a nih; Judahaiin, chu hma khawm chun tûkhawmin “Ama chu Krista a nih,” tia an ṭan chun, inkhâwmna inah hnawng an tih ti hi an remti sa a na.
Chuleichun a nih, a nu le pa chun, “Patling a nih annâwm, ama indawn ro,” an ti chu.
Chuongchun, mitdel chu an ko nâwk a, a kuomah, “Pathien inpâk rawh, ama kha chu mi suol a nih ti kan hriet,” an ta.
Ama chun, “Mi suol a ni le ni naw ka hriet nawh, kawng khat ka hriet, kha hma khan ka mit ân del a, tuhin ka hmu thei ta hi,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “I chungah iengtin am a thaw a? I mit iengtin am a sukvar a?” an ta.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Nakie khan ka hril ta cheu kha, in hriet nuom si nawh; iengdinga in hriet nuom nâwk ta am a ni leh? Nangni khawm ama inchûktirhai ni in nuom ve am a nih?” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, anni chun an hal a, “Nang hi ama inchûktir i na, keini chu Mosie inchûktirhai kan ni hi teh.
Pathienin Mosie a biek ti kan hriet, hi mipa hrep hi khâwlaia inthawka hung suok am a na, kan hriet hrep nawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Chu chu a nih a makna chu, khâwlaia inthawka hung suok am a ni in hriet naw a, ka mit a sukvar tlat si hi.
Pathienin mi suol thu a ngai ngai nawh ti ei hriet; nisienlakhawm, tukhawmin Pathien a ngaisak a, a dit zâwng a thaw chun, Pathienin ama chu a thu a ngai hlak.
Khawvêl insieng tira inthawk tukhawmin mitdel saa pieng mit an sukvar nâwk ti an hriet ngai nawh.
Hi mipa hi Pathien kuoma inthawka suok a ni naw chun, iengkhawm thaw thei naw ni,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Nang suol letdêra pieng i nih annâwm, nangin i mi hril vei maw?” an ta, an dawn a. Chuongchun, ama chu an hnawt dawk ta a.
Chun, an hnawt dawk ti Isûn a lo hriet a; chun, a zawng dawk a, “Pathien Naupa i ring am?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Pu, ama chu tu am a na, mi hril rawh, ka ring theina dingin?” a ta, a dawn a.
Isûn a kuomah, “Ama chu i hmu zing tah, a be zingtu che hi a nih,” a ta.
Ama chun, “Lalpa, ka ring ie,” a ta, chibai a bûk a.
Chun, Isûn, “Rorêl dinga hi khawvêla hin hung ka nih, mitdelhai chu an mit a hung varna ding le, mitvarhai chu an mit a hung indelna dingin,” a ta.
Chun, a kâwla Pharisai umhai chun chuong thu chu an hriet a, a kuomah, “Keini khawm hi mitdel kan ni ve am a nih?” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Mitdel in ni chun suol nei naw ti niu a, nisienlakhawm, ‘Kan hmu thei ie,’ tuhin in ti si a, chuleiin, in suol a um zing a nih.
“Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawm berâm huona kawtkhâra lût lova, a dang tienga lâwn lût chu ama chu iengkhat inruhmang le suomhmang a nih.
Tûkhawm kawtkhâra lût ruok chu, berâm vêngtu a nih.
Kawtkhâr vêngtuin ama chu a lo hawng pêk hlak a; berâmhaiin a râwl an hriet hlak a; ama berâmhai chu an hmingin a ko seng a, a ṭhuoi suok hlak a.
A ta po po ân suoktir phingleh, an hma a ṭhuoi a, berâmhaiin ama an zu i hlak a, a râwl an hriet si a.
Mi dang chu zui naw ni hai a, tlân hmang san lem an tih; mi danghai râwl chu an hriet naw leiin,” a ta.
Chu tekhithu chu Isûn an kuomah a hril a; nisienlakhawm, ieng thu am a na an kuomah a hril an hriet si naw a.
Chuongchun, Isûn an kuomah a hril nâwk a, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, kei hi berâm kawtkhâr chu ka nih,
ka hmaa hunghai po po kha inruhmanghai, suomhmanghai an ni vawng a; nisienlakhawm, berâmhai chun an thu an awi nawh.
Kei kawtkhâr chu ka nih; tûkhawm keimaah a lût chun, humhimin um a ta, lûtin suok a ta, fâk ding hmu bawk a tih.
Inruhmang chu, inru ding le, sukhlum ding le sukse ding naw chun a hung nawh; kei chu hringna an neina dingin, tamtaka an neina dinga hung ka nih.
Kei bêram vêngtu ṭha chu ka nih; berâm vêngtu ṭha chun berâmhai ta dingin a hringna a pêk hlak.
Inhlawfa, berâm vêngtu tak ni lova, berâmhai a ta ni lo chun satene hung a hmu chun berâmhai a tlânsan hlak; chun, satene chun berâmhai a se a, a sukdar hlak;
inhlawfa a na, berâmhai a ngai- sak naw leiin a tlânsan hlak a nih.
Kei chu berâm vêngtu ṭha ka nih; ka ta chu ka hriet a, ka ta khawmin an mi hriet a nih,
Chun, hi berâm huona mi naw khawm hi, berâm dang ka nei; anni khawm ka la hung ṭhuoi ding a nih, ka râwl khawm hrieng an tih, chuongchun, pâwl khatin um an ta, a vêngtu pakhat leh.
“Hi lei hin Pain a mi hmangai a nih, lâk nâwk dinga ka hringna ka pêk ding leiin.
Tûkhawmin mi lâkpêk naw ni hai, keima thu thuin ka pêk lem ding a nih; pe thei ka nih, la nâwk thei khawm ka nih. Hi thupêk hi ka Pa kuoma inthawka ka hmu a nih,” a ta.
Chuong thu lei chun Judahai an inṭhe a, an inkhing nâwk a.
Mi tamtakin, “Khawhri a zâwl a, ân vêt a ni hi; iengdinga a thu in ngai am a na?” an ta.
A ṭhenin, “Hieng thu hi khawhri zâwl thuhril a ni naw ie. Khawhri chun mitdel mit a sukvar thei am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, Jerusalema Inpumpêk Ruoiṭhe lai a na; chu chu thlasik lai a nih.
Chun, Isu Pathien biekinah, Solomon tuolpûka chun ân lawn ân lawn a.
Chun, Judahai a kâwlah an hung a, a kuomah,“Ieng chen am lungâwpinkaiin i mi sie ding a na? Krista i ni chun feltakin mi hril rawh,” an ta.
Isûn an kuomah, “Ka hril ta cheu kha in awi si nawh; ka Pa hminga thil ka thaw hi, hieng hin ka chanchin ân hriettir a ni hi.
Nisienlakhawm, in awi si nawh, ka berâm laia mi in ni naw leiin.
Ka berâmhaiin ka râwl an hriet hlak, kei khawmin anni chu ka hriet, anni chun an mi zui hlak.
An kuomah chatuona hringna ka pêk hlak; kumkhuoin bohmang naw ni hai a, tukhawmin ka kuta inthawkin mi lâkpêk bawk naw ni hai.
Anni mi petu ka Pa chu mi po po nêka ropui a nih, tukhawmin Pa kuta inthawk chu lâkpêk thei naw ni hai.
Kei le Pa chu pumkhat kan nih,” tiin a dawn a.
Chun, Judahai chun a dêngna dingin lung an rût nâwk a.
Chun, Isûn anni chu a biek a, “Pa kuoma inthawka suok sinthaw ṭha tamtak kân entir cheu a, khâng sinthawhai laia ieng sinthaw lei khan am a ni lunga in mi dêng ding hi?” a ta.
Judahai chun a kuomah, “Sin ṭha chunga lunga dêng ding che kan ni naw a; Pathien i hrilsietna chunga le, nang mihriem ni si a, Pathiena în siem lei hin a ni lem a nih,” tiin an dawn a.
Pathien thu tlungnahai hman pathienhai an ti chun, (Pathien Lekha thu bân thei a ni si naw a)
Pain a iruot, khawvêla a itir chunga hin, ‘Pathien Naupa ka nih,’ ka ti leiin, ‘Pathien i hrilsiet,’ in ti a ni maw?
Ka pa sinthaw ka ni naw chun mi ring naw ro.
Amiruokchu, thaw ka ni chun, kei mi ring naw unla khawm, sinthawhai bêk hi ring ro; Pa keimaah a um ti le, kei Paah ka um ti in hriet a, in ringna dingin,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuongchun, ama chu man an tum nâwk a, nisienlakhawm, an kuta inthawkin a suok a.
Chun, mi tamtak a kuomah an hung a, “Johanin thilmak iengkhawm chu a thaw naw a; nisienlakhawm, Johanin hi mipa chungchâng thu a hril taphawt kha chu ân dik hle hi,” an ta.
Chun, chutaka chun mi tamtak- in ama an ring ta a.
(Mari, hriek rim inhnik Lal chu nâla, a sama a ke hrutu kha, kha minu ṭapa Lazar a nih dam naw chu.)
Isûn chu chu a hriet a, “Hi natna hi thina ding a ni nawh, Pathien ropuina ding a ni lem, Pathien Naupa chu hi lei hin a la mawina dingin,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn Martha hai, a zuorpuinu hai, Lazar hai a hmangai a.
Chuleiin, a damnaw ti a hrietin a umna ngaiah ni hni a la um ta rawp a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun a închûktirhai kuomah, “Judai ramah fe nâwk ei tiu,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Rabbi, kha hma el khan Judahaiin lunga dêng an tum che kha; chuong sa sa chun chutaka chun i la fe rawp ding am a nih?” an ta.
Isûn, “Sûnah dârkâr sâwm le pahni a um naw am a nih? Mi sûnah a lêng chun a pêm ngai nawh, hi khawvêl var hi a hmu leiin.
Amiruokchu, mi zânah a lêng chun a pêm hlak, amaa chun var a um naw leiin,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuong thu chu a hril a; chun, chu hnunga chun an kuomah, “Ei ruolpa Lazar chu a ininnghil ta a; a ininnghil keihar dingin ka fe ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Lalpa a ininnghil a ni chun dam nâwk el a tih,” an ta.
(Isûn a thi thu a hril a nih; nisienlakhawm, anni chun a châwl sûnga a ininnghil thu a hril amanih an ta.)
Chuongchun, Isûn fietakin an kuomah a hril a, “Lazar a thi a nih.
Chutaka ka um naw chu ka lâwm pêk cheu, in ring theina dingin; nisienlakhawm, a kuomah fêng ei tiu,” a ta.
Chun, Thoma
Chuongchun, Isûn a tlung chun, ni li thlânah a lo um tah ti a hriet a,
Bethani chu Jerusalem kâwl a na, fing sâwmpanga laia hla a nih;
chuongchun, an ṭapa thi chunga sukthlamuong dingin Judahai rawi tamtak Martha le Mari kuomah an hung a.
Martha chun Isu a hung ding a nih ti a hriet phingleh a va tuok a; Mari ruok chu inah a la ṭhung zing a.
Chun, Martha chun Isu kuomah, “Lalpa hitaka um ni la chu, ka ṭapa a thi naw ding bah.
Tukhawm hin Pathien kuoma i ngên taphawt chu Pathienin pêng a ti che ti ka hriet,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “I ṭapa tho nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Martha chun a kuomah, “Ni kin nia, thonâwknaa chun thonâwk a tih ti ka hriet,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Kei hi thonâwkna le hringna chu ka nih; tûkhawm a mi ring chu thi sienla khawm hring zing a tih;
tukhawm a hring taphawt a mi ring chu kumkhuoin thi naw nih; chu thu chu i ring am?” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Ring e Lalpa, Krista, Pathien Naupa, khawvêla hung ding chu i ni ti ka ring ie,” a ta.
Chun, chu thu chu a hril zo phingleh a fe a, a zuorpuinu Mari chu arûkin a va ko a, “Inchûktirtu hitakah a um a, a ko che,” a ta.
Ama chun chu chu a hriet phingleh a tho vak a, a kuomah a va fe a.
(Isu chu khuo a la lût naw a, Marthain a va tuok laia, a umna ngaiah a la um a.)
In sûnga a thlamuongtu a umpui Judahai chun, Mari a tho vaka, a suok an hmu phingleh, thlâna ṭap dingin a fe amanih an ta, an zui a.
Chun, Mari chun Isu umna chu a va tlung a, a hmu phingleh a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, a kuomah, “Lalpa, hitaka um ni la chu ka ṭapa a thi naw ding bah,” a ta.
Isu chun Mari ṭap le a hung zuitu Judahai ṭap chu a hmuin, a lungrilin ân rûm a, a lungngai a.
“Ama chu khâwlai am in inzâl a?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, hung la, en ta,” an ta.
Isu a ṭap ta a.
Chun, Judahai chun, “En ta u, Lazar hi a lo va hmangai de e!” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ṭhenkhat chun, “Hi mitdel mit sukvartu hin, hi mipa khawm hi ân thi naw tir thei naw am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, Isu chu a lungrilin ân rûm nâwk a, thlân chu a tlung ta a. Chu thlân chu pûk a na, a kawtkhâra chun lung pakhat a um a.
Isûn, “Lung hi dawm tâwl ro,” a ta. A thipa farnu Martha chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, tuhin chu thu tâng a tih, a thina ni li a ni ta si a,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “I ring chun Pathien ropuizie hmûng i tih, ka ti naw che am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, lung chu an dawm tâwl a. Chun, Isu a dâk a, “Pa, ka thu i ngai leiin i chungah ka lâwm ie.
Kumkhuoin ka thu i ngai hlak ti ka hriet zing a nih; nisienlakhawm, mipui ngîr khup lei hin chu chu ka ti a nih, nangin i mi tir ti an ring theina dingin,” a ta.
Chun, chuonga a ṭawng zo phingleh râwl inringtakin, “Lazar, hung suok rawh,” a ta, a khêk a.
Mithi chu a kut le a kehai thlân puona tuom pumin a hung suok ta a, a hmai khawm puona tuom a nih. Isûn an kuomah, “Sût unla, infetir ro,” a ta.
Chuleichun, Mari lêngpuitu Isu thilthaw hmu Juda mi tamtakin Isu an ring ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, a ṭhen Pharisaihai kuomah an va fe a, an kuomah Isu thilthawhai chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai chun rorêltuhai an ko khâwm a, “Iengtin am thâwng ei ta? Hi mipa hin thilmak tamtak a thaw si a.
Hieng anga ei thlathlam el chun mi po poin ama ring an ta; chun, Roma mihai hung an ta, ei hmun le ei chihai hi mi lâkpêk an tih,” an ta.
Chun, anni laia mi pakhat, Kaiapha, chu kuma Thiempu Laltak chun an kuomah, “Nangnîn iengkhawm in hriet dêr nawh.
Ei hnam pumpui bohmang nawna dingin, mipui aia mi pakhat thi ei ta dingin a ṭhalem ti in hriet phak naw a nih,” a ta.
(Chu thu chu ama phuokfâwmin a hril nawh, chu kum chun Thiempu Laltak a na, an chihai nêka Isu a thi ding thu a hril lâwk a ni lem.
Chuhai chihai ai chau chun a ni nawh, Pathien nau khawvêla indarhai po po pâwl khata a ṭhuoi khâwmna dingin a ni bawk.)
Chuongchun, chu ni chena inthawk chu ama sukhlum dingin an inrâwn rawp a.
Chuleiin, Isu chu Judahai lai ân langin a lêng nâwk ta naw a, chutaka inthawkin thlalêr dep tienga khaw pakhat Ephraim an tia chun a va fe ta lem a; chutaka chun inchûktirhai leh an um ta zing a.
Chun, Judahai Fekân Ruoiṭhe chu a hnai ta a, mi tamtak inthien dingin rama inthawk, Fekân Ruoiṭhe hma chun, Jerusalemah an hang fe a.
Chuongchun, Isu an zawng a, Pathien biekinah ngir pumin an inbiek a, “Ieng am in ring a? Ruoiṭhenaah hung naw ni maw?” an in ti a.
Thiempu Lalhai le Pharisaihaiin ama chu an man theina dingin tûkhawmin a umna an hriet chun phuong ding a nih ti thu an pêk ta si a.
Chun, Fekân Ruoiṭhena ding ni ruk a la umin, Isu mithi laia inthawka a keitho Lazar umna Bethani kha a hung tlung a.
Chun, chutaka chun ama ta dingin zânah ruoi an ṭhe a; Martha chun rawng a bâwl a, Lazar chu a thlaithlêng awtpuitu pakhat a nih.
Chun, Mariin bûk zâtve Spiknard hriek rim inhnik totak a hung chawi a, Isu kehai a nâl a, a samin a kehai chu a hrûk a; chuongchun, chu hriek rim chun in chu a sip rum rum el a.
Nisienlakhawm, Iskariot Juda, a închûktir pakhat, ân mantirtu ding chun,
“Hi hriek rim inhnik hi iengdinga duli
(Pasiehai a ngaisak leia chu thu chu hril a ni nawh; inru a na, tangka ip a kawl a, a sûnga um chu a lâk hlak lei a ni lem a).
Chun, Isûn, “Tosan rawh, an mi phûm nia dingin khêk raw se.
Chun, Isu chutaka chun a um ti Juda mi narânhai chun an lo hriet ta a; chun, an hung a, Isu chau chu an hungna san a ni naw a, mithi laia inthawka a keitho Lazar khawm kha hmu dingin a ni bawk a.
Chun, thiempu lalhai chu Lazar khawm sukhlum dingin an inrâwn a;
ama leia Juda tamtakin an pakai san a, Isu an ring hlak leiin.
A zînga chun, ruoiṭhenaa hung mipui tamtakin Isu Jerusalemah a hung ding a nih ti an hrietin,
Chun, Isûn sabengtungtê a hmu a, a chungah a chuong a,
En ta, i Lal chu,
Sabengtungtê chunga chuongin,
A hung ding a nih,”
ti ziek ang khan.

Chuong thu chu a tîrin a închûktirhaiin an hriet nawh; nisienlakhawm, Isu chawimawia a um hnung chun, a chanchinah chuong thu chu ziek a nih ti le, a chungah chuong thil chu an lo thaw ngei ti an hriet ta a.
Chun, Lazar thlâna inthawka a ko suok a, mithi laia inthawka a keitho laia mipui umhai khan, a thu chu an inhriettir ta pei a.
Chu lei chun a nih mipuihai khawmin ama chu an tuok chu; chu thilmak chu a thaw ti an hriet si a.
Chuongchun, Pharisaihai chun, “Hre ro, iengkhawm in law thei naw hi; en ta u, khawvêlin ama an zui ta hi,” an ta.
Chun, ruoiṭhenaa Pathien chibai bûk dinga hang fehai lai Grik tuhai amanih an um a.
Chuonghai chu Galili rama Bethsaida khuoa mi Philip kuoma chun an hung a, a kuomah, “Pu, Isu hmu kan nuom,” an ta, an ngên a.
Philip chun Andri a hung hril a; Andri le Philip chun Isu an hung hril a.
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Mihriem Naupa chawimawia a um hun chu a tlung tah.
Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, bu mal hnuoiah a tla a, a thi naw chun, a mal chauin a um zing hlak; a thi ruok chun tamtakin a ra hlak.
Tûkhawmin ka rawng a bâwl chun mi zui raw se; ka umnaah ka rawng bâwltu khawm um a tih. Tûkhawmin ka rawng a bâwl chun ama chu Pain chawimawi a tih.
“Tuhin ka lungril a lunginzîng, ieng am hril ka ta aw? ‘Pa, hi huna inthawk hin mi sanhim rawh,’ ka ti ding am a nih? Ti lo e, hi ding lei taka hi, hi huna hi hung ka nih,
Pa, i hming inchawimawi rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, vâna inthawkin râwl a hung suok a, “Ka chawimawi tah, chawimawi nâwk bawk ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, mipui a kâwla ngîrhai chun chu chu an hriet a, “Vân ân rûm a nih,” an ta, mi danghaiin, “Vantirkoin ama a biek a nih,” an ta.
Isûn a dawn a, “Chu râwl chu ka ta dinga hung suok a ni nawh, nangni ta dingin a ni lem.
Tuhin hi khawvêl hi ngaituo lai a nih; tuhin hi khawvêl lal hi pei suok nîng a tih.
Chun, kei hnuoia inthawka khaikânga ka um chun, mi po po keia tieng hîp ka tih,” a ta.
Chu thu chu ieng angin am a thi ding ti inhriettirna dingin a hril a nih.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Var hi nangni lai sâwt nawte a la um hri hi, var in nei sûng hin lêng ro, inthimin a nang nawna ding cheuin; tûkhawm inthima lêng chun a fena chin a hriet ngai nawh.
Var in nei sûng hin var hi ring ro, var nauhai in hung ni theina dingin,” a ta. Chuong thu chu Isûn a hril a, chun, a fe a, an hmu naw dingin ân bihmang a.
An hmaah chuong ang thilmak tamtak thaw sienla khawm ama an ring si nawh:
Lalpa kut khawm tu kuom âm ân lang a?”
ti, Zâwlnei Isaiin a hril kha a tlungna dingin.
Hi lei hin a nih an ring thei naw, Isaiin,
“Amain an mit a sukdel a,
An lungril a sukngar a;
Chuong naw chun, an mitin hmu rawi an ta,
An lungrilin hrethiem rawi an ta,
Ngha kîr nâwk rawi an ta;
Keiin anni sukdam rawi ka tih,”
ti a hril nâwk lei hin.
Isaiin a ropuizie a hmu le a chanchin a hril lei hin chuong thu chu a hril a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, thuneituhai ṭhangsin mi tamtakin Isu an ring ta a; amiruokchu, Pharisaihai leiin an inpuong nawh; chuong naw chun, inkhâwmna in a hnawngin um an tih.
Pathien kuoma ropuina nêkin mihriem kuoma ropuina an dit lem si a.
Chun, Isu a khêk a, “Tûkhawm keia mi ring chu keia mi ring a ni naw a, a mi tirtu ring a ni lem.
Tûkhawm a mi hmu chu a mi tirtu hmu a nih.
êntu dinga khawvêla hung ka nih, a mi ring taphawt chu inthima an um zing nawna dingin.
Tûkhawm ka thu hril hrein awi naw sienla khawm, keiin thiemnaw kân chang tir nawh; khawvêl thiemnaw inchangtir dinga hung ka ni naw a; khawvêl sanhim dinga hung ka ni lem.
Tûkhawm mi dit lova, ka thu hrilhai vawn lo chun, thiemnaw inchangtirtu pakhat a nei a nih; ka thu hril kha, kha thu ngei khan ni kin nia chun ama thiemnaw inchangtir a tih.
Keia phuokfâwmin ka hril si nawh; Pa a mi tirtu chun, ka hril ding le ka ṭawngna ding chu thu a mi pêk a ni lem.
Ama thupêk chu chatuona hringna a nih ti ka hriet, chuleichun, thu ka hrilhai hi Pa mi hril ang peiin ka hril a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Fekân Ruoiṭhe hmain Isûn hi khawvêl hi suok sana, Pa kuoma a fe hun a tlung tah ti a hriet a. Amaa mi khawvêla um a hmangai hlakhai chu, a tâwp chen khawmin a hmangai zing a.
Chun, zânbu fâk laiin, (chu hma khawm chun diebolin Simon naupa Iskariot Juda chu Isu inmantir dingin ân lungriltir a,)
Isûn Pain a kuta thil iengkim ân kawltir dâm, Pathien kuoma inthawka hung suok a ni dâm, Pathien kuoma a fe ding dâm hre zingin,
a zânbu awt chu a tho a, a puonhai a sie a, inhrûkna puon a lâk a, a dierkei a.
Chun, maihûnah tui a sung a, inchûktirhai ke a sâwp a, inhrûkna puon a dierkei chun a hrûk pei a.
Chuongchun, Simon Peter kuomah a hung a. Peter chun, “Lalpa, nang êmin ka ke i sâwp ding am a nih?” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Ka thilthaw hi tuhin i hriet nawh; nisienlakhawm, nakie tieng la hrieng i tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Peterin a kuomah, “Ka ke sâwp naw tawp i tih!” a ta; Isûn a kuomah, “Ka sâwp naw che chun ka kuomah iengkhawm chan nei naw ti nih,” a ta.
Simon Peter chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, chuong a ni chun, ka ke chau ni lovin, ka kut le ka lu khawm tie,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Insil ta chu a ke naw chu sâwp a ngai nawh, a fai deh annâwm; nangni in fai, in rêng ruok chun ni lovin,” a ta.
(Ân mantirtu ding chu a hriet si a; chuleiin, “In rêngin in fai nawh,” a ti a nih.)
Chuongchun, an ke a sâwp a, a puonhai a lâk a, a ṭhung nâwk chun an kuomah, “In chunga ka thilthaw hi ieng thawna am a na, in hriet am?
Nangnîn Inchûktirtu le Lalpa in mi ti hlak; in ti indik hle, ka ni ngei hrim a.
Kei Lalpa le Inchûktirtu hmanin in ke ka sâwp chun, nangni khawmin in ke in insâwppêk ding a nih.
Chuong thil chu in hriet chun, thaw unla, hamṭhâng in tih.
‘Ka bei fatu chun,
A kekhawng chu ka chungah ân let tah,’
ti Pathien Lekha Thu kha a hung tlung theina dingin a nih.
Hi hi a hung tlung hmain tuhin ka hril cheu hi, a hung tlung phaleh, kei kha ka nih ti in ring theina dingin.
Isûn chuong anga a hril zo chun, a lungrilin a lunginzîng a, “Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, nangni laia mi pakhatin mîn mantir a tih,” a ta, ân hriettir ta a.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun a ti bîk an hriet naw a, an inen tâwl a.
Chun, a închûktirhai laia pakhat, Isûn a ihmangai chu, Isu hnai takah ama innghâiin a ṭhung a.
Chun, Simon Peterin ama kuoma chun, “Tu thu tak am a na a hril, indawn ta,” tiin zaizirin a biek a.
Ama chu a umna ngaiah a um a, Isu âwm hnengin a hung thle a, a kuomah, “Lalpa, tu tak am a na?” a ta.
Chun, Isûn “Bei hlek inchiepêk ka ta, ka ipêk chu nîng a tih,” a ta, a dawn a. Chuongchun, bei hlek chu ân chie hnungin a lâk a, Iskariot Simon naupa Juda kuoma chun a pêk a.
Chun, bei hlek chu a pêk hnungin a sûngah Setan chu a lût nghâl ta a. Chuongchun, Isûn a kuomah, “I thaw ding chu thaw vak rawh,” a ta.
(Chun, dawkân kiltuhai tukhawmin iengtiziea ti am a ni an hriet naw a.
Ṭhenkhatin “Juda chun tangka ip a kawl leiin, Isûn ‘Ruoiṭhenaa ding thil ei mamawhai inchaw rawh,’ a ti amanih, ‘Pasiehai kuoma iengkhat pêk ding,’ a ti amanih,” an ti a nih.)
Chun, ama chun bei hlek chu a lâk a, a suok nghâl ta a; chu lai hun chu zân a nih.
Chuongchun, a suok hnung chun Isûn a hril a, “Tuhin chu Mihriem Naupa chawimawiin a um tah, ama leiin Pathien khawm chawimawiin a um a nih.
Pathien chu amaah chawimawiin a um chun, Pathien khawmin amaa chun ama chu chawimawi a tih, chawimawi nghâl a tih.
“Thupêk thar ka pêk cheu hi, inhmangai tuo unla; keiin ka hmangai ang cheu hin, nangni khawm inhmangai tuo ro.
In inhmangai tuo chun mi po poin ka închûktirhai in ni ti chutaka chun hrieng an tih,” a ta.
Simon Peterin a kuomah, “Lalpa, khâwlai am i fe ding a na?” a ta. Isûn, “Ka fena dingah nangnîn tuhin mi zui thei naw ti niu; nakie pha ruok chu mi zui in tih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Peterin a kuomah, “Lalpa, iengdingin am tu khawm hin zui thei nâwng ka ti che a? Nangma leiin ka hringna pêng ka tih,” a ta.
Isûn, “Keima leiin i hringna i pêk ding maw? Titakzetin, ka hril che hi, nangin vawi thum i mîn phat hmakhat chu âr khuong naw ni.
“In lungril lunginzîng naw raw se; Pathien in ring, kei khawm mi ring ve ro.
Ka Pa inah umna tamtak a um a, a um naw chun ka hril ta ding cheu a nih; in ta dingin hmun siemin ka fe ding a nih.
Chun, in ta dinga hmun ka hang siem chun hung kîr nâwk ka ta, ka kuomah lâng ka ti cheu; ka umnaah nangni khawm in um theina dingin.
Ka fena ding a lampui chin in hriet ie,” a ta.
Thoma’n a kuomah, “Lalpa, i fena ding chin kan hriet naw annaw, a lampui iengtin am hrieng kan ta?” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Kei hi lampui le thutak le hringna ka nih; keimaa fe naw chu tukhawm Pa kuom an tlung ngai nawh.
Kei mi hrie ni unla chu, ka Pa khawm in hriet ta ding bah; tuta inthawk chu ama in hriet tah, ama in hmu ta bawk,” a ta.
Philipin a kuomah, “Lalpa, Pa chu keini mîn hmutir ta la, chuongchun, kan ta dingin hun a tih,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Philip, hi chen rau hi in kuomah ka um a, chuong khawm chun in mi la hriet naw ta rawp maw? Tûkhawm a mi hmu chu Pa hmu a nih. ‘Pa chu mîn hmutir rawh,’ ieng ti tia ti am i na?
Kei Paa ka um le, Pa keimaah a um ti in awi naw a ni? In kuoma thu ka hril hi keia phuokfâwmin ka hril nawh; Pa keimaah a um zing a, a thil a thaw lem hlak a nih.
Kei Paa ka um le keimaa Pa a um ti hi mi ring ro; annawleh, thilthaw lei bêk hin mi ring ro.
Titakzetin, ka hril cheu hi, tûkhawmin a mi ring chun thil ka thawhai hi ama khawmin thaw vêng a tih; hienghai nêka thil ropui lemhai khawm la thawng a tih, Pa kuoma ka fe ding leiin.
Chun, keia hminga iengkhawm in hni taphawt chu, thaw pei ka tih, Pa, Naupa leia chawimawia a um theina dingin.
Nangnîn keia hmingin iengkhawm in mi hni chun, chu chu thaw pei ka tih.
“Nangnîn in mi hmangai chun, ka thupêkhai chu zâwm in tih.
Chun, Pa hnîng ka ta, ama chun Thlamuongtu dang pêng a ti cheu, chatuona in kuoma um dingin;
chu chu Thlarau indiktak a nih; khawvêlin chu chu an nei thei nawh, ama an hmu naw a, an hriet bawk naw leiin. Nangnîn ama chu in hriet, in kuomah a um zing lei le, nangniah a um ding leiin.
Fahrain mâksan naw ning cheu; in kuomah hung nâwk ka tih.
Sâwt nawtê hnungah khawvêlin mi hmu nâwk ta naw ni, nisienlakhawm, nangni chun mi hmûng in tih; kei ka hring leiin nangni khawm hring in tih.
Chu nia chun kei ka Paa ka um dâm, nangni keimaa in um dâm, kei nangnia ka um dâm hre tâng in tih.
Tukhawm ka thupêkhai nei a, zâwm chu a mi hmangaitu a nih; tûkhawm a mi hmangai chu, ka Pain hmangai a tih, kei khawmin ama chu hmangai ka tih, a kuomah inlâr rawp ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Juda (Iskariot naw lem) chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, keini kuomah inlâr i ta, khawvêl kuoma în lâr naw ding chu iengdinga?” a ta.
Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Mîn a mi hmangai chun ka thu zâwm a ta; ka Pain ama chu hmangai a ta, a kuomah hung kan ta, a kuomah um zing kan tih.
Tûkhawm a mi hmangai naw chun ka thu a zâwm nawh, thu in hriethai hi ka ta a ni nawh, Pa a mi tirtu ta a ni lem.
In kuoma ka la um sûng hin hieng thu hi ka hril cheu hi.
Chun, Thlamuongtu, Thlarau Inthieng, Pain ka hminga a hung tir ding khan, ama chun iengkim inchûktir a ti cheu a, in kuoma ka hril po po kha inhriet suoktir nâwk a ti cheu.
“Thlamuongna ka mâk pêk cheu hi; keima thlamuongna ka pêk cheu a; khawvêlin a pêk ang cheuin ka pêk naw cheu hi. In lungril lunginzîng naw raw se, ṭi khawm ṭi naw raw se.
‘Ka fe hmang ding a na, in kuomah hung nâwk ka tih’, ka tizie cheu kha in hriet tah. Nangnîn mi hmangai ni unla Pa kuoma ka fe ding a ni leiin in lâwm ding a nih; Pa chu keia nêkin a ropui lem si a.
Tuhin a hung tlung hma hin ka hril ta cheu hi, a hung tlung phaa in ringna dingin.
In kuomah thu hril nâwk mang ta naw ning, khawvêl lal a hung ding a ni si a, ama chun keimaah iengkhawm a nei nawh,
nisienlakhawm, keiin Pa ka hmangai le, Pain thu a mi pêk ang peiin thil ka thaw ti khawvêlin an hrietna ding a ni hi. Tho ro, hitaka hi suok ei tiu.
“Kei grêp hrui tak tak ka nih, Ka Pa a huon enkawltu a nih.
Ka zawmpui kâu ra naw taphawt chu a peihâwn hlak; a ra taphawt chu a sukthieng hlak, a ra tam nâwk zuolna dingin.
In kuoma ka thu hril lei chun tu khawm hin in inthieng ta pang a nih.
Keimaah um zing ro, kei khawm nangniah um zing ka tih. Kâu chu grêp hruiah a um zing naw chun a khâtin a ra thei naw ang bawkin, nangni khawm keimaah in um zing naw chun ra thei naw ti niu.
Kei grêp hrui chu ka nih, nangni a kâuhai chu in nih, tûkhawm keimaa a um zing a, kei khawm amaa ka um zingna chu, ama chu tamtakin a ra hlak; ka ṭhang naw chun iengkhawm in thaw thei si nawh.
Mi keimaah a um zing naw chun kâu anga peihâwnin a um a, a vuoi hlak; chun, an inkhâwm a, meiah an pei a, a kâng hlak.
Nangni keimaa in um zing a, ka thu nangnia a um zing chun, in dit dit hni ro, in ta dingin thawin um pei a tih.
Hi hi leiin ka Pa chu chawimawiin a um hlak, tamtaka in ra hin; chuongchun, ka închûktirhai nîng in tih.
“Pain a mi hmangai ang bawkin kei khawmin ka hmangai cheu hi; ka ihmangaiin um zing ro.
Nangnîn ka thupêkhai in zâwm chun ka ihmangaiin um zing in tih; keiin ka Pa thupêkhai ka zâwm a, a ihmangaia ka um zing ang bawk hin.
Ka lâwm nangnia a um zingna ding le, in lâwm a kimna dingin hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril hi.
Mihriemin a ruol ta dinga a hringna a pêk nêka hmangaina nasa lem tukhawmin an nei nawh.
Thu ka pêk taphawt cheu in thaw chun, ka ruolhai nîng in tih.
Suok ti nâwk ta naw ning cheu; a pu thilthaw suok chun a hriet si nawh; ruolhai ka ti ta lem cheu a nih. Pa kuoma inthawka thil ka hriet po po in kuomah ka puong ta si a.
Nangnîn in mi thlang naw a, keiin ka thlang lem cheu a nih. Fea, ra insuo ding le in ra chu um zing dingin ka ruot cheu a nih, ka hminga Pa kuoma in hni taphawt a pêk theina ding cheuin.
In inhmangai theina dingin hieng thu hi ka pêk cheu a nih.
“Khawvêlin a theida cheu chun, a theida hma cheu khawmin kei a mi theida tah ti hre ro.
Nangni khawvêla mi ni unla, khawvêlin amaa mi a hmangai ding bah; khawvêla mi in ni si naw a, khawvêla inthawka ka thlang suok lem cheu leiin, khawvêlin a theida cheu a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng thil po po hi ka hming leiin in chungah thâwng an tih, keia mi tirtu an hriet naw leiin.
Kei hungin an kuomah thu hril naw lang chu suol an nei naw ding bah; tu ruok hin chu an suolnaah suonlam ding an nei ta naw a nih.
Tûkhawm kei mi theida chun ka Pa khawm a theida a nih.
Mi dang tukhawm la thaw ngailo thilhai anni lai thaw ni naw lang chu, suol an nei naw ding bah. Nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu an hmu ta a, chuongsa khawm chun kei le ka Pa an mi theida ve ve tah a nih.
“Chun, ka Pa kuoma inthawka Thlamuongtu in kuoma ka hung tir ding, Paa suok Thlarau indiktak chu, a hung tlung pha, ama chun ka thu inhriettir a tih;
nangni khawmin inhriettir bawk in tih, a tîra inthawk ka kuoma in um leiin.
“Sukthlûka in um nawna dingin hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi.
Inkhâwmna inahai inhnawngtir an ti cheu a, anih, tûkhawm a sukhlumtuhai cheu chun Pathien chungah thilṭha thawin inhrieng an tih, chuong ang hun chu a tlung ding a nih.
Chuong thil chu thâwng an tih, Pa le kei an mi hriet naw leiin.
Hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi, a hun chu a hung tlung pha, ka hril ta cheu ti in hriet nâwkna dingin. Hieng thil hi a tîra inthawk ka la hril naw hrim cheu a nih, in kuoma ka la um leiin.
Tu ruok hin chu a mi tirtu kuomah ka fe ding a nih, nangni rawi tukhawmin, ‘Khâwlai am i fe ding?’ tiin in mîn dawn si nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril leiin in lungril chu lungngaiin a sip ṭeu lem ta a.
“Nisienlakhawm, thu indiktak ka hril cheu hi, ka fe in ta dingin a ṭha; ka fe naw chun Thlamuongtu chu in kuomah a hung naw ding a ni si a; kei ka fe ruok chun in kuomah hung tir ka tih.
Ama chu a hung tlung chun suol thua dâm, fel thua dâm, rorêl thua dâm khawvêl an thiemnaw inhriettir a tih;
suol thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, kei an mi ring naw leiin,
fel thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, Pa kuomah ka fe ding a na, nangnîn in mi hmu nâwk ta naw ding lei hin;
rorêl thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, hi khawvêl lal hi inthiemlova a tlûk ta leiin.
“In kuomah thu hril ding tamtak ka la nei ta rawp a; nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu tlin hri naw ti niu.

Nisienlakhawm, ama Thlarau indiktak chu a hung tlung pha chun, thutak po poa chun ṭhuoi lût a ti cheu a, ama phuok fâwmin thu a hril âwm si naw a, thu a idawng taphawt chu hril lem a tih; thil hung tlung dinghai khawm inhriettir a ti cheu.
Ama chun kei mi chawimawi a tih, ka taa mi lâng a ta, in kuomah ân hriettir ding cheu a ni si a.
Pain thil a nei po po ka ta a nih; chuleiin, ‘ka taa mi lâng a ta, in kuomah inhriettir a ti cheu,’ ka ti hi.
“Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu a, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,” a ta.

Chun, a închûktirhai ṭhenkhatin, “Ei kuoma a thu hril hi ieng am a na? ‘Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu a, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,’ a ti le, ‘Pa kuoma ka fe ding leiin,’ a ti hi,” an in ti a.
Chun, anni ma chun, “Hi hi ieng am a na? ‘Sâwt nawtê,’ a ti hi. A thu hril hi a ngaina ei hriet nawh,” an ta.
Chun, ama indawn an nuom ti Isûn a hriet a, an kuomah, “ ‘Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,’ tia hi ka thu hril hi in indawn maw?
Titakzetin, ka hril cheu hi, nangni in mitthli tlâng a ta, ṭap rak bawk in ta, khawvêl ruok chu lâwm an tih, nangni lungngai in ta, nisienlakhawm, in lungngai chu lâwmin inchang a tih.
Nuhmeiin nauha ân vawiin a lungngai hlak, a hun a tlung ta leiin, nisienlakhawm, nau a hung nei phing chun a thlaphâng chu a hriet nâwk ta ngai nawh, khawvêla mihriem hung pieng chu a lâwm leiin.
Chun, tuhin nangni in lungngai, nisienlakhawm, hmu nâwk ka ti cheu a, in lungril lâwm a tih, in lâwm chu tukhawmin lâkpêk naw ni hai cheu.
Chu ni chun nangnîn kei iengkhawm mîn dawn naw ti niu. Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Pa kuomah in hni taphawt chu ka hmingin pêng a ti cheu.
Tu chen hin keia hmingin iengkhawm in la hni nawh; hni ro, chuongchun hmûng in tih, in lâwm a kimna dingin.
“Chuong thu chu a thawiin in kuomah ka hril tah; a hun a tlung ding a nih, chu pha chun a thawiin in kuomah thu hril nâwk ta naw ning a, fietakin Pa chanchin hril lem ka ti cheu.
Chu ni chun keia hmingin thil hnîng in ta, chun, ‘Pa kuomah keiin ngên pêk ka ti cheu,’ ka ti naw cheu a,
Pa ngeiin a hmangai si cheu a, nangnîn kei in mi hmangai a, Pathiena suok ka nih ti in ring leiin.
Kei Pa kuoma inthawka hung suok a, khawvêla hung ka nih; khawvêl fe san a, Pa kuoma fe nâwk ding ka nih,” a ta.
A închûktirhaiin, “Ngai ta, tuhin chu fietakin thu i hril a, a thawi hrim hrimin i hril ta naw hi.
Nangin iengkim i hriet a, tukhawm indawn che i ngai nawh ti tuhin kan hriet tah; hi hi lei hin Pathien kuoma hung suok i ni ti kan awi ie,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Tuhin chu in awi ta maw?

Ngai ro, a hun a tlung ding a ni tah, anih, a tlung zing tah, chu pha chun, mâni in sengah indar vawng in tih, keia khât chauin mi thlâthlam in tih; nisienlakhawm, Pa ka kuoma a um leiin makhât chauin ka um si nawh.
Hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi, keimaa in thlamuongna dingin. Khawvêla hin rinumin in um hlak; nisienlakhawm, thlamuongtakin um ro, keiin khawvêl ka hne tah,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu Isûn a hril a; chun vântieng nghain, “Pa, a hun a tlung tah; i Naupa chawimawi rawh, Naupa hin a chawimawina ding chein;
khânga mi po po chunga thuneia i siem khan, a kuoma i pêkhai po chu chatuona hringna a pêk theina dingin.
Hi hi chatuona hringna a nih: nang Pathien tak chau le i tir Isu Krista hriet hi.
Nangin thil thaw ding i mi pêk kha ka thaw zo ta a, khawvêla hin ka chawimawi ta che.
Aw Pa, khawvêl um hmaa i kuoma mawina ka inei khan, tuhin nangma kuoma ngei mi chawimawi rawh.
“Nangin khawvêla inthawka mî i mi pêkhai kuoma khan i hming ka suklang tah. Anni chu i ta an ni tah, nangin anni chu kei i mi pêk ta a, anni chun i thu an zâwm tah:
Nangin thil i mi pêk po po, i kuoma inthawka suok an nih ti tuhin an hriet tah.
Nangin thu i mi pêkhai kha an kuoma ka pêk ta si a; chuong chu an vawn a, i kuoma inthawka suok ka nih ti indiktakin an hriet tah, nangin i mi tir ti khawm an awi tah.
“An ta dinga ka ngênpêk hi, khawvêl ta dinga ngênpêk ka ni nawh; nangin i mi pêkhai ta ding lemin a nih; i ta an ni si.
Thil po po ka ta taphawt chu i ta a nih, i ta chu ka ta a nih; anni leiin chawimawiin ka um hlak.

Chun, kei chu khawvêlah um ta naw ning, hienghai hi chu khawvêlah um an tih, kei chu i kuomah ka hung ding a ni tah. Pa Inthieng, anni chu I hmingin hum rawh, I hming mi pêk khan, eini ang bawka pumkhat an ni theina dingin.
Nisienlakhawm, tuhin i kuomah ka hung ding a ni tah; khawvêlah hieng thu hi ka hril a nih, ka lâwm annia an nei kimna dingin.
I thu an kuomah ka pêk tah; chun, khawvêlin anni chu an theida a, khawvêla mi an ni naw leiin, kei khawvêla mi ka ni naw ang bawkin.
“Anni chu khawvêla inthawka la suok dinga ngen che ka ni naw a, mi suol laka hum dingin ka ngên lem che a nih.
Anni chu khawvêla mi an ni nawh, kei khawvêla mi ka ni naw ang bawk hin.
Anni chu thutakin sukthieng rawh, i thu chu thutak a nih.
Nangin khawvêla kei i mi tir ang khan, kei khawmin anni chu khawvêlah ka tir hi.
Anni leiin kân sukthieng a nih, anni khawm thutaka an inthieng theina dingin.
“Hienghai ta ding chau hin ngên pêk ka ni nawh, an thu leia kei mi la hung ring dinghai ta ding khawma ngênpêk ka ni bawk ie, an rênga pumkhat an nina dingin;
Pa, nang keimaa i um le, kei nangmaa ka um ang bawk hin, anni khawm einia an umna dingin: nangin i mi tir ti khawvêlin an awi theina dingin.
Chun, nangin ropuina i mi pêk kha keiin an kuomah ka pêk tah; anni chu pumkhat an nina dingin, eini pumkhat ei ni ang bawk hin;
kei anniah, nang keimaah, anni pumkhata an um a, an famkim theina dingin, nangin kei i mi tir ti le, i mi hmangai angin anni hi i hmangai ti, khawvêlin an hriet theina dingin.
Pa, nangin kei i mi pêkhai hi ka umnaah ka kuoma um dingin ka dit; nangin i mi pêk ka ropuina kha an hmuna dingin; leihnuoi insieng hma khawmin nangin i mi hmangai ta si a.
Aw Pa feltak, khawvêl chun an hriet naw che a, kei ruok chun ka hriet che kha, hienghai khawm hin nangin kei i mi tir ti an hriet kha.
Chun, an kuomah i hming kân hriettir a, inhriettir nâwk rawp ka tih; nangin kei i mi hmangaina kha anniah a um a, kei khawm annia ka um theina dingin,” a ta.
Isûn chuong thu chu a hril zoin, a închûktirhai leh an suok a, Kidron vadung an kai a. Chutaka chun huon a um a, chutaka chun an lût a, ama le a închûktirhai leh.
Chun, ân mantirtu ding Juda khawm chun chu hmun chu a hriet; Isu a închûktirhai leh chutaka chun a lêng rawp leiin.
Chuongchun, Juda chun sipai pâwl leh, thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai kuoma um manmihai leh a ṭhuoi a, khâwnvarhai, meiserhai, hriemhai chawiin chutaka chun an hung a.
Isûn a chunga thil tlung ding po po chu a hriet zing a, a va suok a, an kuomah, “Tu am in zawng a?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Nazareth Isu,” an ta, an dawn a. Isûn an kuomah, “Kei hi ka nih,” a ta. Chun, ân mantirtu Juda khawm chu anni lai a ngîr a.
Isûn, “Kei hi ka nih,” a ti phingleh, hnungtieng an intâwl a, hnuoiah an tlu tâwl a.
Isu chun an kuomah, “Tu am in zawng a?” a ti nâwk a. Anni chun, “Nazareth Isu,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn, “Kei hi ka nih ti ka hril cheu annâwm, nangnîn kei in mi zawng chun, hienghai hi inthla ṭha ro,” a ta, a dawn a.
(A thu hril, “Nangin kei i mi pêkhai pakhat khawm kân hmang nawh,” a ti kha a tlungna dingin.)
Chun, Simon Peterin kâwlhnâm a kawl a, a phawi a, Thiempu Laltak suok a sât a, a nakâwr changtieng a sât thlâkpêk a. Suokpa hming chu Malka a nih.
Chuongchun, sipai pâwl leh, an hotu laltak leh, Judahai manmihai le chun Isu an man a, an khuop a,
Ana kuomah an ṭhuoi hmasa a, Kaiapha tarpupa a ni leiin, Kaiapha chu, chu kum chun Thiempu Laltak a nih.
Chun, Simon Peterin Isu a zui a, a închûktir dang pakhat leh. Chu inchûktir chu Thiempu Laltak hmêlhriet a na, Thiempu Laltak in inhuon sûng tuolah Isu kuomah a lût ve a,
nisienlakhawm, Peter chu tuolah kawtkhâr bulah a ngir zing a. Chuongchun, inchûktir dang, Thiempu Laltak hmêlhriet chu, a va suok a, kawtkhâr vêngtu a biek a, Peter a ṭhuoi lût a.
Chun, kawtkhâr vêngtu nunghâk chun Peter kuomah, “Nang khawm hi mipa inchûktir laia ṭhang ve i ni maw?” a ta. Ama chun, “Ka ni nawh,” a ta.
Chun, suokhai le manmihai chu chutaka chun an ngîr tâwl a, a dei leiin meihawlin mei an sêm a, a lum an awi a, Peter khawm anni lai a ṭhang a, ngîr pumin mei lum a awi ve a.
Chun, Thiempu Laltak chun Isu chu a inchûktirhai chanchin le a închûktirzie chanchin ân dawn a.

Isûn a dawn a, a kuomah, “Khawvêl kuomah, tlâng hrietah thu ka hril hlak kha; inkhâwmna in le, Pathien biekin, Juda po po um khâwmnaahai chun, kân chûktir rawp hlak kha, iengkhawm arûkin ka hril nawh.
Iengdinga kei i mîn dawn am? An kuomah ka thu hrilzie chu ka thu hretuhai indawn rawh; ngai rawh, chuonghai chun ka thu hril chu an hriet annâwm,” a ta.
Chu chu a hril phingleh, a kâwla ngîr manmi pakhatin Isu a ben a, “Thiempu Laltak hieng ang hin i dawn maw?” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Thu suol ka hril leh, ka suolna mîn hriettir rawh, nisienlakhawm, thu ṭha ka hril khawmin iengdinga i mi ben am?” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, Ana chun khuop pumin Thiempu Laltak Kaiapha kuomah a tir a.
Chun, Simon Peterin ngîrin mei lum a awi a. Chun, “Nang khawm a inchûktir laia ṭhang ve i ni maw?” an ta. Ama chun, “Ka ni nawh,” tiin ân pha a.
Chun, Thiempu Laltak suok pakhat, Peterin a nakâwr a sât thlâk pêkpa laibungpa chun, “A kuomah huona khan ka hmu naw che am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, Peter ân pha nâwk a, âr a khuong ta a.
Chun, Isu chu Kaiapha ina inthawk chun lal inah an ṭhuoi nâwk a. Zingkâr a na; chun anni chu lal inah an lût nawh, chuong naw chun, inthieng naw nîng an ta, Fekân Ruoiṭhe fa thei naw ni hai.
Chun, Pilat an kuomah a va suok a, an kuomah, “Hi mipa chunga hin thupawi ieng am in nei a?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Hi mipa hi mi suol ni naw sien chu i kuomah hung ṭhuoi naw ning ungah,” an ta, an dawn a.
Pilat chun an kuomah, “Nangnîn ṭhuoi unla, in dân angin a thu rêl ro,” a ta. Judahai chun a kuomah, “Keini thu chun tukhawm sukhlum dân a ni nawh,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Pilat chu a inah a lût nâwk a. Isu a ko a, a kuomah, “Judahai lal i ni maw?” a ta.
Isûn “Hihi nanga lungril puoksuoka i hril am a ni, mi dangin an hril che, ka chunga thu hi?” a ta, a dawn a.
Pilatin, “Kei Juda am ka nih? nangma chihai le thiempu lalhaiin ka kuomah an hung ṭhuoi che a ni hi, thil ieng am i thaw hrim leh?” a ta, a dawn a.

Isûn, “Ka ram chu hi khawvêla mi hi a ni nawh; ka ram chu hi khawvêla mi hi ni sienla, ka rawihaiin thâwng an tih, Judahai laia pêka ka um nawna dingin; nisienlakhawm, ka ram chu hitaka mi hi a ni nawh,” a ta, a dawn a.

Chun, Pilatin a kuomah, “Chu lal i ni am a nih?” a ta. Isûn, “Lal ka nizie i hril zing chu. Thutak inhriettir hi ka pieng san le khawvêla ka hung san a nih. Tukhawm thutaka mi taphawt chun ka thu an pawm hlak,” a ta.
Pilatin a kuomah, “Thutak chu ieng am a na?” a ta. Chun, chu thu chu a hril phingleh, Judahai kuomah a va suok nâwk a, an kuomah, “Iengkhawm a suol ka hmu nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, Fekân Ruoiṭheah mi pakhat kân suopêk ding cheuin dân in nei; chuongchun, Judahai lal hi insuopêk lang cheu in nuom am?” a ta.
Chun, anni chu an khêk nâwk a, “Hi mipa hi chu ni naw raw se, Barabba kha ni lem raw se,” an ta. Barabba chu suomhmang a nih.
Chun, chuong lai chun Pilatin Isu a ṭhuoi a, a vuok a.
Chun, sipaihai chun hling lukhum an phier a, an inkhumtir a, puon sen duk an insiltir bawk a,
chun, a kuomah an hung a, “Chibai, Judahai Lal,” an ta, an ben a.
Pilat chu a suok nâwk a, an kuomah, “En ta u, iengkhawm a suol ka hmu nawh ti in hrietna dingin in kuomah ka hung ṭhuoi suok hi,” a ta.
Chun, Isu chu hling lukhum le puon sen duk chu sil pumin a hung suok a. Chun, Pilatin an kuomah, “En ta u, mihriempa hi,” a ta.

Chun, thiempu lalhai le manmihai chun ama an hmu phingleh an khêk a, “Krawsah hemde rawh, krawsah hemde rawh,” an ta. Pilatin an kuomah, “Nangnîn fepui unla, krawsah hemde ro; kei chu ieng khawm a suolna ka hmu si nawh,” a ta.
Judahai chun a kuomah, “Kan dân kawng khat a um, chu dân ang peiin Pathien Naua ân siem leiin, a thi ding a nih,” an ta, an dawn a.
Pilatin chu thu chu a hrietin a ṭi nâwk zuol a;
a inah a lût nâwk a, Isu kuomah, “Khâwtienga mi am I ni a?” a ta. Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a dawn nawh.
Chun, Pilatin a kuomah, “Nangin kei i mi biek naw vei maw? Inthla thei che ka nih, krawsa hemde thei che ka nih ti i hriet naw am a nih?” a ta.
Isûn, “Chungtienga inthawka pêk i ni naw chun, ka chunga hin thaw thei hrim hrim nei naw ti ni; chuleiin, i kuoma mi petu khan suol a phur zuol a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chu chena inthawk chu Pilatin inthla a tum a, nisienlakhawm, Judahai an khêk a, “Hi mipa hi în thla chun Kaisar ruolpa ni naw ti ni, tûkhawm lala insiem taphawt chu Kaisar do an nih,” an ta.
Chun, Pilatin chuong thu chu a hriet phingleh Isu a ṭhuoi suok a, a hming Lungrem, Hebrai ṭawng chun Gabbatha an ta, chu hmuna chun rorêlna ṭhungphaah a ṭhung a.
(Chun, chu ni chu Fekân Ruoiṭhe Inringlâwk ni a nih, nisa inding vêl a nih.) Chun, ama chun Judahai kuomah, “En ta u, in Lal hi,” a ta.

Chun, anni chu an khêk a, “Sukbohmang rawh, sukbohmang rawh, krawsah hemde rawh,” an ta. Pilatin an kuomah, “In lal hi krawsah hemdêng ka ti maw?” a ta. Thiempu Lalhaiin, “Kaisar naw chu lal dang kan nei nawh,” an ta, an dawn a.
Chuongchun, Pilatin krawsa hemde dingin ama chu an kuomah a pêk ta a.
Chuongchun, Isu chu an ṭhuoi ta a. Ama chun mâni ta dinga kraws putin, “Lu ru hmun,” an ti, Hebrai ṭawng chun Golgotha an ti, chu hmun chen chun a va suok a.
Chutaka chun ama chu krawsah an hemde a, mi dang pahni khawm krawsah an hemde bawk a, a sîr tuokah pakhat ve vein, a laiah Isu.
Chun, Pilatin lekha a ziek a, kraws lêr tieng a bel a, “NAZARETH ISU JUDAHAI LAL,” tiin ziek a nih.
Chu lekha chu Judahai tamtakin an tiem a; Isu krawsa an hemdena hmun chu khawpui kâwl a na, Hebrai ṭawng dâm, Latin ṭawng
Chuongchun, Judahai thiempu lalhai chun, Pilat kuomah “ ‘Judahai Lal,’ tiin ziek naw la, ‘Judahai Lal ka nih a tih,’ tiin ziek lem rawh,” an ta.
Pilat chun, “Ka ziek kha ka ziek zo tah,” a ta, a dawn a.

Chun, sipaihaiin Isu chu krawsa an hemde zo chun, a silfênhai an lâk a, phêk liin an siem a, sipaihaiin phêk khatin an chang seng a; a zakuo an lâk bawk a. Zakuo chu ṭhuilo zakuo a na, a rînga inthawka a puma khâwng vawng a nih.
“Ka silfênhai an insem a,
Ka zakuo dingin ṭhum an vâwr a,”
ti a tlungna dingin. Chuong thil chu sipaihaiin an thaw a nih.
Chun, Isu kraws kâwlah a nu le a nu zuorpuinu Mari, Kleopa nuhmei, le Mari Magdalin an ngîr a.
Chun, Isûn a nu le a inchûktir a ihmangai kha a kâwla ngir a hmu a, a nu kuomah, “Nuhmei, en ta, i naupa kha!” a ta.
Chun, inchûktir kuoma khawm chun, “En ta, i nu kha!” a ta. Chun, chu chena inthawk chu, chu inchûktir chun amanu chu a inah a ṭhuoi ta a.
Chutaka chun bêl pakhat uoin thûra sip an intung a, chuongchun sponj pakhat chu uoin thûra inchie sipin husop hmawlah an târ a, a hmûr an hang intlun a.
Chun, Isûn uoin thûr chu a lo dâwn zo chun, “A kin tah,” a ta. A lu a kûn a, a thlarau ân thla ta a.
Chun, Inringlâwk ni a ni leiin, ruonghai chu Châwlnia krawsa a um zing nawna dingin, (chu Châwlni chu ni ropui a ni si a,) Judahaiin Pilat kuomah an kehai suktlieka, an ruong fepui dingin an ngên a.
Chun, sipaihai chu an hung a, a kuoma krawsa an hemde a tawntira mi le mi dang chu an kehai an suktliek a.
Nisienlakhawm, Isu kuomah an hung a, a thi ta zing ti an hriet a, a kehai an suktliek ve naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, sipaihai laia mi pakhatin a nâkah feiin a sun a, chuongchun, thisen le tui a suok nghâl ta a.
A hmutu chun ân hriettir tah (a thu inhriettir chu ân dik a nih, a hril indik ti khawm a hriet,) nangni khawmin in ringna dingin.

Chun, chuong thil thaw zo chun, Josef Arimathai khuoa mi, Isu inchûktir a nih, nisienlakhawm, Judahai a ṭi leiin a rûka um a na, ama chun Isu ruong chu fepui dingin Pilat kuomah a hni a, chun Pilatin a phal a. Chuongchun, a hung a, a ruong chu a fepui ta a.
Chun, Isu ruong chu an lâk a, Judahai inphûm dân angin thil rim inhnikhai le chun puon zai inhmiin an tuom a.
Chun, krawsa an hemdena hmuna chun huon pakhat a um a, huona chun tukhawm lân zâlna ngainaw thlân thar pakhat a um.
Chun, Judahai Inringlâwk ni a ni leiin, thlân chu an kâwl el a ni si a, chutaka chun Isu chu an inzâl ta a.
Chun, ni saria ni hmasatakah, zîngkâr, khuo a lân thim laiin, Mari Magdalin chu thlâna chun a va fe a, lung chu thlâna inthawka lâk sawnin a hmu a.
Chuongchun, a tlân a, Simon Peter le inchûktir dang Isûn a ihmangai kuoma chun a hung a, an kuomah, “Thlâna inthawk khan Lalpa chu an fe hmangpui tah, an siena chin hrim kan hriet nawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Peter chu a suok a, inchûktir dang le chun; chun, thlântieng an pan ta a.
An tlân rêl a, inchûktir dang chun Peter a lekhêl a, thlân chu a tlung hmasa a.
A kûn a, a bi a, puon zai inhmi um chu a hmu a; nisienlakhawm, a sûngah a lût nawh.
Chun, Simon Peter khawmin a hnungah a hung hnawt phâk a, thlân sûngah a lût a; puon zai inhmihai um le
a lua inhrûkna puon um chu, puon zai inhmihai laia um lovin, ziel sain hmun tuma um a hmu a.
Chuongchun, inchûktir dang, thlân tlung hmasapa khawm chu a lût ve a, a hmu a, a awi a.
Mithi laia inthawkin a thonâwk ding a ni ti Pathien Lekha Thu kha an la hriet si naw a.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chu anni inah an fe nâwk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Mari chu tuolah thlân kâwla chun ṭap pumin a ngîr a; chuongchun, ṭap pumin a kûn a, thlân sûng chu a bi a;
chun, vântirko pahni puon vâr silin, Isu ruong inzâlna hmuna chun, pakhat a lu tieng, pakhat a ke tienga ṭhung a hmu a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Nuhmei, iengdinga i ṭap am?” an ta. Ama chun an kuomah, “Ka Lalpa an fehmangpui a, an siena chin ka hriet naw leiin,” a ta.
Chun, chuonga a hril phingleh a hnung tieng a ngha a, Isu ngîr chu a hmu a, Isu a ni ti a hriet si naw a.

Isûn a kuomah, “Nuhmei, iengdinga i ṭap am? Tû am i zawng a?” a ta. Ama chun huon enkawltu amanih a ti a, a kuomah, “Pu, ama hitaka inthawka i fepui a ni chun i siena chin mi hril rawh, chuongchun lâng ka tih,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Mari,” a ti a. Ama chu a ngha a, a kuomah, Hebrai ṭawngin, “Rabboni,” a ta; (chu chu Inchûktirtu tina a nih.)

Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Mi chel naw rawh, tu chen khawmin Pa kuomah ka la hang fe nawh; amiruokchu, ka unauhai kuomah va fe la, an kuomah, ‘Ka pa, in Pa, Ka Pathien, in Pathien kuomah ka lâwn ding a nih,’ a tih, va ti rawh,” a ta.
Mari Magdalin chu a va fe a, închûktirhai kuomah, “Lalpa chu kan hmu tah,” tiin a puong a; chu chu Isu'n a kuoma a lo hril thu khawm a hril a.

Chun, chu ni, ni saria ni hmasatakah, khuo a hung inhnu chun, Judahai ṭi leia inchûktirhai umna kawtkhârhai chu khâr a ni hnungin, Isu anni lai a hung ngîr a, an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se,” a ta.
Chu chu a hril zo chun, a kut le a nâk an kuomah ân entir a. Chun, Lalpa chu an hmu chun inchûktirhai chu an lâwm ta a.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se, Pain kei a mi tir ang bawkin ka tir cheu hi,” a ti nâwk a.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril zoin, an chungah ân thuok a, an kuomah, “Thlarau Inthieng nei ro,
Chun, Isu a hung lai khan, sâwm le pahnihai laia ṭhang ve Thoma (Didum an ti bawk) chu an kuomah a um ve naw a.

Chuongchun, inchûktir danghai chun a kuomah, “Lalpa chu kan hmu tah,” an ta. Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kuomah, “A kuta thîr kilna serhai kha ka hmu a, thîr kilna serhaia chun ka kut pârhai ka khîk lûta, a nâka ka pur meu naw chun, ring naw ning,” a ta.

Chun, ni riet hnungah, a inchûktirhai chu in sûngah an um nâwk a, Thoma khawm an kuomah a um ve a. Chun, Isu a hung a, kawthai chu khâr a ni si a, anni lai a hung ngîr ta a, an kuomah, “In chungah thlamuongna um raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Thoma kuoma chun, “I kut pârin hang them la, ka kuthai en rawh; i kut hang ban la, ka nak pur rawh; ring lovin um naw la, ring el rawh,” a ta.
Thoman a kuomah ,“Ka Lalpa le ka Pathien i nih,” a ta, a dawn a.
Isûn a kuomah, “Nangin kei i mi hmu leiin i ring a ni maw? Hmu lova ring taphawthai chu an hamṭha,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn inchûktirhai hmaah inchikna dang tamtak a thaw a, chuonghai chu hi lekhabua hin ziek a ni nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng hi, Isu chu, Krista, Pathien Naupa a nih ti in ringna ding le, in ring a, a hminga hringna in neina dinga ziek a nih.
Chun chu hnunga chun, Tiberi dîlah Isu a inchûktirhai kuomah ân lâr nâwk a; hieng ang hin ân lâr;
Simon Peter hai, Thoma
Chun, khawfing chatin Isu ṭieuphoah a ngîr a; nisienlakhawm, a închûktirhai chun Isu a nih ti an hriet si nawh.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Nauhai, iengkhat fâk ding in nei am?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Nei lo,” an ta, an dawn a.
Chuongchun, inchûktir Isûn a ihmangai khan Peter kuomah, “Lalpa a ni saw,” a ta. Chuongchun, Lalpa a nih ti Simon Peter chun a hriet phingleh, a silfên ân bel a, (ruoka
Nisienlakhawm, inchûktir danghai chun lawng chîna chun, lên nga puma hnûk pei pum chun an hung pan a, (khawmuola inthawkin a hla si naw a, tawng za hni amani chau a nih).
Chun, khawmuola an suok phingleh, chutaka chun meihawla mei insêm an hmu a, a chunga nga le beiphêk raw leh.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tuhin in nga man kha a ṭhen hung la ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Simon Peter a va chuong a, lên chu nga lien tak taka sipin khawmuolah a hnûk dawk a, za le sâwmnga le pathum a nih; chuong zât zât um sien khawm lên chu ân ek si nawh.
Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Zîngbu hung fa ro,” a ta. Inchûktirhai laia tukhawmin a kuomah, “Tu am i na?” tiin an indawn ngam nawh, Lalpa a nih ti an hriet leiin.
Chun, Isu a hung a, beiphêk chu a lâk a, an kuomah a pêk a, ngahai khawm chu chuong ang bawkin a pêk a.
Chu chu Isu mithi laia inthawka a thonâwk hnunga a închûktirhai kuoma ân lâr a vawi thumna a nih.

Chun, zingbu an fâk zoin, Isûn Simon Peter kuomah, “Simon, Johan naupa, hienghai nêk hin nangin kei i mi hmangai lem am?” a ta. Ama chun a kuomah, “Aw, Lalpa, ka ngaina che ti i hriet,” a ta. Ama chun a kuomah, “Ka berâmtehai châwm rawh,” a ta.

A vawihninaah, a kuomah, “Simon, Johan naupa, nangin kei i mi hmangai am?” a ti nâwk a. Ama chun a kuomah, “Aw, Lalpa, ka ngaina che ti i hriet,” a ti nâwk a. Ama chun a kuomah, “Ka berâmhai enkawl rawh,” a ta.

A vawithumnaa chun, “Simon, Johan naupa, nangin kei i mi ngaina am?” a ta. Chun, a vawithumnaah “Nangin i mi ngaina am,” a kuoma a ti lei chun Peter a lungngai a, a kuomah, “Lalpa, iengkim i hriet a, ka ngaina che ti i hriet,” a ta. Isûn a kuomah, “Ka berâmhai châwm rawh.

Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril che, i naupang lai khan i kâwngah în khit a, i nuomna tieng tieng i fe hlak; nisienlakhawm, i upat pha i kuthai phar i ta, mi dangin khitpêk an ti che a, i nuom nawna tieng kei an ti che,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu ienganga thiin am Pathien a chawimawi ding ti inhriettirna dingin a hril a nih. Chun, chu chu a hril zoin a kuomah, “Mi zui rawh,” a ta.
Peterin ama chu a hmu chun Isu kuomah, “Lalpa hi mipa hin ieng am thâwng a ta?” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “Ka hung nâwk chena um zing dingin dit lang lem chu, chu chu ienga i hmang ding am a na? Nangin mi zui el rawh,” a ta.

Chuongchun, chu inchûktir chu thi naw dingin a thu unauhai lai ân thang ta a. Nisienlakhawm, Isûn thi naw ni ti a kuomah a hril si nawh, “Ka hung nâwk chena um zing dingin dit lang lem chu, chu chu ienga i hmang ding am a na?” a ti el a ni si a.
Chu inchûktir chu hieng thu ziektu le inhriettirtu hi a nih; a thu inhriettir hi indiktak a nih ti ei hriet.
Chun, hieng naw khawm hi Isu thilthaw dang tamtak a la um, chuongchu ziek fai vawng ding ni sien, lekhabu ziek ding po po chu khawvêla khawm hin inlengin ka ring nawh.
Theophil, kha hmaa lekhaa khan, Isu thilthaw le ân chûktir phut lai thu po po kha ka ziek a;
Thlarau Inthieng ṭhangpuia a tirko thlanghai kuoma thu a tiem zoa, vân tienga ṭhuoia a um ni chena thu kha.
Chu tirkohai kuoma chun rinum chu a tuor hnungin inhriettirna tamtakin hringin ân entir a, ni sâwmli zet an kuomah ân lâr a, Pathien ram thu a hril hlak.
Chun, an umkhâwm dâm a pâwl ve a, “Jerusalem fe san naw ro, Pa thutiem ka hril in hriet kha lo nghâk ro,” a ti tlat a.
“Johan khan tuiin a baptis hlak a, nisienlakhawm, ni sâwtnawtêah Thlarau Inthiengin baptisma chang in tih,” a ta.
Chun, anni chun an hung inkhâwmin a kuomah, “Lalpa, tuhin am a ni Israelhai kuoma ram i pêk nâwk ding?” an ta, an indawn a.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Pain a hun le a ni ama thu thua um dinga a ruot chu nangni lo hriet ding a ni naw ie.

Nisienlakhawm, Thlarau Inthieng chu in chungah a hung tlung pha leh thilthawtheina la nei in tih; chuongchun, Jerusalema dâm, Judai le Samari ram khaw tina dâm, kâwlkawdawng chenin ka thu hretuhai nîng in tih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu a hril zoin an hmu zing pumin, vân tienga ṭhuoiin a um a; chun, sûmin an hmu phâk nawah a ṭhuoi hmang ta a.
Chun, a hang fe laia vân tieng an en zing laiin, mi pahni puon vâr silin an kâwlah an hung ngîr a.
Chuonghai chun, “Galili rama mihai, iengdinga vân tieng nghaa in ngir am? Hi Isu in kuoma inthawka vân tienga ṭhuoia um hi, vâna a hang fe in hmu ang bawk hin ama ngei hi hung nâwk a tih,” an ta.
Chun, Oliv tlâng an tia inthawk chun Jerusalemah an kîr nâwk ta a; chu tlâng chu Jerusalem kâwl a nih. Châwlnia lêngna tâwk chau a nih.

Chun, an lûtin an umna pindan chunghnunga chun an hang fe a, Peter le Johan leh, Jakob le Andri leh, Philip le Thoma leh, Bartholomai le Matthai leh, Alphai naupa Jakob leh, Simon Zelot pâwla mi le Jakob naupa Juda leh an nih.
Chuonghai po po chun nuhmei tuhai amani le Isu nu Mari leh, Isu unauhai leh, lungril hmunkhata ṭhahnemngaitaka ṭawngṭaiin an um a.
Chun, chu ni chun unauhai lai Peter a ngîr a, (an rêng chun za le sâwmhni lai an nih),
“Unauhai, Thlarau Inthiengin, David baua, Isu mantuhai ṭhuoitu Juda thu a hrillâwk kha, kha Pathien Lekha Thu kha hung tlung ding a ni hrim a nih.
Ama chu eini laia tiemsa a na, hieng rawngbâwlnaa hin chan khawm a nei ve si a.
(Chun, ama chun a suol manin hmun pakhat ân châwk a, a letlingin a tla a, a laiah a puok kawi a, a rîl po po a ṭê vawng a.
Chun, chuong thu chu Jerusalema umhai po poin an lo hriet a; chuongchun, chu hmun chu anni ṭawngin, ‘Akeldama,’ an ti a, chu chu, ‘Thisen hmun,’ tina a nih.)
Inpâkna Hla Buah hi thu hi ziek a nih:
‘A umna sukramin um raw se
A sûngah tukhawm um naw raw se,’ ti le,
‘A hotu nîna chu mi dangin chang raw se,’ ti hi.
“Chuongchun, Lal Isu eini laia lût le suoka a um hlak sûng po a,
Johan Baptisma chena inthawka ei kuoma inthawka vâna ṭhuoia a um ni chen kha hieng a mi pâwl hlakhai laia mi pakhat, a thonâwkna mi hrietpuitu dingin a um ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, mi pahni an ruot a, pakhat chu Josef Barsabba an ti chu, (a hming dang Justa an ti bawk a). Chun, pakhat chu Matthia a nih.
Chun, an ṭawngṭai a, “Lalpa, Nang mihriem po po lungril hretu, hienghai hi a tu lem am i thlang mîn hriettir la;
Juda chun ama umnaa a fe theina dinga hieng rawngbâwlna le tirko sin a tlâwmsan ai awtu dingin,” an ta.
Chun, ṭhum an vâwr a, an ṭhum vâwr chu Matthia chungah a tla a. Chuongchun, ama chu tirko sâwm le pakhathai lai chun tiemsa a ni ta a.
Chun, kârlovin vâna inthawkin ri thlipui hrâng angin a hung tlung ta phut a. Chu chun an ṭhungna in chu a suksip ta vawng a.
Chun, leihai ama le ama insemin, mei angin an kuomah a hung inlâr ta a.
Chun, an chungah a chuong seng a, an rêngin Thlarau Inthiengin an sip ta vawng a, Thlarauin ân ṭawngtir ang peiin ṭawng danghaiin an hung ṭawng ta a.
Chun, vânkhuphnuoia hnam tin laia mi Pathien ngaisak Judahai Jerusalemah an châm a.
Chun, chu ri chu an hriet phingleh mipui an hung inkhâwm a, mi tinin an ṭawng chu mâni ṭawng sengin an lo hriet leiin an lungrilin an lo buoi a.
Chun, an rêng chun an lunginzîng a, mak an ti hle a; “En ta u, hieng a ṭawnghai po po hi Galili rama mi an ni naw am a nih?
Iengtiziea ei rênga ei piengpui ṭawng anga ei hriet seng am a na?
Ṭhenkhat Parthai hnam dâm, Medai hnam dâm, Elamatai hnam dâm, ei ni si a; Mesopotamia rama um dâm, Judai rama um dâm, Kappadoki rama um dâm, Ponto rama um dâm, Asia rama um dâm,
Phrugia rama um dâm, Pamphulia rama um dâm, Aigupta rama um dâm, Kurini kâwl vêla Libu rama um ei na,

ṭhenkhat Rom khaw mikhuol Judahai le an saphunhai leh ei na, ṭhenkhat Kret thlierkâra mi le Arab rama mi ei ni si a; nisienlakhawm, Pathien thilthaw ropuihai an hril mâni ṭawng sengin ei hriet si hi!” an ta.
Chun, an rêng chun mak an ti hle a, a ngaina an hriet naw a, “Hieng hi a umzie iem a na?” tiin an indawntuo a.
Ṭhenkhatin an nuisan a, “Uoin thar an inrui a ni hi,” an ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Peter chu sâwm le pakhathai leh an ngîr a, ama chun râwl inringtakin, an kuomah a hril a, “Nangni Judai rama mihai, nangni Jerusalema um po pohai, hieng hi hre unla, ka thu khawm lo ngai ro.
Hienghai hi in ring angin an inrui nawh, vairik chau a la ni hi.
Hieng hi zâwlnei Joelin a hril kha a ni lem:
Pathienin, ‘Ni nuhnungahai chun hieng hi nîng a ta,
Mi po po chungah ka Thlarau buok ka ta;
Chuongchun, in naupahai, in naunuhaiin ka thu hril an tih;
In tlangvâlhaiin inlârnahai hmûng an ta,
In tarhaiin mangah mang an ta;
Anih, chuong nia chun ka suokpahai, ka suoknuhai chunga khawm,
Ka Thlarau buok ka ta, ka thu hril an tih,
Chun, chungtieng vânah thilmakhai,
Hnuoi tieng leihnuoiah inchiknahai inhmutir ka tih:
Thisen dâm, mei dâm, meikhu hu dâm,
Nisa inthimin inchang a ta,
Thla thisenin inchang a ta,
Lalpa ni ropuitak le hming inthangtak chu
A hung tlung hma chun;
Chun, hieng hi nîng a ta,
Tûkhawm Lalpa hming lam taphawt chu sandamin um an tih,’ a tih, a ti kha.
“Nangni Israel mihai hieng thu hi lo ngai ro; Nazareth Isu chu, Pathienin nangni lai thilthaw mak dâm, thilmak dâm, inchikna dâm inthawtirin ân hriet chiengtir cheu kha,
‘Ka hmaah kumkhuoin Lalpa chu ka hmu hlak,
Kân hnîng nawna dingin ka changtieng a um a nih;
Chuleiin, ka lungril a hlim a,
Ka lei khawm a lâwm a;
Chuleiin, ka taksa khawm beiseitakin um bawk a tih;
Ka thlarau mithi khuoah mâksan naw ti ni a,
I mi inthieng hmawnhmangna hmu khawm phal naw ti ni a;
Nangin hringna lampuihai i mîn hriettir a,
Nangin i hmêlin lâwmin mi suksip i tih,’ tiin.
“Unauhai, chi thlatu David chanchin hi ṭi lovin in kuomah ka hril cheu a; ama chu a thi a; phûm khawm an phûm tah annâwm, a thlân khawm tu chen hin ei kuomah a la um zing a.
Ama chu zâwlnei a na, Pathienin a ṭhalbea mi tû amanih a ṭhungpha chungah ân ṭhungtir ding a nih ti inkhâmin a hril ti a hriet a.
Chuongchun, chuong chu a lo hriet lâwk zing leiin, Krista thonâwkna ding thu a hril a nih, ‘Mithi khuoah mâksanin a um naw a, a ruong khawmin hmawnna a hmu bawk nawh,’ tiin.
Chu Isu chu Pathienin a keitho nâwk ta hrim a, chu chu kan rêng hin a hretu kan nih.
Pathien kut changtienga chawimawiin a um a, Thlarau Inthieng tiem chu Pa kuoma inthawkin a hmu a, tuta in hmu le in hriet hi a hung buok tah a ni hi.
David chu vânah a hang lâwn naw a nih, ama ngeiin,
‘Lalpa chun ka Lalpa kuomah,
Ka changtieng ṭhung zing rawh,
Ka siem hmakhat chu,’ a ti a, a ti lem a ni kha.
“Chuongchun, Isu in hemde ngei kha, Pathienin Lal le Krista ni fâwmin a siem tah ti, Israel hnam tinin hre mawl raw hai se,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu an hrietin an lungrilah sun ang an lo ni ta a, Peter le tirko danghai kuoma chun, “Unauhai, iengtin am thaw tâng kan ta?” an ti a.
Peter chun an kuomah, “In suolhai ngaidamna dingin, sim unla, Isu Krista hmingin baptisma chang seng ro; chuongchun, Thlarau Inthieng pêk hi hmûng in tih.
A tiem kha, nangni ta ding khawmin, in nauhai ta ding khawmin, hlataka mi po po ta ding khawmin, Lalpa ei Pathienin a kuoma a kohai taphawt ta dingin a ni ie,” a ta.
Chun, thu dang tamtakin a hrilfie a, “Tulai ruolthar rilohaia inthawk hin insukhim ro,” tiin ân fui a.
Chun, a thu zâwm taphawt chun baptisma an chang ta a; chu nia chun mi sâng thum lai belsain an um a.
Chun, tirkohai inchûktirin, inpâwlin, bei khawiin, ṭawngṭaiin ṭhahnemngaitakin an um zing a.
Chun, mi tinin an ṭi ta a; tirkohai chun thilmak le inchikna tamtak an thaw a.
an thil neihai, an thuomhnawhai an zawr a, an mamaw dai tâwk seng chauin an rênga kuoma chun an sem hlak a.
Ni tin lungril hmunkhatin Pathien biekina chun ṭhahnemngaitakin an um hlak a, an in tieng khawm bei an khawi a, hlimtak le lungawitakin bu an fâk hlak a.
Pathien an inpâk a, mi po po lâwmzâwngin an um hlak a. Chun, sandama hung um pei taphawthai chu, Lalpain ni tin an kuomah ân ṭhangsatir pei hlak a.
Chun, Peter le Johan chu chawhnung inher, ṭawngṭai hun lai chun, Pathien biekina lût ding chun an hang fe a.
Chun, patling tu amanih a pieng tira inthawka ke inbai an hung zâwn a, ama chu biekina lûthai kuoma kut daw dingin, biekin kawtkhâr, “Mawi,” an ti bula chun, ni tin an inzâltir hlak a.
Ama chun Peter le Johan Pathien biekina lût ding chu a hmu a, kut a daw a.
Chun, Peter le Johanin ama chu an en zing a. Peterin, “Keini mi hang en ta,” a ta.
Ama chun an kuoma inthawka ieng amanih hmu a beisei a, a hang en a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin, “Tangka le rângkachak iengkhawm ka nei nawh; nisienlakhawm, ka nei sun pêng ka ti che; Nazareth Isu Krista hmingin kein lâwn ta rawh,” a ta.
A kut changtieng a chel a, a keitho ta a. Chun, kârlovin a kehai le a kemit ruhai chu a hung hrât nghâl ta a.
Chun, ama chu ân châwm tho a, a ngîr a, a kein a lâwn ṭan ta a. Kea lâwn lâwn le, inchâwm le, Pathien inpâk pum peiin biekina chun a lût ve ta a.
Chun, keâ lâwn le Pathien ân pâk chu mi po poin an hmu a;
biekin kawtkhâr, Mawi, bula kut dawa ṭhung hlak kha a nih ti an hriet a; a chunga thil tlung chu mak an ti bêk bêk a, an buoi hle el a.
Chun, ama chun Peter le Johan chu a chel zing laiin, mi po poin mak an ti bêk bêk a, Solomon tuolpûk an tia chun, an kuomah an hung tlân khâwm a.

Peterin chu chu a hmu chun, mihai chu a biek a, “Nangni Israel mihai, hieng hi iengdinga mak in ti am a na? Keini thilthawtheina le Pathien kan ngaisak leia ama hi kan inlâwntir ang el chun iengdinga in mi en zing am?
Hringna Siemtu chu in that a; nisienlakhawm, Pathienin ama chu mithi laia inthawkin a keitho nâwk tah; chu chu a hretuhai kan nih.
Chun, ama hming ring leiin, a hming chun hi mipa in hmu le in hriet hlak hi a sukhrât tah a nih; anih, ama leia ringna hung um hin, in rênga mithmuah a sukdam var tah a ni hi.
“Nisienlakhawm, unauhai, in hotuhai khawmin an inmâwl leia an thaw ang khan, in inmâwl leiin hieng hi in thaw a nih ti ka hriet.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathienin zâwlnei po po bauah, Krista chun rinum a tuor ding thu ân hriettir lâwk kha; khâng ang khan ân tlungtir ta lem a nih.
Chuleiin, in suolhai thâibo a ni theina dingin sim unla, ngha kîr nâwk ro,
chuongchun, Lalpa kuoma inthawka har hunhai la hung tlung thei a tih, Krista Isu, in ta dinga a iruot khawm kha hung tir thei a tih.

Amiruokchu, iengkim siem ṭhat hun a tlung hmakhat chu vânin ama chu a la kawl hri ding a nih; chu siem ṭhat ding thu chu Pathienin leihnuoi insieng tira inthawk a zâwlnei inthieng umhai bauin a hril ta kha.
Chun, mi tûkhawm, chu zâwlnei thu chu ngai naw taphawt chu, mi laia inthawk sukbohmang dai nîng an tih,” a ti kha.
Anih, Samuel um chena inthawk zâwlnei po po, an hnunga mihai leh, thu hril taphawt hai khan, tulai chanchin hi an hril lâwk bawk hlak.
Pathienin a Siehlaw chu a ruot a, in suolhai innghatsantir seng cheua mal sâwmpêk ding cheuin, nangni kuomah a hung tir hmasa tak a ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, Peter le Johanin mihai kuomah thu an hril leiin, thiempuhai, biekin hotuhai, Saddukaihai chu an kuom an hung tlung thut a.
Mi an inchûktir le Isu leiin mithi laia inthawka thonâwk thu an hril leiin an lungninaw bêk bêk a.
Chun, an man a, zântieng a ni leiin a zîng chena dingin intângna inah an khum ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, thu ngaihai laia tamtakin an awi a; an tam tieng chu patling ruok khawm sâng nga lai an tling a.
Chun, a zînga chun an hotuhai, upahai, Dân inchûktirtuhai, Jerusalemah an um khâwm a,
Thiempu Laltak Anna hai, Kaiapha hai, Johan hai, Alexandra hai, Thiempu Laltak chihai po po le chun.
Chun, Peter le Johan chu a laiah an inngîrtir a, “Ieng thuneinain am, tu hmingin am hieng hi in thaw a?” an ta, an indawn a.
Chuongchun, Peter chu Thlarau Inthiengin a sip a, an kuomah, “Mi po po hotuhai, upahai,
mi hrâtnaw sukṭhat thuah, ‘Hi mipa hi ieng leiin am a hung dam ta a?’ tiin vawisûn hin in mi fie a ni chun,

nangni po poin hre ro, Israel mi po khawmin hre raw hai se, Nazareth Isu Krista krawsa in hemde Pathienin mithi laia inthawka a ikeitho nâwk kha, ama hming ngeiin hi mipa hi hitaka hin in hmaah damin a ngîr tah a ni hi.
Mi dang tu kuoma khawm sandamna a um nawh; vânkhuphnuoia mihriem isak lai, a mi sandam ding hming dang hrim a um nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Peter le Johan huoizie chu an hmu chun lekha thiemnaw le mi narân el an nih ti an hrietin, mak an ti hle a; Isu kuomah an um tah ti an hriet ta a.
Chun, mi an sukdam chu an kâwla ngîr an hmu a, iengkhawm an sawisêl thei si nawh.
Chuongchun, an rorêlnaa inthawka an infetir hnungin an inrawn a,
“Hieng mihai hi iengtin am thâwng ei ta? Thilmak inthangtak an thaw ti Jerusalema um po poin an hriet ta hi; eini khawmin ei sêl thei si naw a.
Nisienlakhawm, mi kuoma ân dar nâwk zuol nawna dingin, tuta inthawk tû kuoma khawm hi hminga thu an hril nawna dingin vau ei tiu,” an ta.
Chuongchun, anni chu an ko a, Isu hminga thu hril dêr lo ding an ti tlat a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peter le Johanin an kuomah, “Pathien mithmuin, Pathien thu zâwm nêkin nangni thu zâwm ân dik lem am chu, ngaituo ro.
Keini chu thil kan hmu le kan hriethai kha hril lovin kan um thei nawh,” an ta.
Chun, anni chun an vau nâwk zuol a, an insuo ta a. Mipui leiin hremna remchâng an hmu nawh; an thilthaw lei khan mi po poin Pathien an chawimawi si a.
Thilmaka an isukdam chu kum sâwmli nêk hmana tam lem a ni si a.
Chun, Peter le Johan chu an suok chun anni pâwlhai lai an va fe a; thiempu lalhai le upahaiin an kuoma an hril po chu an hril vawng a.
‘Jentailhai iengdinga an lunginsen am?
Hnam tinin iengdinga thil teplo an ngaituo am a na?
Khawvêl lalhaiin an ep huoi huoi a,
Hotuhai khawm an pung khâwm a,
Lalpa le a Krista chunga chun,’ tiin.
i kut le i lungrilin tlung dinga i ruot lâwk taphawthai kha thaw dingin.
Chuongchun, tuhin Lalpa, an mi vauzie hi ngai ta; i suokhai hi huoitakin i thu inhriltir la,
mihai sukdam dingin i kut phar bawk rawh; i siehlaw inthieng Isu hmingin inchikna le thilmakhai inthawtir bawk rawh,” an ta.
Chun, an ṭawngṭai zo chun an umna in chu a hung inhnîng a, an rêngin Thlarau Inthiengin an hung sip a, huoitakin Pathien thu an hril ta a.
Chun, tirkohai chun awiumtakin Lal Isu thonâwk thu an inhriettir hlak a, an rênga chungah lunginsietna nasatak a um a.
Chun, anni lai khawm tlasam tukhawm an um nawh, hnuoihai, inhai nei taphawtin an zawr a, an thil zawrhai chu a man an hung chawi a,
tirkohai ke bulah an sie hlak a; an mamaw dai tâwk sengin an sem seng hlak a.
Chun, Josef, tirkohaiin Barnaba an ti chu, (chu hming umzie chu “Thlamuongna nau,” tina a nih), Levi chi, Kupra thlierkâra mi a na,
a lo nei chu zawrin a man a hung chawi a, tirkohai ke bulah a sie ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, mi pakhat a hming Anania a nuhmei Saphira leh an um a, Anania chun hnuoi a zawr a, a nuhmei hrietin a man a ṭhen a ip ta a.
Chun, a ṭhen a hung chawi a, tirkohai ke bula chun a sie a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin, “Anania, Thlarau Inthieng hlêm ding le, hnuoi man a ṭhen ip dingin iengdinga Setanin i lungril a suksip am a na?

A um sûng po khan i ta a ni zing a ni naw am a nih? I zawr hnung khawm khan a man chu i thu thua um a ni naw am a nih? Iengdinga hieng thu hi i lungrila i ngaituo am a na? Mihriem hlêm i ni naw a, Pathien kuoma khêl hril i ni lem,” a ta.
Chun, Anania chun chuong thu chu a hriet phingleh a tlu a, a thi ta a; chun, a hre taphawt chun an ṭi ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, tlangvâlhai chu an tho a, an tuom a, an zâwn suok a, an phûm ta a.
Chun, dârkar thum lai hnunga chun, a nuhmei chu thil umzie chu hre lovin a hung lût a.
Chun, Peterin a kuomah, “Mi hril rawh, Hnuoi chu hieng zât char hin maw in zawr?” a ta. Ama chun, “Uou, hieng zât char hin a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Peterin a kuomah, “Iengdinga Lalpa Thlarau infiena dinga in inthuruol am? Ngai ta, i pasal phûmtuhai kepha chu kawtkhâr bulah a hung um tah, nang khawm zâwn dawk an ti che,” a ta.
Chun, kârlovin a ke bula chun a tlu nghâl ta a, a thi ve ta a; chun, tlangvâlhai chu an hung lût a, ama chu a thisain an hung hmu a, an zâwn dawk a, a pasal kâwla chun an phûm ta a.
Chun, kohranhai po po le chuong thu hre taphawt chun an ṭi ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, mi lai Pathienin tirkohai kutin inchikna le thilmak tamtak a thaw hlak a. Annirawi chu an rêngin lungril hmunkhatin Solomon Tuolpûka chun an inkhâwm hlak a.
Mi dang ruok chu tukhawm anni lai an ṭhang ve ngam ta nawh; nisienlakhawm, anni chu miin an inpâk hlak a.
Chun, a ring tharhai nuhmei le pasal tamtakin Lalpa kuoma chun an hung belsa nâwk zuol hlak a.
Chuongchun, mi damnawhai khawm kawtthlêrhaiah an zâwn dawk a, khumahai, puonphaahai an inzâltir a, “Peter fe malamin a hlimin a ṭhen bêk a hlie theina dingin,” an ta.
Chun, Jerusalem kâwl vêl khuoa inthawkin mipuihai khawm chu damnawhai, khawhri inthiengnaw isawisakhai hung ṭhuoiin an hung khâwm a; chuonghai khawm chu an hung dam ta seng a.
Chun, thiempu Laltak le a ruolhai po po an hung inthawk a, (chuong a ruolhai chu Saddukai pâwl an nih,) an îtthîk bêk bêk a,
tirkohai chu an man a, vântlâng intângna inah an khum ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Lalpa vântirko pakhatin, kawtkhârhai chu a hung hawng a, a ṭhuoi suok ta a,
“Pathien biekinah va ngîr unla, mi kuomah hieng hringna thu po po hi va hril ro,” a ta.

Chun, chu thu chu an hrietin khawvar hun vêla chun Pathien biekinah an va lût a, an inchûktir a. Nisienlakhawm, Thiempu Laltak le a ruolhai chu an hung a, rorêltuhai le Israel thlahai upahai po po an ko khâwm a, tirkohai chu hung inṭhuoitir dingin intângna ina chun mi an tir a.
Nisienlakhawm, manmihai chu an va tlung chun intângna ina chun anni chu an hmu si nawh; chuongchun, an kîr nâwk a,
“Intângna in chu himtaka inkhârin, a vêngtuhai khawm kawtkhâr bula ngîrin kan hmu si a; nisienlakhawm, kan hei hawng a, a sûngah tukhawm kan hmu si nawh,” tiin an hril a.
Chun, Pathien biekin hotu le thiempu lalhaiin chuong thu chu an hrietin, “Hi thil hi iengtin takin am fe pei a ti aw?” tiin an thua chun an lunginzîng ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, mi pakhat a hung a, an kuomah, “Ngai ta u, intângna ina mi inkhumhai khan Pathien biekinah ngîrin mi an inchûktir kha ti!” tiin an hung hril a.
Chuongchun, hotu chu manmihai le chun an va fe a, vântlâng an ṭi leiin tlangtakin an hung ṭhuoi a, chuong naw chun lunga dêng an ṭi a.
Chun, an hung ṭhuoi tlung chun rorêltuhai hmaa chun an inngîrtir a. Chun, Thiempu Laltak chun an kuomah,
Nisienlakhawm, Peter le tirkohai chun, “Mihriem thu nêkin Pathien thu kan zâwm lem ding a nih.
Nangnîn Isu thinga khaikângin in sukhlum kha, ei thlatuhai Pathienin a keitho nâwk tah a nih.
Ama ngei kha Pathienin Lal le Sandamtua um dingin a changtieng a chawimawi tah, Israelhai suol insimtir ding le ngaidam dingin.
Chuong thu chu, a hretuhai kan ni hi, Thlarau Inthieng, Pathienin a thu zâwm taphawthai kuoma a pêk kha, a hretu a ni ve bawk a,” an ta, an dawn a.
Chun, anni chun chuong thu chu an hrietin an lungril a khei ta a, sukhlum an tum ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, rorêltuhai lai chun, a hming Gamaliel, Pharisai, Dân hretu, mi po po laia hminginthangtak, mi pakhat chu a ngîr a, chuhai chu insuoktir phawt dingin thu a pêk a.
Chun, rorêltuhai kuoma chun, “Nangni Israel mihai, hihai chunga in thil thaw tum hi fîmkhur ro.

Tuta hma khawm khan, Theoda, ‘Mi lien ka nih,’ tiin a hung um a, chu mipa kuoma chun mi tamtak, za li lai an lo kawp a. Ama chu sukhlumin a um ta a; a thu zâwm taphawt chu an rêngin an indar ta vawng a, iengkhawm an ni ta nawh.

Chu mipa um hnung chun, hming ziek lai khan Galili rama mi Juda kha a hung um nâwk a, a kuomah mi ṭhenkhat a hîp nâwk a, nisienlakhawm, ama chu a thi ta a, a thu zâwm taphawt chu an rêngin an indar ta vawng a.
Chuleiin, tuhin ka ti cheu hi, hieng mihai hi tâwk naw unla, um el raw hai se; hieng an thil thaw tum le an thilthaw hi mihriem ithaw suok el a ni chun bohmang a tih;
amiruokchu, Pathien ithaw suok a ni chun anni sukbohmang thei naw ti niu; chuong naw chun, Pathien do ni hlau rawi in tih,” a ta. Chun, a hril chu rem an ti ta a.
Chuongchun, tirkohai chu an ko a, an vuok a, chu zo chun Isu hminga thu hril lo ding ti tlatin an insuo ta a.
Chuongchun, rorêltuhai laia inthawk chun an suok a, chu hming leia muolphona tuor tlâka ruot an ni leiin an lâwm hle a.
Chun, ni tin Pathien biekina le anni inahai, “Isu chu Krista a nih,” tiin inchûktir le hril an ma nawh.

Chun, chuong laia inchûktirhai an hung pung pei lai chun, an ni tin thil sema chun an hmeithaihai an ngaisak naw leiin Juda, Grik ṭawng hmanghai chu Juda, Hebrai ṭawng hmanghai chungah an lo chier ta a.
Chun, sâwm le pahnihai chun inchûktir mipuihai chu an ko a, “Pathien thu hril bân sanin, dawkânahai rawng kan bâwl chun ṭha naw nih.
Chuongchun, unauhai, nangni laia varna le Thlaraua sip mi hming ṭha ruok pasari thlang ro; anni chu hieng thil rêltu ding hin siem ei tih.
Keini ruok chu ṭawngṭai le thu rawngbâwlin um tlat kan tih,” an ta.
Chuong thu chun mipui po po chu a suklâwm a; chuongchun, Stephan, ringna le Thlarau Inthienga sip le, Philip, Prokor, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena le Nikol Judahai saphun Antiokei mi leh an thlang a.
Chuhai chu tirkohai hmaa chun an inngîrtir a, chun, anni chu an ṭawngṭai a, an chungah an kut an innghat a.
Chun, Pathien thu chu a hung indar a; Jerusalema inchûktirhai an pung ta bêk bêk a; thiempu laia khawm mi tamtak chu ringna awi mi an ni ta a.
Chun, Stephan chu zaidamna le thilthawtheinain a sip a, mi lai thilmak le inchikna ropuitak a thaw hlak a.

Nisienlakhawm, Sal suokhai, Kurinia mi dâm, Alexandra khuoa mi dâm, inkhâwmna an tia mi ṭhenkhat leh, Kiliki rama mi dâm, Asia ram mi inkhâwmna ina mi ṭhenkhathai an hung inthawk a, Stephan chu an hung sêl a.
Nisienlakhawm, a varna le a hrilpuitu Thlarau chu an letthlâk thei naw a.
