Chun, mihai an tham a; chuhai chun, “Mosie le Pathien a hrilsiet kan hriet,” an ta.
Chun, mihai, upahai, Dân inchûktirtuhai, an infui a, Stephan an thaw a, an man a, rorêltuhai kuomah an ṭhuoi a.
Chun, hretu tehlêmhai an siem a, chuhai chun, “Hi mipa hin In Inthieng le Dân hi a hrilsiet rawp hlak a;
hi Nazareth Isu hin hi In hi ṭhiek a ta, Mosiein dân a mi pêkhai kha sukdanglam a tih tiin a hril kan hriet,” an ta.
Chun, rorêltuhai ṭhung po po chun Stephan an en zing a, a hmêl chu vântirko hmêl angin an hmu a.
Chun, Thiempu Laltak chun, “Hieng thu hi ân dik am?” a ta.
Chun, Stephan chun, “Unauhai, pahai ngai ta u, ei thlatu Abraham Harana a um hmaa, Mesopotamia rama a um lai khan Ropuina Pathien chu a kuomah a hung inlâr a,
Chun, hitaka hin chu iengkhawm hmun hluo ding, a ke innghatna khawp khawm a pêk naw a; nisienlakhawm, ama le a hnunga a thlahai chena ro dingin pêk a tiem a, nau a la nei hma ngei khawmin.
Chun, Pathienin, ‘Suoka neitu ding hnam chu keiin la ngaituong ka tih, chun, chu zoa chun hung suok an ta, hi hmuna hin ka rawng la bâwl an tih,’ a ti bawk a.

A rinum tuor po poah a san suok pei a, Aigupta ram lal Pharao khawm ân lunginsiettir a, mi vartak a ni ti ân hriettir bawk a. Chuongchun, ama chun Aigupta ram le a ina mi po po chungah hotuin a siem ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Jakob chun Aiguptaah bu a um ti a hriet phingleh ei thlatuhai chu a tir suok a; chu chu an fe phutna tak a nih.
Chuongchun, Jakob chu Aigupta ramah a zu fe a, chutaka chun ama le ei thlatuhai chu an thi ta a,
Josef hre naw lal dang a hung um chen khan.
Ama chun ei chihai chu a zaihlêm a, a suknawmna a, an nautêhai dam lo dingin ân pei suoktir hlak.
Chun, an pei suok chun Pharao naunu chun a lâk a, ama nau dingin a châwm ta a.
“Chun, Mosie chu Aigupta mihai varna po po an inchûktir a, a thu le a thilthawah a ropui bêk bêk a.
Chun, anni laia mi pakhat sukrinum tuor lai a hmu a, a san a, suknawmnatna tuortu phuba chu a lâk a, Aigupta mi chu a sukhlum ta a.
Mosie chun ama kutin Pathienin anni a sanhim ding ti a unauhaiin an hriet amanih a ta, nisienlakhawm, an hriet si nawh.
Chun, a zîngah anni laia mi pahni an insuol laiin an kuom a hung tlung a, ‘Puhai, unau in nih annâwm; iengdinga indiknawtakin in inthaw am?’ tiin anni rem a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, a ruolpa chunga a kawmawpa lem chun Mosie a nampei a, ‘Kan chungah rorêltu le hotuin tuin am a siem che a?
Zânita Aigupta mi i sukhlum ang khan, mi sukhlum i tum a ni maw?’ a ta.
Chun, chu thu lei chun Mosie a tlân hmang a, Median ramah a thang zing a, chutaka chun naupasal pahni a nei a..
Chun, Mosiein a hmu chun, a thil hmu chu mak a ti hle a; chun, en dinga a va hnai laiin, Lalpa rawlin,
‘Kei i thlatuhai Pathien ka nih, Abraham Pathien, Isak Pathien, Jakob Pathien chu,’ a lo ti a. Chuongchun, Mosie chu ân thin a, a en ngam ta naw a.
Chun, Lalpa chun a kuomah, ‘I kephaa inthawkin i kekawk kha sût rawh, i ngîrna hmun kha hnuoi inthieng a nih.
Aiguptaa ka mi umhai chu an rimsikzie ka hmu zing a, anni sanhim dingin ka hung ṭum a nih. Hung ta, Aiguptaah tir ka ti che,’ a ta.
“Chu Mosie, ‘Hotu le rorêltu dingin tuin am a siem che a?’ tia an sêl chu, chîmbuka vântirko a kuoma inlâr khan a ṭhangpui a, Pathienin ama ngei chu hotu le sanhimtu ni fâwm dingin a tir a nih.
Ei thlatuhai chun a thu an zâwm nuom naw a, an sêl a, an lungrilhai chu Aigupta ram tieng a lêt nâwk ta a.
Chun, chuonglai chun sebâwngte lim an siem a, a lim chu ran thatin an biek a, anni kutsuok chunga chun an hlim ta a.
Chuongchun, Pathienin a nghat san a, vâna arasihai chibai an bûk theina dingin anni a ensan ta a; Zâwlnei Lekhabua,
‘Israel chihai, thlalêra khan kum sâwmli sûngin,
Sa that le ran thatin kei in mi biek am a nih?
Chibai bûk dingin a lim in siemhai kha,
In zâwm lem hlak a;
Chuleiin, Babulon khaw khêl tieng
Ṭhuoi hmang ka ti cheu,’ ti ziek ang khan.
Nisienlakhawm, Achunghnungtak chu kuta bâwl inhaia a um ngai nawh; zâwlnei chun:-
Lalpain, ‘Vân ka ṭhungpha a na,
Hnuoi ka kepha innghatna a nih;
In ieng angin am mi bâwlpêk in ta?
Ka châwlna hmun khawm ieng am a na?
“Mi kâwmawhai, lungril le naa sertanlohai, in thlatuhaiin an thaw hlak ang khan, Thlarau Inthieng chu in dodâl kumkhuo a nih.
In thlatuhaiin zâwlnei lai an suknawmnat naw tu am an um a? Mi feltak hung ding thu hril lâwktuhai kha an sukhlum a; tuhin nangni ama inmantirtu le sukhlumtuhai in hung ni tah.
Vântirkohai ipêk sâwng Dân kha hmu zeta zâwm si lohai,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu an hrietin an lungril a khei ta a, Stephan chunga chun an ha an râwt a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu Thlarau Inthienga sip a na, vân tieng a en tlat a, Pathien ropuizie le Pathien changtienga Isu ngir a hmu a,
“Ngai ta u, vân inhawnghai ka hmu a, Pathien changtienga Mihriem Naupa ngîr khawm ka hmu,” a ta.
Chun, anni chu rawl inringtakin an khêk a, an na an hip a, inthuruolin an thaw a.
Khuoa inthawk chu an hnawtsuok a, lungin an dêng a. A hretuhai chun tlangvâl pakhat a hming Saula ke bula chun an puonhai an sie tâwl a.
Chuongchun, Stephanin, “Lal Isu, ka thlarau la rawh,” tia Lalpa a ko laiin lungin an dêng mur mur a.

Chun, a dingṭhaṭhuon a, rawl inringtakin a khêk a, “Lalpa, hi an thil suksuol hi an chungah maw inphurtir naw rawh,” a ta. Chu thu chu a hril zo phingleh a ininnghil ta a. Saula khawm chun a thi chu a remti a.
Chu ni chun, kohran Jerusalema umhai chu mîn nasatakin an suknawmna ṭan ta a; chuongchun, tirkohai bak naw chu Judai le Samari ram khaw tinah an indar ta vawng a.
Chun, Pathien ngaisak tuhaiin amanih Stephan chu an phûm a, nasatakin an ṭap a.
Saula ruok chun kohranhai chu a suknawmna bêk bêk a, in tinah a lût a, a nuhmei a pasalin a hnûk dawk a, intângna inah a khum hlak a.
Chun, ân darhai chu khaw tinah an fe a, thu chu an hril pei a.
Chun, Philip chu Samari khuoah a zu fe a, an kuomah Krista thu a khêk pui a.
Mipuihaiin a thu an hriet a, a thilmak thawhai an hmu chun Philip thu hril chu lungril hmunkhatin an ngaisak a,
khawhri inthiengnawhai chu mi tamtak an imanhai sûnga inthawkin rawl inringtaka khêka an suok leiin le, zeng le keinbai tamtak khawm an hung dam ta leiin.
Chun, chu khuoa chun nasatakin an lâwm ta a.
Chun, a hming Simon, mi pakhat a um a; ama chun, chu khuoa chun dawi hmangin Samari khuoa mihai maktitakin a lo siem ta hlak a.
Mi po po chun mi setaka inthawka ân laltak chenin, “Hi mipa hi Pathien thilthawtheina, ‘Ropui,’ an ti kha a ni hi,” tiin a thu an ngaisak tâwl hlak.
A dâwi hmangin sâwttak mak titaka a siem hlak leiin a thu an ngaisak a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun Pathien ram chanchin ṭha le Isu Krista hming Chanchin Ṭha Philip hril chu an âwi phingleh, a nuhmei a pasalin baptisma an chang ta a.
Chun, Simon rau khawmin a âwi ve ta a, chun baptisma a chang zo chun, Philip kuomah a um zing a. Inchikna le thilmak nasatak thawa umhai chu a hmu ve a, mak a ti hle hlak a.
Chun, tirko Jerusalema umhai khan Samari khuoa mihaiin Pathien thu an awi ti an hrietin, an kuomah Peter le Johan chu an tir a.
Anni chu an zuk tlung chun Thlarau Inthieng an hmu theina dingin an ṭawngṭaipêk a.
Chu hma chun anni laia tu chunga khawm a la tlung nawh; Lal Isu hmingin baptisma an chang chau a la nih.
Chun, an chungah an kut an innghat a, Thlarau Inthieng an hmu ta a.
Chun, tirkohai kut innghat leia Thlarau Inthieng pêk a nih ti Simonin a hmu a,
“Hi thuneina hi mi pe ve ro, tû chunga khawm kut kân nghatna taphawtin Thlarau Inthieng an hmu vena dingin,” tiin an kuomah tangka pêk a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin a kuomah, “I tangka hi nanga ruolin bohmang raw se, Pathien thilpêk tangka suma inchâwk i tum leiin.
Hieng thua hin i ṭhang ve nawh, chan khawm i nei bawk nawh; i lungril Pathien ngaiin a fel nawh.
Chuleiin, i suol hi sim la, Lalpa kuomah ṭawngṭai rawh, chuongchun, i lungrila i ngaituo hi a ngaidam thei khiet che rawi mawh.
Thil khâkna mîta le, suol khuop thlûkna hmunah i um ti ka hriet a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Simonin, “In thil hril hi ka chunga iengkhawm a tlung nawna dingin nangnîn Lalpa kuomah mi ṭawngṭaipêk ro,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuongchun, anni chun Lalpa thu chu an inhriettira an hril zoin, Jerusalemah an fe nâwk ta a; Samari rama mihai khaw tamtak kuomah Chanchin Ṭha chu an hril pei a.
Chun, Lalpa vântirko pakhatin Philip chu a biek a, “Tho la, sim tienga Jerusalema inthawka Gaza zuk sun lampuia khan fe rawh, chu lampui chu thlalêra fe thleng a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a tho a, a fe ta a. Chun, ngai ta, Ethiopia rama mi pakhat, Ethiopia lalnu Kandaki hnuoia mitillâk inlaltak, a ro po po enkawltu, Jerusalemah Pathien be dingin a hang fe a.
A hung tieng chun a tawlailîra ṭhung pumin zâwlnei Isai lekhabu a tiem pei a.
Chun, Thlarau chun Philip kuomah, “Saw tawlailîr saw va hnai la, va pâwl rawh,” a ta.
Chun, Philip chu mitillâk kuoma chun a va tlân a, zâwlnei Isai lekhabu a tiem a hriet a, “I tiem kha a umzie i hriet am?” a ta.
Ama chun, “Tukhawmin an mi hrilfie naw chun, iengtin am hre thei ka ta?” a ta. Chun, a kuoma hung ṭhung dingin Philip chu a fiel ta a.
Pathien Lekha a tiem lai chu hi hi a nih:-
“That dingin berâm angin ama chu an ṭhuoi a;
Berâmtê a hmul vâwtu hmaa a to zing angin,
Ama khawmin a bau a ka nawh;
A thlahai chanchin tuin am hril tâng an ta?
Khawvêla inthawkin a hringna an lâkpêk ta si a,” ti hi.
Chun, mitillâk chun Philip a biek a, a kuomah, “Zâwlneiin hieng thu hi tû thu am a na a hril, ama thu am a ni, mi dang thu? kân dawn che,” a ta.
Philip chun a hril a, chu Pathien Lekha Thu chu a bulah a ṭan a, a kuomah Isu thu a hril a.
Chun, lampuia an fe malamin tui umna an tlung a; chun, mitillâk chun, “En ta, hitaka hi tui a um, baptisma chang dingin iengin am a mi hluo a?” a ta.
[Chun, Philip chun, “I lungril po poa i ring chun, i chang thei,” a ta. Ama chun, “Isu Krista chu Pathien Naupa a ni ka ring,” a ta, a dawn a].
Chun, tawlailîr chu ân ngîrtir a, an pahni chun, Philip le mitillâk chu tuia chun an zu fe a; chun, Philip chun ama chu a baptis ta a.
Tuia inthawk chu an hang suok phingleh, Lalpa Thlarau chun Philip chu a lâk hmang ta a; mitillâk chun ama chu a hmu nâwk ta naw a, nisienlakhawm, hlimtakin a fe ta pei a.
Philip chu miin Azota khuoah an hmu nâwk ta a; chun, a fe thleng a, Kaisari khuo a tlung hmakhat chun, khaw tinah Chanchin Ṭha chu a hril pei a.
Saula ruok chun, Lalpa inchûktirhai a vau thu le that a tum thu chu a la sâksuok ta rawp a.

Thiempu Laltak kuomah a fe a, Damaskaa inkhâwmna in po poa mihai kuoma pêk dingin lekha a hni a, chu Lama mi chu tukhawm a hmu chun, nuhmei khawm, pasal khawm, Jerusalema khuop puma hung ṭhuoi theina dingin.
Chun, a fe laiin, Damaska a tlung tâwmin, kârlovin var vâna inthawkin a vêlah a hung var phut a.
Chun, hnuoiah a tlu a, a kuomah, “Saula, Saula, nangin iengdinga i mi suknawmna am a na?” tiin rawl a hriet a.
Chun, ama chun, “Tû am i na, Lalpa?” a ta.
Lalpa chun, “Isu i suknawmnat hi ka nih; nisienlakhawm, tho la, khuoah lût rawh, chuongchun, i thaw ding lo hril an ti che,” a ta.
Chun, ama le fehai chu hril ding hre lovin an ngir a, rawl chu an hriet a chu tukhawm an hmu si nawh.
Chun, Saula chu hnuoia inthawk chun a tho a; chun, a hang meng a, iengkhawm a hmu thei ta naw a; chuongchun, a kutah an kei a, Damaskaa chun an ṭhuoi lût a.
Ni thum khaw hmu lovin a um a, iengkhawm a fâkin a dâwn naw a.
Chun, Damaskaa chun inchûktir pakhat a hming Anania a um a. Lalpa chun a mang angin a kuomah, “Anania,” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “Lalpa, en ta, hitaka hin ka um,” a ta.
Lalpa chun a kuomah, “Tho la, kawtthlêr, ‘Tlûn’ an tia chun fe la, Juda inah, Tarsa khuoa mi, a hming Saula indawn suok rawh; ngai ta, a ṭawngṭai zing a nih,
a hming Anania mi pakhat lûta, a mit sukvar dingin a chunga kut innghatin a hmu tah,” a ta.
Chun, Anania chun, “Lalpa, chu mipa chu Jerusalema i mi inthienghai chunga a suksuol tamzie thu mi tamtak baua inthawkin ka hriet a nih.
Hitaka khawm i hming lam taphawt chu khuop dingin thiempu lalhaia inthawkin thu a hmu zing annâwm,” a ta, a dawn a.
Nisienlakhawm, Lalpa chun a kuomah, “Fe el rawh, Jentailhai, lalhai, Israel mipuihai kuoma ka hming put lûtna dinga ka bêl ruot a nih.
Ka hming leiin rinum ieng anga nasa am a tuor ding a kuomah lân hriettir ka tih,” a ta.

Chun, Anania chu a va fe a, ina chun a lût a; a chungah kut ân nghat a, “Unau Saula, i mit varna ding le Thlarau Inthienga sipa i um theina dingin, Lalpa, i hungna lampuia i kuoma inlâr Isu khan a mi hung tir a nih,” a ta.
Chun, kârlovin a mita inthawk chun phuhlip ang ieng amanih a tla nghâl ta a, a mit a var nâwk ta a; chun, a tho a, baptisma a chang ta a.
Chun, bu a fâk a, a har nâwk ta a. Chun, Damaskaa inchûktir umhai kuoma chun ni iengzat amanih a um a.
Inkhâwmna inhaia chun Isu chu Pathien Naupa a nizie thu a khêkpui nghâl ta a.

Chun, a thu hretuhai po po chun mak an ti hle a; “Hi mipa hi Jerusalema hi hming lamtuhai suknawmna hlaktu kha a ni naw am a nih? Chuong mihai chu thiempu lalhai kuoma khuop puma ṭhuoi, a hung san a ni kha,” an ta.
Saula ruok chu a hung hrât nâwk zuol a, ama chu Krista a ni takzet ti a hrilfie a, Damaskaa Juda umhai chu a sêldawng rawp hlak a.
nisienlakhawm, ama chun an thurawt chu a lo hriet ta a. Sukhlum dingin kul kawtkhâr tina chun a sûn a zânin an inchân hlak a.
Nisienlakhawm, a închûktirhaiin ama chu an ṭhuoi a, zânah kul tukverah bâwmin an thlâk thla ta a.
Chun, Saula chun Jerusalem a tlung phingleh inchûktirhai chu pâwl a tum a; anni ruok chun an rêngin ama chu an ṭi a, inchûktir a ni ve ti an ring naw a.
Barnaba ruok chun ama chu a ṭhuoi a, tirkohai kuoma chun a hungpui a, lampuia Lalpa a hmua a biekzie dâm, Damaskaa Isu hminga huoitaka a thu a hrilzie dâm khawm chu an kuomah a hril ta a.
Chuongchun, Saula chu Jerusalema chun an kuoma lûtin a suok hlak a, Lalpa hmingin huoitakin thu a hril hlak a.
Chun, Grik ṭawng hmang Judahai lai thu a hril a, a sêl a; anni ruok chun ama chu sukhlum an tum a.
Chun, unauhai chun chu chu an hrietin, Kaisari khuoah an ṭhuoi thlâk a, Tarsa khuoah an tir ta dai a.

Chuongchun, kohranhai chu Judai ram vêla dâm, Galili ram vêla dâm, Samari ram vêla dâm chun an det deu deu a, muongtakin an um ta a; chun, Lalpa ṭi dêkin, Thlarau Inthieng ithlamuongin an um a, an hung pung ta deu deu a.
Chun, Peterin khawvêl a fang malamin, Ludda khuoa mi inthieng umhai kuomah a zu fe bawk a.
Chutaka chun mi pakhat, a hming Ainia a zeng leia kum riet khuma zâl zing a hmu a.
Chun, Peter chun a kuomah, “Ainia, Isu Krista chun a sukdam che; tho la i puonpha ziel rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a tho nghâl ta a.
Chun, Ludda khuo le Saron phaia um po pohai chun Ainia chu an hmu a, Lalpa tieng an ngha tâwl ta a.
Chun, Joppa khuoah a hming Tabitha, inchûktir pakhat a um a, (Tabitha umzie chu Dorka a nih); chu nuhmei chun thil thawṭhat le thilpêk a hau hle a.
Chun, chuong lai chun a damnaw a, a thi ta a; chun an insil fai a, pindan chunghnungah an inzâl a.
Chun, Ludda khuo chu Joppa khaw kâwl a ni leiin, inchûktirhai chun Peter chutaka chun a um ti an hriet a, “Sâwt riel lovin kan kuomah hung rawh,” tia ngên dingin a kuomah mi pahni an tir a.

Chun, Peter chu a tho a, anni ruolin a fe ve ta a. Chun, a tlung phingleh pindan chunghnunga chun an ṭhuoi a; hmeithai po po chu a kâwla ngîrin, Dorka an kuoma a um laia a zakuo siemhai, a puon siemhai inentir pumin an ṭap tâwl a.

Nisienlakhawm, Peter chun an rêngin ân suoktir vawng a, a dingṭhaṭhuon a, a ṭawngṭai ta a; chun, ruong tieng chu a ngha a, “Tabitha, tho rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a mit a hung meng a, Peter chu a hmu phingleh a ṭhung ta a.
Chun, Peter chun a kut a pêk a, a keitho ta a; chun, mi inthienghai le hmeithaihai chu a ko a, damin an kuomah a ṭhuoi ta a.
Chun, chu chu Joppa khuo po po chun an hriet ta vawng a; mi tamtakin Lalpa chu an ring ta a.
Chun, Peter chu ni tamtak Joppa khuoa Simon, savun siemtu inah a châm zing a.
Chun, Kaisari khuoah a hming Korneli mi pakhat a um a; Itali pâwl an ti, chu pâwla sipai za hotu a nih.
Pathien ngaisak mi a na, a sûnghai po po leh Pathien an ṭi hlak a; mihai kuomah thil tamtak a pêk hlak a, Pathien kuoma khawm an ṭawngṭai rawp a.
Chawhnung dâr thum vêlah inlârnain chiengtakin a hmu a; Pathien vântirko pakhat a kuomah a hung a, “Korneli” a hung ti a.
Chun, Korneli chun ama chu a lo en zing a, a ṭi a, “Lalpa, ieng am a na?” a ta. Chun, ama chun a kuomah, “I ṭawngṭainahai le i thil pêk thuhai kha hriet zing dingin Pathien hmaah a hang tlung tah.
Tuhin Joppa khuoah mihai tir la, mi pakhat Simon Peter an ti chu, hang inṭhuoitir rawh.
Savun siemtu Simon kuoma tlung a na, a in chu tuipui panga a um a nih,” a ta.
Chun, vântirko a betu chu a fe phingleh, Korneli chun, a siehlawhai laia mi pahni le a rawngbâwl rawphai laia Pathien ngaisak sipai pakhat a ko a;
chun, thu po po chu an kuoma a hril zoin Joppa khuoa chun a tir ta a.
Chun, a zînga an fe laia khaw kâwl an tlung laiin, Peter chu ṭawngṭai dingin, sûnbu fâk hun laiin, in chungah a hang lawn a.
Chun a phîng a hung ṭâm a, bu fâk a nuom ta a; nisienlakhawm, fâk ding an siem lai chun zêlin a um ta a.
Vân inhawngin, iengkhat bâwm puon lientak ang, a ki palia khita, hnuoiah inkhaithlain a hmu a.
Chu sûnga chun sapheimanlihai le, thilhring le chunga vate tinrênghai an um a.
Chun, a kuomah rawlin, “Peter tho rawh; that la fa rawh,” a hung ti a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peter chun, “Lalpa, ni lo e; thil pawrche le inthiengnaw iengkhawm ka fâk ngai naw ie,” a ta.
Chun, rawl chun vawihninaah, “Pathienin a sukthieng ta chu nangin thiengnaw ti naw rawh,” a ta.
Chuong ang ruok chun, vawi thum a hung um a; chun, bâwm chu vâna zuk khaiin a um nâwk nghâl ta a.
Chun, Peterin mang anga a hmu chu a ngaina hre lova a lunginzîng laiin, Korneli mi tirhai chun Simon in chu an lo indawn suok ta a, kawtkhâr bulah an lo ngîr a,
an khêk a, Simon, Peter an ti chu, chutaka chun a tlung le tlung naw an indawn a.
Chun, Peterin a mang thu chu a ngaituo laiin, Thlarauin a kuomah, “Ngai ta, mi pathumin an zawng che.
Chuongchun, tho la, ṭum la, iengkhawm ringhla lovin anni zui rawh; anni chu ka itir an nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Peter chu chuhai kâwla chun a ṭum a, an kuomah, “In izawng hi ka nih; ieng am in hungna san?” a ta.

Anni chun, “Vântirko inthieng pakhatin, Korneli, sipai za hotu mi feltak, Pathien ṭi Juda hnam po pohai khawma an ingaisâng kuoma chun, i thu hril a hrietna dingin, a inah nang ko ding chein a hril a nih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, mihai chu a ko lût a, ân riek tir ta a. A zînga chun Peter chu a tho a, an kuomah a fe a, Joppa khuoa mi unau tuhai amani khawm anni leh an fe ve a.
Chun, a zing nâwk chun Kaisari khuoa chun an lût ta a. Chun, Korneli chun a laibunghai le a ruol dittakhai a ko khâwm a, anni chu a lo nghâk zing a.
Chun, Peter chu a lût ding lai takin Korneli chun a lo tuok a, a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, Pathien chibai bûk angin a bûk a.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin ama chu a keitho a, “Ngîr rawh, kei khawm mihriem ka ni hi,” a ta.
Chun, a kâwla thu hril pumin a lût a, mi tamtak umkhâwm chu a va hmu a.
An kuomah, “Juda mîn hnam dang kuoma fe le pâwl a thieng nawzie nangnîn in hriet a nih; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm inthiengnaw le pawrche ka ti ding an nawh ti Pathienin a mîn hriettir a nih.
Chuleiin, in mi hung ko phingle khan sêl lovin ka hung a ni hi. Chuongchun, kân dawn cheu, ieng am a na in mi hung ko san?” a ta.
Chun, Korneli chun, “Ni li a ni tah, tu ang hunah hin, ka inah, chawhnung inher ṭawngṭainaah ka ṭawngṭai a; chun, ngai ta, mi pakhat puon vârtak silin ka hmaah a hung ngîr a,
‘Korneli, i ṭawngṭaina kha hrietin a um tah, mi kuoma i thilpêkhai khawm kha Pathienin a hriet zing ie.
Chuleiin, Joppa khuoah mi tir la, Simon Peter an ti chu, i kuomah ko rawh, ama chu tuipui panga savun siemtu Simon ina tlung a nih,’ a ta.
Chuleiin, i kuomah mi ka hung tir nghâl tah a nih; i hung hi a ṭha ie. Chuongchun, Lalpain thu a pêk taphawt che hre dingin tuhin Pathien mithmuin kan rêngin hitaka hin kan um a ni hi,” a ta.
nisienlakhawm, hnam tin lai tûkhawm ama ṭia, feltaka thaw taphawt chu, a lâwm zâwng mi a ni hlak.
Ama chun thlamuongna Chanchin Ṭha Isu Krista baua hrilin Israel mipuihai kuomah thu ân phur a, (Isu chu mi po po Lal a nih).
Johanin a khêkpui hlak baptisma zoa khan, thu, Galili rama inthawkin hung inthang ṭanin, Juda ram po poa inthang suok kha, nangnîn in hriet bawk annâwm.

Nazareth Isu chungchâng thu kha, khânga ama chu Pathienin Thlarau Inthieng le thilthawtheinaa a vurzie kha; ama chun mi chunga thawṭhain le diebol suknawmnat po po sukdamin a fang vêl hlak, Pathien a kuoma a um leiin.
Juda ram le Jerusalema a thilthawhai po po hretu kan nih; ama chu thinglêra khaiin an sukhlum tah.
Pathienin ama chu ni thum niin a keitho nâwk a, fietakin ân entir a,
amiruokchu, mi po po kuomah ni lovin, a thu hretu ni dinga inhmaa Pathienin a ithlang tah, keini, mithi laia a thonâwk hnunga a kuoma faa dâwntuhai kuoma hin a nih.
Ama chu mithihai le mi hringhai chunga Rorêltua Pathien iruot chu a nih ti, mi kuoma khêkpui le inhriettir dingin Pathienin thu a mi pêk a nih.
“Tûkhawm ama ring taphawt chu a hming leiin suolhai ngaidamin um an tih ti hieng a chanchin hi zâwlneihai po poin an inhriettir hlak kha a nih,” a ta.
Chun, Peterin chuong thu chu a hril lai tak chun, thu hretuhai po po chunga chun Thlarau Inthieng a hung tlung ta a.
Chun, Sertanhai laia ringtuhai Peter hung zuituhai chun Thlarau Inthieng pêk chu Jentailhai chunga khawm buok a ni leiin mak an ti hle a;
ṭawng hrietnawhaia thu hrilin, Pathien inpâkin an hriet si a.
Chun, Peterin a biek a, “Hieng mihai, eini anga Thlarau Inthieng hmuhai hi baptisma an chang nawna dingin miin tui hmang an khap thei am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, Isu Krista hminga baptisma chang ding thu a pêk a. Chuong zoa chun ni iengzat amani lai châm dingin an ngên a.
Chun, Juda rama tirko le unau umhai chun Jentailhai khawmin Pathien thu an zâwm ti an hriet ta a.
Chuongchun, Peter chu Jerusalem a hang tlung phingleh, Sertanhaiin an kal a,
a kuomah, “Sertan nawhai inah i lût a, an kuomah i fâk vei a,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Peterin a bula inthawkin indawt zatin an kuomah a hrilfie a;
“Joppa khuoah ṭawngṭaia ka um laiin zêlin ka um a. Mang angin iengkhat bâwm, puon lientak ang, a ki palia khita, vâna inthawka inkhaithla ka hmu a; ka kâwla ngei a mi hung hnai a.
Chu chu ka en zing a, ka ngaituo a, hnuoia mi sapheimanlihai, ramsahai, thilhringhai le chunga vatehai ka hmu a.
Chun, rawlin, ‘Peter, tho rawh, that la fa rawh,’ mi tiin ka hriet bawk a.
Nisienlakhawm, keiin, ‘Lalpa, ni lo e, thiengnaw le inthiengnaw iengkhawm ka bauah a lût ngai nawh,’ ka ta.
Nisienlakhawm, vâna inthawka rawl chun a vawi hninaah, ‘Pathienin a sukthieng ta chu nangin inthiengnaw ti naw,’ tiin a mi dawn a.
Chuong ang ruok chun vawi thum a hung um a; chun, iengkim chu vâna zuk khaiin a um nâwk ta a.
Chun, ngai ta u, mi pathum, Kaisari khuoa inthawkin ka kuomah an hung tir a, ka umna tuola chun an lo um zing ta a.
“Chun, Thlarauin lunghimawna nei lova anni zui dingin a mi tir a. Hieng unau parukhai khawm hin an mi zui ve a, mi ina chun kan lût a.
Chun, ama chun kan kuomah, a ina vântirko ngîr a hmuzie le, vântirko chun a kuomah, ‘Joppa khuoah mi tir la, Simon, Peter an ti chu, hung inṭhuoitir rawh;
ama chun thu hril a ti che a, ama thu lei chun nang le i sûnghai sandamin um in tih,’ a tizie khawm a mi hril a.
Chun, thu ka hang hril hlimin Thlarau Inthieng ei chunga a hung tlung tir lai ang khan an chungah a hung tlung ta a.
Chuongchun, Lalpa Isu Krista an ring phingleh, Pathienin thil thlâwnpêk a mi pêk ang kha an kuoma a pêk tahnung chu, kei tê hi Pathien sêl ruol am ka nih?” a ta.
Chuong thu chu an hrietin an to ta a, “Chuong a ni chun, Pathienin Jentailhai khawm hring dingin sim a phal tah a ni chu,” tiin Pathien an inpâk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni laia a ṭhen chu Kupra thlierkâr le Kurinia mihai an na, chuonghai chu Antiokei an tlung chun Grikhai kuoma khawm, Lalpa Isu Chanchin Ṭha an hril ve ta a.
Chun, Lalpa kutin anni a ṭhangpui a; mi tamtakin an ring a, Lalpa tieng chu an ngha tâwl ta a.
chun, an chanchin chu Jerusalema kohran umhai naa chun a hung lût ta a; chuongchun, Antiokei chen chun Barnaba chu an tir suok ta a.
Chun, ama chu a va tlung a, Pathien lunginsietzie chu a hmu chun a lâwm hle a; ṭhahnemngaitaka Lalpa chel zing dingin an rêngin ân fui ta a.
Barnaba chu mi ṭhatak, Thlarau Inthieng le ringnaa sip a nih. Chun, mi tamtakin Lalpa kuomah an belsa ta a.
Chun, Barnaba chu Saula zawng dingin Tarsa khuoah a fe a; chun a hmu chun Antiokeia chun a hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, kum khat zet kohranhai inkhâwmnaa chun an ṭhang ve hlak a, mi tamtak an inchûktir hlak a. Antiokeia chun a nih inchûktirhai chu “Kristien” an ti hmasa tak chu.
Chun, chuong lai chun zâwlnei tuhai amanih Jerusalema inthawkin Antiokeia chun an zu fe a.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chun, an thei tâwk sengin, Judai rama unau umhai kuoma chun sawmdâwlna ding thawn an tum a.
Chu chu an thaw ta ngei a, Barnaba le Saula kuta chun upahai kuomah an inphur ta a.
Chun, chuong lai vêl chun Lal Herod chun kohrana mi ṭhenkhat suknawmnat tumin a kut ân let ta a.
Jakob, Johan unau chu, kâwlhnâmin a sâthlum a.
Chu chun Judahai chu a suklâwm ti a hrietin, Peter khawm chu man a tum nâwk pei a. (Chuong nihai chu Chawlṭhanglo Bei ruoiṭhe ni a nih).
Chuleiin, Peter chu intângna inah ân umtir hri a; nisienlakhawm, kohranhaiin ama ta dingin ṭhahnemngaitakin Pathien kuomah an ṭawngṭaipêk hlak a.
Chun, Herod chun a ṭhuoi suok tâwmin, chu zân tak chun Peter chu sipai pahni inkârah khaidiet pahni bunin a in a, a vêngtuhai khawm kawtkhâr bulah an um a, intângna in chu an vêng a.
Chun, ngai ta, Lalpa vântirko pakhat a kâwlah a hung ngîr a, rip sûnga chun var ieng amanih a hung var a, Peter nâkah a khîk har a, “Tho vak rawh,” a ta. Chun, a kuta khaidiethai chu a tla ta a.
Vântirko chun a kuomah, “Dier kei la, i kekawk bun rawh,” a ta. Ama chun chuong ang chun a thaw a. Chun vântirko chun a kuomah, “I puon bât ṭha la, mi zui rawh,” a ta.
Peter chu a suok a, a zui ta a; vântirko chângzie chu a tak a ni ti a hriet naw a, manga a hmu amanih a sâwn lem a.

Chun, vêngtu hmasa le a dawttu chu an khêl hnung chun, tuol suokna ding thîr kawtkhâr chu an va tlung a, chu chu an ta dingin ân hawng fâwm ta a; an suok a, kawtthlêr pakhat an khêl a; chun, vântirko chun a fe san nghâl ta a.
Chun, Peter chu a har phingleh, “Lalpain a vântirko a tir suok a, Herod kut le Juda mihai beiseina po poa inthawkin a mi sandam ti tuhin indiktakin ka hriet tah,” a ta.
Chun, ân ngaituo zo chun, Johan, Marka an ti, chu mipa nu Mari ina chun a va fe a; chutaka chun ṭawngṭaiin mi tamtak an lo um khâwm a.
Chun, tuolpûk kawtkhâr a hei nawk phingleh, a hming Rodi, nunghâk pakhat, dawn dingin a va fe a.
Peter rawl a hriet phingleh, a lâwm leiin kawt chu hawng lovin a tlân lût nâwk ta lem a, “Peter chu kawtkhâr bulah a ngîr” tiin a va hril a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun a kuomah, “în vêt a ni ta hi,” an lo ti a. Ama ruok chu, “Titakzet a nih,” tiin a ṭhang ṭal a. Anni chun, “A vântirko a ni chu,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Peter chun a nawk zing a; chun, an hei hawng chun, ama chu an hmu a, mak an ti hle a.

Chuongchun, ama chun an tona dingin kutin a zâp a, Pathienin intângna ina inthawka a ṭhuoi suokzie chu a hril ta a. Chun, “Hieng thu hi Jakob le unauhai kuomah va hril ro,” a ta. Chun, a suok a, ram dangah a fe ta a.
Chun, nisa a suok phingleh, sipaihai chu, “Peter khâwlai am a um ta a?” tiin buoi namênin an buoi naw a.
Herod chun a zawng a, a hmu si naw a, a vêngtuhai chu a suosal a, sukhlum dingin thu a pêk ta a. Chun, Herod chu Judai rama inthawkin Kaisari khuoah a zu fe a, chutaka chun a um zing a.

Herod chu, Tura le Sidon khuoa mihai chunga chun a lungninaw bêk bêk a. Anni chun, Blasta, lal khum vêngtu chu, an ruolah an siem a, inthuruolin a kuomah an hung a, an khuo tiengin lal khuo tienga pûr inchaw hlak an ni leiin inrem an ngên a.
A ni tiem ni chun, Herod chun lal puon a sil a, lalṭhungphaah a ṭhung a, an kuomah thu a hril a.
Mi po po chun, “Pathien rawl a ni hi, mihriem rawl a ni naw hi,” an ta, an khêk a.
Ama chun Pathien kuomah chawimawina chu a pêk naw leiin kârlovin Lalpa vântirkoin a man a, rulrukûtin a fâk a, a thi ta a.
Pathien thu ruok chu, ân dâr a, a pung ta pei a.
Chun, Barnaba le Saula chun, rawng chu an bâwl zo chun, Jerusalema inthawk chun an kîr nâwk ta a, Johan, Marka an ti chu an kuomah an ṭhuoi ve a.
Chun, Antiokeia kohran lai chun thu hriltuhai le inchûktirhai an um; chuong chu Barnaba hai, Simeon Niger an ti hai, Kurini khuoa Lukia hai, lal Herod unau Manaina hai, Saula hai leh an nih.
Chun, Lalpa rawng an bâwl a, bu an nghei laiin, Thlarau Inthiengin, “Barnaba le Saula hi anni ka ruot ang san thaw dingin mi suktumpêk ro,” a ta.
Chuongchun, bu nghei a, an ṭawngṭai zo chun an chungah kut an innghat a, an infetir ta a.
Chuongchun, Thlarau Inthieng tir suok chun an fe ta a, Selukai khuoah an fe thla a, chutaka inthawkin Kupra thlierkârah lâwngin an fe a.
Chun, Salamis khuoa an um laiin, Juda inkhâwmna inahai Pathien thu an hril hlak; Johan khawm kha an rawng bâwl dingin an ṭhuoi ve a.
Chun, thlierkâr chu Paphos chenin an fang suok a, dawithiem zâwlnei tehlêm, Juda mi pakhat an hmu a, a hming chu Bar-Isu a nih.
Ama chu, lal aiawtu, Serjia Paula, mi vartak kuoma um a nih. Chu lal aiawtu chun, Barnaba le Saula chu a ko a, Pathien thu hriet a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, Elum, (Bar-Isu hming dang umzie hi Dawithiem tina a nih), chu mipa chun, lal aiawtu chu, inringnawtir tumin, anni chu a lo kal a.
Chuongchun, Saula, (Paula an ti bawk chu), Thlarau Inthiengin a sip a, ama chu a en zing a,
“Nang mi hlêm le theidaum tinrênga sippa, nang diebol naupa, nang felna tinrêng kawp nawpa, Lalpa kawng feltakhai hi suksiet ma naw ti ni maw?
Hre rawh, tuhin Lalpa kut i chungah a tla a ni hi, i mit hung indel a ta, khaw var hmu hri naw ti ni,” a ta. Chuongchun, inthim le sûmin ama a baw nghâl ta a, kuta keitu ding zawngin ân vâk a.
Chun, Lal aiawtu chun, chuong thil chu a hmu a, Lalpa thu an inchûktir chu mak a ti hle, a ring ta a.
Chun, Paula chu a rawihai le chun, Paphos khuoa inthawk chun lawngin an fe a. Pamphulia rama Perga an tlung a; chun, Johan khan anni chu a mâksan a, Jerusalemah a kîr nâwk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chu Pergaa inthawkin an fe pei a, Pisidia rama Antiokei an tlung a; chun, Châwlniin inkhâwmna inah an lût a, an ṭhung a.
Chun, Dân Lekhabu le Zâwlneihai lekhabu tiem zoin inkhâwmna hotuhaiin an kuomah mi an tir a, “Unauhai, mihai infuina thu ieng amanih in nei chun hril ro,” an ta.
Chun, Paula a ngîr a, kutin a zâp a, a hril a: “Israel mihai le Pathien ṭituhai, ngai ro.

Chun, ama chu a sawn hmang hnung khan an lala um dingin David a siem ta a; Pathienin chu thu chu inhriettirin, ‘David, Jessai naupa, ka lungril ang put mi ka hmu suok tah, ama chun ka dit zâwng taphawt thâwng a tih,’ a ta.
“Chu thlahai laia chun Pathienin, thutiem ang peiin, Israelhai Sandamtu Isu a hung intlun a.
“Unauhai, Abraham thla nauhai, nangni laia Pathien ṭi po pohai, eini kuoma hin hieng sandamna thu hi a mi hung inphur suok a ni hi.
Jerusalema umhaiin, an hotuhai leh, ama chu an hriet naw lei le, zâwlneihai thu, Châwlni taphawta tiem hlak kha, an hriet bawk naw leiin, ama chu thiemnaw inchangtirin, chu thu chu an hlen ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathienin mithi laia inthawkin a keitho nâwk ta a.
Keini khawmin thlatuhai kuomah thutiem kha a chanchin lâwmum kan hung hril cheu hi,
Hmawnna hmuna fe nâwk lo dingin Pathienin ama chu mithi laia inthawkin a keitho dingzie thu chu hieng hin a hril a nih, ‘David kuoma lunginsietna ka itiem tlathai kha nanga kuomah pêng ka che,’ tiin.
Chuleiin, Hla dangin, ‘I Mi Inthieng chu hmawn hmang phal naw ti ni a,’ a ti bawk a.
David chu, Pathien rorêlpêk angin a dam ruolpuihai rawng a bâwl zo khan, a in innghil a, a thlatuhai kuomah an inzâl a, a hmawn hmang tah a nih.
Pathienin a ikeitho ruok kha chu a hmawn hmang naw kha.
“Chuongchun, unauhai, hre ro; ama lei chun, suol ngaidamna thu in kuomah hril a ni hi;
tûkhawm ama ring taphawt chu, iengkimah ama thiem inchangtirin a um, chuonga chun, Mosie Dânin thiem inchangtirin in um thei nawh.
Chuleiin, fîmkhur ro, chuong naw chun, zâwlneihai lekhabua an hril kha in chungah hung tlung a tih,
Makti unla, bohmang ro;
In dam sûng hin thil kawng khat ka thaw hi,
Chu thil chu miin hril hai sienla cheu khawm,
Awi tawp naw ti niu,’ a ti kha,”
a ta.
Chun, an suok chun, Châwlni nâwka chuong thu chu hril nâwk dingin an ngên a.

Chun, inkhâwmhai chu an ṭin phingleh, Judahai le an saphun Pathien ngaisak laia mi tamtakin Paula le Barnaba chu an zui pei a; anni chun an lo biek a, Pathien lunginsietnaa chun um zing dingin an infui a.
Chun, Châwlni nâwka chun a khuo deu thawin Pathien thu ngai dingin an hung inkhâwm a.
Nisienlakhawm, Judahaiin mipuihai chu an hmu phingleh an îtthîk bêk el a; Paula thu hril chu an sêlkal a, an hrilpâwi hle a.

Chun, Paula le Barnaba chun huoitakin an hril dawk a, “Pathien thu hi nangni kuoma hril hmasak hrim ding a nih; nisienlakhawm, in lo dang kîr a, chatuona hring tlâk lova in inruot ta hnung chu, hre ro, Jentailhai kuom tieng ngha vê tâng kan tih.
‘Jentailhai sukvartuah ka ruot che,
Kâwlkawdawng chena sandamna in tlun theina dingin,’ ti ziek ang khan,”
an ta.
Chun, Jentailhai chun chuong thu chu an hrietin an lâwm a, Pathien chu an chawimawi a, chun, chatuona hring dinga ruot po chun an ring ta a.
Chun, Lalpa thu chu, chu lai ram khawvêla chun ân dar ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, Judahai chun nuhmei inzaum Pathien ngaisakhai le khuoa upahai chu an infui a, Paula le Barnaba chu an insuknawmnatir a, an rama inthawkin an hnawt suok ta a.
Chun, închûktirhai chu lâwmna le Thlarau Inthiengin an sip tâwl a.
Chun, Ikonioma chun Judahai inkhâwmna inah an lût rêl a, mi hne thei zâwng taka thu an hril leiin, Grik le Juda mi tamtak ringtu an hung ni ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, ring nuom naw Judahaiin Jentailhai chu infuipawrin, unauhai chu an intheidatir a.
Chuleiin, Lalpa thu huoitaka hrilin chutaka chun sâwt rei an um a, ama chun, inchikna le thilmakhai an kuta inthawtirin, a lunginsiet thu ân hriettir hlak a.
Chun, khuoa mipuihai chu an inkhing ta a; aṭhenin Judahai chu an ṭan a; aṭhenin tirkohai chu.
Chun, Jentailhai, Judahai, an hotuhai le chun, tirkohai chu inzakumtaka siem le lunga dêng tuma an thaw ding laiin anni chun an lo hriet a,
Lukaoni ram bawka chun, Lustra le Derbe khuoa le a vêl ramhaia chun an tlân hmang a;
chuonga chun, Chanchin Ṭha an hril pei a.
Chun, Lustraa chun ke zeng tû amanih a ṭhung hlak a, a pieng tîra inthawk ke inbai hrim a na, kein a lâwn ngai naw a.
Ama chun, Paula thu hril a ngai a, chun, Paula chun, ama chu a en zing a, damna dingin ringna a nei ti a hriet a,
rawl inringtakin, “I kein ngîr tlûn rawh,” a ta. Chun, ama chu ân châwm tho a, kein a lâwn ta a.
Chun, mipuihaiin Paula thilthaw chu an hmu phingleh, Lukaoni ṭawngin inringtakin, “Pathienhai chu mihriem angin ei kuomah an hung ṭum tah a ni hi!” an ta.
Chun, Barnaba chu, “Jupitar
Chun, Jupitar biekin khawhnâwma um chu, a thiempu chun sebâwng chalhai le, pâr ṭhihrui limhai, kawtkhâr kâwlah a hung lâk a, mipuihai le chun biekna dingin that an tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, tirko Barnaba le Paula chun, chu chu an hriet phingleh, an puon an keithlêr a, mipui lai chun an inchâwm lût a, an khêk a.

“Puhai, iengdinga hieng thilhai hi in thaw am a na? Keini khawm in nungchang ang put mihriem kan ni hi; hieng thil teplohai hi in nghatsan a, vân hai, hnuoi hai, tuipui hai, an sûnga um po pohai siemtu Pathien hring kuoma chun in hung kawpna dingin Chanchin Ṭha kan hung intlun cheu a ni hi.
Chu Pathien chun, tienlaiin hnam tin mâni lampui seng hraw a phal hlak a.

Nisienlakhawm, ama inhriettirna um lovin ân siem ngai nawh. Chuongchun, thil a thaw ṭha hlak a, vâna inthawka ruohai le kum ṭhat kumhai a pêk cheu a, in lungril fâk ding le lâwmnain a suktlaipêk hlak cheu kha,” an ta.
Chun, chuong thu chun, mipuihaiin anni biekna dinga ran an that ding chu an khap zo hrâm a.

Nisienlakhawm, Antiokei le Ikonioma mi Juda tuhai amanih chutaka chun an hung a, mipuihai chu an zâwr thlûk ta a; chuongchun, Paula chu lungin an dêng a, thia an ring leiin khuoa inthawk chu an hnûk dawk ta a.
Nisienlakhawm, inchûktirhai chu a vêla an ngîr laiin, a hung tho a, khuoa chun a lût nâwk ta a. Chun, a zînga chun Barnaba leh Derbeah an fe ta a.
Chu khuohai kuoma chun, Chanchin Ṭha an hril a, inchûktir tamtak an siem hnungin Lustraa hai, Ikonioma hai, Antiokeia hai, an kîr nâwk a.
“Rinum tamtak tuorin Pathien ramah ei lût ding a ni hrim a nih,” tiin inchûktirhai lungril an sukdet a, ringnaa chun um zing dingin an infui a.
Chun, kohran tinah upahai an ruot pêk pei a, bu nghei puma an ṭawngṭai zoin, an ring Lalpa kuoma chun an inkawltir pei a.
Chun, Pisidia ram chu an fang suok a, Pamphulia ram chu an tlung a.
Chun, Pergaa thu an hril zoin Attaliaah an zu fe a;
chutaka inthawk chun lawngin an suok a, Antiokei chu an hung tlung nâwk ta a, chu chu a thil thaw zo ta chu thaw dinga unauhaiin Pathien lunginsietna inkawltira an suokna kha a nih.
Chun, an tlung hnungin kohranhai chu an ko khâwm a, Pathienin anni hmanga, thil a thawhai po po le, Jentailhai ta dinga ringna kawtkhâr a hawngpêkziehai chu an hril a.
Inchûktirhai lai chun sâwt rei an um ta a.

Chuongchun, Paula le Barnaba chu anni le chun namênlovin an insêl a, an inkhing tlat leiin, Paula le Barnaba chu, anni laia mi ṭhenkhat leh, chu thubuoi chunga chun, Jerusalema tirkohai le upahai kuoma hang fe dingin an ruot a.
Chuongchun, kohran chun an hang inthla a, anni chun Jentailhai nghat kîr nâwkzie thu chu hril peiin Phoiniki ram le Samari ram an fang suok ta a; chuongchun, unauhai po po an suklâwm bêk bêk a.
Chun, Jerusalem chu an hang tlung chun, kohranhai, tirkohai, upahai chun an lo lâwm a, chun, Pathienin anni hmanga thil a thawhai po po chu an hril a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pharisai pâwl, ring ve tuhai amanih an tho a, “Jentailhai ser tan ding a nih. Mosie dân zâwm khawm anni chu tiem
Chun, tirkohai le upahai chu, chu thu chu ngaituo dingin an inkhâwm a.
chun, anni le eini thlier bîk lovin, ringnain an lungril a sukthieng ta a.
Chuongchun, ei thlatuhai le eini izo ta naw, rîngkawl kha inchûktirhai chungah tuhin innghat tumin iengdinga Pathien var in sêlkal am a na?
Anni ring ang bawkin eini khawmin Lalpa Isu lunginsietna leia sandam ding ei nih ti ei ring si a,” a ta.
Chuongchun, mipui po po an to zing a, Barnaba le Paula Pathienin anni hmanga Jentailhai laia inchiknahai le thilmakhai a thaw thu kha an hril sûng po chu an ngai a.
Chun, an hril zoin Jakobin a hril ve thung a; “Unauhai, ka thu lo ngai ta u,
Pathienin ama hming put dingin, anni laia mihai la suok dingin Jentailhai a hung kan tîr thu kha, Simeon hin a hril tah.
Chun, chuong thu le zâwlneihai thu hi ân hme a nih:
‘Chuong zoa chun kîr nâwk ka ta
David bâwktê chim kha siem nâwk ka tih,
A sietna lai po khawm siem ṭha nâwk ka ta;
Mi dang, Jentailhai po po ka hming mîn ṭawmpuihai chun,
Lalpa an zawngna dingin
Chu bâwktê chu tungding ka tih, tiin,
ti ziek ang khan.
“Chuleiin, hieng ang hin ka ruot a nih. Jentailhai laia Pathien tieng nghahai chu sukrinum naw inla,
Mosien inhmaa inthawk tah khaw tinah a thu khêkpuitu a nei hlak si a; inkhâwmna inahai Châwlni taphawt chun a thu chu tiem a ni hlak kha,” a ta.

Chun, tirkohai, upahai kohran po pohai le chun, an pâwla mi thlanga, Paula le Barnaba ruolin Antiokeia infetir ṭha an ti a; an ithlanghai hming chu Juda (Barsaba an ti) le, Sila an nih; anni chu unauhai laia hotu deu an nih.
Chun, hieng ang hin an ziek a, an kutah an inphur a; “Tirkohai le unauhai laia upahaiin Antiokeia dâm, Suria rama dâm le Kilikia rama Jentail unau umhai chibai an bûk.
“Kan pâwl laia mi tuhai amaniin thu hrilin an sukbuoi cheu a, in lungril an suklungzîng ti kan hriet a, an kuomah thu iengkhawm kan pêk si nawh.
Chuleiin, inthuruola kan inkhâwmin, kan dittak Barnaba le Paula,
Lalpa Isu Krista hming leia thi dâwnlohai hung ruol hin, mi thlanga in kuoma hung tir ve ṭhain kan hriet a.
Chuongchun, Juda le Sila kan hung tir a ni hi, anni khawmin hieng thu bawk hi ṭawng bauin hril an ti cheu.
Thlarau Inthieng le keinîn, hieng thu pawimaw naw hi chu phur rik zuol in chungah innghat naw inla, a ṭha kan tih;
milim biekna sa fâk dâm, indit dâm ma unla kan tih. Hieng hi in ma chun in ta dingin ṭhâng a tih. Damtakin um ro,” tiin.
Chuongchun, an itir chun an fe a, Antiokei chu an zu tlung a. Mipui chu an ko khâwm a, lekha chu an pêk a.
Chun, an tiem zoin thlamuongna thu lei chun an lâwm ta hle a.
Chun, Juda le Sila chu zâwlnei an ni bawk a, thu tamtakin unauhai chu an thlamuon a, an sukdet a.
Chun, chutaka chun sâwt rei an um hnungin, anni hung tirtuhai kuomah kîr nâwk dingin unauhai chun thlamuongtakin an infetir nâwk ta a,
(Sila ruok chu chutaka um zing a tum a.)
Paula le Barnaba ruok chu Antiokeia chun Lalpa thu inchûktir le hrilin an um zing a, mi dang tamtakhai leh.
Chun, ni iengzat amanih hnunga chun, Paulain Barnaba kuomah, “Tuhin fe nâwk inla, khaw tina Lalpa thu ei hrilna taphawta unau umhai kha kan pei inla, an um dân en ei tih,” a ta.
Chun, Barnaba chun Johan, (Marka an ti chu), an kuoma ṭhuoi ve a tum a, Paula ruok chun, ama chu an kuoma ṭhuoi chu ṭha a ti naw a.
Chuongchun, nasatakin an lo insêl ta a, an inṭhe a, Barnaba chun, Marka chu a kuomah a ṭhuoi a, Kupra thlierkâr tieng lawngin a fe ta a.
Paula ruok chun, Sila a thlang a, unauhaiin Lalpa lunginsietna an inkawltir hnungin a fe suok ta a.
Chun, kohranhai chu sukdet peiin Suria le Kilikia ram a fang suok ta a.
Chun, Derbe le Lustraa chun a fe bawk a; chun, chutaka chun, a hming Timothe inchûktir pakhat a um; ama chu ringtu Juda nuhmei naupa a na, a pa ruok chu Grik a nih;
Lustra le Ikonioma unau umhai chun, ama chu an inpâk hlak a.
Paulain ama chu a kuoma fe ve dingin a dit a; chuongchun, chu tienga Juda umhai lei chun, a ser a tanpêk a, a pa chu Grik a nih ti an hriet vawng si a.
Chun, khaw tinah an fe malamin Jerusalema tirko le upa umhai thurêl kha zâwm dingin unauhai kuomah an pêk pei a.
Chuongchun, kohranhai chu ringnaa chun an det ta a, ni tin an pung ta deu deu a.
Chun, Thlarau Inthiengin Asia rama thu hril a khap leiin Phrugia le Galati ram chu an fang suok a;
chun, Musia ram kâwl an tlungin Bethunia ramah lût an tum a, nisienlakhawm, Isu Thlarauin a phal si nawh.
Chuongchun, Musia ram chu an khêl a, Troasah an fe thla ta a.
Chun, zânah Paulain a mang angin Makedonia rama mi mi pakhat ngîrin, “Makedonia ramah hung kai la, mi ṭhangpui rawh,” tia ngên ngênin a hmu a.
Chun, chu mang chu a mang zo phingleh, Makedonia rama chun fe kan tum ta a, an kuoma Chanchin Ṭha hril dingin Pathienin a mi ko ti kan hriet a.
Chun, Troasa inthawk chun lawngin kan suok a, tluongtakin Samotrakiah kan riek a, a zînga chun Neapoliah kan fe nâwk a;

chun, chutaka inthawk chun Philippiah kan fe a, chu khuo chu Makedonia rama khaw pakhat a nih, chu biela chun khaw pawimaw tak a na, Roma inthawka mi inpêmhai khuo a nih. Chu khuoa chun ni tam rei kan châm a.
Chun, Châwlniin kul kawtkhâr puo tienga vadung panga, ṭawngṭaina hmun ni dinga kan ringa chun kan fe a; chun, kan ṭhunga nuhmei hung khâwmhai kuoma chun thu kan hril a.
Chun, a hming Luda, puon senduk zawrtu, Thuotira khuoa mi, Pathien betu nuhmei pakhatin kan thu a hriet a; chun Paula thu hril zâwm dingin Lalpa chun a lungril a sukvar ta a.
Chun, ama le a sûnghaiin baptisma an chang zo chun, “Lalpa ring tak zeta in mi ruot chun, ka inah hung tlung ro,” tiin a mi ngên a mi ngên a, a mi chel ta a.
Chun, ṭawngṭaina hmuna kan fe lai chun suok nunghâk tû amanih, khawhrizâwl aisânthiemin a mîn tuokpui a, ama chun a aisân lei chun a puhai chu sum tamtak ân hmutir hlak a.
Ama chun Paula le keini a mi zui a, “Hienghai, sandamna lampui hriltu cheu hi, Achunghnungtak Pathien suokhai an ni hi,” tiin a khêk a.

Chuong ang chun, ni sâwt rei a thaw hlak a. Chuongchun, Paula chu a lungni ta naw a, a ngha a, khawhri kuoma chun, “Isu Krista hmingin a sûnga inthawkin suok thu ka pêk che,” a ta. Chun, chu lai tak chun a suok nghâl ta a.
Chun, a puhai chun an sum hmuna ân hmang ti an hriet a, Paula le Sila chu an man a, hotuhai hmaah dâwr hmunah an kei lût a.
Chuongchun, thu rêltuhai kuomah an ṭhuoi a, “Hienghai hi Judahai an na, kan khuo an sukbuoi bêk bêk a,
dân kan pawm thiengnaw le kan zâwm thiengnaw dâm an hril a, Rom mi kan ni si a,” an ta.
Chuongchun, mipuihai khawm chu tirkohai thaw ding chun an hung inthawk ve a, thu rêltuhai chun an puonhai an the thlâkpêk a, hmawla vuok thu an pêk a.
Chun, vawi tamtak an vuok zoin intângna inah an khum a, a vêngtu kuomah himtaka vêng ding an ti tlat a.
Chuong ang lâwma thu an pêk leiin rip sûngrilah a khum a, an kehaia chun thing kawl ân buntir a.
Nisienlakhawm, zân rila chun, Paula le Sila chu Pathien kuomah an ṭawngṭai a, hla an sak a, intânghai chun an ngai a;
chun, kârlovin simkhawleihnuoi nasatakin a hung inhnîng a; chun, kawtkhâr po po chu ân hawng nghâl a, mi tin kawl bunhai chu a hung insût vawng ta a.
Chun, a vêngtu a ininnghil chu a hung har a, intângna in kawtkhârhai chu inhawngin a hmu a, intânghai chu an tlân hmang amanih a ta, kâwlhnâm a phawi a, insukhlum a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, Paula chu rawl inringtakin a khêk a, “Iengkhawm inlaw naw, kan rêngin hitaka hin kan la um vawng annâwm,” a ta.
Chun, a vêngtu chun khâwnvarhai a lam a, ân châwm lût a, ṭia inthin pumin Paula le Sila hmaah a bawkkhup a.
Anni chu a ṭhuoi suok a, “Puhai, sandama um dingin ieng am ka thaw ding?” a ta.
Chun, anni chun, “Lalpa Isu ring la, chuongchun, sandamin um i tih, nang le i sûnghai leh,” an ta.
Chun, a kuoma le a ina um po pohai kuoma chun Pathien thu an hril a.
Chu zân chun, chu lai la la chun, a ṭhuoi a, an vuokna invuolhai chu a sâwpfai a; chun, ama le a sûnghai po po chun baptisma an chang nghâl ta a.
Chun, a inah a hang ṭhuoi a, fâk ding a pêk a, chun, Pathien an ring leiin, ama chu, a sûnghai po po le chun an hlim ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, nisa a suok chun rorêltuhai chun, “Kha hai kha insuo rawh,” ti dingin manmihai an tir a.
Chun, intângna in vêngtu chun, Paula kuomah an thu a hril a, “Rorêltuhai chun insuo ding cheuin mi an hung tir a; chuleiin, tuhin hung suok unla, thlamuongtakin fe ro,” a ta.

Nisienlakhawm, Paula chun an kuomah, “Rom mi kan ni si a, kan thiem le kan thiem naw hre lovin vântlâng mithmuin an mi vuok a, intângna inah an mi khum a; tuhin arûkin an mi hnawt suok vei ding a ni maw? Ni thei naw ni; anni ngei hung hai sienla mi hung ṭhuoi suok raw hai se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, manmihai chun, chuong thu chu rorêltuhai kuoma chun an hril a. Chun, Rom mi an nih ti an hriet chun an ṭi ta a.
An va fe a, an thlêm a, an ṭhuoi suok a, khuoa inthawk chun fe hmang dingin an ngên a.
Chun, intângna ina inthawk chun an suok a, Luda ina chun an lût a; chun, unauhai chu an hmu a, an thlamuon a, an suok ta a.
Chun, Amphipoli le Apollonia an khêl a, Thessalonika an tlung ta a; chutaka chun Judahai inkhâwmna in a um a.
Chun, Paula, a dân pângngaiin, an kuomah a lût a, Châwlni vawi thum Pathien Lekha Thua inthawkin nguntakin a suipui a,
Krista chu rinum tuor ding a ni hrimzie dâm, mithi laia inthawka thonâwk ding a ni hrimzie dâm a hrilfie a; a suklang hlak a, “Hi Isu a thu ka hril cheu hi, ama chu Krista a nih,” a ti bawk hlak a.
Chuongchun, anni laia ṭhenkhat chu zâwrthlûkin an um ta a, Paula le Sila chu an pâwl ta a; Pathien ngaisak Grik mipui nasatak le nuhmei ṭhuoitu tamtak leh.

Nisienlakhawm, Judahaiin an huphur a; dâwr hmuna mi suol thabo tuhai amanih an kuomah an ṭhuoi a, mipui an ko khâwm a, khuo po po chu an chawkbuoi a, Jason in an hung ṭhâwng a, vântlâng laia ṭhuoi suok tumin.
Chun, anni chu an hmu naw a, Jason le unau dang tuhai amanih khaw hotuhai kuomah an kei lût a, an khêk a, “Khawvêl chawkbuoituhai kha hitaka khawm hin an hung a,
Jason hin a lo intlungtir vei a; hienghai po po hi, ‘A hming Isu, lal dang a um,’ tiin Kaisar thu kalin an um hlak a nih,” an ta.
Chun, mipui le khaw hotuhai chun chuong thu chu an hang hriet chun an buoi ta a;
chun, Jason le unau danghai kuoma inthawka an aia hrên ding iengkhat an lâk a, an insuo ta a.
Chun, unauhai chun a zân a zânin Paula le Sila chu Beroia khuoah an infetir nghâl ta a; chu hmun an va tlung chun, Judahai inkhâwmna inah an lût a.

Chutaka mihai chu Thessalonika mihai nêk chun an lo ṭha lem a, chuongchun, lungril lâwmtakin thu chu an pawm a, an thu hril chu ân dik le ân dik naw hrietna dingin ni tin Pathien Lekhaah an zawng hlak a.
Chuongchun, chuong mihai tamtak chun an ring ta a; Grik nuhmei inzaum tamtak le pasalhai khawmin an ring ta bawk a.
Nisienlakhawm, Thessalonikaa Judahai chun Paulain Beroia khuoah Pathien thu a hril ti an hriet phingleh, chutaka khawm chun an va fe a, mipuihai an infui a, an buoi nâwk ta a.
Chuongchun, unauhaiin tuipui chena fe dingin Paula chu an tir suok ta a, Sila le Timothe ruok chu chutaka chun an la um zing a.
Chun, Paula ṭhuoituhai chun Atheni chenin an ṭhuoi a; chun, Sila le Timothe chu inhmawtaka a kuoma fe vakna ding thu incha chu phurin an kîr ta a.
Chun, Paulain Atheniah anni chu a lo nghâk laiin, khuo chu Pathien lima sipin a hmu a, a lungril a lunginzîng ta hle a.
Chuongchun, inkhâwmna inah Judahai le Pathien ngaisakhai a sêl hlak a, dâwr hmuna dâm khawm, chutaka hung um taphawthai chu ni tin a lo sêl bawk hlak a.

Chun, Epikuria mi le Stoik mi laia mi var tuhai amanih khawmin ama chu an hung sêl a, a ṭhenin, “Hi mipa bautam hin ieng am hril a tum a?” an ta. A ṭhenin, (Isu thu le thonâwkna thu a hril leiin,) “Ram dang pathienhai thu hriltu a ni âwm ie,” an ta.
Chun, ama chu an chel a, Areopagia chun an hung ṭhuoi a, a kuomah, “Hi inchûktirna thar i hril hlak hi mîn hriettir thei i ti?
Thilmak ieng amanih kan naah i hung intlun a nih; chuleiin, hieng thil umzie hi hriet kan nuom,” an ta.
(Athenia mi po po chu, an khuoa mikhuol umhai khawm, an inhman chang taphawt chu thu thar chu hrilin amanih, ngaiin amani bêk an um zing hlak hrim a na).
Chun, Paula chu Areopagi lai taka chun a ngîr a, a hril a, “Nangni Athenia mihai, kawng iengkimah sakhaw ngaisaktak mi in ni ti ka hriet a.

Ka lêng malama, chibai in ibûkhai ka en laiin, maichâm pakhat, a chungah, ‘HRIET NAW PATHIEN TA DING,’ tia ziek ka hmu a nih. Chuongchun, hre lova chibai in ibûk hlak kha, ama thu chu ka hril cheu a ni hi.
Thil tlasam angin mihriem kuta rawngbâwlpêkin a um bawk nawh. Ama ngei chu iengkim kuoma hringnahai, inthuoknahai, le thil po po petu chu a ni lem.
Chun, hnuoi chung po poa um dingin, bul hmunkhatin hnam tin mi a siem a. An ta dingin hun bihai a ruot a, an umna rihai khawm a khang pêk a;
Pathien an zawng a, an dap an dap a, an hmu hrâmna dingin; nisienlakhawm, ama chun a mi hlat naw seng si.
Ama leiin, ei hring, ei châng, ei um a ni si a; nangni hlaphuokthiem tuhai amani khawmin, ‘Eini khawm a thlahai ei nih,’ tia an hril ang khan.
Chuongchun, Pathien thlahai ei ni hnung chu, Pathien pangti chu, rângkachak dâm, tangka dâm, lung dâm, mihriem themthiemna le ngairuotnaa suthai ang hi ni dingin ei ngai ding a ni nawh.
Chuongchun, Pathienin ei hriet naw laihai kha hriet naw tehlêm a thaw hlak a; nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu ram tina mi po po sim ding thu a pêk tah a nih, ni a tiem leiin;
chu ni chun, a mi ruot chu, hnuoia mihai ro feltakin inrêltir a tih. Chu thu chu, Pathienin ama chu mithi laia inthawka a keithona chun, mi po po kuomah ân hriettir tah a nih,” tiin.
Chun, mithi laia inthawka thonâwkna thu chu an hriet phingleh a ṭhenin an nuisan a; a ṭhenin, “Hi thu hi i kuomah la ngai nâwk kan tih,” an ta.
Chuongchun, Paula chu anni laia inthawkin a suok ta a.

Nisienlakhawm, mi tuhai amanih a kuomah an ṭhang ta tlat a, an ring ta a; anni laia ṭhenkhathai chu Areopagia rorêltu pâwla mi Dionusia le, nuhmei pakhat a hming, Damari le, an kuoma mi danghai le chun an nih.
Chuong thil hnunga chun Paula chu Athenia inthawk chu a suok a, Korinthah a fe ta a.
Chun, a hming Akuila, Juda pakhat a hmu a, ama chu Ponto rama pieng a nih; Klaudiin Juda po po Roma inthawka suok thu a pêk leiin a nuhmei Priskilla leh Itali rama inthawka hung hlim an nih.
Chun, Paula chu anni ina chun a tlung ta a; chun, an sinthaw ang thaw a ni leiin anni a hrawn a, an kuomah a thaw ve hlak a; an sinthaw chu puon in siem a nih.
Châwlni po leh inkhâwmna inah ṭhahnemngaitakin thu a hril hlak a, Judahai le Grikhai chu inhmin a tum hlak a.
Chun, Sila le Timothe chu Makedonia rama inthawka an hung thla chun, Paula chu thu hril chauin a um ta a, Isu kha Krista a nih ti Judahai chu a hrilfie a. Nisienlakhawm, an kalin an hrilpâwi a,
Paulân a puon a thin a, an kuomah, “In thina maw chu nangnîn phur ro, kei chu ka hul a nih, tuta chen chu Jentailhai lai fe tâng ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun a fe a, mi pakhat a hming Tita Justa inah a lût a, ama chun Pathien a biek hlak a; a in chu inkhâwmna in bula um nih.
Chun, Krispa, inkhâwmna hotu chun, a sûnghai po po leh Lalpa an ring a, Korinth khuoa mi tamtak khawmin an hriet a, an ring a, baptisma an chang ta a.
Chun, zânah Lalpain Paula kuoma chun mang angin, “Ṭi naw la, to lovin thu hril pei rawh,
kei i kuomah ka um annâwm, sukna ding chein tukhawmin i chungah kut thlâk naw ni hai; hi khuoa hin mi tamtak ka nei si a,” a ta.
Chun, Paula chu chutaka chun, an kuomah Pathien thu inchûktirin kum khat le thla ruk a um a.
Chun, Gallio, Akaia rama lal aiawa a um laiin Judahaiin inthuruolin Paula an thaw a, rorêlna ṭhungpha hmaah an ṭhuoi a,
“Hi mipa hrep hin Dân naw anga Pathien be dingin mi a thlêmthlûk hlak a nih,” an ta.
Chun, Paulain a dawn tâwmin, Gallio chun Judahai kuomah, “Judahai, hieng hi thil indiknaw thu amanih bêk ni sienla, matheilovin ngaisak ka ti cheu a;
nisienlakhawm, thuhai, hminghai, nangni dân chung thuhai mei mei a ni chun, nangnîn rêl lem ro; kei chu chuong ang thu chu ngaituo ka nuom naw ie,” a ta.
Chun, rorêlna ṭhungphaa inthawk chun anni chu a hnawt hmang ta a.
Chun, Grik mihai po poin inkhâwmna in hotu Sosthen an man a, rorêlna ṭhungpha hmaa chun an vuok a. Gallio chun chuong an thilthaw chu ienga khawm a ngai nawh.
Chun, Ephesi chu an tlung a, chutaka chun anni chu a mâksan a; ama ruok chu inkhâwmna inah a lût a, Judahai chu Pathien thu a suipui a.
Chun, sâwt deu châm dingin an ngên a, nisienlakhawm, a remti naw a,
“Pathienin a phal chun, in kuomah la hung nâwk ka tih,” tiin ṭawngbauṭhain a ṭhe a; Ephesia inthawk chu lawngin a fe ta a.
Chun, lawnga inthawk chu Kaisariah a suok a, Jerusalemah a hang fe a, kohranhai chu chibai a bûk a; chun, chu zoa chun, Antiokeiah a zu fe ta a.
Chun, chutaka chun sâwt rei a um hnungin, a fe nâwk a, inchûktirhai po po sukdetin Galati ram le Phrugia ram chu a fang suok vawng a.
Chun, Juda pakhat a hming Apollo, Alexandria khuoa pieng, thuhril theitak, Ephesia chun a zu fe a; ama chun Pathien Lekha thuhai a hriet nasa bêk bêk a.
Ama chu Lalpa Lam thu inchûktir tah a na, lungrila ṭhahnemngaitak a ni leiin Isu chanchin nguntakin a hril a, ân chuktir hlak a, Johan baptisma thu chau a hriet si a.
Chun, inkhâwmna inah huoitakin thu a hril ṭan ta a. Chuongchun, Priskilla le Akuila chun a thu hril an hrietin; an inah an ṭhuoi a, a kuomah Pathien Lam thu fel nâwk zuolin an hrilfie ta a.

Chun, ama chun Akaia rama fe kai a tum phingleh unauhaiin an infui a, ama an lo lâwmna dingin inchûktirhai kuomah lekha an ziekpêk a. Chun, a tlung chun, Pathien lunginsietna leia ringtuhai chu nasatakin a ṭhangpui a.
Vantlâng hrietin Judahai chu nasatakin a sêldawng a, Pathien Lekha Thu hmangin Isu kha Krista chu a nih ti ân hriettir hlak a.
Chun, Paula chu khaw sak biel a fang suok zet a, Apollo Korintha a um kâr khan Ephesi chu a tlung a, inchûktir tuhai amanih a hmu a;
chun, ama chun an kuomah, “In ring tîr lai khan Thlarau Inthieng in chang am?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Chang lo, Thlarau Inthieng a um ti khawm kan hriet nawh,” an ta.
Ama chun, “Ieng baptisma am in chang a?” a ta. Anni chun, “Johan baptisma,” an ta.
Chu thu chu an hriet phingleh, Lalpa Isu hmingin baptisma an chang ta a.
Chun, Paulain an chungah a kut ân nghat a, Thlarau Inthieng chu an chungah a hung tlung ta a; chuongchun ṭawng hrietnaw haiin thu an hril a, Pathien thu khawm an hril ta a.
An rêng chun patling sâwm le pahni lai an nih.
Chun, Paula chu inkhâwmna inah a lût hlak a, thla thum lai huoitakin thu a hril a, Pathien ram kawng thua chun a sêl a, mi ân hmin hlak a.

Nisienlakhawm, a ṭhen chu an kawmaw a, an awi nuom naw a, mipui hmaah Lam thu chu an hrilsiet phingleh, ama chun anni a fe san a, inchûktirhai chu a kei hran a, ni tin Turanna inchûktirnaah a sêl hlak a.
Chuong ang ruok chun kum hni lai a thaw a; chuongchun, Asia rama um po po, Judahai le Grikhai khawmin, Lalpa thu chu an hriet ta a.
Chun, Pathienin Paula hmangin thilmak chungchuonghai a thaw hlak a.
Chuongchun, rawmawlhai amanih, a pang tâwk fênthuohai chu damnawhai kuomah an hung chawi a, an natnahai a bo hlak a, an sûnga inthawkin khawhrihai khawm an suok hlak a.
Chun, Juda mi thieminzawr ṭhenkhat, ramtina invâk tuhaiin amanih, “Paulain a thu a ikhêkpui hlak Isu hmingin kan vau che,” tiin khawhri imanhai chungah Lalpa Isu hming an lam hlak a.
Chun, Juda mi, thiempu lal pakhat, Skeva chun chuong ang thaw ve hlak naupasal pasari a nei a.
Nisienlakhawm, khawhri chun an kuomah, “Isu ka awi, Paula khawm ka hriet, nangni ruok chu tuhai am in ni leh?” a ta, a dawn a.
Chun, khawhri iman chun anni a hung baw a, an rêngin a hne a, a ngam ta lem a; chuongchun, chu ina inthawk chun saruok le hliem hielin an tlân suok ta a.
Chuongchun, Ephesia um po po, Judahai le Grikhai kuoma chun, chu thu chu ân thang ta a. Chuongchun, an rêngin an ṭi a, Lalpa Isu hming a lien ta a.
Chunawa khawm, ringtu hung ni tah tamtak chu inpuongin an thil chînghai an hril suok a.
Dawihmang ṭhenkhat khawmin an lekhabuhai an hung chawi khâwm a, mi po po mithmuah an râw ta a; chun a man an sût a, tangka sîng nga man niin an hriet.
Chuong ang lâwma nasa chun Lalpa thu chu ân dar a, a hne ta pei a.
Chun, chuong zoa chun Paulain, Makedonia ram le Akaia ram chu fang suok phawt a, Jerusalema fe a lungril a, “Chutaka ka fe zo chun Rom ka sir bawk ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, a ṭhangpuitu pahni, Timothe le Erasta chu, Makedoniaah ân fetir zet a, ama ruok chu Asia ramah a um hri a.
Chun, chuong lai vêl chun Lam thu lei chun buoina namên lo a hung suok ta a.
Mi pakhat a hming Demetria, tangkaruo suttu, tangkaruoa Diana
Ama chun anni chu a ko khâwm a, an sinthaw ang thawtuhai leh; chun, an kuomah, “Puhai, hi sin hi ei hausakna a nih ti in hriet.

Hitaka Ephesi chaua hin ni lovin Asia ram pumpui deu thawa khawm, hi Paula hin, ‘Kuta siem pathienhai hi Pathien an ni nawh,’ tiin mi tamtak thlêmthlûin a hîp hmang zo tah ti nangni ngeiin in hmuin in hriet bawk a.

Chuongchun, ei sinthaw lân a tih ti chau khawm hi ni lovin, pathiennu ropuitak Diana biekin khawm hi hung ngaitlâwm an ta, Asia rama mi po po le khawvêla miin an biek hlak hi, a ropui vei leh, tlâwm a tih ti ṭi a um bawk a nih,” a ta.
Chun, chuong thu chu an hriet phingleh an lunginsen ta bêk bêk a, “Ephesia mi Diana hi ropuitak a nih!” tiin an khêk a.
Chuongchun, a khuoin an buoi ta a, Gaia le Aristarka, Makedonia rama mi, Paula hnungzuituhai chu an man a, inthuruolin ennuom siemna inah an tlânpui a.
Chun, Paulain mipui lai lût a tum chun, inchûktirhai chun an phal naw a.
Chun, Asia rama hotutakhai laia ṭhenkhat tuhai amanih Paula ruolhai an na, a kuomah mi an tir a, ennuom siemna ina chun lût ṭâl lo dingin an ngên a.
Chun, umkhâwmhai chu an buoi a, mi tam lem chun an inkhâwmna san khawm an hriet naw a, chuleiin ṭhenkhat thu pakhatin an khêk a, ṭhenkhat thu dangin an khêk a.

Chun, mipui laia mi ṭhenkhatin an thiemna thu hril dân ding chu Alexandra an hril a, Judahaiin ama chu mi hma tieng chun an nam lût a, Alexandra chun a kutin a zâp a, mi po po kuoma chun an thiemna thu hril a tum a.
Nisienlakhawm, ama chu Juda mi a nih ti an hriet phingleh, dârkâr hni lai, rawl inruoltakin, “Ephesia mi Diana hi ropuitak a nih” ti ruokin an khêk a.
Chun, khaw lekhaziektuin mipui chu a vaudei zo chun, “Ephesia mihai, Diana ropuitak biekin le vâna inthawka milim tla kha, Ephesia mihai hi a vêngtu in ni ti, tû am a hre naw an um a?
Chuongchun, hieng thu hi sêl ruol a ni naw hnung chun in to zing ding a nih, thu dâwn lovin iengkhawm in thaw ding a ni nawh.
Hieng mihai hitaka in hung ṭhuoihai hi, biekin suomhmanghai an ni naw a, ei pathiennu hrilsetu hlak an ni bawk nawh.
Chuongchun, Demetria le a ruol themthiemhai khawmin tû chunga khawm thupawi an nei chun thupawi hrilna inhai chu hawng zing a nih annâwm, lal aiawtuhai khawm an um a; intlun raw hai se.
Thil dang pawi hrim nei in ni chun inkhâwm pângngaiah rem an tih.
Vawisûna nasêtum lei hin suosal ṭiumin ei um ta hi, a bul um si lovin; chuongchu a ni leiin, hi inkhâwmna san hi iengkhawm ei hril thei âwm naw hi,” a ta.
Chun, chuong ang thu a hril zo chun, umkhâwmhai chu ân ṭintir ta a.
Chun, buoina chu a re zo chun, Paulain inchûktirhai ân kotir a, ân fui a, ṭawng bauṭhain a ṭhe a, Makedonia rama fe dingin a suok ta a.
Chun, thu tamtaka inchûktirhai infui peiin chu ram chu a fang suok a, Grik ram a tlung ta a.
Chun, chutaka chun thla thum a thang hnungin Suria ram tieng lawngin a fe ding a na, Judahaiin ama an phierrûk leiin Makedonia rama fe nghâl a tum nâwk lem ta a.
Chun, Purrha naupa Sopater Beroia khuoa mi hai, Thessalonikaa mi Aristarka le Sekunda hai, Derbea mi Gaia hai, Timothe hai, Asia ram mi Tukik le Trophim hai, ama leh Asia rama chun an va fe ve a.
Chuonghai chun kan hma an ṭhuoi a, Troasa chun an mi lo nghâk zing a.
Keini ruok chu Chawlṭhanglo Bei ruoiṭhe ni po po hnunga chun Philippia inthawk chu lawngin kan suok a, ni nga chenah Troasah an kuom kan tlung a; chutaka chun ni sari kan châm a.
Chun, ni saria ni hmasataka chun, bei khawi dinga kan um khâwm laiin, Paula chu a zînga fe el ding ani leiin ṭhahnemngaitakin thu a hril a; zân ril chenin thu a hril pei a.
Chun, pindan chunghnung kan um khâwmnaa chun khâwnvar tamtak a um a.

Chun, tlangvâl pakhat, Eutuk an ti chu tukvera chun a ṭhung a, Paula thuhril chu a sâwt ta êm leiin inhnik takin a lo inlusu a. A îmu chun a hne ta êm leiin in sâwng thumnaa inthawk chun a tla a, a thi sain an zu lâk a.
Nisienlakhawm, Paula a ṭum a, a zu baw a, a zu pawm a, “Thlaphâng naw ro, a hnuk a la chat nawh,” a ta.
Chun, Paula a hang lâwn nâwk a, bei chu a khawi a, bu a fâk a, sâwttak, khawvar rakin an kuomah thukhawchâng a hril a, chu hnunga chun a fe ta a.
Chun, tleirawl chu damin an ṭhuoi a, an thlamuong zie chu namên ân nawh.

Chun, keini ruok chu lawngah kan lo fe ta a, Asso pan dingin lawng chun kan suok hmasa a, chutaka chun Paula chu inchuongtir kan tum a; ama chun kea hung a tum leiin chuong ang chun amain a ruot hrim a nih.
Chun, Assoah a mi hung fin nâwk chun kan inchuongtir ta a, Mitulin kan tlung a.
Chutaka inthawk chun lawngin kan fe nâwk a, a zînga chun Kia thlierkâr zâwn kan tlung a; a zing nâwk Sami thlierkâr kan sir a; chu zîng nâwk chun Mileti kan tlung nâwk a.
Chun, Paulain Asia rama um sâwt a nuom naw leiin, Ephesi chu lawnga khêl a tum sa hrim a na, a thei chun Jerusalemah Pentikost ni nang a tum a, a fe inhmaw a nih,
Chun, Miletia inthawkin Ephesiah mi a tir a, kohrana upahai a kuomah ân kotir a.
Chun, a kuoma an hung tlung chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Asia ram ka sir hlima inthawk tah, in kuoma ka um sûng po khan ka um dân kha in hriet a.
Judahaiin an mi phierrûk leia mitthli tla le, thil rinum ka chunga tlahai tuor pumin thuhnuoirawltakin Lalpa rawng ka bâwl hlak kha.
Khâng khan a sâwt ding thil chu in kuomah iengkhawm hril intîm ka nei naw a, vantlâng lai dâm inchûktir ka ma naw kha.
Judahai le Grikhai kuoma khawm Pathien tienga lungril inlet thu le, ei Lalpa Isu Krista tieng ringna ding thu kân hriettir hlak kha.
Chun, hre ro, tuhin lungrila fe lo thei lova kân hriet leiin, Jerusalemah ka fe ding a ni hi, chutaka chun ka chunga thil hung tlung ding chin ka hriet nawh.
Thlarau Inthiengin ‘Khuopna le rinumnain a tuok che’, tiin khaw tinah a mîn hriettir hlak, chu chau chu ka hriet a nih.
“Chun, hre ro, nangni po po, Pathien ram thu khêkpuia kân vâk kân vâkna hlakhai hin ka hmêl hmu nâwk ta naw ti niu ti ka hriet a.
Chuleiin, mi po po thisenah ka hul a nih ti vawisûn hin kân hriettir cheu.
Pathien thiltum po po arêngin in kuoma hril kân tîm naw a.
Pathien kohran ama thisena a inchâwk chu, châwm dingin, nangni le inrawihai po po chunga chun fimkhur ro, Thlarau Inthiengin an chunga hotuin a siem cheu hi.
Ka fe hnungin satene hrânghai nangni lai hung lût an ta, pâwlruol chu hla naw ni hai ti ka hriet.
Nangni laia mi khawm, inchûktirhai an kuoma inkawptir dingin thu hran hril la hung um an tih.
Chuleiin, ngaiven ro; kum thum rau, mitthli tla pumin asûn azâna, mi tin hal ka ma naw kha hre zing ro.
“Tuhin Pathien kuomah le a lunginsietna thuah kân kawltir cheu, chu chun a siem lien thei cheu a, mi inthienghai lai ro chan ân neitir thei bawk cheu a.
Tu tangkahai, rângkachakhai, silfênhai khawm kân hnar ngai naw kha.
Hi kuthai hin kei le ka ruolhai pawimaw chu a them suok hlak kha nangni ngeiin in hriet a.

Iengkim ka thaw taphawt ka thawhmu hlak cheu kha, chuonga sininrim pum le, Lalpa Isu thu hre zing pumin mi hrâtnawhai in ṭhangpui ding a nih; ama ngeiin, ‘Iengkhat lâk nêkin pêkin lukhâwng a nei lem’, a ti kha,” a ta.
Chun, chuong ang thu chu a hril zo chun, a dingṭhaṭhuon a, an rêngin a ṭawngṭaipui a.
Chun, an rêng chun an ṭap a, Paula chu an kuo a, an fâwp an fâwp a.
A hmêl an hmu nâwk naw ding thu a hril chu an lungngaina tak a nih. Chun, lawng chen chun ama an inthla ta a.

Chun, anni le chun kan inṭhe a, lawngin kan suok a, chu hnunga chun tlûntakin Kos thlierkâr kan tlung a; chun, a zîngah Rodi thlierkâr kan tlung nâwk a, chutaka inthawkin kan fe pei a, Patara kan tlung a;
chun, Phoiniki ram kai ding lawng pakhat kan hmu a, kan chuong a, kan fe pei ta a.
Chun, Kupra thlierkâr kan hmu a, vawitieng panin kan khêl a, Suria ram tieng kan fe pei a, Turaa chun khawmuolah kan suok phawt a; chutaka chun lawnga thuomhnaw thak suok ding a ni a.
Chun, inchûktirhai kan zawng suok a, chutaka chun ni sari kan châm a. Anni chun, Thlarau hrilin, Paula kuomah, Jerusalem sir lo ding an ta.

Nisienlakhawm, chuong ni zoa chun kan suok a, kan fe ta a, unauhai chun an rêngin, an nuhmei an nauhai leh khaw kâwl chenin an mi vân thla a; chun, tuipui panga chun kan dingṭhaṭhuon a, kan ṭawngṭai a.
Chun, “Damtakin”, kan in ti a, lawnga chun kan chuong a; anni ruok chu an inah an kîr nâwk ta a.
Chun, Turaa inthawka lawnga kan fe zo chun Ptolemai kan tlung a, unauhai chibai kan bûk a, an kuomah ni khat kan châm a.
Ama chun naunuhmei pali a nei a, nunghâk inthieng an nih, Pathien thu an hril hlak a.

Kan kuomah a hung a, Paula kâwnghrên a lâk a, a kehai, a kuthai ama le ama ân khuop a, chun, “Jerusalema Judahai chun hi kâwnghrên neitu hi hieng ang hin khuop an tih, Jentailhai kutah pe bawk an tih, Thlarau Inthiengin a tih,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu kan hriet phingleh, keini le chu khuoa mihai chun Paula chu Jerusalema hang fe lo dingin kan ngên ta rak a.
Paula chun a dawn a, “Iem a ta, in ṭap in ṭap a, ka thla in suksie ie! Lalpa Isu hming lei chun Jerusalema khuop chau ni lovin, thi khawm ka huom in sawnnaw,” a ta.
Chun, thlêm ruol a ni naw hnung chun, “Lalpa thu thu ni raw se,” kan ta, kan ma ta a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun kan thuomhnaw kan siem a, Jerusalemah kan hang fe a.
Kaisaria mi inchûktir tuhai amanih kan kuomah an fe ve a, anni chun a hming Mnason, inchûktir hmasa pâwl, Kupra thlierkâra mi pakhat, kan tlung-in dingpa chu an ṭhuoi ve a.
Chun, Jerusalem kan tlung chun unauhaiin hlimtakin an mi lo lâwm a.
A zînga chun Paula rawiin Jakob kuomah kan lût a; chutaka chun kohran upahai po po khawm an um a.
Chun, Paulain anni chibai a bûk zoin, a rawngbâwlna hmanga Pathienin Jentailhai laia thil ân thawtirhai chu a kip a kawiin a hril a.
Chun, unauhai chun chuong thu chu an hrietin Pathien an chawimawi a; chun, Paula kuoma chun, “Unau, Judahai laia ringtu tamzie i hmu a; an rêngin Dân chungah ṭhahnem an ngai bawk a.
Chun, nangin Jentailhai laia Juda umhai po po kuoma chun an nauhai ser tan lo ding le, dân anga um naw ding tiin, Mosie peithlâkna thu în chûktir hlak ti mi bauah an hriet a.
Iengtin am ni tâng a ta? I hung tlung ti an hriet ngei âwm si a.

Chuonghai chu ṭhuoi la, anni lai inthien fai ve la, an lu an vaw theina dingin an ta dingin sum sêng rawh: chuongchun, mi po poin mi baua i thu an hriethai kha, a tak a ni naw hrieng an ta, nang ngei Dân hrawin feltakin i um lem a nih hre el an tih.

Chun, a zînga chun Paulain pasalhai chu a ṭhuoi a, anni lai ân thienfai ve a, Pathien biekina chun a lût a, an ta dinga sa that seng ding a pêk pêk hmakhat chu inthienfainain an nei hri ding a nih ti, thiempu kuoma chun an hril lâwk a.
Chun, ni sari chu a tling vângin Asia rama Judahai chun Paula chu Pathien biekinah an hmu a, mipui po po an infui a, ama chu an man a,

an khêk a, “Israel mihai, mi ṭhangpui ro, hi mipa hi ram tinah mi po po kuomah, Juda mi dâm, Dân dâm, hi in dâm hi hrilsetu kha a nih; chu naw khawm chu Pathien biekina hin Grik mihai khawm a lûtpui a, hi in inthieng hi a suktirdakum tah a nih,” an ta.
A khuo chun an inlap ta mer mur a, mihai chu an tlân khâwm a. Paula an man a, Pathien biekina inthawk chun an kei dawk a, kawthai chu an khâr nghâl ta a.
Chun, ama chu sukhlum an tum lai chun Jerusalema mi po po an buoi ti thu chu sipai pâwl hotu laltak kuom a hang tlung a.
Ama chun sipaihai le sipai za hotuhai a ṭhuoi nghâl ta a, an kuomah a tlân thla a. Anni chun sipai hotu laltak le sipaihai an hmu chun Paula vuok chu an ma ta a.
Chun, hotu laltak chun a hung hnai a, Paula a chel a, khaidiet pahni inbuntir ding thu a pêk a; tû am a ni, ieng am a thaw ân dawn a.
Chun, mipui lai chun a ṭhen thu pakhatin an khêk a, a ṭhen thu dangin an khêk a. Chu, buoina sosang lei chun a chinchâng a hriet thei naw a, kulbîngah ṭhuoi lût ding thu a pêk a.
Chun, Paula kailâwn a tlung laiin mipuiin an thaw nasat leiin sipaihaiin ama chu an dawm kâng pei a;
mi po poin, “Sukbohmang ro” tia khêkin an zui hut hut si a.
Chun, Paula chu kulbînga chun an ṭhuoi lût ding laiin, ama chun sipai za hotu laltak kuoma chun, “I kuomah thu bau khat hril thei ka ti?” a ta. Ama chun, “Grik ṭawng i hriet maw?
Inhmaa mihai infuia, mihriem philhmanghai sângli thlalêra ṭhuoi suoktu Aigupta rama mi kha i ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Paula chun, “Juda mi, Kiliki rama Tarsa khuoa mi ka nih, khaw narâna um ka ni nawh; mi lunginsiet la, mi po po kuomah thu mîn hriltir rawh,” a ta.
Chun, a remti phingleh, Paula kailâwna chun a ngîr a, mi po po tona dingin kutin a zâp a; chun an to ṭhuop phingleh Hebrai ṭawngin an kuomah:
“Unauhai, pahai, tuhin in kuomah ka thiemna thu ka hril ding cheu a ni hi lo ngai ro,” a ta.
Chun, Hebrai ṭawngin an kuomah thu a hril ti an hriet phingin an to nâwk zuol a;

Thiempu Laltak le upahai po po khawmin chuong thu chu an mi hrietpui thei, an kuoma inthawka unauhai pêk dingin lekha ka hmu kha; chun, Damaskaa um taphawt an hrem dingin, khuop puma Jerusalema ṭhuoi dingin ka fe kha.
“Chun, ka fe a, Damaska khaw kâwl ka tlung chun, sûnbu fâk pha laiin, kârlovin vâna inthawka var nasatak ka vêlah a hung var phut a.
Chun, hnuoiah ka tlu a, ka kuomah, ‘Saula, Saula, nangin iengdinga i mi suknawmna am a na?’ tiin rawl ka hriet a.
Chun, keiin, ‘Tu am i na, Lalpa?’ tiin ka dawn a. Ama chun ka kuomah, ‘Nazareth Isu i suknawmnat hi ka nih,’ a ta.
Ka ruolhai chun var chu an hmu dea chu, a mi betu rawl ruok chu an hriet nawh.
Chun, keiin, ‘Lalpa, ieng am thâwng ka ta?’ ka ta. Lalpa chun ka kuomah, ‘Tho la, Damaskaah lût rawh, thil po po i thaw dinga ruot taphawt chu hril an ti che,’ a ta.
Chun, chu var nasat lei chun khuo ka hmu thei ta naw a, ka ruolhaiin kutin an mi kei a, Damaskaah ka lût ta a.
“Chun, mi pakhat, Anania, Dân kawnga Pathien ngaisak le chutaka Juda umhai po po kuoma hming ṭha chu,
ka kuomah a hung a, ka kâwlah a ngîr a, ka kuomah, ‘Unau Saula, mitvar nei rawh,’ a mi ta. Chu lai tak chun ka mit chu a hung var a, ama ka hang hmu ta a.
Chun, ama chun, ‘Ei thlatuhai Pathienin a ditzâwng hre ding le, Mi feltak chu hmua, a ṭawngbau khawm hre dingin a ruot ta che.
I hmu le i hriet thua khan mi po po kuomah ama thu hretu nîng i tih.
Chun, iengdinga i la um zing am? Tho la, ama hming lam pumin baptisma chang la, i suolhai sâwpfai ta la,’ a mi ta.
“Chun, Jerusalema hin ka kîr nâwk hnungin, Pathien biekina ka ṭawngṭai laiin, zêlin ka um a;
chun, ‘Inhmaw la, Jerusalema inthawkin suok rawh; ka chanchin i hril ding chu an pawm âwm naw hi,’ a mi ti lai ka hmu a.
“Chun, keiin, ‘Lalpa inkhâwmna in tinah a ringtu che taphawt intângna inah ka khum a, ka vuok hlak kha an hriet si a;
“Chun, ama chun, ‘Fe rawh; hitaka inthawka hlatakah, Jentailhai kuomah tir lem ka ti che,’ a mi ti a,” a ta.
Chun, chu thu chen chun an ngai a, rawl inringtakin, “Mi hieng ang hrep hi, khawvêla inthawkin sukbohmang ro, hring tlâk khawm a ni nawh,” an ti ta a.
An khêk a, an puonhai an hlîp a, an pei a, pilvut an vânvawr a,
chuongchun, sipai hotu laltak chun Paula chu kulbîng sûnga ṭhuoi lût thu a pêk a, a chunga chuong ang lâwma an khêkna san chu hrietna dingin vuok puma suosal dingin a ti a.
Chun, savun hruia an khuop zoin, Paulain a kâwla ngîr sipai za hotu kuoma chun, “Rom mi hrim hrim in vuok thei am a nih? thiemnaw inchangtir hnung khawm ni si lovin,” a ta.
Sipai za hotu chun chu chu a hriet phingleh, sipai hotu laltak kuomah chun a fe a, “I thil thaw ding hi fimkhur raw khai! Hi mipa hi Rom mi a lo ni ie,” a ta, a hril a.
Chun, sipai hotu laltak chu a hung a, a kuomah, “Rom mi i ni maw? Mi hril rawh,” a ta. Ama chun, “Ni e,” a ta.
Sipai hotu laltak chun, “Chu khaw mi ni dingin kei chu tangka tamtak ka sêng annaw,” a ta, a dawn a. Paula chun, “Kei chu Rom mia pieng hrim ka nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, sawisak puma suosal tumtuhai chun ama chu an mâksan nghâl ta a; sipai hotu laltak khawmin Rom mi a nih ti a hriet chun a ṭi a, ama a khuop lei khan a ṭi bawk a.

Chun, a zînga chun Judahaiin ieng leiin am Paula an hêka ti hriet fel tumin sipai hotu laltak chun ama chu a sût a, thiempu lalhai le rorêltuhai po po inkhâwm dingin thu a pêk a, Paula a ṭhuoi thlâk a, an hmaah ân ngirtir ta a.
Chun, Paula chun rorêltuhai chu a en zing a, “Unauhai, vawisûn chen hin Pathien mithmua ṭha tienga ka hriet taphawt chu thawin ka um hlak,” a ta.
Chun, thiempu Laltak Anania chun, Paula kâwla ngîrhai kuomah, a baua benpêk ding a ta.
Chun, a kâwla mihaiin, “Pathien thiempu Laltak i hal vei maw?” an ta.
Chun, chu chu a hril phingleh, Pharisaihai le Saddukaihai an lo insêl a, rorêltuhai chu an inkhing ta a.
(Saddukaihaiin, “Mithi thonâwkna hrim a um nawh, vântirkohai, thlarauhai khawm an um bawk nawh,” an ti hlak; Pharisaihai ruok chun chu kawng pahni chu a um an awi si a.)

Chuongchun, nasatakin an buoi ta a; Pharisai tienga mi Dân inchûktirtu ṭhenkhat an ngîr a, an sêl a, “Hi mipa hi a suolna iengkhawm kan hriet nawh ie; thlarau khawmin, vântirko khawmin ama hi be sienla ieng am pawi a ta?” an ta.
Chun, an insêl nasa deu deu leiin, sipai hotu laltak chun Paula an kei nâwi a ṭi a, sipaihai kuomah, zu fea anni laia inthawka kulbînga hung ṭhuoi lût el dingin a ta.
Chun, zâna chun Lalpa chu Paula kâwlah a ngîr a, “Thlamuongtakin um rawh, Jerusalema ka thu în hriettir ang bawkin Roma khawm în hriettir ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, nisa a suok chun Judahai an ṭhang ruol a, Paula an that hmakhat chu iengkhawm faa dâwn lo dingin an inkhâm a.
Chu thu phierrutuhai chu sâwmli nêka tam lem an nih.
Anni chu thiempu lalhai le upahai kuomah an fe a, “Paula kan that hmakhat chu iengkhawm intem lo dingin kan inkhâm tah a nih.

Chuleiin, nangnîn, rorêltuhai le a thu fel nâwkzuola ngaituo tum angin, in kuoma ṭhuoi thla dingin sipai hotu laltak kuomah pehêl deuin hang hril ro; in kâwl hnai a tlung hma khawmin keini ama that dingin kan inpei zing a nih,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Paula farnu naupa chun an inchân thu chu a lo hriet a, kulbînga chun a va lût a, Paula a va hril a.
Chun, Paula chun sipai za hotu pakhat a ko a,“Hi tlangvâl hi hotu laltak kuoma chun ṭhuoi rawh; a kuomah thu ieng amanih hril ding a nei a ni âwm ie,” a ta.
Chuongchun, sipai hotu laltak kuoma chun a va ṭhuoi a, “Paula intâng khan a mi ko a, hi tlangvâl hi i kuoma hung ṭhuoi dingin a mi tir a, i kuomah thu ieng amanih hril ding a nei a ni âwm ie,” a ta.
Sipai hotu laltak chun, a kutah a chel a, a fe hranpui a, inrûkin, “Ieng am mi hril ding i nei chu?” a ta, ân dawn a.
Chun, ama chun, “Paula thu fel nâwk zuola i ngaituo ding angin, zîngah rorêltuhai kuoma ṭhuoi thlâk dingin Judahaiin hni che an remti tlâng a.

Nisienlakhawm, an thu lo awi naw rawh; anni laia mi sâwmli nêka tam lemin an inchân zing a, chuonghai chun ama an that hmakhat chu iengkhawm faa dâwn lo dingin an inkhâm a; tuhin i thu nghâkin inpei sa zingin an um a nih,” a ta.
Chun, sipai hotu laltak chun tlangvâl chu ân fetir a, “Hieng thu hi i mîn hriettir tah ti tukhawm hril naw rawh,” a ta.
Chun, sipai za hotu pahni a ko a, “Zân, zâl hun pha, Kaisari chena fe ding sipai za hni leh, sakawr chung chuong mi sâwmsari leh, fei chawi mi za hni leh siem ro,” a ta.
Chun, Bawrsâp Felik kuoma chun, himtaka ân tlun theina dingin, Paula an inchuongtirna dingin sahai lo siem ding a ti bawk a.
Chun, hieng ang hin lekha a ziek a;
“Klaudi Lusiain Felik Bawrsâp ṭhatak chibai a bûk.
“Hi mipa hi Judahaiin an man a, an that ding laiin an kuomah sipaihai ṭhuoiin ka fe a, Rom mi a nih ti ka hriet a, ka san suok ta a.
Chun, an hêkna san hriet ka nuom a, an rorêltuhai kuomah ka ṭhuoi thlâk a.
Chuongchun, an dân thu ieng ienga manih hêk a nih ti ka hriet a, nisienlakhawm, an hêkna thuah thina le khuopna khawp rau dingin iengkhawm ka hriet si nawh.

Chun, Judahaiin ama an inchân ti miin an mîn hriettir phingleh, i kuomah ama hi ka hung tir nghâl ta a nih, a hêktuhai khawm, a chunga thupawi an nei taphawt chu i hmaa hril dingin thu ka pêk bawk a,” tiin.
Chuongchun, sipaihai chun a thupêk ang chun, Paula chu a zân a zânin an ṭhuoi a, Antipatri an tlungpui a.
A zînga chun sakawr chung chuong mihai chu, ama le fe pei dingin an kîr san a, kulbînga chun an fe nâwk ta a.
Chun, anni chu Kaisari khuo chu an tlung a, Bawrsâp kuomah lekha chu an pêk a, Paula khawm a hmaah an inngîrtir a.
Bawrsâp chun a tiem zoin Paula umna ram ân dawn a. Chun, Kiliki ram mi a nih ti a hriet phingleh,
“A hêktuhai che an hung tlung phingleh, i thupawi ngaituong ka tih,” a ta. Chun, Herod inah vêng ding thu a pêk a.
Chun, ni nga chenah Thiempu Laltak Anani a hung tlung thla a, upa tuhai amanih leh, a hming Tertulla thuhril thiem pakhat leh; chun, Paula chunga thupawi chu Bawrsâp kuomah an hril a.

Chun, Paula chu an ko suok hnung chun, Tertulla chun ama a hêk ṭan a, “Felik ṭha tak, nangma zârin thlamuongtakin kan um lei le, i enkawl leia hi chihai ta dinga suolhai chu khap ṭhata a um hlak leiin,
kumkhuoin khâwlai khawm lungawitakin kan lâwm hlak.
Iengkhawm ni sienla, i ta dinga nghawkum taluo ni ka nuom naw a, I nunnêmnain thu baukhat ruok chu mi ngaipêk dingin ka hni che a nih.
Hi mipa hi mi theidaumtak, khawvêla Judahai po po chawkbuoitu le, Nazareth pâwla a ṭhuoitu pakhat a nih ti kan hriet a.
Pathien biekin sukthieng naw a tum bawk a, chuleiin, kan man a nih; [kan dân anga a chungthu rêl kan nuom a,
nisienlakhawm, sipai hotu tak Lusia a hung a, ka kuta mi chu a hung ṭhuoi lui ta a.
Ama hêktuhai chu i hmaa inlang ding thu a pêk bawk a.]
Judahai khawm chun, “Chuong thu chu chuong ang tak chu a nih,” tiin an lo ṭhangpui a.
Chun, Bawrsâp chun thu hril dinga Paula chu kuta a zâp phingleh, ama chun, “Nang kum tamtak hi chihai rorêl pêktu i nih ti ka hriet leiin lâwmtakin ka thiemna thu ka hril ding a ni hi.
Jerusalema Pathien be dinga ka hang fe chen chu ni sâwm le pahni bâk la ni naw nih ti hre thei i tih.
Pathien biekina khawm, inkhâwmna inahai khawm khuoa khawm tukhawm ka sêl le mipui kân fui annîn an mi hmu bawk nawh,
tu khawm hin an mi hêkna thu hi i hrietah a bula inthawkin sui suok thei bawk naw ni hai.
Nisienlakhawm, hi thu hi i kuomah inphuong ka tih, ‘Chi hran,’ an ti, Lam dân angin ei thlatuhai Pathien ka biek hlak, Dân le zâwlneihai lekhabua ziek po po ringin.
Chun, mi fel le felnaw thonâwkna um a tih ti Pathien tieng ka beisei a, hienghai khawm hin chu chu an awi ve bawk si.
Chuleichun, Pathien kuom tienga le mihriem tienga khawm lungril suol naw mawl hi vawn tlat ka tum hlak.
Chuong lai chun, mipui khawm, sukbuoitu khawm um lovin, Pathien biekinah insukthiengin an mi hmu a.
Nisienlakhawm, chutaka chun Asia rama mi Juda tuhai amanih an um kha, chuonghai chun ka chungah thu an nei chun, hitaka hin i hmaa umin an mi hêk ding a nih.
Annawleh, hienghai ngei hin rorêltu hmaa ka ngîr lai khan, ka suksuol ieng am an hmu a, hril raw hai se,
