A hnetu taphawt chu ka lalṭhungphaah ka kuomah inṭhungtir ka tih; kei khawmin ka hne a, ka pa kuomah lalṭhungphaa ka ṭhung ang khan.
Thlarauin kohranhai kuoma thu a hril hi na nei chun hre raw se, a tih,” a ti a.

Chuong thil hnunga chun ka hang en a, chun, ngai ta, vânah kawtkhâr inhawng ka hmu a; chun, rawl ka hriet hmasak, tawtawrâwt ri anga mi bie khan, “Hitaka hin hung rawh, chuongchun, tuta hnunga thil hung um dinghai inentir ka ti che,” a ta.
Chu a ṭhung chu jaspi le sardion lung ang elin ân lang a; chun, lalṭhungpha vêla chun sumrisâng, ena smaragdin lung ang, ân zâm a.
Lalṭhungpha vêla chun lalṭhungpha sâwmhni le pali a um a; chun lalṭhungphahaia chun upa sâwmhni le pali puon vâr sila ṭhung ka hmu a, rângkachak lallukhumhai an khum a.
“Lalpa Pathien Iengkimthawthei,
Um ta le, um zing le hung um ding chu,
Ân thieng ie, ân thieng ie, ân thieng ie,” tiin sûn le zân an châwl ngai nawh.
Chun, thilhringhai chun lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chatuona hring zing chu an sukropuia, an chawimawia, lâwmthu an hril po leh,
upa sâwmhni le pali hai chu lalṭhungphaa ṭhung hmaa chun an bawkkhup a, chatuona hring zing chu chibai an bûk a, an lallukhumhai chu lalṭhungpha hmaa chun an sie a,
“Nang kan Lalpa le kan Pathien,
Ropuina dâm, chawimawina dâm, thilthawtheina dâm chu
Hmu tlâk i nih ie,
Nangin iengkim i siem a,
I dit leia um le siem
An ni bawk si a,”
tiin.
Chun, vântirko hrâttak rawl inringtaka, “Tu am lekhabu hi phara a închiknahai hi sût tlâk um an ta?” tia tlânginsamin ka hmu bawk a.
Chun, vâna dâm, hnuoia dâm, hnuoi hnuoia dâm khawm lekhabu chu phar thei tûkhawm an um naw a, a en thei khawm an um bawk naw a.
Lekhabu chu phar le a en thei tûkhawm an um naw leiin ka ṭap ta ngâwi ngâwi a.
Chun, ama chu a hung a, lalṭhungphaa ṭhung kut chang tienga lekhabu chu a lâk ta a.
“Nang lekhabu chu laa,
A închiknahai sût tlâk i nih;
Thatin i um ta a,
Chi tina mi dâm, ṭawng tina mi dâm,
Mi tina mi dâm, hnam tina mi dâm,
Pathien ta dingin i thisenin închâwk a,
Thiempuahai i siem ta si a;
Chun hnuoiah ro rêl an tih,”
tiin.
chuonghai chun rawl inring takin,
“Berâmte that ta hi
Thilthawtheina dâm, hausakna dâm,
Varna dâm, hrâtna dâm, chawimawina dâm, ropuina dâm,
Malsâwmna dâm hmu tlâk a nih ie,”
an ta.
Chun, vân le hnuoi chung le, hnuoi hnuoi le, tuipui chunga thilsiem tinrêng umhai le, chuonghai sûnga um po pohaiin,
“Lalṭhungphaa ṭhung le,
Berâmte kuoma chun,
Malsâwmna dâm, chawimawina dâm,
Ropuina dâm, rorêlna dâm,
Chatuonin um raw se,”
an ti ka hriet bawk a.
Chun, thilhring palihai chun, “Amen”, an ti a. Upahai khawm chun bawkkhupin chibai an bûk ta a.
Chun, Berâmte chun inchikna pasari laia pakhat chu a sût lai ka hmu a; chun, thilhring palihai laia pakhat chun, vâninrûm ang elin, “Hung rawh,” a ti ka hriet a,
Chun, inchikna pahnina chu a hang sût phingleh, thilhring pahnina chun, “Hung rawh,” a ti ka hriet a.

Chun, inchikna pathumna chu a hang sût phingleh, thilhring pathumna chun, “Hung rawh,” a ti ka hriet a. Chuongchun, ka hang en a, chun, ngai ta, sakawr dum ka hmu a; a chunga chuong chun bûkna a chawi a.
Chun, thilhring palihai laia inthawk chun râwl âwmtak hin, “Duliin
Chun, inchikna palina chu a hang sût phingleh, thilhring palina rawl chun, “Hung rawh,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, inchikna pangana chu a hang sût phingleh, maichâm hnuoia Pathien thu lei le an pawm inhriettirna thu leia thathai thlarau chu ka hmu a;
anni chun rawl inringtakin, “Aw Lalpa, mi inthieng le indiktak, ieng chen am rorêl lova hnuoia umhai chunga kan thisen insuona phuba chu la lova i um ding?” tiin an khêk a.
Chun, an kuoma chun puon vâr an pêk seng a; chun, an suok chanpuihai le an unauhai, anni ang bawka that dinghai khawm chu an kim hmakhat chun an la châwl hri ding a nih ti an hril a.
Chun, vâna arasihai chu, theichang kûng thlipuiin a nuoi a, a selhai a ṭil ang elin hnuoiah an tla ta a.
Chun, vântirko dang, Pathien hring inchikna chawi, nisa suoknaa hang fe ka hmu bawk a; chun, ama chun vântirko pali, khawmuol le tuipui suksiet theina pêka umhai kuoma chun, rawl inringtakin,
Chun, an inchik zât chu ka lo hriet a, Israel thlahai hnam tina mi nuoi khat le sîng li le sâng li an inchik a.
Juda hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Reuben hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Gad hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Aser hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Naphtali hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Manasse hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Simeon hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Levi hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Issakar hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Zebulun hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Josef hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni,
Benjamin hnama mi sîng khat le sâng hni an inchik ta a nih.

Chu hnunga chun ka hang en a, chun, ngai ta, mipui nasatak tûkhawm itiem sêng naw, hnam tin laia mi dâm, chi tin laia mi dâm, mi tin laia mi dâm, ṭawng tin laia mi dâm puon vâr sila, tûm kâu chawiin, lalṭhungpha hma le Berâmte hmaa ngîr ka hmu a;
chuonghai chun rawl inringtakin,
“Ei Pathien lalṭhungphaa ṭhung kuoma le,
Berâmte kuomah sandamna,”
tiin an khêk a.
Chun, vântirko po pohai chu lalṭhungpha le upahai le thilhring palihai vêla chun ngîrin an um a; chun, lalṭhungpha hmaa chun bawkkhupin.
“Amen, malsâwmna dâm, ropuina dâm, varna dâm,
Lâwmthu hrilna dâm, chawimawina dâm,
Thilthawtheina dâm, hrâtna dâm,
Chatuonin ei Pathien kuomah um raw se, Amen”
tiin Pathien chibai an bûk a.
Chun, upahai laia pakhat chun, ka kuomah, “Hieng silfen vâra inthuomhai hi tuhai am an na, khâwtaka inthawka hung am an ni a?” tiin a mi biek a.
Chuleiin, Pathien ṭhungpha hmaah an um a nih, chun, a sûn a zânin a biekina chun a rawng an bâwl hlak a; lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chun an chungah puon in chu zâr a tih.
Inchikna pasarina chu a hang sût phingleh, dâr chenve lai vân chu a dei ṭhuop a.
Chun, vântirko pasari Pathien hmaa ngîr hlakhai chu ka hmu a; an kuomah tawtawrâwt pasari an pêk a.
Riminhnik raw khu chu vântirko kuta inthawk chun Pathien hmaah a hang fe ta a, mi inthienghai ṭawngṭainahai le chun.
Chun, vântirko pasari tawtawrâwt pasari chawihai chu mût dingin an inbuotsai ta a.
Vântirko pahnina chun a hang mût a; chuongchun, tlâng lientak meia kâng lai ang tuisuorietah an pei thlâk a.

Chuongchun, tuisuoriet hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu thisenin a hung inchang ta a. Tuipuia thilsiem, hringna neihai chu, hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu an thi ta bawk a, lawnghai khawm hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu suksiet a ni ta bawk a.

Chun, ka hang en a, mupui vânlaizâwla vuongin, rawl inringtakin, “Vantirko pathum tawtawrâwt la mût ding, chu ri la hung um dinghai lei chun hnuoia umhai chung a rik ie, a rik ie, a rik ie!” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, vântirko pangana chun a hang mût a; chuongchun, arasi, vâna inthawka hnuoia tla sa ka hmu a; chun, vânsam khur chabi chu a kuomah an pêk a,
Chun, an kuoma chun mihriemhai chu sukhlum êm lova, thla nga sukrinum lem dingin thu an pêk a; an sukrinumzie chu ainuvêtin mi a seh a, a sukrinum ang hi a nih.
Ainuvêt mei ang mei an nei a, an meihmawrhaia chun tûr a um bawk a.Thla nga sûng mihriem suknat theina thilthawtheina an nei a.
Vânsam khur tirko chu an chunga laltakah an nei a, Hebrai ṭawngin a hming chu Abaddon
Chungrikna hmasatak chu a bo ta a, ngai ta, tuta hnung chungrikna pahni la um a tih.
Chu rawl chun vântirko parukna, tawtawrâwt chawi kuoma chun, “Euphrates vadunga vântirko pali khuophai kha sût rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, chu dârkâr le ni le thla le kuma ding chun, mihriem hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat sukhlumtu dinga buotsai tah, vântirko palihai chu an sût ta a.
Sipai sakawr chung chuonghai chu an tam tieng sîng ruoka hmun sîng hni an nih; an tam tieng chu mi hril ka hriet a nih.

Chun, inlârnaa chun sakawr le an chunga chuonghai chu hieng ang hin ka hmu a nih, mei le ngên le kât ang hi âwmphaw an nei a, Sakawr luhai chu sakeibaknei lu ang hi a nih, an baua inthawk chun mei le meikhu le kâthai a suok a.
Chuong hremna pathum hai chun mihriem hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat chu a sukhlum ta a, mei le meikhu le kât an baua inthawka suok khan.
Sakawrhai thilthawtheina chu an baua le an meiah a ni a um chu. An meihai chu rûl ang a na, luhai a nei bawk a; chu chun a nih mi an suknat hlak chu.
An tuolthathai khawm, an dawi hmanghai khawm, an indithai khawm, an inrûkhai khawm an sim chuong nawh.
Chun, vântirko hrâttak dang pakhat, sûma inthuom, vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmu a; a lua chun sumrisâng ân zâm a, a hmai chu nisa ang a na, a kehai chu mei ban ang a nih.
A kuta chun lekhabu chîtê phawk sa a chawi a, a ke changtiengin tuisuoriet a sir a, a vawitiengin khawmuol a sir a;
sakeibaknei inhûk angin rawl inringtakin a khêk ta a. A khêk zo chun vâninrûm pasarihai chun an rawl an insuo ta a.
Chun, vâninrûm pasarihai chun an rawl an insuo phingleh ziek ka tum a; chuongchun, “Vâninrûm pasarihai thu hril chu ip tlat la ziek naw,” tiin vâna inthawkin rawl ka hriet a.
Chun, vântirko tuipui le khawmuola ngîr ka ihmu chun a kut chang tieng vân tieng a phar a,
chatuona hring zing, vân, a chunga thil umhai le hnuoi, a chunga thil umhai le, tuipui, a sûnga thil umhai le siemtu chu sâlin, “Hun um ta naw ni.
Chun, vâna inthawka rawl ka ihriet khan a mi biek nâwk a, “tuipui le khawmuola ngîr vântirko kuta lekhabu phar sa saw va la rawh,” a ti ka hriet a.

Chun, vântirko kuoma chun ka va fe a, a kuomah, “Lekhabu chîtê kha mi pe rawh,” ka ti a. Ama chun ka kuomah, “La la, fa zo vawng rawh, chuongchun, i phîng chu sukkhâng a ta, i baua ruok chun khuoizu angin thlum a tih,” a ta.
Chun, ka kuomah, “Mi tamtak dâm, hnam tamtak dâm, ṭawng tamtak dâm, lal tamtak dâm chungchâng thu hril nâwk i tih,” an ti a.
Chun, ka thu hretu pahnihai kuoma chun thu pêng ka ta, chuongchun, saiip puon silin ni sâng khat za hni sâwmruk sûng po thu hril an tih,” a ta.
Anni chu tûkhawmin suknat an tum chun, an baua inthawkin mei a hung suok a, an hmêlmahai chu a kânghmang hlak. Tûkhawmin anni chu suknat tum ang sienla, chuong ang bawka sukhlumin an um ding a nih.
Chun, mihai laia mi dâm, chihai laia mi dâm, ṭawnghai laia mi dâm, hnamhai laia mi dâmin ni thum le a chenve an ruong chu en an ta, an ruonghai chu thlâna phûm phal naw ni hai.
An thi leiin hnuoia umhai chu lâwm an ta, hlimna siem an ta, thilpêkhai inthawn tuo bawk an tih; zâwlnei pahni hai chun hnuoia umhai chu an sukrimsik hlak leiin.
Chungrikna pahnina chu a bo ta a, ngai ta, chungrikna pathumna chu a hung um vak ding a nih.
Chuongchun, Pathien hmaa an lalṭhungphaa upa sâwmhni le pali ṭhunghai chu an bawkkhup a, Pathien chibai an bûk a.
“Aw Lalpa Pathien, Iengkimthawthei, um zing le um tah, i thilthawtheina ropuitak chu laa ro i rêl leiin lâwmthu kan hril che.
Chun, thilmak ropuitak vânah a hung inlang ta a; nuhmei nisaa inthuom, a ke hnuoia thla um, arasi sâwm le pahnia siem lallukhum khum a hung um a;
ama chun nau a vawn a; nauhase nain ân rûm a.
Chun, nuhmei chu thlalêra Pathien ibuotsai hmun a neinaa chun a tlân hmang a, chutaka chun ni sâng khat za hni sâwmruk an châwm theina dingin.
Chun, vâna chun indona a hung um a; Mikael le a vântirkohai chun dragon chu an do a;
dragon le a tirkohai khawm chun an do ve a; nisienlakhawm, an hne ta naw a, an hmun chu vânah a um ta bawk nawh.
Chun, dragon lientak, Rûlpui tar, Diebol le Setan an ti, khawvêl po po hlêmtu chu, an pei thlâk ta a; hnuoiah an pei a, a tirkohai khawm an pei thlâk sa ve a.

Chun, vâna chun rawl inringtakin, “Tuhin chu ei Pathien sandamna le thilthawtheina le ram chu a hung tlung ta a, a Krista thuneina leh; ei unauhai hêktu, ei Pathien hmaa a sûn a zâna hêk hlaktu chu, an pei thlâk ta si a.
Berâmte thisen lei le an inhriettirna thu leiin, ama chu an hne a nih; thi ngam khawpin an hringna an ngainêp bawk a.

Chuleiin, aw vânhai le a sûnga umhai, lâwm ro! Hnuoi le tuipuia um po pohai, in chung a rik ie! Diebol chun hun tlâwmte chau a nei tah ti hrea lunginsen bêk bêka in kuoma a hung thla ta leiin,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, dragon chun hnuoia pei thlâk a nih ti ân hriet phingleh naupasal neitu nuhmei chu a suknawmna ta a.
Chuongchun, thlalêra a hmuna chun a vuong lût theina dingin nuhmei chu mupui lientak thla khing hni an pêk a, chutaka chun rûlpui hmu phâk nawah hun khat le hunhai le hun chenve sûng po châwm an tih.
Chun, rûlpui chun tuiin a lên hmang theina dingin nuhmei hnunga chun vadung ang elin a baua tui a pik suok a.
Nisienlakhawm, hnuoiin nuhmei chu a ṭhangpui a, hnuoi chun a bau a ka a, dragonin abaua inthawka a pik suok vadung chu a lem zo ta a.
Chuongchun, dragon chu nuhmei chunga chun a hung lunginsen a, a thla la um Pathien thupêkhai zâwm a, Isu inhriettirna thu pawmhai chu do dingin a fe ta a.
Chuongchun, dragon chu tuisuoriet ṭieuphoa chun a ngîr ta a.
A lu pakhat chu thipui khawp raua hliem angin ka hmu a, nisienlakhawm, thipui khawp rau dinga hliem chu a dam ta a; chuongchun, hnuoia mi po poin Sahrâng chu mak an ti a, an zui a.
Chun, Sahrâng kuoma chun a thuneina chu a pêk leiin dragon chu Pathien chibai bûkin an bûk a; chun, “Sahrâng ang hi tu am a uma, tuin am do thei a ta?” tiin Sahrâng khawm chu an bûk bawk a.
Chun, uongna le Pathien hrilsietna thu hrilna bau a kuoma pêk a na, thla sâwmli pahni châng dingin thuneina pêk a ni bawk a.
Chun, mi inthienghai a do le a hne phal a na, chi tinrêng dâm, mi tinrêng dâm, ṭawng tinrêng dâm, hnam tinrêng dâm chunga thuneina a kuoma pêk a ni bawk a.
Tûkhawmin na a nei chun hre raw se.
Chun, Sahrâng dang hnuoia hung suok ka hmu a; berâmte kî ang ki pahni a nei a, dragon ṭawng angin a ṭawng a.
Sahrâng hmasa thuneina po po ang kha a mithmuah a hmang a, Hnuoi le a chunga um po pohai chu Sahrâng hmasa lem, thipui khawp rau dinga hliem dam nâwk chu, chibai ân bûktir bawk a.
Chun, mihriem mithmuah vâna inthawka hnuoia mei intlâktir thei khawp rauin thilmak ropuitak a thaw hlak.

Hnuoia umhai kuomah, Sahrâng kâwlhnâma hliem hnung la dam chawimawina dingin ama lim an siem ding a ni ti hrilin, Sahrâng mithmua thilmak thaw dinga thu a ihmu, chuong thilmak lei chun hnuoia umhai chu a hlêm bawk a.
Chun, Sahrâng lim chu a ṭawng theina ding le, Sahrâng lim chibai bûk naw taphawt ân sukhlumtir theina dingin Sahrâng lim kuoma chun inthuokna pêk phal a nih.
Chun, mi po po a lien a chînin, a hausa a pasiein, suok le suok nawhai khawm, an kut chang tienga manih, an chala manih inchikna ân neitir tâwl a;
inchikna, Sahrâng hming amanih, a hming nambar amanih, neihai chau naw chun, tûkhawmin iengkhawm an inchâwkin an zawr thei nawna dingin.
Hitaka hin varna inlang theina a um. Hriet theina nei chun Sahrâng nambar chu sût raw se; mihriem nambar a ni si a; a nambar chu za ruk sâwmruk paruk a nih.
Chun, vâna inthawka rawl ri, tui tamtak ri ang le, vâninrûm ri nasatak ri ang, ka hriet a; chun, ka ri hriet chu ṭingṭang keituhaiin an ṭingṭang an kei ri ang a na,

lalṭhungpha hmaa le, thilhring pali le upahai hmaa chun hla thar ni âwmtak hi an sak a; chun, hnuoia inthawka intlan tah, mi nuoi khat le sîng li le sâng li chau naw khan chu, tûkhawmin chu hla chu an inchûk thei nawh.

Chuonghai chu nuhmeia insukthiengnaw nawhai chu an nih; nunghâk inthieng ang an ni si a. Chuong chu Berâmte a fena taphawta zuituhai chu an nih. Chuong chu Berâmte le Pathien ta dinga ra hmasatak ni dinga mihriem laia inthawka intlan suok an nih.
Chun, hnuoia umhai kuoma le, hnam tinrêng dâm, chi tinrêng dâm, ṭawng tinrêng dâm kuoma tlânginsampui dinga chatuon Chanchin Ṭha nei vântirko dang vânlaizâwla vuong ka hmu a;
Ama chun rawl inringtakin, “A rorêl hun chu a hung tlung ta leiin Pathien chu ṭi unla, chawimawi ro; vân dâm, hnuoi dâm, tuipui dâm, tui hnâr dâm siemtu chu chibai bûk ro,” a ti a.
Chun, vântirko dang, a pathumna chun rawl inringtakin, “Tûkhawmin Sahrâng le a lim chibai bûkin a chala manih, a kuta manih inchikna a nei chun, chu mi ngei chun Pathien lunginsenna uoiin,
Hitaka hin mi inthieng Pathien thupêkhai le Isu ringna thu zâwmtuhai selna inlang theina a um.

Chun, vâna inthawkin rawlin, “Hienghin ziek rawh: Tuta hnung chu mithi, Lalpaa thihai chu, an hamṭha. Thlarau chun, ‘Anih, an sininrimnahai chu châwl san tâng an tih; an thilthawhai chun a hung zui ve ding a ni si a,’ a tih,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, vântirko dang, Pathien biekina inthawkin a hung suok a, sûm chunga ṭhung kuoma chun rawl inringtakin, “I kâwite kha keidawk la, ât rawh; ât a hun ta si a; hnuoi bu khu a ngui zo tah khu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, sûm chunga ṭhung chun a kâwite chu hnuoiah a thlâk a, hnuoi bu chu an ât ta a.
Chun, vântirko dang vâna Pathien biekina inthawkin a hung suok nâwk a, ama khawm chun kâwite ngeitak a chawi bawk a.

Chun, vântirko dang, mei chunga thuneitu chu, maichâma inthawkin a hung suok nâwk a; chun, ama chun rawl inringtakin, “I kâwite ngeitak kha keidawk la, hnuoia grêp hrui ra bâwrhai khu zu ât rawh, grêp rahai khu a hmin ṭuo ta khu,” tiin kâwite ngeitak chawitu chu a ko a.
Chuongchun, vântirko chun a kâwite chu hnuoiah a thlâk a, hnuoia grêp ra chu a ât a, grêp sâwrna khur lientak, Pathien lunginsenna grêp sâwrna khura chun a the lût a.
Chun, vânah inchikna dang ropuitak le maktak ka hmu a, vântirko pasari hremna pasari chawihai chu; chuong chu hremna nuhnung takhai an nih; chuonga chun Pathien lunginsenna chu a kim ta si a.
Hlimen ang el tuipui, mei le inpawl ka hmu a, Sahrâng le a lim, inchikna le a hming nambar hnea hung suokhai chu Pathien ṭingṭanghai an kuthaia chawia hlimen tuipui chunga ngîr ka hmu a.
“Aw Lalpa Pathien Iengkimthawthei,
I thilthawhai chu a ropuiin a mak a;
Nang, hnam tin Laltak,
I lampuihai chu a felin ân dik a nih.
Chawimawi naw ding?
Nang chau în thieng si;
I thilthaw felhai chu suklang a ni ta leiin,
Hnam tinrêngin chibai hung bûk an ti che,” tiin.
chuongchun, pindan sûngrila inthawk chun hremna pasari chawi vântirko pasarihai chu, puon inthieng vârtak silin, an âwm rangkachak kâwngkhia inkhitin an hung suok a.
Chun, thilhring pali laia pakhat chun vântirko pasarihai kuoma chun, Pathien chatuona hring zing lunginsennaa sip rângkachak berbu pasari a pêk a.
Chun, pindan sûngrila inthawk chun rawl inringtakin, vântirko pasarihai kuoma chun, “Fe unla, Pathien lunginsenna berbuhai chu hnuoiah bunthla ro,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, a pahnina chun a berbu chu tuipuiah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, mithi thisen angin thisenin ân chang ta a; chun, thilhring tinrêng tuipuia umhai chu an thi ta vawng a.
Chun, tui vântirko chun, “Nang Mi Inthieng, hieng anga ro i rêl leiin, nang um zing le um tah, i fel ie.
Anni chun mi inthienghai le zâwlneihai thisen an insuo a; chun, nangin dâwn dinga thisen ma i pêk thung hi dâwn tlâk an ni hrim deh,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, maichâm chun, “Anih, Aw Lalpa Pathien, Iengkimthawthei, i rorêlhai chu ân dikin a fel a nih,” a ti ka hriet a.
Chun, a palina chun a berbu chu nisaah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, nisa chu meia mihriem em ût dingin thilthawtheina an pêk a.
Chuongchun, mihai chu lumtaka em ûtin an um a, chuong hremna chunga thuneitu Pathien hming chu an hrilsiet a, ama chawimawi dingin an sim chuong nawh.
an nahai le an pânnahai leiin vâna Pathien chu an hrilsiet a; an thilthawhai chu an sim chuong nawh.
Chun, dragon baua inthawk le Sahrâng baua inthawk le, zâwlnei tehlêm baua inthawk chun thlarau inthiengnaw pathum u ni âwmtak, hung suok ka hmu a.
Chuong chu khawhri thlarau, thilmak thaw hlakhai an nih. Anni chu Pathien Iengkimthawthei ni ropuia indonaa ṭhuoi khâwm dingin khawvêl po poa lalhai kuomah an fe a.
Chun, a pasarina chun a berbu chu boruokah a bunthlâk a; chuongchun, pindan sûngrila, Lalṭhungphaa inthawkin, “A kim tah,” tiin rawl inringtak a hung suok a.
Chun, vântirko pasari berbu pasari chawihai laia pakhat chun a mi biek a. “Hung ta, tui tamtaka ṭhung, nawchizawr ropuitak hremna chu inentir ka ti che.
A bâwka chun thurûk, “BABULON KHAW ROPUI, HNUOIA NAWCHIZAWRHAI LE THIL TIRDAKUMHAI NU,” tia hming ziek a um a.
Chun, chu nuhmei chu mi inthienghai thisen le Isu martarhai thisena inruiin ka hmu a. Ka hmu phingleh mak ka ti bêk bêk a.
Chuongchun, vântirko chun ka kuomah, “Ieng leiin am mak i ti a? Nuhmei le a phurtu sahrâng lu sari le ki sâwm nei thurûk hril ka ti che.
Hitaka hin lungril varna nei inlang theina a um. Lu sarihai chu nuhmei ṭhungna tlâng pasarihai chu an nih. Lal pasari khawm an na;
pangahai chu an tlâwm ta a, pakhat chu a la um, pakhat chu a la hung um hri naw a; a hung um pha chun sâwtnawtê um ding a nih.
Chun, sahrâng um ta zeta, um nâwk ta naw ngei khawm kha a parietna a na, pasarihai laia mi kha a ni nghe nghe a; bohmangnaah fêng a tih.
Chuongchun, thu hmunkhatin an thilthawtheina le thuneina chu sahrâng pêng an tih.
Chuongchun, Berâmte chu do an ta, chun, Berâmte chu hotuhai Hotu le lalhai Lal a ni leiin anni chu hnêng a tih; chun, a kuoma um, kohai, thlanghai, ringumhai chun hne bawk an tih,” a ti a.
Chun, ama bawk chun ka kuomah, “Nawchizawr ṭhungna tui i hmuhai kha, mi dâm, mipui dâm, hnam dâm, ṭawng dâm a nih.
Chun, ki sâwm i hmu le sahrâng chun nawchizawr chu theidâng an ta, iengkhawm neinaw le saruokin siem an tih, a sa khawm fâng an ta, meiin rawhmang an tih.
Pathien thuhai chu a tlung hmakhat chun a dit zâwng an thawna ding le thu thuhmuna an um theina dingin le, an ram chu sahrâng kuoma an pêkna dingin Pathienin an lungrilah a tir ta si a.
Chun, i nuhmei hmu kha, khaw ropui, hnuoia lalhai chunga rorêltu chu a nih,”a ta.
Chuong hnunga chun vântirko dang, thuneina nasatak neiin vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmu a; a ropuinain hnuoi chu a el ta vawng a.
“Ân sukropui le ân hawitirzie ang pei khan sawisain suklungngai thung ro; a lungril chun, ‘Lalnuin ka ṭhung a nih, hmeithai hrim ka ni naw a, lungngaina hmu dêr naw ningah’, a ti si a.
“Chun, hnuoia lal, a dit hlakhai le ân hawitirpui hlakhai chun, a kâng khu chu an hmu pha a chunga ṭapin âwm inchum an ta;

An thuomhnawhai chu, rângkachak dâm, tangka dâm, lungmantam dâm, tuikeplung dâm, puon zai inhmi dâm, puon senduk dâm, tuktulungêk puon dâm, puon sen inlâr dâm leh; thing riminhnik tinrêng dâm, saiha bêl tinrêng dâm, thing hlutak le dâr le thîr le sailungvâra siem, bêl tinrêng dâm leh;
‘Ra i lungrilin a châkhai chun a fe hmang san che a, thil tuihnâi le mawi po po chun an bohmang san che a, hmu nâwk ta naw tawp an tih,’ an ti a.
‘Khaw ropui, puon zai inhmi le puon sen duk le puon sen inlâr sila, rângkachak le lungmantam le tuikeplunga inchei chu, a chung a rik, a chung a rik!

“Chun, lawng hotu taphawt dâm, lawnga fe hlak taphawt dâm, lawng mi dâm, tuipuia sinthaw taphawt dâm chu hlataka ngîrin, a kâng khu chu thlîr pumin, ‘Hi khaw ropui tluk hi khâwlai khuo am um a ta?’ tiin an khêk a.
Chuong hnunga chun vânah mipui nasatakhai rawl inringtak ni âwmtak hin, “Halleluia, sandamna dâm, ropuina dâm, thilthawtheina dâm, ei Pathien ta a nih.
Chun, upa sâwmhni le pali le thilhring palihai chu an bawkkhup a, “Amen, Halleluia,” tiin Pathien lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chu chibai an bûk a.
Hlimtakin lâwm inla, ama chawimawi ei tiu, Berâmte nuhmei nei chu a hun ta si a; a mo khawm ânzo tah,” a ti ka hriet.
Puon zai inhmi faitak, vârtak sil phal pêk a ni a, (puon zai inhmi chu mi inthienghai thilthaw fel a ni si a.)

Chuongchun, Pathien chibai bûka bûk dingin a ke bulah ka bawkkhup a. Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hienghin thaw naw raw khai, kei chu nangma le i unau, Isu inhriettirna thu pawmhai suok chanpui ka ni annâwm; Pathien chibai bûk lem rawh; Isu inhriettirna thu chu thu hrilna thlarau a ni si a,” a ta.
Puon thisen kai a sil a, a hminga chun, “Pathien Thu,” an ta.
Vâna sipaihai chun, puon zai inhmi vârtak, faitak silin, sakawr vârhai chunga chuongin an zui a.
Chun, a puona le a êlpuia chun, “Lalhai Lal le hotuhai Hotu,” tia hming ziek a um.
Chun, nisaa khin vântirko ngîr ka hmu a; ama chun vânlaizâwla vate vuong po pohai kuoma chun rawl inringtaka khêkin, “Pathien ruoi ropuitak ṭhenaa chun hung inkhâwm ro,
Chun, Sahrâng dâm, hnuoia lalhai dâm, an sipaihai dâm, sakawr chunga chuong kha do ding le a sipaihai chu do dinga an inkhâwm ka hmu a.
Mi danghai chu sakawr chunga chuong kâwlhnâm, a baua inthawka suok khan sâthlum an ni ta a; vate po po chu an sahai fain an khawp ta vawng a.
Chun, vântirko vânsam chabi le khaidiet lientak chawia, vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmu a.
vânsama chun a pei lût a, a khâr khum a, kum sâng khat chu ân vawi hmakhat chu hnam tin a hlêm nâwk ta nawna dingin a châr nel ta a; chu hnunga chun sâwtnawtêa dingin insuo nâwk ding a nih.
(Mithi danghai ruok chu kum sâng khat chu ân vawi hmakhat chu an la hring hri naw a.) Chu chu thonâwkna hmasa chu a nih.

Thonâwkna hmasaa ṭhanghai chu an hamṭhain an inthieng a nih; chuonghai chunga chun thi hnina chun thu hrim a nei naw a. Pathien le Krista thiempuhai nîng an ta, ama leh kum sâng khat rorêlin um lem an tih.
Chun, kum sâng khat chu ân vawi pha chun Setan chu ân tângnaa inthawka insuoin um a ta,
Chun, hnuoi khang tieng dâpin a tungin an fe a, mi inthienghai le khuo ditumtak chu an inhuol ta a, chun, vâna inthawkin mei a hung tla a, anni chu a kânghmang ta a.
Chun, anni hlêmtu, Diebol chu Sahrâng le zâwlnei tehlêm umna, mei le kât dîla chun an pei ta a; chuongchun, chatuonin a sûn a zâna sawisakin um an tih.
Chun, lalṭhungpha lientak vârtak le a chunga ṭhung chu ka hmu a, a hmaa inthawk chun hnuoi le vân an tlân hmang a, an ta dingin hmun hrim a um ta naw a.
Tuisuoriet chun a sûnga mithi umhai chu ân suoktir a, Thina le Mithi Khuo chun an sûnga mithi umhai chu an insuoktir bawk a; chun, mi tin an thilthaw ang peia rêlpêkin an um ta a.
Chun, Thina le Mithi Khuohai chu mei dîlah an pei a. Chu chu thi hnina chu a nih, mei dîl chu.
Tûkhawm Hringna Buah a hming ziek an hmu naw chun mei dilah an pei bawk a.
“Ngai ta, Pathien bâwkte chu mihriem lai a hung um tah,
Ama chu an kuomah um a ta,
Anni chu a mihai nîng an ta,
Pathien ngei chu an kuomah um a ta,
An Pathien ni bawk a tih;
Thina um nâwk ta naw ni a,
Lungngai dâm, ṭap dâm, nat dâm khawm,
Um nâwk ta bawk naw ni a;
Thil hmasahai chu a bo tah,”
tiin.
Chun, lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chun, “Ngai ta, thil iengkim ka siem thar ie,” a ta. Chun, “Ziek rawh, hieng thu hi ring a umin ân dik si a,” a ti bawk a.

Amiruokchu, mi dawi dâm, awinaw dâm, tirdakum dâm, tuolthat dâm, indit hmang dâm, dawithiem dâm, milim bie dâm, khêlinhlip po po dâm chan ding chu mei le kâta kâng dîla chun um a tih; chu chu thi hnina chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, berbu pasari, hremna nuhnungtak pasaria sip chawi, vântirko pasari laia pakhat chu a hung a; ama chun, “Hung ta, mo, Berâmte nuhmei chu inentir ka ti che,” tiin a mi biek a.
Pathien ropuina a nei a, a varzie chu lung mantamtak ang, jaspi lung ang el hi a na, krustal lung angin a tle a nih.

Kul nasatak insângtak a nei a, kawtkhâr sâwm le pahni a nei a, kawtkhâr bulahai chun vântirko sâwm le pahni an um a, chuong kawtkhâra chun hming ziek a um bawk a, chuong chu Israel thlahai hnam sâwm le pahnihai hming chu a nih;
Chun, chu khaw kul chun lungphûm sâwm le pahni a nei a, chuonga chun Berâmte tirko sâwm le pahnihai hming a chuong a.
Khuo chu inbiel vêlin a um a, a dungtieng chu a khangtieng chen a nih; khuo chu luong chun ân khi a, fîng sîng khat le sâng hni a nih. A dungtieng le a khangtieng le ân sângtieng chu ân ang a nih.
Chun, a kul chu ân khi nâwk a, mihriem inkhi dân pangngaiin (chu chu vântirko inkhi dân pângngai chu a nih) tawng za khat sâwmli pali a nih.
Chun, a kul chu jaspi lunga siem a nih, khuo chu hlimen inthieng ang ela, rângkachak inthienga siem a nih.

Chu khaw kul lungphûmhai chu lung mantam chi tinrênga cheimawi a nih. Lungphûm hmasatak chu jaspi lung a na; a pahnina chu sapphir lung a na, a pathumna chu kalkidon lung a na; a palina chu smaragdin lung a na,

a pangana chu sardonuk lung a na, a parukna chu sardion lung a na, a pasarina chu kruso lung a na; a parietna chu birul lung a na, a pakuona chu topaz lung a na; a sâwmna chu krusopra lung a na; a sâwmpakhatna chu ngên lung a na; a sâwmpahnina chu amethusto lung a nih.
Chun, a sûnga chun biekin hrim ka hmu naw a; Lalpa Pathien Iengkimthawthei le Berâmte chu an biekin an ni si a.
Chu khuo chun a ên dingin nisa a ngai naw a, thla khawm a ngai bawk nawh; Pathien ropuina chun a ên a, an khâwnvar chu Berâmte a ni si a.
A kawthai chu sûnah khâr naw tawp an ta, chutaka chun zân hrim a um naw ding a ni si a.
Nisienlakhawm, thil inthiengnaw hrim lût dêr naw ni a, thil tirdakum thawhai le khêlinhlip khawm lût naw bawk an tih; Berâmte Hringna Bua hming an ziekhai chau lût an tih.
a hmêl hmûng an ta, a hming chu an bâwkah chuong bawk a tih.

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hieng thu hi ring a umin ân dik a nih; chuongchun, Lalpa zâwlneihai thlarau Pathien chun, thil hung tlung vak dinghai chu a suokhai kuoma inentir dingin, a vântirko a tir a nih.
Chun, ngai ta, ka hung vak ding a nih,” a ta. Hi lekhabu hrillâwkna pawm taphawt chu an hamṭha.
Kei Johan hieng thil po po hmutu le hretu chu ka nih. Chun, ka hrieta ka hmu chun hieng thil mîn entirtu vântirko ke bulah Pathien chibai bûka bûk dingin ka bawkkhup a.
Ama chun ka kuoma, “Hienghin chu thaw naw raw khai; kei chu nangma le i unau zâwlneihai le, hi lekhabu pawmtuhai suok chanpui ka ni annâwm, Pathien chibai bûk lem rawh,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hi lekhabu hrillâwkna thuhai hi ip naw; a hun chu a hung tlung ding a ni ta si a.
Mi felnaw chu sukfelnawin um zing raw se, mi inthiengnaw chu sukthiengnawin um zing raw se, mi fel chu sukfelin um zing raw se, mi inthieng chu sukthiengin um zing raw se.
“Ngai ta, ka hung vak ding a nih; mi tin an thilthaw ang peia pêk dingin ka lâwmman ka kuomah a um a.
Kei Alpha le Omega, a Hmasatak le a Nuhnungtak, a Bul le a Tâwp ka nih.
Hringna Thing chunga chun thu an nei theina ding le, kawtkhâra chun khuoa an lût theina dinga an puon sâwpfaihai chu an hamṭha.
Tuola chun, ui dâm, dawithiem dâm, indit chîng dâm, tuolthat dâm, milim bie dâm, khêl ngaina le khêlinhlip taphawthai chu um an tih.
“Kei Isu hin kohranhai ta dingin hieng thu hi in kuomah inhriettir dingin ka vântirko chu ka hung tir a nih. David bulpui le a thla arasi vartak, sikhawvar chu ka nih,” a ta.
Thlarau le mo chun, “Hung rawh,” an ti a. A hre taphawt chun, “Hung rawh,” ti raw se. Dangchâr taphawt hung raw se; a nuom taphawtin hringna tui hi a thlâwnin la raw se.
Hi lekhabu hrillâwkna thu hre taphawt chu kân hriettir; tûkhawmin hieng thu hi a belsa chun, a lekhabua hremna ziekhai hi, Pathienin a chungah belsa vêng a tih;
chun, tûkhawmin hi hrillâwkna lekhabu thua inthawka thu a lâkhmang chun hi lekhabua ziek Hringna Thing le Khaw Inthienga a chan chu Pathienin la hmang vêng a tih.
Hieng thu inhriettirtu hin, “Anih, ka hung vak ding a nih,” a tih. Amen, hung ta la, Lalpa Isu.
Lalpa Isu lunginsietna chu mi inthienghai kuomah um raw se. Amen.
